quotes.name: Henry Rollins

quotes.message: Adolescence is the conjugator of childhood and adulthood.
quotes.name: Louise J. Kaplan

quotes.message: The age of puberty is a crisis in the age of man worth studying. It is the passage from the unconscious to the conscious; from thesleep of passions to their rage.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Adolescence is just one big walking pimple.
quotes.name: Carol Burnett

quotes.message: Adolescence is perhaps nature's way of preparing parents to welcome the empty nest.
quotes.name: Karen Savage

quotes.message: Most of us have had that experience at around puberty of realising that, despite whatever efforts we put into our chosen sports, we will become at best competent.
quotes.name: Will Self

quotes.message: Adolescence is when girls experience social pressure to put aside their authentic selves and to display only a small portion of their gifts.
quotes.name: Mary Pipher

quotes.message: Dating is about finding out who you are and who others are. If you show up in a masquerade outfit, neither is going to happen.
quotes.name: Henry Cloud

quotes.message: In its purest form, dating is auditioning for mating (and auditioning means we may or may not get the part).
quotes.name: Joy Browne

quotes.message: Dating is a battleground filled with deception and infidelity.
quotes.name: Andrew S. Trees

quotes.message: Dating is really all about sex. In the conventional context, this means that the man invites the woman to go through a social encounter, the ultimate purpose of which is sexual engagement.
quotes.name: Alexander Mccall Smith

quotes.message: Dating is a give and take. If you only see it as 'taking,' you are not getting it.
quotes.name: Henry Cloud

quotes.message: Everybody knows the pressure of a first date: Searching for that perfect outfit. Hunting for ways to be engaging. Dissecting each detail when it's over to check for mistakes. Dating can make even the most confident person lose his cool.
quotes.name: Kelly Starling

quotes.message: Dating a girl with a guy best friend is never easy.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Internet dating is the fastest, most efficient way to gather a pool of qualified candidates. It could take you a lifetime to do the investigation that the computer comes up with in seconds.
quotes.name: Judsen Culbreth

quotes.message: Online dating is just as murky and full of lemons as finding a used car in the classifieds. Once you learn the lingo, it's easier to spot the models with high mileage and no warranty.
quotes.name: Laurie Perry

quotes.message: There is so much hurt in this game of searching for a mate, of testing, trying. And you realize suddenly that you forgot it was a game, and turn away in tears.
quotes.name: Sylvia Plath

quotes.message: Dating should be less about matching outward circumstances than meeting your inner necessity.
quotes.name: Mark Amend

quotes.message: Whenever I date a guy, I think, 'Is this the man I want my children to spend their weekends with?'
quotes.name: Rita Rudner

quotes.message: Never date a woman you can hear ticking.
quotes.name: Mark Patinkin

quotes.message: Dating an ex is the equivalent of failing a test you already had the answers to.
quotes.name: Kendrick Cole

quotes.message: Dating is different when you get older. You're not as trusting, or as eager to get back out there and expose yourself to someone.
quotes.name: Toni Braxton

quotes.message: Every time you date someone with an issue that you have to work to ignore, you're settling.
quotes.name: Andre Breton

quotes.message: Employees make the best dates. You don't have to pick them up and they're always tax-deductible.
quotes.name: Andy Warhol

quotes.message: Date someone because you already see a future, not because you want to see if you would work out.
quotes.name: Sarah Moores

quotes.message: A person's readiness to date is largely a matter of maturity and environment.
quotes.name: Dr. Myles Munroe

quotes.message: Well, dating has become a sport and not about finding the person you love.
quotes.name: Rashida Jones

quotes.message: Dating is really hard because everyone puts on a front. It's really difficult to see who is who, so it is important to be yourself.
quotes.name: Brooke Burke

quotes.message: Dating now is a lot like going shopping when you don't have any money. Even if you find the right thing, you can't do anything about it.
quotes.name: Joshua Harris

quotes.message: People tend to look at dating sort of like a safari - like they're trying to land the trophy.
quotes.name: Henry Cloud

quotes.message: Dating is all about the chase.
quotes.name: Lauren Conrad

quotes.message: Dating someone on the opposite end of the happy spectrum teaches you an incredible amount of patience.
quotes.name: Chris Pine

quotes.message: Dating someone exclusively for four months in New York is like four years in Anchorage.
quotes.name: Zack Love

quotes.message: Dating a man is like flying a kite. You only need to know when to wind up the string or let it out.
quotes.name: Jenna Alatari

quotes.message: You didn't date someone to change him. You dated him because you wanted him for the way he was. Flaws and fears and all.
quotes.name: Jean Oram

quotes.message: Basically, dating is like climbing a volcano and you never know when it's going to erupt, dumping molten lava and burning you.
quotes.name: Robin Bielman

quotes.message: To be happy with a man, you must understand him a lot and love him a little. To be happy with a woman you must love her a lot and not try to understand her at all.
quotes.name: Helen Rowlnad

quotes.message: When you've exhausted the traditional dating channels of casual bar encounters and awkward exchanges at the grocery store, the option of online dating is a ray of hope in an otherwise desolate field of desperation and loneliness.
quotes.name: Alfred Jarry

quotes.message: Before you enter into the world of online dating, be prepared with what to say in case your date looks less the pictures you saw online and moe like a sunburned walrus.
quotes.name: Alfred Jarry

quotes.message: It's afterward you realize that the feeling of happiness you had with a man didn't necessarily prove that you loved him.
quotes.name: Marguerite Duras

quotes.message: And I shall find some girl perhaps, and a better one than you. With eyes as wise, but kindlier, and lips as soft, but true, and I daresay she will do.
quotes.name: Rupert Brooke

quotes.message: Watching your daughter being collected by her date feels like handing over a $1 million Stradivarius to a gorilla.
quotes.name: Jim Bishop

quotes.message: Sometimes I wonder if men and women really suit each other. Perhaps they should live next door and just visit now and then.
quotes.name: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.message: Men will sleep with women they wouldn't date, and women will date men they wouldn't sleep with.
quotes.name: Rebecca Christian

quotes.message: I know we've only just met, but I have the feeling that I've known you all my life because every little thing you do drives me up the wall.
quotes.name: Dan Piraro

quotes.message: I'm afraid of dating. When the guy shows up at the door, I give him my purse and beg him not to hurt me.
quotes.name: Maria Bamford

quotes.message: I'm dating a homeless woman. It's easier to get her to stay over.
quotes.name: Gary Shandling

quotes.message: My biggest problem with dating is that I have no game. Some women can just bat their eyes and men come running. The men just keep popping up one after another. It's like they have a magical man-filled Pez dispenser.
quotes.name: Lori Giarnella

quotes.message: Opposites attract— and then aggravate.
quotes.name: Joy Browne

quotes.message: Everyone knows that dating in your thirties is not the happy-go-lucky free-for-all it was when you were twenty-two.
quotes.name: Helen Fielding

quotes.message: Dating a grad student was like making hurried-up popcorn: lots of butter, high heat, instant noise.
quotes.name: Will Weaver

quotes.message: Dating, after all is still about two people who are interested in one another and want to get together at a specific time and place.
quotes.name: Joy Browne

quotes.message: Dating requires a leap of faith that the two of you can have a good time together for an hour or two.
quotes.name: Joy Browne

quotes.message: Dating is an emotional experience. You're vulnerable. You're letting someone you barely know see the real you.
quotes.name: Joy Browne

quotes.message: A date may be just a pleasant coming together; a way of saying thank you for a favor, or it may be a delicate step in a courtship and mating dance.
quotes.name: Rebecca Sharp Colmer

quotes.message: But the one thing that says it all about dating is: it is about communication.
quotes.name: Rebecca Sharp Colmer

quotes.message: The bottomline is that dating is supposed to be fun and enjoyable. Maybe a few butterflies will flutter in your tummy but that is part of the thrill of dating.
quotes.name: Rebecca Sharp Colmer

quotes.message: Dating is something you do before making binding choices or exclusive commitments.
quotes.name: Rebecca Sharp Colmer

quotes.message: “To say that one waits a lifetime for his soulmate to come around is a paradox. People eventually get sick of waiting, take a chance on someone, and by the art of commitment become soulmates, which takes a lifetime to perfect.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: You know, the man of my dreams might walk round the corner tomorrow. I'm older and wiser and I think I'd make a great girlfriend. I live in the realm of romantic possibility.
quotes.name: Stevie Nicks

quotes.message: “Better to put your heart on the line, risk everything, and walk away with nothing than play it safe. Love is a lot of things, but “safe” isn't one of them.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Don't look for a partner who is eye candy. Look for a partner who is soul food.
quotes.name: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.message: Dating is like searching for the perfect wine. One date is too fruity, another too dry, and still another too much bouquet (cologne overdose). But once you find the perfect variety that suits your taste, get drunk.
quotes.name: Katie Kosko

quotes.message: Everything he does while you're dating is like a crystal ball predicting what he's going to be like after you're married. If you don't like a habit of his, honey, unless you fix it before the altar, it's there to stay.
quotes.name: Bethany Jett

quotes.message: Dating with no intent to marry is like going to the grocery store with no money. You either leave unhappy or take something that isn't yours.
quotes.name: Jefferson Bethke

quotes.message: Dating is like trying to make a meal out of leftovers. Some leftovers actually get better when they've had a little time to mature. But others should be thrown out right away, No matter how you try to warm them up, they're never as good as when they were new.
quotes.name: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.message: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Imagination will often carry us to worlds that never were. But without it we go nowhere.
quotes.name: Carl Sagan

quotes.message: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: I imagine that yes is the only living thing.
quotes.name: E. E. Cummings

quotes.message: To treat your facts with imagination is one thing, to imagine your facts is another.
quotes.name: John Burroughs

quotes.message: Imagination grows by exercise, and contrary to common belief, is more powerful in the mature than in the young.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: I imagine, therefore I belong and am free.
quotes.name: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.message: Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Imagination does not become great until human beings, given the courage and the strength, use it to create.
quotes.name: Maria Montessori

quotes.message: Imagination is the golden-eyed monster that never sleeps. It must be fed; it cannot be ignored.
quotes.name: Patricia A. Mckillip

quotes.message: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Reason is intelligence taking exercise. Imagination is intelligence with an erection.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Because when you are imagining, you might as well imagine something worth while.
quotes.name: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.message: Imagination means nothing without doing.
quotes.name: Charles Chaplin

quotes.message: The imagination is a palette of bright colors. You can use it to touch up memories ? or you can use it to paint dreams.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: Nothing encourages creativity like the chance to fall flat on one's face.
quotes.name: James D. Finley

quotes.message: The creative person is both more primitive and more cultivated, more destructive, a lot madder and a lot saner, than the average person.
quotes.name: Frank Barron

quotes.message: Sometimes imagination pounces; mostly it sleeps soundly in the corner, purring.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: He who has imagination without learning has wings but no feet.
quotes.name: Joseph Joubert

quotes.message: Imagination is the highest kite one can fly.
quotes.name: Lauren Bacall

quotes.message: Perhaps imagination is only intelligence having fun.
quotes.name: George Scialabba

quotes.message: I believe in the imagination. What I cannot see is infinitely more important than what I can see.
quotes.name: Duane Michals

quotes.message: Those who do not think outside the box are easily contained.
quotes.name: Nicolas Manetta

quotes.message: Creative minds have always been known to survive any kind of bad training.
quotes.name: Anna Freud

quotes.message: To think creatively, we must be able to look afresh at what we normally take for granted.
quotes.name: George Kneller

quotes.message: Imagination governs the world.
quotes.name: Napolon Bonaparte

quotes.message: Imagination was given to man to compensate him for what he is not; a sense of humor to console him for what he is.
quotes.name: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.message: The imagination is man's power over nature.
quotes.name: Wallace Stevens

quotes.message: My imagination makes me human and makes me a fool; it gives me all the world and exiles me from it.
quotes.name: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.message: The imagination, give it the least license, dives deeper and soars higher than Nature goes.
quotes.name: Henery David Thoreau

quotes.message: Imagination is an inner resource. That's why it takes stopping, slowing, silencing, reassuring, embracing to allow it to speak.
quotes.name: Suzanne Beth Stinnett

quotes.message: Imagination is actually a form of computation. Imagination gives calculated and instinctive solutions for the future.
quotes.name: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.message: It is better to have enough ideas for some of them to be wrong, than to be always right by having no ideas at all.
quotes.name: Edward de Bono

quotes.message: Imagination is the voice of daring. If there is anything godlike about God, it is that.
quotes.name: Henry Miller

quotes.message: Fantasy was always only a reality waiting to be switched on.
quotes.name: Joe Hill

quotes.message: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
quotes.name: John Muir

quotes.message: All the works of man have their origin in creative fantasy. What right have we then to depreciate imagination.
quotes.name: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.message: Imagination disposes of everything; it creates beauty, justice, and happiness, which is everything in this world.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: The quality of the imagination is to flow and not to freeze.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Imagination is not a talent of some people but is the health of everyone.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Imagination is a poor matter when it has to part company with understanding.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Only in men's imagination does every truth find an effective and undeniable existence. Imagination, not invention, is the supreme master of art as of life.
quotes.name: Joseph Conrad

quotes.message: Imagination is always the fabric of social life and the dynamic of history. The influence of real needs and compulsions, of real interests and materials, is indirect because the crowd is never conscious of it.
quotes.name: Simone Weil

quotes.message: The imagination is never governed, it is always the ruling and divine power.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: A strong imagination begetteth opportunity.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: The imagination is the secret and marrow of civilization.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Imagination allows you to see things in a non-traditional, non-restrictive manner. Your imagination is your picture of what tomorrow may bring.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Imagination is the only key to the future. Without it none exists - with it all things are possible.
quotes.name: Ida Tarbell

quotes.message: By peace we mean the capacity to transform conflicts with empathy, without violence, and creatively - a never-ending process.
quotes.name: Johan Galtung

quotes.message: Each one has to find his peace from within. And peace to be real must be unaffected by outside circumstances.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Even a fool, when he holds his peace, is counted wise.
quotes.name: Proverbs 17:28, Biblical Proverb

quotes.message: First keep the peace within yourself, then you can also bring peace to others.
quotes.name: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.message: Five great enemies to peace inhabit with us: avarice, ambition, envy, anger, and pride. If those enemies were to be banished, we should infallibly enjoy perpetual peace.
quotes.name: Francesco Petrarch

quotes.message: How different the peace of God from that of the world! It calms the passions, preserves the purity of the conscience, is inseparable from righteousness, unites us to God and strengthens us against temptations. The peace of the soul consists in an absolute resignation to the will of God.
quotes.name: Francois Fenelon

quotes.message: I do not want the peace which passeth understanding, I want the understanding which bringeth peace.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: I speak of peace, therefore, as the necessary rational end of rational men. I realize the pursuit of peace is not as dramatic as the pursuit of war? But we have no more urgent task.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: If you want peace, work for justice.
quotes.name: Pope Paul VI

quotes.message: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: If you wish to experience peace, provide peace for another.
quotes.name: Tenzin Gyatso

quotes.message: Imagine all the people living life in peace. You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us, and the world will be as one.
quotes.name: John Lennon

quotes.message: It isn't enough to talk about peace. One must believe in it. And it isn't enough to believe in it. One must work at it.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Let us forgive each other - only then will we live in peace.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: Peace begins with a smile..
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Peace comes from being able to contribute the best that we have, and all that we are, toward creating a world that supports everyone. But it is also securing the space for others to contribute the best that they have and all that they are.
quotes.name: Hafsat Abiola

quotes.message: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Peace demands the most heroic labor and the most difficult sacrifice. It demands greater heroism than war. It demands greater fidelity to the truth and a much more perfect purity of conscience.
quotes.name: Thomas Merton

quotes.message: Peace does not mean an absence of conflicts; differences will always be there. Peace means solving these differences through peaceful means; through dialogue, education, knowledge; and through humane ways.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.message: Peace has never come from dropping bombs. Real peace comes from enlightenment and educating people to behave more in a divine manner.
quotes.name: Carlos Santana

quotes.message: Peace hath higher tests of manhood than battle ever knew.
quotes.name: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.message: Peace is a daily, a weekly, a monthly process, gradually changing opinions, slowly eroding old barriers, quietly building new structures.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Peace is a journey of a thousand miles and it must be taken one step at a time.
quotes.name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.message: Peace is a practical positive policy, which must be attained by friendly co-operation between the nations, putting the good of all before the interests of each.
quotes.name: A. Ruth Fry

quotes.message: Peace is an unstable equilibrium, which can be preserved only by acknowledged supremacy or equal power.
quotes.name: Will Durant and Ariel Durant

quotes.message: Peace is every step.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hahn

quotes.message: Peace is more important than all justice; and peace was not made for the sake of justice, but justice for the sake of peace.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Peace is more than the absence of war. Peace is accord. Harmony.
quotes.name: Laini Taylor

quotes.message: Peace is never long preserved by weight of metal or by an armament race. Peace can be made tranquil and secure only by understanding and agreement fortified by sanctions. We must embrace international cooperation or international disintegration.
quotes.name: Bernard Baruch

quotes.message: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Peace is not an absence of war, it is a virtue, a state of mind, a disposition for benevolence, confidence, justice.
quotes.name: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.message: Peace is not merely a distant goal that we seek, but a means by which we arrive at that goal.
quotes.name: Marthin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: Peace is not something you wish for. It's something you make, something you do, something you are, and something you give away.
quotes.name: Robert Fulghum

quotes.message: Peace is something spontaneous; it is something that unites us. Peace is something that we have to spread. But unless and until we have peace deep within us, we can never hope to have peace in the outer world.
quotes.name: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.message: Peace is the only battle worth waging.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Peace may sound simple - one beautiful word - but it requires everything we have, every quality, every strength, every dream, every high ideal.
quotes.name: Yehudi Menuhin

quotes.message: Peace rules the day, where reason rules the mind.
quotes.name: William Collins

quotes.message: Peace. It doesn not mean to be in place where there is no noise, trouble, or hardwork. It means to be in the midst of those and still be calm in your heart.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The day the power of love overrules the love of power, the world will know peace.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: There is no way to peace, only peace.
quotes.name: A. J. Muste

quotes.message: To reach peace, teach peace.
quotes.name: Pope John Paul II

quotes.message: When you find peace within yourself, you become the kind of person who can live at peace with others
quotes.name: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.message: Where there is peace, God is.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: You cannot find peace by avoiding life.
quotes.name: Virginia Woolf

quotes.message: You have peace,' the old woman said, 'when you make it with yourself.
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: The art of peace is not easy. It is a fight to the finish, the slaying of evil desires and all falsehood within. On occasion the Voice of Peace resounds like thunder, jolting human beings out of their stupor.
quotes.name: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.message: The practice of the art of peace is an act of faith, a belief in the ultimate power of nonviolence.
quotes.name: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.message: No loud noise to interrupt my reverie so sweet, . Rendezvous with the past, future perhaps to meet. . Far away the cooing of a turtle dove, . Singing of its never-ending love.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Peace between races is not to be secured by degrading one race and exalting another, by giving power to one race and withholding it from another, but by maintaining a state of equal justice between all classes.
quotes.name: Frederick Douglass

quotes.message: Peace hath her victories no less renowned than war.
quotes.name: Milton

quotes.message: Peace has its victories no less than war, but it doesn't have as many monuments to unveil.
quotes.name: Frank Hubbbard

quotes.message: Peace begins just where ambition ends.
quotes.name: Edward Young

quotes.message: Peace in the present time is based more on fear than on friendship.
quotes.name: Paul VI

quotes.message: Peace cannot suddenly descend from the heavens. It can only come when the root-cause of trouble is removed.
quotes.name: Nehru

quotes.message: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.
quotes.name: Emerson

quotes.message: When we do not find peace within ourselves, it is vain to seek for it elsewhere.
quotes.name: La Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Learn calm to face what's pressing.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: Arms alone are not enough to keep the peace. It must be kept by people.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: No man can have peace longer than his neighbor pleases.
quotes.name: Dutch Proverb

quotes.message: If peace cannot be maintained with honor, it is no longer peace.
quotes.name: Lord John Russell

quotes.message: It must be a peace without victory. Only peace between equals can last.
quotes.name: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.message: He can never speak well, who knows not how to hold his peace.
quotes.name: Plutarch

quotes.message: Peace is such a precious jewel that I would give anything for it but the truth.
quotes.name: Matthew Henry

quotes.message: Peace is the happy, natural state of man; war, his corruption, and disgrace.
quotes.name: James Thomson

quotes.message: There is no harbor of peace from the changing waves of joy and despair.
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: If a man would live in peace, he should be blind, deaf, and dumb.
quotes.name: Turkish Proverb

quotes.message: If there is to be any peace, it will come through being, not having.
quotes.name: Henry Miller

quotes.message: The only way to bring peace to the earth is to learn to make your own life peaceful.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Non Violence has come among people and it will live. It is the harbinger of the peace of the world.
quotes.name: Gandhi

quotes.message: If a civman does find the solution for world peace, it will be the most revolutionary reversal of his record we have ever known.
quotes.name: George Marshall

quotes.message: For the Christian, peace is not simply the absence of conflict or any other artificial state the world has to offer. Rather it is the deep, abiding peace only Jesus Christ brings to the heart.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: There can never be peace between nations until there is first known that true peace which is within the souls of men.
quotes.name: Black Hawk

quotes.message: A harvest of peace is produced from a seed of contentment.
quotes.name: Indian Proverb

quotes.message: Fond as we are of our loved ones, there comes at times during their absence an unexplained peace.
quotes.name: Anne Shaw

quotes.message: Nonviolence doesn't always work— but violence never does.
quotes.name: Madge Micheels-Cyrus

quotes.message: We cannot have peace among men whose hearts find delight in killing any living creature.
quotes.name: Rachel Carson

quotes.message: Two things define your personality, the way you manage things when you have nothing, and the way you behave when you have everything.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It's beauty that captures your attention; personality that captures your heart.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: I use bits and pieces of others personalities to form my own.
quotes.name: Kurt Cobain

quotes.message: Your personality is the only permanent thing in your, ultimately, temporary life...that's all the more reason to cherish it.
quotes.name: Isabella Koldras

quotes.message: All too often our personality is nothing more than psychological clothing that we wear to hide our true self from the world.
quotes.name: Teal Swan

quotes.message: Let your personality be your profit and not your punishment.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: The note of the perfect personality is not rebellion, but peace.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: We continue to shape our personality all our life. If we knew ourselves perfectly, we should die.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Maybe that's what a person's personality is: the difference between the inside and the outside.
quotes.name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.message: Having a passive personality, is a soft way to live a dead life.
quotes.name: Omar EL KADMIRI

quotes.message: Personality is an unbroken series of successful gestures.
quotes.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.message: Personality has power to uplift, power to depress, power to curse, and power to bless.
quotes.name: Paul Harris

quotes.message: I am what is mine. Personality is the original personal property.
quotes.name: Norman O. Brown

quotes.message: I've trained myself to illuminate the things in my personality that are likable and to hide and protect the things that are less likeable.
quotes.name: Will Smith

quotes.message: There is nothing more attractive than a great positive personality. Its beauty never fades away with time.
quotes.name: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.message: Personality is in the very intention of the evolution of life, and the human personality is just one mode in which this intention is realized.
quotes.name: Joseph L. Baron

quotes.message: If you want to know my personality, look through my bedroom window and see how I act.
quotes.name: Benjamin Ndayishimiye

quotes.message: Personality is to a man what perfume is to a flower.
quotes.name: Charles M. Schwab

quotes.message: Personality is lower than partiality.
quotes.name: Goldwin Smith

quotes.message: I want freedom for the full expression of my personality.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: When you fall for their personality, everything about them becomes beautiful.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I think that personality traits that come through when somebody is really sincere is what makes them beautiful.
quotes.name: Taylor Swift

quotes.message: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Humility is no substitute for a good personality.
quotes.name: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.message: Where there is personality, there is discord.
quotes.name: Terry Pratchett

quotes.message: An ugly personality destroys a pretty face.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Our personality should be impenetrable even to ourselves.
quotes.name: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.message: When people label you by saying that you have attitude.Just tell them that you have a personality which is unshakable and unaffected by what people say about you.
quotes.name: Aarti Khurana

quotes.message: Personality is a mask you believe in.
quotes.name: Dr. White

quotes.message: Personality begins where comparison ends.
quotes.name: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.message: Personality is only ripe when a man has made the truth his own.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: Personality is the knowledge that we are apart from the rest of the universe.
quotes.name: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.message: A beautiful appearance will last a few decades, but a beautiful personality will last a lifetime.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: We get criticized for showing no personality, then we get penalized when we do.
quotes.name: Lindsay Davenport

quotes.message: If you want to build your personality don't do extraordinarily, just act like a human being.
quotes.name: Mohammad Rishad sakhi

quotes.message: Attractiveness and magnetism of man's personality is the result of his inner radiance.
quotes.name: Yajur Veda

quotes.message: Don't try to take on a new personality; it doesn't work.
quotes.name: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.message: The deeds and motive of man define his personality.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: You can't photoshop your ugly personality.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: One's personality can be understood from the people they mingle with.
quotes.name: Kazi Shams

quotes.message: Positive expectations are the mark of the superior personality.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: It's not what you say, it's how you say it - because personality always wins the day.
quotes.name: Joseph L. Baron

quotes.message: Personality is that which is thrust upon us.
quotes.name: Balkrishna Panday

quotes.message: For the adult, all the world is a stage and the personality is the mask one wears to play the assigned role.
quotes.name: Sam Keen

quotes.message: Personality is, in fact, only a free being emphasizing and recognizing itself as such. Every man makes his own personality, he is to that extent his own creator.
quotes.name: Sabine Baring-Gould

quotes.message: There is no formula for how to deal with different personality types. The process is one of exploration and observation. You can see how people respond to different things. You can approach them in a manner, see how they respond, and adjust accordingly. It's almost like you are putting out feelers to get a sense of how best to relate to them.
quotes.name: Michael Mamas

quotes.message: Personality is not a predictor of character.
quotes.name: Betty Russell

quotes.message: Personality is the supreme value, and should be regarded as an end and not merely as a means to an end.
quotes.name: Kirby Page

quotes.message: Personality is regarded as a collection of relatively discrete, independent, and narrow social capacities, each relevant to performance only within a specific domain of life.
quotes.name: David C. Funder

quotes.message: Personality is the outcome of our conditionings.
quotes.name: Balkrishna Panday

quotes.message: Our lives are shaped as profoundly by personality as by gender or race. And the single most important aspect of personality ... is where we fall on the introvert-extrovert spectrum.
quotes.name: Susan Cain

quotes.message: The nucleus of personality is the totality of 'activity attitudes' toward the world.
quotes.name: Robert J. Sternberg

quotes.message: But then one regrets the loss even of one's worst habits. Perhaps one regrets them the most. They are such an essential part of one's personality.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Our social personality is a creation of the thoughts of other people.
quotes.name: Marcel Proust

quotes.message: Personality refers to the very essence of an individual's unique nature. To become a personality is to achieve wholeness--to become complete. This is a lifelong process that requires a connection to one's social world but without total conformity to it.
quotes.name: Jim McMartin

quotes.message: Your personality is what's holding you back.
quotes.name: Jason Donnelly

quotes.message: Never underestimate personality. A sense of humor will make you popular; a little confidence will win you jobs; and the right amount of sass or cockiness will score you dates. Personality shines from within, mingling spirit and intelligence, so it's safe to assume it originates in the brain.
quotes.name: Susan Scutti

quotes.message: Personality is largely molded around how people hide, protect, or defend what they feel is a personal core weakness. The first thing you have to do is recognize the other person's vulnerability.
quotes.name: Michael Mamas

quotes.message: Personality is the dynamic organization within the individual of those psychosocial systems that determine his unique adjustments to his environment.
quotes.name: Gordon W. Allport

quotes.message: Find me a girl in today's world; who loves you solely for your inimitably unique and profound personality; without the most evaporating iota of spell-binding magic descending down your spine?
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: Personality unique: for with manner anarchic.
quotes.name: Bjørnstjerne Bjørnson

quotes.message: The pride of personality, seeking its highest, aspires to die, and in unspeakably profound.
quotes.name: Coventry Patmore

quotes.message: Your personality always keeps me smiling, even when I haven't had my joint.
quotes.name: Lamont Bennerman

quotes.message: Not just an evanescent droplet; but an unlimited measure of my intricate personality; the boundless vacillations of moods that even the tiniest of my nerves; inevitably underwent.
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: Personality shapes your intellect.
quotes.name: Xin-An Lu

quotes.message: It's a sign of mediocrity when you demonstrate gratitude with moderation.
quotes.name: Roberto Benigni

quotes.message: I'd made it back to the land of the living. No matter how boring or mediocre a world it might be, this was it.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: To those whose talents are above mediocrity, the highest subjects may be announced. To those who are below mediocrity, the highest subjects may not be announced.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Everything I've ever done was out of fear of being mediocre.
quotes.name: Chet Atkins

quotes.message: You know you've reached a new plateau of group mediocrity when even a Canadian is alarmed by your lack of individuality.
quotes.name: Sarah Vowell

quotes.message: Mediocrity is excellent to the eyes of mediocre people.
quotes.name: Joseph Joubert

quotes.message: I try to keep an open mind but I'm so tired of the mediocrity.
quotes.name: Clea Duvall

quotes.message: Only mediocrity can be trusted to be always at its best.
quotes.name: Max Beerbohm

quotes.message: People who are unable to motivate themselves must be content with mediocrity, no matter how impressive their other talents.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: Mediocrity is now, as formerly, dangerous, commonly fatal, to the poet; but among even the successful writers of prose, those who rise sensibly above it are the very rarest exceptions.
quotes.name: William E. Gladstone

quotes.message: The price of excellence is discipline. The cost of mediocrity is disappointment.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: Only the mediocre are always at their best.
quotes.name: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.message: Creative people are often found either disagreeable or intimidating by mediocrities.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: It takes more energy to maintain mediocrity than it takes to pursue excellence.
quotes.name: Matthew Kelly

quotes.message: Women want mediocre men, and men are working to be as mediocre as possible.
quotes.name: Margaret Mead

quotes.message: Mediocrity doesn't mean average intelligence, it means an average intelligence that resents and envies its betters.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: It is a wretched taste to be gratified with mediocrity when the excellent lies before us.
quotes.name: Isaac D'Israeli

quotes.message: Great artists are people who find the way to be themselves in their art. Any sort of pretension induces mediocrity in art and life alike.
quotes.name: Margot Fonteyn

quotes.message: Excellence is a better teacher than mediocrity. The lessons of the ordinary are everywhere. Truly profound and original insights are to be found only in studying the exemplary.
quotes.name: Warren G. Bennis

quotes.message: Some people are born mediocre, some people achieve mediocrity, and some people have mediocrity thrust upon them.
quotes.name: Joseph Heller

quotes.message: To a hungry person, every bitter food is sweet.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: It is cruel to discover one's mediocrity only when it is too late. It does not improve the temper.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: There's a lot of mediocrity being celebrated, and a lot of wonderful stuff being ignored or discouraged.
quotes.name: Sean Penn

quotes.message: Mediocrity will never do. You are capable of something better.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: There is always a heavy demand for fresh mediocrity. In every generation the least cultivated taste has the largest appetite.
quotes.name: Paul Gauguin

quotes.message: Perseverance - a lowly virtue whereby mediocrity achieves an inglorious success.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: In the republic of mediocrity, genius is dangerous.
quotes.name: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.message: Mediocrity knows nothing higher than itself, but talent instantly recognizes genius.
quotes.name: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.message: Nothing is as approved as mediocrity, the majority has established it and it fixes it fangs on whatever gets beyond it either way.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: Mediocrity requires aloofness to preserve its dignity.
quotes.name: Charles G. Dawes

quotes.message: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: If any of you have a desire to be mediocre, you will probably find that you have already achieved your ambition.
quotes.name: Hugh B. Brown

quotes.message: It is mediocrity which makes laws and sets mantraps and spring-guns in the realm of free song, saying thus far shalt thou go and no further.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: The way that I am now, I don't want to accept mediocrity. I don't want to accept the easy road.
quotes.name: Joe Nichols

quotes.message: Not doing more than the average is what keeps the average down.
quotes.name: William M. Winans

quotes.message: Ridicule is the tribute paid to the genius by the mediocrities.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Idleness is fatal only to the mediocre.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: When you tolerate mediocrity, you get more of it.
quotes.name: Frank Sonnenberg

quotes.message: The difference between greatness and mediocrity is often how an individual views a mistake.
quotes.name: Nelson Boswell

quotes.message: The highest level than can be reached by a mediocre but experienced mind is a talent for uncovering the weaknesses of those greater than itself.
quotes.name: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.message: Over and over again mediocrity is promoted because real worth isn't to be found.
quotes.name: Kathleen Norris

quotes.message: The world doesn't need any more mediocrity or hedged bets.
quotes.name: Anne Rice

quotes.message: Step out of the crowd of average people. Enter that game and change the values on the scoreboard.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: When small men attempt great enterprises, they always end by reducing them to the level of their mediocrity.
quotes.name: Read more: https://www.wisesayings.com/mediocrity-quotes/page-2/#ixzz6rxdqXz3v

quotes.message: Rebuilding relationship requires a lifelong discipline and commitment.
quotes.name: Sri Amma Bhagwan

quotes.message: Rebuilding our communities where the police and citizens all see themselves as being on the same side will require contributions from all of us.
quotes.name: Hillary Clinton

quotes.message: If we wish to rebuild our cities, we must first rebuild our neighborhoods.
quotes.name: Harvey Milk

quotes.message: We've got to rebuild human hearts - and persuade people that hope isn't just possible, but essential.
quotes.name: Tony Snow

quotes.message: As I rebuild my life, I remind myself not to relive the past.
quotes.name: Chelsea Manning

quotes.message: It is not difficult to rebuild a life. All we need is to be aware that we have the same strength we had before, and to use it in our favor.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: We must rebuild organic communities, where people can come together and have analogue conversations and share stories, art, music and emotions.
quotes.name: Bryant McGill

quotes.message: You can reconstruct the picture from chaos and memory's ruins.
quotes.name: Kay Boyle

quotes.message: We can so reconstruct society that it will be self-perpetuating instead of as now, self-exhaustive.
quotes.name: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.message: We all reconstruct our past because we wish to see how our present came to be our present - do we not?
quotes.name: Robert Jackson Bennett

quotes.message: He tried to reconstruct the story in his mind, but it kept getting confused, bleeding into itself like watercolors.
quotes.name: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.message: Every time he tried to reconstruct the internal arguments that had led to his decision, they sounded feebler to him.
quotes.name: J. K. Rowling

quotes.message: We renovate the heart by, of course, changing it, but we can't do that, really, without changing the other essential parts of the human personality.
quotes.name: Dallas Willard

quotes.message: Only in the shattering can the rebuilding occur.
quotes.name: Barbara Marciniak

quotes.message: Rebuild your world, rebuild your race, rebuild your empire. Rebuild it all. But make sure you rebuild your ideals too. Rebuild the principles that made you a great and honorable galactic power in the first place. Don't prey on the weak. Don't steal from the helpless. Don't murder the innocent. Be a force for good, not a force for yourself.
quotes.name: Dan Abnett

quotes.message: Busy remaking the world, man forgot to remake himself.
quotes.name: Andrei Platonov

quotes.message: The hope of remaking the world is indispensable in the struggle of oppressed men and women.
quotes.name: Paulo Freire

quotes.message: In restoring man from evil sovereignty, we must cheat.
quotes.name: Sun Myung Moon

quotes.message: Only by restoring the broken connections can we be healed. Connection is health.
quotes.name: Wendell Berry

quotes.message: The problem of restoring to the world original and eternal beauty is solved by redemption of the soul.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: It is the neglect of timely repair that makes rebuilding necessary.
quotes.name: Richard Whately

quotes.message: The key to truly rebuilding our central city on a vital and sustainable foundation is people.
quotes.name: Alan Autry

quotes.message: Without rebuilding the confidence between parties, you will never succeed.
quotes.name: Harri Holkeri

quotes.message: Whenever they rebuild an old building, they must first of all destroy the old one.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: We can actually reconstruct our past by examining what we think, say, feel, expect, believe, and do in an intimate relationship now.
quotes.name: David Richo

quotes.message: We must start... rebuilding our cities around energy efficiency and human needs, rather than around the car and wasted energy.
quotes.name: Jay Inslee

quotes.message: We are always remaking history. Our memory is always an interpretive reconstruction of the past, so is perspective.
quotes.name: Umberto Eco

quotes.message: Remaking the world wasn't always a stage show and a cheering crowd. Politics was just warfare by other means. The losers didn't get to hold rallies.
quotes.name: Alex London

quotes.message: In remaking the world in the likeness of a steam-heated, air-conditioned metropolis of apartment buildings we have violated one of our essential attributes-our kinship with nature.
quotes.name: Ross Parmenter

quotes.message: Restoring nature to its natural state is a cause beyond party and beyond factions. It has become a common cause of all the people of this country. It is a cause of particular concern to young Americans, because they more than we will reap the grim consequences of our failure to act on programs which are needed now if we are to prevent disaster later.
quotes.name: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.message: Better a decent remake than a bad original, don't you think?
quotes.name: Ram Charan

quotes.message: I guess that's just part of loving people: You have to give things up. Sometimes you even have to give them up.
quotes.name: Lauren Oliver

quotes.message: She taught me all about real sacrifice. That it should be done from love... That it should be done from necessity, not without exhausting all other options. That it should be done for people who need your strength because they don't have enough of their own.
quotes.name: Veronica Roth

quotes.message: It's not hard to decide what you want your life to be about. What's hard, she said, is figuring out what you're willing to give up in order to do the things you really care about.
quotes.name: Shauna Niequist

quotes.message: Nobody knows you as well as our spouse. And that means no one will be quicker to recognize a change when you deliberately start sacrificing your wants and wishes to make sure his or her needs are met.
quotes.name: Stephen Kendrick

quotes.message: The ultimate test of man's conscience may be his willingness to sacrifice something today for future generations whose words of thanks will not be heard.
quotes.name: Gaylord Nelson

quotes.message: People who put themselves on the line and sacrifice their own safety for the greater good and for others, and anyone in any profession whose concern is the welfare for other people instead of the individual, are inspiring and important.
quotes.name: Chris Hemsworth

quotes.message: Some day you will find out that there is far more happiness in another's happiness than in your own.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: Doing the right thing for someone else occasionally means doing something that feels wrong to you
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: Sometimes we have to step down to help somebody up, not because we failed to go up, but as a humble sacrifice to save a great soul.
quotes.name: Terry Mark

quotes.message: The sacrifice which causes sorrow to the doer of the sacrifice is no sacrifice. Real sacrifice lightens the mind of the doer and gives him a sense of peace and joy. The Buddha gave up the pleasures of life because they had become painful to him.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Whenever you feel compelled to put others first at the expense of yourself, you are denying your own reality, your own identity
quotes.name: David Stafford

quotes.message: For I was sure of one thing, it wasn't always the hero who saved the world. It was the person most willing to die first.
quotes.name: R.K. Ryals

quotes.message: Regardless of what the advertising campaigns may tell us, we can't have it all. Sacrifice is not an option, or an anachronism; it's a fact of life. We all cut off our own limbs to burn on some altar. The crucial thing is to choose an altar that's worth it and a limb you can accept losing. To go consenting to the sacrifice.
quotes.name: Tana French

quotes.message: Sacrifice is a part of life. It's supposed to be. It's not something to regret. It's something to aspire to. Little sacrifices. Big sacrifices. A mother works so her son can go to school. A daughter moves home to take care of her sick father.
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: As soon as sacrifice becomes a duty and necessity to mankind. I see no limit to the horizon which opens before him.
quotes.name: Ernest Renan

quotes.message: One-half of knowing what you want is knowing what you must give up before you get it.
quotes.name: Sidney Howard

quotes.message: Sacrifice still exists everywhere, and everywhere the elect of each generation suffers for the salvation of the rest.
quotes.name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.message: What we do for ourselves dies with us. What we do for others and the world remains and is immortal.
quotes.name: Albert Pine

quotes.message: Life becomes harder for us when we live for others, but it also becomes richer and happier.
quotes.name: Zahid Abas

quotes.message: I am thankful that in the giving we receive, and what we receive is the satisfaction of knowing that whatever we give is always bigger once we've given it away.
quotes.name: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.message: Self sacrifice is the real miracle out of which all the reported miracles grow.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: To put others in front of ourselves is to put God in front of everything.
quotes.name: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.message: All great things worth having require great sacrifice worth giving.
quotes.name: Paullina Simons

quotes.message: Occasionally in this life, we must give up or lose the things that we want in order to gain the things we really need.
quotes.name: David Kreger

quotes.message: They warn you that you're gonna have to make sacrifices, but i guess that means different things to different people, like giving up something you really want now for something you've wanted your whole life, or spending less time on yourself, so you can spend more time with someone you love.
quotes.name: Scrubs J.D

quotes.message: Real magic can never be made by offering someone else's liver. You must tear out your own, and not expect to get it back.
quotes.name: Peter S. Beagle

quotes.message: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish, but have eternal life.
quotes.name: Holy Bible: New International Version

quotes.message: Brotherhood means laying down your life for somebody, really willing to sacrifice yourself for somebody else.
quotes.name: Tim Hetherington

quotes.message: The most sublime act is to set another before you.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: Giving yourself is the ultimate revolution.
quotes.name: Bryant McGill

quotes.message: Mom's eyes held yours for a moment. 'I don't like or dislike the kitchen. I cooked because I had to. I had to stay in the kitchen so you could all eat and go to school. How could you only do what you like? There are things you have to do whether you like it or not.
quotes.name: Kyung-sook Shin

quotes.message: If people knew what they were missing, they would give up everything they have to achieve it.
quotes.name: Belsebuub

quotes.message: What we obtain too cheaply, we esteem too lightly; it's dearness only that gives everthing its value.
quotes.name: Thomas Paine

quotes.message: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: The important thing is this: To be able, at any moment, to sacrifice what we are for what we could become
quotes.name: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.message: Sometimes in life, you do things you don't want to. Sometimes you sacrifice, sometimes you compromise. Sometimes you let go and sometimes you fight.
quotes.name: Lindy Zart

quotes.message: Sacrifice, which is the passion of great souls, has never been the law of societies.
quotes.name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.message: The Lord requires sacrifice, meaning something above and beyond the minimum. The Master spoke of the 'second mile' and told us to go there. Why Because he wants to bless us, and he put all the blessings in the second mile.
quotes.name: Hartman Rector, Jr.

quotes.message: Where excess lies, usually someone had to give something up for the other to get it.
quotes.name: A.J. Darkholme

quotes.message: A wise man once said you can have anything in life, if you sacrifice everything else for it. What he meant is, nothing comes without a price. So before you go into battle you better decide how much you're willing to lose.
quotes.name: Bernajoy Vaal

quotes.message: Nothing great was ever achieved without a personal sacrifice. You have to pay the price to realize your goals.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: There's something tightly woven throughout the fabric of our humanity that runs entirely opposite to the baser instinct of looking out for our own good.
quotes.name: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.message: For you, and for any dear to you, I would do anything. I would embrace any sacrifice for you and for those dear to you. And when you see your own bright beauty springing up anew at your feet, think now and then that there is a man who would give his life, to keep a life you love beside you.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: In order for you to receive, someone else has to give. That's called sacrifice.
quotes.name: Todd Stocker

quotes.message: Yet, there is a sense of some deep sort that runs entirely contrary to human nature, that in putting ourselves first, we must by necessity put others first.
quotes.name: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.message: Sacrifice is the most beautiful situation and solution for all social problems.
quotes.name: Kartik Mehta

quotes.message: Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears and sweat.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: In this world it is not what we take up, but what we give up, that makes us rich.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: To give anything less than your best is to sacrifice the gift.
quotes.name: Steve Prefontaine

quotes.message: Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.
quotes.name: James M. Barrie

quotes.message: Sweat plus sacrifice equals success.
quotes.name: Charlie Finley

quotes.message: There's only one effectively redemptive sacrifice, the sacrifice of self will to make room for the knowledge of God.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: He who would accomplish little must sacrifice little. He who would achieve much must sacrifice much. He who would attain highly must sacrifice greatly.
quotes.name: James Allen

quotes.message: The law of sacrifice is uniform throughout the world. To be effective it demands the sacrifice of the bravest and the most spotless.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Sacrifice is nothing other than the production of sacred things.
quotes.name: Georges Bataille

quotes.message: It is what we give up, not what we lay up, that adds to our lasting store.
quotes.name: Hosea Ballou

quotes.message: It is a clear gain to sacrifice pleasure in order to avoid pain.
quotes.name: Leading with Wisdom

quotes.message: Sacrifice is the ecstasy of giving the best we have to the One we love most.
quotes.name: J. Oswald Sanders

quotes.message: In everyday things the law of sacrifice takes the form of positive duty.
quotes.name: James Anthony Froude

quotes.message: One life is all we have and we live it as we believe in living it. But to sacrifice what you are and to live without belief, that is a fate more terrible than dying.
quotes.name: Joan of Arc

quotes.message: Don’t sacrifice yourself too much, because if you sacrifice too much there’s nothing else you can give and nobody will care for you.
quotes.name: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.message: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: To achieve some depth in your field requires a lot of sacrifices.
quotes.name: Mikhail Baryshnikov

quotes.message: You can only become great at something you are willing to sacrifice for.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: In gambling the many must lose in order that the few may win.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: The gambling interests like to point to the construction jobs, but those jobs go away.
quotes.name: John Warren Kindt

quotes.message: The subject of gambling is all encompassing. It combines man's natural play instinct with his desire to know about his fate and his future.
quotes.name: Franz Rosenthal

quotes.message: Victory is a fleeting thing in the gambling business. Today's winners are tomorrow's blinking toads, dumb beasts with no hope.
quotes.name: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.message: I figure you have the same chance of winning the lottery whether you play or not.
quotes.name: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.message: You bring in gambling into a major population base, and the more people you have going into a casino, the more people you have hooked on gambling.
quotes.name: John Warren Kindt

quotes.message: At the gambling table, there are no fathers and sons.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Gambling has held human beings in thrall for millennia. It has been engaged in everywhere, from the dregs of society to the most respectable circles.
quotes.name: Peter L Bernstein

quotes.message: If you must play, decide upon three things at the start: the rules of the game, the stakes, and the quitting time.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Gambling operates under the premise that greed can be satisfied by luck.
quotes.name: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.message: Gambling is not a vice, it is an expression of our humanness. We gamble. Some do it at the gaming table, some do not. You play, you win, you play, you lose. You play.
quotes.name: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.message: Gambling is the great leveller. All men are equal at cards.
quotes.name: Nikolai Gogol

quotes.message: At gambling, the deadly sin is to mistake bad play for bad luck.
quotes.name: Ian Fleming

quotes.message: The gambling supply house catalog is distinctly not the safest place to learn about cheating devices, beware of catalog men.
quotes.name: John Scarne

quotes.message: Gambling makes boys selfish and cruel as well as men.
quotes.name: Thomas Hughes

quotes.message: Gambling is entertainment. People go to casinos to be entertained.
quotes.name: Eric Schneiderman

quotes.message: The gambling known as business looks with austere disfavor upon the business known as gambling.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: Gambling is not as destructive as war or as boring as pornography. It is not as immoral as business or as suicidal as watching television. And the percentages are better than religion.
quotes.name: Mario Puzo

quotes.message: Gambling can turn into a dangerous two-way street when you least expect it. Weird things happen suddenly, and your life can go all to pieces.
quotes.name: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.message: A Gentleman is a man who will pay his gambling debts even when he knows he has been cheated.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: Gambling with cards or dice or stocks is all one thing. It's getting money without giving an equivalent for it.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: It's hard to walk away from a winning streak, even harder to leave the table when you're on a losing one.
quotes.name: Cara Bertoia

quotes.message: I want people to understand, gambling is not a bad thing if you do it within the framework of what it's meant to be, which is fun and entertaining.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: Gambling is an act of faith of gamblers. Prophecy is an act of faith of the saints.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Gambling is a disease of barbarians superficially civilized.
quotes.name: Dean Inge

quotes.message: All gambling is the telling of a fortune, but of a monstrously depleted fortune, empty of everything save one numerical circumstance, shorn of all such richness as a voyage across the water, a fair man that loves you, a dark woman that means you harm.
quotes.name: Rebecca West

quotes.message: Time spent in a casino is time given to death, a foretaste of the hour when one's flesh will be diverted to the purposes of the worm and not of the will.
quotes.name: Rebecca West

quotes.message: Gambling is a principle inherent in human nature.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: By gaming we lose both our time and treasure: two things most precious to the life of man.
quotes.name: Owen Feltham

quotes.message: Gambling: The sure way of getting nothing for something.
quotes.name: Wilson Mizner

quotes.message: Some psychiatrists claim gambling is masochistic, that gamblers want to lose to punish themselves. Sure some do. Some People like to jump off the Empire State Building. But millions go up to look at the view.
quotes.name: Mario Puzo

quotes.message: A gambler is someone who plays slot machines. I prefer to own slot machines.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: It's the risk I like about owning a casino. Some days you win, other days you win more.
quotes.name: Paul Lyons

quotes.message: No use gambling if you can't lose your head once in a while.
quotes.name: Larry Merchant

quotes.message: So the gambler, lest he should lose, does not stop losing.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: He was so sure he would lose that he had not played everything— as if to prolong the sensation of losing.
quotes.name: Andre Malraux

quotes.message: They gambled with me for my heart with all kinds of games. They defeated me and took it away.
quotes.name: As-Sanawbari

quotes.message: The solemn resolutions, which are nevertheless broken, never to do it again, the stupefying pleasure and the bad conscience which tells the subject he is ruining himself.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: Bad beats haunt you like bad dreams.
quotes.name: Alvin Alvarez

quotes.message: Show me a gambler and I'll show you a loser.
quotes.name: Mario Puzo

quotes.message: To gamble is to risk, to approach 'the ruin factor.' When I was poor the ruin factor was not important. Hell, I was ruined anyway.
quotes.name: Mario Puzo

quotes.message: I play in order to lose. That's what gets my juice going. If I only bet on the games I know, I could at least break even.
quotes.name: Axel Freed

quotes.message: The games became burning lights on the floor of my withdrawal, and later, while I slept, there were poker chips falling through my dreams.
quotes.name: Jim Lewis

quotes.message: My only worry about my husband's gambling is that he may lose.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: It is possible that a wise and good man may be prevailed on to gamble; but it is impossible that a professed gamester should be a wise and good man.
quotes.name: Lavater

quotes.message: Some play for gain; to pass time others play; both play the fool; who gets byplay is loser in the end.
quotes.name: Heath

quotes.message: Curst is the wretch enslaved to such a vice, who ventures life and soul upon the dice.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: All gaming, since it implies a desire to profit at the expense of others, involves a breach of the tenth commandment.
quotes.name: Whately

quotes.message: Gambling houses are temples where the most sordid and turbulent passions contend; there no spectator can be indifferent. A card or a small square of ivory interests more than the loss of an empire, or the ruin of an unoffending group of infants and their nearest relatives.
quotes.name: Zimmermann

quotes.message: Out of adultery comes murder, out of gambling comes thieving.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: In Texas it's not a question of gambling; it's a question of what time are we gambling. I mean, I grew up shooting dice.
quotes.name: Jackie Burke

quotes.message: Life is a big gambling game. Some are born lucky and some are born unlucky.
quotes.name: Jack London

quotes.message: I have a notion that gamblers are as happy as most people, being always excited; women, wine, fame, the table, even ambition, sate now & then, but every turn of the card & cast of the dice keeps the gambler alive— besides one can game ten times longer than one can do anything else.
quotes.name: Lord Byron

quotes.message: There is no gambling like politics.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: I have no brief for gambling, nay . The notion I express . That money earned 's the only way . To pay for happiness. . With cards and dice I do not hold; . By betting I've been bit: . Conclusion: to get honest gold . You've got to sweat for it.
quotes.name: Robert William Service

quotes.message: To build a new way . That may lead, towards . The same outcome . So I dare not . I am afraid, . From such ones . It seems everyone is that . I cannot risk and bear . Such gambling again.
quotes.name: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.message: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Quit while you're ahead. All the best gamblers do.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian y Morales

quotes.message: The only sure thing about luck is that it will change.
quotes.name: Bret Harte

quotes.message: The roulette table pays nobody . except him that keeps it.. Nevertheless a passion for gaming is common, . though a passion . for keeping roulette tables is unknown.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Luck, bad if not good, will always be with us. But it has a way of favoring the intelligent and showing its back to the stupid.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: Remember this: The house doesn't beat the player. It just gives him the opportunity to beat himself.
quotes.name: Nicholas Dandolos

quotes.message: Like anyone else, there are days I feel beautiful and days I don't, and when I don't, I do something about it.
quotes.name: Cheryl Tiegs

quotes.message: Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical.
quotes.name: Sophia Loren

quotes.message: I feel beautiful when I'm at peace with myself. When I'm serene, when I'm a good person, when I've been considerate of others.
quotes.name: Elle Macpherson

quotes.message: It's not vanity to feel you have a right to be beautiful. Women are taught to feel we're not good enough, that we must live up to someone else's standards. But my aim is to cherish myself as I am.
quotes.name: Elle Mcpherson

quotes.message: And barefoot or first thing in the morning, I feel beautiful. Because I feel like me. I didn't always feel that way, but I feel that way now. When somebody just loves you, and when you make somebody happy, when your presence seems to make them happy, you suddenly feel like the most beautiful person in the world.
quotes.name: Angelina Jolie

quotes.message: Beauty is eternity gazing at itself in a mirror. But you are eternity and you are the mirror.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: Although beauty may be in the eye of the beholder, the feeling of being beautiful exists solely in the mind of the beheld.
quotes.name: Martha Beck

quotes.message: It's important to feel beautiful; it's political to feel beautiful.
quotes.name: Margaret Cho

quotes.message: I know now that it's really important to feel beautiful. There is a power to that.
quotes.name: Lana Del Rey

quotes.message: But looking beautiful isn't, I think, as important as feeling beautiful.
quotes.name: Julia Quinn

quotes.message: You've got to get up every morning with a smile on your face . And show the world all the love in your heart . Then people gonna treat you better . You're gonna find, yes you will . That you're beautiful as you feel.
quotes.name: Carole King

quotes.message: I don't look my best when I wake up. But, I do feel beautiful when I'm tired and happy and I've had a good laugh and a glass of champagne.
quotes.name: Maya Rudolph

quotes.message: When I lay my head on the pillow at night I can say I was a decent person today. That's when I feel beautiful.
quotes.name: Drew Barrymore

quotes.message: Nothing makes a woman more beautiful than the belief that she is beautiful.
quotes.name: Rashida Jones

quotes.message: You need to feel beautiful on your own before a guy can make you feel beautiful, because it wont be a healthy relationship.
quotes.name: Megan Park

quotes.message: I want to feel beautiful, like when he told me I was.
quotes.name: Pamela L. Ritchie

quotes.message: You should feel beautiful and you should feel safe. What you surround yourself with should bring you peace of mind and peace of spirit.
quotes.name: Stacy London

quotes.message: I never think, Oh, I'm so beautiful. To me, feeling happy is more important.
quotes.name: Leslie Bibb

quotes.message: I feel most beautiful at night, when I take my makeup off and it's just me.
quotes.name: Ashley Greene

quotes.message: I believe that how you feel is very important to how you look - that healthy equals beautiful.
quotes.name: Victoria Principal

quotes.message: Personally, I don't ever want to depend on makeup to feel beautiful.
quotes.name: Lupita Nyong'o

quotes.message: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don't need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line.
quotes.name: Lucille Ball

quotes.message: Beauty does not always feel beautiful.
quotes.name: Tynee Williams

quotes.message: Looking beautiful starts by feeling beautiful.
quotes.name: Tresors De Luxe

quotes.message: The first question I ask myself when something doesn't seem to be beautiful is why do I feel it's not beautiful? And very shortly you discover there is no reason.
quotes.name: John Cage

quotes.message: Confidence is the ability to feel beautiful without needing someone to tell you.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Despite the message of self-doubt and inadequacy hammered home by the beauty industry, the truth is simple: If you feel gorgeous, you'll look gorgeous.
quotes.name: Anita Roddick

quotes.message: Beauty can't amse you, but brainwork— reading, writing, thinking— can.
quotes.name: Helen Gurley Brown

quotes.message: I am so beautiful, sometimes people weep when they see me. And it has nothing to do with what I look like really, it is just that I gave myself the power to say that I am beautiful, and if I can do that, maybe there is hope for them, too. And the great divide between the beautiful and the ugly will cease to be. Because we are all what we choose.
quotes.name: Margaret Cho

quotes.message: I was sweaty, and my hair was matted all over the place. And I was happy and hot and accomplishing a lot and running around, and I could feel my heart beating, and I felt beautiful.
quotes.name: Angelina Jolie

quotes.message: Taught from infancy that beauty is woman's sceptre, the mind shapes itself to the body, and roaming round its gilt cage, only seeks to adorn its prison.
quotes.name: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.message: I think that the longer I look good, the better gay men feel.
quotes.name: Cher

quotes.message: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
quotes.name: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.message: There is a certain age when a woman must be beautiful to be loved, and then there comes a time when she must be loved to be beautiful.
quotes.name: Francoise Sagan

quotes.message: Now that I'm pregnant I feel beautiful for the first time in my life.
quotes.name: Karen Alexander

quotes.message: Remind yourself everyday that you are beautiful, whether you struggle to believe that or you already know.
quotes.name: Becca Anderson

quotes.message: I think I'm a very pretty girl. I'm never going to pretend to think otherwise.
quotes.name: Milla Jovovich

quotes.message: I am comfortable in my clothes. I am naturally beautiful. I recognize that I have true beauty.
quotes.name: Becca Anderson

quotes.message: I see myself as sexy. If you are comfortable with it, it can be very classy and appealing.
quotes.name: Aaliyah

quotes.message: I am healthy and attractive. I am free of negativity. I see myself as beautiful.
quotes.name: Becca Anderson

quotes.message: Beauty is about being comfortable in your own skin . It's about knowing and accepting who you are.
quotes.name: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.message: Beauty as we feel it is something indescribable: what is or what it means can never be said.
quotes.name: George Santayana

quotes.message: Beauty is momentary in he mind— . The fitful tracing of a portal; . But in the flesh it is immortal; . The body dies; the body;s beauty lives.
quotes.name: Wallace Stevens

quotes.message: Research shows the way someone feels about their looks has a far greater effect on their quality of life than how they actually look.
quotes.name: Jessamy Hibberd

quotes.message: Recognising this difference (how you look versus how you feel about how you look) is the first step to feeling more beautiful.
quotes.name: Jessamy Hibberd

quotes.message: What really makes me feel beautiful is that I can finally feel the powerful emotion of love.
quotes.name: Nancy Ostrov

quotes.message: All that matters to me now is that people see me as a beautiful woman, and for the first time in my life, I feel beautiful.
quotes.name: Nancy Ostrov

quotes.message: What we don't get is no one can make us feel beautiful, unless we know and we feel that we are.
quotes.name: Rosilia A. Albert

quotes.message: I'm beautiful because I can feel it, I can taste it, I can smell it. It's all over me. I have a big heart, a beautiful heart. Anyone that comes in contact with me will always feel my beauty.
quotes.name: Rosilia A. Albert

quotes.message: There is nothing to do except to be just who you are. You have the right to feel beautiful and enjoy it.
quotes.name: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.message: What matters is how you feel inside, because feeling beautiful on the inside is key to looking good.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: I think that glamour is about confidence. I think however somebody feels beautiful, that's glamour.
quotes.name: Kate Upton

quotes.message: As a woman, I believe you have to embrace your body, and feel beautiful both inside and out.
quotes.name: Tamara Ecclestone

quotes.message: Beauty is really all about confidence. If you feel beautiful, then you are beautiful.
quotes.name: Sofia Vergara

quotes.message: 'You can't be beautiful,' Brandy says about a thousand times, 'until you feel beautiful.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: I contend that every woman has the right to feel beautiful, no matter how scrambled her features, or how indifferent her features.
quotes.name: Marie Dressler

quotes.message: I don't give up, and I make sure to keep my standards high.
quotes.name: Lukasz Gottwald

quotes.message: You're going to find the people that make it work never quit, quitting is not an option.
quotes.name: Bob Proctor

quotes.message: Don't give up the search for happiness because you're afraid of getting hurt.
quotes.name: Martha Raye

quotes.message: Don't give up, what've you do; eyes front, head high to the finish.
quotes.name: Edgar A. Guest

quotes.message: If you start a painting and you don't like where it's going, don't give up on it. Just keep going and follow through. You might be surprised how it ends up.
quotes.name: Andrew McDermott

quotes.message: Resolve never to quit, never to give up, no matter what the situation.
quotes.name: Jack Nicklaus
