quotes.message: You don't give up the intention, and you don't give up the desire. You give up your attachment to the results.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: You can dance in the storm. Don't wait for the rain to be over before because it might take too long. You can can do it now. Wherever you are, right now, you can start, right now; this very moment.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Don't quit your day jobs, boys, but always keep your sense of humor.
quotes.name: Kimberly Guilfoyle

quotes.message: If you don't give up on something you truly believe in, you will find a way.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: If you don't give up your hopes and dreams, then there will always be a good ending.
quotes.name: Choi Minho

quotes.message: When something really matters, you should never give up or give in.
quotes.name: Gordon Brown

quotes.message: Never quit believing that you can develop in life. Never give up. Don't deny the inward spirit that provides the drive to accomplish great things in life.
quotes.name: Jon Huntsman, Sr.

quotes.message: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.message: Keep believing. You may be tired, discouraged, but don't give up on your future.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: You can actually overcome all the limitations of life and achieve your dreams, if you don't give up too early.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: There are tomorrows on their way worth the struggles of today. Never give up.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: It doesn't matter how many times you get knocked down. All that matters is you get up one more time than you were knocked down.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: People think they have to give up things to make a difference to the world, but you don't have to.
quotes.name: Waris Ahluwalia

quotes.message: Never quit. It is the easiest cop-out in the world. Set a goal and don't quit until you attain it. When you do attain it, set another goal, and don't quit until you reach it. Never quit.
quotes.name: Bear Bryant

quotes.message: I never quit trying. I never felt that I didn't have a chance to win.
quotes.name: Arnold Palmer

quotes.message: Don't ever give up. You gotta keep trying, and never give up.
quotes.name: Ryan Sheckler

quotes.message: Always believe in yourself and never give up because you don't know what success could be right around the corner.
quotes.name: Jamie Hampton

quotes.message: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.
quotes.name: William J. Clinton

quotes.message: Don't quit. For if you do, you may miss the answer to your prayers.
quotes.name: Max Lucado

quotes.message: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
quotes.name: Conrad Hilton

quotes.message: Winners never quit and quitters never win.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Never lose hope; until your bones are rotten, never give up.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
quotes.name: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.message: Success is a choice; a promise that you make to yourself to keep moving forward.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Bourgeret

quotes.message: Don't give up, be positive and if you know someone who knows someone at a record company don't stop beating down their door till you get heard. Don't ever say it'll never happen or it'll never happen.
quotes.name: Mary J. Blige

quotes.message: Don't ever give up on something or someone that you can't go a full day without thinking about.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Whatever you hold onto that you want to do, and that other people tell you you are foolish to want to do, don't give up.
quotes.name: Dermot Mulroney

quotes.message: Don't give up on the people you love. Your patient love and faithfulness may be exactly what they need to make a complete turn around.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: Use what you've been through as fuel, believe in yourself and be unstoppable!
quotes.name: Yvonne Pierre

quotes.message: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.name: Earl Nightingale

quotes.message: Whatever you're going through in your life, don't ever give up.
quotes.name: Mariah Carey

quotes.message: The success gate is far at the end of the long failure corridor. Keep moving no matter how many potholes you step into.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Don't quit. Never give up trying to build the world you can see, even if others can't see it. Listen to your drum and your drum only. It's the one that makes the sweetest sound.
quotes.name: Simon Sinek

quotes.message: Every great journey begins with one step and it begins with moving forward, turning on the engine, and shifting into the right gear at the right time. Remember, going through pain is temporary and it will subside, but quitting on the other hand lasts forever.
quotes.name: Louie Herron

quotes.message: If you fail, never give up. Keep trying, you will succeed.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: You can't please everybody. I give up. I'm not trying to. I don't care. Leave me alone with that.
quotes.name: Estelle

quotes.message: Don't give up your power to change things. Negativity and unhappiness are caused by you. You can change your attitude.
quotes.name: Satchidananda Swami

quotes.message: Don't give up in your goals in life, I'm a perfect example of how dreams can come true.
quotes.name: Paula DeAnda

quotes.message: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
quotes.name: Paul Bryant

quotes.message: The longer a man's fame is likely to last, the longer it will be in coming.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: People confuse fame with validation or love. But fame is not the reward. The reward is getting fulfillment out of doing the thing you love.
quotes.name: Claire Danes

quotes.message: Fame is like a shaved pig with a greased tail, and it is only after it has slipped through the hands of some thousands, that some fellow, by mere chance, holds on to it!
quotes.name: Davy Crockett

quotes.message: Fame is hollow. It amplifies what is there. If there is any self-doubt, or hatred, or lack of ability to connect with people, fame will magnify it.
quotes.name: Alanis Morissette

quotes.message: If you wanna be famous, then it's okay if the music is fake, because fame isn't real.
quotes.name: Josh Homme

quotes.message: With fame, you can't trust everybody. You can't depend on them being there for you as a person. They will only be there because of what you've got you as a person. They will only be there because of what you've got and what you can bring to their life. It's not a relationship-it's a leech.
quotes.name: Chris Brown

quotes.message: Passion for fame: A passion which is the instinct of all great souls.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: The present condition of fame is merely fashion.
quotes.name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Fame can take interesting men and thrust mediocrity upon them.
quotes.name: David Bowie

quotes.message: If you're lucky enough to be famous, then it's great if you can use your fame and the power your fame gives you to draw attention to things that really matter.
quotes.name: Michael Schumacher

quotes.message: One of the downsides of being famous is that folks pay far more attention to you than they should. American celebrities are constantly under surveillance, and every word they say is subject to scrutiny. So, be careful what you wish for if you desire fame. No human being should be a goldfish.
quotes.name: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.message: Worldly fame is but a breath of wind that blows now this way, and now that, and changes name as it changes direction.
quotes.name: Dante Alighieri

quotes.message: Fame is a vapor; popularity an accident; riches take wings; the only earthly certainty is oblivion.
quotes.name: Horace Greeley

quotes.message: Fame is the thirst of youth.
quotes.name: Lord Byron

quotes.message: For children preserve the fame of a man after his death.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: Fame is indeed beautiful and benign and gentle and satisfying, but happiness is something at once tender and brilliant beyond all things.
quotes.name: Mary MacLane

quotes.message: There's a funny thing about fame. The truth is you run as fast as you can towards it because it's everything you want. Not just the fame but what it represents, meaning work, meaning opportunity. And then you get there, and it's shocking how immediately you become enveloped in this world that is incredibly restricting.
quotes.name: George Clooney

quotes.message: Fame or perceived success - it all comes from groupthink.
quotes.name: Chance The Rapper

quotes.message: Fame is something that is bestowed upon you because of success. Success is something you have to chase.
quotes.name: Noel Gallagher

quotes.message: Fame is like a big piece of meringue - it's beautiful, and you keep eating it, but it doesn't really fill you up.
quotes.name: Pierce Brosnan

quotes.message: Fame itself... doesn't really afford you anything more than a good seat in a restaurant.
quotes.name: David Bowie

quotes.message: You can't reverse fame. You can lose all the money, but you'll never lose people knowing you.
quotes.name: J. Cole

quotes.message: If we should be blessed by some great reward, such as fame or fortune, it's the fruit of a seed planted by us in the past.
quotes.name: Bodhidharma

quotes.message: In general, when you have success on the field, you're more popular, and you have that fame that comes with it. You realize you're in the public eye more, and you've got to be a little bit more careful about some of the things you're doing out in public and make sure you're smart about the things you say.
quotes.name: Aaron Rodgers

quotes.message: Fame has also this great drawback, that if we pursue it, we must direct our lives so as to please the fancy of men.
quotes.name: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.message: Is fame without purpose and is fame without talent really where we are now? People used to be famous for what they did. Now, they're just famous.
quotes.name: John Carroll Lynch

quotes.message: Fame can be just so annoying because people are so critical of you. You can't just say, 'hi'. You say hi and people whisper' man did you see the way she said hi? What an attitude.
quotes.name: Juliette Lewis

quotes.message: Of all the possessions of this life fame is the noblest; when the body has sunk into the dust the great name still lives.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: The highest form of vanity is love of fame.
quotes.name: George Santayana

quotes.message: Fame is damaging when people become reliant on it for their sense of self, and their identity, when fame is linked to how you see yourself.
quotes.name: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.message: Fame is a weird one. You need to distance yourself from it. People see a value in you that you don't see yourself.
quotes.name: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.message: Love of fame is the last thing even learned men can bear to be parted from.
quotes.name: Publius Cornelius Tacitus

quotes.message: If you come to fame not understanding who you are, it will define who you are.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Never underestimate the power of being popular in pop culture. You have to be able to do something. You can have a good seat at the restaurant, but you still have to pay for the meal. Fame is important, but to be rich is more important.
quotes.name: Gene Simmons

quotes.message: That equals to being a fool, having fame and no fortune. A lot of guys out there have fame doing this and doing that, but they are broke.
quotes.name: Mike Tyson

quotes.message: Fame is like the dessert that comes with your achievements - it's not an achievement in itself, but sometimes it can overpower the work.
quotes.name: Adam Clayton

quotes.message: Fame is like caviar, you know - it's good to have caviar but not when you have it at every meal.
quotes.name: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.message: Fame and fortune should never get in front of your passion. The passion will generate the fame and fortune, if you're good enough.
quotes.name: Max Walker

quotes.message: All fame is is having people you don't know coming up to you and saying, 'Hello.' I'm always polite and people are always nice, but it's weird.
quotes.name: Karl Pilkington

quotes.message: Fame and fortune are as hard to find as a lightning strike.
quotes.name: P. N. Elrod

quotes.message: Fame is an unnatural construct and those who go in search of it are the least likely to find it.
quotes.name: Ryan Adams

quotes.message: Fame doesn't end loneliness.
quotes.name: Claire Danes

quotes.message: You know, fame is a funny thing, man, especially, you know, actors, musicians, rappers, rock singers, it's kind of a lifestyle and it's easy to get caught up in it - you go to bars, you go to clubs, everyone's doing a certain thing... It's tough.
quotes.name: Eminem

quotes.message: Fame is a series of misunderstandings surrounding a name.
quotes.name: Joni Mitchell

quotes.message: Fame is easy to acquire; impact is much more difficult.
quotes.name: Hans Rosling

quotes.message: Fame comes and goes. Longevity is the thing to aim for.
quotes.name: Tony Bennett

quotes.message: What is fame? The advantage of being known by people of whom you yourself know nothing, and for whom you care as little.
quotes.name: Lord Byron

quotes.message: Fame is like a river, that beareth up things light and swollen, and drowns things weighty and solid.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Fame doesn't fulfill you. It warms you a bit, but that warmth is temporary.
quotes.name: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.message: It is in vain to try and stop a star from rising, even with a ladder.
quotes.name: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.message: Fame and insecurity don’t usually mix well. Though the fame maybe easily attainable, acceptance by the masses to one’s satisfaction, usually isn’t.
quotes.name: Robert Black

quotes.message: Fame is neither something to value nor to view as a threat.
quotes.name: Adrienne Posey

quotes.message: The talent of success is nothing more than doing what you can do well; and doing well whatever you do, without a thought of fame.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: Fame is the perfume of heroic deeds.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Fame is a fickle food upon a shifting plate.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: Fame is no sure test of merit, but only a probability of such; it is an accident, not a property of man.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Fame sometimes hath created something of nothing.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: Toil, says the proverb, is the sire of fame.
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: Even the best things are not equal to their fame.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: I trust a good deal to common fame, as we all must.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: There's not a thing on earth that I can name, so foolish, and so false, as common fame.
quotes.name: John Wilmot

quotes.message: Fondness for fame is avarice of air.
quotes.name: Edward Young

quotes.message: Some to the fascination of a name surrender judgment, hoodwinked.
quotes.name: William Cowper

quotes.message: What a heavy burden is a name that has too soon become famous.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: If I'm such a legend, why am I so lonely?
quotes.name: Judy Garland

quotes.message: All is temporary and ephemeral—fame and the famous, as well.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: Famous men have the whole earth as their memorial.
quotes.name: Pericles

quotes.message: The way to fame is like the way to heaven, through much tribulation.
quotes.name: Laurence Sterne

quotes.message: Fame and honor sometimes fall more fitly on those who do not desire them.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: Even for the wise, the desire for glory is the last of all passions to be laid aside.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: If you would acquire fame, let not the sun shine on you in bed.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: Fame and repute follow a man to the door.
quotes.name: Danish Proverb

quotes.message: Consider not death but the fame that will survive you.
quotes.name: Irish Proverb

quotes.message: What is fame?—The advantage of being known by people of whom you yourself know nothing, and for whom you care as little.
quotes.name: Leszezynski Stanislaus

quotes.message: There is not in the world so toilsome a trade as the pursuit of fame: life concludes before you have so much as sketched your work.
quotes.name: Jean de La Bruyère

quotes.message: He that pursues fame with just claims, trusts his happiness to the winds; but he that endeavors after it by false merit, has to fear, not only the violence of the storm, but the leaks of his vessel.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: The temple of fame stands upon the grave; the flame upon its altars is kindled from the ashes of the dead.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: It often happens that those of whom we speak least on earth are best known in heaven.
quotes.name: Nicolas Caussin

quotes.message: Name, and not fame is the exact yardstick because fame is transitory, and in our times, fame is vulgar because it can actually be bought.
quotes.name: Sandeep Balakrishna

quotes.message: Waking your kids up for school the first day after a break is almost as much fun as birthing them was.
quotes.name: Jenny McCarthy

quotes.message: You're off to great to great places.
quotes.name: Dr. Seuss

quotes.message: I felt abandoned - watching my mum leave me with strangers. I'll never forget that feeling. Then I had very happy years at school.
quotes.name: Claire Sweeney

quotes.message: I felt like the first day of school or someting. My heart was beating a litttle faster, my anticipation was building up. It was like the first day of school when you go to kindergaten or something.
quotes.name: Carlos Boozer

quotes.message: I've always loved the first day of school better than the last day of school. Firsts are best because they are beginnings.
quotes.name: Jenny Han

quotes.message: On the first day of a college you will worry about how will you do inside the college and at the last day of a college you will wonder what will you do outside the college
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Describing her first day back in grade school after a long absence, a teacher said, It was like trying to hold 35 corks under water at the same time.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: The child who desires education will be bettered by it; the child who dislikes it disgraced.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: What we want is to see the child in pursuit of knowledge, and not knowledge in pursuit of the child.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: The first day of school is always a fashion show, The rest of the school year? A pajama party.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: What makes a child gifted and talented may not always be good grades in school, but a different way of looking at the world and learning.
quotes.name: Chuck Grassley

quotes.message: The first day of school is our second New Year’s. It is our day to make resolutions, to look backward to former lapses and triumphs and to look ahead, usually with a mix of anxiety and hope, to the year to come.
quotes.name: Mark Edmundon

quotes.message: I'm not going.
quotes.name: Kate Berube

quotes.message: My memories on my first day of school included the classic never-ending search for that one classroom that did not seem to exist.
quotes.name: Sean C. Cusak

quotes.message: Learn as much as you can while you are young, since life becomes too busy later.
quotes.name: Dana Stewart Scott

quotes.message: Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today.
quotes.name: Malcolm X

quotes.message: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Why do people cry on the last day of school? You should be crying on the first day of school.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Sending your child off to school for the first time in their life is terrifying.
quotes.name: Arabella Weir

quotes.message: You must get an education. You must go to school, and you must learn to protect yourself. And you must learn to protect yourself with the pen, and not the gun.
quotes.name: Josephine Baker

quotes.message: The first day of school - The day when the countdown to the last day of the school begins.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: That awkward moment on the first day of school when you'll go in front of the class and introduce yourself.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You learn something every day if you pay attention.
quotes.name: Ray LeBlond

quotes.message: Studies serve for delight, for ornaments, and for ability.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: School bells are ringing loud and clear; vacation's over, school is here.
quotes.name: Winifred C. Marshal

quotes.message: School success is not predicted by a child’s fund of facts or a precocious ability to read as much as by emotional and social measures.
quotes.name: Daniel Goleman

quotes.message: You come here for one thing and one thing only, and that is to learn. I used to spend a lot of my life waiting for the day I could quit school, but then came to realize that so long as we are alive we never leave school. Life is a series of high schools, one after the other.
quotes.name: RuPaul

quotes.message: Time to rise. Time for school! Open your eyes.
quotes.name: Tammie Jones

quotes.message: You are graduating from college. That means that this is the first day of the last day of your life. No, that's wrong. This is the last day of the first day of school. Nope, that's worse. This is a day.
quotes.name: Andy Samberg

quotes.message: On the first day of school, you got to be real careful where you sit. You walk into the classroom and just plunk your stuff down on any old desk, and the next thing you know the teacher is saying, 'I hope you all like where you're sitting, because these are your permanent seats.
quotes.name: Jeff Kinney

quotes.message: First day of school, make sure that you know your locker combination.
quotes.name: Jordan Francis

quotes.message: I had the feeling that to get into a schoolhouse and study... would be about the same as getting into paradise.
quotes.name: Booker T. Washington

quotes.message: On the first day of school, my father told me I'd be the most popular girl and everyone would love me and want to be my friend. It wasn't so, but it gave me an enormous amount of confidence.
quotes.name: Maeve Binchy

quotes.message: From your first day at school you are cut off from life to make theories.
quotes.name: Taisen Deshimaru

quotes.message: Wisdom begins in wonder.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: And this was the cause of my suffering when I was sent to school. For all of a sudden I found my world vanishing around me, giving place to wooden benches and straight walls staring at me with the blank stare of the blind. But the legend is that eating of the fruit of knowledge is not consonant with dwelling in paradise. Therefore men's children have to be banished from their paradise into a realm of death dominated by the decency of a tailoring department. So my mind had to accept the tight-fitting encasement of the school which, being like the shoes of a mandarin woman, pinched and bruised my nature on all sides and at every movement.
quotes.name: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.message: What if they mispronounce my last name and everyone laughs? What if my teacher doesn't make her D's like Mom taught me? What if I spend the whole day without a friend?
quotes.name: Erma Bombeck

quotes.message: we pray . you will learn easily . in this new place . you will laugh and share .
quotes.name: Lucy Tapahanso

quotes.message: My first year has been as disappointing as it was rewarding... I have lost and found hope, reviewed and revised, and finally concluded that my presence here is much more important that I had thought it would be.
quotes.name: Catherine McTamaney

quotes.message: Our problem as educators is that far too often we begin the academic year worrying more about our courses and about our academic responsibilities than about our students, those fragile human beings who sit across from us and stare, waiting to learn and eager to know.
quotes.name: Frank Pajares

quotes.message: The distance between pupil and teacher diminishes as the former gets older: by the end of high school the teacher should be a a fellow student.
quotes.name: Northrop Frye

quotes.message: When kids look back on today, they won't remember the stack of work and supplies you sent home with them, but they will remember the love and compassion you showed them on a day full of uncertainty and anxiousness they likely can't describe.
quotes.name: Tricia Kannberg

quotes.message: You're perfect when you're comfortable being yourself.
quotes.name: Ansel Elgort

quotes.message: All children start their school careers with sparkling imaginations, fertile minds, and a willingness to take risks with what they think.
quotes.name: Ken Robinson

quotes.message: Every day is the first day of school.
quotes.name: Dr. Edoardo Zeloni Magelli

quotes.message: My number one goal at the end of the first day is not that they know the rules and consequences. It's that they're excited to be part of the class. That they run home to their parents and say, 'Oh my gosh. I have the best teacher. I have this awesome class. It's going to be great.
quotes.name: Michael Linsin

quotes.message: Reach as high as you can, and then reach a little higher. There you will find magic and possibility. And maybe even cookies.
quotes.name: Marc Johns

quotes.message: The first day of school is tough on all my kids. Especially the one I married.
quotes.name: Claire Dunphy

quotes.message: First I was born young and healthy . I told my mother one day I'd be wealthy . Can't forget my first day at school .
quotes.name: Joseph Bruce

quotes.message: And I had a dream it blows the autumn through my head . It felt like the first day of school . But I was going to the moon instead . And I walked down the hall . With the notebooks they got for me . My dad led me through the house . My mom drank instant coffee . And I knew that I would crash . But I didn't want to tell them . There are just some moments when your family makes sense .
quotes.name: Robert Peter Williams

quotes.message: And I know that this is new . Like your first day of school . And you're feeling awkward . Like you miss your home . And it leaves you with an empty feeling .
quotes.name: Chad Everett Gilbert

quotes.message: It was the first day of school . Just like that you meet new people, isn't that cool . But oh, you just did not fit in, and what a shame .
quotes.name: Peter Michaels Jr.

quotes.message: Greener than the first day at school . Wiser now but I'm still a fool . Packed my bags and I left too soon .
quotes.name: Jordan Randall

quotes.message: And Mother is cutting lunches, . There are only four as a rule, . But to-day another is added, . For Baby is going to school. . ‘You’ll take her on Laddie between you, . And hold her tight at the creek.” . And Mother parts with her darling . With a kiss on her dimpled cheek.
quotes.name: Alice Guerin Crist

quotes.message: An old man's thought of School; . An old man, gathering youthful memories and blooms, that youth itself cannot. . Now only do I know you! . O fair auroral skies! O morning dew upon the grass! . And these I see--these sparkling eyes, . These stores of mystic meaning--these young lives, . Building, equipping, like a fleet of ships--immortal ships! .Soon to sail out over the measureless seas, . On the Soul's voyage.
quotes.name: Walt Whitman

quotes.message: In this little school . Life goes so sweetly, . Day on azure day . Is lost completely. . No one thinks too much, . Or worries greatly. . In a pleasant shade . We dream sedately. . There's no struggle here . Or conflict showing; . Only the sweet pain . Of young limbs growing.
quotes.name: Lesbia Harford

quotes.message: School, School, School, . Without any frightening rule, . It’s not a place for fools and cools, . But a place for cute and artfuls. . It is the time when our pencils get shorten, . And notebooks get fat. . Our crayons get broken, . And erasers get flat. . Teachers here are very kind, . But wrong doings, they do mind. . Infused into us is not fear, . School days are very dear. . Studying in a school is not just a pleasure, . It’s truly a lifetime treasure.
quotes.name: Tungon Dugi

quotes.message: Of oil, wine, and friends, the oldest is the best.
quotes.name: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.message: In dress, the newest is the finest; in friends, the oldest is the best.
quotes.name: Korean Proverb

quotes.message: In forming new friendships, forget not old friends.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: One should not forsake old friends for new, because the old friends, having already proven their calibre, are more trustworthy.
quotes.name: G. Llewellyn Watson

quotes.message: We need new friends; some of us are cannibals who have eaten their old friends up; others must have ever-renewed audiences before whom to re-enact an ideal version of their lives.
quotes.name: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.message: I keep my old friends, and get older with them, but push young. It's good to be surrounded by kids, because they keep you young.
quotes.name: Carine Roitfeld

quotes.message: When you meet with your old friends, you recollect some of the finest moments of your life and find yourself in a joy that has no comparison.
quotes.name: Syed Badiuzzaman

quotes.message: When we are old, our friends find it difficult to please us, and are less concerned whether we be pleased or not.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: New friends may be poems but old friends are alphabets. Don't forget the alphabets because you will need them to read the poems.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Lay this unto your breast: Old friends, like old swords, still are trusted best.
quotes.name: John Webster

quotes.message: Remember that the most valuable antiques are dear old friends.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.message: An old friend never can be found, and nature has provided that he cannot easily be lost.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: There is no friend like an old friend who has shared our morning days, no greeting like his welcome, no homage like his praise.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr

quotes.message: It's an insane world but in it there is one sanity, the loyalty of old friends.
quotes.name: Ben Hur

quotes.message: It's best to have an old friend far away, than a new friend nearby that makes you question your care.
quotes.name: Shanna Rodriguez

quotes.message: Whoever neglects old friends for the sake of new deserves what he gets if he loses both.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: When we forget old friends, it is a sign we have forgotten ourselves.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Say what you want about aging, it's still the only way to have old friends.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: Beautiful memories are like old friends. They may not always be on your mind, but they are forever in your heart.
quotes.name: Susan Gale

quotes.message: It's not good trying to keep up old friendships. It's painful for both sides. The fact is, one grows out of peple, and the only thing is to face it.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maughan

quotes.message: An old friend met in a far country is like rain after a drought.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Spend a new penny on an old friend and share an old pleasure with a new friend.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Every murderer is probably somebody’s old friend.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: There’s a thing that keeps surprising you about stormy old friends after they die—their silence. For a while an echo stays in your ear. You hear a laugh, a knowing phrase or two, a certain quality of enunciation. Then, nothing. Another death takes place—voices.
quotes.name: Ben Hecht

quotes.message: Old friends burn dim, like lamps in noisome air; love them for what they are; nor love them less, because to thee they are not what they were.
quotes.name: Samuel Coleridge Taylor

quotes.message: Old friends, like old swords, still are trusted best.
quotes.name: Duchess of Malfy

quotes.message: Old friends and old wine are best.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: My old friend, I recall the times we had hanging on my wall. I wouldn't trade them for gold ‘cause they laugh and they cry me, somehow sanctify me. They're woven in the stories I have told and tell again.
quotes.name: Tim McGraw

quotes.message: Old friends pass away, new friends appear. It is just like the days. An old day passes, a new day arrives. The important thing is to make it meaningful: a meaningful friend - or a meaningful day.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Do not abandon old friends;, for new ones cannot equal them. A new friend is like new wine; when it has aged, you can drink it with pleasure.
quotes.name: Ecclesiasticus 9:10

quotes.message: Friends.. old friends…. So it breaks, so it ends . There let it rest . It has fought and won . And is still the best . That either has done.
quotes.name: William Ernest Henley

quotes.message: It's the worst part of seeing old friends: when your rose-colored memories become undone by reality.
quotes.name: Brad Meltzer

quotes.message: Old friends looking up to watch the birds holding arms to climb a curb . Old friends oh old friends . Lord when all my work is done bless my life and grant me one .
quotes.name: Guy Clark

quotes.message: You can't make old friends . Can't make old friends . It was me and you, since way back when . But you can't make old friends.
quotes.name: Caitlyn Smith

quotes.message: But you can't make old friends . From the beginning you've been . Always there my old friend .
quotes.name: John Ross Lang

quotes.message: The best mirror is an old friend.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: Make new friends, but don't forget the old, One is silver, the other is gold.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You don't have to have anything in common with people you've known since you were five. With old friends, you've got your whole life in common.
quotes.name: Lyle Lovett

quotes.message: Forsake not an old friend, for the new is not comparable to him. A new friend is a new wine; when if is old, thou shalt drink it with pleasure.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: With clothes the new are the best, with friends the old are the best.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.
quotes.name: John Leonard

quotes.message: There's not a word yet, for old friends who've just met.
quotes.name: Jim Henson

quotes.message: Old friends are the great blessing of one's later years . . . They have a memory of the same events and have the same mode of thinking.
quotes.name: Horace Walpole

quotes.message: Old friends, we say, are best, when some sudden disillusionment shakes our faith in a new comrade.
quotes.name: Gelett Burgess

quotes.message: Ah, how good it feels! The hand of an old friend.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of.
quotes.name: Sarah Orne Jewett

quotes.message: Tell me, why are the old friends kind, And ever the tenderest, too? Youth has no art, but an open mind, And its love is sincere and true.
quotes.name: Edwin Leibfreed

quotes.message: To be with old friends is very warming and comforting.
quotes.name: Ian Ziering

quotes.message: Old friends die on you, and they're irreplaceable. You become dependent.
quotes.name: Lionel Blue

quotes.message: We need old friends to help us grow old and new friends to help us stay young.
quotes.name: Letty Cottin Pogrebin

quotes.message: As in the case of wines that improve with age, the oldest friendships ought to be the most delightful.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: There is only one thing better than making a new friend, and that is keeping an old one.
quotes.name: Elmer G. Letterman

quotes.message: Old stories are like old friends? You have to visit them from time to time.
quotes.name: George R.R. Martin

quotes.message: Finding an old friend is like finding a lost treasure.
quotes.name: Anthony Douglas Williams

quotes.message: There's no friends like the old friends.
quotes.name: James Joyce

quotes.message: To reminisce with my old friends, a chance to share some memories, and play our songs again.
quotes.name: Ricky Nelson

quotes.message: We must never sell old friends to buy old enemies.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Two may talk together under the same roof for many years, yet never really meet; and two others at first speech are old friends.
quotes.name: Mary Catherwood

quotes.message: One old friend is better than two new ones.
quotes.name: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.message: No one leaves an old friend unless they are ashamed.
quotes.name: Julian Casablancas

quotes.message: You can make a new friend but you can't make an old one.
quotes.name: Tom Bodett

quotes.message: Old friends and old ways ought not to be disdained.
quotes.name: Danish Proverb

quotes.message: Condiments are like old friends -- highly thought of, but often taken for granted.
quotes.name: Marilyn Kaytor

quotes.message: Old friends become bitter enemies on a sudden for toys and small offenses.
quotes.name: Robert Burton

quotes.message: It's less the words they say than those they leave unsaid that split old friends apart.
quotes.name: Frederick Buechner

quotes.message: You can't make old friends. You either have them or you don't.
quotes.name: Kenny Rogers

quotes.message: Exercise is like an old friend: You may not be able to see that friend all the time, but you're not mad when you see them, you're happy, and you get right back into it.
quotes.name: Bethenny Frankel

quotes.message: When old friends get together, everything else fades to insignificance.
quotes.name: Robert Lynn Aspri

quotes.message: Old friends are best.
quotes.name: John Selden

quotes.message: ...or like an old friend one has known too well and doesn't want to see.
quotes.name: Doris Lessing

quotes.message: A man's oldest friend is his best.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: No man is much pleased with a companion who does not increase, in some respect, his fondness of himself.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: The fondness we have for self furnishes another long rank of prejudices.
quotes.name: Isaac Watts

quotes.message: The more things for which you develop a fondness the richer the life you live.
quotes.name: Dan Buettner

quotes.message: A fondness for power is implanted in most men, and it is natural to abuse it when acquired.
quotes.name: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.message: A fondness for reading changes the inevitable dull hours of our life into exquisite hours of delight.
quotes.name: Baron de Montesquieu

quotes.message: Showing a greater fondness for their own opinions than for truth, they sought to deny and disprove the new things which, if they had cared to look for themselves, their own senses would have demonstrated to them.
quotes.name: Galileo Galilei

quotes.message: Affection, like melancholy, magnifies trifles; but the magnifying of the one is like looking through a telescope at heavenly objects; that of the other, like enlarging monsters with a microscope.
quotes.name: Pope Paul VI

quotes.message: When affection only speaks, truth is not always there.
quotes.name: Thomas Middleton

quotes.message: Affection cannot be created; it can only be liberated.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Affection is an overpowering craving to be compellingly sought.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: Most affections are habits or duties we lack the courage to end.
quotes.name: Henri de Montherlant

quotes.message: Affection makes your spirit slither out from its concealing spot.
quotes.name: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.message: Love is the affection of a mind that has nothing better to engage it.
quotes.name: Theophrastus

quotes.message: Our affections are our life. We live by them; they supply our warmth.
quotes.name: William Ellery Channing

quotes.message: It is expressions of affection rather than money and power that attract real friends.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.message: True happiness must arise from well-regulated affections, and an affection includes a duty.
quotes.name: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.message: Affection is like the noonday sun; it does not need the presence of another to be manifest.
quotes.name: Isabel Allende

quotes.message: We may not return the affection of those who like us, but we always respect their good judgment.
quotes.name: Lillian Gordy Carter

quotes.message: A fondness for martyrdom, especially of the verbal variety, is common to the young.
quotes.name: Barbara Mertz

quotes.message: One defining symptom of decadence is a fondness for vast and nonsensical extravagance.
quotes.name: Robert Silverberg

quotes.message: A fondness for reading, which, properly directed, must be an education in itself.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: Only a mother knows a mother's fondness.
quotes.name: Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.message: Affection reproaches, but does not denounce.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: Affection is the broadest basis of a good life.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: A girl's affections should never be won unsought.
quotes.name: Anne Bronte

quotes.message: To lead men, you have to lead them with affection.
quotes.name: J. R. D. Tata

quotes.message: Set your affection to infinity and your hate to zero!
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: The choicest thing this world has for a man is affection.
quotes.name: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quotes.message: Only as we mature does affection begin to depend on achievement.
quotes.name: Alain De Botton

quotes.message: Skins may differ, but affection Dwells in white and black the same.
quotes.name: William Cowper

quotes.message: True affection and love have a purity which shall always prevail over bigotry.
quotes.name: Libba Bray

quotes.message: If we lose affection and kindliness from our life: we lose all that gives it charm.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: Affection should not be too sharp eyed, and love is not made by magnifying glasses.
quotes.name: Thomas Browne

quotes.message: Affection is a coal that must be cooled; else, suffered, it will set the heart on fire.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Affection may be abiding and love may be abiding, but the state of being in love is transitory.
quotes.name: Jo Coudert

quotes.message: Certain is it that there is no kind of affection so purely angelic as of a father to a daughter.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Affection can withstand very severe storms of vigor, but not a long polar frost of indifference.
quotes.name: Walter Scott

quotes.message: Affection faints not like a pale-faced coward, But then woos best when most his choice is froward.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: A dog desires affection more than its dinner. Well - almost.
quotes.name: Charlotte Gray

quotes.message: I would rather regret the things that I have done than the things that I have not.
quotes.name: Lucille Ball

quotes.message: Live in the present tense, facing the duty at hand without regret for the past or worry over the future.
quotes.name: William De Witt Hyde

quotes.message: The bitterest tears shed over graves are for words left unsaid and deeds left undone.
quotes.name: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.message: If only. Those must be the two saddest words in the world.
quotes.name: Mercedes Lackey

quotes.message: Some choices we live not only once but a thousand times over, remembering them for the rest of our lives.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
quotes.name: John Barrymore

quotes.message: When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
quotes.name: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.message: Regret for time wasted can become a power for good in the time that remains, if we will only stop the waste and the idle, useless regretting.
quotes.name: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.message: Remorse is virtue's root; its fair increase are fruits of innocence and blessedness.
quotes.name: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.message: Remorse. Never yield to remorse, but at once tell yourself: remorse would simply mean adding to the first act of stupidity a second.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.name: Victoria Holt

quotes.message: I regret that it takes a life to learn how to live.
quotes.name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.message: We must all suffer from one of two pains: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The difference is discipline weighs ounces while regret weighs tons.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Many of us crucify ourselves between two thieves - regret for the past and fear of the future.
quotes.name: Fulton Oursler

quotes.message: I have no regrets in my life. I think that everything happens to you for a reason. The hard times that you go through build character, making you a much stronger person.
quotes.name: Rita Mero

quotes.message: I would much rather have regrets about not doing what people said, than regretting not doing what my heart led me to and wondering what life had been like if I'd just been myself.
quotes.name: Brittany Ren_e

quotes.message: Regret for the things we did can be tempered by time; it is regret for the things we did not do that is inconsolable.
quotes.name: Sydney Smith

quotes.message: Forget regret, or life is yours to miss.
quotes.name: Jonathan Larson

quotes.message: Regret is ... an unavoidable result of any loss, for in loss we lose the tomorrow that we needed to make right our yesterday or today.
quotes.name: Gerald Lawson Sittser

quotes.message: Often regret is very false and displaced, and imagines the past to be totally other than it was.
quotes.name: John O'Donohue

quotes.message: Remorse is the poison of life.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.message: In history as in human life, regret does not bring back a lost moment and a thousand years will not recover something lost in a single hour.
quotes.name: Stefan Zweig

quotes.message: Is it really so difficult to tell a good action from a bad one? I think one usually knows right away or a moment afterward, in a horrid flash of regret.
quotes.name: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.message: The What-ifs and the should-have's will eat your brain.
quotes.name: John O' Callaghan

quotes.message: Don't let the past steal your present.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: Don't let yesterday use up too much of today.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: I think I don't regret a single 'excess' of my responsive youth--I only regret, in my chilled age, certain occasions and possibilities I didn't embrace.
quotes.name: Henry James

quotes.message: To feel today what one felt yesterday isn't to feel - it's to remember today what was felt yesterday, to be today's living corpse of what yesterday was lived and lost.
quotes.name: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.message: I do not regret the things I've done, but those I did not do.
quotes.name: Rory Cochrane

quotes.message: Life is short. Break the rules, forgive quickly, kiss slowly, love truly, laugh uncontrollably, and never regret anything that made you smile.
quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.message: Never regret anything that has happened in your life. It cannot be changed, undone, or forgotten. So take it as a lesson learned, and move on.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Never regret anything that makes you smile.
quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.message: Always do your best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment. Under any circumstances, simply do your best and you will avoid self-judgement, self-abuse and regret.
quotes.name: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.message: Regret for wasted time is more wasted time.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: I see it all perfectly; there are two possible situations - one can either do this or that. My honest opinion and my friendly advice is this: do it or do not do it - you will regret both.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: Regret for wasted time can become a power for good in the time that remains, if we will only stop the waste and the idle, useless regretting.
quotes.name: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.message: We all make mistakes, have struggles, and even regret things in our past. But you are not your mistakes, you are not your struggles, and you are here NOW with the power to shape your day and your future.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: I have no regrets. I wouldn't have lived my life the way I did if I was going to worry about what people were going to say.
quotes.name: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.message: He who has regrets cannot look at himself in the mirror.
quotes.name: Eric Cantona

quotes.message: Regrets are the natural property of grey hairs.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: Regrets and recriminations only hurt your soul.
quotes.name: Armand Hammer

quotes.message: You can have immediate regrets, but if you look at stuff and say, 'Things happen for a reason', there's a fatalistic thing about it. Something will happen that will justify it in some way.
quotes.name: Martin Landau

quotes.message: Regrets are the tears of good deeds left undone
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: The regrets and resentments etched in a heart remain until they are cleansed away with love.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: Be too busy to have time for regrets.
quotes.name: Angela Wright

quotes.message: Speak when you are angry--and you will make the best speech you'll ever regret.
quotes.name: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.message: You'll regret opening your mouth. You'll rarely regret keeping it shut.
quotes.name: Max Lucado

quotes.message: There is no stability without solidarity and no solidarity without stability.
quotes.name: Jose Manuel Barroso

quotes.message: The first step in the evolution of ethics is a sense of solidarity with other human beings.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: You don't fight racism with racism, the best way to fight racism is with solidarity.
quotes.name: Bobby Seale

quotes.message: Solidarity was the best thing which happened in the 20th century.
quotes.name: Mikheil Saakashvili

quotes.message: The most important word in the language of the working class is 'solidarity.
quotes.name: Harry Bridges

quotes.message: If someone puts their hands on you make sure they never put their hands on anybody else again.
quotes.name: Malcolm X

quotes.message: Solidarity and competitiveness are the two sides of a European coin.
quotes.name: Angela Merkel

quotes.message: You can't always be demanding solidarity from others and then refuse to show it yourself.
quotes.name: Martin Schulz

quotes.message: Solidarity is based on the principle that we are willing to put ourselves at risk to protect each other.
quotes.name: Starhawk

quotes.message: There will be no equity without solidarity. There will be no justice without a social movement.
quotes.name: Joia Mukherjee

quotes.message: A people cannot exist if there is no social solidarity.
quotes.name: Ariel Sharon

quotes.message: There is no true peace without fairness , truth , justice and solidarity.
quotes.name: Pope John Paul II

quotes.message: Solidarity is not a feeling of vague compassion or shallow distress at the misfortunes of so many people, both near and far. On the contrary, it is a firm and persevering determination to commit oneself to the common good; that is to say to the good of all and of each individual, because we are all really responsible for all.
quotes.name: Pope John Paul II

quotes.message: Solidarity is not discovered by reflection but created.
quotes.name: Richard M. Rorty

quotes.message: Solidarity between women can be a powerful force of change, and can influence future development in ways favourable not only to women but also to men.
quotes.name: Nawal El-Saadawi

quotes.message: Great opportunities to help others seldom come, but small ones surround us every day.
quotes.name: Sally Koch

quotes.message: Solidarity is not an act of charity, but mutual aid between forces fighting for the same objective.
quotes.name: Samora Machel

quotes.message: The purpose of human life is to serve and to show compassion and the will to help others.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: With solidarity, you will be more talented and handier, you will be taller and stronger, faster and wiser!
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: He who once became aware of the power of Solidarity and who breathed the air of freedom will not be crushed.
quotes.name: Lech Walesa

quotes.message: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: We must indeed all hang together, or, most assuredly, we shall all hang separately.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: A sense of solidarity among fifteen-to-thirty-year-olds would be a menace to civilized society even in the best of times.
quotes.name: Steven Pinker

quotes.message: We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: Every human being is called to solidarity in a world battling between life and death.
quotes.name: Ignacio Ellacuria

quotes.message: It is wonderful to be in solidarity with another big group of people.
quotes.name: Ruqaiyyah Waris Maqsood

quotes.message: Sometimes we find the sweetest solidarity in the midst of solitude.
quotes.name: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quotes.message: True solidarity is only possible among the solitary.
quotes.name: Jose Bergamin

quotes.message: We must speak our minds openly, debate our disagreements honestly, but always pursue solidarity.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: Jealousy, that dragon which slays love under the pretence of keeping it alive.
quotes.name: Havelock Ellis

quotes.message: The thermometer of success is merely the jealousy of the malcontents.
quotes.name: Salvador Dal

quotes.message: You can only be jealous of someone who has something you think you ought to have yourself.
quotes.name: Margaret Atwood

quotes.message: What sort of love is permeated by jealousy? You are jealous because you are unaware that everything you need is inside you.
quotes.name: Peter Deunov

quotes.message: The jealous are troublesome to others, but a torment to themselves.
quotes.name: William Penn

quotes.message: I've spent most of my life walking under that hovering cloud, jealousy, whose acid raindrops blurred my vision and burned holes in my heart. Once I learned to use the umbrella of confidence, the skies cleared up for me and the sunshine called joy became my faithful companion.
quotes.name: Astrid Alauda

quotes.message: Jealousy is the tribute mediocrity pays to genius.
quotes.name: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.message: To cure jealousy is to see it for what it is, a dissatisfaction with self
quotes.name: Joan Didion

quotes.message: Love sees sharply, hatred sees even more sharp, but Jealousy sees the sharpest for it is love and hate at the same time.
quotes.name: Arab Proverb

quotes.message: Never waste jealousy on a real man: it is the imaginary man that supplants us all in the long run.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Jealousy is simply and clearly the fear that you do not have value. Jealousy scans for evidence to prove the point - that others will be preferred and rewarded more than you. There is only one alternative - self-value. If you cannot love yourself, you will not believe that you are loved. You will always think it's a mistake or luck. Take your eyes off others and turn the scanner within. Find the seeds of your jealousy, clear the old voices and experiences. Put all the energy into building your personal and emotional security. Then you will be the one others envy, and you can remember the pain and reach out to them.
quotes.name: Jennifer James

quotes.message: Jealousy is never satisfied with anything short of an omniscience that would detect the subtlest fold of the heart.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Jealousy is that pain which a man feels from the apprehension that he is not equally beloved by the person whom he entirely loves.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Jealousy would be far less torturous if we understood that love is a passion entirely unrelated to our merits.
quotes.name: Paul Eldridge

quotes.message: Jealousy is not a barometer by which the depth of love can be read, it merely records the degree of the lover's insecurity.
quotes.name: Margaret Mead

quotes.message: Jealousy is one of the wickedest of all the passions. It is that which has been the most fruitful mother of tragedies, murders, and wars. But reprehensible though it is, jealousy is almost rather to be pitied than blamed--its first victims are those who harbour the feeling.
quotes.name: Arthur Lynch

quotes.message: Jealousy is indeed a poor medium to secure love, but it is a secure medium to destroy one's self-respect. For jealous people, like dope-fiends, stoop to the lowest level and in the end inspire only disgust and loathing.
quotes.name: Emma Goldman

quotes.message: Jealousy lives upon doubts. It becomes madness or ceases entirely as soon as we pass from doubt to certainty.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Jealousy is a kind of civil war in the soul, where judgment and imagination are at perpetual jars. This civil dissension in the mind, like that of the body politic, commits great disorders, and lays all waste. Nothing stands safe in its way; Nature, interest, religion, must yield to its fury. It violates contracts, dissolves society, breaks wedlock, betrays friends and neighbours. No body is good, and every one is either doing or designing them a mischief. It has a venom that more or less rankles wherever it bites: And as it reports fancies or facts, so it disturbs its own house as often as other folks.
quotes.name: William Penn

quotes.message: Surrounded by the flames of jealousy, the jealous one winds up, like the scorpion, turning the poisoned sting against himself.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Envy...since it’s lodgement is in the heart, not the brain, no degree of intellect supplies a guarantee against it.
quotes.name: Herman Melville

quotes.message: A man will do many things to get himself loved. He will do all things to get himself envied.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Oh! How bitter a thing it is to look into happiness through another man’s eyes.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: A competent and self-confident person is incapable of jealousy in anything. Jealousy is invariably a symptom of neurotic insecurity.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: Jealousy is both reasonable and belongs to reasonable men, while envy is base and belongs to the base, for the one makes himself get good things by jealousy, while the other does not allow his neighbour to have them through envy.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: The jealous are possessed by a mad devil and a dull spirit at the same time.
quotes.name: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.message: To jealousy, nothing is more frightful than laughter.
quotes.name: F. Sagan

quotes.message: O jealousy! thou magnifier of trifles.
quotes.name: Johann Christoph Friedrich von Schiller

quotes.message: Jealousy is the jaundice of the soul.
quotes.name: John Dryden

quotes.message: Comparison is a very foolish attitude, because each person is unique and incomparable. Once this understanding settles in you, jealousy disappears.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: More men die of jealousy than of cancer.
quotes.name: Joseph P. Kennedy

quotes.message: Love may be blind but jealousy has 20-20 vision.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: I refused to believe that love could take any other form than mine: I measured love by the extent of my jealousy, and by that standard of course she could not love me at all.
quotes.name: Graham Greene

quotes.message: If you could untie your wings and free your soul of jealousy, you and everyone around you would fly up like doves.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: It will be found an unjust and unwise jealousy to deprive a man of his natural liberty upon the supposition he may abuse it.
quotes.name: George Washington

quotes.message: Jealousy is all the fun you think they had.
quotes.name: Erica Jong

quotes.message: Jealousy - that jumble of secret worship and ostensible aversion.
quotes.name: Emil Cioran

quotes.message: Jealousy is, I think, the worst of all faults because it makes a victim of both parties.
quotes.name: Gene Tierney

quotes.message: Jealousy is the tie that binds, and binds, and binds.
quotes.name: Helen Rowland

quotes.message: Jealousy is a dog's bark which attracts thieves.
quotes.name: Karl Kraus

quotes.message: Jealousy is cruel as the grave: the coals thereof are coals of fire.
quotes.name: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

quotes.message: There is a sort of jealousy which needs very little fire: it is hardly a passion, but a blight bred in the cloudy, damp despondency of uneasy egoism.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Jealousy isn't a pleasant quality, but if it isn't overdone (and if it's combined with modesty), apart from its inconvenience there's even something touching about it.
quotes.name: Milan Kundera

quotes.message: The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
quotes.name: Bette Midler

quotes.message: Count your blessings, not your problems. Count your own blessings, not someone else's. Remember that jealousy is when you count someone else's blessings instead of your own.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: It is not love that is blind, but jealousy.
quotes.name: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.message: Beware... of jealousy! . It is the green-eyed monster, which doth mock . The meat it feeds on.
Trifles light as air .Are to the jealous confirmations strong . As proofs of holy writ.
Jealous souls will not be answered so: . They are not ever jealous for the cause, . But jealous for they're jealous. . It is a monster . Begot upon itself, born on itself.
Where love reigns, disturbing jealousy . Doth call himself affection's sentinel.
A jealous ear hears all things.
quotes.name: Wisdom of Solomon

quotes.message: Jealousy is a terrible thing. It resembles love, only it is precisely love's contrary. Instead of wishing for the welfare of the object loved, it desires the dependence of that object upon itself, and its own triumph.
quotes.name: Henri-Frédéric Amiel

quotes.message: Of all the passions, jealousy is that which exacts the hardest service, and pays the bitterest wages. Its service is - to watch the success of our enemy; its wages - to be sure of it.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: Moral indignation is jealousy with a halo.
quotes.name: Herbert George

quotes.message: There will be no common faith between those who share in power, and each man will be jealous of his associate.
quotes.name: Lucan

quotes.message: Though jealousy be produced by love, as ashes are by fire, yet jealousy extinguishes love as ashes smother the flame.
quotes.name: Margaret of Angoulême

quotes.message: I lost my first race at school and I was so jealous when the winner received a puppet that I said to myself, 'I will carry on until I win a puppet.
quotes.name: Svetlana Masterkova

quotes.message: Curious thing, plain women are always jealous of their husbands, beautiful women never are!
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Turn thee from these, or dare not to enquire . Of Him whose Name is Jealous, lest in wrath, . He hear and answer thine unblest desire: . Far better we should cross His lightning's path, . Than be according to our idols heard, . And God should take us at our own vain word.
quotes.name: Keble

quotes.message: It is my nature's plague . To spy into abuses, and oft my jealousy . Shapes faults that are not.

The heart of the envious is gall and bitterness; his tongue spitteth venom; the success of his neighbor breaketh his rest. He sitteth in his cell repining; and the good that happeneth to another, is to him an evil. Hatred and malice feed upon his heart, and there is no rest in him.
quotes.name: Akhenaton

quotes.message: Jealousy aims at the peaks; the winds storm the loftiest summits.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: What a plague of one's thoughts, how great a rust of the heart, to be jealous of another.
quotes.name: Cyprian

quotes.message: Jealousy is always born with love, but does not die with it. In jealousy there is more of self-love than of love to another.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: There is no greater glory than love, nor any greater punishment than jealousy.
quotes.name: Felix Lope de Vega

quotes.message: Jealousy is nothing but the foolish child of pride.
quotes.name: Pierre-Augustin de Beaumarchais

quotes.message: Jealousy is the very reverse of understanding, of sympathy, and of generous feeling. Never has jealousy added to character, never does it make the individual big and fine.
quotes.name: Emma Goldman

quotes.message: Jealousy is fueled by powerful, blinding masochism, in which the offended person revels in his or her victimization... The masochist searches for evidence that will inflict more pain and takes delight in increasingly abhorrent discoveries. Jealousy demonstrates the joy of suffering and the allure of pain.
quotes.name: Thomas Moore

quotes.message: Jealousy is like a hot pepper. Use it mildly, and you add spice to the relationship. Use too much of it and it can burn.
quotes.name: Ayala Pines

quotes.message: Women detest a jealous man whom they do not love, but it angers them when a man they do love is not jealous.
quotes.name: L'Enclos

quotes.message: O, Jealousy, thou ugliest fiend of hell! thy deadly venom preys on my vitals, turns the healthful hue of my fresh cheek to haggard sallowness, and drinks my spirit up.
quotes.name: H. More

quotes.message: Jealousy is said to be the offspring of love; yet unless the parent makes haste to strangle the child, the child will not rest till it has poisoned the parent.
quotes.name: Hare

quotes.message: It is with jealousy as with the gout; when such distempers are in the blood there is never any security against their breaking out, and that often on the slightest occasions, and when least suspected.
quotes.name: Fielding

quotes.message: All jealousy must be strangled in its birth, or time will soon make it strong enough to overcome the truth.
quotes.name: Davenant

quotes.message: Jealousy is the fear or apprehension of superiority; envy our uneasiness under it.
quotes.name: Shenstone

quotes.message: We are jealous of a rival, while we are envious of what other people have.
quotes.name: Jean le Rond d'Alembert

quotes.message: Jealousy is no more than feeling alone against smiling enemies.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.message: No true love there can be without its dread penalty - jealousy.
quotes.name: Edward George Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: Jealousy blinds the stricken heart, and without examining, believes everything it fears.
quotes.name: Pierre Corneille

quotes.message: A little jealousy arouses a happy love that is asleep.
quotes.name: Antoinette Deshoulieres

quotes.message: Jealous people destroy what they are incapable of creating.
quotes.name: Paul Guth

quotes.message: Jealousy which keeps silent grows in its silence.
quotes.name: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.message: Lovers may be—and indeed generally are—enemies, but they never can be friends, because there must always be a spice of jealousy and a something of Self in all their speculations.
quotes.name: Lord Byron

quotes.message: It takes someone very special to help you forget someone very special.
quotes.name: Erich Segal

quotes.message: It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.name: Rita Rudner

quotes.message: Anyone can be a father, but it takes someone special to be a dad, and that's why I call you dad, because you are so special to me. You taught me the game and you taught me how to play it right.
quotes.name: Wade Boggs

quotes.message: Good friends help you to find important things when you have lost them - your smile, your hope, and your courage.
quotes.name: Doe Zantamata

quotes.message: I believe in angels, the kind that heaven sends.
quotes.name: Pamela Daranjo

quotes.message: Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends leave footprints in your heart.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Call your mother. Tell her you love her. Remember, you're the only person who knows what her heart sounds like from the inside.
quotes.name: Rachel Wolchin

quotes.message: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Mother - that was the bank where we deposited all our hurts and worries.
quotes.name: T. DeWitt Talmage

quotes.message: A sibling may be the keeper of one's identity, the only person with the keys to one's unfettered, more fundamental self.
quotes.name: Marian Sandmaier

quotes.message: Our brothers and sisters are there with us from the dawn of our personal stories to the inevitable dusk.
quotes.name: Susan Scarf Merrell

quotes.message: A friend is one that knows you as you are, understands where you have been, accepts what you have become, and still, gently allows you to grow.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: A friend is someone you can be alone with and have nothing to do and not be able to think of anything to say and be comfortable in the silence.
quotes.name: Sheryl Condie

quotes.message: A true friend unbosoms freely, advises justly, assists readily, adventures boldly, takes all patiently, defends courageously, and continues a friend unchangeably.
quotes.name: William Penn

quotes.message: An older sister is a friend and defender - a listener, conspirator, a counsellor and a sharer of delights. And sorrows too.
quotes.name: Pam Brown

quotes.message: A friend is one who has the same enemies as you have.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Find someone who openly communicates their feelings. Someone who realizes that youre not perfect and never expects you to be.
quotes.name: Brigitte Nicole

quotes.message: Somewhere on this planet is your best friend. Find that person.
quotes.name: Omar Kiam

quotes.message: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: A friend knows the song in my heart and sings it to me when my memory fails.
quotes.name: Donna Roberts

quotes.message: Best friends can turn a horrible day into one of the best days of your life.
quotes.name: Nathanael Richmond

quotes.message: A friend is the one who comes in when the whole world has gone out.
quotes.name: Grace Pulpit

quotes.message: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Foley

quotes.message: A mother is one to whom you hurry when you are troubled.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: Any mother could perform the jobs of several air traffic controllers with ease.
quotes.name: Lisa Alther

quotes.message: Mom - the person most likely to write an autobiography and never mention herself.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: A loyal friend laughs at your jokes when they're not so good, and sympathizes with your problems when they're not so bad.
quotes.name: Arnold H. Glasgow

quotes.message: It is the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.
quotes.name: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.message: A mother understands what a child does not say.
quotes.name: Jewish Proverb

quotes.message: Are we not like two volumes of one book?
quotes.name: Marceline Desbordes

quotes.message: We have been friends together In sunshine and in shade.
quotes.name: Caroline Sheridan Norton

quotes.message: A brother is a friend provided by nature.
quotes.name: Legouve Pere

quotes.message: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: Wherever we are, it is our friends that make our world.
quotes.name: Henry Drummond

quotes.message: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Our siblings. They resemble us just enough to make all their differences confusing, and no matter what we choose to make of this, we are cast in relation to them our whole lives long.
quotes.name: Susan Scarf Merrell

quotes.message: Siblings are the people we practice on, the people who teach us about fairness and cooperation and kindness and caring quite often the hard way.
quotes.name: Pamela Dugdale

quotes.message: A sister is a little bit of childhood that can never be lost.
quotes.name: Marion C. Garretty

quotes.message: A sister can be seen as someone who is both ourselves and very much not ourselves - a special kind of double.
quotes.name: Toni Morrison

quotes.message: Sisters function as safety nets in a chaotic world simply by being there for each other.
quotes.name: Carol Saline

quotes.message: Sisters share the scent and smells - the feel of a common childhood.
quotes.name: Pam Brown

quotes.message: Your siblings are the only people in the world who know what it's like to have been brought up the way you were.
quotes.name: Betsy Cohen

quotes.message: It takes someone really brave to be a mother, someone strong to raise a child, and someone special to love someone more than herself.
quotes.name: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.message: Despite the overwhelming size and nature of the obstacles that life presents, some people have been able to overcome them to a degree that makes them stand out as someone special— someone extraordinary, someone great.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Venstra

quotes.message: Don't worry about finding your special someone, if that's what you want— and if you'd rather thrive alone, don't worry about ignoring those who may want you to have a 'special someone.
quotes.name: Becca Anderson

quotes.message: I lost someone special. . It's very hard for me. . He won't be coming to visit us. . how different things will be.
quotes.name: Bracha Goetz

quotes.message: Just because we get along and seemed to accept me for who I am, that doesn't mean he's my soulmate. Maybe my special someone is still out there somewhere.
quotes.name: Chaya T. Hirsch

quotes.message: It takes someone special to do what you do. It takes someone rare and remarkable to make the lives of everyone around them nicer, brighter, and more beautiful. It takes someone who has a big heart and a caring soul. It takes someone who's living proof of how precious a person can be. It takes someone just like you.
quotes.name: Douglas Pagels

quotes.message: You are something— and someone—very special. You really are. No one else in this entire world is exactly like you. You're a one-of-a-kind treasure, uniquely here in this space and time.
quotes.name: Douglas Pagels

quotes.message: The special people in our lives are absolutely priceless. They're the ones who bring us so many smiles and inspire such gratitude in our days.
quotes.name: Douglas Pagels

quotes.message: Never forget what a treasure you are. That special person in the mirror may not always get to hear all the compliments you so sweetly deserve, but you are so worthy of such an abundance...of friendship, joy, and love.
quotes.name: Douglas Pagels

quotes.message: There are as many ways to meet someone as there are someones to meet. That said, it's almost impossible to meet that one special someone unless you're willing to be someone else's someone until your special someone comes along.
quotes.name: Kermit The Frog

quotes.message: Oddly enough, the best place to meet your special someone is anywhere you are.
quotes.name: Kermit The Frog

quotes.message: I do not believe that there is a 'one and only' for each person, but I do believe that there is a special 'someone' along life's way and that the road we choose to travel will reveal a 'special someone' for us.
quotes.name: Robert L. Anderson

quotes.message: All these years of being a young adult, I was abstinent; I was waiting for the right time to give my mate something special. I wanted to wait for that special someone who was going to love and respect me as a woman.
quotes.name: Esther Telfort

quotes.message: Don't be afraid to go that extra mile for someone special, because that person will go the extra mile for you.
quotes.name: Ben Kalcher

quotes.message: Love is a hidden treasure. You never know you have it until someone special reveals it.
quotes.name: Debashis Mridha

quotes.message: How difficult it must be to leave a place called home, along with all the bitter sweet memories attached, for someone special and later on visit the same place as a guest.
quotes.name: Swati Kumar

quotes.message: We can all create a sunset, but it takes someone special to create a new dawn.
quotes.name: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.message: You know someone is very special to you when days just don't seem right without them.
quotes.name: John Cena

quotes.message: Finding someone special means you can truly be yourself. I was pretending for a long time.
quotes.name: Gerard Way

quotes.message: If you have someone in your life who makes you feel loved and cared and inspires you then you are truly blessed!
quotes.name: Avijeet Das

quotes.message: Anyone can come into your life and say how much they love you. It takes someone really special to stay in your life and show how much they love you.
quotes.name: Zahid Abas
