quotes.message: The devil catches most souls in a golden net.
quotes.name: German

quotes.message: The devil tempts but doesn't force.
quotes.name: Guyanan

quotes.message: The grass is always greener in someone else's yard.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: There is a charm about the forbidden that makes it unspeakably desirable.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: The devil doesn't come dressed in a red cape and pointy horns. He comes as everything you've ever wished for.
quotes.name: Tucker Max

quotes.message: Temptation is the feeling we get when encountered by an opportunity to do what we innately know we shouldn't.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: The greatest temptations are not those that solicit our consent to obvious sin, but those that offer us great evils masking as the greatest goods.
quotes.name: Thomas Merton

quotes.message: Temptation is stronger in the minds of people who are in doubt. Prayer makes it weaker.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Sometimes we have to behave indifferent towards people who proclaim their love to us, just to see if they are really different.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Temptation likes best those who think they have a natural immunity, for it may laugh all the harder when they succumb.
quotes.name: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.message: Temptation is the fire that brings up the scum of the heart.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Every conquering temptation represents a new fund of moral energy. Every trial endured and weathered in the right spirit makes a soul nobler and stronger than it was before.
quotes.name: William Butler Yeats

quotes.message: Temptation is like a knife, that may either cut the meat or the throat of a man; it may be his food or his poison, his exercise or his destruction
quotes.name: John Owen

quotes.message: Some temptations come to the industrious, but all temptations attack the idle.
quotes.name: Charles H. Spurgeon

quotes.message: Temptation wrings integrity even as the thumbscrew twists a man's fingers.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.message: Good habits result from resisting temptation.
quotes.name: Ancient Proverb

quotes.message: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation: for when he is tried, he shall receive the crown of life.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: It is easier to stay out than get out.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Temptations, unlike opportunities, will always give you many second chances.
quotes.name: Orlando A. Battista

quotes.message: The force of the blow depends on the resistance. It is sometimes better not to struggle against temptation. Either fly or yield at once.
quotes.name: Francis H. Bradley

quotes.message: We usually know what we can do, but temptation shows us who we are.
quotes.name: Thomas Kempis

quotes.message: Remove the temptation of idleness and cupids bow is useless.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: Not being able to govern events, I govern myself, and apply myself to them, if they will not apply themselves to me.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: Everyone must choose one of two pains: The pain of discipline or the pain of regret.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: If we resist our passions, it is more because of their weakness than because of our strength.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: For every man there exists a bait which he cannot resist swallowing.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Conscience whispers, but interest screams aloud.
quotes.name: J. Petit-Senn

quotes.message: Nothing makes it easier to resist temptation than a proper bringing-up, a sound set of values and witnesses.
quotes.name: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.message: Temptation usually comes in through a door that has deliberately been left open.
quotes.name: Arnold Glasow

quotes.message: Temptations are a file which rub off much of the rust of our self-confidence.
quotes.name: Francois Fenelon

quotes.message: He who chooses the beginning of the road chooses the place it leads to. It is the means that determines the end.
quotes.name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.message: Do not grudge the Hand that is moulding the still too shapeless image within you. It is growing more beautiful, though you see it not, and every touch of temptation may add to its perfection.
quotes.name: Henry Drummond

quotes.message: The higher the hill, the stronger the wind: so the loftier the life, the stronger the enemy's temptations.
quotes.name: John Wycliffe

quotes.message: The only way to avoid cannon-shot is to fall down. No such way to be freed from temptation as to keep low.
quotes.name: Thomas Brooks

quotes.message: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.
quotes.name: Alan Alda

quotes.message: Nobody gets to live life backward. Look ahead, that is where your future lies.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: We have to live life with a sense of urgency so not a minute is wasted.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: I don't wait for the calendar to figure out when I should live life.
quotes.name: Gene Simmons

quotes.message: I don't know how one should live - but I know that one should live.....
quotes.name: Glen Duncan

quotes.message: As long as you're alive, there's always a chance things will get better.
quotes.name: Laini Taylor

quotes.message: Live your life remembering good experiences, the bad ones were just lessons.
quotes.name: Michello Borgo

quotes.message: Don't be afraid your life will end; be afraid that it will never begin.
quotes.name: Grace Hansen

quotes.message: Live today facing forwardwith your back on yesterday, your eyes on tomorrow, and your head and heart in the moment.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.name: Dennis P. Kimbro

quotes.message: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: The great thing in this world is not so much where you stand, as in what direction you are moving.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.message: The only way of finding the limits of the possible is by going beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.name: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.message: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt and dance like no one is watching.
quotes.name: Randall G Leighton

quotes.message: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass...it's learning to dance in the rain.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: What seems like the right thing to do could also be the hardest thing you have ever done in your life.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I am the author of my life.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.name: Stephen King

quotes.message: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.name: Mae West

quotes.message: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: It goes on.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
quotes.name: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.message: Enjoy the little things in life, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
quotes.name: Robert Breault

quotes.message: If you obey all the rules, you'll miss all the fun.
quotes.name: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.message: A life without cause is a life without effect.
quotes.name: Barbarella

quotes.message: Life is a great big canvas, and you should throw all the paint on it you can.
quotes.name: Danny Kaye

quotes.message: You've got to get to the stage in life where going for it is more important than winning or losing.
quotes.name: Arthur Ashe

quotes.message: Life was meant to be lived, and curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Love yourself! Forgive yourself! Accept yourself! You are YOU and that's the beginning and the end - no apologies, no regrets.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: One of the most freeing things we learn in life is that we don't have to like everyone, everyone doesn't have to like us, and it's perfectly OK.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You have to understand that people come and people go. That's life. Stop holding on to those who have let go of you long ago.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Life is too short to spend at war with yourself. Practice acceptance and forgiveness. Letting go of yesterday's troubles is your first step towards happiness today.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Take every moment in your stride to make it worth a treasure of life. It is never too late to be what you are destined for. Only it matters how you take the moment & make it beautiful.
quotes.name: Dr. Anil Kr Sinha

quotes.message: Slow down and remember this: Most things make no difference.
quotes.name: Tim Ferriss

quotes.message: We must be willing to get rid of the life we've planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: There are two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: People say that what we are seeking is in for life. I don't think this is what we're really seeking. I think what we're seeking is an experience of being alive.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: Live as if your were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Focus more on your desire than on your doubt, and the dream will take care of itself. You may be surprised at how easily this happens. Your doubts are not as powerful as your desires, unless you make them so.
quotes.name: Marcia Wieder

quotes.message: Be more splendid, more extraordinary. Use every moment to fill yourself up.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: I believe that one of life's greatest risks is never daring to risk.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Love the life you live, and live the life you love.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: Try and fail, but never fail to try.
quotes.name: Jared Leto

quotes.message: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: In life, as in whist, hope nothing from the way cards may be dealt to you. Play the cards, whatever they be, to the best of your skill.
quotes.name: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: In every marriage more than a week old there are grounds for divorce. The trick is to find and continue to find grounds for marriage.
quotes.name: Robert Anderson

quotes.message: A divorce is like an amputation: You survive it, but there's less of you.
quotes.name: Margaret Atwood

quotes.message: I've gone through a really hard divorce, and anyone who has gone through a divorce will speak about how hard the journey is from start to finish. It's a life-uprooting time.
quotes.name: Christina Aguilera

quotes.message: When two people decide to get a divorce, it isn't a sign that they don't understand one another, but a sign that they have, at last, begun to.
quotes.name: Helen Rowland

quotes.message: People do not get married planning to divorce. Divorce is the result of a lack of preparation for marriage and the failure to learn the skills of working together as teammates in an intimate relationship.
quotes.name: Gary Chapman

quotes.message: There would be fewer divorces if men gave as much loving attention to their wives as they do their cars and jobs.
quotes.name: Vikrant Parsai

quotes.message: Divorce is a fire exit. When a house is burning, it doesn't matter who set the fire.
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: Being divorced is like being hit by a Mack truck. If you live through it, you start looking very carefully to the right and to the left.
quotes.name: Jean Kerr

quotes.message: Every divorce is the result of selfishness on the part of one or the other or both parties to a marriage contract. Someone is thinking of self comforts, conveniences, freedoms, luxuries, or ease. Sometimes the ceaseless pin pricking of an unhappy, discontented, and selfish spouse can finally add up to serious physical violence. Sometimes people are goaded to the point where they erringly feel justified in doing the things that are so wrong. Nothing of course justifies sin.
quotes.name: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.message: Getting divorced just because you don't love a man is almost as silly as getting married just because you do.
quotes.name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.message: The remedy for most marital stress is not in divorce. It is in repentance and forgiveness, in sincere expressions of charity and service. It is not in separation. It is in simple integrity that leads a man and a woman to square up their shoulders and meet their obligations. It is found in the Golden Rule, a time-honored principle that should first and foremost find expression in marriage.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckle

quotes.message: Divorce is a failed challenge, which leads to a broken life. It is a socially transmittable disease that can transfer from one generation to another, and it is spreading fast.
quotes.name: Sia F. Dean

quotes.message: People get divorced for one reason and one reason only: One or both of them get selfish.
quotes.name: Pastor Mark Gungor

quotes.message: Each divorce is the death of a small civilization.
quotes.name: Pat Conroy

quotes.message: To get divorced because love has died, is like selling your car because it's run out of gas.
quotes.name: Diane Sollee

quotes.message: Divorce is like an amputation. Sometimes it's necessary but it should be avoided if at all possible because it brings about a permanent disability.
quotes.name: Bill Doherty

quotes.message: It takes two to destroy a marriage.
quotes.name: Margaret Trudeau

quotes.message: Divorce is one of the most financially traumatic things you can go through. Money spent on getting mad or getting even is money wasted.
quotes.name: Richard Wagner

quotes.message: Divorce is a declaration of independence with only two signers.
quotes.name: Gerald F. Lieberman

quotes.message: For some reason, we see divorce as a signal of failure, despite the fact that each of us has a right, and an obligation, to rectify any other mistake we make in life.
quotes.name: Joyce Brothers

quotes.message: Divorce should be the last possible option, rather than something we should be smoothing the passage to.
quotes.name: Brian Adam

quotes.message: Divorce is the one human tragedy that reduces everything to cash.
quotes.name: Rita Brown

quotes.message: Divorce looks like one of the fastest ways to destroy your wealth.
quotes.name: Jay Zagorsky

quotes.message: Divorce is the psychological equivalent of a triple coronary bypass.
quotes.name: Mary Kay Blakely

quotes.message: Love is grand; divorce is a hundred grand.
quotes.name: Shinichi Suzuki

quotes.message: Divorce is a game played by lawyers.
quotes.name: Cary Grant

quotes.message: If you have been divorced, you know it hurts - especially if your marriage had lasted many years. Whatever the circumstances of your relationship, and whatever the nature of its ending, there is always grief and regret - perhaps regret over the ending, or perhaps regret over not ending the relationship sooner - or perhaps both. Nonetheless, move past the grief and regret. No matter how painful, divorce, like all endings, opens the door to new beginnings.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: When people divorce, it's always such a tragedy. At the same time, if people stay together it can be even worse.
quotes.name: Monica Bellucci

quotes.message: Divorce is the sacrament of adultery.
quotes.name: French Proverbs

quotes.message: Divorce is one of the most stressful life events anyone goes through.
quotes.name: Emily Doskow

quotes.message: Divorce is an embarrassing public admission of defeat.
quotes.name: Tracy Letts

quotes.message: Divorce is like cutting off a gangrened arm to save the rest of the body.
quotes.name: David Knox and Caroline Schacht

quotes.message: Divorce is like death without a burial.
quotes.name: Dane Cunningham

quotes.message: Divorce is probably as painful as death.
quotes.name: William Shatner

quotes.message: Divorce is the key that opens the strongbox where the bonds of matrimony are kept under wedlock.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: So many persons think divorce a panacea for every ill, who find out, when they try it, that the remedy is worse than the disease.
quotes.name: DOROTHY DIX

quotes.message: Going through a divorce is like having every aspect of your life played back. Anything you have mishandled or regretted is talked about by everyone as they try to figure out who was right and who the innocent party really is. The comfort you once experienced is gone completely. There are many choices for new comfort, but most of them have no value except introducing new addictions or pounds of fat or guilt.
quotes.name: Kandace Cooper

quotes.message: Divorce isn't the child's fault. Don't say anything unkind about your ex to the child, because you're really just hurting the child.
quotes.name: Valerie Bertinelli

quotes.message: Marriages come and go, but divorces are forever.
quotes.name: Nora Ephron

quotes.message: Divorce is the price people play for playing with matches.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: Divorce can sometimes be for the better. You may end up with happier parents, and you will definitely learn a lot about yourself! And that's the whole point of growing up. So if you think about it, there are reasons to be happy about this experience, if you can learn and grow from it.
quotes.name: Zoe Stern

quotes.message: People that go through what I went through and people going through divorce, it's really a difficulty process; it's heartbreaking and it hurts really bad. It can really mess with your head.
quotes.name: David Arquette

quotes.message: Divorce: a resumption of diplomatic relations and rectification of boundaries.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: Losing a mate to death is devastating but it's not a personal attack like divorce. When somebody you love stops loving you and walks away, it's an insult beyond comparison.
quotes.name: Sue Merrell

quotes.message: I don't see divorce as a failure. I see it as the end to a story. In a story, everything has an end and a beginning.
quotes.name: Olga Kurylenko

quotes.message: I used to think that divorce meant failure, but now I see it more as a step along the path of self-realization and growth
quotes.name: Alana Stewart

quotes.message: Divorce = Rebirth: forget the past, replan your life, improve your appearance & REJUVENATE!
quotes.name: Rossana Condoleo

quotes.message: Divorce in a young-adult novel means what being orphaned meant in a fairy tale: vulnerability, danger, unwanted independence.
quotes.name: Caitlin Flanagan

quotes.message: Divorce is open-heart surgery, emotionally. Some people are not willing to give it enough time, and their expectations for recovery are too fast. When you get up and go faster than you're supposed to and you push your healing cycle too quickly, you have to do it over again and you get a relapse.
quotes.name: Steve Grissom and Kathy Leonard

quotes.message: No man is free who cannot command himself.
quotes.name: Pythagoras

quotes.message: No confict is so severe as his who labors to subdue himself.
quotes.name: Thomas Kempis

quotes.message: Ultimately, the only power to which man should aspire is that which he exercises over himself.
quotes.name: Elie Wiesel

quotes.message: He who has power over himself has power over his greatest enemy.
quotes.name: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.message: He who reigns within himself, and rules passions, desires, and fears, is more than a king.
quotes.name: John Milton

quotes.message: Even a little self control can save you a lot of time, energy and errors.
quotes.name: Unkown

quotes.message: You can't always control the wind, but you can control your sails.
quotes.name: Dr. Bob Chope

quotes.message: You will never have a greater or lesser dominion than that over yourself.
quotes.name: da Vinci

quotes.message: Not being able to govern events, I govern myself, and apply myself to them, if they will not apply themselves to me.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: I am, indeed, a king, because I know how to rule myself.
quotes.name: Pietro Aretino

quotes.message: I am the master of my fate; I am the captain of my soul.
quotes.name: William Henley

quotes.message: What lies in our power to do, it lies in our power not to do.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: The best time for you to hold your tongue is the time you feel you must say something or bust.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Not to have control over the senses is like sailing in a rudderless ship, bound to break to pieces on coming in contact with the very first rock.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: You can never conquer the mountain. You can only conquer yourself.
quotes.name: Jim Whittaker

quotes.message: If you do not conquer self, you will be conquered by self.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: He that hath no rule over his own spirit is like a city that is broken down, and without walls.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: In reading the lives of great men, I found that the first victory they won was over themselves.
quotes.name: Harry S. Truman

quotes.message: Self-control is the quality that distinguishes the fittest to survive.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Self-control is one mark of a mature person; it applies to control of language, physical treatment of others, and the appetites of the body.
quotes.name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.message: The man who masters his own soul will forever be called conqueror of conquerors.
quotes.name: Plautus

quotes.message: The only power to which man should aspire is that which he exercises over himself.
quotes.name: Elie Wiesel

quotes.message: Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
quotes.name: Marcus Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: Man who man would be, must rule the empire of himself.
quotes.name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.message: Learning to control your reactions, saves you a lot of explaining, regretting, and apologizing.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson

quotes.message: If passion drives you, let reason hold the reins.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Self control is the power within you that holds the reins of anger, intolerance and impulsiveness.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson

quotes.message: He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: He who controls others may be powerful, but he who has mastered himself is mightier still.
quotes.name: Tao Te Ching

quotes.message: To conquer oneself is a greater task than conquering others.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Govern thyself then you will be able to govern the world.
quotes.name: Unkown

quotes.message: Rule your mind or it will rule you.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: Self-command is the main elegance.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Man cannot live without self-control.
quotes.name: Isaac Singer

quotes.message: The first and best victory is to conquer self. To be conquered by self is, of all things, the most shameful and objectionable.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: Such power there is in clear-eyed self-restraint.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: As far as your self-control goes, as far goes your freedom.
quotes.name: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.message: There is little that can withstand a man who can conquer himself.
quotes.name: Louis XIV

quotes.message: He who conquers others is strong; he who conquers himself is mighty.
quotes.name: Lao-Tzu

quotes.message: You have power over your mind, not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: I count him braver who overcomes his desires than him who conquers his enemies; for the hardest victory is over self.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: To keep one's mouth from evil and depraved talk; not to love much speaking.
quotes.name: St. Benedict

quotes.message: Our self-will is so subtle and deeply rooted within us, so covered with excuses and defended by false reasoning that it seems a devil.
quotes.name: St. Catherine of Genoa

quotes.message: Willpower was shaped by the guiding force of self-discipline.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Such power there is in clear-eyed self-restraint.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: There never has been, and cannot be, a good life without self-control.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: The difference between a savior and a sinner is this: that the one has perfect control of all the forces within him; the other is dominated and controlled by them.
quotes.name: James Allen

quotes.message: Remember there is always a limit to self-indulgence, but none to self-restraint.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: One must train oneself, small and frequent efforts, to dominate one's feelings.
quotes.name: Alexis Carrel

quotes.message: The wise who control body, speech, and mind are indeed the consummately controlled.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Who has a harder fight than he who is striving to overcome self?
quotes.name: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.message: He that has not mastery over his inclinations, he that knows not how to resist the importunity of present pleasure or pain...is in danger of never being good for anything.
quotes.name: John Locke

quotes.message: Self-restraint may be alien to the human temperament, but humanity without restraint will dig its own grave.
quotes.name: Marya Mannes

quotes.message: A horse that resists the reins, a car without brakes, and a person with no self-control, are all equally headed for disaster.
quotes.name: Satya Sai Baba

quotes.message: Our own inner child has to be disciplined in order to release its tremendous spiritual power.
quotes.name: Marion Boa Woodman

quotes.message: Self-discipline does within while you do without.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: It is a great deal of medicine that possesses a child and robs it of all self-control.
quotes.name: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.message: Ask for advise from those who evidence good self-discipline.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: He who does not control his impulse classes himself with beasts.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: Self-control can be defined as the effortful attempts by a person to change thoughts, feelings, and behaviors in order to reach long-term interests or goals.
quotes.name: Muraven & Baumeister 2000

quotes.message: For a mind is a terrible thing to waste and someone will use it if you don't. Take over; that is a manual for self-control.
quotes.name: Jacobie Allison

quotes.message: Never respond to an angry person with a fiery comeback, even if he deserves it...Don't allow his anger to become your anger.
quotes.name: Bohdi Sanders

quotes.message: Any woman who is sure of her own wits, is a match, at any time, for a man who is not sure of his own temper.
quotes.name: Wilkie Collins

quotes.message: Self-control is the chief element in self-respect, and self-respect is the chief element in courage.
quotes.name: Thucydides

quotes.message: I cannot trust a man to control others who cannot control himself.
quotes.name: Robert E. Lee

quotes.message: Self-control is strength. Right thought is mastery. Calmness is power.
quotes.name: James Allen

quotes.message: Mastering self-control, the act of restraining one’s emotions is the true key to success.
quotes.name: Timothy Pina

quotes.message: In that power of self-control lies the seed of eternal freedom.
quotes.name: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.message: He who angers you conquers you.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Kenny

quotes.message: You have no control over what the other guy does. You only have control over what you do.
quotes.name: A.J. Kitt

quotes.message: Your brain shall be your servant instead of your master. You will rule it instead of allowing it to rule you.
quotes.name: Charles Popplestone

quotes.message: When you lose a person you love so much, surviving the loss is difficult.
quotes.name: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.message: I think loss of loved ones is the hardest blow in life.
quotes.name: Marlo Thomas

quotes.message: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: A great soul serves everyone all the time. A great soul never dies. It brings us together again and again.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Perhaps they are not stars, but rather openings in Heaven where the love of our lost ones pours through and shines down upon us to let us know they are happy.
quotes.name: Eskimo Proverb

quotes.message: When you are sorrowful look again in your heart, and you shall see that in truth you are weeping for that which has been your delight.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: Those we love and lose are always connected by heartstrings into infinity.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: I know for certain that we never lose the people we love, even to death. They continue to participate in every act, thought and decision we make. Their love leaves an indelible imprint in our memories. We find comfort in knowing that our lives have been enriched by having shared their love.
quotes.name: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.message: Words seem inadequate to express the sadness we feel we for and your family. We are here to help, support, and do whatever you need done.
quotes.name: Unknown Author

quotes.message: If there was less sympathy in the world, there would be less trouble in the world.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: We understand death only after it has placed its hands on someone we love.
quotes.name: Anne L. de Stael

quotes.message: Though nothing can bring back the hour of splendor in the grass, of glory in the flower, We will grieve not, rather find strength in what remains behind.
quotes.name: William Wordsworth

quotes.message: Though sympathy alone can't alter facts, it can help to make them more bearable.
quotes.name: Bram Stoker

quotes.message: Like a bird singing in the rain, let grateful memories survive in time of sorrow.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: To Remember Is Painful, To Forget Is Impossible.
quotes.name: Maureen Connelly

quotes.message: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot _be seen or even touched._They must be felt with the heart.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary.
quotes.name: David Sedaris

quotes.message: It is terribly rude to tell people that their troubles are boring.
quotes.name: Lemony Snicket

quotes.message: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: Unable are the loved to die. For love is immortality.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: There are no goodbyes for us. Wherever you are, you will always be in my heart.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
quotes.name: Dr.Seuss

quotes.message: While we are mourning the loss of our friend, others are rejoicing to meet him behind the veil.
quotes.name: John Taylor

quotes.message: When the heart grieves over what is has lost, the spirit rejoices over what it has left.
quotes.name: Sufi Epigram

quotes.message: However long the night, the dawn will break.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: He who has gone, so we but cherish his memory, abides with us, more potent, nay, more present than the living man.
quotes.name: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.message: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.name: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.message: When you are sorrowful look again in your heart, and you shall see that in truth you are weeping for that which has been your delight.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: Sadly missed along life's way, quietly remembered every day... No longer in our life to share, but in our hearts, you're always there.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Delay is the deadliest form of denial.
quotes.name: C. Northcote Parkinson

quotes.message: The thing about denial is that it doesn't feel like denial when it's going on.
quotes.name: Georgina Kleege

quotes.message: When denial is in play, a person simply refuses to recognize the truth, no matter how apparent.
quotes.name: Taite Adams

quotes.message: Denial is the lid on our emotional pressure cooker: the longer we leave it on, the more pressure we build up. Sooner or later, that pressure is bound to pop the lid, and we have an emotional crisis.
quotes.name: Susan Forward

quotes.message: Denial exists when three beliefs intersect: 1. It cannot happen. 2. It cannot happen to you. 3. It cannot happen to you now.
quotes.name: Johnnie Dent Jr.

quotes.message: Denial is a common tactic that substitutes deliberate ignorance for thoughtful planning.
quotes.name: CHARLES TREMPER

quotes.message: Clouds cannot cover secret places, nor denials conceal truth.
quotes.name: Demosthenes

quotes.message: Denial does not solve the problem. Denial does not make the problem go away. Denial does not give us peace of mind, which is what we are really seeking when we engage in it. Denial is a liar. It compounds the problem, because it keeps us from seeing a solution, and taking action to resolve it.
quotes.name: BILL KORTENBACH

quotes.message: Never underestimate the power of denial.
quotes.name: Wes Bently

quotes.message: The abuse dies in a day, but the denial slays the life of the people, and entombs the hope of the race.
quotes.name: Charles Bradlaugh

quotes.message: Denial is the number one aspect of medicine. That's why people don't get check-ups.
quotes.name: Larry L. King

quotes.message: That which is denied cannot be healed.
quotes.name: Brennan Manning

quotes.message: God's delay is not God's denial.
quotes.name: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.message: The greatest barrier to someone achieving their potential is their denial of it.
quotes.name: Simon Travaglia

quotes.message: Denial of one appetite sharpens the others.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: It takes a lot of courage to face up to things you can't do because we feed ourselves so much denial.
quotes.name: Zoe Saldana

quotes.message: Denial is a very powerful thing.
quotes.name: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.message: Remember to be honest with yourself. Denial is how we often get stuck in the same place in life.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Denial is the way we handle what we cannot handle.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: I think denial's fascinating. It's a jokey word, but it really happens, and sometimes in enormous ways.
quotes.name: Marian Keyes

quotes.message: The greatest barrier to someone achieving their potential is their denial of it.
quotes.name: Antje Traue

quotes.message: More people would learn from their mistakes if they weren't so busy denying them.
quotes.name: Harold J. Smith

quotes.message: Denial is the worst form of truth.
quotes.name: Ella The Wise and powerful

quotes.message: Denial is useful defense mechanism until it's not.
quotes.name: Rosalind Kaplan

quotes.message: Denial does not change reality for everyone else. Only for the one denying and those who are foolish enough to believe the fantasy.
quotes.name: Elle Casey

quotes.message: Being in denial never resolved any problem for anyone, anywhere.
quotes.name: Muhammed Haider

quotes.message: No denial of the truth will ever invalidate it.
quotes.name: Nikki Rosen

quotes.message: At first, they'll only dislike what you say, but the more correct you start sounding the more they'll dislike you.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Denial is the worst kind of lie...because it is the lie you tell yourself.
quotes.name: Michelle A. Homme

quotes.message: Denial and inactivity prepare people well for the roles of victim and corpse.
quotes.name: John Leach

quotes.message: Living in denial only makes accepting the truth that much harder.
quotes.name: Jules F.

quotes.message: As the fear of God is the beginning of wisdom, so the denial of God is the height of foolisnes.
quotes.name: R.C. Sproul

quotes.message: Refusal to believe until proof is given is a rational position; denial of all outside of our own limited experience is absurd.
quotes.name: Annie Besant

quotes.message: The speed of the human mind is remarkable. So is its inability to face the obvious.
quotes.name: SIMON MAWER

quotes.message: The worst lies are the lies we tell ourselves. We live in denial of what we do, even what we think. We do this because we're afraid.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: Denial ain't just a river in Egypt.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Most men would rather deny a hard truth than face it.
quotes.name: George R.R. Martin

quotes.message: The easiest way to solve a problem is to deny it exists.
quotes.name: Isaac Asimov

quotes.message: Better a friendly denial than unwilling compliance.
quotes.name: PROVERBS

quotes.message: It is not necessary to deny another's reality in order to affirm your own.
quotes.name: Anne Wilson Schaef

quotes.message: One picture is worth 1,000 denials.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Denial, perhaps, is a necessary human mechanism to cope with the heartaches of life.
quotes.name: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.message: The road of denial leads to the precipice of destruction.
quotes.name: John Bunyan

quotes.message: What state do you live in? Denial.
quotes.name: Bill Watterson

quotes.message: Underneath all that denial, you're someone who's deeply, deeply nice.
quotes.name: David Levithan

quotes.message: Denial is an ugly thing.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: Denial, they say, stands for Don't even notice I am lying. Human beings are the only animals who are happily lied to by our own minds about what is actually happening around us.
quotes.name: Cesar Millan

quotes.message: I would rather have regrets of excess than regrets of denial.
quotes.name: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.message: Denial is a wall in which love hides behind.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Self-denial is indulgence of a propensity to forego.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: The denial of our duty to act in this case is a denial of our right to act; and if we have no right to act, then may we well be termed the white slaves of the North, for like our brethren in bonds, we must seal our lips in silence and despair.
quotes.name: Angelina Grimke

quotes.message: Those who deny the existence of the truth postulate the truth of their denial and plainly contradict themselves.
quotes.name: Antonio Machado

quotes.message: The only atheism is the denial of truth.
quotes.name: Arthur Lynch

quotes.message: I find I am constantly being encouraged to pluck out some one aspect of myself and present this as the meaningful whole, eclipsing or denying the other parts of self.
quotes.name: Audre Lorde

quotes.message: It's not denial. I'm just selective about the reality I accept.
quotes.name: Bill Watterson

quotes.message: Denial helps us to pace our feelings of grief. There is a grace in denial. It is nature's way of letting in only as much as we can handle.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.message: Deny any part of Reality, and you will lose your awareness of all of It.
quotes.name: ELIZABETH A. CRONKHITE

quotes.message: You can't get away from yourself by moving from one place to another.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: Where justice is denied, where poverty is enforced, where ignorance prevails, and where any one class is made to feel that society is an organized conspiracy to oppress, rob and degrade them, neither persons nor property will be safe.
quotes.name: Frederick Douglass

quotes.message: Denial was a weapon; it killed truth, numbed the mind, and I was a junkie.
quotes.name: John Hart

quotes.message: The conflict between the will to deny horrible events and the will to proclaim them aloud is the central dialectic of psychological trauma.
quotes.name: Judith Lewis Herman

quotes.message: Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. It turns denial into acceptance, chaos to order, confusion to clarity. It can turn a meal into a feast, a house into a home, a stranger into a friend.
quotes.name: Melody Beattie

quotes.message: Dreams of innocence are just that; they usually depend on a denial of reality that can be its own form of hubris.
quotes.name: Michael Pollan

quotes.message: The trouble with denial is that when the truth comes, you aren't ready.
quotes.name: Nina LaCour

quotes.message: To regret one’s own experiences is to arrest one’s own development. To deny one’s own experiences is to put a lie into the lips of one’s own life. It is no less than a denial of the soul.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: I could deny it if I liked. I could deny anything if I liked.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Even as your body betrays you, your mind denies it.
quotes.name: Sara Gruen

quotes.message: Denial is like an old blanket. I loved to get on under that thing and curl up and sleep.
quotes.name: Taylor Jenkins Reid

quotes.message: A man who denies his past is a man who truly denies himself a future, for he refuses to know himself, and to deny knowledge of oneself is to stumble through life as handicapped as the blind mute.
quotes.name: Tobsha Learner

quotes.message: Most people find facts irritating. Facts interfere with their systems of denial.
quotes.name: Walter Darby Bannard

quotes.message: The practice of leadership is not the same as the exercise of power.
quotes.name: James Macgregor Burns

quotes.message: Only through practice and more practice, until you can do something without conscious effort.
quotes.name: Joe Hyams

quotes.message: Through practice, gently and gradually we can collect ourselves and learn how to be more fully with what we do.
quotes.name: Jack Kornfield

quotes.message: Everything we do is practice for something greater than where we currently are.
quotes.name: Adam Kirk Smith

quotes.message: We learn by practice. Whether it means to learn to dance by practicing dancing or to learn to live by practicing living, the principles are the same. One becomes in some area an athlete of God.
quotes.name: Martha Graham

quotes.message: You can practice to attain knowledge, but you can't practice to attain wisdom.
quotes.name: Herbie Hancock

quotes.message: Practice only makes for improvement.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: Practice puts brains in your muscles.
quotes.name: Sam Snead

quotes.message: Only by practice and non-attachment can we conquer mind.
quotes.name: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.message: Practice makes better and prayer makes perfect. The more we do, the easier it gets, and all the while praying perfects us in the art.
quotes.name: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.message: We need to learn how to honor and use a practice for as long as it serves us.
quotes.name: Jack Kornfield

quotes.message: Practice the art of patience for nature never acts in haste.
quotes.name: Og Mandino

quotes.message: The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: Preaching is to much avail, but practice is far more effective. A godly life is the strongest argument you can offer the skeptic.
quotes.name: Hosea Ballou

quotes.message: What you practice, is what you'll do.
quotes.name: Benny Urquidez

quotes.message: Practice is everything. This is often misquoted as Practice makes perfect.
quotes.name: Periander

quotes.message: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
quotes.name: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.message: To practice the process of conflict resolution, we must completely abandon the goal of getting people to do what we want.
quotes.name: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.message: Practice means to perform, over and over again in the face of all obstacles, some act of vision, of faith, of desire. Practice is a means of inviting the perfection desired.
quotes.name: Martha Graham

quotes.message: The more you practice the better you'll be, the harder you train the great in you they'll see.
quotes.name: Alcurtis Turner

quotes.message: Good ideas are not adopted automatically. They must be driven into practice with courageous patience.
quotes.name: Hyman Rickover

quotes.message: When you practice gratefulness, there is a sense of respect toward others.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Practice like it's a game; play the game like it's practice.
quotes.name: Mike Candrea

quotes.message: Practice has a logic which is not that of the logician.
quotes.name: Pierre Bourdieu

quotes.message: We must patiently practice every day.
quotes.name: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.message: Practice makes comfort. Expand your experiences regularly so every stretch won't feel like your first.
quotes.name: Gina Greenlee

quotes.message: They say that nobody is perfect. Then they tell you practice makes perfect. I wish they'd make up their minds.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: We are practicing what we preach so that we may preach what we practice.
quotes.name: Ralph Nader

quotes.message: Practice without improvement is meaningless.
quotes.name: Chuck Knox

quotes.message: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
quotes.name: Anton Chekhov

quotes.message: The goal of practice is always to keep our beginner's mind.
quotes.name: Jack Kornfield

quotes.message: I'm a strong believer that you practice like you play, little things make big things happen.
quotes.name: Tony Dorsett

quotes.message: Best practices are those practices that generally produce the best results or minimize risk.
quotes.name: Chad White

quotes.message: Preparation to success is hard work of daily practice with improvement.
quotes.name: Millie DeWitt

quotes.message: Practice is the hardest part of learning, and training is the essence of transformation.
quotes.name: Ann Voskamp

quotes.message: Practice what you know, and it will help to make clear what now you do not know.
quotes.name: Rembrandt

quotes.message: When you get to practice against the best, it brings the best out of you.
quotes.name: Marshawn Lynch

quotes.message: Practice presence embrace the place where life happens.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Practice should always be based upon a sound knowledge of theory.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: Practice is the only norm for verifying truth.
quotes.name: Deng Xiaoping

quotes.message: It is not a matter of faith. It is a matter of practice.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: Don't misunderstand me. I don't believe in prayer. I only do it. Or perhaps it does me.
quotes.name: Sam Keen

quotes.message: It's not what you do once in a while, it's what you do day in and day out that makes the difference.
quotes.name: Jenny Craig

quotes.message: When you find your place where you are, practice occurs.
quotes.name: Eihei Dogen

quotes.message: Practice is the repeated effort to follow the disciplines which give permanent control of the thought-waves of the mind. Practice becomes firmly grounded when it has been cultivated for a long time, uninterruptedly, with earnest devotion.
quotes.name: Patanjali

quotes.message: Practice is the best of all instructors.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: He who knoweth the precepts by heart, but faileth to practice them, is like unto one who lighteth a lamp and the shutteth his eyes.
quotes.name: Nagarjuna

quotes.message: What you want to be eventually, that you must be every day; and by and by the quality of your deeds will get down into your soul.
quotes.name: Frank Crane

quotes.message: Exercise, exercise your powers; what is difficult will finally become routine.
quotes.name: Georg Lichtenberg

quotes.message: What makes a man a good artist, a good sculptor, a good musician? Practice. What makes a man a good linguist, a good stenographer? Practice. What makes a man a good man? Practice. Nothing else.
quotes.name: Henry Drummond

quotes.message: Practice makes permanent.
quotes.name: Jane Zimmerman

quotes.message: Practice not your art, and it will soon depart.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: By nature, men are nearly alike; by practice, they get to be wide apart.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: A juggler's instant skill hath been long years a learning.
quotes.name: Martin Tupper

quotes.message: An ounce of practice is more than tons of preaching.
quotes.name: Gandhi

quotes.message: If I don't practice one day, I know it; two days the critics know it; three days, the public knows it.
quotes.name: Jascha Heifetz

quotes.message: I know you've heard it a thousand times before. But it's true—hard work pays off. If you want to be good, you have to practice, practice, practice. If you don't love something, then don't do it.
quotes.name: Ray Bradbury

quotes.message: There are only two sorts of doctors; those who practice with their brains, and those who practice with their tongues.
quotes.name: Sir William Osler

quotes.message: For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: You don't need to justify your love, you don't need to explain your love, you just need to practice your love. Practice creates the master.
quotes.name: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.message: Practice doesn't make perfect. Practice reduces the imperfection.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Do it again. Play it again. Sing it again. Read it again. Write it again. Sketch it again. Rehearse it again. Run it again. Try it again. Because again is practice, and practice is improvement, and improvement only leads to perfection.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: You are what you practice most.
quotes.name: Richard Carlson

quotes.message: The mind is like tofu. It tastes like whatever you marinate it in.
quotes.name: Sylvia Boorstein

quotes.message: It's what you practice in private that you will be rewarded for in public.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
quotes.name: John Bunyan

quotes.message: It is more difficult to give money away intelligently than to earn it in the first place.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: The value of a man resides in what he gives and not in what he is capable of receiving.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Giving frees us from the familiar territory of our own needs by opening our mind to the unexplained worlds occupied by the needs of others.
quotes.name: Barbara Bush

quotes.message: There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.
quotes.name: John Holmes

quotes.message: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: The proper aim of giving is to put the recipients in a state where they no longer need our gifts.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Where there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance.
quotes.name: St. Francis

quotes.message: You're learning to be nourished by the love you give, not by the validation offered in response to your giving.
quotes.name: Matt Kahn

quotes.message: The life of a man consists not in seeing visions and in dreaming dreams, but in active charity and in willing service.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: No one has ever become poor by giving.
quotes.name: Anne Frank

quotes.message: Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege.
quotes.name: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

quotes.message: The measure of life is not its duration, but its donation.
quotes.name: Peter Marshall

quotes.message: Every good act is charity. A man's true wealth hereafter is the good that he does in this world to his fellows.
quotes.name: Moliere

quotes.message: When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: It's good to be blessed. It's better to be a blessing.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: One good thing about donation, once you do it, you get addicted to it because it brings great joy and happiness to you.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: Donation for the blind. A fee for falling into their own trap.
quotes.name: Andre Dawson

quotes.message: Giving is not just about making a donation. It is about making a difference.
quotes.name: Kathy Calvin

quotes.message: Though our donations are made to please ourselves, we insist, upon those who receive our alms being pleased with them.
quotes.name: John Zimmerman

quotes.message: Value of life depends not on your possessions, but on your donation.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: To give away money is an easy matter and in any man's power. But to decide to whom to give it, and how large and when, and for what purpose and how, is neither in every man's power nor an easy matter.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Whatever you think the world is withholding from you, you are withholding from the world.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Giving is better than receiving because giving starts the receiving process.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: By donating, you will also be supporting your own community and literally saving lives with every pint donated.
quotes.name: Pam Henry

quotes.message: When people make donations to non profits, they want to know that their money goes to good use.
quotes.name: Sam Simon

quotes.message: With regard to donations always expect the most from prudent people, who keep their own accounts.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Every donation received is a potential negative ad. Vetting money is just as important as raising it.
quotes.name: Dick Morris

quotes.message: Life isn't just about the duration you spend, but by the donation of impact you can pass out before you eventually pass-out
quotes.name: Seyi Ayoola

quotes.message: I'd rather have a lot of little donations than a couple big ones. That shows that people care and are giving what they can.
quotes.name: Steve Grand

quotes.message: The value of life is not in its duration, but in its donation. You are not important because of how long you live, you are important because of how effective you live.
quotes.name: Myles Munroe

quotes.message: Anytime you use your God-given abilities to help others, you are fulfilling your purpose of life. What matters is not the Duration of your life, but the Donation of it.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: I do things - whether it's donations or events for good causes or giving back to my community - for the right reason: because I want to. Because it's the best thing to do. I wanna help someone else out.
quotes.name: LeSean McCoy

quotes.message: Even the most caring people can get tired of being taken for granted.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: Whenever you are fed up with life, start writing: ink is the great cure for all human ills, as I have found out long ago.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: A person has to get fed up with the ways of the world before he, before she acquires an appetite for the world of grace.
quotes.name: Eugene H. Peterson

quotes.message: She was always tired, these days. She put on one of those smiles that wasn't really a smile at all, and they went on.
quotes.name: Jojo Moyes

quotes.message: When you eat too much chocolate, you get sick of it. When you drink too much champagne, you get sick of it. Gorge yourself on fear.
quotes.name: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.message: I've done all my tricks. I'm tired of myself.
quotes.name: Sandra Bullock

quotes.message: No one gets tired of loving, but everyone gets tired of waiting, assuming, hearing lies and hurting.
quotes.name: Anmol Andore

quotes.message: People are fed up with something when it becomes more and more popular.
quotes.name: Jean Paul Gaultier

quotes.message: There always comes a point in life when you've had enough and just have to let go of the things that keeps weighing you down no matter how convincing they seem, that you can't do without them, it's just a matter of time you'll surely get over it.
quotes.name: Blaze Olermiday

quotes.message: I'm fed up to the ears with old men dreaming up wars for young men to die in.
quotes.name: George Mcgovern

quotes.message: I'm tired of defending my character. I am what I am. What you see is what you get.
quotes.name: Dana Plato

quotes.message: When we are tired, we are attacked by ideas we conquered long ago
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: You either get tired fighting for peace, or you die.
quotes.name: John Lennon

quotes.message: I am tired of getting up every time I fall and trying to fight the fight I will never be able to win.
quotes.name: Nichole Parisian

quotes.message: Those who love life do not read. Nor do they go to the movies, actually. No matter what might be said, access to the artistic universe is more or less entirely the preserve of those who are a little fed up with the world.
quotes.name: Michel Houellebecq

quotes.message: The most critical time in any battle is not when I'm fatigued, it's when I no longer care.
quotes.name: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.message: I got to the point where I was fed up with so many people telling me how and who I was supposed to be.
quotes.name: Estelle

quotes.message: We believe only in deeds and acts and not in declarations. We are fed up with all those declarations, promises...
quotes.name: Ariel Sharon

quotes.message: I am fed up. I am fed up with tears and weakness. But there isn't much I can do to stop them.
quotes.name: Veronica Roth

quotes.message: Whenever I get fed up with life I love to go wandering in nature.
quotes.name: Andrea Arnold

quotes.message: When someone had enough of being lied to, mistreated, mislead, or tired of feeling neglected, nothing can stand in the way of them leaving you.
quotes.name: Bernajoy Vaal

quotes.message: A conclusion is simply the place where you got tired of thinking.
quotes.name: Dan Chaon

quotes.message: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: I got fed up of listening to bollocks
quotes.name: Jeremy Paxman

quotes.message: I feel like I've started a new chapter in my life, and I need to leave the past behind.
quotes.name: Jennifer Capriati

quotes.message: I'm so tired. I don't know if I can ever outrun how I used to be.
quotes.name: Marie Lu

quotes.message: Sometimes the only way you can feel good about yourself is by making someone else look bad. And I'm tired of making other people feel good about themselves.
quotes.name: Dan Castellaneta

quotes.message: I need little peace now, I cant handle the situations.
quotes.name: pavankumar nagaraj

quotes.message: I'm very intolerant and I get fed up with people easily.
quotes.name: Gary Numan

quotes.message: If my future were determined just by my performance on a standardized test, I wouldn't be here. I guarantee you that.
quotes.name: Michelle Obama

quotes.message: When you do exams you never want to be the one who finishes first and you never want to be the one who finishes last.
quotes.name: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.message: There's more to life than passing exams, and paper qualifications can only take you so far. A lot depends on luck, and on being in the right place at the right time, which was certainly true in my case.
quotes.name: Terry Wogan

quotes.message: May your final exam grades be less damaging to your employment prospects than everything else you've done in college.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: In years to come, Harry would never quite remember how he had managed to get through his exams when he half expected Voldemort to come bursting through the door at any moment.
quotes.name: J.K. Rowling

quotes.message: Recipe for success: Study while others are sleeping; work while others are loafing; prepare while others are playing; and dream while others are wishing.
quotes.name: William A. Ward

quotes.message: Good luck passing the bar exam and my deepest early condolences if you don't.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: If you fail an examination, it means you have not yet mastered the subject. With diligent study and understanding, you will succeed in passing the exams.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: The difference between try and triumph is a little umph.
quotes.name: Marvin Phillips

quotes.message: To be better equipped for the tests that the year will bring – read a textbook. To prepare for the tests that life will bring – read a book.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: Few minds wear out; most rust out.
quotes.name: Christian Nextell Bovee

quotes.message: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.name: Herman Cain

quotes.message: The best way to finish an unpleasant task is to get started.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
quotes.name: Samuel Beckett

quotes.message: Failure is success if we learn from it.
quotes.name: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.message: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work learning from failure.
quotes.name: General Colin Powell

quotes.message: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.name: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.message: Much good work is lost for the lack of a little more.
quotes.name: Edward H. Harriman

quotes.message: Prove yourself to yourself not others.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: You might not make heaven if you cover your script during an exam.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Striving for success without hard work is like trying to harvest where you haven't planted.
quotes.name: David Bly

quotes.message: If you believe in what you're doing, you'll be successful.
quotes.name: Connie Sellecca

quotes.message: Strength of mind is exercise, not rest.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: You can't have a million-dollar dream with a minimum-wage work ethic.
quotes.name: Stephen C. Hogan

quotes.message: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Because so often when we say we're unqualified for something, what we're really saying is that we're too scared to try it, not that we can't do it
quotes.name: Jen Sincero

quotes.message: The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want, and, if they can't find them, make them.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Put your heart, mind, intellect and soul even to your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
quotes.name: Swami Sivananda

quotes.message: School exams are memory tests. In the real-world, no one is going to stop you from referring to a book to solve a problem.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Our brains can only handle so much information at once without exploding, so by looking at each task separately, the larger task suddenly becomes more manageable
quotes.name: Jen Sincero

quotes.message: It’s very easy to be number one: find the guy who is number one, and score one point higher than he does.
quotes.name: Paul Kalanithi

quotes.message: A lot of us would like to move mountains, but few of us are willing to practice on small hills.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: A professional writer is an amateur who didn’t quit.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.name: Christian D. Larson

quotes.message: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got to keep going.
quotes.name: Chantal Sutherland

quotes.message: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.name: John Wooden

quotes.message: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
quotes.name: William Butler Yeats

quotes.message: Don't stop when you are tired, stop when you are done.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.name: Karim Seddiki

quotes.message: Doubt whom you will, but never doubt yourself.
quotes.name: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.message: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.name: Norman Vaughan

quotes.message: Even if you’re on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will spend its whole life believing that it is stupid.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Everything you want is out there waiting for you to ask. Everything you want also wants you. But you have to take action to get it.
quotes.name: Jules Renard

quotes.message: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity. An optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Forget all the reasons it won’t work and believe the one reason that it will.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Forget past mistakes. Forget failures. Forget everything except what you’re going to do now and do it.
quotes.name: William Durant

quotes.message: Trust yourself, you know more than you think you do.
quotes.name: Dr. Benjamin Spock

quotes.message: Great eaters and great sleepers are incapable of anything else that is great.
quotes.name: Henry IV of France

quotes.message: Have no fear of sudden disaster or of the ruin that overtakes the wicked, for the Lord will be at your side and will keep your foot from being snared.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: He who asks is a fool for five minutes, but he who does not ask remains a fool forever.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
quotes.name: Stephen Hawking

quotes.message: I didn’t get there by wishing for it or hoping for it, but by working for it.
quotes.name: Estée Lauder

quotes.message: I failed in some subjects in exam, but my friend passed in all. Now he is an engineer in Microsoft and I am the owner of Microsoft.
quotes.name: Bill Gates

quotes.message: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: I had never passed a single school exam, and clearly never would.
quotes.name: Mary Leakey

quotes.message: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.

quotes.message: From Latin: 'Inside man lives the truth.

quotes.message: Truth can be a dangerous thing. It is quite patient and relentless.

quotes.message: Say not, 'I have found the truth,' but rather, 'I have found a truth.

quotes.message: The truth us what it is, not what should be. What should be is a dirty lie.

quotes.message: Truth is such a rare thing, it is delightful to tell it.

quotes.message: A lie told often enough becomes the truth.

quotes.message: The third time you say a thing, it sounds like a lie.

quotes.message: Truth isn't always beauty, but the hunger for it is.

quotes.message: Chase after the truth like all hell and you'll free yourself, even though you never touch its coattails.

quotes.message: The surest way to remain poor is to be an honest man.

quotes.message: It is easier to perceive error than to find truth, for the former lies on the surface and is easily seen, while the latter lies in the depth, where few are willing to search for it.

quotes.message: They say that in the end truth will triumph, but it's a lie.

quotes.message: Verily there is nothing so false, that a sparkle of truth is not in it.

quotes.message: Truth is powerful and it prevails.

quotes.message: Have the courage to say no. Have the courage to face the truth. Do the right thing because it is right. These are the magic keys to living your life with integrity.

quotes.message: Truth is timeless. Truth does not differ for one age to another, from one people to another, from one geographical location to another... the great all-prevailing truth stands for time and eternity.

quotes.message: Because truth is unpopular does not mean that is should not be proclaimed.

quotes.message: I have met men who are habitual liars. They have lied so long that they no longer can distinguish between the truth and a lie. Their sensitivity to sin has been almost completely dead end.

quotes.message: Our emotions can lie to us, and we need to counter our emotions with truth.

quotes.message: The truth slips and turns. The facts remain the same.

quotes.message: We have free will, but our free will lies in our choice of thoughts.

quotes.message: We cannot lead a choiceless life. Every day, every moment, every second, there is a choice. If it were not so, we would not be an individuals.

quotes.message: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.

quotes.message: The history of free men is never really written by chance but by choice — their choice.

quotes.message: Every intersection in the road of life is an opportunity to make a decision.

quotes.message: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes.. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.. You're on your own. And you know what you know.. And you are the guy who decide where to go.

quotes.message: It is the ability to choose which makes us human.

quotes.message: Until a person can say deeply and honestly, 'I am what I am today because of the choices I made yesterday.' That person cannot say, 'I choose otherwise.

quotes.message: it is our choices... that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

quotes.message: By choosing we learn to be responsible. By paying the price of our choices, we learn to make better choices.

quotes.message: Creative choice is your birthright. Please own it.

quotes.message: Free choice is one of the highest of all the mental processes.

quotes.message: Know to choose well. Most of lives depend thereon. It needs a good taste and correct judgement, for which neither intellect nor study sufficient.

quotes.message: As adults, our choices are almost unlimited, but that does not mean they are not painful. Frequently our choices lie between the lesser of two evils, but it is still within our power to make these choices.

quotes.message: The entirety of one's adult life is a series of personal choices, decisions. If we can accept this totally, then we become free people. To the extent that we do not accept this we will forever feel ourselves victim.
quotes.name: M. Scott Peck

quotes.message: You are the person who has to decide. . Whether you'll do it or toss it aside;. You are the person who makes up your mind.. Whether you'll lead or will linger behind.. Whether you'll try for the goal that's afar.. Or just be contented to stay where you are.
quotes.name: Edgar A. Guest

quotes.message: Choice of attention — to pay attention to this and ignore that — is to the inner life what choice of action is to the outer. In both cases, a man is responsible for his choice and must accept the consequences whatever they may be.
quotes.name: W.H. Auden

quotes.message: Destiny is not a matter of chance, but of choice, not something to wish for, but to attain.
quotes.name: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.message: We are so often wide awake about the decisions our elected officials make in the political, public realm, and so asleep about our private choices.
quotes.name: Courtney E. Martin

quotes.message: This independence of will, mind, and imagination would inform her poetry and her life choices from that point on.
quotes.name: Becca Anderson

quotes.message: Life is all about choices. I remember the choices that my mother, for instance, did not have the opportunity to make.
quotes.name: Gwen Ifill

quotes.message: To make such choices, you have to know who you are, what is important to you, and where you would like to go.
quotes.name: Vincent Barnett

quotes.message: In all things in life, choose your conscience and trust your instincts, and lead your life without regrets.
quotes.name: Anna Quindlen

quotes.message: Life is the sum of all your choices.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Being smart and making smarter decisions puts you in a better position to make better choices.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: No matter how difficult your situation may be, there is always a choice you can make. A choice which will make all the difference in your life.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: When nothing else seems to work, just choose how you see, hear, and feel about whatever it is.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: Life presents you with so many decisions. A lot of times, they’re right in front of your face and they’re really difficult, but we must make them.
quotes.name: Brittany Murphy

quotes.message: I believe that we are solely responsible for our choices, and we have to accept the consequences of every deed, word, and thought throughout our lifetime.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.message: I think that there is something beautiful about mortality. It makes our decisions mean more.
quotes.name: Brandon Boyd

quotes.message: It doesn’t matter which side of the fence you get off on sometimes. What matters most is getting off. You cannot make progress without making decisions.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: The more decisions that you are forced to make alone, the more you are aware of your freedom to choose.
quotes.name: Thornton Wilder

quotes.message: Don't be afraid to make mistakes. But if you do, make new ones. Life is too short to make the wrong choice twice.
quotes.name: Joyce Rachelle

quotes.message: All you can do in regard to your own life is choose the best path that you believe in.
quotes.name: Ichiro Kishimi

quotes.message: No one can save a person from his or her thoughts and deeds except oneself. We can reach for particles of light to escape our dark chambers or continue to live with an inky soul. We make the choices that become our destiny.
quotes.name: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.message: Every day brings new choices.
quotes.name: Martha Beck

quotes.message: The hardest decisions in life are not between good and bad or right and wrong, but between two goods or two rights.
quotes.name: Joe Andrew

quotes.message: Choose your life's mate carefully. From this one decision will come 90 percent of all your happiness or misery.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.message: Any decision I make is the biggest decision of my life.
quotes.name: Carmelo Anthony

quotes.message: Your life changes the moment you make a new, congruent, and committed decision.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure, the process is its own reward.
quotes.name: Amelia Earhart

quotes.message: This is as true in everyday life as it is in battle: we are given one life and the decision is ours whether to wait for circumstances to make up our mind, or whether to act, and in acting, to live.
quotes.name: Omar Bradley

quotes.message: We are the creative force of our life, and through our own decisions rather than our conditions, if we carefully learn to do certain things, we can accomplish those goals.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: There are a lot of things going on with my life right now that don't just have to do with career. So I have a hard time making decisions about work. That's really a luxury problem.
quotes.name: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quotes.message: Concision in style, precision in thought, decision in life.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Look for your choices, pick the best one, and then go with it.
quotes.name: Pat Riley

quotes.message: But the rule seems to be that the bigger and more life-changing the decision, the less it will seem like a decision at all.
quotes.name: Hugh Mackay

quotes.message: It's very easy to make certain decisions that affect your life that you have no perspective on.
quotes.name: Jena Malone

quotes.message: Using the power of decision gives you the capacity to get past any excuse to change any and every part of your life in an instant.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: Sometimes it's the smallest decisions that can change your life forever.
quotes.name: Keri Russell

quotes.message: I'm just kind of taking whatever life gives me and hoping that I make the right decision.
quotes.name: Amy Smart

quotes.message: Life is a matter of choices, and every choice you make makes you.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: When you live your life acting upon your deepest intuitions, no decision you ever make in life will be feared or a risk.
quotes.name: Keshia Chante

quotes.message: Life forces enough final decisions on us. We should have the sense to avoid as many of the unnecessary ones as we can.
quotes.name: John Irving

quotes.message: We can't undo a single thing we have ever done, but we can make decisions today that propel us to the life we want and towards the healing we need.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli
