quotes.message: The quality of your life ultimately is shaped by the quality of your choices and decisions.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: Before you make a decision, ask yourself this question: will you regret the results or rejoice in them?
quotes.name: Rob Liano

quotes.message: We may know our true purpose in life, because we may choose our purpose in life.
quotes.name: Bryant McGill

quotes.message: Life presents many choices, the choices we make determine our future.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: In every single thing you do, you are choosing a direction. Your life is a product of choices.
quotes.name: Dr. Kathleen Hall

quotes.message: Each person has a choice; the choice to do as one may wish and as one wants remains with the individual. If a person sees no benefit to change, they will not change.
quotes.name: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.message: Your choice of people to associate with, both personally and business-wise, is one of the most important choices you make. If you associate with turkeys, you will never fly with the eagles.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Choices are the hinges of destiny.
quotes.name: Edwin Markham

quotes.message: The hardest thing to learn in life is which bridge to cross and which to burn.
quotes.name: David Russell

quotes.message: The doors we open and close each day decide the lives we live.
quotes.name: Flora Whittemore

quotes.message: To decide is to walk facing forward with nary a crick in your neck from looking back at the crossroads.
quotes.name: Betsy Canas Garmon

quotes.message: Decisions become easier when your will to please God outweighs your will to please the world.
quotes.name: Anso Coetzer

quotes.message: Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: The strongest principle of growth lies in human choice.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: There are two primary choices in life; to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Choice means saying no to one thing so you can say yes to another.
quotes.name: Dan Millman

quotes.message: While we are free to choose our actions, we are not free to choose the consequences of our actions.
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: Every choice you make has an end result.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: For what is the best choice, for each individual is the highest it is possible for him to achieve.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: We must make the choices that enable us to fulfill the deepest capacities of our real selves.
quotes.name: Thomas Merton

quotes.message: We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: And in life, it is all about choices we make. And how the direction of our lives comes down to the choices we choose.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: To decide, to be at the level of choice, is to take responsibility for your life and to be in control of your life.
quotes.name: Abbie M Dale

quotes.message: Every person, all the events of your life are drawn there because you have them there. What you choose to do with them is up to you.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: He is free knows how to keep in his own hands the power to decide.
quotes.name: Salvador De Madriaga

quotes.message: The self is not something ready-made, but something in continuous formation through choice of action.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: All my life, whenever it comes time to make a decision, I make it and forget about it.
quotes.name: Harry S. Truman

quotes.message: Before my accidents, there were ten thousands things I could do. I could spend the rest of my life dwelling on the things that I had lost, but instead I chose to focus on the nine thousand I still had left.
quotes.name: W. Mitchell

quotes.message: In any moment of decision the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: How you react to situations is your personal choice. It is your decision, and yours alone, to determine the importance you give to any situation.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Do what you love, and do it well - that's much more meaningful than any metric.
quotes.name: Kevin Systrom

quotes.message: You only have one life and if you're not doing what you love, what's the point?
quotes.name: Hillary Swank

quotes.message: Find a way to get paid for doing what you love. Then every paycheck will be a bonus.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: You might not make it to the top, but if you are doing what you love, there is much more happiness there than being rich or famous.
quotes.name: Tony Hawk

quotes.message: It's not just a question of doing what you love for a living. It's about doing what you love with love. Then your life and all be transformed.
quotes.name: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.message: Ultimately, if you're not doing what you love, you're not going to be fulfilled. Sure, to make money, you have to be tough, you have to have some smarts and a little luck would help, but the bottom line is: You have to love what you do.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: It's important to be successful enough to be able to keep doing what you love.
quotes.name: Lyle Lovett

quotes.message: Doing what you love isn't a priviledge; it's an obligation.
quotes.name: Barbara Sher

quotes.message: When you are doing what you love to do, you become resilient.
quotes.name: Dick Costolo

quotes.message: To be 'on purpose' means you're doing what you love to do, doing what you're good at, and accomplishing what's important to you.
quotes.name: Jack Canfield

quotes.message: Never give up searching for the job that you’re passionate about. Try to find the job you’d have if you were independently rich. Forget about the pay. When you’re associating with the people that you love, doing what you love, it doesn’t get any better than that.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: It is highly impossible for you to be successful at what you don’t love. Do what you love and love what you do.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: If you are going to devote your time to do something you claim you love, take this thought; 'Do I love it? Can I have peace within if I refuse to have it done?' This is passion.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: You can fail at what you don't want, so you might as well take a chance on doing what you love.
quotes.name: Jim Carrey

quotes.message: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: Do what you love and the necessary resources will follow.
quotes.name: Peter McWilliams

quotes.message: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.
quotes.name: Al Lopez

quotes.message: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
quotes.name: David Frost

quotes.message: The ultimate dream in life is to be able to do what you love and learn something from it.
quotes.name: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quotes.message: The way to stay inspired and motivated is by doing what you like, doing what you love.
quotes.name: Raphael Saadiq

quotes.message: Do what you love, and you will find the way to get it out to the world.
quotes.name: Judy Collins

quotes.message: Do what you love and the money will follow.
quotes.name: Marsha Sinetar

quotes.message: You must learn to enjoy life and have fun doing what you love.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: To be a success, love what you do and what you love.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: 'The good old days.' The only good days are ahead.
quotes.name: Alice Childress

quotes.message: The only good thing about the good old days is they're gone.
quotes.name: Dick Gregory

quotes.message: I wish there was a way to know you're in the good old days before you've actually left them.
quotes.name: Andy Bernard

quotes.message: When you think of the good old days, think one word: dentistry.
quotes.name: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: Nothing is more responsible for the good old days than a bad memory.
quotes.name: Franklin P. Adams

quotes.message: Say goodbye to the oldies, but goodies, because the good old days weren't always good and tomorrow ain't as bad as it seems.
quotes.name: Billy Joel

quotes.message: Sooner or later the world will have to return to the good old days when we fought wars and killed people the old-fashioned way, one at a time.
quotes.name: Andy Rooney

quotes.message: The good old days were never that good, believe me. The good new days are today, and better days are coming tomorrow. Our greatest songs are still unsung.
quotes.name: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.message: The expression 'there is nothing like the good old days' does not mean that fewer bad things happened before, but fortunately, that people tend to forget about them.
quotes.name: Ernesto Sabato

quotes.message: When people talk about the good old days, I say to people, 'It's not the days that are old, it's you that's old.' I hate the good old days. What is important is that today is good.
quotes.name: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.message: Forget about what you used to do. Don't make those same mistakes again. Everybody says, 'Oh the good old days' - the good old days are right this second! This moment controls the next moment.
quotes.name: Jack Lalanne

quotes.message: We are always yapping about the 'Good Old Days' and how we look back and enjoy it, but I tell you there is a lot of hooey to it. There is a whole lot of all our past lives that wasn't so hot.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: In every age 'the good old days' were a myth. No one ever thought they were good at the time. For every age has consisted of crises that seemed intolerable to the people who lived through them.
quotes.name: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.message: The good old days, when each idea had an owner, are gone forever.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Don't focus on the good old days, look forward towards the good new days.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: The good old days are neither better nor worse than the ones we're living through right now.
quotes.name: Artie Shaw

quotes.message: Sometimes we look back and 10 years from now we think, 'Boy, those were great old days.' Well, you know, we're living in the good old days.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: The main thing is to get what little happiness there is out of life in this wartorn world because ‘these are the good old days’ now.
quotes.name: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.message: And luckily, therefore the good old days return. The traditional art of driving counts again, and it is all about good tactics, skills and reflexes instead of simple power.
quotes.name: Jacky Ickx

quotes.message: We over-exaggerate yesterday. We either think it was better or worse than it was - you know, the good old days. We over-estimate tomorrow; we think we can do more than we can - always. And that's why we put off everything till tomorrow.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Geeks can be found in all walks of life, from politics to sports, and yes, technology,too.
quotes.name: Jeff Potter

quotes.message: Are you curious about how the world works and enjoy figuring out why something ticks? If so, you're probably a geek, the type of person who would rather be handed a box of tools, kitchen stuff, or bicycle parts and be let loose to play than be told what to do.
quotes.name: Jeff Potter

quotes.message: Sometimes, thinking like a geek means being inventive in how you solve a problem— coming up with a clever trick to get around something that's broken or just seeing easier ways to do something.
quotes.name: Jeff Potter

quotes.message: geeks love science and knowing how things work. Experimentation is the best way to learn those things. If things go 'boom' in the process, all the better.
quotes.name: Ken Denmead

quotes.message: Geeks love finding interesting, creative solutions for problems that could be solved in a more mundane fashion.
quotes.name: Ken Denmead

quotes.message: Spend time with your geek, get to know his or her history, and don't make changes just for the sake of change. Respect your change.
quotes.name: Mikki Halpin

quotes.message: Fact: at some point or another, every geek will spend more money than they probably should on something geeky.
quotes.name: Alex Langley

quotes.message: Geeky people often have...a mind with it's own heartbeat.
quotes.name: Garett Freymann

quotes.message: Anyone who has passion for the things they love is a geek— it's the heart of what being a geek is about..
quotes.name: Alex Langley

quotes.message: It's okay to be a geek. In fact, it's pretty great and you should never listen to anyone who says otherwise.
quotes.name: Alex Langley

quotes.message: Geeks are defined by what they like, by what they take an interest in.
quotes.name: Brian Briggs

quotes.message: Leading genetic researchers have determined that the geek gene can be activated at any time. It does not discriminate. There are only geeks and people who have not yet become geeks.
quotes.name: Brian Briggs

quotes.message: Challenging a geek to deconstruct a problem rationally is like putting peanut butter in front of a chipmunk— they almost can't help themselves.
quotes.name: Rick Jamison

quotes.message: In geek's eyes, everything is part of a system of other things, and in order to fully understand anything, they need to understand what and how it fits into the bigger picture.
quotes.name: Rick Jamison

quotes.message: I am learning to forgive my inner geek, and even value him as a free man.
quotes.name: Kenny Loggins

quotes.message: No one messes around with a nerd’s computer and escapes unscathed.
quotes.name: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.message: Genius or jock, it didn't seem to matter. Boys were born with a gene that kept girls, no matter how smart they might be, from understanding them.
quotes.name: Charity Tahmaseb

quotes.message: I will take a serious approach to a subject usually treated lightly, which is a nerdy thing to do.
quotes.name: Benjamin Nugent

quotes.message: Being a geek is all about learning the inventories of things.
quotes.name: Adam Savage

quotes.message: Just move to the Internet, its great here. We get to live inside where the weather is always awesome.
quotes.name: John Green

quotes.message: Software testing is a sport like hunting, it's bughunting.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: I still am a geek, I don't think there's anything wrong with it. I see no shame in having an unhealthy obsession with something.
quotes.name: David Tennant

quotes.message: Beware of geeks bearing formulas.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Being a geek means you never have to play it cool about how much you like something.
quotes.name: Simon Pegg

quotes.message: I will take a serious approach to a subject usually treated lightly, which is a nerdy thing to do.
quotes.name: Benjamin Nugent

quotes.message: No one messes around with a nerd's computer and escapes unscathed.
quotes.name: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.message: Geeks are people who love something so much that all the details matter.
quotes.name: Marissa Mayer

quotes.message: Now there is so much expertise and brainpower it's hard to be at the cutting edge of what's cool and not do something that's totally geeky.
quotes.name: Darren Aronofsky

quotes.message: I feel like nowadays everybody I know has a smidge of geek in them. In other words, they have some odd niche or some obsessive tendencies.
quotes.name: Josh Zuckerman

quotes.message: As far as I could tell, the quickest way to a geeky guy's heart usually involved geometric shapes.
quotes.name: Angela N. Blount

quotes.message: The greatest luxury is being free.
quotes.name: Manolo Blahnik

quotes.message: Luxury is more deadly than any foe.
quotes.name: Juvenal

quotes.message: Art is a luxury but also a necessity.
quotes.name: Edwidge Danticat

quotes.message: Happy endings are a luxury of fiction.
quotes.name: Trudi Canavan

quotes.message: The past is the luxury of proprietors.
quotes.name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.message: Morality is a private and costly luxury.
quotes.name: Henry Adams

quotes.message: Pessimism is the luxury of the powerful.
quotes.name: Fatima Mernissi

quotes.message: Luxury destroys more efficiently than war.
quotes.name: Juvenal

quotes.message: Luxury ruins republics; poverty, monarchies.
quotes.name: Charles de Montesquieu

quotes.message: It is only to the happy that tears are a luxury.
quotes.name: Thomas Moore

quotes.message: You can't afford the luxury of a negative thought.
quotes.name: Peter McWilliams

quotes.message: Poverty is an expensive luxury. We cannot afford it.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Class structures are a luxury that we cannot afford.
quotes.name: H. Rap Brown

quotes.message: When you dance you can enjoy the luxury of being you.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: The future is the most expensive luxury in the world.
quotes.name: Thornton Wilder

quotes.message: Luxury must be comfortable, otherwise it is not luxury.
quotes.name: Coco Chanel

quotes.message: Real luxury is time and opportunity to read for pleasure.
quotes.name: Jane Brody

quotes.message: Pessimism is a luxury that a Jew can never allow himself.
quotes.name: Golda Meir

quotes.message: Luxury is the ease of a t-shirt in a very expensive dress.
quotes.name: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.message: Sometimes choice is a luxury that fate does not afford us.
quotes.name: Jasper Fforde

quotes.message: Luxury is the income tax of vanity. But it is so pleasant.
quotes.name: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.message: Literacy is not a luxury, it is a right and a responsibility.
quotes.name: William J. Clinton

quotes.message: The less luxury there is in a republic, the more it is perfect.
quotes.name: Baron de Montesquieu

quotes.message: Luxury is about pleasing yourself, not dressing for other people.
quotes.name: Marc Jacobs

quotes.message: Luxury is not a necessity to me, but beautiful and good things are.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: The only luxury is time. The time you get to spend with your family.
quotes.name: Kanye West

quotes.message: Luxury is a state of mind.
quotes.name: L'Wren Scott

quotes.message: Reading is my greatest luxury.
quotes.name: Louise Brown

quotes.message: Luxury is experiencing reality.
quotes.name: Chogyam Trungpa

quotes.message: Let us have the luxury of silence.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: Luxury is nice, but creativity is nicer.
quotes.name: Lena Dunham

quotes.message: It's not a luxury if you can't do without it!
quotes.name: Elizabeth Jane Howard

quotes.message: The luxury of age was the giving up of vanity.
quotes.name: Colum Mccann

quotes.message: All luxury corrupts either the morals or the taste.
quotes.name: Joseph Joubert

quotes.message: God has blessed me to see the luxury side of things.
quotes.name: DJ Khaled

quotes.message: War has become a luxury that only small nations can afford.
quotes.name: Hannah Arendt

quotes.message: Get used to a rough life, for luxury does not last forever.
quotes.name: Umar

quotes.message: Style is luxury, and luxury is simply what makes you happy.
quotes.name: Deborah Needleman

quotes.message: Contemplation is a luxury, requiring time and alternatives.
quotes.name: Tahir Shah

quotes.message: You shouldn't have to have money to have a luxury fragrance.
quotes.name: Lady Gaga

quotes.message: Pleasure is, after all, a luxury. It's love that's essential.
quotes.name: John Dufresne

quotes.message: Luxury will be always around, no matter what happens in the world.
quotes.name: Carolina Herrera

quotes.message: The luxury of doing good surpasses every other personal enjoyment.
quotes.name: John Gay

quotes.message: You can hear a song in every word if you listen closely enough.
quotes.name: Christopher M. Milo

quotes.message: To submit one's self to one's gift is to submit oneself to education and self-development and to devote enough time to improve one's gift
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: We know the battle ahead will be long. But always remember that, no matter what obstacles stand in our way, nothing can stand in the way of the power of millions of voices calling for change.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: Everyone has talent.
quotes.name: Erica Jong

quotes.message: True devotion is motivated by love alone and devoid of selfish entanglements.
quotes.name: Rick Hocker

quotes.message: The main measure of your devotion to God is not your devotional life. It is simply your life.
quotes.name: John Ortberg

quotes.message: True strength lies in submission which permits one to dedicate his life, through devotion, to something beyond himself.
quotes.name: Henry Miller

quotes.message: If you don't drive your business, you will be driven out of business.
quotes.name: B.C Forbes

quotes.message: Its amazing what you can accomplish when you don't care who gets the credit.
quotes.name: Harry Truman

quotes.message: Work as if everything depends on you.  Pray as if everything depends on God.
quotes.name: St. Ignatius Loyola

quotes.message: Your devotion to God is illustrated, demonstrated, and authenticated by your love for others.
quotes.name: Andy Stanley

quotes.message: Don't do anything by half. If you love someone, love them with all your soul. When you go to work, work your ass off. When you hate someone, hate them until it hurts.
quotes.name: Henry Rollins

quotes.message: You have to plan it [your devotion to God] every day. And, the best time to plan it is before your day begins. If you don't plan it, your day will plan you. And so, I make a disciplined life of the study of the scriptures, reading the word every day.
quotes.name: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.message: Even when I'm dead, I'll swim through the Earth, like a mermaid of the soil, just to be next to your bones.
quotes.name: Jeffrey McDaniel

quotes.message: Devotion, as it relates to the title of my memoir, means fidelity - as in fidelity to a person or a practice. I think it's certainly possible to feel devotion without having faith, at least in the religious sense of the word.
quotes.name: Dani Shapiro

quotes.message: With devotion's visage and pious action we do sugar o'er the devil himself.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: Hide yourself in God, so when a man wants to find you he will have to go there first.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Everybody wants their own little place in the world and maybe mine is hereâ€¦ Loving you from a distance.
quotes.name: Ranata Suzuki

quotes.message: The limitless loving devotion to God, and the gift God makes of Himself to you, are the highest elevation of which the heart is capable; it is the highest degree of prayer. The souls that have reached this point are truly the heart of the Church.
quotes.name: Edith Stein

quotes.message: Devotion is the realization that wealth, education and power are God given gifts and not the endowments of fate.
quotes.name: Rev. Pandurang Shashtri Athavale

quotes.message: Children do not give up their innate imagination, curiosity, dreaminess easily. You have to love them to get them to do that.
quotes.name: R. D. Laing

quotes.message: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: A friend is someone who knows the song in your heart, and can sing it back to you when you have forgotten the words.
quotes.name: Donna Roberts

quotes.message: Perpetual devotion to what a man calls his business is only to be sustained by perpetual neglect of many other things.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: To achieve progress and development it is necessary to bring about co-ordination between liberty and security through Devotion.
quotes.name: Pandurang Shashtri Athavale

quotes.message: True teachers are those who use themselves as bridges over which they invite their students to cross; then, having facilitated their crossing, joyfully collapse, encouraging them to create their own.
quotes.name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.message: People, even more than things, have to be restored, renewed, revived, reclaimed, and redeemed; never throw out anyone.
quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.message: The man who removes a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
quotes.name: William Faulkner

quotes.message: I don't need a certain number of friends, just a number of friends I can be certain of.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: Only he who can see the invisible can do the impossible.
quotes.name: Frank Gaines

quotes.message: Don't pray when you feel like it. Have an appointment with the Lord and keep it.
quotes.name: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.message: Devotion begins at home, inside your own awareness.
quotes.name: Debbie Ford

quotes.message: To the world you may be one person but to one person you may be the world.
quotes.name: Bill Wilson

quotes.message: Devotion is diligence without assurance.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.message: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: What an enthusiastic devotion is that which sends a man from the attractions of home, the ties of neighbourhood, the bonds of country, to range plains, valleys, hills, mountains, for a new flower.
quotes.name: Dorothea Dix

quotes.message: With devotion at the center of your awareness, you don't have to refer to your past in order to make a choice of how to respond or react in any given situation.
quotes.name: Debbie Ford

quotes.message: Experience shows that success is due less to ability than to zeal. The winner is he who gives himself to his work, body and soul.
quotes.name: Charles Buxton

quotes.message: There's nothing in the world like the devotion of a married woman. It's a thing no married man knows anything about.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Devotion does not mean only Chanting praise and singing glory of God, nor fasting and offerings made to God. Devotion is a specific attitude towards life and existence.
quotes.name: Rev. Pandurang Shashtri Athavale

quotes.message: Many who have spent a lifetime in it can tell us less of love than the child that lost a dog yesterday.
quotes.name: Thornton Wilder

quotes.message: It is by undivided devotion that I can be known in such a form, truly seen, and entered into.
quotes.name: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.message: Keep behind, and you shall be put in front; keep out, and you shall be kept in.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Giving the best to others are giving the best to us. The value of life is not based on how long we live. But, how much can we contribute to others in our society.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Often devotion to virtue arises from sated desire.
quotes.name: Adela Florence Nicolson

quotes.message: There is always the danger that we may just do the work for the sake of the work. This is where the respect and the love and the devotion come in - that we do it to God, to Christ, and that's why we try to do it as beautifully as possible.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: You don't discipline yourself to attain the feeling of love. You attain the feeling of love and then you want to discipline yourself because you love the discipline, because it brings more love.
quotes.name: Sivaya Subramuniyaswami

quotes.message: Our ultimate devotion is to be a reflection of a divine work that is continuously unfolding in our hearts.
quotes.name: Andrena Sawyer

quotes.message: Love at first sight is easy to understand; it's when two people have been looking at each other for a lifetime that it becomes a miracle.
quotes.name: Sam Levenson

quotes.message: You do what you can for as long as you can, and when you finally can't, you do the next best thing. You back up but you don't give up.
quotes.name: Chuck Yeager

quotes.message: Leaders believe that falling is not failing, but refusal to rise up after falling is the real form of failure!
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
quotes.name: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.message: As long as you've done your best, making mistakes doesn't matter. You and I are human; we will mess up. What counts is learning from your mistakes and getting back up when life has knocked you down.
quotes.name: Shawn Johnson

quotes.message: No matter how many times you get knocked down, keep getting back up. God sees your resolve. He sees your determination. And when you do everything you can do, that's when God will step in and do what you can't do.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: I'm most proud of the blessings that God has bestowed upon me, in my life. He's given me the vision to truly see that you can fall down, but you can still get back up. Hopefully I'll learn from my mistakes and have the opportunity to strengthen and improve the next thing I do.
quotes.name: Martin Lawrence

quotes.message: You take a crash, you get back up and next time you succeed and that's a great feeling.
quotes.name: Shaun White

quotes.message: When real people fall down in life, they get right back up and keep walking.
quotes.name: Sarah Jessica Parker

quotes.message: The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: It is easy to fall, but hard to rise.
quotes.name: Dann Moudry

quotes.message: Those who mastered in the art of falling have no fear of rising!
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: Sometimes it takes a good fall to really know where you stand
quotes.name: Hayley Williams

quotes.message: It's not up to you how you fall.
quotes.name: Sr. Tac Jeffrey Mitchell

quotes.message: Being defeated is often temporary, giving up makes it permanent.
quotes.name: Marilyn von Savant

quotes.message: Fall seven times. Stand up eight.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: For every failure, there's an alternative course of action. You just have to find it. When you come to a roadblock, take a detour.
quotes.name: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.message: Our greatest glory is not in never falling but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: It's not the failures in our life that define us, it's the moments when we decide that getting back up is all that matters
quotes.name: Joel Brown

quotes.message: Everyone falls down. Getting back up is how you learn how to walk.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
quotes.name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.message: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The most beautiful people I've known are those who have known trials, have known struggles, have known loss, and have found their way out of the depths.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.message: Anyone can give up, it's the easiest thing in the world to do. But to hold it together when everyone else would understand if you fell apart, that's true strength.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Keep going, keep going come what may.
quotes.name: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.message: Life ... is not about how fast you run or even with what degree of grace. It's about perseverance, about staying on your feet and slogging forward no matter what.
quotes.name: Dean Koontz

quotes.message: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: A champion is someone who gets up, even when he can't.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It's better to start over than to give up entirely.
quotes.name: Kevin Ngo

quotes.message: Most great people have attained their greatest success one step beyond their greatest failure.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: You drown not by falling into a river, but by staying submerged in it.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: The secret of life isn't what happens to you, but what you do with what happens to you.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: It's hard to beat a person that never gives up.
quotes.name: Babe Ruth

quotes.message: A Quitter never wins-and-a Winner never quits.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: In order to succeed you must fail, so that you know what not to do the next time.
quotes.name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.message: Falling and getting back up is what brings you success.
quotes.name: Tony Horton

quotes.message: When life knocks you down, Get back up and fight harder.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: We have one treasure left; the daring after despair.
quotes.name: Yitzhak Lamden

quotes.message: Success is sweet: the sweeter if long delayed and attained through manifold struggles and defeats.
quotes.name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.message: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Whatever you're going through, many others have not only experienced the same but got out of it just fine.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Once you choose hope, anything's possible
quotes.name: Christopher Reeve

quotes.message: The first step is you have to say that you can
quotes.name: Will Smith

quotes.message: They showed you no respect . What kept you driven then . What kept you going in the ring . And getting back up to fight for a different end.
quotes.name: D. Arnold

quotes.message: We all fall down . It's the getting' back up that really counts . We live and we learn . To help someone up when it's their turn.
quotes.name: Arlis Albritton

quotes.message: And your worlds stop when your falling out of love . But it's not the fall that's so hard . It's the getting back up.
quotes.name: Cannon Goodman

quotes.message: I Already told you that falling is easy . It's getting back up that becomes the problem . If you don't believe you can find a way out . You become the problem.
quotes.name: Catherine Roseanne Dennis

quotes.message: Even if you fall, it isn't over . You're here 'til the end . Nothing's stopping you . From getting back up again.
quotes.name: Stefano Giorgini

quotes.message: Falling down is life . Living is getting back up again.
quotes.name: Kellen McGregor

quotes.message: Everybody trips and everybody falls . But you gotta keep getting back up . Some people quit and that's why they lose . But you know that don't have to be us.
quotes.name: Adam Stuart Argyle

quotes.message: There's something to be said about . Straight on knees and falling down . Getting' right back up again . And givin' all you have to give.
quotes.name: Danielle Peck

quotes.message: I'm rising up . Up to the streets . And you're gonna feel . The rhythm of me . I'm rising up . You're gonna see . You're gonna see . You can't stop me.
quotes.name: Ricky Summer

quotes.message: Rising up, straight to the top . Had the guts, got the glory . Went the distance, now I'm not going to stop . Just a man and his will to survive.
quotes.name: Jim Peterik

quotes.message: I'm rising up this time . through the hands of time.
quotes.name: Roger Dale Jr Clem

quotes.message: The best part of falling is getting back up again.
quotes.name: David Belle

quotes.message: There is no shame in falling down but there is pride in getting back up.
quotes.name: Lilly Singh

quotes.message: It's all about... getting back up and getting back to work and striving to be the best you can be.
quotes.name: Robbie Lawler

quotes.message: You can't lose confidence in yourself, or you've lost already. When you get knocked down, you've got to keep getting back up.
quotes.name: Tim Tebow

quotes.message: Get knocked down. Get back up. Always be a fighter. Don't be afraid of the punch. Don't be afraid of getting back up. Be afraid of giving up.
quotes.name: Maria Kanellis

quotes.message: When you get knocked down, don't stay down; get back up again. Nothing good is going to happen as long as you're down on yourself.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Life is easy when you're hot. But what happens when the ball bounces the other way? You just keep getting back up and climbing up.
quotes.name: Bill Walton

quotes.message: There comes a time in your life, when you walk away from all the drama and people who create it. You surround yourself with people who make you laugh. Forget the bad and focus on the good. Love the people who treat you right, pray for the ones who do not. Life is too short to be anything but happy. Falling down is a part of life, getting back up is living.
quotes.name: Jose N. Harris

quotes.message: In life its not about falling down or not, it's about getting back up.
quotes.name: Nathan Hangen

quotes.message: You will face hard times in life. Sometimes they are supposed to come, sometimes not. Get through them no matter what, 'cause the good life is always on the other side.
quotes.name: F.C.

quotes.message: When setbacks arise - and they will from time to time - regroup, recharge, refocus and refine.
quotes.name: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.message: Nothing or no one is going to rescue you from your current situation. You must take control of your own well-being and forge your own path to happiness and fulfillment.
quotes.name: Germany Kent

quotes.message: One of the things is we tend to give up too soon. We get knocked down a couple of times, and we stay down. It's so important to get back up again.
quotes.name: Og Mandino

quotes.message: If one dream dies, dream another dream. If you get knocked down, get back up and go again.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Sometimes you fall down, but you have to pick yourself back up.
quotes.name: Vitor Belfort

quotes.message: It's really sad sometimes that you have to go to that extreme bottom to find your way back up, but it's true.
quotes.name: Ivan Moody

quotes.message: Everybody, at some point in their life, has fallen down and not felt like getting back up, but you have to, no matter how difficult it is.
quotes.name: Charlie Hunnam

quotes.message: The true value of a human being can be found in the degree to which he has attained liberation from the self.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The paths to liberation are numerous, but the bank along the way is always the same, the Bank of Karma, where the liberation account of each of us is credited or debited depending on our actions.
quotes.name: Yann Martel

quotes.message: Self-realization is liberation. Liberation is self-realization.
quotes.name: Frederick Lenz

quotes.message: Liberation is an ever shifting horizon, a total ideology that can never fulfill its promises. It has the therapeutic quality of providing emotionally charged rituals of solidarity in hatred - it is the amphetamine of its believers.
quotes.name: Arianna Huffington

quotes.message: For to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: Zen is a way of liberation, concerned not with discovering what is good or bad or advantageous, but what is.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: Freeing oneself from words is liberation.
quotes.name: Bodhidharma

quotes.message: The liberation of the earth, the liberation of women, the liberation of all humanity is the next step of freedom we need to work for, and it's the next step of peace that we need to create.
quotes.name: Vandana Shiva

quotes.message: National liberation is necessarily an act of culture.
quotes.name: Amilcar Cabral

quotes.message: If you are angry or in pain, separate yourself from anger and pain and watch them. Externalization is the first step to liberation.
quotes.name: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.message: Liberation does not concern the person, for liberation is freedom from the person. Basically the disciple and teacher are identical. Both are the timeless axis of all action and preception. The only difference is that one 'knows' himself for what he is while the other does not. The idea of being a person, an ego, is nothing other than an image held together by memory.
quotes.name: Jean Klein

quotes.message: Once freedom is equated with a certain material standard of living, confiscation becomes the path to liberation.
quotes.name: James Bovard

quotes.message: It's a kind of liberation to break free in language, if you can break free, but it's also a confinement, because form confines you - whatever the form.
quotes.name: Gerald Stern

quotes.message: Liberation and equal-rights issues notwithstanding, it was a man's job to make a woman feel cherished and respected.
quotes.name: Tom Clancy

quotes.message: Any attempt at liberation, no matter how great it might be, if it does not take into consideration the necessity of dissolving the ego, it is condemned to failure.
quotes.name: Samael Aun Weor

quotes.message: Women's liberation will not be achieved until a woman can become paunchy and bald and still think that she's attractive to the opposite sex.
quotes.name: Earl Wilson

quotes.message: Freedom means the power to act by soul guidance, not by the compulsions of desires and habits. Obeying the ego leads to bondage; obeying the soul brings liberation.
quotes.name: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.message: Liberation is the path of transcendence. Manifestation is the path of immanence. Both lead to the same place: the divine.
quotes.name: Anodea Judith

quotes.message: The dream is the liberation of the spirit from the pressure of external nature, a detachment of the soul from the fetters of matter.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: The true liberation, the true path to freedom, lay in the ability to forgive.
quotes.name: Alyson Noel

quotes.message: Women's liberation could have not succeeded if science had not provided them with contraception and household technology.
quotes.name: Max Perutz

quotes.message: Liberation means you don't have to be silenced.
quotes.name: Toni Morrison

quotes.message: Liberation is not deliverance.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Liberation from every form of exploitation, the possibility of a more human and dignified life, the creation of a new humankind - all pass through this struggle.
quotes.name: Gustavo Gutiérrez

quotes.message: The liberation cannot be reached but by means of the perception of the identity of the individual spirit with the universal spirit.
quotes.name: Laozi

quotes.message: The prison life of the past looks in our own time like liberation itself.
quotes.name: Christopher Lasch

quotes.message: Liberation does not come from outside.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: Creativeness is liberation from slavery. Man is free when he finds himself in a state of creative activity. Creativeness leads to ecstasy of the moment. The products of creativeness are within time, but the creative act itself lies outside time.
quotes.name: Nikolai Berdyaev

quotes.message: Liberation that raises a cry against others is no true liberation. Liberation that means revolutions of hate and violence and takes away lives of others or abases the dignity of others cannot be true liberty.
quotes.name: Oscar Romero

quotes.message: Those who seek liberation for themselves alone cannot become fully enlightened.
quotes.name: Muso Soseki

quotes.message: Liberation is a praxis: the action and reflection of men and women upon their world in order to transform it.
quotes.name: Paulo Freire

quotes.message: Why think of liberation at some future time? Liberation is in the little things, here and now.
quotes.name: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.message: The awareness of liberation is not liberation. The awareness of time is not liberation.
quotes.name: Frederick Lenz

quotes.message: As with all forms of liberation, of which the liberation of women is only one example, it is easy to suppose in a time of freedom that the darker days of repression can never come again.
quotes.name: Jonathan Franzen

quotes.message: But the whole point of liberation is that you get out. Restructure your life. Act by yourself.
quotes.name: Janes Fonda

quotes.message: If you live your life burning for the highest possibility, in that burning itself, there is liberation.
quotes.name: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.message: A lot of the time when people get married in the infatuation, it will go down. That is inevitable. The infatuation stage will not last forever.
quotes.name: Tamera Mowry

quotes.message: Infatuation is when you find somebody who is absolutely perfect. Love is when you realise that they aren't and it doesn't matter.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: love is reliable. infatuation is temporary.
quotes.name: Ann Hood

quotes.message: There is, in lovers, a certain infatuation of egotism; they will have a witness of their happiness, cost that witness what it may.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.message: Infatuation is measured in pleasure. Love is measured in pain.
quotes.name: Anthony Marais

quotes.message: Irrational crushes, infatuations, or obsessions. Whatever you want to label it, it's important to reach out to others.
quotes.name: Janeane Garofalo

quotes.message: Indeed, infatuation thrives on image (while love thrives on knowledge).
quotes.name: Chana Levitan

quotes.message: The evil of infatuation is illustrated by the drunkard.
quotes.name: John Bartholomew Gough

quotes.message: Infatuation is the language of a beautiful eye upon a sensitive heart.
quotes.name: Joseph R. Bartlett

quotes.message: Infatuation is like a drug that gives you the best high yet gives you the worst headache after.
quotes.name: Luke Blaise

quotes.message: Infatuation cannot be sustained indefinitely, my friend. Love that embraces the entire person is a monumental gift that takes time to grow.
quotes.name: Joan Bauer

quotes.message: Love- the infatuation kind- 'he's so handsome, she's so beautiful'- that can shrivel. As soon as something goes wrong, that kind of love can fly out the window.
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: I think infatuation is like a garden. If tended and cared for, it grows into love. If neglected or abused it dies. The only way to have eternal love is to never let your heart forget what it's like to live without it.
quotes.name: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.message: Sometimes when you look back on a situation, you realize it wasn't all you thought it was. A beautiful girl walked into your life. You fell in love. Or did you? Perhaps, it was only a childish infatuation, or maybe just a brief moment of vanity.
quotes.name: Henry Bromell

quotes.message: Infatuation was a good thing. It gave spice to life, and added to its enjoyment... But it was different from love. Love was worth everything, and couldn't be exchanged for anything.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: This was the mark of deep infatuation, he thought: the desire to watch a woman talk just to see her lips move, to be around her.
quotes.name: Hugh Howey

quotes.message: Love sees clearly, and seeing, loves on. But infatuation is blind; when it gains sight, it dies.
quotes.name: Mary Roberts Rinehart

quotes.message: No one can understand love who has not experienced infatuation. And no one can understand infatuation, no matter how many times he has experienced it.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: Infatuation is not quite the same thing as love; it's more like love's shady second cousin who's always borrowing money and can't hold down a job.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.message: Infatuation's just another word for not seeing clearly.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: The key to the mystery of a great artist is that for reasons unknown, he will give away his energies and his life just to make sure that one note follows another . . . and leaves us with the feeling that something is right in the world.
quotes.name: Leonard Bernstein

quotes.message: Any great work of art revives and readapts time and space, and the measure of its success is the extent to which it makes you an inhabitant of that world -- the extent to which it invites you in and lets you breathe its strange, special air.
quotes.name: Leonard Bernstein

quotes.message: Life is not an exact science, it is an art.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: Abstract art: a product of the untalented sold by the unprincipled to the utterly bewildered.
quotes.name: Al Capp

quotes.message: What would it be like if you lived each day, each breath, as a work of art in progress? Imagine that you are a Masterpiece unfolding, every second of every day, a work of art taking form with every breath.
quotes.name: Thomas Crum

quotes.message: True art is characterized by an irresistible urge in the creative artist.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and all science. He to whom this emotion is a stranger, who can no longer pause to wonder and stand rapt in awe, is as good as dead: his eyes are closed.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Art arises when the secret vision of the artist and the manefestation of nature agree to find new shapes.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: Art is a collarboration between God and the artist, and the less the artist does the better.
quotes.name: Andre Gide

quotes.message: No book has yet been written in praise of a woman who let her husband and children starve or suffer while she invented even the most useful things, or wrote books, or expressed herself in art, or evolved philosophic systems.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: To encourage literature and the arts is a duty which every good citizen owes to his country.
quotes.name: George Washington

quotes.message: Many secrets of art and nature are thought by the unlearned to be magical.
quotes.name: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.message: The price we pay when pursuing any art or calling, is an intimate knowledge of its ugly side.
quotes.name: James Arthur Baldwin

quotes.message: To know how to suggest is the great art of teaching.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: The artist alone sees spirits. But after he has told of their appearing to him, everybody sees them.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Great is the art of beginning, but greater is the art of ending.
quotes.name: Henry Wordsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: Keep your love of nature, for that is the true way to understand art more and more.
quotes.name: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.message: All architecture is great architecture after sunset; perhaps architecture is really a nocturnal art, like the art of fireworks.
quotes.name: G K Chesterton

quotes.message: Life beats down and crushes the soul and art reminds you that you have one.
quotes.name: Stella Adler

quotes.message: The more perfect the artist, the more completely separate in him will be the man who suffers and the mind which creates.
quotes.name: T S Eliot

quotes.message: Culture is the arts elevated to a set of beliefs.
quotes.name: Thomas Wolfe

quotes.message: Art is the imposing of a pattern on experience, and our aesthetic enjoyment is recognition of the pattern.
quotes.name: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.message: Art is born of the observation and investigation of nature.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: I say that good painters imitated nature; but that bad ones vomited it.
quotes.name: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.message: Art, like morality, consists of drawing the line somewhere.
quotes.name: G K Chesterton

quotes.message: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: Painting is just another way of keeping a diary.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: There are painters who transform the sun to a yellow spot, but there are others who with the help of their art and their intelligence, transform a yellow spot into the sun.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: There is no abstract art. You must always start with something. Afterward you can remove all traces of reality.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: Every artist was first an amateur.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
quotes.name: Scott Adams

quotes.message: Art arises when the secret vision of the artist and the manefestation of nature agree to find new shapes.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: The finest works of art are precious, among other reasons, because they make it possible for us to know, if only imperfectly and for a little while, what it actually feels like to think subltly and feel nobly.
quotes.name: Aldous Leonard Huxley

quotes.message: The work of art must seize upon you, wrap you up in itself and carry you away. It is the means by which the artist conveys his passion. It is the current which he puts forth which sweeps you along in his passion.
quotes.name: Pierre-August Renoir

quotes.message: A fool's brain digests philosophy into folly, science into superstition, and art into pedantry. Hence University education.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Beautiful young people are accidents of nature, But beautiful old people are works of art.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: If an artist is not able to commit himself totally to his art, how can he expect the world to do so?
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: Keep your love of nature, for that is the true way to understand art more and more.
quotes.name: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.message: I came out of the womb born to sing and dance. I have to follow my heart.
quotes.name: Jennifer Ellison

quotes.message: Follow your heart, but be quiet for a while first. Ask questions, then feel the answer. Learn to trust your heart.
quotes.name: Carl W. Buechner

quotes.message: Go ahead and stand up for what you believe in. As I've learned, that's the path to happiness.
quotes.name: Lesley Ann

quotes.message: You do have to follow your heart, otherwise you're living a false life.
quotes.name: Eric Mabius

quotes.message: You can't do passion halfway. Living your passion means you're all in. You trust your heart and trust your gut wherever that takes you.
quotes.name: Joe Plumeri

quotes.message: How wrong we are to ignore our hearts to follow the familiar path.
quotes.name: Nikki Rowe

quotes.message: Born free to follow your heart.
quotes.name: Dexter Born Free

quotes.message: Follow your heart. Then root its longing with the facts.
quotes.name: Gina Greenlee

quotes.message: You can choose to follow your heart always.
quotes.name: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.message: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: You will never follow your own inner voice until you clear up the doubts in your mind.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: Follow your heart but take your brain with you.
quotes.name: Alfred Adler

quotes.message: Follow your heart. Even though it's on your left, it's always right.
quotes.name: Fannila Tobelli

quotes.message: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
quotes.name: Jalaluddin Rumi

quotes.message: To know how to choose a path with heart is to learn how to follow intuitive feeling. Logic can tell you superficially where a path might lead to, but it cannot judge whether your heart will be in it.
quotes.name: Jean Shinoda Bolen

quotes.message: If you ever find yourself in doubt follow your heart as it will guide you to the right course.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: If you follow your heart and end with a song.
quotes.name: Ella Enchanted

quotes.message: Heart-flow means listening to your intuition and hunches and following your heart.
quotes.name: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.message: Just follow your heart's voice.
quotes.name: Dzien swira

quotes.message: Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: Always follow your heart ! When your heart feels at peace, rest assured, you are on the right track.
quotes.name: Angie karan

quotes.message: You must never doubt your ability to achieve anything, become anything, overcome anything and inspire everything.
quotes.name: Tasha Hoggatt

quotes.message: It's been very important for me to follow my gut or my heart, or whichever organ you want to go by.
quotes.name: Lili Taylor

quotes.message: I think it's important to have a dream and to follow your heart.
quotes.name: Austin Butler

quotes.message: Follow your heart and make it your decision.
quotes.name: Mia Hamm

quotes.message: What I have to do now is figure where my passion is, and follow my heart; I've proven that if I have the passion for something then I can succeed. I haven't been listening to my heart in the last little while.
quotes.name: Clara Hughes

quotes.message: Your heart is free, have the courage to follow it.
quotes.name: Braveheart

quotes.message: If you follow your dreams, it means you follow your heart. If you do follow your heart, I don't think you can go wrong.
quotes.name: Celine Dion

quotes.message: You can do anything as long as you don't stop believing. When it is meant to be, it will be. You just have to follow your heart.
quotes.name: Keke Palmer

quotes.message: If you listen to everybody's opinions, I mean, I always say I'd be digging a ditch on the side of the road now if I had listened to what everybody told me what to do. You know, you have to follow your heart, you have to.
quotes.name: Brian Setzer

quotes.message: I'm reading your heart. I'm asking you to follow it. Begging you.
quotes.name: Bicentennial Man

quotes.message: Break the rules, stand apart, ignore your head, and follow your heart.
quotes.name: Paula Abdul

quotes.message: Everyone wants to belong, or be a part of something bigger than themselves, but it's important to follow your heart and be true to yourself in the process.
quotes.name: Emily Giffin

quotes.message: I think it's imperative to follow your heart and choose a profession you're passionate about, and if you haven't found that 'spark' yet, if you're not sure what you want to do with your lives - be persistent until you do.
quotes.name: Steve Kerr

quotes.message: Everyone has that inner voice, the one that's a Negative Nancy. I'd say to ignore that voice and to be confident and follow your heart.
quotes.name: Katharine McPhee

quotes.message: They say you must follow your heart in order to love, because heart know every feeling you are ready to convey.
quotes.name: Simphiwe Dumi

quotes.message: Stay away from people who try to belittle your faith, goals and ambitions. follow your heart and keep pushing forward.
quotes.name: Ricardo Housham

quotes.message: Imagine for yourself a character, a model personality whose example you determine to follow, in private as well as in public.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: The decision I've made has come from my heart. That's me, to follow my heart.
quotes.name: Craig Stevens

quotes.message: Don't worry about things that you simply cannot know. Let them fall back and recede like the foam pushed aside by the flanks of a ship. Leave them behind and let your heart power on.
quotes.name: Mark Helprin

quotes.message: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: Follow that will and that way which experience confirms to be your own.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: Initiative is doing the right thing without being told.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: If you follow your heart, if you listen to your gut, and if you extend your hand to help another, not for any agenda, but for the sake of humanity, you are going to find the truth.
quotes.name: Erin Brockovich

quotes.message: Follow what you are genuinely passionate about and let that guide you to your destination.
quotes.name: Diane Sawyer

quotes.message: Follow your heart, go wherever it may lead.
quotes.name: Faye Diane Kilday

quotes.message: To reach your destination, follow the directions of your heart. It knows the way.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: Do what you feel in your heart to be right - for you'll be criticized anyway.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Listen to advice, but follow your heart.
quotes.name: Conway Twitty

quotes.message: Unexpected kindness is the most powerful, least costly, and most underrated agent of human change.
quotes.name: Bob Kerrey

quotes.message: For it is in giving that we receive.
quotes.name: Francis of Assisi

quotes.message: He who sees a need and waits to be asked for help is as unkind as if he had refused it.
quotes.name: Dante Alighieri

quotes.message: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Real kindness seeks no return; What return can the world make to rain clouds?
quotes.name: Tiruvalluvar

quotes.message: Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind.
quotes.name: Henry James

quotes.message: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the grandest intention.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Do your little bit of good where you are; it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.
quotes.name: Desmond Tutu

quotes.message: Be kind. Always if you have a choice, be kind.
quotes.name: Anne Rice

quotes.message: A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Every single time you help somebody stand up you are helping humanity rise.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Kindness, I've discovered, is everything in life.
quotes.name: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.message: One of the most difficult things to give away is kindness; usually it comes back to you.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Remember there's no such thing as a small act of kindness. Every act creates a ripple with no logical end.
quotes.name: Scott Adams

quotes.message: If a person seems wicked, do not cast him away. Awaken him with your words, elevate him with your deeds, repay his injury with your kindness. Do not cast him away; cast away his wickedness.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: The words of kindness are more healing to a drooping heart than balm or honey.
quotes.name: Sarah Fielding

quotes.message: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
quotes.name: Tenzin Gyatso

quotes.message: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: No one has ever become poor by giving.
quotes.name: Anne Frank

quotes.message: Kindness can transform someone's dark moment with a blaze of light. You'll never know how much your caring matters. Make a difference for another today.
quotes.name: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.message: Kindness is loving people more than they deserve.
quotes.name: Joseph Joubert

quotes.message: Practice kindness - particularly when you feel irritated or things are not going well. Kindness hardly ever goes wrong.
quotes.name: Lewis Richmond

quotes.message: No act of kindness is too small. The gift of kindness may start as a small ripple that over time can turn into a tidal wave affecting the lives of many.
quotes.name: Kevin Heath

quotes.message: Guard well within yourself that treasure, kindness. Know how to give without hesitation, how to lose without regret, how to acquire without meanness.
quotes.name: George Sand

quotes.message: You can't live a perfect day without doing something for someone who will never be able to repay you.
quotes.name: Debbie Macomber

quotes.message: Kindness is the golden chain by which society is bound together.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Kindness, like a boomerang, always returns.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a harder battle.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: Constant kindness can accomplish much. As the sun makes ice melt, kindness causes misunderstanding, mistrust, and hostility to evaporate.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Kindness is an inner desire that makes us want to do good things even if we do not get anything in return. It is the joy of our life to do them. When we do good things from this inner desire, there is kindness in everything we think, say, want and do.
quotes.name: Emanuel Swedenborg

quotes.message: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: Don't be reckless with other people's hearts, and don't put up with people that are reckless with yours.
quotes.name: Mary Schmich

quotes.message: All I'm saying is, kindness don't have no boundaries.
quotes.name: Kathryn Stockett

quotes.message: Kindness can become its own motive. We are made kind by being kind.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the greatest intention.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: But remember, boy, that a kind act can sometimes be as powerful as a sword.
quotes.name: Rick Riordan

quotes.message: Being kind to someone, only to look kind to others, defeats the purpose of being kind.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions, and the roots spring up and make new trees.
quotes.name: Amelia Earhart

quotes.message: Human kindness has never weakened the stamina or softened the fiber of a free people. A nation does not have to be cruel to be tough.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: Kindness holds the key to the secret of our own transformation and, in the process, of the transformation of the world.
quotes.name: Jean Maalouf

quotes.message: Tenderness and kindness are not signs of weakness and despair, but manifestations of strength and resolution.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: Our kindness may be the most persuasive argument for that which we believe.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: A little kindness from person to person is better than a vast love for all humankind.
quotes.name: Richard Dehmel

quotes.message: You cannot do a kindness too soon, for you never know how soon it will be too late.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: If you treat people right they will treat you right ... ninety percent of the time.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: The simplest acts of kindness are by far more powerful then a thousand heads bowing in prayer.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: Your own words are the bricks and mortar of the dreams you want to realize. Your words are the greatest power you have. The words you choose and their use establish the life you experience.
quotes.name: Sonia Croquette

quotes.message: We never know how high we are Till we are called to rise; And then, if we are true to plan, Our statures touch the skies.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we are not really living. Growth demands a temporary surrender of security.
quotes.name: Gail Sheehy

quotes.message: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in your soul. Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
quotes.name: Pamela Vaull Starr

quotes.message: You have been criticizing yourself for years, and it hasn't worked. Try approving of yourself and see what happens.
quotes.name: Louise L. Hay

quotes.message: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.name: Muriel Strode

quotes.message: If you're able to be yourself, then you have no competition. All you have to do is get closer and closer to that essence.
quotes.name: Barbara Cook

quotes.message: Nurture your mind with great thoughts, for you will never go any higher than you think.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: The question isn't who's going to let me; it's who's going to stop me.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: It took me quite a long time to develop a voice, and now that I have it, I am not going to be silent.
quotes.name: Madeleine Albright

quotes.message: Instead of looking at the past, I put myself ahead twenty years and try to look at what I need to do now in order to get there then
quotes.name: Diana Ross

quotes.message: I could not, at any age, be content to take my place by the fireside and simply look on. Life was meant to be lived. Curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Never dull your shine for somebody else.
quotes.name: Tyra Banks

quotes.message: Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something and that this thing must be attained.
quotes.name: Marie Curie

quotes.message: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
quotes.name: Judy Garland

quotes.message: Don't ask yourself what the world needs, ask yourself what makes you come alive. And then go and do that. Because what the world needs is people who are alive.
quotes.name: Howard Thurman

quotes.message: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.name: Maria Robinson

quotes.message: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
quotes.name: Sri Ram

quotes.message: Our greatness lies not so much in being able to remake the world as in being able to remake ourselves.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: If you don't make mistakes, you're not working on hard enough problems. And that's a big mistake.
quotes.name: F. Wikzek

quotes.message: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Always make your future bigger than your past.
quotes.name: Dan Sullivan

quotes.message: The great leaders are like the best conductors - they reach beyond the notes to reach the magic in the players.
quotes.name: Blaine Lee

quotes.message: Power can be taken, but not given. The process of the taking is empowerment in itself.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: Never tell people how to do things.
quotes.name: General George Smith Patton

quotes.message: One of the most courageous things you can do is identify yourself, know who you are, what you believe in and where you want to go.
quotes.name: Sheila Murray Bethel

quotes.message: Courage is like a muscle.
quotes.name: Ruth Gordo

quotes.message: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: How wrong is it for a woman to expect the man to build the world she wants, rather than to create it herself?
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: A lot of people are afraid to say what they want. That's why they don't get what they want.
quotes.name: Madonna

quotes.message: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: You cannot get through a single day without having an impact on the world around you. What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
quotes.name: Jane Goodall

quotes.message: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that frightens us. We ask ourselves, who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: It takes a great deal of courage to stand up to your enemies, but even more to stand up to your friends.
quotes.name: J.K. Rowling

quotes.message: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: You are Beautiful ~ You are a beautiful soul. The light that emanates from you has the power to heal and transform others. Your unique and magnificent expression is unlike any others' on the entire planet. Your beauty makes the world a better place the beauty that radiates from your heart is a gift to others.
quotes.name: Christine Kloser

quotes.message: An authentically empowered person is humble. This does not mean the false humility of one who stoops to be with those who are below him or her. It is the inclusiveness of one who responds to the beauty of each soul. It is the harmlessness of one who treasures, honors, and reveres life in all its forms.
quotes.name: Gary Zukav

quotes.message: My goal is not to be better than anyone else..but to be better that I used to be.
quotes.name: Dr. Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.message: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
quotes.name: Dr.Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: One little known secret to making precisely the right move, at precisely the right time in your life is knowing that in all cases, there is more than one right move and more than one right time. Lots and lots more.
quotes.name: Mike Dooley

quotes.message: Authentic empowerment is the knowing that you are on purpose, doing God's work, peacefully and harmoniously.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: There's a basic philosophy here that by empowering...workers you'll make their jobs far more interesting, and they'll be able to work at a higher level than they would have without all that information just a few clicks away.
quotes.name: Bill Gates

quotes.message: You may never know what results come of your action, but if you do nothing there will be no result
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself.
quotes.name: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.message: An idea is never given to you without you being given the power to make it reality. You must, nevertheless, suffer for it.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: AUTONOMOUS NURTURING. Not waiting for someone to give you what you can give yourself.
quotes.name: Rob Brezsny

quotes.message: We must all suffer from one of two pains: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The difference is discipline weighs ounces while regret weighs tons.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Without pain, there would be no suffering, without suffering we would never learn from our mistakes. To make it right, pain and suffering is the key to all windows, without it, there is no way of life.
quotes.name: Angelina Jolie

quotes.message: Pain is temporary. It may last a minute, or an hour, or a day, or a year, but eventually it will subside and something else will take its place. If I quit, however, it lasts forever.
quotes.name: Lance Armstrong

quotes.message: When you can't remember why you're hurt, that's when you're healed.
quotes.name: Jane Fonda

quotes.message: I have learned now that while those who speak about one's miseries usually hurt, those who keep silence hurt more.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: Pain is such an uncomfortable feeling that even a tiny amount of it is enough to ruin every enjoyment.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
quotes.name: Buddhist proverb

quotes.message: Pain is what the world inflicts upon us. Suffering is our emotional reaction when we fail to make the difficult conscious choice to choose Joy.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: If you aren't in the moment, you are either looking forward to uncertainty, or back to pain and regret.
quotes.name: Jim Carrey

quotes.message: God gave us pain to remind us we are alive, so we will learn to value the joys and beauty of the world.
quotes.name: Tom Corr

quotes.message: Much of your pain is the bitter potion by which the physician within you heals your sick self.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: An hour of pain is as long as a day of pleasure.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: Pain and pleasure like light and darkness, succeed each other.
quotes.name: Lawrence Stone

quotes.message: Pain is immune to empathy...like love.
quotes.name: Barbara Lazear Ascher

quotes.message: Pain is like a love affair. When it’s over it’s over.
quotes.name: Elyse Sommer

quotes.message: People in pain are like the wandering minstrels of the Renaissance. Any occupied space becomes their court. If the story’s told often enough, perhaps the demons will become manifest. Made visible and mastered though words.
quotes.name: Barbara Lazear Ascher

quotes.message: Even pain has its joy.
quotes.name: Russian Proverb

quotes.message: The pain of the little finger is felt by the whole body.
quotes.name: Filipino Proverb

quotes.message: Pain is the only evil I know about. It’s the only one I can fight.
quotes.name: Walter M. Miller

quotes.message: Sometimes pain can drive a man harder than pleasure.
