quotes.message: When you've understood this scripture, throw it away. If you can't understand this scripture, throw it away. I insist on your freedom.
quotes.name: Jack Kerouac

quotes.message: Not till your thoughts cease all their branching here and there, not till you abandon all thoughts of seeking for something, not till your mind is motionless as wood or stone, will you be on the right road to the Gate.
quotes.name: Huang Po

quotes.message: The things I carry are my thoughts. That's it. They are the only weight. My thoughts determine whether I am free and light or burdened.
quotes.name: Kamal Ravikant

quotes.message: Stay in the center, and you will be ready to move in any direction.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: Preoccupied with a single leaf you won't see the tree.
quotes.name: Vagabond

quotes.message: We're lost where the mind can't find us utterly lost.
quotes.name: Ikkyu

quotes.message: If there's a single lesson that life teaches us, it's that wishing doesn't make it so.
quotes.name: Lev Grossman

quotes.message: Every man desires to live long, but no man wishes to be old.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: Everyone wishes that the man whom he fears would perish.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: I wish for sorrow to be a full stop and happiness to be a comma in my life.
quotes.name: Luffina Lourduraj

quotes.message: A wise woman wishes to be no one's enemy; a wise woman refuses to be anyone's victim.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: No one is perfect and everyone wishes they could change something about themselves.
quotes.name: Julia Jones

quotes.message: It is hard to contend against one's heart's desire; for whatever it wishes to have it buys at the cost of soul.
quotes.name: Heraclitus

quotes.message: May you find grace to do what needs to be done.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house.
quotes.name: George Carlin

quotes.message: A tough lesson in life that one has to learn is that not everybody wishes you well.
quotes.name: Dan Rather

quotes.message: There's no point having wishes if you don't at least try to do them.
quotes.name: Sally Nicholls

quotes.message: How sleep the brave, who sink to rest, By all their country's wishes blest!
quotes.name: William Collins

quotes.message: When envoys are sent with compliments in their mouths, it is a sign that the enemy wishes for a truce.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: Good wishes alone will not ensure peace.
quotes.name: Alfred Nobel

quotes.message: Selfishness is not living as one wishes to live, it is asking others to live as one wishes to live.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Man is free at the moment he wishes to be.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: I'm not that rebellious. There's a part of me that wishes I was that.
quotes.name: Miranda Cosgrove

quotes.message: If you have one wish, wish for everything to be exactly as it is. Then wait patiently for your wish to come true.
quotes.name: Stephen Russell

quotes.message: Every girl wishes she was Juliet in some version of their life.
quotes.name: Hailee Steinfeld

quotes.message: But darling, I wish you well On your way to the wishing well
quotes.name: Patty Griffin

quotes.message: You should never wish for wishful thinking.
quotes.name: Rachel Cohn

quotes.message: With persistent prayer, the desired wish shall be fulfilled.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: A man of the world must seem to be what he wishes to be thought.
quotes.name: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.message: Whoever wishes peace among peoples must fight statism.
quotes.name: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.message: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: When you wish someone joy, you wish them peace, love, prosperity, happiness. All the good things.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Diligence is the mother of good fortune, and idleness, its opposite, never brought a man to the goal of any of his best wishes.
quotes.name: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.message: A wise unselfishness is not a surrender of yourself to the wishes of anyone, but only to the best discoverable course of action.
quotes.name: David Seabury

quotes.message: That is ever the way. Tis all jealousy to the bride and good wishes to the corpse.
quotes.name: James M. Barrie

quotes.message: You can want and want and want, but if he doesn't want you back. You might as well wish the sky were red.
quotes.name: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.message: The wish for healing has always been half of health.
quotes.name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: You will know that forgiveness has begun when you recall those who hurt you and feel the power to wish them well.
quotes.name: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.message: To do nothing evil is good; to wish nothing evil is better.
quotes.name: Claudius

quotes.message: If you wish to forget anything on the spot, make a note that this thing is to be remembered.
quotes.name: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.message: He that humbleth himself wishes to be exalted.
quotes.name: Nietzsche

quotes.message: If you wish to succeed in life, make perseverance your bosom friend.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Don't wish it was easier wish you were better. Don't wish for less problems wish for more skills. Don't wish for less challenge wish for more wisdom.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Decide that you want it more than you're afraid of it.
quotes.name: Bill Cosby

quotes.message: If we wish ourselves to be high, we should treat that which is over us as high.
quotes.name: Anthony Trollope

quotes.message: we wish to make rage into a fire that cooks things rather than a fire of conflagration.
quotes.name: Clarissa Pinkola Estes

quotes.message: Secretly, we wish anyone we love will think exactly the way we do.
quotes.name: Kim Chernin

quotes.message: I wish you to become who you ­were born to be. To become queen.
quotes.name: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.message: Our wishes are presentiments of the abilities that lie in us, harbingers of what we will be able to accomplish.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Sadness usually results from one of the following causes either when a man does not succeed, or is ashamed of his success.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Sadness is but a wall between two gardens.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: Sadness does not inhere in things; it does not reach us from the world and through mere contemplation of the world. It is a product of our own thought. We create it out of whole cloth.
quotes.name: Emile Durkheim

quotes.message: Sadness is a natural reaction to awakening to see the way things are. But we can either become lost in our sadness, or decide to use this awakening to inspire us to work to change things to the way we wish they could be.
quotes.name: Robert Alan Silverstein

quotes.message: Sadness is a visitor who will enter your home without a key but you have the ability to kick it out when you're ready to.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Sadness is a choice - sadness does not exist.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: Sadness is nothing more than the absence of joy in the same way that darkness is nothing more than the absence of light.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: The word happiness would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
quotes.name: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.message: Good humor is the health of the soul, sadness is its poison.
quotes.name: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.message: Remember sadness is always temporary. This, too, shall pass.
quotes.name: Chuck T. Falcon

quotes.message: You cannot prevent the birds of sadness from passing over your head, but you can prevent their making a nest in your hair.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.message: So much sadness exists in the world that we are all under obligation to contribute as much joy as lies within our powers.
quotes.name: John Sutherland Bonnell

quotes.message: Sadness gives depth. Happiness gives height. Sadness gives roots. Happiness gives branches. Happiness is like a tree going into the sky, and sadness is like the roots going down into the womb of the earth. Both are needed, and the higher a tree goes, the deeper it goes, simultaneously. The bigger the tree, the bigger will be its roots. In fact, it is always in proportion. That's its balance.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Sadness may be part of life but there is no need to let it dominate your entire life.
quotes.name: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.message: Sadness flowers to the next renewing joy.
quotes.name: Jareb Teague

quotes.message: Sadness is a valuable treasure only discovered in people you love.
quotes.name: Malagasy Proverb

quotes.message: The best thing for being sad is to learn something.
quotes.name: Theodore White

quotes.message: By the same token, we can experience joy because we have known sadness.
quotes.name: David Weatherford

quotes.message: The walls we build around us to keep out the sadness also keep out the joy.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: I do believe that if you haven't learnt about sadness, you cannot appreciate happiness.
quotes.name: Nana Mouskouri

quotes.message: Sadness does not come from bad circumstances. It comes from bad thoughts.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: No society has been able to abolish human sadness, no political system can deliver us from the pain of living, from our fear of death, our thirst for the absolute. It is the human condition that directs the social condition, not vice versa.
quotes.name: Eugene Ionesco

quotes.message: One must not let oneself be overwhelmed by sadness.
quotes.name: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.message: Sorrow is better than laughter: for by the sadness of the countenance the heart is made better.
quotes.name: Ecclesiastes, 7:3.

quotes.message: Sadness flies on the wings of the morning and out of the heart of darkness comes the light.
quotes.name: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.message: Every human walks around with a certain kind of sadness. They may not wear it on their sleeves, but it's there if you look deep.
quotes.name: Taraji P. Henson

quotes.message: First, accept sadness. Realize that without losing, winning isn't so great.
quotes.name: Alyssa Milano

quotes.message: When sadness comes, accept it. Listen to its song. It has something to give to you. It has a gift which no happiness can give to you, only sadness can give it.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: There is something beautiful in reveling in sadness. The proof is how beautiful sad songs can be. I don't think being sad is to be avoided. It's apathy and boredom you want to avoid. But feeling anything is good, I think.
quotes.name: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quotes.message: I know a cure for sadness: Let our hands touch something that makes your eyes smile.
quotes.name: Mirabai

quotes.message: Tears are often a gift from God, and sadness is a healthy emotion.
quotes.name: Alan Loy McGinnis

quotes.message: Beautiful sadness is a myth. Sadness turns our features to clay, not porcelain.
quotes.name: David Levithan

quotes.message: When sadness comes, just sit by the side and look at it and say, 'I am the watcher, I am not sadness,' and see the difference. Immediately you have cut the very root of sadness. It is no more nourished. It will die of starvation. We feed these emotions by being identified with them.
quotes.name: Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh

quotes.message: Sadness does not last forever when we walk in the direction of that which we always desired.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
quotes.name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.message: A good cry can be wonderful sometimes, and sadness is nothing more than love announced. Sadness and Unhappiness are not the same thing, and it is good to remember that. And there is this: sadness cleanses the heart.
quotes.name: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.message: Experiencing sadness and anger can make you feel more creative, and by being creative, you can get beyond your pain or negativity.
quotes.name: Yoko Ono

quotes.message: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
quotes.name: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.message: Sadness is almost never anything but a form of fatigue.
quotes.name: Andre Gide

quotes.message: Life consists of sadness too. And sadness is also beautiful; it has its own depth, its own delicacy, its own deliciousness, its own taste. A man is poorer if he has not known sadness; he is impoverished, very much impoverished. His laughter will be shallow, his laughter will not have depth, because depth comes only through sadness. A man who knows sadness, if he laughs, his laughter will have depth. His laughter will have something of his sadness too, his laughter will be more colorful.
quotes.name: Rajneesh

quotes.message: Sometimes when we're feeling sad, it's important just to feel the sadness. Like a snake shedding its skin, old feelings of remorse and regret and hurt and anger often have to come up in order to be released. On the other side we're a better person, capable of a happier life...who we are when we're no longer burdened by the buried feelings that weighed us down, or the self - defeating patterns that the pain produced.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: When you feel sadness inside, wipe it away by cries and tears!
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: School is a place were you learn how to be a child.
quotes.name: Nayeli Garcia

quotes.message: School just speeds things up... Without school it might take 70 years before you wake up and are able to count.
quotes.name: Louis Sachar

quotes.message: The reason for the sadness of this modern age and the men who live in it is that it looks for the truth in everything and finds it.
quotes.name: Edmond de Goncourt

quotes.message: What is the source of sadness, but feebleness of the mind? What giveth it power but the want of reason? Rouse thyself to the combat, and she quitteth the field before thou strikest.
quotes.name: Akhenaton

quotes.message: A feeling of sadness and longing that is not akin to pain, and resembles sorrow only as the mist resembles the rain.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: All pleasures contain an element of sadness.
quotes.name: Jonathan Eybeschutz

quotes.message: Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: It's toughest to forgive ourselves. So it's probably best to start with other people. It's almost like peeling an onion. Layer by layer, forgiving others, you really do get to the point where you can forgive yourself.
quotes.name: Patty Duke

quotes.message: The more you know yourself, the more you forgive yourself.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: People can be more forgiving than you can imagine. But you have to forgive yourself. Let go of what's bitter and move on.
quotes.name: Bill Cosby

quotes.message: Do as the heavens have done, forget your evil; With them forgive yourself.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: You cannot travel back in time to fix your mistakes, but you can learn from them and forgive yourself for not knowing better.
quotes.name: Leon Brown

quotes.message: You forgive yourself for every failure because you are trying to do the right thing. God knows that and you know it. Nobody else may know it.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Forgive yourself and welcome love back into your life.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Embrace and love all of yourself - past, present, and future. Forgive yourself quickly and as often as necessary. Encourage yourself. Tell yourself good things about yourself.
quotes.name: Melody Beattie

quotes.message: Once you forgive yourself, the self-rejection in your mind is over. Self-acceptance begins, and the self-love will grow so strong that you will finally accept yourself just the way you are. That's the beginning of the free human. Forgiveness is the key.
quotes.name: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.message: Forgive yourself for believing that youre anything less than beautiful.
quotes.name: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.message: To forgive is indeed the best form of self-interest since anger, resentment, and revenge are corrosive of that 'summum bonum,' the greatest good.
quotes.name: Bishop Desmond Tutu

quotes.message: Forgiving does not erase the bitter past. A healed memory is not a deleted memory. Instead, forgiving what we cannot forget creates a new way to remember. We change the memory of our past into a hope for our future.
quotes.name: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.message: I've learned to take things a little more easily, to be a little more forgiving of myself.
quotes.name: Queen Rania of Jordan

quotes.message: Forgiving is not an easy thing to do.
quotes.name: Amanda Lindhout

quotes.message: When you forgive, you in no way change the past - but you sure do change the future.
quotes.name: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.message: Forgiveness is a gift you give yourself.
quotes.name: Suzanne Somers

quotes.message: To understand is to forgive, even oneself.
quotes.name: Alexander Chase

quotes.message: Forgiveness is for yourself because it frees you. It lets you out of that prison you put yourself in.
quotes.name: Louise L. Hay

quotes.message: The first step in forgiveness is the willingness to forgive.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: We all must learn to dig down deep inside, trust that inner voice, and not be afraid to face and forgive ourselves.
quotes.name: Darren L. Johnson

quotes.message: Forgiving is rediscovering the shining path of peace that at first you thought others took away when they betrayed you.
quotes.name: Dodinsky

quotes.message: Forgiving presupposes remembering.
quotes.name: Paul Tillich

quotes.message: Forgiving is love's toughest work, and love's biggest risk.
quotes.name: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.message: The secret of forgiving everything is to understand nothing.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: We all make mistakes, don't we? But if you can't forgive yourself, you'll always be an exile in your own life.
quotes.name: Curtis Sittenfeld

quotes.message: Although you should not erase your responsibility for the past, when you make the past your jailer, you destroy your future. It is such a great moment of liberation when you learn to forgive yourself, let the burden go, and walk out into a new path of promise and possibility.
quotes.name: John O'Donohue

quotes.message: Forgive yourself for what you think you've done or not done. At every moment, you had your reasons for all of your actions and decisions. You've always done the best that you could do. Forgive yourself.
quotes.name: Doreen Virtue

quotes.message: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
quotes.name: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.message: When you can forgive both others and yourself...you move from the law of karma into the law of grace — that effulgent state that transmutes and heals.
quotes.name: W. Brugh Joy

quotes.message: Healing comes from forgiving ourselves and forgiving others, holding nothing against other people, feeling no guilt or resentment about our own life.
quotes.name: Toby Johnson

quotes.message: Forgiving ourselves dissolves all kinds of unhealthy attitudes — about ourselves and about the other. We are released from brutal self-downing when we stop criticizing others.
quotes.name: Marsha Sinetar

quotes.message: And if a friend does you evil, then say, 'I forgive you what you did to me; but that you have done it to yourself — how could I forgive that?
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Survivors know the best thing is to let go, as hard as it seems. Forgiveness—of others, fate, and even yourself— is crucial.
quotes.name: Jena Pincott

quotes.message: If you haven't forgiven yourself something, how can you forgive others?
quotes.name: Dolores Huerta

quotes.message: Being gentle means forgiving yourself when you mess up. We should learn from our mistakes, but we shouldn't beat the tar out of ourselves over them. He that cannot forgive others breaks the bridge over which he must pass himself; for every man has need to be forgiven.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: Forgive many things in others; nothing in yourself.
quotes.name: Ausonius

quotes.message: It is very important for every human being to forgive himself or herself because if you live, you will make mistakes— it is inevitable.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: To love yourself, you must forgive yourself of your mistakes— all the things you've done or left undone.
quotes.name: Jena Pincott

quotes.message: Forgive yourself— no one else will.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Forgiving yourself is no less arduous a journey.
quotes.name: Everett Worthington

quotes.message: The real struggle in gaining meaningful victory over self-blame is not simply saying you are forgiving yourself. You can forgive yourself with full understanding and yet still feel just as guilty and ashamed of your misdeeds.
quotes.name: Everett Worthington

quotes.message: When I speak of forgiving myself, I mean that I must learn to see myself the way God sees me— washed clean by the blood of Jesus.
quotes.name: Ruth Graham

quotes.message: The peace that came to me from forgiving myself — being set free from guilt over being a father that was too busy— came in waves and stages. It has not been so dramatic, but it has been equally satisfying.
quotes.name: R.T. Kendall

quotes.message: I have learned, that the person I have to ask for forgiveness from the most is: myself. You must love yourself. You have to forgive yourself, every day, whenever you remember a shortcoming, a flaw, you have to tell yourself 'That's just fine.' You have to forgive yourself so much until you don't even see those things anymore. Because that's what love is like.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: Forgiving yourself, believing in yourself, and choosing to love yourself are the best gifts one could receive.
quotes.name: Brittany Burgunder

quotes.message: Be courageous enough to forgive yourself; never forget to be compassionate to yourself.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: If I hadn't forgiven myself, I wouldn't be strong enough to love someone this much.
quotes.name: Dawn Lanuza

quotes.message: Forgiveness for ourselves and others is one of the main elements in growth. It allows us to free ourselves of the issues that are holding us down.
quotes.name: Nanette Mathews

quotes.message: Learn to face yourself, learn to forgive yourself during your meditation and you will see how your life starts transforming MAGICALLY!
quotes.name: Purvi Raniga

quotes.message: Forgive yourself as you strive to be your best self.
quotes.name: Angel Moreira

quotes.message: The best way to calm the anxious mind is to forgive yourself and others.
quotes.name: Debashis Mridha

quotes.message: Forgiveness is beautiful and it feels good when someone gives that gift to you. But it’s one thing for someone you wronged to forgive you. It was another to forgive yourself.
quotes.name: Kirsten Ashley

quotes.message: When you slip up and let yourself back into old, toxic patterns of thinking, forgive yourself before you try to fix yourself.
quotes.name: Vironika Tugaleva

quotes.message: The only person we have the right or the power to forgive is ourselves. For everything else, there is the Art of Acceptance.
quotes.name: Rebecca O'Dwyer

quotes.message: Forgiveness is inherently powerful enough to extend itself wholly and completely to us even when we are the ones in need of forgiving ourselves.
quotes.name: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.message: Forgive yourself. The supreme act of forgiveness is when you can forgive yourself for all the wounds you've created in your own life. Forgiveness is an act of self-love. When you forgive yourself, self-acceptance begins and self-love grows.
quotes.name: Miguel Ángel Ruiz Macías

quotes.message: Forgive yourself for not knowing what you didn't know before you learned it.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: I think that if God forgives us we must forgive ourselves. Otherwise, it is almost like setting up ourselves as a higher tribunal than him.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: A few great minds are enough to endow humanity with monstrous power, but a few great hearts are not enough to make us worthy of using it.
quotes.name: Jean Rostand

quotes.message: As great minds have the faculty of saying a great deal in a few words, so lesser minds have a talent of talking much, and saying nothing.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Great minds always tend to see virtue in misfortune.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: Failures and mistakes are definitely the greatest teachers to all great minds.
quotes.name: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.message: Every great mind seeks to labor for eternity. All men are captivated by immediate advantages; great minds alone are excited by the prospect of distant good.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: No great mind has ever existed without a touch of madness.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Great minds think alike, but lovers think as one.
quotes.name: Pyreglide

quotes.message: High aims form high characters, and great objects bring out great minds.
quotes.name: Tryon Edwards

quotes.message: Great minds that are healthy are never considered geniuses, while this sublime qualification is lavished on brains that are often inferior but are slightly touched by madness.
quotes.name: Guy de Mauppasant

quotes.message: Oblivion is a second death, which great minds dread more than the first.
quotes.name: Jean de Boufflers

quotes.message: Great minds find beauties and appreciate it. Average minds find commonalities and compare. Small minds find the problems and criticize.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: While small minds were bragging about their material possessions, great minds were busy expanding their assets.
quotes.name: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.message: Great minds with great ideas usually share in the midst of their persecution
quotes.name: Jeremy Aldana

quotes.message: A great mind is not sharpened by consorting with lesser minds.
quotes.name: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.message: Great minds tend toward banality. It is the noblest effort of individualism. But it implies a sort of modesty, which is so rare that it is scarcely found except in the greatest, or in beggars.
quotes.name: Andre Gide

quotes.message: Great advantages are often attended with great inconveniences, and great minds called to severe trials.
quotes.name: Mercy Otis Warren

quotes.message: Great errors seldom originate but with men of great minds.
quotes.name: Petrarch

quotes.message: The most characteristic mark of a great mind is to choose some one important object, and pursue it for life.
quotes.name: Anna Letitia Barbauld

quotes.message: Small mind competes, big mind collaborates and great mind encompasses.
quotes.name: Amit Ray

quotes.message: Little minds try to solve the matters through violence and darkness; great minds try to solve the matters through love and light!
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: Silence is sometimes more significant and sublime than the most noble and most expressive eloquence, and is on many occasions the indication of a great mind.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: It is the sign of a great mind to dislike greatness, and prefer things in measure to things in excess.
quotes.name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: Small minds are concerned with the extraordinary, great minds with the ordinary.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: To live for a time close to great minds is the best kind of education.
quotes.name: John Buchan

quotes.message: Great minds must be ready not only to take opportunities, but to make them.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: Only great minds can afford a simple style.
quotes.name: Stendhal

quotes.message: A great mind becomes a great fortune.
quotes.name: Seneca The Younger

quotes.message: The great mind knows the power of gentleness.
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Don't let your ego get too close to your position, so that if your position gets shot down, your ego doesn't go with it.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: Ego is one of the biggest weapons that is used to take us down. It's self-destructive. It's a problem on all levels - even regular people can have big ego problems.
quotes.name: Yehuda Berg

quotes.message: The ego is nothing other than the focus of conscious attention.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: Ego is the immediate dictate of human consciousness.
quotes.name: Max Planck

quotes.message: The ego is not master in its own house.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: Ego is a social fiction for which one person at a time gets all the blame.
quotes.name: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.message: To me the ego is the habitual and compulsive thought processes that go through everybody's mind continuously. External things like possessions or memories or failures or successes or achievements. Your personal history.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Ego is the great enemy. Ego will hold you back every single time.
quotes.name: Nikki Sixx

quotes.message: When you're older and wiser a lot of the ego has gone out of the window.
quotes.name: Billy Ocean

quotes.message: The ego is as little absolutely permanent as are bodies.
quotes.name: Ernst Mach

quotes.message: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
quotes.name: Isaac Asimov

quotes.message: The greatest conflicts are not between two people but between one person and himself.
quotes.name: Garth Brooks

quotes.message: Every man who is high up likes to think that he has done it all himself, and the wife smiles and lets it go at that.
quotes.name: J. M. Barrie

quotes.message: Big egos are big shields for lots of empty space.
quotes.name: Diana Black

quotes.message: Our own self-love draws a thick veil between us and our faults.
quotes.name: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.message: Letting go of your ego opens the door to taking a new and creative course of action.
quotes.name: Suzanne Mayo Frindt

quotes.message: The nice thing about egotists is that they don't talk about other people.
quotes.name: Lucille S. Harper

quotes.message: It's hard to be humble when you are as great as I am.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: The last time I saw him he was walking down lover's lane holding his own hand.
quotes.name: Fred Allen

quotes.message: Well-ordered self-love is right and natural.
quotes.name: St. Thomas Aquinas

quotes.message: Ego expands to fill the space not filled with knowledge.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Armstrong

quotes.message: When ego is lost, limit is lost. You become infinite, kind, beautiful.
quotes.name: Yogi Bhajan

quotes.message: It is hard to resist a flatterer who gets it right.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: You are the sky. Everything else - it's just the weather.
quotes.name: Pema Chodron

quotes.message: The Ego is an exquisite instrument. Enjoy it, use it-just don't get lost in it.
quotes.name: Ram Dass

quotes.message: Self-worth comes from one thing - thinking that you are worthy.
quotes.name: Dr. Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: I'm willing to admit that I may not always be right, but I am never wrong.
quotes.name: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.message: I live for myself and I answer to nobody.
quotes.name: Steve Mcqueen

quotes.message: Self-love seems so often unrequited.
quotes.name: Anthony Powell

quotes.message: A bad day for your ego is a great day for your soul.
quotes.name: Jillian Michaels

quotes.message: My opponent is my teacher, my ego is my enemy.
quotes.name: Renzo Gracie

quotes.message: Your ego screams for people to acknowledge you. But you must do nothing. Take it. Eat it until you’re sick. Endure it. Quietly brush it off and work harder.
quotes.name: Ryan Holiday

quotes.message: Ego trip: a journey to nowhere.
quotes.name: Robert Half

quotes.message: If the egotist is weak, his egotism is worthless. If the egotist is strong, acute, full of distinctive character, his egotism is precious, and remains a possession of the race.
quotes.name: Alexander Smith

quotes.message: Egotism is the anesthetic which nature gives us to deaden the pain of being a fool.
quotes.name: Dr. Herbert Shofield

quotes.message: If a man thinks he is not conceited, he is very conceited indeed.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: The ego is the false self-born out of fear and defensiveness
quotes.name: John O'Donohue

quotes.message: The ego relies on the familiar. It is reluctant to experience the unknown, which is the very essence of life.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: The most common ego identifications have to do with possessions, the work you do, social status and recognition, knowledge and education, physical appearance, special abilities, relationships, person and family history, belief systems, and often nationalistic, racial, religious, and other collective identifications. None of these is you.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Ego says, 'Once everything falls into place, I'll feel peace.' Spirit says, 'Find your peace, and then everything will fall into place.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: One realizes that human relationships are the tragic necessity of human life; that they can never be wholly satisfactory, that every ego is half the time greedily seeking them, and half the time pulling away from them.
quotes.name: Willa Cather

quotes.message: The secret to happiness is a small ego. And a big wallet. Good wine helps, too.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: An average man is egoistic, proud and has strong self-esteem.They always require partners who massage their ego not those who will drag their ego to the mud.
quotes.name: Agu Jaachynma N. E.

quotes.message: The more you can have control over your ego rather than let it run amuck, the more successful you'll be in all areas of life.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: The ego’s relation to the id might be compared to that of a rider to his horse. The horse supplies the locomotive energy, while the rider has the privilege of deciding on the goal and of guiding the powerful animal’s movement.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: We understand the ego as the complex factor to which all conscious contents are related. It forms, as it were, the centre of the field of consciousness; and, in so far as this comprises the empirical personality, the ego is the subject of all personal acts of consciousness. The relation of a psychic content to the ego forms the criterion of its consciousness, for no content can be conscious until it is represented to a subject.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: I once found an ego, crawling around and trying to shine on me. I took it in my arms and the ego turned itself into a virus. First it took over my mind , then my heart, and finally, it attempted to destroy my soul, by corrupting me with fear and guilt. Therefore, with as much energy as I could gather, I trapped the ego within my anger and pulled it out of me.
quotes.name: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.message: I like to dress egos. If you haven't got an ego today, you can forget it.
quotes.name: Gianni Versace

quotes.message: You believe your opinions,- you believe your judgments,- you believe your emotions. And these beliefs become your ego— but this ego is not you.
quotes.name: Ezra Bayda

quotes.message: Whenever I climb I am followed by a dog called 'Ego'.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Once you let go nothing dies, only the ego. You remain for ever and ever.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Ego is just like a dust in the eyes... without clearing the dust you can't see anything clearly... so clear the ego and see the world.
quotes.name: Sukh Sandhu

quotes.message: Analysis does not set out to make pathological reactions impossible, but to give the patient's ego freedom to decide one way or another.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: Only in your ego are you alone.
quotes.name: Brendon Burchard

quotes.message: Ego; 'E' for excellence, 'G' for greatness, and 'O' for 'Oh, I'm so good!'
quotes.name: Artie Smalls

quotes.message: Ego death is where you find happiness . That's the only place you find happiness... . I let my ego down and then I rise back up . I let my ego down and then I'll be stronger.
quotes.name: Craig Ritchie Allan; Jahmal Gwin; Jason Brunton; etal.

quotes.message: Your ego you is what's eating at your heart . Your ego you is what tears me apart . And you're not who I've fallen in love with . Now tell me . What's running through your veins? . That got the ego you . Taking control of you.
quotes.name: Madeline Obrigewitsch and Dave Roth

quotes.message: Inflate my ego gently . Go tell them heaven sent me . Oh cause I'm so expressive . And I'm so obsessed . With my ego, my ego . And its message to inform the press . invite the guests I need the press tonight.
quotes.name: Bernie Taupin and Elton John

quotes.message: Ego is an impostor pretending to be real. . Ego is a charlatan . with quackery appeal. . Ego is a pseudonym for an impious state. . Ego is sacrilegious . to mock and imitate. . Ego is duplicity with 'doubleness' of thought. . Ego is double-dealer . leaving many distraught. . Ego is a hypocrite who's sanctimonious. . Ego is a deceiver . who's disingenuous. . Ego is a 'Robin Hood' using a poison dart. . Ego is a thespian . of histrionic art. . Ego is a basilisk of mythical report. . Ego is a hippogriff . without a life support.
quotes.name: Wallace Dean LaBenne

quotes.message: Fear stokes that mighty, wretched ego, . Blame to wear suffering's glorious crown; . Hatred's bowels, bellows the flames of blame, . Anger's rage to beat the humble spirit down.
quotes.name: Gabriel McBride

quotes.message: If you are brave enough to say goodbye life will reward you with a new hello.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Leave something for someone but dont leave someone for something.
quotes.name: Enid Blyton

quotes.message: Everybody has to leave, everybody has to leave their home and come back so they can love it again for all new reasons.
quotes.name: Donald Miller

quotes.message: And the danger is that in this move toward new horizons and far directions, that I may lose what I have now, and not find anything except loneliness.
quotes.name: Sylvia Plath

quotes.message: There are no goodbyes for us. Wherever you are, you will always be in my heart.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: A farewell is necessary before we can meet again, and meeting again after moments or a lifetime is certain for those who are friends.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: Leaving things behind and starting again is a way of coping with difficulties. I learnt very early in my life that I was able to leave a place and still remain myself.
quotes.name: Rachel Cusk

quotes.message: Leaving home in a sense involves a kind of second birth in which we give birth to ourselves.
quotes.name: Robert Neelly Bellah

quotes.message: However painful the process of leaving home, for parents and for children, the really frightening thing for both would be the prospect of the child never leaving home.
quotes.name: Robert Neelly Bellah

quotes.message: You never really leave a place or person you love, part of them you take with you ,leaving a part of yourself behind.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I hope the leaving is joyful; and I hope never to return.
quotes.name: Frida Kahlo

quotes.message: People fear leaving their safe harbor of the known and venturing off into the unknown. Human beings crave certainty - even when it limits them.
quotes.name: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.message: The sea that calls all things unto her calls me, and I must embark.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: A fear of the unknown keeps a lot of people from leaving bad situations.
quotes.name: Kathie Lee Gifford

quotes.message: You get a strange feeling when you're about to leave a place, like you'll not only miss the people you love but you'll miss the person you are now at this time and this place, because you'll never be this way again.
quotes.name: Azar Nafisi

quotes.message: Never part without loving words to think of during your absence. It may be that you will not meet again in this life.
quotes.name: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.message: Gone - flitted away, Taken the stars from the night and the sun From the day! Gone, and a cloud in my heart.
quotes.name: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.message: Every parting is a form of death, as every reunion is a type of heaven.
quotes.name: Tryon Edwards

quotes.message: Adieu! I have too grieved a heart to take a tedious leave.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Have you ever thought about it, about simply leaving? Really, truly thought about it with the intent to follow through and not as a dream or a passing fancy?
quotes.name: Erin Morgenstern

quotes.message: Has this world been so kind to you that you should leave with regret? There are better things ahead than any we leave behind.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: Parting is such sweet sorrow.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Never say goodbye, because goodbye means going away and going away means forgetting.
quotes.name: Peter Pan

quotes.message: There ain't no way you can hold onto something that wants to go, you understand? You can only love what you got while you got it.
quotes.name: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.message: I make it easier for people to leave by making them hate me a little.
quotes.name: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.message: Life is a series of hellos and goodbyes . I'm afraid it's time for goodbye again.
quotes.name: Billy Joel

quotes.message: Even if we never talk again after tonight, please know that I am forever changed because of who you are and what you mean to me.
quotes.name: Chasing Amy

quotes.message: I been a long time leaving but I'm going to be a long time gone.
quotes.name: Willie Nelson

quotes.message: Happy trails to you, until we meet again. Some trails are happy ones, Others are blue. It's the way you ride the trail that counts,Here's a happy one for you.
quotes.name: Dale Evans

quotes.message: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
quotes.name: Dr. Seuss

quotes.message: Life! we've been long together, Through pleasant and through cloudy weather; 'Tis hard to part when friends are dear, Perhaps 'twill cost a sigh, a tear; Then steal away, give little warning; Choose thine own time; Say not 'Good-night'; but in some bright
quotes.name: Aikin Barbauld

quotes.message: Only in the agony of parting do we look into the depths of love.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Sometimes, people choose to leave not because of selfish reasons. But they just know that things will get worse if they stay.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Absence diminishes little passions and increases great ones, as the wind extinguishes candles and fans a fire.
quotes.name: Francois Duc de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Man's feelings are always purest and most glowing in the hour of meeting and of farewell.
quotes.name: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.message: Farewell! God knows when we shall meet again.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: The return makes one love the farewell.
quotes.name: Alfred De Musset

quotes.message: Good-byes breed a sort of distaste for whomever you say good-bye to; this hurts, you feel, this must not happen again.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.message: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
quotes.name: Washington Irving

quotes.message: That bitter word, which closed all earthly friendships and finished every feast of love farewell!
quotes.name: Robert Pollok

quotes.message: This is not the end. It is not even the beginning of the end. But it is, perhaps, the end of the beginning.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: You're the reason I'm leaving . And by leaving, we don't stop living you know .
quotes.name: Robert Hardy

quotes.message: Leaving is an act that cannot be undone.
quotes.name: Nayomi Munaweera

quotes.message: Leaving some things undone is a necessary tradeoff for extraordinary results.
quotes.name: Gary Keller

quotes.message: Leaving can sometimes be the best way to never go away.
quotes.name: Cathy Davidson

quotes.message: Sometimes leaving is the only way to be there for someone.
quotes.name: Wesley Eisold

quotes.message: In leaving negativity behind, you find something beautiful.
quotes.name: Tom DeLonge

quotes.message: Sometimes leaving is the only way to appreciate what we have.
quotes.name: J.A. London

quotes.message: Leaving the world behind is the best experience most feeble minds fear to try.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: However, leaving everything to the market is not necessarily good for society.
quotes.name: Dorothy E. Denning

quotes.message: Leaving this life is just like going from one room to another and closing the door.
quotes.name: David Berg

quotes.message: Leaving people to jumped conclusions is sometimes simpler than explaining a complicated truth.
quotes.name: Gayle Forman

quotes.message: Leaving others alone is a sign of cowardice, whether you are involved in a war or in a relationship.
quotes.name: Pratik Akkawar

quotes.message: The tough part of having a long distance relationship is the fight. Normal people can fight and make up by talking face to face. That gets a lot more difficult in a long distance relationship.
quotes.name: Darren Klee

quotes.message: Some people can be so close to you even if physically far, they walk with you and stay near in every moment of your life.
quotes.name: Senora Roy

quotes.message: The distance maybe far and wide but my heart can cover them all.
quotes.name: Linda Roy

quotes.message: The simple lack of her is more to me than others presence.
quotes.name: Edward Thomas

quotes.message: Forget the miles, forget them. You'll be there and I'll be here, and it'll just be long distance. And that'll be okay, because quite frankly I'm crazy about you.
quotes.name: Going the Distance

quotes.message: I fell in love with her when we were together, then fell deeper in love with in the years we were apart.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: In true love the smallest distance is too great, and the greatest distance can be bridged.
quotes.name: Hands Nouwens

quotes.message: We were together even when we were apart.
quotes.name: Shannon A. Thompson

quotes.message: You're too far for my hands to hold you, but too near for my heart to love you.
quotes.name: Heraline

quotes.message: Sometimes you have to be apart from the people you love, but that doesn't make you love them any less. Sometimes you love them more.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: Your absence has not taught me how to be alone, it merely has shown that when together we cast a single shadow on the wall.
quotes.name: Doug Fetherling

quotes.message: I found that I missed him the more he was absent from my life, and the more I missed him, the more I loved him.
quotes.name: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.message: I close my eyes, thinking that there is nothing like an embrace after an absence, nothing like fitting my face into the curve of his shoulder and filling my lungs with the scent of him.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: Distance does not break off the friendship absolutely, but only the activity of it.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: The very least you can do in your life is to figure out what you hope for. And the most you can do is live inside that hope. Not admire it from a distance, but live right in it, under its roof.
quotes.name: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.message: Missing someone gets easier every day because even though you get one day further from the last time you saw them, you are one day closer to the next time you will see them.
quotes.name: Mark Ebert

quotes.message: Long distance relationship is like a dream,It can be sweet,It can be sad and it can also be a nightmare.
quotes.name: Bradley B. Dalina

quotes.message: Distance is temporary, but our love is permanent. This may be the last time I see you, but if you keep me in your heart, together we shall be eternal; if you believe, we shall never part.
quotes.name: Ben Harper

quotes.message: Every relationship I've been in becomes long distance because of work. It's never worked out. It puts an intense strain on the relationship, and at a certain point, it becomes too difficult.
quotes.name: Anton Yelchin

quotes.message: The value of love is slowly lost when we have way too much. There is just no time to appreciate it. It is in times of separation and distance that you truly understand the meaning of love.
quotes.name: Tiffany Health

quotes.message: No matter how far you manage to go, distance will never be able to erase those beautiful memories. There is so much goodness that we shared together.
quotes.name: Lucy Aims

quotes.message: The scariest thing about distance is that you don't know whether they'll miss you or forget you.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: Being close is the first and last desire of lovers, but being far and loving each other without an inch's difference is the characteristic of real love.
quotes.name: Senora Ray

quotes.message: Distance simply means separation in place but never in connections. Heart remains inseparable.
quotes.name: DhelChen

quotes.message: If you listen to the wind very carefully, you'll be able to hear me whisper my love for you.
quotes.name: Andrew Davidson

quotes.message: I believe in the immeasurable power of love; that true love can endure any circumstance and reach across any distance.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: I know we loved each other, but distance can do strange things to people and before I was willing to tell you about it, I wanted to be certain that it would last.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: Obviously, a long distance relationship is hard. But, like anything worth having, you make it work.
quotes.name: Leona Lewis

quotes.message: Waiting does not bother me, nor does the distance that is cropping up between us. All I want is a true commitment and to know that your heat will never change.
quotes.name: Ting Stores

quotes.message: Long-distance relationships are hard no matter what. When you don't have face-to-face time, it's just different.
quotes.name: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.message: Some of the toughest things in this world are to really want someone and not have them around you. Those are the times when you don't know what to do. All you can do for is wait.
quotes.name: Tamara Louis

quotes.message: Be the success story you're looking for. Be the ones to survive your long distance relationship. Be the inspiration for others to follow.
quotes.name: Dee King

quotes.message: Long distance relationships are hard no matter what. When you don't have face to face time, it's just different.
quotes.name: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.message: I don't cry because we've been separated by distance, and for a matter of years. Why? Because for as long as we share the same sky and breathe the same air, we're still together.
quotes.name: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.message: Love is missing someone whenever you're apart, but somehow feeling warm inside because you're close in heart.
quotes.name: Kay Knudsen

quotes.message: The second principle of magic: things which have once been in contact with each other continue to act on each other at a distance after the physical contact has been severed.
quotes.name: James G. Frazer

quotes.message: This is the sad bed of chosen chastity because you are miles and mountains away.
quotes.name: Erica Jong

quotes.message: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: Maybe, it's not the distance that's the problem, but how you handle it.
quotes.name: David leviathan

quotes.message: You're my Nemo. If you get lost in the great big ocean, I will find you.
quotes.name: Anon

quotes.message: Love will travel as far as you let it. It has no limits.
quotes.name: Dee King

quotes.message: If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart i'll always be with you.
quotes.name: A.A. Milne

quotes.message: If you found that one person who is really worth the sacrifices, pain, and hardships then your efforts will not go to waste.
quotes.name: Anna Agoncillo

quotes.message: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: Don't be disappointed, the winning side is not always the right one.
quotes.name: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.message: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
quotes.name: Mike Ditka

quotes.message: Learn how to be a loser, because it's important to be a loser to be a winner.
quotes.name: Sanford I. Weill

quotes.message: Maybe the truth is, there's a little bit of loser in all of us. Being happy isn't having everything in your life be perfect. Maybe it's about stringing together all the little things.
quotes.name: Ann Brashares

quotes.message: Losers fix the blame; winners fix what caused the problem.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Perfection is man's ultimate illusion. It simply doesn't exist in the universe. If you are a perfectionist, you are guaranteed to be a loser in whatever you do.
quotes.name: David D. Burns

quotes.message: If at first you don't succeed, find out if the loser gets anything.
quotes.name: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.message: Second place is just the first place loser.
quotes.name: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.message: How you respond to the challenge in the second half will determine what you become after the game, whether you are a winner or a loser.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: The cheerful loser is the winner.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: A peace is of the nature of a conquest; for then both parties nobly are subdued, and neither party loser.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Losers live in the past. Winners learn from the past and enjoy working in the present toward the future.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: The moment you think that your destiny is predetermined, you become a miserable loser! Trust your own power so that you can shape your own destiny!
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: Be careful you don't give up on what is yet to give you victory. Many people quit when they were yet to win. Successful people never quit and I believe no quitter had ever been successful too.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: The path of least resistance is the path of the loser.
quotes.name: H. G. Wells

quotes.message: The fear of losing anything is the inability to prepare for the best.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: One who doesn't recognise an opportunity is bigger loser than one who tries his hand at an opportunity.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: It seems that fighting is a game where everybody is the loser.
quotes.name: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.message: It's not that he was going nowhere, it's that he'd already arrived.
quotes.name: Janet Fitch

quotes.message: Stand up for the underdog, the loser. Sometimes having the strength to show loving support for unacknowledged others turns the tides of our own lives.
quotes.name: Alexandra Katehakis

quotes.message: When you know that someone is playing love games with you and still you are there then it means either you are a true lover or a true loser.
quotes.name: Jasmine Kiyani

quotes.message: The only difference between a winner and a loser is that one second when the winner decided not to give up.
quotes.name: Vikrmn

quotes.message: It's okay to be a loser, these are people who tried to blend in with the world, still get the disrespect he doesn't deserve. decides to be just themselves. and still there's a girl you dream about, has someone else.
quotes.name: Jericho Pasaoa

quotes.message: Don't try to impress a loser because If one is not happy about the things happening in their life, one cannot be happy about the things happening in someone else's life.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Losers always has an excuse Winner always find a way.
quotes.name: Noormohammad Bhuayan

quotes.message: Losers doesn't require a miracle to Win.
quotes.name: Leo Ausdauer Wirabuana

quotes.message: To be a good loser is to learn how to win.
quotes.name: Carl Sandburg

quotes.message: He's got that â€˜born to lose and lose violently' air about him. That's good.
quotes.name: Daniel Woodrell

quotes.message: Winners do what losers don't want to do.
quotes.name: Gary Busey

quotes.message: A winner rebukes and forgives; a loser is too timid to rebuke and too petty to forgive.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: A loser doesn't know what he'll do if he loses, but talks about what he'll do if he wins, and a winner doesn't talk about what he'll do if he wins, but knows what he'll do if he loses.
quotes.name: Eric Berne

quotes.message: So when they win, it's their hard work. And when they lose, it's their bad luck.
quotes.name: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.message: Let me lose everything on earth and the world beyond, but let me not lose what I'm craving for, let it be that i died on the way than retreating from getting it.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: What separates the winners from the losers is how a person reacts to each new twist of fate.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: You crave winning and fear losing instead of just doing.
quotes.name: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.message: There's nothing wrong with being a loser, it just depends on how good you are at it.
quotes.name: Billie Joe Armstrong

quotes.message: Losers have goals. Winners have systems.
quotes.name: Scott Adams

quotes.message: Show me a good loser and I will show you a loser.
quotes.name: Paul Newman

quotes.message: You have to be able to be a good loser. You have to be okay knowing you're going to fail every day in something without getting mad and upset.
quotes.name: Dan O'Brien

quotes.message: At war, there's no right or wrong. Winner's right while loser's wrong.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: No one knows what to say in the loser's locker room.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: Losers make promises they often break. Winners make commitments they always keep.

quotes.message: When you dont produce results.The results produce themselves and wont favour you.

quotes.message: A winner is just a loser who tried one more time.

quotes.message: What's well begun, is half done.

quotes.message: It is one of the beautiful compensations of life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself.

quotes.message: Here's a difference between beauty and charm. A beautiful woman is one I notice. A charming woman is one who notices me.

quotes.message: He contemplation of truth and beauty is the proper object for which we were created, which calls forth the most intense desires of the soul, and of which it never tires.

quotes.message: What the imagination seizes as beauty must be truth.

quotes.message: All God's children are not beautiful. Most of God's children are, in fact, barely presentable.

quotes.message: One cannot collect all the beautiful shells on the beach.

quotes.message: Every man feels instinctively that all the beautiful sentiments in the world weigh less than a single lovely action.

quotes.message: Riches, like glory or heath, have no more beauty or pleasure than their possessor is pleased to lend them.

quotes.message: In every man's heart there is a secret nerve that answers to the vibration of beauty.

quotes.message: To holy people the very name of Jesus is a name to feed upon, a name to transport. His name can raise the dead and transfigure and beautify the living.
quotes.name: ohn Henry Newman

quotes.message: Life has loveliness to sell, All beautiful and splendid things, Blue waves whitened on a cliff, Soaring fire that sways and sings,And children's faces looking up,Holding wonder like a cup.

quotes.message: Everytime you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing.

quotes.message: The longer I live the more beautiful life becomes.

quotes.message: Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together.
quotes.name: Petrarch

quotes.message: There is no excellent beauty that hath not some strangeness in the proportion.
quotes.name: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.message: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Everytime you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: I've learned ... that a smile is an inexpensive way to improve your looks.

quotes.message: Anything with scales counts as a fish.

quotes.message: Appearances are deceptive.

quotes.message: Carve the peg by looking at the hole.

quotes.message: Change is inevitable

quotes.message: Circumstances alter cases.

quotes.message: Cutting off a mule's ears doesn't make it a horse.

quotes.message: Easier said than done.

quotes.message: Even monkeys fall out of trees.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: Even the best laid plans go awry.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Every man has to seek his own way to make himself more noble and to realize his own true worth.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Expect the worst, but hope for the best.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Froth is not beer.
quotes.name: Dutch

quotes.message: Give up the ghost.
quotes.name: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.message: In a crisis, give help first and then advice.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: It is useless attacking the insensible.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: It never rains but it pours.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Life is not a dress rehearsal.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Looks can be deceiving.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: No man can lose what he never had.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: No one goes through life unscathed.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Nothing is black or white.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Nothing is certain but death and taxes.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Seeing is believing.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Sometimes, it's too little, too late.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Sometimes, less is more.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.name: unknown; thanks to rapstar.com

quotes.message: The price of your hat is not always the measure of your brain.
quotes.name: African American

quotes.message: The rain falls on every roof.
quotes.name: African Proverb

quotes.message: The teeth that laugh are also those that bite.
quotes.name: Hausa tribe of West Africa

quotes.message: What goes up must come down.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: What is true by lamplight is not always true in sunlight.
quotes.name: French

quotes.message: What you see is what you get.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: What's done is done.
quotes.name: Early 14th Century French Proverb

quotes.message: When the music changes, so does the dance.
quotes.name: Hausa tribe of West Africa

quotes.message: Wherever you go, you can't get rid of yourself.
quotes.name: Polish

quotes.message: Worrying never changed anything.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You can't beat a dead horse.
quotes.name: Richard Trench

quotes.message: You can't build a relationship with a hammer.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: There's nothing like eavesdropping to show you that the world outside your head is different from the world inside your head.
quotes.name: Thornton Wilder

quotes.message: The key to good eavesdropping is not getting caught.
quotes.name: Lemony Snicket

quotes.message: Any place is good for eavesdropping, if you know how to eavesdrop.
quotes.name: Tom Waits

quotes.message: Eavesdropping's a sin, but ignorance is fatal. Take your pick.

quotes.message: I shouldn't have eavesdropped, but sometimes, that's the only way to find out the truth.

quotes.message: Nothing good was ever learned from eavesdropping, so mind your business and let others mind theirs.

quotes.message: Eavesdropping's sort of thrilling 'cause you learn what people really think, but eavesdropping makes you miserable for exactly the same reason.

quotes.message: A writer's occupational hazard: I think of eavesdropping as minding my business.
quotes.name: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.message: Spying is a like a game of chess: Sometimes you have to withdraw, sometimes you have to sacrifice one of your pieces to win - preferably a knight rather than a king or queen.
quotes.name: John Rhys-Davies

quotes.message: Eavesdropping is a deplorable habit, but I have developed worse ones since.
quotes.name: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.message: The first rule of snooping is to come at it sideways.
quotes.name: Mary Ann Shaffer

quotes.message: The end and aim of spying in all its five varieties is knowledge of the enemy; and this knowledge can only be derived, in the first instance, from the converted spy. Hence it is essential that the converted spy be treated with the utmost liberality.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: I do love to eavesdrop. It's inspirational, not only for subject matter but for actual dialogue, the way people talk.
quotes.name: Lynda Barry

quotes.message: If you could eavesdrop on everything said about you, you'd spend most of your time waiting for the subject to come up.
quotes.name: Robert Breault

quotes.message: Eavesdropping is such a regular-person activity.
quotes.name: Franny Billingsley

quotes.message: We're no longer in the Cold War. Eavesdropping on friends is unacceptable.
quotes.name: Vladimir Putin

quotes.message: Spying on people by magic is the same as spying on them in any other way.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: The first step in good reporting is good snooping.
quotes.name: Matt Drudge

quotes.message: Spying among friends is never acceptable.
quotes.name: Angela Merkel

quotes.message: Spying is always an expensive method of acquiring information.
quotes.name: Muriel Lester

quotes.message: There's been spying for years, there's been surveillance for years, and so forth, I'm not going to pass judgement on that, it's the nature of our society.
quotes.name: Eric Schmidt

quotes.message: Every time you overhear something hurtful, I want you to do something kind for someone else.
quotes.name: Suze Orman

quotes.message: A woman's rank lies in the fulness of her womanhood: Therein alone she is royal.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Do not live someone else's life and someone else's idea of what womanhood is. Womanhood is you. Womanhood is everything that's inside of you.
quotes.name: Viola Davis

quotes.message: My ideal of womanhood has always been the pioneer woman who fought and worked at her husband's side. She bore the children, kept the home fires burning; she was the hub of the family, the planner and the dreamer.

quotes.message: Womanhood is a flourishing flower.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: The idea of perfect womanhood is perfect independence.
quotes.name: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.message: Womanhood is something you don't consider until it hits you.
quotes.name: Laura Marling

quotes.message: Anything may happen when womanhood has ceased to be a protected occupation.
quotes.name: Virginia Woolf

quotes.message: The heart of true womanhood knows where its own sphere is, and never seeks to stray beyond it!
quotes.name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.message: The true worth of a race must be measured by the character of its womanhood.
quotes.name: Mary Mcleod Bethune

quotes.message: The true aim of female education should be, not a development of one or two, but all the faculties of the human soul, because no perfect womanhood is developed by imperfect culture.

quotes.message: It is against womanhood to be forward in their own wishes.
quotes.name: Philip Sidney

quotes.message: Real Womanhood isn't a function of becoming a great mother, but of being loved by your Great Father.
quotes.name: Ann Voskamp

quotes.message: Womanhood is the great fact in her life; wifehood and motherhood are but incidental relations.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.message: The sanctity of womanhood is incompatible with social liberty and social claims; and for a woman emancipation means corruption.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: Pure womanhood plus priesthood means exaltation. But womanhood without priesthood, or priesthood without pure womanhood doesn't spell exaltation.
quotes.name: Harold B. Lee

quotes.message: The best things about womanhood might possibly even be the conversations. The chatting. The gabbing. The whispering. The hands-on-hips eye-rolling. The yukking-it up.
quotes.name: Katherine Center

quotes.message: The ultimate meaning of true womanhood is this: It is a distinctive calling of God to display the glory of his Son in ways that would not be displayed if there were no womanhood.
quotes.name: John Piper

quotes.message: Everyone thinks that a new place or a new identity will jumpstart a new life.
quotes.name: Caroline Leavitt

quotes.message: The responsibility of carrying and bringing a new life into this world is one that cannot be taken lightly.
quotes.name: Gloria Estefan

quotes.message: Everybody deserves a second chance in this world. That's basically all I ask.
quotes.name: Shannen Doherty

quotes.message: Joining a new church and starting a new life is never easy and often frightening.
quotes.name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.message: Rather than turning the page, it's much easier to just throw the book away.
quotes.name: Anthony Liccione

quotes.message: If you want a new life, first give praise for having the old one!
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: The beginning of compunction is the beginning of a new life.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: I've got a new life now, a new future, there's a lot more to Lennox Lewis than just being a boxer.
quotes.name: Lennox Lewis

quotes.message: You never begin a new life. It's a mistake to think that you end one part of your life and start another as if there's no continuity.
