quotes.message: The question is what I wanted to do with the new life God has given me. This is the mission I want to take on.
quotes.name: Billy Tauzin

quotes.message: They'll never forget, never forgive, no matter who the enemy is, son. Better just to start a new life. Be someone else.
quotes.name: Jeff Vandermeer

quotes.message: When everything is lost, and all seems darkness, then comes the new life and all that is needed.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: Don't hold together what must fall apart. The familiar life crumbles so the new life can begin.
quotes.name: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.message: Perhaps there are just some things you leave behind when you choose a new life.
quotes.name: Andrew Davidson

quotes.message: A lasting solution, the possibility to begin a new life, is the only dignified solution for the refugee himself.
quotes.name: Poul Hartling

quotes.message: Knowing when it is over is the beginning of a new life and the end of an old one!
quotes.name: Michael Penn

quotes.message: No one can begin a new life, unless he repent of the old.
quotes.name: Saint Augustine

quotes.message: What's old collapses, times change, and new life blossoms in the ruins.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: We're given second chances every day of our life. We don't usually take them, but they're there for the taking.
quotes.name: Andrew M. Greeley

quotes.message: A new life? There's not such thing.It was only in the magazine headlines that people got a new life. Stopped drinking or taking drugs, found a new love. But the same life.
quotes.name: John Ajvide Lindqvist

quotes.message: Today I begin a new life for I am the master of my abilities and today is going to be a great and beautiful day!
quotes.name: Tyrese Gibson

quotes.message: I used to believe that people are only born once, but now I feel I have been reborn, like I was given a new life. I see myself as a child, full of energy and hope.
quotes.name: Bahman Ghobadi

quotes.message: You make a new life by making new choices.
quotes.name: Sean Stephenson

quotes.message: We are continuously living a new life, and when the old and the new do not fit nicely together, the old - no longer able to contain the new - should be discarded.
quotes.name: Ernest Holmes

quotes.message: What else remains for me? Youth, hope and love; To build a new life on a ruined life.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: These, by obtruding the beginning of a change for the entire work of new life, will fall under the former guilt.
quotes.name: Henry Hammond

quotes.message: Your life changes the moment you make a new, congruent, and committed decision.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: If you're brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
quotes.name: Carl Bard

quotes.message: Today I begin a new life. I will greet this day with love in my heart.
quotes.name: Og Mandino

quotes.message: We're old souls in a new life baby. They gave us a new life To live and learn.
quotes.name: Paul Williams

quotes.message: There is no ascent to the heights without prior descent into darkness, no new life without some form of death.
quotes.name: Karen Armstrong

quotes.message: I can hardly wait for tomorrow, it means a new life for me each and every day.
quotes.name: Stanley Kunitz

quotes.message: New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: I'm planning a whole new life, ... It's an opportunity knocking for me out here.
quotes.name: Phillip Johnson

quotes.message: I've been waiting for this for so long--something new, life after high school.
quotes.name: Nina LaCour

quotes.message: The way I feel now, I'm 45 years old and I have a new life. I feel reborn. I'm alive again.
quotes.name: Joe Agnello

quotes.message: I have new life now. I'm refreshed. I'm ready to play and I'm excited.
quotes.name: Jason Higton

quotes.message: I've always had this deep-down conviction that I'm not like everybody else, and there's an amazingly exciting new life waiting for me just around the corner.
quotes.name: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.message: I hope that even in your new life you will continue to be a good member of society while looking after your household.
quotes.name: Empress Michiko

quotes.message: We all have big changes in our lives that are more or less a second chance.
quotes.name: Harrison Ford

quotes.message: If you ever get a second chance in life for something, you've got to go all the way.
quotes.name: Lance Armstrong

quotes.message: God does not patch up the old life,or make certain repairs on the old life;He gives a new life, through the new birth.
quotes.name: Kathryn Kuhlman

quotes.message: Having a second chance makes you want to work even harder.
quotes.name: Tia Mowry

quotes.message: First, I have to thank God for giving me the gift that he did as well as a second chance for a better life.
quotes.name: Oksana Baiul

quotes.message: I was dying but suddenly had a second chance at living.
quotes.name: Shelley Fabares

quotes.message: The beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: You may long for a new life, but need to appreciate the life you currently have, in order to create the life you desire.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: If you don't like the life you've created, you can always create a new life. A life that inspires you.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: Someday this life will end, but for the Christian death also marks a beginning— the beginning of a new life with God that will last forever.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Your new life will last forever because it comes from the eternal, living word of God.
quotes.name: 1 Peter 1:23

quotes.message: Christ can take the most sin-laden, selfish, evil person and bring forgiveness and new life.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: To be always intending to live a new life, but never find time to set about it—this is as if a man should put off eating and drinking from one day to another till he be starved and destroyed.
quotes.name: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.message: Perhaps the most profound miracle of all is living through something we thought would kill us. And not just living, but living abundantly, living effectively, raised from living death to a new life.
quotes.name: Beth Moore

quotes.message: Grace has come from the Lord our God to preserve a remnant for us and give us a stake in His holy place. Even in our slavery, God has given us new life and light to our eyes.
quotes.name: Beth Moore

quotes.message: When a Christian dies, it's not a time to despair, but a time to trust. Just as the seed is buried and the material wrapping decomposes, so our fleshy body will be buried and will decompose. But just as the buried seed sprouts new life, so our body will blossom into a new body.
quotes.name: Max Lucado

quotes.message: Redemption is not a matter of an addition of a spiritual or supernatural dimension to creaturely life that was lacking before; rather, it is a matter of bringing new life and vitality to what was there all along.
quotes.name: Albert Wolters

quotes.message: Betrayal is the only truth that sticks.
quotes.name: Arthur Miller

quotes.message: For there to be betrayal, there would have to have been trust first.
quotes.name: Suzanne Collins

quotes.message: To me, the thing that is worse than death is betrayal. You see, I could conceive death, but I could not conceive betrayal.
quotes.name: Malcolm X

quotes.message: Though those that are betray'd Do feel the treason sharply, yet the traitor Stands in worse case of woe.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: We have to distrust each other. It is our only defense against betrayal.
quotes.name: Tennessee Williams

quotes.message: One should rather die than be betrayed. There is no deceit in death. It delivers precisely what it has promised. Betrayal, though ... betrayal is the willful slaughter of hope.
quotes.name: Steven Deitz

quotes.message: There is no greater blessing than a family hand that lifts you from a fall; but there is not lower curse than a family hand that strikes you when you're down.
quotes.name: Wes Fessler

quotes.message: The thorn from the bush one has planted, nourished and pruned pricks more deeply and draws more blood.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: It's a shame that the very people who you protect are the first ones to turn there backs on you.
quotes.name: Autumn Kohler

quotes.message: t's particularly hard to take being stabbed in the back close to home. There's always a feeling of betrayal when people of your own group oppose you.
quotes.name: Catharine MacKinnon

quotes.message: Trust thy self, and another shall not betray thee.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Passions spin the plot: We are betrayed by what is false within.
quotes.name: George Meredith

quotes.message: Lord, defend me from my friends; I can account for my enemies.
quotes.name: Charles D'Hericault

quotes.message: Be certain that he who has betrayed thee once will betray thee again.
quotes.name: Johann Caspar Lavater

quotes.message: Every betrayal contains a perfect moment, a coin stamped heads or tails with salvation on the other side.
quotes.name: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.message: Anyone who hasn't experienced the ecstasy of betrayal knows nothing about ecstasy at all.
quotes.name: Jean Genet

quotes.message: We have to distrust each other.
quotes.name: Tennessee Williams

quotes.message: It's hard to tell who has your back from who has it long enough just to stab you in it .
quotes.name: Nicole Richie

quotes.message: Love is understood, in a historical way, as one of the great human vocations-but its counterspell has always been infidelity. This terrible, terrible betrayal that can tear apart not only another person, not only oneself, but whole families.
quotes.name: Junot Diaz

quotes.message: In a broken nest there are few whole eggs.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Diaper backward spells repaid. Think about it.
quotes.name: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.message: Relations are simply a tedious pack of people, who haven't got the remotest knowledge of how to live, nor the smallest instinct about when to die.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Betrayal can only happen if you love.
quotes.name: John Le Carre

quotes.message: It was a mistake, you said. But the cruel thing was, it felt like the mistake was mine, for trusting you.
quotes.name: David Levithan

quotes.message: I used to advertise my loyalty and I don't believe there is a single person I loved that I didn't eventually betray.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: etrayal is never easy to handle and there is no right way to accept it.
quotes.name: Christine Feehan

quotes.message: The saddest thing about betrayal is that it never comes from your enemies... It comes from Friends n loved ones.
quotes.name: Ash Sweeney

quotes.message: My love for you was bulletproof but you're the one who shot me.
quotes.name: Pierce The Veil

quotes.message: There must be love, and understanding, to betray. Most men haven't the wit or the honor for betrayal: not to know it when they see it; not the stomach to apprehend it as they do it. Most men, blind and dumb in their self-centeredness, don't betray: they merely disappoint.
quotes.name: Janet Morris

quotes.message: A traumatic experience of love can occur when a child’s experience of love, caring and affection collides with an on-going experience of abuse and betrayal. The union of love, trust and safety becomes fractured, while notions of love and betrayal become linked in tragic partnership.
quotes.name: Jennifer J. Freyd

quotes.message: Betrayal. A form of abandonment. Often the abandonment is difficult to see because the betrayer can be still close, even intimate, or may be intruding in your life. Yet your interests, your well-being is continually sacrificed.
quotes.name: Patrick Carnes

quotes.message: Family can bring us the greatest joy. Family can also bring the great pain not even a stranger can outdo. The painful and disappointing family episodes can bring many of us to our knees wondering how those who claim to love and chanted, 'Blood is thicker than water' treat us with such disdain without remorse.
quotes.name: Clarissa Burton

quotes.message: The worst families are those in which the members never really speak their minds to one another; they maintain an atmosphere of unreality, and everyone always lives in an atmosphere of suppressed ill-feeling.
quotes.name: Walter Bagehot

quotes.message: Far from being the basis of the good society, the family, with its narrow privacy and tawdry secrets, is the source of all our discontents.
quotes.name: Edmund Leach

quotes.message: Family history, of course, has its proper dietary laws. One is supposed to swallow and digest only the permitted parts of it. the halal portions of the past, drained of their redness, their blood.
quotes.name: Salman Rushdie

quotes.message: I detest collaterals. Blood may be thicker than water, but it is also a great deal nastier.
quotes.name: Edith Somerville and Martin Ross

quotes.message: Family! . . . the home of all social evil, a charitable institution for comfortable women, an anchorage for house-fathers, and a hell for children.
quotes.name: August Strindberg

quotes.message: If a man’s character is to be abused, say what you will, there’s nobody like a relation to do the business.
quotes.name: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.message: The first half of our lives is ruined by our parents, the second half by our children.
quotes.name: Clarence Darrow

quotes.message: My Mom said she learned how to swim when someone took her out in the lake and threw her off the boat. I said ‘Mom, they weren't trying to teach you how to swim.
quotes.name: Paula Poundstone

quotes.message: If life is a family, then sin is a feud between family members.
quotes.name: Brian D. McLaren

quotes.message: Do you know what love is?... It is whatever you can still betray.
quotes.name: John Le Carre

quotes.message: To betray, you must first belong. I never belonged.
quotes.name: Kim Philby

quotes.message: The Family is a petty despotism; . . . a school in which men learn to despise women and women to mistrust men (much more than is necessary); a slaughterhouse for children (the firstborn succumbing to unskilled treatment, the lastborn to neglect) . . . Unfortunately, we cannot as yet do without it; and therefore we put a good face on the matter by conferring upon it the conventional attribute of sacredness, and impudently proclaiming it the source of all the virtues it has well-nigh killed in us.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: The number one reason people fail in life is because they listen to their friends, family, and neighbors.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Sometimes the people closest to you betray you, and your home isn’t a place you can be happy anymore. It’s hard, but it’s true.
quotes.name: P.C. Cast

quotes.message: Everyone suffers at least one bad betrayal in their lifetime. It’s what unites us. The trick is not to let it destroy your trust in others when that happens. Don’t let them take that from you.
quotes.name: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.message: Only those you trust can betray you.
quotes.name: Terry Goodkind

quotes.message: One should rather die than be betrayed. There is no deceit in death. It delivers precisely what it has promised. Betrayal, though, is the willful slaughter of hope.
quotes.name: Steven Deitz

quotes.message: You can't keep snakes in your backyard and expect them only to bite your neighbors. You know, eventually those snakes are going to turn on whoever has them in the backyard.
quotes.name: Hillary Rodham Clinton

quotes.message: If you're very good, tomorrow night I'll tell you the story of emperor Claudius who was betrayed by those closest to him, by his own blood. They whispered in dark corners and went out late at night and conspired and conspired but the emperor Claudius knew they were up to something. He knew they were busy little bees. And one night he sat down with one of them and he looked at her and he said, 'Tell me what you've been doing busy little bee or I shall strike down those dearest to you. You shall watch as I bathe in their blood.' And the emperor was heartbroken. The little bee had wounded him more deeply than anyone else could ever have done.
quotes.name: Commodus

quotes.message: If you're very good, tomorrow night I'll tell you the story of emperor Claudius who was betrayed by those closest to him, by his own blood. They whispered in dark corners and went out late at night and conspired and conspired but the emperor Claudius knew they were up to something. He knew they were busy little bees. And one night he sat down with one of them and he looked at her and he said, 'Tell me what you've been doing busy little bee or I shall strike down those dearest to you. You shall watch as I bathe in their blood.' And the emperor was heartbroken. The little bee had wounded him more deeply than anyone else could ever have done.
quotes.name: Commodus

quotes.message: If you're very good, tomorrow night I'll tell you the story of emperor Claudius who was betrayed by those closest to him, by his own blood. They whispered in dark corners and went out late at night and conspired and conspired but the emperor Claudius knew they were up to something. He knew they were busy little bees. And one night he sat down with one of them and he looked at her and he said, 'Tell me what you've been doing busy little bee or I shall strike down those dearest to you. You shall watch as I bathe in their blood.' And the emperor was heartbroken. The little bee had wounded him more deeply than anyone else could ever have done.
quotes.name: Commodus

quotes.message: There's one [traitor] in every family sire. Two in mine, actually. And they always manage to ruin special occasions.
quotes.name: Zazu [about Scar]

quotes.message: Fredo, you're my older brother, and I love you. But don't ever take sides with anyone against the Family again. Ever.
quotes.name: Michael Corleone

quotes.message: I, uh, betrayed my wife. I betrayed myself. I've killed men, and I ordered men to be killed. No, it's useless. I killed... I ordered the death of my brother; he injured me. I killed my mother's son. I killed my father's son.
quotes.name: Michael Corleone

quotes.message: When you stop expecting people to be perfect, you can like them for who they are.
quotes.name: Donald Miller

quotes.message: The quality of our expectations determines the quality of our action.
quotes.name: A. Godin

quotes.message: High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation.
quotes.name: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.message: Peace begins When expectation ends.
quotes.name: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.message: So the secret to good self-esteem is to lower your expectations to the point where they're already met?
quotes.name: Bill Watterson

quotes.message: A life that is burdened with expectations is a heavy life. Its fruit is sorrow and disappointment.
quotes.name: Douglas Adams

quotes.message: Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: Expect everything so that nothing comes unexpected.
quotes.name: Norton Juster

quotes.message: Unhappiness lies in that gap between our talents and our expectations.
quotes.name: Sebastian Horsley

quotes.message: I'm not in this world to live up to your expectations and you're not in this world to live up to mine.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: You can't expect everyone to have the same dedication as you.
quotes.name: Jeff Kinney

quotes.message: Expectations were like fine pottery. The harder you held them, the more likely they were to crack.
quotes.name: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.message: That was the thing about the world: it wasn't that things were harder than you thought they were going to be, it was that they were hard in ways that you didn't expect.
quotes.name: Lev Grossman

quotes.message: You don't ask nobody to give what they can't give, or be what they can't be. You've learnt that, you got a headstart on heartbreak.
quotes.name: Jack Farris

quotes.message: Expectation is the mother of all frustration.
quotes.name: Antonio Banderas

quotes.message: We must rediscover the distinction between hope and expectation.
quotes.name: Ivan Illich

quotes.message: Carry out a random act of kindness, with no expectation of reward, safe in the knowledge that one day someone might do the same for you.
quotes.name: Princess Diana

quotes.message: There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something tomorrow.
quotes.name: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.message: We love to expect, and when expectation is either disappointed or gratified, we want to be again expecting.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: If you do not the expect the unexpected you will not find it, for it is not to be reached by search or trail.
quotes.name: Heraclitus

quotes.message: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: We find what we expect to find, and we receive what we ask for.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Good is not good, when better is expected.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: It's a funny thing about life: if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: Anger always comes from frustrated expectations
quotes.name: Elliott Larson

quotes.message: We must learn to reawaken and keep ourselves awake, not by mechanical aid, but by an infinite expectation of the dawn.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: The best things in life are unexpected - because there were no expectations.
quotes.name: Eli Khamarov

quotes.message: The expectations of life depend upon diligence; the mechanic that would perfect his work must first sharpen his tools.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Don't lower your expectations to meet your performance. Raise your level of performance to meet your expectations. Expect the best of yourself, and then do what is necessary to make it a reality.
quotes.name: Ralph Marston

quotes.message: When we put down ideas of what life should be like, we are free to wholeheartedly say yes to our life as it is.
quotes.name: Tara Brach

quotes.message: Do what you can with what you have where you are.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: The problem is not that there are problems. The problem is expecting otherwise and thinking that having problems is a problem.
quotes.name: Theodore Rubin

quotes.message: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: If we did the things we are capable of, we would astound ourselves.
quotes.name: Thomas Alva Edison

quotes.message: Where there is love there are no demands, no expectations, no dependency. I do not demand that you make me happy; my happiness does not lie in you.
quotes.name: Anthony De Mello

quotes.message: Creating perfection will also create expectations for the future
quotes.name: Rick Helders

quotes.message: Expect much from yourself and little from others and you will avoid incurring resentments.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: The universe constantly and obediently answers to our conceptions; whether we travel fast or slow, the track is laid for us.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: I did what I came here to do. What I've done I've done with sincerity and to the best of my ability. You can't expect much more from life.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Expect to have hope rekindled. Expect your prayers to be answered in wondrous ways. The dry seasons in life do not last. The spring rains will come again.
quotes.name: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.message: Do everything with a mind that lets go. Do not expect praise or reward.
quotes.name: Achaan Chah

quotes.message: You have to take risks.We will only understand the miracle of life fully when we allow the unexpected to happen.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: To be brave is to love someone unconditionally, without expecting anything in return. To just give. That takes courage, because we don't want to fall on our faces or leave ourselves open to hurt.
quotes.name: Madonna

quotes.message: Every human being is entitled to courtesy and consideration. Constructive criticism is not only to be expected but sought.
quotes.name: Margaret Chase Smith

quotes.message: If you align expectations with reality, you will never be disappointed.
quotes.name: Terrell Owens

quotes.message: You can't base your life on other people's expectations.
quotes.name: Stevie Wonder

quotes.message: Whatever happens in the world is real, what one thinks should have happened is projection. We suffer more from our fictitious illusion and expectations of reality.
quotes.name: Jacque Fresco

quotes.message: We don't want people to have expectations of us, but then we have expectations of everybody else.
quotes.name: Lauryn Hill

quotes.message: There's a victory in letting go of your expectations.
quotes.name: Mike White

quotes.message: Our expectations are our standards imposed upon someone else.
quotes.name: Xandria Ooi

quotes.message: Expectations manifest when we impose our standards on the people around us. We often do this with good intentions—we genuinely believe that the person should adopt what we believe because it's a better standard compared to theirs.
quotes.name: Xandria Ooi

quotes.message: Expectations almost always carry the concept of 'should' in our minds, which brings with it furious thoughts of unfairness and indignation.
quotes.name: Xandria Ooi

quotes.message: Without expectations, we see someone for who they are— in all their flawed imperfection—without judgment.
quotes.name: Xandria Ooi

quotes.message: Expectations lead to resentment and resentment always leads to judgment.
quotes.name: Xandria Ooi

quotes.message: A man who lives with expectations is bound to feel frustrated because existence has no obligation to you. But if you live without intentions, without expectations, then miraculously you will find that everything you ever dreamed of is being fulfilled.
quotes.name: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.message: The real thing is that you are suffering from your expectations. When they are not fulfilled-frustration arises, failure arises, and you feel neglected as if existence does not care for you.
quotes.name: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.message: High expectations can lead to great disappointments.
quotes.name: Alfred Henry

quotes.message: Expectations have so long and so often been combated by disappointment that I feel myself unhappy, my spirits which were naturally cheerful are depressed and the enjoyments of life are growing very insipid to me.
quotes.name: Abigail Adams

quotes.message: One month of daily expectation is more tedious than a year of certainty.
quotes.name: Abigail Adams

quotes.message: I indicated no wish or purpose of my own;I simply expressed my expectation. Cannot the judge perceive the distinction between a purpose and an expectation? I have often expressed an expectation to die but I have never expressed a wish to die.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Remaining trapped in the world of preferences we are led to an expectation of how things should be. When our expectation of how things should be conflicts with how things are, there is dukkha, suffering.
quotes.name: Mu Soeng

quotes.message: Soldiers! Your country has a right to expect great things from you. Justify her expectations!...All, when they return home, would wish to say proudly, 'I was with the victorious Army of Italy.
quotes.name: Napoleon

quotes.message: In meditation, don't expect anything. Just sit back and see what happens. Treat the whole thing as an experiment. Take an active interest in the test itself, but don't get distracted by your expectations about the results. For that matter, don't be anxious for any result whatsoever.
quotes.name: Bhante Henepola Gunaratana

quotes.message: Your life is colored by your expectations.
quotes.name: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.message: You don't like being rejected, but your expectations were minimum and your patience maximum.
quotes.name: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.message: Victory in a great cause is measured not only by reaching the final goal. It is also a triumph to live up to expectations in your lifetime.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: If our expectations—if our fondest prayers and dreams— are not realized, then we should all bear in mind that the greatest glory of living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time you fall.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: The knowledge that in your day you did your duty, and lived up to the expectations of your fellow men is in itself a rewarding experience and magnificent achievement.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: Make the expectations lively enough, and action will follow.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: It was only when you started to insatiably expect; . that every stranger on the street would wholeheartedly smile; . altruistically enshroud each dreary aspect of your beleaguered existence with unprecedented happiness, . That it terribly hurt you; when he unsparingly abused you; . excoriating you apart like inconspicuously frigid shit; . for ostensibly no reason or plausible rhyme; instead.
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: If you spent your life concentrating on what everyone else thought of you, would you forget who you really were? What if the face you showed the world turned out to be a mask...
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: Treat a man as he is and he will remain as he is. Treat a man as he can and should be and he will become as he can and should be.
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: To wish was to hope, and to hope was to expect.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: What I have since realized is that if people expect you to be brave, sometimes you pretend that you are, even when you are frightened down to your very bones.
quotes.name: Sharon Creech

quotes.message: There were two ways to be happy: improve your reality or lower your expectations.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: A wonderful gift may not be wrapped as you expect.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: I hope you do not let anyone else’s expectations direct the course of your life.
quotes.name: Julianne Donaldson

quotes.message: I'd rather be pleasantly surprised than fatally disappointed.
quotes.name: Julia Glass

quotes.message: Expectation wasn't just about what people expected of you. It was about what you expected of yourself.
quotes.name: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.message: We always blame the woman when a man falls in love, as though no man had the courage of his inclinations.
quotes.name: Samuel Taylor

quotes.message: Morality is what the queen expects from the hive, not from herself.
quotes.name: Marty Rubin

quotes.message: It is forbidden to kill; therefore all murderers are punished unless they kill in large numbers and to the sound of trumpets.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: When I kiss a girl for a part, people think it's sexy. But if two guys kiss, suddenly there's a backlash. It's a double standard.
quotes.name: Olivia Wilde

quotes.message: People cant handle the truth unless you speak to them with a mirror.
quotes.name: Lakia Echols

quotes.message: Leaders scan the future so it can be free of doubts and fear. They do so by not living a double standard life in the present.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: In relation to a writer, most readers believe in the Double Standard: they may be unfaithful to him as often as they like, but he must never, never be unfaithful to them.
quotes.name: W. H. Auden

quotes.message: We have a double standard, which is to say, a man can show how much he cares by being violent see, he's jealous, he cares a woman shows how much she cares by how much she's willing to be hurt; by how much she will take; how much she will endure; how suicidal she's prepared to be.
quotes.name: Andrea Dworkin

quotes.message: I think we cannot have a double standard. We cannot see our art as different from the reality. We cannot use two different sets of judgment.
quotes.name: Ai Weiwei

quotes.message: There's a double standard between writers and readers. Readers can be unfaithful to writers anytime they like, but writers must never ever be unfaithful to the readers.
quotes.name: Peter Schjeldahl

quotes.message: A politician is a man who will double cross that bridge when he comes to it.
quotes.name: Oscar Levant

quotes.message: The double standard of morality will survive in this world so long as the woman whose husband has been lured away is favoured with the sympathetic tears of other women, and a man whose wife has made off is laughed at by other men.
quotes.name: H. L. Mencken

quotes.message: We cannot use a double standard for measuring our own and other people's policies. Our demands for democratic practices in other lands will be no more effective than the guarantees of those practiced in our own country.
quotes.name: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.message: It's a double standard. They say these management guys are so valuable. They are not. This is typical corporate greed.
quotes.name: Bobby De Pace

quotes.message: It's true that in Cuba there are double standards, there's opportunism, and there is a lack of freedom in some ways.
quotes.name: Fernando Perez

quotes.message: Apparently when it's two people, it's quirky and funny, but when it's a person doing the same stuff on her own, it's rebellious and antisocial.
quotes.name: Katie Alender

quotes.message: I will not calm down! Women are allowed to get angrier than men about double standards.
quotes.name: Liz

quotes.message: Once you've lived the inside-out world of espionage, you never shed it. It's a mentality, a double standard of existence.
quotes.name: John Le Carre

quotes.message: There's definitely a whole double standard. I don't understand it. A guy can be sexy and good looking, and it totally just enhances his credibility as an athlete.
quotes.name: Lolo Jones

quotes.message: There's been a decline in the double standard. That's why you're seeing more of these cases.
quotes.name: David Finkelhor

quotes.message: It is vain to expect virtue from women till they are in some degree independent of men.
quotes.name: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.message: I think there will always be a double standard between males and females, so I think that an actress is more likely to protect her public persona, so to speak, than an actor would be.
quotes.name: Mila Kunis

quotes.message: It's very clear that there's a lot of double standards going on. Should there be a 30mph speed limit? Of course there bloody should. And certainly with kids and school food, kids need to be nannied for sure. So give them a bloody good meal at school.
quotes.name: Jamie Oliver

quotes.message: There is this double standard. The losses are larger in other areas of the tax code, but somehow a different standard gets applied to this.
quotes.name: Robert Greenstein

quotes.message: I hate to hear you talk about all women as if they were fine ladies instead of rational creatures. None of us want to be in calm waters all our lives.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: History is filled with double standards: a man who uses a woman is colored an ass, yet a woman who uses a man is hailed as resourceful.
quotes.name: Ken Poirot

quotes.message: Let's not have a double standard. One standard will do just fine.
quotes.name: George Carlin

quotes.message: There is a double-standard. And quite often if you're from Africa, if you're from a developing country, you'll be executed. There aren't that many people protesting or making a big fuss.
quotes.name: Dick Atkins

quotes.message: There is no real wealth but the labor of man.
quotes.name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.message: Labor is man's greatest function. He is nothing, he can do nothing, he can achieve nothing, he can fulfill nothing, without working.
quotes.name: Orville Dewey

quotes.message: Labor is still, and ever will be, the inevitable price set upon everything which is valuable.
quotes.name: Samuel Smiles

quotes.message: For as labor cannot produce without the use of land, the denial of the equal right to the use of land is necessarily the denial of the labor to its own produce.
quotes.name: Henry George

quotes.message: Labor can not stand still. It must not retreat. It must go on, or go under.
quotes.name: Harry Bridges

quotes.message: It is labor alone that is productive: it creates wealth and therewith lays the outward foundations for the inward flowering of man.
quotes.name: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.message: Labor rids us of three great evils poverty, vice, and boredom.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Labor wants pride and joy in doing good work, a sense of making or doing something beautiful or useful to be treated with dignity and respect as brother and sister.
quotes.name: Thorstein Veblen

quotes.message: A man is not idle because he is absorbed in thought. There is a visible labor and there is an invisible labor.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: He who labors diligently need never despair; for all things are accomplished by diligence and labor.
quotes.name: Menander

quotes.message: Labor is the source of all wealth and all culture.
quotes.name: Ferdinand Lassalle

quotes.message: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: All labor that uplifts humanity has dignity and importance and should be undertaken with painstaking excellence.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: Labor is prior to, and independent of, capital. Capital is only the fruit of labor, and could never have existed if labor had not first existed. Labor is the superior of capital, and deserves much the higher consideration.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: People might not get all that they work for in this world, but they must certainly work for all that they get.
quotes.name: Frederick Douglass

quotes.message: Not all the labor of the earth Is done by hardened hands.
quotes.name: Will Carleton

quotes.message: Labor can and will become its own employer through co-operative association.
quotes.name: Leland Stanford

quotes.message: Labor is the only prayer that nature answers.
quotes.name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.message: Labor disgraces no man; unfortunately, you occasionally find men who disgrace labor.
quotes.name: Ulysses S. Grant

quotes.message: Labor is the instituted means for the methodical development of all our powers under the direction and control of the will
quotes.name: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quotes.message: Labor never quits. We never give up the fight no matter how tough the odds, no matter how long it takes.
quotes.name: George Meany

quotes.message: Before the reward there must be labor. You plant before you harvest. You sow in tears before you reap joy.
quotes.name: Ralph Ransom

quotes.message: As labor creates the wealth of the country, we demand the passage of such laws as may be necessary to protect it in all its rights.
quotes.name: John Peter Altgeld

quotes.message: Labor is the fruit of civilization, not the basis of it.
quotes.name: Alexander Crummell

quotes.message: Labor is the curse of the world, and nobody can meddle with it without becoming proportionately brutalized.
quotes.name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.message: It is only by labor that thought can be made healthy, and only by thought that labor can be happy; and the two cannot be separated with impunity.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: Labor is today the most vital and potential power this planet has ever known, and its historic mission is as certain of ultimate realization as is the setting of the sun.
quotes.name: Eugene V. Debs

quotes.message: Labor gives birth to ideas.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Labor is the fabled magician's wand, the philosophers stone, and the cap of good fortune.
quotes.name: James Weldon Johnson

quotes.message: Ignorance more frequently begets confidence than does knowledge: it is those who know little, not those who know much, who so positively assert that this or that problem will never be solved by science.
quotes.name: Charles Darwin

quotes.message: Ignorance deprives people of freedom because they do not know what alternatives there are. It is impossible to choose to do what one has never heard of.
quotes.name: Ralph B. Perry

quotes.message: Beware of false knowledge; it is more dangerous than ignorance.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Ignorance is always afraid of change.
quotes.name: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.message: To remove ignorance is an important branch of benevolence.
quotes.name: Ann Plato

quotes.message: Ignorance, the root and stem of all evil.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: If ignorance is bliss, there should be more happy people.
quotes.name: Victor Cousin

quotes.message: The only victories which leave no regret are those which are gained over ignorance.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: Better be ignorant of a matter than half know it.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: I am not ashamed to confess I am ignorant of what I do not know.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: Where ignorance is our master, there is no possibility of real peace.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: The highest form of ignorance is when you reject something you don't know anything about.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Ignorance breeds monsters to fill up the vacancies of the soul that are unoccupied by the verities of knowledge.
quotes.name: Horace Mann

quotes.message: Ignorance is preferable to error; and he is less remote from the truth who believes nothing, than he who believes what is wrong.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Most ignorance is evincible ignorance. We don't know because we don't want to know.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: Ignorance is like a delicate fruit; touch it, and the bloom is gone.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Ignorance is never out of style. It was in fashion yesterday, it is the rage today and it will set the pace tomorrow.
quotes.name: Frank Dane

quotes.message: Ignorance is not innocence, but sin.
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: Ignorance is the night of the mind, but a night without moon or star.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Ignorance speaks loudly, so as to be heard; but its volume proves reason to doubt every word.
quotes.name: Wes Fessler

quotes.message: The recipe for perpetual ignorance is: Be satisfied with your opinions and content with your knowledge.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Ignorance is the dominion of absurdity.
