quotes.message: American football makes rugby look like a Tupperware party.
quotes.name: Sue Lawley

quotes.message: The tactical difference between Association Football and Rugby with its varieties seems to be that in the former the ball is the missile, in the latter men are the missiles.
quotes.name: Alfred E. Crawley

quotes.message: Let's face it, you have to have a slightly recessive gene that has a little something to do with the brain to go out on the football field and beat your head against other human beings on a daily basis.
quotes.name: Tim Green

quotes.message: You have to play this game like somebody just hit your mother with a two-by-four.
quotes.name: Dan Birdwell

quotes.message: As concerning football, I protest unto you that it may rather be called a friendly kind of fight than a play or recreation - a bloody and murdering practise than a fellowly sport or pastime.
quotes.name: Philip Stubbes quotes

quotes.message: What's the toughest thing in a professional football game? Well, it's being the mother of the quarterback.
quotes.name: John Madden

quotes.message: Football is a game played with arms, legs and shoulders but mostly from the neck up.
quotes.name: Knute Rockne

quotes.message: To play this game (football) you must have fire in you, and there is nothing that strokes fire like hate.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: In life, as in football, you won't go far unless you know where the goalposts are.
quotes.name: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.message: At the base of it was the urge, if you wanted to play football, to knock someone down, that was what the sport was all about, the will to win closely linked with contact.
quotes.name: George Plimpton

quotes.message: College football is a sport that bears the same relation to education that bullfighting does to agriculture.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Football fans share a universal language that cuts across many cultures and many personality types. A serious football fan is never alone. We are legion, and football is often the only thing we have in common.
quotes.name: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.message: The essence of football was blocking, tackling, and execution based on timing, rhythm and deception.
quotes.name: Knute Rockne

quotes.message: Anyone who's just driven 90 yards against huge men trying to kill them has earned the right to do Jazz hands.
quotes.name: Craig Ferguson

quotes.message: In football everything is complicated by the presence of the opposite team.
quotes.name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.message: Football combines two of the worst things in American life. It is violence punctuated by committee meetings.
quotes.name: George F. Will

quotes.message: Football is a simple game based on the giving and taking of passes, of controlling the ball and of making yourself available to receive a pass. It is terribly simple.
quotes.name: Bill Shankly

quotes.message: Anybody who watches three games of football in a row should be declared brain dead.
quotes.name: Erma Bombeck

quotes.message: Football is all very well as a game for rough girls, but is hardly suitable for delicate boys.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Some people think football is a matter of life and death. I assure you, it's much more serious than that.
quotes.name: Bill Shankly

quotes.message: Football is the ballet of the masses.
quotes.name: Dmitri Shostakovich

quotes.message: If you have not seen it, FOOTBALL is a game in which men shove one another back and forth for no reason. They do not choose how, when, or whom they shove. They are doing this in order to please one angry old man on the sidelines. This old man is called the 'coach' or 'yelling surrogate' dad who will never be happy.
quotes.name: John Hodgman

quotes.message: The employee is regarded by the employer merely in the light of his value as an operative. His productive capacity alone is taken into account.
quotes.name: Leland Stanford

quotes.message: Employee engagement is an investment we make for the privilege of staying in business.
quotes.name: Ian Hutchinson

quotes.message: Resources are hired to give results, not reasons.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Employees who are controlled cannot respond caringly, you need superior knowledge and real leadership, not management. Because of this we specifically developed a selection process for leaders; we don't hire managers.
quotes.name: Horst Schulze

quotes.message: Employee of the month is a good example of how somebody can be both a winner and a loser at the same time.
quotes.name: Demetri Martin

quotes.message: Employee fathers need to step up to the plate and put their family needs on the table.
quotes.name: James Levine

quotes.message: Every employee must be essential to the functions of the organization.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Employers have gone away from the idea that an employee is a long-term asset to the company, someone to be nurtured and developed, to a new notion that they are disposable.
quotes.name: Barbara Ehrenreich

quotes.message: People want to know they matter and they want to be treated as people. That's the new talent contract.
quotes.name: Pamela Stroko

quotes.message: Your work is to discover your work and then with all your heart to give yourself to it.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: The way your employees feel is the way your customers will feel. And if your employees don't feel valued, neither will your customers.
quotes.name: Sybil F. Stershic

quotes.message: If we consistently exceed the expectations of employees, they will consistently exceed the expectations of our customers.
quotes.name: Shep Hyken

quotes.message: Employment was invented to make education seem useful.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: Motivating employees to work at their full potential is the main premise of successful management.
quotes.name: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.message: The five steps in teaching an employee new skills are preparation, explanation, showing, observation and supervision.
quotes.name: Bruce Barton

quotes.message: Employees who believe that management is concerned about them as a whole person - not just an employee - are more productive, more satisfied, more fulfilled. Satisfied employees mean satisfied customers, which leads to profitability.
quotes.name: Anne M. Mulcahy

quotes.message: Most employees are smarter than their employers. All employers are braver than their employees.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: Understanding your employee's perspective can go a long way towards increasing productivity and happiness.
quotes.name: Kathryn Minshew

quotes.message: If you fulfill the wishes of your employees, the employees will fulfill your visions.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Every employee, not just the senior people, should know how a company is doing.
quotes.name: Jack Welch

quotes.message: Employee participation programs and employee ownership are important efforts to deal with powerlessness at work.
quotes.name: Daniel Yankelovich

quotes.message: Your assets are your employees. Invest more on those performing well. Let the non performers go.
quotes.name: Manoj Arora

quotes.message: A great employee is like a four leaf clover, hard to find and lucky to have.
quotes.name: Tammy Cohen

quotes.message: Employees who don't feel significant rarely make significant contributions.
quotes.name: Mark Sanborn

quotes.message: You cannot love an employee into creativity, although you can avoid his dissatisfactions with the way you treat him.
quotes.name: Frederick Herzberg

quotes.message: For employee success, loyalty and integrity are equally as important as ability.
quotes.name: Harry F. Banks

quotes.message: Realize that employees and the customers both have to be engaged, at the same time, to move your business forward for sustainable success.
quotes.name: Robert G. Thompson

quotes.message: One mistake employees do is to work for the employers' success at their own expense.
quotes.name: John Muhaise Bikalemesa

quotes.message: An employee's motivation is a direct result of the sum of interactions with his or her manager.
quotes.name: Bob Nelson

quotes.message: Treat employees like partners, and they act like partners.
quotes.name: Fred Allen

quotes.message: Every employee can affect your company's brand, not just the front-line employees that are paid to talk to your customers.
quotes.name: Tony Hsieh

quotes.message: Being an employee is a bad outcome. You want to avoid that. Being an employee is never a good outcome. That's just an opinion.
quotes.name: Kevin O'Leary

quotes.message: An injury is much sooner forgotten than an insult.
quotes.name: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.message: If a man's character is to be abused, say what you will, there's nobody like a relation to do the business.
quotes.name: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.message: Use, do not abuse; neither abstinence nor excess ever renders man happy.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: The greater the power, the more dangerous the abuse.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: Let us not forget who we are. Drug abuse is a repudiation of everything America is.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: The million little things that drop into your hands, The small opportunities each day brings, He leaves us free to use or abuse, And goes unchanging along His silent way.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: Adversity has the effect of eliciting talents, which in prosperous circumstances would have lain dormant.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: Liberty may be endangered by the abuse of liberty, but also by the abuse of power.
quotes.name: James Madison

quotes.message: Whipping and abuse are like laudanum: you have to double the dose as the sensibilities decline.
quotes.name: Harriet Elizabeth Beecher Stowe

quotes.message: Abuse of words has been the great instrument of sophistry and chicanery, of party, faction, and division of society.
quotes.name: John Adams

quotes.message: If the cruelties of slavery could not stop us, the opposition we now surely fail. . . . Because the goal of America is freedom, abused and scorned tho' we may be, our destiny is tied up with America's destiny.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King

quotes.message: Books are the best of things, well used; abused, among the worst. What is the right use? What is the one end, which all means go to effect? They are for nothing but to inspire.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Maturity is achieved when a person accepts life as full of tension.
quotes.name: Joshua Loth Liebman

quotes.message: Maturity is a high price to pay for growing up.
quotes.name: Tom Stoppard

quotes.message: Maturity is achieved when a person postpones immediate pleasures for long-term values.
quotes.name: Joshua Loth Liebman

quotes.message: Maturity is the ability to think, speak and act your feelings within the bounds of dignity. The measure of your maturity is how spiritual you become during the midst of your frustrations.
quotes.name: Samuel Ullman

quotes.message: Maturity is knowing when to be immature.
quotes.name: Randall Hall

quotes.message: Maturity is the ability to reap without apology and not complain when things don't go well.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Maturity begins to grow when you can sense your concern for others outweighing your concern for yourself.
quotes.name: John MacNaughton

quotes.message: Maturity is the capacity to endure uncertainty.
quotes.name: John Huston Finley

quotes.message: Maturity: Be able to stick with a job until it is finished. Be able to bear an injustice without having to get even. Be able to carry money without spending it. Do your duty without being supervised.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: Maturity includes the recognition that no one is going to see anything in us that we don't see in ourselves. Stop waiting for a producer. Produce yourself.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: To make mistakes is human; to stumble is commonplace; to be able to laugh at yourself is maturity.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: I believe the sign of maturity is accepting deferred gratification.
quotes.name: Peggy Cahn

quotes.message: Maturity consists in no longer being taken in by oneself.
quotes.name: Kajetan Von Schlaggenberg

quotes.message: Maturity starts with the willingness to give oneself.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.message: I guess real maturity, which most of us never achieve, is when you realize that you're not the center of the universe.
quotes.name: Katherine Paterson

quotes.message: Age is just a number. Maturity is a choice.
quotes.name: Harry Styles

quotes.message: Maturity is not when we start speaking big things. It is when we start understanding small things..
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: A person's maturity consists in having found again the seriousness one had as a child, at play.
quotes.name: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.message: Age is no guarantee of maturity.
quotes.name: Lawana Blackwell

quotes.message: Maturity comes not with age but with the acceptance of responsibility.
quotes.name: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.message: Maturity is often more absurd than youth and very frequently is most unjust to youth.
quotes.name: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.message: Maturity, one discovers, has everything to do with the acceptance of not knowing.
quotes.name: Mark Z. Danielewski

quotes.message: Maturity is when your world opens up and you realize that you are not the center of it.
quotes.name: M.J. Croan

quotes.message: Youth ends when egotism does; maturity begins when one lives for others.
quotes.name: Hermann Hesse

quotes.message: Maturity is the moment one regains one's innocence.
quotes.name: Marty Rubin

quotes.message: Maturity is so often considered to be synonymous with 'adult. But I truly feel that maturity may be defined by the ability to be both an adult and a child.
quotes.name: Gina Marinello

quotes.message: Maturity is only a short break in adolescence.
quotes.name: Jules Feiffer

quotes.message: Youth condemns; maturity condones.
quotes.name: Amy Lowell

quotes.message: Age' is the acceptance of a term of years. But maturity is the glory of years.
quotes.name: Martha Graham

quotes.message: Maturity is the time of life when, if you had the time, you'd have the time of your life.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: A mark of maturity seems to be the range and extent of one's feeling of self-involvement in abstract ideals.
quotes.name: Gordon Wallport

quotes.message: Maturity implies otherness... The art of living is the art of living with.
quotes.name: Julius Gordon

quotes.message: I would say that the surest measure of a man's or a woman's maturity is the harmony, style, joy, and dignity he creates in his marriage, and the pleasure and inspiration he provides for his spouse.
quotes.name: Benjamin Spock

quotes.message: Maturity is developed by respecting others and accepting responsibility for violating that respect.
quotes.name: Wes Fessler

quotes.message: Maturity is a bitter disappointment for which no remedy exists, unless laughter can be said to remedy anything.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: I think part of maturity is knowing who you are.
quotes.name: Rob Lowe

quotes.message: Maturity is to face, and not evade, every fresh crisis that comes.
quotes.name: Fritz Kunkel

quotes.message: Maturity is when we can treat ourselves in our own way rather than within the automatic ways of our parents in childhood.
quotes.name: Hugh Missildine

quotes.message: Maturity is having the ability to escape categorization.
quotes.name: K. Rexroth

quotes.message: Maturity begins the day you take responsibility for your own feelings.
quotes.name: Kevin Everett Fitzmaurice

quotes.message: Maturity comes when keeping a secret gives you more satisfaction than passing it along.
quotes.name: John M. Henry

quotes.message: Maturity is the art of living in peace with that which we cannot change.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: One sign of maturity is knowing when to ask for help.
quotes.name: Dennis Wholey

quotes.message: That's maturity-when you realize that you've finally arrived at a state of ignorance as profound as your parents.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Peters

quotes.message: Maturity begins when you feel you are right about something without feeling the need to prove someone else wrong.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: It takes a long time to bring excellence to maturity.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: Maturity is the ability to discern the ignorant without discussing them.
quotes.name: Vikrant Parsai

quotes.message: The awareness of the ambiguity of one's highest achievements (as well as one's deepest failures) is a definite symptom of maturity.
quotes.name: Paul Johannes Tillich

quotes.message: Maturity, one discovers, has everything to do with the acceptance of ‘not knowing.
quotes.name: Mark Z. Danielewski

quotes.message: The willingness to forgive is a sign of spiritual and emotional maturity.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: Maturity has nothing to do with age.
quotes.name: Abhaidev

quotes.message: Maturity means seeing the differences, but realizing they don’t matter. There’s no technological shortcut.
quotes.name: Ted Chiang

quotes.message: While maturity may bring you wisdom and strength, it is the playful, curious child in you that makes the world magic, that makes a life enchanting and worth living at all.
quotes.name: Beau Taplin

quotes.message: At some point, we have to own our choices.
quotes.name: Tommy Tomlinson

quotes.message: Maturity becomes a goal, and progress becomes movement towards a goal.
quotes.name: Burrhus Frederic Skinner

quotes.message: Maturity comes only through non-violence, love, and all-inclusiveness.
quotes.name: Amit Ray

quotes.message: On the day I reach maturity and feel the need like leaves to leave the tree. To show the world the colours that are me rejoice in all the beauty that you see.
quotes.name: Elaine C. George

quotes.message: On the life-long journey to maturity, where mirrors do not tell lies.
quotes.name: Sonia Walker

quotes.message: Its appearance at maturity puristically flamboyant, mighty storm winds strike it with rebellious force.
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: Inch by inch grows the child till maturity's prime.
quotes.name: Eliza Cook

quotes.message: The frost of winter and the summer storm. All bow it down; rarely the blossom comes. To full maturity; but there is nought.
quotes.name: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.message: A man is not mature unless he gets a certificate of maturity from a woman.
quotes.name: Abhaidev

quotes.message: Maturity is knowing everybody has their own perception and they are right when we see them from their perspective.
quotes.name: Giridhar Alwar

quotes.message: Maturity is the ability to live fully and equally in multiple contexts; most especially, the ability, despite our grief and losses, to courageously inhabit the past the present and the future all at once.
quotes.name: David Whyte

quotes.message: Maturity is the ability to live fully and equally in multiple contexts; most especially, the ability, despite our grief and losses, to courageously inhabit the past the present and the future all at once.
quotes.name: David Whyte

quotes.message: The wisdom that comes from maturity is recognised through a disciplined refusal to choose between or isolate three powerful dynamics that form human identity: what has happened, what only looks as if it is happening now, and what is about to occur.
quotes.name: David Whyte

quotes.message: Maturity is not a static arrived platform, a golden epoch from where life is viewed from a calm, untouched oasis of wisdom, but the dissolution of living elemental frontiers between what has happened, what is happening now, and the consequences of our passt; first imagined anew, and then lived into the waiting future.
quotes.name: David Whyte

quotes.message: Maturity is the time when these tidal forces meet and break apart our life, making one life out of our regrets, our self-compassion, and our forgiveness forged into a future made real by a radical change in our behaviour.
quotes.name: David Whyte

quotes.message: Maturity is the breakdown of elemental frontiers, between different epochs of our life, between life and death, between the part of us that has been a fine, upstanding citizen and the darker, helpless parts of us that have caused harm and damage.
quotes.name: David Whyte

quotes.message: Real maturity can only be sustained by real silence, by a daily discipline of silence and an inhabitation of spaciousness, a foundational giving away.
quotes.name: David Whyte

quotes.message: Maturity is the discipline of giving up and giving away, to see what is left and what is real.
quotes.name: David Whyte

quotes.message: Maturity calls us to risk ourselves as much as we did in our immaturity, but for a bigger picture, a larger horizon; for a powerfully generous outward incarnation of our inward qualities and not for gains that make us smaller, even in the winning.
quotes.name: David Whyte

quotes.message: Maturity beckons also, asking us to be larger, more fluid, more elemental, less cornered, less unilateral; a living, conversational intuition between the inherited story, the one we are privileged to inhabit, and the one - if we are large enough and broad enough, moveable enough and, even, here enough - just, astonishingly, about to occur.
quotes.name: David Whyte

quotes.message: Maturity is not directly proportional to age.
quotes.name: Olaotan Fawehinmi

quotes.message: Maturity means the understanding to be decisive on your own.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Maturity is coming, you are gaining your innocence again.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: There is a great difference between maturity and aging, a vast difference, and people always remain confused about it.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Maturity is an inner growth.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Maturity is something that you bring to your life-it comes out of awareness.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Aging plus awareness, experiencing plus awareness, is maturity.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Maturity has not decided that he will not be angry again, no-that is the sign of a man who is not getting mature.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: A man of maturity never decides for the future, the maturity itself takes care.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Maturity means gaining your lost innocence again, reclaiming your paradise, becoming a child again.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Maturity is a rebirth, a spiritual birth.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Maturity is the ultimate flowering of meditation.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Going beyond thoughts and feelings and becoming a pure isness is maturity.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Maturity has nothing to do with your life experiences. It has something to do with your inward journey, your experiences of the inner.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Maturity has a fragrance. It gives tremendous beauty to the individual.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Maturity is that you no longer innocent, that you have ripened through life experiences, that you cannot be cheated easily, that you cannot be exploited, that you have within you something like a solid rock, a protection, a security.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Maturity of spirit is touching your inner sky.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Maturity is meant that you have come home.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Salary stories are intrusive.
quotes.name: Nicole Kidman

quotes.message: The salary of the chief executive of a large corporation is not a market award for achievement. It is frequently in the nature of a warm personal gesture by the individual to himself.
quotes.name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.message: It's not your salary that makes you rich, it's your spending habits.
quotes.name: Charles Jaffe

quotes.message: Try to save something while your salary is small; it's impossible to save after you begin to earn more.
quotes.name: Jack Benny

quotes.message: A salary does not make a person rich, but only gives him the opportunity to take care of hisneeds. It is not a means of becoming wealthy. It is a means of fulfilling our potential.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: The only way to make real wealth is to get rid of your salary. In a salary, by definition, you are creating wealth for others, and you are creating a chain and handcuffs for yourself.
quotes.name: James Altucher

quotes.message: The reason that man is seldom satisfied with his salary is that when it increases, he increases his expenses.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: To work for salary is to mortgage your life.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: Salary is the price you pay to compromise on your dreams.
quotes.name: Nitya Prakash

quotes.message: A salary is a tax employers pay, every four weeks, for putting an employee’s dream on hold.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: Paying good wages is not charity at all-it is the best kind of business.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Wages are determined by the bitter struggle between capitalist and worker.
quotes.name: Karl Marx

quotes.message: The best of wages will not compensate for excessively long working hours which undermine heath.
quotes.name: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.message: Wages cannot be considered as a gift, because they are due to work, but God has given free grace to all men by the justification of faith.
quotes.name: Hilary of Poitiers

quotes.message: A day’s pay for a day’s work is more than adequate when both the work and the pay are appreciated as much as they are expected.
quotes.name: Cullen Hightower

quotes.message: Money and salary is not a particularly good motivator in the long term.
quotes.name: Matt Mullenweg

quotes.message: It is my belief that one's salary is between an individual and the IRS.
quotes.name: Jessica Savitch

quotes.message: Salary matters shouldn't be told to everyone. It's a matter of respect for my teammates.
quotes.name: Carlos Tevez

quotes.message: Anybody who makes an outlandish salary obviously attracts attention.
quotes.name: Jerry Buss

quotes.message: The three most harmful addictions are heroin, carbohydrates, and a monthly salary.
quotes.name: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.message: Obscene salaries send the wrong message through a company.
quotes.name: James Sinegal

quotes.message: Salaries and wages must reflect the reality of the enterprise's economic performance; deviations from the planned performance should be reflected in pay.
quotes.name: Samora Machel

quotes.message: Salary is no object: I want only enough to keep body and soul apart.
quotes.name: Dorothy Parker

quotes.message: The fact that somebody is reducing your salary is just telling me they're not satisfied with what you're doing.
quotes.name: Joe Torre

quotes.message: The first commitment is raise your salary. One of the ways to raise your salary sometimes is to have short-term profits but there are many other ways.
quotes.name: Noam Chomsky

quotes.message: Job and salary is the greatest slavery you can ever set upon yourself.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: It stands to reason: Higher wages means higher loyalty and morale, which means higher productivity, which means a more profitable business.
quotes.name: Tom Perez

quotes.message: You pay more in wages, get more in in tax, you get people living a higher standard, you get more money. It's a kind of circle.
quotes.name: Jeremy Corbyn

quotes.message: Paying good wages is not in opposition to good productivity.
quotes.name: James Sinegal

quotes.message: If a rise in wages does not raise prices, a fall will not reduce them.
quotes.name: Joan Robinson

quotes.message: The higher the wages the fewer the jobs; the lower the wages the more the jobs.
quotes.name: James Cook

quotes.message: All wages are based primarily on productive power. Anything else would be charity.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Wages ought not to be insufficient to support a frugal and well-behaved wage-earner.
quotes.name: Pope Leo XIII

quotes.message: Good wages are pro business, since they reduce turnover, increase morale, produce better-skilled employees, and improve productivity.
quotes.name: Jim Hightower

quotes.message: A day of travelling will bring a basketful of learning.
quotes.name: Vietnamese

quotes.message: Brains are better than brawn.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Everyone is ignorant only on different subjects.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Instead of seeking new landscapes, develop new eyes.
quotes.name: Marcel Proust

quotes.message: Knowledge is more than equivalent to force.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Learning is better than house and land.
quotes.name: David Garrick

quotes.message: People learn more on their own rather than being force fed.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Presumption first blinds a man, then sets him a running.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The shoe knows if the stocking has a hole.
quotes.name: Bahamian

quotes.message: What signifies knowing the names, if you know not the natures of things.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: When the pupil is ready, the teacher will come.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Wit is the only wall between us and the dark.
quotes.name: Mark Van Doren

quotes.message: With time even a bear can learn to dance.
quotes.name: Yiddish

quotes.message: Distance lends enchantment to the view.
quotes.name: Thomas Campbell

quotes.message: Doubt is the key to knowledge.
quotes.name: Iranian

quotes.message: Example is the best precept.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: It is better to be born a beggar than a fool.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: It is better to be the head of a chicken than the rear of an ox.
quotes.name: Japanese

quotes.message: Knowledge is power.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Mistakes are doorways to discovery.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Put two and two together.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: What good is running when you're on the wrong road.
quotes.name: German

quotes.message: When you're sad, learn something,
quotes.name: Merlin

quotes.message: Memorizing, guessing, looking at pictures, predicting, substituting, and skipping, are not reading; they are very bad habits.
quotes.name: Phyllis Schlafly

quotes.message: To cure worry, spend fifteen minutes daily filling your mind full of God. Worry is just a very bad mental habit. You can change any habit with God's help.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Habits begin to form at the very first repetition. After that there is a tropism toward repetition, for the patterns involved are defenses , bulwarks against time and despair.
quotes.name: Kim Stanley

quotes.message: These various habits of thought, or habitual expressions of life, are all phases of the single life sequence of the individual; therefore a habit formed in response to a given stimulus will necessarily affect the character of the response made to other stimuli. A modification of human nature at any one point is a modification of human nature as a whole.
quotes.name: Thorstein Veblen

quotes.message: An unfortunate thing about this world is that the good habits are much easier to give up than the bad ones.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: Habits begin as offhanded remarks, ideas and images. And then, layer upon layer, through practice, they grow from cobwebs into cables that shackle or strengthen our lives.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Habit must play a larger place in our religious life. We worship when we feel like it, we pray when we feel like it. We read the Bible when we feel like it. Leaving our religious exercises to the promptings of impulse, we become creatures of impulse rather than soldiers of Christ. An army made up of creatures of impulse would be only a mob. So is a church.
quotes.name: Ralph Washington Sockman

quotes.message: Life becomes a habit. You get up, dress, eat, go tae work, clock in etcetera etcetera automatically, and think about nothing but the pay packet on Friday and the booze-up last Saturday. Life's easy when you're a robot.
quotes.name: Alasdair Gray

quotes.message: Habit is the most imperious of all masters.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Good habits are hard to develop but easy to live with; bad habits are easy to develop but hard to live with. The habits you have and the habits that have you will determine almost everything you achieve or fail to achieve.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Repetition of the same thought or physical action develops into a habit which, repeated frequently enough, becomes an automatic reflex.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Be careful what you choose to do consciously, for unless your will is very strong, that is what you may have to do repeatedly and compulsively through the habit-influencing power of the subconscious mind.
quotes.name: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.message: The only habits you never conquer are the ones you put off doing something about.
quotes.name: Wess Roberts

quotes.message: Habit is a man's sole comfort. We dislike doing without even unpleasant things to which we have become accustomed.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Evil habits, in which men indulge, are the chief cause of disease in the physical as well as the mental state.
quotes.name: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.message: Habit is a second nature which prevents us from knowing the first, of which it has neither the cruelties nor the enchantments.
quotes.name: Marcel Proust

quotes.message: Your behavior is based on your beliefs, and what you do and say, over and over again, helps develop your habits.
quotes.name: Darren Johnson

quotes.message: Habit is thus the enormous flywheel of society, its most precious conservative agent. It alone is what keeps us all within the bounds of ordinance, and saves the children of fortune from the envious uprisings of the poor.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: Habit gives endurance, and fatigue is the best night cap.
quotes.name: Jamaica Kincaid

quotes.message: Habit is the beneficent harness of routine which enables silly men to live respectfully and unhappy men to live calmly.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Habit is habit, and not to be flung out of the window by any man, but coaxed down-stairs one step at a time.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Habits are to the soul what the veins and arteries are to the blood, the courses in which it moves.
quotes.name: Horace Bushnell

quotes.message: The wise say that our failure is to form habits: for habit is the mark of a stereotyped world.
quotes.name: A.C. Grayling

quotes.message: Habits are like the wrinkles on a man's brow; if you will smooth out the one, I will smooth out the other.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Success is not a sometimes thing. In other words, you don't do what is right once in awhile, but all the time. Success is a habit. Winning is a habit.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Practice hope. As hopefulness becomes a habit, you can achieve a permanently happy spirit.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Basically, morphic fields are fields of habit, and they've been set up through habits of thought, through habits of activity, and through habits of speech. Most of our culture is habitual.
quotes.name: Rupert Sheldrake

quotes.message: Successful people form habits that feed their success, instead of habits that feed their failure.
quotes.name: Jeff Olson

quotes.message: If you want to change your art, change your habits.
quotes.name: Clement Greenberg

quotes.message: Habit is the cement of society, the comfort of life, and, alas! The root of error.
quotes.name: Fulke Greville

quotes.message: Habit: The great economizer of energy.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Habits are where our lives and careers and bodies are made.
quotes.name: Seth Godin

quotes.message: Habits, soft and pliant at first, are like some coral stones, which are easily cut when first quarried, but soon become hard as adamant.
quotes.name: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.message: Creativity is a habit, and the best creativity is a result of good work habits.
quotes.name: Twyla Tharp

quotes.message: Good habits are the key to all success. Bad habits are the unlocked door to failure.
quotes.name: Og Mandino

quotes.message: To make anything a habit, do it; to not make it a habit, do not do it; to unmake a habit, do something else in place of it.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Habit and routine have an unbelievable power to waste and destroy.
quotes.name: Henri de Lubac

quotes.message: I believe you can never change a habit, or create one, with a word or a piece of chalk. You can talk all day, put all sorts of diagrams on the board, but a habit is not going to change. It's a conditional reflex, created by a repetitive act.
quotes.name: Pete Newell

quotes.message: Do something everyday that you don't want to do; this is the golden rule for acquiring the habit of doing your duty without pain.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: To change a habit, make a conscious decision, then act out the new behavior.
quotes.name: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.message: Sometimes, the hardest habit to break is the habit of doing nothing beyond the necessary.
quotes.name: Mira Grant

quotes.message: Positive thinking is a habit, like everything else, you get better at it with time.
quotes.name: Alexander Gustafsson

quotes.message: Ancient Rule of Twenty-one: if you do anything for twenty-one days in a row, it will be installed as a habit.
quotes.name: Robin S

quotes.message: A habit is good if it helps you achieve your goal; it is bad if it hinders your achievement.
quotes.name: Douglas Merrill

quotes.message: A habit is something you can do without thinking - which is why most of us have so many of them.
quotes.name: Frank A. Clark

quotes.message: You are what you do repeatedly every day. If excellence is something you're striving for, then it's not an accident. It's a habit.
quotes.name: Greg Plitt

quotes.message: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.name: Jim Ryun

quotes.message: The habit of virtue cannot be formed in a closet. Habits are formed by acts of reason in a persevering struggle through temptation.
quotes.name: Bernard Gilpin

quotes.message: The successful person makes a habit of doing what the failing person doesn't like to do.
quotes.name: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.message: The beginning of love is a horror of emptiness.
quotes.name: Robert Bly

quotes.message: I am empty of everything. I am empty of everything but the thin, frail ghosts in my room.
quotes.name: Jean Rhys

quotes.message: A sad soul needs an infinite horizon which can throw all his sorrow into the silence of the eternal emptiness!
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: Become totally empty. Quiet the restlessness of the mind. Only then will you witness everything unfolding from emptiness.
quotes.name: Laozi

quotes.message: You are not feeling empty because you don't have much money. You are feeling empty because you have not yet encountered your real self, you have not come to your authentic individuality.
quotes.name: Rajneesh

quotes.message: There are so many empty people walking around on this little planet. Lonely people. Angry people. Bitter. Forgotten.
quotes.name: Jeyn Roberts

quotes.message: I swear, I end up feeling empty, like you've taken something out of me and I have to search my body for scars.
quotes.name: Richard Siken

quotes.message: But what I did sense was an emptiness like a black hole inside of him, and there was no predicting what might emerge from a place like that.
quotes.name: Ryū Murakami

quotes.message: Every word is like an unnecessary stain on silence and nothingness.
quotes.name: Samuel Beckett

quotes.message: It is beautiful, it is endless, it is full and yet seems empty. It hurts us.
quotes.name: Jackson Pearce

quotes.message: We become aware of the void as we fill it.
quotes.name: Antonio Porchia

quotes.message: The artist's job is not to succumb to despair but to find an antidote for the emptiness of existence.
quotes.name: Woody Allen

quotes.message: Life is an empty bottle filled with love.
quotes.name: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.message: Emptiness which is conceptually liable to be mistaken for sheer nothingness is in fact the reservoir of infinite possibilities.
quotes.name: D.T. Suzuki

quotes.message: One must know oneself. If this does not serve to discover truth, it at least serves as a rule of life and there is nothing better.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: But to me nothing, the negative, the empty, is exceedingly powerful.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: When I feel truly alone, with a sense of being lost, even empty inside, it is then I realize I have unknowingly moved away from God, so I move back.
quotes.name: David L. Weatherford

quotes.message: There is no such thing as an empty space or an empty time. There is always something to see, something to hear. In fact, try as we may to make a silence, we cannot.
quotes.name: John Cage

quotes.message: The more space and emptiness you can create in yourself, then you can let the rest of the world come in and fill you up.
quotes.name: Jeff Bridges

quotes.message: I decided I would fill the emptiness in me with God and with paint.
quotes.name: Kimberly Novosel

quotes.message: This was the truth at the core of my existence: this yawning emptiness, scantily clad in rage.
quotes.name: Hillary Jordan

quotes.message: The greatest tragedies in life is not untimely death, but to live a life for emptiness.
quotes.name: Topsy Gift

quotes.message: The funny thing about having all this so-called success is that behind it is a certain horrible emptiness.
quotes.name: Sam Shepard

quotes.message: The rest of my life stretches out as an emptiness before me.
quotes.name: Kazuo Ishiguro

quotes.message: There's just something obvious about emptiness, even when you try to convince yourself otherwise.
quotes.name: Sarah Dessen

quotes.message: This world that I live in is empty and cold the loneliness cuts me and tortures my soul.
quotes.name: Waylon Jennings

quotes.message: It's not the feeling of completeness I need, but the feeling of not being empty.
quotes.name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.message: Everyday we used to slip away to talk. We would talk about the goodness of your heart. Now it seems I admit that never exist at all and it leaves me feeling empty with this hollow chord.
quotes.name: Regina Belle

quotes.message: In all our searching, the only thing we've found that makes the emptiness bearable is each other.
quotes.name: Carl Sagan

quotes.message: Emptiness is not a great loss. It creates a great opportunity to fill yourself again and again with great love.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: Illusion is needed to disguise the emptiness within.
quotes.name: Arthur Erickson

quotes.message: If giving leaves you feeling empty, you're giving too much to the wrong person.
quotes.name: Maza Dohta

quotes.message: Bowed by the weight of centuries he leans upon his hoe and gazes on the ground, the emptiness of ages in his face, and on his back the burden of the world.
quotes.name: Edwin Markham

quotes.message: I said nothing for a time, just ran my fingertips along the edge of the human-shaped emptiness that had been left inside me.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: The void inside me starts to fill, but my heart has holes, and whatever it holds will run out, leaving me empty once again.
quotes.name: Danielle Esplin

quotes.message: I felt myself being invaded through and through, I crumbled, disintegrated, and only emptiness remained.
quotes.name: Stanislaw Lem

quotes.message: This will be a winter so desolate, only memory can fill the emptiness.
quotes.name: John Geddes

quotes.message: You can only fit so many words in a postcard, only so many in a phone call, only so many into space before you forget that words are sometimes used for things other than filling emptiness.
quotes.name: Sarah Kay

quotes.message: The inner emptiness is the door to God.
quotes.name: Swami Dhyan Giten

quotes.message: If emptiness is endless, then everything rests in emptiness.
quotes.name: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.message: To fake it is to stand guard over emptiness.
quotes.name: Arthur Herzog

quotes.message: Nothingness not being nothing, nothingness being emptiness.
quotes.name: Isabelle Adjani

quotes.message: Nothing has an unlikely quality. It is heavy.
quotes.name: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.message: What had been quiet and restful was now silent and empty.
quotes.name: Frederick Barthelme

quotes.message: We often feel proud of our knowledge even when it is filled with emptiness.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: A busy life is filled with tremendous emptiness.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: Life is empty and meaningless because life is empty and meaningless.
quotes.name: Werner Erhard

quotes.message: When you're full of yourself, God can't fill you. But when you empty yourself, God has a useful vessel.
quotes.name: Max Lucado

quotes.message: Depression isn't just being a bit sad. It's feeling nothing. It's not wanting to be alive anymore.
quotes.name: J. K. Rowling

quotes.message: Now that I've won a slam, I know something very few people on earth are permitted to know. A win doesn't feel as good as a loss feels bad, and the good feeling doesn't last long as the bad. Not even close.
quotes.name: Andre Agassi

quotes.message: Communication without clarity is noise. Speak with purpose and you’ll propel your audience to take massive action towards a journey of self-improvement.
quotes.name: Farshad Asl

quotes.message: When speaking publicly, it is wise to communicate mindfully in the presence of silent listening eyes...
quotes.name: Tracey Bond

quotes.message: Engaging in lifelong learning to improve your public speaking skills is far from drudgery. It can lead to a better job, higher profits, more donations, and public policy objectives. That sounds like fun to me.
quotes.name: Ed Barks

quotes.message: Fear of public speaking can include fear of forgetting your words, fear of being judged, fear of difficult questions or all of these
quotes.name: Ibrahim Mustapha

quotes.message: A good speech has ripple effect. Charisma makes it last.
quotes.name: Martin Uzochukwu Ugwu

quotes.message: Public speaking is the art of diluting a two-minute idea with a two-hour vocabulary.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: No audience ever complained about a presentation or speech being too short.
quotes.name: Stephen Keague

quotes.message: Speakers who talk about what life has taught them never fail to keep the attention of their listeners.
quotes.name: Dale Carneige

quotes.message: There are always three speeches, for every one you actually gave. The one you practiced, the one you gave, and the one you wish you gave.
quotes.name: Dale Carneige

quotes.message: Make sure you have finished speaking before your audience has finished listening.
quotes.name: Dorothy Sarnoff

quotes.message: A talk is a voyage. It must be charted. The speaker who starts nowhere, usually gets there.
quotes.name: Dale Carneige

quotes.message: Public Speaking is a skill that can be studied, polished, perfected. Not only can you get good at it, you can get damn good at it and it makes a heck of a difference.
quotes.name: Tom Peters

quotes.message: Whenever people have trouble public speaking, it's because they are just thinking about themselves.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: With public speaking, practicing congruence is very helpful - allowing the words to be expressed with the face and body. It helps to think of simply 'turning up the nonverbal volume.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: Visualize yourself giving the entire speech as a controlled, confident speaker.
quotes.name: Ibrahim Mustapha

quotes.message: If you preach in public, you should be aware that you give your speech that can be compelling to your audiences that presents a good purpose for your presence in front of your bystanders at the right place and time.
quotes.name: Saaif Alam

quotes.message: Thinking in loneliness and speaking in public are the two things leaders are masters at.
quotes.name: Vikrmn

quotes.message: In presentations or speeches less really is more
quotes.name: Stephen Keague

quotes.message: People think actresses find public speaking easy, and it's not easy at all; we're used to hiding behind masks.

quotes.message: Good public speaking is based on good private thinking
quotes.name: Scott Berkun

quotes.message: More men feel comfortable doing 'public speaking,' while more women feel comfortable doing 'private' speaking.
quotes.name: Deborah Tannen

quotes.message: Ah, the first rule of public speaking -- always start with a joke.
quotes.name: Jon Stewart

quotes.message: I try not to borrow, first you borrow then you beg.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: You don't have to be like most people around you, because most people never become truly rich and wealthy.
quotes.name: Manoj Arora

quotes.message: Too many people spend money they earned to buy things they don't want to impress people that they don't like.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: Money never made a man happy yet, nor will it. The more a man has, the more he wants. Instead of filling a vacuum, it makes one.

quotes.message: Our incomes are like our shoes; if too small, they gall and pinch us; but if too large, they cause us to stumble and to trip.

quotes.message: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
quotes.name: Phillip Fisher

quotes.message: Invest in yourself. Your career is the engine of your wealth.
quotes.name: Paul Clitheroe

quotes.message: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: There can be no rise in the value of labour without a fall of profits.
quotes.name: David Ricardo

quotes.message: Your net worth to the world is usually determined by what remains after your bad habits are subtracted from your good ones.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: What we really want to do is what we are really meant to do. When we do what we are meant to do, money comes to us, doors open for us, we feel useful, and the work we do feels like play to us.
quotes.name: Julia Cameron

quotes.message: It's good to have money and the things that money can buy, but it's good, too, to check up once in a while and make sure that you haven't lost the things that money can't buy.
quotes.name: George Horace Lorimer

quotes.message: You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you.
quotes.name: Dave Ramsey

quotes.message: Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that.

quotes.message: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.

quotes.message: Try to save something while your salary is small; it's impossible to save after you begin to earn more.
quotes.name: Jack Benny

quotes.message: Never spend your money before you have it.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: The individual investor should act consistently as an investor and not as a speculator.
quotes.name: Ben Graham

quotes.message: A big part of financial freedom is having your heart and mind free from worry about the what-ifs of life.
quotes.name: Suze Orman

quotes.message: All money is a matter of belief.
quotes.name: Adam Smith

quotes.message: I would not pre-pay. I would invest instead and let the investments cover it.
quotes.name: Dave Ramsey

quotes.message: Money is a good servant but a bad master.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Every once in a while, the market does something so stupid it takes your breath away.
quotes.name: Jim Cramer

quotes.message: Finance is critical. If sufficient investment is made in infrastructure and venture capital is made available, there will be a big improvement in the situation.
quotes.name: Sanjay Kumar

quotes.message: The avoidance of taxes is the only intellectual pursuit that still carries any reward.
quotes.name: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.message: Many people take no care of their money till they come nearly to the end of it, and others do just the same with their time.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: I made my money the old-fashioned way. I was very nice to a wealthy relative right before he died.

quotes.message: Personal finances are like people's personal health, crucial and tragic to the sufferer but tedious to the listener.
quotes.name: Thomas Keneally

quotes.message: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: I will tell you how to become rich. Close the doors. Be fearful when others are greedy. Be greedy when others are fearful.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Financial peace isn't the acquisition of stuff. It's learning to live on less than you make, so you can give money back and have money to invest. You can't win until you do this.
quotes.name: Dave Ramsey

quotes.message: Every time you borrow money, you're robbing your future self.
quotes.name: Nathan W. Morris

quotes.message: I finally know what distinguishes man from the other beasts: financial worries.
quotes.name: Jules Renard

quotes.message: The first rule in making money is not to lose it.
quotes.name: Steven J. Lee

quotes.message: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Wide diversification is only required when investors do not understand what they are doing.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Price ain't merely about numbers. It's a satisfying sacrifice.

quotes.message: Thou shalt not forget that money is only money and not character or fame.
quotes.name: Steven J. Lee

quotes.message: A budget tells us what we can't afford, but it doesn't keep us from buying it.
quotes.name: William Feather

quotes.message: In investing, what is comfortable is rarely profitable.
quotes.name: Robert Arnott

quotes.message: Money often costs too much.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: There is more dementia about finance than there is about sex.
quotes.name: Charlie Munger

quotes.message: By and large, I don't think too much of finance professors. It is a field with witchcraft.
quotes.name: Charlie Munger

quotes.message: Where you have complexity, by nature you can have fraud and mistakes...This will always be true of financial companies, including ones that run by governments. If you want accurate numbers from financial companies, you're in the wrong world.
quotes.name: Charlie Munger

quotes.message: There exists today an overwhelming consensus on the need to wrest from the grip of terrorists the funding they rely upon to finance their violence.
quotes.name: Paul Martin

quotes.message: If merely looking up past financial data would tell you what the future holds, The Forbes 400 would consist of librarians.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: If you can actually count your money, then you are not really a rich man.
quotes.name: J. Paul Getty

quotes.message: It is wonderful to think how men of very large estates not only spend their yearly income but are often actually in want of money. It is clear, they have not valued for what they spend.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: When it comes to finances, remember that there are no withholding taxes on the wages of sin.
quotes.name: Mae West

quotes.message: Money is a poor man's credit card.
quotes.name: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.message: Money-lust has always existed, but not in the history of the world was it ever a craze, a madness, until your time and mine.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: A dollar picked up in the road is more satisfaction to you than the ninety-and-nine which you had to work for, and money won at faro or in stock snuggles into your heart in the same way.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: A holding company is the people you give your money to while you are being searched.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Profit is part of the mechanism by which society decides what it wants to see produced.
quotes.name: Henry C. Wallich

quotes.message: A bank is a financial institution from which you can borrow money as long as you can provide sufficient evidence to show you don't need it.
quotes.name: Sally Poplin

quotes.message: If you owe the bank $100, that's your problem. If you owe the bank $100 million, that's the bank's problem.
quotes.name: J. Paul Getty

quotes.message: Money frees you from doing things you dislike. Since I dislike doing nearly everything, money is handy.
quotes.name: Groucho Marx

quotes.message: Money is good for bribing yourself through the inconveniences of life.
quotes.name: Gottfried Reinhardt

quotes.message: Without money, it is difficult to enjoy your wealth.
quotes.name: Remco Campert

quotes.message: The way to become rich is to make money, not to save it.
quotes.name: Kate Chopin

quotes.message: If you want to make money, go where the money is.
quotes.name: Joseph P. Kennedy

quotes.message: The dollar will never fall as low as some people will do to get it.
quotes.name: Alfred E. Neuman

quotes.message: The dollar will never fall as low as some people will do to get it.
quotes.name: Alfred E. Neuman

quotes.message: Lack of money is no obstacle, lack of idea is an obstacle.
quotes.name: Ken Hakuta

quotes.message: Rich or poor, it's good to have money.
quotes.name: Sid Lance

quotes.message: Give a beggar a dime and he'll bless you. Give him a dollar and he'll curse you for withholding the rest of your fortune.
quotes.name: Anzia Yezierska

quotes.message: Money will come to you when you are doing the right thing.
quotes.name: Michael Philips

quotes.message: Politics don't control the world, money does.
quotes.name: Andrew Young

quotes.message: While many believe that only the wealthy have economic power, all of us have the power to spend our money where we choose, whether we're making a million-dollar purchase or buying a box of detergent.
quotes.name: Camille Cosby

quotes.message: If possible honestly, if not, somehow make money.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: Always try and rub up against money long enough, some of it may rub off on you.
quotes.name: Damon Runyon

quotes.message: Money is better than poverty, if only for financial reasons.
quotes.name: Woody Alllen

quotes.message: Be sincere; be brief; be seated.
quotes.name: Franklin D Roosevelt

quotes.message: Whatever advice you give, be brief.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: A short saying often contains much wisdom.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: If I am to speak ten minutes, I need a week for preparation; if fifteen minutes, three days; if half an hour, two days; if an hour, I am ready now.
quotes.name: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.message: It is my ambition to say in ten sentences what other men say in whole books - what other men do not say in whole books.
quotes.name: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.message: The most valuable of all talents is that of never using two words when one will do.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: The present letter is a very long one, simply because I had no leisure to make it shorter.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: Brevity is the soul of lingerie.
quotes.name: Dorothy Parker

quotes.message: Let thy speech be short, comprehending much in few words.
quotes.name: The Bible

quotes.message: There's a great power in words, if you don't hitch too many of them together.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: The fewer the words, the better the prayer.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Brevity is a great charm of eloquence.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: The tragedy of old age is not that one is old, but that one is young.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Do not try to live forever, you will not succeed.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: The wiser mind mourns less for what age takes away than what it leaves behind.
quotes.name: William Wordsworth

quotes.message: The glory of the elderly is their insight to life.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: The old are in a second childhood.
quotes.name: Aristophanes

quotes.message: Never tease an old dog; he might have one bite left.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: Nature gives you the face you have at twenty; it is up to you to merit the face you have at fifty.
quotes.name: Coco Chanel

quotes.message: Age should not have its face lifted, but it should rather teach the world to admire wrinkles as the etchings of experience and the firm line of character.
quotes.name: Ralph B. Perry

quotes.message: You can only perceive real beauty in a person as they get older.
quotes.name: Anouk Aimee

quotes.message: Old age is ready to undertake tasks that youth shirked because they would take too long.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: It doesn't behoove elderly persons to follow fashion in their thinking nor in the way they dress.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Old age hath yet his honour and his toil.
quotes.name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.message: The way the elderly are treated, and in some cases warehoused and medicated, rather than nurtured and listened to, is distressing.
quotes.name: Bill Nighy

quotes.message: Old age is the most unexpected of all the things that can happen to a man.
quotes.name: Leon Trotsky

quotes.message: The elderly have so much to offer. They're our link with history.
quotes.name: John Cusack

quotes.message: He thought that the world would make more rapid progress without the burden of old people.
quotes.name: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.message: You can live to be a hundred if you give up all the things that make you want to live to be a hundred.
quotes.name: Woody Allen

quotes.message: Live your life and forget your age.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Youth cannot know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young.
quotes.name: J. K. Rowling

quotes.message: As we grow older, we must discipline ourselves to continue expanding, broadening, learning, keeping out minds active and open.
quotes.name: Clint Eastwood

quotes.message: You are as young as your faith, as old as your doubt; as young as your self-confidence, as old as your fear; as young as your hope, as old as your despair.
quotes.name: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.message: None are so old as those who have outlived enthusiasm.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: One of the things you realize about gettin older is that not everybody is goin to get older with you.
quotes.name: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.message: They only name things after you when you're dead or really old.
quotes.name: George H. W. Bush

quotes.message: To know how to grow old is the master work of wisdom, and one of the most difficult chapters in the great art of living.
quotes.name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.message: By the time you're eighty years old you've learned everything. You only have to remember it.
quotes.name: George Burns

quotes.message: We are not limited by our old ages; we are liberated by it.
quotes.name: Stu Mittleman

quotes.message: About the only thing that comes without effort is old age.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: By the time you're eighty years old you've learned everything. You only have to remember it.
quotes.name: Bill Vaughan

quotes.message: Age is a matter of feeling, not of years.
quotes.name: George William Curtis

quotes.message: Getting older was definitely preferable to an up close and personal meeting with the Grim Reaper.
quotes.name: JoAnn Ross

quotes.message: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
quotes.name: Betty Friedan

quotes.message: You don't have a little time for your elderly parents. Most of you ignore and even forget your parents.
quotes.name: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.message: For, in spite of our whiskers, we elderly friskers are kiddies the most of our time.
quotes.name: Clarence Michael James Stanislaus Dennis

quotes.message: By the side of a murmuring stream, an elderly gentleman sat. On the top of his head was a wig, and a-top of his wig was his hat.
quotes.name: George Canning

quotes.message: I would prioritise an Elderly Person that needs to be looked after.
quotes.name: Rob Hopkin

quotes.message: The elderly are often isolated, voiceless, powerlessness. The elderly are often more trusting.
quotes.name: Neil Edwards

quotes.message: A little respect for the elderly.
quotes.name: Guy Andrews

quotes.message: Language sound very strange to elderly ears.
quotes.name: George Callahan

quotes.message: Well, despite our elderliness, some things remain from our youth.
quotes.name: Liz W. Garcia

quotes.message: Caring for an elderly parent, that's a - that's an awesome responsibility.
quotes.name: Gary David Goldberg

quotes.message: It is a culture's duty to take care of it's elderly.
quotes.name: Theodore Melfi

quotes.message: You two need to learn some respect for the elderly. And I'm gonna teach you.
quotes.name: Haim Saban

quotes.message: Love, care and treasure the elderly people in the society.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Economics exists to make astrology look respectable.
quotes.name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.message: Economics is too important to leave to the economists.
quotes.name: Steve Keen

quotes.message: Economics is haunted by more fallacies than any other study known to man.
quotes.name: Henry Hazlitt

quotes.message: The point of studying economics is so as not to be fooled by economists.
quotes.name: Joan Robinson

quotes.message: Economics make homeopath and alternative healers look empirical and scientific.
quotes.name: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.message: Economics is like gravity: Ignore it and you will be in for some rude surprises.
quotes.name: Charles Wheelan

quotes.message: Economics limps along with one foot in untested hypotheses and the other in untestable slogans.
quotes.name: Joan Robinson

quotes.message: Economics teaches humility because it teaches us more about what we can't do than what we can do
quotes.name: Peter Boettke

quotes.message: Economics was the only profession where a person could be considered an expert without having once been right.
quotes.name: George Meany

quotes.message: Good economics is good politics.
quotes.name: Paul Keating

quotes.message: Economics is not a morality play.
quotes.name: Paul Krugman

quotes.message: Economics is a very dangerous science.
quotes.name: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.message: Good environmentalism is good economics.
quotes.name: Barber Conable

quotes.message: Economics is really politics in disguise.
quotes.name: Hazel Henderson

quotes.message: In human life, economics precedes politics or culture.
quotes.name: Park Geun-hye

quotes.message: Economics is a subject that does not greatly respect one's wishes.
quotes.name: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.message: Economics is concerned with what emerges, not what anyone intended.
quotes.name: Thomas Sowell

quotes.message: Economics is extremely useful as a form of employment for economists.
quotes.name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.message: Economics is a slave-driver. No one has free time; no one has any leisure.
quotes.name: James Hillman

quotes.message: There is no such thing as economics, only social science applied to economic problems.
quotes.name: Kenneth E. Boulding

quotes.message: Economics dominates politics - and with that domination comes different forms of ruthlessness.
quotes.name: Chris Hedges

quotes.message: Economics becomes redundant if it can rationalise an exchange that sells the future of humankind.
quotes.name: Andrew Simms

quotes.message: Economics is not about things and tangible material objects; it is about men, their meanings and actions.
quotes.name: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.message: Economics that hurt the moral well-being of an individual or a nation are immoral and, therefore, sinful.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Economics brings into view that conflict of choice is one of the permanent characteristics of human existence.
quotes.name: Lionel Robbins

quotes.message: Existing economics is a theoretical system which floats in the air and which bears little relation to what happens in the real world.
quotes.name: Ronald Coase

quotes.message: Economics has many substantive areas of knowledge where there is agreement, but also contains areas of controversy. That's inescapable.
quotes.name: Ben Bernanke

quotes.message: Economics is a strange science. Our subject deals with some of the most important as well as mundane issues that impinge on the human condition.
quotes.name: Dale T. Mortensen

quotes.message: Economics has been called the dismal science. Once you get to understand it, you may not find it so dismal, but you don't find it much of a science either.
quotes.name: Jean Chretien

quotes.message: If you want to forget something or someone, never hate it, or never hate him.her. Everything and everyone that you hate is engraved upon your heart; if you want to let go of something, if you want to forget, you cannot hate.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: Renew, release, let go. Yesterday's gone. There's nothing you can do to bring it back. You can't should've done something. You can only DO something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: I realise there's something incredibly honest about trees in winter, how they're experts at letting things go.
quotes.name: Jeffrey McDaniel

quotes.message: Think about any attachments that are depleting your emotional reserves. Consider letting them go.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: You can't reach for anything new if your hands are still full of yesterday's junk.
quotes.name: Louise Smith

quotes.message: Rather than wasting time on yesterday that is gone, it is better to invest your time in tomorrow that is not yet born.
quotes.name: RVM

quotes.message: People have an annoying habit of remembering things they shouldn't.
quotes.name: Christopher Paolini

quotes.message: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: The past is behind, learn from it. The future is ahead, prepare for it. The present is here, live it.

quotes.message: Forgive, forget. Bear with the faults of others as you would have them bear with yours.

quotes.message: By forgetting the past and by throwing myself into other interests, I forget to worry.

quotes.message: I don't live in the past at all; I'm always wanting to do something new. I make a point of constantly trying to forget and get things out of my mind.

quotes.message: Letting go and forgetting the past is easier said than done, but never use the past as an excuse to not care about your future.

quotes.message: I don't believe in forgetting the past, Because it's always going to be a part of my life.

quotes.message: Moving on isn't forgetting the past, it's learning from it.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Never forget the past, and hold no regrets for the mistakes you've made. forgetting the pastcan cause you to make the same mistakes again.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Sometimes you have to forget what's gone, appreciate what still remains, and look forward to what's coming next.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The only thing a person can ever really do is keep moving forward. Take that big leap forward without hesitation, without once looking back. Simply forget the past and forge toward the future.

quotes.message: I think the secret to a happy life is a selective memory. Remember what you are most grateful for and quickly forget what your not.

quotes.message: The sadness in your heart is a yesterday you can no longer see, so put it behind you and walk always forward.

quotes.message: Forgetting is something time alone takes care of, but forgiveness is an act of volition, and only the sufferer is qualified to make the decision

quotes.message: You're just another story I can't tell anymore.
quotes.name: pleasefindthis, I Wrote This For You

quotes.message: There is no past that we can bring back by longing for it. There is only an eternally new now that builds and creates itself out of the Best as the past withdraws.

quotes.message: Who controls the past controls the future: who controls the present controls the past.

quotes.message: Man... cannot learn to forget, but hangs on the past: however far or fast he runs, that chain runs with him.

quotes.message: The beauty of the past is that it is the past. The beauty of the now is to know it. The beauty of the future is to see where one is going.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It is sadder to find the past again and find it inadequate to the present than it is to have it elude you and remain forever a harmonious conception of memory.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Don't let yesterday use up too much of today.

quotes.message: No man is rich enough to buy back his past.

quotes.message: One problem with gazing too frequently into the past is that we may turn around to find the future has run out on us.

quotes.message: Do not let your shadow walk you. You are not a slave of the past.

quotes.message: Brothers, I do not consider that I have made it my own.
quotes.name: Philippians 3:13

quotes.message: Remember not the former things, nor consider the things of old. Behold, I am doing a new thing; now it springs forth, do you not perceive it? I will make a way in the wilderness and rivers in the desert.

quotes.message: Let all bitterness and wrath and anger and clamor and slander be put away from you, along with all malice. Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, as God in Christ forgave you.
quotes.name: Ephesians 4:31-32

quotes.message: I am he who blots out your transgressions for my own sake, and I will not remember your sins.

quotes.message: Forget past mistakes and forget failures. Forget everything except what you are going to do now and do it.

quotes.message: We have to forget the past. History is something that even today we are paying the consequences, and the future is integration. We all as a people, as citizens, as the leadership of both countries should be looking in that direction.

quotes.message: Forget the past - the future will give you plenty to worry about.
quotes.name: George Allen, Sr.

quotes.message: Everybody's got a past. The past does not equal the future unless you live there.

quotes.message: There is a time for departure, even when there is no certain place to go.

quotes.message: You are responsible for your life. You can't keep blaming somebody else for your dysfunction. Life is really about moving on.

quotes.message: Moving on, is a simple thing, what it leaves behind is hard.

quotes.message: Love is not all I crave . I know there's a world to save . But I've always done my best . And I think, I've passed every test . But there's something about a brand new heart .

quotes.message: Today is the shadow of tomorrow . Today is the present future of yesterday . Yesterday is the shadow of today . The darkness of the past is yesterday .

quotes.message: The wisdom of the past is the light of the past . The light which is to be the wisdom of the future .

quotes.message: Yes, I'm looking for a better future and forgetting about the past . I'm looking for a better future and forgetting about the past .

quotes.message: More and more I'm forgetting the past . More and more I'm living at last .

quotes.message: Time may lie heavy between . But what has been . is past forgetting . This sweet memory . Across the years .

quotes.message: I am controlling my future . I am forgetting my past . Making the best of the present . Those who don't are coming in last, aye .

quotes.message: We're like candles burning in both ends . Like divers suffering from the bends . We'll hit the surface far too fast .
quotes.name: Joakim Akerman

quotes.message: And now loving is in living for forgetting your past . So now why the distant stare? . Could it be there is someone who remains .
quotes.name: Shawn Phillips

quotes.message: I need you to be more forgetting of the past . And for the future be more optimistic . Just for the night I need you not to be realistic .

quotes.message: Rolling on the highway one . Vibes, from the sea, everyone is with a smile . Living for today, forgetting all our past .

quotes.message: In her face he looks for traces . Of the woman he once knew . Not forgetting, past regretting .

quotes.message: Something's here I'm not quite getting . Though I try, I keep forgetting . Like a memory long since past .
quotes.name: Danny Elfman

quotes.message: Bright lights and country music a bottle and a glass . Soon I'll be forgetting that there ever was a past . And when everybody asks me what helped me forget so fast .

quotes.message: And it feels like a hand grenade . That man, I'll never understand . Everyone's living in the past .
quotes.name: Alexander Amiruddin

quotes.message: I'm clean through no good of my own . But when You look at me You see Your Son . And I am clean . Looking back, my past is worth forgetting .
quotes.name: Jason Walker

quotes.message: We burn the candle at both ends . The circle turns, we start again . Let's make our future better than our past .
quotes.name: Baker

quotes.message: Driving way too fast . Living in the past . And never knowing that I'm happy .
quotes.name: Kevin Coyne

quotes.message: Back in the long stretch of loneliness . I have come to call a living, . I'm getting something for all this love's labor, . Even when I am forgetting.
quotes.name: Amy Elizabeth Ray

quotes.message: Getting up . I start anew . Forgetting all that I have put me through . Unraveling my past .
quotes.name: Aiis

quotes.message: Forget the past. Save the future.
quotes.name: Tim Kring

quotes.message: Think of yourself now. Forget the past. Live in the present. That's surprising. Normally, people say the opposite.

quotes.message: He's gonna be so sorry he lost you, so stop worrying. Forget the past. Forget the pain.

quotes.message: You must forget the past. Despite who you are now, you will also become something more.
quotes.name: Denis Dyack

quotes.message: Building the future and keeping the past alive are one in the same thing.

quotes.message: The furies bloat the present with the undigested past. . 'Memory and oblivion, we call that imagination.' . We dream in order to forget.
