quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: A man makes no noise over a good deed, but passes on to another as a vine to bear grapes again in season.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: It is not enough to do good; one must do it in a good way.
quotes.name: Marquis de Condorcet

quotes.message: He who is too busy doing good finds no time to be good.
quotes.name: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.message: You can fake being cool, but you can't fake being good.
quotes.name: Chuck Klosterman

quotes.message: A good edge is good for nothing, if it has nothing to cut.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: The profit of a good action is to have done it.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Do good by stealth, and blush to find it fame.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: To be good is noble, but to teach others how to be good is nobler - and less trouble.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: There is an idea abroad among moral people that they should make their neighbours good. One person I have to make good: myself.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: Good words make us laugh; good deeds make us silent.
quotes.name: French Proverb

quotes.message: One good deed is better than three days of fasting at a shrine.
quotes.name: Japanese saying

quotes.message: Don't cry over spilt milk.
quotes.name: James Howell

quotes.message: Don't cut off your nose to spite your face.
quotes.name: Mid 14th century French Proverb

quotes.message: Don't try to reinvent the wheel.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Fools and scissors require good handling.
quotes.name: Japanese

quotes.message: Fools are like other folks as long as they are silent.
quotes.name: Danish

quotes.message: Fools rush in where wise men fear to tread.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: If you buy things you don't need, you will soon be selling things you do need.
quotes.name: Pampango - Filipino

quotes.message: If you follow a fool, you are a fool yourself.
quotes.name: Jamaican

quotes.message: It is a foolish sheep that makes the wolf its confessor.
quotes.name: Italian

quotes.message: It is a fool's sheep that breaks loose twice.
quotes.name: Ashanti

quotes.message: It's better to be thought a fool, than to open your mouth and remove all doubt.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: Only a fool hates that which he knows nothing about.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Only the foolish visit the land of the cannibals.
quotes.name: Maori

quotes.message: Philosophy as well as foppery often changes fashion.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Sing away sorrow, cast away care.
quotes.name: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.message: The complete fool is half prophet.
quotes.name: Yiddish

quotes.message: The fool is thirsty in the midst of water.
quotes.name: Ethiopian

quotes.message: The fool never undertakes little.
quotes.name: Czech

quotes.message: The hero appears only after the tiger is dead.
quotes.name: Burmese

quotes.message: The right place at the wrong time.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You will do foolish things, but do them with enthusiasm.
quotes.name: Colette

quotes.message: Talk sense to a fool and he calls you foolish.
quotes.name: Euripedes

quotes.message: He who asks is a fool for five minutes, but he who does not ask remains a fool forever.
quotes.name: Unknown Author

quotes.message: He that breaks a thing to find out what it is has left the path of wisdom.
quotes.name: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.message: If you fear nothing, then you are not brave. You are merely too foolish to be afraid.
quotes.name: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.message: Until you're ready to look foolish, you'll never have the possibility of being great.
quotes.name: Cher

quotes.message: Mix a little foolishness with your serious plans. It is lovely to be silly at the right moment.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: Fools build houses, and wise men buy them.
quotes.name: Unknown Author

quotes.message: Foolishness is indeed the sister of wickedness.
quotes.name: Sophocies

quotes.message: Pain and foolishness lead to great bliss and complete knowledge, for Eternal Wisdom created nothing under the sun in vain.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: Our wisdom comes from our experience, and our experience comes from our foolishness.
quotes.name: Sacha Guitry

quotes.message: Foolishness is rarely a matter of lack of intelligence or even lack of information.
quotes.name: John McCarthy

quotes.message: The two most abundant things in the universe are hydrogen and stupidity.
quotes.name: Harlan Elison

quotes.message: People do not wish to appear foolish; to avoid the appearance of foolishness, they are willing to remain actually fools.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: With too much pride a man cannot learn a thing. In and of itself, learning teaches you how foolish you are.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: If you want to improve, be content to be thought foolish and stupid.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Any man can make mistakes, but only an idiot persists in his error.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: The foolish and the dead alone never change their opinion.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: I am patient with stupidity but not with those who are proud of it.
quotes.name: Edith Sitwell

quotes.message: Nothing in the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: Only the wisest and the stupidest of men never change.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Better a witty fool than a foolish wit.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Only a fool tests the depth of the water with both feet.
quotes.name: African Proverb

quotes.message: Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice, shame on me.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: The best way to convince a fool that he is wrong is to let him have his way.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Insanity is doing the same thing over and over, and expecting a different result.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: A learned fool is more foolish than an ignorant one.
quotes.name: Moliere

quotes.message: A fellow who is always declaring that he's no fool, usually has his suspicions.
quotes.name: Wilson Mizner

quotes.message: It is better to keep your mouth closed and let people think you are a fool than to open it and remove all doubt.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Panic causes tunnel vision. Calm acceptance of danger allows us to more easily assess the situation and see the options.
quotes.name: Simon Sinek

quotes.message: A financial panic is a very bad thing, but a government panic can do far greater damage in a far shorter time.
quotes.name: Tom McClintock

quotes.message: Panic implies that there is no rational thought taking place. That we are frozen and incapable of adjusting. Powerless to logic, and subject to seemingly unthinkable behavior.
quotes.name: Anthony Scaramucci

quotes.message: If you panic that's a good way to lose. You have to stay in control.
quotes.name: Ted Turner

quotes.message: Panic is a sudden desertion of us, and a going over to the enemy of our imagination.
quotes.name: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.message: Panic is not an effective long-term organizing strategy.
quotes.name: Starhawk

quotes.message: Panic is an incredibly catalyzing creative force. And almost out of sheer necessity, I found I had to talk about myself and my real life as it is effectively lived by me.
quotes.name: John Hodgman

quotes.message: There's no panic like the panic you momentarily feel when your hand or head is stuck in something.
quotes.name: Peter Kay

quotes.message: Panic is the sudden realization that everything around you is alive.
quotes.name: William S. Burroughs

quotes.message: Depression is anger slowed down; panic is grief speeded up.
quotes.name: Ann-Marie MacDonald

quotes.message: Panic is the great access of creativity because that's the only way to get rid of your mind.
quotes.name: Shekhar Kapur

quotes.message: Panic is highly contagious, especially in situations when nothing is known and everything is in flux.
quotes.name: Stephen King

quotes.message: If you're tearing around in a panic about something, then it puts everyone else in a panic as well.
quotes.name: Julie Andrews

quotes.message: Panic, a deep abiding, free-floating anxiety, often without any reason or logical basis.
quotes.name: Nelson DeMille

quotes.message: Some risks that are thought to be unknown, are not unknown. With some foresight and critical thought, some risks that at first glance may seem unforeseen, can in fact be foreseen. Armed with the right set of tools, procedures, knowledge and insight, light can be shed on variables that lead to risk, allowing us to manage them.
quotes.name: Daniel Wagner

quotes.message: Never take both hands off the pump. As an entrepreneur, you need to be on constant lookout for opportunity, and that will involve risk. But you minimize those risks by keeping one hand on the pump that is producing for you.
quotes.name: Kenneth E. Behring

quotes.message: A major lesson in risk management is that a 'receding sea' is not a lucky offer of an extra piece of free beach, but the warning sign of an upcoming tsunami.
quotes.name: Jos Berkemeijer

quotes.message: Risk comes with the territory when you are breaking new ground. Learn how to evaluate and mitigate these risks rather than take away people’s power and autonomy.
quotes.name: Leena Patel

quotes.message: Opportunity and risk come in pairs
quotes.name: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.message: If you don't invest in risk management, it doesn't matter what business you're in, it's a risky business.
quotes.name: Gary Cohn

quotes.message: Keeping the risk management plan up to date can transform it from a door stop into a vital project management tool. Remember: what you don't know can kill your project.
quotes.name: Bruce Pittman

quotes.message: Risk management is a more realistic term than safety. It implies that hazards are ever-present, that they must be identified, analyzed, evaluated and controlled or rationally accepted.
quotes.name: Jerome F. Lederer

quotes.message: If you treat risk management as a part-time job, you might soon find yourself looking for one.
quotes.name: Deloitte white paper

quotes.message: Risk management is a culture, not a cult. It only works if everyone lives it, not if it's practiced by a few high priests.
quotes.name: Tom Wilson

quotes.message: Here's the essence of risk management: Risk no more than you can afford to lose, and also risk enough so that a win is meaningful. If there is no such amount, don't play.
quotes.name: Ed Seykota

quotes.message: The first step in the risk management process is to acknowledge the reality of risk. Denial is a common tactic that substitutes deliberate ignorance for thoughtful planning.
quotes.name: CHARLES TREMPER

quotes.message: Not taking risks one doesn't understand is often the best form of risk management.
quotes.name: Raghuram G. Rajan

quotes.message: Being able to be repeated controllably is one key element in risk management.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: The risk management needs to lift up from risk control to risk intelligence which can identify the potential business growth opportunities
quotes.name: Pearl Zhu

quotes.message: Alignment of business strategy and risk appetite should minimize the firm's exposure to large and unexpected losses. In addition, the firm's risk management capabilities need to be commensurate with the risks it expects to take.
quotes.name: Jerome Powell

quotes.message: The essence of risk management lies in maximizing the areas where we have some control over the outcome while minimizing the areas where we have absolutely no control over the outcome.
quotes.name: Peter L. Bernstein

quotes.message: Managing risk is very different from managing strategy. Risk management focuses on the negative-threats and failures rather than opportunities and successes.
quotes.name: Robert S. Kaplan

quotes.message: Risk management is about people and processes and not about models and technology.
quotes.name: Trevor Levine

quotes.message: If everything is a matter of luck, risk management is a meaningless exercise. Invoking luck obscures truth, because it separates an event from its cause.
quotes.name: Peter Bernstein

quotes.message: Risk management should be an enterprisewide exercise and engrained in the business culture of the organization.
quotes.name: OSFI Superintendent Julie Dickson

quotes.message: Thoughtfully assessing and addressing enterprise risk and placing a high value on corporate transparency can protect the one thing we cannot afford to lose: trust.
quotes.name: Dale E. Jones

quotes.message: The key to risk management is never putting yourself in a position where you cannot live to fight another day.
quotes.name: Richard S Fuld Jr

quotes.message: Total enterprise risk management is critical, but implementing it is both expensive and easier said than done. Even the most sophisticated financial institutions are still basically silo risk managers.
quotes.name: Danny Klinefelter

quotes.message: Risk managers and investment bankers and actually, all kinds of investors took on more risk than they expected. So there was a failure of risk management. There was a failure to recognize how much risk there was in some of these securities that people bought.
quotes.name: Robert F. Engle

quotes.message: Anything that government and industry learn from hackers must be seen through the lens of their own risk management needs.
quotes.name: Paul Proctor

quotes.message: Let's be honest: starting, owning and running a business is inherently risky. Creating the right systems is what helps you manage the risk. And risk management is incredibly important.
quotes.name: Tom Corson-Knowles

quotes.message: All of life is the management of risk, not its elimination.
quotes.name: Walter Wriston

quotes.message: Good risk management fosters vigilance in times of calm and instills disciplie in times of crisis.
quotes.name: Dr Michael Ong

quotes.message: Doing all the little tricky things it takes to grow up, step by step, into an anxious and unsettling world.
quotes.name: Sylvia Plath

quotes.message: Don't try to make children grow up to be like you, or they may do it.
quotes.name: Russell Baker

quotes.message: Even though you're growing up, you should never stop having fun.
quotes.name: Nina Dobrev

quotes.message: For, after all, you do grow up, you do outgrow your ideals, which turn to dust and ashes, which are shattered into fragments; and if you have no other life, you just have to build one up out of these fragments.
quotes.name: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.message: Growing old is mandatory. Growing up is optional.
quotes.name: Chili Davis

quotes.message: Growing up happens in a heartbeat. One day you're in diapers; the next day you're gone. But the memories of childhood stay with you for the long haul.
quotes.name: The Wonder Years

quotes.message: Growing up happens when you start having things you look back on and wish you could change.
quotes.name: Cassandra Clare

quotes.message: Growing up is hard, love. Otherwise everyone would do it.
quotes.name: Kim Harrison

quotes.message: Growing up is losing some illusions, in order to acquire others.
quotes.name: Virginia Woolf

quotes.message: Growing up is never easy. You hold on to things that were. You wonder what's to come. But that night, I think we knew it was time to let go of what had been, and look ahead to what would be. Other days. New days. Days to come. The thing is, we didn't have to hate each other for getting older. We just had to forgive ourselves... for growing up.
quotes.name: The Wonder Years

quotes.message: Growing up is never straight forward. There are moments when everything is fine, and other moments where you realize that there are certain memories that you'll never get back, and certain people that are going to change, and the hardest part is knowing that there's nothing you can do except watch them.
quotes.name: Alden Nowlan

quotes.message: Growing up is such a barbarous business, full of inconvenience and pimples.
quotes.name: J.M. Barrie

quotes.message: I am convinced that most people do not grow up...We marry and dare to have children and call that growing up. I think what we do is mostly grow old. We carry accumulation of years in our bodies, and on our faces, but generally our real selves, the children inside, are innocent and shy as magnolias.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: I think she is growing up, and so begins to dream dreams, and have hopes and fears and fidgets, without knowing why or being able to explain them.
quotes.name: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.message: I think, as you're growing up, your emotions are just as deep as they are when you're an adult. You're ability to feel lonely, longing, confused or angry are just as deep. We don't feel things more as we get older.
quotes.name: Spike Jonze

quotes.message: I would have given anything to keep her little. They outgrow us so much faster than we outgrow them.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: If growing up is the process of creating ideas and dreams about what life should be, then maturity is letting go again.
quotes.name: Mary Beth Danielson

quotes.message: If growing up means it would be beneath my dignity to climb a tree, I'll never grow up, never grow up, never grow up! Not me!
quotes.name: J.M. Barrie

quotes.message: If you're gonna screw up, do it while you're young. Older you get, the harder it is to bounce back.
quotes.name: Winston Groom

quotes.message: In this day and age, some turn 18 and think they're a man or a woman and that's it, but that's just not true. You have to establish your manhood or your womanhood with actions.
quotes.name: Orlando McGuire

quotes.message: It happens to everyone as they grow up. You find out who you are and what you want, and then you realize that people you've known forever don't see things the way you do. So you keep the wonderful memories, but find yourself moving on.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: Most of us won't see one another after graduation, and even if we do it will be different. We'll be different. We'll be adults--cured, tagged and labeled and paired and identified and placed neatly on our life path, perfectly round marbles set to roll down even, well-defined slopes.
quotes.name: Lauren Oliver

quotes.message: One of the oddest things about being grown-up was looking back at something you thought you knew and finding out the truth of it was completely different from what you had always believed.
quotes.name: Patricia Briggs

quotes.message: Part of growing up is realizing you learn to love so many people. It's about forming those relationships and finding what will last forever.
quotes.name: Dylan O'Brien

quotes.message: Part of growing up was learning not to be quite that honest - learning when it was better to lie, rather than to hurt someone with the truth.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: Some day you will be old enough to start reading fairy tales again.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: Sometimes we're so concerned about giving our children what we never had growing up, we neglect to give them what we did have growing up.
quotes.name: James Dobson

quotes.message: Sometimes you have to grow up before you appreciate how you grew up.
quotes.name: Daniel Black

quotes.message: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
quotes.name: Max Lerner

quotes.message: Too many people grow up. That's the real trouble with the world, too many people grow up. They forget. They don't remember what it's like to be 12 years old. They patronize, they treat children as inferiors. Well I won't do that.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: Until you're grown-up they send you to reform school. After you're grown-up they send you to the penitentiary.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.name: E. E. Cummings

quotes.message: Part of growing up is just taking what you learn from that and moving on and not taking it to heart.
quotes.name: Beverley Mitchell

quotes.message: The trick is growing up without growing old.
quotes.name: Casey Stengel

quotes.message: We had so many dreams as children.
quotes.name: Helen Hollick

quotes.message: You know your children are growing up when they stop asking you where they came from and refuse to tell you where they're going.
quotes.name: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: This is growing up, having to stomp out love, this is how people turn terrible.
quotes.name: Michelle Tea

quotes.message: I had a lot of growing up to do. A lot of times, I learned the hard way.
quotes.name: Allen Iverson

quotes.message: We grow neither better nor worse as we get old, but more like ourselves.
quotes.name: May Lamberton Becker

quotes.message: I know that in my past I was young and irresponsible - but that's what growing up is. You learn from your mistakes.
quotes.name: Lindsay Lohan

quotes.message: No matter where you are or where you grow up, you always go through the same awkward moments of being a teenager and growing up and trying to figure out who you are.
quotes.name: Aimee Teegarden

quotes.message: You grow up the day you have your first real laugh -- at yourself.
quotes.name: Ethel Barrymore

quotes.message: Everything I was afraid of when I was growing up, I've become. I've taken on my nightmares, like the devil and the end of the world, and I've become those things.
quotes.name: Marilyn Manson

quotes.message: It is as important for children to grow up fit as it is to grow up smart.
quotes.name: Todd Whitaker, Dale Lumpa

quotes.message: Most people don't really grow up. What they do is grow old, they grow tiresome even and self-righteous maybe, for it is very hard to grow.
quotes.name: Larry Chang

quotes.message: Children who grow up with plenty can learn to give, just as children who grow up receiving love can learn to express it.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: To grow up to be healthy, very young children do not need to know how to read, but they need to know how to play.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: Let's learn to grow up, before we grow old.
quotes.name: Martin H. Manser

quotes.message: Instead, by speaking the truth in a spirit of love, we must grow up in every way to Christ, who is the head.
quotes.name: Martin H. Manser

quotes.message: Life is to be enjoyed, not endured. So follow your dreams, embrace change and live what you love.
quotes.name: Aysel Gunar

quotes.message: Encourage them to follow one of many dreams that they have been chasing for years.
quotes.name: Antawn Barb & Joe Barb lll

quotes.message: Regardless of parentage, heritage or origin, dreams are meant to be pursued and grasped and pulled from the sky. If you work hard, educate yourself, strive, and never forget to be kind to others, your dreams can come true.
quotes.name: Michael Lee-Chin

quotes.message: Dream the biggest dream for yourself. Hold the highest vision of life for yourself.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Lord knows . Dreams are hard to follow . But don't let anyone . Tear them away . Hold On . There will be tomorrow . In time you'll find the way.
quotes.name: Mariah Carey

quotes.message: It just made me realize how important life is, how short time is, how important it is to follow your dreams and your goals. That's part of who you are and you take away from it by not doing it.
quotes.name: Queen Latifah

quotes.message: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: We've removed the ceiling above our dreams. There are no more impossible dreams.
quotes.name: Jackson

quotes.message: If you haven't dream that you will get there, you will not think about ever taking the steps to be there.
quotes.name: Max Robinson

quotes.message: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hardwork.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: Don't be afraid of the space between your dreams and reality. If you can dream it, you can make it.
quotes.name: Belva Davis

quotes.message: Exercise the right to dream. You must face reality-- that which is. But the dream of the reality that ought to be, that must be.
quotes.name: Jesse Jackson

quotes.message: Man, alone can transform the power of his thoughts into physical reality; man, alone can dream, and make his dream come true.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Follow your dreams, they know the way.
quotes.name: Kobe Yamada

quotes.message: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
quotes.name: Carl Sandburg

quotes.message: Without dreams, there can be no courage. And without courage, there can be no action.
quotes.name: Wim Wenders

quotes.message: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: If you follow your dreams and keep your desire for success at its highest peak, there is nothing in this world that you can't achieve.
quotes.name: Romeo Marrishaw

quotes.message: The sooner you start taking your dreams seriously, the less time it will take for them to become a reality.
quotes.name: Romeo Marrishaw

quotes.message: Wishful thinking is a delusion. Only action and perseverance will bring your dreams to fruition.
quotes.name: Romeo Marrishaw

quotes.message: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the action stems the dream again; and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.
quotes.name: Anaïs Nin

quotes.message: The permanent temptation of life is to confuse dreams with reality. The permanent defeat of life comes when dreams are surrendered to reality.
quotes.name: James Michener

quotes.message: It's not what the dream is, it's what the dream does.
quotes.name: John Harrold Johnson

quotes.message: Reason may fail you. If you are going to do anything with life, you have sometimes move away from it, beyond all measurements. You must follow sometimes visions and dreams.
quotes.name: Bede Jarrett

quotes.message: The only person who can stop you from achieving your goals and dreams is you--your thoughts and beliefs.
quotes.name: Harish Muralidhar

quotes.message: The artist's relative lack of adaptation turns out to his advantage; it enables him to follow his own yearnings far from the beaten path and to discover what it is that would meet the unconscious needs of his age.
quotes.name: C.G. Jung

quotes.message: Chasing dreams . A sense following . Realizing . Making dreams of tomorrow . Today's memories.
quotes.name: Mary Steffen

quotes.message: Tell me why does following your dreams . Take you far away from me and I knew that it would . Tell me how to feel the space you left behind . And how to laugh instead of cry and how to say goodbye.
quotes.name: Hailey Steele

quotes.message: It's hard enough trying to live your life . But not following your dreams made you dead inside . If you don't love what you do.
quotes.name: Daniel O'Donoghue

quotes.message: If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Follow your dreams. I am not saying it’s going to be easy, but I am saying it’s going to be worth it.
quotes.name: Moffat Machingura

quotes.message: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
quotes.name: Erma Bombeck

quotes.message: Magic is the happiness that we create when we give ourselves permission to follow our dreams.
quotes.name: Nattie Kate Mason

quotes.message: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.name: Pablo Picaso

quotes.message: Believe in your dreams, no matter how impossible they seem.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: Don't tell me the sky's the limit when there are footprints on the moon.
quotes.name: Paul Brandt

quotes.message: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.name: Arthur Ashe

quotes.message: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.name: Oprah

quotes.message: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
quotes.name: Paul Valery

quotes.message: Commitment leads to action. Action brings your dream closer.
quotes.name: Marcia Wieder

quotes.message: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: It is precisely the possibility of realizing a dream that makes life interesting.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: When you stop chasing your dreams, your dreams start chasing you.
quotes.name: Dez Del Rio

quotes.message: Dreams come true. Without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
quotes.name: John Updike

quotes.message: We may place blame, give reasons, and even have excuses; but in the end, it is an act of cowardice to not follow your dreams.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: The only boundaries for me are those I place on myself. I can make my own dreams come true.
quotes.name: Shelly Wu

quotes.message: As soon as you start to pursue a dream, your life wakes up and everything has meaning.
quotes.name: Barbara Sher

quotes.message: If your success is not on your own terms, if it looks good to the world but does not feel good in your heart, it is not success at all.
quotes.name: Anna Quindlen

quotes.message: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Once in awhile it really hits people that they don't have to experience the world in the way they have been told.
quotes.name: Alan Keightley

quotes.message: I have accepted fear as a part of life- specifically the fear of change. I have gone ahead despite the pounding in the heart that says: turn back.
quotes.name: Erica Jong

quotes.message: Figure out what your purpose is in life, what you really and truly want to do with your time and your life; then be willing to sacrifice everything and then some to achieve it. If you are not willing to make the sacrifice, then keep searching.
quotes.name: Quintina Ragnacci

quotes.message: A mediocre idea that generates enthusiasm will go further then a great idea that inspires no one.
quotes.name: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.message: It was the man's dream, and his inspiring attempt to make them come true that remain important.
quotes.name: Francis Ford Coppola

quotes.message: Vision without action is merely a dream. Action without vision just passes the time. Vision with action can change the world.
quotes.name: Joel Barker

quotes.message: When your heart is in your dreams, no request is too extreme.
quotes.name: Jiminy Cricket

quotes.message: Deep into that darkness peering, long I stood there, wondering, fearing, doubting, dreaming dreams no mortal ever dared to dream before.
quotes.name: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.message: Get mocked at for as much as you can, fail as much as you can, but don't quit. Let every mockery, every failure, be a source of inspiration for you to reach for greatness, and that greatness will silence your critics.
quotes.name: Ajaero Tony Martins

quotes.message: Chase the vision, not the money. The money will end up following you.
quotes.name: Tony Hsieh

quotes.message: The only thing worse than starting something and failing ... is not starting something.
quotes.name: Seth Godin

quotes.message: I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest.
quotes.name: Venus Williams

quotes.message: I knew that if I failed I wouldn't regret that, but I knew the one thing I might regret is not trying.
quotes.name: Jeff Bezos

quotes.message: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.name: Harriet Tubman

quotes.message: It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: You don't get in life what you want; you get in life what you are.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: Don't ever let someone tell you, you can't do something. Not even me. You got a dream, you got to protect it.
quotes.name: Steven Conrad

quotes.message: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.name: Earl Nightingale

quotes.message: I've been absolutely terrified every moment of my life and I've never let it keep me from doing a single thing that I wanted to do.
quotes.name: Georgia O'Keefe

quotes.message: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there's love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
quotes.name: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.message: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: There is no passion to be found playing small-in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: It's your place in the world; it's your life. Go on and do all you can with it, and make it the life you want to live.
quotes.name: Mae Jemison

quotes.message: Follow your passions, follow your heart, and the things you need will come.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.message: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humour, some style.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Perhaps the biggest tragedy of our lives is that freedom is possible, yet we can pass our years trapped in the same old patterns.
quotes.name: Tara Brach

quotes.message: Do something wonderful. People may imitate it.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Swim out of your little pond.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: Any dream worth dreaming, is worth the effort to make it come true
quotes.name: Evan Gourley

quotes.message: At first, dreams seem impossible, then improbable, and eventually inevitable
quotes.name: Christopher Reeve

quotes.message: Be willing to be uncomfortable. Be comfortable being uncomfortable.
quotes.name: Peter McWilliams

quotes.message: Cherish your visions and you dreams, as they are the children of your soul; the blueprints of your ultimate achievements
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Capture your dreams and your life becomes full.
quotes.name: Nikita Koloff

quotes.message: This is the key to time management - to see the value of every moment.
quotes.name: Menachem Mendel Schneerson

quotes.message: I think time management as a label encourages people to view each 24-hour period as a slot in which they should pack as much as possible.
quotes.name: Tim Ferriss

quotes.message: Time management is the mantra of my life.
quotes.name: Vir Das

quotes.message: It's not enough to be busy; so are the ants.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Time management is a big part of the director's job.
quotes.name: Debbie Allen

quotes.message: No, my entire life is planned. It's called time management.
quotes.name: Sean Hayes

quotes.message: Don't let the fear of the time it will take to accomplish something stand in the way of your doing it. The time will pass anyway; we might just as well put that passing time to the best possible use.
quotes.name: Earl Nightingale

quotes.message: You will never find time for anything. If you want time you must make it.
quotes.name: Charles Buxton

quotes.message: Start by doing whats necessary, then whats possible, and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes.name: St Francis Of Assisi

quotes.message: Never leave that till tomorrow which you can do today.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Be mindful of how you approach time. Watching the clock is not the same as watching the sun rise.
quotes.name: Sophia Bedford-Pierce

quotes.message: It's better to do the right thing slowly than the wrong thing quickly.
quotes.name: Peter Turla

quotes.message: Once you have mastered time, you will understand how true it is that most people overestimate what they can accomplish in a year and underestimate what they can achieve in a decade!
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: Know the true value of time; snatch, seize, and enjoy every moment of it. No idleness, no laziness, no procrastination; Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
quotes.name: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.message: The more business a man has to do, the more he is able to accomplish, for he learns to economize his time.
quotes.name: Sir Matthew Hale

quotes.message: Ordinary people think merely how they will spend their time, a man of intellect tries to use it.
quotes.name: Schopenhauer

quotes.message: We can no more afford to spend major time on minor things than we can to spend minor time on major things.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: I recommend to you to take care of the minutes; for hours will take care of themselves.
quotes.name: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.message: The day is of infinite length for him who knows how to appreciate and use it.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: If you want to make good use of your time, you've got to know what's most important and then give it all you've got.
quotes.name: Lee Iacocca

quotes.message: I have yet to hear a man ask for advice on how to combine marriage and a career.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: You've got to think about big things while you're doing small things, so that all the small things go in the right direction.
quotes.name: Alvin Toffler

quotes.message: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
quotes.name: Michael Altshuler

quotes.message: Don't mistake movement for achievement. It's easy to get faked out by being busy.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Time = Life, Therefore, waste your time and waste of your life, or master your time and master your life.
quotes.name: Alan Lakein

quotes.message: Time is the scarcest resource and unless it is managed nothing else can be managed.
quotes.name: Peter Drucker

quotes.message: Time management is life managemnent.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: Those who prefer interacting with people over task achievement tend to be more careless about time management.
quotes.name: Robert Moore

quotes.message: It's all about time management. You can actually do a lot of things if you work out your schedule.
quotes.name: Amanda Izatt

quotes.message: Either run the day or the day runs you.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Time management is critical to productivity because most people try to cram as much as possible in a day.
quotes.name: Deb Howard

quotes.message: There is never enough time to do everything, but there is always enough time to do the most important thing.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Don't wait for extraordinary opportunities. Seize common occasions and make them great.
quotes.name: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.message: I've learned time management, organization and I have priorities.
quotes.name: Tory Burch

quotes.message: One always has time enough, if one will apply it well.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Realize that if you have time to whine and complain about something, then you have the time to do something about it.
quotes.name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.message: We become what we want to be by consistently being what we want to become each day.
quotes.name: Richard G. Scott

quotes.message: Whenever you are asked if you can do a job, tell 'em, 'Certainly I can!' Then get busy and find out how to do it
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: I have been busy my whole life and I learned at a young age time management when balancing sports and school.
quotes.name: Shantelle Taylor

quotes.message: The key is in not spending time, but in investing it.
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: Time is the most valuable coin in your life. You and you alone will determine how that coin will be spent. Be careful that you do not let other people spend it for you.
quotes.name: Carl Sandburg

quotes.message: Before you eat the elephant, make sure you know what parts you want to eat.
quotes.name: Todd Stocker

quotes.message: Essential to time-management is a change in focus, a change from being busy' to a focus on outcomes
quotes.name: Tony Buon

quotes.message: This time, like all times, is a very good one, if we but know what to do with it.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: A wise person does at once, what a fool does at last. Both do the same thing; only at different times.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: I am definitely going to take a course on time management just as soon as I can work it into my schedule.
quotes.name: Louis E. Boone

quotes.message: It's how we spend our time here and now, that really matters. If you are fed up with the way you have come to interact with time, change it.
quotes.name: Marcia Wieder

quotes.message: Parrots make great pets. They have more personality than goldfish.
quotes.name: Chevy Chase

quotes.message: An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language.
quotes.name: Martin Buber

quotes.message: Animals are reliable, many full of love, true in their affections, predictable in their actions, grateful and loyal. Difficult standards for people to live up to.
quotes.name: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.message: I really love pets. They're like children. They know if you really love them or not. You can't fool them.
quotes.name: Donna Douglas

quotes.message: Pets have more love and compassion in them than most humans.
quotes.name: Robert Wagner

quotes.message: Pets, like their owners, tend to expand a little over the Christmas period.
quotes.name: Frances Wright

quotes.message: Most pets display so many humanlike traits and emotions it's easy to forget they're not gifted with the English language and then get snubbed when we talk to them and they don't say anything back.
quotes.name: Stephenie Geist

quotes.message: To me, a cat is an easy pet, they don't need any spoiling or looking after.
quotes.name: Karl Pilkington

quotes.message: Sometimes losing a pet is more painful than losing a human because in the case of the pet, you were not pretending to love it.
quotes.name: Amy Sedaris

quotes.message: Your pet is not your friend. It is your hostage.
quotes.name: Scott Dikkers

quotes.message: Animals are such agreeable friends they ask no questions, they pass no criticisms.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Just watching my cats can make me happy.
quotes.name: Paula Cole

quotes.message: Dogs are better than human beings because they know but do not tell.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: It's difficult to understand why people don't realize that pets are gifts to mankind.
quotes.name: Linda Blair

quotes.message: I really love animals. My cat is my little soul mate. He's not just a cat, he's my friend.
quotes.name: Tracey Emin

quotes.message: We have three cats. It's like having children, but there is no tuition involved.
quotes.name: Ron Reagan

quotes.message: If you are a dog and your owner suggests that you wear a sweater suggest that he wear a tail.
quotes.name: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.message: Dogs are my favorite people.
quotes.name: Richard Dean Anderson

quotes.message: Dogs really are perfect soldiers. They are brave and smart; they can smell through walls, see in the dark, and eat Army rations without complaint.
quotes.name: Susan Orlean

quotes.message: There's a saying. If you want someone to love you forever, buy a dog, feed it and keep it around.
quotes.name: Dick Dale

quotes.message: Actually, my dog I think is the only person who consistently loves me all the time.
quotes.name: H. G. Bissinger

quotes.message: I used to love dogs until I discovered cats.
quotes.name: Nafisa Joseph

quotes.message: It's true, you can never eat a pet you name. And anyway, it would be like a ventriloquist eating his dummy.
quotes.name: Alexander Theroux

quotes.message: I think there's something great and generic about goldfish. They're everybody's first pet.
quotes.name: Paul Rudd

quotes.message: I love animals and feel very strongly that people should not be allowed to buy a pet if they are not able to look after it.
quotes.name: Kirsty Gallacher

quotes.message: My idea of a perfect pet is a really, really big dog! Huge!
quotes.name: Emily Vancamp

quotes.message: Cats are connoisseurs of comfort.
quotes.name: James Herriot

quotes.message: Until one has loved an animal, a part of one's soul remains unawakened
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: Dogs do speak, but only to those who know how to listen.
quotes.name: Orhan Pamuk

quotes.message: Dogs have important jobs, like barking when the doorbell rings, but cats have no function in a house whatsoever.
quotes.name: W. Bruce Cameron

quotes.message: I don't understand people who don't touch their pets. Their cat or dog is called a pet for a reason.
quotes.name: Jarod Kintz

quotes.message: Our pets are our family.
quotes.name: Ana Monnar

quotes.message: Armadillos make affectionate pets, if you need affection that much.
quotes.name: Will Cuppy

quotes.message: I never married because there was no need. I have three pets at home which answer the same purpose as a husband. I have a dog which growls every morning, a parrot which swears all afternoon, and a cat that comes home late at night.
quotes.name: Marie Corelli

quotes.message: People really do spend a lot of money on their pets - sometimes more then themselves.
quotes.name: Oksana Baiul

quotes.message: Adopted pets are the best pets you can have. Most adoptable pets come from loving homes that simply cannot care for them anymore. Or, they are strays who've been on their own without the loving care they deserve.
quotes.name: Josh Duhamel

quotes.message: I used to have some fish, some nice little carp, but they got too big for the tank. I don't have any pets now.
quotes.name: Tom Felton

quotes.message: I've always had a fascination for animals. I loved watching them, and even then I thought of them as beings rather than pets.
quotes.name: Tippi Hedren

quotes.message: I love cats. I've had cats as pets.
quotes.name: Sam Raimi

quotes.message: Ever consider what pets must think of us? I mean, here we come back from a grocery store with the most amazing haul - chicken, pork, half a cow.
quotes.name: Anne Tyler

quotes.message: Well-washed and well-combed domestic pets grow dull; they miss the stimulus of fleas.
quotes.name: Francis Galton

quotes.message: I'm not about to go out and buy a snake for a pet. I mean, I may have faced a few fears but I'm not insane.
quotes.name: Kristin Davis

quotes.message: It's like having a pet dog for a long time. You get attached to it, and when it dies you miss it.
quotes.name: Jesse Owens

quotes.message: Everyone's pet is the most outstanding. This begets mutual blindness.
quotes.name: Jean Cocteau

quotes.message: Animals possess a soul and men must love and feel solidarity with our smaller brethren.
quotes.name: Pope John Paul II

quotes.message: The dog was created especially for children. He is the God of frolic.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Cats are like walking brooms you can actually comfortably cuddle with.
quotes.name: Jarod Kintz

quotes.message: The greatest pleasure of a dog is that you may make a fool of yourself with him and not only will he not scold you, but he will make a fool of himself, too.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: Pets need love as much as people do. The responsibility of caring for your pet's life includes dedicating time and affection toward them.
quotes.name: Brenda Knight

quotes.message: The dog was created especially for children.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: For me, a house or an apartment becomes a home when you add one set of for legs, a happy tail, and that indescribable measure of love that we call a dog.
quotes.name: Roger A. Caras

quotes.message: No amount of time can erase the memory of a good cat, and no amount of masking tape can ever totally remove his fur from your couch.
quotes.name: Leo Dworken

quotes.message: With the qualities of cleanliness, affection, patience, dignity, and courage that cats have, how many of us, I ask you, would be capable of becoming cats?
quotes.name: Fernand Mery

quotes.message: I love cats because I enjoy my home and little by little, they become its visible soul.
quotes.name: Jean Cocteau

quotes.message: Animals are my friends, and I don't eat my friends.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: If you want a friend in Washington, get a dog.
quotes.name: Harry S. Truman

quotes.message: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than you love yourself.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: A dog is a man's best friend. A cat is a cat's best friend.
quotes.name: Robert J. Vogel

quotes.message: When a man's best friend is his dog, the dog has a problem.
quotes.name: Edward Abbey

quotes.message: The way people pamper their pets is ridiculous. Have you heard the latest? Elevator paws for dachshunds.
quotes.name: Robert Orben

quotes.message: I've never had any luck with pets. I once had a turtle I had to send to obedience school.
quotes.name: Robert Orben

quotes.message: We have all kinds of pets. We have birds who specialize in singing; we have dogs who specialize in barking; we have cats who specialize in meowing, and we have turtles who specialize in dying.
quotes.name: Robert Orben

quotes.message: Pets are kept for many reasons. Some are regarded primarily for the beauty of their bodies or their movements; others make beautiful sounds. Some are living toys; others are symbols for our desires for social status.
quotes.name: Katherine C. Grier

quotes.message: Pets could furnish an 'every-fresh source of happiness to those who love them.
quotes.name: Olive Thorne Miller

quotes.message: Pets receive special attention intended to promote their well-being, at least as people understand that condition.
quotes.name: Katherine C. Grier

quotes.message: The dog is unquestionably the noblest of all domestic pets, and he may be pre-eminently styled the friend of man.
quotes.name: Jane Loudon

quotes.message: Pets are important, especially for kids without brothers and sisters. They can get close to this animal and they both can grow up to love one another.
quotes.name: Michael Robin

quotes.message: Pets can be introduced to encourage loving and caring responses.
quotes.name: Marvin B. Sussman

quotes.message: Pets can provide very important information about how the family system is organized or disorganized.
quotes.name: Michael Robin

quotes.message: Pets facilitate introduction by being social lubricants. They provide a neutral subject of conversation and perform a variety of functions as social catalysts.
quotes.name: Jean E. Veevers

quotes.message: If for some reason I had to live without my pets, I would find the world a much lonelier, colder place.
quotes.name: Charles H. Rudolph

quotes.message: Dogs come when they're called; cats take a message and get back to you later.
quotes.name: Mary Bly

quotes.message: Pets do not just substitute for human relationships, they complement and add to them, giving a special and unique dimension to human life.
quotes.name: Alan M. Beck

quotes.message: Pets can coax smiles and words out of socially withdrawn institutionalized patients of all ages.
quotes.name: Alan M. Beck

quotes.message: Pets can make psychotherapy progress faster. In children, carefully controlled studies have shown that contacts with pets and nature can reduce the symptoms of attention deficit hyperactivity disorder.
quotes.name: Alan M. Beck

quotes.message: It may seem unnecessary to describe the ways in which animals are treated like people because in some sense everyone knows that pts are sometimes people.
quotes.name: Alan M. Beck

quotes.message: Feeding animals our own food right from our own hands or even our own lips is a deeply felt and solemn pleasure. It transforms that animal automatically into a pet and a companion.
quotes.name: Alan M. Beck

quotes.message: The greatest deception men suffer is from their own opinions.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: All deception in the course of life is indeed nothing else but a lie reduced to practice, and falsehood passing from words into things.
quotes.name: Robert Southey

quotes.message: A deception that elevates us is dearer than a host of low truths.
quotes.name: Marina Tsvetaeva

quotes.message: Any seeming deception in a statement is costly, not only in the expense of the advertising but in the detrimental effect produced upon the customer, who believes she has been misled.
quotes.name: John Wanamaker

quotes.message: Only one deception is possible in the infinite sense, self-deception.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: Self-deception is sometimes as necessary a tool as a crowbar.
quotes.name: Moss Hart

quotes.message: He who tries to protect himself from deception is often cheated, even when most on his guard.
quotes.name: Plautus

quotes.message: Don't tell me of deception; a lie is a lie, whether it be a lie to the eye or a lie to the ear.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Nothing is so difficult as not deceiving oneself.
quotes.name: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.message: Deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: We are never so easily deceived as when we imagine we are deceiving others.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: It is vain to find fault with those arts of deceiving wherein men find pleasure to be deceived.
quotes.name: John Locke

quotes.message: He who has made it a practice to lie and deceive his father, will be the most daring in deceiving others.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: Cunning is the art of concealing our own defects, and discovering the weaknesses of others.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Hateful to me as the gates of Hades is that man who hides one thing in his heart and speaks another.
quotes.name: Homer

quotes.message: It is twice the pleasure to deceive the deceiver.
quotes.name: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.message: It seems to me that there are two kinds of trickery: the ''fronts'' people assume before one another's eyes, and the ''front'' a writer puts on the face of reality.
quotes.name: Francoise Sagan

quotes.message: Nothing is more common on earth than to deceive and be deceived.
quotes.name: Johann G. Seume

quotes.message: The art of using deceit and cunning grow continually weaker and less effective to the user.
quotes.name: John Tillotson

quotes.message: The easiest way to be cheated is to believe yourself to be more cunning than others.
quotes.name: Pierre Charron

quotes.message: Tricks and treachery are the practice of fools, that don't have brains enough to be honest.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: We are never deceived; we deceive ourselves.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: To give up pretensions is as blessed a relief as to get them ratified.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: The craftiest trickery are too short and ragged a cloak to cover a bad heart.
quotes.name: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.message: You can fool some of the people all the time, and all of the people some of the time, but you cannot fool all of the people all the time.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: We like to be deceived.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: Whatever deceives men seems to produce a magical enchantment.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: When a person cannot deceive himself the chances are against his being able to deceive other people.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: The people of the world having once been deceived, suspect deceit in truth itself.
quotes.name: Hitopadesa

quotes.message: Deception is a cruel act... It often has many players on different stages that corrode the soul.
quotes.name: Donna A. Favors

quotes.message: Reality denied comes back to haunt.
quotes.name: Philip K. Dick

quotes.message: You can fool yourself, you know. You'd think it's impossible, but it turns out it's the easiest thing of all.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: Lying to ourselves is more deeply ingrained than lying to others.
quotes.name: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.message: If it is necessary sometimes to lie to others, it is always despicable to lie to oneself.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: Beware of becoming a pawn in your own game.
quotes.name: Marty Rubin

quotes.message: Avoidance of self deception is a matter of integrity not comfort.
quotes.name: Orrin Woodward

quotes.message: Whenever, therefore, people are deceived and form opinions wide of the truth, it is clear that the error has slid into their minds through the medium of certain resemblances to that truth.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: There is nothing more deceptive than an obvious fact.
quotes.name: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.message: It is not difficult to deceive the first time, for the deceived possesses no antibodies and is unvaccinated by suspicion.
quotes.name: John Updike

quotes.message: Any fool can tell the truth, but it requires a man of some sense to know how to lie well.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: A man is his own easiest dupe, for what he wishes to be true he generally believes to be true.
quotes.name: Demosthenes

quotes.message: He who permits himself to tell a lie once, finds it much easier to do it a second and a third time till at length it becomes habitual.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Lying is not only excusable; it is not only innocent; it is, above all, necessary and unavoidable. Without the ameliorations that it offers, life would become a mere syllogism and hence too metallic to be borne.
quotes.name: H. L. Mencken

quotes.message: He who is not very strong in memory should not meddle with lying.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: Whoever is detected in a shameful fraud is ever after not believed even if they speak the truth.
quotes.name: Phaedrus

quotes.message: If you do not wish to be lied to, do not ask questions. If there were no questions, there would be no lies.
quotes.name: B. Traven

quotes.message: Yet still we hug the dear deceit.
quotes.name: Nathaniel Cotton

quotes.message: Skilled in every trick, a worthy heir of his paternal craft, he would make black look white, and white look black.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: Deceit is the false road to happiness; and all the joys we travel through to vice, like fairy banquets, vanish when we touch them.
quotes.name: Aaron Hill

quotes.message: Nature never deceives us; it is we who deceive ourselves.
quotes.name: John Bartlett

quotes.message: Cheats never prosper.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: Deceive boys with toys, but men with oaths.
quotes.name: Lysander

quotes.message: And if, to be sure, sometimes you need to conceal a fact with words, do it in such a way that it does not become known, or, if it does become known, that you have a ready and quick defense.
quotes.name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.message: A false report, if believed during three days, maybe of great service to the government.
quotes.name: Catherine de Medici

quotes.message: Doubtless, the pleasure is as great . Of being cheated, as to cheat.. As lookers-on feel most delight . That least perceive a juggler's sleight.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: One is easily fooled by that which one loves.
quotes.name: Moliere

quotes.message: An open foe may prove a curse, . But a pretended friend is worse.
quotes.name: John Gay

quotes.message: Beware of false prophets, which come to you in sheep's clothing, but inwardly they are ravening wolves.
quotes.name: St. Matthew

quotes.message: Keep up appearances; there lies the test. The world will give thee credit for the rest. Outward be fair, however, foul within; Sin if thou wilt, but then in secret sin.
quotes.name: Charles Churchill

quotes.message: The underlying principle of all Satan's tactics is deception. He is a crafty and clever camouflage.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: For Satan's deceptions to be successful, they must be so cunningly devised that his real purpose is concealed by wiles.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Satan is masterful at using just enough of God's truth to capture a person's attention and then mix it with his devious potion that will lead believers astray.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: A mouth that praises may conceal a hand that kills.
quotes.name: Arabian Proverb

quotes.message: Good works and bad acts deceive both wise and simple.
quotes.name: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.message: He who has once used deception will deceive again.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: To deceive a diplomat, speak the truth — he has no experience with it.
quotes.name: Greek Proverb

quotes.message: Even what appears to be the purest feeling could still be a deception.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: Watch out brothers, so that there won't be in any of you an evil, unbelieving heart that departs from the living God. But encourage each other daily while it is called today so that none of you is hardened by sin's deception.
quotes.name: Hebrews 3:12

quotes.message: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.
quotes.name: 1 John 1:8

quotes.message: Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: Just because something isn't a lie does not mean that it isn't deceptive. A liar knows that he is a liar, but one who speaks mere portions of truth in order to deceive is a craftsman of destruction.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Someone who smiles too much with you can sometimes frown too much with you at your back.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: And thus I clothe my naked villainy . With odd old ends stol'n out of holy writ; . And seem a saint, when most I play the devil.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: People trust their eyes above all else - but most people see what they wish to see, or what they believe they should see; not what is really there.
quotes.name: Zoe Marriott

quotes.message: His lies were so exquisite I almost wept.
quotes.name: Dave Eggers

quotes.message: Many things are not as they seem: The worst things in life never are.
quotes.name: Jim Butcher

quotes.message: The truest way to be deceived is to think oneself more knowing than others.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: People appear like angels until you hear them speak.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Her words were like tinfoil; they shone and they covered things up.
quotes.name: Helen Cross

quotes.message: One of the most important things you can do on this earth is to let people know they are not alone.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: One of our goals is to encourage people that there is hope, there is a future.
quotes.name: Garth Coonce

quotes.message: Mistakes are experiences. Without these experiences, there is no learning.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Every positive attempt was as a result of encouragement, every encouragement leads to success.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Each victory with God can bring a reassurance once more that the ones born of God are victorious
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: Support and encouragement are found in the most unlikely places.
quotes.name: Raquel Cepeda

quotes.message: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
quotes.name: Victor Kiam

quotes.message: Correction does much, but encouragement does more.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Use encouragement. Make the fault seem easy to correct.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: There are high spots in all of our lives and most of them have come about through encouragement from someone else.
quotes.name: George Madison Adams

quotes.message: The essential support and encouragement comes from within, arising out of the mad notion that your society needs to know what only you can tell it.
quotes.name: John Updike

quotes.message: Reassurances could dull pain, nobody would ever go to the trouble of pressing grapes.
quotes.name: Scott Lynch

quotes.message: One has to remember that every failure can be a stepping stone to something better.
quotes.name: Colonel Sanders

quotes.message: To many people holidays are not voyages of discovery, but a ritual of reassurance.
quotes.name: Phillip Adams

quotes.message: If you ever think about giving up, remember why you held on for so long.
quotes.name: Hayley Williams

quotes.message: Everything will be okay in the end. If it's not okay, it's not the end.
quotes.name: John Lennon

quotes.message: Always see your mistakes as a learning curve.
quotes.name: Auliq Ice

quotes.message: Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out.
quotes.name: John Wooden

quotes.message: A child needs encouragement like a plant needs water.
quotes.name: Rudolf Dreikurs

quotes.message: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.
quotes.name: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.message: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: It is by going down into the abyss that we recover the treasures of life. Where you stumble, there lies your treasure.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Encouragement is like water to the soul, it makes everything grow.
quotes.name: Chris Burkmenn

quotes.message: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.name: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.message: Reassurance is such a sad, mad thing. Deep inside, everyone knows the truth.
quotes.name: Michel Faber

quotes.message: One of the most beautiful gifts in the world is the gift of encouragement.
quotes.name: John O'Donohue

quotes.message: Every second you dwell on the past you steal from your future. Every minute you spend focusing on your problems you take away from finding your solutions.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: One word of encouragement can be enough to spark someone's motivation to continue with a difficult challenge.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: A word of Encouragement from a leader can inspire a person to reach her potential
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: A dead end street is a good place to turn around.
quotes.name: Naomi Judd

quotes.message: If you start trying to figure out yourself from the image everyone has of you, you run into a dead end.
quotes.name: Sam Shepard

quotes.message: It is a sure sign that a culture has reached a dead end when it is no longer intrigued by its myths.
quotes.name: Greil Marcus

quotes.message: People go on exploration; they're trying to find places that weren't known before. But it is an inevitable fact of research, as is in any other form of exploration of the unknown, that some people find they go down a dead end.
quotes.name: Mark Walport

quotes.message: Worry compounds the futility of being trapped on a dead-end street. Thinking opens new avenues.
quotes.name: Cullen Hightower

quotes.message: If things go wrong and you hit a dead end-as you will-it's just life's way of saying it's time to change course.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: I think that people who get to a certain position, and then try to ferociously defend it or build on it, it's kind of a dead-end street. You see people becoming miserable that way.
quotes.name: Viggo Mortensen

quotes.message: The longer a dead-end, the more it looks like a road.
quotes.name: Mikhail Turovsky

quotes.message: There are no dead ends in life, only dead end thinking.
quotes.name: Orrin Woodward

quotes.message: People who inspire others are those who see invisible bridges at the end of dead-end streets.
quotes.name: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.message: It is only in God that we discover our origin, our identity, our meaning, our purpose, our significance, and our destiny. Every other path leads to a dead end.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: I'm sure that in the fullness of time we'll learn that one or more of these seemingly promising technologies were dead ends. And that's the nature of innovation, and that's why we should spread our bets; we should not put our eggs in any one basket. Some of these will be grand successes, some of them will be average, and some of them will be abject failures.
quotes.name: Jay Inslee

quotes.message: There are ends, occasionally, with projects. That happens. But they are natural dead ends. It's usually the outside situation that demands an ending. I never really settle for one.
quotes.name: Aleksandra Mir

quotes.message: An ordinary mistake is one that leads to a dead end, while a profound mistake is one that leads to progress. Anyone can make an ordinary mistake, but it takes a genius to make a profound mistake.
quotes.name: Frank Wilczek

quotes.message: Those who deny the change in consciousness that the divine process of creation now brings about-or actually imposes on us-and fail to develop their intuition accordingly will sooner or later find themselves at a dead end.
quotes.name: Carl Johan Calleman

quotes.message: I suppose it’s easier to see the way out of anything when you’ve found your way out of that maze. When you’re stuck in the middle, in a series of dead-ends making circles, it’s difficult to make any sense of anything.
quotes.name: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.message: As the rain falls and the sun shines, they grow, grow, grow; minds so open, they go through life aware and accepting, seeing light where there's dark, seeing possibility in dead ends, tasting victory as others spit out failure, questioning where others accept. Just a little less jaded, a little less cynical.
quotes.name: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.message: There are no dead ends, just detours.
quotes.name: Nora Roberts

quotes.message: Arrogance and fanaticism cause the hardening of positions taken and entrenchment can only lead to a dead end.
quotes.name: Ecumenical Patriarch Bartholomew I of Constantinople

quotes.message: Negative expectations are a quick route to dead-end thinking.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: In science, a path that turns out to be a dead end is very useful because you don't devote resources to focusing on that; you go elsewheres.
quotes.name: Michael Bloomberg

quotes.message: In our age of nuclear and biological weapons and the ever more efficient exploitation of nature, the mix of high technology and an ethos of domination could take us to an evolutionary dead end.
quotes.name: Riane Eisler

quotes.message: It may seem like I came out of the blue. But, my road was long, windy, full of hurdles, and even some dead ends. I lost family. I lost friends. I even lost my way. When I reached what felt like rock bottom, I realized I had a responsibility to everyone who believed in me and to kids, like me, who just needed a chance and something to believe in.
quotes.name: Victor Cruz

quotes.message: When we attempt to find meaning in the pursuit of pleasure, the commitment to a job, or through plumbing intellectual depths, we all eventually find in each of these pursuits a dead end.
quotes.name: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.message: Thinking that what you want equals what's best for you is a dead end.
quotes.name: Byron Katie

quotes.message: Work at what you love the most, even if you're only a two. Trust that your love for what your are doing will see you through. That's not easy, but better to grow into what you love than to pretend you're satisfied with a developmental dead end.
quotes.name: Laurence Boldt

quotes.message: Pure mathematics is on the whole distinctly more useful than applied. For what is useful above all is technique, and mathematical technique is taught mainly through pure mathematics.
quotes.name: G. H. Hardy

quotes.message: Mathematics is as much an aspect of culture as it is a collection of algorithms.
quotes.name: Carl Boyer

quotes.message: Mathematics is a game played according to certain simple rules with meaningless marks on paper.
quotes.name: David Hilbert

quotes.message: You can not apply mathematics as long as words still becloud reality.
quotes.name: Hermann Weyl

quotes.message: Mathematics is the tool specially suited for dealing with abstract concepts of any kind and there is no limit to its power in this field.
quotes.name: P. Dirac.

quotes.message: The power of mathematics is often to change one thing into another, to change geometry into language.
quotes.name: Marcus Du Sautoy

quotes.message: Mathematics is the gate and key to science.
quotes.name: Roger Bacon

quotes.message: God used beautiful mathematics in creating the world.
quotes.name: Paul Dirac

quotes.message: Mathematics is a game played according to certain rules with meaningless marks on paper.
quotes.name: David Hilbert

quotes.message: Mathematics is written for mathematicians.
quotes.name: Nicolaus Copernicus

quotes.message: The science of pure mathematics, in its modern developments, may claim to be the most original creation of the human spirit.
quotes.name: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.message: The most painful thing about mathematics is how far away you are from being able to use it after you have learned it.
quotes.name: James Newman

quotes.message: Mathematics is concerned only with the enumeration and comparison of relations.
quotes.name: Carl Friedrich Gauss

quotes.message: Mathematics cannot handle physical quantities like density that literally go to infinity.
quotes.name: Gregory Benford

quotes.message: The art of doing mathematics consists in finding that special case which contains all the germs of generality.
quotes.name: David Hilbert

quotes.message: Mathematics allows for no hypocrisy and no vagueness.
quotes.name: Stendhal

quotes.message: Mathematics is as old as Man.
quotes.name: Stefan Banach

quotes.message: Thus, in a sense, mathematics has been most advanced by those who distinguished themselves by intuition rather than by rigorous proofs.
quotes.name: Felix Klein

quotes.message: What is best in mathematics deserves not merely to be learned as a task but to be assimilated as a part of daily thought, and brought again and again before the mind with ever-renewed encouragement.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Mathematics, rightly viewed, possesses not only truth, but supreme beauty.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: For the things of this world cannot be made known without a knowledge of mathematics.
quotes.name: Roger Bacon

quotes.message: You do not study mathematics because it helps you build a bridge. You study mathematics because it is the poetry of the universe. Its beauty transcends mere things.
quotes.name: Johnathan David Farley

quotes.message: Mathematics may be defined as the subject in which we never know what we are talking about, nor whether what we are saying is true.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Mathematics is a place where you can do things which you can't do in the real world.
quotes.name: Marcus Du Sautoy

quotes.message: Without mathematics, there's nothing you can do. Everything around you is mathematics. Everything around you is numbers.
quotes.name: Shakuntala Devi

quotes.message: Mathematics takes us into the region of absolute necessity, to which not only the actual word, but every possible word, must conform.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Mathematics has beauty and romance. It's not a boring place to be, the mathematical world. It's an extraordinary place; it's worth spending time there.
quotes.name: Marcus Du Sautoy

quotes.message: Logic and mathematics are nothing but specialised linguistic structures.
quotes.name: Jean Piaget

quotes.message: One of the most amazing things about mathematics is the people who do math aren't usually interested in application, because mathematics itself is truly a beautiful art form. It's structures and patterns, and that's what we love, and that's what we get off on.
quotes.name: Danica Mckellar

quotes.message: Mathematics is, as it were, a sensuous logic, and relates to philosophy as do the arts, music, and plastic art to poetry.
quotes.name: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.message: All mathematics is is a language that is well tuned, finely honed, to describe patterns; be it patterns in a star, which has five points that are regularly arranged, be it patterns in numbers like 2, 4, 6, 8, 10 that follow very regular progression.
quotes.name: Brian Greene

quotes.message: The abstract analysis of the world by mathematics and physics rests on the concepts of space and time.
quotes.name: James J. Gibson

quotes.message: If a man's wit be wandering, let him study the mathematics.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Mathematics is the language with which God wrote the universe.
quotes.name: Galileo

quotes.message: Mathematics is the music of reason.
quotes.name: James Joseph Sylvester

quotes.message: Mathematics knows no races or geographic boundaries; for mathematics, the cultural world is one country.
quotes.name: David Hilbert

quotes.message: A lot of music is mathematics. It's balance.
quotes.name: Mel Brooks

quotes.message: Mathematics is the art of giving the same name to different things.
quotes.name: Henri Poincare

quotes.message: In mathematics the art of proposing a question must be held of higher value than solving it.
quotes.name: Georg Cantor

quotes.message: Mathematics consists in proving the most obvious thing in the least obvious way.
quotes.name: George Polya

quotes.message: The longer mathematics lives the more abstract - and therefore, possibly also the more practical - it becomes.
quotes.name: E. T. Bell

quotes.message: The essence of mathematics lies in its freedom.
quotes.name: Georg Cantor

quotes.message: Pure mathematics is, in its way, the poetry of logical ideas.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Mathematics is the most beautiful and most powerful creation of the human spirit.
quotes.name: Stefan Banach

quotes.message: The study of mathematics, like the Nile, begins in minuteness but ends in magnificence.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: Mathematics is the queen of science.
quotes.name: Carl Friedrich Gauss

quotes.message: Well, some mathematics problems look simple, and you try them for a year or so, and then you try them for a hundred years, and it turns out that they're extremely hard to solve.
quotes.name: Andrew Wiles
