quotes.message: But mathematics is the sister, as well as the servant, of the arts and is touched by the same madness and genius.
quotes.name: Marston Morse

quotes.message: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort.
quotes.name: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.message: Good well-being promotes good productivity.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Writing crystallizes thought and thought produces action.
quotes.name: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.message: Productivity is driven at the enterprise level. Better wages, better performing workplaces, are driven at the workplace level.
quotes.name: Bill Shorten

quotes.message: Connectivity is productivity whether it's in a modern office or an underdeveloped village.
quotes.name: Iqbal Quadir

quotes.message: It's not knowing what to do, it's doing what you know.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: Productivity is being able to do things that you were never able to do before.

quotes.message: Even though worker capacity and motivation are destroyed when leaders choose power over productivity, it appears that bosses would rather be in control than have the organization work well.
quotes.name: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.message: Individual income can grow only as fast as productivity rises.
quotes.name: Alex Berenson

quotes.message: Nothing is less productive than to make more efficient what should not be done at all.
quotes.name: Peter Drucker

quotes.message: Improve quality, you automatically improve productivity.
quotes.name: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.message: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes.name: Francis of Assisi

quotes.message: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Improved productivity means less human sweat, not more.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.
quotes.name: David Allen

quotes.message: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: Stressing output is the key to improving productivity, while looking to increase activity can result in just the opposite.
quotes.name: Paul Gauguin

quotes.message: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: There is no substitute for hard work.
quotes.name: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.message: Progress occurs where truths are questioned.
quotes.name: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

quotes.message: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: All mankind is divided into three classes: those that are immovable, those that are movable, and those that move.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Create with the heart; build with the mind.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Don't allow idleness to deceive you, for while you give him today, he steals tomorrow from you.
quotes.name: H. Croccoquill

quotes.message: The productivity of a work group seems to depend on how the group members see their own goals in relation to the goals of the organization.
quotes.name: Ken Blanchard

quotes.message: My goal is no longer to get more done, but rather to have less to do.
quotes.name: Francine Jay

quotes.message: The simple act of paying positive attention to people has a great deal to do with productivity.

quotes.message: Stop measuring days by degree of productivity and start experiencing them by degree of presence.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: Should you find yourself in a chronically leaking boat, energy devoted to changing vessels is likely to be more productive than energy devoted to patching leaks.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: There are risks and costs to action. But they are far less than the long range risks of comfortable inaction.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Productivity and efficiency can be achieved only step by step with sustained hard work, relentless attention to details and insistence on the highest standards of quality and performance.

quotes.message: Productivity is less about what you do with your time. And more about how you run your mind.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: You will boost your productivity with active exercise.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Forget what we became, what matters is what we've become, and our potentials to overcome.
quotes.name: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

quotes.message: Never leave that till tomorrow which you can do today.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: There's usually more than one way to complete a task. I will not stay stuck in my ways. I will remain motivated and open minded.
quotes.name: Izey Victoria Odiase

quotes.message: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it
quotes.name: Stephen Hawking

quotes.message: Productivity is a relative matter. And it's really insignificant: What is ultimately important is a writer's strongest books.
quotes.name: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.message: Start with good people, lay out the rules, communicate with your employees, motivate them and reward them. If you do all those things effectively, you can't miss.
quotes.name: Lee Iacocca

quotes.message: How poor are they that have not patience! What wound did ever heal but by degrees?
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: Some of us have become so addicted to pointing fingers at others for all the wrong that happens in our lives that self-assessment has become synonymous with blaming the victim.
quotes.name: LZ Granderson

quotes.message: Never point a finger where you never lent a hand.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: When a man points a finger at someone else, he should remember that four of his fingers are pointing at himself.
quotes.name: Louis Nizer

quotes.message: All of us should be much more humble and contrite when we point the finger at somebody else, because four more fingers are pointing back at us.
quotes.name: Michael Eric Dyson

quotes.message: When we assign blame we are pointing the finger to who or what is responsible for a fault or for a wrong doing. We are trying to make others accountable. Blaming does not solve a problem it usually only makes people defensive.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: ‎When you point your finger at someone, anyone, it is often a moment of judgement. We point our fingers when we want to scold someone, point out what they have done wrong. But each time we point, we simultaneously point three fingers back at ourselves.
quotes.name: Christopher Pike

quotes.message: No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Most of us can read the writing on the wall; we just assume it's addressed to someone else.
quotes.name: Ivern Ball

quotes.message: Blaming is pointing out there, rather than in here, into your own mind, when you find yourself in a painful or uncomfortable experience. Blame means shifting the responsibility for where you are onto someone or something else, rather than accepting responsibility for your role in the experience.
quotes.name: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.message: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers - but never blame yourself. It's never your fault. But it's always your fault, because if you wanted to change you're the one who has got to change.
quotes.name: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.message: One of the annoying things about believing in free will and individual responsibility is the difficulty of finding somebody to blame your problems on. And when you do find somebody, it's remarkable how often his picture turns up on your driver's license.
quotes.name: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: Blame is just a lazy person’s way of making sense of chaos.
quotes.name: Douglas Coupland

quotes.message: Men are forever pointing at others, which is why I always follow the knuckle and not the nail.
quotes.name: R. Scott Bakker

quotes.message: FOREFINGER, n. The finger commonly used in pointing out two malefactors.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: Stop pointing fingers and placing blame on others. Your life can only change to the degree that you accept responsibility for it.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Clean your finger before you point at my spots.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: I think that the most politically correct finger-pointing that anyone can ever do is to finger-point while standing in front of a really big mirror.
quotes.name: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.message: When you point your finger at someone, look where the other fingers point.
quotes.name: Jamaican Proverb

quotes.message: Never point out the mistakes of another with a dirty finger.
quotes.name: Italian Proverb

quotes.message: The one who points his fingers has three pointing back at him.
quotes.name: Native American Proverb

quotes.message: Everybody wants to take responsibility when you win, but when you fail, all these fingers are pointing.
quotes.name: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.message: Wherever you find a problem, you will usually find the finger-pointing of blame. Society is addicted to playing the victim.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: It's always the ones with the dirty hands pointing the fingers.

quotes.message: You take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing: no one to blame.

quotes.message: The man who smiles when things go wrong has thought of someone to blame it on.
quotes.name: Robert Bloch

quotes.message: Responsibility: A detachable burden easily shifted to the shoulders of God, Fate, Fortune, Luck or one's neighbor. In the days of astrology it was customary to unload it upon a star.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: Don't focus on the speck in your brother's eye while ignoring the log in your own eye.
quotes.name: Jesus in Matthew 7:5

quotes.message: Blame is for God and small children.
quotes.name: Dustin Hoffman

quotes.message: Before pointing fingers make sure your hands are clean.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: At the end of the day, you are solely responsible for your success and your failure. And the sooner you realize that, you accept that, and integrate that into your work ethic, you will start being successful. As long as you blame others for the reason you aren't where you want to be, you will always be a failure.
quotes.name: Erin Cummings

quotes.message: The best years of your life are the ones in which you decide your problems are your own. You do not blame them on your mother, the ecology, or the president. You realize that you control your own destiny.
quotes.name: Albert Ellis

quotes.message: All too often we have been pulled away from being honest with ourselves and drawn into a game of blaming others for bad situations.
quotes.name: Joseph E. McGuire

quotes.message: When you blame yourself, you learn from it. If you blame someone else, you don't learn nothing, cause hey, it's not your fault, it's his fault, over there.

quotes.message: All of the things that have happened in my life have been self-propelled. I can't blame anybody else or point a finger at anybody.

quotes.message: Psychologically, it's always more pleasurable to blame others for our problems than it is to acknowledge our own responsibility.
quotes.name: Barry Eisler

quotes.message: The blame game is a waste of time. Any time you're busy fixing blame, you're wasting energy and not fixing the problem.

quotes.message: The human race is facing all kinds of problems, and all we are doing is pointing fingers and saying, 'Your interpretation of the problem is different from my interpretations of the problem.

quotes.message: It's so much easier to point a finger than to take responsibility yourself, isn't it? Maybe it isn't so simple as this person's fault or that one. Maybe we make up the dance together, as we go along, and no one knows what the result will be.

quotes.message: When we blame, we give away our power.

quotes.message: Blaming others is nothing more than excusing yourself.

quotes.message: You can blame the other guy for saying it, or you can look at yourself and say, 'I must have contributed to this.

quotes.message: Your 'hand-shake' can encourage tens of people while your 'finger-pointing' can turn ten thousands away from you!
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: It’s always easy to blame others. You can spend your entire life blaming the world, but your success and failures are entirely your own responsibility.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Solutions are not found by pointing fingers; they are reached by extending hands.
quotes.name: Aysha Taryam

quotes.message: When others, a man begins to blame . He'll soon find himself alone, . The same.

quotes.message: And so, pointing fingers become pointing guns, because nobody listens to fingers.

quotes.message: Stop the blame game.
quotes.name: Eric Thomas

quotes.message: If you are looking to inspire people then blaming is the last thing you want to do. To inspire others, focus your attention on the solution not the blame. No good comes from blame, good comes from finding a way to correct the situation.

quotes.message: Sometimes you have to blame yourself before you can blame others.

quotes.message: Easy to judge the mistakes of others, difficult to recognize our own mistakes.

quotes.message: You can only lose what you cling to.

quotes.message: In the process of letting go you will lose many things from the past, but you will find yourself.

quotes.message: Change has to come for life to struggle forward.

quotes.message: We need to learn to let go as easily as we grasp and we will find our hands full and our minds empty.

quotes.message: What does it matter, if you let go? For the weight that is on you means nothing and never meant anything.

quotes.message: Renew, release, let go. Yesterday's gone. There's nothing you can do to bring it back. You can't should've done something. You can only DO something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment.

quotes.message: By letting it go it all gets done. The world is won by those who let it go. But when you try and try, the world is beyond the winning.

quotes.message: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.

quotes.message: Absorb what is useful. Discard what is not. Add what is uniquely your own.

quotes.message: We must learn to let go, to give up, to make room for the things we have prayed for and desired.

quotes.message: People have a hard time letting go of their suffering. Out of a fear of the unknown, they prefer suffering that is familiar.

quotes.message: The farther behind I leave the past, the closer I am to forging my own character.

quotes.message: Keep what is worth keeping and with the breath of kindness blow the rest away.

quotes.message: Be not overcome by evil but repay evil with good.

quotes.message: Beauty without virtue is a flower without perfume.

quotes.message: Character is easier kept than recovered.

quotes.message: Civility costs nothing and buys everything.

quotes.message: Do good and care not to whom.

quotes.message: Do what comes natural.

quotes.message: Don't talk unless you can improve the silence.

quotes.message: Give credit where credit is due.

quotes.message: Good example is the best sermon.

quotes.message: Good wine needs no bush.
quotes.name: R. Taverner

quotes.message: Goodness does not consist in greatness but greatness in goodness.

quotes.message: Grace thou thy house and let not that grace thee.

quotes.message: Handsome is as handsome does.

quotes.message: If evils come not then our fears are in vain; and if they do, fear but augments the pain.

quotes.message: If I keep my character, I'll be rich enough.

quotes.message: If you are not good for yourself, how can you be good for others.

quotes.message: If you make yourself into a doormat, people will wipe their feet on you.

quotes.message: If you want to lift yourself up, lift someone else up.

quotes.message: If you'ld have a servant that you like, serve yourself.

quotes.message: It is better to take many injuries than to give one.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: It is easy to kick a person when he is down.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: It's an ill bird that fouls his own nest.

quotes.message: No one is hurt by doing the right thing.

quotes.message: Nobility is not a birthright, but is defined by one's actions.

quotes.message: Outside show is a poor substitute for inner worth.

quotes.message: People show their character by what they laugh at.

quotes.message: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Seek virtue and of that posest, to Providence resign the rest.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Sweet are the slumbers of a virtuous man.

quotes.message: td>Caesar did not merit the triumphal car more than he that conquers himself.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The best way to keep good acts in memory is to repeat them.
quotes.name: Cato

quotes.message: The love of liberty is the love of others; the love of power is the love of ourselves.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: The one who understands does not speak; the one who speaks does not understand.

quotes.message: The pleasure of doing good is the only one that will not wear out.

quotes.message: The real art of conversation is not only saying the right thing at the right moment but also to leave unsaid the wrong thing at the most tempting moment.

quotes.message: The wise and the brave dares own that he was wrong.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Virtue alone is true nobility.

quotes.message: Virtue is like a rich stone, it's best plain set.

quotes.message: Wealth and content are not always bedfellows.

quotes.message: What you cannot avoid, welcome.

quotes.message: When love and skill go together, expect a masterpiece.

quotes.message: When you go to a donkey's house, don't talk about ears.

quotes.message: Where you were born is less important than how you live.
quotes.name: Turkish

quotes.message: Who is strong? He that can conquer his bad habits.

quotes.message: You are what you eat.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: You become what you think about.

quotes.message: You can't stop a pig from wallowing in the mud.
quotes.name: Yoruba - West Africa

quotes.message: Remembering our loved ones is breathing life into their fading images, that we might once more see their faces and pass along a tearful I miss you.

quotes.message: People imagine that missing a loved one works kind of like missing cigarettes,' he said. 'The first day is really hard but the next day is less hard and so forth, easier and easier the longer you go on. But instead it's like missing water. Every day, you notice the person's absence more.

quotes.message: When you miss someone it's weird your body doesn't function normally as it should. Because I miss you, and my heart it's not steady my soul it sings numb. Fingers are cold like you your soul.

quotes.message: Love is missing someone whenever you're apart, but somehow feeling warm inside because you're close in heart.
quotes.name: Kay Knudsen

quotes.message: Sometimes, when one person is missing, the whole world seems depopulated.

quotes.message: Missing someone is the worst feeling in the world
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Without you here, the sun forgets to shine.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Missing someone is not about how long it has been since you have seen them or the amount of time since you have talkedâ€¦it is about that very moment when you are doing something and wishing they were there with you.
quotes.name: Dru Edmund Kucherera

quotes.message: Just because you miss someone doesn't mean you need them back in your life. Missing is just a part of moving on.
quotes.name: Macklemore

quotes.message: Missing u is my way of loving u.
quotes.name: Saravana Kumar Murugan

quotes.message: Missing you is flashes of our past and fantasies of our future with the hard irony of the absence of our present as present occurs.

quotes.message: Where you used to be, there is a hole in the world, which I find myself constantly walking around in the daytime, and falling in at night. I miss you like hell.
quotes.name: Edna St Vincent Millay

quotes.message: But nothing makes a room feel emptier than wanting someone in it.

quotes.message: Losing people you love affects you. It is buried inside of you and becomes this big, deep hole of ache. It doesn't magically go away, even when you stop officially mourning.

quotes.message: Missing someone gets easier every day because even though it's one day further from the last time you saw each other, it's one day closer to the next time you will.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Missing someone is your heart's way of reminding you, that you love them.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: The worst thing you can do if you missing someone or need them is let it hide from them.
quotes.name: pooja

quotes.message: I miss him for all the things he forgot to see in himself & if I'm lucky fate will help us rekindle a flame that never got set alight in the first place.
quotes.name: Nikki Rowe

quotes.message: Each time I miss you, a star falls down from the sky. So, if you looked up at the sky and found it dark with no stars, it is all your fault.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: The only thing missing from your life is what you're failing to bring to it.
quotes.name: Brent Smith

quotes.message: If you wanna know how much I miss you, try to catch rain drops, the ones you catch is how much you miss me, & the other you miss is how much I miss you.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Missing you every day is part of loving you, and loving you that makes me miss you every day.
quotes.name: Analiza Garcia

quotes.message: Sometimes what you miss the most is the way a loved one made you feel about yourself.
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: For as long as the world spins and the earth is green with new wood, she will lie in this box and not in my arms.
quotes.name: Lurlene McDaniel

quotes.message: When we miss someone, often, what we really miss is the part of us that with this someone awakens.
quotes.name: Luigina Sgarro

quotes.message: Missing someone enlightens how the person means to you and broadens the feelings shared.
quotes.name: Unarine Ramaru

quotes.message: It’s hard when you miss people. But you know if you miss them, that means you're lucky. It means you had someone special in your life, someone worth missing.
quotes.name: Nikki Schiefelbein

quotes.message: You can love someone so much, but you can never love people as much as you can miss them.
quotes.name: John Green

quotes.message: And they can’t understand, what hurts more—missing the other person or pretending not to.
quotes.name: Khadija Rupa

quotes.message: I think perhaps I will always hold a candle for you – even until it burns my hand. And when the light has long since gone …. I will be there in the darkness holding what remains, quite simply because I cannot let go.
quotes.name: Ranata Suzuki

quotes.message: I miss that feeling of connection. Knowing he was out there somewhere thinking about me at the same time I was thinking about him.
quotes.name: Ranata Suzuki

quotes.message: No, I don't miss you... Not in a way that one is missed. But I think of you. Sometimes. In the way that one might think of the summer sunshine. On a winter night...
quotes.name: Sreesha Divakaran

quotes.message: The absence of a message sometimes is a presence of one.
quotes.name: Hasse Jerner

quotes.message: His eyes missed her as much as the rest of him.
quotes.name: Rainbow Rowell Eleanor and Park

quotes.message: It's wild to miss someone so much, and yet in order to care for them, you have to constantly say goodbye.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Acevedo

quotes.message: Why are you there even in my silences? Why does my loneliness keep talking about you?
quotes.name: Avijeet Das

quotes.message: Missing someone you love, is like falling sick, that kills you, every second, over and over again.
quotes.name: Rakesh Balu

quotes.message: Vengeance is God's job, not ours.
quotes.name: F. LaGard Smith

quotes.message: Part of me wants justice for this. Part of me wants to never cause harm to another.
quotes.name: Ken Scholes

quotes.message: The city guardsmen were like the keres, doom-bringers of merciless vengeance.
quotes.name: Janet Morris

quotes.message: A tardy vengeance shares the tyrant's guilt.

quotes.message: Vengeance taken will often tear the heart and torment the conscience.

quotes.message: And though the villain 'scape a while, he feels. Slow vengeance, like a bloodhound, at his heels.

quotes.message: To treat a man with kindness rather than vengeance is the way to move him. Vengeance may break his spirit; but kindness will break his heart.
quotes.name: William Barclay

quotes.message: For vengeance is an emptiness and he that seeketh it wasteth himself.
quotes.name: Jeffery Farnol

quotes.message: Before you embark on a journey of revenge, dig two graves.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Vengeance cannot abide the agony of grace.
quotes.name: Anne Elisabeth Stengl

quotes.message: In high vengeance there is noble scorn.

quotes.message: I'm not violent, I don't believe in killing people, but standing up for yourself, speaking out against injustice, is another form of vengeance.

quotes.message: Vengeance is mine; I will repay.

quotes.message: Vengeance is not the point; change is. But the trouble is that in most people's minds the thought of victory and the thought of punishing the enemy coincide.

quotes.message: There was a time when metal ruled the world and I don't see any reason why it should be different now.

quotes.message: When critics sit in judgment it is hard to tell where justice leaves off and vengeance begins.

quotes.message: Vengeance is sweet. Vengeance taken when the vengee isn't sure who the venger is, is sweeter still.

quotes.message: Vengeance has no foresight.

quotes.message: The thirst for vengeance was the beautiful nature which Homer imitated.

quotes.message: Retribution often means that we eventually do to ourselves what we have done unto others.

quotes.message: Just vengeance does not call for punishment.

quotes.message: Vengeance is in my heart, death in my hand, blood and revenge are hammering in my head.

quotes.message: One good act of vengeance deserves another.

quotes.message: To seek greatness is the only righteous vengeance.

quotes.message: An eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth.

quotes.message: Vengeance is one of life's great motivators.

quotes.message: If an injury has to be done to a man it should be so severe that his vengeance need not be feared.

quotes.message: Vengeance is a form of reciprocity in which each deed begets another. Each act of vengeance is a response to a previous wrong.

quotes.message: Always seek justice, but love only mercy. To love justice and hate mercy is but a doorway to more injustice.

quotes.message: Vengeance is a monster of appetite, forever bloodthirsty and never filled.

quotes.message: I don't believe in the death penalty, but I understand personal vengeance.

quotes.name: Jane Goldman

quotes.name: St. Thomas Aquinas

quotes.message: A society built upon a foundation of vengeance is a society doomed to destroy itself.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: I know there are people who believe you should forgive and forget. For the record, I'd like to say I'm a big fan of forgiveness as long as I'm given the opportunity to get even first.
quotes.name: Sue Grafton

quotes.message: And I will strike down upon thee with great vengeance and furious anger those who attempt to poison and destroy my brothers.
quotes.name: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.message: In theory it may seem all right to some, but when it comes to being made the instrument of the Lord's vengeance, I myself don't like it.
quotes.name: Robert Shaw

quotes.message: Deep vengeance is the daughter of deep silence.
quotes.name: Vittorio Alfieri

quotes.message: On wrongs swift vengeance waits.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: If you're betrayed, release disappointment at once. By that way, the bitterness has no time to take root.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Nothing is more costly, nothing is more sterile, than vengeance.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Revenge is an act of passion; vengeance of justice. Injuries are revenged; crimes are avenged.

quotes.message: Vengeance is a delicious fruit, that must ripen in order that we may fully enjoy it.
quotes.name: Émile Gaboriau

quotes.message: You are not special. You are not a beautiful or unique snowflake. You're the same decaying organic matter as everything else.

quotes.message: Sometimes it feels as if everything in life is just something we haul to the grave.

quotes.message: Keep courage. Whatever you do, do not feel sorry for yourself. You will win in a great age of opportunity.

quotes.message: Self-confidence gives you the freedom to make mistakes and cope with failure without feelingthat your world has come to an end or that you are a worthless person.

quotes.message: I don't deserve a soul, yet I still have one. I know because it hurts.

quotes.message: Of all our infirmities, the most savage is to despise our being.

quotes.message: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection

quotes.message: Never feel self-pity, the most destructive emotion there is. How awful to be caught up in the terrible squirrel cage of self.

quotes.message: God does not love us because we are valuable; rather we are valuable because God loves us.

quotes.message: Whether you think you can or think you can't you are right.

quotes.message: What is written without effort is in general read without pleasure.

quotes.message: Happiness is a choice that requires effort at times.

quotes.message: The best effort of a fine person is felt after we have left their presence.

quotes.message: The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be.

quotes.message: Make every effort matter, and always make the following effort better than the last one.

quotes.message: Understand from top to bottom what the effort requires.

quotes.message: It is always the start that requires the greatest effort.

quotes.message: Without some goal and some effort to reach it, no one can live.

quotes.message: Education comes from within; you get it by struggle and effort and thought.

quotes.message: The greater the effort, the greater the glory.

quotes.message: It takes a lot of effort to do things effortlessly.

quotes.message: Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work.

quotes.message: One must develop an instinct for what one can just barely achieve through one's greatest efforts.

quotes.message: A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.

quotes.message: Trees are the earth's endless effort to speak to the listening heaven.

quotes.message: An excuse becomes an obstacle in your journey to success when it is made in place of your best effort or when it is used as the object of the blame.

quotes.message: Failure is something many people take great efforts to avoid but failure is essential for growth and learning.

quotes.message: By letting you suffer a little or work harder now and achieve it on your own, I know that I am doing you a better service than the disservice of giving you what you want without efforts.
quotes.name: James Fray

quotes.message: We help each other and we both benefit from these efforts.
quotes.name: James Fray

quotes.message: Nothing prospers without effort.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: What can't be done easily rarely gets done.
quotes.name: John Taylor Wood

quotes.message: When you can't change the direction of the winds, adjust your sails.
quotes.name: John Taylor Wood

quotes.message: The greater the price in effort, the greater the reward.

quotes.message: Don't wait for the ship to come in. Row out and meet it.

quotes.message: All human actions have one of these causes: chance, nature, compulsion, habit, reason, passion and desire.
quotes.name: John Taylor Wood

quotes.message: Sometimes, in an effort to improve one area of our life, we discover that what we're learning, is valuable to others too.

quotes.message: In an effort to become more efficient in one are, we ultimately create ways to replace it with something new.

quotes.message: It can be a shock for people to realize it still takes time & effort to realize a dream.

quotes.message: You can't live your dream if you're living like most people.

quotes.message: A child at play isn't wasting effort, like a craftsman sharpening his tools isn't wasting time.

quotes.message: A surplus of effort could overcome a deficit of confidence.
quotes.name: Sonia Sotomayor

quotes.message: If people knew how hard I worked to get my mastery, it wouldn't seem so wonderful at all. 'It's hard to be great. But it's well worth the effort.

quotes.message: If you want to be successful, the key is finding something you're good at and focusing your efforts to help people.

quotes.message: Dreaming is easy, but actual moving the mountains or the hills that need moving requires some effort.

quotes.message: Maintaining your enthusiasm is the real difference between an impressive effort, and a total victory.
quotes.name: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.message: Artist rarely criticize other artists because they appreciate the artistic effort. Ordinary people are often critical based on their ignorance of that effort.
quotes.name: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.message: If you make little effort you deserve little results, everything in the universe is governed by this principle.

quotes.message: Inspiration is given to inspire. We give what we receive.

quotes.message: We may need inspiration ourselves one hour, and be called upon to give inspiration to others the next.
quotes.name: David O. Mears

quotes.name: David O. Mears

quotes.message: Good deeds inspire remembrance in return.
quotes.name: David O. Mears

quotes.message: Continue in such a work of inspiration for others, the world would take on a new appearance within less than twelve months.
quotes.name: David O. Mears

quotes.message: Hard work isn't what you think it is. It's more about love than it is about money and material possessions.
quotes.name: Michael Crews

quotes.message: Hard work is about loving yourself enough to be the best you can be. It's about loving the people you work with enough to be an effective team player who performs well so that everyone else can succeed, too.
quotes.name: Michael Crews

quotes.message: Hard work is about using your abilities for purposes greater than yourself. You may get rich in the process, and, if you're a real hard worker, you'll use much of the wealth you generate to help others.
quotes.name: Michael Crews

quotes.message: Hard work is a precious gift. If you're able to work hard, generate income for yourself, and enrich the lives of your community, then success will surely be yours.
quotes.name: Michael Crews

quotes.message: Where there are difficulties, there are ways too. It you have the passion to do something and more ahead, then you can achieve everything in life. There is a need to have courage.
quotes.name: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.message: You struggle at every point in your life. You die everyday and live everyday. In these conditions, the aim before us is to please everyone be becoming better.
quotes.name: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.message: If you want to win in life and get success, then you would have to remove your weakness and make it your strength, If you prove yourself, then there would be no difference between success and you.
quotes.name: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.message: Success is more of a lifestyle but a lifestyle with purpose. When every are of your life is prioritized and balanced you will begin to prosper.
quotes.name: William A. McLean

quotes.message: You control your life. You control your path to success.
quotes.name: Garrett Pierson

quotes.message: Desire is a choice that you hold within your heart, your mind, and your soul. The true desire within is what will lead you to action and the opportunities of success.
quotes.name: Garrett Pierson

quotes.message: Success is more a function of consistent common sense than it is of genius.
quotes.name: Ann Wang

quotes.message: Another thing that successful people have obtained in their lifetime is self-control, self-control over their thoughts, their desires, and their successes.
quotes.name: Garrett Pierson

quotes.message: Any problem, big or small, within a family, always seems to start with bad communication. Someone isn't listening.
quotes.name: Emma Thompson

quotes.message: Family quarrels are bitter things. They don't go according to any rules. They're not like aches or wounds, they're more like splits in the skin that won't heal because there's not enough material.
quotes.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.message: In every dispute between parent and child, both cannot be right, but they may be, and usually are, both wrong. It is this situation which gives family life its peculiar hysterical charm.
quotes.name: Isaac Rosenfeld

quotes.message: Most couples have not had hundreds of arguments; they've had the same argument hundreds of times.
quotes.name: Gay Hendricks

quotes.message: Family quarrels have a total bitterness unmatched by others. Yet it sometimes happens that they also have a kind of tang, a pleasantness beneath the unpleasantness, based on the tacit understanding that this is not for keeps; that any limb you climb out on will still be there later for you to climb back.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: It doesn't matter what kind of problems a family is having; it should always stay in the family.
quotes.name: Scott Weiland

quotes.message: We're a very close family and we're a very real family, and I think every real family has real problems.
quotes.name: Emilio Estevez

quotes.message: I can't say it's not painful being estranged from most of my family. I wish it could be otherwise.
quotes.name: LaToya Jackson

quotes.message: Family problems come in all shapes and sizes; some are short-lived and easily managed, while others are more chronic and difficult to handle.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Sometimes problems don't require a solution to solve them; instead they require maturity to outgrow them.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: How many solutions are found to family problems if we take time to reflect? If we think of a husband or wife and we dream about their good qualities that they have? Don't ever lose the illusion of when you were boyfriend and girlfriend!
quotes.name: Pope Francis

quotes.message: I don't think a female running a house is a problem, a broken family. It's perceived as one because of the notion that a head is a man.
quotes.name: Toni Morrison

quotes.message: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: You can't teach a son to be loyal if the father is not loyal. The same applies with the mother and her daughter.
quotes.name: Mercy Pheona

quotes.message: The American family is not simply changing; it is getting weaker. . . . Family decline drives some of our most urgent social problems. . . . The heart of the family problem lies in the steady breakup of the two-parent home.
quotes.name: David Popenoe

quotes.message: A busy mother makes slothful daughters.
quotes.name: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.message: Otherwise, you just become partners managing the kids and life, and that makes your marriage more vulnerable to problems down the road.
quotes.name: Laura Berman

quotes.message: The old problems - love, money, security, status, health, etc. - are still here to plague us or please us.
quotes.name: Shelley Berman

quotes.message: Pick a dysfunction and it's a family problem.
quotes.name: Robert Downey, Jr.

quotes.message: Families and their problems go on and on, and they aren't solved, they're dealt with.
quotes.name: Roger Ebert

quotes.message: I was the black sheep of the family, and my mother never really understood me.
quotes.name: Andre Rieu

quotes.message: After every storm the sun will smile; for every problem there is a solution, and the soul's indefeasible duty is to be of good cheer.
quotes.name: William R. Alger

quotes.message: The best way to resolve any problem in the human world is for all sides to sit down and talk.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: The two of you — father and son— should take walks in the evening and talk (without purpose or routes) about this and that.
quotes.name: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.message: My father left me his words. From them I remember both his outlook on life and his voice, positive, and clear. He was someone who didn't worry about small problems. His advice here—leave it; let it go— is inspiring.
quotes.name: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.message: The place of the father in the modern suburban family is very small one, particularly if he plays golf.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Where but in Kenya can a man whose grandfather was a cannibal watch a really good game of polo?
quotes.name: Marina Sulzberger

quotes.message: Smartness runs in my family. When I went to school I was so smart my teacher was in my class for five years.
quotes.name: George Burns

quotes.message: Sometimes life can be difficult. Life happens.
quotes.name: Brooke Jorden

quotes.message: Insanity is hereditary; you get it from your children.
quotes.name: Sam Levenson

quotes.message: A family harmony would make so essential a part of my happiness that I could never enjoy myself without it.
quotes.name: Abigail Adams

quotes.message: We have been a scattered family. If some of my children could now be collected round the parent Hive it appears to me, that it would add much to the happiness of our declining years.
quotes.name: Abigail Adams

quotes.message: I want to spend more time with my family, but I'm not sure they want to spend more time with me.
quotes.name: Esther Rantzen

quotes.message: My father is a bastard . My Ma's an S.O.B.. My grandpa's always plastered . My grandma pushes tea . My sister wears a moustache . My brother wears a dress . Goodness gracious, that's why I'm a mess.
quotes.name: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.message: Parentage is a very important profession, but no test of fitness for it is ever imposed in the interest of the children.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: All happy families resemble one another, but each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: Do not display to others your family's ugly problems.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.message: There is no school equal to decent home and no teachers equal to honest virtuous parents.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: There is too much stress today on material things. Teach your children not so much the value of cents but the sense of values.
quotes.name: Morris Franklin

quotes.message: The family has become too scared of its children; the children too insecure in their remoteness from their parents; and the church too much of a social welfare organization for the good of the family, the church, or society.
quotes.name: A. Whitney Griswold

quotes.message: The best legacy a parent can leave his children is more of his time every day.
quotes.name: O.A. Battista

quotes.message: It is only necessary to make war with five things; . with the maladies of the body . the ignorances of the mind . with the passions of the body . with the seditions of the city . and the discords of families.
quotes.name: Pythagoras

quotes.message: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Think of your family today and every day thereafter, don't let the busy world of today keep you from showing how much you love and appreciate your family.
quotes.name: Josiah Royce

quotes.message: If we're sitting at dinner and there's no conversation going on because everybody's got their head someplace else in their iPhone, that's a family problem that needs to be solved.
quotes.name: Ross W. Greene

quotes.message: The more you’re loving and understanding, the more your kids will sing.
quotes.name: Maxime Lagace

quotes.message: When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching — they are your family.
quotes.name: Jim Butcher

quotes.message: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
quotes.name: Anthony Brandt

quotes.message: Any woman who understands the problems of running a home will be nearer to understanding the problems of running a country.
quotes.name: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.message: Free will is an illusion. People always choose the perceived path of greatest pleasure.
quotes.name: Scott Adams

quotes.message: Free will, though it makes evil possible, is also the only thing that makes possible any love or goodness or joy worth having.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: And one who is just of his own free will shall not lack for happiness; and he will never come to utter ruin.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: Let all the 'free-will' in the world do all it can with all its strength; it will never give rise to a single instance of ability to avoid being hardened if God does not give the Spirit, or of meriting mercy if it is left to its own strength.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: If God thinks this state of war in the universe a price worth paying for free will...then we may take it it is worth paying.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: The essence of spiritual life is simply to use our free will properly.
quotes.name: Radhanath Swami

quotes.message: The neutral view of free will is impossible. It involves choice without desire.
quotes.name: R. C. Sproul

quotes.message: Free will is to mind what chance is to matter.
quotes.name: Charles Darwin

quotes.message: Free will is not the liberty to do whatever one likes, but the power of doing whatever one sees ought to be done, even in the very face of otherwise overwhelming impulse. There lies freedom, indeed.
quotes.name: George Macdonald

quotes.message: Morality pertains only to the sphere of man's free will - only to those actions which are open to his choice.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Man has reason, discrimination and free-will such as it is. The brute has no such thing. It is not a free agent, and knows no distinction between virtue and vice, good and evil. Man, being a free agent, knows these distinctions, and when he follows his higher nature, shows himself far superior to the brute, but when he follows his baser nature can show himself lower than the brute.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Mankind has a free will; but it is free to milk cows and to build houses, nothing more.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: The greatest judgment which God himself can, in the present life, inflict upon a man is to leave him in the hand of his own boasted 'free'-will.
quotes.name: Augustus Toplady

quotes.message: ...free will does not mean one will, but many wills conflicting in one man. Freedom cannot be conceived simply.
quotes.name: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.message: You can't have it both ways. You can't have both free will and a benevolent higher power who protects you from yourself.
quotes.name: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.message: No one has free will until they are an adult, and by then the choices that were made for them, have already set them on a course that gives limited freedom in the choices to be made.
quotes.name: J.D. Stroube

quotes.message: The question of free will is insoluble on strictly psychological grounds.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: Free will is the power of choosing good and evil.
quotes.name: Origen

quotes.message: No tribe unites with another of its own free will.
quotes.name: Arthur Keith

quotes.message: One of my core beliefs is that belief itself is a choice that can be made of our own free will.
quotes.name: Steve Pavlina

quotes.message: Our hands we open of our own free will, and the good flies, which we can never recall.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Think of destiny more like potentiality because of an element called - free will.
quotes.name: Ruben Papian

quotes.message: Contempt for the things people choose of their own free will is, at its heart, contempt for free will.
quotes.name: James Lileks

quotes.message: Free will does not enable any man to perform good works, unless he is assisted by grace; indeed, the special grace which the elect alone receive through regeneration.
quotes.name: John Calvin

quotes.message: You have fettered yourself of your own free will, man - break the fetters!
quotes.name: Halldor Laxness

quotes.message: It is only work that is done as freewill offering to humanity and to nature that does not bring with it any binding attachment.
quotes.name: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.message: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant: if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome.
quotes.name: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.message: I'm full of fears and I do my best to avoid difficulties and any kind of complications. I like everything around me to be clear as crystal and completely calm.
quotes.name: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.message: I just don't want to die without a few scars.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: The pine stays green in winter, wisdom in hardship.
quotes.name: Norman Douglas

quotes.message: The only thing that's the end of the world is the end of the world.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: In the midst of winter, I finally learned there was in me an invincible summer.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Enclose your heart in times of need with the steel of your determination and your strength. In doing this, all things will be bearable.
quotes.name: Lora Leigh

quotes.message: Given a choice between grief and nothing, I'd choose grief.
quotes.name: William Faulkner

quotes.message: Nothing is predestined. The obstacles of your past can become the gateways that lead to new beginnings.
quotes.name: Ralph H. Blum

quotes.message: The real tragedy of the poor is the poverty of their aspirations.
quotes.name: Adam Smith

quotes.message: It was no hardship to me to spend long hours reading and writing.
quotes.name: Patti Smith

quotes.message: The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it.
quotes.name: Moliere

quotes.message: There is no success without hardship.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: For every dark night, there's a brighter day.
quotes.name: Tupac Shakur

quotes.message: Never be afraid to fall apart because it is an opportunity to rebuild yourself the way you wish had been all along.
quotes.name: Rae Smith

quotes.message: I know God will not give me anything I can't handle. I just wish that He didn't trust me so much.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: God tests His people through hardship.
quotes.name: John Piper

quotes.message: After great pain, a formal feeling comes. The Nerves sit ceremonious, like tombs.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: As athletes, we're used to reacting quickly. Here, it's come, stop, come, stop. There's a lot of downtime. That's the toughest part of the day.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: The very greatest things, great thoughts, discoveries, inventions have usually been nurtured in hardship, often pondered over in sorrow, and at length established with difficulty.
quotes.name: Samuel Smiles

quotes.message: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: If a man cannot understand the beauty of life, it is probably because life never understood the beauty in him.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: If you can find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn't lead anywhere.
quotes.name: Frank A. Clark

quotes.message: What a weary time those years were, to have the desire and the need to live but not the ability.
quotes.name: Charles Bukowski

quotes.message: Everybody's at war with different things. I'm at war with my own heart sometimes.
quotes.name: Tupac Shakur

quotes.message: Your friends will believe in your potential, your enemies will make you live up to it.
quotes.name: Tim Fargo

quotes.message: You can't run away from trouble. There ain't no place that far.
quotes.name: Uncle Remus

quotes.message: The salvation of the world is in man's suffering.
quotes.name: William Faulkner

quotes.message: The robbed that smiles, steals something from the thief.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
quotes.name: Harry Golden

quotes.message: Sometimes the issue isn't that your problems are so big, it's that you see yourself as being so small.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem.
quotes.name: Captain Jack Sparrow

quotes.message: Life keeps throwing me curve balls and I don't even own a bat. At least my dodging skills are improving.
quotes.name: Jayleigh Cape

quotes.message: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: It seems like every time you come up something happens to bring you back down.
quotes.name: Tupac Shakur

quotes.message: Even cowards can endure hardship; only the brave can endure suspense.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: When you come out of the storm you won't be the same person who walked in. That's what this storm's all about.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: Say not that this or that thing came to thwart you; it only came to test you.
quotes.name: Muriel Strode

quotes.message: You have come into a hard world. I know of only one easy place in it, and that is the grave.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Hardship makes the world obscure.
quotes.name: Don DeLillo

quotes.message: I shall come, not as one who has escaped pain, but as one who has glorified it.
quotes.name: Muriel Strode

quotes.message: Fire tests gold, suffering tests brave men.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: I think men, growing up, you have to go through some form of hardship. You've got to harden the metal.
quotes.name: Ice T.

quotes.message: Don't know how I kept going. You just do. You have to, so you do.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Wein

quotes.message: To learn patience is not to rebel against every hardship.
quotes.name: Henri Nouwen

quotes.message: The healthy and strong individual is the one who asks for help when he needs it. Whether he's got an abscess on his knee or in his soul.
quotes.name: Rona Barrett

quotes.message: What a weary time those years were -- to have the desire and the need to live but not the ability.
quotes.name: Charles Bukowski

quotes.message: Did you hear about the rose that grew from a crack in the concrete? Proving nature's laws wrong, it learned to walk without having feet. Funny, it seems to by keeping it's dreams; it learned to breathe fresh air. Long live the rose that grew from concrete when no one else even cared.
quotes.name: Tupac Shakur

quotes.message: If a man cannot understand the beauty of life, it is probably because life never understood the beauty in him. If a man cannot understand the beauty of life, it is probably because life never understood the beauty in him.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Don't be too quick to draw conclusions from what happens to you; simply let it happen. Otherwise it will be too easy for you to look with blame... at your past, which naturally has a share with everything that now meets you.
quotes.name: Rainer Marie Rilke

quotes.message: There are many who don't wish to sleep for fear of nightmares. Sadly, there are many who don't wish to wake for the same fear.
quotes.name: Richelle Goodrich

quotes.message: When you leave home to follow your dreams, your road will probably be riddled with potholes, not always paved in happy Technicolor bricks. You'll probably be kicked to the ground 150 million times and told you're nuts by friends and strangers alike. As you progress you may feel lonely or terrified for your physical and emotional safety. You may overestimate your own capabilities or fail to live up to them, and you'll surely fall flat on your face once in a while.
quotes.name: Kelly Cutrone

quotes.message: it is clear that we must trust what is difficult; everything alive trusts in it, everything in Nature grows and defends itself any way it can and is spontaneously itself, tries to be itself at all costs and against all opposition. We know little, but that we must trust in what is difficult is a certainty that will never abandon us; it is good to be solitary, for solitude is difficult; that something is difficult must be one more reason for us to do it.
quotes.name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.message: It's easier to bleed than sweat
quotes.name: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.message: It's easier to bleed than sweat
quotes.name: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.message: It's easier to bleed than sweat
quotes.name: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.message: No one is without troubles, without personal hardships and genuine challenges. That fact may not be obvious because most people don't advertise their woes and heartaches. But nobody, not even the purest heart, escapes life without suffering battle scars.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: To those who, in spite of everything, still choose goodness
quotes.name: Marie Lu

quotes.message: It is more civilized to make fun of life than to bewail it
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Life has moments that feel as if the sun has blackened to tar and the entire world turned to ice.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: Always do more than he expects of you, never less. Never flinch at any task or hardship. And above all, never shame the lord you serve.
quotes.name: Lora Leigh

quotes.message: Easily mistaken, it is not about a love for adversity, it is about knowing a strength and a faith so great that adversity, in all its adverse manifestations, hardly even exists.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Explorers like to pretend that they are a select breed of people with iron nerve and an ability to endure terrible hardship.
quotes.name: Tahir Shah

quotes.message: Only hardship softens the hardness of the human heart.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: The worse the passage the more welcome the port.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: We need sometimes to escape into open solitudes, into aimlessness, into the moral holiday of running some pure hazard in order to sharpen the edge of life, to taste hardship, and to be compelled to work desperately for a moment at no matter what.
quotes.name: George Santayana

quotes.message: With hope, we can endure any hardship.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: There are as many kinds of Rastas as the reeds that grow on the riverbank. There's the baldhead Rasta, like me. There's the white Rasta, like you. There's the rootical Rasta...There's Congo Dread and Coptic Dread. But it all stem from the same thing, and it all go through the same place, the heart, you know.
quotes.name: Gerald Hausman

quotes.message: What is it about this movement--developing in the slums of West Kingston, Jamaica--that makes it so appealing to people of very different nationalities, ethnic backgrounds, socioeconomic standings, and academic interests?
quotes.name: Nathaniel Samuel Murrell

quotes.message: To many, dreadlocks are a symbol of defiance against 'Babylon', to others a way of manifesting individual, personal choice and being different from the mainstream aesthetic norms, whilst to others they are simply the natural way of wearing ones hair according to biblical scripture.
quotes.name: Katrin Hansing

quotes.message: Any interpretation of the significance of Rastafari must begin with the understanding that it is a conscious attempt by the African soul to free itself from the alienating fetters of colonialism and its contemporary legacies.
quotes.name: Ennis B. Edmonds

quotes.message: Rasta psychology is...resistance and liberation psychology--the sum total of the organized and spontaneous campaign against racist subjection, fired by the burning desire to be free from all forms of social, economic, and political dimination.
quotes.name: Clinton Hutton

quotes.message: Rasta is a concept, Rasta is a religion, Rasta is a faith, Rasta is you. You make yourself to be a Rasta. And in order to be a Rasta, you have to seek first the Kingdom of God, and all things shall be added.
quotes.name: Brother Yendi

quotes.message: Rastafarianism is the first mass movement among West Indians preoccupied with the task of looking into themselves and asking the fundamental question, Who am I? or What am I?
quotes.name: Dennis Forsythe

quotes.message: Above my bed, Bob's face I saw, my daddy looking at me so passionately, little brother. Well, in his eyes I saw the truth, mommy, the truth of a Rastaman, the truth of a iyaman.
quotes.name: Ziggy Marley

quotes.message: For if one days its coffee, the next day it may be tea, but if there is nothing at all, ALMIGHTY, I-n-I will still give thanks to Thee.
quotes.name: Robert Athlyi Rogers

quotes.message: JAH would never give the power to a baldhead. Run some crucify the dread. Time alone, oh! time will tell. Think you're in heaven, but you living in hell.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: It is not only war that can stop war but men of goodwill, conscious of their mission can deal with such deadly enemy.
quotes.name: Haile Selassie

quotes.message: Don't gain the world and lose your soul; wisdom is better than silver or gold.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: Everyone will someday be judged for what they do, and Jah is the only judge.
quotes.name: Dennis Brown

quotes.message: Enlightened leadership is spiritual if we understand spirituality not as some kind of religious dogma or ideology but as the domain of awareness where we experience values like truth, goodness, beauty, love and compassion, and also intuition, creativity, insight and focused attention.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: Life is one big road with lots of signs. So when you riding through the ruts, don't complicate your mind. Flee from hate, mischief and jealousy. Don't bury your thoughts, put your vision to reality .
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: This world was not created piecemeal. Africa was born no later and no earlier than any other geographical area on this globe. Africans, no more and no less than other men, possess all human attributes, talents and deficiencies, virtues and faults.
quotes.name: Haile Selassie I

quotes.message: Emancipate yourselves from mental slavery. None but ourselves can free our minds.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: Just because you are happy it does not mean that the day is perfect but that you have looked beyond its imperfections.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: Life and Jah are one in the same. Jah is the gift of existence. I am in some way eternal, I will never be duplicated. The singularity of every man and woman is Jah's gift. What we struggle to make of it is our sole gift to Jah. The process of what that struggle becomes, in time, the truth.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: The more people smoke herb, the more Babylon fall.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: Rastafarianism isn't recognized my the prison service, shall I register you as null religion.
quotes.name: Maureen Chadwick

quotes.message: A Rasta is someone who has been elected and who is making his calling and election sure to enter, holy Zion!
quotes.name: Empress Yuajah

quotes.message: Not every Rasta knows he is Rasta yet, but eventually he will have no choice but to know.
quotes.name: Empress Yuajah

quotes.message: Born Rasta's have spiritually inherited the values and beliefs of what it means to be Rastafari. In Rastafari we value respect and show love.
quotes.name: Empress Yuajah

quotes.message: Rastafari is a spiritual way of life, not a religion. We don't have hard and fast rules, we don't try to convert others, and we certainly don't believe anybody should die because they don't believe the same thing we do.
quotes.name: Empress Yuajah

quotes.message: Rastafarians are pro-life. We believe all life is valuable at all times.
quotes.name: Empress Yuajah

quotes.message: Rastafari is a way of life that acknowledges Jah is some very specific, special and spiritual ways.
quotes.name: Empress

quotes.message: To embrace Rastafari is a blessing. Convert to Rastafari is my way of sharing this blessing of my faith, with those who want to embrace it too. The more Rastafari minded individuals we have on the earth, the better the world will be.
quotes.name: Empress

quotes.message: A Rasta is a person who loves and respects, and is spiritually aware of, the earth, himself, King Selassie I, Jah, and Jah creations.
quotes.name: Empress

quotes.message: The Rastafari are a recent reincarnation of these efforts to develop racially grounded cultural alternatives, and like their predecessors, they, too, suffered from suppression and rejection by their fellow citizens and kin.
quotes.name: Charles Price

quotes.message: Rastafari identity is a version of a long-standing set of racialized dialogues concerned with challenging oppression and White cultural hegemony.
quotes.name: Charles Price

quotes.message: Rastafari has much in common with 'prefigurative' social movements in that the Rastafari identity (and its cultural complex) provides ideas for people experimenting with different ways of relating and living.
quotes.name: Charles Price

quotes.message: Becoming a Rastafarian is characteristically a conversion process, and identity transformation.
quotes.name: Charles Price

quotes.message: Rastafarians do not represent the traditional culture of precolonial Africans, they sought to adopt as many of the elements of the traditional culture as they could, and called attention to the history of precolonial Africa.
quotes.name: Anita M. Waters

quotes.message: Rastafari is a spirituality of the heart. If you use your mind to understand something that is spiritual, you may miss the true essence and meaning of it.
quotes.name: Empress

quotes.message: Rastafari men and women also sport a unique hairstyle, which they prefer to as dreads, but more correctly known as locks.
quotes.name: Seon M. Lewis

quotes.message: Another noticeable characteristic of Rastafari is their clothing. Designed by themselves, it is made with bright colors of red, green and yellow. These colors are not there only for decorative beauty, but they represent significant religious implications to Rastafari.
quotes.name: Seon M. Lewis

quotes.message: Rastafari believe that they are the only ones who are today living up to the Lord's biblical stipulations. The stipulation of not cutting one's hair.
quotes.name: Seon M. Lewis

quotes.message: Rastafari was acting upon human nature. They are engaged in humanity's ancient national pastime, cultivating their culture, and, for that, they should not be demonized just because well established religious say so.
quotes.name: Seon M. Lewis

quotes.message: Dreadlocks are the multivalent symbol of Rastafarian self-confidence, valorization of African beauty, and mythical connection with Jah.
quotes.name: Ennis Barrington Edmonds

quotes.message: The principles of Rastafarian lifestyle, called 'livity', encode a commitment to live organically and harmoniously with the environment, which is infused with Jah's power.
quotes.name: Ennis Barrington Edmonds

quotes.message: Many people of all ethnic stripes, who find themselves marginalized by what they perceive as the oppressive and homogenizing values have found in Rastafari a means of resisting those values and institutions, and returning home to a sense of self, rooted in a divine relationship with Jah.
quotes.name: Ennis Barrington Edmonds

quotes.message: Out of the dark colonial past of their forbears, Rastas have risen up to affirm their self-dignity, African heritage, and right to self-determination.
quotes.name: Ennis Barrington Edmonds

quotes.message: Some Rastas believe that their hair resembles as the mane, of a lion, others believe it shows the crown of their Jah Selassie. Dreads are mostly worn in compiance with athe Biblical references.
quotes.name: Johannes Schiefer

quotes.message: Rastafarians have a close relationship with nature.
quotes.name: Amber Wilson

quotes.message: The Rastafari diet is called Ital, which comes from the word 'vital'. Rastafarians use the term 'Ital' to mean a natural and healthy way of life.
quotes.name: Amber Wilson

quotes.message: Rastafarians obey the laws of the Old Testament in the Bible, and do not cut or comb their dreads because they believe the Bible forbids it.
quotes.name: Amber Wilson

quotes.message: An important part of some Rastafarians ceremonies is smoking a green herb called marijuana, or ganja, while reciting prayers. Rastafarians believe this herb calms people and brings them together in a peaceful way.
quotes.name: Amber Wilson

quotes.message: Smoking marijuana is illegal in many parts of the world, including Jamaica, but Rastafarians do not obey this las because they believe it was created by people who do not share their religion.
quotes.name: Amber Wilson

quotes.message: For most Jamaicans, religion is much more than just paying lip service to vague ideals; it represents a total involvement, a way of life.
quotes.name: Harry S. Pariser

quotes.message: Most famous (and at times in the past, infamous) of all the sects originating in the Caribbean, Rastafarianism is also the most horrendously misunderstood.
quotes.name: Harry S. Pariser

quotes.message: Rastas are basically vegetarians. Vegetables, fruit and juices are dietary staples.
quotes.name: Harry S. Pariser

quotes.message: Rastas represent the spirit of the lion in the way they carry themselves, in their looks, and in their challenging attitudes towards contemporary social values.
quotes.name: Harry S. Pariser

quotes.message: Rastas are congenial, gentle, and trustworthy people. The true Rasta, that is.
quotes.name: Harry S. Pariser

quotes.message: Jamaica has often been characterized as an extremely religious society, and one place this religiosity is strongly reflected is in the country's popular music - particularly in the strong influence of the Rastafarian faith on reggae.
quotes.name: Michael Veal

quotes.message: Rastafarian belief rejected modern technology in favor of a philosophy of naturalism typified by a rural ('roots') lifestyle.
quotes.name: Michael Veal

quotes.message: Although there were abundant love songs, novelty songs, slackness songs, and instrumentals, the Rastafarian influence was dominant in the popular reggae of the era.
quotes.name: Michael Veal

quotes.message: Rastafarians encounter all manner of diverse opinions, hearsay and half-truths about themselves, usually from those who see them from the perspective of spectators rather than faithful disciples.
quotes.name: Abba Yahudah

quotes.message: Pretending that we live doesn't make us alive.
quotes.name: Serj Tankian

quotes.message: Pretending to know everything closes the door to finding out what's really there.
quotes.name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.message: I hope you have not been leading a double life, pretending to be wicked and being good all the time. That would be hypocrisy.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: The best way to not get your heart broken, is pretending you don't have one.
quotes.name: Charlie Sheen

quotes.message: Duty largely consists of pretending that the trivial is critical.
quotes.name: John Fowles

quotes.message: You can't wake a person who is pretending to be asleep.
quotes.name: American Indian Proverb, Navajo

quotes.message: Pretending is not just play. Pretending is imagined possibility. Pretending, or acting, is a very valuable life skill and we do it all the time.
quotes.name: Meryl Streep

quotes.message: When one is pretending the entire body revolts.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: Wearing a mask wears you out. Faking it is fatiguing. The most exhausting activity is pretending to be what you know you aren't.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: The only good in pretending is the fun we get out of fooling ourselves that we fool somebody.
quotes.name: Booth Tarkington

quotes.message: Wisdom consists partly in not pretending anymore, in discarding artifice.
quotes.name: Julian Barnes

quotes.message: It's much more interesting to embrace who you really are rather than waste energy pretending to be someone else.
quotes.name: Adam Levine

quotes.message: The terrible immoralities are the cunning ones hiding behind masks of morality, such as exploiting people while pretending to help them.
quotes.name: Vernon Howard

quotes.message: You're pretending this isn't your life. You think it's going to happen some other time. When you're dead you'll realise you were alive now.
quotes.name: Caryl Churchill

quotes.message: Everybody wants to lie to himself, pretending that there's something else besides only the normal life you're living in.
quotes.name: Gaspar Noe

quotes.message: There’s no use of pretending to be good in front of people who are also doing same to us.. Mutual deceptions don’t lead anywhere.
quotes.name: Rajneesh Sharma

quotes.message: Everyone in a position of authority is hysterical, and everyone else is pretending to be asleep.
quotes.name: Samuel R. Delany

quotes.message: Nobody really knows what they're doing. Some are just better at pretending like they do.
quotes.name: Kumail Najiani

quotes.message: Half the trouble in life is caused by pretending there isn't any.
quotes.name: Edith Warthon

quotes.message: There is weakness in pretending to know more than you know or in stating less than you know.
quotes.name: Robert Henri

quotes.message: You don't get anything worth getting by pretending to know things you don't know.
quotes.name: Sam Harris

quotes.message: Pretending that there are no choices to be made - reading only books, for example, which are cheery and safe and nice - is a prescription for disaster for the young.
quotes.name: Louis Lowry

quotes.message: You gain power by pretending to be weak.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: Confidence is very important - even pretending to be confident. If you make a mistake but do not let your opponent see what you are thinking then he may overlook the mistake.
quotes.name: Viswanathan Anand

quotes.message: We are born knowing how to be just. And we die knowing we spent a lifetime pretending we didn't.
quotes.name: Susan Meissner

quotes.message: Good people protect people they love even if that means that pretending that everything is okay.
quotes.name: Ron McLarty

quotes.message: I think any hardship is better than pretending to do what one is paid for, and never really doing it.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Never pretend to a love which you do not actually feel, for love is not ours to command.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: Economic freedom is very important for women empowerment. They must be partners in economic development also. I have seen that women are very good at adapting to latest technology. We should link women and technology up-gradation.
quotes.name: Narendra Modi

quotes.message: Empowering women is key to building a future we want.
quotes.name: Amartya Sen

quotes.message: A woman with a voice is by definition a strong woman. But the search to find that voice can be remarkably difficult.
quotes.name: Melinda Gates

quotes.message: The true wealth of a community is measured by how carefully it listens to its women and how sincerely it values their wisdom. Empowering women empowers us all.
quotes.name: Forest Whitaker

quotes.message: Empowering women isn't just the right thing to do - it's the smart thing to do.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: If you empower women, you can change the world.
quotes.name: Meg Ryan

quotes.message: Women have to harness their power â€“ it's absolutely true. It's just learning not to take the first no. And if you can't go straight ahead, you go around the corner.
quotes.name: Cher

quotes.message: We need women at all levels, including the top, to change the dynamic, reshape the conversation, to make sure women's voices are heard and heeded, not overlooked and ignored.
quotes.name: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.message: Since violence is largely a male pastime, cultures that empower women tend to move away from the glorification of violence and are less likely to breed dangerous subcultures of rootless young men.
quotes.name: Steven Pinker

quotes.message: As women are empowered, violence can come down, for a number of reasons. By all measures, men are the more violent gender.
quotes.name: Steven Pinker

quotes.message: When you empower women and help them thrive, you help their communities thrive. Women shoulder the burden disproportionately.
quotes.name: Joy Bryant

quotes.message: If you really want to change a culture to empower women improve basic hygiene and health care and fight high rates of infant mortality the answer is to educate girls.
quotes.name: Greg Mortenson

quotes.message: A strong woman understands that the gifts such as logic, decisiveness, and strength are just as feminine as intuition and emotional connection. She values and uses all of her gifts.
quotes.name: Nancy Rathburn

quotes.message: Empower us women and we will change this whole entire world.
quotes.name: Alicia Keys

quotes.message: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create, nurture and transform.
quotes.name: Diane Mariechild
