quotes.message: If you economically empower a woman, she represents enormous opportunity that can actually be transformative not only for her family and for her community, but at the aggregate level for the economy.
quotes.name: Sheryl Wudunn

quotes.message: I think the most important thing people can do to save our planet and the human race is to empower women!
quotes.name: Robert Ballard

quotes.message: The education and empowerment of women throughout the world cannot fail to result in a more caring, tolerant, just and peaceful life for all.
quotes.name: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.message: Empowering women means trusting them.
quotes.name: Isabel Allende

quotes.message: If we don't empower women, we don't allow them to unlock the potential of themselves and their children.
quotes.name: Melinda Gates

quotes.message: Women empowering other women.They get the psycho-social support. They become part of a community.
quotes.name: Annie Lennox

quotes.message: We need to empower women: provide them with work for their own income, and teach them to become independent of men so they will never have to have their children suffering the same torture.
quotes.name: Waris Dirie

quotes.message: The empowered woman is powerful beyond measure and beautiful beyond description.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Woman must not accept; she must challenge. She must not be awed by that which has been built up around her; she must reverence that woman in her which struggles for expression.
quotes.name: Margaret Sanger

quotes.message: That's not to say that women's priorities are better than men's. Rather, when women are empowered, when they can speak from the experience of their own lives, they often address different, previously neglected issues. And families and whole communities benefit.
quotes.name: Dee Dee Myers

quotes.message: Empowering women isn't for women, but for the world.
quotes.name: Amy Richards

quotes.message: We need to empower women. Give women a voice in the decision-making process. Give women a political voice where they can champion, for their own welfare. And, of course, for us. United Nations â€“ organizations, agencies â€“ we need to do our part.
quotes.name: Margaret Chan

quotes.message: I wanted to be an empowered woman, and I became an empowered woman. And now I want to empower every woman. And I do it through my clothes, I do it through my words, I do it through my money, I do it through everything.
quotes.name: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.message: I have always felt strongly about empowering women. I'm living proof that, with confidence and by believing in yourself, you can accomplish any goal.
quotes.name: Queen Latifah

quotes.message: By empowering a woman, we empower a child. By educating a girl child, we make it possible for her to grow up to become an empowered woman.
quotes.name: Winnie Byanyima

quotes.message: Women are leaders everywhere you lookâ€”from the CEO who runs a Fortune 500 company to the housewife who raises her children and heads her household. Our country was built by strong women, and we will continue to break down walls and defy stereotypes.
quotes.name: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.message: Any woman who understands the problems of running a home will be nearer to understanding the problems of running a country.
quotes.name: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.message: Societies that empower women are less violent in every way.
quotes.name: Steven Pinker

quotes.message: A rejection is nothing more than a necessary step in the pursuit of success.
quotes.name: Bo Bennett

quotes.message: I take rejection as someone blowing a bugle in my ear to wake me up and get going, rather than retreat.
quotes.name: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.message: Rejection can disappoint you, depress you and may even stop you in your tracks... learn not to take rejection so personally... if you're honest with yourself and believe in your work, others will too.
quotes.name: Bev Jozwiak

quotes.message: Artistic rejection is like taking cod liver oil; they say it's good for you, you know they're right, but it can be still tough to swallow.
quotes.name: Ian Semple

quotes.message: Rejection doesn't have to mean you aren't good enough; it often just means the other person failed to notice what you have to offer.
quotes.name: Ash Sweeney

quotes.message: Dear to us are those who love us but dearer are those who reject us as unworthy, for they add another life; they build a heaven before us whereof we had not dreamed, and thereby supply to us new powers out of the recesses of the spirit.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Every rejection is incremental payment on your dues that in some way will be translated back into your work.
quotes.name: James Lee Burke

quotes.message: Rejection is the sand in the oyster, the irritation that ultimately produces the pearl.
quotes.name: Burke Wilkinson

quotes.message: A boo is a lot louder than a cheer. If you have 10 people cheering and one person booing, all you hear is the booing.
quotes.name: Lance Armstrong

quotes.message: Human rejection can be God's divine protection.
quotes.name: Paula Hendricks

quotes.message: Rejection gives you more power to push forward.
quotes.name: Jeremy Limn

quotes.message: Rejection is part of the game. Or rather, rejection is part of the profession. A profession which at times can feel like a game.
quotes.name: Robin Black

quotes.message: You get used to the rejection and you don't take it personally.
quotes.name: Daniel Craig

quotes.message: Rejection is merely a redirection; a course correction to your destiny.
quotes.name: Bryant McGill

quotes.message: Each rejection brings us closer to acceptance.
quotes.name: Ramesh Lohia

quotes.message: We are always afraid to ask because we aren't afraid of the answer but the feeling of rejection.
quotes.name: Anna R.

quotes.message: There's nothing like rejection to make you do an inventory of yourself.
quotes.name: James Lee Burke

quotes.message: Do not waste yourself in rejection; do not bark against the bad, but chant the beauty of the good.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: The effects of rejection can either kill your muse or change your life.
quotes.name: Jane Champagne

quotes.message: It is necessary to put yourself out for rejection, and accept that you will be rejected.
quotes.name: Robert Genn

quotes.message: Learn to eat rejection; it will make you stronger.
quotes.name: Bob Ragland

quotes.message: A clear rejection is always better than a fake promise.
quotes.name: Rihanna A Mohammed

quotes.message: Rejection isn't a sign that something is wrong for you it's a sign that they're wrong for you.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: Don't feel bad if someone rejects you or ignore you. People usually reject and ignore expensive things because they can't afford them.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Rejected pieces aren't failures; unwritten pieces are.
quotes.name: Greg Daugherty

quotes.message: I always feel like rejection is my petrol. That's what keeps me going.
quotes.name: Laura Kightlinger

quotes.message: You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: Just because you are different does not mean that you have to be rejected.
quotes.name: Eartha Kitt

quotes.message: Reject your sense of injury and the injury itself disappears.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: Don't let anyone, or any rejection, keep you from what you want.
quotes.name: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.message: Rejection is, of course, part of any successful model's career, as ironic as that sounds. It's how you pick yourself up and get on with the job.
quotes.name: Erin O'Connor

quotes.message: Better a friendly refusal than an unwilling consent.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: A soft refusal is not always taken, but a rude one is immediately believed
quotes.name: Alexander Chase

quotes.message: You can be the ripest, juiciest peach in the world, and there's still going to be somebody who hates peaches.
quotes.name: Dita Von Teese

quotes.message: Social rejection doesn't just cause emotional pain; it affects our physical being.
quotes.name: Leonard Mlodinow

quotes.message: Rejection isn't failure. Failure is giving up. Everyone gets rejected. It's how handle it that determines where you'll end up.
quotes.name: Richard Castle

quotes.message: If we live for people's acceptance, we will die from their rejection.
quotes.name: Lecrae

quotes.message: Don't get discouraged from all the rejection.
quotes.name: Joey King

quotes.message: There's no point in dwelling on rejection.
quotes.name: Isabel Lucas

quotes.message: Rejection is a challenge.
quotes.name: Veronica Purcell

quotes.message: Practice, practice, practice until you eventually get numb on rejections.
quotes.name: Brian Klemmer

quotes.message: I think all great innovations are built on rejections.
quotes.name: Louis-Ferdinand Celine

quotes.message: To be no part of any body, is to be nothing.
quotes.name: John Donne

quotes.message: You've got to love this business. You have to be able to take rejection.
quotes.name: Jessica Biel

quotes.message: Rejection is a big part of show business. It can be tough on anyone who doesn't have fairly good self-esteem. Especially kids, as they try to discover who they are.
quotes.name: Angela Cartwright

quotes.message: The greatest trap in our life is not success, popularity or power, but self rejection.
quotes.name: Henri Nouwen

quotes.message: Human beings, like plants, grow in the soil of acceptance, not in the atmosphere of rejection.
quotes.name: John Powell

quotes.message: The better you are at communicating, negotiating, and handling your fear of rejection, the easier life is.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Sometimes rejection in life is really redirection.
quotes.name: Tavis Smiley

quotes.message: You have to know how to accept rejection and reject acceptance.
quotes.name: Ray Bradbury

quotes.message: The most important element of a free society, where individual rights are held in the highest esteem, is the rejection of the initiation of violence.
quotes.name: Ron Paul

quotes.message: Artistic creation is a demand for unity and a rejection of the world.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Often, out of our greatest rejection comes our greatest direction.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Never give up! Failure and rejection are only the first step to succeeding.
quotes.name: Jimmy Valvano

quotes.message: Rejection and the fear of rejection is the biggest impediment we face to choosing ourselves.
quotes.name: James Altucher

quotes.message: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit
quotes.name: E.E. Cummings

quotes.message: What the mind can conceive and believe, and the heart desire, you can achieve.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Confidence is like a dragon where, for every head cut off, two more heads grow back.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: A great figure or physique is nice, but it's self-confidence that makes someone really sexy.
quotes.name: Vivica A. Fox

quotes.message: With realization of one's own potential and self-confidence in one's ability, one can build a better world.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: The way to develop self-confidence is to do the thing you fear and get a record of successful experiences behind you.
quotes.name: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.message: You need an incredible amount of self-confidence to go digging around in someone's brain.
quotes.name: Benjamin Carson

quotes.message: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
quotes.name: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.message: Always be yourself and have faith in yourself. Do not go out and look for a successful personality and try to duplicate it.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: You wouldn't worry so much about what others think of you if you realized how seldom they do.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
quotes.name: Golda Meir

quotes.message: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
quotes.name: Peter T. Mcintyre

quotes.message: The courage to be is the courage to accept oneself, in spite of being unacceptable.
quotes.name: Paul Tillich

quotes.message: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
quotes.name: Dr. Benjamin Spock

quotes.message: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: Confidence, like art, never comes from having all the answers; it comes from being open to all the questions.
quotes.name: Earl Gray Stevens

quotes.message: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams and live the life you have imagined.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Confidence thrives on honesty, on honor, on the sacredness of obligations, on faithful protection and on unselfish performance. Without them it cannot live.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: You have no control over other people's taste, so focus on staying true to your own.
quotes.name: Tim Gunn

quotes.message: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: If you're presenting yourself with confidence, you can pull off pretty much anything.
quotes.name: Katy Perry

quotes.message: I've finally stopped running away from myself.
quotes.name: Goldie Hawn

quotes.message: Low self-confidence isn't a life sentence. Self-confidence can be learned, practiced, and mastered - just like any other skill. Once you master it, everything in your life will change for the better.
quotes.name: Barrie Davenport

quotes.message: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
quotes.name: Arthur Ashe

quotes.message: I have gone ahead despite the pounding in the heart that says: Turn back.
quotes.name: Erica Jong

quotes.message: It is confidence in our bodies, minds and spirits that allows us to keep looking for new adventures.
quotes.name: Oprah

quotes.message: Embracing your true self radiates a natural beauty that cannot be diluted or ignored.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Don't live down to expectations. Go out there and do something remarkable.
quotes.name: Wendy Wasserstein

quotes.message: Confidence is preparation. Everything else is beyond your control.
quotes.name: Richard Kline

quotes.message: A man cannot be comfortable without his own approval.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: To establish true self-esteem we must concentrate on our successes and forget about the failures and the negatives in our lives.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Our self-respect tracks our choices. Every time we act in harmony with our authentic self and our heart, we earn our respect. It is that simple. Every choice matters.
quotes.name: Dan Coppersmith

quotes.message: You have been criticizing yourself for years, and it hasn't worked. Try approving of yourself and see what happens.
quotes.name: Louise L. Hay

quotes.message: The better you feel about yourself, the less you feel the need to show off.
quotes.name: Robert Hand

quotes.message: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Who has confidence in himself will gain the confidence of others.
quotes.name: Leib Lazarow

quotes.message: Self-confidence is the first requisite to great undertakings.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: I think self-awareness is probably the most important thing towards being a champion.
quotes.name: Billie Jean King

quotes.message: You can have anything you want if you are willing to give up the belief that you can't have it.
quotes.name: Dr. Robert Anthony

quotes.message: Confidence is half of victory.
quotes.name: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.message: There's one blessing only, the source and cornerstone of beatitude: confidence in self.
quotes.name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: Confidence is that feeling by which the mind embarks on great and honorable courses with a sure hope and trust in itself.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life. With confidence, you have won even before you have started.
quotes.name: Marcus Garvey

quotes.message: The strongest single factor in prosperity consciousness is self-esteem: believing you can do it, believing you deserve it, believing you will get it.
quotes.name: Jerry Gillies

quotes.message: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
quotes.name: Judy Garland

quotes.message: The most important key to the permanent enhancement of esteem is the practice of positive inner-talk.
quotes.name: Dennis Waitley

quotes.message: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
quotes.name: Salvador Dali

quotes.message: Small minds are concerned with the extraordinary, great minds with the ordinary.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: Great minds discuss ideas; Average minds discuss events; Small minds discuss people.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: The difference between intelligence and education is this: intelligence will make you a good living.
quotes.name: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.message: The intelligence is proved not by ease of learning, but by understanding what we learn.
quotes.name: Joseph Whitney

quotes.message: Intelligence is not to make no mistakes, but quickly to see how to make them good.
quotes.name: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.message: Be smarter than other people, just don't tell them so.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.message: It is not enough to have a good mind; the main thing is to use it well.
quotes.name: Rene Descartes

quotes.message: The greatest intelligence is precisely the one that suffers most from its own limitations.
quotes.name: Andre Gide

quotes.message: Your intelligence is measured by those around you; if you spend your days with idiots you seal your own fate.
quotes.name: Mary M. Illigassch

quotes.message: There is no greater evidence of superior intelligence than to be surprised at nothing.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: The sign of an intelligent people is their ability to control emotions by the application of reason.
quotes.name: Marya Mannes

quotes.message: Intelligence is really a kind of taste: taste in ideas.
quotes.name: Susan Sontag

quotes.message: Intelligence is the ability to avoid doing work, yet getting the work done.
quotes.name: Linus Torvalds

quotes.message: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The best intelligence test is what we do with our leisure.
quotes.name: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.message: Intelligence forbids tears.
quotes.name: Dorris Lessing

quotes.message: The test of a first-rate intelligence is the ability to hold two opposed ideas in the mind at the same time, and still retain the ability to function.
quotes.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.message: Intelligence is the art of good guesswork.
quotes.name: H. B. Barlow

quotes.message: Intelligence flourishes only in the ages when belief withers.
quotes.name: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.message: The burden of intelligence: you can always imagine all those wonderful places where you can never belong.
quotes.name: Robert Reed

quotes.message: I've always felt that a person's intelligence is directly reflected by the number of conflicting points of view he can entertain simultaneously on the same topic.
quotes.name: Abigail Adams

quotes.message: One of the functions of intelligence is to take account of the dangers that come from trusting solely to the intelligence.
quotes.name: Lewis Mumford

quotes.message: An intelligence test sometimes shows a man how smart he would have been not to have taken it.
quotes.name: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.message: Intelligence is quickness to apprehend as distinct from ability, which is capacity to act wisely on the thing apprehended.
quotes.name: Alfred N. Whitehead

quotes.message: Intelligence must follow faith, never precede it, and never destroy it.
quotes.name: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.message: Intelligence is the faculty of making artificial objects, especially tools to make tools.
quotes.name: Henri Bergson

quotes.message: Intelligence is quickness in seeing things as they are.
quotes.name: George Santayana

quotes.message: Intelligence is a moral category.
quotes.name: Theodor Adorno

quotes.message: A great deal of intelligence can be invested in ignorance when the need for illusion is deep.
quotes.name: Saul Bellow

quotes.message: It has yet to be proven that intelligence has any survival value.
quotes.name: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.message: There is no such thing as Intelligence; one has intelligence of this or that. One must have intelligence only for what one is doing.
quotes.name: Edgar Degas

quotes.message: Undernourished, intelligence becomes like the bloated belly of a starving child: swollen, filled with nothing the body can use.
quotes.name: Andrea Dworkin

quotes.message: Human intelligence may not be the best trick nature has to offer.
quotes.name: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.message: Intelligence, in diapers, is invisible. And when it matures, out the window it flies. We have to pounce on it earlier.
quotes.name: Stanislaw J. Lec

quotes.message: The sad thing about artificial intelligence is that it lacks artifice and therefore intelligence.
quotes.name: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.message: The intellect is always fooled by the heart.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Whatever debases the intelligence degrades the entire human being.
quotes.name: Simone Weil

quotes.message: The intellect is not a serious thing, and never has been. It is an instrument on which one plays, that is all.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Intellect annuls fate. So far as a man thinks, he is free.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: A sign of intelligence is an awareness of one's own ignorance.
quotes.name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.message: A small mind is obstinate. A great mind can lead and be led.
quotes.name: Alexander Cannon

quotes.message: Creative minds have always been known to survive any kind of bad training.
quotes.name: Anna Freud

quotes.message: Only great minds can afford a simple style.
quotes.name: Stendhal

quotes.message: Intelligence is enormously sexy.
quotes.name: Frank Langella

quotes.message: Intelligence is nothing without delight.
quotes.name: Paul Claudel

quotes.message: Wit is educated insolence.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Wit is a dangerous weapon, even to the possessor, if he knows not how to use it discreetly.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: Wit lies in recognizing the resemblance among things which differ and the difference between things which are alike.
quotes.name: Anne Louise Germaine De Stal

quotes.message: Human intelligence has been applied to a vast range of problems, ranging from foraging for food and water to the problems in physics and mathematics.
quotes.name: Daeyeol Lee

quotes.message: Intelligence is not unique for humans, because all animals have certain abilities to select their actions appropriate to maximize the likelihood of their survival and reproduction in their environments.
quotes.name: Daeyeol Lee

quotes.message: Compared to other forms of intelligence on Earth, human intelligence had produced more impressive outcomes.
quotes.name: Daeyeol Lee

quotes.message: Our intelligence is needed to solve all kinds of problems we face in our society. Therefore, it is critical for us to be aware of potential weaknesses and biases in our intelligence.
quotes.name: Daeyeol Lee

quotes.message: Intelligence is the ability to make good choices in many different contexts.
quotes.name: Daeyeol Lee

quotes.message: Human intelligence is something all humans share in common: it is what traditionally marks us out from other animals.
quotes.name: Nicholas Mackintosh

quotes.message: Intelligence is the greatest tool available for the accomplishment of a thorough development of the individual personality, the means of surpassing one's self.
quotes.name: L.A. Machado

quotes.message: A society with more highly developed collective intelligence will give rise to a much greater number of questions, but the answers will also arise more quickly and effectively.
quotes.name: L.A. Machado

quotes.message: Intelligence is a hereditary gift: so humanity has believed throughout time.
quotes.name: L.A. Machado

quotes.message: The right to be intelligent is a right inherent in every man, through his condition as man.
quotes.name: L.A. Machado

quotes.message: Intelligence is the best antidote. An intelligent world does not make war, it avoids it.
quotes.name: L.A. Machado

quotes.message: Intelligence is a social triumph, which reveals our debt to earlier generations, other cultures, teachers, professors, parents and the TV set.
quotes.name: Phil Brown

quotes.message: When it comes to being intelligent it is clear that there is much more than simply what we can do as an individual; how we interact with others is a crucial element of how smart we are in the real world.
quotes.name: Lucas

quotes.message: No man is half as intelligent as he wants some woman to think he is.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: The less intelligence you claim, the more intelligence people will give you credit for.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: When you hire people who are smarter than you are, you prove you are smarter than they are.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: A man's intelligence is seldom questioned as long as he can keep his tongue from trying to prove it.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: Youth thinks intelligence a substitute for experience, and age thinks experience a substitute for intelligence.
quotes.name: Lyman Bryson

quotes.message: The level of intelligence are 'Smart, Intelligent, Brilliant, Genius, Simple.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Science can be communicated, wisdom cannot.
quotes.name: Herman Hesse

quotes.message: To know the road ahead, ask those coming back.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Curiosity is the spring of intelligence.
quotes.name: Gianna Bogana

quotes.message: Being serious is usually not a sign of wisdom, as boring people think: intelligence must make people laugh.
quotes.name: Fernando Savater

quotes.message: Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together to the making of genius. Love, love, love is the soul of genius.
quotes.name: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quotes.message: There are painters who transform the sun into a yellow spot, but there are others who, thanks to their art and intelligence, transform a yellow spot into the sun.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: Action is the real measure of intelligence.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: A woman uses her intelligence to find reasons to support her intuition.
quotes.name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.message: We should take care not to make the intellect our god; it has, of course, powerful muscles, but no personality.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Everyone is a genius at least once a year. The real geniuses simply have their bright ideas closer together.
quotes.name: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.message: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be kindled.
quotes.name: Plutarch

quotes.message: An intellectual is someone whose mind watches itself.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: The capacity for intelligent thought is a skill, but one that bears testament to diligence and hard work as much as to innate ability.
quotes.name: Robert Jameson

quotes.message: The intelligent will necessarily devote a great many hours to the development of his art.
quotes.name: Robert Jameson

quotes.message: The thing is that you don't get to be intelligent if you are arrogant. Being intelligent requires hard work.
quotes.name: Robert Jameson

quotes.message: An exceptionally intelligent person will know from experience that they are not like most other people. They don't pretend to be good at everything, but they know what they are good at.
quotes.name: Robert Jameson

quotes.message: I try to remember, as I hear about friends getting engaged, that it's not about the ring and it's not about the wedding. It's a grave thing, getting married. And it's easy to get swept up in the wrong things.
quotes.name: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.message: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart.
quotes.name: Judy Garland

quotes.message: My instinct is to keep my engagement ring After all, I wouldn't like to see it on the finger of a cheeky girl.
quotes.name: Sian Lloyd

quotes.message: I won't give my heart to another girl until God shows me it's my wife.
quotes.name: Eric Ludy

quotes.message: Control leads to compliance; autonomy leads to engagement.
quotes.name: Daniel H. Pink

quotes.message: We may have started as individuals, but now we are as one.
quotes.name: Bryon Pulsifer

quotes.message: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking together in the same direction.
quotes.name: Antoine

quotes.message: Not men but measures a sort of charm by which many people get loose from every honorable engagement.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: There are many blanks left in the weeks of courtship, which a loving faith fills with happy assurance.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: You rose into my life like a promised sunrise, brightening my days with the light in your eyes. I've never been so strong. Now I'm where I belong.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: We start a relationship with someone not only because of how great they are but how great they make us feel. And because they have granted us this extraordinary giftâ€”a chance to experience love, joy, compassion, and security â€”it is our exclusive privilege to make them feel wonderful about themselves, especially during days when they, themselves, don't feel so wonderful.
quotes.name: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.message: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.name: Emily Bronte

quotes.message: If you want to sacrifice the admiration of many men for the criticism of one, go ahead, get married.
quotes.name: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.message: We're all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness - and call it love - true love.
quotes.name: Robert Fulghum

quotes.message: The Oriole weds his mottled mate, the Lily weds the bee; Heaven's marriage ring is round the earth, let me bind thee?
quotes.name: Victorian Card

quotes.message: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Engagement marks the end of a whirlwind romance and beginning of an eternal love story.
quotes.name: Rajeev Ranjan

quotes.message: Grow old with me! The best is yet to be.
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: It is good to have an end to journey toward; But it is the journey that matters, in the end.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: May your love for each other always shine brightly! Well wishes on your engagement!
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.name: Nora Ephron

quotes.message: All commands from your lips are sweet, I say, and now have you not said the sweetest of all? Marry you!
quotes.name: Byron Caldwell Smith

quotes.message: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances; if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: We have the greatest pre-nuptial agreement in the world. It's called love.
quotes.name: Gene Perret

quotes.message: Find the person who will love you because of your differences and not in spite of them and you have found a lover for life.
quotes.name: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.message: To love and to be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.name: David Viscott

quotes.message: Engagement marks the apex of a relationship's love and happiness. It's all downhill from here. Congratulations.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: I couldn't have dreamed you into existence because I didn't even know I needed you. You must have been sent to me.
quotes.name: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.message: It is the duty of the bride's father to give a party to announce the engagement. Apparently this is done only after everyone knows about it.
quotes.name: Spencer Tracy

quotes.message: An engagement should come upon a young girl as a surprise, pleasant or unpleasant as the case may be. It is hardly a matter she could be allowed to arrange for herself.
quotes.name: Edith Evans

quotes.message: No engagement is worth anything unless it has been broken at least once.
quotes.name: Dorothy Tutin

quotes.message: The disgusting way an engagement is regarded public property; all these older women smirking...but my point is their whole attitude is wrong— an engagement, horrid word in the first place, is a private affair and should be regarded as such.
quotes.name: Daniel Day-Lewis

quotes.message: An engaged woman is always more agreeable than a disengaged. She is satisfied with herself. Her cares are over, and she feels that may exert all her powers of pleasing without suspicion. All is safe with a lady engaged; no harm can be done.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: I would rather not be engaged. When people are engaged, they begin to thin of being married soon...and I should like everything to go on for a long while just as it is.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: To speak frankly, I'm not in favor of long engagements. They give people the opportunity of finding out each other's character before marriage, which I think is never advisable.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Courtship to marriage is a very witty prologue to a very dull play.
quotes.name: William Congreve

quotes.message: Today, engagement parties still allow both families to meet each other if they haven't done so before. Even if both sets of parents have met, it's nice for siblings and other extended relatives to meet and mingle so they are all acquainted with one another before the wedding.
quotes.name: Gabrielle Kaplan-Mayer

quotes.message: It's never out of style to have good manners. If possible, make the engagement announcement to the bride's parents in person.
quotes.name: Joyce Scardina-Becker

quotes.message: Although somewhat outdated, the use of formal announcement cards is a beautiful and elegant way to spread the word of your engagement.
quotes.name: Joyce Scardina-Becker

quotes.message: And how my anguish, when she drew her glove, .And showed the plain gold sign of wedded love, . Refused assuagement:— . Why is it that I do not care a jot . If this one wears such fateful ring, or not— .
quotes.name: James Brunton-Stephen

quotes.message: Herbert broke our engagement of eight years . When Annabelle returned to the village . From the Seminary, ah me! . If I had let my love for him alone . It might have grown into a beautiful sorrow.
quotes.name: Edgar Lee Masters

quotes.message: The best thing that the diamond ring could do; was to amicably occupy a place on the engagement finger,
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: If we don't break this off, there will be time enough . For that sort of thing; but the bargain must be, . That as long as I choose I am perfectly free: . For this is a sort of engagement, you see, . Which is binding on you, but not binding on me.
quotes.name: William Allen Butler

quotes.message: Once I was a King . Now I'm wrapped around her finger . Like a diamond ring . The engagement ring . The wedding ring . The church bells ring . And the suffering.
quotes.name: Stuart Phillips

quotes.message: Darling me and you, we had a strange arrangement . But you broke all the rules . And I'm through playing the fool for love . Darling yes it's true, we had a grand engagement . But I can't stand by, while you break my heart in two . Ooh, I've got to be a man . Baby I've got to take a stand, so.
quotes.name: Andrew M. Cohen

quotes.message: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: And I'd choose you; in a hundred lifetimes, in a hundred worlds, in any version of reality, I'd find you and I'd choose you.
quotes.name: Kiersten White

quotes.message: It is sometimes essential for a husband and a wife to quarrel—they get to know each other better.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfang Von Goethe

quotes.message: What greater thing is there for human souls than to feel that they are joined for life – to be with each other in silent unspeakable memories.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow Internet to see who they really are.
quotes.name: Will Ferrell

quotes.message: It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.name: Rita Rudner

quotes.message: Success in marriage does not come merely through finding the right mate, but through being the right mate.
quotes.name: Barnett R. Brickner

quotes.message: Engagement can be a commitment to love or a declaration of war. One must enter every battle without hesitation, willing to fully engage the enemy until death do you apart.
quotes.name: Emily Thorne

quotes.message: A perfect couple shares their failures, mistakes and their successes equally and deal with them all as a team.
quotes.name: Ricardo Derose

quotes.message: All prosperity begins in the mind and is dependent only on the full use of our creative imagination.
quotes.name: Ruth Ross

quotes.message: Prosperity is only an instrument to be used, not a deity to be worshipped.
quotes.name: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.message: Prosperity depends more on wanting what you have than having what you want.
quotes.name: Geoffrey F. Abert

quotes.message: Prosperity is a way of living and thinking, and not just money or things. Poverty is a way of living and thinking, and not just a lack of money or things.
quotes.name: Eric Butterworth

quotes.message: Prosperity's right hand is industry and her left hand is frugality.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: To rejoice in the prosperity of others is to partake of it.
quotes.name: W. Austin

quotes.message: You can't borrow your way to prosperity.
quotes.name: Terry Branstad

quotes.message: Prosperity in the form of wealth works exactly the same as everything else. You will see it coming into your life when you are unattached to needing it.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Everything in the world may be endured except continual prosperity.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: There are many roads to prosperity, but one must be taken. Inaction leads nowhere.
quotes.name: Robert Zoellick

quotes.message: In the day of prosperity be joyful, but in the day of adversity consider.
quotes.name: King Solomon

quotes.message: When prosperity comes, do not use all of it.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: The fact is prosperity has a purpose. It's to allow us to pursue 'the better angels,' to give us time to think and grow.
quotes.name: George H. W. Bush

quotes.message: Start with big dreams and make life worth living.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: Prosperity tries the fortunate: adversity the great.
quotes.name: Rose F. Kennedy

quotes.message: In prosperity prepare for a change; in adversity hope for one.
quotes.name: James Burgh

quotes.message: If you always attach positive emotions to the things you want, and never attach negative emotions to the things you don't, then that which you desire most will invariably come your way.
quotes.name: Matt D. Miller

quotes.message: The desire for economic prosperity is itself not culturally determined but almost universally shared.
quotes.name: Francis Fukuyama

quotes.message: The world of prosperity maintains the world of adversity.
quotes.name: James Lendall Basford

quotes.message: Prosperity tries the fortunate, adversity the great.
quotes.name: Rose Kennedy

quotes.message: Prosperity is the best protector of principle.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: A sustainable world means working together to create prosperity for all.
quotes.name: Jacqueline Novogratz

quotes.message: There is no way to prosperity, prosperity is the way.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Opportunity today, prosperity tomorrow.
quotes.name: Julian Castro

quotes.message: As much as we need a prosperous economy, we also need a prosperity of kindness and decency.
quotes.name: Caroline Kennedy

quotes.message: Prosperity is a way of living and thinking, and not just money or things.
quotes.name: Eric Butterworth

quotes.message: Prosperity is the surest breeder of insolence I know.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: It is easy when we are in prosperity to give advice to the afflicted.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: True prosperity is the result of well-placed confidence in ourselves and our fellow man.
quotes.name: Benjamin Burt

quotes.message: Thankfulness makes much of little.
quotes.name: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.message: A thankful heart cannot be cynical.
quotes.name: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.message: Thankfulness eradicates entitlement.
quotes.name: Perry Noble

quotes.message: Gratitude is infinite praise.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Gratitude is the root of joy.
quotes.name: Jonathan Jackson

quotes.message: Gratefulness is a practice, just like happiness is a choice.
quotes.name: Russell Simmons

quotes.message: Gratefulness has the courage to trust and so overcomes fear.
quotes.name: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.message: Gratefulness is that fullness of life for which we are all thirsting.
quotes.name: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.message: Gratefulness is the great task, the how of our spiritual work, because, rightly understood, it re-roots us.
quotes.name: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.message: Being thankful for life itself is a way of making life better. When we look away from our problems, even for a short time, and generate joy in our hearts, we find that the world seems to change a bit.
quotes.name: John Harricharan

quotes.message: In everything give thanks.
quotes.name: Paul the Apostle

quotes.message: Thanks are the highest form of thought.
quotes.name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Gratitude is joyful act.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Gratitude is heaven itself.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: You should be thankful for the journey of life. You only make this journey once in your life time.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Thankfulness is the tune of angels.
quotes.name: Edmund Spenser

quotes.message: Give thanks to God, who made necessary things simple, and complicated things unnecessary.
quotes.name: Gregory Skovoroda

quotes.message: A thankful heart is the greatest virtue.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: Have an attitude of gratitude.
quotes.name: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.message: Gratitude is the smile of love.
quotes.name: Ralph Marston

quotes.message: Gratitude is the seedbed of joy.
quotes.name: Peter Kreeft

quotes.message: Gratitude is the great multiplier.
quotes.name: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.message: Gratitude is the antidote to fear.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: It is gratefulness which makes the soul great.
quotes.name: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.message: Gratefulness is a payment everyone can afford.
quotes.name: Michael Josephson

quotes.message: Thanksgiving being thankful or grateful results in more to be thankful for.
quotes.name: John Templeton

quotes.message: Thanksgiving opens up the windows of the opportunity for ideas to flow your way.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Being thankful and saying thanks are two habits of people who've discovered what it means to succeed in life.
quotes.name: Hal Urban

quotes.message: Give thanks to the most high.
quotes.name: DJ Khaled

quotes.message: An obsession is a way for damaged people to damage themselves more.
quotes.name: Mark Barrowcliffe

quotes.message: Our current obsession with creativity is the result of our continued striving for immortality in an era when most people no longer believe in an after-life.
quotes.name: Arianna Huffington

quotes.message: My obsession is to make women beautiful. When you create with that in mind, things can't go out of fashion.
quotes.name: Azzedine Alaia

quotes.message: Obsession is what lazy people call dedication.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Obsession is a commitment; you have to believe in it, because it soon takes you over.
quotes.name: Lennard J. Davis

quotes.message: Obsession is so extreme and so hard to imagine with the rational mind that it has a science-fiction-like quality to it-it's almost as if the obsessed one has been taken over by a replica, a pod, a facsimile of the rational person.
quotes.name: Susan Cheever

quotes.message: There's a lot of obsession about people's personal ambitions.
quotes.name: Mary Ann Shaffer

quotes.message: An obsession with control generally seems to reflect a fear of uncertainty.
quotes.name: Henry Mintzberg

quotes.message: An obsession is where something will not leave your mind.
quotes.name: Eric Clapton

quotes.message: Obsession is an attractive thing. People who are really, really interested and good at one thing and smart are attractive, if they're men.
quotes.name: Meryl Streep

quotes.message: Determination becomes obsession and then it becomes all that matters.
quotes.name: Jeremy Irvine

quotes.message: To obsess too virulently is to walk alone in anxiety. But to obsess too little is to wall oneself off from one's own creativity.
quotes.name: Eric Maisel

quotes.message: The obsession with instant gratification blinds us from our long-term potential.
quotes.name: Mike Dooley

quotes.message: Obsession is the wellspring of genius and madness.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: Obsession is just another round on the merry-go-round of unfinished business.
quotes.name: Dale Andrews

quotes.message: An obsession is an idea which you must get out of your mind if you are not to go out of your mind.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: An obsession is intrusive because it does not require a permit to walk into the brain.
quotes.name: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.message: Positive obsession is about not being able to stop just because you're afraid and full of doubts. Positive obsession is dangerous. It's about not being able to stop at all.
quotes.name: Octavia Butler

quotes.message: A man with an obsession is a man who has very little sales resistance.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: Obsessional does not necessarily mean sexual obsession, not even obsession for this, or for that in particular; to be an obsessional means to find oneself caught in a mechanism, in a trap increasingly demanding and endless.
quotes.name: Jacques Lacan

quotes.message: Obsessions are essentially secondary to the depression, and usually clear up when the depression lifts.
quotes.name: Padmal de Silva

quotes.message: Obsession is the single most wasteful human activity, because with an obsession you keep coming back and back and back to the same question and never get an answer.
quotes.name: Norman Mailer

quotes.message: When you're nothing, people will ignore you but when you're on top that's when everybody swear they know you.
quotes.name: Lincey Alphonse

quotes.message: Because I'm just a giving person spiritually, I feel that if your intentions are to use or abuse or take advantage of, then you might get what you get in the meantime, but there's still a price to pay.
quotes.name: Angie Stone

quotes.message: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.
quotes.name: Erich Fromm

quotes.message: I don't let people use me. That's why I like a small number of people in my life. The more people in my life, the more complex it becomes, so I just try to keep it at a minimum.
quotes.name: Anita Baker

quotes.message: Not everyone will appreciate what you do for them. You have to figure out who's worth your kindness and who's just taking advantage.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It's so funny how 'friends' forget us when they don't need any more favors.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Sometimes you try to help people, and it backfires on you, and then they try to take advantage of you.
quotes.name: Bill Cosby

quotes.message: You are a manipulator. I like to think of myself more as an outcome engineer.
quotes.name: J.R. Ward,

quotes.message: When you know what a man wants you know who he is, and how to move him.
quotes.name: George R.R. Martin

quotes.message: All people have feelings, they are not there to be used. If you're not longer interested in someone, they have the right to be informed before you go and cheat or go looking elsewhere.
quotes.name: Jerry Springer

quotes.message: I have learned that people at the bottom use others' bodies to climb to the top.
quotes.name: Mandla Langa

quotes.message: Using people to leverage a refined process multiplies production, using people as a poor solution to a poor process multiplies problems.
quotes.name: Timothy Ferriss

quotes.message: Men are used as they use others.
quotes.name: Bidpai

quotes.message: Don't take advantage of each other, but fear God!
quotes.name: Leviticus 25:17

quotes.message: Controllers, abusers, and manipulative people don't question themselves. They don't ask themselves if the problem is them. They always say the problem is someone else.
quotes.name: Darlene Ouimet

quotes.message: Don't use men to get what you want in life. Get it yourself.
quotes.name: Helen Gurley Brown

quotes.message: We have people who show love at our front and who hate at our back, but it's still hard to find that Mysterious person who love to walk with us without worrying what the destination will be.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: Anytime you're taking advantage of other people financially, I think some sort of punishment is definitely correct.
quotes.name: Cliff Seigneur

quotes.message: When success comes, people can try to trick you or take advantage of you.
quotes.name: Christina Aguilera

quotes.message: Just because something isn't a lie does not mean that it isn't deceptive. A liar knows that he is a liar, but one who speaks mere portions of truth in order to deceive is a craftsman of destruction.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: I don't care if you hate me now, I already know you only treat me nice when you think I am useful to you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: People try to constantly use me and I hate it.
quotes.name: Tracy Emin

quotes.message: The measure of a man is what he does with power.
quotes.name: Greek Proverb

quotes.message: Trickery and treachery are the practices of fools that have not the wits enough to be honest.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Strong people don't put others down they lift them up.
quotes.name: Michael P. Watson

quotes.message: Is it possible to use people fairly?
quotes.name: Chris Boucher

quotes.message: Is that what love is? Using people? And maybe that's what hate is - not being able to use people.
quotes.name: Tennessee Williams

quotes.message: Why is it that the less use people have another human being, the politer they become to him? Relentlessly polite.
quotes.name: Alfred Hitchcock Presents

quotes.message: People will naturally expect us to do something.
quotes.name: William M. Conselman

quotes.message: Good people do not turn other people into water coolers.
quotes.name: Constance M. Burge

quotes.message: Next to knowing when to seize an opportunity, the most important thing in life is to know when to forgo an advantage.
quotes.name: Disraeli

quotes.message: It's them as take advantage that get advantage in this world.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: It is the greatest of advantages to enjoy no advantage at all.
quotes.name: Thoreau

quotes.message: If you don't get the better of yourself, someone else will.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: A sworn vow never to be taken advantage of again.
quotes.name: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.message: I've worked too hard and built too much to be taken advantage of. I know my worth and what I bring to the table.
quotes.name: Tony A. Gaskins

quotes.message: I'm open to the possibilities of being one of those people who reach certain heights without being owned by others.
quotes.name: Tony A. Gaskins

quotes.message: It's when you get complacent that you get taken advantage of.
quotes.name: Tony A. Gaskins

quotes.message: You don't need to know every detail, but you should know the basics. There are so many people who get taken advantage of.
quotes.name: Tony A. Gaskins

quotes.message: If you don't want to be taken advantage of, if you don't want your brand to be misrepresented, if you don't want someone else to be in control of your destiny, then do your work.
quotes.name: Tony A. Gaskins

quotes.message: People respond in accordance to how you relate to them.
quotes.name: James Frey

quotes.message: Abusive men find abusiveness rewarding. The privileged position they gain is a central reason for their reluctance to change.
quotes.name: Lundy Bancroft

quotes.message: Abusive men tend to be happy only when everything in the relationship is proceeding on their terms.
quotes.name: Lundy Bancroft

quotes.message: Violence is not just punches and slaps; it is anything that puts you in physical fear or that uses your body to control you.
quotes.name: Lundy Bancroft

quotes.message: To dominate is to attempt to control another person's actions.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: The person who tries to dominate another person has a tremendous need to have his own way.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: A dominating person often resorts to threats in order to get in.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: Domineering behavior includes ordering a partner around; monitoring time and activities; restricting resources.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: To dominating partners, even commitment can feel like emotional suffocation.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: Many women encountering nonphysical types of abuse experience grave psychological and physical health symptoms.
quotes.name: Carol A Lambert

quotes.message: Whether psychological or physical, abuse is about one thing; control.
quotes.name: Carol A Lambert

quotes.message: Psychologically abused women experience depression, anxiety, and low self-esteem.
quotes.name: Carol A Lambert

quotes.message: Psychological abuse by far makes people more fearful than any other type of abuse.
quotes.name: Carol A Lambert

quotes.message: A controlling partner who ridicules personal traits, criticizes, controls activities, and ignores their partner causes a loss of self-esteem.
quotes.name: Carol A Lambert

quotes.message: When people encounter controlling behavior, they often feel 'erased' as if to the perpetrator they don't exist.
quotes.name: Patricia Evans

quotes.message: In relationships, particularly, controlling behavior sets the stage for all kinds of abuse.
quotes.name: Patricia Evans

quotes.message: Acts against others whether cold or subtle such as a contemptuous glands or hot and explosive such as a burst of rage are paradoxically both senseless and understandable, they are also attempts to control.
quotes.name: Patricia Evans

quotes.message: People who have indulged in controlling behaviors are often stunned man they realize what they've done.
quotes.name: Patricia Evans

quotes.message: They may forget what you said, but they will never forget how you made them feel.
quotes.name: Carl W. Buechner

quotes.message: Each friend represents a world in us, a world possibly not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: Live your life in such a way that you'll be remembered for your kindness, compassion, fairness, character, benevolence, and a force for good who had much respect for life, in general.
quotes.name: Germany Kent

quotes.message: A lot of people resist transition and therefore never allow themselves to enjoy who they are. Embrace the change, no matter what it is; once you do, you can learn about the new world you're in and take advantage of it.
quotes.name: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.message: Sometimes people use thought to not participate in life.
quotes.name: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.message: An investor without investment objectives is like a traveler without a destination.

quotes.message: Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.

quotes.message: In the short run, the market is a voting machine, but in the long run it is a weighing machine.

quotes.message: Never depend on single income. Make investment to create a second source.

quotes.message: Investing in yourself is the best thing you can do. If you've got talents, no one can take them from you.

quotes.message: Earn as much as you can. Save as much as you can. Invest as much as you can. Give as much as you can.

quotes.message: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.

quotes.message: The best investment is in the tools of one's own trade.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Never stop investing. Never stop improving. Never stop doing something new.
quotes.name: Bob Parsons

quotes.message: You should invest in a business that even a fool can run, because someday a fool will.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Whenever you make an investment in yourself, you're making an investment in your future.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The individual investor should act consistently as an investor and not as a speculator.
quotes.name: Ben Graham

quotes.message: It's not your salary that makes you rich, it's your spending habits.
quotes.name: Charles A. Jaffe

quotes.message: Build into each budget the cost of hiring and don't lump yourself with capital investment.

quotes.message: Successful investing is about managing risk, not avoiding it.

quotes.message: The rich invest in time, the poor invest in money.

quotes.message: When you invest you are buying a day that you don't have to work.

quotes.message: The four most dangerous words in investing are: this time it's different.

quotes.message: Those who are unwilling to invest in the future haven't earned one.

quotes.message: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.

quotes.message: Investing isn't about beating others at their game. It's about controlling yourself at your own game.
quotes.name: Benjamin Graham

quotes.message: Anyone who is not investing now is missing a tremendous opportunity.
quotes.name: Carlos Slim

quotes.message: Put not your trust in money, but put your money in trust.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.message: An important key to investing is to remember that stocks are not lottery tickets.

quotes.message: The best investment with the least risk and the greatest dividend is giving.
