quotes.message: If a business does well, the stock eventually follows.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: The greatest investment we can ever make is to invest our life in the life of someone else.
quotes.name: Scott Lee

quotes.message: Be picky with who you invest your time in. Wasted time is worse than wasted money.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Don't gamble; take all your savings and buy some good stock and hold it till it goes up, then sell it. If it don't go up, don't buy it.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: In any investment, you expect to have fun and make money.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: Invest in yourself. Your career is the engine of your wealth.
quotes.name: Paul Clitheroe

quotes.message: You cannot save time for future use, but you can invest it for the future!
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: If you want your children to turn out well, invest twice as much time with them and half as much money.
quotes.name: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.message: An investor without investment objectives is like a traveler without a destination.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Some of your activities should be viewed as an investment and not a sacrifice.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Investors should purchase stocks like they purchase groceries, not like they purchase perfume.
quotes.name: Ben Graham

quotes.message: Financial peace isn't the acquisition of stuff. It's learning to live on less than you make, so you can give money back and have money to invest. You can't win until you do this.
quotes.name: Dave Ramsey

quotes.message: The entrance strategy is actually more important than the exit strategy.
quotes.name: Edward Lampert

quotes.message: It's not whether you're right or wrong that's important, but how much money you make when you're right and how much you lose when you're wrong.
quotes.name: George Soros

quotes.message: You will come to know that what appears today to be a sacrifice will prove to be the greatest investment that you will ever make.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinkley

quotes.message: The stock market is never obvious. It is designed to fool most of the people, most of the time.
quotes.name: Jesse Livermore

quotes.message: Bottoms in the investment world don't end with four-year lows; they end with 10- or 15-year lows.
quotes.name: Jim Rogers

quotes.message: The secret to investing is to figure out the value of something and then pay a lot less.
quotes.name: Joel Greenblatt

quotes.message: Don't look for the needle in the haystack.
quotes.name: John Bogle

quotes.message: In many ways, the stock market is like the weather in that if you don’t like the current conditions all you have to do is wait a while.
quotes.name: Low Simpson

quotes.message: The biggest risk of all is not taking one.
quotes.name: Mellody Hobson

quotes.message: Investing should be more like watching paint dry or watching grass grow. If you want excitement, take $800 and go to Las Vegas.
quotes.name: Paul Samuelson

quotes.message: Although it’s easy to forget sometimes, a share is not a lottery ticket it’s part ownership of a business.
quotes.name: Peter Lynch

quotes.message: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
quotes.name: Phillip Fisher

quotes.message: In investing, what is comfortable is rarely profitable.
quotes.name: Robert Arnott

quotes.message: How many millionaires do you know who have become wealthy by investing in savings accounts? I rest my case.
quotes.name: Robert G. Allen

quotes.message: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: To be a successful business owner and investor, you have to be emotionally neutral to winning and losing Winning and losing are just part of the game.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Don’t work for money; make it work for you.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: If you want to be truly successful, invest in yourself to get the knowledge you need to find your unique factor. When you find it and focus on it and persevere your success will blossom.
quotes.name: Sydney Madwed

quotes.message: Do not put all your eggs in one basket.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Rule #1: Never lose money; Rule #2: Don’t forget rule #1.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Risk comes from not knowing what you are doing.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: I will tell you how to become rich. Close the doors. Be fearful when others are greedy. Be greedy when others are fearful.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Wide diversification is only required when investors do not understand what they are doing.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: The stock market is a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: The first rule of investment is: Don't Lose. And the second rule of investment is: Don't forget the first rule.
quotes.name: Warren Buffett

quotes.message: Empathy is about finding echoes of another person in yourself.
quotes.name: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.message: When you show deep empathy toward others, their defensive energy goes down, and positive energy replaces it. That's when you can get more creative in solving problems.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: All I ever wanted was to reach out and touch another human being not just with my hands but with my heart.
quotes.name: Tahereh Mafi

quotes.message: Whenever you feel like criticizing any one...just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had.
quotes.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.message: We must learn to regard people less in the light of what they do or omit to do, and more in the light of what they suffer.
quotes.name: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.message: Whenever you are about to find fault with someone, ask yourself the following question: What fault of mine most nearly resembles the one I am about to criticize?
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: A prerequisite to empathy is simply paying attention to the person in pain.
quotes.name: Daniel Goleman

quotes.message: Empathy is a tool for building people into groups, for allowing us to function as more than self-obsessed individuals.
quotes.name: Neil Gaiman

quotes.message: Remember that everyone you meet is afraid of something, loves something and has lost something.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.message: Empathy is really the opposite of spiritual meanness. It's the capacity to understand that every war is both won and lost. And that someone else's pain is as meaningful as your own.
quotes.name: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.message: Empathy depends not only on one's ability to identify someone else's emotions but also on one's capacity to put oneself in the other person's place and to experience an appropriate emotional response.
quotes.name: Charles G. Morris

quotes.message: I believe empathy is the most essential quality of civilization.
quotes.name: Roger Ebert

quotes.message: Empathy is a virtue, but it should not be a guiding judicial principle.
quotes.name: Gary Bauer

quotes.message: Empathy is born out of the old biblical injunction 'Love the neighbor as thyself.
quotes.name: George Mcgovern

quotes.message: Empathy means both understanding others on their own terms and bringing them within the orbit of one's own experience.
quotes.name: Jacob A. Belzen

quotes.message: Empathy is full presence to what's alive in the other person at this moment.
quotes.name: John Cunningham

quotes.message: You can only understand people if you feel them in yourself.
quotes.name: John Steinbeck

quotes.message: Empathy is the lovefire of sweet remembrance and shared understanding.
quotes.name: John Eaton

quotes.message: Empathy is like giving someone a psychological hug.
quotes.name: Lawrence J

quotes.message: I think we all have empathy. We may not have enough courage to display it.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: I wouldn't expect someone who's been injured to hear my side until they felt that I had fully understood the depth of their pain.
quotes.name: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.message: Empathy is the only human superpower - it can shrink distance, cut through social and power hierarchies, transcend differences, and provoke political and social change.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Thomas

quotes.message: Empathy is the most radical of human emotions.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: Empathy needs no genius.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: I do not ask the wounded person how he feels, I myself become the wounded person.
quotes.name: Walt Whitman

quotes.message: Yet, taught by time, my heart has learned to glow for other's good, and melt at other's woe.
quotes.name: Homer

quotes.message: Anyone who has experienced a certain amount of loss in their life has empathy for those who have experienced loss.
quotes.name: Anderson Cooper

quotes.message: If you share in a heart-felt sorrow, you can lighten the load of a friend. Sometimes facing the burden together can mend two broken hearts in the end.
quotes.name: Wes Fessler

quotes.message: When a good man is hurt all who would be called good must suffer with him.
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: Are you then unable to recognize unless it has the same sound as yours?
quotes.name: Andre Gide

quotes.message: The state of empathy, or being empathic, is to perceive the internal frame of reference of another with accuracy and with the emotional components and meanings which pertain thereto as if one were the person.
quotes.name: Carl Rogers

quotes.message: Empathy is a special way of coming to know another and ourself, a kind of attuning and understanding. When empathy is extended, it satisfies our needs and wish for intimacy, it rescues us from our feelings of aloneness.
quotes.name: Carl Rogers

quotes.message: Empathy is putting yourself in another's shoes to find out what exactly that person is feeling or going through at the given time. It basically refers to being at a common wavelength with someone.
quotes.name: Deepa Kodikal

quotes.message: Empathy is the greatest virtue. From it, all virtues flow. Without it, all virtues are an act.
quotes.name: Eric Zorn

quotes.message: Empathy means both understanding others on their own terms and bringing them within the orbit of one's own experience.
quotes.name: Jacob A. Belzen

quotes.message: We need to have empathy. When we lose empathy, we lose our humanity.
quotes.name: Goldie Hawn

quotes.message: Empathy as a complex emotion is different. It requires awareness of the other person's feelings and of one's own reactions. The appropriate reaction may not be to cry when another person cries, but to reassure them, or even to leave them alone.
quotes.name: Frans De Waal

quotes.message: You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view -- until you climb into his skin and walk around in it.
quotes.name: Harper Lee

quotes.message: We need empathy, we need the eyes that still can weep.
quotes.name: Lydia Millet

quotes.message: Empathy is the crucible of intercultural relations.
quotes.name: Carolyn Calloway-Thomas

quotes.message: Loss of empathy might well be the most enduring and deep-cutting scar of all, the silent blade of an unseen enemy, tearing at our hearts and stealing more than our strength.
quotes.name: R.A. Salvatore

quotes.message: Empathy is a powerful behavior of nurturing. When it is given properly, the receiver can feel that the giver really cares about them, and that what they are going through is not trivial.
quotes.name: William E. Krill

quotes.message: If there is any one secret of success, it lies in the ability to get the other person's point of view and see things from his angle as well as your own.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Before you criticize someone, you should walk a mile in their shoes. That way when you criticize them, you are a mile away from them and you have their shoes.
quotes.name: Jack Handey

quotes.message: Pain shared is pain lessened; joy shared is joy increased. Thus do we refute entropy.
quotes.name: Spider Robinson

quotes.message: Empathy frequently informs our earliest days with our infants as we try to figure out what they need, how to comfort and satisfy them
quotes.name: Katherine Ellison

quotes.message: When I get ready to talk to people, I spend two thirds of the time thinking what they want to hear and one third thinking about what I want to say.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: I feel like songwriting is an experiment in empathy.
quotes.name: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.message: The opposite of anger is not calmness, its empathy.
quotes.name: Mehmet Oz

quotes.message: Empathy is akin to sympathy, but whereas sympathy says, 'I feel as you do,' empathy says, 'I know how you feel.
quotes.name: R.W. Armstrong

quotes.message: Empathy enables us to use our heads more than our hearts, and allow us to appreciate another person's feelings without becoming emotionally involved with him.
quotes.name: R.W. Armstrong

quotes.message: Universal responsibility is feeling for other people's suffering just as we feel for our own. It is the realization that even our enemy is entirely motivated by the quest for happiness. We must recognize that all human beings want the same things we want.
quotes.name: The XIV Dalai Lama

quotes.message: It is not granted to the fortunate to understand the sorrow of others.
quotes.name: A.V. Platen

quotes.message: No one really understands the grief or joy of another.
quotes.name: Franz Schubert

quotes.message: If you have problems, let me know. I may not have a solution, but I have been working on my empathy for a long time.
quotes.name: Forrest Lang

quotes.message: There is a great deal of empathy between people who are not only of the same age but genetically identical.
quotes.name: Gordon Randall Garett

quotes.message: Eat not bread while another stands by without extending your hand to him or her. As for food, it is always here; it is man and woman who do not remain.
quotes.name: Khemetic Saying

quotes.message: If you know what hurts yourself you know what hurts others.
quotes.name: Malagasy Wisdom

quotes.message: Rejoice with them that do rejoice, and weep with them that weep.
quotes.name: Roman 12:15

quotes.message: Though I be absent in the flesh, yet am I with you in the spirit.
quotes.name: Col 2:5

quotes.message: Empathy feels these thoughts; your hurt is in my heart, your loss is in my prayers, your sorrow is in my soul, and your tears are in my eyes.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: By compassion, we make others' misery our own, and so, by relieving them, we relieve ourselves also.
quotes.name: Thomas Browne

quotes.message: Listening to people talking I could enter into their lives, feel their tattered clothes on my back, walk with my feet in their shoes; their desires, their needs, all passed into my soul or my soul passed into theirs.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: A man to be greatly good must imagine intensely and comprehensively; he must himself in the place of another and in many others; the pains and pleasures of his species must become his own.
quotes.name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.message: True kindness presupposes the faculty of imagining as one's own the suffering and joys of others.
quotes.name: Andre Gide

quotes.message: Empathy is not merely the basic principle of artistic creation. It is also the only path by which one can reach the truth about life and society.
quotes.name: Nagai Kafu

quotes.message: To understand any living thing, you must, so to say, creep within and feel the beating of its heart.
quotes.name: W. Macneile Dixon

quotes.message: If we revision human nature to include our innate capacity for empathy, then acting on behalf of others lead to self-fulfillment, rather than personal privation.
quotes.name: Tom Hurley

quotes.message: Compassion for all things . Love grows from many pieces . A glorious day it’ll be . Empathy among the species.
quotes.name: Dance of the Poet's Pen

quotes.message: No one cares how much you know until they know how much you care.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Empathy begins with understanding life from another person's perspective. Nobody has an objective experience of reality. It's all through our own individual prisms.
quotes.name: Sterling K. Brown

quotes.message: When you start to develop your powers of empathy and imagination, the whole world opens up to you.
quotes.name: Susan Sarandon

quotes.message: Learning to stand in somebody else’s shoes, to see through their eyes, that’s how peace begins. And it’s up to you to make that happen. Empathy is a quality of character that can change the world.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: The great gift of human beings is that we have the power of empathy, we can all sense a mysterious connection to each other.
quotes.name: Meryl Streep

quotes.message: Whenever you feel like criticizing anyone...just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had.
quotes.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.message: It is an absolute human certainty that no one can know his own beauty or perceive a sense of his own worth until it has been reflected back to him in the mirror of another loving, caring human being.
quotes.name: John Joseph Powell

quotes.message: We think we listen, but very rarely do we listen with real understanding, true empathy. Yet listening, of this very special kind, is one of the most potent forces for change that I know.
quotes.name: Carl Rogers

quotes.message: Empathy is simply listening, holding space, withholding judgment, emotionally connecting, and communicating that incredibly healing message if you’re not alone.
quotes.name: Brene Brown

quotes.message: Empathy is the ability to step outside of your own bubble and into the bubbles of other people.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: The brain is wider than the sky.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: Psychology keeps trying to vindicate human nature. History keeps undermining the effort.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: Introspection is always retrospection.
quotes.name: Sartre

quotes.message: The chief difficulty for those who begin the study of scientific psychology is that all men indulge in popular psychology.
quotes.name: Karl Friedrich Muenzinger

quotes.message: It is not easy to treat feelings scientifically.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: The separation of psychology from the premises of biology is purely artificial, because the human psyche lives in indissoluble union with the body.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: You are the creator of your own reality, and life can show up no other way than that way in which you think it will.
quotes.name: Neale Donald Walsh

quotes.message: The greatest discovery of my generation is that human beings can alter their lives by altering their attitudes of mind.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: But psychology is a more tricky field, in which even outstanding authorities have been known to run in circles, describing things which everyone knows in language which no one understands.
quotes.name: Raymond Bernard Cattell

quotes.message: It is easier to understand mankind in general than any individual man.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: The deepest principle in human nature is the craving to be appreciated.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: Perception is a clash of mind and eye, the eye believing what it sees, the mind seeing what it believes.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: It seems a pity that psychology has destroyed all our knowledge of human nature.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: To the intelligent man with an interest in human nature it must often appear strange that so much of the energy of the scientific world has been spent on the study of the body and so little on the study of the mind.
quotes.name: Edward Thorndike

quotes.message: Knowing reality means constructing systems of transformations that correspond, more or less adequately, to reality.
quotes.name: Jean Piaget

quotes.message: Nothing is so dangerous to the progress of the human mind than to assume that our views of science are ultimate, that there are no mysteries in nature, that our triumphs are complete and that there are no new worlds to conquer.
quotes.name: Humphry Davy

quotes.message: Learn one way; react. Learn many ways; understand.
quotes.name: Tadeu Dias

quotes.message: When the mind is thinking it is talking to itself.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: Idleness is the parent of psychology.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: No one who, like me, conjures up the most evil of those half-tamed demons that inhabit the human breast, and seeks to wrestle with them, can expect to come through the struggle unscathed.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: Genuine feelings cannot be produced, nor can they be eradicated. We can only repress them, delude ourselves, and deceive our bodies. The body sticks to the facts.
quotes.name: Alice Miller

quotes.message: Cognitive psychology tells us that the unaided human mind is vulnerable to many fallacies and illusions because of its reliance on its memory for vivid anecdotes rather than systematic statistics.
quotes.name: Steven Pinker

quotes.message: A large part of the popularity and persuasiveness of psychology comes from its being a sublimated spiritualism: a secular, ostensibly scientific way of affirming the primacy of spirit over matter.
quotes.name: Susan Sontag

quotes.message: Great spirits have often overcome violent opposition from mediocre minds.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Hence, wherever we meet with vital phenomena that present the two aspects, physical and psychical there naturally arises a question as to the relations in which these aspects stand to each other.
quotes.name: Wilhelm Max Wundt

quotes.message: Seeing ourselves as others see us would probably confirm our worst suspicions about them.
quotes.name: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.message: No man's knowledge here can go beyond his experience.
quotes.name: John Locke

quotes.message: Ultimately, man should not ask what the meaning of his life is, but rather he must recognize that it is he who is asked. In a word, each man is questioned by life; and he can only answer to life by answering for his own life; to life he can only respond by being responsible.
quotes.name: Victor Frankl

quotes.message: Our wounds are often the openings into the best and most beautiful part of us.
quotes.name: David Richo

quotes.message: A pessimist is one who makes difficulties of his opportunities, an optimist is one who makes opportunities of his difficulties.
quotes.name: Harry Truman

quotes.message: If you deliberately plan on being less than you are capable of being, then I warn you that you’ll be unhappy for the rest of your life.
quotes.name: Abraham Maslow

quotes.message: Happiness is the only thing that multiplies when you share it.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Every man takes the limits of his own field of vision for the limits of the world.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: We shouldn't teach great books; we should teach a love of reading. Knowing the contents of a few works of literature is a trivial achievement. Being inclined to go on reading is a great achievement.
quotes.name: B.F. Skinner

quotes.message: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
quotes.name: Carl G. Jung

quotes.message: Every form of addiction is bad, no matter whether the narcotic be alcohol, morphine or idealism.
quotes.name: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.message: The pendulum of the mind oscillates between sense and nonsense, not between right and wrong.
quotes.name: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.message: Becoming is better than being.
quotes.name: Carol S. Dweck

quotes.message: A wonderful fact to reflect upon, that every human creature is constituted to be that profound secret and mystery to every other.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: Probably the biggest insight is that happiness is not just a place, but also a process. Happiness is an ongoing process of fresh challenges, and it takes the right attitudes and activities to continue to be happy.
quotes.name: Ed Diener

quotes.message: It is not primarily our physical selves that limit us but rather our mindset about our physical limits.
quotes.name: Ellen J. Langer

quotes.message: Life doesn't make any sense without interdependence. We need each other, and the sooner we learn that, the better for us all.
quotes.name: Erik Erikson

quotes.message: Life doesn't make any sense without interdependence. We need each other, and the sooner we learn that, the better for us all.
quotes.name: Erik Erikson

quotes.message: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
quotes.name: Harry F. Banks

quotes.message: If you want to be creative, stay in part a child, with the creativity and invention that characterizes children before they are deformed by adult society.
quotes.name: Jean Piaget

quotes.message: Be content with what you have. Rejoice in how things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking the whole world belongs to you.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Ability is what you’re capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: Sometimes, if you want to change a man's mind, you have to change the mind of the man next to him first.
quotes.name: Megan Whalen Turner

quotes.message: If you ever find yourself in the wrong story, leave.
quotes.name: Mo Willems

quotes.message: When we encounter an unexpected challenge of threat, the only way to save ourselves is to hold on tight to the people around us and not let go.
quotes.name: Shawn Achor

quotes.message: The highest and most beautiful things in life are not to be heard about, nor read about, nor seen but, if one will, are to be lived.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: Teamwork makes the dream work, but a vision becomes a nightmare when the leader has a big dream and a bad team.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Teamwork is so important that it is virtually impossible for you to reach the heights of your capabilities or make the money that you want without becoming very good at it.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
quotes.name: James Cash Penney

quotes.message: To me, teamwork is the beauty of our sport, where you have five acting as one. You become selfless.
quotes.name: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.message: Individual commitment to a group effort--that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Teamwork is the ability to work together toward a common vision. The ability to direct individual accomplishments toward organizational objectives. It is the fuel that allows common people to attain uncommon results.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: Remember, teamwork begins by building trust. And the only way to do that is to overcome our need for invulnerability.
quotes.name: Patrick Lencioni

quotes.message: None of us is as smart as all of us.
quotes.name: Ken Blanchard

quotes.message: Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
quotes.name: Phil Jackson

quotes.message: It takes two flints to make a fire.
quotes.name: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.message: Only by binding together as a single force will we remain strong and unconquerable.
quotes.name: Chris Bradford

quotes.message: Teamwork: I love the idea of all for one especially if that one is me.
quotes.name: Jarod Kintz

quotes.message: You don't win with the best talent - you win with the five players who are able to play well together.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: In union there is strength.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: Teamwork divides the task and multiplies the success.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: It is a fact that in the right formation, the lifting power of many wings can achieve twice the distance of any bird flying alone.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Regardless of differences, we strive shoulder to shoulder... [T]eamwork can be summed up in five short words: 'We believe in each other.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Teamwork: Simply stated, it is less me and more we.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: A single arrow is easily broken, but not ten in a bundle.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: People have been known to achieve more as a result of working with others than against them.
quotes.name: Dr. Allan Fromme

quotes.message: Effective teamwork will not take the place of knowing how to do the job or how to manage the work. Poor teamwork, however, can prevent effective final performance. And it can also prevent team members from gaining satisfaction in being a member of a team and the organization.
quotes.name: Robert F. Bales

quotes.message: When a team outgrows individual performance and learns team confidence, excellence becomes a reality.
quotes.name: Joe Paterno

quotes.message: Working together works.
quotes.name: Dr. Rob Gilbert

quotes.message: No one can whistle a symphony. It takes an orchestra to play it.
quotes.name: H.E. Luccock

quotes.message: Teams are not ends in themselves; they are a means by which to achieve other organizational goals.
quotes.name: Richard Wellins

quotes.message: Teamwork represents a set of values that encourage behaviors such as listening and constructively responding to points of view expressed by others, giving others the benefit of the doubt, providing support to those who need it, and recognizing the interests and achievements of others.
quotes.name: Katzenbach & Smith

quotes.message: It is amazing what can be accomplished when nobody cares about who gets the credit.
quotes.name: Robert Yates

quotes.message: The nice thing about teamwork is that you always have others on your side.
quotes.name: Margaret Carty

quotes.message: No man is an island, entire of itself; every man is a piece of the continent.
quotes.name: John Donne

quotes.message: Teamwork appears most effective if each individual helps others to succeed, increasing the synergy of that team; ideally, every person will contribute different skills to increase the efficiency of the team and develop its unity.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: Since the dawn of time, the descent of man has revolved around teamwork, and today, successful organisations in any sphere of life all rely on a teamwork ethic with people working together towards a common goal.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
quotes.name: Babe Ruth, Jr.

quotes.message: No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible.
quotes.name: Stanis_aw Jerzy Lec

quotes.message: Individually we are one drop. Together we are an ocean.
quotes.name: Ryunosuke Satoro

quotes.message: Many hands make light work.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: Teamwork makes the dream work.
quotes.name: Bang Gae

quotes.message: If a team is to reach its potential, each player must be willing to subordinate his personal goals to the good of the team.
quotes.name: Bud Wilkinson

quotes.message: Teamwork. A few harmless flakes working together can unleash an avalanche of destruction.
quotes.name: Justin Sewell

quotes.message: Interdependent people combine their own efforts with the efforts of others to achieve their greatest success.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: Many of us are more capable than some of us, but none of us is as capable as all of us.
quotes.name: Tom Wilson

quotes.message: Sticks in a bundle are unbreakable.
quotes.name: Kenyan Proverb

quotes.message: A boat doesn't go forward if each one is rowing their own way.
quotes.name: Swahili Proverb

quotes.message: A single leaf working alone provides no shade.
quotes.name: Chuck Page

quotes.message: Halloween wraps fear in innocence, as though it were a lightly sour sweet. Let terror, then, be turned into a treat...
quotes.name: Nick Gordon

quotes.message: As spirits roam the neighborhoods at night, let loose upon the Earth till it be light...
quotes.name: Nicholas Gordon

quotes.message: I don't know that there are real ghosts and goblins, but there are always more trick-or-treaters than neighborhood kids.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: Tis the nightâ€”the night of the grave's delight, and the warlocks are at their play; Ye think that without, the wild winds shout, but no, it is theyâ€”it is they!
quotes.name: Arthur Cleveland Coxe

quotes.message: Clothes make a statement. Costumes tell a story.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: On Halloween, witches come true; Wild ghosts escape from dreams. Each monster dances in the park.
quotes.name: Nicholas Gordon

quotes.message: Double, double toil and trouble; Fire burn and cauldron bubble.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: The Harvest Moon glows round and bold, in pumpkin shades outlined in gold, illuminating eerie forms, unnatural as a candied corn. Beware what dare crawls up your sleeve,for 'tis the night called Hallows Eve.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: At first cock-crow the ghosts must go back to their quiet graves below.
quotes.name: Theodosia Garrison

quotes.message: From ghoulies and ghosties and long leggety beasties and things that go bump in the night, Good Lord, deliver us!
quotes.name: Scottish Saying

quotes.message: There is nothing funny about Halloween. This sarcastic festival reflects, rather, an infernal demand for revenge by children on the adult world.
quotes.name: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.message: Tis now the very witching time of night, when churchyards yawn, and hell itself breathes out contagion to this world.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Halloween wraps fear in innocence, As though it were a slightly sour sweet. Let terror, then, be turned into a treat.
quotes.name: Nicholas Gordon

quotes.message: If human beings had genuine courage, they'd wear their costumes every day of the year, not just on Halloween.
quotes.name: Douglas Coupland

quotes.message: A grandmother pretends she doesn't know who you are on Halloween.
quotes.name: Erma Bombeck

quotes.message: Pixie, kobold, elf, and sprite, All are on their rounds tonight; In the wan moon's silver ray, Thrives their helter-skelter play.
quotes.name: Joel Benton

quotes.message: Men say that in this midnight hour, the disembodiÃ¨d have power to wander as it liketh them, by wizard oak and fairy stream.
quotes.name: William Motherwell

quotes.message: I can see lights in the distance trembling in the dark cloak of night. Candles and lanterns are dancing, dancing a waltz on All Souls Night.
quotes.name: Loreena McKennitt

quotes.message: In masks and gown we haunt the street and knock on doors for trick or treat tonight we are the king and queen, for oh tonight it's Halloween!
quotes.name: Jack Prelutsky

quotes.message: When witches go riding, and black cats are seen, the moon laughs and whispers, â€˜tis near Halloween.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: A house is never still in darkness to those who listen intently; there is a whispering in distant chambers, an unearthly hand presses the snib of the window, the latch rises. Ghosts were created when the first man awoke in the night.
quotes.name: James Matthew Barrie

quotes.message: Eye of newt, and toe of frog, Wool of bat, and tongue of dog, Adder's fork, and blind-worm's sting, Lizard's leg, and owlet's wing, For a charm of powerful trouble, Like a hell-broth boil and bubble.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Oh how the candles will be lit and the wood of worm burn in a fiery dust. For on all Hallow's Eve will the spirits come to play, and only the fruit of thy womb will satisfy their endless roaming.
quotes.name: Solange nicole

quotes.message: Nothing beats a haunted moonlit night on All Hallows Eve.... And on this fatal night, at this witching time, the starless sky laments black and unmoving. The somber hues of an ominous, dark forest are suddenly illuminated under the emerging face of the full moon.
quotes.name: Kim Elizabeth

quotes.message: Shadows of a thousand years rise again unseen, Voices whisper in the trees, 'Tonight is Halloween!'
quotes.name: Dexter Kozen

quotes.message: May Jack-o-lanterns burning bright, Of soft and golden hue, Pierce through the future's veil and show, What fate now holds for you?
quotes.name: Jerry Smith

quotes.message: Hark! Hark to the wind! 'Tis the night, they say, when all souls come back from the far away- the dead, forgotten this many a day!
quotes.name: Virna Sheard

quotes.message: The witches fly across the sky, The owls go, Who? Who? Who? The black cats yowl And green ghosts howl, Scary Halloween to you!
quotes.name: Nina Willis Walter

quotes.message: Nothing on Earth so beautiful as the final haul on Halloween night.
quotes.name: Steve Almond

quotes.message: It has been my experience that folks who have no vices have very few virtues.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Vices are simply the errors which a man makes in his search after his own happiness. Unlike crimes, they imply no malice toward others, and no interference with their persons or property.
quotes.name: Lysander Spooner

quotes.message: The greatest temptations are not those that solicit our consent to obvious sin, but those that offer us great evils masking as the greatest goods.
quotes.name: Thomas Merton

quotes.message: Thus, a good man, though a slave, is free; but a wicked man, though a king, is a slave. For he serves, not one man alone, but what is worse, as many masters as he has vices.
quotes.name: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.message: It is good to be without vices, but it is not good to be without temptations.
quotes.name: Walter Bagehot

quotes.message: No company is preferable to bad. We are more apt to catch the vices of others than virtues, as disease is far more contagious than health.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: To love a woman for her virtues is meaningless. She's earned it, it's a payment, not a gift. But to love her for her vices is a real gift, unearned and undeserved. To love her for her vices is to defile all virtue for her sake - and that is a real tribute of love, because you sacrifice your conscience, your reason, your integrity and your invaluable self-esteem.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Men are more easily governed through their vices than through their virtues.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: Vices are sometimes only virtues carried to excess!
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: Vices are simply the errors which a man makes in his search after his own happiness.
quotes.name: Lysander Spooner

quotes.message: The problem with people who have no vices is that generally you can be pretty sure they're going to have some pretty annoying virtues.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.message: There is no vice so simple but assumes some mark of virtue on his outward parts.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: We tolerate without rebuke the vices with which we have grown familiar.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: Half the vices which the world condemns most loudly have seeds of good in them and require moderate use rather than total abstinence.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: There are vices which have no hold upon us, but in connection with others; and which, when you cut down the trunk, fall like the branches.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: Think no vice so small that you may commit it, and no virtue so small that you may over look it.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Vices are often habits rather than passions.
quotes.name: Antoine Rivarol

quotes.message: Vices are those acts by which a man harms himself or his property. Crimes are those acts by which one man harms the person or property of another.
quotes.name: Lysander Spooner

quotes.message: Accepting your vices and faults makes you more human. And far less likely to succeed.
quotes.name: Siddesh Sonawane

quotes.message: The real meaning of enlightenment is to gaze with undimmed eyes on all darkness.
quotes.name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.message: Enlightenment must come little by little - otherwise it would overwhelm.
quotes.name: Idries Shah

quotes.message: Really, the only thing that makes sense is to strive for greater collective enlightenment.
quotes.name: Elon Musk

quotes.message: Borrowing knowledge of reality from all sources, taking the best from every study, Science of Mind brings together the highest enlightenment of the ages.
quotes.name: Ernest Holmes

quotes.message: Enlightenment is always there. Small enlightenment will bring great enlightenment. If you breathe in and are aware that you are alive - that you can touch the miracle of being alive - then that is a kind of enlightenment.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: Not creating delusions is enlightenment.
quotes.name: Bodhidharma

quotes.message: There are many paths to enlightenment. Be sure to take one with a heart.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Enlightenment means taking full responsibility for your life.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: Enlightenment is not about becoming divine. Instead it's about becoming more fully human. . . . It is the end of ignorance.
quotes.name: Lama Surya Das

quotes.message: There is no enlightenment outside of daily life.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: If I could define enlightenment briefly I would say it is 'the quiet acceptance of what is.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: One does not become enlightened by imagining figures of light, but by making the darkness conscious.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: Do not think you will necessarily be aware of your own enlightenment.
quotes.name: Dogen

quotes.message: Nirvana or lasting enlightenment or true spiritual growth can be achieved only through persistent exercise of real love.
quotes.name: M. Scott Peck

quotes.message: Just being the seeker, somebody whose open to spiritual enlightenment, is in itself the important thing and it's the reward for being a seeker in this world.
quotes.name: Walter Isaacson

quotes.message: Enlightenment is like everyday consciousness but two inches above the ground.
quotes.name: D. T. Suzuki

quotes.message: The moment of enlightenment is when a person's dreams of possibilities become images of probabilities.
quotes.name: Vic Braden

quotes.message: Only one person in a million becomes enlightened without a teacher's help.
quotes.name: Bodhidharma

quotes.message: Enlightened people seldom or never possess a sense of responsibility.
quotes.name: George Orwell

quotes.message: He who knows others is wise. He who knows himself is enlightened.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Everybody wants to get enlightened but nobody wants to change.
quotes.name: Andrew Cohen

quotes.message: Enlightenment is the inner light of wisdom that is permanently free from all mistaken appearance, and whose function is to bestow mental peace upon each and every living being every day.
quotes.name: Kelsang Gyatso

quotes.message: Only a couple of times have I ever been to church and felt enlightened by it.
quotes.name: Lynn Johnston

quotes.message: We need enlightenment, not just individually but collectively, to save the planet. We need to awaken ourselves. We need to practice mindfulness if we want to have a future, if we want to save ourselves and the planet.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: Enlightenment is not something you achieve. It is the absence of something. All your life you have been going forward after something, pursuing some goal. Enlightenment is dropping all that.
quotes.name: Charlotte Joko Beck

quotes.message: Enlightenment means waking up to what you truly are and then being that.
quotes.name: Adyashanti

quotes.message: Spiritual realization is to see clearly that what I perceive, experience, think, or feel is ultimately not who I am, that I cannot find myself in all those things that continually pass away.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: When you awaken, you realize that the separate person you took yourself to be is just a contract, a mental fabrication.
quotes.name: Stephan Bodian

quotes.message: Spiritual awakening is about waking up from your ego. It is not about awakening the ego.
quotes.name: Sampo Kaasila

quotes.message: Enlightenment is a demolition project. It simply shows you that everything you ever believed was true isn't.
quotes.name: Adyashanti

quotes.message: I believe enlightenment or revelation comes in daily life. I look for joy, the peace of action. You need action. I'd have stopped writing years ago if it were for the money.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Enlightenment is intimacy with all things.
quotes.name: Dogen Zenji

quotes.message: The awakening process, once begun, develops its own momentum without effort on your part, and the truth naturally yearns to awaken itself through you.
quotes.name: Stephan Bodian

quotes.message: Enlightenment is, in the end, nothing more than the natural state of being.
quotes.name: Adyashanti

quotes.message: Enlightenment cannot be attained nor forced. It can only happen when it is given a vacant space to appear in.

quotes.message: The Enlightenment has been blamed for many things. It has been held responsible for the French Revolution, for totalitarianism, and for the view that nature is simply an object to be dominated, manipulated, and exploited.

quotes.message: Enlightenment has been implicated in one way or another in European imperialism and the most aggressive aspects of capitalism. While some have insisted that its skepticism about absolute values infects our culture with a nihilistic sluggishness, others have suggested that liberal societies should divest themselves of the Enlightenment's obsession with philosophical foundations.
quotes.name: James Schmidt

quotes.message: It is said that Enlightenment passion for rights and liberties unleashed a destructive individualism that undermines any sense of community. Yet it has also been argued that its assumption that human nature was infinitely malleable has provided the intellectual inspiration for attempts by totalitarian states to eradicate all traces of individuality from their subjects.
quotes.name: James Schmidt

quotes.message: Enlightenment has been criticized for its insensitivity to the tragic character of moral conflicts and for its naive assumption that all dilemmas have simple solutions.
quotes.name: James Schmidt

quotes.message: Enlightenment has been argued that its attempt to construct a moral philosophy ended in failure, leaving us with either an impoverished moral vision that suppresses all values that cannot be reduced to instrumental efficiency or a corrupted moral discourse in which ethical evaluations are nother more than a mask for individual preferences.
quotes.name: James Schmidt

quotes.message: Enlightenment has been castigated for its affection for master metanarratives and its hostility toward otherness. Its racism and its sexism have not passed unnoticed.
quotes.name: James Schmidt

quotes.message: Enlightenment is at all faithful to its subject. Reservations can be registered on at least two fronts. First, the images of the Enlightenment we have considered here are, at best, caricatures that highlight certain features but miss others. Second, what these caricatures miss may very well be what is of greatest importance in understanding the continuing viability of some version of hopes of the Enlightenment.
quotes.name: James Schmidt

quotes.message: The Enlightenment's significance was believed to transcent its immediate historical circumstances: it held out the prospect of a new, explicitly modern understanding of human beings' place in the world, and of radical improvement in the human condition.

quotes.message: The more you act like a lady, the more he'll act like a gentleman.
quotes.name: Sydney Biddle Barrows

quotes.message: A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony in a moment
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: Feminine force is that inner strength, that power, that will to face down any negative circumstances in life and defeat them.
quotes.name: Georgette Mosbacher

quotes.message: A feminist is anyone who recognizes the equality and full humanity of women and men.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: Look like girl, act like a lady, think like a man work like a boss.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: A strong woman builds her own world. She is one who is wise enough to know that it will attract the man she will gladly share it with.
quotes.name: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.message: To be a woman is to be more than our parts. It is to be more than the length of our lashes or the plumpness and color of our lips.
quotes.name: Leah Darrow

quotes.message: A woman's perfume tells more about her than her handwriting.
quotes.name: Christian Dior

quotes.message: The fact is external feminine beauty is highly valued, and we are constantly given the message that a slamming body is the most valuable thing a woman can possess.
quotes.name: Amanda de Cadenet

quotes.message: Being a female is a matter of birth. Being a woman is a matter of age. But being a lady that's a matter of choice.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Truth is a demure lady, much too ladylike to knock you on your head and drag you to her cave. She is there, but people must want her, and seek her out.
quotes.name: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quotes.message: Be a girl with a mind, a woman with an attitude and a lady with class.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Real women fight for something, other than their own emotions.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Modesty answers not the crude how of femininity, but the beautiful why.
quotes.name: Wendy Shalit

quotes.message: The madman is not the man who has lost his reason. The madman is the man who has lost everything except his reason.
quotes.name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Those who will not reason, perish in the act. Those who will not act, perish for that reason.
quotes.name: W H Auden

quotes.message: Perhaps the reason we are unable to love is that we yearn to be loved, that is, we demand something (love) from our partner instead of delivering ourselves up to him demand-free and asking for nothing but his company.
quotes.name: Milan Kundera

quotes.message: An idle reason lessens the weight of the good ones you gave before.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: Human reason has this peculiar fate that in one species of its knowledge it is burdened by questions which, as prescribed by the very nature of reason itself, it is not able to ignore, but which, as transcending all its powers, it is also not able to answer.
quotes.name: Immanuel Kant

quotes.message: Reason must be deluded, blinded, and destroyed. Faith must trample underfoot all reason, sense, and understanding, and whatever it sees must be put out of sight and, know nothing but the word of God.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Love is a passion for life shared with another person. You fall in love with a person who you think is wonderful. It's your deepest appreciation of the value of that individual, and that individual is a reflection of what you value most in life. Love, for sound reasons, can be one of life's greatest rewards.
quotes.name: Terry Goodkind

quotes.message: And if your parents have you for a reason, then that reason better exist. Because once it's gone, so are you.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: The past shouldn't be forgotten. It should be used as a guide for future situations and not used as a reason to avoid making difficult decisions. There was always a choice.
quotes.name: Maria V. Snyder

quotes.message: I understand the reasons behind his keeping a distance from a girl he cares about. Because the truth is, sometimes getting close to the fire does actually burn you.
quotes.name: Simone Elkeles

quotes.message: When bad things turn good, the reason can usually be found in the human heartâ€”sometimes in the hearts of great masses of people, sometimes in the heart of a solitary soul.
quotes.name: Jerry Spinelli

quotes.message: What does reason know? Reason only knows what it has succeeded in learning.
quotes.name: Rene Descartes

quotes.message: Reason is the greatest enemy that faith has: it never comes to the aid of spiritual things.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Reason can discover things only near,--sees nothing that's above her.
quotes.name: Francis Quarles

quotes.message: The true triumph of reason is that it enables us to get along with those who do not possess it.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: The last function of reason is to recognize that there are an infinity of things which surpass it.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: The voice of reason is more to be regarded than the bent of any present inclination; since inclination will at length come over to reason, though we can never force reason to comply with inclination.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Every man's Reason is sufficient for his guidance, if used.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Reason must know the heart's reasons and every other reason
quotes.name: Leonora Carrington

quotes.message: The reason 'closure' is a cliche is that it is used too often, too imprecisely, and doesn't in any case reflect reality. In reality, such closure in broken friendships and much else in life is rarely achieved; only death brings closure and then not always for those still living.
quotes.name: Joseph Epstein

quotes.message: What was the point in such loneliness among people. At least if you were by yourself, you had a good reason to be lonely.
quotes.name: Janet Fitch

quotes.message: Where we have reasons for what we believe, we have no need of faith; where we have no reasons, we have lost both our connection to the world and to one another.
quotes.name: Sam Harris

quotes.message: Sometimes we have to do a thing in order to find out the reason for it. Sometimes our actions are questions, not answers.
quotes.name: John Le Carre

quotes.message: If we are bound to improve, we need not trouble to improve. The pure doctrine of progress is the best of all reasons for not being a progressive.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Losing your way on a journey is unfortunate. But, losing your reason for the journey is a fate more cruel.
quotes.name: H. G. Wells

quotes.message: There's never any reason to trust someone. If there's a reason, then it's not trust.
quotes.name: Gerald Morris

quotes.message: We cannot reason ourselves out of our basic irrationality. All we can do is learn the art of being irrational in a reasonable way.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: Because of fear, they made shelter and found food and grew things. For the same reason, weapons were stored, waiting.
quotes.name: Lois Lowry

quotes.message: There is no good reason. Don't waste your life waiting for good reasons...You'll wait and wait.
quotes.name: Susan Minot

quotes.message: Reason enslaves all whose minds are not strong enough to master her.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Reason is itself a matter of faith. It is an act of faith to assert that our thoughts have any relation to reality at all.
quotes.name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.message: A lot of women don't know how to love because there's deep reasons for them not knowing how to love. And what I mean by deep reasons is deep and dark reasons.
quotes.name: Lil Wayne

quotes.message: Reason, however able, cool at best, Cares not for service, or but serves when prest, Stays till we call, and then not often near.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: Reason is not automatic. Those who deny it cannot be conquered by it. Do not count on them. Leave them alone.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: The supreme function of reason is to show man that some things are beyond reason.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: Our reason may prove what it will: our reason is only a feeble ray that has issued from Nature.
quotes.name: Maurice Maeterlinck

quotes.message: If you follow reason far enough it always leads to conclusions that are contrary to reason.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: He that cannot reason is a fool. He that will not is a bigot. He that dare not is a slave.
quotes.name: William Drummond

quotes.message: Reason has always existed, but not always in a reasonable form.
quotes.name: Karl Marx

quotes.message: A man always has two reasons for doing anything: a good reason and the real reason.
quotes.name: J.P. Morgan

quotes.message: The reason for the unreason with which you treat my reason , so weakens my reason that with reason I complain of your beauty.
quotes.name: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

quotes.message: Reason can never reconcile one to life: nothing allays the wants one cannot explain.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.message: The primary cause of unhappiness is never the situation but your thoughts about it.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Smiling without good reason is demeaning.
quotes.name: Ellen Raskin

quotes.message: People wonder why the novel is the most popular form of literature; people wonder why it is read more than books of science or books of metaphysics. The reason is very simple; it is merely that the novel is more true than they are.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: People don't just disappear. There's always a reason, or an enemy with a grudge. There's always a loose thread that starts to unravel.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: We were meant to survive because of our minds' ability to reason, our ability to live with frustration in order to maintain our virtue. We wore smiling masks while dying inside.
quotes.name: Anchee Min

quotes.message: Reason is the only thing that makes us men, and distinguishes us from the beasts.
quotes.name: Rene Descartes

quotes.message: If selfishness is the key to being miserable, then selflessness must be the key to being happy!
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: Real living is living for others.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Our compassion and acts of selflessness take us to the deeper truths.
quotes.name: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.message: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
quotes.name: Tenzin Gyatso

quotes.message: I've learned that selflessness is a practice, not a place; a journey much more than a destination.
quotes.name: Kayla Mueller

quotes.message: For your kindness, I'm in debt to you. For your selflessness, my admiration.
quotes.name: Natalie Merchant

quotes.message: If the entire world sought to make itself worthy of happiness rather than make itself happy, then the entire world would be happy.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Do some selfless service for people who are in need. Consider the whole picture, not just our little selves.
quotes.name: Nina Hagen

quotes.message: Behold I do not give lectures or a little charity, When I give I give myself.
quotes.name: Walt Whitman

quotes.message: Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: Life is an exciting business, and most exciting when it is lived for others.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: The men in the steel industry who sacrificed their all were nor merely aiding their fellows at home but were adding strength to the cause of their comrades in all industry.
quotes.name: John L. Lewis

quotes.message: Courage is inseparable from love and leads to what may arguably be the noblest of all warrior virtues: selflessness.
quotes.name: Steven Pressfield

quotes.message: The mythic journey is always about selflessness.
quotes.name: Chris Pine

quotes.message: Selflessness. Humility. Truthfulness. These are the three marks of an honorable man.
quotes.name: Suzy Kassem

quotes.message: Nothing was really so important to my father as the achievement of selflessness. He rarely mentioned it directly, but tried to guide us to it in a roundabout way.
quotes.name: Tahir Shah

quotes.message: The mark of the immature man is that he wants to die nobly for a cause, while the mark of the mature man is that is wants to live humbly for one.
quotes.name: Wilhelm Stekel

quotes.message: The greatest surprise of human evolution may be that the highest form of selfishness is selflessness.
quotes.name: Robert E. Ornstein

quotes.message: Your determination, selflessness and courage have brought the freedom struggle towards its fulfillment.
quotes.name: Gerry Adams

quotes.message: True love is selfless. It is prepared to sacrifice.
quotes.name: Sadhu Vaswani

quotes.message: Man can never be a woman's equal in the spirit of selfless service with which nature has endowed her.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Hopefully as you get older you get more selfless. That would be probably a good goal. I don't know if we do, though.
quotes.name: John Cusack

quotes.message: When you've married someone who's been at war, there is nothing you can do that compares to that level of selflessness and bravery.
quotes.name: John Oliver

quotes.message: You've got to be dedicated and throw yourself into parts and auditions in a way that is completely selfless.
quotes.name: Sophie Kennedy Clark

quotes.message: Without selfless service, no one ever receives the fruits of their rewards.
quotes.name: Sri Guru Granth Sahib

quotes.message: Sometimes you have to be selfish to be selfless.
quotes.name: Edward Albert

quotes.message: When selflessness is seen in objects, the seed of cyclic existence is destroyed.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: There is power in self-sacrifice.
quotes.name: Veronica Roth

quotes.message: Day after day, ordinary people become heroes through extraordinary and selfless actions to help their neighbors.
quotes.name: Sylvia Mathews Burwell

quotes.message: It is under the greatest adversity that there exists the greatest potential for doing good, both for oneself and others.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.message: A hero is somebody who is selfless, who is generous in spirit, who just tries to give back as much as possible and help people. A hero to me is someone who saves people and who really deeply cares.
quotes.name: Debi Mazar

quotes.message: Better than worshiping gods is obedience to the laws of righteousness.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Obedience brings success; exact obedience brings miracles.
quotes.name: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.message: Obedience is the primary object of all sound education.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Missing Sewell

quotes.message: Obedience to lawful authority is the foundation of manly character.
quotes.name: Robert E. Lee

quotes.message: True obedience is true freedom.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Obedience isn't a lack of fear. It's just doing it scared.

quotes.message: Obedience indeed is only the pitiful and cowardly egotism of him who thinks that he can do something better than reason.

quotes.message: When obedience is so impious, revolt is a necessity.

quotes.message: A great work is made out of a combination of obedience and liberty.
quotes.name: Nadia Boulanger

quotes.message: The great test of life is obedience to God.
quotes.name: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.message: Obedience completes itself in understanding.

quotes.message: Disobedience, in the eyes of any one who has read history, is man's original virtue. It is through disobedience that progress has been made, through disobedience and through rebellion.

quotes.message: One act of obedience is better than one hundred sermons.
quotes.name: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.message: Obedience of the law is demanded; not asked as a favor.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Obedience is the opener of eyes.
quotes.name: George Macdonald

quotes.message: Obedience is less painful than regret.
quotes.name: Christine Caine

quotes.message: Obedience simulates subordination as fear of the police simulates honesty.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Obedience and resignation are our personal offerings upon the altar of duty.
quotes.name: Hosea Ballou

quotes.message: Obedience is a part of greatness.
quotes.name: Mark E. Petersen

quotes.message: For there is no obedience without humility, nor humility without charity.
quotes.name: St. Catherine of Siena

quotes.message: Obedience alone gives the right to command.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Obedience is your responsibility, the outcome is God's!
quotes.name: Steven Furtick

quotes.message: Obedience is the mother of success and is wedded to safety.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: Obedience to God is the pathway to the life you really want to live.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: The virtue of obedience makes the will supple. It inspires the courage with which to fulfill the most difficult tasks.
quotes.name: John Vianney

quotes.message: Disobedience is the true foundation of liberty. The obedient must be slaves.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Obedience is the crown and honour of all virtue.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Obedience is an act of faith; disobedience is the result of unbelief.
quotes.name: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.message: Obedience shows whether you are grateful.
quotes.name: Catherine Of Siena

quotes.message: In obedience there is always fear, and fear darkens the mind.
quotes.name: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.message: Obedience to the word in humility of mind never confuses.
quotes.name: John Nelson Darby

quotes.message: Only he who believes is obedient and only he who is obedient believes.
quotes.name: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.message: A person is bound to work in obedience to and in conformity to that person's own nature.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: We must not, in trying to think about how we can make a big difference, ignore the small daily differences we can make which, over time, add up to big differences that we often cannot foresee.
quotes.name: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.message: You're the only one who can make the difference. Whatever your dream is, go for it.
quotes.name: Earvin Magic Johnson

quotes.message: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: Being a man or a woman is a matter of birth. Being a man or a woman who makes a difference is a matter of choice.
quotes.name: Byron Garrett

quotes.message: If you think you're too small to make a difference, you've obviously never been in bed with a mosquito.

quotes.message: It's not what you do once in a while, it's what you do day in and day out that makes the difference.
quotes.name: Jenny Craig

quotes.message: It's not what you've got, it's what you use that makes a difference.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: It's your unlimited power to care and to love that can make the biggest difference in the quality of your life.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: Sometimes just a smile on our face can help to make this world a better place. Stand up for the things that are right. Try to talk things out instead of fight. Lend a hand when you can. You can help to make a difference . . .
quotes.name: Robert Alan

quotes.message: When it's all over, it's not who you were. . . it's whether you made a difference.

quotes.message: We must remember that one determined person can make a significant difference, and that a small group of determined people can change the course of history.

quotes.message: It's a great satisfaction knowing that for a brief point in time you made a difference.

quotes.message: It's not what abilities you have that makes a difference it's what you do with these abilities that's paramount.

quotes.message: Little things done over and over again add up to making a difference in a big way.
quotes.name: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.message: I realize it's possible in ways both large or small to make a difference in someone's life.
quotes.name: Yanni

quotes.message: People don't understand that not only can they make a difference, it's their responsibility to do so.

quotes.message: There is no greater joy nor greater reward than to make a fundamental difference in someone's life.

quotes.message: You cannot get through a single day without having an impact on the world around you. What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.

quotes.message: You may find that making a difference for others makes the biggest difference in you.

quotes.message: It is better to have a meaningful life and make a difference than to merely have a long life.

quotes.message: It takes ONE FAMILY to make a difference in this COMMUNITY. It takes ONE PERSON to make a difference in this FAMILY.
quotes.name: Nisandeh Neta

quotes.message: It's important to see what we can do to make a difference, but it's more important to me to do it every single day.

quotes.message: We can really make a difference in the world, just one heart, one kind word at a time.
quotes.name: Noelani Musicaro

quotes.message: It is important to nurture any new ideas and initiatives which can make a difference
quotes.name: Wangari Maathai

quotes.message: Don't accept that you can't make a difference. Because if you can't make a difference, you won't make a difference, and if you put a multiplier on that we will continue on an unsustainable pathway.

quotes.message: None of us alone can save the nation or world. But each of us can make a positive difference if we commit ourselves to do so.

quotes.message: To make a difference in someone's life, you don't have to be brilliant, rich, beautiful, or perfect. You just have to care.

quotes.message: Go out and make a difference in your community. You don't need endless time and perfect conditions. Do it now. Do it today. Do it for twenty minutes and watch your heart start beating.
quotes.name: Barbara Sher

quotes.message: Any time you have an opportunity to make a difference in this world and you don't, then you are wasting your time on Earth.
quotes.name: Roberto Clemente

quotes.message: You're not considered different until you have made a difference.

quotes.message: If you feel rooted in your home and family, if you're active in your community, there's nothing more empowering. The best way to make a difference in the world is to start by making a difference in your own life.
quotes.name: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quotes.message: Every day of our lives we are on the verge of making those slight changes that would make all the difference.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: Whether you live to be 50 or 100 makes no difference, if you made no difference in the world.
quotes.name: Jarod Kintz

quotes.message: To make a difference in the world, it only takes one optimistic person, who can gather millions of people to make the change.
