quotes.message: Learn to appreciate every moment of your life, stop thinking of the future too much, you have a choice to make a difference in your life at any time you wish.
quotes.name: Auliq Ice

quotes.message: Never give up on you. In order to make a difference you would have to somehow be different.
quotes.name: Johnnie Dent Jr.

quotes.message: If you want to make a difference, think different.
quotes.name: Palle Oswald

quotes.message: It doesn't really matter to me how I make a difference, I just wanna make sure that I do.
quotes.name: Clay Aiken

quotes.message: If you desire to make a difference in the world, you must be different from the world.
quotes.name: Elaine S. Dalton

quotes.message: Those little things can add up to make a big difference.
quotes.name: Tim Mcavoy

quotes.message: I had the ability to make a difference, even if I didn't know what that difference was yet.
quotes.name: Lorna Shultz Nicholson

quotes.message: God made you different so you can make a difference.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: We may not have the ability to change all of the world's wrongs, but we can make a difference where we are.
quotes.name: Dillon Burroughs

quotes.message: One person really can make a difference. Each person is the revolution.
quotes.name: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.message: Small acts of kindness can make a difference in other peoples lives more than we can imagine.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: But you can make a difference, everyone can do that too. May those who can use the help, receive what they ought to.
quotes.name: Julie Hebert

quotes.message: A small change can make a big difference.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: The truth is anyone can be the difference; all it takes is using whatever you have, to do whatever you can.
quotes.name: Darius Graham

quotes.message: Every individual matters. Every individual has a role to play. Every individual makes a difference.
quotes.name: Jane Goodall

quotes.message: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
quotes.name: Edith Wharton

quotes.message: What counts in life is not the mere fact that we have lived. It is what difference we have made to the lives of others that will determine the significance of the life we lead.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: You change the world by being yourself.
quotes.name: Yoko Ono

quotes.message: Anyone who thinks that they are too small to make a difference has never tried to fall asleep with a mosquito in the room.
quotes.name: Christine Todd Whitman

quotes.message: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: We tried in our simple way to lead our life in a manner that may make a difference to those of others.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: Do not wait for leaders. Do it alone, person to person.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: One person can make a difference.
quotes.name: Raoul Wallenberg

quotes.message: Love and kindness are never wasted. They always make a difference. They bless the one who receives them, and they bless you, the giver.
quotes.name: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.message: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The only way to make a difference is to acquire power.
quotes.name: Hillary Clinton

quotes.message: To know is to care, to care is to act, to act is to make a difference.
quotes.name: Harry Chapin

quotes.message: Each one of us can make a difference. Together we make a change.
quotes.name: Barbara Mikulski

quotes.message: When you encourage others, you in the process are encouraged because you’re making a commitment and difference in that person’s life. Encouragement really does make a difference.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Throw yourself into life as someone who makes a difference, accepting that you may not understand how or why.
quotes.name: Benjamin Zander

quotes.message: Heart is what makes a difference.
quotes.name: Jerry Sloan

quotes.message: Everybody wants to make a difference, but nobody wants to be different. And you simply cannot have one without the other.
quotes.name: Andy Andrews

quotes.message: Dreamers dream about things being different. Visionaries envision themselves making a difference.
quotes.name: Andy Stanley

quotes.message: There's always an opportunity to make a difference.
quotes.name: Michael Dell

quotes.message: If you give up on the idea that your voice can make a difference, then other voices will fill the void.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: A difference is a difference only if it makes a difference.
quotes.name: Darrell Huff

quotes.message: Sometimes, two people have to fall apart to realize how much they need to fall back together.
quotes.name: Colleen Hoover

quotes.message: Laughter is the only strategy that has ever worked at all for me when my world is falling apart.
quotes.name: Pat Conroy

quotes.message: There's people that get a chance to do the kind of work that changes the world, and make things really different. And there's the kind that just keeps the world from falling apart.
quotes.name: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.message: Change always involves a dark night when everything falls apart. Yet if this period of dissolution is used to create new meaning, then chaos ends and new order emerges.
quotes.name: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.message: Memories fall apart, too. And then you're left with nothing, left not even with a ghost but with its shadow.
quotes.name: Miles 'Pudge' Halter

quotes.message: Lives fall apart when they need to be rebuilt.
quotes.name: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.message: In the beginning, she had haunted me, haunted my dreams, but even now, just weeks later, she was slipping away, falling apart in my memory and everyone else's, dying again.
quotes.name: Miles 'Pudge' Halter

quotes.message: Don't be concerned that things appear to be falling apart: this has to happen in order for something new and wonderful to emerge.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: Things can fall apart, or threaten to, for many reasons, and then there's got to be a leap of faith. Ultimately, when you're at the edge, you have to go forward or backward; if you go forward, you have to jump together.
quotes.name: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.message: The world as we know it is falling apart at the seams, because it's an inadequate container for the truth of who we are.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: When your world seems to be falling apart,look to Jesus who holds everything together.
quotes.name: Marianette Carbito

quotes.message: Sometimes falling apart is the bravest act of all.
quotes.name: Sarah Hackley

quotes.message: But things don't just fall apart. People break them.
quotes.name: Robin Wasserman

quotes.message: Don't hold together what must fall apart. The familiar life crumbles so the new life can begin.
quotes.name: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.message: When things fall apart, the broken pieces allow all sorts of things to enter, and one of them is the presence of God.
quotes.name: Shauna Niequist

quotes.message: The loneliest moment in someone's life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly.
quotes.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.message: Sometimes when we think our lives are falling apart what we don't see, is that they might just be falling into place.
quotes.name: LJ Vanier

quotes.message: Just because your world is falling apart doesn't mean you have to fall apart. When everything seems crazy, you be calm. Don't let the outer chaos you are facing get inside of you.
quotes.name: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.message: Keep smiling and Stay strong. Even if things are falling apart. Even if you're breaking down.
quotes.name: Marshy Marsh

quotes.message: It is good to realize that falling apart is not such a bad thing. Indeed, it is as essential to evolutionary and psychological transformation as the cracking of outgrown shells.
quotes.name: Joanna Macy

quotes.message: Women often find great roles in revolution, simply because the rules fall apart and everyone has agency, anyone can act.
quotes.name: Rebecca Solnit

quotes.message: The splendid thing about falling apart silently is that you can start over as many times as you like.
quotes.name: Sanober Khan

quotes.message: Everything is falling together perfectly, even though it looks as if some things are falling apart. Trust in the process you are now experiencing.
quotes.name: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.message: It is saying these things that keeps us from falling apart. And maybe by imagining these futures we can make them real, and maybe not, but either way we must imagine them. The light rushes out and floods in.
quotes.name: John Green

quotes.message: When everything falls apart, only one thing sustains our hope: God loves us, he loves everyone!
quotes.name: Pope Francis

quotes.message: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things could fall together.
quotes.name: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.message: When you think your life is falling apart, it's usually falling together in disguise.
quotes.name: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.message: Things falling apart is a kind of testing and also a kind of healing.
quotes.name: Pema Chödrön

quotes.message: Sometimes when things seem falling apart, they might actually be falling into place. Just have patience.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: All my life, I have been in love with the sky. Even when everything was falling apart around me, the sky was always there for me.
quotes.name: Yoko Ono

quotes.message: It was always the power of love that pulled us through, and it was the power of laughter that kept us from falling apart.
quotes.name: Steve Rizzo

quotes.message: Everyone wants someone they can hold and love. Someone who will be there to help pick up the pieces when everything falls apart.
quotes.name: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.message: Even during the worst hardships when the other things in our lives seem to fall apart we can still find peace in the eternal love of God.
quotes.name: Armstrong Williams

quotes.message: Wise sayings often fall on barren ground, but a kind word is never thrown away.
quotes.name: Arthur Helps

quotes.message: Maybe working on the little things as dutifully and honestly as we can is how we stay sane when the world is falling apart.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: Relationships are two people; everyone is accountable. A lot goes into a relationship coming together, and a lot goes into a relationship falling apart. Even if it's 98 percent the other person's fault, it's 2 percent yours You can only clean up your side of the street.
quotes.name: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.message: Some people fall apart when they get hurt. Puddle into apathy and despair and never recover. They wait all their lives for someone to come along and rescue them.
quotes.name: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.message: No matter how your world falls apart-and honey, that's what happens: we all build ourselves a world, and then it falls apart-but no matter how that happens, you still have the kind heart you've had since you were a child, and that's all that really counts.
quotes.name: Kate Bornstein

quotes.message: I learned about the strength you can get from close family life. I learned to keep going, even in bad times. I learned not to despair, even when my world was falling apart. I learned that there are no free lunches. And I learned the value of hard work.
quotes.name: Lee Iacocca

quotes.message: One small crack doesn’t mean that you are broken. It means that you were put to test and you didn’t fall apart.
quotes.name: Linda Paindexter

quotes.message: I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
quotes.name: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.message: Never be afraid to fall apart because it is an opportunity to rebuild yourself the way you wish you had been all along.
quotes.name: Rae Smith

quotes.message: After all, computers crash, people die, relationships fall apart. The best we can do is breath and reboot.
quotes.name: Sarah Jessica Parker

quotes.message: When real people fall down in life, they get right back up and keep walking.
quotes.name: Sarah Jessica Parker

quotes.message: Insanity is everyone expecting you not to fall apart when you find out everything you believed in was a lie.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: It takes ten times as long to put yourself back together as it does to fall apart.
quotes.name: Suzanne Collins

quotes.message: It takes ten times as long to put yourself back together as it does to fall apart.
quotes.name: Suzanne Collins

quotes.message: The loneliest moment in someone’s life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart and all they can do is stare blankly.
quotes.name: The Great Gatsby

quotes.message: Sometimes, all you can do is lie in bed, and hope to fall asleep before you fall apart.
quotes.name: William C.Hannan

quotes.message: The worst thing one can do is not to try, to be aware of what one wants and not give in to it, to spend years in silent hurt wondering if something could have materialized - never knowing.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Doubt is the vestibule through which all must pass before they can enter into the temple of wisdom.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: The simple practice of hesitation helps you stop reacting blindly to everything that happens.
quotes.name: Ma Jaya

quotes.message: Make up your mind to act decidedly and take the consequences. No good is ever done in this world by hesitation.
quotes.name: Thomas Henry Huxley

quotes.message: Without doubt, you are recognized for the last role you played.
quotes.name: Roger Moore

quotes.message: If you hesitate, some bolder hand will stretch out before you and get the prize.
quotes.name: P. T. Barnum

quotes.message: Doubt your doubts before you doubt your beliefs.
quotes.name: Chace Crawford

quotes.message: To the timid and hesitating everything is impossible because it seems so.
quotes.name: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.message: Never hesitate to ask a lesser person.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Never hesitate to hold out your hand; never hesitate to accept the outstretched hand of another.
quotes.name: Pope John XXIII

quotes.message: Hesitation will get you killed.
quotes.name: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.message: Whenever man begins to doubt himself, he does something so stupid that he is reassured.
quotes.name: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.message: You can tell when something's not moving forward anymore. When the doubts you have about it don't go away.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.message: When in doubt, have a man come through the door with a gun in his hand.
quotes.name: Raymond Chandler

quotes.message: Never hesitate to steal a good idea.
quotes.name: Al Neuharth

quotes.message: Beyond a doubt truth bears the same relation to falsehood as light to darkness.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: Doubt must be no more than vigilance, otherwise it can become dangerous.
quotes.name: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.message: While one person hesitates because he feels inferior, the other is busy making mistakes and becoming superior.
quotes.name: Henry C. Link

quotes.message: Doubt is the father of invention.
quotes.name: Galileo Galilei

quotes.message: When you doubt, abstain.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: The more you hesitate in a game, the more your chance of getting hit. Your focus isn't there. When you hesitate, usually you're in trouble.
quotes.name: Sidney Crosby

quotes.message: Modest doubt is called the beacon of the wise.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: He who hesitates is poor.
quotes.name: Mel Brooks

quotes.message: Second thoughts oftentimes are the very worst of all thoughts.
quotes.name: William Shenstone

quotes.message: In this world second thoughts, it seems, are best.
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: Doubt is not the opposite of faith; it is one element of faith.
quotes.name: Paul Tillich

quotes.message: Hesitation is the best cure for anger. The first blows of anger are heavy, but if it waits, it will think again.
quotes.name: Seneca The Younger

quotes.message: Hesitation only enlarges, magnifies the fear. Take action promptly. Be decisive.
quotes.name: David J. Schwartz

quotes.message: Doubt begins only at the last frontiers of what is possible.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease for ever to be able to do it.
quotes.name: J. M. Barrie

quotes.message: On the plains of hesitation bleach the bones of countless millions who, at the dawn of decision, sat down to wait, and waiting died.
quotes.name: Sam Ewing

quotes.message: Doubt is the brother of shame.
quotes.name: Erik Erikson

quotes.message: The worst part is doubt. When you doubt yourself, which we are taught to do, you get lost.
quotes.name: Kevin Eubanks

quotes.message: Our doubts are traitors and make us lose the good we oft might win by fearing to attempt.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Doubt is the middle position between knowledge and ignorance. It encompasses cynicism but also genuine questioning.
quotes.name: Vera Farmiga

quotes.message: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: Hesitation increases in relation to risk in equal proportion to age.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: Doubt, of whatever kind, can be ended by action alone.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Hesitation of any kind is a sign of mental decay in the young, of physical weakness in the old.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Your doubts are generated by fear, and fear is a series of distorted thoughts.
quotes.name: Leandra Medine

quotes.message: Doubt comes in at the window when inquiry is denied at the door.
quotes.name: Benjamin Jowett

quotes.message: There must be a reason why people hesitate; uncertainty is one, no courage another.
quotes.name: Ron De Jonge

quotes.message: When in doubt, use brute force.
quotes.name: Ken Thompson

quotes.message: Of all the words of mice and men, the saddest are, 'It might have been'.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut, Jr.

quotes.message: If in doubt, don't. If still in doubt, do what's right.
quotes.name: Donald Rumsfeld

quotes.message: You should never hesitate to trade your cow for a handful of magic beans.
quotes.name: Tom Robbins

quotes.message: When you start to doubt yourself the real world will eat you alive.
quotes.name: Henry Rollins

quotes.message: Doubt grows with knowledge.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Politeness is not always a sign of wisdom; but the want of it always leaves room for a suspicion of folly, if folly and imprudence are the same.
quotes.name: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.message: There is no policy like politeness; and a good manner is the best thing in the world either to get a good name, or to supply the want of it.
quotes.name: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: Politeness goes far, yet costs nothing.
quotes.name: Samuel Smiles

quotes.message: In truth, politeness is artificial good humor, it covers the natural want of it, and ends by rendering habitual a substitute nearly equivalent to the real virtue.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Good and strong will. Mechanism must precede science (learning). Also in morals and religion? Too much discipline makes one narrow and kills proficiency. Politeness belongs, not to discipline, but to polish, and thus comes last.
quotes.name: Immanuel Kant

quotes.message: (Politeness is) a tacit agreement that people's miserable defects, whether moral or intellectual, shall on either side be ignored and not be made the subject of reproach.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: [Politeness costs nothing.]. . . . Nothing, that is to him that shows it; but it often costs the world very dear.
quotes.name: William Allingham

quotes.message: Virtue, perhaps, is nothing more than politeness of soul.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: Politeness is an inexpensive way of making friends.
quotes.name: William Feather

quotes.message: There is a politeness of the heart; this is closely allied to love.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Politeness is sometimes a great tax upon sincerity.
quotes.name: Charlotte Lennox

quotes.message: Life is short, but there is always time enough for courtesy.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Politeness -- The most acceptable hypocrisy.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: Treat everyone with politeness, even those who are rude to you â€” not because they are nice, but because you are.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: E-mail has some magical ability to turn off the politeness gene in the human being.
quotes.name: Jeff Bezos

quotes.message: Politeness of the mind is to have delicate thoughts.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: The care that we bestow on our person is a species of politeness towards others.
quotes.name: Charles Blanc

quotes.message: One of the greatest victories you can gain over someone is to beat him at politeness.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Politeness is the chief sign of culture.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: Politeness is one of those advantages which we never estimate rightly but by the inconvenience of its loss.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: True politeness consists in being easy one's self, and in making every one about one as easy as one can.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: True politeness is to social life what oil is to machinery, a thing to oil the ruts and grooves of existence. False politeness can shine without warming and glitter without vivifying.
quotes.name: Frances Harper

quotes.message: Politeness has been well defined as benevolence in small things.
quotes.name: Thomas B. Macaulay

quotes.message: A polite enemy is just as difficult to discredit, as a rude friend is to protect.
quotes.name: Bryant McGill

quotes.message: All Politeness is owing to Liberty. We polish one another, and rub off our Corners and rough Sides by a sort of amicable Collision. To restrain this, is inevitably to bring a Rust upon Mens Understandings.
quotes.name: Anthony Ashley-Cooper

quotes.message: Home is the place where true politeness tells.
quotes.name: Julia McNair Wright

quotes.message: It is wise to apply the oil of refined politeness to the mechanisms of friendship.
quotes.name: Colette

quotes.message: Politeness can at once be the indifferent affliction of the â€˜civilized' as well as a subterfuge for the designed offence.
quotes.name: Vinod Pande

quotes.message: Politeness is the poison of collaboration.
quotes.name: Edwin Land

quotes.message: Politeness and an affable address are our best introduction.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: Politeness is the flower of humanity.
quotes.name: Joseph Joubert

quotes.message: Politeness is like an air-cushionâ€”there may be nothing in it, but it wonderfully eases the joltings along the rough road of life.
quotes.name: H.W. Beecher

quotes.message: Politeness is organized indifference.
quotes.name: Paul Valery

quotes.message: Politeness is to human nature what warmth is to wax.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: Politeness is half good manners and half good lying.
quotes.name: Mary Wilson Little

quotes.message: There is no accomplishment so easy to acquire as politeness, and none more profitable.
quotes.name: Henry Wheeler Shaw

quotes.message: Politeness is fictitious benevolence. Depend upon it, the want of it never fails to produce something disagreeable to one or other.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Our morality seems to be only a check on the ultimate domination of force, just as our politeness is a check on the impulse of every pig to put his feet in the trough.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.message: Politeness [is] a sign of dignity, not subservience.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Politeness is the art of choosing among one's real thoughts.
quotes.name: Abel Stevens

quotes.message: The highest perfection of politeness is only a beautiful edifice, built, from the base to the dome, of ungraceful and gilded forms of charitable and unselfish lying.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Politeness is as much concerned in answering letters within a reasonable time, as it is in returning a bow, immediately.
quotes.name: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.message: It is a wise thing to be polite; consequently, it is a stupid thing to be rude. To make enemies by unnecessary and willful incivility, is just as insane a proceeding as to set your house on fire. For politeness is like a counter--an avowedly false coin, with which it is foolish to be stingy.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: Politeness makes one appear outwardly as they should be within.
quotes.name: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.message: Democracy is two wolves and a lamb voting on what to have for lunch.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Democracy works when people claim it as their own.
quotes.name: BILL MOYERS

quotes.message: Democracy consists of choosing your dictators, after they've told you what you think it is you want to hear.
quotes.name: ALAN COREN

quotes.message: Democracy is the recurrent suspicion that more than half of the people are right more than half the time.
quotes.name: E.B. WHITE

quotes.message: Democracy is a pathetic belief in the collective wisdom of individual ignorance.
quotes.name: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.message: Democracy is when the indigent, and not the men of property, are the rulers.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Democracy is a charming form of government, full of variety and disorder, and dispensing a sort of equality to equals and unequal alike.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: Democracy is the art and science of running the circus from the monkey cage.
quotes.name: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.message: Democracy, like liberty, justice and other social and political rights are not given. They are earned through courage, resolution and sacrifice.
quotes.name: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.message: Democracy is the process by which people choose the man who'll get the blame.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Democracy is the form of government that gives every man the right to be his own oppressor.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: Democracy is the art of thinking independently together.
quotes.name: Alexander Meiklejohn

quotes.message: A democracy is a volcano which conceals the fiery materials of its own destruction. These will produce an eruption and carry desolation in their way.
quotes.name: Fisher Ames

quotes.message: Democracy means government by discussion, but it is only effective if you can stop people talking.
quotes.name: Clement Atlee

quotes.message: Democracy means not 'I am as good as you are' but 'You are as good as I am.
quotes.name: Theodore Parker

quotes.message: Democracy does not guarantee equality of conditions - it only guarantees equality of opportunity.
quotes.name: Irving Kristol

quotes.message: Democracy is 51% of the people taking away the rights of the other 49%.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Democracy is like a hobby horse: It will carry you nowhere unless you use your own legs.
quotes.name: Herbert Samuel

quotes.message: Democracy is not a fragile flower; still it needs cultivating.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Democracy means that anyone can grow up to be president, and anyone who doesn't grow up can be vice president.
quotes.name: Johnny Carson

quotes.message: The ship of democracy, which has weathered all storms, may sink through the mutiny of those on board.
quotes.name: Grover Cleveland

quotes.message: Democracy is based upon the conviction that there are extraordinary possibilities in ordinary people.
quotes.name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.message: Democracy is a device that ensures we shall be governed no better than we deserve.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Democracy substitutes election by the incompetent many for appointment by the corrupt few.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Democracy: The state of affairs in which you consent to having your pocket picked, and elect the best man to do it.
quotes.name: Benjamin Lichtenberg

quotes.message: Democracy is like a raft: It won't sink, but you will always have your feet wet.
quotes.name: Russell B. Long

quotes.message: Democracy cannot flourish half rich and half poor, any more than it can flourish half free and half slave.
quotes.name: Felix G. Rohatyn

quotes.message: Democracy is an experiment, and the right of the majority to rule is no more inherent than the right of the minority to rule; and unless the majority represents sane, righteous, unselfish public sentiment, it has no inherent right.
quotes.name: William Allen White

quotes.message: The primal principle of democracy is the worth and dignity of the individual.
quotes.name: Edward Bellamy

quotes.message: Democracy is not the law of the majority but the protection of the minority.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: In a democracy, the individual enjoys not only the ultimate power but carries the ultimate responsibility.
quotes.name: Norman Cousins

quotes.message: I understand democracy as something that gives the weak the same chance as the strong.
quotes.name: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.message: A great democracy must be progressive or it will soon cease to be a great democracy.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Democracy is constructed like an edifice, freedom by freedom, right by right, until it reaches its snapping point.
quotes.name: Abdoulaye Wade

quotes.message: The whole purpose of democracy is that we may hold counsel with one another, so as not to depend upon the understanding of one man.
quotes.name: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.message: In our so-called democracy we are accustomed to give the majority what they want rather than educate them to understand what is best for them.
quotes.name: Carter Woodson

quotes.message: Democracy is the government of the people, by the people, for the people.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Democracy is the most demanding of all forms of government in terms of the energy, imagination, and public spirit required of the individual.
quotes.name: George C. Marshall

quotes.message: Democracy cannot succeed unless those who express their choice are prepared to choose wisely. The real safeguard of democracy, therefore, is education.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: Democracy is supposed to give you a feeling of choice, like painkiller x and painkiller y. But they're both just aspirin.
quotes.name: Gore Vidal

quotes.message: Adultery is the application of democracy to love.
quotes.name: H. L. Mencken

quotes.message: Democracy is only an experiment in government, and it as the obvious disadvantage of merely counting votes instead of weighing them.
quotes.name: Dean Inge

quotes.message: Democracy is an abuse of statistics.
quotes.name: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.message: The great thing about democracy is that it gives every voter a chance to do something stupid.
quotes.name: Art Spander

quotes.message: Democracy encourages the majority to decide things about which the majority is ignorant.
quotes.name: John Simon

quotes.message: Democracy is a pathetic belief in the collective wisdom of individual ignorance.
quotes.name: H.L. Mencken

quotes.message: Democracy is worth dying for, because it's the most deeply honorable form of government ever devised by man.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Democracy is the power of equal votes for unequal minds.
quotes.name: Charles I of England

quotes.message: Democracy has nothing to do with freedom. Democracy is a soft variant of communism, and rarely in the history of ideas has it been taken for anything else.
quotes.name: Hans-Hermann Hoppe

quotes.message: As long as people use violence to combat violence, we will always have violence.
quotes.name: MICHAEL BERG

quotes.message: Violence is not a catalyst but a diversion.
quotes.name: Joseph Conrad

quotes.message: The sight of blood to crowds begets the thirst of more, As the first wine-cup leads to the long revel.
quotes.name: Lord Byron

quotes.message: Violence does, in truth, recoil upon the violent, and the schemer falls into the pit which he digs for another.
quotes.name: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.message: A man with a briefcase can steal millions more than any man with a gun.
quotes.name: Don Henley

quotes.message: A society that presumes a norm of violence and celebrates aggression, whether in the subway, on the football field, or in the conduct of its business, cannot help making celebrities of the people who would destroy it.
quotes.name: Lewis H. Lapham

quotes.message: I object to violence because when it appears to do good, the good is only temporary; the evil it does is permanent.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: I write about violence as naturally as Jane Austen wrote about manners. Violence shapes and obsesses our society, and if we do not stop being violent we have no future.
quotes.name: Edward Bond

quotes.message: If you strike a child, take care that you strike it in anger, even at the risk of maiming it for life. A blow in cold blood neither can nor should be forgiven.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf.
quotes.name: George Orwell

quotes.message: We fear violence less than our own feelings. Personal, private, solitary pain is more terrifying than what anyone else can inflict.
quotes.name: Jim Morrison

quotes.message: Nonviolence doesn't always work -- but violence never does.
quotes.name: Isaac Asimov

quotes.message: Violence and smut are of course everywhere on the airwaves. You cannot turn on your television without seeing them, although sometimes you have to hunt around.
quotes.name: Dave Barry

quotes.message: When liberty comes with hands dabbled in blood it is hard to shake hands with her.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Violence is an admission that one's ideas and goals cannot prevail on their own merits.
quotes.name: Edward Kennedy

quotes.message: Peace cannot be achieved through violence, it can only be attained through understanding.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: The sword of murder is not the balance of justice.
quotes.name: Julia Ward Howe

quotes.message: You must show the world that you abhor fighting.
quotes.name: Bishop Desmond Tutu

quotes.message: Violence can only be concealed by a lie, and the lie can only be maintained by violence.
quotes.name: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.message: Power and violence are opposites; where the one rules absolutely, the other is absent. Violence appears where power is in jeopardy, but left to its own course it ends in power's disappearance.
quotes.name: Hannah Arendt

quotes.message: In America all too few blows are struck into flesh. We kill the spirit here, we are experts at that. We use psychic bullets and kill each other cell by cell.
quotes.name: Norman Mailer

quotes.message: We must unite. Violence against women cannot be tolerated, in any form, in any context, in any circumstance, by any political leader or by any government.
quotes.name: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.message: More and more leaders around the world are joining the struggle. More and more individuals understand that any abuse of any woman is intolerable.
quotes.name: Asha-Rose Migiro

quotes.message: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: There are only two forces in the world, the sword and the spirit. In the long run the sword will always be conquered by the spirit.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: iolence is not merely killing another. It is violence when we use a sharp word, when we make a gesture to brush away a person, when we obey because there is fear.
quotes.name: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.message: Violence isn't always evil. What's evil is the infatuation with violence.
quotes.name: Jim Morrison

quotes.message: It is better to be violent, if there is violence in our hearts, than to put on the cloak of nonviolence to cover impotence.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: They attack the one man with their hate and their shower of weapons. But he is like some rock which stretches into the vast sea and which, exposed to the fury of the winds and beaten against by the waves, endures all the violence.

quotes.message: Power and violence are opposites; where the one rules absolutely, the other is absent. Violence appears where power is in jeopardy, but left to its own course it ends in power's disappearance.

quotes.message: Violence does, in truth, recoil upon the violent, and the schemer falls into the pit which he digs for another.

quotes.message: Violence commands both literature and life, and violence is always crude and distorted.

quotes.message: There are situations in life to which the only satisfactory response is a physically violent one. If you don't make that response, you continually relive the unresolved situation over and over in your life.
quotes.name: Russell Hoban

quotes.message: In violence we forget who we are.
quotes.name: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.message: Hungry people cannot be good at learning or producing anything, except perhaps violence.
quotes.name: Pearl Bailey

quotes.message: I am for violence if non-violence means we continue postponing a solution to the American black man's problem just to avoid violence.
quotes.name: Malcolm X

quotes.message: If you succumb to the temptation of using violence in the struggle, unborn generations will be the recipients of a long and desolute night of bitterness, and your chief legacy to the future will be an endless reign of meaningless chaos.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: On the one hand, the guns were there to help capture the imagination of the people. But more important, since we knew that you couldn't observe the police without guns, we took our guns with us to let the police know that we have an equalizer.
quotes.name: Bobby Seale

quotes.message: Why is it that, as a culture, we are more comfortable seeing two men holding guns than holding hands
quotes.name: Ernest Gaines

quotes.message: Opinions founded on prejudice are always sustained with the greatest of violence.
quotes.name: Francis Jeffrey

quotes.message: The only thing that's been a worse flop than the organization of non-violence has been the organization of violence.
quotes.name: Joan Baez

quotes.message: Those who make peaceful revolution impossible will make violent revolution inevitable.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: There are more pleasant things to do than beat up people.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: The right things to do are those that keep our violence in abeyance; the wrong things are those that bring it to the fore.
quotes.name: Robert J. Sawyer

quotes.message: An intelligent fool can make things bigger, more complex, and more violent.
quotes.name: Hoshang N. Akhtar

quotes.message: Though defensive violence will always be 'a sad necessity' in the eyes of men of principle, it would be still more unfortunate if wrongdoers should dominate just men.
quotes.name: Saint Augustine

quotes.message: One must do violence to the object of one's desire; when it surrenders, the pleasure is greater.
quotes.name: Marquis De Sade

quotes.message: The main goal of the future is to stop violence. The world is addicted to it.
quotes.name: Bill Cosby

quotes.message: All violence consists in some people forcing others, under threat of suffering or death, to do what they do not want to do.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: Violence send deep roots into the heart, it has no seasons, it is always ripe, evergreen.
quotes.name: Pat Conroy

quotes.message: Great anger and violence can never build a nation.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: Violence is a disease, a disease that corrupts all who use it regardless of the cause.
quotes.name: Chris Hedges

quotes.message: As much as it hurts, I would rather miss someone than hit someone.
quotes.name: Brian Celio

quotes.message: For all who draw the sword will die by the sword.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: Violence is a dark contrast to what so many of us still believe in -- love.
quotes.name: Robi Ludwig

quotes.message: Violence and injury enclose in their net all that do such things, and generally return upon him who began.
quotes.name: Lucretius

quotes.message: Through violence, you may solve one problem, but you sow seeds for another.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: There is a violence that liberates, and a violence that enslaves; there is a violence that is moral and a violence that is immoral.

quotes.message: Violence is like a strong perfume. It may seem good from afar, but as soon as you get close it's sickening.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Violence, even well intentioned, always rebounds upon oneself.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Violence is not power, but the absence of power.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Violence is the problem, not the solution.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Returning violence for violence multiplies violence, adding deeper darkness to a night already devoid of stars.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: Sometimes you have to pick the gun up to put the Gun down.
quotes.name: Malcolm X

quotes.message: Violence is man re-creating himself.
quotes.name: Frantz Fanon

quotes.message: Violence is the last word of the illiterate. Also the first.
quotes.name: Solomon Short

quotes.message: What is gained by violence must be lost before superior violence.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Violence ends up defeating itself. It creates bitterness in the survivors and brutality in the destroyers.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: Violence of the tongue is very real- sharper than any knife.
quotes.name: Teresa Giudice

quotes.message: At the end of the day, violence never really solves any problemâ€¦it just creates new ones.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The ultimate weakness of violence is that it is a descending spiral, begetting the very thing that it seeks to destroy.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: Violence is not only impractical but immoral.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: Violence is never the answer, until it's the only answer.
quotes.name: Derek Landy

quotes.message: Return not violence for violence.
quotes.name: Abu Hanifa

quotes.message: No amount of violence you've done to others prepares you for violence done to yourself.
quotes.name: Glen Duncan

quotes.message: The violence done us by others is often less painful than that which we do to ourselves.

quotes.message: Through violence, you may murder the hater, but you do not murder the hate.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: Violence is born of the desire to escape oneself.
quotes.name: Iris Murdoch

quotes.message: An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Nothing good ever comes of violence.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Nonviolence doesn't always work but violence never does.
quotes.name: Madge Micheels-Cyrus

quotes.message: He that breaks a thing to find out what it is has left the path of wisdom.
quotes.name: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.message: Answer violence with violence. If one of us falls today, five of them must fall tomorrow.
quotes.name: Evita Peron

quotes.message: When you used violence to achieve 'peace'; what did you achieve ? -Supressed violence!
quotes.name: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

quotes.message: Violence does not always take visible form, and not all wounds gush blood.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: In violence, we forget who we are.
quotes.name: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.message: It is better to be violent, if there is violence in our hearts, than to put on the cloak of nonviolence to cover impotence.
quotes.name: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.message: Any man who can drive safely while kissing a pretty girl is simply not giving the kiss the attention it deserves.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Kissing is like drinking salted water. You drink, and your thirst increases.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Kissing is a merging of two lips, two souls and two spirits that makes them divine.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Kissing you is like dancing in the rain; it is an exciting kind of sensation that you can't help but fall in love with.
quotes.name: Melissa

quotes.message: Kissing may not spread germs, but they certainly lower resistance.
quotes.name: Louise Erickson

quotes.message: Her lips on his could tell him better than all her stumbling words.
quotes.name: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.message: Lips that taste of tears, they say, Are the best for kissing.
quotes.name: Dorothy Parker

quotes.message: Ancient lovers believed a kiss would literally unite their souls, because the spirit was said to be carried in one's breath.
quotes.name: Eve Glicksman

quotes.message: Soul meets soul on lovers' lips.
quotes.name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.message: I can't read lips unless they're touching mine.
quotes.name: Jon Troast

quotes.message: The decision to kiss for the first time is the most crucial in any love story. It changes the relationship of two people much more strongly than even the final surrender; because this kiss already has within it that surrender.
quotes.name: Emil Ludwig

quotes.message: Ancient lovers believed a kiss would literally unite their souls, because the spirit was said to be carried in one's breath.
quotes.name: Eve Glicksman

quotes.message: There is the kiss of welcome and of parting, the long, lingering, loving, present one; the stolen, or the mutual one; the kiss of love, of joy, and of sorrow; the seal of promise and receipt of fulfillment.
quotes.name: Thomas C. Haliburton

quotes.message: Kissing your hand may make you feel very very good but a diamond and sapphire bracelet lasts forever.
quotes.name: Anita Loos

quotes.message: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
quotes.name: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.message: Stolen kisses are always sweetest.
quotes.name: Leigh Hunt

quotes.message: A kiss can be a comma, a question mark or an exclamation point. That's basic spelling that every woman ought to know.
quotes.name: Mistinguett

quotes.message: I wasn't kissing her, I was whispering in her mouth.
quotes.name: Chico Marx

quotes.message: Women still remember the first kiss after men have forgotten the last.
quotes.name: Remy de Gourmont

quotes.message: It is the passion that is in a kiss that gives to it its sweetness; it is the affection in a kiss that sanctifies it.
quotes.name: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.message: A kiss makes the heart young again and wipes out the years.
quotes.name: Rupert Brooke

quotes.message: When I kiss you, I can taste your soul.
quotes.name: Carrie Latet

quotes.message: We turned on one another deep, drowned gazes, and exchanged a kiss that reduced my bones to rubber and my brain to gruel.
quotes.name: Peter De Vries

quotes.message: Is not a kiss the very autograph of love
quotes.name: Henry Finck

quotes.message: A friend is always good to have, but a lover's kiss is better than angels raining down on me.
quotes.name: Dave Matthews

quotes.message: A kiss that is never tasted, is forever and ever wasted.
quotes.name: Billie Holiday

quotes.message: You may conquer with the sword, but you are conquered by a kiss.
quotes.name: Daniel Heinsius

quotes.message: A kiss is something you cannot give without taking and cannot take without giving.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: What of soul was left, I wonder, when the kissing had to stop
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: Kisses are a better fate than wisdom.
quotes.name: E. E. Cummings

quotes.message: The moment eternal - just that and no more - When ecstasy's utmost we clutch at the core While cheeks burn, arms open, eyes shut, and lips meet!
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: With a kiss let us set out for an unknown world.
quotes.name: Alferd De Musset

quotes.message: If it's the first kiss, it's important for the eyes to be closed so you know it's real.
quotes.name: Joe Jonas

quotes.message: Never a lip is curved with pain that can't be kissed into smiles again.
quotes.name: Bret Harte

quotes.message: I can forget my very existence in a deep kiss of you.
quotes.name: Byron Caldwell Smith

quotes.message: The sound of a kiss is not so loud as that of a cannon, but its echo lasts a great deal longer.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendall Holmes

quotes.message: A kiss may ruin a human life.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Love at the lips was touch as sweet as I could bear.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: Once he drew with one long kiss My whole soul through my lips, As sunlight drinketh dew.
quotes.name: Lord Tennyson

quotes.message: My heart smiled when you kissed my lips. What a sweet surprise.
quotes.name: Jan Arden

quotes.message: A kiss shares things that words find hard to express.
quotes.name: LJ

quotes.message: Hugging closes the door to hate. Kissing opens the door to love.

quotes.message: There is something almost magical about kissing the one you love... time is no more as lips touch, the art of tenderness displayed and emotion and passions ignite into flame.
quotes.name: LJ

quotes.message: Never close your lips to those whom you have opened your heart.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: Once he drew, with one long kiss my whole soul through my lips.
quotes.name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.message: Take it and return it: the kiss of love.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: Kisses that are easily obtained are easily forgotten.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: A kiss, when all is said, what is it? A rosy dot placed on the i in loving; 'Tis a secret told to the mouth instead of to the ear.

quotes.message: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
quotes.name: Judy Garland

quotes.message: A kiss is one of the most significant exchanges two people can have, serving as an unspoken language to convey our deepest feelings when words simply will not do.
quotes.name: Sheril Kirshenbaum

quotes.message: Kiss is a symbol of love and desire to a perfunctory greeting between family and friends, this act can have innumerable meanings and resonances.
quotes.name: Sheril Kirshenbaum

quotes.message: Some kisses are sealed forever in our minds and hearts, while others are forgotten as quickly as they occur.
quotes.name: Sheril Kirshenbaum

quotes.message: Across continents and time, kissing is one of the most important activities in our lives, yet its real nature has been too often overlooked by scientists and laypeople alike.
quotes.name: Sheril Kirshenbaum

quotes.message: For many of us, kiss is a part of our earliest introduction to planet earth, and is often involved in our final exit as well.
quotes.name: Sheril Kirshenbaum

quotes.message: A kiss is like a window into someone's inner thoughts.
quotes.name: William Cane

quotes.message: You can sense the mood of the person you're kissing. You can often tell how they really feel about you from a kiss.
quotes.name: William Cane

quotes.message: Another thing I like about kissing is that it always foreshadows what might be coming.
quotes.name: William Cane

quotes.message: Kissing is more than mere technique. It's passion, romance, and above all love.
quotes.name: William Cane

quotes.message: Kissing is such a connection! I mean it's nearly impossible to kiss someone and not stay physically and mentally involved.
quotes.name: William Cane

quotes.message: A kiss is the seal of affection.
quotes.name: J. Beaumont

quotes.message: Kisses are the messenger of love.
quotes.name: Opitz

quotes.message: There is much virtue in a kiss of honest love.
quotes.name: Sydney Smith

quotes.message: There is some mysterious virtue in a kiss, after all.
quotes.name: Miss Annie C Johnson

quotes.message: There is magic in a kiss that doth disarm all force.
quotes.name: Cowley

quotes.message: A kiss is not the feast; it is an invitation to the feast.

quotes.message: A kiss is the door that opens the citadel of the heart.

quotes.message: A simple kiss from my mother made me a painter.

quotes.message: The strength of a kiss is generally measured by its length.

quotes.message: A kiss is at once the token of boldness, confidence, and affection.

quotes.message: A kiss given and received is the token of love offered and accepted.

quotes.message: The acme of human happiness is that we may kiss whom we please, and please whom we kiss.

quotes.message: It is delightful to kiss the eyelashes of the beloved; but never so delightful as when fresh tears are on them.

quotes.message: When two hearts are surcharged with love's electricity, a kiss is the burning contact, the wild, leaping flame of love's enthusiasm.

quotes.message: Though a lover be never so great an orator, yet a kiss on the lips of his beloved is often more eloquent than all his fine speech.

quotes.message: Kisses are like grains of gold or silver found upon the ground, of no value themselves, but precious as showing that a mine is near.

quotes.message: The soul as one leaf is plucked, all its mates easily fall after; and a kiss may sometimes break out the first leaf.

quotes.message: Deal gently with those who stray; draw by love and persuasion; a kiss is worth a thousand kicks; a kind word is more valuable than a mine of gold.

quotes.message: A kiss fairly electrifies you; no language expresses it. A kiss is as old as creation; Eve learned it in paradise, and was taught its beauties, virtues, and varieties by an angel, for there is something so transcendent in it.
quotes.name: A Clyde

quotes.message: The force of gravity seems no longer to be in effect, at the kiss transports the lovers tp another plane of existence--high above the mundane.

quotes.message: Never surrender opportunity for security.

quotes.message: Nothing in the world is as fearsome as a bloody, battered opponent who will never surrender.

quotes.message: If we are to be who we are; if we are to accomplish great things; then we must learn the heart's most essential rule: NEVER SURRENDER DREAMS
quotes.name: J. Michael Straczynski

quotes.message: If you fall behind, run faster. Never give up, never surrender, and rise up against the odds.

quotes.message: Never surrender, it's all about the faith you got: don't ever stop, just push it 'till you hit the top and if you drop, at least you know you gave your all to be true to you, that way you can never fall.

quotes.message: We'll never surrender, we'll win or die you've got to fight the next generation and the next .....

quotes.message: An honest man can never surrender an honest doubt.

quotes.message: Here's a summary for the time or attention challenged: Never surrender freedom for laws that can't affect criminals; they disobey laws for a living.
quotes.name: Wayne LaPierre

quotes.message: We shall defend our island, whatever the cost may be, we shall fight on the beaches, we shall fight on the landing grounds, we shall fight in the fields and in the streets, we shall fight in the hills; we shall never surrender.

quotes.message: Do not yield. Do not flinch. Stand up. Stand up with our President and fight. We're Americans. We're Americans, and we'll never surrender. They will.
quotes.name: John McCain

quotes.message: For to save mankind's future freedom, we must face up to any risk that is necessary.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: We never surrendered. We always kept in our hearts the most noble, beautiful feeling that sets human beings apart: hope.
quotes.name: Manel Loureiro

quotes.message: Never surrender to cynicism, even if you suspect it would get the critics on your side.
quotes.name: Roselyn Bosch

quotes.message: Never surrender to you're passions. Dream and live to excess.
quotes.name: Truth Devour

quotes.message: Letting go of someone we love is the hardest thing we will ever do. Some people never surrender to love for the fear of being hurt. But to not have loved, to not have felt the immense joy it brings, would have been a far worse kind of death.
quotes.name: Goldie Hawn

quotes.message: Israel will never surrender to hatred.
quotes.name: Benny Gantz

quotes.message: Lovers never surrender to each other, lovers simply surrender to love.
quotes.name: Rajneesh

quotes.message: Liberty, when it begins to take root, is a plant of rapid growth.
quotes.name: George Washington

quotes.message: Liberty doesn't work as well in practice as it does in speeches.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Liberty means responsibility. That is why most men dread it.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Liberty is maintained by responsible freedom.
quotes.name: Roger W Hancock

quotes.message: Liberty without learning is always in peril; learning without liberty is always in vain.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: The love of liberty is the love of others; the love of power is the love of ourselves.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Liberty lies in the hearts of men and women; when it dies there, no constitution, no law, no court can save it.... While it lies there, it needs no constitution, no law, no court to save it.
quotes.name: Learned Hand

quotes.message: I prefer liberty to chains of diamonds.
quotes.name: Lady Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.message: The basis of a democratic state is liberty.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Absolute liberty is absence of restraint; responsibility is restraint; therefore, the ideally free individual is responsible to himself.
quotes.name: Henry Adams

quotes.message: Life without liberty is like a body without spirit.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: The tree of liberty needs to be watered from time to time with the blood of patriots and tyrants.
quotes.name: Lyn Nofziger

quotes.message: Liberty for wolves is death to the lambs.
quotes.name: Isaiah Berlin

quotes.message: But what is liberty without wisdom, and without virtue? It is the greatest of all possible evils; for it is folly, vice, and madness, without tuition or restraint.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: There can be no liberty without the law.
quotes.name: Cecil B. DeMille

quotes.message: Liberty is the only thing you can't have unless you give it to others.
quotes.name: William Allen White

quotes.message: When liberty comes with hands dabbled in blood it is hard to shake hands with her.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: If liberty means anything at all, it means the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.
quotes.name: George Orwell

quotes.message: The true character of liberty is independence, maintained by force.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Liberty is the power that we have over ourselves.
quotes.name: Hugo Grotius

quotes.message: Liberty, then, is the sovereignty of the individual, and never shall man know liberty until each and every individual is acknowledged to be the only legitimate sovereign of his or her person, time, and property, each living and acting at his own cost; and not until we live in a society where each can exercise his right of sovereignty at all times without clashing with or violating that of others.
quotes.name: Josiah Warren

quotes.message: Our liberty will not be secured at the sword's point... We must secure it by making ourselves worthy of it. And when the people reaches that height, God will provide a weapon, the idols will be shattered, tyranny will crumble like a house of cards, and liberty will shine out like the first dawn.
quotes.name: Jose Rizal

quotes.message: There can be no liberty for a community which lacks the means by which to detect lies.
quotes.name: Walter Lippmann

quotes.message: The liberty of the individual is no gift of civilization. It was greatest before there was any civilization.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: Liberty cannot be preserved without general knowledge among the people.
quotes.name: John Adams

quotes.message: Excess of liberty, whether it lies in state or individuals, seems only to pass into excess of slavery.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: Liberty is an acknowledgement of faith in God and His works.
quotes.name: Frederic Bastiat

quotes.message: Liberty will not descend to a people; a people must raise themselves to liberty; it is a blessing that must be earned before it can be enjoyed.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: Liberty is like rich food and strong wine: the strong natures accustomed to them thrive and grow even stronger on them; but they deplete, inebriate and destroy the weak.
quotes.name: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quotes.message: Every difficulty slurred over will be a ghost to disturb your repose later on.
quotes.name: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.message: Every great and deep difficulty bears in itself its own solution. It forces us to change our thinking in order to find it.
quotes.name: Niels Bohr

quotes.message: The difficulty we have in accepting responsibility for our behavior lies in the desire to avoid the pain of the consequences of that behavior.
quotes.name: M. Scott Peck

quotes.message: Surmounting difficulty is the crucible that forms character.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: Difficulty is the nurse of greatness.
quotes.name: William C. Bryant

quotes.message: A difficulty is a light. An insurmountable difficulty is a sun.
quotes.name: Paul Valery

quotes.message: Every difficulty draws us toward a higher power than ourselves.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: The difficulty lies not so much in developing new ideas as in escaping from old ones.
quotes.name: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.message: The greatest difficulty with the world is not its ability to produce, but the unwillingness to share.
quotes.name: Roy L. Smith

quotes.message: The greatest difficulty always comes right before the birth of a dream.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Difficulty is what wakes up the genius.

quotes.message: Difficulty comes not only because of your mistakes, but once you try to make an excuse or accuse someone else, your mind stops thinking.

quotes.message: The difficulty with any sort of esteem is that more is expected of you.

quotes.message: Have the courage to face a difficulty lest it kick you harder than you bargain for.

quotes.message: Difficulty is one of the prices that we pay for our blessings.

quotes.message: Life must pass through difficulty in order to achieve any modicum of beauty.
quotes.name: Colum Mccann

quotes.message: The difficulty for most of us in the modern world is that the old-fashioned idea of God has become incredible or implausible.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: The difficulty is not so great to die for a friend, as to find a friend worth dying for.
quotes.name: Homer

quotes.message: The apprenticeship of difficulty is one which the greatest of men have had to serve.
quotes.name: Samuel Smiles

quotes.message: The difficulty is not making a decision, it's living with the consequences.
quotes.name: Micah Baldwin

quotes.message: Difficulty shows what men are.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Difficulty is the excuse history never accepts.
quotes.name: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.message: When you are face to face with a difficulty, you are up against a discovery.
quotes.name: Lord Kelvin

quotes.message: Every difficulty requires new strategy to overcome it.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Difficulty is inevitable. Drama is a choice.
quotes.name: Anita Renfroe

quotes.message: Divide each difficulty into as many parts as is feasible and necessary to resolve it.
quotes.name: Rene Descartes

quotes.message: The greater the difficulty, the more the glory in surmounting it.
quotes.name: Epicurus

quotes.message: Difficulty attracts the man of character because it is in embracing it that he realizes himself.
quotes.name: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.message: The best way out of a difficulty is through it.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Facing a difficulty requires a willingness of heart.
quotes.name: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.message: There is no difficulty that enough love will not conquer.
quotes.name: Emmet Fox

quotes.message: You gain strength with every difficulty, which you boldly overcome.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Difficulty is our most reliable narrative engine.
quotes.name: Leslie Jamison

quotes.message: The difficulty is to try and teach the multitude that something can be true and untrue at the same time.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: The difficulty is that we try to perfect others before we perfect ourselves.
quotes.name: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.message: It is only when a person gets into difficulty that one can truly see his heart.
quotes.name: Matthew Polly

quotes.message: You have to push through every difficulty to achieve the goal.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: People seem to sometimes have a difficulty drawing that line between the character and the person.
quotes.name: Clark Duke

quotes.message: The difficulty is not to write, but to write what you mean.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: It is not the path which is the difficulty; rather, it is the difficulty which is the path.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: The real difficulty is to overcome how you think about yourself. If we don't have that we never grow, we never learn, and sure as hell we should never teach.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Almost any difficulty will move in the face of honesty. When I am honest I never feel stupid. And when I am honest I am automatically humble.
quotes.name: Hugh Prather

quotes.message: A difficulty journey is more revealing of character than any discussion or analysis.
quotes.name: Michael Treanor

quotes.message: Every difficulty is an opportunity for personal growth.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Conquering any difficulty always gives one a secret joy, for it means pushing back a boundary-line and adding to one's liberty.
quotes.name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.message: Where there is no difficulty there is no praise.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: The difficulty is to know conscience from self-interest.
quotes.name: William Dean Howells

quotes.message: If most people are not willing to see the difficulty, this is mainly because, consciously or unconsciously, they assume that it will be they who will settle these questions for the others, and because they are convinced of their own capacity to do this.
quotes.name: Friedrich August von Hayek

quotes.message: Is déjà vu actually the specter of false timelines that never happened but did, casting their shadows upon reality?
quotes.name: Blake Crouch

quotes.message: We have all some experience of a feeling, that comes over us occasionally, of what we are saying and doing having been said and done before, in a remote time of our having been surrounded, dim ages ago, by the same faces, objects, and circumstances- of our knowing perfectly what will be said next, as if we suddenly remembered it !
quotes.name: David Copperfield

quotes.message: Every little job becomes a dream, and you don't recall it anymore, and maybe you might have a deja vu moment, but it's like something you dreamed earlier.
quotes.name: Terrence Howard

quotes.message: I have gained and lost the same 10 pounds so many times over and over again my cellulite must have deja vu!
quotes.name: Jane Wagner

quotes.message: Déjà vu is simply remembrance of the future.
quotes.name: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.message: A déjà vu is your future self doing a past life regression.
quotes.name: David Mellen-Thomas

quotes.message: Deja Vu confirms a faithful path worth taking.
quotes.name: T. F. Hodge

quotes.message: Deja Vu is when God thinks something is so funny, that he has to rewind it to show it to his friends.
quotes.name: Unknown Quotes

quotes.message: I went to a fancy french restaurant called 'Deja Vu.
quotes.name: Rod Schmidt

quotes.message: Let's go back, I know it's been a minute. But I can do it better than I did when I did it. You were loving me, I was loving you. You can come over and we can have deja vu.
quotes.name: Mike Posner

quotes.message: That was like a carbon copy of the last time we saw them. It was just too much like how it went over at our place to not have a little feeling of déjà vu.
quotes.name: Vic Wolffis

quotes.message: It's déjà vu all over again. We should have done better. We should have learned from the lessons of the past.
quotes.name: David Walker

quotes.message: I feel like I've dreamed half of my life that hasn't happened yet, so a lot of times I'm going along, and I do stuff, and I know that I've done it. I have deja vus more than I have regular experiences.
quotes.name: Marilyn Manson

quotes.message: I always play every game in my mind before it begins. A lot of times in a game, a play will happen, and it will feel like deja vu, like I've seen the play happen before in my mind.
quotes.name: Troy Aikman

quotes.message: I haven't been here, but I have been. Can't think of next step, but feels I am pro in this. This makes me wonder, How can I feel the same, when I don't even remember the feeling. What's the logic behind this? What's the connection I feel? Deja vu? Still can't find the answers or solutions, to the situations I feel same.
quotes.name: Sneha Dewani

quotes.message: Teaching his dad not to stumble while walking, Time reversed their roles. Deja vu moment for a dad as a child's perspective, And for a child as a dad's perspective.
quotes.name: Arunima Sharma

quotes.message: Something tells me that there will be another Deja vu, but only this time...You'll make it consciously.
quotes.name: Kshama Aghamkar

quotes.message: We are living in a computer-programmed reality, and the only clue we have to it is when some variable is changed, and some alteration in reality occurs. We have the overwhelming impression that we were reliving the present - deja vu.
quotes.name: Philip K. Dick

quotes.message: Deja vu - don't know exactly what it is...just a coincidental overlapping of events or a past life experience or something which is beyond our vision..
quotes.name: Deepali Nautiyal

quotes.message: Usually we find later that we did good. It's all about how things will happen if we allow our own inner to steer, just like wrapping a gift when we realize it's all been Déjà vu.
quotes.name: levi paul taylor

quotes.message: Beware of that dream, That rivetting Deja vu thing. Some might be astounding and Some creepy and haunting.
quotes.name: SID

quotes.message: The more I try to Hide my Feelings away...The More My Eyes Show The Urge to Say... I wonder If this is the best Deja vu As I fall in Love with You More and More Everyday.
quotes.name: Barkha Parikh

quotes.message: Real nobility is based on scorn, courage, and profound indifference.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Sweet mercy is nobility's true badge.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Nobility of spirit has more to do with simplicity than ostentation, wisdom rather than wealth, commitment rather than ambition.
quotes.name: Riccardo Muti

quotes.message: The nobility of a human being is strictly independent of that of his convictions.
quotes.name: Jean Rostand

quotes.message: Put more trust in nobility of character than in an oath.
quotes.name: Solon

quotes.message: It matters not from what stock we are descended so long as we have virtue; for that alone is true Nobility.
quotes.name: Wellins Calcott

quotes.message: Noble persons have the best capacities; for whether they give themselves to goodness or ungraciousness, they do in either excel, as none of the common sort of people can come anything nigh them.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: Nobility is kept alive and strong when it is attached to wealth, and without money it is like a dead thing, for those who are in need have often to turn their hands to vile things.
quotes.name: Martin De Viciana

quotes.message: Nobility without virtue is a fine setting without a gem.
quotes.name: Jane Porter

quotes.message: Nobility is a river that sets with a constant and undeviating current, directly into the great Pacific Ocean of Time; but, unlike all other rivers, it is more grand at its source, than at its termination.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: A degenerate nobleman, or one that is proud of his birth, is like a turnip: there is nothing good of him but that which is underground.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: If a man be endowed with a generous mind, this is the best kind of nobility.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: Nobility of birth does not always insure a corresponding unity of mind; if it did, it would always act as a stimulus to noble actions; but it sometimes acts as a clog rather than a spur.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: The essence of true nobility is neglect of self.
quotes.name: James A. Froude

quotes.message: Noble blood is an accident of fortune; noble actions characterize the great.
quotes.name: Carlo Goldoni

quotes.message: New nobility is but the act of power, but ancient nobility is the act of time.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: To do good is noble. To tell others to do good is even nobler and much less trouble.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: The warrior's nobility is like a prostitute's smile, the truth of which is self-interest.
quotes.name: Georges Bataille

quotes.message: Even in adversity, nobility shines through, when a man endures repeated and severe misfortune with patience, not owing to insensibility but from generosity and greatness of soul.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Nobility is expensive, nonproductive, and parasitic, siphoning away too much of society’s energy to satisfy its frivolous cravings.
quotes.name: Alan Weisman

quotes.message: True nobility is exempt from fear.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: Base men being in love have then a nobility in their natures more than is native to them.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: My nobility begins in me, but yours ends in you.
quotes.name: Iphicrates

quotes.message: Idleness is an appendix to nobility.
quotes.name: Robert Burton

quotes.message: What is madness but nobility of soul.
quotes.name: Theodore Roethke

quotes.message: I believe that love is better than hate. And that there is more nobility in building a chicken coop than in destroying a cathedral.
quotes.name: Betty Greene

quotes.message: If ancient descent could confer nobility, the lower forms of life would possess it in a greater degree than man.
quotes.name: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.message: To men and women there falls the task of exploring truth with their reason, and in this their nobility consists.
quotes.name: Pope John Paul II

quotes.message: As one lamp lights another, nor grows less, So nobleness enkindleth nobleness.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: Life ought to be a struggle of desire toward adventures whose nobility will fertilize the soul.
quotes.name: Rebecca West

quotes.message: The noble soul has reverence for itself.
quotes.name: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.message: Nobleness was one word for making a fuss about the trivial inevitabilities of life, but there were others.
quotes.name: Douglas Adams

quotes.message: Our awesome responsibility to ourselves, to our children, and to the future is to create ourselves in the image of goodness, because the future depends on the nobility of our imaginings.
quotes.name: Barbara Grizzuti Harrison

quotes.message: Many things about our bodies would not seem to us so filthy and obscene if we did not have the idea of nobility in our heads
quotes.name: Georg Lichtenberg

quotes.message: A noble person attracts noble people, and knows how to hold on to them.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: If there is anything good about nobility it is that it enforces the necessity of avoiding degeneracy.
quotes.name: Boethius

quotes.message: O lady, nobility is thine, and thy form is the reflection of thy nature!
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: Be noble in every thought And in every deed!
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: In observing the Sabbath, one is both giving a gift to God and imitating Him.
quotes.name: Lauren Winner

quotes.message: The gift of the Sabbath must be treasured. Blessed are you who honour this day.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: On the Sabbath- we are reminded that we are not human doings, but human beings.
quotes.name: Rob Bell

quotes.message: Sabbath is not simply the pause that refreshes. It is the pause that transforms.
quotes.name: Walter Brueggemann

quotes.message: Anybody can observe the Sabbath, but making it holy surely takes the rest of the week.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: The Sabbath is the link between the paradise which has passed away and the paradise which is yet to come.
quotes.name: Andrew Wylie

quotes.message: Sabbath is that uncluttered time and space in which we can distance ourselves from our own activities enough to see what God is doing.
quotes.name: Eugene H. Peterson

quotes.message: Sabbath observance invites us to stop. It invites us to rest. It asks us to notice that while we rest, the world continues without our help. It invites us to delight in the world's beauty and abundance.
quotes.name: Wendell Berry

quotes.message: It is time for us to breathe and build margin into our lives for God. Sabbath was intended as a gift, and it is still a gift to us today. If you are weary, worn out, and exhausted the concept of Sabbath will change your life.
quotes.name: Priscilla Shirer

quotes.message: Sabbath, in the first instance, is not about worship. It is about work stoppage. It is about withdrawal from the anxiety system of Pharaoh, the refusal to let one's life be defined by production and consumption and the endless pursuit of private well-being.
quotes.name: Walter Brueggemann
