quotes.message: Pain and Happiness are the coverings over reality

quotes.message: Happiness is a state of inner fulfillment.

quotes.message: Paths are many, Truth is ONE!

quotes.message: Yoga is a light, which once lit, will never dim. The better your practice, the brighter the flame.

quotes.message: A mind free from all disturbances is Yoga

quotes.message: Meditation is the soul's perspective glass.

quotes.message: Yoga takes us to the present moment, the only place where life exists.

quotes.message: In our uniquely human capacity of connect movement with breath and spiritual meaning, yoga is born.

quotes.message: Yoga began with the first person wanting to be healthy and happy all the time.

quotes.message: Breathe Through the Pain, It Always Gets Easier with Time.

quotes.message: You must find the place inside yourself where nothing is impossible.

quotes.message: That's exactly how it is in yoga. The places where you have the most resistance are actually the places that are going to be the areas of the greatest liberation.

quotes.message: When you live your life with an appreciation of coincidences and their meanings, you connect with the underlying field of infinite possibilities.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra.

quotes.message: The beauty is that people often come here for the stretch, and leave with a lot more
quotes.name: Liza Ciano

quotes.message: Worries are pointless. If there's a solution, there's no need to worry. If no solution exists, there's no point to worry.

quotes.message: Every time you are tempted to react in the same old way, ask if you want to be a prisoner of the past, or a pioneer of the future.

quotes.message: Be present and aware of the privilege of living.

quotes.message: One of the fundamental principles of yoga: a small action done repeatedly can make an enormous difference.

quotes.message: True yoga is not about the shape of your body, but the shape of your life. Yoga is not to be performed; yoga is to be lived. Yoga doesn’t care about what you have been; yoga cares about the person you are becoming. Yoga is designed for a vast and profound purpose, and for it to be truly called yoga, its essence must be embodied.
quotes.name: Aadil Palkhivala

quotes.message: Yoga is the ultimate practice. It simultaneously stimulates our inner light and quiets our overactive minds. It is both energy and rest. Yin and Yang. We feel the burn and find our bliss.

quotes.message: Balancing in yoga and life is a reflection of our inner state.
quotes.name: Shiva Rea

quotes.message: Yoga is about clearing away whatever is in us that prevents our living in the most full and whole way. With yoga, we become aware of how and where we are restricted — in body, mind, and heart — and how gradually to open and release these blockages. As these blockages are cleared, our energy is freed. We start to feel more harmonious, more at one with ourselves. Our lives begin to flow — or we begin to flow more in our lives.
quotes.name: Cybele Tomlinson

quotes.message: Yoga is a dance between control and surrender — between pushing and letting go — and when to push and when to let go becomes part of the creative process, part of the open-ended exploration of your being.

quotes.message: The goal of yoga is liberation from all limitations. So how do we overcome limitations? Look what happens when you do Hatha Yoga: a stiff and inflexible body will stretch, release and relax. In the same way, if you use the other tools of yoga you will stretch your mind and bring your essential self into the Light.
quotes.name: Swami Radhananda

quotes.message: People enjoy the practice of yoga in many different ways. Most do it because it is low impact form of exercise that quietens the mind. Some do it exclusively for the heightened awareness and presence that they get out of their yoga session.
quotes.name: Shanti Priva

quotes.message: The Yoga we practice is not for ourselves alone, but for the Divine; its aim is to work out the will of the Divine in the world, to effect a spiritual transformation and to bring down a divine nature and a divine into the mental, vital, and physical nature and life of humanity.

quotes.message: Hatha yoga is a refuge for all those who are scorched by the three fires. To those who practice yoga, hatha yoga is like the tortoise who supports the three worlds.

quotes.message: Yoga is a way to freedom. By its constant practice, we can free ourselves from fear, anguish, and loneliness.
quotes.name: Indra Devi

quotes.message: Yoga is skillful action.

quotes.message: Yoga is almost like music in a way; there's no end to it.
quotes.name: Sting

quotes.message: Yoga aims to remove the root cause of all diseases, not to treat its symptoms as medical science generally attempts to do.

quotes.message: Yoga is about compassion and generosity toward others. It means being mindful of the world around us.
quotes.name: Christy Turlington

quotes.message: Yoga carves you into a different person—and that is satisfying physically.
quotes.name: Adam Levine

quotes.message: Yoga is an art and science of living. Yoga means union, in all its significances and dimensions.
quotes.name: Indra Devi

quotes.message: Yoga calms me down.
quotes.name: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.message: Exercises are like prose, whereas yoga is the poetry of movements. Once you understand the grammar of yoga, you can write your poetry of movements.

quotes.message: Yoga is about remembering that we are already one with the divinity and we've never left it.

quotes.message: For me, yoga is not just a workout—it's about working on yourself.

quotes.message: Yoga is invigoration in relaxation. Freedom in routine. Confidence through self control. Energy within and energy without.

quotes.message: Yoga, an ancient but perfect science, deals with the evolution of humanity. This evolution includes all aspects of one's being, from bodily health to self-realization. Yoga means union—the union of body with consciousness and consciousness with the soul.

quotes.message: Yoga does not remove us from the reality or responsibilities of everyday life but rather places our feet firmly and resolutely in the practical ground of experience. We don't transcend our lives; we return to the life we left behind in the hopes of something better.

quotes.message: The attitude of gratitude is the highest yoga.
quotes.name: Yogi Bhajan

quotes.message: The 'yoga' intuition is founded on the notion of transforming the body, & I don't know if there's any Christian alternative answer to it. Our present body is almost wholly unknown to the consciousness which inhabits it. Yoga creates an imaginative body in its place, & goes to work on that.
quotes.name: Northrop Frye

quotes.message: Yoga is the voluntary suppression of the involuntary actions of the mind. We're all born with a natural yoga: we're freed by objective energy and our consciousness freezes it into matter.
quotes.name: Northrop Frye

quotes.message: I was frequently so wrought up that I had to do certain yoga exercises in order to hold my emotions in check. But since it was my purpose to know what was going on within myself, I would do these exercises only until I had calmed myself enough to resume my work with the unconscious. As soon as I had the feeling that I was myself again, I abandoned this restraint upon the emotions and allowed the images and inner voices to speak afresh. The Indian, on the other hand, does yoga exercises in order to obliterate completely the multitude of psychic contents and images.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: They call it 'European Yoga.' Well people are doing it all over Europe. I mean, standing up, doing yoga day and night. They hardly ever stop. I mean, some countries have given up chairs completely.
quotes.name: Melody Hanson

quotes.message: A man's duty is to find out where the truth is, or if he cannot, at least to take the best possible human doctrine and the hardest to disprove, and to ride on this like a raft over the waters of life.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: Your duty is to treat everybody with love as a manifestation of the Lord.
quotes.name: Swami Sivananda

quotes.message: Happiness is the natural flower of duty.
quotes.name: Phillips Brooks

quotes.message: Who escapes a duty, avoids a gain.
quotes.name: Theodore W. Parker

quotes.message: The reward of one duty done is the power to fulfill another.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: The reward of doing one duty is the power to do another.
quotes.name: Rabbi Ben Azai

quotes.message: Only aim to do your duty, and mankind will give you credit where you fail.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: The first duty of a man is the seeking after and the investigation of truth.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks.
quotes.name: James Allen

quotes.message: Every duty that is bidden to wait comes back with seven fresh duties at its back.
quotes.name: Charles Kingsley

quotes.message: Duty is one and invariable; it requires no impossibilities, nor can it ever be disregarded with impunity.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: A sense of duty is useful in work, but offensive in personal relations.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Duty is what one expects from others.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: The duty of youth is to challenge corruption.
quotes.name: Kurt Cobain

quotes.message: Duty is the sublimest word in the language; you can never do more than your duty; you shall never wish to do less.
quotes.name: Robert E. Lee

quotes.message: A man who neglects his duty as a citizen is not entitled to his rights as a citizen.
quotes.name: Tiorio

quotes.message: Do your duty and a little more and the future will take care of itself.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: Every one regards his duty as a troublesome master from whom he would like to be free.
quotes.name: Mazo de la Roche

quotes.message: People tend to forget their duties but remember their rights.
quotes.name: Indira Gandhi

quotes.message: If you lay duties upon people and give them no rights, you must pay them well.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: We never fail when we try to do our duty, we always fail when we neglect to do it.
quotes.name: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.message: Every right implies a responsibility; Every opportunity, an obligation, Every possession, a duty.
quotes.name: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.message: It is our duty to be faithful, not with eye service as men pleasers.
quotes.name: Jupiter Hammon

quotes.message: Do your duty as you see it, and damn the consequences.
quotes.name: George S. Patton Jr.

quotes.message: It's an artist's duty to reflect the times in which we live.
quotes.name: John Legend

quotes.message: Do your duty and leave the rest to the gods.
quotes.name: Pierre Corneille

quotes.message: n action, to have moral worth, must be done from duty.
quotes.name: Immanuel Kant

quotes.message: Every duty is a charge, but the charge of oneself is the root of all others.
quotes.name: Mencius

quotes.message: Honor is no phantom. Duty doesn't melt away, no matter how much we might wish it to.
quotes.name: Claudia J. Edwards

quotes.message: It is our duty as men and women to proceed as though the limits of our abilities do not exist.
quotes.name: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.message: Duty is that mode of action on the part of the individual which constitutes the best possible application of his capacity to the general benefit.
quotes.name: William Godwin

quotes.message: The duty of man is not a wilderness of turnpike gates, through which he is to pass by tickets from one to the other. It is plain and simple, and consists but of two points--his duty God, which every man must feel; and, with respect to his neighbor, to do as he would be done by.
quotes.name: Thomas Paine

quotes.message: There is no duty we so much underrate as the duty of being happy.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: Do something every day that you don't want to do; this is the golden rule for acquiring the habit of doing your duty without pain.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: We all have the duty to do good.
quotes.name: Pope Francis

quotes.message: With faith, discipline and selfless devotion to duty, there is nothing worthwhile that you cannot achieve.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quotes.message: When a stupid man is doing something he is ashamed of, he always declares that it is his duty.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Our duty is to be useful, not according to our desires but according to our powers.
quotes.name: Henri FrÃ©dÃ©ric Amiel

quotes.message: It is the first responsibility of every citizen to question authority.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: To be a Christian means to forgive the inexcusable because God has forgiven the inexcusable in you.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: Forgiveness is unlocking the door to set someone free and realising you were the prisoner!
quotes.name: Max Lucado

quotes.message: Forgiveness is the key that unlocks the door of resentment and the handcuffs of hatred. It is a power that breaks the chains of bitterness and the shackles of selfishness.
quotes.name: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.message: Those who cannot forgive others break the bridge over which they themselves must pass.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King

quotes.message: To begin loving people today, we must close the door on the past. And that cannot happen without forgiveness! Forgive those who have hurt you for your sake, not because they deserve it.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: You will know that forgiveness has begun when you recall those who hurt you and feel the power to wish them well.
quotes.name: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.message: Whatever our religion, we know that if we really want to love, we must first learn to forgive before anything else.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: We all agree that forgiveness is a beautiful idea until we have to practice it.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: When you forgive, you in no way change the past - but you sure do change the future.
quotes.name: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.message: The hatred you're carrying is a live coal in your heart far more damaging to yourself than to them.
quotes.name: Lawana Blackwell

quotes.message: Good to forgive, best to forget.
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: Forgiveness is not an occasional act, it is a constant attitude.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King

quotes.message: Forgiveness is choosing to love. It is the first skill of self giving love.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Forgiveness is a sign that the person who has wronged you means more to you than the wrong they have delt.
quotes.name: Ben Greenhalgh

quotes.message: True forgiveness is when you can say, thank you for that experience.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you: love, prayer, and forgiveness.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.message: To forgive is the highest, most beautiful form of love. In return, you will receive untold peace and happiness.
quotes.name: Robert Muller

quotes.message: Without forgiveness, there is no future.
quotes.name: Desmond Tutu

quotes.message: Forgiveness is the final form of love.
quotes.name: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.message: Forgiveness is not always easy. At times, it feels more painful than the wound we suffered, to forgive the one that inflicted it. And yet, there is no peace without forgiveness.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
quotes.name: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.message: Forgiveness is God's invention for coming to terms with a world in which people are unfair to each other and hurt each other deeply. He began by forgiving us. And He invites us all to forgive each other.
quotes.name: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.message: Forgiveness is giving up the hope that the past could have been any different, it's accepting the past for what it was, and using this moment and this time to help yourself move forward.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Anger makes you smaller, while forgiveness forces you to grow beyond what you were.
quotes.name: Cherie Carter-Scott

quotes.message: By far the strongest poison to the human spirit is the inability to forgive oneself or another person. Forgiveness is no longer an option but a necessity for healing.
quotes.name: Caroline Myss

quotes.message: The more you know yourself, the more you forgive yourself.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Forgiveness is an inner correction that lightens our heart and frees us to live in the present. It is for our peace of mind first. Being at peace, we now have peace to extend to others, and this is the most permanent and valuable gift we can possibly give.
quotes.name: Gerald Jampolsky

quotes.message: Forgiveness in no way requires that you trust the one you forgive.
quotes.name: William P. Young

quotes.message: One forgives to the degree that one loves.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Genuine forgiveness does not deny anger but faces it head on.
quotes.name: Alice Miller

quotes.message: If you can't forgive and forget, pick one.
quotes.name: Robert Breault

quotes.message: Forgiving is not forgetting. Forgiving is remembering without pain.
quotes.name: Celia Cruz

quotes.message: Forgiveness unleashes joy. It brings peace. It washes the slate clean. It sets all the highest values of love in motion. In a sense, forgiveness is Christianity at its highest level.
quotes.name: John Macarthur

quotes.message: People can be more forgiving than you can imagine. But you have to forgive yourself. Let go of what's bitter and move on.
quotes.name: Bill Cosby

quotes.message: Not to forgive is to be imprisoned by the past, by old grievances that do not permit life to proceed with new business.
quotes.name: Lance Morrow

quotes.message: Forgiveness is for yourself because it frees you. It lets you out of that prison you put yourself in.
quotes.name: Louise Hay

quotes.message: Forgiveness is a virtue of the brave.
quotes.name: Indira Gandhi

quotes.message: Forgiveness is an act of the will, and the will can function regardless of the temperature of the heart.
quotes.name: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.message: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: There is no revenge so complete as forgiveness.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Forgiveness is the remission of sins. For it is by this that what has been lost, and was found, is saved from being lost again.
quotes.name: Saint Augustine

quotes.message: Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.
quotes.name: Hannah Arendt

quotes.message: Forgiveness is like faith. You have to keep reviving it.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: The first step in forgiveness is the willingness to forgive.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: The forgiving state of mind is a magnetic power for attracting good. No good thing can be withheld from the forgiving state of mind.
quotes.name: Catherine Ponder

quotes.message: Forgiveness is almost a selfish act because of its immense benefits to the one who forgives.
quotes.name: Lawana Blackwell

quotes.message: Forgiveness is a funny thing. It warms the heart and cools the sting.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: A winner rebukes and forgives. A loser is too timid to rebuke and too petty to forgive.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: If you choose to forgive someone who has wronged you rather than to hate that person, you shift the frequency of your Light.
quotes.name: Gary Zukav

quotes.message: A fault confessed is half redressed.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: A grudge is a heavy thing to carry.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Charity covers a multitude of sins.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: Don't make a mountain out of a molehill.
quotes.name: Henry Ellis

quotes.message: Forgive and forget.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: If God were not willing to forgive sin, heaven would be empty.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Let bygones be bygones.
quotes.name: Christina Georgina Rossetti

quotes.message: Record only the sunny hours.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Repay evil with kindness.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Temper justice with mercy.
quotes.name: John Milton

quotes.message: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
quotes.name: Langston Hughes

quotes.message: All men dream, but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their minds, wake in the day to find that it was vanity: but the dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act on their dreams with open eyes, to make them possible.
quotes.name: T.E. Lawrence

quotes.message: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: When you have a dream that you can't let go of, trust your instincts and pursue it. But remember: Real dreams take work, They take patience, and sometimes they require you to dig down very deep. Be sure you're willing to do that.
quotes.name: Harvey Mackay

quotes.message: Yes: I am a dreamer. For a dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
quotes.name: John Lennon

quotes.message: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: Dreaming is an act of pure imagination, attesting in all men a creative power, which if it were available in waking, would make every man a Dante or Shakespeare.
quotes.name: H.F. Hedge

quotes.message: Dreams are illustrations... from the book your soul is writing about you.
quotes.name: Marsha Norman

quotes.message: Dreams are excursions into the limbo of things, a semi-deliverance from the human prison.
quotes.name: Henri Amiel

quotes.message: Keep your heart open to dreams. For as long as there's a dream, there is hope, and as long as there is hope, there is joy in living.
quotes.name: Unknown Author

quotes.message: That which the dream shows is the shadow of such wisdom as exists in man, even if during his waking state he may know nothing about it.... We do not know it because we are fooling away our time with outward and perishing things, and are asleep in regard to that which is real within ourself.
quotes.name: Paracelsus

quotes.message: Man, alone, has the power to transform his thoughts into physical reality; man, alone, can dream and make his dreams come true.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: When you stop having dreams and ideals -- well, you might as well stop altogether.
quotes.name: Marian Anderson

quotes.message: Dreams are renewable. No matter what our age or condition, there are still untapped possibilities within us and new beauty waiting to be born.
quotes.name: Dale Turner

quotes.message: Be careful what you water your dreams with. Water them with worry and fear and you will produce weeds that choke the life from your dream. Water them with optimism and solutions and you will cultivate success. Always be on the lookout for ways to turn a problem into an opportunity for success. Always be on the lookout for ways to nurture your dream.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: You’ve got to follow your passion. You’ve got to figure out what it is you love, who you really are. And have the courage to do that. I believe that the only courage anybody ever needs is the courage to follow your own dreams.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Often we don’t even realize who we’re meant to be because we’re so busy trying to live out someone else's ideas. But other people and their opinions hold no power in defining our destiny.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Dream lofty dreams, and as you dream, so you shall become. Your vision is the promise of what you shall one day be; your ideal is the prophecy of what you shall at last unveil.
quotes.name: James Allen

quotes.message: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.
quotes.name: Edgar Cayce

quotes.message: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
quotes.name: J.K. Rowling

quotes.message: Dreaming permits each and every one of us to be quietly and safely insane every night of our lives.
quotes.name: William Dement

quotes.message: Dreams say what they mean, but they don't say it in daytime language.
quotes.name: Gail Godwin

quotes.message: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
quotes.name: Goethe

quotes.message: It may be that those who do most, dream most.
quotes.name: Stephen Butler Leacock

quotes.message: Follow your dreams, they know the way.
quotes.name: Kobe Yamada

quotes.message: Without dreams, there can be no courage. And without courage, there can be no action.
quotes.name: Wim Wenders

quotes.message: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
quotes.name: Carl Sandburg

quotes.message: Our dreams may be totally different and yet, we are alike in that no matter what we have achieved, we still have dreams that have eluded us.
quotes.name: Steven Scott

quotes.message: You can begin to have dreams grander than you have ever had, and see many of them come true. All you have to do is learn and use the same skills that are used by those who do achieve their dreams.
quotes.name: Steven Scott

quotes.message: Dreams to survive. Dreams make a wish come true, ooh. Keep your dreams alive. Dream, dream on. Your dream will come alive.
quotes.name: 2 Brothers on the 4th Floor

quotes.message: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended.
quotes.name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.message: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
quotes.name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.message: Young dreams !—old dreams of young days— Shall the new dream vex us as they did ? Or as things worth censure or praise ? Real toil is ours, real trouble, Dim dreams of pleasure and pride ; Let the dreams disperse like a bubble, So the toil like a dream subside.
quotes.name: Adam Lindsay Gordon

quotes.message: What is a dream ? That transient power that cometh near the midnight hour. To carry me to pastures new and bid my anxious fears adieu.
quotes.name: Alan Parry-Booth

quotes.message: Dream in a pragmatic way.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: Dreams are the most curious asides and soliloquies of the soul. When a man recollects his dream, it is like meeting the ghost of himself. Dreams often surprise us into the strangest self-knowledge. Dreaming is the truest confessional, and often the sharpest penance.
quotes.name: Alexander Smith

quotes.message: Dreams are true while they last, and do we not live in dreams?
quotes.name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.message: Our dreams drench us in sense, and sense steeps us again in dreams.
quotes.name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.message: Dreams are necessary to life.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the actions stems the dream again; and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: As long as you pray and believe in your dreams, anything is possible.
quotes.name: Andy Ruiz, Jr.

quotes.message: Dreams are dreams and reality is reality. We have to make the dreams happen.
quotes.name: Andy Ruiz, Jr.

quotes.message: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
quotes.name: Ben Carson

quotes.message: Dreams are the guiding words of the soul.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: Dreams in the dusk, only dreams closing the day and with the day’s close going back to the gray things, the dark things, the far, deep things of dreamland.
quotes.name: Carl Sandburg

quotes.message: AS when from dreams awaking the dim forms float away whose visioned smiles were making our darkness bright as day.
quotes.name: Caroline Elizabeth Sarah Norton

quotes.message: Dreams of joy return with night, and dwell upon the past- and every grief that clouds our light.
quotes.name: Caroline Elizabeth Sarah Norton

quotes.message: Living in dreams of yesterday, we find ourselves still dreaming of impossible future conquests.
quotes.name: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.message: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
quotes.name: Christopher Reeve

quotes.message: Take what you can from your dreams, make them as real as anything.
quotes.name: Dave Matthews

quotes.message: All people dream, but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their mind, wake in the morning to find that it was vanity. But the dreamers of the day are dangerous people, For they dream their dreams with open eyes, and make them come true.
quotes.name: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.message: They who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
quotes.name: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.message: Dream manfully and nobly, and thy dreams shall be prophets.
quotes.name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: All the things one has forgotten scream for help in dreams.
quotes.name: Elias Canetti

quotes.message: When we can't dream any longer we die.
quotes.name: Emma Goldman

quotes.message: We all dream; we do not understand our dreams, yet we act as if nothing strange goes on in our sleep minds, strange at least by comparison with the logical, purposeful doings of our minds when we are awake.
quotes.name: Erich Fromm

quotes.message: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely.
quotes.name: Erma Bombeck

quotes.message: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
quotes.name: Erma Bombeck

quotes.message: Two dreams came down to earth one night. From the realm of mist and dew; one was a dream of the old, old days, and one was a dream of the new.
quotes.name: Eugene Field

quotes.message: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than the one with all the facts.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.message: Dreaming is an act of pure imagination, attesting in all mean a creative power, which if it were available in waking, would make every man a Dante or Shakespeare.
quotes.name: H.F Hedge

quotes.message: Dreams are the touchstones of our character.
quotes.name: Henry /David Thoreau

quotes.message: The greatest achievement was at first and for a time a dream. The oak sleeps in the acorn, the bird waits in the egg, and in the highest vision of the soul a waking angel stirs. Dreams are the seedlings of realities.
quotes.name: James Allen

quotes.message: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
quotes.name: James Dean

quotes.message: Dreams can become a reality when we possess a vision that is characterized by the willingness to work hard, a desire for excellence, and a belief in our right and our responsiblity to be equal members of society.
quotes.name: Janet Jackson

quotes.message: No one should negotiate their dreams. Dreams must be free to fly high. No government, no legislature, has a right to limit your dreams. You should never agree to surrender your dreams.
quotes.name: Jesse Jackson

quotes.message: Our dreams must be stronger than our memories. We must be pulled by our dreams, rater than pushed by our memories.
quotes.name: Jesse Jackson

quotes.message: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.
quotes.name: Jesse Owens

quotes.message: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Dreams are but interludes which fancy makes.
quotes.name: John Dryden

quotes.message: Where all is but dream, reasoning and arguments are of no use, truth and knowledge nothing.
quotes.name: John Locke

quotes.message: Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: Perhaps life is just that... a dream and a fear.
quotes.name: Joseph Conrad

quotes.message: Dream and give yourself permission to envision a you that you choose to be.
quotes.name: Joy Page

quotes.message: We all keep dreaming, and luckily, dreams come true.
quotes.name: Katie Holmes

quotes.message: Believe in your dreams. They were given to you for a reason.
quotes.name: Katrina Mayer

quotes.message: The most pitiful among men is he who turns his dreams into silver and gold.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: In dreams the truth is learned that all good works are done in the absence of a caress.
quotes.name: Leonard Cohen

quotes.message: Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake?
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: Dreaming is a part of life. Everyone dreams, but does it actually happen? Most dreams just fade away and don't come back to mind until you have one foot in the grave or feel some type of remorse for your future.
quotes.name: Lonii

quotes.message: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
quotes.name: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.message: Chasing dreams a sense following, realizing making dreams of tomorrow today's memories.
quotes.name: Mary Steffen

quotes.message: You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.
quotes.name: Michael Phelps

quotes.message: If our dreams are sincere desires to achieve, not mere pipe-dreams, there is something deep within ourselves which comes out to meet them and helps to make them realities.
quotes.name: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.message: Dreams must be heeded and accepted. For a great many of them come true.
quotes.name: Paracelsus

quotes.message: The interpretation of dreams is a great art.
quotes.name: Paracelsus

quotes.message: What dreams we have and how they fly.
quotes.name: Paul Laurence Dunbar

quotes.message: Dreams become reality when we put our minds to it.
quotes.name: Queen Latifah

quotes.message: The more closely you get in touch with your dreams, the more able you are to make them real. The more vividly you consider how you want your world to be, the more real and effective tools you will have for making it so.
quotes.name: Ralph Marston

quotes.message: Dreams are a scientific fact.
quotes.name: Robyn Hitchcock

quotes.message: The interpretation of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: Dreams can still come true; you need a great deal of energy and determination, and a little bit of luck.
quotes.name: Stefano Gabbana

quotes.message: A heart without dreams is like a bird without feathers.

Harvard did not have the stature that it does today.

And when it happens that you are broken, or betrayed, or left, or hurt, or death brushes near, let yourself sit by an apple tree and listen to the apples falling all around you in heaps, wasting their sweetness. quotes.message: Your strength, when your very existence Is proof of your greatness. You were born a winner, a warrior, one who defied the odds by surviving the most gruesome battle of them all.

quotes.message: The strength I'm looking for isn't the type where you win or lose. I'm not after a wall that'll repel power coming from outside. What I want is the kind of strength to be able to absorb that kind of power, to stand up to it.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: Moderate strength is shown in violence, supreme strength is shown in levity.
quotes.name: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.message: At your weakest, you end up showing more strength; at your lowest, you are suddenly lifted higher than you’ve ever been.
quotes.name: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.message: I found an inner strength to fight for myself. It was clear that nobody else would.
quotes.name: Tehmina Durrani

quotes.message: Strength of character means the ability to overcome resentment against others, to hide hurt feelings, and to forgive quickly.
quotes.name: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quotes.message: You must draw from that strength. You must increase it. And you must hold on to it because sometimes that small glimmer of inner strength is all that we have to help us press forward through the darkness.
quotes.name: Morgan Rhodes

quotes.message: The crisis throws you back, and when you are required to exhibit strength, it comes.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: You can measure the true strength of a man by how well he controls others, but you measure his true power by how well he controls himself.
quotes.name: Amari Soul

quotes.message: There was a saying that the strength of a man’s steel was only known under the hammer of circumstance.
quotes.name: Alison Goodman

quotes.message: From my weakness, I drew strength that never left me.
quotes.name: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.message: His wound is his strength.
quotes.name: Lev Grossman

quotes.message: We know you're strong, but accepting help is its own kind of strength.
quotes.name: Kiera Cass

quotes.message: Finding the center of strength within ourselves is in the long run the best contribution we can make to our fellow men.
quotes.name: Rollo May

quotes.message: One person with indigenous inner strength exercises a great calming effect on panic among people around him.
quotes.name: Rollo May

quotes.message: A lot of what we experience as strength comes from knowing what to do with weakness.
quotes.name: Barbara Ehrenreich

quotes.message: The first gift is Strength. May you remember to call upon it whenever you need it.
quotes.name: Charlene Costanzo

quotes.message: It takes incredible strength not to open a can of 'whoop-ass', justifiably, when ones button is pushed.
quotes.name: T. F. Hodge

quotes.message: We had something few experience. We were joined in our strengths rather than in our weaknesses.
quotes.name: Frank Herbert

quotes.message: We all get scared and want to turn away, but it isn’t always strength that makes you stay. Strength is also making the decision to change your destiny.
quotes.name: Zoraida Córdova

quotes.message: How fast you have forgotten your strength when your very existence is proof of your greatness.
quotes.name: Suzy Kassem

quotes.message: There are two kinds of strength. Power and the ability to wield it is obvious, but resilience, the ability to resist power, is the other.
quotes.name: Raymond E. Feist

quotes.message: It takes strength, the strength of a man, to make the magic his own, to make it serve him, and not the other way around.
quotes.name: Daniel Wallace

quotes.message: You can't retire to weakness -- you've got to learn to control strength.
quotes.name: Wallace Stegner

quotes.message: Only when we cease to rely on our own strength can we discover that God's strength is always there for us.
quotes.name: Scott Hahn

quotes.message: Strength and success - they are above morality, above criticism.
quotes.name: John Steinbeck

quotes.message: My dear, it is a great strength to have faced the worst and to have *felt* it a feature of beauty. Nothing ever after can shake one.
quotes.name: Olaf Stapledon

quotes.message: The strength of every individual is the grace for great work.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: May you find the strength of will and the grace of endurance to overcome every challenge.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Rather than the strength it takes to not lose, it's the strength to stand back up after a loss that is sometimes more valuable.
quotes.name: Kyo Shirodaira

quotes.message: The strongest people are not those who show strength in front of the world but those who fight and win battles that others do not know anything about.
quotes.name: Jonathan Harnisch

quotes.message: Learn to recognize good luck when it’s waving at you, hoping to get your attention.
quotes.name: Sally Koslow

quotes.message: Luck is a goddess not to be coerced and forcibly wooed by those who seek her favors.
quotes.name: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.message: Luck is what we make it, not what is thrust upon us. You’ve shown initiative and it has nothing to do with luck.
quotes.name: George Bellairs

quotes.message: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.
quotes.name: Ray Kroc

quotes.message: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.
quotes.name: Iain Duncan Smith

quotes.message: The only good luck many great men ever had was being born with the ability and determination to overcome bad luck.
quotes.name: Channing Pollock

quotes.message: I’ve always believed in luck. I love the fact that people can change their lives instantly.
quotes.name: Fiona Barton

quotes.message: You don’t get lucky while sitting in the sofa with arms crossed doing nothing. You can be lucky only when you are prepared.
quotes.name: Nesta Jojoe Erskine

quotes.message: Good luck is when opportunity meets preparation, while bad luck is when lack of preparation meets reality.

quotes.message: I’ve found that what most people call luck is often little more than raw talent combined with the ability to make the most of opportunities.
quotes.name: Timothy Zahn

quotes.message: Being deeply learned and skilled, being well trained and using well-spoken words: this is good luck.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: The universe works in crazy ways. Your good luck will come in waves, and so does your bad, so you have to take the good with the bad and press forward.
quotes.name: Nick Cummins

quotes.message: You know, in life there are only three or four fundamental decisions to make. The rest is just luck.
quotes.name: Raymond Aubrac

quotes.message: With luck, you have other things to do than wait for lightning to strike.
quotes.name: Paul Lauterbur

quotes.message: Luck is merely an illusion, trusted by the ignorant and chased by the foolish.
quotes.name: Timothy Zahn

quotes.message: You can't just trust to luck; you have to really listen to what that character is telling you.
quotes.name: Estelle Parsons

quotes.message: Luck is the by-product of busting your fanny.
quotes.name: Don Sutton

quotes.message: Luck when your burst of energy doesn't run afoul of someone else's.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: Go and wake up your luck.
quotes.name: Persian Saying

quotes.message: Those who have succeeded at anything and don't mention luck are kidding themselves.
quotes.name: Larry King

quotes.message: Luck never made a man wise.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: I am great believer in luck. The harder work I work, the more of it I seem to have.
quotes.name: Coleman Cox

quotes.message: I believe in luck: how else can you explain the success of those you dislike?

quotes.message: The thing about luck is that it's like a fever. You can take fever meds and lie in bed and drink chicken broth and sleep seventeen hours in a row, but basically your fever will break when it wants to break.
quotes.name: Cynthia Kadohata

quotes.message: Luck is not only having the best hand dealt to you but having someone to raise.
quotes.name: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.message: Luck will occasionally blow some wind into wings that were not made to properly support flight.
quotes.name: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.message: Here’s luck!’ while waitin’ for the luck that never comes.
quotes.name: Henry Lawson

quotes.message: We all have bad luck some times, but it mends.
quotes.name: Clarence Michael

quotes.message: So Good-Luck came, and on my roof did light, like noiseless snow, or as the dew of night.
quotes.name: Robert Herrick

quotes.message: The beginner's luck, now don't mess it up if you get too stuck just bluff the beginner's luck is tough.
quotes.name: King Gizzard

quotes.message: The Lord above gave man an arm of iron but, with a little bit of luck, with a little bit of luck
quotes.name: Stanley Holloway

quotes.message: Nobody gives a break when you're down on your luck everybody's on the take.
quotes.name: Thin Lizzy

quotes.message: Some guys have all the luck, all the luck what you gonna do when your luck begins to run.
quotes.name: Robert Palmer

quotes.message: You never know what worse luck your bad luck has saved you from.
quotes.name: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.message: The sun doesn't just hang on one family's tree.
quotes.name: Anchee Min

quotes.message: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.message: I'm a greater believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: I wandered everywhere, through cities and countries wide. And everywhere I went, the world was on my side.
quotes.name: Roman Payne

quotes.message: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances. Be more active. Show up more often.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
quotes.name: Harry Golden

quotes.message: The best luck of all is the luck you make for yourself.
quotes.name: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.message: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect.

quotes.message: Luck is a very thin wire between survival and disaster, and not many people can keep their balance on it.
quotes.name: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.message: The only sure thing about luck is that it will change.
quotes.name: Wilson Mizner

quotes.message: Name the greatest of all inventors. Accident.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Luck never gives; it only lends.
quotes.name: Swedish Proverb

quotes.message: Luck is what you have left over after you give 100 percent.
quotes.name: Langston Coleman

quotes.message: It's hard to detect good luck - it looks so much like something you've earned.
quotes.name: Frank A. Clark

quotes.message: People always call it luck when you've acted more sensibly than they have.
quotes.name: Anne Tyler

quotes.message: Luck, good or bad, is the invisible play of mind upon affairs, the effect of mental aptitudes and habits which are not in sight, but which work and bring forth their due issues.
quotes.name: James Vila Blake

quotes.message: What we call luck is the inner man externalized. We make things happen to us.

quotes.message: Luck was something you either earned or invented through strength of character. You had to come by it honestly; you could not trick or bluff your way into it.

quotes.message: When luck is on your side it is not the time to be modest or timid. It is the time to go for the biggest success you can possibly achieve.

quotes.message: Luck is not chance. It's Toil. Fortune's expensive smile is earned.

quotes.message: Luck affects everything; let your hook always be cast; in the stream where you least expect it, there will be a fish.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Luck is not something you can mention in the presence of self-made men.
quotes.name: E.B. White

quotes.message: Luck is the residue of design.
quotes.name: John Milton

quotes.message: Chance corrects us of many faults that reason would not know how to correct.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Depend on the rabbit's foot if you will, but remember it didn't work for the rabbit.
quotes.name: R. E. Shay

quotes.message: Good luck beats early rising.
quotes.name: Irish Proverb

quotes.message: I think luck is the sense to recognize an opportunity and the ability to take advantage of it. The man who can smile at his breaks and grab his chances gets on.
quotes.name: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.message: Nothing happens by chance, my friend... No such thing as luck. A meaning behind every little thing, and such a meaning behind this. Part for you, part for me, may not see it all real clear right now, but we will, before long.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: If one is lucky, a solitary fantasy can totally transform one million realities.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Luck is the idol of the idle.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: Some luck lies in not getting what you thought you wanted but getting what you have, which once you have got it you may be smart enough to see is what you would have wanted had you known.
quotes.name: Garrison Keillor

quotes.message: Luck is tenacity of purpose.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Chance favors the prepared mind.
quotes.name: Louis Pasteur

quotes.message: The winds and waves are always on the side of the ablest navigators.
quotes.name: Edward Gibbon

quotes.message: Ability is of little account without opportunity.
quotes.name: Lucille Ball

quotes.message: Fortune brings in some boats that are not steered.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: If one does not know to which port is sailing, no wind is favorable.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: The amount of good luck coming your way depends on your willingness to act.
quotes.name: Barbara Sher

quotes.message: Luck always seems to be against the man who depends on it.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Good luck is the willing handmaid of a upright and energetic character, and conscientious observance of duty.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: A lucky man is rarer than a white crow.
quotes.name: Juvenal

quotes.message: Luck generally comes to those who look for it, and my notion is that it taps, once in a lifetime, at everybody's door, but if industry does not open it luck goes away.
quotes.name: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.message: Better an ounce of luck than a pound of gold.
quotes.name: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.message: Throw a lucky man in the sea, and he will come up with a fish in his mouth.
quotes.name: Arab Proverb

quotes.message: Luck sometimes visits a fool, but it never sits down with him.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Men have made an idol of luck as an excuse for their own thoughtlessness.
quotes.name: Democritus

quotes.message: The champion makes his own luck.
quotes.name: Red Blaik

quotes.message: Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Nothing is as important as passion. No matter what you want to do with your life, be passionate.
quotes.name: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.message: If you can't figure out your purpose, figure out your passion. For your passion will lead you right into your purpose.
quotes.name: Bishop T.D. Jakes

quotes.message: Chase down your passion like it's the last bus of the night.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: Without passion man is a mere latent force and possibility, like the flint which awaits the shock of the iron before it can give forth its spark.
quotes.name: Amiel

quotes.message: Our passion are the true phoenixes; when the old one is burnt out, a new one rises from its ashes.

quotes.message: Only passions, great passions can elevate the soul to great things.
quotes.name: Denis Diderot

quotes.message: Passion, though a bad regulator, is a powerful spring.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Passion makes idiots of the cleverest men, and makes the biggest idiots clever.

quotes.message: Passion is the genesis of genius.

quotes.message: There is no passion to be found playing small ? in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.

quotes.message: Great dancers are not great because of their technique, they are great because of their passion.

quotes.message: Nothing great in the world was accomplished without passion.

quotes.message: Follow your passion, and success will follow you.

quotes.message: Passion is one great force that unleashes creativity, because if you're passionate about something, then you're more willing to take risks.

quotes.message: Without passion you don't have energy, without energy you have nothing.

quotes.message: It is your passion that empowers you to be able to do that thing you were created to do.
quotes.name: T. D. Jakes

quotes.message: One person with passion is better than forty people merely interested.
quotes.name: E. M. Forster

quotes.message: There is no greatness without a passion to be great, whether it's the aspiration of an athlete or an artist, a scientist, a parent, or a businessperson.

quotes.message: Man is only truly great when he acts from the passions.

quotes.message: Passions are likened best to floods and streams: The shallow murmur, but the deep are dumb.

quotes.message: All passion becomes strength when it has an outlet.

quotes.message: Our passion is our strength.

quotes.message: Passion requires focused direction, and that direction must come from three other areas: your purpose, your talents, and your needs.

quotes.message: The passions are like fire, useful in a thousand ways and dangerous only in one, through their excess.
quotes.name: Christian Nevell Bovee

quotes.message: All you need is passion. If you have a passion for something, you'll create the talent.
quotes.name: Yanni

quotes.message: A genuine passion is like a mountain stream; it admits of no impediment; it cannot go backward; it must go forward.
quotes.name: Bovee.

quotes.message: Passion is the drunkenness of the mind.
quotes.name: South.

quotes.message: A great leader's courage to fulfill his vision comes from passion, not position.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Passion is in all great searches and is necessary to all creative endeavors.
quotes.name: Eugene W. Smith

quotes.message: In the human heart new passions are forever being born; the overthrow of one almost always means the rise of another.

quotes.message: Passions unguided are for the most part mere madness.

quotes.message: Allow your passion to become your purpose, and it will one day become your profession.
quotes.name: Gabrielle Bernstein

quotes.message: A strong passion for any object will ensure success, for the desire of the end will point out the means.

quotes.message: If there is no passion in your life, then have you really lived? Find your passion, whatever it may be. Become it, and let it become you and you will find great things happen FOR you, TO you and BECAUSE of you.

quotes.message: Passion makes a person stop eating, sleeping, working, feeling at peace. A lot of people are frightened because, when it appears, it demolishes all the old things it finds in its path.

quotes.message: Passion is absolutely necessary to achieve any kind of long-lasting success. I know this from experience. If you don?t have passion, everything you do wi?ll ultimately fizzle out or, at best be mediocre.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: Passion is the most compelling and irresistible emotion there is. Passion is at the heart of every idea that matters.
quotes.name: Bernadette Jiwa

quotes.message: PASSION is the oxygen of the soul.
quotes.name: Bill Butler

quotes.message: The passions are the winds which fill the sails of the vessel; they sink it at times, but without them it would be impossible to make way.

quotes.message: You need great passion, because everything you do with great pleasure, you do well.
quotes.name: Juan Manuel Fangio

quotes.message: Passion is a feeling that tells you: this is the right thing to do. Nothing can stand in my way. It doesn't matter what anyone else says. This feeling is so good that it cannot be ignored.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Have the courage to follow your passion ? and if you don't know what it is, realize that one reason for your existence on earth is to find it.

quotes.message: If you can create a career built on passion, your chances for success, fulfillment, and longevity are far greater than if you take any old job simply for the paycheck.
