quotes.message: Ancestral karma is not something that is permanently ingrained; with conscientious effort it can be modified and healed. It only requires you to be proactive and intentional in your efforts to heal.
quotes.name: Dr. Steven Farmer

quotes.message: Karma bides it's time. You will always have to watch out. Karma is unforgiving and always gets payback.

quotes.message: You cannot do harm to someone because someone has done harm to you. You will pay just like they will.
quotes.name: Ericka Williams

quotes.message: No need for revenge. Just sit back and wait. Those who hurt you will eventually screw up themselves and if you're lucky, God will let you watch.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Every action has equal and opposite reaction. This is law of the universe and spares none. Wrong done and injustice inflicted is paid back in the same coin. No one has escaped justice of the universe. It is only a matter of time.
quotes.name: Anil Sinha

quotes.message: Nobody deserves misery but sometimes it's just your turn.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Karma is when you throw a banana in Mario Kart and you end up slipping on it.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Most times, how you treat your children is how they grow up to treat you.
quotes.name: Terry Mark

quotes.message: Don't envy those who make their wealth in an ungodly way. The wicked seem to prosper now and live without care but they will spend their eternity in terror and despair.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Whatever you give to life, it gives you back. Do not hate anybody. The hatred which comes out from you will someday come back to you. Love others. And love will comeback to you.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Karma has a surprising way of taking care of situations. All you have to do is to sit back and watch.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Karma is like a boomerang, whatever you give out... will come back to you.
quotes.name: Rashida Rowe

quotes.message: The ones you judge today, may be the judgments you endure tomorrow.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Remember the unkindness, dishonesty, and deception you display toward others...dont be shocked when it comes back to bite you.
quotes.name: Sarah Moore

quotes.message: Every act done, no matter how insignificant, will eventually return to the doer with equal impact. Good will be returned with good; evil with evil.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: Nature runs a restuarant called Karma. It's a place where there is no need to place any order. You are autimatically served what you deserve.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Karma is not just about the troubles, but also about surmounting them.
quotes.name: Rick Springfield

quotes.message: I'm a true believer in karma. You get what you give wheter it's bad or good.
quotes.name: Sandra Bullock

quotes.message: Karma is the universe's way of letting you know that you just thought you got away with it.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: My actions are my only true belongings. I cannot escape the consequences of my actions. My actions are the ground upon which I stand.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: Forgive the person and their actions, never give in to hate. Let it go, set it free, and karma will take care of what is meant to be.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Someone should have mentioned to him that karma was a venomous witch.
quotes.name: Courtney Cole

quotes.message: Like gravity, karma is so basic we often don't even notice it.
quotes.name: Sakyong Mipham

quotes.message: If justice is denied, let the law of karma take the ride. Nothing in this world is done without a price.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Karma has no problem getting back in touch with you when need be.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: When karma comes back to punch you in the face, I wanna be there just in case it needs help.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Karma, simply put, is an action for an action, good or bad.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: You are free to choose, but you are not free from the consequence of your choice.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Revenge will never solve anything, karma will.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: What goes around comes back around.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Do good and good will follow you.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Great Karma additionally interprets into great well being. At the point when an individual has a cheerful and delighted viewpoint in life, this will just add to the wellbeing of his or her wellbeing condition.
quotes.name: Emma Robertson

quotes.message: The results of karma, whether good or bad, may not manifest right away. In may happen in the same lifetime or in a future life. We may even receive both positive and negative reactions at the same time.
quotes.name: Benjawan Poomsan

quotes.message: Karma is intertwined in the fabric of our life, and training ourselves to be aware of this can transform how we live. We become more mindful and thoughtful, making choices with care, understanding that our past actions, present experiences, and future circumstances originate in our minds.
quotes.name: Thubten Chodron

quotes.message: Love your neighbor, even the ones who do not show you the same courtesy.
quotes.name: Alexandra Elle

quotes.message: If your actions were to boomerang back on you instantly, would you still act the same?
quotes.name: Alexandra Katehakis

quotes.message: You cannot control the results, only your actions.
quotes.name: Allan Lokos

quotes.message: I believe in fate and I believe that things happen for a reason but I don't think that there's a high power, necessarily. I believe in karma very much though.
quotes.name: Amy Winehouse

quotes.message: Sooner or later in life, we will all take our own turn being in the position we once had someone else in.
quotes.name: Ashly Lorenzana

quotes.message: But this was what happened when you didn’t want to visit and confront the past: the past starts visiting and confronting you.
quotes.name: Bret Easton Ellis

quotes.message: When you see a good person, think of becoming like her.him. When you see someone not so good, reflect on your own weak points.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Even if things don't unfold the way you expected, don't be disheartened or give up. One who continues to advance will win in the end.
quotes.name: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.message: Life is painful. It has thorns, like the stem of a rose. Culture and art are the roses that bloom on the stem. The flower is yourself, your humanity. Art is the liberation of the humanity inside yourself.
quotes.name: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.message: Dangerous consequences will follow when politicians and rulers forget moral principles.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Not only is there often a right and wrong, but what goes around does come around, Karma exists.
quotes.name: Dr Ken Baker

quotes.message: Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness. How do you know this is the experience you need? Because this is the experience you are having at this moment.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: This is your karma. You do not understand now, but you will understand later.
quotes.name: H. Raven Rose

quotes.message: Even chance meetings are the result of karma… Things in life are fated by our previous lives. That even in the smallest events there’s no such thing as coincidence.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: A boomerang returns back to the person who throws it.
quotes.name: James C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Is Fate getting what you deserve, or deserving what you get?
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: If you send out goodness from yourself, or if you share that which is happy or good within you, it will all come back to you multiplied ten thousand times. In the kingdom of love there is no competition; there is no possessiveness or control. The more love you give away, the more love you will have.
quotes.name: John O'Donohue

quotes.message: Some day people will ask me what is the key to my success…and I will simply say, “Good Karma.
quotes.name: K. Crumley

quotes.message: But, mark my words; someday she’ll get what’s coming to her.
quotes.name: Kathleen Brooks

quotes.message: I believe in karma, and I believe if you put out positive vibes to everybody, that’s all you’re going to get back.
quotes.name: Kesha

quotes.message: When you plant a seed of love, it is you that blossoms.
quotes.name: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

quotes.message: Quiet the mind, and the soul will speak.
quotes.name: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

quotes.message: Those who pray for your downfall are concentrating negative thoughts towards you.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Dear Karma, I really hate you right now, you made your point.
quotes.name: Ottilie Weber

quotes.message: Strange things conspire when one tries to cheat fate.
quotes.name: Rick Riordan

quotes.message: Violence does, in truth, recoil upon the violent, and the schemer falls into the pit which he digs for another.
quotes.name: Sherlock Holmes

quotes.message: Contrary to popular misconception, karma has nothing to do with punishment and reward. It exists as part of our holographic universe’s binary or dualistic operating system only to teach us responsibility for our creations – and all things we experience are our creations.
quotes.name: Sol Luckman

quotes.message: I want revenge, but I don’t want to screw up my karma.
quotes.name: Susane Colasanti

quotes.message: Manipulation, fueled with good intent, can be a blessing. But when used wickedly, it is the beginning of a magician's karmic calamity.
quotes.name: T.F. Hodge

quotes.message: I’m a true believer in karma. You get what you give, whether it’s bad or good.
quotes.name: Sandra Bullock

quotes.message: Guilt is also a way for us to express to others that we are a person of good conscience.
quotes.name: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.message: Guilt is a useless feeling. It's never enough to make you change direction--only enough to make you useless.
quotes.name: Daniel Nayeri

quotes.message: Guilt is a destructive and ultimately pointless emotion.
quotes.name: Lynn Crilly

quotes.message: No guilt is forgotten so long as the conscience still knows of it.
quotes.name: Stefan Zweig

quotes.message: Every man is guilty of all the good he didn't do.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Guilt is the very nerve of sorrow.
quotes.name: Horace Bushnell

quotes.message: Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.message: Guilt is the price we pay willingly for doing what we are going to do anyway.
quotes.name: Isabelle Holland

quotes.message: Guilt is a rope that wears thin.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Successful guilt is the bane of society.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: He declares himself guilty who justifies himself before accusation.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: Guilt: the gift that keeps on giving.
quotes.name: Erma Bombeck

quotes.message: Guilt is to danger, what fire is to gunpowder; a man need not fear to walk among many barrels of powder, if he have no fire about him.
quotes.name: John Flavel

quotes.message: He that is conscious of guilt cannot bear the innocence of others: So they will try to reduce all others to their own level.
quotes.name: Charles James Fox

quotes.message: Guilt alone, like brain-sick frenzy in its feverish mood, fills the light air with visionary terrors, and shapeless forms of fear.
quotes.name: Junius

quotes.message: Guilt upon the conscience, like rust upon iron, both defiles and consumes it, gnawing and creeping into it, as that does which at last eats out the very heart and substance of the metal.
quotes.name: Bishop Robert South

quotes.message: Guilt is always hungry, don't let it consume you.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: Guilt is oftentimes the strongest witness against itself.
quotes.name: Edward Counsel

quotes.message: The guilt you feel finally comes to an end when you fully express how it came into your consciousness.
quotes.name: Luke Garne

quotes.message: Guilt is the sum total of: All the negative feelings we have ever had about ourselves! Any form of self-hatred, self-rejection, feelings of worthlessness, sinfulness, inferiority, incompetence, failure, or emptiness. The feeling that there are things in us that are lacking or missing or incomplete.
quotes.name: Ken Wapnick

quotes.message: What is guilt? It is moral self-reproach--I did wrong when it was possible to have done otherwise.
quotes.name: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.message: Make friends with guilt. Guilt is a beautiful emotion that alerts us when something is wrong so that we may achieve peace with our conscience. Without conscience there would be no morality. So we can greet guilt cordially and with acceptance, just as we do all other emotions. After we respond to guilt, it has done its job and we can release it.
quotes.name: Glenn R. Schiraldi

quotes.message: Guilt hath very quick ears to an accusation.
quotes.name: Henry Fielding

quotes.message: Guilt is something small people feel when they run out of excuses for their behavior.
quotes.name: Gaius Baltar

quotes.message: Repentant tears wash out the stain of guilt.
quotes.name: Saint Augustine

quotes.message: Guilt: punishing yourself before God doesn't.
quotes.name: Alan Cohen

quotes.message: Guilt is ever at a loss, and confusion waits upon it; when innocence and bold truth are always ready for expression.
quotes.name: William Congreve

quotes.message: Where guilt is, rage and courage doth abound.
quotes.name: Ben Jonson

quotes.message: Guilt is an indulgence, it entangles you in the past.
quotes.name: Gregg Hurwitz

quotes.message: Guilt once harbored in the conscious breast, intimidates the brave, degrades the great.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Guilt has always its horrors and solicitudes; and, to make it yet more shameful and detestable, it is doomed often to stand in awe of those to whom nothing could give influence or weight but their power of betraying.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Guilt is a poor, helpless, dependent being. Without the alliance of able, diligent, and let me add, fortunate fraud, it is inevitably undone. If the guilty culprit be obstinately silent, it forms a deadly presumption against him; if he speaks, talking tends only to his discovery, and his very defence often furnishes the materials for his conviction.
quotes.name: Junius

quotes.message: Guilt was never a rational thing; it distorts all the faculties of the human mind, it perverts them, it leaves a man no longer in the free use of his reason, it puts him into confusion.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: People incapable of guilt usually do have a good time.
quotes.name: Rust Cohle

quotes.message: The guilty think all talk is of themselves.
quotes.name: Chaucer

quotes.message: Guilt is abscent when the act is justified.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Guilt is anything you did and fear others to know about.
quotes.name: Mohammad

quotes.message: Guilt is the source of sorrows, the avenging fiend that follows us behind with whips and stings.
quotes.name: Nicholas Rowe

quotes.message: There are two kinds of guilt: the kind that drowns you until you're useless, and the kind that fires your soul to purpose.
quotes.name: Sabaa Tahir

quotes.message: You're making yourself too important. Guilt comes from feeling we're at the center of the universe. We're not.
quotes.name: Gloria Whelan

quotes.message: Guilt's just your ego's way of tricking you into thinking that you're making moral progress. Don't fall for it, my dear.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.message: Like hatred, guilt can't be locked in the silence of forgetting, without taking part of your soul with it.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: You won't be free from guilt if you are constantly replaying the negative memories of your past.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Releasing guilt is like removing a huge weight from your shoulders. Guilt is released through the empowering thought of love and respect for yourself. Let go of standards of perfection and refuse to use up the precious currency of your life, the now, with thoughts that continue to frustrate and weaken you. Instead, vow to be better than you used to be, which is the true test of nobility.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Guilt is a lazy feeling that takes no action; the wings of integrity are the only thing that sets it free.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Guilt can interfere with our desires to move forward, to heal properly and to become a person who has the mental health and means of proper recompense.
quotes.name: Bryant McGill

quotes.message: Guilt is a waste of time unless you learn how to be more loving the next time a similar situation presents itself.
quotes.name: Annette Vaillancourt

quotes.message: Guilt is a manifestation of condemnation or aversion towards oneself, which does not understand the changing transformative quality of mind.
quotes.name: Joseph Goldstein

quotes.message: Guilt is really self- condemnation and self-invalidation of our worth and value as a human being.
quotes.name: David R. Hawkins

quotes.message: Fear is the tax that conscience pays to guilt.
quotes.name: George Sewell

quotes.message: There is no greater guilt than discontentment.
quotes.name: Lao-Tzu

quotes.message: So full of artless jealousy is guilt, . It spills itself in fearing to be spilt.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: The only art her guilt to cover, . To hide her shame from every eye, . To give repentance to her lover, . And wring his bosom, is — to die.
quotes.name: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.message: By the sympathy of your human hearts for sin ye shall scent out all the places — whether in church, bedchamber, street.
quotes.name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.message: What is our innocence, . what is our guilt? All are . naked, none is safe.
quotes.name: Marianne Moore

quotes.message: Remorse sleeps during a prosperous period but wakes up in adversity.
quotes.name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.message: But, R - e - m - o - r - s - e! . The water-wagon is the place for me; . . . . It is no time for mirth and laughter, .
quotes.name: George Ade

quotes.message: In former days, everyone found the assumption of innocence so easy; today we find fatally easy the assumption of guilt.
quotes.name: Amanda Cross

quotes.message: Of all means to regeneration Remorse is surely the most wasteful. It cuts away healthy tissue with the poisoned. It is a knife that probes far deeper than the evil.
quotes.name: E.M. Forster

quotes.message: True guilt is guilt at the obligation one owes to oneself to be oneself. False guilt is guilt felt at not being what other people feel one ought to be or assume that one is.
quotes.name: R. D. Laing

quotes.message: Guilt feelings so often arise from accusations rather than from crimes.
quotes.name: Iris Murdoch

quotes.message: Here’s the smell of the blood still: all the perfumes of Arabia will not sweeten this little hand.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: What hangs people ... is the unfortunate circumstance of guilt.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: If something makes you cry, you have to do something about it. That’s the difference between politics and guilt.
quotes.name: Bill Clinton

quotes.message: I have many regrets, and I’m sure everyone does. The stupid things you do, you regret if you have any sense, and if you don’t regret them, maybe you’re stupid.
quotes.name: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.message: O conscience, upright and stainless, how bitter a sting to thee is a little fault!
quotes.name: Dante Alighieri

quotes.message: There is only one way to achieve happiness on this terrestrial ball, and that is to have either a clear conscience or none at all.
quotes.name: Ogden Nash

quotes.message: In former days, everyone found the assumption of innocence so easy; today we find fatally easy the assumption of guilt.
quotes.name: Carolyn Heilbrun

quotes.message: When lovely woman stoops to folly . And finds too late that men betray, . What charm can soothe her melancholy, .
quotes.name: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.message: My doctrine is this, that if we see cruelty or wrong that we have the power to stop, and do nothing, we make ourselves sharers in the guilt.
quotes.name: Anna Sewell

quotes.message: Remorse begets reform.
quotes.name: Wiliam Cowper

quotes.message: We can always get along better ty reason and love of truth than by worry of conscience and remorse Harmful are these, and evil.
quotes.name: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.message: Mothers, food, love, and career: the four major guilt groups.
quotes.name: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.message: Conscience reigns but it does not govern.
quotes.name: Paul Valéry

quotes.message: What the devil loves is that vague cloud of unspecified guilt feeling or unspecified virtue by which he lures us into despair or presumption. 'Details, please?' is the answer.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: All men alike stand condemned, not by alien codes of ethics, hut by their own, and all men therefore arc conscious of guilt.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: When we grieve, tears and guilt get mixed together.
quotes.name: Art Buchwald

quotes.message: Conscience is thoroughly well-bred and soon leaves off talking to those who do not wish to hear it.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: The fact that human conscience remains partially infantile throughout life is the core of human tragedy.
quotes.name: Erik H. Erikson

quotes.message: Each man’s soul is a menagerie where Conscience, the animal-tamer, lives with a collection of wild beasts.
quotes.name: Austin O’Malley

quotes.message: The voice of conscience is so delicate that it is easy to stifle; but it is also so clear that it is impossible to mistake.
quotes.name: Germaine De Staël

quotes.message: What we call real estate — the solid ground to build a house on — is the broad foundation on which nearly all the guilt of this world rests.
quotes.name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.message: How extraordinary it is that one feels most guilt about the sins one is unable to commit.
quotes.name: V.S. Pritchett

quotes.message: An excuse not requested betrays the guilt of him who makes it.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: He confesses his guilt who flees from his trial.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: He declares himself guilty who justifies himself before being accused.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: He who is guilty believes that all men speak ill of him.
quotes.name: Italian Proverb

quotes.message: How difficult it is not to betray guilt by our looks.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: How near to guilt a man may approach without being guilty.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: Measure your guilt, then stretch your legs.
quotes.name: Arabian Proverb

quotes.message: The act does not make the person guilty, unless the mind be guilty.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: The innocent are free from fear; but the guilty have always the dread of punishment before their eyes.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: A mind conscious of guilt is its own accuser.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: The one who secretly meditates a crime bears all the guilt of the deed.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: A guilty conscience needs to confess. A work of art is a confession.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: If a dog will not come to you after having looked you in the face, you should go home and examine your conscience.
quotes.name: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.message: Enjoying someone else’s smell—the most modest form of guilt there is.
quotes.name: Francesco Pacifico

quotes.message: You may not be able to change the world, but at least you can embarrass the guilty.
quotes.name: Jessica Mitford

quotes.message: I think that everything he did, feeding the poor, giving money to friends in need, it was all a way of redeeming himself. And that, I believe, is what true redemption is, Amir jan, when guilt leads to good.
quotes.name: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.message: Everyone’s conscience in religion is between God and themselves, and it belongs to none other.
quotes.name: Margaret Cavendish

quotes.message: Negative emotions like loneliness, envy, and guilt have an important role to play in a happy life; they're big, flashing signs that something needs to change.
quotes.name: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.message: No amount of guilt can solve the past. No amount of anxiety can change the future.
quotes.name: Bruce Van Horn

quotes.message: Guilt before we act is called morality.
quotes.name: Jesse Fisher

quotes.message: Without the sensation of guilt, the hierarchy are afraid the individual would run free and there would be no order. Without order, there is no power. Guilt forces each of us to surrender our will, our souls to those who should not possess them.
quotes.name: Alessandro Farnese

quotes.message: Fear and guilt are sisters.
quotes.name: Trish Park

quotes.message: Hey, hey, hey. Come on. I know what guilt is. It's one of those touchy-feely words that people throw around that don't really mean anything... You know, like 'maternal' or 'addiction.
quotes.name: Karen Walker

quotes.message: I'm only human baby . Ain't I allowed to make mistakes . You put your guilt on me . And it's causing my poor heart to break, yeah .
quotes.name: Marcus Miller; Luther Vandross

quotes.message: There's a war between guilt and grace . And they're fighting for a sacred space . But I'm living proof .
quotes.name: Matthew West

quotes.message: Words can't describe the way it feels . When mercy floods a thirsty soul . A broken side begins to heal .
quotes.name: Matthew West

quotes.message: Oh! load of guilt! relentless misery! . Still, ever still the same where'er I fly; . No peace, no hope, not one poor moment's glimpse .
quotes.name: Thomas Oldham

quotes.message: Daily mediate and affirm the Scriptures; your mind and soul will be filled with pure thoughts.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Meditation is offering your genuine presence to yourself in every moment.
quotes.name: Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: Meditation provides a way of learning how to let go. As we sit, the self we've been trying to construct and make into a nice, neat package continues to unravel.
quotes.name: John Welwood

quotes.message: Meditation is the signpost directing the steps to the main highway of realization.
quotes.name: Guy Bogart

quotes.message: Mediation on the Scriptures will renew your mind.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: The mediation of internal conflict can be linkages with other problems.
quotes.name: Howard Raiffa

quotes.message: The spirit of meditation is the combating of self-willed thinking-it is a combat against the weight of one's feelings.
quotes.name: Hakuin Ekaku

quotes.message: Mediation on the scriptures transforms our lives.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Meditation is to the mind what exercise is to the body it warms and invigorates.
quotes.name: John Thornton

quotes.message: Make your life a prayer. Live your mediation.
quotes.name: Reba Riley

quotes.message: Meditation is the discovery that the point of life is always arrived at in the immediate moment.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: Peer mediation is a chance for students to work with other students to help them resolve problems, arguments, disagreements without having to get the teacher or the administration involved.
quotes.name: Janet Reno

quotes.message: Meditation allows us to directly participate in our lives instead of living life as an afterthought.
quotes.name: Stephen Levine

quotes.message: Daily mediation on the Holy Scriptures is a spiritual act.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Meditation means dissolving the invisible walls that unawareness has built.
quotes.name: Sadhguru

quotes.message: Any action done with awareness is meditation. Meditation means to be fully aware of our actions, thoughts, feelings and emotions. Another name of meditation is passive awareness.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: What mediation is designed for is to resolve disputes on the value on a claim, not whether there is a claim.
quotes.name: David Wheeler

quotes.message: Daily mediation is a healthy spiritual exercise.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Practice mediation and concentration exercises, and begin to think more about regaining your sensitivity by avoiding draining situations. Not because of fear but because of intelligence.
quotes.name: Frederick Lenz

quotes.message: Meditation must be continuous. The current of meditation must be present in all your activities.
quotes.name: Annamalai Swami

quotes.message: Mediation on word of God leads to renewal of mind; rekindle of spirit and revival of soul.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Mediation is one of the most effective tools of non-violence. It can turn parties away from conflict, towards compromise.
quotes.name: Miroslav Lajcak

quotes.message: Mediation and reconciliation work is about a profound quest for justice and social transformation. But at the same time, they are about service, solidarity, about exploring and rediscovering the human spirit that has been lost or shattered through human conflict, cruelty, ignorance and greed.
quotes.name: Hizkias Assefa

quotes.message: Meditation is the secret of all growth in spiritual life and knowledge.
quotes.name: James Allen

quotes.message: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: You don't have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
quotes.name: Dan Millman

quotes.message: The day she let go of the things that were weighing her down, was the day she began to shine the brightest.
quotes.name: Katrina Mayer

quotes.message: Patience is the calm acceptance that things can happen in a different order than the one you have in mind.
quotes.name: David G. Allen

quotes.message: I long for the countryside. That's where I get my calm and tranquillity from – being able to come and find a spot of green.
quotes.name: Emilia Clarke

quotes.message: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, it empties today of its strength.
quotes.name: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.message: Step outside for a while - calm your mind. It is better to hug a tree than to bang your head against a wall continually.
quotes.name: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.message: Keep calm because pain makes you stronger, fear makes you braver and eartbreak makes you wiser.
quotes.name: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.message: The most intense conflicts, if overcome, leave behind a sense of security and calm that is not easily disturbed. It is just these intense conflicts and their conflagration which are needed to produce valuable and lasting results.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: Stop a minute, right where you are. Relax your shoulders, shake your head and spine like a dog shaking off cold water. Tell that imperious voice in your head to be still.
quotes.name: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.message: Being relaxed, at peace with yourself, confident, emotionally neutral loose, and free-floating – these are the keys to successful performance in almost everything.
quotes.name: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.message: Peace is the result of retraining your mind to process life as it is, rather than as you think it should be.
quotes.name: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.message: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Everything we do is infused with the energy with which we do it. If we're frantic, life will be frantic. If we're peaceful, life will be peaceful.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: Choose to be optimistic. It feels better.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: You practice mindfulness, on the one hand, to be calm and peaceful. On the other hand, as you practice mindfulness and live a life of peace, you inspire hope for a future of peace.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: Everything you do can be done better from a place of relaxation.
quotes.name: Stephen C. Paul

quotes.message: If you do not have control over your mouth, you will not have control over your future.
quotes.name: Germany Kent

quotes.message: Panic causes tunnel vision. Calm acceptance of danger allows us to more easily assess the situation and see the options.
quotes.name: Simon Sinek

quotes.message: To experience peace does not mean that your life is always blissful. It means that you are capable of tapping into a blissful state of mind amidst the normal chaos of a hectic life.
quotes.name: Jill Bolte Taylor

quotes.message: Those who act with few desires are calm, without worry or fear.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Learn to calm down the winds of your mind, and you will enjoy great inner peace.
quotes.name: Remez Sasson

quotes.message: Be like a duck. Calm on the surface, but always paddling like the dickens underneath.
quotes.name: Michael Caine

quotes.message: He who is of calm and happy nature will hardly feel the pressure of age, but to him who is of an opposite disposition youth and age are equally a burden.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
quotes.name: William S. Burroughs

quotes.message: Peace of mind is attained not by ignoring problems, but by solving them.
quotes.name: Raymond Hull

quotes.message: Do not ever get agitated by provoking thoughts and actions. Always keep your calm. This will shame the alien.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Being under stress is like being stranded in a body of water. If you panic, it will cause you to flail around so that the water rushes into your lungs and creates further distress. Yet, by calmly collecting yourself and using controlled breathing you remain afloat with ease.
quotes.name: Alaric Hutchinson

quotes.message: The one who had the power to calm the elements of the earth has power to calm our souls.
quotes.name: Elder Robert D. Hales

quotes.message: Concentration is a cornerstone of mindfulness practice. Your mindfulness will only be as robust as the capacity of your mind to be calm and stable. Without calmness, the mirror of mindfulness will have an agitated and choppy surface and will not be able to reflect things with any accuracy.
quotes.name: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.message: Never be in a hurry; do everything quietly and in a calm spirit. Do not lose your inner peace for anything whatsoever, even if your whole world seems upset.
quotes.name: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.message: Set peace of mind as your highest goal, and organise your life around it.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Compassion, tolerance, forgiveness and a sense of self-discipline are qualities that help us lead our daily lives with a calm mind.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Freedom from desire leads to inner peace.
quotes.name: Lao Tse

quotes.message: Getting stress out of your life takes more than prayer alone. You must take action to make changes and stop doing whatever is causing the stress. You can learn to calm down in the way you handle things.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: Keep calm and keep learning.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Breath is the power behind all things. I breath in and know that good things will happen.
quotes.name: Tao Porchon-Lynch

quotes.message: Only when one is connected to one's own core is one connected to others, I am beginning to discover. And, for me, the core, the inner spring, can best be refound through solitude.
quotes.name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.message: Keep cool; anger is not an argument.
quotes.name: Daniel Webster

quotes.message: They sicken of the calm who know the storm.
quotes.name: Dorothy Parker

quotes.message: Whenever something bad happens, keep calm, take a few deep breaths and shift the focus to something positive.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: Let peace be your middle name.
quotes.name: Ntathu Allen

quotes.message: You have to slow your heart rate, stay calm. You have to shoot in between your heartbeats.
quotes.name: Chris Kyle

quotes.message: When the expected occurred, never panic, by keep calming, you gain control over the situation.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm.
quotes.name: Willa Cather

quotes.message: There is a calmness to a life lived in gratitude, a quiet joy.
quotes.name: Ralph H. Blum

quotes.message: Sometimes you can find peace of mind by transferring yourself to different situations. They're just reminders to stay... calm.
quotes.name: Yves Behar

quotes.message: Mistakes and pressure are inevitable; the secret to getting past them is to stay calm.
quotes.name: Travis Bradberry

quotes.message: It's not just about the words you use, but the way you use them, and the message that puts over. Also your face too and the way you project your message. If you're telling the group to stay calm, be good, and you have beads of sweat dripping down your forehead, you're in trouble.
quotes.name: Didier Deschamps

quotes.message: I know I perform best when I stay calm.
quotes.name: Shikhar Dhawan

quotes.message: I don't know if I'm ready to know what triggers my anger. I just feel like I figured out on my own how to stay calm, how to enjoy life, how to be happy.
quotes.name: Rolando McClain

quotes.message: I wouldn't, a little bit frightened but throughout my life I'd learnt that when you're in the serious situations, you've got to try to stay calm. Because that's the way you get out of them.
quotes.name: John Newcombe

quotes.message: There are difficult matches from time to time, and that is absolutely normal. You have to stay calm and confident after them.
quotes.name: Thomas Tuchel

quotes.message: They might make you feel you are useless or incomplete. Don't let it affect you. Keep calm and let your future prove that they were wrong.
quotes.name: Amen Muffler

quotes.message: Defend your leadership roles with your true character.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: You don’t need to be too anxious about anything; you only need to get understanding!
quotes.name: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.message: Everyone propels at different stages of their life.
quotes.name: Hopal Green

quotes.message: Change is important, but if you can’t really change it, just keep calm, understand the situation and go through it with a good heart! Time will surely speak with time!
quotes.name: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.message: Explain yourself when it is a must, but sometimes, in life, keep quit when people think you are mad or you shall speak and speak how mad they think you are!
quotes.name: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.message: Keep calm and let your heart sing the song of kindness.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: Impatience is not the fastest way of getting to where your treasures are. It is the quickest way of by-passing them without even knowing.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Your brand is your personal lawyer... It defends and speaks for you even in your absence.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Keep calm. You have the forest in your blood.
quotes.name: Nenia Campbell

quotes.message: Patience is not the ability to wait. Patience is to be calm no matter what happens, constantly take action to turn it to positive growth opportunities, and have faith to believe that it will all work out in the end while you are waiting.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: Whoever’s calm and sensible is insane!
quotes.name: Jalaluddin Rumi

quotes.message: To learn to see – to accustom the eye to calmness, to patience, and to allow things to come up to it; to defer judgment, and to acquire the habit of approaching and grasping an individual case from all sides.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Be like a duck, paddling and working very hard inside the water, but what everyone sees is a smiling and calm face.
quotes.name: Manoj Arora

quotes.message: So just keep breathing, and keep calm, keep calm . The only real control we have is over ourselves . So let's get over it . That we can't and we won't control anything else.
quotes.name: Andrew Glass

quotes.message: Keep calm . Keep real . Hey never you let them get you down. You might never come around . Never you let them out your fire .
quotes.name: Stephen Marley

quotes.message: The important thing for you to learn in any emergency is, stay calm, keep cool, and think!
quotes.name: Brad Jones

quotes.message: Another speed bump keep calm and walk on . Just a little speed bump just a hurdle you can jump . You didn't come this far toonly come this far . Don't stop now .
quotes.name: Marta Innocenti

quotes.message: It feels like there's no place to land .
quotes.name: Jared Clement

quotes.message: My pain and I birds of a feather .
quotes.name: Sarthak Maurya

quotes.message: In the midst of any stressful situation, say or think a series of statements such as, Stay calm. . . everything's okay. . . you've handled worse before. . . relax and take a deep breath. . . take it step by step and don't rush. . . I can get help if I need it.
quotes.name: Amy E. Dean

quotes.message: When we learn to manage that stress we are able to create our peak performance abilities and remain calm.
quotes.name: James O'Donnell

quotes.message: When you wish to feel more positive, you can decide to be calm and direct your thoughts.
quotes.name: Julia Hidy

quotes.message: I don't wanna burn out, I'll keep it calm, cool, collected
quotes.name: Syretha Smith

quotes.message: Keep calm . Keep going on . It may be long .
quotes.name: Eric Gallagher

quotes.message: We'll keep calm and carry on . With good intentions . They'll prescribe the rights and wrongs . Until we're perfect.
quotes.name: Josh Bradford

quotes.message: ll right, people, let's keep it calm. The last thing we need is a panic.
quotes.name: Jerry Siegel

quotes.message: Far away, from frustration . I stay calm . And enjoy peace.
quotes.name: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.message: Storms chafe, and soon wear out themselves, or us; . In calms, Heaven laughs to see us languish thus.
quotes.name: John Donne

quotes.message: There is a calm for those who weep, . A rest for weary pilgrims found: . They softly lie, and sweetly sleep, . Low in the ground.
quotes.name: James Francis Montgomery

quotes.message: To successfully build relationships, gain trust, and maintain a respectful classroom, my demeanor needed to remain calm.
quotes.name: Victoria Lentfer

quotes.message: It is important to link our physical exercises and emotional feelings together to most effectively feel calm and let our light shine through.
quotes.name: Lauren Brukner

quotes.message: Keep calm meant being able to choose his emotion.
quotes.name: Jonathan Forrest

quotes.message: If we can pick part how our self-esteem has been constructed, how it affects our lives and the llives of others, and by what it is influenced, then we can learn to control it, and to stay calm and content no matter what life throws at us.
quotes.name: Cat Williams

quotes.message: The most important skill in staying calm is not to lose sleep over small issues. The second most important skill is to be able to view all issues as small issues.
quotes.name: Paul Wilson

quotes.message: You never know what might work for you until you try.
quotes.name: Adams Media

quotes.message: A calm mind means a calm nervous system, which means less anxiety and more feelings of peace and tranquility.
quotes.name: Tanya Carroll Richardson

quotes.message: Feeling frustrated is okay. I will try to learn to stay calm when I am frustrated.
quotes.name: Carol Gray

quotes.message: Someone who maintained inner calm under extreme stress was running an organization that was well balanced and growing.
quotes.name: Dr. Stephen G. Payne

quotes.message: Engaging in behaviours that build your spiritual core connection opens pathways to a better workplace, more calm and much more joy.
quotes.name: Dr. Stephen G. Payne

quotes.message: To be calm becomes a kind of revolutionary act. To be happy with your own non upgraded existence.
quotes.name: Matt Haig

quotes.message: Calm your mind, and inner control and power you'll find.
quotes.name: John Newman

quotes.message: Stay calm and keep your eyes close, When someone appears holding something. But remind them, that you are available, Whether they need someone to talk with.
quotes.name: Gina Ancheta Agsaulio

quotes.message: When you forgive, you in no way change the past - but you sure do change the future.
quotes.name: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.message: To err is human, to forgive divine.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: Sorry doesn't mean anything unless you mean it.
quotes.name: Ashley Sexton

quotes.message: Sometimes, an apology sets free a part of you that you didn't even realize was cagedâ€¦and forgiveness destroys the cage.
quotes.name: Sanjo Jendayi

quotes.message: An apology given just to appease one's conscience is self-serving and better left unspoken!
quotes.name: Evinda Lepins

quotes.message: An apology is a lovely perfume; it can transform the clumsiest moment into a gracious gift.
quotes.name: Margaret Lee Runbeck

quotes.message: An apology is a good way to have the last word.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
quotes.name: Paul Boese

quotes.message: Apologize! That's the least you can do to try to make right something you have wronged.
quotes.name: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.message: Apologizing does not always mean that you are wrong and the other person is right. It just means that you value your relationship more than your ego.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Saying â€˜I'm sorry' is saying â€˜I love you' with a wounded heart in one hand and your smothered pride in the other.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: In this life, when you deny someone an apology, you will remember it at time you beg forgiveness.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Forgiveness is not an occasional act, it is a constant attitude.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: When you say the word 'sorry' make sure you understand that an apology has 3 parts. 'I'm sorry', 'It's my fault and I won't do it again' and 'How can I make things better'. The last part is the most important.
quotes.name: Manasa Rao

quotes.message: It's more than saying sorry. It's meaning it. It's letting the apology change things. But an apology is where it has to begin.
quotes.name: Neil Gaiman

quotes.message: Sorry may have become 'just another word', but with tears it means the world.
quotes.name: C.J.

quotes.message: Forgiveness is a sign that the person who has wronged you means more to you than the wrong they have delt.
quotes.name: Ben Greenhalgh

quotes.message: I'm sorry. The two most inadequate words in the English language.
quotes.name: Beth Revis

quotes.message: 'Sorry' can not change the past, but can change the future.
quotes.name: Sladiana Savic

quotes.message: Never ruin an apology with an excuse.
quotes.name: Kimberly Johnson

quotes.message: Life becomes easier when you learn to accept an apology you never got.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: There's a small window of opportunity to apologize sometimes after you've terribly wronged someone. It closes. Sometimes forever, but it never opens wide enough again for a good breeze.
quotes.name: Darnell Lamont Walker

quotes.message: A truly humble apology works to part storm clouds, calm rough seas, and bring on the soft lights of dawn; it has the power to change a person's world.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: 'I'm sorry' won't fix what's been broken. It can't reverse time or undo the damage or change anything that happened. But a sincere, humble apology can serve to soften the sting and sometimes do a pretty good patch up job.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: Sacrifice is at the heart of repentance. Without deeds, your apology is worthless.
quotes.name: Bryan Davis

quotes.message: 'I'm sorry' won't fix what's been broken.  It can't reverse time or undo the damage or change anything that happened.  But a sincere, humble apology can serve to soften the sting and sometimes do a pretty good patch up job.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: Its incredible how many wounds can be healed by the two words â€˜I'm sorry'.
quotes.name: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.message: Forgiveness is the sweetest revenge.
quotes.name: Isaac Friedmann

quotes.message: It's easier to ask forgiveness than it is to get permission.
quotes.name: Grace Hopper

quotes.message: Let us forgive each other â€” only then will we live in peace.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: â€˜Sorry' is indeed, one of the most difficult and most powerful words in English, provided one can feel and say it at the same time. It is difficult because you sincerely need to feel the pain of the other person and rise above your ego to say it; it is powerful because you overwhelm the other with the opposite reaction of what they were expecting.
quotes.name: Uday Mukerji

quotes.message: It takes a great deal of character strength to apologize quickly out of one's heart rather than out of pity. A person must possess himself and have a deep sense of security in fundamental principles and values in order to genuinely apologize.
quotes.name: Stephan Covey

quotes.message: I'm sorry you're angry is NOT an apology.
quotes.name: Lisa Lutz

quotes.message: Apologizing does not always mean you're wrong and the other person is right. It just means you value your relationship more than your ego.
quotes.name: Mark Matthews

quotes.message: Sorry means you leave yourself open, to embrace or to ridicule or to revenge. Sorry is a question that begs forgiveness, because the metronome of a good heart won't settle until things are set right and true. Sorry doesn't take things back, but it pushes things forward. It bridges the gap. Sorry is a sacrament. It's an offering. A gift.
quotes.name: Craig Silvey

quotes.message: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.name: Gandhi

quotes.message: In this lifetime when you deny someone an apology, you will remember it at the time you beg for forgiveness.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: You can edit what you write. Why not edit what you say? If it hurts somebody, you can still offer an apology or withdraw your statements.
quotes.name: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.message: An apology can be a wonderful thing so long as it is infrequent and from the heart. However, beware of the person who justifies bad behavior with apologies. For them it is a means to an end, and quite often at your expense.
quotes.name: Gary Hopkins

quotes.message: Sorry' isn't a synonym for â€˜guilty.' It's a way to say you're listening.
quotes.name: Martina Boone

quotes.message: If you think the most courageous and difficult thing you can do is stubbornly stand your ground, try graciously giving in.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: An apology is the super glue of life. It can repair just about anything.
quotes.name: Lynn Johnston

quotes.message: When you realize you've made a mistake, make amends immediately. It's easier to eat crow while it's still warm.
quotes.name: Dan Heist

quotes.message: When you forgive, you free your soul. But when you say I'm sorry, you free two souls.
quotes.name: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.message: Never apologize for showing your feelings. When you do, you are apologizing for the truth.
quotes.name: Jose N. Harris

quotes.message: Apologizing is different from begging, it doesn't change your status, go ahead and get on your knees, spill tears if you got it, for the person you offended, if at all you had a place in their hearts, you'll be totally forgiven and accepted.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Being sorry is the highest act of selfishness, seeing value only after discarding it.
quotes.name: Douglas Horton

quotes.message: Would 'sorry' have made any difference? Does it ever? It's just a word. One word against a thousand actions.
quotes.name: Sarah Ockler

quotes.message: Look, we are human, we make mistakes. I will gladly shout from the rooftops that I am not perfect. Nor will I ever be.
quotes.name: Dianna Agron

quotes.message: Life's not perfect. Some loose ends may never get trimmed up and tidied.
quotes.name: Hoda Kotb

quotes.message: I know I'm not perfect & will never become. Yet, I'm proud of being Me, with all humility & imperfections. Cause this is the only life I have.
quotes.name: Abu Sufyan ibn Harb

quotes.message: No one is perfect in this world. Forgive people for not knowing better and learn to move on.
quotes.name: Leon Brown

quotes.message: I'm not perfect, but if there are any points given for caring about people with every fiber of your being and giving life all you've got every day, then I suppose I have a shot.
quotes.name: Jack Welch

quotes.message: People are not perfect... very often the relationships that are strongest are those where people have worked through big crises, but they've had to work through them. So the challenge to us is to work through that.
quotes.name: Patricia Hewitt

quotes.message: I'm not perfect, but those flaws make an interesting person.
quotes.name: Mary Frann

quotes.message: Maybe you're not perfect, but you're willing to actually look at yourself and take some kind of accountability. That's a change. It might not mean that you can turn everything around, but I think there's something incredibly hopeful about that.
quotes.name: Brie Larson

quotes.message: Warriors of light are not perfect.Their beauty lies in accepting this fact and still desiring to grow and to learn.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: But I am not perfect in my way of putting things Because I lack the divine simplicity Of being only what I appear to be.
quotes.name: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.message: I'm not perfect, but I'd like to be perfect. I'm working on it.
quotes.name: Shelley Long

quotes.message: I understand that I'm not perfect. I made mistakes and I had a hand in everything that's happened to me, good and bad.
quotes.name: Dwyane Wade

quotes.message: I'm not perfect. But I am trying every day to concentrate on being better.
quotes.name: Allen Iverson

quotes.message: I make mistakes every day. I'm not perfect in my behavior, but I want to be and that's what God is after, a heart that wants to be.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: All that is not perfect down to the smallest detail is doomed to perish.
quotes.name: Gustav Mahler

quotes.message: The living is not perfect because it is liable to change; the dead is not perfect because it does not live.
quotes.name: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.message: I know who I am. I am not perfect. I'm not the most beautiful woman in the world. But I'm one of them.
quotes.name: Mary J. Blige

quotes.message: I'm not perfect. And who knows how many times I've fallen short. We all fall short. That's the amazing thing about the grace of God.
quotes.name: Tim Tebow

quotes.message: I will make mistakes, after all I am not perfect, but I will do my best to make them up to you. I would never hurt you intentionally. I would not give up on you, so I hope you don't give up on me. Sincerely, The Person that Loves You.
quotes.name: Carlos Salinas

quotes.message: The most beautiful things are not perfect, they are special.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: I may not be perfect but I am perfect enough to be a very good rendition of me.
quotes.name: Jan Hellriegel

quotes.message: I'm not perfect; no one is perfect. Everyone makes mistakes. I think you try to learn from those mistakes.
quotes.name: Derek Jeter

quotes.message: People are good or half good or a quarter good, and it changes all the time- but even on the best day nobody's perfect.
quotes.name: Colum Mccann

quotes.message: Nobody's perfect. We're all just one step up from the beasts and one step down from the angels.
quotes.name: Jeannette Walls

quotes.message: I love what I do, and I always make sure to tell my fans I'm not perfect, so don't think I am. I make mistakes. I'm human, and we all are. But I try to be the best I can be, and that's all I really can do.
quotes.name: Selena Gomez

quotes.message: Every day is not perfect. You have your bad days and good days just like anyone else. You do not want to talk to people sometimes. It is normal.
quotes.name: Brett Favre

quotes.message: We're not perfect; we all have things that people might not like to see, and I like to show my faults.
quotes.name: Grace Jones

quotes.message: Everybody's got regrets. Everybody's made mistakes. Nobody's perfect.
quotes.name: Josh Duhamel

quotes.message: I am not a perfect friend, and it is impossible not to rebuff or be rebuffed if you move about the world.
quotes.name: Anne Roiphe

quotes.message: I'm not perfect but I'm learning to be better.
quotes.name: Ronnie Radke

quotes.message: Because I'm not perfect looking, I get to play better roles.
quotes.name: Juliette Lewis

quotes.message: All confidence placed in another is dangerous if it is not perfect, for on almost all occasions we ought to tell everything or to conceal everything. We have already told too much of our secret, if one single circumstance is to be kept back.
quotes.name: Jean de la Bruyère

quotes.message: Baseball is a game of life. It's not perfect, but it feels like it is.
quotes.name: Joe Torre

quotes.message: I'm not perfect in my walk but I want to do the right thing.
quotes.name: Kirk Cameron

quotes.message: I see conflict. But the conflict is what makes it relatable. I'm conflicted; you're conflicted. I'm not perfect - nobody is. I'm just blessed to be able to express my conflict through song.
quotes.name: Kendrick Lamar

quotes.message: What happened in my personal life affected my career too. I am not perfect and I have made a lot of mistakes. Being an entrepreneur is incredibly lonely. There were many hurdles along the way. From starting out, to making it, and almost losing it, to fighting back, to nearly losing it all again. There have been extreme highs and extreme lows.
quotes.name: Michelle Mone

quotes.message: I'm not perfect, but I think that I've done good to stay focused on what I'm called to do.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: It was not perfect but I'm very happy. It could have been better, but I'm now looking forward to my second race of the season.
quotes.name: Usain Bolt

quotes.message: I will be the first to admit I am not perfect and I make mistakes.
quotes.name: Alberto Gonzales

quotes.message: I'm not perfect, but I believe my faith in Jesus Christ will really take me far in the world!
quotes.name: Christina Grimmie

quotes.message: It's okay that we're not perfect. It's okay that we all have problems. It's okay to cry, to show emotions.
quotes.name: Marina Abramovic

quotes.message: A woman's life is not perfect or whole till she has added herself to a husband. Nor is a man's life perfect or whole till he has added to himself a wife.
quotes.name: Anthony Trollope

quotes.message: Most of our ancestors were not perfect ladies and gentlemen. The majority of them weren't even mammals.
quotes.name: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.message: Nobody has a perfect anything. We don't have perfect lives. We're not perfect beings.
quotes.name: Gladys Knight

quotes.message: I don't have to be perfect. All I have to do is show up and enjoy the messy, imperfect and beautiful journey of my life.
quotes.name: Kerry Washington

quotes.message: I'm the most chill person I know...I'm happy with myself...I'm not perfect, but I'm cool with that.
quotes.name: Freddie Prinze Jr.

quotes.message: Judge not, before you judge yourself. . Judge not, if you're not ready for judgment. . The road of life is rocky and you may stumble too, . So while you talk about me, someone else is judging you.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: To banish imperfection is to destroy expression, to check exertion, to paralyze vitality.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: We are all wonderful, beautiful wrecks. That's what connects us--that we're all broken, all beautifully imperfect.
quotes.name: Emilio Estevez

quotes.message: Life is not always perfect. Like a road, it has many bends, ups and down, but that’s its beauty.
quotes.name: Amit Ray

quotes.message: Nothing and no one is perfect. It just takes a good eye to find those hidden imperfections.
quotes.name: Daphne Delacroix

quotes.message: No person is completely wicked, just as no person is perfect. We are all grey.
quotes.name: Sweety Shinde

quotes.message: We are all perfectly imperfect.
quotes.name: Muniba Mazari

quotes.message: I love this world because it is imperfect. It is imperfect, and that's why it is growing; if it was perfect it would have been dead.
quotes.name: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.message: Man will ever remain imperfect, and it will always be his part to try to be perfect.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Whilst we may attack measures and systems, we may not, must not, attack men. Imperfect ourselves, we must be tender toward others and be slow to impute motives.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: You come to love not by finding the perfect person, but by seeing an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.name: Sam Keen

quotes.message: Perfect solutions of our difficulties are not to be looked for in an imperfect world.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: I always find beauty in things that are odd and imperfect - they are much more interesting.
quotes.name: Marc Jacobs

quotes.message: It is not the perfect, but the imperfect, who have need of love.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: The mere existence of conscience, that faculty of which people prate so much nowadays, and are so ignorantly proud, is a sign of our imperfect development.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: If something is going to be flawed, why not have it be interestingly flawed, as opposed to borrowingly flawed?
quotes.name: Tim Burton

quotes.message: Every single one of us is loveable just the way we are; even with our flaws and blemishes. When we truly know that, we can stop disliking aspects of ourselves and embrace our imperfections. In fact, it is often because of these flaws that we are special and unique.
quotes.name: Allen Klein

quotes.message: Imperfection is in some sort essential to all that we know of life. Nothing that lives is or can be rigidly perfect.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: It is only imperfection that complains of what is imperfect. The more perfect we are, the more gentle and quiet we become toward the defects of others.
quotes.name: Francois Fenelon

quotes.message: We can be aware of an imperfection without making any problem about it. In other words, the mind becomes an embracing mind.
quotes.name: Josh Bartok

quotes.message: Imperfection means perfection hid.
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: Life does not have to be perfect to be wonderful.
quotes.name: Annette Funicello

quotes.message: I am imperfect and vulnerable but I am also brave and worthy of love and belonging.
quotes.name: Brené Brown

quotes.message: You are imperfect; permanently and inevitably flawed. And you are beautiful.
quotes.name: Amy Bloom

quotes.message: When we see someone or something as imperfect, it is a reflection of our limitations, not theirs.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Pray for my soul. More things are wrought by prayer Than this world dreams of: Wherefore, let they voice, Rise like a fountain for me night and day.
quotes.name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.message: Prayer is a strong wall and fortress of the church; it is a goodly Christian weapon.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Prayer has mighty power to move mountains because the Holy Spirit is ready both to encourage our praying and to remove the mountains hindering us.
quotes.name: Wesley L Duewel

quotes.message: Prayer is simply talking to God like a friend and should be the easiest thing we do each day.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: In prayer it is better to have a heart without words than words without a heart.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Heavenly citizenship and heavenly homesickness are in prayer. Prayer is an appeal from the lowness, from the emptiness, from the need of earth, to the highness, the fullness and to the all-sufficiency of heaven.
quotes.name: E.M. Bounds

quotes.message: We can be tired, weary, and emotionally distraught, but after spending time alone with God, we find that He injects into our bodies energy, power and strength.
quotes.name: Charles Stanley

quotes.message: Thank you' is the best prayer that anyone could say. I say that one a lot. Thank you expresses extreme gratitude, humility, understanding.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: Prayer is powerful. It can heal, prayer can give, and it can change lives.
quotes.name: Shane DeCreshio

quotes.message: For prayer is nothing else than being on terms of friendship with God.
quotes.name: Teresa of Avila

quotes.message: The prayer of the feeblest saint who lives in the Spirit and keeps right with God is a terror to Satan. The very powers of darkness are paralyzed by prayer; no spiritualistic seance can succeed in the presence of a humble praying saint. No wonder Satan tries to keep our minds fussy in active work till we cannot think in prayer.
quotes.name: Oswald Chambers

quotes.message: Prayer is one of the greatest assets that a Christian could possess, but sometimes it seems to be a real challenge to make it a full part of our devotional life.
quotes.name: Brian Johnston

quotes.message: Heavenly Father has given a simple pattern for us to receive the Holy Ghost not once but continually in the tumult of our daily lives. The pattern is repeated in the sacramental prayer: We promise that we will always remember the savior. We promise to take his name upon us. We promise to keep his commandments.
quotes.name: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.message: Prayer is the spirit speaking truth to Truth.
quotes.name: Philip James Bailey

quotes.message: Prayer is nothing but the breathing that out before the Lord, that was first breathed into us by the Spirit of the Lord.
quotes.name: Thomas Brooks

quotes.message: Prayer is to our relationship with our divine source what conversation is to our most intimate human relationships. Like water for a plant, it's a condition for growth.
quotes.name: Daniel Murphy

quotes.message: Prayer is the easiest and hardest of all things; the simplest and the sublimest; the weakest and the most powerful; its results lie outside the range of human possibilities they are limited only by the omnipotence of God.
quotes.name: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.message: To pray rightly, you must make God your hope, stay, and all. Right prayer sees nothing substantial or worth being concerned about except God.
quotes.name: John Bunyan

quotes.message: Prayer is a confession of one's own unworthiness and weakness.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Prayer is not a discourse. It is a form of life, the life with God. That is why it is not confined to the moment of verbal statement.
quotes.name: Jacques Ellul

quotes.message: Daily prayers to God should never be seen as a task. It should be a necessity in our life just as air is a necessity for us in order to breathe and live.
quotes.name: Oliver Powell

quotes.message: Prayer requires more of the heart than of the tongue.
quotes.name: Adam Clarke

quotes.message: Prayer does not change God, but it changes him who prays.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: To give thanks in solitude is enough. Thanksgiving has wings and goes where it must go. Your prayer knows much more about it than you do.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: We can take our questions, doubts, needs, dreams, and circumstances to the Lord in prayer, asking him to reveal the answers in Scripture.
quotes.name: Joel Patchen

quotes.message: Each time, before you intercede, be quiet first, and worship God in His glory. Think of what He can do, and how He delights to hear the prayers of His redeemed people.
quotes.name: Andrew Murray

quotes.message: Rather than set aside daily time for prayer, I pray constantly and spontaneously about everything I encounter on a daily basis. When someone shares something with me, I'll often simply say, 'let's pray about this right now.
quotes.name: Thomas Kinkade

quotes.message: Pray absolutely for those things you may pray for absolutely. Pray conditionally for those things you may pray for conditionally. For those things you can't pray for don't.
quotes.name: Paul Gerhardt

quotes.message: And from the prayer of Want, and plaint of Woe, O never, never turn away thine ear! Forlorn, in this bleak wilderness below, Ah! what were man, should Heaven refuse to hear!
quotes.name: James Beattie

quotes.message: Prayer is no fitful, short-lived thing. It is no voice crying unheard and unheeded in the silence. It is a voice which goes into God's ear, and it lives as long as God's ear is open to holy pleas, as long as God's heart is alive to holy things.
quotes.name: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.message: True prayer is not asking God for love; it is learning to love, and to include all mankind in one affection. Prayer is the utilization of the love where with He loves us.
quotes.name: Mary Baker Eddy

quotes.message: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: God shapes the world by prayer. The more praying there is in the world the better the world will be, the mightier the forces against evil.
quotes.name: E.M. Bounds

quotes.message: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
quotes.name: Meister Eckhart

quotes.message: Prayer lays hold of God's plan and becomes the link between His will and its accomplishment on earth. Amazing things happen, and we are given the privilege of being the channels of the Holy Spirit's prayer.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.message: Prayer is the forerunner of mercy. Turn to sacred history, and you will find that scarecely ever did a great mercy come to this world unheralded by supplication.
quotes.name: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.message: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men. Do not pray for tasks equal to your powers. Pray for powers equal to your tasks. Then the doing of your work shall be no miracle, but you shall be the miracle.
quotes.name: Phillips Brooks

quotes.message: No one is a firmer believer in the power of prayer than the devil; not that he practices it, but he suffers from it.
quotes.name: Guy H. King

quotes.message: Praying without ceasing is not ritualized, nor are there even words. It is a constant state of awareness of oneness with God; it is a sincere seeking for a good thing; and it is a concentration on the thing sought, with faith that it is obtainable.
quotes.name: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.message: I believe in prayer. It's the best way we have to draw strength from heaven.
quotes.name: Josephine Baker

quotes.message: Being light is turning the other cheek when you have been offended. Being light is not only publically forgiving a person that would choose to be your enemy, but it's also including your enemy in your prayers at night.
quotes.name: Matthew Robert Payne

quotes.message: God answers sharp and sudden on some prayers, And thrusts the thing we have prayed for in our face, A gauntlet with a gift in 't.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.message: Prayer is not only asking, but an attitude of mind which produces the atmosphere in which asking is perfectly natural.
quotes.name: Oswald Chambers

quotes.message: All vital praying makes a drain on a man's vitality. True intercession is a sacrifice, a bleeding sacrifice.
quotes.name: J.H. Jowett

quotes.message: Prayer is as natural an expression of faith as breathing is of life.
quotes.name: Jonathan Edwards

quotes.message: Our prayers are strengthened when we know God is listening and that he is faithful.
quotes.name: Dr. David Jeremiah

quotes.message: In my deepest, darkest moments, what really got me through was a prayer. Sometimes my prayer was 'Help me.' Sometimes a prayer was 'Thank you.' What I've discovered is that intimate connection and communication with my creator will always get me through because I know my support, my help, is just a prayer away.
quotes.name: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.message: We are not a victim of our emotions or thoughts. We can understand our triggers and use them as tools to help us respond more objectively.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Thornton

quotes.message: There are no victims, only volunteers.
quotes.name: Robert Anthony

quotes.message: We're all victims of our own hubris at times.
quotes.name: Kevin Spacey

quotes.message: Victims make excuses. Leaders deliver results.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: The victim of mind-manipulation does not know that he is a victim.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: You are a victim only when you have decided to play the part.
quotes.name: Gary Hopkins

quotes.message: Where victims see adversity, extreme achievers see opportunity.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: The worst kind of victim was the kind that was aware of nothing.
quotes.name: B. Barmanbek

quotes.message: The victim to too severe a law is considered as a martyr rather than a criminal.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: We're all victims of what life deals out. It's how we handle it that's important.
quotes.name: Nora Roberts

quotes.message: We were not the victims of ancestor worship. We had the benefits of a fresh start.
quotes.name: Matthew D. Miller

quotes.message: You can't play the role of a victim all your life without becoming one in the end.
quotes.name: Danilo Kis

quotes.message: We become victims of the great disease of technological society - meaninglessness.
quotes.name: Doris Janzen Longacre

quotes.message: We are not victims of the world we see, we are victims of the way we see the world.
quotes.name: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.message: You are not a helpless victim of your own thoughts, but rather a master of your own mind.
quotes.name: Louise Hay

quotes.message: What hurts the victim most is not the cruelty of the oppressor, but the silence of the bystander.
quotes.name: Elie Wiesel

quotes.message: The real victim of bigotry is the white man who hides his weakness under his myth of superiority.
quotes.name: James A. Baldwin

quotes.message: You become the victim of the past, and your tormentor today is your self left over from yesterday.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: We are all victims of the violence that animals suffer... their liberation is also our liberation.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: You are not a victim of your circumstance.Stay determine to endure hard times. No situation is permanent.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Victims of oppression & injustice don't need our spasm of passion....they need our legs & lungs of endurance.
quotes.name: Gary Haugen

quotes.message: One victim lives in tragedy, another victim stops to stare, and still another walks on by pretending not to see
quotes.name: Bob Seger

quotes.message: Don't become a victim of yourself.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Once trapped in the belief that you are a victim, you surrender your birthright to compete for the prizes of life.
quotes.name: James Cook

quotes.message: The victims of crime have been transformed into a group oppressively burdened by a system designed to protect them.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: It is true that a victim who fights back may suffer for it, but one who does not almost certainly will suffer for it.
quotes.name: Jeff Cooper

quotes.message: As victims of hurt, we frequently don't bring up what ails us, because so many wounds look absurd in the light of day.
quotes.name: Alain De Botton

quotes.message: We are all both victims and victimizers. Just as everyone suffers, no one is innocent of causing suffering themselves.
quotes.name: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.message: We don't have to be victims of our past, that we can let go of our bitterness, and that all of us can achieve greatness.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: The victim who is able to articulate the situation of the victim has ceased to be a victim: he or she has become a threat.
quotes.name: James A. Baldwin

quotes.message: We are the victims of the world's most comprehensive robbery. Life demands a balance. It's all right if we do a little robbing now.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Definition of a victim: a person to whom life happens.
quotes.name: Peter McWilliams

quotes.message: We are all victims of culture.
quotes.name: Jacque Fresco

quotes.message: Becoming a victim is your choice.
quotes.name: Rajashree Choudhury

quotes.message: You are a victim of the rules you live by.
quotes.name: Jenny Holzer

quotes.message: We are only victims if we allow ourselves to be.
quotes.name: McCartney Green

quotes.message: A victim of your own greed..wallowing in the muck of avarice.
quotes.name: Jake Roberts

quotes.message: If you act like a victim, you are likely to be treated as one.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: How could I pretend to be a victim when I was so willing to sin?
quotes.name: Emily M. Danforth

quotes.message: Do not be victim of life-negative religions. Be respectful to life, love and beauty.
quotes.name: Amit Ray

quotes.message: No woman has to be a victim of physical abuse. Women have to feel like they are not alone.
quotes.name: Salma Hayek

quotes.message: All victims have experienced a loss-a thwarted desire or aspiration-even if they're not aware of it.
quotes.name: David Emerald Womeldorff

quotes.message: Being a victim is almost as easy as being a liberal. It's one of the most gutless choices you could make.
quotes.name: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.message: Victims suggest innocence. And innocence, by the inexorable logic that governs all relational terms, suggests guilt.
quotes.name: Susan Sontag

quotes.message: If you're a victim, you're not happy. You can't be happy. It's impossible to be happy. It's even difficult to be content.
quotes.name: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.message: No victim wants their record, or their minor story to be told. Every victim should have the right to tell their own story.
quotes.name: Jim Bob Duggar

quotes.message: Lies require commitment.
quotes.name: Veronica Roth

quotes.message: If you tell a big enough lie and tell it frequently enough, it will be believed.
quotes.name: Adolf Hitler
