quotes.message: Things come apart so easily when they have been held together with lies.
quotes.name: Dorothy Allison

quotes.message: Man is not what he thinks he is, he is what he hides.
quotes.name: Andr_ Malraux

quotes.message: A lie can travel halfway around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Every violation of truth is not only a sort of suicide in the liar, but is a stab at the health of human society.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: False words are not only evil in themselves, but they infect the soul with evil.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: He who permits himself to tell a lie once, finds it much easier to do it a second and a third time till at length it becomes habitual.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: There is nothing in the world more shameful than establishing one's self on lies and fables.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: A lie with a purpose is one of the worst kind, and the most profitable.
quotes.name: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.message: Lying increases the creative faculties, expands the ego, lessens the friction of social contacts. It is only in lies, wholeheartedly and bravely told, that human nature attains through words and speech the forbearance, the nobility, the romance, the idealism, that -- being what it is -- it falls so short of in fact and in deed.
quotes.name: Clare Boothe Luce

quotes.message: I detest the man who hides one thing in the depth of his heart and speaks forth another.
quotes.name: Homer

quotes.message: With lies you may go ahead in the world, but you can never go back.
quotes.name: Russian Proverb

quotes.message: The least initial deviation from the truth is multiplied later a thousandfold.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: A lie has speed, but truth has endurance.
quotes.name: Edgar J. Mohn

quotes.message: We tell lies when we are afraid... afraid of what we don't know, afraid of what others will think, afraid of what will be found out about us. But every time we tell a lie, the thing that we fear grows stronger.
quotes.name: Tad Williams

quotes.message: When you tell a lie, you steal someone's right to the truth.
quotes.name: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.message: A single lie destroys a whole reputation of integrity.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: A lie does not consist in the indirect position of words, but in the desire and intention, by false speaking, to deceive and injure your neighbour.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: By a lie, a man...annihilates his dignity as a man.
quotes.name: Immanuel Kant

quotes.message: We lie loudest when we lie to ourselves.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: He who permits himself to tell a lie once, finds it much easier to do it a second and a third time till at length it becomes habitual.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: A successful lie cannot be brought into this world and capriciously abandoned; like any committed relationship, it must be maintained, and with far more devotion than the truth, which carries on being carelessly true without any help.
quotes.name: Lionel Shriver

quotes.message: People do not believe lies because they have to, but because they want to.
quotes.name: Malcolm Muggeridge

quotes.message: A lie never lives to be old.
quotes.name: Sophocles quotes

quotes.message: The more you defend a lie, the angrier you become.
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: Because everybody lies. It's part of living in society. Don't get me wrong - I think it's necessary. The last thing anyone wants is to live in a society where total honesty prevails. Can you imagine the conversations? You're short and fat, one person might say, and the other might answer, I know. But you smell bad. It just wouldn't work. So people lie by omission all the time. People will tell you most of the story...and I've learned that the part they neglect to tell you is often the most important part. People hide the truth because they're afraid.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: A lie will easily get you out of a scrape, and yet, strangely and beautifully, rapture possesses you when you have taken the scrape and left out the lie.
quotes.name: C. E. Montague

quotes.message: Falsehood is so easy, truth so difficult....Examine your words well, and you will find that even when you have no motive to be false, it is a very hard thing to say the exact truth, even about your own immediate feelings -- much harder than to say something fine about them which is_not_the exact truth.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Falsehoods not only disagree with truths, but usually quarrel among themselves.
quotes.name: Daniel Webster

quotes.message: The only form of lying that is absolutely beyond reproach is Iying for its own sake.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Falsehood is never so successful as when she baits her hook with truth, and no opinions so fatally mislead us as those that are not wholly wrong, as no watches so effectively deceive the wearer as those that are sometimes right.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: He who has not a good memory should never take upon him the trade of lying.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: It is a double pleasure to deceive the deceiver.
quotes.name: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.message: Lord, Lord, how this world is given to lying!
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: I do not mind lying, but I hate inaccuracy.
quotes.name: Joseph Butler

quotes.message: Though leaves are many, the root is one; . Through all the lying days of my youth . I swayed my leaves and flowers in the sun; . Now I may wither into the truth.
quotes.name: William Butler Yeats

quotes.message: Truth, like light, blinds. Falsehood, on the contrary, is a beautiful twilight that enhances every object.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Deception is not as creative as truth. We do best in life if we look at it with clear eyes, and I think that applies to coming up to death as well.
quotes.name: Cicely Saunders

quotes.message: I count false words the foulest plague of all.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: To lie a little is not possible; whoever lies, lies a whole lie.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: The most common lie is that which one lies to himself; lying to others is relatively an exception.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: It reminds me of the small boy who jumbled his biblical quotations and said: A lie is an abomination unto the Lord, and a very present help in trouble.
quotes.name: Adlai Stevenson

quotes.message: She tells enough white lies to ice a wedding cake.
quotes.name: Margot Asquith

quotes.message: Matilda told such Dreadful Lies, . It made one Gasp and Stretch one’s Eyes; . Her Aunt, who, from her Earliest Youth, . Had kept a Strict Regard for Truth, . Attempted to Believe Matilda: . The effort very nearly killed her.
quotes.name: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.message: Telling lies is a bit like tiling bathrooms—if you don’t know how to do it properly, it’s best not to try.
quotes.name: Tom Holt

quotes.message: A little inaccuracy sometimes saves tons of explanation.
quotes.name: Saki

quotes.message: O what a tangled web we weave, .
quotes.name: Walter Scott

quotes.message: Without lies humanity would perish of despair and boredom.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: There are three kinds of lies: lies, damned lies and statistics.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Whoever would lie usefully should lie seldom.
quotes.name: Lord Hervey

quotes.message: The retort courteous…the quip modest…the reply churlish…the reproof valiant…the countercheck quarrelsome…the lie circumstantial…the lie direct.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: If you want truth to go round the world you must hire an express train to pull it; but if you want a lie to go round the world, it will fly: it is as light as a feather, and a breath will carry it. It is well said in the old proverb, ‘a lie will go round the world while truth is pulling its boots on.
quotes.name: C.H. Spurgeon

quotes.message: The cruellest lies are often told in silence.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: One of the most striking differences between a cat and a lie is that a cat has only nine lives.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Great is the power of steady misrepresentation.
quotes.name: Charles Darwin

quotes.message: A deception that elevates us is dearer than a host of low truths.
quotes.name: Alexander Pushkin

quotes.message: Surely to tell these tall tales and others like them would be to speed the myth, the wicked lie, that the past is always tense and the future, perfect.
quotes.name: Zadie Smith

quotes.message: In human relations kindness and lies are worth a thousand truths.
quotes.name: Graham Greene

quotes.message: Can we devise one of those lies—the kind which crop up as the occasion demands, which we were talking about not so long ago—so that with a single noble lie we can indoctrinate the rulers themselves, preferably, but at least the rest of the community?
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: There is no worse lie than a truth misunderstood by those who hear it.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: The Social Contract is nothing more or less than a vast conspiracy of human beings to lie to and humbug themselves and one another for the general Good. Lies are the mortar that bind the savage individual man into the social masonry.
quotes.name: H.G. Wells

quotes.message: Died some, pro patria, . non ‘dulce’ non ‘et decor’… . walked eye-deep in hell . believing in old men's lies, the unbelieving .
quotes.name: Ezra Pound

quotes.message: Anyone who tells a lie has not a pure heart, and cannot make a good soup.
quotes.name: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.message: From all that terror teaches, . From lies of tongue and pen, . From all the easy speeches . That comfort cruel men, . From sale and profanation . Of honour and the sword, . From sleep and from damnation, .
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: If I ever said in grief or pride. I tired of honest things. I lied.
quotes.name: Edna Saint Vincent Millay

quotes.message: You cannot weave truth on a loom of lies.
quotes.name: Suzette Haden Elgin

quotes.message: So often the truth is told with hate, and lies are told with love.
quotes.name: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.message: The man who fears no truths has nothing to fear from lies.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Never believe anything a writer tells you about himself. A man comes to believe in the end the lies he tells himself about himself.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: The trouble with lying and deceiving is that their efficiency depends entirely upon a dear notion of the truth that the liar and deceiver wishes to hide.
quotes.name: Hannah Arendt

quotes.message: Hurt me with the truth. Don’t comfort me with a lie.
quotes.name: Rihanna

quotes.message: From long journeys long lies.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: If lies are to find credence, they must be patched with truth.
quotes.name: Danish Proverb

quotes.message: Lies and gossip have a wretched offspring.
quotes.name: Danish Proverb

quotes.message: Lies and Latin go round the world.
quotes.name: Danish Proverb

quotes.message: Lies have short legs and are soon overtaken.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: Lies have short wings.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Lies melt the snow.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Lies that build are better than truths that destroy.
quotes.name: West African Proverb

quotes.message: Rabbits and lies easily multiply.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: No man understands dishonesty better than the abbot who has been a monk.
quotes.name: French Proverb

quotes.message: Honesty brings success, dishonesty defeats itself.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: But liars we can never trust, . Even when they say what is true. . And he who does one fault at first . And lies to hide it, makes it two.
quotes.name: Isaac Watts

quotes.message: Sometimes I lie. . I'm a good storyteller, though I know not why .
quotes.name: Maria Anderson

quotes.message: This is not lying. This is creative reasoning.
quotes.name: Wayne Malloy

quotes.message: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: Fight till the last gasp.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: You can't be brave if you've only had wonderful things happen to you.
quotes.name: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.message: When their adventures do not succeed, however, they run away; but it was the mark of a brave man to face things that are, and seem, terrible for a man, because it is noble to do so and disgraceful not to do so.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Bravery has no place where it can avail nothing.
quotes.name: Dr Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Brave men are all vertebrates; they have their softness on the surface and their toughness in the middle.
quotes.name: G K Chesterton

quotes.message: It is easy to be brave from a safe distance.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: A brave man struggling in the storms of fate, And greatly falling with a falling state.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: The pressure of adversity does not affect the mind of the brave man. . . . It is more powerful than external circumstances.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Fortune and love favor the brave.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: We could never learn to be brave and patient if there were only joy in the world.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: The pressure of adversity does not affect the mind of the brave man. . . . It is more powerful than external circumstances.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: Well, I went through some emotionally abusive relationships and allowed myself to not be properly respected as a lady, as a human being even, though I tried everything I knew to be a lady.
quotes.name: Gloria Gaynor

quotes.message: The results of any traumatic experience, such as abuse, can only be resolved by experiencing, articulating, and judging every facet of the original experience within a process of careful therapeutic disclosure.
quotes.name: Alice Miller

quotes.message: The scars you can't see are the hardest to heal.
quotes.name: Astrid Alauda

quotes.message: Poisonous relationships can alter our perception. You can spend many years thinking you're worthless... but you're not worthless, you're unappreciated.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Family is supposed to be our safe haven. Very often, it's the place where we find the deepest heartache.
quotes.name: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.message: Screaming at children over their grades, especially to the point of the child's tears, is child abuse, pure and simple. It's not funny and it's not good parenting. It is a crushing, scarring, disastrous experience for the child. It isn't the least bit funny.
quotes.name: Ben Stein

quotes.message: There are far too many silent sufferers. Not because they don't yearn to reach out, but because they've tried and found no one who cares.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: The greater the power, the more dangerous the abuse.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: Domestic abuse happens only in intimate, interdependent, long-term relationships - in other words, in families - the last place we would want or expect to find violence.
quotes.name: Leslie Morgan Steiner

quotes.message: The abuse dies in a day, but the denial slays the life of the people, and entombs the hope of the race.
quotes.name: Charles Bradlaugh

quotes.message: I think anybody who has been abused as a kid - and I was abused as a kid, by various people - will say it's irrational because violence is irrational.
quotes.name: Samantha Morton

quotes.message: Abuse if you slight it, will gradually die away; but if you show yourself irritated, you will be thought to have deserved it.
quotes.name: Tacitus

quotes.message: We should meet abuse by forbearance. Human nature is so constituted that if we take absolutely no notice of anger or abuse, the person indulging in it will soon weary of it and stop.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: There are more people abusive to others than lie open to abuse themselves; but the humor goes round, and he that laughs at me to-day will have somebody to laugh at him to-morrow.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Abuse is the means in which violence retards love.
quotes.name: Inga Muscio

quotes.message: You survived the abuse. You're going to survive the recovery.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Bullies may be the perpetrators of evil, but it is the evil of passivity of all those who know what is happening and never intervene that perpetuates such abuse.
quotes.name: Philip Zimbardo

quotes.message: Abuse of words has been the great instrument of sophistry and chicanery, of party, faction, and division of society.
quotes.name: John Adams

quotes.message: Some of the world's most appalling abuses have been justified by religion because it is possible for people to find vindication in their scriptures for any of their prejudices.
quotes.name: Zac Goldsmith

quotes.message: So many people suffer from abuse, and suffer alone.
quotes.name: Pamela Stephenson

quotes.message: I think that most minorities have experienced some form of racial abuse.
quotes.name: Lynn Swann

quotes.message: Every abuse ought to be reformed, unless the reform is more dangerous than the abuse itself.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Do you never look at yourself when you abuse another person?
quotes.name: Plautus

quotes.message: It is impossible to correct abuses unless we know that they're going on.
quotes.name: Julian Assange

quotes.message: The biggest abuses in society happen when people are not able to communicate and not able to connect.
quotes.name: Heather Brooke

quotes.message: Not all wounds are visible.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Emotional abuse is a major epidemic in our culture.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: Emotional abuse is the least understood form of abuse.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: Ultimately, given enough time, most victim of emotional abuse come not only to blame themselves for all the problems in the relationship come not only to blame themselves for all the problems in the relationship but also to believe that they are inadequate, contemptuous, and even unlovable.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: Emotional abuse is considered by many to be the most painful form of violence and the most detrimental to self-esteem.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: Emotional abuse cuts to the very core of a person, creating scars that may be longer lasting than physical ones.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: With emotional abuse, the insults, insinuations, crtiticism, and accusations slowly eat away at the victim's self-esteem until he or she is incapable of judging a situation realistically.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: Emotional abuse poisons a relationship and infuses it with hostility, contempt, and hatred,
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: No matter how much a couple once loved each other, once emotional abuse becomes a consistent aspect of the relationship, that love is overshadowed by fear, anger, guilt, and shame.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: At the very least, emotional abuse causes both abuser and the victim to lose sight of any redeeming qualities his or her partner once had.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: The disrespect and hatred each partner begins to feel leads to more and more emotional abuse and to each partner justifying inappropriate, even destructive, behavior.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: Over time, anger can build up on the part of both abuser and victim, and emotional abuse can turn into physical violence.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: When emotional abuse is mutual, it becomes a matter of survival, as each partner has to constantly fend off criticism, verbal attacks, or rejection and shore up enough strength to go on with daily tasks.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: As the emotional abuse takes its toll and each partner becomes less and less self-assured, each clings to the relationship even more.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: No one wants to have to face the fact that he or she has lost control in this way and that his or her actions and.or words have caused his or her partner emotional damage.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: The insidiousness and power of emotional abuse paralleled the invisibility, strength, and purpose of a spider's web.
quotes.name: Jess Hill

quotes.message: What is going on in our relationship is domestic violence, and the type of violence that I'm using on you is called emotional abuse, which means I don't bash you with my fists, I bash you with my emotions, to keep you under control
quotes.name: Jess Hill

quotes.message: The scars from mental cruelty can be as deep and long-lasting as wounds from punches or slaps but are often not as obvious. In fact, even among women who have experienced violence from a partner, half or more report that the man’s emotional abuse is what is causing them the greatest harm.
quotes.name: Lundy Bancroft

quotes.message: It is not the bruises on the body that hurt. It is the wounds of the heart and the scars on the mind.
quotes.name: Aisha Mirza

quotes.message: Intimidation, even if it appears unintentional, is a sign that emotional abuse is on the way - or has already begun - and is a warning flag that physical violence may eventually follow.
quotes.name: Lundy Bancroft

quotes.message: The damage and invisible scars of emotional abuse are very difficult to heal, because memories are imprinted on our minds and hearts and it takes time to be restored. Imprints of past traumas do not mean a person cannot change their future beliefs and behaviors. as people, we do not easily forget. However, as we heal, grieve, and let go, we become clear-minded and focused to live restore and emotionally healthy.
quotes.name: Dee Brown

quotes.message: Emotional abuse is extensive in our culture, and faith-based communities are no exception.
quotes.name: Dee Brown

quotes.message: Emotional abuse is a nonphysical behavior or attitude that controls, demeans, punishes or isolates a person
quotes.name: Dee Brown

quotes.message: In emotionally abusive relationships there is a determined intent to formulate statements or actions which leave a person feeling awful.
quotes.name: Dee Brown

quotes.message: Emotional abuse is designed to undermine another's a sense of self. It is deliberate humiliation, with the intent to seize control of how others feel about themselves.
quotes.name: Lorraine Nilon

quotes.message: Get pissed because you deserve more than this abuse. Emotional abuse is the gateway to all abuse.
quotes.name: Tracy Malone

quotes.message: Words are singularly the most powerful force available to humanity. We can choose to use this force constructively with words of encouragement, or destructively using words of despair. Words have energy and power with the ability to help, to heal, to hinder, to hurt, to harm, to humiliate and to humble.
quotes.name: Yehuda Berg

quotes.message: Think twice before you speak, because your words and influence will plant the seed of either success or failure in the mind of another.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Of all sad words of tongue or pen, the saddest are these, 'It might have been.
quotes.name: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.message: Words are, of course, the most powerful drug used by mankind.
quotes.name: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.message: Words can be like X-rays if you use them properly -- they'll go through anything. You read and you're pierced.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: We are masters of the unsaid words, but slaves of those we let slip out.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: A vocabulary of truth and simplicity will be of service throughout your life.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: But if thought corrupts language, language can also corrupt thought.
quotes.name: George Orwell

quotes.message: If you wish to know the mind of a man, listen to his words.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: All our words from loose using have lost their edge.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: You have it easily in your power to increase the sum total of this world's happiness now. How? By giving a few words of sincere appreciation to someone who is lonely or discouraged. Perhaps you will forget tomorrow the kind words you say today, but the recipient may cherish them over a lifetime.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: All our words are but crumbs that fall down from the feast of the mind.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: 'As we must account for every idle word, so must we account for every idle silence.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Colors fade, temples crumble, empires fall, but wise words endure.
quotes.name: Edward Thorndike

quotes.message: Oaths are but words, and words but wind.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: Words are only painted fire; a look is the fire itself.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Words travel as swiftly as desire, so it is possible to send a message of love without them.
quotes.name: Laura Esquivel

quotes.message: A blow with a word strikes deeper than a blow with a sword.
quotes.name: Robert Burton

quotes.message: A powerful agent is the right word. Whenever we come upon one of those intensely right words... the resulting effect is physical as well as spiritual, and electrically prompt.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: A thousand words will not leave so deep an impression as one deed.
quotes.name: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.message: One great use of words is to hide our thoughts.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Words so innocent and powerless as they are, as standing in a dictionary, how potent for good and evil they become in the hands of one who knows how to combine them.
quotes.name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.message: So difficult it is to show the various meanings and imperfections of words when we have nothing else but words to do it with.
quotes.name: John Locke

quotes.message: One of the hardest things in life is having words in your heart that you can't utter.
quotes.name: James Earl Jones

quotes.message: The right word may be effective, but no word was ever as effective as a rightly timed pause.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Words may show a man's wit, but actions his meaning.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Words are pegs to hang ideas on.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Our words have wings, but fly not where we would.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: A word is not a crystal, transparent and unchanged, it is the skin of a living thought and may vary greatly in color and content according to the circumstances and the time in which it is used.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.message: Love is a vessel that contains both security and adventure, and commitment offers one of the great luxuries of life: time. Marriage is not the end of romance, it is the beginning.
quotes.name: Esther Perel

quotes.message: A strong marriage is one in which both people understand that the other person needs to have outside interests and activities which help them to feel happy and fulfilled. A strong marriage is one where both people understand that it is more important to be happy than it is to be right.
quotes.name: Joe Amoia

quotes.message: In every marriage more than a week old, there are grounds for divorce. The trick is to find, and continue to find, grounds for marriage.
quotes.name: Robert Anderson

quotes.message: Ultimately the bond of all companionship, whether in marriage or in friendship, is conversation.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Every marriage tends to consist of an aristocrat and a peasant. Of a teacher and a learner.
quotes.name: John Updike

quotes.message: Do everything you can to support your partner's well-being, and respect your partner as you would your best friend.
quotes.name: John Gerson

quotes.message: When you give each other everything, it becomes an even trade. Each wins all.
quotes.name: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.message: Marriage is like putting your hand into a bag of snakes in the hope of pulling out an eel.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: Marriage is not about age; it's about finding the right person.
quotes.name: Sophia Bush

quotes.message: Marriage is the highest state of friendship. If happy, it lessens our cares by dividing them, at the same time that it doubles our pleasures by mutual participation.
quotes.name: Samuel Richardson

quotes.message: Marriage is for the mature, not the infantile. The fusion of two different personalities requires emotional balance and control on the part of each person.
quotes.name: Archie Lee

quotes.message: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: Compatibility doesn't determine the fate of a marriage, how you deal with the incompatibilities, does.
quotes.name: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.message: More marriages might survive if the partners realized that sometimes the better comes after the worse.
quotes.name: Doug Larson

quotes.message: Happily ever after is not a fairy tale. It's a choice.
quotes.name: Fawn Weaver

quotes.message: Make a list of three of the happiest moments in your marriage. Spend a few minutes each day briefly reliving those moments in your mind. The results will amaze you.
quotes.name: Lucia

quotes.message: There is no greater happiness for a man than approaching a door at the end of a day knowing someone on the other side of that door is waiting for the sound of his footsteps.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Marriage: a ceremony in which rings are put on the finger of the lady and through the nose of the gentleman.
quotes.name: Herbert Spencer

quotes.message: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: A happy marriage is the union of two good forgivers.
quotes.name: Ruth Graham

quotes.message: Marriage is neither heaven nor hell, it is simply purgatory.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: When you make the sacrifice in marriage, you're sacrificing not to each other but to unity in a relationship.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: Treat marriage like a diamond necklace; if broken, fix it, but do not throw it away.
quotes.name: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.message: It is better to get married with the mindset that you are going to give rather than get.
quotes.name: Paul Silway

quotes.message: We come to love not by finding a perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.name: Sam Keen

quotes.message: A wedding is a party, not a performance. If at the end of the day, you are married to the one you love, then everything went perfectly.
quotes.name: David Tutera

quotes.message: All married couples should learn the art of battle as they should learn the art of making love. Good battle is objective and honest never vicious or cruel. Good battle is healthy and constructive, and brings to a marriage the principles of equal partnership.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: Marriage is a lot like a roller coaster. You have extreme highs and you can have some pretty extreme lows, but the ride is worth it.
quotes.name: Teresa Collins

quotes.message: Marriage is not consist upon happiness, it consists upon accountability, before considering the happiness, think about the accountability.
quotes.name: Kamaran Ihsan Salih

quotes.message: In marriage, God rarely starts with the issues on the table. He starts with the ones in our hearts.
quotes.name: Ngina Otiende

quotes.message: Marriages are like fingerprints; each one is different and each one is beautiful.
quotes.name: Maggie Reyes

quotes.message: On your wedding day, remember you can't buy happiness but a luxury home and a few sports cars on the driveway could help!
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: A marriage is a solemn affair. The tempest of emotions and the myriad of arrangements are giddying, and when one is faced with these, clothing seems to be the last of one's priorities.
quotes.name: Daphne Guinness

quotes.message: Getting married is a lot like getting into a tub of hot water. After you get used to it, it ain't so hot.
quotes.name: Minnie Pearl

quotes.message: Never marry a person who is not a friend of your excitement.
quotes.name: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.message: One should believe in marriage as in the immortality of the soul.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: To keep your marriage brimming, with love in the loving cup. Whenever you're wrong, admit it. Whenever you're right, shut up.
quotes.name: Ogden Nash

quotes.message: Marriage is miserable unless you find the right person that is your soulmate and that takes a lot of looking.
quotes.name: Marvin Gaye

quotes.message: When marrying, ask yourself this question: Do you believe that you will be able to converse well with this person into your old age? Everything else in marriage is transitory.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Marriage is the perfection which love aimed at, ignorant of what it sought.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: All weddings are similar, but every marriage is different.
quotes.name: John Berger

quotes.message: There are four stages in a marriage. First there's the affair, then the marriage, then children and finally the fourth stage, without which you cannot know a woman, the divorce.
quotes.name: Norman Mailer

quotes.message: Determine that there will never be anything that will come between you that will disrupt your marriage. Make it work. Resolve to make it work.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: Marriage is not a competition. Marriage is completion of two souls.
quotes.name: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.message: The greatest marriages are built on teamwork. A mutual respect, a healthy dose of admiration, and a never-ending portion of love and grace.
quotes.name: Fawn Weaver

quotes.message: It takes two to make a marriage a success and only one to make it a failure.
quotes.name: Herbert Samuel

quotes.message: Marriage is give and take. You'd better give it to her or she'll take it anyway.
quotes.name: Joey Adams

quotes.message: Thing about marriage i've learned over the years? Just make your partner happy.
quotes.name: Eden Butler

quotes.message: I chose my wife, as she did her wedding gown, for qualities that would wear well.
quotes.name: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.message: Any marriage that survives a big wedding can probably survive.
quotes.name: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.message: Happiness in marriage is entirely a matter of chance.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: The best way to get most husbands to do something is to suggest that perhaps they're too old to do it.
quotes.name: Anne Bancroft

quotes.message: The curse which lies upon marriage is that too often the individuals are joined in their weakness rather than in their strength—each asking from the other instead of finding pleasure in giving.
quotes.name: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.message: My wife and I have a perfect understanding. I don't try to run her life, and I don’t try to run mine.
quotes.name: Milton Berle

quotes.message: My husband and I have never considered divorce. Murder, sometimes, but never divorce.
quotes.name: Dr. Joyce Brothers

quotes.message: Even hooligans marry, though they know that marriage is but for a little while. It is alimony that is forever.
quotes.name: Quentin Crisp

quotes.message: The value of marriage is not that adults produce children but that children produce adults.
quotes.name: Peter De Vries

quotes.message: Marriage is the greatest earthly happiness when founded on complete sympathy.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Make sure you never, never argue at night. You just lose a good night’s sleep, and you can’t settle anything until morning anyway.
quotes.name: Rose Kennedy

quotes.message: My whole working philosophy is that the only stable happiness for mankind is that it shall live married in blessed union to woman kind—intimacy, physical and psychical, between a man and his wife. I wish to add that my state of bliss is by no means perfect.
quotes.name: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.message: There is one thing I would break up over, and that is if she caught me with another woman. I won’t stand for that.
quotes.name: Steve Martin

quotes.message: A successful marriage is an edifice that must be rebuilt every day.
quotes.name: Andre Maurois

quotes.message: The best friend is likely to acquire the best wife, because a good marriage is based on the talent for friendship.
quotes.name: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.message: A good marriage is that in which each appoints the other the guardian of his solitude, and shows him this confidence, the greatest in his power to bestow.
quotes.name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.message: By all means marry. If you get a good wife, you’ll be happy. If you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Don’t marry a man to reform him—that’s what reform schools are for.
quotes.name: Mae West

quotes.message: The very essence of romance is uncertainty. If I ever marry, I’ll try to forget the fact.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Marriage, if one will face the truth, is an evil, but a necessary evil.
quotes.name: Menander

quotes.message: Marriages are made in heaven and consummated on earth.
quotes.name: John Lyly

quotes.message: Deceive not thyself by overexpecting happiness in the married estate. . . . Remember the nightingales which sing only some months in the spring, but commonly are silent when they have hatched their eggs.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: A man’s mother is his misfortune, but his wife is his fault.
quotes.name: Walter Bagehot

quotes.message: If you want to know about a man you can find out an awful lot by looking at who he married.
quotes.name: Kirk Douglas

quotes.message: It’s pretty easy. Just say 'I do’ whenever anyone asks you a question.
quotes.name: Richard Curtis

quotes.message: Only two things are necessary to keep one’s wife happy. One is to let her think she is having her own way, and the other, to let her have it.
quotes.name: Lyndon Baines Johnson

quotes.message: Twenty years of romance make a woman look like a ruin; but twenty years of marriage make her something like a public building.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: A woman seldom asks advice before she has bought her wedding clothes.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Like everything which is not the involuntary result of fleeting emotion but the creation of time and will, any marriage, happy or unhappy, is infinitely more interesting than any romance, however passionate
quotes.name: W. H. Auden

quotes.message: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: Marriage is a wonderful invention; but, then again, so is a bicycle repair kit
quotes.name: Billy Connolly

quotes.message: Most marriages don't add two people together.
quotes.name: Ian Fleming

quotes.message: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The problem with marriage is that it ends every night after making love, and it must be rebuilt every morning before breakfast.
quotes.name: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.message: Always remember that the most important thing in a good marriage is not happiness, but stability.
quotes.name: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.message: A happy marriage is a long conversation that always seems too short.
quotes.name: Andre Maurois

quotes.message: The great secret of a successful marriage is to treat all disasters as incidents and none of the incidents as disasters.
quotes.name: Harold Nicolson

quotes.message: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads which sew people together through the years.
quotes.name: Simone Signoret

quotes.message: As soon as you say 'I do,' you'll discover that marriage is like a car. Both of you might be sitting in the front seat, but only one of you is driving. And most marriages are more like a motorcycle than a car. Somebody has to sit in the back, and you have to yell just to be heard.
quotes.name: Wanda Sykes

quotes.message: Jealousy in romance is like salt in food. A little can enhance the savor, but too much can spoil the pleasure and, under certain circumstances, can be life-threatening.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Marriage must constantly fight against a monster which devours everything: routine.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: In a happy marriage, it is the wife who provides the climate, the husband the landscape.
quotes.name: Gerald Brenan

quotes.message: The best of all possible marriages is a seesaw in which first one, then the other partner is dominant.
quotes.name: Dr. Joyce Brothers

quotes.message: Marrying a man is like buying something you’ve been admiring for a long time in a shop window. You may love it when you get it home, but it doesn’t always go with everything else in the house.

quotes.message: Marriage is very difficult. Marriage is like a five-thousand-piece jigsaw puzzle, all sky.
quotes.name: Cathy Ladman

quotes.message: In every house of marriage there's room tor an interpreter.
quotes.name: Stanley Kunitz

quotes.message: In a successful marriage, there is no such thing as one's way.
quotes.name: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.message: Marriage is three parts love and seven parts forgiveness of sins.
quotes.name: Langdon Mitchell

quotes.message: A good relationship has a pattern like a dance and is built on some of the same rules. The partners do not need to hold on tightly, because they move confidently in the same pattern.
quotes.name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.message: No man and woman really know what perfect love is until they have been married a quarter of a century.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: At American weddings, the quality of the food is inversely proportional to the social position of the bride and groom.
quotes.name: Calvin Trillin

quotes.message: Marriage: A master, a mistress and two slaves, making in all, two.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: A man in love is incomplete until he is married. Then he is finished.
quotes.name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.message: One should never know too precisely whom one has married.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: A good marriage is not 'made in heaven,' but on earth. Love is a fragile commodity which needs to be cultivated and nourished constantly.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: The only really sound marriages are those based on mutual respect.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: My wife often said that 'a good marriage consists of two good forgivers.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Gardens don’t grow by themselves; they need to be tended and cultivated and weeded. The same is true of a marriage.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Before you marry, beware; for it is a hard knot to untie.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: Before you marry, have a house to live in, fields to till, and vines to cut.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: Before you marry, make sure you know whom you are going to divorce.
quotes.name: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.message: Never get married in the morning - you never know who you might meet that night.
quotes.name: Paul Hornung

quotes.message: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
quotes.name: Paul Sweeney

quotes.message: We've all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That's who we really are.
quotes.name: J.K. Rowling

quotes.message: Don't let life discourage you; everyone who got where he is had to begin where he was.
quotes.name: Richard L. Evans

quotes.message: Thousands of successful people did not achieve success on their first try, but they were not discouraged. They picked themselves up and went back at it with an even stronger, single minded tenacity to achieve their goal.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Do not be discouraged if your plans do not succeed the first time. No one learns to walk by taking only one step.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.name: Booker T. Washington

quotes.message: Discouragement is root of distress.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Every wrong attempt discarded is another step forward.
quotes.name: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.message: When things are a disappointment, try not to be so discouraged.
quotes.name: Carol Burnett

quotes.message: Don't get discouraged, and think positive all the time. Don't get down on yourself if you lose out a couple of times. It's just a lot of hard work.
quotes.name: Larisa Oleynik

quotes.message: Discouragement comes when things are going great, and it comes when we are already down, but no matter when it comes, it hurts

quotes.message: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Don't worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don't even try.
quotes.name: Jack Canfield

quotes.message: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: You can be discouraged by failure, or you can learn from it. So go ahead and make mistakes, make all you can. Because, remember that's where you'll find success - on the far side of failure.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.message: Don't let people discourage you from living your dreams.
quotes.name: David DeNotaris

quotes.message: You measure the size of the accomplishment by the obstacles you had to overcome to reach your goals.
quotes.name: Booker T. Washington

quotes.message: Discouragement is not the absence of adequacy but the absence of courage.

quotes.message: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.

quotes.message: People who accomplish big things in life must face naysayers who try to discourage them.

quotes.message: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.

quotes.message: Negative people can only infest you with discouragements when they find you around.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: If you feel discouraged by seeing progress in others and are tempted to give up, stop. Forget comparing yourself to others or pre-set ideals.

quotes.message: Disappointment is really just a term for our refusal to look on the bright side.

quotes.message: Don't be discouraged by a failure. It can be a positive experience. Failure is, in a sense, the highway to success, inasmuch as every discovery of what is false leads us to seek earnestly after what is true, and every fresh experience points out some.

quotes.message: What is important is to believe in something so strongly that you're never discouraged.
quotes.name: Salma Hayek

quotes.message: When you get discouraged or depressed, try changing your attitude from negative to positive and see how life can change for you.

quotes.message: Don't accept discouragement, keep going! Less stress will result by not allowing discouragement to be your attitude!

quotes.message: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.

quotes.message: Everybody is going to have their critics. It's easy to get discouraged in life.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

quotes.message: Being discouraged can cause you to lose hope, you need to pick yourself up, focus on the positive and find success by taking action - you may then find your discouragement fading.

quotes.message: A problem is a chance for your to do your best.

quotes.message: Living in the present moment, we feel encouraged and motivated in our lives; we sit on solid ground and are not easily knocked off our balance into discouragement and negativity.

quotes.message: Do not be discouraged if someone copies you. Copying is a compliment - you are doing it right. It also gives you the opportunity to grow and move beyond what is now being copied. Keep moving forward.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Lose of hope leads to discouragement.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: If you fall sometimes, you must not be discouraged.

quotes.message: One of the main effects of war, after all, is that people are discouraged from being characters.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: Don't get discouraged; it is often the last key in the bunch that opens the lock.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: If you are discouraged it is a sign of pride, because it shows you trust in your own powers.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Every child comes with the message that God is not yet discouraged of man.

quotes.message: It is a healthy approach not to expect persons to turn out precisely how you would have wished.

quotes.message: Better to know the quick pain of truth than the ongoing pain of a long-held false hope.

quotes.message: And as far as false hope, there is no such thing. There is only hope or the absence of hope - nothing else.

quotes.message: False hope really makes you cynical.
quotes.name: Bill Maher

quotes.message: It is always the false that makes you suffer, the false desires and fears, the false values and ideas, the false relationships between people. Abandon the false and you are free of pain; truth makes you happy, truth liberates.
quotes.name: Nisardagatta Maharaj

quotes.message: Hope is a word that can kill as well as save. A double-sided knife onto whose handle we all cling. If hope is our dreams, it takes courage to strive for those dreams; to not abandon hope as one of folly. A person lost can have hope of being found, but false hope, a hope that can torture a soul with promises never delivered, that is a hope we can all live without.
quotes.name: Paul Howsley

quotes.message: False hope is clung to with all one's might and main, till a day comes when it has sucked the heart dry and it forcibly breaks through its bonds and departs. After that comes the misery of awakening, and then once again, the longing to get back into the maze of the same mistakes.
quotes.name: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.message: To keep false hopes is to prolong misery.

quotes.message: Sugar coating things makes people feel better, but it also gives them false hope, and it keeps them holding onto the wrong people.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: Because sometimes people who seem good end up being not as good as you might have hoped.
quotes.name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.message: Hope itself is always genuine. It's only what it's placed in that can prove to be false.

quotes.message: That would be the death of anyone - to recognize false hopes with a certainty. One mustn't know that.

quotes.message: What is false about hope?
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: False hope is sometimes mistaken for true love. Don't rush into something until you're sure it actually exists.

quotes.message: False hope is sometimes much worse and sometimes much better than no hope.

quotes.message: If you expect nothing, you can never be disappointed.

quotes.message: False hope can lead to intemperate choices and flawed decision making. True hope takes into account the real threats that exist and seeks to navigate the best path around them.

quotes.message: Harsh reality is always better than false hope.

quotes.message: A false hope gives only false comfort.

quotes.message: False hope is the bread - and - butter of my existence, the only thing that keeps me going.

quotes.message: Hope is such a tenuous quality. To feel it and then to be denied what one most longs for. Better, surely, not to hope at all, than to open the heart to a hope that is impossible.

quotes.message: There is something truly restorative, finally comforting, in coming to the end of an illusion - a false hope.

quotes.message: False hopes are more dangerous than fears.
quotes.name: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.message: Expectations were like fine pottery. The harder you held them, the more likely they were to crack.
quotes.name: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.message: False hope is nicer than no hope at all.
quotes.name: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.message: False hope is worse than despair.

quotes.message: A clear rejection is better than a fake promise.

quotes.message: If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies. Succeed anyway.

quotes.message: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts.

quotes.message: Seeing much, suffering much, and studying much are the three pillars of learning.

quotes.message: When your temper rises, lower your fists. When your fists rise, lower your temper.

quotes.message: My computer beat me at checkers, but I sure beat it at kickboxing.

quotes.message: If it doesn't challenge you, it doesn't change you.

quotes.message: Anything that gets your blood racing is probably worth doing.

quotes.message: There's no need to fear the wind if your haystacks are tied down.

quotes.message: Fall seven times, stand up eight.

quotes.message: I survived because the fire inside me burned brighter than the fire around me.

quotes.message: It is easy to stand in the crowd, but it takes courage to stand alone.

quotes.message: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.

quotes.message: Real strength is not just a condition of one's muscle, but a tenderness in one's spirit.

quotes.message: Your spirit is the true shield.

quotes.message: It isn't the mountains ahead to climb that wear you out; it’s the pebble in your shoe.

quotes.message: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.

quotes.message: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.

quotes.message: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.

quotes.message: Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.

quotes.message: Fire tests gold, suffering tests brave men.

quotes.message: Life doesn't get easier, or more forgiving, we get stronger and more resilient.

quotes.message: Success comes from having dreams that are bigger than your fears.

quotes.message: Cowards never start. The weak never finish. Winners never quit.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Never let your fear decide your future.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: True strength is in the soul and spirit, not in the muscles.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The more you sweat in practice, the less you bleed in battle.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It's not just self defence, it's about self control, body discipline, and mind discipline and breath techniques. It involves yoga. It involves meditation. It's an art, not a sport.

quotes.message: The kickboxing and the martial arts is so fun. It's like anything in school. You're not going to retain information unless you're interested in it.
quotes.name: Zoey Deutch

quotes.message: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Kickboxing tightens you up.

quotes.message: They fail, and they alone, who have not striven.

quotes.message: Don't fear failure so much that you refuse to try new things. The saddest summary of a life contains three descriptions: could have, might have, and should have.

quotes.message: He who fears being conquered is sure of defeat.

quotes.message: Those who are acquainted with failure acquire the unique ability to dare without fear of it.

quotes.message: Failure isn't fatal, but failure to change might be.

quotes.message: It's failure that gives you the proper perspective on success.

quotes.message: Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.

quotes.message: One who fears failure limits his activities.Failure is only the opportunity to more intelligently begin again.

quotes.message: Fear of failure is fiction, face this fact and fear will fall.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Failures are finger posts on the road to achievement.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: Being alone is scary, but not as scary as feeling alone in a relationship.
quotes.name: Amelia Earhart

quotes.message: Ask anyone who has been in a love relationship for a while: nothing is perfect.

quotes.message: Nothing is perfect. Life is messy. Relationships are complex. Outcomes are uncertain. People are irrational.
quotes.name: Pietro Aretino

quotes.message: Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.
quotes.name: Hermann Hesse

quotes.message: A real relationship is like a river; the deeper it gets the less noise it makes.

quotes.message: You don't develop courage by being happy in your relationships everyday. You develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
quotes.name: Epicurus

quotes.message: Looking back and wondering if it could have worked eventually hurts more than trying and failing.
quotes.name: Dominic Riccitello

quotes.message: Some birds are not meant to be caged, that's all. Their feathers are too bright, their songs too sweet and wild. So you let them go, or when you open the cage to feed them they somehow fly out past you. And the part of you that knows it was wrong to imprison them in the first place rejoices, but still, the place where you live is that much more drab and empty for their departure.
quotes.name: Stephen King

quotes.message: Either, you are in love with someone or you're not. Fear is complicated, not love.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: It is very difficult to live among people you love and hold back from offering them advice.

quotes.message: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.

quotes.message: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals.

quotes.message: What you perceive as a failure today may actually be a crucial step towards the success you seek.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: A relationship with lots of pain, it's not a relationship that will last long.
quotes.name: Jang In-hwan

quotes.message: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.
quotes.name: Henry Winkler

quotes.message: Relationship is an art. The dream that two people create is more difficult to master than one.
quotes.name: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.message: Anyone who reads my work will see that there are often difficult relationships between fathers and sons.

quotes.message: When you struggle with your partner, you are struggling with yourself. Every fault you see in them touches a denied weakness in yourself.

quotes.message: It's always difficult to really sum up exactly why a relationship works.

quotes.message: Difficult relationships come into our lives for a reason. No one would choose them, certainly. But if we let them, they can teach us how to be flexible with others and more forgiving.
quotes.name: Joan Bauer

quotes.message: All conflict can be traced back to someone's feelings getting hurt, don't you think?
quotes.name: Liane Moriarty

quotes.message: Whenever you're in conflict with someone, there is one factor that can make the difference between damaging your relationship and deepening it. That factor is attitude.

quotes.message: The most functional way to regulate difficult emotions in love relationships is to share them.
quotes.name: Sue Johnson

quotes.message: Courage means to keep working a relationship, to continue seeking solutions to difficult problems, and to stay focused during stressful periods.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: If you can't be happy and content by yourself then you shouldn't be in a relationship.
quotes.name: Evan Sutter

quotes.message: Every relationship is different. Everyone loves differently.
quotes.name: Richelle Mead

quotes.message: It will be a difficult couple of days. It's difficult now and it will be difficult tomorrow.
quotes.name: Gary Neville

quotes.message: Never marry at all, Dorian. Men marry because they are tired, women, because they are curious: both are disappointed.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: When you have an author and an auteur, it's a difficult and challenging relationship.

quotes.message: Be honest, brutally honest. That is what's going to maintain relationships.
quotes.name: Lauryn Hill

quotes.message: A life with difficult relationships, filled with obstacles and losses, presents the most opportunity for the soul's growth.
quotes.name: Brian Weiss

quotes.message: Pain will leave you, when you let go.
quotes.name: Jeremy Aldana

quotes.message: There are times when two people need to step apart from one another, but there is no rule that says they have to turn and fire.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: It's hard to communicate anything exactly and that's why perfect relationships between people are difficult to find.
quotes.name: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.message: Strong relationships withstand the tests of time and brave the hardships encountered as though they are the necessities for survival.
quotes.name: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.message: Single and in a relationship are just titles. Your heart determines your true relationship status.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Sorrow comes in great wavesâ€¦but rolls over us, and though it may almost smother us, it leaves us. And we know that if it is strong, we are stronger, inasmuch as it passes and we remain.
quotes.name: Henry James

quotes.message: Without communication there is no relationship. Without respect there is no love. Without trust there is no reason to continue.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: With relationship comes access, and with intimacy comes influence.
quotes.name: Tommy Tenney

quotes.message: Marriage is an extremely difficult relationship.
quotes.name: Lee Radziwil

quotes.message: When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.

quotes.message: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Couples need to rebuild their relationship. Retired men still tend to act like the lord and master.
quotes.name: Sayoko Nishida

quotes.message: There are so many different kinds of relationships, so it's sort of difficult to define what is considered normal.
quotes.name: Annette Bening

quotes.message: A relationship with secrets can never work.
quotes.name: Jerrry Siegel

quotes.message: I have to warn you about tonight's show. Tonight's show will fix your relationship or destroy it. And either way, you're welcome.
quotes.name: Christopher Titus

quotes.message: Relationships are built on trust, Hope. And I want our relationship to have a strong foundation.
quotes.name: Chris McKenna

quotes.message: I don't think I've ever felt this good about the end of a relationship.
quotes.name: Gene Rodenberry
