quotes.message: Do what you fear most and you control fear.
quotes.name: Tom Hopkins

quotes.message: There are four ways you can handle fear. You can go over it, under it, or around it. But if you are ever to put fear behind you, you must walk straight through it. Once you put fear behind you. Leave it there.
quotes.name: Donna Favors

quotes.message: Feed your faith and your fears will starve to death.
quotes.name: Max Lucado

quotes.message: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: A mind focused on doubt and fear cannot focus on the journey to victory.
quotes.name: Mike Jones

quotes.message: I will not die an unlived life. I will not live in fear of falling or catching fire. I choose to inhabit my days, to allow my living to open me, to make me less afraid, more accessible, to loosen my heart until it becomes a wing, a torch, a promise. I choose to risk my significance; to live so that which comes to me as seed goes to the next as blossom and that which comes to me as blossom, goes on as fruit.
quotes.name: Dawna Markova

quotes.message: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgment that something else is more important than fear.
quotes.name: Ambrose Redmoon

quotes.message: We are more often frightened than hurt; and we suffer more from imagination than from reality.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: One of the greatest discoveries a man makes, one of his great surprises, is to find he can do what he was afraid he couldn't do.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: When people are bored, it is primarily with their own selves that they are bored.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: What's wrong with being a boring kind of guy?
quotes.name: George W Bush

quotes.message: Work spares us from three evils: boredom, vice, and need.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: I've got a great ambition to die of exhaustion rather than boredom.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Unless a man has been taught what to do with success after getting it, the achievement of it must inevitably leave him a prey to boredom.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Without lies humanity would perish of despair and boredom.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: You'll find boredom where there is the absence of a good idea.
quotes.name: Earl Nightingale

quotes.message: Love fed fat soon turns to boredom.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: Virtuous people often revenge themselves for the constraints to which they submit by the boredom which they inspire.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: We fear our enemy but the bigger and real fear is that of a fake friend who is sweetest to your face and most vile behind your back.
quotes.name: Mufti Ismail Menk

quotes.message: Fake friends are like shadows: always near you at your brightest moments, but nowhere to be seen at your darkest hour True friends are like stars, you don't always see them but they are always there.
quotes.name: Habeeb Akande

quotes.message: Someone who smiles too much with you can sometime frown too much with you at your back.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: I despise the rituals of fake friendship. I wish we could just claw each other's eyes out and call it a day; instead we put on huge radiant smiles and spout compliments until our teeth hurt from the saccharine sweetness of it all.
quotes.name: Jody Gehrman

quotes.message: Be very careful of who you share your problem with, remember that not every friend that smile at you is your best friend.
quotes.name: Kemmy Nola

quotes.message: It is hard to deal with someone who smiles and pretends to like you to your face and sticks that eight inch blade in your back when you turn around.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: A false friend and a shadow attend only while the sun shines.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: An honest enemy is better than a false friend. When in doubt, pay more attention to what people do and less to what they say. Actions not only speak louder than words, they are more difficult to fake.
quotes.name: Zero Dean

quotes.message: Time alone can prove the worth of friendship. As time goes by we lose the the false ones and keep the best. True friends stay when all the rest are gone.
quotes.name: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.message: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.
quotes.name: The Buddha

quotes.message: False friendship, like the ivy, decays and ruins the walls it embraces; but true friendship gives new life and animation to the object it supports.
quotes.name: Richard Burton

quotes.message: A friend who stands with you in pressure is more valuable than a hundred ones who stand with you in pleasure.
quotes.name: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: Most people want to see you to do better, but not doing better than them.
quotes.name: London Mond

quotes.message: An honest enemy is better than a best friend who lies.
quotes.name: Vandi Tanko

quotes.message: Always sleep with one eye open. Never take anything for granted. Your best friends might just be your enemies.
quotes.name: Sara Shepard

quotes.message: Pretend to be poor in reality and you'll notice a decrease in your friends list and request.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Fake friends are like autumn leaves, they're scattered everywhere.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: You always knew after sh— things happened, who your friends really were.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: Better an honest enemy than a false friend.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Watch who you call friend, because friends are the same ones that will leak your business to everyone after y'all not friends anymore.
quotes.name: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.message: I've got more respect for someone who comes out and says they don't like me than for the ones who act like they do but talk bad about me when I'm not around.
quotes.name: Mitchell Perry

quotes.message: You got nothing to lose. You don't lose when you lose fake friends.
quotes.name: Joan Jett

quotes.message: Keep talking about me behind my back, and watch God keep blessing me in front of your face.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Every coin has two sides, just like most people have two faces.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: I used to think enemies were the worst people in the world, but that was until I met fake friends and realized that they're a lot worse.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: The same person that speaks highly of you will be the same person that downs you. Be careful who you call friends.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Better to have an enemy who slaps you in the face than a friend who stabs you in the back.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: An enemy, who is honest and shows his.her hate openly is better than a friend who is liar and putting you down secretly.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: A false friend, a friendly fraud: both are like thieves.
quotes.name: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.message: A false friend is like the shadow of a sundial.
quotes.name: French Proverb

quotes.message: Friends are like melons. Shall I tell you why? To find a good one, you must a hundred try.
quotes.name: Claude Mermet

quotes.message: To betray you must first belong. I never belonged.
quotes.name: Kim Philby

quotes.message: If I had to choose between betraying my country and betraying my friend, I hope I should have the guts to betray my country.
quotes.name: E.M. Forster

quotes.message: Brother, even by our mother’s dust, I charge you, do not betray me to your mirth or hate.
quotes.name: John Ford

quotes.message: In one respect indeed, our employment may be reckoned dishonest, because, like great Statesmen, we encourage those who betray their friends.
quotes.name: John Gay

quotes.message: Is it possible to succeed without any act of betrayal?
quotes.name: Jean Renoir

quotes.message: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
quotes.name: Jim Morrison

quotes.message: A friend to all is a friend to none.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: A friendship founded on business is good deal better than a business founded on friendship.
quotes.name: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.message: A lot of problems in the world would disappear if we talk to each other instead of about each other.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: A person's character is shown through their actions in life NOT where they sit on Sunday.
quotes.name: Navonne Johns

quotes.message: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.name: Walter Winchell

quotes.message: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
quotes.name: Doug Larson

quotes.message: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
quotes.name: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.message: Be yourself. An original is worth more than a copy.
quotes.name: Suzy Kassem

quotes.message: Betray a friend and you’ll often find you have ruined yourself.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: Don’t fear the enemy that attacks you, but the fake friend that hugs you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Fake friends are like shadows: they follow you in the sun, but leave your side when in gets dark.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Fear of something is at the root of hate for others, and hate within will eventually destroy the hater.
quotes.name: George Washington Carver

quotes.message: Friends are born, not made.
quotes.name: Henry Adams

quotes.message: Friendship is also about liking a person for their failings, their weakness. It’s also about mutual help, not about exploitation.
quotes.name: Paul Theroux

quotes.message: Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks.
quotes.name: Waqar Ahmed

quotes.message: I hate two faced people, it makes it harder for me to decide which side to slap first.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If it comes, let it come. If it goes, it’s ok, let it go. Let things come and go. Stay calm, don’t let anything disturb your peace, and carry on.
quotes.name: Germany Kent

quotes.message: In fact a lot of problems in this world would disappear if we talk to each other instead of about each other.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: In life, you have a choice: Bitter or Better? Choose better, forget bitter.
quotes.name: Nick Vujicic

quotes.message: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: It is only the great hearted who can be true friends. The mean and cowardly, can never know what true friendship means.
quotes.name: Charles Kingsley

quotes.message: It’s hard to tell who has your back, from who has it long enough just to stab you in it…
quotes.name: Nicole Richie

quotes.message: Knowledge planted in truth grows in truth. Strength born of peace loses nothing to hate.
quotes.name: Aberjhani

quotes.message: Learn to use the criticism as fuel and you will never run out of energy.
quotes.name: Orrin Woodward

quotes.message: Letting go of toxic people in your life is a big step in loving yourself.
quotes.name: Hussein Nishah

quotes.message: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Lovers have a right to betray you, friends don’t.
quotes.name: Judy Holliday

quotes.message: Many people would be scared if they saw in the mirror, not their faces..but their character.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
quotes.name: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.message: Never contract friendship with a man that is not better than thyself.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: Once they stop talking to you, they start talking about you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Share your weaknesses. Share your hard moments. Share your real side. It’ll either scare away every fake person in your life or it will inspire them to finally let go of that mirage called 'perfection,' which will open the doors to the most important relationships you’ll ever be a part of.
quotes.name: Dan Pearce

quotes.message: Some people are going to leave, but that’s not the end your story. That’s the end of their part in your story.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Some people think that the truth can be hidden with a little cover-up and decoration. But as time goes by, what is true is revealed, and what is fake fades away.
quotes.name: Ismail Haniyeh

quotes.message: Sometimes, you have to give up on people. Not because you don’t care but because they don’t.
quotes.name: Jennifer Green

quotes.message: Stab the body and it heals, but injure the heart and the wound lasts a lifetime.
quotes.name: Mineko Iwasaki

quotes.message: The friendship that can cease has never been real.
quotes.name: St. Jerome

quotes.message: The jealous are troublesome to others, but a torment to themselves.
quotes.name: William Penn

quotes.message: The strong-minded rise to the challenge of their goals and dreams. The weak-minded become haters.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: The worst part about success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
quotes.name: Bette Midler

quotes.message: There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: This is what happens. You tell your friends your most personal secrets, and they use them against you.
quotes.name: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.message: To me, the thing that is worse than death is betrayal. You see, I could conceive death, but I could not conceive betrayal.
quotes.name: Malcolm X

quotes.message: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: What’s the whole point of being pretty on the outside when you’re so ugly on the inside?
quotes.name: Jess C. Scott

quotes.message: You cannot always trust what you see. Even salt looks like sugar.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You don’t lose friends because real friends can never be lost. You lose people masquerading as friends, and you’re better for it.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Bad things do happen; how I respond to them defines my character and the quality of my life. I can choose to sit in perpetual sadness, immobilized by the gravity of my loss, or I can choose to rise from the pain and treasure the most precious gift I have - life itself.
quotes.name: Walter Anderson

quotes.message: You build on failure. You use it as a stepping stone. Close the door on the past. You don't try to forget the mistakes, but you don't dwell on it. You don't let it have any of your energy, or any of your time, or any of your space.
quotes.name: Johnny Cash

quotes.message: Forgiving does not erase the bitter past. A healed memory is not a deleted memory. Instead, forgiving what we cannot forget creates a new way to remember. We change the memory of our past into a hope for our future.
quotes.name: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.message: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on.
quotes.name: Carrie Underwood

quotes.message: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Moving on, is a simple thing, what it leaves behind is hard.
quotes.name: Dave Mustaine

quotes.message: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: We all have life storms, and when we get the rough times and we recover from them, we should celebrate that we got through it. No matter how bad it may seem, there's always something beautiful that you can find.
quotes.name: Mattie Stepanek

quotes.message: You will find that it is necessary to let things go; simply for the reason that they are heavy. So let them go, let go of them. I tie no weights to my ankles.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Sometimes the hardest part isn't letting go but rather learning to start over.
quotes.name: Nicole Sobon

quotes.message: It is important that we forgive ourselves for making mistakes. We need to learn from our errors and move on.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: You can't look back - you just have to put the past behind you, and find something better in your future.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: Moving on is easy. It's staying moved on that's trickier.
quotes.name: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

quotes.message: I demolish my bridges behind me...
quotes.name: Fridtjof Nansen

quotes.message: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
quotes.name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.message: The truth is, unless you let go, unless you forgive yourself, unless you forgive the situation, unless you realize that the situation is over, you cannot move forward.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Sooner or later we've all got to let go of our past.
quotes.name: Dan Brown

quotes.message: The only thing a person can ever really do is keep moving forward. Take that big leap forward without hesitation, without once looking back. Simply forget the past and forge toward the future.
quotes.name: Alyson Noel

quotes.message: We must be willing to let go of the life we've planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: I can choose to let it define me, confine me, refine me, outshine me - or I can choose to move on and leave them behind me.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars. You have to let go at some point in order to move forward.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: In order to move on, you must understand why you felt what you did and why you no longer need to feel it.
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: What's done is done. What's gone is gone. One of life's lesson is always moving on. It's okay to look back and think of fond memories but keep moving forward.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Moving on doesn't mean you forget about things, it just means you have to accept what happened and continue living.
quotes.name: Erza Scarlet

quotes.message: Just because you miss someone doesn't mean you need them back in your life. Missing is just a part of moving on.
quotes.name: Macklemore

quotes.message: Don't waste your time looking back for what you have lost, move on for life wasn't meant to be traveled backwards.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Once you've made the decision to move on, don't look back. You will never find your future in the rear view mirror.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Don't cry over the past, it's gone . Don't stress about the future, it hasn't arrived. Live in the present and make it beautiful.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: I move on feeling and have learned to distrust who don't.
quotes.name: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.message: Our answers somehow lie in building and creating, moving forward and beyond, allowing wounds to heal and scars to fade gracefully. Not to forget or deny pain, but to embrace it and move on.
quotes.name: Renee M. Martinez

quotes.message: The art of war is simple enough. Find out where your enemy is. Get at him as soon as you can. Strike him as hard as you can and keep moving on.
quotes.name: Ulysses S. Grant

quotes.message: As a player at the end of your career, you always know when it's time to move on.
quotes.name: Bob Uecker

quotes.message: The faster you move on after failing the sooner you'll get to your next chance.
quotes.name: Youbin Jung

quotes.message: There comes a time when it is time to move on and do what has to be done. A time when one might feel we no longer stand for what is real in other's eyes, and most of all— our own.
quotes.name: Kathleen Bartholomew

quotes.message: There's always something to suggest that you'll never be who you wanted to be. Your choice is to take it or to keep on moving.
quotes.name: Phylicia Rashad

quotes.message: Recovery begins from the darkest moments.
quotes.name: John Major

quotes.message: You may have a fresh start any moment you choose, for this thing that we call 'failure' is not the falling down but the staying down.
quotes.name: Mary Pickford

quotes.message: You must make a decision that you are going to move on. It won't happen automatically. You will have to rise up and say, 'I don't care how hard this is, I don't care how disappointed I am, I'm not going to let his get the best of me. I'm moving on with my life.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Let go...stop reminiscing about the past, and look towards the future. Happiness is waiting for you.
quotes.name: M. Sosa

quotes.message: Believe in yourself and in your life's purpose. Know that your thoughts are powerful. Choose yourself. Think positive, see the good, and be strong. Stand up when you fall, take action, and keep moving forward. You are the master of your fate. You are the captain of your soul.
quotes.name: Aysel Gunar

quotes.message: If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.name: Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: Once you've forgiven, forgotten, and learned the lesson, you can move forward with the healing or whatever process works for you in moving forward with your life.
quotes.name: James E. Murphy

quotes.message: You can spend minutes, hours, days, weeks, or even months over-analyzing a situation; trying to put the pieces together, justifying what could've, would've happened… or you can just leave the pieces on the floor and move on.
quotes.name: Tupac Shakur

quotes.message: Life moves on and so should we.
quotes.name: Spencer Johnson

quotes.message: My heart might be bruised, but it will recover and become capable of seeing the beauty of life once more. It’s happened before, it will happen again, I'm sure. When someone leaves, it’s because someone else is about to arrive – I'll find love again.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Accept yourself, love yourself, and keep moving forward. If you want to fly, you have to give up what weighs you down.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: That’s all you can do in this world, no matter how strong the current beats against you, or how heavy your burden, or how tragic your love story. You keep going.
quotes.name: Robin Schneider

quotes.message: Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: If I kept saying it; if I kept reaching out. My accident really taught me just one thing: the only way to go on is to go on. To say ‘I can do this,' even when you know you can't.
quotes.name: Stephen King

quotes.message: Be Brave and Take Risks: You need to have faith in yourself. Be brave and take risks. You don't have to have it all figured out to move forward.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: Girls you've gotta know when it’s time to turn the page.
quotes.name: Tori Amos

quotes.message: Grudges are for those who insist that they are owed something; forgiveness, however, is for those who are substantial enough to move on.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide that you are not going to stay where you are.
quotes.name: J.P. Morgan

quotes.message: Look at life through the windshield, not the rear-view mirror.
quotes.name: Byrd Baggett

quotes.message: To be able to move on, one has to learn to forgive not only the person (or people) who have done one wrong but also oneself.
quotes.name: Eugenia Tripputi

quotes.message: You are responsible for your life. You can't keep blaming somebody else for your dysfunction. Life is really about moving on.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: By forgiving and choosing to move on, one takes the power back to morph it into positive energy.
quotes.name: Eugenia Tripputi

quotes.message: Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: The best way to destroy an enemy is to make him a friend.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: Always forgive your enemies - nothing annoys them so much.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: If you want to make enemies, try to change something.
quotes.name: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.message: The best weapon against an enemy is another enemy.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: If you are far from the enemy, make him believe you are near.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: Observe your enemies, for they first find out your faults.
quotes.name: Antisthenes

quotes.message: Enemies are so stimulating.
quotes.name: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.message: Enemies promises were made to be broken.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: One enemy can do more hurt than ten friends can do good.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: Our enemies come nearer the truth in the opinions they form of us than we do in our opinion of ourselves.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Keep your friends close, and your enemies closer.
quotes.name: Mario Puzo

quotes.message: It's hard to fight an enemy who has outposts in your head.
quotes.name: Sally Kempton

quotes.message: Love your enemies; for they shall tell you all your faults.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: You can discover what your enemy fears most by observing the means he uses to frighten you.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: The enemy is anybody who's going to get you killed, no matter which side he's on.
quotes.name: Joseph Heller

quotes.message: We often give our enemies the means for our own destruction.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: Let your enemies be disarmed by the gentleness of your manner, but at the same time let them feel, the steadiness of your resentment.
quotes.name: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.message: Bear patiently with a rival.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: I bring out the worst in my enemies and that's how I get them to defeat themselves.
quotes.name: Roy M. Cohn

quotes.message: I destroy my enemies when I make them my friends.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Forgive your enemies, but first get even.
quotes.name: Lester Cole

quotes.message: If you don't have enemies, you don't have character.
quotes.name: Paul Newman

quotes.message: Enemies, as well as lovers, come to resemble each other over a period of time.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: As our enemies have found we can reason like men, so now let us show them we can fight like men also.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Our enemies are our outward consciences.
quotes.name: Shakespeare

quotes.message: An enemy despised is the most dangerous of all enemies.
quotes.name: Publius Syrus

quotes.message: It is from our enemies that we often gain excellent maxims, and are frequently surprised into reason by their mistakes.
quotes.name: Thomas Paine

quotes.message: Enemies' gifts are no gifts and do no good.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: Our enemies will tell the rest with pleasure.
quotes.name: Bishop William Fleetwood

quotes.message: The enemy of my enemy is my friend.
quotes.name: Arabic Proverb

quotes.message: We can learn even from our enemies.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: An enemy generally says and believes what he wishes.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Know your enemy and know yourself and you can fight a hundred battles without disaster.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: When the enemy attacks you, it means you are on the right road.
quotes.name: Enver Hoxha

quotes.message: Despise the enemy strategically, but take him seriously tactically.
quotes.name: Mao Zedong

quotes.message: We need a common enemy to unite us.
quotes.name: Condoleezza Rice

quotes.message: Give the enemy not only a road for flight, but also a means of defending it.
quotes.name: Thomas Hardy

quotes.message: A distant enemy is always preferable to one at the gate.
quotes.name: Emil Cioran

quotes.message: If you had no enemies, you had no fun.
quotes.name: Denis Leary

quotes.message: Every educated person is a future enemy.
quotes.name: Martin Bormann

quotes.message: It is the enemy who can truly teach us to practice the virtues of compassion and tolerance.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Everyone needs a warm personal enemy or two to keep him free from rust in the movable parts of his mind.
quotes.name: Gene Fowler

quotes.message: Give the enemy an inch, he'll take a yard.
quotes.name: Monica Crowley

quotes.message: Flee an enemy who knows your weakness.
quotes.name: Pierre Corneille

quotes.message: One of the most time-consuming things is to have an enemy.
quotes.name: E. B. White

quotes.message: The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends.

quotes.message: The Bible tells us to love our neighbors, and also to love our enemies; probably because generally they are the same people.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Whenever you are confronted with an opponent. Conquer him with love.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
quotes.name: Frank Sinatra

quotes.message: A wise man gets more use from his enemies than a fool from his friends.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: Never explain―your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: There is nothing more admirable than when two people who see eye to eye keep house as man and wife, confounding their enemies and delighting their friends.
quotes.name: Homer

quotes.message: If you have enemies, good that means you stood up for something.
quotes.name: Eminem

quotes.message: Those who pray for your downfall are concentrating negative thoughts towards you, without taking cognisance of the slippery ground in which they are standing, which could lead to their downfall.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: A doubtful friend is worse than a certain enemy. Let a man be one thing or the other, and we then know how to meet him.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: No man ever got very high by pulling other people down. The intelligent merchant does not knock his competitors. The sensible worker does not work those who work with him. Don't knock your friends. Don't knock your enemies. Don't knock yourself.
quotes.name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.message: Bitter people are not interested in what you say, but what you hide.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Tis best to weigh the enemy more mighty than he seems.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: The haft of the arrow had been feathered with one of the eagles own plumes. We often give our enemies the means of our own destruction.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: When a sinister person means to be your enemy, they always start by trying to become your friend.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: Through you we learn to be invisible, through you inaudible; and hence we can hold the enemy's fate in our hands.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: If people think nature is their friend then they sure don't need an enemy.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: People from the past, have a tendency to walk back into the present, and run over the future.
quotes.name: Anthony Liccione

quotes.message: If we could read the secret history of our enemies we should find in each man’s life sorrow and suffering enough to disarm all hostility.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: Remember that nobody will ever get ahead of you as long as he is kicking you in the seat of the pants.
quotes.name: Walter Winchell

quotes.message: Concentrated power has always been the enemy of liberty.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
quotes.name: J. K. Rowling

quotes.message: To love our enemy is impossible. The moment we understand our enemy, we feel compassion towards him.her, and he.she is no longer our enemy.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: When there is no enemy within, the enemies outside cannot hurt you.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Never hate your enemies. It affects your judgment.
quotes.name: Mario Puzo

quotes.message: Only enemies speak the truth; friends and lovers lie endlessly, caught in the web of duty.
quotes.name: Stephen King

quotes.message: It's not enough to hate your enemy. You have to understand how the two of you bring each other to deep completion.

quotes.message: For the enemy to be recognized and feared, he has to be in your home or on your doorstep.

quotes.message: The truth may not set you free, but used carefully, it can confuse the hell out of your enemies.
quotes.name: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.message: Scratch a lover, and find a foe.

quotes.message: If you are without an enemy in the world, you may be a lamb or an ass, but you are not a man.

quotes.message: Your enemy is never a villain in his own eyes. Keep this in mind, it may offer a way to make him your friend. If not, you can kill him without hate.

quotes.message: You can calculate the worth of a man by the number of his enemies, and the importance of a work of art by the harm that is spoken of it.

quotes.message: I have spent many years of my life in opposition, and I rather like the role.

quotes.message: Let my enemies devour each other.

quotes.message: We learn our virtues from our friends who love us; our faults from the enemy who hates us. We cannot easily discover our real character from a friend. He is a mirror, on which the warmth of our breath impedes the clearness of the reflection.

quotes.message: Pay attention to your enemies, for they are the first to discover your mistakes.
quotes.name: Antisthenes

quotes.message: Never wound a snake; kill it.
quotes.name: Harriet Tubman

quotes.message: Once is happenstance. Twice is coincidence. Three times is enemy action.

quotes.message: You must not fight too often with one enemy, or you will teach him all your art of war.

quotes.message: If you want peace, you don't talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies.

quotes.message: The chief enemy of creativity is 'good' sense.

quotes.message: A man can't be too careful in the choice of his enemies.

quotes.message: Time is my greatest enemy.

quotes.message: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into friend.

quotes.message: The enemies of the future are always the very nicest people.

quotes.message: Faith activates God - Fear activates the Enemy.

quotes.message: No accurate thinker will judge another person by that which the other person's enemies say about him.

quotes.message: Sooner or later we all must die. Warriors choose to do so on their feet, standing between their enemies and those they hold dear. With a weapon in their hands. Cowards choose to do so on their bellies. Unarmed.

quotes.message: Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up.

quotes.message: Friends come and go but enemies accumulate.

quotes.message: Memory is man's greatest friend and worst enemy.

quotes.message: That is the thankless position of the father in the family-the provider for all, and the enemy of all.

quotes.message: We make our friends; we make our enemies; but God makes our next door neighbor.

quotes.message: However bad a man, he will have some friends: however good, he will have some enemies.

quotes.message: Always presume that the enemy has dangerous designs and always be forehanded with the remedy. But do not let these calculations make your timid.

quotes.message: To be wronged is nothing unless you continue to remember it.

quotes.message: If you want enemies, excel others; if you want friends, let others excel you.

quotes.message: It is a pitiful fortune that is not without enemies.

quotes.message: Man usually avoids attributing cleverness to somebody else unless it is an enemy.

quotes.message: In a world of lies and liars, an honest work of art is always an act of social responsibility.

quotes.message: Without restoring an ethos of social responsibility, there can be no meaningful and sustained economic recovery.

quotes.message: If you feel a sense of social responsibility, first of all keep working on yourself. Being peaceful yourself is the first step if you want to live in a peaceful universe.

quotes.message: Corporate Social Responsibility is a hard-edged business decision. Not because it is a nice thing to do or because people are forcing us to do it because it is good for our business.

quotes.message: There is a social responsibility to take care of vulnerable people. It seems that a sensible social responsibility is obligatory education, but also decent education, and that is not happening.

quotes.message: Social responsibility becomes an aspect not of Christian mission only, but also of Christian conversion. It is impossible to be truly converted to God without being thereby converted to our neighbor.

quotes.message: Together with the social responsibility of businesses, there is also the social responsibility of consumers. Every person ought to have the awareness that 'purchasing is always a moral-and not simply an economic-act.

quotes.message: Social responsibility above the level of family, or at most of tribe, requires imagination-- devotion, loyalty, all the higher virtues -- which a man must develop himself; if he has them forced down him, he will vomit them out.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: Corporate social responsibility is measured in terms of businesses improving conditions for their employees, shareholders, communities, and environment. But moral responsibility goes further, reflecting the need for corporations to address fundamental ethical issues such as inclusion, dignity, and equality.
quotes.name: Klaus Schwab

quotes.message: We have an unwavering commitment to our social responsibility program; it's good for business, and we know it's the right thing to do.
quotes.name: Robert J. Fisher

quotes.message: The concept of corporate social responsibility (CSR) has long been used as an effective lens through which to examine the actions business can take toward ensuring mutual long-term well-being and sustainability.

quotes.message: If we don't take responsiblity of what happens to our society, then no amount of Independence can improve human condition.

quotes.message: The main social responsibility for a company is to win.

quotes.message: The voluntary approach to corporate social responsibility has failed in many cases.

quotes.message: We need to get back to a level of social responsibility that we haven't seen for a long time.

quotes.message: We, as humans, have actually developed a sense of social responsibility. We have gone beyond our basic instincts.

quotes.message: We all have a social responsibility and have to be mindful of what we do and say.

quotes.message: Every charitable act is a stepping stone towards heaven.

quotes.message: Everyone can be great, because everyone can serve.

quotes.message: We are not put on this earth for ourselves, but are placed here for each other. If you are there always for others, then in time of need, someone will be there for you.

quotes.message: Caring has the gift of making the ordinary special.

quotes.message: One man gives freely, yet gains even more; another withholds unduly, but comes to poverty.

quotes.message: If you have zest and enthusiasm you attract zest and enthusiasm. Life does give back in kind.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Love life. Engage in it. Give it all you've got. Love it with a passion because life truly does give back, many times over, what you put into it.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: I believe that as much as you take, you have to give back. It's important not to focus on yourself too much.
quotes.name: Nicole Kidman

quotes.message: Not he who has much is rich, but he who gives much.
quotes.name: Erich Fromm

quotes.message: From what we get, we can make a living. What we give, however, makes a life.
quotes.name: Arthur Ashe

quotes.message: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: You can give without loving, but you can never love without giving.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: He who cannot give anything away cannot feel anything either.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Your mind will give back to you exactly what you put into it.
quotes.name: James Joyce

quotes.message: The end of law is not to abolish or restrain, but to preserve and enlarge freedom. For in all the states of created beings capable of law, where there is no law, there is no freedom.
quotes.name: John Locke

quotes.message: The safety of the people shall be the highest law.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: There's a natural law of karma that vindictive people, who go out of their way to hurt others, will end up broke and alone.
quotes.name: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.message: At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: I am free, no matter what rules surround me. If I find them tolerable, I tolerate them; if I find them too obnoxious, I break them. I am free because I know that I alone am morally responsible for everything I do.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: We cannot expect people to have respect for law and order until we teach respect to those we have entrusted to enforce those laws.
quotes.name: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.message: Laws and principles are not for the times when there is no temptation: they are for such moments as this, when body and soul rise in mutiny against their rigour ...
quotes.name: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.message: In times of war, the law falls silent.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: The Law is hard, but it is the Law.
quotes.name: Cassandra Clare

quotes.message: Laws grind the poor, and rich men rule the law.
quotes.name: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.message: People are more afraid of the laws of Man than of God, because their punishment seems to be nearest.
quotes.name: William Penn

quotes.message: Law is order, and good law is good order.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Without law men are beasts.
quotes.name: Maxwell Anderson

quotes.message: The law was made for one thing alone, for the exploitation of those who don't understand it.
quotes.name: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.message: The law isn't justice. It's a very imperfect mechanism. If you press exactly the right buttons and are also lucky, justice may show up in the answer. A mechanism is all the law was ever intended to be.
quotes.name: Raymond Chandler

quotes.message: If there were no bad people, there would be no good lawyers.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: When men are pure, laws are useless; when men are corrupt, laws are broken.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: The law is reason, free from passion.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: The clearest way to show what the rule of law means to us in everyday life is to recall what has happened when there is no rule of law.
quotes.name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.message: Good people do not need laws to tell them to act responsibly, while bad people will find a way around the laws.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: We must reject the idea that every time a law's broken, society is guilty rather than the lawbreaker. It is time to restore the American precept that each individual is accountable for his actions.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: It may be true that the law cannot make a man love me, but it can keep him from lynching me, and I think that's pretty important.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: No man is above the law and no man is below it; nor do we ask any man's permission when we ask him to obey it. Obedience to the law is demanded as a right; not asked as a favor.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: An unjust law is itself a species of violence. Arrest for its breach is more so.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Laws alone can not secure freedom of expression; in order that every man present his views without penalty there must be spirit of tolerance in the entire population.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Good laws have their origins in bad morals.
quotes.name: Ambrosius Macrobius

quotes.message: Where you find the laws most numerous, there you will find also the greatest injustice.
quotes.name: Arcesilaus

quotes.message: Law is order in liberty, and without order liberty is social chaos.
quotes.name: Archbishop Ireland

quotes.message: A law is something which must have a moral basis, so that there is an inner compelling force for every citizen to obey.
quotes.name: Chaim Weizmann

quotes.message: Law is king of all.
quotes.name: Henry Alford

quotes.message: Law is a Bottomless-Pit, it is a Cormorant, a Harpy, that devours every thing.
quotes.name: John Arbuthnot

quotes.message: Surely we will not dare say that these laws are unjust, or rather, that they are not laws at all. For it seems to me that an unjust law is no law at all.
quotes.name: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.message: Any law that takes hold of a man's daily life cannot prevail in a community, unless the vast majority of the community are actively in favor of it. The laws that are the most operative are the laws which protect life.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: No civilization would ever have been possible without a framework of stability, to provide the wherein for the flux of change. Foremost among the stabilizing factors, more enduring than customs, manners and traditions, are the legal systems that regulate our life in the world and our daily affairs with each other.
quotes.name: Hannah Arendt

quotes.message: Laws, like houses, lean on one another.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: Bad laws are the worst form of tyranny.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: Law and equity are two things which God has joined, but which man has put asunder.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: Laws and institutions, like clocks, must occasionally be cleaned, wound up, and set to true time.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: The law helps those who watch, not those who sleep.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: Where the law is uncertain there is no law.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: Written laws are like spider's webs; they will catch, it is true, the weak and the poor, but would be torn in pieces by the rich and powerful.
quotes.name: Anacharsis

quotes.message: Laws are not invented. They grow out of circumstances.
quotes.name: Azarias

quotes.message: Laws are not masters, but servants, and he rules them, who obeys them.
quotes.name: Ward Becker

quotes.message: There is a Law that man should love his neighbor as himself. In a few hundred years it should be as natural to mankind as breathing or the upright gait; but if he does not learn it he must perish.
quotes.name: Alfred Adler

quotes.message: As labor creates the wealth of the country, we demand the passage of such laws as may be necessary to protect it in all its rights.
quotes.name: John Peter Altgeld

quotes.message: Law; an ordinance of reason for the common good, made by him who has care of the community
quotes.name: St. Thomas Aquinas

quotes.message: Judicial bodies provide a forum for truth telling
quotes.name: Louise Arbour

quotes.message: The rule of law in place of force, always basic to my thinking, now takes on a new relevance in a world where, if war is to go, only law can replace it.
quotes.name: Roger Nash Baldwin

quotes.message: Laws and principles are not for the times when there is no temptation: they are for such moments as this, when body and soul rise in mutiny against their rigour ...
quotes.name: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.message: The law is hard, but it is the law.
quotes.name: Cassandra Clare

quotes.message: We may brave human laws, but we cannot resist natural ones.
quotes.name: Jules Verne

quotes.message: Law applied to its extreme is the greatest injustice
quotes.name: Cicero Marcus Tullius

quotes.message: There are laws. There are rules. And when you break them, there are consequences. Laws of nature and laws of life. Laws of love and laws of death.
quotes.name: Amy Harmon

quotes.message: No great idea in its beginning can ever be within the law. How can it be within the law? The law is stationary. The law is fixed. The law is a chariot wheel that binds us all regardless of conditions or place or time.
quotes.name: Emma Goldman

quotes.message: But the law is an odd thing. For instance, one country in Europe has a law that requires all its bakers to sell bread at the exact same price. A certain island has a law that forbids anyone from removing its fruit. And a town not too far from where you live has a law that bars me from coming within five miles of its borders.
quotes.name: Lemony Snicket

quotes.message: Laws grind the poor and the rich men rule the law.
quotes.name: Goldsmith

quotes.message: The law maker should not be a law breaker.
quotes.name: D.V. Rangarajan

quotes.message: Law is a bottomless pit.
quotes.name: J. Arbuthnot

quotes.message: There is: God's law. There's no law against that.
quotes.name: Robert Bolt

quotes.message: You want me to respect the law? Then make the law respectable.
quotes.name: Pan Macmillan

quotes.message: Law without reason is criminal.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: I don't know who made the laws; But I know there ain't no law that you got to go hungry.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: . You make a law for every movement.
quotes.name: Frank Herbert

quotes.message: Law is made by the winner to preserve victory over the loser.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Feminism is something you do. It's a verb. It's what you are. It's an activity; it's something you're actively engaged in.
quotes.name: Kathleen Hanna

quotes.message: Feminism is equality: politically; culturally; socially; economically. That's it, that simple.
quotes.name: Emma Watson

quotes.message: Feminism was about making women's lives less constrained and giving them more choices.
quotes.name: Hanna Rosin

quotes.message: Feminism is the radical notion that women are human beings.
quotes.name: Cheris Kramarae

quotes.message: Feminism has never been about getting a job for one woman. It's about making life more fair for women everywhere. It's not about a piece of the existing pie; there are too many of us for that. It's about baking a new pie.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: Feminism means something - legislation, cultural change - but 'Girl Power' meant nothing more than being friends with your friends.
quotes.name: Caitlin Moran

quotes.message: Feminism is the ability to choose what you want to do.
quotes.name: Nancy Reagan

quotes.message: Really feminism is about being all that you are and not having to trade one thing for another on your way up.
quotes.name: Gina Torres

quotes.message: Feminism's agenda is basic: It asks that women not be forced to â€˜choose' between public justice and private happiness.
quotes.name: Susan Faludi

quotes.message: Feminism was established so as to allow unattractive women access to the mainstream of society.
quotes.name: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.message: Feminism means to me being comfortable with who you are as a woman and being unapologetic about it.
quotes.name: Charissa Thompson

quotes.message: The word feminism needs to be taken back. It needs to be reclaimed in a way that is inclusive of men.
quotes.name: Annie Lennox

quotes.message: Feminism is the single most powerful social movement of our time, one that addresses every aspect of human and social life.
quotes.name: Richard Allen Epstein

quotes.message: Feminism is a socialist, anti-family, political movement that encourages women to leave their husbands, kill their children, practice witchcraft, destroy capitalism and become lesbians.
quotes.name: Pat Robertson

quotes.message: Feminism is a belief that although women and men are inherently of equal worth, most societies privilege men as a group. As a result, social movements are necessary to achieve political equality between women and men, with the understanding that gender always intersects with other social hierarchies.
quotes.name: Estelle Freedman

quotes.message: Feminism isn't called the longest revolution for nothing.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: Feminism is an entire world view or gestalt, not just a laundry list of women's issues.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bunch

quotes.message: Feminism isn't about making women stronger. Women are already strong. It's about changing the way the world perceives that strength.
quotes.name: G.D. Anderson

quotes.message: Feminism's ultimate success is that we don't need it anymore.
quotes.name: S. E. Cupp

quotes.message: here's nothing bad about feminism. We have to help each other, because there's a lot of women in the world who are suffering because the fact is we're not equal. It's as plain as that. It's still a men's world. I don't know. We'll go on with it.
quotes.name: Yoko Ono

quotes.message: Feminism is a political mistake. Feminism is a mistake made by women's intellect, a mistake which her instinct will recognize.
quotes.name: Valentine de Saint-Point

quotes.message: Feminism is just about equality, really, and there's so much stuff attached to the word, when it's actually so simple. I don't know why it's always so bogged down.
quotes.name: Mia Wasikowska

quotes.message: Feminism is doomed to failure because it is based on an attempt to repeal and restructure human nature.
quotes.name: Phyllis Schlafly

quotes.message: Feminism is a transformational force, an individual and social force. It is a way of looking at the world-a questioning of power.domination issues, an affirmation of women's energy.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bunch

quotes.message: Feminism is not just about women; it's about letting all people lead fuller lives.
quotes.name: Jane Fonda

quotes.message: Feminism is a program for making different beings â€” men and women â€” turn out alike, andâ€¦ it must do a good deal of chopping to fit the real world into its ideal.
quotes.name: Michael Levin

quotes.message: Feminism is a good venue for getting yourself across as much as for getting your point across.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.message: Feminism has led the way in demystifying personal relations, forcefully insisting they are political to the core.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Fox-Genovese

quotes.message: Feminism is what I do with my life, it's how I spend my days, it's my job, it's not just an opinion I have among many other opinions.
quotes.name: Jaclyn Friedman

quotes.message: Feminism starts out being very simple, and it ends up being a world view that questions hierarchy altogether.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: hater is a person whose jealousy of another person success or achievements makes them verbally nit-pick any flaws no matter how small or just make up flaws in order to somehow try and belittle the successful person.
quotes.name: Rai M. Teves

quotes.message: A haters job is to hate you, and they stay on their job 24.7. So, if you're expecting them to clock out, and leave you alone think again.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: And these haters try to knock me but they can't knock me off the hinges.
quotes.name: Lil Wayne

quotes.message: Behind every sucessful person lies a pack of Haters! I love my haters!
quotes.name: Gloria Tesch

quotes.message: Don't doubt yourself, that's what haters are for.
quotes.name: Turcois Ominek

quotes.message: Don't try to win over the haters; you are not a jackass whisperer.
quotes.name: Brene Brown

quotes.message: Haters and bullies are always cowards, you know. They like to pick on little guys.
quotes.name: Scylar Tyberius

quotes.message: Haters are my favorite. I've built an empire with the bricks they've thrown at me. Keep on hating.
quotes.name: C.M. Punk

quotes.message: Haters don't hate you. They hate themselves because you're a reflection of what they wish to be.
quotes.name: Nicki Minaj

quotes.message: Haters keep on hating, cause somebody's gotta do it.
quotes.name: Chris Brown

quotes.message: Haters never win. I just think that's true about life, because negative energy always costs in the end.
quotes.name: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.message: Haters teach you to be grateful for the people you love, hard times teach to you be grateful for the times that are good, and God, well God teaches you everything you need to know.
quotes.name: Carniel Dunlop

quotes.message: I don't worry about the haters? They are just angry because the truth I speak contradicts the lie they live.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: I only feel sorry for weak people. And mostly what I've come to find is that the weak people are the ones that are the haters.
quotes.name: R. Kelly

quotes.message: I think people are just haters. When they see people doing well, some people, if there's something wrong, they'll pick at that.
quotes.name: Alana Blanchard

quotes.message: I think that everybody wants to be heard, and the easiest way to be the loudest is to be the hater.
quotes.name: Tavi Gevinson

quotes.message: Just be you. I've learned the hard way and in the end, some people are just so full of hate that no matter what you say or do, they'll always have something to say.
quotes.name: Megan Fox

quotes.message: My haters are my motivators.
quotes.name: Nicki Minaj

quotes.message: My whole thing is, haters are gonna hate, but haters are also going to click on your YouTube video just to watch it, so I don't really care. You helped me break the record. Even if you were watching just to hate on me, and now I hold the record, so I win.
quotes.name: Miley Cyrus

quotes.message: People who hate you because of a mere jealousy over your success hurt themselves in disguise. This is because you carry an image of who they wish they had become. Don't hate them back because they may also become like you one day and it will mean hurting that image you carry.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Respect your haters they're the only ones who think you're better than them.
quotes.name: Nicki Minaj

quotes.message: Rumors are carried by haters, spread by fools, and accepted by idiots.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: The haters always scream the loudest.
quotes.name: Tucker Max

quotes.message: The haters always scream the loudest.
quotes.name: Tucker Max

quotes.message: The best way to torture haters is with your happiness. There's nothing people hate more than seeing you be successful.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: There will be haters, there will be doubters, there will be non-believers, and then there will be you, proving them wrong.
quotes.name: Karina Barton

quotes.message: They're [haters] just building you up to knock you down. But for me, they haven't.
quotes.name: Taylor Swift

quotes.message: To all the haters out there I wish you the best. You can't bring me down. I wake up everyday grateful for the opportunity and grateful to the fans.
quotes.name: Justin Bieber

quotes.message: You can't hate.love others without loving.hating yourself first.
quotes.name: Tyga

quotes.message: Graduation, a conclusion of one chapter, a beginning of another.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: The man who graduates today and stops learning tomorrow is uneducated the day after.
quotes.name: Newton D. Baker

quotes.message: Commencement speeches were invented largely in the belief that outgoing college students should never be released into the world until they have been properly sedated.
quotes.name: Garry Trudeau

quotes.message: Graduation is just the spark to a fire, in order to keep it going you have build up a stack of knowledge logs.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: There is a good reason they call these ceremonies ' commencement exercises'. Graduation is not the end; it's the beginning.
quotes.name: Orrin Hatch

quotes.message: The first of many graduations of life. From elementary school to senior school, each one holds successes for you to enjoy.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Life is my college.
quotes.name: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.message: Your graduation is a milestone in your life.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Graduation is not the end but the beginning of our bigger life and bigger challenges in life to face.
quotes.name: May Ann

quotes.message: It is indeed ironic that we spend our school days yearning to graduate and our remaining days waxing nostalgic about our school days.
quotes.name: Isabel Waxman

quotes.message: Just about a month from now I'm set adrift, with a diploma for a sail and lots of nerve for oars.
quotes.name: Richard Halliburton

quotes.message: Graduation is a time of completion, of finishing, of an ending, however, it is also a time of celebration of achievement and a beginning for the new graduate.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Your education is a dress rehearsal for a life that is yours to lead.
quotes.name: Nora Ephron

quotes.message: Graduation is an exciting time. It's both an ending and a beginning; it's warm memories of the past and big dreams for the future.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You are educated. Your certification is in your degree. You may think of it as the ticket to the good life. Let me ask you to think of an alternative. Think of it as your ticket to change the world.
quotes.name: Tom Brokaw

quotes.message: Graduation is only a concept. In real life every day you graduate. Graduation is a process that goes on  until the last day of your life. If you can grasp that, you'll make a difference.
quotes.name: Arie Pencovici

quotes.message: Graduation is the beginning of knowing who you are, what you are, why you are, and always knowing where you are going.
quotes.name: Dr. Lydia Patton

quotes.message: Graduation is the end of therotical knowledge and the start of practical life.
quotes.name: Geetha Laxman

quotes.message: Every year, many, many stupid people graduate from college. And if they can do it, so can you.
quotes.name: John Green

quotes.message: A graduation ceremony is an event where the commencement speaker tells thousands of students dressed in identical caps and gowns that 'individuality' is the key to success.
quotes.name: Robert Orben

quotes.message: For many, graduation marks the end of formal student life - the end of long spring breaks and of thinking that a 10 A.M. class is far too early.
quotes.name: Alexa Von Tobel

quotes.message: At graduation you wear your square-shaped mortarboards. My hope is that from time to time you will let your minds be bold, and wear sombreros.
quotes.name: Paul Freund

quotes.message: That diploma you hold in your hands today is really just your learner's permit for the rest of the drive through life. Remember, you don't have to be smarter than the next person, all you have to do is be willing to work harder than the next person.
quotes.name: Jimmy Iovine

quotes.message: Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today.
quotes.name: Malcolm X

quotes.message: Graduation isn't the closing of a door, It's the opening of a thousand.
quotes.name: Dan Schultz

quotes.message: Graduation is not the end; it's the beginning.
quotes.name: Senator Orrin Hatch

quotes.message: The fireworks begin today. Each diploma is a lighted match, each one of you is a fuse.
quotes.name: Ed Koch

quotes.message: Graduation is like the day of reckoning! you will be judge based on what you have planted.
quotes.name: Mark Alonzo

quotes.message: The tassel's worth the hassle!
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: Rehearsal's over. You're going out there now, you're going to do this thing. How you live matters. You're going to fall down, but the world doesn't care how many times you fall down, as long as it's one fewer than the number of times you get back up.
quotes.name: Aaron Sorkin

quotes.message: Graduation is the first step to truly living. Graduation is also the first time you are able to do what you want with your life, without anyone holding you back or telling you no.
quotes.name: Michael Pipper

quotes.message: As you start your journey, the first thing you should do is throw away that store-bought map and begin to draw your own.
quotes.name: Michael Dell

quotes.message: If you walk out of here with a diploma in your hand, you better walk out of here with something these professors put in your heads, too. And retain it, or you're going to be in bad trouble.
quotes.name: Pearl Bailey

quotes.message: As we look around here today at all of the people who helped make us who we are, I know it feels like we're saying goodbye, but we will carry a piece of each other into everything that we do next to remind us of who we are, and who we're meant to be.
quotes.name: Gwen Stacey

quotes.message: You've got the makings of greatness in you, but you gotta take the helm and chart your own course. Stick to it, no matter the squalls! And when the time comes, you get the chance to really test the cut of your sails, and show what you're made of...well, I hope I'm there, catching some of the light coming off you that day.
quotes.name: John Silver

quotes.message: The journey is what brings us happiness, not the destination.
quotes.name: Dan Millman

quotes.message: What do we leave behind when we cross each frontier? Each moment seems split in two; melancholy for what was left behind and the excitement of entering a new land.
quotes.name: Ernesto Guevara de la Serna

quotes.message: But from this afternoon onward, you relinquish all your immunities. Within an hour, you will be on your own. Good luck. I have a feeling that some of you will need it.
quotes.name: Andrew Hacker

quotes.message: I just wanted to say that you're all winners. And I could not be happier that this school year's ending.
quotes.name: Mr. Duvall

quotes.message: If you never do anything, you never become anyone.
quotes.name: Jenny Mellor

quotes.message: My friends, I address you all tonight as you truly are, wizards, mermaids, travelers, adventurers, magicians. Come and dream with me.
quotes.name: Georges Melies

quotes.message: I am on my way . I can go the distance . I don't care how far . Somehow I'll be strong . I know every mile . Will be worth my while . I would go most anywhere . To find where I must belong.
quotes.name: Hercules

quotes.message: You just can't stay seventeen forever.
quotes.name: Steve Bollander

quotes.message: Well, what can I say? I graduated. It's over; I did it. I know most of you are saying, 'Hey any idiot could do that,' Well...
quotes.name: Billy Madison

quotes.message: You cannot help but learn more as you take the world into your hands. Take it up reverently, for it is an old piece of clay, with millions of thumbprints on it.
quotes.name: John Updike

quotes.message: Find a partner to love and a job you adore so much you would do for free—although you really do have to demand that they pay you.
quotes.name: Gail Collins

quotes.message: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.name: E.E. Cummings

quotes.message: It is good to have an end to journey toward, but it is the journey that matters in the end.
quotes.name: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.message: I am learning all the time. The tombstone will be my diploma.
quotes.name: Eartha Kitt

quotes.message: Instruction ends in the schoolroom, but education ends only with life.
quotes.name: Frederick W. Robertson

quotes.message: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself in any direction you choose.
quotes.name: Dr. Seuss

quotes.message: My dear terrified graduates, you are about to enter the most uncertain and thrilling period of your lives. The stories you are about to live are the ones you will be telling your children, and grandchildren, and therapists.
quotes.name: Lin Manuel Miranda

quotes.message: The only thing that ever sat its way to success was a hen.
quotes.name: Sarah Brown

quotes.message: To those of you who received honors, awards and distinctions, I say well done. And to the C students, I say you too may one day be president of the United States.
quotes.name: George W. Bush

quotes.message: A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car, but if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Education is the key to unlocking the world, a passport to freedom.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Now go, and make interesting mistakes, make amazing mistakes, make glorious and fantastic mistakes. Break rules. Leave the world more interesting for you being here. Make good art.
quotes.name: Neil Gaimann

quotes.message: Your life is your story, and the adventure ahead of you is the journey to fulfill your own purpose and potential.
quotes.name: Kerry Washington

quotes.message: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
quotes.name: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.message: Being loved is the only thing that is admirable by any stretch of the imagination.
quotes.name: Auliq-Ice

quotes.message: To have the chance of being loved we have to take a chance on being destroyed inside.
quotes.name: Jo Nesbo

quotes.message: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves say rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: Because feeling love does make you feel superior. Until you find out you aren't loved back.
quotes.name: Kaui Hart Hemmings

quotes.message: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: There is no happiness like that of being loved by your fellow creatures, and feeling that your presence is an addition to their comfort.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.message: To be fully seen by somebody, then, and be loved any how this is a human offering that can border on miraculous.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.message: When I saw you I fell in love. And you smiled because you knew.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: There is no surprise more magical than the surprise of being loved: It is God's finger on man's shoulder.
quotes.name: Charles Morgan

quotes.message: We're all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness and call it love true love.
quotes.name: Robert Fulghum

quotes.message: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you. I love you not only for what you have made of yourself, but for what you are making of me. I love you for the part of me that you bring out.
quotes.name: Roy Croft

quotes.message: Once you feel loved by the universe, you're already accepted, and you're not really concerned about offending people.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: I used to think being loved was the greatest thing to think about, but now I know love is never satisfied just thinking about it.
quotes.name: Bob Goff

quotes.message: I think that one of the things that you do learn is that falling in love and being in love with someone is a rarity. That you don't fall in love as many times as you think you're going to. And then when you do, it's really special; it's really important.
quotes.name: Julianne Moore

quotes.message: No matter what has happened. No matter what you've done. No matter what you will do. I will always love you. I swear it.
quotes.name: C.J. Redwine

quotes.message: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
quotes.name: Eden Ahbez

quotes.message: People fall in love without reason, without even wanting to. You can't predict it. That's love.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: Behind every angry soul is a wounded child that just wanted you to love them for who they are.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Feeling loved by God means feeling glad not only that he crushed his son so that I can be forgiven, but that he's crushing everything that takes away from my praising of the glory of his grace.
quotes.name: John Piper

quotes.message: To be loved but not known is comforting but superficial. To be known and not loved is our greatest fear. But to be fully known and truly loved is, well, a lot like being loved by God. It is what we need more than anything. It liberates us from pretense, humbles us out of our self-righteousness, and fortifies us for any difficulty life can throw at us.
quotes.name: Timothy Keller

quotes.message: The love we give away is the only love we keep.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: It is impossible to live without love. You must have the feeling of being loved.
quotes.name: Mireille Mathieu

quotes.message: Being in love is the best feeling on the planet. I really believe that love makes the world go round.
quotes.name: Sonam Kapoor

quotes.message: Being in love, I find myself smiling for no reason at all.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: With love, you should go ahead and take the risk of getting hurt because love is an amazing feeling.
quotes.name: Britney Spears

quotes.message: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quotes.name: A. A. Milne

quotes.message: I loved the feeling of finally falling in love to someone who would love me back.
quotes.name: Kristine Cuevas

quotes.message: A loving relationship is one in which the loved one is free to be himself to laugh with me, but never at me; to cry with me, but never because of me; to love life, to love himself, to love being loved. Such a relationship is based upon freedom and can never grow in a jealous heart.
quotes.name: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.message: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
quotes.name: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.message: But the experience that I had, which was basically just feeling loved and taken care of in a room full of thousands of people I didn't know, seemed to be a pretty strong sign that what I was doing was a good thing.
quotes.name: Mariel Hemingway

quotes.message: Love is the wisdom of the fool, and the folly of the wise.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: The cure love is marriage, and the cure for marriage is love again.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: As soon as you cannot keep anything from a woman, you love her.
quotes.name: Paul Geraldy

quotes.message: It's the nature of women not to love when we love them, and to love them not.
quotes.name: Cervantes

quotes.message: Love brings light to darkness darkness; it reaches through, sees through and follows through.
quotes.name: John A. Andrews

quotes.message: Love is patient however; it does not sit on the fence.
quotes.name: John A. Andrews

quotes.message: Love is never fragmented; it's an inseparable whole which does not delight in bits and pieces.
quotes.name: John A. Andrews

quotes.message: To love and be loved demands your best.
quotes.name: John A. Andrews

quotes.message: If love isn't flowing it's dying, and like the stream without it's source, one cannot give something which he does not first possess.
quotes.name: John A. Andrews

quotes.message: Being surrounded by love at home should be the base for your life.
quotes.name: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.message: Remember that the best relationships that in which mutual love is bigger that mutual necessity.
quotes.name: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.message: Love and cook with passion.
quotes.name: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.message: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
quotes.name: Rupert Everett

quotes.message: Tell me whom you love, and I will tell you who you are.
quotes.name: Arsene Houssaye

quotes.message: Love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: Love is a superstition that doth fear. The idol which it itself has made.
quotes.name: Sir Thomas Overbury

quotes.message: Love is life. And if you miss love, you miss life.
quotes.name: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.message: I like not only to be loved, but also to be told I am loved.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: A kiss is a rosy dot over the 'I' of loving.
quotes.name: Cyrano de Bergerac

quotes.message: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
quotes.name: Judy Garland

quotes.message: Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion.
quotes.name: Javan

quotes.message: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
quotes.name: H.Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.message: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Love is always bestowed as a gift - freely, willingly and without expectation. We don't love to be loved; we love to love.
quotes.name: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.message: If you wan't to be loved. Be lovable.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: We loved with a love that was more than love.
quotes.name: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.message: All mankind love a lover.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
