quotes.name: Eva Gabor

quotes.message: Everything is clearer when you're in love.
quotes.name: John Lennon

quotes.message: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Love consists in this, that two solitude protect and touch and greet each other.
quotes.name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.message: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: Love that is not madness is not love.
quotes.name: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.message: Love is supreme and unconditional; like is nice but limited.
quotes.name: Duke Ellington

quotes.message: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Love knows not distance; it hath no continent; it's eyes are for the stars.
quotes.name: Gilbert Parker

quotes.message: Love is but the discovery of ourselves in other, and the delight in the recognition.
quotes.name: Alexander Smith

quotes.message: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Women initiate most domestic violence.
quotes.name: Dov Charney

quotes.message: At the beginning, I wasn't aware of some of the stuff that goes on. Now, I have a heightened awareness of domestic violence and how to spot it.
quotes.name: Danielle Jones

quotes.message: The time when domestic violence is the most lethal is when the person is trying to leave the situation.
quotes.name: Julie Johnston

quotes.message: Even child abuse specialists do not routinely screen for domestic violence. This shows how much more education we need to do, even among experts, to understand the known links between violence of the child and the parent.
quotes.name: Jocelyn Brown

quotes.message: Domestic abuse is wrong, but domestic retribution is okay.
quotes.name: Dov Davidoff

quotes.message: Nobody believes that domestic violence kills and nobody believes it is detrimental to children. This world has got to wake up. To me, if there is domestic violence, if the children see it or hear it, that to me is detrimental. Batterers should not have rights to children.
quotes.name: Denise Brown

quotes.message: Domestic violence can be so easy for people to ignore, as it often happens without any witnesses and it is sometimes easier not to get involved. Yet, by publicly speaking out against domestic violence, together we can challenge attitudes towards violence in the home and show that domestic violence is a crime and not merely unacceptable.
quotes.name: Honor Blackman

quotes.message: An abuser isn't abusive 24.7. They usually demonstrate positive character traits most of the time. That's what makes the abuse so confusing when it happens, and what makes leaving so much more difficult.
quotes.name: Miya Yamanouchi

quotes.message: If the numbers we see in domestic violence were applied to terrorism or gang violence, the entire country would be up in arms, and it would be the lead story on the news every night.
quotes.name: Rep. Mark Green

quotes.message: No woman has to be a victim of physical abuse. Women have to feel like they are not alone.
quotes.name: Salma Hayek

quotes.message: Nearly one in four women will experience domestic violence during her lifetime. And slightly more than half of female victims of domestic violence live in households with children under age 12.
quotes.name: Lucille Roybal-Allard

quotes.message: There is a subconscious way of taking violence as a way of expression, as a normality, and it has a lot of effects in the youth in the way they absorb education and what they hope to get out of life.
quotes.name: Salma Hayek

quotes.message: A lot of people think that domestic violence is if someone hits, kicks, or punches you.
quotes.name: Robin McGraw

quotes.message: From what I've been told, the scariest part of being part of a domestic abuse relationship is the idea that you cannot escape and you cannot get help, that feeling of being stuck.
quotes.name: Kerry Washington

quotes.message: Hairdressers know a lot about the personal lives of their clients. They come in contact on a day-to-day basis with women dealing with domestic violence.
quotes.name: Gordon Miller

quotes.message: Domestic violence is the front line of the war against women.
quotes.name: Pearl Cleage

quotes.message: Sexual, racial, gender violence and other forms of discrimination and violence in a culture cannot be eliminated without changing culture.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bunch

quotes.message: A domestic violence advocate can help you discern your level of risk from your abuser and whether you should get a civil restraining order.
quotes.name: Caroline Abbott

quotes.message: The main reason they were homeless and in crisis was because of domestic violence.
quotes.name: Connie Phillips

quotes.message: One in three women may suffer from abuse and violence in her lifetime. This is an appalling human rights violation, yet it remains one of the invisible and under-recognized pandemics of our time.
quotes.name: Nicole Kidman

quotes.message: Domestic violence does not only happen to adults. Forty percent of girls age 14 to 17 report knowing someone their age who has been hit or beaten by a boyfriend, and approximately one in five female high school students reports being physically and.or sexually abused by a dating partner.
quotes.name: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.message: All violence consists in some people forcing others, under threat of suffering or death, to do what they do not want to do.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: Victims of domestic violence need assistance and deserve justice, I commend the crime unit's efforts to put offenders behind bars and reach out to victims.
quotes.name: Bob Riley

quotes.message: Society has seldom considered the vicarious effects of domestic violence between partners on the lives of children.
quotes.name: Asa Don Brown

quotes.message: Emotional abuse is any type of abuse that is not physical in nature. It can include everything from verbal abuse to the silent treatment, domination to subtle manipulation.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: We're number one in domestic violence homicides. We also have a high rate of alcohol abuse and drug abuse and there's a high lethality rate when you get those factors involved, so the shelter has 52 beds, certainly it is never empty.
quotes.name: Diana Burch

quotes.message: Domestic violence is any behavior involving physical, psychological, emotional, sexual or verbal abuse. It is any form of aggression intended to hurt, damage, or kill an intimate person.
quotes.name: Asa Don Brown

quotes.message: It's incredibly dangerous to leave an abuser, because the final step in the domestic violence pattern is: kill her.
quotes.name: Leslie Morgan Steiner

quotes.message: Long term domestic violence: Being abused in this manner is like being kidnapped and tortured for ransom but you will never have enough to pay off the kidnapper.
quotes.name: Rebecca J. Burns

quotes.message: Domestic violence is a criminal matter and needs to stay in criminal court, Too often, judges see charges of domestic violence as a ploy to get custody and send the case to family court.
quotes.name: Catherine Campbell

quotes.message: Domestic violence is frequently excused when alcohol and other substances are involved.
quotes.name: Asa Don Brown

quotes.message: I am living in hell from one day to the next. But there is nothing I can do to escape. I don't know where I would go if I did. I feel utterly powerless, and that feeling is my prision. I entered of my own free will, I locked the door, and I threw away the key.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: Women trapped in violent relationships need to know that there's no shame in talking out and walking out on their abusive partners.
quotes.name: Kate Thornton

quotes.message: Domestic violence causes far more pain than the visible marks of bruises and scars. It is devastating to be abused by someone that you love and think loves you in return. It is estimated that approximately 3 million incidents of domestic violence are reported each year in the United States.
quotes.name: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.message: Women initiate most domestic violence, yet out of a thousand cases of domestic violence, maybe one is involving a man. And this has made a victim of culture out of women.
quotes.name: Dov Charney

quotes.message: Few people who are hit once by someone they love respond in the way they might to a singular physical assault by a stranger.
quotes.name: Bell Hooks

quotes.message: Domestic violence causes far more pain than the visible marks of bruises and scars. It is devastating to be abused by someone that you love and think loves you in return.
quotes.name: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.message: Domestic violence occurs because of social power structures where the roles of men and women are predefined, and domestic violence is how that power is played out.
quotes.name: Inhe Choi

quotes.message: Where is the political prisoner movement for those women who are imprisoned for retaliating against abusive father, unless, lovers, and others? I think the absence of these types of campaigns speaks volumes about our movement's gender politics.
quotes.name: Kai Lumumba Barrow

quotes.message: We cannot to the police for protection against domestic violence and then rally against them from brutality as if they are two different institutions.
quotes.name: Anannya Bhattacharjee

quotes.message: If a child is confronted with murder, rape, domestic violence, and other kinds of destructive aggression in daily life, it doesn't surprise me if that child 'turns off' careful looking and listening.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: There is now a wider recognition that domestic violence is about perpetrator's power and control over women and involves not only physical and sexual violence but can include a number of behaviours such as intimidation and threats, isolation and humiliation, behaviour often named as psychological coercion or violence.
quotes.name: Lynne Harne

quotes.message: Domestic violence can occur in any intimate or familial relationship, irrespective of whether the parties are living together or not, whether they are married or cohabiting or living in three-generational extended families.
quotes.name: Lynne Harne

quotes.message: Domestic violence is a breach of human rights as well as major public health and clinical problem.
quotes.name: Louise Howard

quotes.message: Domestic violence and abuse is threatening behaviour, violence or abuse between adults who are relatives, partners or ex-partners. It includes abuse from adult children and from parents of adult children.
quotes.name: Louise Howard

quotes.message: Domestic violence has been shown to be associated with a range of mental health problems.
quotes.name: Louise Howard

quotes.message: Domestic violence is not at all unusual. It is a serious and far-reaching social problem.
quotes.name: Michael P. Johnson

quotes.message: It's violence from someone you know, someone who claims to love you.
quotes.name: Rachel Louise Snyder

quotes.message: It is most often hidden from even one's closest confidantes, and on many occasions the physical violence is far less damaging than the emotional and verbal violence.
quotes.name: Rachel Louise Snyder

quotes.message: Domestic violence is a pattern of emotional and.or physical abuse perpetrated by a romantic partner, the term can also include abuse perpetrated by a family member against another family member.
quotes.name: Stacey Freudenberg PsyD

quotes.message: It is fine to commiserate with a man about his bad experience with a previous partner, but the instant he uses her as an excuse to mistreat you, stop believing anything he tells you about that relationship and instead recognize it as a sign that he has problems with relating to women.
quotes.name: Lundy Bancroft

quotes.message: Never let a man put his hands on you without your permission.
quotes.name: Melda Beaty

quotes.message: Domestic abuse is a form of communication fueled by personal insecurities, temperament, economic, educational or lack therein, physical and psychological conditions.
quotes.name: Asa Don Brown

quotes.message: Domestic violence has often gone unnamed and unblamed in my society. It is the norm for men to teach their wives a lesson, and for the women to bear that beating and teaching with no complaints.
quotes.name: Fatima Mohammed

quotes.message: The very fact that intimate partner violence is so often addressed in civil court, rather than criminal court, gives insight into how we as a society still view it.
quotes.name: Rachel Louise Snyder

quotes.message: Leaving an abusive partner is a very difficult thing to do. It frequently feels like you are failing, or destroying your family, or not trying to work things out, or not giving your partner a second chance.
quotes.name: Blaine Nelson

quotes.message: I realize now I am a survivor. I am a stronger woman for opening my eyes and stepping away from someone who didn't respect themselves and would never respect me.
quotes.name: Lori

quotes.message: It is not the bruises on the body that hurt. It is the wounds of the heart and the scars on the mind.
quotes.name: Aisha Mirza

quotes.message: You are not the darkness you endured. You are the light that refused to surrender.
quotes.name: John Mark Green

quotes.message: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: A real man wouldn't lay a finger on a woman. He treats his partner with respect, love and support. Men are physically stronger and have no place abusing that power. Everyone has problems, and arguments happen, but that's when a real man uses his intelligence to talk it out.
quotes.name: Matt Lanter

quotes.message: ... you don't have to wait for someone to treat you bad repeatedly. All it takes is once, and if they get away with it that once, if they know they can treat you like that, then it sets the pattern for the future.
quotes.name: Jane Green

quotes.message: Please don't drown into his fears, his concrete fists don´t let him again, break the bridge of your nose with his cruel born hits. Then disappear into that mask of misery.
quotes.name: Anthony Liccione

quotes.message: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
quotes.name: Brad Henry

quotes.message: The one exclusive sign of thorough knowledge is the power of teaching.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: A good teacher, like a good entertainer first must hold his audience's attention, then he can teach his lesson.
quotes.name: John Henrik Clarke

quotes.message: Good teachers know how to bring out the best in students.
quotes.name: Charles Kuralt

quotes.message: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
quotes.name: Henry Adams

quotes.message: Teaching is leaving a vestige of one self in the development of another. And surely the student is a bank where you can deposit your most precious treasures.
quotes.name: Eugene P. Bertin

quotes.message: I have come to believe that a great teacher is a great artist and that there are as few as there are any other great artists. Teaching might even be the greatest of the arts since the medium is the human mind and spirit.
quotes.name: John Steinbeck

quotes.message: Teachers who inspire know that teaching is like cultivating a garden, and those who would have nothing to do with thorns must never attempt to gather flowers.
quotes.name: Unknown Author

quotes.message: The mediocre teacher tells. The good teacher explains. The superior teacher demonstrates. The great teacher inspires.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: In learning you will teach, and in teaching you will learn.
quotes.name: Phil Collins

quotes.message: Teaching should be full of ideas instead of stuffed with facts.
quotes.name: Unknown Author

quotes.message: No man can reveal to you aught but that which already lies half asleep in the dawning of your knowledge. The teacher who walks in the shadow of the temple, among his followers, gives not of his wisdom but rather of his faith and his lovingness. If he is indeed wise he does not bid you enter the house of his wisdom, but rather leads you to the threshold of your own mind.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: I never teach my pupils, I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Teachers, I believe, are the most responsible and important members of society because their professional efforts affect the fate of the earth.
quotes.name: Helen Caldecott

quotes.message: The dream begins, most of the time, with a teacher who believes in you, who tugs and pushes and leads you on to the next plateau, sometimes poking you with a sharp stick called truth.
quotes.name: Dan Rather

quotes.message: A good teacher is like a candle - it consumes itself to light the way for others.
quotes.name: Mustafa Kemal Ataruk

quotes.message: The future of the world is in my classroom today, a future with the potential for good or bad... Several future presidents are learning from me today; so are the great writers of the next decades, and so are all the so-called ordinary people who will make the decisions in a democracy. I must never forget these same young people could be the thieves and murderers of the future. Only a teacher? Thank God I have a calling to the greatest profession of all! I must be vigilant every day, lest I lose one fragile opportunity to improve tomorrow.
quotes.name: Ivan Welton Fitzwater

quotes.message: There's no word in the language I revere more than 'teacher.' My heart sings when a kid refers to me as his teacher, and it always has. I've honored myself and the entire family of man by becoming a teacher.
quotes.name: Pat Conroy

quotes.message: The whole art of teaching is only the art of awakening the natural curiosity of young minds for the purpose of satisfying it afterwards.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: If kids come to us from strong, healthy functioning families, it makes our job easier. If they do not come to us from strong, healthy, functioning families, it makes our job more important.
quotes.name: Barbara Colorose

quotes.message: Teaching is not a lost art, but the regard for it is a lost tradition.
quotes.name: Jacques Barzun

quotes.message: The man (or woman) who can make hard things easy is the educator.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: The test of a good teacher is not how many questions he can ask his pupils that they will answer readily, but how many questions he inspires them to ask him which he finds it hard to answer.
quotes.name: Alice Wellington Rollins

quotes.message: Teaching kids to count is fine, but teaching them what counts is best.
quotes.name: Bob Talbert

quotes.message: If we teach today's students as we taught yesterday's, we rob them of tomorrow.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: Teaching is the one profession that creates all other professions.
quotes.name: Unknown Author

quotes.message: If a child can't learn the way we teach, maybe we should teach the way they learn.
quotes.name: Ignacio Estrada

quotes.message: There are two kinds of teachers: the kind that fills you with so much quail shot that you can't move, and the kind that just gives you a little prod behind and you jump to the skies.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: The greatest sign of success for a teacher ... is to be able to say, 'The children are now working as if I did not exist.
quotes.name: Maria Montessori

quotes.message: Every truth has four corners: as a teacher I give you one corner, and it is for you to find the other three.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Good teaching is more a giving of right questions than a giving of right answers.
quotes.name: Josef Albers

quotes.message: What we want is to see the child in pursuit of knowledge, and not knowledge in pursuit of the child.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Good teaching is one-fourth preparation and three-fourths theatre.
quotes.name: Gail Goldwin

quotes.message: I cannot teach anybody anything, I can only make them think.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: A teacher is one who makes himself progressively unnecessary.
quotes.name: Thomas Caruthers

quotes.message: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: A mind when stretched by a new idea never regains its original dimensions.
quotes.name: Unknown Author

quotes.message: Teaching is more than imparting knowledge, it is inspiring change. Learning is more than absorbing facts, it is acquiring understanding.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: A teacher who is attempting to teach without inspiring the pupil with a desire to learn is hammering on cold iron.
quotes.name: Horace Mann

quotes.message: A hundred years from now, it will not matter what kind of car I drove, what kind of house I lived in, how much money I had in the bank...but the world may be a better place because I made a difference in the life of a child.
quotes.name: Forest Witcraft

quotes.message: It is not what is poured into a student that counts but what is planted.
quotes.name: Linda Conway

quotes.message: When you study great teachers... you will learn much more from their caring and hard work than from their style.
quotes.name: William Glaser

quotes.message: The average teacher explains complexity; the gifted teacher reveals simplicity.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: There is, in fact, no teaching without learning. One requires the other.
quotes.name: Paulo Freire

quotes.message: Ideal teachers are those who use themselves as bridges over which they invite their students to cross, then having facilitated their crossing, joyfully collapse, encouraging them to create bridges of their own.
quotes.name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.message: You can teach a student a lesson for a day; but if you can teach him to learn by creating curiosity, he will continue the learning process as long as he lives.
quotes.name: Clay P. Bedford

quotes.message: Do not train children to learning by force and harshness, but direct them to it by what amuses their minds, so that you may be better able to discover with accuracy the peculiar bent of the genius of each.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: In teaching you cannot see the fruit of a day's work. It is invisible and remains so, maybe for twenty years.
quotes.name: Jacques Barzun

quotes.message: To teach is to learn twice over.
quotes.name: Joseph Joubert

quotes.message: The authority of those who teach is often an obstacle to those who want to learn.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: The object of teaching a child is to enable him to get along without a teacher.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Teaching like any truly human activity emerges from one's inwardness.
quotes.name: Parker J. Palmer

quotes.message: We can teach from our experience, but we cannot teach experience.
quotes.name: Sasha Azevedo

quotes.message: Teaching is the highest form of understanding.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Example isn't another way to teach, it is the only way to teach.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Teaching is more than imparting knowledge, it is inspiring change.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: Teaching is the canny art of intellectual temptation
quotes.name: Jerome Bruner

quotes.message: He who dares to teach must never cease to learn.
quotes.name: Richard Henry Dann

quotes.message: Effective teaching may be the hardest job there is.
quotes.name: William Glasser

quotes.message: Teaching is of more importance than urging.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Teaching should be such that what is offered is perceived as a valuable gift and not as a hard duty.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Some of the world's best educators are grandparents.
quotes.name: Dr. Charlie W. Shedd

quotes.message: Any genuine teaching will result, if successful, in someone's knowing how to bring about a better condition of things than existed earlier.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: If you would thoroughly know anything, teach it to others.
quotes.name: Tryon Edwards

quotes.message: True teaching is not that which gives knowledge, but that which stimulates pupils to gain it.
quotes.name: John Milton Gregory

quotes.message: Everybody who is incapable of learning has taken to teaching.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Teaching is truth mediated by personality.
quotes.name: Phyllis Brooks

quotes.message: Share your knowledge. It is a way to achieve immortality.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.message: Experience teaches only the teachable.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: To know how to suggest is the great art of teaching.
quotes.name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.message: Teaching does not come from a political mandate ... it comes from the heart.
quotes.name: Robert John Meehan

quotes.message: The key to fixing education is better teaching, and the key to better teaching is figuring out who can teach and who can't.
quotes.name: Jonathan Alter

quotes.message: You cannot teach a man anything, you can only help him find it within himself.
quotes.name: Galileo Galilei

quotes.message: To teach is to touch the heart and impel it to action.
quotes.name: Louis Sullivan

quotes.message: We should not teach children the sciences; but give them a taste for them.
quotes.name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.message: A teacher who is attempting to teach without inspiring the pupil with a desire to learn, is hammering on cold iron.
quotes.name: Horace Mann

quotes.message: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
quotes.name: B.B. King

quotes.message: Teach a child how to think, not what to think.
quotes.name: Sidney Sugarman

quotes.message: Teaching is an art, not a science, principally because it involves human beings, their emotions and their values.
quotes.name: Gilbert Highet

quotes.message: No one learns as much about a subject as one who is forced to teach it.
quotes.name: Peter F. Drucker

quotes.message: Teaching is the systematic inculcation of knowledge.
quotes.name: John Milton Gregory

quotes.message: There is no better way to learn than to teach.
quotes.name: Benjamin Whichcote

quotes.message: There are three things to remember when teaching: know your stuff; know whom you are stuffing; and then stuff them elegantly.
quotes.name: Lola May

quotes.message: Every day that you teach you have two options: be focused, passionate and caring, or to be focused, passionate and caring.
quotes.name: Robert John Meehan

quotes.message: There should not be any particular teaching. Teaching is in each moment.
quotes.name: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.message: Good teaching is one-fourth preparation and three-fourths pure theatre.
quotes.name: Gail Godwin

quotes.message: Teaching is unlikely to change until teachers, and all educators, recognize that it can be studied and improved.
quotes.name: James W. Stigler @ James Hiebert

quotes.message: None can teach admirably if not loving his task.
quotes.name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.message: You cannot teach a crab to walk straight.
quotes.name: Aristophenes

quotes.message: Not fault of teaching spider if little spider pay more attention to catching fly than doing lesson
quotes.name: Anne Bishop

quotes.message: Those who know, do. Those that understand, teach.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: The learning process is something you can incite, literally incite, like a riot.
quotes.name: Audre Lorde

quotes.message: When you want to teach children to think, you begin by treating them seriously when they are little, giving them responsibilities, talking to them candidly, providing privacy and solitude for them, and making them readers and thinkers of significant thoughts from the beginning. That’s if you want to teach them to think.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Do not confine your children to your own learning, for they were born in another time.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: One day with a great teacher is better than a thousand days of diligent study.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: With too much pride a man cannot learn a thing. In and of itself, learning teaches you how foolish you are.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Spoon feeding in the long run teaches us nothing but the shape of the spoon.
quotes.name: E. M. Forster

quotes.message: Genius is the ability to independently arrive at and understand concepts that would normally have to be taught by another person.
quotes.name: Immanuel Kant

quotes.message: Real learning comes about when the competitive spirit has ceased.
quotes.name: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.message: Don't remember what you try to teach them. They remember what you are.
quotes.name: Jim Henson

quotes.message: The job of an educator is to teach students to see vitality in themselves.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: One child, one teacher, one book, one pen can change the world.
quotes.name: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.message: Teaching is only demonstrating that it is possible. Learning is making it possible for yourself.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: I cannot be a teacher without exposing who I am.
quotes.name: Paulo Freire

quotes.message: Learning is finding out what you already know. Doing is demonstrating that you know it. Teaching is reminding others that they know just as well as you. You are all learners, doers, teachers.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: If you want to teach people a new way of thinking, don't bother trying to teach them. Instead, give them a tool, the use of which will lead to new ways of thinking.
quotes.name: Richard Buckminster Fuller

quotes.message: The fundamental purpose of school is learning, not teaching.
quotes.name: Richard DuFour

quotes.message: His older self had taught his younger self a language which the older self knew because the younger self, after being taught, grew up to be the older self and was, therefore, capable of teaching.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: I am not a teacher, but an awakener.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: When one teaches, two learn.
quotes.name: Robert Heinlein

quotes.message: We must teach our girls that if they speak their mind, they can create the world they want to see.
quotes.name: Robyn Silverman

quotes.message: Teachers teach someone something, in that order.
quotes.name: Samuel Natale

quotes.message: We never know which lives we influence, or when, or why.
quotes.name: Stephen King

quotes.message: At it's highest level, the purpose of teaching is not to teach it is to inspire the desire for learning. Once a student's mind is set on fire, it will find a way to provide its own fuel.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: What you do teaches faster, and has a lasting impression, far beyond what you say.
quotes.name: T.F. Hodge

quotes.message: If you want to use television to teach somebody, you must first teach them how to use television.
quotes.name: Umberto Eco

quotes.message: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Im a shy person. I contradict my own profession, because Im an introvert in a very glamorous world.
quotes.name: Deepika Padukone

quotes.message: All sorrow has its root in man's inability to sit quiet in a room by himself.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: When a quiet introvert talks, heads turn, and that's power.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: Often confused with shyness, introversion does not imply social reticence or discomfort. Rather than being averse to social engagement, introverts become overwhelmed by too much of it, which explains why the introvert is ready to leave a party after an hour and the extravert gains steam as the night goes on.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: For an introvert his environment is himself and can never be subject to startling or unforeseen change.
quotes.name: Quentin Crisp

quotes.message: Introverts are more effective leaders of proactive employees. When you have a creative, energetic work force, an introvert is going to draw out that energy better.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: I'm an introvert at heart... And show business - even though I've loved it so much - has always been hard for me.
quotes.name: Roy Rogers

quotes.message: Introverts paradoxically pull away from culture and create culture.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: For introverts, to be alone with our thoughts is as restorative as sleeping, as nourishing as eating.
quotes.name: Jonathan Rauch

quotes.message: As an introvert, you can be your own best friend or your worst enemy. The good news is we generally like our own company, a quality that extroverts often envy. We find comfort in solitude and know how to soothe ourselves.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: An introverted, bookish child, with a mass of complexes and her head full of crazy ideals and a childish faith in the beautiful prince who was searching for and would surely find her.
quotes.name: Sergei Lukyanenko

quotes.message: Introverts think carefully before they speak. We can be excellent public speakers because we prepare carefully.
quotes.name: Sophia Dembling

quotes.message: Introverts dislike small talk, but we are fluent in the language of ideas and dreams.
quotes.name: Michaela Chung

quotes.message: Introverts treasure the close relationships they have stretched so much to make.
quotes.name: Adam S. McHugh

quotes.message: Introverts often work more slowly and deliberately. They like to focus on one task at a time and can have mighty powers of concentration. They're relatively immune to the lures of wealth and fame.
quotes.name: Susan Cain

quotes.message: The only thing a true introvert dislikes more than talking about himself is repeating himself.
quotes.name: Jonathan Rauch

quotes.message: Introverts process information internally, and we don't like to express our thoughts until they are fully formed.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: It was words and reading that had made me quiet, and being quiet had made me a mark.
quotes.name: Charles M. Blow

quotes.message: Introverts are capable of acting like extroverts for the sake of work they consider important, people they love, or anything they value highly.
quotes.name: Susan Cain

quotes.message: What we share as introverts is the love of ideas and the desire to explore them with minimal interruption. We want and need input, but we'd rather get it through reading, research, and rich conversation than through unfiltered talk.
quotes.name: Laurie A. Helgoe

quotes.message: Introverts are generally more sensitive to low-intensity stimuli - they are mentally alerted to inputs that extroverts may miss.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: Introverts need to trust their gut and share their ideas as powerfully as they can.
quotes.name: Susan Cain

quotes.message: An inability to stay quiet is one of the conspicuous failings of mankind.
quotes.name: Walter Bagehot

quotes.message: Introverts often feel more freedom in worship services that feature traditional liturgy than they do in ones that feature more open, informal, unstructured styles of worship. Introverts often appreciate the depth of liturgical prayers and hymns, as well as the rich symbolism that fill traditional churches.
quotes.name: Adam S. McHugh

quotes.message: I'm an introvert... I love being by myself, love being outdoors, love taking a long walk with my dogs and looking at the trees, flowers, the sky.
quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.message: When someone speaks to an introvert, her brain responds with a high level of activity. It is as if several lights start flashing on a control panel.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: Introverts are dependent on their own inside noise, extroverts are dependent of outside noise. The outputs are dependent on quality of those noise.
quotes.name: Amit K Ghosh

quotes.message: She might be a little introverted, livelier of movement than of conversation, neither bashful nor forward, with a soul that seemed submerged, but in a radiant moistness. Opalescent on the surface but translucent in her depths.
quotes.name: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.message: Introvert conversations are like jazz. Each player gets to solo for a nice stretch before the other player comes in and does his solo.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: Introverts often assume what's inside is visible on the outside.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: The last introvert in a world of extroverts. Silence: my response to both emptiness and saturation. But silence frightens people. I had to learn how to talk. Out of politeness.
quotes.name: Ariel Gore

quotes.message: When introverts are in conflict with each other...
quotes.name: Adam S. McHugh

quotes.message: A lot of good actors tend to be quite introverted as people.
quotes.name: Antony Sher

quotes.message: Introverts don't get lonely if they don't socialize with a lot of people, but we do get lonely if we don't have intimate interactions on a regular basis.
quotes.name: Sophia Dembling

quotes.message: A happy life must be to a great extent a quiet life, for it is only in an atmosphere of quiet that true joy dare live.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Whatever kind of introvert you are, some people will find you 'too much' in some ways and 'not enough' in others.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: Shyness is about the fear of social judgments - at a job interview or a party you might be excessively worried about what people think of you. Whereas an introvert might not feel any of those things at all, they simply have the preference to be in a quieter setting.
quotes.name: Susan Cain

quotes.message: Introverts, the world needs you and it needs the things you carry. So I wish you the best of all possible journeys and the courage to speak softly.
quotes.name: Susan Cain

quotes.message: Introverts are collectors of thoughts, and solitude is where the collection is curated and rearranged to make sense of the present and future.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: Writing is something you do alone. Its a profession for introverts who want to tell you a story but don't want to make eye contact while doing it.
quotes.name: John Green

quotes.message: I think the best thing I have is the introvert's ability to listen when you're working on something as complicated as this and you have to really be aware of everyone's specialized skills.
quotes.name: Jennifer Yuh Nelson

quotes.message: When you're an introvert like me and you've been lonely for a while, and then you find someone who understands you, you become really attached to them. It's a real release.
quotes.name: Lana Del Rey

quotes.message: Quiet people have the loudest minds.
quotes.name: Stephen Hawking

quotes.message: When an introvert is quiet, don't assume he is depressed, snobbish or socially deficient.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: Introverts prefer to work independently, and solitude can be a catalyst to innovation.
quotes.name: Susan Cain

quotes.message: A shy kid might look longingly at other kids playing in the schoolyard, afraid and unsure about how to approach them, but an introvert is perfectly content on her own.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: I was very shy and very reserved as a child, very, very introvert.
quotes.name: Om Puri

quotes.message: There are no regrets in life, just lessons.
quotes.name: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.message: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.name: Victoria Holt

quotes.message: I have no regrets because I know I did my best -- all I could do.
quotes.name: Midori Ito

quotes.message: I've no regrets. You take responsibility for your actions.
quotes.name: Ron Moody

quotes.message: Work hard, do your best, live the truth, trust yourself, have some fun...and you'll have no regrets.
quotes.name: Byrd Bagget

quotes.message: I have no regrets. Regrets are meaningless. You can't change yesterday or tomorrow. You can change only this present moment.
quotes.name: Richey Edwards

quotes.message: There's no point in regretting things. If you can't do the time, don't do the crime. Life's too short to worry about things I've said.
quotes.name: Robbie Williams

quotes.message: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Make it a rule of life never to regret and never to look back. regret is an appalling waste of energy; you can't build on it; it's only good for wallowing in.
quotes.name: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.message: No regrets. No looking back. Just hold onto life and move forward. We have no way of knowing what lies ahead...and that is what makes the journey even more exciting.
quotes.name: Susan Gale

quotes.message: I have no regrets. I will never regret loving someone because the feeling of love for five minutes is greater than an eternity of hurt.
quotes.name: Kurt Langner

quotes.message: Never regret. IF IT'S GOOD, It's wonderful. IF IT'S BAD, IT'S experience.
quotes.name: Victoria Holt

quotes.message: At the end of the day let their be no regrets, only a desire to do more tomorrow than you did today.
quotes.name: Noel Dejesus

quotes.message: I have no regrets in my life. I think that everything happens to you for a reason. The hard times that you go through build character, making you a much stronger person.
quotes.name: Rita Mero

quotes.message: Never look back and regret, look back and smile at what you have learned.
quotes.name: Michelle C. Ustaszeski

quotes.message: I don't dwell in the past; I don't wallow in old events and emotions. I don't waste time on regret. No use going over and over the details of what already happened.
quotes.name: Yanni

quotes.message: I don't have time for regrets, only fun.
quotes.name: Carrie Bradshaw

quotes.message: I have no regrets. I don't believe in looking back. What I am proudest of? Working really hard... and achieving as much as I could.
quotes.name: Elena Kagan

quotes.message: I already gave my best. I have no regrets at all.
quotes.name: William Hung

quotes.message: Accept everything about yourself - I mean everything, You are you and that is the beginning and the end - no apologies, no regrets.
quotes.name: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.message: I never regret anything. Because every little detail of your life is what made you into who you are in the end.
quotes.name: Drew Barrymore

quotes.message: Live with no excuses and love with no regrets.
quotes.name: Montel

quotes.message: We should all start to live before we get too old. Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
quotes.name: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.message: We should have no regrets. ... The past is finished. There is nothing to be gained by going over it. Whatever it gave us in the experiences it brought us was something we had to know.
quotes.name: Rebecca Beard

quotes.message: Forget regret, or life is yours to miss.
quotes.name: Jonathan Larson

quotes.message: Regret for time wasted can become a power for good in the time that remains, if we will only stop the waste and the idle, useless regretting.
quotes.name: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.message: In looking back, I see nothing to regret and little to correct.
quotes.name: John C. Calhoun

quotes.message: Regrets and recriminations only hurt your soul.
quotes.name: Armand Hammer

quotes.message: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
quotes.name: George Halas

quotes.message: Regret for wasted time is more wasted time.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: If I should die tomorrow, I will have no regrets. I did what I wanted to do. You can't expect more from life.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Never regret anything you have done with a sincere affection; nothing is lost that is born of the heart.
quotes.name: Basil Rathbone

quotes.message: Never regret yesterday. Life is in you today, and you make your tomorrow.
quotes.name: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.message: Regrets are just expired Dreams.. Throw them out.
quotes.name: Kinyo

quotes.message: If I'm sincere today, what does it matter if I regret it tomorrow?
quotes.name: Jos Saramago

quotes.message: In a world where death is the hunter, my friend, there is no time for regrets or doubts. There is only time for decisions.
quotes.name: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.message: Living in the moment, without attaching yourself to regrets about yesterday or worries about tomorrow, goes a long way toward cutting through the chaos of everyday life.
quotes.name: Eve Adamson

quotes.message: Do it right, regret nothing.
quotes.name: Vanna Bonta

quotes.message: Do not anxiously expect what is not yet come; do not vainly regret what is already past.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: You'd think, 'What if I make a mistake today, I'll regret it'. I don't believe in regret, I feel everything leads us to where we are and we have to just jump forward, mean well, commit and just see what happens.
quotes.name: Angelina Jolie

quotes.message: Has this world been so kind to you that you should leave with regret? There are better things ahead than any we leave behind.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: I want to live my life so that my nights are not full of regrets.
quotes.name: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.message: Don't waste today regretting yesterday instead of making a memory for tomorrow.
quotes.name: Laura Palmer

quotes.message: This day is all that is good and fair. It is too dear, with its hopes and invitations, to waste a moment on the yesterdays.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: You must never regret what might have been. The past that did not happen is as hidden from us as the future we cannot see.
quotes.name: Richard Martin Stern

quotes.message: Were it not better to forget than to remember and regret?
quotes.name: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.message: We can't afford to waste tears on might-have-beens. We need to turn the tears into sweat that can take us to what can be.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: We must not weep for what might have been. There is still time.
quotes.name: Edward Matchett

quotes.message: Our biggest regrets are not for the things we have done but for the things we haven't done.
quotes.name: Chad Michael Murray

quotes.message: Be wise today so you don’t cry tomorrow.
quotes.name: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.message: The only regret I will have in dying is if it is not for love.
quotes.name: Gabriel García Márquez

quotes.message: Guard well within yourself that treasure, kindness. Know how to give without hesitation, how to lose without regret, how to acquire without meanness.
quotes.name: George Sand

quotes.message: Unfortunately, the clock is ticking, the hours are going by. The past increases, the future recedes. Possibilities decreasing, regrets mounting.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.name: Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.message: One of my main regrets in life is giving considerable thought to inconsiderate people.
quotes.name: Jarod Kintz

quotes.message: We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Why didn't I learn to treat everything like it was the last time. My greatest regret was how much I believed in the future.
quotes.name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.message: I regret that it takes a life to learn how to live.
quotes.name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.message: You can't regret the life you didn't lead.
quotes.name: Junot Díaz

quotes.message: Of all the words of mice and men, the saddest are, It might have been.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: Speak when you are angry – and you’ll make the best speech you’ll ever regret.
quotes.name: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.message: There’s always failure. And there’s always disappointment. And there’s always loss. But the secret is learning from the loss, and realizing that none of those holes are vacuums.
quotes.name: Michael J. Fox

quotes.message: Sacrifice is a part of life. It's supposed to be. It's not something to regret. It's something to aspire to.
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: I'm done with those; regrets are an excuse for people who have failed.
quotes.name: Ned Vizzini

quotes.message: You’re not living if you’re not regretting.
quotes.name: Nicola Yoon

quotes.message: The past could always be annihilated. Regret, denial, or forgetfulness could do that. But the future was inevitable.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde.

quotes.message: When you find your path, you must not be afraid. You need to have sufficient courage to make mistakes. Disappointment, defeat, and despair are the tools God uses to show us the way.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Don’t waste your time in anger, regrets, worries, and grudges. Life is too short to be unhappy.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: No amount of regretting can change the past, and no amount of worrying can change the future.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: There are two kinds of guilt: the kind that drowns you until you’re useless, and the kind that fires your soul to purpose.
quotes.name: Sabaa Tahir

quotes.message: One of the greatest regrets in life is being what others would want you to be, rather than being yourself.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: One day, perhaps, you will see for yourself that regrets are as nothing. The value lies in how they are answered.
quotes.name: Steven Erikson

quotes.message: When you're happy you find pure joy in your life. There are no regrets in this state of happiness - and that's a goal worth striving for in all areas of your life.
quotes.name: Suze Orman

quotes.message: Regret for the things we did can be tempered by time; it is regret for the things we did not do that is inconsolable.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: The principles of living greatly include the capacity to face trouble with courage, disappointment with cheerfulness, and trial with humility.
quotes.name: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.message: My one regret in life is that I am not someone else.
quotes.name: Woody Allen

quotes.message: Debt is such a powerful tool, it is such a useful tool, it's much better than colonialism ever was because you can keep control without having an army, without having a whole administration.
quotes.name: Susan George

quotes.message: He who promises runs in debt.
quotes.name: The Talmud

quotes.message: Debt, we've learned, is the match that lights the fire of every crisis. Every crisis has its own set of villains - pick your favorite: bankers, regulators, central bankers, politicians, overzealous consumers, credit rating agencies - but all require one similar ingredient to create a true crisis: too much leverage.
quotes.name: Andrew Ross Sorkin

quotes.message: Debt is great source of inner unhappiness.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: A mortgage casts a shadow on the sunniest field.
quotes.name: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.message: Debts and lies are generally mixed together.
quotes.name: Francois Rabelais

quotes.message: Debt can turn a free, happy person into a bitter human being.
quotes.name: Michael Mihalik

quotes.message: No man's credit is as good as his money.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: Debt on anything that depreciates is disastrous.
quotes.name: Orrin Woodward

quotes.message: Debts are like children: the smaller they are the more noise they make.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: Debt . . . . that peculiar nexus where money, narrative or story, and religious belief intersect, often with explosive force.
quotes.name: Margaret Atwood

quotes.message: Debt is like any other trap, easy enough to get into, but hard enough to get out of.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: The debt of gratitude we owe our mother and father goes forward, not backward. What we owe our parents is the bill presented to us by our children.
quotes.name: Nancy Friday

quotes.message: Debt is a mistake between lender and borrower, and both should suffer.
quotes.name: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.message: If you think nobody cares if you're alive, try missing a couple of car payments.
quotes.name: Earl Wilson

quotes.message: Only debt is forever.
quotes.name: Charles Stross

quotes.message: Debt is an ingenious substitute for the chain and whip of the slavedriver.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: A man in debt is so far a slave.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Debt is the worst poverty.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: A Debt Problem Is, At Its Core, a Budgeting Problem.
quotes.name: Natalie Pace

quotes.message: We can pay our debts to the past by putting the future in debt to ourselves.
quotes.name: John Buchan

quotes.message: Blessed are the young, for they shall inherit the national debt.
quotes.name: Herbert Hoover

quotes.message: Debt is normal. Be weird.
quotes.name: Dave Ramsey

quotes.message: Debt is the secret foe of thrift, as vice and idleness are its open enemies.
quotes.name: James H. Aughey

quotes.message: He that dies pays all debts.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Debt certainly isn't always a bad thing. A mortgage can help you afford a home. Student loans can be a necessity in getting a good job. Both are investments worth making, and both come with fairly low interest rates.
quotes.name: Jean Chatzky

quotes.message: There are some debts that can't be paid with money.
quotes.name: Steven J. Carroll

quotes.message: Some debts are fun when you are acquiring them, but none are fun when you set about retiring them.
quotes.name: Ogden Nash

quotes.message: A habit of debt is very injurious to the memory.
quotes.name: Austin O'Malley

quotes.message: Never spend your money before you have it.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: The debt we owe to the play of imagination is incalculable.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: Small debts are like small shot; they are rattling on every side, and can scarcely be escaped without a wound; great debts are like cannon; of loud noise, but little danger.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Debt is a social and ideological construct, not a simple economic fact.
quotes.name: Noam Chomsky

quotes.message: Debt is dumb. Cash is king.
quotes.name: Dave Ramsey

quotes.message: Debt basically enables people to live a lie.
quotes.name: Rachel Cruze

quotes.message: Debt is one person's liability, but another person's asset.
quotes.name: Paul Krugman

quotes.message: An emotional debt is hard to square.
quotes.name: Iceberg Slim

quotes.message: Debt trap can sometimes become a Death trap.
quotes.name: Ankala V Subbarao

quotes.message: Debt is the slavery of the free.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: Debt is part of the human condition. Civilization is based on exchanges - on gifts, trades, loans - and the revenges and insults that come when they are not paid back.
quotes.name: Margaret Atwood

quotes.message: Debt is a prolific mother of folly and of crime.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Debt, n. An ingenious substitute for the chain and whip of the slavedriver.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: A promise made is a debt unpaid.
quotes.name: Robert W. Service

quotes.message: Debt is a four letter word and means a four word sentence - Be Prepared for Trouble.
quotes.name: Lucas Remmerswaal

quotes.message: If I owe you a pound, I have a problem; but if I owe you a million, the problem is yours.
quotes.name: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.message: You can't be in debt and win. It doesn't work.
quotes.name: Dave Ramsey

quotes.message: Simply put, unsustainable debt is helping to keep too many poor countries and poor people in poverty.
quotes.name: William J. Clinton

quotes.message: A small debt produces a debtor; a large one, an enemy.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: One of the greatest disservices you can do a man is to lend him money that he can't pay back.
quotes.name: Jesse H. Jones

quotes.message: Every election is a sort of advance auction sale of stolen goods.
quotes.name: H. L. Mencken

quotes.message: Free election of masters does not abolish the masters or the slaves.
quotes.name: Herbert Marcuse

quotes.message: Winning or losing of the election is less important than strengthening the country.
quotes.name: Indira Gandhi

quotes.message: The people who cast the votes decide nothing. The people who count the votes decide everything.
quotes.name: Joseph Stalin

quotes.message: If voting made any difference they wouldn't let us do it.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: An election is a moral horror, as bad as a battle except for the blood; a mud bath for every soul concerned in it.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Leadership is not about the next election, it's about the next generation.
quotes.name: Simon Sinek

quotes.message: People never lie so much as after a hunt, during a war or before an election.
quotes.name: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.message: Clever and attractive women do not want to vote; they are willing to let men govern as long as they govern men
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: This election could come down to just a handful of votes. It could come down to just one vote.
quotes.name: Vicky Hartzler

quotes.message: The election is not very far off when a candidate can recognize you across the street.
quotes.name: Kin Hubbard

quotes.message: An election is coming. Universal peace is declared, and the foxes have a sincere interest in prolonging the lives of the poultry.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Elections belong to the people. It's their decision. If they decide to turn their back on the fire and burn their behinds, then they will just have to sit on their blisters.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: In an election, one needs both hope and audacity.
quotes.name: Francois Hollande

quotes.message: We elected a man who knows how to build walls when we needed someone who knows how to build bridges.
quotes.name: DaShanne Stokes

quotes.message: Elections determine who is in power, but they do not determine how power is used.
quotes.name: Paul Collier

quotes.message: In elections, the undecided vote is usually the deciding factor.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: In elections, you can't tell the outcome until you open the ballot boxes.
quotes.name: Katsuya Okada

quotes.message: To finalize, the purpose of an election is to hear the will of the people, not to fabricate votes.
quotes.name: Lincoln Diaz-Balart

quotes.message: During an election campaign the air is full of speeches and vice versa.
quotes.name: Henry Adams

quotes.message: Elections are about the future.
quotes.name: Nancy Pelosi

quotes.message: We deserve elections we can trust.
quotes.name: Jill Stein

quotes.message: An election cannot give a country a firm sense of direction if it has two or more national parties which merely have different names, but are as alike in their principals and aims as two peas in the same pod.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: An election is an opportunity for a new consensus.
quotes.name: Martin O'Malley

quotes.message: The right of election is the very essence of the constitution.
quotes.name: Junius

quotes.message: If elections really changed anything, they would be outlawed.
quotes.name: Emma Goldman

quotes.message: People are what this election is all about.
quotes.name: Patty Berg

quotes.message: Every election is determined by the people who show up.
quotes.name: Larry J. Sabato

quotes.message: You cannot win an election without a fight.
quotes.name: Tony Abbott

quotes.message: A politician thinks of the next election. A statesman, of the next generation.
quotes.name: James Freeman Clarke

quotes.message: Politics resemble religion; attempting to divest either of ceremony is the most certain mode of bringing either into contempt.
quotes.name: Goldsmith

quotes.message: Great political questions stir the deepest nature of one half the nation; but they pass far above and over the heads of the other half.
quotes.name: Wendell Phillips

quotes.message: A politician weakly and amiably in the right is no match for a politician tenaciously and pugnaciously in the wrong.
quotes.name: Whipple

quotes.message: We go by the major vote, and if the majority are insane, the sane must go to the hospital.
quotes.name: Horace Mann

quotes.message: The universe would not be rich enough to buy the vote of an honest man.
quotes.name: St. Gregory

quotes.message: The men I am afraid of are the men who believe everything, subscribe to everything, and vote for everything.
quotes.name: Bishop Shipley

quotes.message: We cannot, and we must not do away with democracy at any level. For democracy is not merely political institution. It is a way of life.
quotes.name: Bidhan Nagar

quotes.message: Election, lest it be realized, is just the beginning of democracy.
quotes.name: Bidhan Nagar

quotes.message: Voters are not a common mass of men and women. They belong to so many distinctive functional groups with diverse and often conflicting interests.
quotes.name: Bidhan Nagar

quotes.message: Always vote for principle, though you may vote alone, and you may cherish the sweetest reflection that your vote is never lost.
quotes.name: John Quincy Adams

quotes.message: To vote is like the payment of a debt, a duty never to be neglected, if its performance is possible.
quotes.name: Rutherford B. Hayes

quotes.message: He who uses the office he owes to the voters wrongfully and against them is a thief.
quotes.name: Jose Marti

quotes.message: Some people including colonists who founded America think voting is the most important right a citizen of a democracy can have. Yet when America was founded, only white male landowners age twenty-one and over had the right to vote.
quotes.name: Susan Buckley

quotes.message: It's not the voting that's democracy, it's the counting.
quotes.name: Tom Stoppard

quotes.message: Democracy substitutes election by the incompetent many for appointment by the corrupt few.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: When you turn an election into a three-ring circus, there’s always a chance that the dancing bear will win.
quotes.name: Nancy Isenberg

quotes.message: Contrary to popular opinion, leadership is not a reserved position for a particular group of people who were elected or appointed, ordained or enthroned. Leadership is self-made, self-retained, self-inculcated and then exposed through a faithful, sincere and exemplary life.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: It is morally permissible to sell one's vote to another person such that the seller acquires another vote.
quotes.name: Jason Brennan

quotes.message: Philosophers believe that we have a duty not merely to vote but to vote well.
quotes.name: Jason Brennan

quotes.message: Citizens typically have no duty to vote. However, if citizens do vote, they must vote well, on the basis of sound evidence for what is likely to promote the common good.
quotes.name: Jason Brennan

quotes.message: Citizens who lack the motive, knowledge, rationality, or ability to vote well should abstain from voting.
quotes.name: Jason Brennan

quotes.message: Having the right to vote is important, even if it is not always important to exercise that right.
quotes.name: Jason Brennan

quotes.message: The popular wisdom is that voting is a freedom that citizens have a right to exercise or not to exercise.
quotes.name: Julia Maskivker

quotes.message: It is common to encounter the belief that democracy affords us the freedom to have our voice heard. It also offers us the freedom not to care about being heard.
quotes.name: Julia Maskivker

quotes.message: When members of a group of people each make a choice and each person's choice is counted, that's voting.
quotes.name: Kristen Rajczak Nelson

quotes.message: You may have voted by simply raising your hand in class to pick what move to watch.
quotes.name: Kristen Rajczak Nelson

quotes.message: Some TV shows let fans call in, text or visit a website to vote for winners each week.
quotes.name: Kristen Rajczak Nelson

quotes.message: Voting contributes to a collective outcome, rather than affecting us purely as individuals.
quotes.name: Jocelyn A J Evans

quotes.message: Even in the most anodyne of situations, voting matters.
quotes.name: Jocelyn A J Evans

quotes.message: Terrorism is what we call the violence of the weak, and we condemn it; war is what we call the violence of the strong, and we glorify it.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: Terrorism has no religion, terrorists have no religion and they are friends of no religion.
quotes.name: Manmohan Singh

quotes.message: Terrorism will never cease in a country where the so called leaders are criminals and terrorists in disguise.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Terrorism can go anywhere where there is not strong government, or government that cannot control its hinterlands.
quotes.name: Robert D. Kaplan

quotes.message: We do not create terrorism by fighting the terrorists. We invite terrorism by ignoring them.
quotes.name: George W. Bush

quotes.message: Terrorism is the intentional use of, or threat to use violence against civilians or against civilian targets, in order to attain political aims.
quotes.name: Boaz Ganor

quotes.message: Terrorism is always one bad day away from being issue No. 1.
quotes.name: John Avlon

quotes.message: Terrorism against our nation will not stand.
quotes.name: George W Bush

quotes.message: Terrorism is the tactic of demanding the impossible, and demanding it at gunpoint.
quotes.name: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.message: Terrorism has no religion is a theory, and the religion of terrorism is a real threat and practical thing.
quotes.name: Satyendra Singh 'Shyamal

quotes.message: Terrorism has become the systematic weapon of a war that knows no borders or seldom has a face.
quotes.name: Jacques Chirac

quotes.message: Any terrorism is an attack on libertarian values.
quotes.name: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: Terrorism, like viruses, is everywhere. There is a global perfusion of terrorism, which accompanies any system of domination as though it were its shadow, ready to activate itself anywhere, like a double agent.
quotes.name: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.message: Terrorism is the preferred weapon of weak and evil men.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Terrorism works better as a tactic for dictatorships, or for would-be dictators, than for revolutionaries.
quotes.name: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.message: Terrorism is just a whole other level of anger management issues.
quotes.name: Thisuri Wanniarachchi

quotes.message: It terrorism happened because intelligence, leadership and police failures made it possible.
quotes.name: Ashraf Ghani

quotes.message: The terrorism is not in the bombs, in your hands; the terrorism is in your unconscious.
quotes.name: Rajneesh

quotes.message: Terrorism grows when there are no other options, and when the center of the global economy is the god of money and not the person men and women this is already the first terrorism!
quotes.name: Pope Francis

quotes.message: Terrorism is a psychological warfare. Terrorists try to manipulate us and change our behavior by creating fear, uncertainty, and division in society.
quotes.name: Patrick J. Kennedy

quotes.message: What distinguishes terrorism is the willful and calculated choice of innocents as targets.
quotes.name: Benjamin Netanyahu

quotes.message: Everybody's worried about stopping terrorism. Well, there's a really easy way: stop participating in it.
quotes.name: Noam Chomsky

quotes.message: Terrorism is a significant threat to peace and security, prosperity and people.
quotes.name: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.message: If you want to end terrorism, you have to stop being terrorists
quotes.name: Howard Zinn

quotes.message: Terrorism is the war of the poor, and war is the terrorism of the rich.
quotes.name: Peter Ustinov

quotes.message: Terrorism is global and can come from even remote countries.
quotes.name: Narendra Modi

quotes.message: Terrorism must be outlawed by all civilized nations, not explained or rationalized, but fought and eradicated. Nothing can, nothing will justify the murder of innocent people and helpless children.
quotes.name: Elie Wiesel

quotes.message: The terrible thing about terrorism is that ultimately it destroys those who practice it. Slowly but surely, as they try to extinguish life in others, the light within them dies.
quotes.name: Terry Waite

quotes.message: Terrorism has no nationality or religion.
quotes.name: Vladimir Putin

quotes.message: Terrorism is the price of empire. If you do not wish to pay the price, you must give up the empire.
quotes.name: Pat Buchanan

quotes.message: A war against terrorism is an impracticable conception if it means fighting terrorism with terrorism.
quotes.name: John Mortimer

quotes.message: Terrorism has once again shown it is prepared deliberately to stop at nothing in creating human victims. An end must be put to this. As never before, it is vital to unite forces of the entire world community against terror.
quotes.name: Vladimir Putin

quotes.message: Demoralize the enemy from within by surprise, terror, sabotage, assassination. This is the war of the future.
quotes.name: Adolf Hitler

quotes.message: Terrorism is not an expression of rage. Terrorism is a political weapon. Remove a government's facade of infallibility, and you remove its people's faith.
quotes.name: Dan Brown

quotes.message: Fighting terrorism is like being a goalkeeper. You can make a hundred brilliant saves but the only shot that people remember is the one that gets past you.
quotes.name: Paul Wilkinson

quotes.message: Terrorists are like zebras; those having more white stripes than black are good terrorists,those with more black stripes than white are bad ones.
quotes.name: Shahid Hussain Raja

quotes.message: It's exciting setting goals and moving forward with them.
quotes.name: Amber Frey

quotes.message: Setting goals for your game is an art. The trick is in setting them at the right level neither too low nor too high.
quotes.name: Greg Norman

quotes.message: You cannot afford to wait for perfect conditions. Goal setting is often a matter of balancing timing against available resources. Opportunities are easily lost while waiting for perfect conditions.
quotes.name: Gary Ryan Blair

quotes.message: The major reason for setting a goal is for what it makes of you to accomplish it. What it makes of you will always be the far greater value than what you get.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: You have to be the one setting your own goals, trying to achieve those goals.
quotes.name: Johnny Bench

quotes.message: Setting a goal is not the main thing. It is deciding how you will go about achieving it and staying with that plan.
quotes.name: Tom Landry

quotes.message: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: You should set goals beyond your reach so you always have something to live for.
quotes.name: Ted Turner

quotes.message: When you set goals, something inside of you starts saying, 'Let's go, let's go,' and ceilings start to move up.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Set short-term goals that you can reach. Set goals that are well balanced, not too many nor too few, and not too high nor too low. Write down your attainable goals, and work on them according to their importance. Pray for divine guidance in your goal setting.
quotes.name: M. Russell Ballard

quotes.message: Set goals - high goals for you and your organization. When your organization has a goal to shoot for, you create teamwork, people working for a common good.
quotes.name: Bear Bryant

quotes.message: Exercise to stimulate, not to annihilate. The world wasn't formed in a day, and neither were we. Set small goals and build upon them.
quotes.name: Lee Haney

quotes.message: I believe in goals, but I believe that the individual should set his own. Goal setting should cause us to stretch as we make our way.
quotes.name: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.message: The most important thing to do is to set goals. Training is a waste of time if you don't have goals.
quotes.name: Samantha Riley

quotes.message: If you don't set goals, you can't regret not reaching them.
quotes.name: Yogi Berra

quotes.message: Without some goals and some efforts to reach it, no man can live.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: Set goals so big that unless God helps you, you will be a miserable failure.
quotes.name: Bill Bright

quotes.message: Set goals that are achievable. Bring about meaningful change one step at a time. Raising awareness is not enough.
quotes.name: Henry Spira

quotes.message: I'm a firm believer in goal setting. Step by step. I can't see any other way of accomplishing anything.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: Setting goals helps bring your future into your present and the present is the only time we can take action.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Goal setting has traditionally been based on past performance. This practice has tended to perpetuate the sins of the past.
quotes.name: Joseph Juran

quotes.message: All goal setting must be immediately followed by both the development of a plan, and massive and consistent action toward its fulfillment.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: Stop setting goals. Goals are pure fantasy unless you have a specific plan to achieve them.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: Most people know how to set goals; few know how to achieve them.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Your ability to set goals and to make plans for their accomplishment is the master skill of success.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Setting goals is the first important step in achieving success in an activity. It's a reminder of what you are working towards.
quotes.name: Peter Vanderkaay

quotes.message: Unless you have definite precise, clearly set goals, you are not going to realize the maximum potential that lies within you.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: You must avoid blindness of mind by setting goals. ... I have long contended that the person who sets goals and who strives to attain such is the master of his own fate.
quotes.name: Carlos E. Asay

quotes.message: There's nothing wrong with setting goals, but it doesn't mean a thing if you don't pay attention to the day-to-day details.
quotes.name: Don Shula

quotes.message: Without making a fetish of goal setting, and without letting 'lists' of tasks we desire to do dominate us, some recording of goals is wise not only for the self-reminder these constitute, but also for the satisfaction of crossing things off.
quotes.name: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.message: When we set goals we are in command. If we know where we are going, we can judge more accurately where we are now and make effective plans to reach our destination.
quotes.name: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.message: I believe in the saying, 'If you aim at nothing, you're going to hit nothing.' So if you don't set goals, then you have nowhere to go.
quotes.name: Taylor Lautner

quotes.message: Make your goals big and broad enough so that they never become answered prayers and boomerang to curse you.
quotes.name: Douglas Coupland

quotes.message: Set goals not for the outcome itself, but for who you get to become in the process.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.name: Bo Jackson

quotes.message: You must have long term goals to keep you from being frustrated by short term failures.
quotes.name: Charles C. Noble

quotes.message: This one step -- choosing a goal and sticking to it -- changes everything.
quotes.name: Scott Reed

quotes.message: Determine what specific goal you want to achieve. Then dedicate yourself to its attainment with unswerving singleness of purpose, the trenchant zeal of a crusader.
quotes.name: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.message: The goal you set must be challenging. At the same time, it should be realistic and attainable, not impossible to reach. It should be challenging enough to make you stretch, but not so far that you break.
quotes.name: Rick Hansen

quotes.message: The ultimate reason for setting goals is to entice you to become the person it takes to achieve them.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Before you can really start setting financial goals, you need to determine where you stand financially.
quotes.name: David Bach

quotes.message: The secret to productive goal setting is in establishing clearly defined goals, writing them down and then focusing on them several times a day with words, pictures and emotions as if we've already achieved them.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: You have to set goals that are almost out of reach. If you set a goal that is attainable without much work or thought, you are stuck with something below your true talent and potential.
quotes.name: Steve Garvey

quotes.message: Crystallize your goals . Make a plan for achieving them and set yourself a deadline. Then, with supreme confidence, determination and disregard for obstacles and other people's criticisms carry out your plan.
quotes.name: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.message: All goal setting must be immediately followed by both the development of a plan, and massive and consistent action toward its fulfillment.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: To solve a problem or to reach a goal, you don't need to know all the answers in advance. But you must have a clear idea of the problem or the goal you want to reach.
quotes.name: W. Clement Stone

quotes.message: A good leader makes a good follower.
quotes.name: Wilfred Bion

quotes.message: Good leaders must first become good servants.
quotes.name: Robert K. Greenleaf

quotes.message: Selflessness is the highest goal of good leaders.
quotes.name: Todd Stocker

quotes.message: You can't be a good leader without good character.
quotes.name: Tony Boselli

quotes.message: A good leader shares information, even if they don't know the whole story. Without any information, people create their own, which causes fear and paranoia.
quotes.name: Simon Sinek

quotes.message: A good leader can't get too far ahead of his followers.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: Good leaders must become what they want their followers to become.
quotes.name: Nido R Qubein
