quotes.message: Good leaders must communicate vision clearly, creatively, and continually. However, the vision doesn't come alive until the leader models it.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: While a good leader sustains momentum, a great leader increases it.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: A good leader needs to know how to follow.
quotes.name: Casey Affleck

quotes.message: A good leader is not necessarily the most popular person in their business, but the best ones are liked because they are respected for their clarity and vision.
quotes.name: Alan Sugar

quotes.message: A good leader has a compass in their head and a magnet in their heart.
quotes.name: Howard G. Hendricks

quotes.message: You know you're a good leader when people follow you out of curiosity.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: Every good leader is part manager and every good manager is part leader.
quotes.name: Condoleezza Rice

quotes.message: Lead by listening - to be a good leader you have to be a great listener.
quotes.name: Richard Branson

quotes.message: Bad leaders care about who is right. Good leaders care about what is right.
quotes.name: Simon Sinek

quotes.message: All good leaders listen to their people and empower them to go away and turn any innovative ideas they have into a reality.
quotes.name: Richard Branson

quotes.message: Good leaders inspire people to have confidence in their leader. Great leaders inspire people to have confidence in themselves.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: A good leader sees everything, overlooks a great deal, and corrects a little.
quotes.name: Pope John Paul II

quotes.message: Being a good leader does not require you possessing a fancy title, no more than possessing a fancy title makes you a good leader.
quotes.name: Mark W Boyer

quotes.message: A good Leader promotes peace, not war. A good leader is for the people, not for himself. A good leader does not watch his people suffer.
quotes.name: Godfrey Orateng

quotes.message: If you look at anything successful, you will find traces of a good leader in it.
quotes.name: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.message: Good leaders don't tell people what to do, they give teams capability and inspiration.
quotes.name: Jeffrey R. Immelt

quotes.message: A good leader... maintains a balance between emotional drive and sound thinking.
quotes.name: Haile Selassie

quotes.message: The quality of a good leader therefore is his vision, tenacity, and his capability.
quotes.name: Jack Ma

quotes.message: A good leader gets people to follow him because they want to, not because he makes them.
quotes.name: Tony Dungy

quotes.message: An important mark of a good leader [is] to know you don’t know it all and never will.
quotes.name: Anne M. Mulcahy

quotes.message: A good leader is someone who knows what he's bad at, and hires someone who's good at it to take care of it for him.
quotes.name: John Flanagan

quotes.message: Good leaders make people feel that they're at the very heart of things, not at the periphery.
quotes.name: Warren Bennis

quotes.message: A good leader encourages followers to tell him what he needs to know, not what he wants to hear.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: A good leader remains focused. Controlling your destination is better than being controlled by it.
quotes.name: Jack Welch

quotes.message: A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit.
quotes.name: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.message: A good leader needs to stand behind his or her followers as often as he or she needs to stand in front of them.
quotes.name: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.message: A good leader is one who reveals to you your own potential and then inspires and shows you how to reach your potential.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: A good leader sets the right goals, gets things moving, and helps us to discover that we already know what to do.
quotes.name: Donella Meadows

quotes.message: Good leaders reach solutions, and then stop. They do not dare to rely on force.
quotes.name: Laozi

quotes.message: Good leaders need a positive agenda, not just an agenda of dealing with crisis.
quotes.name: Michael Porter

quotes.message: Be willing to make decisions. That's the most important quality in a good leader.
quotes.name: General George S. Patton

quotes.message: Good leaders are very curious, and they spend a lot of time trying to learn things.
quotes.name: Jeffrey R. Immelt

quotes.message: Being a good leader today doesn't mean you'll be a good leader 10 years from now. You have to adapt to the times.
quotes.name: Carlos Ghosn

quotes.message: Good leaders must know how to reward those who succeed and know when to retrain, move, or fire ineffective staff.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: All good leaders are connectors. They relate well and make people feel confident about themselves and their leader.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: The qualities required to be a good leader are usually incompatible with the qualities required to become a leader.
quotes.name: Francis Mont

quotes.message: The good leader carries water for his people.
quotes.name: Laozi

quotes.message: It is in times of crisis that good leaders emerge.
quotes.name: Rudy Giuliani

quotes.message: Only a few good leaders have paused to reflect seriously on being leaders.
quotes.name: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: A good leader will seek the wisdom of others.
quotes.name: Jim George

quotes.message: A good leader must be fair.
quotes.name: Yao Ming

quotes.message: A good leader brings the lady partner dance level to a superior level.
quotes.name: Donnie Burns

quotes.message: Exes are like our old diaries-they know the whole truth and the unedited version of you. If you can still attain their respect after the relationship you must have done something well.
quotes.name: Nontobeko Sibiya

quotes.message: Nobody deserves your tears, but whoever deserves them will not make you cry.
quotes.name: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.message: I don't think much about guys from the past. I'm glad I knew them, but there's a reason they didn't make it into my future.
quotes.name: Lorraine Zago Rosenthal

quotes.message: Going back to your ex is like reading a book you have already read. The outcome will always be the same.
quotes.name: Matthew Donnell

quotes.message: To fall in love is awfully simple, but to fall out of love is simply awful.
quotes.name: Bess Myerson

quotes.message: Dating an ex is the equivalent of failing a test you already had the answers to.
quotes.name: Kendrick Cole

quotes.message: A heartbreak is a blessing from God. It's just his way of letting you realize he saved you from the wrong one.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: All discarded lovers should be given a second chance, but with somebody else.
quotes.name: Mae West

quotes.message: You can choose to be happy or sad and whichever you choose that is what you get. No one is really responsible to make someone else happy, no matter what most people have been taught and accept as true.
quotes.name: Sidney Madwed

quotes.message: Sometimes a woman will look back on what she had, not because she wants to go there but to motivate her to do better.
quotes.name: Reuben Holmes II

quotes.message: We are all trying to get over the person who broke our hearts. We are all far from perfect.
quotes.name: Alex Rosa

quotes.message: One relationship ends but life goes on. Your 'Ex' was just a stepping stone to something better.
quotes.name: Sushan R Sharma

quotes.message: If you feel the need to insult your ex or their new lover, you obviously still have feelings for them.
quotes.name: Alexis Rose

quotes.message: I couldn't deal with my ex and his new she-devil girlfriend being all up in my face and him trying to be friendly and her trying to poison me with her existence.
quotes.name: Sarah Bilington

quotes.message: Never get jealous when you see your ex with someone else, because our parents taught us to give our used toys to the less fortunate.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It may seem as the hardest thing in the world, but you have to forget the guy who forgot about you.
quotes.name: The Notebook

quotes.message: You're still my person, even if I'm not yours.
quotes.name: Grey's Anatomy

quotes.message: The truth is that it hurts because it's real. It hurts because it mattered. And that's an important thing to acknowledge to yourself.
quotes.name: John Greene

quotes.message: The hottest love has the coldest end.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: I never hated a man enough to give him his diamonds back.
quotes.name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.message: How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard
quotes.name: Carol Sobieski and Thomas Meehan

quotes.message: Irregardless, ex boyfriends are just off limits to friends. I mean, that's just the rules of feminism.
quotes.name: Mean Girls

quotes.message: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.name: Victoria Holt

quotes.message: If you really love something set it free. If it comes back it's yours, if not it wasn't meant to be.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I don't miss him, I miss who I thought he was.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It rather goes without saying that Katherine drank her coffee black. Katherines do, generally. They like their coffee like their ex-boyfriends: bitter.
quotes.name: John Green

quotes.message: He heals the broken hearted and binds up their wounds.
quotes.name: Psalm 147:3

quotes.message: Failed relationships can be described as so much wasted make-up.
quotes.name: Marian Keyes

quotes.message: Why is it that when you miss someone so much that your heart is ready to disintegrate, you hear the saddest song on the radio?
quotes.name: Pete & Pete

quotes.message: When a love comes to an end, weaklings cry, efficient ones instantly find another love, and the wise already have one in reserve.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: You know it's love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you’re not part of their happiness.
quotes.name: Julia Roberts

quotes.message: Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of withering, of tarnishing.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: Relationships are hard. It's like a full-time job, and we should treat it like one. If your boyfriend or girlfriend wants to leave you, they should give you two weeks’ notice. There should be severance pay, and before they leave you, they should have to find you a temp.
quotes.name: Bob Ettinger

quotes.message: When you get back together with an old boyfriend, it's pathetic. It’s like having a garage sale and buying your own stuff hack.
quotes.name: Laura Kightlinger

quotes.message: Exes should never, never go out with or marry other people but should remain celibate to the end of their days in order to provide you with a mental fallback position.
quotes.name: Helen Fielding

quotes.message: There is a good way to break up with someone and it doesn’t include a Post-it.
quotes.name: Carrie Bradshaw

quotes.message: I will always love the false image I had of you.
quotes.name: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.message: He’s the kind of man a woman would have to marry to get rid of.
quotes.name: Mae West

quotes.message: I've had enough boyfriends and enough issues. I'd seen enough train wrecks.
quotes.name: Taylor Dayne

quotes.message: Love blurs your vision; but after it recedes, you can see more clearly than ever.
quotes.name: Margaret Atwood

quotes.message: It's probably a bad indicator of your lifestyle when you miss your ex-boyfriend because he's absolutely lethal.
quotes.name: Charlaine Harris

quotes.message: Failed relationships can be described as so much wasted make-up.
quotes.name: Marian Keyes

quotes.message: Next time, we don't date the girl with eleven evil ex-boyfriends.
quotes.name: Stacey Pilgrim

quotes.message: You'll always be my favorite ex-boyfriend.
quotes.name: Cassidy

quotes.message: Yeah, well, trouble stalks me like a crazy ex-boyfriend.
quotes.name: Claire Temple

quotes.message: To make an omelette, you have to kill some ex-boyfriends
quotes.name: Sadie Cunningham

quotes.message: It's not cheating if you dream of kissing your ex-boyfriend, right?
quotes.name: Tori Spelling

quotes.message: He's the guy that you should feel sorry for . He had the world but he thought that he wanted more . I owe it all to the mistake he made back then .
quotes.name: Matthew Thiessen

quotes.message: My boyfriend and I broke up. He wanted to get married and I didn't want him to.
quotes.name: Rita Rudner

quotes.message: There is only one real tragedy in a woman’s life. The fact that her past is always her lover, and her future invariably her husband.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Got a long list of ex lovers . They'll tell you I'm insane . But I've got a blank space, baby .
quotes.name: Max Martin; Johan Karl Schuster; Taylor Alison Swift

quotes.message: Forget about your ex he wasn't good enough .
quotes.name: Cliff Lighty; Keir Gist; Balewa Muhammed; Eddie Berkeley; Smooth

quotes.message: Every lover known in comparison is a failure, I forget their names now.
quotes.name: Ali Payami; Karl Johan Schuster; Max Martin; Taylor Swift

quotes.message: Guess I should say thank you, . For the ‘hate yous’ and the tattoos, . Oh baby I’m cool by the way, .
quotes.name: Camille Purcell et al.

quotes.message: This is a shout out to my ex . Heard he in love with some other chick . Yeah yeah, that hurt me, I'll admit .
quotes.name: Camille Purcell et al.

quotes.message: Shout out to my ex, you're really quite the man .
quotes.name: Camille Purcell et al.

quotes.message: Here's to my ex, hey, look at me now . Well, I, I'm all the way up .
quotes.name: Camille Purcell et al.

quotes.message: Head in the clouds . Got no weight on my shoulders . I should be wiser . And realize that I've got .
quotes.name: Amethyst Amelia Kelly; Ariana Grande; Ilya Salmanzadeh; Martin Karl Sandberg; Savan Harish Kotecha

quotes.message: You must not know 'bout me . You must not know 'bout me . I'll have another you by tomorrow . So don't you ever for a second .
quotes.name: Mikkel Eriksen; Amund Bjorklund; Beyonce Knowles; Espen Lind; Tor Hermansen; Shaffer Smith

quotes.message: But even if the stars and moon collide . I never want you back into my life . You can take your words and all your lies .
quotes.name: Carl Anthony Falk; Savan Harish Kotecha; Cher Lloyd; Demitria Lovato; Rami Yacoub

quotes.message: But since you been gone . I can breathe for the first time . I'm so movin' on, yeah, yeah . Thanks to you .
quotes.name: Lukasz Gottwald; Martin Karl Sandberg

quotes.message: I try to forget about you, baby . And I die when I think of you with someone else and . I don't know why, I don't know why you're dancing in my mind .
quotes.name: Ilsey Anna Juber; Linus Thure Wiklund; Noonie Bao; Zara Maria Larsson

quotes.message: Here I am . Once again . I'm torn into pieces . Can't deny it . Can't pretend . Just thought you were the one . Broken up deep inside . But you won't get to see the tears I cry .
quotes.name: Martin Max Sandberg; Kelly Brianne Clarkson; Lukasz Gottwald

quotes.message: I used to cry to all my friends . But they would say, 'I told ya' . Finally, I can breathe again . The weight is off my shoulders . I was warned but fooled by charm .
quotes.name: Meghan Trainor; Eric Frederic; Tommy Brown; Steven Franks; Mario Mims; Taylor Parks; Travis Sayles

quotes.message: I will love you 'til the end of time . I would wait a million years . Promise you'll remember that you're mine .
quotes.name: Daniel Law Heath; Elizabeth Grant; Emile Haynie

quotes.message: And after all the obstacles . It's good to see you now with someone else . And it's such a miracle that you and me are still good friends . After all that we've been through .
quotes.name: Dallas Austin; Gwen Stefani

quotes.message: When I said I hope you're happy, didn't mean it . Never thought you'd be so good at moving on . When I'm lying wide awake, you're probably sleeping .
quotes.name: Adam King Feeney; Camila Cabello; Louis Bell; Ryan B. Tedder

quotes.message: Walk away . You know how . Don't start caring .
quotes.name: Emily Warren; Ian Kirkpatrick; Caroline Ailin; Dua Lipa

quotes.message: Aren't you the guy who tried to . Hurt me with the word 'goodbye'? . Though it took some time to survive you . I'm better on the other side . I'm all good already . So moved on, it's scary .
quotes.name: Emily Warren; Ian Kirkpatrick; Caroline Ailin; Dua Lipa

quotes.message: Well, I'll be damned . Here comes your ghost again . But that's not unusual . It's just that the moon is full . And you happened to call . And here I sit . Hand on the telephone . Hearing a voice I'd known . A couple of light years ago .
quotes.name: Joan Baez

quotes.message: Now you're telling me . You're not nostalgic . Then give me another word for it . You who are so good with words . And at keeping things vague . 'Cause I need some of that vagueness now . It's all come back too clearly . Yes, I loved you dearly . And if you're offering me diamonds and rust .
quotes.name: Joan Baez

quotes.message: At first I was afraid, I was petrified . Kept thinking I could never live without you by my side . But then I spent so many nights thinking how you did me wrong . And I grew strong .
quotes.name: Dino Fekaris; Frederick J. Perren

quotes.message: I loved you, and . You love me . And I just couldn't see tomorrow, baby . And I cared for you . And I didn't see us through . Now I know in my heart you will always be .
quotes.name: Christopher A. Stewart; Terius Youngdell Nash

quotes.message: Did you know when you go it's the perfect ending . To the bad day I was just beginning .
quotes.name: Jeff Trott; Sheryl Crow

quotes.message: 'Member when we argued on the concept of regret? . You were an expert even then but not me, not yet . Now all you gotta do's remind me that we met .
quotes.name: Fiona Apple Maggart

quotes.message: I'm giving you up . I've forgiven it all .
quotes.name: Adele Adkins; Max Martin; Johan Shellback

quotes.message: Send my love to your new lover . Treat her better . We've gotta let go of all of our ghosts .
quotes.name: Adele Adkins; Max Martin; Johan Shellback

quotes.message: And I just can't believe . We went from strangers to lovers to strangers in a lifetime . Now just memories . We've gone from strangers to lovers to strangers .
quotes.name: Charlie Puth; Jacob Kasher Hindlin; Johan Jens Erik Carlsson; Katheryn Elizabeth Hudson

quotes.message: Now and then I think of all the times you screwed me over . But had me believing it was always something that I'd done . And I don't wanna live that way . Reading into every word you say . You said that you could let it go .
quotes.name: Wally De Backer

quotes.message: Old friend, why are you so shy . Ain't like you to hold back .
quotes.name: Adele Laurie Blue Adkins; Daniel Dodd Wilson

quotes.message: Never mind I'll find someone like you . I wish nothing but the best . For you too, don't forget me . I beg, I'll remember you say . Sometimes it lasts in love .
quotes.name: Adele Laurie Blue Adkins; Daniel Dodd Wilson

quotes.message: I used to know my place was a spot next to you . Now I'm searching the room for an empty seat .
quotes.name: Taylor Swift

quotes.message: Cause when I'm with him . I am thinking of you . Thinking of you . What you would do if . You were the one . Who was spending the night . Oh I wish that I .
quotes.name: Katy Perry

quotes.message: We are never ever, ever getting back together . We are never ever, ever getting back together . You go talk to your friends, talk to my friends, talk to me .
quotes.name: Taylor Swift; Max Martin; Johan Shellback

quotes.message: And I'm here, to remind you . Of the mess you left when you went away . It's not fair, to deny me . Of the cross I bear that you gave to me .
quotes.name: Alanis Morissette

quotes.message: Oh, you had me several years ago . When I was still quite naive . Well, you said that we made such a pretty pair . And that you would never leave . But you gave away the things you loved . And one of them was me . I had some dreams, they were clouds in my coffee .
quotes.name: Carly E. Simon

quotes.message: I do not know anyone who has gotten to the top without hard work. That is the recipe. It will not always get you to the top, but it will get you pretty near.
quotes.name: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.message: If the power to do hard work is not a skill, it's the best possible substitute for it.
quotes.name: James A. Garfield

quotes.message: Opportunity is missed by most because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.name: Thomas Alva Edison

quotes.message: If you want to achieve some really big and interesting goals, you have to learn to fall in love with hard work.
quotes.name: Steve Pavlina

quotes.message: Hard work is painful when life is devoid of purpose. But when you live for something greater than yourself and the gratification of your own ego, then hard work becomes a labor of love.
quotes.name: Steve Pavlina

quotes.message: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: Nothing ever comes to one, that is worth having, except as a result of hard work.
quotes.name: Booker T. Washington

quotes.message: Hard work spotlights the character of people: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don't turn up at all.
quotes.name: Sam Ewing

quotes.message: Focused, hard work is the real key to success. Keep your eyes on the goal, and just keep taking the next step towards completing it. If you aren't sure which way to do something, do it both ways and see which works better.
quotes.name: John Carmack

quotes.message: Hard work pays off - hard work beats talent any day, but if you're talented and work hard, it's hard to be beat.
quotes.name: Robert Griffin III

quotes.message: Hard work opens doors and shows the world that you are serious about being one of those rare - and special - human beings who use the fullness of their talents to do their very best.
quotes.name: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.message: Life grants nothing to us mortals without hard work.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.
quotes.name: Babe Ruth

quotes.message: Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: If people knew how hard I had to work to gain my mastery, it would not seem so wonderful at all.
quotes.name: Michelangelo Buonarroti

quotes.message: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
quotes.name: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.message: The dictionary is the only place that success comes before work. Work is the key to success, and hard work can help you accomplish anything.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: No one ever drowned in sweat.
quotes.name: U.S. Marine Corps

quotes.message: Do not let your good ideas to spend your brain energy, do it with all the effort because the shadow of the success can become a reality only with hard work.
quotes.name: Isra

quotes.message: You can't have a million dollar dream with a minimum wage work ethic.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: God gives every bird its food, but He does not throw it into its nest.
quotes.name: J.G. Holland

quotes.message: Much good work is lost for the lack of a little more.
quotes.name: Edward H. Harriman

quotes.message: I've got a theory that if you give 100 percent all of the time, somehow things will work out in the end.
quotes.name: Larry Bird

quotes.message: Men are made stronger on realization that the helping hand they need is at the end of their own arm.
quotes.name: Sidney J. Phillips

quotes.message: The person who is waiting for something to turn up might start with their shirt sleeves
quotes.name: Garth Henrichs

quotes.message: There's nothing like biting off more than you can chew, and then chewing anyway.
quotes.name: Mark Burnett

quotes.message: If you shoot for the stars and hit the moon, it's OK. But you've got to shoot for something. A lot of people don't even shoot.
quotes.name: Robert Townsend

quotes.message: It takes struggle, a goal and enthusiasm to make a champion.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.message: Hard work brings prosperity; playing around brings poverty.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: Hard work is the yeast that raises the dough.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I believe in work, hard work, and long hours of work. Men do not breakdown from overwork, but from worry and dissipation.
quotes.name: Charles Evans Hughes

quotes.message: The daily grind of hard work gets a person polished.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: There are few things that you can't do as long as you are willing to apply yourself.
quotes.name: Greg LeMond

quotes.message: There is no royal flower-strewn path to success. And if there is, I have not found it for if I have accomplished anything in life it is because I have been willing to work hard.
quotes.name: Madam C.J. Walker

quotes.message: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
quotes.name: Newt Gingrich

quotes.message: Don't tell me how hard you work. Tell me how much you get done.
quotes.name: James Ling

quotes.message: Initiative is key. Anybody who wants to be somebody is going to work as hard as they can to fulfill that dream.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The heights by great men reached and kept were not attained by sudden flight, but they while their companions slept, were toiling upward in the night
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: I don't wait for moods. You accomplish nothing if you do that. Your mind must know it has got to get down to work.
quotes.name: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.message: Hard work without talent is a shame, but talent without hard work is a tragedy.
quotes.name: Robert Half

quotes.message: Hard work doesn't guarantee success, but improves its chances.
quotes.name: B. J. Gupta

quotes.message: We forget that every good that is worth possessing must be paid for in strokes of daily effort. We postpone and postpone, until those smiling possibilities are dead.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: All growth depends upon activity. There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.
quotes.name: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.message: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
quotes.name: Peter Drucker

quotes.message: Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: We all have a path to take; sometimes it's hidden under the weeds, so you might have to work a little.
quotes.name: Mike Dolan

quotes.message: Look at a day when you are supremely satisfied at the end. It's not a day when you lounge around doing nothing; it's when you've had everything to do, and you've done it.
quotes.name: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.message: Those who find beauty in all of nature will find themselves at one with the secrets of life itself.
quotes.name: L. Wolfe Gilbert

quotes.message: Everyone can identify with a fragrant garden, with beauty of sunset, with the quiet of nature, with a warm and cozy cottage.
quotes.name: Thomas Kincade

quotes.message: Sunshine is delicious, rain is refreshing, wind braces us up, snow is exhilarating; there is really no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Trees are the earth's endless effort to speak to the listening heaven.
quotes.name: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.message: Give me odorous at sunrise a garden of beautiful flowers where I can walk undisturbed.
quotes.name: Walt Whitman

quotes.message: Looking at beauty in the world, is the first step of purifying the mind.
quotes.name: Amit Ray

quotes.message: I believe the world is incomprehensibly beautiful an endless prospect of magic and wonder.
quotes.name: Ansel Adams

quotes.message: May your trails be crooked, winding, lonesome, dangerous, leading to the most amazing view. May your mountains rise into and above the clouds.
quotes.name: Edward Abbey

quotes.message: Those who contemplate the beauty of the Earth find reserves of strength that will endure as long as life lasts.
quotes.name: Rachel Carson

quotes.message: On earth there is no heaven, but there are pieces of it.
quotes.name: Jules Renard

quotes.message: A lake is the landscape's most beautiful and expressive feature. It is Earth's eye; looking into which the beholder measures the depth of his own nature.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings. Nature's peace will flow into you as sunshine flows into trees. The winds will blow their own freshness into you and the storms their energy, while cares will drop off like autumn leaves.
quotes.name: John Muir

quotes.message: The day, water, sun, moon, night - I do not have to purchase these things with money.
quotes.name: Plautis

quotes.message: To sit in the shade on a fine day and look upon the verdant green hills is the most perfect refreshment.
quotes.name: Jane Austin

quotes.message: The rich fire of the orange sunset gloriously announces the coming night.
quotes.name: Susan S. Florence

quotes.message: Reading about nature is fine, but if a person walks in the woods and listens carefully, he can learn more than what is in books, for they speak with the voice of God.
quotes.name: George Washington Carver

quotes.message: Earth and sky, woods and fields, lakes and rivers, the mountain and the sea, are excellent schoolmasters, and teach some of us more than we can ever learn from books.
quotes.name: John Lubbock

quotes.message: Forget not that the earth delights to feel your bare feet and the winds long to play with your hair.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: A morning-glory at my window satisfies me more than the metaphysics of books.
quotes.name: Walt Whitman

quotes.message: We do not see nature with our eyes, but with our understandings and our hearts.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Let us learn to appreciate there will be times when the trees will be bare, and look forward to the time when we may pick the fruit.
quotes.name: Anton Chekhov

quotes.message: Forests, lakes, and rivers, clouds and winds, stars and flowers, stupendous glaciers and crystal snowflakes—every form of animate or inanimate existence, leaves its impress upon the soul of man.
quotes.name: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.message: Let the clean air blow the cobwebs from your body. Air is medicine.
quotes.name: Lillian Russell

quotes.message: Those who contemplate the beauty of the earth find reserves of strength that will endure as long as life lasts. There is something infinitely healing in the repeated refrains of nature — the assurance that dawn comes after night, and spring after winter.
quotes.name: Rachel Carson

quotes.message: Nature is beautiful and you are in her bosom. That voice of comfort which speaks in the breezes of the morning, may visit your mind, that the delightful influences which the green leaves, the blue sky, the moonbeams and clouds of the evening diffuse over the universe, may in their powers of soul-healing, visit your day visions, is my desire and hope.
quotes.name: Humphry Davy

quotes.message: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: If you truly love Nature, you will find beauty everywhere.
quotes.name: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.message: Beauty is a harmonious relation between something in our nature and the quality of the object which delights us.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises.
quotes.name: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.message: Rain is grace; rain is the sky descending to the earth; without rain, there would be no life.
quotes.name: John Updike

quotes.message: Water is the driving force of all nature.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: I love to think of nature as an unlimited broadcasting station, through which God speaks to us every hour, if we only will tune in.
quotes.name: George Washington Carver

quotes.message: The beauty of the natural world lies in the details.
quotes.name: Natalie Angier

quotes.message: In all things of nature there is something of the marvelous.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Nature gives to every time and season some beauties of its own.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: Earth laughs in flowers.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: The hum of bees is the voice of the garden.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Lawrence

quotes.message: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.
quotes.name: John Muir

quotes.message: The sun does not shine for a few trees and flowers, but for the wide world's joy.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Nature never hurries. Atom by atom, little by little she achieves her work.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: I go to nature to be soothed and healed, and to have my senses put in order.
quotes.name: John Burroughs

quotes.message: Nothing is more beautiful than the loveliness of the woods before sunrise.
quotes.name: George Washington Carver

quotes.message: There are places on earth where we can catch a glimpse of heaven.
quotes.name: Anthony Douglas Williams

quotes.message: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
quotes.name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.message: Take a course in good water and air; and in the eternal youth of Nature you may renew your own. Go quietly, alone; no harm will befall you.
quotes.name: John Muir

quotes.message: There are no lines in nature, only areas of colour, one against another.
quotes.name: Edouard Manet

quotes.message: The rain began again. It fell heavily, easily, with no meaning or intention but the fulfilment of its own nature, which was to fall and fall.
quotes.name: Helen Garner

quotes.message: For me, camp made everything a marvel, from the slanted pine trees to the steep-sided dunes and tide pools.
quotes.name: Ruby McConnell

quotes.message: There is something special about a quiet untouched forest that just pulls you into the moment. Something that no parks will ever be able to achieve.
quotes.name: Jon Krakauer

quotes.message: Nature soothes us. Nature heals us, and something more, the woods are a place of power.
quotes.name: Frederick Lenz

quotes.message: There are some places so beautiful they can make a grown man break down and weep.
quotes.name: Edward Abbey

quotes.message: Love the world as your own self; then you can truly care for all things.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Nature is pleased with simplicity. And nature is no dummy.
quotes.name: Isaac Newton

quotes.message: We don’t inherit the earth from our ancestors, we borrow it from our children.
quotes.name: Greek Proverb

quotes.message: Heaven is under our feet as well as over our heads.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: The air was soft, the stars so fine, the promise of every cobbled alley so great, that I thought I was in a dream.
quotes.name: Mr. Jack Kerouac

quotes.message: To see a world in a grain of sand, and a heaven in a wild flower, hold infinity in the palm of your hand, and eternity in an hour.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: Who has not found the heaven below, will fail of it above. God’s residence is next to mine, his furniture is love.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: I will find my joy – not in a bed of hothouse roses, but in a wayward roadside flower.
quotes.name: Muriel Strode

quotes.message: Nature’s first green is gold, Her hardest hue to hold. Her early leaf’s a flower; But only so an hour. Then leaf subsides to leaf. So Eden sank to grief, So dawn goes down to day. Nothing gold can stay.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: We share the earth not only with our fellow human beings, but with all the other creatures.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Keep a little fire burning; however small, however hidden
quotes.name: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.message: The woods call to us with a hundred voices, but the sea has one only — a mighty voice that drowns our souls in its majestic music. The woods are human, but the sea is of the company of the archangels.
quotes.name: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.message: The sea, the great unifier, is man’s only hope. Now, as never before, the old phrase has a literal meaning: we are all in the same boat.
quotes.name: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.message: Not just beautiful, though - the stars are like the trees in the forest, alive and breathing. And they’re watching me.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: In nature, nothing is perfect and everything is perfect. Trees can be contorted, bent in weird ways, and they’re still beautiful.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: We forget that the water cycle and the life cycle are one.
quotes.name: Jacques Cousteau

quotes.message: A book, too, can be a star, a living fire to lighten the darkness, leading out into the expanding universe.
quotes.name: Madeleine L’Engle

quotes.message: Never measure the height of a mountain until you have reached the top. Then you will see how low it was.
quotes.name: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.message: Rainbows apologize for angry skies.
quotes.name: Sylvia A. Voiral

quotes.message: We cannot direct the winds but we can adjust our sails to them
quotes.name: Old Proverb

quotes.message: The way is not in the sky. The way is in the heart.
quotes.name: The Dhammapada

quotes.message: Every particular in nature, a leaf, a drop, a crystal, a moment of time is related to the whole, and partakes of the perfection of the whole.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: No one is free, even the birds are chained to the sky.
quotes.name: Robert Milkwood Thomas

quotes.message: I’ve always regarded nature as the clothing of God.
quotes.name: Alan Hovhaness

quotes.message: We need to find God, and he cannot be found in noise and restlessness. God is the friend of silence. See how nature – trees, flowers, grass – grows in silence; see the stars, the moon and the sun, how they move in silence. We need silence to be able to touch soul.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: God writes the gospel not in the Bible alone, but on trees and flowers and clouds and stars.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: Green was the silence, wet was the light, the month of June trembled like a butterfly.
quotes.name: Pablo Neruda

quotes.message: Every child is born a naturalist. His eyes are, by nature, open to the glories of the stars, the beauty of the flowers, and the mystery of life.
quotes.name: R. Search

quotes.message: The sky lovingly smiles on the earth and her children.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Nature holds the key to our aesthetic, intellectual, cognitive and even spiritual satisfaction.
quotes.name: E. O. Wilson

quotes.message: If I were to name the three most precious resources of life, I should say books, friends, and nature.
quotes.name: John Burroughs

quotes.message: Come forth into the light of things, let nature be your teacher.
quotes.name: William Wordsworth

quotes.message: Speaking comes by nature, silence by understanding.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Over every mountain there is a path, although it may not be seen from the valley.
quotes.name: Theodore Roethke

quotes.message: Some people come into our lives and quickly go. Some stay for a while, leave footprints on our hearts, and we are never, ever the same.
quotes.name: Flavia Weedn

quotes.message: Goodbyes are only for those who love with their eyes. Because for those who love with heart and soul there is no such thing as separation.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: Shake hands with today; it is here already. Bid farewell to yesterday; it's gone already. Never let yesterday's pain rob you of today's gains.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Every parting is a form of death, as every reunion is a type of heaven.
quotes.name: Tryon Edwards

quotes.message: That bitter word, which closed all earthly friendships and finished every feast of love farewell!
quotes.name: Robert Pollok

quotes.message: It's always difficult to say goodbye, especially when one has spent a long time—literally years, in the case of a series—inside a character or two, suffering and celebrating with them.
quotes.name: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.message: Farewell, they cried, 'Wherever you fare till your eyries receive you at the journey's end!' That is the polite thing to say among eagles.
quotes.name: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.message: It's been an incredible ride. Mission accomplished. With that, I have to bid farewell. I'm the happiest person in the world right now. It's better than I ever thought it would be.
quotes.name: Jerome Bettis

quotes.message: Don't be dismayed at goodbyes. A farewell is necessary before you can meet again. And meeting again, after moments or lifetime, is certain for those who are friends.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: Not for everyone a darkest night is bid farewell by a bright sunrise.
quotes.name: Saud khan

quotes.message: There should have been a better farewell. But in the end, there never is. And we take what meagre scraps we can find.
quotes.name: Richard K. Morgan

quotes.message: Why can't we get all the people together in the world that we really like and then just stay together? I guess that wouldn't work. Someone would leave. Someone always leaves. Then we would have to say good-bye. I hate good-byes. I know what I need. I need more hellos.
quotes.name: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.message: Forever, and forever, farewell, Cassius! If we do meet again, why, we shall smile; If not, why then this parting was well made.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Goodbyes make you think. They make you realize what you've had, what you've lost, and what you've taken for granted.
quotes.name: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.message: We need to say goodbye to the traditional methodologies of corporate universities.
quotes.name: Marcus Buckingham

quotes.message: A man never knows how to say goodbye; a woman never knows when to say it.
quotes.name: Helen Rowland

quotes.message: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: When I mount the scaffold at last these will be my farewell words to the sheriff: Say what you will against me when I am gone, but don't forget to add, in common justice, that I was never converted to anything.
quotes.name: H. L. Mencken

quotes.message: Nothing hurts like a hostile farewell.
quotes.name: Regina Jennings

quotes.message: How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.
quotes.name: Carol Sobieski and Thomas Meehan

quotes.message: We will put no impediment in your way and we will be at dockside bidding you a farewell as you set off into the sunset.
quotes.name: Charles Lichenstein

quotes.message: Painful though parting be, I bow to you as I see you off to distant clouds.
quotes.name: Emperor Saga

quotes.message: Farewell has a sweet sound of reluctance. Good-by is short and final, a word with teeth sharp to bite through the string that ties past to the future.
quotes.name: John Steinbeck

quotes.message: Saying goodbye doesn't mean anything. It's the time we spent together that matters, not how we left it.
quotes.name: Trey Parker

quotes.message: Every farewell combines loss and new freedom.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: If you're brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Farewell all relations and friends in Christ; farewell acquaintances and all earthly enjoyments; farewell reading and preaching, praying and believing, wanderings, reproaches, and sufferings.
quotes.name: Donald Cargill

quotes.message: We'll meet again, Don't know where,don't know when, But I know we'll meet again, some sunny day.
quotes.name: Vera Lynn

quotes.message: May the road rise up to meet you, may the wind be ever at your back. May the sun shine warm upon your face and the rain fall softly on your fields. And until we meet again, may God hold you in the hollow of his hand.
quotes.name: Irish Blessing

quotes.message: Only in the agony of parting do we look into the depths of love.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Gone—flitted away, taken the stars from the night and the sun from the day! Gone, and a cloud in my heart.
quotes.name: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.message: Goodbye, goodbye, I hate the word. Solitude has long since turned brown and withered, sitting bitter in my mouth and heavy in my veins.
quotes.name: R.M. Grenon

quotes.message: It's time to say goodbye, but I think goodbyes are sad and I'd much rather say hello. Hello to a new adventure.
quotes.name: Ernie Harwell

quotes.message: The return makes one love the farewell.
quotes.name: Alfred De Musset

quotes.message: Learning to let go should be learned before learning to get. Life should be touched, not strangled. You've got to relax, let it happen at times, and at others move forward with it.
quotes.name: Ray Bradbury

quotes.message: Farewell is a beautiful and a soft word and yet it is a horrible and a heavy thing too!
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: Farewell, my sister, fare thee well. The elements be kind to thee, and make thy spirits all of comfort: fare thee well.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Farewell, my great one, my own, farewell, my pride, farewell, my swift, deep, dear river, how I loved your daylong splashing, how I loved to plunge into your cold waves.
quotes.name: Boris Pasternak

quotes.message: A farewell to my shadow is not my death; it's my rebirth in darkness.
quotes.name: Munia Khan

quotes.message: Farewell, dearest friend, never to see one another any more till at the right hand of Christ.
quotes.name: Donald Cargill

quotes.message: Farewell! a word that must be, and hath been—A sound which makes us linger; yet—farewell!
quotes.name: Lord Byron

quotes.message: While conscience is our friend, all is at peace;however once it is offended,farewell to a tranquil mind.
quotes.name: Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.message: You and I will meet again, When we're least expecting it, One day in some far off place, I will recognize your face, I won't say goodbye my friend, For you and I will meet again.
quotes.name: Tom Petty

quotes.message: Finally, brethren, farewell. Be perfect, be of good comfort, be of one mind, live in peace; and the God of love and peace shall be with you.
quotes.name: Paul

quotes.message: The two hardest things to say in life are hello for the first time and goodbye for the last.
quotes.name: Moira Rogers

quotes.message: Farewell, fair cruelty.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Fare thee well! and if for ever, still for ever, fare thee well.
quotes.name: Lord Byron

quotes.message: Farewell! God knows when we shall meet again.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: I'll never see them again. I know that. And they know that. And knowing this, we say farewell.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: Farewell is a word that,in any language, is full of sorrow. It is a word that promises absolutely nothing.
quotes.name: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.message: Farewell is a father's good-by. It is - 'Go out in the world and do well, my son.' It is encouragement and admonition. It is hope and faith. But it passes over the significance of the moment; of parting it says nothing.
quotes.name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.message: Farewell! Dearest and most beloved of men_whatever may be my fate_be happiness yours! Once more, my lingering, foreboding heart, repeats farewell.
quotes.name: Mary Hays

quotes.message: Farewell to you and the youth I have spent with you. It was but yesterday we met in a dream.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: You yearn to stay in this in-between place, where the beauty of the times you have freshly bade farewell to is still alive and vivid in your mind – almost real – and the reality of your new circumstances has yet to fully sink in.
quotes.name: Agnes Chew

quotes.message: There was something unfinished about not saying farewell, like a door left open in the chill night.
quotes.name: Julie C. Dao

quotes.message: For me, the times I always regret are missed opportunities to say farewell to good people, to wish them long life and say to them in all sincerity.
quotes.name: Kevin Hearne

quotes.message: This time, I want the hugs, kisses, and love that comes with a farewell … even if it’s a temporary one.
quotes.name: J. B. Mcgee

quotes.message: Farewell!-God knows when we shall meet again.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Never say goodbye because goodbye means going away and going away means forgetting.
quotes.name: J.M. Barrie

quotes.message: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected. Maybe they always have been and will be. Maybe we've lived a thousand lives before this one and in each of them we've found each other. And maybe each time, we've been forced apart for the same reasons. That means that this goodbye is both a goodbye for the past ten thousand years and a prelude to what will come.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: I still cannot understand how he could abandon me so unceremoniously, without any sort of goodbye, without looking back even once. The pain is like an axe that chops my heart.
quotes.name: Yann Martel

quotes.message: I thought I was stronger than a word, but I just discovered that having to say goodbye to you is by far the hardest thing I’ve ever had to do.
quotes.name: Colleen Hoover

quotes.message: Sadly enough, the most painful goodbyes are the ones that are left unsaid and never explained.
quotes.name: Jonathan Harnisch

quotes.message: This is a long goodbye, yet not time enough. I have no aptitude for this. I cannot learn this. I would hold on, and hold on, until my hands clutch at emptiness.
quotes.name: Juliet Marillier

quotes.message: Saying goodbye is a little like dying.
quotes.name: Marjane Satrapi

quotes.message: It's the emptiest and yet the fullest of all human messages: 'Good-bye.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: I know too well how good-bye can steal more than just the future.
quotes.name: Talia Vance

quotes.message: It's hard to say goodbye for good at any time or any place.
quotes.name: Cornell Woolrich

quotes.message: Goodbyes are hard because now all I will have Is a beloved, but incomplete form of you.
quotes.name: Karl Kristian Flores

quotes.message: We want to control our deaths, our goodbye to the world, and if we can't control is, we can at least control how we leave it behind.
quotes.name: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.message: The best kind of goodbye is the kind where you don’t actually have to leave the person behind.
quotes.name: Dan Gemeinhart

quotes.message: An honest goodbye is one that does not seek excuses or reasons, or explanations of any kind.
quotes.name: Roger Housden

quotes.message: On any day no goodbye is forever.
quotes.name: Dahi Tamara Koch

quotes.message: It’s so difficult to say goodbye because, really, we’ve only just said hello.
quotes.name: Margaret McMullan

quotes.message: Don’t let the goodbye scare you from starting what could be the best story of your life.
quotes.name: Dawn Lanuza

quotes.message: There are some people so addicted to exaggeration that they can't tell the truth without lying.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Never exaggerate. It is a matter of great importance to forego superlatives, in part to avoid offending the truth, and in part to avoid cheapening your judgment. Exaggeration wastes distinction and testifies to the paucity of your understanding and taste.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: Some so speak in exaggerations and superlatives, that we need to make a large discount from their statements, before we can come at their real meaning.
quotes.name: Tryon Edwards

quotes.message: Unless you embellish, you can't tell the truth.
quotes.name: Marty Rubin

quotes.message: Exaggeration is a standard peculiarity of man. To deprecate is often a form of exaggeration which people do not notice, because it appears to be its opposite.
quotes.name: Idries Shah

quotes.message: Exaggeration, the inseparable companion of greatness.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Exaggeration is lying. It does not take long for the people in the community to get the habit of discounting twenty-five percent of all you say. If you continually overstate and vociferate you must keep on getting louder, until you soon become incoherent.
quotes.name: Frank Crane

quotes.message: Eschew the monumental. Shun the Epic. All the guys who can paint great big pictures can paint great small ones.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: It is the essence of truth that it is never excessive.... We must not resort to the flame where only light is required.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Every exaggeration of the truth once detected by others destroys our credibility and makes all that we do and say suspect.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: If you add to the truth, you subtract from it.
quotes.name: The Talmud

quotes.message: But exaggeration establishes no good understanding between the reader and the author. It is a solemn appeal to our credulity, and we are right to resent it. It is the violence of a weakling hand—the worst manner of violence.
quotes.name: Alice Meynell

quotes.message: I don't exaggerate—I just remember big.
quotes.name: Chi Chi Rodriguez

quotes.message: Sometimes in life we blow things out of proportion because proportion is so dull.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: If you use the term 'over-exaggerate,' you know the definition neither of 'exaggerate' nor of 'over.
quotes.name: Rodney Ulyate

quotes.message: To exaggerate is to weaken.
quotes.name: Jean François de La Harpe

quotes.message: Exaggeration is a branch of lying.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: Exaggeration is truth that has lost its temper.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: It is always the novice who exaggerates.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: Exaggeration is the melodramatic child of truth.
quotes.name: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.message: Exaggeration is in the course of things. Nature sends no creature, no man into the world, without adding a small excess of his proper quality. Given the planet, it is still necessary to add the impulse; so, to every creature nature added a little violence of direction in its proper path, a shove to put it on its way; in every instance, a slight generosity, a drop too much.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Exaggeration! was ever any virtue attributed to a man without exaggeration? was ever any vice, without infinite exaggeration? Do we not exaggerate ourselves to ourselves, or do we recognize ourselves for the actual men we are? Are we not all great men? Yet what are we actually, to speak of? We live by exaggeration.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: I know exaggerators of both kinds: people whose lies are only picturesque adjectives, and people whose picturesque adjectives are only lies.
quotes.name: Katherine Fullerton Gerould

quotes.message: An element of exaggeration clings to the popular judgment: great vices are made greater, great virtues greater also; interesting incidents are made more interesting, softer legends more soft.
quotes.name: Walter Bagehot

quotes.message: All the exaggerations are right, if they exaggerate the right thing.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Exaggeration is the cheapest form of humor.
quotes.name: Barbara Mertz

quotes.message: Exaggeration is a blood relation to falsehood, and nearly as blamable.
quotes.name: Hosea Ballou

quotes.message: He who cannot exaggerate is not qualified to utter truth.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: The temptation to vivify the tale and make it walk abroad on its own legs is hard to deny.
quotes.name: Gelett Burgess

quotes.message: Exaggeration in every sense is as essential to newspaper writing as it is to the writing of plays: for the point is to make as much as possible of every occurrence.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: All passions exaggerate; and they are passions only because they do exaggerate.
quotes.name: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.message: You always get exaggerated notions about things you don't know anything about.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Thought is a process of exaggeration. The refusal to exaggerate is not infrequently an alibi for the disinclination to think or praise.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: Stop telling such outlandish tales. Stop turning minnows into whales.
quotes.name: Dr. Seuss

quotes.message: We exaggerate misfortune and happiness alike. We are never as bad off or as happy as we say we are.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: Examples of exaggeration can be found in almost any advertising medium. The use of the superlative is altogether too prevalent. 'The finest,' 'the best,' 'the greatest,' 'the purest,' 'the most economical,' and so on ad infinitum, are hurled at the public everywhere. Surely not all products of the same class can be the best or the finest.
quotes.name: Daniel Starch

quotes.message: He's the type who makes mountains out of molehills and then sells climbing equipment.
quotes.name: Ivern Ball

quotes.message: Don't, Sir, accustom yourself to use big words for little matters.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: People add color to their story because they think it happened in black and white.
quotes.name: Tawny Lara

quotes.message: There is no one who does not exaggerate. In conversation, men are encumbered with personality, and talk too much.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Men of great conversational powers almost universally practise a sort of lively sophistry and exaggeration which deceives for the moment both themselves and their auditors.
quotes.name: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quotes.message: By speaking, by thinking, we undertake to clarify things, and that forces us to exacerbate them, dislocate them, schematize them. Every concept is in itself an exaggeration.
quotes.name: José Ortega y Gasset

quotes.message: Exaggeration misleads the credulous and offends the perceptive.
quotes.name: Eliza Cook

quotes.message: Exaggeration is a prodigality of the judgment which shows the narrowness of one's knowledge or one's taste.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: Danger lies in the writer becoming the victim of his own exaggeration, losing the exact notion of sincerity, and in the end coming to despise truth itself as something too cold, too blunt for his purpose—as, in fact, not good enough for his insistent emotion. From laughter and tears the descent is easy to sniveling and giggles.
quotes.name: Joseph Conrad

quotes.message: When we exaggerate the tenderness of our friends towards us, it is often less from gratitude than from a desire to exhibit our own merit.
quotes.name: François de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: People exaggerate the value of things they haven't got: everybody worships truth and unselfishness because they have no experience with them.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: We aim above the mark, to hit the mark. Every act hath some falsehood of exaggeration in it.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Never believe extraordinary characters which you hear of people. Depend upon it, they are exaggerated. You do not see one man shoot a great deal higher than another.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Poets and writers who are in love with the superlative all want to do more than they can.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: I was always conscious of that weak point of mine, and sometimes very much afraid of it. I exaggerate everything, that is where I go wrong.
quotes.name: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.message: 'Tis a rule of manners to avoid exaggeration.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Adding more bull to bull yields bigger bull.
quotes.name: Cathy Burnham Martin

quotes.message: Like I said, all comedy is based on exaggeration, big or small, whatever you can get away with.
quotes.name: Drew Carey

quotes.message: Nothing makes a fish bigger than almost being caught.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: Exaggeration is to paint a snake and add legs.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: Man is inclined to exaggerate almost everything — except his own mistakes.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: On the death of a friend, we should consider that the fates through confidence have devolved on us the task of a double living, that we have henceforth to fulfill the promise of our friend's life also, in our own, to the world.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: Death leaves a heartache no one can heal, love leaves a memory no one can steal.
quotes.name: Richard Puz

quotes.message: Closed eyes, heart not beating, but a living love.
quotes.name: Avis Corea

quotes.message: I pray to God to remove my enemies from my life, and before I know it I started losing friends. Am just saying no one to be trusted.
quotes.name: Blaze Olamiday

quotes.message: Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks.
quotes.name: Waqar Ahmed

quotes.message: A friendship that can cease has never been real.
quotes.name: St. Jerome

quotes.message: We call that person who has lost his father, an orphan; and a widower that man who has lost his wife. But that man who has known the immense unhappiness of losing a friend, by what name do we call him? Here every language is silent and holds its peace in impotence.
quotes.name: Joseph Roux

quotes.message: Sometimes we lose friends for whose loss our regret is greater than our grief, and others for whom our grief is greater than our regret.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: That friendship will not continue to the end which is begun for an end.
quotes.name: Francis Quareles

quotes.message: When one has lost a friend one's eyes should be neither dry nor streaming. Tears, yes, there should be, but not lamentation.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: We all lose friends.. we lose them in death, to distance and over time. But even though they may be lost, hope is not. The key is to keep them in your heart, and when the time is right, you can pick up the friendship right where you left off. Even the lost find their way home when you leave the light on.
quotes.name: Amy Marie Walz

quotes.message: The death of a friend is equivalent to the loss of a limb.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Lovers have a right to betray you friends don't.
quotes.name: Judy Holliday

quotes.message: Good God! How often are we to die before we go quite off this stage? In every friend we lose a part of ourselves, and the best part.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: I have learned that no matter how good a friend is, they're going to hurt you every once in a while and you must forgive them for that.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If two friends ask you to judge a dispute, do not accept, as you may lose a friend.
quotes.name: Saint Augustine

quotes.message: Everyone leaves footprints in your memory, but the ones that leave footprints in your heart are the ones you will truly remember.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sperling

quotes.message: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Foley

quotes.message: Make as many friends as you can, but don't build your life on them alone. It's an unstable foundation.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Fare thee well! and if for ever .
quotes.name: Lord Byron

quotes.message: A special friend is hard to find, hard to lose and impossible to forget.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I'm losing friends 'cause people are catching feelings I'm not catching.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Due to success I started losing friends.
quotes.name: Ace Hood

quotes.message: Some people are going to leave, but that's not the end your story. That's the end of their part in your story.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Don’t be dismayed at goodbyes. A farewell is necessary before you can meet again. And meeting again, after moments or lifetime, is certain for those, who are friends.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: Life is a bus ride, with only so many seats. It took me a long time to comprehend that sometimes people had to leave my life, to make room for the better ones, but once I understood that it became easier to let go, and I was surprised at just how quickly new, interesting people somehow found their way onto my bus.
quotes.name: Dodie Clark

quotes.message: When your friends are gone and you only can look at pictures, then remeber, that times and people change but that memories stay forever.
quotes.name: C.M.

quotes.message: One of the difficult things about growing older is that you start losing so many friends. On the other hand, the older you get, the less time you have to wait until you see them again.
quotes.name: Ron Brackin

quotes.message: Your lost friends are not dead but gone before; advanced a stage or two upon that road which you must travel in the steps they trod.
quotes.name: Aristophanes

quotes.message: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: The worst pain in the world goes beyond the physical. Even further beyond any other emotional pain one can feel. It is the betrayal of a friend.
quotes.name: Heather Brewer

quotes.message: While we are mourning the loss of our friend, others are rejoicing to meet him behind the veil.
quotes.name: John Taylor

quotes.message: Two persons cannot long be friends if they cannot forgive each other’s little failings.
quotes.name: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.message: Can miles truly separate you from friends… If you want to be with someone you love, aren’t you already there?
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: The deep pain that is felt at the death of every friendly soul arises from the feeling that there is in every individual something which is inexpressible, peculiar to him alone, and is, therefore, absolutely and irretrievably lost.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: When our friends are alive, we see the good qualities they lack; dead, we remember only those they possessed.
quotes.name: Jean Antoine Petit-Senn

quotes.message: No distance of place or lapse of time can lessen the friendship of those who are thoroughly persuaded of each other’s worth.
quotes.name: Robert Southey

quotes.message: Though friendship is not quick to burn, it is explosive stuff.
quotes.name: May Sarton

quotes.message: The difficulty is not so great to die for a friend, as to find a friend worth dying for.
quotes.name: Homer

quotes.message: Breaking with old friends is one of the most painful of the changes in all that piling up of a multitude of small distasteful changes that constitutes growing older
quotes.name: John Dos Passos

quotes.message: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: It’s hard to tell who has your back, from who has it long enough just to stab you in it’.
quotes.name: Nicole Richie

quotes.message: False friends are like our shadow, keeping close to us while we walk in the sunshine, but leaving us the instant we cross into the shade.
quotes.name: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.message: Death is but crossing the world, as friends do the seas; they live in one another still. For they must be present, that love and live in that which is omnipresent. In this divine glass, they see face to face, and their converse is free as well as pure. This is the comfort of friends, that though they may be said to die, yet their friendship and society are, in the best sense, ever present, because immortal.
quotes.name: William Penn

quotes.message: Friendship is like a glass ornament, once it is broken, it can rarely be put back together in exactly the same way.
quotes.name: Charles Kingsley

quotes.message: The worst solitude is to be destitute of sincere friendship.
quotes.name: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Sometimes your closest friend is your greatest enemy.
quotes.name: Jason Fong

quotes.message: We can’t feel the lose of a friend until they are apart from us.
quotes.name: Debolina

quotes.message: A friend who dies, it’s something of you who dies.
quotes.name: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.message: I used to know you the best and now I don’t even remember your name.
quotes.name: Mya Waechtler

quotes.message: Sometimes being a friend means mastering the art of timing. There is a time for silence. A time to let go and allow people to hurl themselves into their own destiny. And a time to prepare to pick up the pieces when it's all over.
quotes.name: Octavia Butler

quotes.message: Losing people you love affects you. It is buried inside of you and becomes this big, deep hole of ache. It doesn’t magically go away, even when you stop officially mourning.
quotes.name: Carrie Jones

quotes.message: There are going to be some people who at some point of your life will become your friends. And some friends, who at some point, will become just people.
quotes.name: Chanda Kaushik

quotes.message: Life is an operation which is done in a forward direction. One lives toward the future, because to live consists inexorably in doing, in each individual life making itself.
quotes.name: Jose Ortega Gasset

quotes.message: People change and things go wrong but just remember life goes on.
quotes.name: Mac Miller

quotes.message: All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on.
quotes.name: Havelock Ellis

quotes.message: Life goes on is a redundancy. Life is defined by its going on.
quotes.name: David Levithan

quotes.message: Sometimes, you regret letting certain people into your life. The harm has already been done. All you can do is learn a lesson from it and move on. Life is to short to spend it on regrets. life goes on.
quotes.name: Gloria Lamisi

quotes.message: To be judged for your imperfections is to be judged for being human, mistakes are made, life goes on, don't let other people change who you are.
quotes.name: Lee Jameson

quotes.message: Even though we have been hurt, we must find a way to get through it, life goes on whether we want it to or not. The world keeps turning no matter how bad we feel. This is why we have to learn how to bounce back and keep moving forward.
quotes.name: Rashida Rowe

quotes.message: We have this unspoken connection. We see each other, lock eyes, smile that one certain smile that means nothing to anyone else, but the world to us, and keep going on. life goes on, but our love remains.
quotes.name: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.message: I am strengthened by my weaknesses. I am brave because of my fears. I am greater because of my mistakes. Life goes on, forget the past.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: When the pretty birds have flown, And you feel hurt and alone, Be strong and carry on, And remember that life goes on.
quotes.name: Mouloud Benzadi

quotes.message: One thing always sure. Life go on with you or without you, no matter how much you seen.
quotes.name: Lalita Tademy

quotes.message: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: Life goes on pretty much the same way. I've been working on a couple of films on the side. You may see some more. You may even see another television show.
quotes.name: Norman Lear

quotes.message: if something does go wrong, here is my advice. Keep calm and Carry on.
quotes.name: Maira Kalman

quotes.message: Life gets more interesting as it goes on. It becomes fuller because there is perspective there.
quotes.name: Ann Dowd

quotes.message: Remember, whether you choose to move on or stay stuck in the past, life goes on!
quotes.name: Billy Cox

quotes.message: Life is more than just chess. Though king dies, life goes on.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Change has to come for life to struggle forward.
quotes.name: Helen Hollick

quotes.message: You either get bitter or you get better. It's that simple. You either take what has been dealt to you and allow it to make you a better person, or you allow it to tear you down. The choice does not belong to fate, It belongs to you.
quotes.name: Josh Shipp

quotes.message: You are responsible for your life. You can't keep blaming somebody else for your dysfunction. Life is really about moving on.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Sometimes our light goes out, but is blown again into instant flame by an encounter with another human being.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: So long as this struggle known as life goes on, there will always be the music to fit the mood and make it better.
quotes.name: Patrick James Balthazor

quotes.message: It's never nice to lose someone close to you; unfortunately, life goes on, and we have to make peace with it and move on.
quotes.name: Francois Hougaard

quotes.message: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.name: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.message: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
quotes.name: Dr. Seuss

quotes.message: If you carry joy in your heart, you can heal any moment.
quotes.name: Carlos Santana

quotes.message: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: The great courageous act that we must all do, is to have the courage to step out of our history and past so that we can live our dreams.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Grief is in two parts. The first is loss. The second is the remaking of life.
quotes.name: Anne Roiphe

quotes.message: You are the sky. The clouds are what happens, what comes and goes.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Things end. People leave. And you know what? Life goes on.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Scott

quotes.message: Things change. Stuff happens. Life goes on.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Scott

quotes.message: In the middle of life, death comes to take your measurements. The visit is forgotten and life goes on. But the suit is being sewn on the sly.
quotes.name: Tomas Transtromer

quotes.message: Life goes on after sorrow, in spite of sorrow, as a defense against sorrow.
quotes.name: Cornelia Meigs

quotes.message: The longer your life goes on, the more death you face.
quotes.name: Patrick Swayze

quotes.message: Weep if you must Parting is hell But life goes on So sing as well.
quotes.name: Joyce Grenfell

quotes.message: Life goes on and on, after one's lack has run out. Youthfulness persists, alas, long after one has ceased to be young.
quotes.name: Glenway Wescott

quotes.message: Life goes on with fragile normalcy.
quotes.name: Sara Gruen

quotes.message: You can't have an ending. It's impossible. Because unlike in the movies, life goes on. You're never at the end until you die.
quotes.name: E. Lockhart

quotes.message: Life goes on forever like the gnawing of a mouse.
quotes.name: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.message: Our body is a machine for living. It is organized for that, it is its nature. Let life go on in it unhindered and let it defend itself.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: As life goes on it becomes tiring to keep up the character you invented for yourself, and so you relapse into individuality and become more like yourself everyday.
quotes.name: Agatha Christie

quotes.message: You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward.
quotes.name: Conrad Hall

quotes.message: I hope life isn't a big joke, because I don't get it.
quotes.name: Jack Handey

quotes.message: You can fool all the people some of the time, and some of the people all the time, but you cannot fool all the people all the time.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Abraham Lincoln
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: It is the ability to take a joke, not make one, that proves you have a sense of humor.
quotes.name: Max Eastman

quotes.message: The aim of a joke is not to degrade the human being, but to remind him that he is already degraded.
quotes.name: George Orwell

quotes.message: Suppose the world were only one of God's jokes, would you work any the less to make it a good joke instead of a bad one?
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: I trust in God, and His ways are not our ways. So we have to go with that, and there's nothing I can do about that.
quotes.name: Cissy Houston

quotes.message: You were made by God and for God, and until you understand that, life will never make sense.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: Faith in God is an opening up, a letting go, a deep trust, a free act of love but sometimes it was so hard to love.
quotes.name: Yann Martel

quotes.message: Hold fast to your faith. Keep your hope in the Lord. Embrace the love of God.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Faith is all about trusting God even when you don't understand His plan.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: We are a long time in learning that all our strength and salvation is in God.
quotes.name: David Brainerd

quotes.message: Faith is not the belief that everything will be all right tomorrow, but the belief that I possess the strength to make everything all right today.
quotes.name: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.message: Put up your guards, keep faith in God, I promise you all the world will be ours.
quotes.name: Puff Daddy
