quotes.message: God doesn't change his word, if He has promised you something;you better believe that is done before it's existence.
quotes.name: Euginia Herlihy

quotes.message: He knows that as long as a man keeps his faith in God and in himself nothing can permanently defeat him.
quotes.name: Wilferd Peterson

quotes.message: Faith in God includes faith in God's timing.
quotes.name: Neal A Maxwell

quotes.message: Through faith in the Lord Jesus alone can we obtain forgiveness of our sins, and be at peace with God; but, believing in Jesus, we become, through this very faith, the children of God; have God as our Father, and may come to Him for all the temporal and spiritual blessings which we need.
quotes.name: George Muller

quotes.message: Faith in God necessarily implies a lack of faith in humanity.
quotes.name: Barbara G. Walker

quotes.message: Build a strong faith in God through daily commitment in reading and obeying God's word.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe.
quotes.name: Saint Augustine

quotes.message: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Faith is a living, daring confidence in God's grace, so sure and certain that a man could stake his life on it a thousand times.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: A living faith in God means acceptance of the brotherhood of mankind.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: You can believe in God without believing in immortality, but it is hard to see how anyone can believe in immortality and not believe in God.
quotes.name: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.message: Trusting God means looking beyond what we can see to what God sees.
quotes.name: Charles Stanley

quotes.message: If you need all the answers to trust God, you are not really trusting God.
quotes.name: David McGee

quotes.message: The danger of loss of faith in God is not that one will believe in nothing, but rather that one will believe in anything.
quotes.name: Gilbert K Chesterton

quotes.message: The great thing about faith in God is that it keeps a man undisturbed in the midst of disturbance.
quotes.name: Oswald Chambers

quotes.message: You don't have any problems, all you need is faith in God.
quotes.name: R. W. Schambach

quotes.message: Faith in God is the instrument which enables men and women to remove the hills of difficulty which block their path.
quotes.name: William Barclay

quotes.message: The grace,faith,love and power of God will uplift you to greater heights.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Keep the faith. The vision is always for the appointed time. Be patient, prayerful and wait for the fulfillment of your visions.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: The word hope I take for faith; and indeed hope is nothing else but the constancy of faith.
quotes.name: John Calvin

quotes.message: If our faith in God is not the veriest sham, it demands, and will produce, the abandonment sometimes, the subordination always, of eternal helps and material good.
quotes.name: Alexander Maclaren

quotes.message: This is true faith, a living confidence in the goodness of God.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: Faith has to do with things that are not seen and hope with things that are not at hand.
quotes.name: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.message: Having faith in God means trusting in Him even when everything inside of you wants to take control.
quotes.name: Dan Ellis

quotes.message: Faith in God life can never take you by surprise again.
quotes.name: James Dobson

quotes.message: As believers in Jesus Christ, our work is to believe while God works on our behalf.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: Faith in God means believing absolutely in something with no proof whatsoever. Faith in humanity means believing absolutely in something with a huge amount of proof to the contrary. We are the true believers.
quotes.name: Joss Whedon

quotes.message: Having faith doesn't mean I have all the answers. It means trusting God especially in the midst of uncertainty.
quotes.name: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.message: To be a strong and empathetic person always requires us to trust that God will send angels to the people's heart we tried to reach, but couldn't.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: His faith was like the radar of a bat, it took him through the darkness that surrounded him. It would guide him through everything that evil would throw at him. When his body gave up, God's powers lifted him up and kept his heart thumping.
quotes.name: Mark A. Cooper

quotes.message: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
quotes.name: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.message: Many things are possible for the person who has hope. Even more is possible for the person who has faith. And still more is possible for the person who knows how to love. But everything is possible for the person who practices all three virtues.
quotes.name: Brother Lawrence

quotes.message: Everyone who believes in God at all believes that he knows what you and I are going to do tomorrow.
quotes.name: C S Lewis

quotes.message: To have faith in Christ means more than simply despising the delights of this life. It means we should bear all our daily trials that may bring us sorrow, distress, or unhappiness, and bear them patiently for as long as God wishes and until He comes to visit us. For it is said, I waited on the Lord and He came to me.
quotes.name: Symeon the New Theologian

quotes.message: Having faith in God did not mean sitting back and doing nothing. It meant believing you would find success if you did your best honestly and energetically.
quotes.name: Ken Follett

quotes.message: Only faith in God and trust in Him give us the strength to endure and obtain victory.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: There is never a moment when God is not in control. Relax! He's got you covered.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Faith is about trusting God when you have unanswered questions.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Even faith in God is only a stage on the way. Ultimately you abandon all, for you come to something so simple that there are no words to express it.
quotes.name: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.message: Let your life reflect the faith you have in God. Fear nothing and pray about everything. Be strong, trust God's word, and trust the process.
quotes.name: Germany Kent

quotes.message: Don’t be scared of anything. Trust in the Lord and face the battle of life. There is no power on earth that can lay you low.
quotes.name: Dada J.P. Vaswani

quotes.message: When gloomy clouds across the sky . Cast shadows o'er the land, . Bright rays of hope illumine my path, . For Jesus holds my hand.
quotes.name: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.message: The will of God wouldn’t take you, where His grace wouldn’t protect you.
quotes.name: Gloria Shalom

quotes.message: The situations that will stretch your faith most will be those times when life falls apart and God is nowhere to be found.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: So keep your faith in the God above, and faith in the righteous truth, . it shall bring you back to the absent love, and the joys of a vanished youth.
quotes.name: Edgar A. Guest

quotes.message: Prayer will change a heartache into a cheerful song, . If in faith you ask it, the answer will soon come 'long.
quotes.name: Eldred Herbert

quotes.message: My faith didn't remove the pain, but it got me through the pain. Trusting God didn't diminish or vanquish the anguish, but it enabled me to endure it.
quotes.name: Robert Rogers

quotes.message: Faith is not only daring to believe, it is also daring to act. When I believe in myself as a son of God, I attribute to all men the same quality. This goes for men of every class, creed and color. The proof that I believe this way will be measured by the way I act towards others.
quotes.name: Wilfred Peterson

quotes.message: God is capable of discerning the thoughts and intents of the heart, and answers prayers of faith both spoken and unspoken. It's all about faith.
quotes.name: Luis Ranzolin

quotes.message: The beginning of anxiety is the end of faith, and the beginning of faith is the end of anxiety.
quotes.name: George Miller

quotes.message: A tree is shown by its fruits, and in the same way those who profess to belong to Christ will be seen by what they do. For what is needed is not mere present professions, but perseverance to the end in the power of faith.
quotes.name: Ignatius of Antioch

quotes.message: What greater rebellion, impiety, or insult to God can there be than not to believe his promises?
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: When principles that run against your deepest convictions begin to win the day, then battle is your calling, and peace has become sin; you must, at the price of dearest peace, lay your convictions bare before friend and enemy, with all the fire of your faith.
quotes.name: Abraham Kuyper

quotes.message: If anyone cannot set his mind at rest by disregarding death, that man should know that he has not yet gone far enough in the faith of Christ.
quotes.name: John Calvin

quotes.message: Catch on fire with enthusiasm and people will come for miles to watch you burn.
quotes.name: John Wesley

quotes.message: Faith enables the believing soul to treat the future as present and the invisible as seen.
quotes.name: J. Oswald Sanders

quotes.message: Probabilities are the big temptation when it comes to exercising faith.
quotes.name: Miles Stanford

quotes.message: Firstly I believe in the reality of God as the centre of human aspiration and history. What I believe about man, made in the image of God, derives first and foremost from what I believe about God.
quotes.name: David Sheppard

quotes.message: I believe in Jesus Christ, in whom I get a picture of God within the limits of my comprehension. Upon Him rests the whole fabric of my life. He alone holds it together in form and purpose, and without Him it would disintegrate.
quotes.name: Hugh Redwood

quotes.message: When I believe, I am no longer a mere man, I am already a son of God.
quotes.name: Carlo Carretto

quotes.message: He does not believe, that does not live according to his Belief.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: There comes a time when we have to believe where we cannot prove, and to accept where we cannot understand. If, even in the darkest hour, we believe that somehow there is a purpose in life, and that somehow that purpose is love, then even the unbearable becomes bearable, and even in the darkness there is still a glimmer of light.
quotes.name: William Barclay

quotes.message: I believe in one God, the creator of the universe. That he governs it by his Providence. That he ought to be worshipped. That the most acceptable service we can render to him is doing good to his other children.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Religious faith does not consist in supposing that there is a God. It consists in personal trust in God rising to personal fellowship with God.
quotes.name: William Temple

quotes.message: The only faith that wears well and holds its colour in all weathers is that which is woven of conviction and set with the sharp mordant of experience.
quotes.name: J. R. Lowell

quotes.message: To have faith is to meet the world with the conviction that in spite of all its ambiguities and its downright evils, there can be discerned in it the reality of love and a ground of hope.
quotes.name: John Macquarrie

quotes.message: Proofs are the last thing looked for by a truly religious mind which feels the imaginative fitness of its faith and knows instinctively that, in such a manner, imaginative fitness is all that can be required.
quotes.name: George Santayana

quotes.message: One in whom persuasion and belief . Had ripened into faith, and faith become . A passionate intuition.
quotes.name: William Wordsworth

quotes.message: That man is perfect in faith who can come to God in the utter dearth of his feelings and his desires, without a glow or an inspiration, with the weight of low thoughts, failures, neglects, and wandering forgetfulness, and say to him, 'Thou art my refuge, because thou art my home.
quotes.name: George Macdonald

quotes.message: How do we stand in respect of our use of the watch-tower of Faith? Are we so busy on the ground floor that we take it for granted, and seldom go upstairs? It is true that those stairs are dark and steep; but if we never make the effort, never ascend to the soul's summit, we remain something less than human.
quotes.name: Evelyn Underhill

quotes.message: The creeds are not objects of faith; they are expressions of a faith of which Christ is the object, and in regard to all such personal relationships there is scope for at least a great width of intellectual movement as we seek more and more perfectly to understand and to interpret the character with which we are confronted.
quotes.name: William Temple

quotes.message: Faith literally means to 'give up, surrender, or commit.' Faith is complete confidence.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Belief is a wise wager. Granted that faith cannot be proved, what harm will come to you if you gamble on its truth and it proves false? If you gain, you gain all; if you lose, you lose nothing. Wager, then, without hesitation, that He exists.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: Faith of our fathers, living still, . In spite of dungeon, fire, and sword; . O how our hearts beat high with joy . When e'er we hear that glorious word! . Faith of our fathers, holy faith! . We will be true to thee until death.
quotes.name: Carolyn Craig Franklin

quotes.message: Busy not yourself in looking forward to the events of to-morrow; but whatever may be those of the days Providence may yet assign you neglect not to turn them to advantage.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: Procrastination is like a credit card; it's a lot fun until you get the bill.
quotes.name: Christopher Parker

quotes.message: Regret for the things we did can be tempered by time; it is regret for the things we did not do that is inconsolable.
quotes.name: Sydney Harris

quotes.message: Stop procrastinating, stop feeling guilty and just do it!
quotes.name: Bastiaan Blikman

quotes.message: Procrastinating does nothing more than add to your do list.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Procrastination can guard against making the wrong choice too soon. Or it could just be mental laziness.
quotes.name: Pepper Hume

quotes.message: Procrastination is my sin. It brings me naught but sorrow. I know that I should stop it.
quotes.name: Gloria Pitzer

quotes.message: Procrastination is something best put off until tomorrow.
quotes.name: Gerald Vaughan

quotes.message: I don't wait for moods. You accomplish nothing if you do that. Your mind must know it has got to get down to work.
quotes.name: Baltasar Graci

quotes.message: Nothing is so fatiguing as the eternal hanging on of an uncompleted task.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.name: Anne Frank

quotes.message: Don't put off until tomorrow what can be done today. Procrastination is a sign of weak character.
quotes.name: Carol Cox

quotes.message: Procrastination is the soul rebelling against entrapment.
quotes.name: Nassim N. Taleb

quotes.message: He who hesitates is last.
quotes.name: Mae West

quotes.message: Procrastination is a sign of a perfectionist.
quotes.name: P. J. Kennedy

quotes.message: It's easy to get distracted and procrastinate sometimes, but you can make it happen.
quotes.name: Danny Yann

quotes.message: Don't let procrastination take over your life. Be brave and take risks. Your life is happening right now.
quotes.name: Roy Bennett

quotes.message: The greatest thief this world has ever produced is procrastination, and he is still at large.
quotes.name: Henry Wheelter Shaw

quotes.message: My evil genius Procrastination has whispered me to tarry 'til a more convenient season.
quotes.name: Mary Todd Lincoln

quotes.message: Don't postpone joy until you have learned all of your lessons. Joy is your lesson.
quotes.name: Alan Cohen

quotes.message: Procrastination is also a subtle act of corruption â€“ it corrupts valuable time
quotes.name: Amit Abraham

quotes.message: Vagueness and procrastination are ever a comfort to the frail in spirit.
quotes.name: John Updike

quotes.message: Procrastination may not take up a lot of effort physically but without you knowing it, it takes over the mind.
quotes.name: Stephen Hall

quotes.message: You may not be punished for your procrastination, but for sure you will be punished by your procrastination.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: The problem with procrastination is it's been around since the beginning of time it seems.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: Procrastination is the bad habit of putting of until the day after tomorrow what should have been done the day before yesterday.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Procrastination is the foundation of all disasters.
quotes.name: Pandora Poikilos

quotes.message: Doing just a little bit during the time we have available puts you that much further ahead than if you took no action at all.
quotes.name: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.message: The greatest amount of wasted time is the time not getting started.
quotes.name: Dawson Trotman

quotes.message: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday
quotes.name: Don Marquis

quotes.message: Happy soul and a hardcore procrastinator seeking truth.
quotes.name: Pallav Gautam

quotes.message: Procrastination is the thief of time, collar him.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: If you procrastinate when faced with a big difficult problem break the problem into parts, and handle one part at a time.
quotes.name: Robert Collier

quotes.message: You may delay, but time will not.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: I can't think about that right now. If I do, I'll go crazy. I'll think about that tomorrow.
quotes.name: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.message: Procrastinate now, don't put it off.
quotes.name: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.message: Procrastination is opportunity's natural assassin.
quotes.name: Victor Kiam

quotes.message: Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: There is no avoidance in delay.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: Delay is the deadliest form of denial.
quotes.name: C. Northcote Parkinson

quotes.message: If you are always saying I'll do it to tomorrow, than your tomorrow will than turn into another day and so on, and so, etc. etc.
quotes.name: Victoria Addino

quotes.message: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: If you put off everything till you're sure of it, you'll never get anything done.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Never postpone until tomorrow what you can postpone until the day after.
quotes.name: Raoul Wallenberg

quotes.message: Procrastinators are the painters of tomorrow.
quotes.name: Rick Rotante

quotes.message: Procrastination is a ring on every man's finger.
quotes.name: Trebonianus Gallus

quotes.message: Procrastination is one of the most common and deadliest of diseases and its toll on success and happiness is heavy.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: In delay there lies no plenty.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: A mother is always the beginning. She is how things begin.
quotes.name: Amy Tan

quotes.message: The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new.
quotes.name: Rajneesh

quotes.message: Mother love is the fuel that enables a normal human being to do the impossible.
quotes.name: Marion C. Garretty

quotes.message: Most mothers are instinctive philosophers.
quotes.name: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.message: There is only one pretty child in the world, and every mother has it.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Youth fades; love droops, the leaves of friendship fall; A mother's secret hope outlives them all.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.message: A mother is one to whom you hurry when you are troubled
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: Before a day was over, Home comes the rover, For mother's kiss â€” sweeter this Than any other thing!
quotes.name: William Allingham

quotes.message: A mother's arms are more comforting than anyone else's.
quotes.name: Princess Diana

quotes.message: Who fed me from her gentle breast And hushed me in her arms to rest, And on my cheek sweet kisses prest? My Mother.
quotes.name: Ann Taylor

quotes.message: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love, and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
quotes.name: Stevie Wonder

quotes.message: The mother's heart is the child's schoolroom.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Only mothers can think of the future-because they give birth to it in their children.
quotes.name: Maxim Gorky

quotes.message: A mother's love for her child is like nothing else in the world. It knows no law, no pity, it dates all things and crushes down remorselessly all that stands in its path.
quotes.name: Agatha Christie

quotes.message: A good mother is irreplaceable.
quotes.name: Adriana Trigiani

quotes.message: My mother is my friend who shares with me her bread.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Blessed is a mother that would give up part of her soul for her children's happiness.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: My mom is a lifelong smile in my heart, her voice a comfort to my soul, her hugs my ladder to the stars.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: Being a full-time mother is one of the highest salaried jobsâ€¦ since the payment is pure love.
quotes.name: Mildred B. Vermont

quotes.message: Mothers care in volumes of tears and earnestness of prayers and a depth of emotion others cannot fathom.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: Mothers are fonder than fathers of their children because they are more certain they are their own.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: I will look after you and I will look after anybody you say needs to be looked after, any way you say. I am here. I brought my whole self to you. I am your mother.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Being a mother is an attitude, not a biological relation.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: The sweetest sounds to mortals given are heard in Mother, Home, and Heaven.
quotes.name: William Goldsmith Brown

quotes.message: The heart of a mother is a deep abyss at the bottom of which you will always find forgiveness.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: When you are a mother, you are never really alone in your thoughts. A mother always has to think twice, once for herself and once for her child.
quotes.name: Sophia Loren

quotes.message: A man loves his sweetheart the most, his wife the best, but his mother the longest.
quotes.name: Irish Proverb

quotes.message: Motherhood is near to divinity. It is the highest, holiest service to be assumed by mankind.
quotes.name: Howard W. Hunter

quotes.message: Mother is the name for god on the lips and hearts of all children
quotes.name: Brandon Lee

quotes.message: Motherhood has a very humanizing effect. Everything gets reduced to essentials.
quotes.name: Meryl Streep

quotes.message: A mother loves her children unconditionally. However they wrong her, she'll carry on loving them.
quotes.name: Alaa Al Aswany

quotes.message: There's nothing like your mother's sympathetic voice to make you want to burst into tears.
quotes.name: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.message: This heart, my own dear mother, bends, with love's true instinct, back to thee!
quotes.name: Thomas Moore

quotes.message: There is no velvet so soft as a mother's lap no rose as lovely as her smile, no path so flowery as that imprinted with her footsteps.
quotes.name: Archibald Thompson

quotes.message: My mother had a great deal of trouble with me, but I think she enjoyed it.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: A mother is not a person to lean on, but a person to make leaning unnecessary.
quotes.name: Dorothy Canfield Fisher

quotes.message: There's no way to be a perfect mother and a million ways to be a good one.
quotes.name: Jill Churchill

quotes.message: A mother is a person who seeing there are only four pieces of pie for five people, promptly announces she never did care for pie.
quotes.name: Tenneva Jordan

quotes.message: This is what we do, my mother's life said. We find ourselves in the sacrifices we make.
quotes.name: Cammie McGovern

quotes.message: My mother is my teacher, her words make me richer, I thank you oh my mother, may you grow and live long!
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: In a child's eyes, a mother is a goddess. She can be glorious or terrible, benevolent or filled with wrath, but she commands love either way. I am convinced that this is the greatest power in the universe.
quotes.name: N.K. Jemisin

quotes.message: But the mother's yearning, that completest type of the life in another life which is the essence of real human love, feels the presence of the cherished child even in the debased, degraded man.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: A mother's love perceives no impossibilities.
quotes.name: Paddock

quotes.message: I remember my mother's prayers and they have always followed me. They have clung to me all my life.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Mothers were the only ones you could depend on to tell the whole, unvarnished truth.
quotes.name: Margaret Dilloway

quotes.message: Mothers and their children are in a category all their own. No love so instantaneous and forgiving.
quotes.name: Gail Tsukiyama

quotes.message: Mothers and their children are in a category all their own. There's no bond so strong in the entire world. No love so instantaneous and forgiving.
quotes.name: Gail Tsukiyama

quotes.message: Mothers are like glue. Even when you can't see them, they're still holding the family together.
quotes.name: Susan Gale

quotes.message: In the ordinary business of life punctuality is . . . necessary.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Punctuality is the duty of subjects and the politeness of kings.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Punctuality is the first step towards success.
quotes.name: Nishtunishaa

quotes.message: The trouble with being punctual is that nobody's there to appreciate it.
quotes.name: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.message: Promptitude is not only a duty, but is also a part of good manners; it is favorable to fortune, reputation, influence, and usefulness; a little attention and energy will form the habit, so as to make it easy and delightful.
quotes.name: Charles Simmons

quotes.message: Punctuality is a quality the need of which is bound up with social co-operation. It has nothing to do with the relation of the soul to God, or with mystic insight, or with any of the matters with which the more elevated and spiritual moralists are concerned.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: The most indispensable qualification of a cook is punctuality. The same must be said of guests.
quotes.name: B. Savarin

quotes.message: Punctuality is not just limited to arriving at a place at right time, it is also about taking actions at right time.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Arriving late is a way of saying that your own time is more valuable than the time of the person who waited for you.
quotes.name: Karen Joy Fowler

quotes.message: Few things tend more to alienate friendship than a want of punctuality in our engagements. I have known the breach of a promise to dine or sup to break up more than one intimacy.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: One good thing about punctuality is that it's a sure way to help you enjoy a few minutes of privacy.
quotes.name: Orlando Aloysius Battista

quotes.message: Know the true value of time; snatch, seize, and enjoy every moment of it. No idleness, no delay, no procrastination; never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
quotes.name: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.message: So long as we think of it objectively, time is Fate or Chance, the factor in our lives for which we are not responsible, and about which we can do nothing; but when we begin to think of it subjectively, we feel responsible for our time, and the notion of punctuality arises.
quotes.name: W H Auden

quotes.message: Even if a farmer intends to loaf, he gets up in time to get an early start.
quotes.name: E W Howe

quotes.message: Tardiness often robs us opportunity, and the dispatch of our forces.
quotes.name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.message: Punctuality is the art of guessing how late the other fellow is going to be.
quotes.name: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.message: Punctuality is the thief of adventure.
quotes.name: Jan Struther

quotes.message: If you are 15 minutes early, you are on time. If you are on time, you are late and if you are late, you didn't want to be there.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: If you're there before it's over, you're on time.
quotes.name: James J. Walker

quotes.message: Method and punctuality are so little natural to man that where they exist they are commonly the effect of education or discipline.
quotes.name: W. B. Clulow

quotes.message: Preparedness and punctuality are two of the most important qualities of a leader.
quotes.name: John A. Widtsoe

quotes.message: Method is the very hinge of business, and there is no method without punctuality.
quotes.name: Richard Cecil

quotes.message: It is no use running; to set out betimes is the main point.
quotes.name: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.message: Punctuality is the politeness of kings.
quotes.name: Louis XVIII of France

quotes.message: Punctuality is one of the cardinal business virtues: always insist on it in your subordinates.
quotes.name: Don Marquis

quotes.message: Want of punctuality is a want of virtue.
quotes.name: John M. Mason

quotes.message: Punctuality is closely related to faithfulness and dependability. Being tardy can be linked to uninterest, apathy, slothfulness and procrastination...
quotes.name: Sterling W. Sill

quotes.message: Punctuality is not about being on time, it's basically about respecting your own commitments.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Punctuality is an essential trait of the teacher. It is a foundation, not an embellishment.
quotes.name: Boyd K. Packer

quotes.message: Strict punctuality is perhaps the cheapest virtue which can give force to an otherwise utterly insignificant character.
quotes.name: J. F. Boyes.

quotes.message: Punctuality is the sole of business.
quotes.name: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.message: The habit of being uniformly considerate toward others will bring increased happiness to you. As you put into practice the qualities of patience, punctuality, sincerity and solicitude, you will have a better opinion of the world about you.
quotes.name: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.message: But Time, unfortunately, though it makes animals and vegetables bloom and fade with amazing punctuality has no such simple effect upon the mind of man.
quotes.name: Virginia Woolf

quotes.message: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do the day after tomorrow.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Punctuality is the thief of time.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Punctuality is a compliment you pay to the intelligent and a rebuke you pay to the stupid.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: Punctuality is a virtue, if you don't mind being lonely.
quotes.name: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: The trouble with being punctual is that nobody's there to appreciate it.
quotes.name: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.message: It is difficult to prove yourself reliable when people are required to wait for you.
quotes.name: Wes Fesler

quotes.message: Punctuality is the stern virtue of men of business, and the graceful courtesy of princes.
quotes.name: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: Punctuality or the lack thereof oftentimes is the only introduction one will ever have to new groups and friends. Serenity and poise are not the companions of those who lack the courtesy and judgment to be on time.
quotes.name: Marvin J Ashton

quotes.message: Perhaps punctuality is a quality made even more valuable because it is found in so few people. Punctuality is not usually thought of in our day as a major virtue.
quotes.name: Sterling W. Sill

quotes.message: Unfaithfulness in the keeping of an appointment is an act of clear dishonesty. You may as well borrow a person's money as his time.
quotes.name: Horace Mann

quotes.message: To be on time is to be late. To be early is to be on time.
quotes.name: Tim Gunter

quotes.message: In the tyranny of time, schedules and routines are ministers teaching us punctuality.
quotes.name: Srishti Halder

quotes.message: Punctuality means doing something in an appointed period of time
quotes.name: Noopur Saini

quotes.message: Punctuality is the virtue of the bored.
quotes.name: Evelyn Waugh

quotes.message: Punctuality: the art of guessing how late the other person is going to be.
quotes.name: David Young

quotes.message: I am believer in punctuality, though it makes me lonely.
quotes.name: E.V Lucas

quotes.message: I have often noticed that the people who are late are often so much jollier than the people who have to wait for them.
quotes.name: E.V Lucas

quotes.message: The trouble with being punctual is that there's nobody there to appreciate it.
quotes.name: Harold Rome

quotes.message: If you are there before it is over, you are on time.
quotes.name: James J. Walker

quotes.message: Punctuality at work prepares you to face the inevitable and grab opportunities in time.
quotes.name: Sandeep Ravidutt Sharma

quotes.message: My motto is: be punctual, or don't be.
quotes.name: Frank Lupo

quotes.message: Punctuality is the vice of virtuous women.
quotes.name: John Patrick

quotes.message: I could never have done what I have done without the habits of punctuality, order, and diligence, without the determination to concentrate myself on one subject at a time.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: We teach punctuality, particularly if the enforcement of it disturbs the peace.
quotes.name: E.B. White

quotes.message: Beginning of a great day begins a night before.
quotes.name: Sukant Ratnakar

quotes.message: Self discipline, punctuality and time management are very important - for life is short, and every resource you have must be well utilized so that you find enlightenment and liberation - your ultimate goal.
quotes.name: Dada J.P. Vaswani

quotes.message: That man who is regular and punctual will get sure success in all walks of life.
quotes.name: Sivananda Saraswati

quotes.message: I have always been a quarter of an hour before my time, and it has made a man of me.
quotes.name: Lord Nelson

quotes.message: I was taught a very strong work ethic that included punctuality, which I've always felt is a sign of respect for others.
quotes.name: Nicole Kidman

quotes.message: A man consumes the time you make him wait in thinking of your faults-so don't be late!
quotes.name: Arthur Guiterman

quotes.message: When steam first began to pump and wheels go round at so many revolutions per minute, what are called business habits were intended to make the life of man run in harmony with the steam engine, and his movement rival the train in punctuality.
quotes.name: George William Russell

quotes.message: Lose an hour in the morning, and you will be looking for it all day.
quotes.name: Richard Whately

quotes.message: You come most carefully upon your hour.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: The only way of catching a train I have ever discovered is to miss the train before.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: An artist must organize his life. Here is the exact timetable of my daily activities. Get up: 7.18 am; be inspired: 10.23 to 11.47 am. I take lunch at 12.11 pm and leave the table at 12.14 pm.
quotes.name: Erik Satie

quotes.message: But think how early I go.
quotes.name: Lord Castlerosse

quotes.message: We've been waiting 700 years, you can have the seven minutes.
quotes.name: Michael Collins

quotes.message: We must leave exactly on time... From now on everything must function to perfection.
quotes.name: Benito Mussolini

quotes.message: I'm getting married in the morning, . Ding! dong! the bells are gonna chime. . Pull out the stopper; . Let's have a whopper; .
quotes.name: Alan Jay Lerner

quotes.message: We met at nine. . We met at eight. . I was on time. . No, you were late.
quotes.name: Alan Jay Lerner

quotes.message: If you have time don't wait for time.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: When you act on your promptings, you will live with no regrets.
quotes.name: Kody Bateman

quotes.message: Punctuality is a great virtue in the school of success.
quotes.name: Louis Osuetha

quotes.message: Mike, this is a railroad watch - as close to absolute accuracy as a watch can be made. Something no locomotive engineer conductor would function very well without. To such men, punctuality is as important as the steady beat of the human heart.
quotes.name: John Beresford Tipton

quotes.message: Nerds are nothing if not punctual.
quotes.name: Zoey

quotes.message: Smart and punctual. Two hours on the dot.
quotes.name: D'avin Jaqobis

quotes.message: Punctuality, Henry. Without it, time stands still.
quotes.name: Phil Brickman

quotes.message: Oh, do try to be punctual on the day of your wedding. It's one of those strange little rituals of courtship that requires your presence.
quotes.name: The Queen

quotes.message: And if they're as punctual as Big Ben, they've already got it.
quotes.name: Alex Sector

quotes.message: Morality knows nothing of geographical boundaries, or distinctions of race.
quotes.name: Herbert Spencer

quotes.message: Moral courage is higher and a rarer virtue than physical courage.
quotes.name: William Slim

quotes.message: Moral excellence comes about as a result of habit. We become just by doing just acts, temperate by doing temperate acts, brave by doing brave acts.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Unless we discover actual truth, morality is up for grabs.
quotes.name: Pamela Christian

quotes.message: Wrong is wrong even if everyone is doing it. Right is right even if no one is doing it.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The purpose of morality is to teach you, not to suffer and die, but to enjoy yourself and live.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Whenever you are to do a thing, though it can never be known but to yourself, ask yourself how you would act were all the world looking at you, and act accordingly.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Morality is a burglar's tool whose merit lies in never being left behind at the scene of the crime.
quotes.name: Karl Kraus

quotes.message: Every young man would do well to remember that all successful business stands on the foundation of morality.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Do not depend upon the morality of a person until you have seen him behave while in anger.
quotes.name: Umar

quotes.message: Children often have a much stronger concept of morality than adults.
quotes.name: Nina Bawden

quotes.message: The test of morality of a society is what it does with it's children.
quotes.name: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.message: Morality is the thing upon which your friends smile, and immorality is the thing upon which they frown.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Morality is the herd-instinct in the individual.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Morality is of the highest importance - but for us, not for God.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Morality is only moral when it is voluntary.
quotes.name: Lincoln Steffens

quotes.message: Do not do an immoral thing for moral reasons.
quotes.name: Thomas Hardy

quotes.message: Morality, like art, means drawing a line someplace.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: The quality of moral behavior varies in inverse ratio to the number of human beings involved.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: The higher the buildings, the lower the morals.The higher the buildings, the lower the morals.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Morality is simply the attitude we adopt towards people whom we personally dislike.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Morality comes with the sad wisdom of age, when the sense of curiosity has withered.
quotes.name: Graham Greene

quotes.message: A man that has lost moral sense is like a man in battle with both of his legs shot off: he has nothing to stand on.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Even if everyone else is not doing good. I alone will. Even if everyone else is doing wrong, I alone will not.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Always do what is right. It will gratify half of mankind and astound the other.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: There are no easy answers, but there are simple answers. We must have the courage to do what we know is morally right.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Morality is truth in full bloom.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: The best way to teach morality is to make it a habit with children.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: It's easy enough to preach morality on a full belly.
quotes.name: Erwin Sylvanus

quotes.message: Bad company ruins good morals.
quotes.name: I Corinthians 15:33

quotes.message: We have two kinds of morality side by side: one which we preach but do not practice and another which we practice but seldom preach.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: The only immorality is not to do what one has to do when one has to do it.
quotes.name: Jean Anouilh

quotes.message: Ordinary morality is only for ordinary people.
quotes.name: Aleister Crowley

quotes.message: Only morality in our actions can give beauty and dignity to life.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Do not be too moral. You may cheat yourself out of much life. So aim above morality. Be not simply good; be good for something.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Never let your sense of morals prevent you from doing what is right!
quotes.name: Isaac Asimov

quotes.message: Men are more moral than they think and far more immoral than they can imagine.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: The Moral Law tells us the tune we have to play: our instincts are merely the keys.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: Compassion is the basis of morality.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: Morality is a private and costly luxury.
quotes.name: Henry B. Adams

quotes.message: Morality is how you go about getting what you want without screwing anybody to get it.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Morality may keep you out of jail, but it takes the blood of Jesus Christ to keep you out of hell.
quotes.name: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.message: Food first, then morality.
quotes.name: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.message: Morality, like numinous awe, is a jump; in it, man goes beyond anything that can be 'given' in the facts of experience.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: Morality begins at the point of a gun.
quotes.name: Mao Zedong

quotes.message: The hottest place in Hell is reserved for those who remain neutral in times of great moral conflict.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: I'm not in pursuit of happiness, I'm happiness in pursuit; ready to happen everywhere I go.
quotes.name: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quotes.message: In pursuit of happiness, smart people often end up dumbing down themselves.
quotes.name: Erol Ozan

quotes.message: Pursuing happiness, and I did, and I still do, is not at all the same as being happy--which I think is fleeting, dependent on circumstances...If the sun is shining, stand in it---yes, yes, yes. Happy times are great, but happy times pass--they have to because time passes. The pursuit of happiness is more elusive; it is life-long, and it is not goal-centered. What you are pursuing is meaning--- a meaningful life. There's the hap-- the fate, the draw that is yours, and it isn't fixed, but changing the course of the stream, or dealing new cards, whatever metaphor you want to use---that's going to take a lot of energy. There are times when it will go so wrong that you will barely be alive, and times when you realise that being barely alive, on your own terms, is better than living a bloated half-life on someone else's terms. The pursuit isn't all or nothing--- it's all AND nothing.
quotes.name: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.message: As long as you are pursuing happiness, you do not have it.
quotes.name: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.message: It is the pursuit of happiness that makes people unhappy
quotes.name: Piero Scaruffi

quotes.message: Pursuit of happiness is a pursuit of mirage; you only realize its a delusion at the end of the road
quotes.name: A.M.M Alusi

quotes.message: The pursuit of happiness is a most ridiculous phrase: if you pursue happiness you'll never find it.
quotes.name: Carrie Snow

quotes.message: Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy.
quotes.name: Guillaume Apollinaire

quotes.message: If there is an abiding theme in 'The Pursuit of Happiness,' it is the idea that you come into the world already shaped by other people's past histories.
quotes.name: Douglas Kennedy

quotes.message: If you want happiness for an hour – take a nap. If you want happiness for a day – go fishing. If you want happiness for a year – inherit a fortune. If you want happiness for a lifetime – help someone else.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: We begin from the recognition that all beings cherish happiness and do not want suffering. It then becomes both morally wrong and pragmatically unwise to pursue only one’s own happiness oblivious to the feelings and aspirations of all others who surround us as members of the same human family. The wiser course is to think of others when pursuing our own happiness.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: The Constitution only guarantees you the right to pursue happiness. You have to catch it yourself.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: There is no such thing as the pursuit of happiness, but there is the discovery of joy.
quotes.name: Joyce Grenfell

quotes.message: The grand essentials of happiness are: something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
quotes.name: Allan K. Chalmers

quotes.message: In the pursuit of happiness, the difficulty lies in knowing when you have caught up.
quotes.name: R. H. Grenville

quotes.message: I think the conscientious pursuit of happiness by itself can validate decisions to change, to try again, especially when failure to change will lead to lives of duplicity, dishonesty, and deceit.
quotes.name: Ben Bradlee

quotes.message: We believe, as our founders did, that 'the pursuit of happiness' depends upon individual liberty; and individual liberty requires limited government.
quotes.name: Paul Ryan

quotes.message: It is not in the pursuit of happiness that we find fulfillment, it is in the happiness of pursuit.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: True happiness is… to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
quotes.name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: Happiness is the meaning and purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Maybe happiness is something that we can only pursue. And maybe we can actually never have it no matter what.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: […] success, like happiness, cannot be pursued; it must ensue, and it only does so as the unintended side-effect of one’s personal dedication to a cause greater than oneself or as the by-product of one’s surrender to a person other than oneself. Happiness must happen, and the same holds for success: you have to let it happen by not caring about it.
quotes.name: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.message: The road to happiness lies in two simple principles: find what it is that interests you and that you can do well, and when you find it put your whole soul into it-every bit of energy and ambition and natural ability you have.
quotes.name: John D. Rockefeller III

quotes.message: There are no happier people on this planet than those who decide that they want something, define what they want, get hold of the feeling of it even before its manifestation and then joyously watch the unfolding as, piece by piece by piece, it begins to unfold. That's the feeling of your hands in the clay.
quotes.name: Esther Hicks

quotes.message: Slow down and enjoy life. It's not only the scenery you miss by going too fast - you also miss the sense of where you are going and why.
quotes.name: Eddie Cantor

quotes.message: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Live every day as if it were going to be your last; for one day you're sure to be right.
quotes.name: Harry Morant

quotes.message: Simply enjoy life and the great pleasures that come with it.
quotes.name: Karolina Kurkova

quotes.message: I enjoy life when things are happening. I don't care if it's good things or bad things. That means you're alive.
quotes.name: Joan Rivers

quotes.message: Follow your hopes and not your fears.
quotes.name: Jody Bower

quotes.message: If you go around being afraid, you're never going to enjoy life. You have only one chance, so you've got to have fun.
quotes.name: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.message: Believe in 'live and let live'.
quotes.name: Satyendra Pandey

quotes.message: The safest course is to do nothing against one's conscience. With this secret, we can enjoy life and have no fear from death.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: In all of living, have much fun and laughter. Life is to be enjoyed, not just endured.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: Do anything, but let it produce joy.
quotes.name: Walt Whitman

quotes.message: Do what makes you happy, be with who makes you smile, laugh as much as you breathe, and love as long as you live.
quotes.name: Rachel Ann Nunes

quotes.message: Stop seeking out the storms and enjoy more fully the sunlight.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: Don't ask yourself what the world needs; ask yourself what makes you come alive. And then go and do that. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
quotes.name: Harold Whitman

quotes.message: Slow down and remember this: Most things make no difference.
quotes.name: Tim Ferriss

quotes.message: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: We must be willing to get rid of the life we've planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: You will never find time for anything. If you want time you must make it.
quotes.name: Charles Buxton

quotes.message: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
quotes.name: James Dean

quotes.message: I don't want to get to the end of my life and find that I lived just the length of it. I want to have lived the width of it as well.
quotes.name: Diane Ackerman

quotes.message: And in the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Its important to have specific dreams. Dream Big. Dream without fear.
quotes.name: Randy Pausch

quotes.message: Enjoy life. There's plenty of time to be dead.
quotes.name: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.message: Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: Live in the moment. Forget the past and don't concern yourself with the future.
quotes.name: Tanner Christensen

quotes.message: Fully embrace the now, no matter what the situation.
quotes.name: Patrick Flynn

quotes.message: Participate in life instead of just watching it pass you by.
quotes.name: Lindsey Wonderson

quotes.message: Keep your spirit free, be flexible, let go.
quotes.name: Leslie Brown

quotes.message: One day your life will flash before your eyes. Make sure it's worth watching.
quotes.name: Gerard Way

quotes.message: Never save the best for later. You don't know what tomorrow holds.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: The most important thing is to enjoy your life, to be happy, it's all that matters.
quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.message: No man is a failure who is enjoying life.
quotes.name: William Feather

quotes.message: Find ecstasy in life. The mere sense of living is joy enough.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: Dream big, stay positive, work hard, and enjoy the journey.
quotes.name: Urijah Faber

quotes.message: Enjoy the journey, enjoy every moment, and quit worrying about Winning and losing.
quotes.name: Matt Biondi

quotes.message: Take a step back, evaluate what is important, and enjoy life.
quotes.name: Teri Garr

quotes.message: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
quotes.name: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.message: Life is a challenge, meet it! Life is a dream, realize it! Life is a game, play it! Life is love, enjoy it!
quotes.name: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.message: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now.
quotes.name: Earl Nightingale

quotes.message: Live and work but do not forget to play, to have fun in life and really enjoy it.
quotes.name: Eileen Caddy

quotes.message: Life is too short to worry about anything. You had better enjoy it because the next day promises nothing.
quotes.name: Eric Davis

quotes.message: Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.
quotes.name: John Lennon

quotes.message: We will never enjoy life unless we make a quality decision to do so.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: You have to enjoy life. Always be surrounded by people that you like, people who have a nice conversation. There are so many positive things to think about.
quotes.name: Sophia Loren

quotes.message: Negative thinking keeps us from enjoying life.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: The struggles we endure today will be the ‘good old days’ we laugh about tomorrow.
quotes.name: Aaron Lauritsen

quotes.message: Life is like a roller coaster, live it, be happy, enjoy life.
quotes.name: Avril Lavigne

quotes.message: As you walk down the fairway of life you must smell the roses, for you only get to play one round.
quotes.name: Ben Hogan

quotes.message: Homework is not an option. My bed is sending out serious nap rays. I can't help myself. The fluffy pillows and warm comforter are more powerful than I am. I have no choice but to snuggle under the covers.
quotes.name: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.message: He's given me enough homework to last ten years. I'm gonna die of nerdism.
quotes.name: Mark A. Cooper

quotes.message: The worst thing a kid can say about homework is that it is too hard. The worst thing a kid can say about a game is it's too easy.
quotes.name: Henry Jenkins

quotes.message: You don't get rich off your day job, you get rich off your homework.
quotes.name: Daymond John

quotes.message: Everybody talks about finding your voice. Do your homework and your voice will find you.
quotes.name: Branford Marsalis

quotes.message: If you want to be lucky, do your homework.
quotes.name: Jim Rogers

quotes.message: The teacher can always tell when you did your homework on the bus.
quotes.name: Cynthia Lewis

quotes.message: Do your homework. I'm tired of carrying you.
quotes.name: Cheryl Miller

quotes.message: Teens think listening to music helps them concentrate. It doesn't. It relieves them of the boredom that concentration on homework induces.
quotes.name: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.message: With homework, school prepares students for overtime. With reports, it prepares them for payday.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: Do your homework and stand your ground.
quotes.name: Peter Bart

quotes.message: If you do your homework and do your due diligence, you shouldn't get stuck with one of them.
quotes.name: Dawson Grimsley

quotes.message: There's only one interview technique that matters. Do your homework so you can listen to the answers and react to them and ask follow-ups. Do your homework, prepare.
quotes.name: Jim Lehrer

quotes.message: Nothing is free. You got to pay to be in society. First you start with homework.
quotes.name: Mel Brooks

quotes.message: Homework is a term that means grown up imposed yet self-afflicting torture.
quotes.name: James Patterson

quotes.message: The more you do your homework, the more you're free to be intuitive. But you've got to put the work in.
quotes.name: Edward Norton

quotes.message: One of life's most painful moments comes when we must admit that we didn't do our homework, that we are not prepared.
quotes.name: Merlin Olsen

quotes.message: If you're working 12-hour days, then you come home to do three hours' homework, it's quite a lot on your plate.
quotes.name: Anna Popplewell

quotes.message: Writing for me can be homework. I do get a lot from it in the end. But I hate doing it.
quotes.name: Natalie Maines

quotes.message: Do your homework and know your business better than anyone. Otherwise, someone who knows more and works harder will kick your ass.
quotes.name: Mark Cuban

quotes.message: Homework is a best work,but if human hate it its a worst work.
quotes.name: Vidhya Vijay

quotes.message: Do your homework, study the craft, believe in yourself, and out-work everyone.
quotes.name: Justin Hires

quotes.message: The toughest thing about homework is getting mom and pop to agree on the same answer.
quotes.name: Joey Lauren Adams

quotes.message: Home computers are being called upon to perform many new functions, including the consumption of homework formerly eaten by the dog.
quotes.name: Doug Larson

quotes.message: The difference between a calculated risk and rolling the dice can be expressed in one word: homework.
quotes.name: Georgette Mosbacher

quotes.message: Lack of homework shows up in the marketplace as well as in the classroom.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: I like a teacher who gives you something to take home to think about besides homework.
quotes.name: Lily Tomlin

quotes.message: You see it in education a lot. If you do your homework, you get to pick out something from the class treasure chest.
quotes.name: Dace Svikis

quotes.message: Inspiration comes in the middle of the night when you should be doing homework.
quotes.name: Amy Lee

quotes.message: Do your homework and keep good files. Know the background and biases of your sources.
quotes.name: Jane Brody

quotes.message: My life is a black hole of boredom and despair. So basically you've been doing homework. Like I said, black hole.
quotes.name: Kiersten White

quotes.message: The same people who never did their homework in high school are still doing that to this very day out in the real world.
quotes.name: Jules Shear

quotes.message: My parents always taught me that my day job would never make me rich; it'd be my homework.
quotes.name: Daymond John

quotes.message: The team that is going to win is the one that does its homework the best by studying its opponents.
quotes.name: Imran Khan

quotes.message: When I was growing up, my parents told me. Finish your dinner. People in China and India are starving. I tell my daughters. Finish your homework. People in India and China are starving for your job.
quotes.name: Thomas Friedman

quotes.message: Homework, I have discovered, involves a sharp pencil and thick books and long sighs.
quotes.name: Katherine Applegate

quotes.message: Do your homework and know your facts, but remember it's passion that persuades.
quotes.name: H Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.message: Do your homework or hire wise experts to help you. Never jump into a business you have no idea about.
quotes.name: John Templeton

quotes.message: We define meaningful homework as tasks that enrich the in-school curriculum by challenging students to think deeply about important questions, apply their knowledge and skills toward solving genuine problems, and creating authentic products that will be used in meaningful ways.
quotes.name: Janet Alleman

quotes.message: Meaningful homework is oriented toward authentic forms of student achievement.
quotes.name: Janet Alleman

quotes.message: Meaningful homework should match the goals of the lessons and units and should expand, enrich, or apply what is learned in school.
quotes.name: Janet Alleman

quotes.message: Many claim that homework is necessary for improving student achievement--an assertion that is only partially a supported by research.
quotes.name: Janet Alleman

quotes.message: Homework is tough on parents, then, and it's also tough on children.
quotes.name: Alfie Kohn

quotes.message: Homework is a long-standing education that, until recently, has seldom been questioned.
quotes.name: Cathy Vatterott

quotes.message: Homework has generally been viewed as a positive practice and accepted without question as part of the student routine.
quotes.name: Cathy Vatterott

quotes.message: As the culture changed, and as the schools and families have changed, homework has become problematic for more and more students, parent, and teachers.
quotes.name: Cathy Vatterott

quotes.message: Homework was viewed as a culprit that robbed children of important opportunities for social interaction.
quotes.name: Cathy Vatterott

quotes.message: The controversy over homework starts with a large number of academic studies that have sought to establish or refute the notion that homework improves academic performance.
quotes.name: John Buell

quotes.message: Students who do homework receive better grades or higher test scores, but they do not establish that homework causes improved performance.
quotes.name: John Buell

quotes.message: There is no evidence that any amount of homework improves the academic performance of elementary school students.
quotes.name: John Buell

quotes.message: When you also learn the truth about homework, chances are that you'll want to do something to lighten that heavy backpack your child drags home each night.
quotes.name: Sara Bennett

quotes.message: It seems like the more homework a nation's teachers assign, the worse that nation's students do on achievement tests.
quotes.name: Professor Baker

quotes.message: Many educators tout homework as a great way to teach children responsibility.
quotes.name: Sara Bennett

quotes.message: With parents increasingly involved in assignments every step of the way we think homework undermines the teaching of responsibility.
quotes.name: Sara Bennett

quotes.message: There's no evidence that homework is good for reinforcement, if parents are going to give up their home life for homework, there should be evidence that it will produce something.
quotes.name: Professor Kralovec

quotes.message: The most common reason teachers give for assigning homework is that parents want it. I know parents who judge the quality of the school by how much homework the teachers give, often creating a climate that forces teachers to create assignments against their better judgement.
quotes.name: Vera Goodman

quotes.message: No matter how parents justify it or demand it, excessive homework is an intrusion into the private lives of children.
quotes.name: Vera Goodman

quotes.message: Young children often like to get some homework because it makes them feel grown up.
quotes.name: Vera Goodman

quotes.message: Homework that is light, and designed so that families can enjoy spending time working together, is valuable.
quotes.name: Vera Goodman

quotes.message: Teachers argue that they need to give homework to cover the mandated curriculum.
quotes.name: Vera Goodman

quotes.message: If you're going to choose someone's homework to copy, you need to choose someone who's good in math.
quotes.name: Blanche Hanalis

quotes.message: it's wonderful what they can do with computers these days and I'm pretty sure you have homework to do.
quotes.name: Holden Weihs

quotes.message: I wish I had a robot to help me with my homework when I was little.
quotes.name: Colin Bostock-Smith

quotes.message: Over the next few decades, schools institutionalized homework as a primary means for determining a student's academic proficiency on almost a daily basis.
quotes.name: David C. Berliner

quotes.message: Today school systems overwhelmingly use homework as a pedagogical staple and a measurement for assessing students' academic growth in the short term.
quotes.name: David C. Berliner

quotes.message: Parents enforce homework because they believe children who study hard make the grade.
quotes.name: David C. Berliner

quotes.message: Most parents eagerly include 'homework time' as part of the daily household routine and act as tutor.
quotes.name: David C. Berliner

quotes.message: Thorough homework—good fact-finding coupled with good analysis—is essential if good remedies are to follow and if an effective case is to be made for a particular cause.
quotes.name: Frank Sennett

quotes.message: There are always more events to be organized, students to be congratulated, cheers to say, homework to design, and challenges to meet.
quotes.name: Pondie Nicholson

quotes.message: Homework is a breeze. Cooking is a pleasant diversion. Putting up a retaining wall is a lark. But teaching is like climbing a mountain.
quotes.name: Fawn M. Brodie

quotes.message: My daddy used to ask us whether the teacher had given us any homework. If we said no, he'd say, well, assign yourself.
quotes.name: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.message: Our furnace broke, and we had to burn my homework to keep ourselves from freezing.
quotes.name: Jim Kraus

quotes.message: I didn't do my history because I don't believe in dwelling on the past.
quotes.name: Jim Kraus

quotes.message: When a teenager is watching television, listening to her record player, and talking on the phone, she is probably doing her homework.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: A lazy schoolboy lets his father do his homework, but a bright one helps his father with it.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: Homework sometimes shows how much children don't know, but more often how much their parents don't know.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: When it comes to homework, most schoolchildren like to do nothing better.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: Half the parents who do their children's homework for them shouldn't; the other half can't.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: A fair exchange is no robbery.
quotes.name: Scottish Proverb

quotes.message: A friend's eye is a good mirror.
quotes.name: Gaelic

quotes.message: A loan though old is not a gift.
quotes.name: Hungarian

quotes.message: A man who never made a mistake, never made anything.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Avoid dishonest gain: no price can recompence the pangs of vice.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Caesar's wife must be above suspicion.
quotes.name: Julius Caesar

quotes.message: Dally not with other folk's spouses or money.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Don't pretend to be something you aren't.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: Don't take any wooden nickels.
quotes.name: American

quotes.message: Following the path of least resistence is what makes both men and rivers crooked.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: From the fullness of the heart, the mouth speaks.
quotes.name: Jesus Christ

quotes.message: Half the truth is often a whole lie.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: He that first cries out 'stop thief' is often he that has stolen the treasure.
quotes.name: William Congreve

quotes.message: He that steals an egg will steal an ox.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: Honesty is the best policy.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: It is better to suffer for truth than to prosper by falsehood.
quotes.name: Danish

quotes.message: Keep conscience clear, then never fear.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Keep thy shop and thy shop will keep thee.
quotes.name: George Chapman

quotes.message: Let's get things straight.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Making money selling manure is better than losing money selling musk.
quotes.name: Egyptian

quotes.message: No legacy is as rich as honesty.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Pay what you owe and what you're worth you'll know.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Possession is nine tenths of the law.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The best thing about telling the truth is...
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The contented person can never be ruined.
quotes.name: Chinese

quotes.message: The sting of a reproach is the truth of it.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: When a thief kisses you, count your teeth.
quotes.name: Yiddish

quotes.message: You can fool people some of the time, but you can't fool them all of the time.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: If you have integrity nothing else matters. If you don't have integrity nothing else matters.
quotes.name: Alan K. Simpson

quotes.message: Anyone who doesn't take truth seriously in small matters cannot be trusted in large ones either.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: An honest man's the noblest work of God.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: The least initial deviation from the truth is multiplied later a thousand fold.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: One of the hardest things in this world is to admit you are wrong. And nothing is more helpful in resolving a situation than its frank admission.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Honesty is such a lonely word. Everyone is so untrue.
quotes.name: Billy Joel

quotes.message: Honest hearts produce honest actions.
quotes.name: Brigham Young

quotes.message: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
quotes.name: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.message: Most of our faults are more pardonable than the means we use to conceal them.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Be true to your work your word and your friend.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: He that loseth his honesty hath nothing else to lose.
quotes.name: John Lyly

quotes.message: The true measure of life is not length, but honesty.
quotes.name: John Lyly

quotes.message: Honesty is the rarest wealth anyone can possess.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Honesty pays, but it doesn't seem to pay enough to suit some people.
quotes.name: Kin Hubbard

quotes.message: Truth, like gold is to be obtained not by its growth, but by washing away from it all that is not gold.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: To believe in something, and not to live it, is dishonest.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: If it is not right do not do it if it is not true do not say it.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: Where is there dignity unless there is honesty?
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: If you tell the truth you don't have to remember anything.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Honesty is the best policy when there is money in it.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: One of the most striking differences between a cat and a lie is that a cat has only nine lives.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Honesty is the cornerstone of all success, without which confidence and ability to perform shall cease to exist.
quotes.name: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.message: Truth allows you to live with integrity. Everything you do and say shows the world who you really are. Let it be the Truth.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Honesty does not always bring a response of love, but it is absolutely essential to it.
quotes.name: Ray Blanton

quotes.message: What is freedom of expression? Without the freedom to offend, it ceases to exist.
quotes.name: Salman Rushdie

quotes.message: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: Rather fail with honor than succeed by fraud.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Science adjusts its views based on what's observed Faith is the denial of observation so that belief can be preserved.
quotes.name: Tim Minchin

quotes.message: A truth that's told with bad intent beats all the lies you can invent.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: No legacy is so rich as honesty.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty character integrity faith love and loyalty.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: The price of greatness is responsibility.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to affect those around him positively.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: A grateful heart is a beginning of greatness. It is an expression of humility.
quotes.name: James E. Faust

quotes.message: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Always be a first rate version of yourself and not a second rate version of someone else.
quotes.name: Judy Garland

quotes.message: A great man is always willing to be little.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Great men are not born great, they grow great . . .
quotes.name: Mario Puzo

quotes.message: Creativity means believing you have greatness.
quotes.name: Dr. Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.message: There are no great men, only great challenges that ordinary men are forced by circumstances to meet.
quotes.name: William F. Halsey

quotes.message: No great man lives in vain. The history of the world is but the biography of great men.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Man is only truly great when he acts from his passions
quotes.name: Benjamin Disreali

quotes.message: Show me a man who cannot bother to do little things and I'll show you a man who cannot be trusted to do big things
quotes.name: Lawrence D. Bell

quotes.message: The good news is that the moment you decide that what you know is more important than what you have been taught to believe, you will have shifted gears in your quest for abundance. Success comes from within, not from without.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Everybody can be great... because anybody can serve.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: There is a great man who makes every man feel small. But the real great man is the man who makes every man feel great.
quotes.name: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.message: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: The first step toward greatness is to be honest.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: All great deeds and all great thoughts have a ridiculous beginning.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Nothing great in the world has ever been accomplished without passion.
quotes.name: Hebbel

quotes.message: If there is no passion in your life, then have you really lived? Find your passion, whatever it may be. Become it, and let it become you and you will find great things happen FOR you, TO you and BECAUSE of you.
quotes.name: T. Alan Armstrong

quotes.message: To become truly great, one has to stand with people, not above them.
quotes.name: Charles de Montesquieu

quotes.message: Be good and you will be lonely.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Forget about likes and dislikes. They are of no consequence. Just do what must be done. This may not be happiness but it is greatness.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Greatness is a spiritual condition.
quotes.name: Matthew Arnold

quotes.message: We shall never resolve the enigma of the relation between the negative foundations of greatness and that greatness itself.
quotes.name: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.message: Great men are not always wise.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: The greatness of a man's power is the measure of his surrender.
quotes.name: William Booth

quotes.message: Greatness be nothing unless it be lasting.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: Men are only as great as they are kind.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who does him absolutely no good.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Great thoughts speak only to the thoughtful mind, but great actions speak to all mankind.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but it is my chief duty to accomplish small tasks as if they were great and noble.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: Great hope makes great men
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: Deeds, not stones, are the true monuments of the great.
quotes.name: John L. Motley

quotes.message: Each of us is great insofar as we perceive and act on the infinite possibilities which lie undiscovered and unrecognized about us.
quotes.name: James Harvey Robinson

quotes.message: Great things are done when men and mountains meet.
quotes.name: William Blake
