quotes.message: To know much is often the cause of doubting more.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: When in doubt, win the trick.
quotes.name: Edmund Hoyle

quotes.message: Doubt is the father of invention.
quotes.name: Galileo Galilei

quotes.message: Doubt comes in at the window, when Inquiry is denied at the door.
quotes.name: Benjamin Jowett

quotes.message: To believe with certainty we must begin with doubting.
quotes.name: Stanis_Aw Leszczy_Ski

quotes.message: Doubt is a pain too lonely to know that faith is his twin brother.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: Doubt is the origin of wisdom.
quotes.name: Rene Descartes

quotes.message: It is by doubting that we come to investigate, and by investigating that we recognize the truth.
quotes.name: Peter Abelard

quotes.message: One must verify or expel his doubts, and convert them into the certainty of Yes or NO.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Doubt is a killer. You just have to know who you are and what you stand for.
quotes.name: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.message: Doubt is what gets you an education.
quotes.name: Wilson Mizne

quotes.message: Your doubt can become a good quality if you train it. It must become knowing, it must become criticism.
quotes.name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.message: Modest doubt is called the beacon of the wise.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Doubt is not the opposite of faith; it is one element of faith.
quotes.name: Paul Tillich

quotes.message: Doubts are death. Doubts are the dry rot of life.
quotes.name: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.message: When in doubt, don't.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Deep doubts, deep wisdom; small doubts, little wisdom.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Doubt is the vestibule through which all must pass before they can enter into the temple of wisdom.
quotes.name: Colton

quotes.message: If a man will begin with certainties, he shall end in doubts; but if he will be content to begin with doubts, he shall end in certainties.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: If doubt is challenging you and you do not act, doubts will grow. Challenge the doubts with action and you will grow. Doubt and action are incompatible.
quotes.name: John Kanary

quotes.message: If you doubt you can accomplish something, then you can't accomplish it. You have to have confidence in your ability, and then be tough enough to follow through.
quotes.name: Rosalyn Carter

quotes.message: Doubt is the beginning, not the end, of wisdom.
quotes.name: George Iles

quotes.message: Doubt must be no more than vigilance, otherwise it can become dangerous.
quotes.name: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.message: Doubt is a virus that attacks our self-esteem, productivity and confidence. Faith that you and your life are perfectly unfolding is the strongest vaccine.
quotes.name: Sean Stephenson

quotes.message: Never believe what you cannot doubt.
quotes.name: Robin Skelton

quotes.message: Doubt is the incentive to truth and inquiry leads the way.
quotes.name: Hosea Ballou

quotes.message: Doubt, of whatever kind, can be ended by action alone.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Doubt is the middle position between knowledge and ignorance. It encompasses cynicism but also genuine questioning.
quotes.name: Vera Farmiga

quotes.message: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.name: Suzy Kassem

quotes.message: There is nothing more dreadful than the habit of doubt. Doubt separates people. It is a poison that disintegrates friendships and breaks up pleasant relations. It is a thorn that irritates and hurts; it is a sword that kills.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Doubt is the thing that'll kill you, the only thing, and it'll kill your friends, too.
quotes.name: Ron Leshem

quotes.message: Even a wise man knows doubt from time to time, it is the fool who allows it to rule his judgement.
quotes.name: Jennifer Hudock

quotes.message: Doubt is a creature within the air.It grows when someone hesitates.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Doubt is the ally of hope, not its enemy, and together they made all the blessing he had.
quotes.name: Barry Unsworth

quotes.message: Doubts are the ants in the pants of faith. They keep it awake and moving.
quotes.name: Frederick Buechner

quotes.message: Doubt is one of the main paths on the highway to failure.
quotes.name: Rick Pitino & Bill Reynolds

quotes.message: Doubt ... is an illness that comes from knowledge and leads to madness.
quotes.name: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.message: Doubt is the herald of progress; the genius of reason; the pathway to truth; the advance guard in the contest with intellectual darkness.
quotes.name: Henry M. Taber

quotes.message: Doubt is a catalyst for owning one's faith and allowing the faith story to continue.
quotes.name: Eric Venable

quotes.message: Doubt is the stepping-stone to faith.
quotes.name: Harwood Huntingtin

quotes.message: When you doubt your power, you give power to your doubt.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: When in doubt, tell the truth.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: My wife and I were happy for 20 years - then we met.
quotes.name: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.message: Whenever I date a guy, I think, is this the man that I want my children to spend their weekends with?
quotes.name: Rita Rudner

quotes.message: Love conquers all things except poverty and toothache.
quotes.name: Mae West

quotes.message: Love is a two-way street constantly under construction.
quotes.name: Carroll Bryant

quotes.message: Remember, beneath every cynic there lies a romantic, and probably an injured one.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: I almost had a psychic girlfriend but she left me before we met.
quotes.name: Steven Wright

quotes.message: Marriage is a wonderful institution, but who wants to live in an institution?
quotes.name: Groucho Marx

quotes.message: Women marry men hoping they will change. Men marry women hoping they will not. So each is inevitably disappointed.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: I don't see how being married could be any worse than listening to you talk for twenty years, but that still ain't much of a recommendation for it.
quotes.name: Larry McMurtry

quotes.message: I was married by a judge. I should have asked for a jury.
quotes.name: Groucho Marx

quotes.message: Marriage has no guarantees. If that's what you're looking for, go live with a car battery.
quotes.name: Frederick Ryder

quotes.message: Love is telling someone their hair extensions are showing.
quotes.name: Natasha Leggero

quotes.message: An archaeologist is the best husband any woman can have; the older she gets the more interested he is in her.
quotes.name: Agatha Christie

quotes.message: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
quotes.name: Laurence J Peter

quotes.message: The most important thing in a relationship between a man and a woman is that one of them must be good at taking orders.
quotes.name: Linda Festa

quotes.message: Honesty is the key to a relationship. If you can fake that, you're in.
quotes.name: Richard Jeni

quotes.message: I can't make you love me. But I can fill my pantry with your favorite snacks and offer you a weekly stipend of $75.
quotes.name: Rob Delaney

quotes.message: Relationships are hard. It's like a full-time job, and we should treat it like one. If your boyfriend or girlfriend wants to leave you, they should give you two weeks' notice. There should be severance pay, and before they leave you, they should have to find you a temp.
quotes.name: Bob Ettinger

quotes.message: It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party.
quotes.name: Nick Hornby

quotes.message: Before marriage, a man declares that he would lay down his life to serve you; after marriage, he won't even lay down his newspaper to talk to you.
quotes.name: Helen Rowland

quotes.message: The only true love is love at first sight; second sight dispels it.
quotes.name: Israel Zangwill

quotes.message: My girlfriend told me that she was seeing another man. I told her to rub her eyes.
quotes.name: Emo Philips

quotes.message: True love is singing karaoke Under Pressure and letting the other person sing the Freddie Mercury part.
quotes.name: Mindy Kaling

quotes.message: If you text I love you to a person and the person writes back an emoji â€” no matter what that emoji is, they don't love you back.
quotes.name: Chelsea Peretti

quotes.message: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight, dinner, soft music and dancing. She goes Tuesdays, I go Fridays.
quotes.name: Henny Youngman

quotes.message: Save a boyfriend for a rainy day â€” and another, in case it doesn't rain.
quotes.name: Mae West

quotes.message: Marry a man your own age; as your beauty fades, so will his eyesight.
quotes.name: Phyllis Diller

quotes.message: The difference between being in a relationship and being in prison is that in prisons they let you play softball on the weekends.
quotes.name: Agatha Christie

quotes.message: I love being married. It's so great to find one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.name: Rita Rudner

quotes.message: There's no easy way to break off any relationship. It's like the mozzarella cheese on a good slice of pizza. No matter how far you pull the slice away from your mouth it just gets thinner and longer but never snaps.
quotes.name: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.message: To symbolize out great relationship. I'd like you to have this framed x-ray.
quotes.name: Pat Williams

quotes.message: Men who have a pierced ear are better prepared for marriage-they've experienced pain and bought jewelry
quotes.name: Rita Rudner

quotes.message: By all means marry; of you get a good wife, you'll be happy. If you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Love is blind - marriage is the eye-opener
quotes.name: Pauline Thomason

quotes.message: The best way to get most husbands to do something is to suggest that perhaps they're too old to do it.
quotes.name: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.message: My husband forgot my birthday and my anniversary. I didn't feel bad. On the contrary. Give me a guilty husband any day. Some of my best outfits come from his guilt.
quotes.name: Betty Walker

quotes.message: I married Miss Right. I just didn't know her first name was Always.
quotes.name: David Young

quotes.message: If you want your wife to pay undivided attention to every word you say, talk in your sleep.
quotes.name: David Young

quotes.message: When a man and woman marry they become one. The trouble starts when they try to decide which one.
quotes.name: David Young

quotes.message: Some women spend the first part of their lives looking for a husband, and the last part wondering where he is.
quotes.name: David Young

quotes.message: You know the honeymoon is over when the husband takes his wife off the pedestal and puts her on a budget.
quotes.name: David Young

quotes.message: When a husband brings his wife flowers for no reason, there's a reason.
quotes.name: Marian Jordan

quotes.message: My husband says I treat him like he's a god; every meal is a burnt offering.
quotes.name: Rhonda Hansome

quotes.message: My husband and I are either going to buy a dog or have a child. We can't decide whether to ruin our carpet or ruin our lives.
quotes.name: Rita Rudner

quotes.message: I figure when my husband comes home from work, if the kids are still alive, then I've done my job.
quotes.name: Roseanne Barr

quotes.message: The power by which a woman charms a lover and terrifies a husband.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: My husband and I fell in love at first sight. Maybe I should have taken a second look.
quotes.name: Mia Farrow

quotes.message: An Ideal Husband Life is a near-death experience.
quotes.name: George Carlin

quotes.message: Failed relationships can be described as so mch wasted make-up.
quotes.name: Marian Keyes

quotes.message: You know you're happily married, when you'd rather come home than go out.
quotes.name: Heinz Ruhmann

quotes.message: Marrying means to halve one's rights and double one's duties
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: Most women try to change a man and then they have changed him, they do not like them.
quotes.name: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.message: A happy marriage is where he's a little bit blind, and she's a little bit deaf.
quotes.name: Loriot

quotes.message: A husband is living proof that a wife can take a joke.
quotes.name: Hugh Payne

quotes.message: How do husbands sort their laundry? 'Filthy' and 'Filthy but Wearable.
quotes.name: Hugh Payne

quotes.message: The most effective way to remember your wife's birthday is to forget it once.
quotes.name: Hugh Payne

quotes.message: Marriage is the process of finding out what kind of person your spouse would really have preferred.
quotes.name: Hugh Payne

quotes.message: Behind every successful man stands a surprised mother-in-law.
quotes.name: Hugh Payne

quotes.message: Honolulu: it's got everything, Sand for the children, sun for the wife, sharks for the wife's mother.
quotes.name: Ken Dodd

quotes.message: The thing to remember is that in marriage the husband and wife are one - and the husband is the one.
quotes.name: Helen Deutsch

quotes.message: There are four sacred bonds in this life: A parent and child, a husband and wife, a priest and confessor... and manager-talent.
quotes.name: Mitch Glazer

quotes.message: There's no such thing as a 'perfect marriage' or a 'perfect spouse'. Come on, get real! Marriage is a flawed institution. if you but into that theory.
quotes.name: Shobha Dé

quotes.message: A happy marriage is the union of two good forgivers.
quotes.name: Robert Quillen

quotes.message: After marriage, husband and wife become two sides of a coin; they just can't face each other, but still they stay together.
quotes.name: Al Gore

quotes.message: I had some words with my wife, and she had some paragraphs with me.
quotes.name: Bill Clinton

quotes.message: A good wife always forgives her husband when she's wrong.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: When a husband and wife are concerned only about their own individual desires, the stage is set for conflict.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Too many husbands and wives enter into marriage with the idea that their spouse exists for one purpose: to make them happy.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Marriage is not a reform school..Instead of you reforming (your spouse), (he or she) will instead influenced you.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Isolation is aloneness that feels forced upon you, like a punishment. Solitude is aloneness you choose and embrace. I think great things can come out of solitude, out of going to a place where all is quiet except the beating of your heart.
quotes.name: Jeanne Marie Laskas

quotes.message: We allow our ignorance to prevail upon us and make us think we can survive alone, alone in patches, alone in groups, alone in races, even alone in genders.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Isolation offered its own form of companionship.
quotes.name: Jhumpa Lahiri

quotes.message: I have such a fear of finding another like myself, and such a desire to find one! I am so utterly lonely, but I also have such a fear that my isolation be broken through, and I no longer be the head and ruler of my universe.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: When so many are lonely as seem to be lonely, it would be inexcusably selfish to be lonely alone.
quotes.name: Tennessee Williams

quotes.message: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Isolation is a self-defeating dream.
quotes.name: Carlos Salinas de Gortari

quotes.message: The whole value of solitude depends upon one's self; it may be a sanctuary or a prison, a haven of repose or a place of punishment, a heaven or a hell, as we ourselves make it.
quotes.name: John Lubbock

quotes.message: Isolation is the sum total of wretchedness to a man.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: I would get a lot of writing done if I lived in isolation in a cave under a swamp.
quotes.name: Claire Cameron

quotes.message: Even the technology that promises to unite us, divides us. Each of us is now electronically connected to the globe, and yet we feel utterly alone.
quotes.name: Dan Brown

quotes.message: You can make more friends in two months by becoming interested in other people than you can in two years by trying to get other people interested in you.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Love can isolate us from everything around us. But in its absence, we can be filled with the fear that something comparable exists.
quotes.name: Carlos Fuentes

quotes.message: We're all islands shouting lies to each other across seas of misunderstanding.
quotes.name: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.message: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
quotes.name: Orson Welles

quotes.message: Loneliness doesn't have much to do with where you are.
quotes.name: Hugh Hefner

quotes.message: Solitude vivifies; isolation kills.
quotes.name: Joseph Roux

quotes.message: But there are other words for privacy and independence. They are isolation and loneliness.
quotes.name: Megan Whalen Turner

quotes.message: I was never less alone than when by myself.
quotes.name: Edward Gibbon

quotes.message: There is no such thing as a good or bad ad in isolation. What is good at one moment is bad at another. Research can trap you into the past.
quotes.name: William Bernbach

quotes.message: I never found the companion that was so companionable as solitude. We are for the most part more lonely when we go abroad among men than when we stay in our chambers.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: The strongest man in the world is he who stands most alone.
quotes.name: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.message: A picture held us captive. And we could not get outside it, for it lay in our language and language seemed to repeat it to us inexorably.
quotes.name: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.message: There was nothing lonelier than a man with a million friends.
quotes.name: William Shatner

quotes.message: No one can live entirely on their own, nor can any country or society exist in isolation.
quotes.name: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.message: Living alone, though it may not be the state you ultimately desire for yourself, affords an unparalleled opportunity to know yourself, to be yourself, and to develop yourself as a unique and interesting individual.
quotes.name: Phyllis Hobe

quotes.message: The more powerful and original a mind, the more it will incline towards the religion of solitude.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: I am greatly pleased with the public, authentic isolation in which we two, you and I, now find ourselves. It is wholly in accord with our attitude and our principles.
quotes.name: Karl Marx

quotes.message: Lonely people, in talking to each other can make each other lonelier.
quotes.name: Lillian Hellman

quotes.message: I am in no way different from anyone else, that my predicament, my sense of aloneness or isolation may be precisely what unites me with everyone.
quotes.name: Franz Wright

quotes.message: No man is an island, entire of itself.
quotes.name: John Donne

quotes.message: Loneliness is the first thing which God's eye named not good.
quotes.name: John Milton

quotes.message: Solitude, isolation, are painful things and beyond human endurance.
quotes.name: Jules Verne

quotes.message: Without great solitude no serious work is possible.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: Loneliness is and always has been the central and inevitable experience of every man.
quotes.name: Thomas Wolfe

quotes.message: Solitude is a chosen separation for refining your soul. Isolation is what you crave when you neglect the first.
quotes.name: Wayne Cordeiro

quotes.message: What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.
quotes.name: Ellen Burstyn

quotes.message: Tears do not burn except in solitude.
quotes.name: Emil Cioran

quotes.message: People need loving the most when they appear to deserve it the least.
quotes.name: John Harrigan

quotes.message: It is strange how the presence of additional people can make you feel more alone.
quotes.name: James Alan Gardner

quotes.message: Solitude is fine but you need someone to tell you that solitude is fine.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: We're all of us sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life!
quotes.name: Tennessee Williams

quotes.message: Be able to be alone. Lose not the advantage of solitude, and the society of thyself.
quotes.name: Thomas Browne

quotes.message: Loneliness is the poverty of self; solitude is richness of self.
quotes.name: May Sarton

quotes.message: Too much self-centered attitude, you see, brings, you see, isolation. Result: loneliness, fear, anger. The extreme self-centered attitude is the source of suffering.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: If you meet a loner, no matter what they tell you, it's not because they enjoy solitude. It's because they have tried to blend into the world before, and people continue to disappoint them.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go.
quotes.name: Hermen Hesse

quotes.message: Just because a relationship ends, it doesn't mean it's not worth having.
quotes.name: Sarah Mlynowski

quotes.message: Pleasure of love lasts but a moment, Pain of love lasts a lifetime.
quotes.name: Bette Davis

quotes.message: Love is unconditional, relationships are not.
quotes.name: Grant Gudmundson

quotes.message: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
quotes.name: Victoria Holt

quotes.message: Relationships end, but they don't end your life. But people do often spending more time finding out about failed relationships than finding successful ones.
quotes.name: Steve Martin

quotes.message: Celebrate endings - for they precede new beginnings.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: So often the end of a love affair is death by a thousand cuts, so often its survival is life by a thousand stitches.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: In any relationship in which two people become one, the end result is two half people.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: The end of a relationship is not always a failure. Sometimes all the love in the world is not enough to save something. In these cases, it is not a matter of fault from either person. Some things cannot be, it's as simple as that.
quotes.name: Ashly Lorenzana

quotes.message: A sad thing in life is that sometimes you meet someone who means a lot to you only to find out in the end that it was never bound to be and you just have to let go.
quotes.name: Dave Matthews Band

quotes.message: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: To meet, to know, to love and then to part, is the sad tale of many a heart.
quotes.name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.message: Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of withering, of tarnishing.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: The loss of love is not nearly as painful as our resistance to accepting it is.
quotes.name: Tigress Luv

quotes.message: If people refuse to look at you in a new light and they can only see you for what you were, only see you for the mistakes you've made, if they don't realize that you are not your mistakes, then they have to go.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Even the best of friends face conflicts, but that needn't mean the end of the relationship.
quotes.name: Unkown

quotes.message: If a relationship is to evolve, it must go through a series of endings.
quotes.name: Christopher Morley

quotes.message: Any time you end a relationship, and everyone has ended plenty in their life, it's always a tough thing and hard to get over.
quotes.name: Adam Brody

quotes.message: Death ends a life, not a relationship.
quotes.name: Robert Benchley

quotes.message: If love breaks more than a heart, maybe it's a sign and time to step out.
quotes.name: Anthony Liccione

quotes.message: We mistakenly assume that if our partners love us they will react and behave in certain ways - the ways we react and behave when we love someone.
quotes.name: John Gray

quotes.message: Almost all of our relationships begin and most of them continue as forms of mutual exploitation, a mental or physical barter, to be terminated when one or both parties run out of goods.
quotes.name: Wiston Auden

quotes.message: Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over.
quotes.name: Guy Finley

quotes.message: Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
quotes.name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.message: Think about any attachments that are depleting your emotional reserves. Consider letting them go.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: You can love them, forgive them, want good things for them ... but still move on without them.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Ever has it been that loves knows not its own death until the hour of separation.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: The heart was made to be broken.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Failed relationships can be described as so much wasted make-up.
quotes.name: Marian Keyes

quotes.message: Don't cry when the sun is gone because the tears won't let you see the stars.
quotes.name: Violeta Para

quotes.message: No matter how hard your heart is broken, the world doesn't stop for your grief.
quotes.name: Faraaz Kazi

quotes.message: When you leave weary of me without a work, I shall gently let you go.
quotes.name: Kim Sowol

quotes.message: I didn't lose you. You lost me. You'll search for me inside of everyone you're with and I won't be found.
quotes.name: R.H.Sin

quotes.message: If you want to forget something or someone, never hate it, or never hate him.her. Everything and everyone that you hate is engraved upon your heart; if you want to let go of something, if you want to forget, you cannot hate.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: Let go. Why do you cling to pain? There is nothing you can do about the wrongs of yesterday. It is not yours to judge.
quotes.name: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.message: Hearts can break. Yes, hearts can break. Sometimes I think it would be better if we died when they did, but we don’t.
quotes.name: Stephen King

quotes.message: Every time your heart is broken, a doorway cracks open to a world full of new beginnings, new opportunities.
quotes.name: Patti Roberts

quotes.message: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it…
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: The saddest thing about love is that not only that it cannot last forever, but that heartbreak is soon forgotten.
quotes.name: William Faulkner

quotes.message: The moment that you feel that, just possibly, you’re walking down the street naked, exposing too much of your heart and your mind and what exists on the inside, showing too much of yourself. That’s the moment you may be starting to get it right.
quotes.name: Neil Gaiman

quotes.message: There are all kinds of ways for a relationship to be tested, even broken, some, irrevocably; it’s the endings we’re unprepared for.
quotes.name: Katherine Owen

quotes.message: The past can’t hurt you anymore, not unless you let it.
quotes.name: Alan Moore

quotes.message: I pray that former rejection and deep hurts will not color what I see and hear now.
quotes.name: Sue Augustine

quotes.message: You can victimize yourself by wallowing around in your own past.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: There will be a time when you are forced to follow your heart away from someone you love.
quotes.name: Ashly Lorenzana

quotes.message: So it’s true when all is said and done, grief is the price we pay for love.
quotes.name: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.message: You find out what you are made of when you have a broken heart. If it happens early and often, all the better.
quotes.name: Isabel Gillies

quotes.message: Of course! It takes a lot of strength to mend a broken heart. Channelising energies into your work helps, but also to be able to accept situations for what they are instead of questioning them helps immensely.
quotes.name: Deepika Padukone

quotes.message: I moved on, but I never left. When I broke your heart those years ago, I thought I lost you forever, and I moved on.
quotes.name: Kit Hood

quotes.message: I know that we can't change the past, but there's a difference between moving on and letting go.
quotes.name: Bruno Heller

quotes.message: But souls do stay a while, until they're ready to move on.
quotes.name: Sera Gamble

quotes.message: Moving on is not the same as moving forward. What I mean is, don't focus on 'moving on'. Constantly reminding yourself of where you should be in life only makes you feel more...
quotes.name: Joan S.

quotes.message: Can never forget her. Your first love. It's what you keep looking for, the rest of your life. Some people are blessed. They can hold on. I wasn't. I had to let go.
quotes.name: Luigi Bian

quotes.message: Despite the heartache and loss, the reason you are not hearing from me is that I am too busy taking care of myself moving on with my fabulous life.
quotes.name: Greg Behrendt

quotes.message: You gladly accept this radio silence because your relationship has been broken for a while, and get on with your grieving because you are moving on to something better.
quotes.name: Greg Behrendt

quotes.message: Now, defeating kryptonite and getting over a broken heart is incredibly tough. It's also wildly empowering. But the even bigger victory is finally living your own life again without the constant presence of heartache.
quotes.name: Greg Behrendt

quotes.message: The hard truth is that breakups are sink-or-swim. Some people spend their life in an emotional downward spiral because they can't get over lost love. Others, most notably you, use it as a turning point to reevaluate, rebuild, and possibly redecorate.
quotes.name: Greg Behrendt

quotes.message: It's called a breakup because it's broken is designed to help you not only get out of an unsatisfying relationship but to get over it so that you can be ready for the better things in life that are coming your way.
quotes.name: Greg Behrendt

quotes.message: Anytime something so earth-shattering in your life happens that it breaks your heart, it also leaves the doorway of your soul open to new emotions and new mind-sets that can shake, rattle, and roll you right up to the next level.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Then why are we so willing to stay stuck in a relationship once it has become clear that the other person is not our perfect fit?
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Breakups have a way of shaking us awake and helping us see what we really want versus what we are willing to settle for.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Realize that everything and everyone that walks away from you does so because they are no longer part of your story.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: One of the best times for figuring out who you are and what you really want out of life is right after a breakup.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Breakups aren't trivial; they affect us to our core.
quotes.name: Samantha Burns

quotes.message: There's life after breakup. Every setback is a setup for a comeback, and yours will be fierce.
quotes.name: Samantha Burns

quotes.message: Going through a breakup is actually very similar to grieving a death. You're grieving the loss of someone you love and learning to live life without them by your side.
quotes.name: Samantha Burns

quotes.message: Although breakups can feel unbearable, we don't die from them.
quotes.name: Rachel Sussman

quotes.message: Even if you initiated your split, you are going to be overcome with interminable sorrow. You are not only mourning the loss of someone significant in your life, but saying farewell to your dreams of an eternity together.
quotes.name: Rachel Sussman

quotes.message: Usually right after the initial sting of the breakup, you're not going to be very hungry. You won't have an appetite and may drop a few pounds. I call it the breakup body.
quotes.name: Lesley Robins

quotes.message: Keep moving. Exercise will make you feel better. It's a fact. Do not rush into being a superwoman at the gym or joining a team to run a marathon right after the breakup.
quotes.name: Lesley Robins

quotes.message: You'll slowly start seeing life beyond the breakup, and eventually life won't be about the breakup at all.
quotes.name: Lesley Robins

quotes.message: When things aren't going your way, like during this breakup, you must fight for your own happiness. If you keep looking on the outside for validation, especially from a man, you will lose.
quotes.name: Lesley Robins

quotes.message: After your breakup, go through life slowly and stay true to what you need in each moment.
quotes.name: Lesley Robins

quotes.message: You've felt the grief and sadness along with the anger associated with your breakup. Your body is literally a giant tank filled with emotions, and they need to be released.
quotes.name: Andi Dorfman

quotes.message: Unlike real hurricanes, heartbreak has no eye--it offers no reprieve and it leaves no place to take shelter. We thus remain exposed, drenched, and miserable until it passes.
quotes.name: Guy Winch

quotes.message: Real heartbreak is unmistakable, from the intensity of the emotional pain it causes, to the totality with which it takes over our mind and even our body. We think of nothing else.
quotes.name: Guy Winch

quotes.message: One of the most unfortunate realities of heartbreak is that our 'natural' responses often do us more harm than good.
quotes.name: Guy Winch

quotes.message: Letting go does not mean you're giving up, it simply means you're making a conscious choice to acknowledge that something is out of your control.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: Sometimes when you feel completely powerless to a situation in your life, all you can do is let go. Sometimes letting go is all it takes to create the change you want.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: Place your hand over your heart, can you feel it? That is called purpose. You're alive for a reason so don't ever give up.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Suicide doesn't end the chances of life getting worse, it eliminates the possibility of it ever getting any better.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The person who completes suicide, dies once. Those left behind die a thousand deaths, trying to relive those terrible moments and understand...
quotes.name: Clark

quotes.message: Your life is not over. Your life is important. Don't take your beauty fom the world.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: To anyone out there who's hurting—it's not a sign of weakness to ask for help. It's a sign of strength.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: There are far, far better things ahead than anything we leave behind.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: But in the end one needs more courage to live than to kill himself.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: When it is darkest, we can see the stars.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.name: Christian D. Larson

quotes.message: All things are difficult before they are easy.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: Grit your teeth and let it hurt. Don't deny it, don't be overwhelmed by it. It will not last forever.
quotes.name: Harold Kushner

quotes.message: The longer we dwell on our misfortunes, the greater is their power to harm us.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Suicide is not a remedy.
quotes.name: James A. Garfield

quotes.message: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start now and make a brand new ending.
quotes.name: Carl Bard

quotes.message: Suicide is a permanent solution to a temporary problem.
quotes.name: Phil Donahue

quotes.message: If you want to show me that you really love me, don't say that you would die for me, instead stay alive for me.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.name: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.message: If someone listens, or stretches out a hand, or whispers a word of encouragement, or attempts to understand a lonely person, extraordinary things begin to happen.
quotes.name: Loretta Girzartis

quotes.message: I hope you live a life you are proud of. If you find that you are not, I hope you have the strength to start all over again.
quotes.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.message: The world is a better place with you in it.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If your heart is still beating, God is not done with you yet.
quotes.name: Dillon Burroughs

quotes.message: The pain passes, but the beauty remains.
quotes.name: Pierre August Renoir

quotes.message: One of the secrets of life is to make stepping stones out of stumbling blocks.
quotes.name: Jack Penn

quotes.message: The real reason for not committing suicide is because you always know how swell life gets again after the hell is over.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: When you feel like giving up, just remember the reason why you held on for so long.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Because if you kill yourself, you're also going to kill the people who love you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The harder the journey the more glorious the victory.
quotes.name: Melissa Dohme

quotes.message: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.name: Franklin D Roosevelt

quotes.message: This life. This night. Your story. Your pain. Your hope. It matters. All of it matters.
quotes.name: Jamie Tworkowski

quotes.message: Think of all the beauty thats still left in and around you and be happy!
quotes.name: Anne Frank

quotes.message: Hope is a necessity for normal life and the major weapon against the suicide impulse.
quotes.name: Karl A. Menninger

quotes.message: We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves strong. The amount of work is the same.
quotes.name: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.message: If you are looking for a sign not to kill yourself, this is it.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Never never never give up.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The man who kills a man kills a man. The man who kills himself kills all men. As far as he is concerned, he wipes out the world.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Don't ask yourself what the world needs. Ask yourself what makes you come alive and then go do that. Because what the world needs is more people who have come alive.
quotes.name: Dr. Howard Thurman

quotes.message: Life doesn't come with a REWIND, FAST FORWARD or PAUSE BUTTON. Once it starts it PLAYS until it ends or you press STOP. Never press STOP just enjoy it while it PLAYS.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: Choosing whether you respond to the situation as a negative or as an opportunity to react with a new and different perspective sets in motion the course of what happens.
quotes.name: Michael Nulty

quotes.message: You can do things today that shape your unknown future. Make every day the time when you turn what you don't know into what would like to happen.
quotes.name: Michael Nulty

quotes.message: Taking back control of your life and finding a way to become hopeful, optimistic and believe that what you desire and want is possible and day is coming when everything changes, your life will eventually become easier and you will begin to see life as it was meant to be.
quotes.name: Michael Nulty

quotes.message: Let go of any regrets you have since, you can't go back and change anything, you have the choice of moving forward or continue struggling.
quotes.name: Michael Nulty

quotes.message: The key to getting beyond your struggles is making choices that invite new possibilities - new ways of thinking, feeling, behaving and living your life for the better.
quotes.name: Michael Nulty

quotes.message: You are learning to be fearless and becoming who you were always meant to be.
quotes.name: Marie White

quotes.message: You can either crushed by horrific event and lose your sanity, your family and your life. Or, you can take this pain that was thrust upon you, to propel into greatness. You can make it through this. I know it's hard.
quotes.name: Marie White

quotes.message: There is a hero inside of you. You are the main character in an epic struggle between good and evil. Ler's travel to the dark places of grief together and climb out, where we can see the bigger picture.
quotes.name: Marie White

quotes.message: There is beauty in the journey, regardless of the outcome. Let's grieve and hope and fight together.
quotes.name: Marie White

quotes.message: One day you will get more than what you could have ever perceived in the most wildest of your dreams; as you selflessly diffused the same; to all those brutally strangulated in the dormitories of unbelievably merciless agony. And that day was invincibly sure to come in yours and every benevolent entity's life; so keep optimistically conceiving and working towards that day; don't lose hope; don't yet die.
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: Don't forget who you are and where you came from. Don't get too emotionally over little things. Don't. Quit until you win grand prize.
quotes.name: Robert Randle

quotes.message: You who drink because of shame that you think will last, or because of wrong done you—trouble in the past—“Nothing left to live for now,” you will say, I know; but you have your own self yet, give that self a show!
quotes.name: Henry Lawson

quotes.message: Leave what’s alive in the furrow, what’s dead in yourself, for life does not move in the same way as a group of clouds; from your work you will be able one day to gather yourself.
quotes.name: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.message: Now you are only giving food to that final pain which is slowly winding you in the nets of death, but to live is to work, and the only thing which lasts is the work; start there, turn to the work.
quotes.name: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.message: Shake off this sadness, and recover your spirit; sluggish you will never see the wheel of fate that brushes your heel as it turns going by, the man who wants to live is the man in whom life is abundant.
quotes.name: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.message: Nobody on earth could live for you other than you yourself; in order to be an integral element of the drapery of this effervescent planet; and further embellish each step that you tread on with the spirit of immortal love,Then why do you keep weeping that you were all alone; when you had infact the most invincibly blessed company on earth to disseminate love; friendship and undying charm—which was by the Grace of God none other; but you yourself.
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: Don't always know why I kept moving, but it never - for long - felt like an option not to.
quotes.name: Matt Haig

quotes.message: I spend a lot of time wondering what dying feels like. What dying sounds like. If I’ll burst like those notes, let out my last cries of pain, and then go silent forever. Or maybe I’ll turn into a shadowy static that’s barely there, if you just listen hard enough.
quotes.name: Jasmine Warga

quotes.message: Even the people who once fought for others tend to get weak and eventually 'give up' and lose interest in the worth of fighting any longer.
quotes.name: Osjusn CC

quotes.message: Killing yourself slowly is still killing yourself. Wanting to die is not the same as wanting to come home. Recovery is hard work. Not wanting to die is hard work.
quotes.name: Blythe Baird

quotes.message: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.name: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.message: Anything that’s human is mentionable, and anything that is mentionable can be more manageable. When we can talk about our feelings, they become less overwhelming, less upsetting, and less scary.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: One small crack does not mean that you are broken, it means that you were put to the test and you didn’t fall apart.
quotes.name: Linda Poindexter

quotes.message: You don’t have to be positive all the time. It’s perfectly okay to feel sad, angry, annoyed, frustrated, scared and anxious. Having feelings doesn’t make you a negative person. It makes you human.
quotes.name: Lori Deschene

quotes.message: Nobody can save you but yourself, and you’re worth saving. It’s a war not easily won, but if anything is worth winning then this is it.
quotes.name: Charles Bukowski

quotes.message: Healing takes time, and asking for help is a courageous step.
quotes.name: Mariska Hargitay

quotes.message: Be confused, it’s where you begin to learn new things. Be broken, it’s where you begin to heal. Be frustrated, it’s where you start to make more authentic decisions. Be sad, because if we are brave enough we can hear our heart’s wisdom through it. Be whatever you are right now. No more hinding. You are worthy, always.
quotes.name: S.C. Lourie

quotes.message: She overcame everything that was meant to destroy her.
quotes.name: Sylvester McNutt

quotes.message: Often it’s the deepest pain which empowers you to grow into your highest self.
quotes.name: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.message: Give yourself a break. Stop beating yourself up! Everyone makes mistakes, has setbacks and failures. You don’t come with a book on how to get it right all the time. You will fail sometimes, not because you planned to, but simply because you’re human. Failure is a part of creating a great life.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: Write your sad times in sand, write your good times in stone.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Breathing is hard. When you cry so much, it makes you realize that breathing is hard.
quotes.name: David Levithan

quotes.message: Even when you are feeling down, you have to live your life positively, that way, happy days and happy feelings will come to you some day.
quotes.name: Kim Hyun-joong

quotes.message: As the light begins to intensify, so does my misery, and I wonder how it is possible to hurt so much when nothing is wrong.
quotes.name: Tabitha Suzuma

quotes.message: Most of my life I've had long periods of feeling down and lost. That's why every five years or so I've smashed my life to pieces and started again.
quotes.name: Siobhan Fahey

quotes.message: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: I guess that's what saying good-bye is always like — like jumping off an edge. The worst part is making the choice to do it. Once you're in the air, there's nothing you can do but let go.
quotes.name: Lauren Oliver

quotes.message: The rose and the thorn, and sorrow and gladness are linked together.
quotes.name: Saadi

quotes.message: She had tricked him. She had made him leave his old self behind and come into her world, and then before he was really at home in it but too late to go back, she had left him stranded there — like an astronaut wandering about on the moon. Alone.
quotes.name: Katherine Paterson

quotes.message: Whenever you're feeling down..And I am not around let the sight of me be the reason you smile.
quotes.name: Shahrukh Khan

quotes.message: Whenever you leave behind failure that means you're doing better. If you think everything you've done has been great, you're probably dumb.
quotes.name: Louis CK

quotes.message: I seldom think about my limitations, and they never make me sad. Perhaps there is just a touch of yearning at times; but it is vague, like a breeze among flowers.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: It feels like every other part of my body is broken too.
quotes.name: Missy Altijd

quotes.message: You not supposed to feel down over whatever happen to you. I mean, you're supposed to use whatever happen to you as some type of upper, not a downer.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: When you are feeling down, look at the skies. You are not always alone.
quotes.name: EunB

quotes.message: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: When someone you love dies, you don't lose them all at once. You lose them in pieces over time.
quotes.name: Simon Birch

quotes.message: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
quotes.name: H. G. Wells

quotes.message: This is what it felt like to have a broken heart. It felt less like a cracking down the middle and more like she had swallowed it whole and it sat bruised and bleeding in the pit of her stomach.
quotes.name: Wendy Wunder

quotes.message: I just got tired of being sick and tired and feeling down. Unfortunately, you don't realize this until you're getting sober but the reason why you're depressed all the time is it's the drugs that are depressing you.
quotes.name: Steven Adler

quotes.message: I try to make myself do things for other people when I'm feeling down. Like, you can call your local hospital and help out in the pediatric unit.
quotes.name: Abigail Breslin

quotes.message: When you're feeling down, sad, lonely, negative, you don't want to take care of yourself - and the weight problem and the diabetic problem and the heart attack and stroke problems and high cholesterol set in.
quotes.name: Richard Simmons

quotes.message: You were merely wishing for the end of pain, the monster said. Your own pain. An end to how it isolated you. It is the most human wish of all.
quotes.name: Patrick Ness

quotes.message: I think I'm afraid to be happy because whenever I get too happy, something bad always happens.
quotes.name: Charles Schulz

quotes.message: Regrets are the tears of choices not made, and of good deeds left undone.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: Pick yourself up when you're feeling down. No one else is likely to.
quotes.name: Catherine DeVrye

quotes.message: It's raining in my heart like it's raining in the city.
quotes.name: Sonya Sones

quotes.message: Don't mind me. I'll just sit here, crying over yesterday.
quotes.name: P.M. Harrison

quotes.message: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Alas for those that never sing, But die with all their music in them!
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.message: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: A big part of letting go is recognizing when it is time to stay in a situation and when it is time to move on.
quotes.name: Darren L. Johnson

quotes.message: You can go to the doctor a million times if you're feeling down, and get nowhere, but if you go for a run it makes you feel really good.
quotes.name: Gail Porter

quotes.message: You're only given a little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it.
quotes.name: Robin Williams

quotes.message: Be selective with your battles. Sometimes peace is better than being right.
quotes.name: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.message: Each day you only have a limited amount of time and energy. Don’t waste it stressing about things you cannot control.
quotes.name: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.message: Your thoughts are a steering wheel. Watch where you aim them.
quotes.name: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.message: You have it within you to rise above whatever is bringing you down.
quotes.name: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.message: It’s okay not to be okay – as long as you are not giving up.
quotes.name: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.message: Things change. And friends leave. Life doesn't stop for anybody.
quotes.name: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.message: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
quotes.name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.message: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: To have felt too much is to end in feeling nothing.
quotes.name: Dorothy Thompson

quotes.message: It's sad when someone you know becomes someone you knew.
quotes.name: Henry Rollins

quotes.message: It will never rain roses: when we want to have more roses, we must plant more roses.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Life's under no obligation to give us what we expect.
quotes.name: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.message: Sometimes you've got to be able to listen to yourself and be okay with no one else understanding.
quotes.name: Christopher Barzak

quotes.message: One thing you can't hide — is when you're crippled inside.
quotes.name: John Lennon

quotes.message: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
quotes.name: Christopher Morley

quotes.message: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
quotes.name: Norman Cousins

quotes.message: Mostly it is loss which teaches us about the worth of things.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: I didn't want to wake up. I was having a much better time asleep. And that's really sad. It was almost like a reverse nightmare, like when you wake up from a nightmare you're so relieved. I woke up into a nightmare.
quotes.name: Ned Vizzini

quotes.message: Why do people have to be this lonely? What's the point of it all? Millions of people in this world, all of them yearning, looking to others to satisfy them, yet isolating themselves.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: Any fool can be happy. It takes a man with real heart to make beauty out of the stuff that makes us weep.
quotes.name: Clive Barker

quotes.message: They say when you are missing someone that they are probably feeling the same, but I don't think it's possible for you to miss me as much as I'm missing you right now
quotes.name: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.message: Imagine smiling after a slap in the face. Then think of doing it twenty-four hours a day.
quotes.name: Markus Zusak

quotes.message: Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart.
quotes.name: Jose N. Harris

quotes.message: Tonight I can write the saddest lines
quotes.name: Pablo Neruda

quotes.message: The longer and more carefully we look at a funny story, the sadder it becomes.
quotes.name: Nikolai V. Gogol

quotes.message: Tears are words that need to be written.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: There are two types of people in the world: those who prefer to be sad among others, and those who prefer to be sad alone.
quotes.name: Nicole Krauss

quotes.message: Don't be ashamed to weep; 'tis right to grieve. Tears are only water, and flowers, trees, and fruit cannot grow without water. But there must be sunlight also. A wounded heart will heal in time, and when it does, the memory and love of our lost ones is sealed inside to comfort us.
quotes.name: Brian Jacques

quotes.message: In time, every sad ending will become happy. The sad ending is only because the author stops telling the story. But it still goes on. It's just untold.
quotes.name: Mark Polish

quotes.message: It's a sad, sad song that I'm singing, . It's a sad, sad tale that I tell, . About a love that a poor girl is bringing, . To a man who is destined for Hell.
quotes.name: Al C. Ward

quotes.message: I would rather have a fool to make me merry than experience to make me sad.
quotes.name: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.message: Well, when I'm sad, I like to read a really sad story because then I don't feel so sad myself.
quotes.name: Blanche Hanalis

quotes.message: So it’s true, when all is said and done, grief is the price we pay for love.
quotes.name: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.message: I woke up this morning . Feeling lonely .
quotes.name: Nicolas Pablo Munoz

quotes.message: What is this feeling? . Empty inside my head .
quotes.name: Nicolas Pablo Munoz

quotes.message: I miss you so bad . A thought of you makes me sad .
quotes.name: Nicolas Pablo Munoz

quotes.message: What a sick, sick feeling . To let you go, my dear . Cause I was not prepared to .
quotes.name: Nicolas Pablo Munoz

quotes.message: I miss the way you sound . I miss to be around you .
quotes.name: Nicolas Pablo Munoz

quotes.message: I'm the loneliest I've ever been tonight . I'm the loneliest I've ever been tonight . I'm inspired by your proposition, but I don't trust my intuition .
quotes.name: Sonny Moore

quotes.message: I pray you, Sadness, leave me soon . In sweet invention thou art poor! . Thy sister, Joy can make ten songs . While thou art making four.
quotes.name: William Henry Davies

quotes.message: Therefore sweet Sadness, leave me soon . Let thy bright sister, Joy, come more . For she can make ten lovely songs . While thou art making four.
quotes.name: William Henry Davies

quotes.message: What are you buying and selling . Oh dear daughter of sadness . with open breasts . `Sir, I am a hawker of . sea water.
quotes.name: Devil Poet

quotes.message: From where comes . so much of tears . `Sir, my last resort is . to cry for sea.
quotes.name: Devil Poet

quotes.message: Holy Ghost! dispel our sadness . Pierce the clouds of nature's night . Come, Thou source of joy and gladness . Breathe Thy life, and spread Thy light.
quotes.name: Augustus Montague Toplady

quotes.message: IT is not, Dear, because I am alone . For I am lonelier when the rest are near . But that my place against your heart has grown . Too dear to dream of when you are not here.
quotes.name: Edith Nesbit

quotes.message: I weep because my thoughts no more may roam . To meet, half-way, your longing thoughts of me . To turn with these and spread glad wings for home . For the dear haven where I fain would be.
quotes.name: Edith Nesbit

quotes.message: I knew it would happen . Everyone will leave me . I will remain alone .
quotes.name: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.message: It is my fate; it is my prize . To living alone . To smile alone . To cry alone .
quotes.name: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.message: Depression . even when the most enchantingly tantalizing of seductresses . unfurled their umpteenth flavors of vibrant seduction . just abreast of my impoverished countenance.
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: Depression . even when all the cuckoos of this Universe . boisterously chirped around me . for hours immemorial.
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: Depression . even when a fathomless garden of rose bountifully bloomed outside my bedroom window . insatiably wafting the scent of timeless happiness into my penuriously sagging ears.
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: Anxiety is the partner of depression. It accompanies half the cases of depression. Sometimes it triggers depression.
quotes.name: Matt Haig

quotes.message: Anxiety and depression are an interesting mix. In many ways they are opposite experiences, and yet mix them together and you don't get a happy medium.
quotes.name: Matt Haig

quotes.message: You can be a depressive and be happy, just as you can be a sober alcoholic. It doesn't have always have an obvious case.
quotes.name: Matt Haig

quotes.message: One in five people gets depression at some point in their life. Though obviously more than that will suffer from mental illness.
quotes.name: Matt Haig

quotes.message: Twice as many women as men will suffer a serious bout of depression in their lives.
quotes.name: Matt Haig

quotes.message: The symptoms of clinical depression include excessive crying or sadness, extreme mood swings, erratic behavior, loss of interest in friends, loved ones, or any type of pleasure, loss of appetite, weight gain or loss, anger, irritability, fatigue.
quotes.name: Pat Love

quotes.message: If you have a sad expression, it is much more likely you will make others feel this too. If you smile happily, you may have this effect on those around you as well.
quotes.name: I. C. Robledo

quotes.message: A person who displays a negative character generates a negative atmosphere.
quotes.name: Jean Watson

quotes.message: Encourage others today! So often the difference between success and failure is belief.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: Weed and feed. Our minds are like a garden; each day you need to weed out the negativity and feed it positivity.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: You are more powerful than your circumstances. They don't define you. You do.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: The story you tell yourself defines the life you live and the actions you take. It's important to tell yourself a positive story.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: While fear and worry can weaken or harden you, love transforms you and the people and situations around you.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: You don't have to wait to feel positive enough for a smile to happen. You can generate a positive feeling by smiling. Your smile can be the source of your positivity, not the result of it. Smile more today.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: I can see that the sadness has returned. And it's not a beautiful sadness- beautiful sadness is a myth. Sadness turns our features to clay, not porcelain.
quotes.name: David Levithan

quotes.message: Night is beautiful when you are happy--comforting when you are in grief--terrible when you are lonely and unhappy.
quotes.name: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.message: We must also look into our feelings of grief and loss. When we accept that everything is constantly changing, when we accept the inevitability that people and animals die, we can deal with pain in a much better fashion.
quotes.name: Aaron Soltys

quotes.message: Embrace your grief and your sadness felt towards those that have passed and remember them with love.
quotes.name: Aaron Soltys

quotes.message: Replace your grief with love and appreciation. That is truly what any who have departed from our lives would wish for us.
quotes.name: Aaron Soltys

quotes.message: In our quest for the answers of life we tend to make order out of chaos, and chaos out of order.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Fry

quotes.message: The great quest of life has always been to discover truth.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: The eternal quest of the individual human being is to shatter his loneliness.
quotes.name: Norman Cousins

quotes.message: To begin is the most important part of any quest and by far the most courageous.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: The quest for freedom, dignity, and the rights of man will never end.
quotes.name: William J. Brennan

quotes.message: My quests fuel my dreams… my dreams fuel my quests!!
quotes.name: AJ Vosse

quotes.message: Quests are a huge inconvenience. Don't let anyone tell you differently, even if that person has experience. The problem is that people forget the pain and aggravation as soon as the quest ends successfully, and then they remember only the glorious parts. In this way quests are a bit like childbirth, even to the point of saying that quests often give birth to glory. Maybe.
quotes.name: Amy Neftzger

quotes.message: Scientists derive satisfaction from figuring out the puzzle. It's about the quest, not the grail.
quotes.name: Isaac Asimov

quotes.message: In the presence of love, hearth and quest become one.
quotes.name: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.message: I just feel like I'm on a quest to fail if I try to even compete with myself.
quotes.name: Jenova Chen

quotes.message: That's the key. The quests are things you need to do for others so that you can learn.
quotes.name: Kaza Kingsley

quotes.message: Love isn’t the quest anymore; the new quest is the sensuality with which it is practiced.
quotes.name: Lebo Grand

quotes.message: You didn’t get the quest you wanted, you got the one you could do.
quotes.name: Lev Grossman

quotes.message: The journey is the treasure.
quotes.name: Lloyd Alexander

quotes.message: Always remember, joy is not incidental to spiritual quest. It is vital.
quotes.name: Nachman of Breslov

quotes.message: The terrible thing about the quest for truth is that you find it.
quotes.name: Remy de Gourmont

quotes.message: There can be no greater good than the quest for peace, and no finer purpose than the preservation of freedom.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: But that shadow has been serving you! What hurts you, blesses you. Darkness is your candle. Your boundaries are your quest. You must have shadow and light source both. Listen, and lay your head under the tree of awe.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: The quest for peace begins in the home, in the school and in the workplace.
quotes.name: Silvia Cartwright

quotes.message: The quest of the absolute leads into the four-dimensional world.
quotes.name: Sir Arthur Eddington

quotes.message: Scientists have become the bearers of the torch of discovery in our quest for knowledge.
quotes.name: Stephen Hawking

quotes.message: The insatiable quest for knowledge is far greater than the quest for worker health and safety.
quotes.name: Steven Magee

quotes.message: I think it is a quest of literature throughout the ages to describe the human condition.
quotes.name: Werner Herzog

quotes.message: Adventure works in any strand—it calls to those who care more for living than for their lives.
quotes.name: Amal El-Mohtar

quotes.message: You are not alone in your quest to be who you want and have what you want.
quotes.name: Chris Prentiss

quotes.message: The fear of being deceived is the vulgar version of the quest for Truth.
quotes.name: Emil Cioran

quotes.message: Love, the quest; marriage, the conquest; divorce, the inquest.
quotes.name: Helen Rowland

quotes.message: Science is a quest for understanding.
quotes.name: Jocelyn Bell Burnell

quotes.message: My music is part of the quest I have to find new ways of telling stories, and also, I want to inspire people.
quotes.name: Michael Franti

quotes.message: I need more friends. It's kind of like my quest right now just to have more true friends.
quotes.name: Miley Cyrus

quotes.message: The first rule of an expedition is that everyone should stick together.
quotes.name: Tahir Shah

quotes.message: My quest has always been to get my story to the rest o' the people.
quotes.name: Tech N9ne

quotes.message: The degree of freedom from unwanted thoughts and the degree of concentration on a single thought are the measures to gauge spiritual progress.
quotes.name: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.message: We must not inflict life on children who will be resented; we must not inflict unwanted children on society.
quotes.name: Anne Lamott

quotes.message: There are unwanted emotions and pain that goes along with any birth.
quotes.name: John Travolta

quotes.message: All men are sculptors, constantly chipping away the unwanted parts of their lives, trying to create their idea of a masterpiece.
quotes.name: Eddie Murphy

quotes.message: Unwanted favours gain no gratitude.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: The greatest tragedy of old age is the tendency for the old to feel unneeded, unwanted, and of no use to anyone; the secret of happiness in the declining years is to remain interested in life, as active as possible, useful to others, busy, and forward looking.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: You build a wall to keep something unwanted out … or to hold something precious in.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: It's very hard, feeling that you're no more than a piece of unwanted furniture in this world.
quotes.name: Anton Chekhov

quotes.message: The biggest disease today is not leprosy or tuberculosis, but rather the feeling of being unwanted.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Just as the unwanted pregnancy, there are unwanted people in your life you should strive to abort, and such abortion is not sin, nor harm, but the eradication of a destructive foetus.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: If you feel unwanted or unappreciated where you are or by those you're with, it only means you're in the wrong place or with the wrong people. Hang in there. Someone else will see you for the true gift you are.
quotes.name: LK Hunsaker

quotes.message: I’ve found that falling asleep is the best way to politely excuse yourself from an unwanted interaction.
quotes.name: Babe Walker

quotes.message: Let us touch the dying, the poor, the lonely and the unwanted according to the graces we have received and let us not be ashamed or slow to do the humble work.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Controlling unwanted thoughts is not the problem. Believing, thrusting, and taking direction from them is.
quotes.name: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.message: Pushing away unwanted feelings and situations, equals inviting them to return back with a greater strength.
quotes.name: Raphael Zernoff

quotes.message: Wisdom is unwanted in the colony of fools
quotes.name: Bamigboye Olurotimi

quotes.message: I want to leave, to go somewhere where I should be really in my place, where I would fit in . . . but my place is nowhere; I am unwanted.
quotes.name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.message: Contempt is the weapon of the weak and a defense against one's own despised and unwanted feelings.
quotes.name: Alice Miller

quotes.message: Human beings have a tendency to push away unwanted pain, but my experience is that when I give my consent to it, it delivers its gift and moves on.
quotes.name: Michael Beckwith

quotes.message: Do you know what an unwanted bodily condition is? It's a freshly hatched energy-summoning life-giving desire!
quotes.name: Esther Hicks

quotes.message: To be lonely is to feel unwanted and unloved, and therefor unloveable. Loneliness is a taste of death. No wonder some people who are desperately lonely lose themselves in mental illness or violence to forget the inner pain.
quotes.name: Jean Vanier

quotes.message: There are no unwanted children, just unfound families.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: The truth is that there is almost nothing as tiresome as unwanted love.
quotes.name: Sheila Kohler

quotes.message: No driven man hears unwanted counsel.
quotes.name: Janny Wurts

quotes.message: Resistance to unwanted circumstances has the power to keep those circumstances alive and well for a very long time.
quotes.name: Pema Chodron

quotes.message: In order to change unwanted habits and actions, it is important to take the time to get to know yourself.
quotes.name: Darren Johnson

quotes.message: Nothing discourages unwanted questions as much as a flow of pious bleating.
quotes.name: George R. R. Martin

quotes.message: If a free society cannot help the many who are poor, it cannot save the few who are rich.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: You aren't wealthy until you have something money can't buy.
quotes.name: Garth Brooks

quotes.message: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: When wealth is lost, nothing is lost. When health is lost, something is lost. When character is lost, all is lost.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: It is neither wealth nor splendor; but tranquility and occupation which give you happiness.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: I am grateful for the blessings of wealth, but it hasn't changed who I am. My feet are still on the ground. I'm just wearing better shoes.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: He is rich or poor according to what he is, not according to what he has.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: All riches have their origin in mind. Wealth is in ideas not money.
quotes.name: Robert Collier

quotes.message: If we command our wealth, we shall be rich and free; if our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: The real measure of your wealth is how much you'd be worth if you lost all your money.
quotes.name: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.message: Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Wealth stays with us a little moment if at all. Only our characters are steadfast, not our gold.
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: The way to wealth depends on just two words, industry and frugality.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: In every well-governed state wealth is a sacred thing. In democracies it is the only sacred thing.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: Wealth is power, and power is the only thing about which contemporary culture cares.
quotes.name: Dean Koontz

quotes.message: But wealth is a great means of refinement and it is a security for gentleness, since it removes disturbing anxieties.
quotes.name: Donald Grant Mitchell

quotes.message: Our wealth is often a snare to ourselves, and always a temptation to others.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: Wealth is the Conjurer's Devil, Whom, when he thinks he hath, the Devil hath him.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: Wealth is the smallest thing on earth, the least gift that God has bestowed on mankind.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: All wealth is the product of labor.
quotes.name: John Locke

quotes.message: Seek not greater wealth, but simpler pleasure. Not higher fortune, but deeper felicity.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Wealth is nothing more or less than a tool to do things with. It is like the fuel that runs the furnace or the belt that runs the wheel only a means to an end.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Wealth, in even the most improbable cases, manages to convey the aspect of intelligence.
quotes.name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.message: Wealth is the slave of a wise man. The master of a fool.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Wealth is the product of man's capacity to think.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without one.
quotes.name: Chinese

quotes.message: Earth is dearer than gold.
quotes.name: Estonian

quotes.message: If you know how to spend less than you get, you have the philosopher's stone.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Save money and money will save you.
quotes.name: Jamaican

quotes.message: The devil dances in empty pockets.
quotes.name: Tudor

quotes.message: Wealth is both an enemy and a friend.
quotes.name: Nepalese

quotes.message: Wealth is but dung; useful only when spread.
quotes.name: Chinese

quotes.message: Wealth is not his that has it, but his that enjoys it.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Who is rich? He that enjoys his portion.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Worldly prosperity is like writing on water.
quotes.name: Telagu

quotes.message: There comes a point when you have to realize that you'll never be good enough for some people.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: You may never be good enough for some people, but you will always be the best for those who deserve you.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Good is not good enough when better is expected.
quotes.name: Lou Lamoriello

quotes.message: Better is not good enough; the best is yet to come!
quotes.name: T. B. Joshua

quotes.message: You are not your mistakes: they are what you did, not who you are.
quotes.name: Lisa Lieberman-Wang

quotes.message: The moment someone tells you or makes you feel like you're not good enough is the moment you know you're better than them.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: When people tell you're not good enough, don't mind them.
quotes.name: Toni Gonzaga

quotes.message: Never think that you are not good enough for anyone, always ask yourself if they are good enough for you.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: There's not one human being on the planet earth who has never felt, at some point, unaccepted. At some point in our lives, we feel like we're not good enough, but we have to step back and realize that we are.
quotes.name: Jussie Smollett

quotes.message: The worst feeling in the world is knowing you did the best you could and it still wasn't good enough.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Never let someone tell you that you or your dreams are impossible, improbable, or not ‘good enough’ for their liking, especially when they have no experience or knowledge of your true heart and powers.
quotes.name: Brendon Burchard

quotes.message: Shame is the most powerful, master emotion. It's the fear that we're not good enough.
quotes.name: Brene Brown

quotes.message: And it is easy to believe you are not good enough if you listen to everybody else.
quotes.name: Mackenzie Astin

quotes.message: You are good. But it is not enough just to be good. You must be good for something. You must contribute good to the world. The world must be a better place for your presence. And the good that is in you must be spread to others.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: Just doing as well as you did last time is not good enough.
quotes.name: Michael Jackson

quotes.message: And above all things, never think that you're not good enough yourself. A man should never think that.
quotes.name: Isaac Asimov

quotes.message: It's a lie to think you're not good enough. It's a lie to think you're not worth anything.
quotes.name: Nick Vujicic

quotes.message: Never do they hurt your feelings or make you feel like you are not good enough, but rather they build you up and show you the things about yourself that make you special and even beautiful.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: Do not let anyone tell you what you can be. Do not let anyone tell you that you are not good enough or smart enough. Remember that nobody is better than you. Everybody puts on their pants one leg at a time.
quotes.name: Farrah Gray

quotes.message: Don't let anyone tell you you're not good enough. You're good enough, you are too good. Love your family with all your heart and listen to it.
quotes.name: Gerard Way

quotes.message: We start to feel not good enough and we withdraw our hearts energy and sensor our authentic expression, and that hurts!
quotes.name: Agapi Stassinopoulos

quotes.message: All you can do is all you can do... If all you can do, is still not good enough, then go do something else.
quotes.name: Bradford Winters
