quotes.message: Don't let anyone make you feel like you're not good enough, smart enough or cool enough. Do your own thing.
quotes.name: Benji Madden

quotes.message: If something is not good enough, stop doing it.
quotes.name: Jonathan Ive

quotes.message: Don't ever say you're not good enough. If that person can't see how amazing you are then they are the one who's not good enough.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Above all else, never think you're not good enough.
quotes.name: Anthony Trollope

quotes.message: We are afraid of failure, of ridicule, of being rejected. We are afraid we're not good enough.
quotes.name: Rhonda Britten

quotes.message: You have to realize that, if you don't get signed right away, it's not because you're not talented. It's not because you're not good enough. The stars have to align perfectly in order to get signed. And sometimes it works out, and sometimes it doesn't.
quotes.name: Carmen Rasmusen

quotes.message: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
quotes.name: J.R.R.Tolkien

quotes.message: How unreliable is the woman caught being faithful! Today she is faithful to you, tomorrow to another.
quotes.name: Karl Kraus

quotes.message: I have no faith in my faith. My faith is in the faithful God.
quotes.name: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.message: When we in faith embrace Christ as our Lord and Savior, our minds are transformed.
quotes.name: John MacArthur Jr

quotes.message: Faith in the king comes easily in lovely times, but be faithful now and endure, pale lover.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: Leave me if you must, but be faithful to me if you are with me.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.message: Have confidence. Return. Invoke our Lady and you'll be faithful.
quotes.name: Josemaria Escriva

quotes.message: In all my life and in the future, I will always be a faithful and loyal servant to all of my compatriots.
quotes.name: Norodom Sihamoni

quotes.message: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
quotes.name: Andre Gide

quotes.message: If you be faithful, you will have that honor that comes from God: his Spirit will say in your hearts, Well done, good and faithful servants.
quotes.name: Adam Clarke

quotes.message: We are not here to be successful, we are here to be FAITHFUL.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Otherwise without faith it becomes very difficult to keep pushing forward every day.
quotes.name: Darrin Wiggins

quotes.message: The best thing about love is the trust, the best thing about trust is honesty, and the best thing about honesty is faithfulness.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: Faithfulness and loyalty is not an option in a relationship, it's a priority if it must work.
quotes.name: Anne Nwakama

quotes.message: We can only be faithful to what we remember, and we remember only what we have known.
quotes.name: Marcel Proust

quotes.message: If your man were the faithful type you wouldn't have to worry about other women. Realize that it's his job to be faithful to you.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: You have to be faithful in little before you are entrusted with much.
quotes.name: Daniel Brown

quotes.message: If you wonder how long Ill be faithful. I'll be happy to tell you again. I'm gonna love you forever & ever, forever & ever amen.
quotes.name: Randy Travis

quotes.message: Being faithful in the smallest things is the way to gain, maintain, and demonstrate the strength needed to accomplish something great.
quotes.name: Alex Harris

quotes.message: To love is to be faithful to those who cheat on us.
quotes.name: Nelson Rodrigues

quotes.message: Hold faithfulness and sincerity as first principles.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: One secret to my success is that I am faithful to my dreams and don't cheat on my dreams by taking drugs or blaming others when things don't go right.
quotes.name: Mark Kostabi

quotes.message: Become faithful to yourself, if you do, it will come natural towards everyone else.
quotes.name: Unarine Ramaru

quotes.message: God wants to be faithful and make sure that He restores me and you to our original purpose, a pure and holy people when He comes again.
quotes.name: Happy Zhou

quotes.message: We shouldn't have to be faithful, we should want to be faithful.
quotes.name: Larry Kramer

quotes.message: Dont worry about being effective. Just concentrate on being faithful to the truth.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: Be faithful in small things because it is in them your strength lies.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Faith is unseen but felt, faith is strength when we feel we have none, faith is hope when all seems lost.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Only the person who has faith in himself is able to be faithful to others.
quotes.name: Erich Fromm

quotes.message: At times one remains faithful to a cause only because its opponents do not cease to be insipid.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: I don't think there are any men who are faithful to their wives.
quotes.name: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.message: It is a truism to say that the dog is largely what his master makes of him: he can be savage and dangerous, untrustworthy, cringing and fearful; or he can be faithful and loyal, courageous and the best of companions and allies.
quotes.name: Ranulph Fiennes

quotes.message: He who loveth a book will never want a faithful friend, a wholesome counsellor, a cheerful companion, or an effectual comforter.
quotes.name: Isaac Barrow

quotes.message: Unemployment insurance is a pre-paid vacation for freeloaders.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Unemployment is a great tragedy. The man who goes about hopelessly seeking work in order to earn bread for his children is a living reproach to civilization.
quotes.name: Carlos Saavedra Lamas

quotes.message: Of all aspects of social misery nothing is so heartbreaking as unemployment.
quotes.name: Jane Addams

quotes.message: The longer our graduation lines are today, the shorter our unemployment lines will be tomorrow.
quotes.name: George H. W. Bush

quotes.message: Unemployment diminishes people. Leisure enlarges them.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: If heaven really exists: then heaven is the job, hell is unemployment, while life is merely an interview.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: The cool thing about unemployment is every day is Saturday.
quotes.name: Jarod Kintz

quotes.message: Employment frees man from the nightmare of unemployment, while it chains him to his employer’s dream.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: Unemployment or the loss of income which will always affect some in any society is certainly less degrading if it is the result of misfortune and not deliberately imposed by authority.
quotes.name: F.A. Hayek

quotes.message: There is no such thing as an acceptable level of unemployment, because hunger is not acceptable, poverty is not acceptable, poor health is not acceptable, and a ruined life is not acceptable.
quotes.name: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.message: Inflation is the parent of unemployment and the unseen robber of those who have saved.
quotes.name: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.message: Unemployment is like a headache or a high temperature – unpleasant and exhausting but not carrying in itself any explanation of its cause.
quotes.name: William Beveridge

quotes.message: Hunger is not the worst feature of unemployment; idleness is.
quotes.name: William E. Barrett

quotes.message: Unemployment, with its injustice for the man who seeks and thirsts for employment, who begs for labour and cannot get it, and who is punished for failure he is not responsible for by the starvation of his children – that torture is something that private enterprise ought to remedy for its own sake.
quotes.name: David Lloyd George

quotes.message: Unemployment is not the situation to blame your fate or on others… It’s time to believe in yourself and Unveil-New-Employment
quotes.name: Shashank Rayal

quotes.message: Computers can solve all kinds of problems except the unemployment problem they create
quotes.name: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.message: Unemployment is bigger than a political party. It is a national danger and a national scandal.
quotes.name: Ellen Wilkinson

quotes.message: As long as there is unemployment, war, crime and all things that go to the infliction of man's inhumanity to man, regardless - there is much to be done, and people need to work together.
quotes.name: Rosa Parks

quotes.message: The trouble with unemployment is that the minute you wake up in the morning, you're on the job.
quotes.name: Slappy White

quotes.message: When more and more people are thrown out of work, unemployment results.
quotes.name: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.message: Long-term unemployment can make any worker progressively less employable, even after the economy strengthens.
quotes.name: Janet Yellen

quotes.message: We need to give importance to skill development because this way we can end unemployment.
quotes.name: Narendra Modi

quotes.message: The final solution for unemployment is work.
quotes.name: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.message: Unfortunately, very few governments think about youth unemployment when they are drawing up their national plans.
quotes.name: Kofi Annan

quotes.message: Everyone has the right to work, to free choice of employment, to just and favorable conditions of work and to protection against unemployment.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Flattery makes friends and truth makes enemies.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: Look closely at those who patronize you. Half are unfeeling, half untaught.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Flattery is like chewing gum. Enjoy it but don't swallow it.
quotes.name: Hank Ketcham

quotes.message: A little flattery will support a man through great fatigue.
quotes.name: James Monroe

quotes.message: Flattery corrupts both the receiver and the giver.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: Flattery succeeds best on minds previously occupied by conceit.
quotes.name: Norman Macdonald

quotes.message: Although a skillful flatterer is a most delightful companion if you have him all to yourself, his taste becomes very doubtful when he takes to complimenting other people.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: Flattery is refined deception--it is the froth of language--it is the alcohol of social intercourse--it is the prescription of the subtle--and the nectar of fools.
quotes.name: William Scott Downey

quotes.message: Flattery is like cologne water, to be smelt, not swallowed
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Flattery is all right if you don't inhale.
quotes.name: Adlai Stevenson I

quotes.message: A fool flatters himself, a wise man flatters the fool.
quotes.name: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: Nothing in this world is harder than speaking the truth, nothing easier than flattery.
quotes.name: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.message: I pay no attention whatever to anybody's praise or blame. I simply follow my own feelings.
quotes.name: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quotes.message: The public wants work which flatters its illusions.
quotes.name: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.message: It is possible to be below flattery as well as above it.
quotes.name: Thomas B. Macaulay

quotes.message: A compliment is a statement of an agreeable truth; flattery is a statement of an agreeable untruth.
quotes.name: Sir John A. MacDonald

quotes.message: Between flattery and admiration there often flows a river of contempt.
quotes.name: Minna Antrim

quotes.message: Flattery is never so agreeable as to our blind side; commend a fool for his wit, or a knave for his honesty, and they will receive you into their bosoms.
quotes.name: Henry Fielding

quotes.message: There is no effect more disproportionate to its cause than the happiness bestowed by a small compliment.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: Some folks pay a compliment like they went down in their pocket for it.
quotes.name: Kin Hubbard

quotes.message: Like pollen on a honeybee, flattery clings to the things you tell yourself.
quotes.name: Willis Goth Regier

quotes.message: Flattery is a form of hatred.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: He who says he hates every kind of flattery, and says it in earnest, certainly does not yet know every kind of flattery.
quotes.name: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.message: I cannot think of any character below the flatterer, except he who envies him.
quotes.name: Sir Richard Steele

quotes.message: Do not offer a compliment and ask a favor at the same time. A compliment that is charged for is not valuable.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: The voice of flattery affects us after it has ceased, just as after a concert men find some agreeable air ringing in their ears to the exclusion of all serious business.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Here comes Glib-tongue: who can out-flatter a Dedication; and lie, like ten Epitaphs.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Flattery is like friendship in show, but not in fruit
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Flattery is telling the other person precisely what he thinks about himself
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Sweet words are like honey, a little may refresh, but too much gluts the stomach.
quotes.name: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.message: None are more taken in by flattery than the proud, who wish to be the first and are not.
quotes.name: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.message: Some indeed there are who profess to despise all flattery, but even these are nevertheless to be flattered, by being told that they do despise it.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: Popular culture is a place where pity is called compassion, flattery is called love, propaganda is called knowledge, tension is called peace, gossip is called news, and auto-tune is called singing.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: The aim of flattery is to soothe and encourage us by assuring us of the truth of an opinion we have already formed about ourselves.
quotes.name: Edith Sitwell

quotes.message: Flattery is no more than what raises in a man's mind an idea of a preference which he has not.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: Flattery is a counterfeit money which, but for vanity, would have no circulation.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: If we did not flatter ourselves, the flattery of others could never harm us.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Baloney is flattery laid on so thick it cannot be true, and blarney is flattery so thin we love it.
quotes.name: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.message: No man flatters the woman he truly loves.
quotes.name: Henry Theodore Tuckerman

quotes.message: Flattery is the worst and falsest way of showing our esteem.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: The flattery of posterity is not worth much more than contemporary flattery, which is worth nothing.
quotes.name: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.message: The most skillful flattery is to let a person talk on, and be a listener.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Listening, not imitation, may be the sincerest form of flattery.
quotes.name: Joyce Brothers

quotes.message: In the best, the friendliest and simplest relations flattery or praise is necessary, just as grease is necessary to keep wheels turning.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: We despise no source that can pay us a pleasing attention.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Flattery pleases very generally. In the first place, the flatterer may think what he says to be true; but, in the second place, whether he thinks so or not, he certainly thinks those whom he flatters of consequence enough to be flattered.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: No visor does become black villainy so well as soft and tender flattery.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Retirement, a time to do what you want to do, when you want to do it, where you want to do it, and, how you want to do it.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Retirement may be looked upon either as a prolonged holiday or as a rejection, a being thrown on to the scrap-heap.
quotes.name: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.message: The key to retirement is to find joy in the little things.
quotes.name: Susan Miller

quotes.message: Retirement has been a discovery of beauty for me. I never had the time before to notice the beauty of my grandkids, my wife, the tree outside my very own front door. And, the beauty of time itself.
quotes.name: Hartman Jule

quotes.message: Retirement without the love of letters is a living burial.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Retirement: That's when you return from work one day and say, 'Hi, Honey, I'm home, forever.
quotes.name: Gene Perret

quotes.message: Retire from work, but not from life.
quotes.name: M.K. Soni

quotes.message: To enjoy a long, comfortable retirement, save more today.
quotes.name: Suze Orman

quotes.message: Retirement kills more people than hard work ever did.
quotes.name: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.message: The best time to start thinking about your retirement is before the boss does.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Retirement may be an ending, a closing, but it is also a new beginning.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: The trouble with retirement is that you never get a day off.
quotes.name: Abe Lemons

quotes.message: Retirement: Something arrived at in haste and lived at in leisure.
quotes.name: Dave Erhard

quotes.message: If you start thinking about retirement in six months' time, you're already there.
quotes.name: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.message: Retirement is when the living is easy and the payments are hard.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: When a man retires, his wife gets twice the husband but only half the income.
quotes.name: Chi Chi Rodriguez

quotes.message: Life begins at retirement.
quotes.name: Unkown

quotes.message: The goal of retirement is to live off your assets-not on them.
quotes.name: Frank Eberhart

quotes.message: Retirement from Job does not mean retirement from life! It is the beginning not an end!
quotes.name: Ravi Samuel

quotes.message: Retirement is having nothing to do and someone always keeping you from it.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: In retirement, every day is Boss Day and every day is Employee Appreciation Day.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: Retirement: It's nice to get out of the rat race, but you have to learn to get along with less cheese.
quotes.name: Gene Perret

quotes.message: I'm not just retiring from the company, I'm also retiring from my stress, my commute, my alarm clock, and my iron.
quotes.name: Hartman Jule

quotes.message: I never stopped doing anything [when I retired], I stopped getting paid for it.
quotes.name: Bill Chavanne

quotes.message: Retirement itself is the best gift. No gold watch could ever top it.
quotes.name: Abigail Charleson

quotes.message: In retirement, only money and symptoms are consequential.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: Retirement is a one-way trip to insignificance.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: Retirement to me does not mean nothing to do but the realization of the decisions I made in the past. That I made in my life.
quotes.name: Jack Bowman

quotes.message: Retirement . . . is when you stop living at work and begin working at living.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: When you retire, you switch bosses from the one who hired you to the one who married you.
quotes.name: Gene Perret

quotes.message: Retirement is a time given to find God within yourself.
quotes.name: Walter

quotes.message: The harder you work, the harder it is to surrender.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Don't simply retire from something; have something to retire to.
quotes.name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.message: Retirement: World's longest coffee break.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Retirement is like a long vacation in Las Vegas. The goal is to enjoy it the fullest, but not so fully that you run out of money.
quotes.name: Jonathan Clements

quotes.message: Retirement is a great opportunity to become the person you have always wanted to be but have never been.
quotes.name: Dave Erhard

quotes.message: The challenge of retirement is how to spend time without spending money.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Retirement is wonderful if you have two essentials - much to live on and much to live for.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Retirement: The time in your life when time is no longer money.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: For retirement brings repose, and repose allows a kindly judgment of all things.
quotes.name: John Sharp Williams

quotes.message: Retirement requires the invention of a new hedonism, not a return to the hedonism of youth.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: And in the end it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Retirement gives each of us another opportunity to smell the flowers. Once again, some of us will, and some of us won't.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: In my retirement I go for a short swim at least once or twice every day. It's either that or buy a new golf ball.
quotes.name: Gene Perret

quotes.message: Retirement means no pressure, no stress, no heartache... unless you play golf.
quotes.name: Gene Perret

quotes.message: Retirement is a time to look back with satisfaction, and a time to look ahead with anticipation. A time to fill each day with enjoyment. A very special time for you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Retirement brings the ball finally onto your court, where you get to make all the rules.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Not dead, just very much retired. To old friends, to retirement, to new beginnings.
quotes.name: Debra Hill

quotes.message: Retirement is eighty-five. You're all almost mandatory retirement age.
quotes.name: Glen A. Larson

quotes.message: I know exactly what I'm gonna do when I retire. Buy a beach bar. Surf all day, and margaritas 'till sun-up.
quotes.name: Donald P. Bellisario

quotes.message: Retiring nature. It means I want to live long enough... to retire.
quotes.name: Sydney Newman

quotes.message: I'm retired, not dead. I mean different. Okay, a little boring.
quotes.name: Luc Besson

quotes.message: Undercover agents don't retire. They just go deeper.
quotes.name: Shane Brennan

quotes.message: I don't mean being a cop. I mean to quit, retire, be a regular person.
quotes.name: Gary DeVore

quotes.message: I have to say, a lot of guys, when they retire, they just drift. But... you're really making this work.
quotes.name: Andrew W. Marlowe

quotes.message: Retiring and sailing around the world on my boat. We are living the dream.
quotes.name: Will Ferrell

quotes.message: When I retire from racing, I don't even like to think about it, I feel that each day I can run, touch wood, with, er, injury free conditions then I'll run til I drop.
quotes.name: Nick Park

quotes.message: I've seen people get old, retire, and die. Rarely on the same day.
quotes.name: Cory Goodman

quotes.message: For many people, retirement is simply the point in their lives when they stop working for money.
quotes.name: S. Jamie Gayton

quotes.message: In order to achieve you retirement vision, enjoy financial independence, and prepare for any emergencies that may arise later in life, you must start saving for retirement now.
quotes.name: S. Jamie Gayton

quotes.message: Retirement is more than simply withdrawing from work. Retirement often leads to new options in later life.
quotes.name: Harry R. Moody

quotes.message: Retirement has come to mean an expansion of leisure time, most of it during the retirement years.
quotes.name: Harry R. Moody

quotes.message: Retirement as a time of leisure is feasible only with a certain degree of wealth.
quotes.name: Harry R. Moody

quotes.message: Retirement is a social institution with rules about when it is permissible for workers to leave the paid labor force.
quotes.name: Joan T. Erber

quotes.message: Transition from a working environment to retirement poses financial as well as emotional challenges.
quotes.name: Irving S. Schloss

quotes.message: At the outset, the most important myth to dispel is that retirement represents the finish line.
quotes.name: Irving S. Schloss

quotes.message: One of the major turnings in life takes place at 'retirement.
quotes.name: John Fry

quotes.message: Retirement is a convenient social expedient for removing from work employed workers who reach certain ages.
quotes.name: John Fry

quotes.message: Retirement should be looked on as the end of the beginning rather than as the beginning of the end.
quotes.name: John Fry

quotes.message: Yes, there can be retirement from a primary job but new opportunities await everyone to share their lessons from life and make the 'rest if our years the best or our years!'
quotes.name: John Heide

quotes.message: Yes, retirement is alluring and enchanting for many!
quotes.name: John Heide

quotes.message: Obedience of the law is demanded; not asked as a favor.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
quotes.name: Elon Musk

quotes.message: The longer you hang in there, the greater the chance that something will happen in your favor. No matter how hard it seems, the longer you persist, the more likely your success. Read more at: https:..www.brainyquote.com.quotes.
quotes.name: Jack Canfield

quotes.message: Chance favors the prepared mind.
quotes.name: Louis Pasteur

quotes.message: Friends don't count the cost of favors.
quotes.name: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.message: No favor can win gratitude from a cat.
quotes.name: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.message: A favor is never so long-lived as a grudge.
quotes.name: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.message: No wind favors he who has no destined port.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: This is a universe that does not favor the timid.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Never claim as a right what you can ask as a favor.
quotes.name: John Churton Collins

quotes.message: Live life as if everything is rigged in your favor.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: One person can bring favor to many during the storm.
quotes.name: Beth Moore

quotes.message: The friendship of a great man is a favor of the gods.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: Gratitude is merely the secret hope of further favors.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: I have friends in overalls whose friendship I would not swap for the favor of the kings of the world.
quotes.name: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.message: Fortune does favor the bold and you'll never know what you're capable of if you don't try.
quotes.name: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.message: Fortune and love favor the brave.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: The bird thinks it a favor to give the fish a lift in the air.
quotes.name: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.message: He who boasts of a favor bestowed, would like it back again.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: Heaven goes by favor. If it went by merit, you would stay out and your dog would go in.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: That man is worthless who knows how to receive a favor, but not how to return one.
quotes.name: Plautus

quotes.message: It is the characteristic of the magnanimous man to ask no favor but to be ready to do kindness to others.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: The least productive people are usually the ones who are most in favor of holding meetings.
quotes.name: Thomas Sowell

quotes.message: There is no safety in regaining the favor of an enemy
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: Favor and honor sometimes fall more fitly on those who do not desire them.
quotes.name: Livy

quotes.message: If even dying is to be made a social function, then, grant me the favor of sneaking out on tiptoe without disturbing the party.
quotes.name: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.message: Goals allow you to control the direction of change in your favor.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: The odds will always favor the man with a plan.
quotes.name: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.message: To refuse graciously is to confer a favor.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: The ideal man takes joy in doing favors for others.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: If you want to make a friend, let someone do you a favor.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Most of the change we think we see in life is due to truths being in and out of favor.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: People who demand neutrality in any situation are usually not neutral but in favor of the status quo.
quotes.name: Max Eastman

quotes.message: We secure our friends not by accepting favours but by doing them.
quotes.name: Thucydides

quotes.message: Never forget the favors done for you. Always forget the favors you’ve done for others.
quotes.name: Omar Suleiman

quotes.message: If we do what is necessary, all the odds are in our favor.
quotes.name: Charles Buxton

quotes.message: When you are through changing, you are through.
quotes.name: Bruce Barton

quotes.message: The man who never alters his opinion is like standing water, and breeds reptiles of the mind.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: It's funny how you can know somebody for so long and they change right in front of you.
quotes.name: Karina Barton

quotes.message: Sometimes it's not the people who change,it's the mask that falls off.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: People change, those that are close they turn to enemies and those that are strange, they turn to family.
quotes.name: Simphiwe Ntuli

quotes.message: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: People underestimate their capacity for change. There is never a right time to do a difficult thing.
quotes.name: John Porter

quotes.message: All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy; for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter another.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: Don't be too confident when someone tells you they like you. The real question is until when? Because people change and so do feelings.
quotes.name: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.message: Love can change a person the way a parent can change a baby- awkwardly, and often with a great deal of mess.
quotes.name: Lemony Snicket

quotes.message: You're always you, and that don't change, and you're always changing, and there's nothing you can do about it.
quotes.name: Neil Gaiman

quotes.message: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Prayer changes things? No! Prayer changes people, and people change things.
quotes.name: Burton Hills

quotes.message: Some people change their ways when they see the light; others when they feel the heat
quotes.name: Caroline Schoeder

quotes.message: People change and forget to tell each other.
quotes.name: Lillian Hellman

quotes.message: People change for two reasons: Either they learned a lot or they've been hurt too much.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Progress is impossible without change & those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Things change. And friends leave. Life doesn't stop for anybody.
quotes.name: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.message: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: There comes a time when you have to stop crossing oceans for people who wouldn't jump puddles for you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It happens to everyone as they grow up. You find out who you are and what you want, and then you realize that people you've known forever don't see things the way you do. So you keep the wonderful memories, but find yourself moving on.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: At some point, you'll have to realize that some people can stay in your heart, but not in your life.
quotes.name: Ashley Hodgeson

quotes.message: Everything is changing. People are taking their comedians seriously and the politicians as a joke.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: People lose people, we lose things in our life as we're constantly growing and changing. That's what life is is change, and a lot of that is loss. It's what you gain from that loss that makes life.
quotes.name: Thomas Jane

quotes.message: What old people say you cannot do, you try and find that you can. Old deeds for old people, and new deeds for new.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: It's hard to watch people change, but it's even harder to remember who they used to be.
quotes.name: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.message: Constant development is the law of life, and a man who always tries to maintain his dogmas in order to appear consistent drives himself into a falseposition.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Consider how hard it is to change yourself and you'll understand what little chance you have in trying to change others.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: People don't resist change.
quotes.name: Peter Senge

quotes.message: If people refuse to look at you in a new light and they can only see you for what you were, only see you for the mistakes you’ve made, if they don’t realize that you are not your mistakes, then they have to go.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: You cannot change the people around you, but you can change the people you choose to be around.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: How would your life be different if you stopped making negative judgmental assumptions about people you encounter? Let today be the day you look for the good in everyone you meet and respect their journey.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Constant development is the law of life, and a man who always tries to maintain his dogmas in order to appear consistent drives himself into a false position.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: I don’t think people change. I think they definitely mature. But I think the essence of what I am today is the same as when I was five years old. It’s just maturity. I’ve become a healthier, fuller expression of that essence.
quotes.name: Ricky Williams

quotes.message: People change for two main reasons: their minds have opened or their hearts have been broken.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: We are not trapped or locked up in these bones. No, no. We are free to change. And love changes us. And if we can love one another, we can break open the sky.
quotes.name: Walter Mosley

quotes.message: I’m unpredictable, I never know where I’m going until I get there, I’m so random, I’m always growing, learning, changing, I’m never the same person twice. But one thing you can be sure of about me, I will always do exactly what I want to do.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C

quotes.message: You must be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: People cannot change the truth but the truth can change people
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: One day spent with someone you love can change everything.
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: Things do not change, we change.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: The snake which cannot cast its skin has to die. As well the minds which are prevented from changing their opinions; they cease to be mind.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: And that is how change happens. One gesture. One person. One moment at a time.
quotes.name: Libba Bray

quotes.message: For what it’s worth: it’s never too late or, in my case, too early to be whoever you want to be. There’s no time limit, stop whenever you want. You can change or stay the same, there are no rules to this thing. We can make the best or the worst of it.
quotes.name: Eric Roth

quotes.message: Everything comes to pass, nothing comes to stay.
quotes.name: Matthew Flickstein

quotes.message: By changing nothing, nothing changes.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: All great changes are preceded by chaos.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: Change alone is eternal, perpetual, immortal.
quotes.name: Arthur Shopenhauer

quotes.message: Change is inevitable. Growth is optional.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Sometimes it’s not the people who change, it’s the mask that falls off.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: I don’t know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: People do not change, they are merely revealed.
quotes.name: Anne Enright

quotes.message: When you’re different, sometimes you don’t see the millions of people who accept you for what you are. All you notice is the person who doesn’t.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: I don’t need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.
quotes.name: Plutarch

quotes.message: No matter what happens in life, be good to people. Being good to people is a wonderful legacy to leave behind.
quotes.name: Taylor Swift

quotes.message: People don’t change who they are. They only change what they do with it.
quotes.name: Maggie Stiefvater

quotes.message: Life is funny. Things change, people change, but you will always be you, so stay true to yourself and never sacrifice who you are for anyone.
quotes.name: Zayn Malik

quotes.message: People fall so in love with their pain, they can’t leave it behind. The same as the stories they tell. We trap ourselves.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: You will never find the real truth among people that are insecure or have egos to protect. Truth over time becomes either guarded or twisted as their perspective changes; it changes with the seasons of their shame, love, hope or pride.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: I’ve spent most of my life and most of my friendships holding my breath and hoping that when people get close enough, they won’t leave, and fearing that it’s a matter of time before they figure me out and go.
quotes.name: Shauna Niequist

quotes.message: I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they’re right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
quotes.name: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.message: Times change, people change, thoughts about good and evil change, about true and false. But what always remains fast and steady is the affection that your friends feel for you, those who always have your best interest at heart.
quotes.name: Margot Frank

quotes.message: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
quotes.name: Stephen Hawking

quotes.message: If we don’t change, we don’t grow. If we don’t grow, we aren’t really living.
quotes.name: Gail Sheehy

quotes.message: Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced.
quotes.name: James Baldwin

quotes.message: Life will only change when you become more committed to your dreams than you are to your comfort zone.
quotes.name: Billy Cox

quotes.message: Nothing is so painful to the human mind as a great and sudden change.
quotes.name: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quotes.message: People want to change everything and, at the same time, want it all to remain the same.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Discrimination has a lot of layers that make it tough for minorities to get a leg up.
quotes.name: Bill Gates

quotes.message: Discrimination is a disease.
quotes.name: Roger Staubach

quotes.message: No change can come if those who are impacted the most by discrimination are not willing to stand up for themselves.
quotes.name: Zainab Salbi

quotes.message: I have a dream that my four little children will one day live in a nation where they will not be judged by the color of their skin but by the content of their character.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: If you believe that discrimination exists, it will.
quotes.name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.message: How I wish we lived in a time when laws were not necessary to safeguard us from discrimination.
quotes.name: Barbra Streisand

quotes.message: It is not discrimination to treat different things differently.
quotes.name: Maggie Gallagher

quotes.message: Humans are naturally elusioned in discrimination; it starts when we look for the first time in mirror.
quotes.name: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.message: Discrimination is discrimination, even when people claim it's 'tradition.
quotes.name: DaShanne Stokes

quotes.message: Reducing a group to a slur or stereotype reduces us all.
quotes.name: DaShanne Stokes

quotes.message: At the end of the game, the king and the pawn go back in the same box.
quotes.name: Italian Proverb

quotes.message: Men's skins have many colors, but human blood is always red.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: White, black and yellow men - they all cry salt tears.
quotes.name: Claude Aveline

quotes.message: When you introduce discrimination of any kind, it's anti-innovative.
quotes.name: David Isenberg

quotes.message: We should be doing our utmost to ensure that all are protected against discrimination.
quotes.name: Henry A. Waxman

quotes.message: I believe in human beings, and that all human beings should be respected as such, regardless of their color.
quotes.name: Malcolm X

quotes.message: Love, all alike, no season knows, nor clime, nor hours, days, months, which are the rags of time.
quotes.name: John Donne

quotes.message: Hating people because of their color is wrong. And it doesn't matter which color does the hating. It's just plain wrong.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: And each of us can practice rights ourselves, treating each other without discrimination, respecting each other's dignity and rights.
quotes.name: Carol Bellamy

quotes.message: Our true nationality is mankind.
quotes.name: H.G. Wells

quotes.message: Achievement has no color.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin, or his background, or his religion. People must learn to hate, and if they can learn to hate, they can be taught to love, for love comes more naturally to the human heart than its opposite.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: The color of the skin is in no way connected with strength of the mind or intellectual powers.
quotes.name: Benjamin Banneker

quotes.message: When we're unemployed, we're called lazy; when the whites are unemployed it's called a depression.
quotes.name: Jesse Jackson

quotes.message: Be nice to whites, they need you to rediscover their humanity.
quotes.name: Desmond Tutu

quotes.message: The way to stop Discrimination on the basis of race is to stop discriminating on the basis of race.
quotes.name: John Roberts

quotes.message: It is often easier to become outraged by injustice half a world away than by oppression and Discrimination half a block from home.
quotes.name: Carl T. Rowan

quotes.message: The law prohibits Discrimination on the basis of race, gender, marital status, political beliefs, disability, or age, and the government effectively enforced these prohibitions.
quotes.name: U.S. State Department Report, 2010

quotes.message: Discrimination due to age is one of the great tragedies of modern life. The desire to work and be useful is what makes life worth living, and to be told your efforts are not needed because you are the wrong age is a crime.
quotes.name: Johnny Ball

quotes.message: I believe discrimination still exists in society and we must fight it in every form.
quotes.name: Andrew Cuomo

quotes.message: What is required of a working hypothesis is a fine capacity for discrimination.
quotes.name: Jean-Francois Lyotard

quotes.message: I have an intensive hatred for discrimination based on colour.
quotes.name: John Diefenbaker

quotes.message: Discrimination still exists. Some people feel that their own beliefs are being threatened. Some are unhappy about unfamiliar cultures. They all need to be reassured that there is so much to be gained by reaching out to others; that diversity is indeed a strength and not a threat.
quotes.name: Elizabeth II

quotes.message: In the long run, there is not much discrimination against superior talent.
quotes.name: Carter G. Woodson

quotes.message: If we were to wake up some morning and find that everyone was the same race, creed and color, we would find some other causes for prejudice by noon.
quotes.name: George Aiken

quotes.message: The failure of women to have reached positions of leadership has been due in large part to social and professional discrimination.
quotes.name: Rosalyn Sussman Yalow

quotes.message: Our global community has come a long way in helping to eliminate discrimination, but we still have far to go.
quotes.name: Robert Alan Silverstein

quotes.message: Sexual, racial, gender violence and other forms of discrimination and violence in a culture cannot be eliminated without changing culture.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bunch

quotes.message: All human beings bear God's image and must be respected for what each person is. Therefore, no external description of one's being, whether based on race, ethnicity, gender or sexual orientation, can properly be used as the basis for either rejection or discrimination.
quotes.name: Bishop John Shelby Spong

quotes.message: Of all treasons against humanity, there is no one worse than his who employs great intellectual force to keep down the intellect of his less favored brothers.
quotes.name: William Ellery Channing

quotes.message: DISCRIMINATE, v.i. To note the particulars in which one person or thing is, if possible, more objectionable than another.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: The sage embraces things. Ordinary men discriminate amongst them and parade their discriminations before others. So I say; those who discriminate, fail to see.
quotes.name: Zhuangzi

quotes.message: When calamity approaches, discrimination departs.
quotes.name: Sri Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.message: We cannot continue to sweep the problems of segregation and discrimination under the rug.
quotes.name: Thomas Sugrue

quotes.message: The ills of discrimination are still with us. We have to continue the tenacity and vigilance of the 1960s. Racial understanding is not something we find; it's something we create.
quotes.name: Thomas Cole

quotes.message: Like a pet fish unaware of the fishbowl it lives in, each of us inherently discriminates against young people without knowing it.
quotes.name: Adam Fletcher

quotes.message: Discrimination means keeping the negative and unhappy thoughts away and allowing the pretty thoughts to come inside you.
quotes.name: Frederick Lenz

quotes.message: Unfortunately, discrimination is alive and well. After 41 years of addressing it, we get over 80,000 complaints annually and over a million phone calls.
quotes.name: Cari M. Dominguez

quotes.message: We call upon all communities to be tolerant—to reject prejudice based on cast, creed, sect, religion or gender. To ensure freedom and equality for women so that they can flourish. We cannot all succeed when half of us are held back.
quotes.name: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.message: To those who are lesbian, gay, bisexual or transgender, let me say: You are not alone. Your struggle for an end to violence and discrimination is a shared struggle. Any attack on you is an attack on the universal values the United Nations and I have sworn to defend and uphold. Today, I stand with you, and I call upon all countries and people to stand with you, too.
quotes.name: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.message: The moment a little boy is concerned with which is a jay and which is a sparrow, he can no longer see the birds or hear them sing.
quotes.name: Eric Berne

quotes.message: The only difference between man and man all the world over is one of degree, and not of kind, even as there is between trees of the same species.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Equality is not the empirical claim that all groups of humans are interchangeable; it is the moral principle that individuals should not be judged or constrained by the average properties of their group.
quotes.name: Steven Pinker

quotes.message: The one thing that the racist can never manage is anything like discrimination: he is indiscriminate by definition.
quotes.name: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.message: If we are to fight discrimination and injustice against women we must start from the home for if a woman cannot be safe in her own house then she cannot be expected to feel safe anywhere.
quotes.name: Aysha Taryam

quotes.message: The way we imagine discrimination or disempowerment often is more complicated for people who are subjected to multiple forms of exclusion. The good news is that intersectionality provides us a way to see it.
quotes.name: Kimberle Williams Crenshaw

quotes.message: Discrimination must always be drawn out, like venom from the wound.
quotes.name: Sharon Needles

quotes.message: There are still traces of discrimination against race and gender, but it's a lot different than when I started out. It just comes quietly, slowly, sometimes so quietly that you don't realize it until you start looking back.
quotes.name: Eddie Bernice Johnson

quotes.message: White people, White men, need to be more outraged with the injustices of racism and discrimination than we are when someone is telling us that they don't like something that we are doing.
quotes.name: Matt McGorry

quotes.message: Sometimes, I feel discriminated against, but it does not make me angry. It merely astonishes me. How can any deny themselves the pleasure of my company? It's beyond me.
quotes.name: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.message: Can we see in each other a common humanity, a shared dignity, and recognize how our different experiences have shaped us?
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: Differences are not intended to separate, to alienate. We are different precisely in order to realize our need of one another.
quotes.name: Archbishop Desmond Tutu

quotes.message: What we need now more than ever is a human rights movement that challenges systemic racism in every single context.
quotes.name: Opal Tometi

quotes.message: Weakness is what brings ignorance, cheapness, racism, homophobia, cruelty, brutality, all these things that will keep a society chained to the ground, one foot nailed to the floor.
quotes.name: Henry Rollins

quotes.message: We'll have our rights; See if we don't; And you can't stop us from them; See if you can.
quotes.name: Sojourner Truth

quotes.message: Discrimination is a hellhound that gnaws at Negroes in every waking moment of their lives to remind them that the lie of their inferiority is accepted as truth in the society dominating them.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: There is no place for discrimination in the United States of America. And if there's anybody in the communities around this country that are being hurt by it, we have got to come together and do everything we can to see that it doesn't go on.
quotes.name: George H. W. Bush

quotes.message: Racial discrimination and racism are an insult to God.
quotes.name: George Sweeting

quotes.message: Why is it that men can be bastards and women must wear pearls and smile?
quotes.name: Lynn Hecht Schafran

quotes.message: White people now tan to get darker; and black people wear their hair like white people. We are all confused. Deep down we admire each other, but we don't accept it. The silly thing is that color of one's skin is simply evolution's answer for dealing with different rates of exposure to the sun.
quotes.name: Manasa Rao Saarloos

quotes.message: I always looked upon the acts of racist exclusion, or insult, as pitiable, for the other person. I never absorbed that. I always thought that there was something deficient about such people.
quotes.name: Toni Morrison

quotes.message: As I often say, we have come a long way from the days of slavery, but in 2014, discrimination and inequality still saturate our society in modern ways. Though racism may be less blatant now in many cases, its existence is undeniable.
quotes.name: Al Sharpton

quotes.message: Last time I was down South I walked into this restaurant, and this white waitress came up to me and said: 'We don't serve colored people here.' I said: 'that's all right, I don't eat colored people. Bring me a whole fried chicken.
quotes.name: Dick Gregory

quotes.message: Latinos come from different countries, and they tend to segregate with only their country instead of embracing all other countries, because in reality, all the Latinos are going through the same experiences of discrimination and racism.
quotes.name: Andrea Navedo

quotes.message: It is not our differences that divide us. It is our inability to recognize, accept, and celebrate those differences.
quotes.name: Audre Lorde

quotes.message: Yeah, I love being famous.
quotes.name: Chris Rock

quotes.message: Until the killing of black men, black mothers' sons, becomes as important as the killing of white men, white mothers' sons, we who believe in freedom cannot rest.
quotes.name: Ella J. Baker

quotes.message: I was thinking about all the honors that are showered on me in the theater, how everyone wishes to shake my hand or get an autograph, a real hero you'd naturally think. However, when I reach a hotel, I am refused permission to ride on the passenger elevator, I cannot enter the dining room for my meals, and am Jim Crowed generally... I know this to be an unbelievable custom.
quotes.name: Bert Williams

quotes.message: Discrimination and intolerance will eat you up and destroy whatever creativity was in you if you let it.
quotes.name: Gordon Parks

quotes.message: This is the essence of discrimination: formulating opinions about others not based on their individual merits, but rather on their membership in a group with assumed characteristics.
quotes.name: Joe Miller

quotes.message: We should not be held back from pursuing our full talents, from contributing what we could contribute to the society, because we fit into a certain mold- because we belong to a group that historically has been the object of discrimination.
quotes.name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quotes.message: One life lost is one life too many. That is why human rights experts around the world have recognized that gender-based violence is a form of discrimination.
quotes.name: Naomi Fontanes

quotes.message: The conviction that all men are equal by reason of their natural dignity has been generally accepted. Hence racial discrimination can no longer be justified.
quotes.name: Pope John XXIII

quotes.message: As negative thoughts produce negative actions, so positive thoughts produce positive actions.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Negative thoughts are the nails that build a prison of failure.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: Believing in negative thoughts is the single greatest obstruction to success.
quotes.name: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.message: The best way to dispel negative thoughts is to require that they have a purpose.
quotes.name: Robert Breault

quotes.message: The best way to overcome undesirable or negative thoughts and feelings is to cultivate the positive ones.
quotes.name: William Walker Atkinson

quotes.message: Do not allow negative thoughts to enter your mind for they are the weeds that strange confidence.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Do not let your negative thoughts have power over you because those thoughts will end up controlling your life. No one can live a positive life with a negative mind.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: If you realized how powerful your thoughts are, you would never think a negative thought.
quotes.name: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.message: There are more blessings in the book of your destiny than your negative thoughts and beliefs are suggesting.
quotes.name: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.message: A mind filled with negative thoughts makes you feel miserable and inadequate and will lead to failure after failure no matter how hard you try to succeed.
quotes.name: Steve Backley

quotes.message: Consider that not only do negative thoughts and emotions destroy our experience of peace, they also undermine our health.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Are you a hoarder of more negative thoughts or positive ones? Whichever ones you hoard, grow into trees and then forests.
quotes.name: John Assaraf

quotes.message: When you have walked through the hell of your negative thoughts and survived, no pain on this earth will ever again worry you.
quotes.name: Leon Brown

quotes.message: When you start comparing yourself to another man's mirror, that's when those negative thoughts start creeping in. My journey isn't anybody else's journey.
quotes.name: Arian Foster

quotes.message: When you close the door of your mind to negative thoughts, the door of opportunity opens to you.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: The only thing that can possibly keep you from going after your dreams is the person standing in your shoes, wearing your clothes, and thinking your negative thoughts.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: The ancestor of every destructive action, every destructive decision, is a negative thought.
quotes.name: Eknath Easwaran

quotes.message: Dwelling on negative thoughts is like fertilizing weeds.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Never waste energy on worries or negative thoughts, all problems are brought into existence -drop them.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Never think negatively, for the negative thinker does a very dangerous thing. He pumps out negative thoughts into the world around him and thus activates the world negatively.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: It was thinking negative thoughts or thinking positive thoughts, leaving the house prepared or leaving the house unprepared that made the difference.
quotes.name: Jack Canfield

quotes.message: We can lift ourselves, and others as well, when we refuse to remain in the realm of negative thought and cultivate within our hearts an attitude of gratitude.
quotes.name: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.message: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
quotes.name: Willie Nelson

quotes.message: Be a force of love as often as you can and turn away negative thoughts whenever you feel them surface.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Be vigilant; guard your mind against negative thoughts
quotes.name: Gautama Buddha

quotes.message: Learn to forgive others so that you can release yourself from being held captive by the very negative thoughts around you.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: Just the simple process of letting go of negative thoughts will allow your natural state of health to emerge within you.
quotes.name: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.message: When your own mind tells you to quit, you must ignore your negative thoughts and press on.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: The way to overcome negative thoughts and destructive emotions is to develop opposing, positive emotions that are stronger and more powerful.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: If you think of thoughts of success and back them up with hard work, then you will be a winner. If you cherish doubts, negative thoughts, then you won't be a winner at all.
quotes.name: Frederick Lenz

quotes.message: Positive minds produce positive lives. Negative minds produce negative lives. Positive thoughts are always full of faith and hope. Negative thoughts are always full of fear and doubt.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: Once you reach the top, take care as the only way left to go is down.
quotes.name: Darren Bateman

quotes.message: One man may be more cunning than another, but not more cunning than everybody else.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Pride is as loud a beggar as want, and a great deal more saucy. When you have bought one fine thing, you must buy ten more, that your appearance may be all of a piece; but it is easier to suppress the first desire than to satisfy all that follow it.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The devil wipes his breech with poor folks' pride.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The higher you climb, the heavier you fall.
quotes.name: Vietnamese

quotes.message: A proud man is always looking down on things and people; and, of course, as long as you are looking down, you cannot see something that is above you
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: Pride gets no pleasure out of having something, only out of having more of it than the next man... It is the comparison that makes you proud: the pleasure of being above the rest. Once the element of competition is gone, pride is gone.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: We are rarely proud when we are alone.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: The proud person always wants to do the right thing, the great thing. But because he wants to do it in his own strength, he is fighting not with man, but with God.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: Proud people breed sad sorrows for themselves.
quotes.name: Emily Bronte

quotes.message: God opposes the proud, but gives grace to the humble.
quotes.name: Holy Bible, James 4:6

quotes.message: Pride is pleasure arising from a man's thinking too highly of himself.
quotes.name: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.message: Through pride we are ever deceiving ourselves. But deep down below the surface of the average conscience a still, small voice says to us, something is out of tune.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: Never look down on anybody unless you are helping them up.
quotes.name: Jesse Jackson

quotes.message: Most of the trouble in the world is caused by people wanting to be important.
quotes.name: T. S. Eliot

quotes.message: Pride is a personal commitment. It is an attitude which separates excellence from mediocrity.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Airs of importance are the credentials of impotence.
quotes.name: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.message: Pride is the mask of one's own faults.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: In general, pride is at the bottom of all great mistakes.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: Pride helps us; and pride is not a bad thing when it only urges us to hide our own hurts, not to hurt others.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Pride must die in you, or nothing of heaven can live in you.
quotes.name: Andrew Murray

quotes.message: Pride makes us long for a solution to things - a solution, a purpose, a final cause; but the better telescopes become, the more stars appear.
quotes.name: Julian Barnes,Flaubert's Parrot

quotes.message: The proud wish God would agree with them. They are not interested in changing their opinions to agree with God's.
quotes.name: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.message: Pride is the mother of arrogance.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: He who imagines he can do without the world deceives himself much; but he who fancies the world cannot do without him is still more mistaken.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Pride gets no pleasure out of having something, only out of having more of it than the next man.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis quotes

quotes.message: It is more often from 'pride' than from ignorance that we are so obstinately opposed to current opinions; we find the first places taken, and we do not want to be the last.
quotes.name: Franois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: There is nothing that will kill a man so soon as having nobody to find fault with but himself.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: To know a man, observe how he wins his object, rather than how he loses it; for when we fail our pride supports us; when we succeed, it betrays us.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Coltoz

quotes.message: Pride goeth before destruction, and an haughty spirit before a fall.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: Pride sullies the noblest character.
quotes.name: Claudianus

quotes.message: In pride, in reasoning pride, our error lies; All quit their sphere and rush into the skies. Pride still is aiming at the bless'd abodes, Men would be angels, angels would be gods.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: Pride is an admission of weakness; it secretly fears all competition and dreads all rivals.
quotes.name: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.message: The infinitely little have a pride infinitely great.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Friends, show me a man who hates himself, and I'll show you a man who hates his neighbors more! He'd have to--you'd not grant anyone else something you can't have for yourself--no love, no kindness, no respect!
quotes.name: Mary Ann Shaffer

quotes.message: There are two kinds of pride, both good and bad. 'Good pride' represents our dignity and self-respect. 'Bad pride' is the deadly sin of superiority that reeks of conceit and arrogance.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Pride is an independent, me-oriented spirit. It makes people arrogant, rude and hard to get along with. When our heart is prideful, we don't give God the credit and we mistreat people, looking down on them and thinking we deserve what we have.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: When you are full of pride on the inside, it makes you stiff, stubborn, and creates strife with others.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: I have come to the conclusion that it's a waste of time to have too much pride in anything. Perhaps it's good to have a sense of duty, a jealous zeal to protect or improve, but pride ultimately is only that which stands vulnerable to offense and degradation.
quotes.name: Henry Rollins

quotes.message: Pride adversely affects all our relationships - our relationship with God and His servants, between husband and wife, parent and child, employer and employee, teacher and student, and all mankind.
quotes.name: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.message: He that is proud eats up himself. Pride is his own glass, his own trumpet, his own chronicle; and whatever praises itself but in the deed, devours the deed in the praise.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: A man's pride can be his downfall, and he needs to learn when to turn to others for support and guidance.
quotes.name: Bear Grylls

quotes.message: Pride slays thanksgiving, but a humble mind is the soil out of which thanks naturally grow. A proud man is seldom a grateful man, for he never thinks he gets as much as he deserves.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Pride deafens us to the advice or warnings of those around us.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Leaders who fail to prune their pride will meet demise. That's not a guess, it's a guarantee. With pride, it's not a matter of 'if' we will fall, but 'when.' There are no exceptions.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Pride is the chalice into which all human sins are poured: it glitters and jingles and its arabesque lures your gaze, while your lips involuntarily touch the seductive beverage.
quotes.name: Vladimir Odoevsky

quotes.message: Pride must be a summer thing, because it comes before the fall.
quotes.name: Jarod Kintz

quotes.message: One's self-satisfaction is an untaxed kind of property which it is very unpleasant to find deprecated.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Your ego decides the humanity in you - higher the ego lesser the humanity....
quotes.name: Adil Adam Memon

quotes.message: In wickedness of pride is lost the light to understand how little grace is earned and how much given.
quotes.name: Robert Hunter

quotes.message: As long as you set yourself up as a little god to which you must be loyal there will be those who will delight to offer affront to your idol.
quotes.name: A.W. Tozer

quotes.message: Essentially, pride is a 'my will' rather than 'thy will' approach to life.
quotes.name: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.message: When the serpent breathed the poison of his pride, the desire to be as God, into the hearts of our first parents, that they too fell from their high estate into all the wretchedness in which man is now sunk. In heaven and earth, pride, self-exaltation, is the gate and the birth, and the curse, of hell.
quotes.name: Andrew Murray

quotes.message: You can have pride in what you do each day, but not arrogance in what you were born with.
quotes.name: Amy Tan

quotes.message: We rise in glory as we sink in pride.
quotes.name: Andrew Young

quotes.message: Don't accept your dog's admiration as conclusive evidence that you are wonderful.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: Some people would rather die in their pride, than live in their humility.
quotes.name: Anthony Liccione

quotes.message: It was pride that changed angels into devils; it is humility that makes men as angels.
quotes.name: St. Augustine

quotes.message: Conceit is God’s gift to little men.
quotes.name: Bruce Barton

quotes.message: Pride is holding your head up when everyone around you has theirs bowed. Courage is what makes you do it.
quotes.name: Bryce Courtenay

quotes.message: It was through Pride that the devil became the devil: Pride leads to every other vice: it is the completely anti-God state of mind.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: We ought to be ashamed of our pride, but never proud of our shame.
quotes.name: Charles Mackay

quotes.message: Temper gets you into trouble. Pride keeps you there.
quotes.name: Charles Ofori Akrofi

quotes.message: I would always rather be happy than dignified.
quotes.name: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.message: There are two circumstances that lead to arrogance: one is when you're wrong and you can't face it; the other is when you're right and nobody else can face it.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Pride and power fall when the person falls, but discoveries of truth form legacies that can be built upon for generations.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: I have had more trouble with myself than with any other man.
quotes.name: D.L. Moody

quotes.message: When dealing with people, remember you are not dealing with creatures of emotion, but with creatures bristling with prejudice and motivated by pride and vanity.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Pride is concerned with who is right. Humility is concerned with what is right.
quotes.name: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.message: Better to die on your feet than live on your knees.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: The last time I saw him he was walking down lover's lane holding his own hand.
quotes.name: Fred Allen

quotes.message: It's a fine thing to rise above pride, but you must have pride in order to do so
quotes.name: Georges Bernanos

quotes.message: Vanity and pride are different things, though the words are often used synonymously. A person may be proud without being vain. Pride relates more to our opinion of ourselves, vanity, to what we would have others think of us.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: I could easily forgive his pride, if he had not mortified mine.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: Where there is a real superiority of mind, pride will be always under good regulation.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: I was given good principles, but left to follow them in pride and conceit.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: Pride is a devastating sin and is complex. Most sins turn us away from God, but pride directly attacks God. It lifts us above and against God, seeking to dethrone Him by enthroning ourselves.
quotes.name: Joel Beeke

quotes.message: It is better to lose your pride with someone you love rather than to lose that someone you love with your useless pride.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: Pride may be allowed to this or that degree, else a man cannot keep up his dignity.
quotes.name: John Selden

quotes.message: If a proud man makes me keep my distance, the comfort is that he keeps his at the same time.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: Let others pride themselves about how many pages they have written; I'd rather boast about the ones I've read.
quotes.name: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.message: Generosity is giving more than you can, and pride is taking less than you need.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: And I will break the pride of your strength and make your heavens like iron and your earth like bronze.
quotes.name: Leviticus 26:19

quotes.message: Don't pretend to be what you're not, instead, pretend to what you want to be, it is not pretence, it is a journey to self realization.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: A person is wise if he listens to millions of advice and doesn't implement any of it.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: I do not care so much what I am to others as I care what I am to myself.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: Whatever makes us feel superior to other people, whatever tempts us to convey a sense of superiority, that is the gravity of our sinful nature, not grace.
quotes.name: Philip Yancey

quotes.message: You have to learn how to stay in a good mood as you overthrow the sour, puckered hallucination that is mistakenly referred to as reality.

quotes.message: Good moods're as fragile as eggs. Bad moods're as fragile as bricks.

quotes.message: If we are in a good mood when we get up in the morning, if there is a warm-hearted feeling within, automatically our inner door is opened for that day.

quotes.message: Lay aside life-harming heaviness and entertain a cheerful disposition
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: I credit my youthfulness at eighty to the fact of a cheerful disposition and contentment in every period of my life with what I was.

quotes.message: There are some characters who carry their wealth with them, who are rich without money. They do not need palatial homes or a large bank account. They do not need to buy admission to society--everybody loves them. They are welcome everywhere because they have that which money cannot buy--a genial, helpful, sunny, cheerful disposition.
quotes.name: Nixon Waterman

quotes.message: You are welcome, therefore, Stranger, to join our cofraternity. But please observe the rules. Always display a cheerful disposition. Do not refer to our infirmities. Help us conquer the galaxy.
quotes.name: Thomas M. Disch

quotes.message: A cheerful disposition is good for your health; gloom and doom leave you bone-tired

quotes.message: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.

quotes.message: Everyone is in such a good mood when they've eaten well.
quotes.name: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.message: Well-meaning, helpful, good-natured attitudes of mind have not come to be honored on account of their usefulness, but because they are states of richer souls that are capable of bestowing and have their value in the feeling of the plenitude of life.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: The most important decision you make is to be in a good mood.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Smile, and the world will smile with you. Laugh and they'll all think your on drugs.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: The thing with pretending you're in a good mood is that sometimes you can.

quotes.message: When life is stressful, do something to lift your spirits. Go for a drive. Go two or three thousand miles away. Maybe change your name.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: When you're in a good mood, bring up the past. When you're in a bad mood, stick to the present. And when you're not feeling emotional at all, it's time to talk about the future.
quotes.name: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.message: Our happiness or our unhappiness depends far more on the way we meet the events of life than on the nature of those events themselves.
quotes.name: Wilhelm Von Humboldt

quotes.message: Be happy in the moment, that's enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: People in good moods are better at inductive reasoning and creative problem solving.
quotes.name: Peter Salovey

quotes.message: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: Love and focus keep you in a good mood. Forever on my mind.
quotes.name: Cam Boogie

quotes.message: I'm gonna put on my new shoes tonight I'm going to put on my good suit tonight, yeah I'm going to be in a good mood tonight 'cause the reggae music

quotes.message: I don't ever wanna quit 'Cause I never ever feel like shit Be another just to get food Force myself into a good mood

quotes.message: of feeling good I got the key to your good mood So come on you participate it's now the time to celebrate Par par party check up this beat Now boys
quotes.name: Jovanotti

quotes.message: Then, after thousands of years If I'm in a good mood I'll let you crawl out Crawl out from your cave
quotes.name: Dengue Fever

quotes.message: pair A Fendi bag and a bad attitude That's all I need to get me in a good mood She can walk with her switch and talk with street slang
quotes.name: LL Cool J

quotes.message: in a good mood You know a man's home is his castle And I'm comin' home to groove
quotes.name: Lou Rawls

quotes.message: like movie stars, set to flip The whole crowd's in a good groove, eatin the good food Soul food to keep you in a good mood
