quotes.message: I hit the floor suggest we move our feet. Good mood is painted on our fleeting best.
quotes.name: Phil Keaggy

quotes.message: When I'm outside in a real good mood You could almost forget bout all the other things Like a big old ominous cloud in my periphery Don't wanna talk about it Simultaneous I shout it
quotes.name: Kurt Vile

quotes.message: You're always peeking at the ladies with the Short dresses on you only want me in mine when We're alone I'm going out tonight I'm in a real Good Mood I need a change of space and a fresh Attitude I'm tired now I can't take it nomore
quotes.name: Shirley Murdock

quotes.message: So please don't feel blue - let us show you how To talk yourself into a good mood right now Feeling sad is no longer allowed No matter how worthless you are
quotes.name: The Divine Comedy

quotes.message: Hit the surf, it'll put me in a good mood If I - If I believe I can achieve Gotta be the best version of me that I can be So remember, when your thoughts are wild
quotes.name: Lee Fields

quotes.message: of circus city lights The surface smiling For all the good moods you can buy I know more shadows than people We call the night as our witness
quotes.name: Fetish Fetish

quotes.message: Some guys like to undermine a girl's self-esteem with little verbal jabs. Eventually it all adds up. One bee sting doesn't hurt a horse, but enough bee stings can kill a horse.
quotes.name: Oliver Gaspirtz

quotes.message: Verbal abuse is not a form on entertainment.
quotes.name: J. E. Brown

quotes.message: Screaming at children over their grades, especially to the point of the child's tears, is child abuse, pure and simple. It's not funny and it's not good parenting. It is a crushing, scarring, disastrous experience for the child. It isn't the least bit funny.
quotes.name: Ben Stein

quotes.message: Sticks and stones may break my bones, but your words they'll destroy me.

quotes.message: Bless people when they revile you. Think how much good they are doing by helping to stamp out the false ego.

quotes.message: By continually scolding someone, they in time become accustomed to it and despise your reproof.

quotes.message: Rash and incessant scolding runs into custom and renders itself despised.

quotes.message: The pleasure we feel in criticizing robs us from being moved by very beautiful things.

quotes.message: Vilify, Vilify, some of it will always stick.

quotes.message: There is nobody so weak of invention that he cannot make up some little stories to vilify his enemy.

quotes.message: The bitter clamour of two eager tongues.

quotes.message: They have vilified me, they have crucified me; yes, they have even criticized me.

quotes.message: Abusive language and swearing are a legacy of slavery, humiliation, and disrespect for human dignity, one's own and that of other people.

quotes.message: Let us consider that swearing is a sin of all others peculiarly clamorous, and provocative of Divine judgment.

quotes.message: The greater the power, the more dangerous the abuse.

quotes.message: Abuse of words has been the great instrument of sophistry and chicanery, of party, faction, and division of society.

quotes.message: I guess name-calling is your only attack; because you're too weak to challenge me any other way.

quotes.message: Any fool can criticize, condemn, and complain - and most fools do.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: For evil deeds may better than bad words be borne.

quotes.message: If verbal abuse had consequences, it would stop right now.

quotes.message: Your victory over verbal abuse is our victory over the cloud of confusion that shadows our planet.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse is an attempt to control you.

quotes.message: Those targeted by verbal abuse can become confused, adapted to the abuse, and brainwashed while their spirit and sense of self are croded.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse often seeks to injure the reputation of others using tactics such as backbiting, barbs, or belittling talk, and strategies as slander, slurs, and lies.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse injures the feelings of others with reviling, insulting, or contemptuous words.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse is always destructive.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse is the systematic, ongoing use of harmful words or a sharp tone in an attempt to control or dominate another person.

quotes.message: Ultimately, words move from being positive to being abusive when they hurt our hearts and harm our relationships.
quotes.name: June Hunt

quotes.message: Abuse wears many faces--faces as varied as the people who give it and receive it. But with all its differences, abuse is always either verbal or nonverbal in delivery, and it always deeply impacts your personal and social life.

quotes.message: Abuse does not emerge by a certain age, happen in a single socioeconomic group, present in a distinct way, or occur in a single setting.

quotes.message: Abuse should never happen to anyone. All types of abuse are horrific and affect people in all walks of life, regardless of age, educational background, gender, economic status, religion, or nationality.

quotes.message: Abuse can harm people physically and emotionally, as well as leave them feeling isolated and lonely. Abuse does not discriminate. It affects children, adults, and older people.
quotes.name: Sharon Stark

quotes.message: A more salient form of violence is verbal abuse, which often goes unreported but has lasting and psychologically damaging effects.
quotes.name: Sharon Stark

quotes.message: Verbal abuse leaves no visible scars; however, the emotional damage to the victim can be devastating.
quotes.name: Sharon Stark

quotes.message: Verbal abuse is a form of psychological or emotional maltreatment in which perpetrators use words to harm others.
quotes.name: A SAGE Reference Publication

quotes.message: Verbal abuse communicates a basic disrespect for another's personhood.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse is damaging to the spirit. It takes the joy and vitality out of life. It distorts reality because the abuser's response does not corelate with the partner's communication.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse causes emotional damage because of the victim's sense of rejection of their value as a person. May isolate a person from friendship by destroying the self-esteem needed for these relationships.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse is designed to humiliate, control, and cause self-doubt in the partner.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse corrupts the values and behaviors of the victim, degrades the victim by robbing the person of self-esteem and exploits the victim to the benefit of the abuser.

quotes.message: Indirect form of verbal and emotional abuse causes the other person to be confused, and lowers self-esteem.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse in families is defined as mistreatment between family members using words or language to convey personally negative and denigrating comments.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse of children is nonetheless seen as a powerfully negative influence on emotional development.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse is any verbal attack or ridicule of your mate, usually in an attempt to control or hurt. Constant nagging about something can be verbal abuse.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse is mean and unkind words.

quotes.message: Attacking another person's dignity is another form of verbal abuse.

quotes.message: Both men and women can be guilty of verbal abuse. Whatever the reason, verbal abuse is wrong and destructive.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse also is more difficult to treat because it is often so ego syntonic.

quotes.message: The subtle outbursts of anger displayed in emotional and verbal abuse can do just as much harm to a relationship over time.

quotes.message: I classify emotional and verbal abuse as the 'silent killer' that nobody sees.

quotes.message: Verbal abuse does not have to include yelling. One can be verbally abusive in a calm, soft tone.

quotes.message: It is almost as if their words become a verbal heel grinding down the self-esteem of the abused.

quotes.message: Emotional blackmail is one of the most powerful forms if manipulation.
quotes.name: Beverly Engel

quotes.message: If I had to choose between physical and verbal abuse, I'd take a beating anytime. You can see the marks, so at least people feel sorry for you. With the verbal stuff, it just make you crazy. The wounds are invisible. Nobody cares. Real bruises heal a lot faster than insults.

quotes.message: Such blatant verbal abuse can sear into a child's self-worth like a cattle brand, leaving deep psychological scars.

quotes.message: The impossible expectation that children be perfect is another common trigger of severe verbal attacks.
quotes.name: Susan Forward

quotes.message: Sometimes verbal abuse can hurt as bad as physical abuse.

quotes.message: For those who have never experience verbal abuse could never understand this feeling of anguish.

quotes.message: Self-centeredness is part of being abusive and disrespectful. The opposite is selflessness. Selflessness is a part of being non-abusive and respectful.
quotes.name: Jennie Dibartolomeo

quotes.message: Many verbally abusive relationships will never cross the physical abuse line, but don't be deceived; the absence of physical abuse does not make a verbally abusive relationship any less destructive or acceptable---verbal or emotional abuse is not okay.

quotes.message: In not putting a stop to verbal abuse may enable your relationship to escalate into a physical violence.

quotes.message: True liberty acknowledges and defends the equal rights of all men, and all nations.

Philosophy slowly, slowly has given us arguments saying, look, you already committed to your own life flourishing, and you're being inconsistent if you don't expand it. So philosophy often works in trying to show us that there's an inner incoherence in our points of view.

quotes.message: The demand for equal rights in every vocation of life is just and fair; but, after all, the most vital right is the right to love and to be loved. Indeed, if partial emancipation is to become a complete and true emancipation of woman, it will have to do away with the ridiculous notion that to be loved, to be sweetheart and mother, is synonymous with being slave or subordinate. It will have to do away with the absurd notion of the dualism of the sexes, or that man and woman represent two antagonistic worlds.

quotes.message: All men have equal rights, but not to equal things.

quotes.message: A Christian, a Deist, a Turk, and a Jew, have equal rights: they are men and brethren.

quotes.message: I believe everyone on this planet deserves equal rights to their own pursuit of happiness.

quotes.message: All men have equal rights to liberty, to their property, and to the protection of the laws.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Equality! Where is it, if not in education? Equal rights! They cannot exist without equality of instruction.

quotes.message: Equal rights and free discussion will be fearlessly advocated and maintained. Sectarian dogmas or tenets will be investigated and compared.

quotes.message: The demand for equal rights in every vocation of life is just and fair; but, after all, the most vital right is the right to love and be loved.
quotes.name: Emma Goldman

quotes.message: Progressive leaders always try to take action on the forward edge of that movement, movement toward greater respect for the equal rights of all.

quotes.message: There is way to turn negative thinking to positive thinking, it means seeing the positives and not focusing on the negatives.

quotes.message: Never say anything about yourself that you do not want to come true.

quotes.message: The best way to gain self-confidence is to do what you are afraid to do.

quotes.message: Focus on your potential instead of your limitations.

quotes.message: If you have a positive outlook in life, you will attract positive and passionate people.

quotes.message: Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.
quotes.name: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.message: Positive thinking is the key which unlocks the doors of the world.

quotes.message: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.

quotes.message: Positive thinking must be followed by positive doing.

quotes.message: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle, or the mirror that reflects it.

quotes.message: Always strive to aim for the highest peak of the goals in life you have set, this way if you manage to reach even half way toward a goal, landing in the middle is not such a bad place to end up.

quotes.message: Keep your spirits up. Good things will come to you and you will come to good things.

quotes.message: The positive thinker sees the invisible, feels the intangible and achieves the impossible.

quotes.message: Your circumstances may be uncongenial, but they shall not remain so if you only perceive an ideal and strive to reach it. You cannot travel within and stand still without.

quotes.message: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.

quotes.message: Whatever you think the world is withholding from you, you are withholding from the world.

quotes.message: When you think and say I can, confidence and happiness will fill your entire being.

quotes.message: Don't hang with negative people. They will pull you down with them. Instead, invite them into your light and together you will both shine strong.

quotes.message: Don't promote negativity online and expect people to treat you with positivity in person.

quotes.message: Don't be the slave of a negative character. Be the master of a positive character.

quotes.message: Positive thinking helps you stand back up again when you are knocked down by bad luck or negativity.

quotes.message: Think positively and masterfully, with confidence and faith, and life become more secure, more fraught with action, richer in experience and achievement.

quotes.message: Positive thinking creates ingenuity and originality. Negative thinking cripples imagination and creativity.

quotes.message: Where there is a will there is a way.

quotes.message: No one has the power to shatter your dreams unless you give it to them.
quotes.name: Maeve Greyson

quotes.message: Every cloud has a silver lining.
quotes.name: John Milton

quotes.message: Never give up. And never, under any circumstances, face the facts.
quotes.name: Ruth Gordon

quotes.message: Not knowing when the dawn will come, I open every door.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: When you blame others, you give up your power to change.
quotes.name: Robert Anthony

quotes.message: Never give up. You only get one life.
quotes.name: Richard E. Grant

quotes.message: The man who gives up accomplishes nothing and is only a hindrance. The man who does notgive up can move mountains.
quotes.name: Ernest Hello

quotes.message: Try and fail, but don't fail to try.
quotes.name: Stephen Kaggwa

quotes.message: Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they've got a second.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: Setbacks are temporary as long as you don't give up.
quotes.name: Kevin Ngo

quotes.message: I can't do it' never yet accomplished anything. 'I will try' has performed miracles.
quotes.name: George P. Burnham

quotes.message: I can't' isn't a reason to give up, it's a reason to try harder.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I felt so much better since I gave up hope.
quotes.name: Zen Comics

quotes.message: Wanna fly, you got to give up the shit that weighs you down.
quotes.name: Toni Morrison

quotes.message: The act of giving something up is painful. But as we negotiate the curves and corners of our lives, we must continually give up parts of ourselves. The only alternative is not to travel at all on the journey of life.
quotes.name: M. Scott Peck

quotes.message: You must want to fly so much that you are willing to give up being a caterpillar.

quotes.message: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.name: Thomas Edison

quotes.message: We can do anything we want to if we stick to it long enough.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: Don't give up. Keep going. There is always a chance that you stumble onto something terrific. I have never heard of anyone stumbling over anything while he was sitting down.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: Nothing stops the man who desires to achieve. Every obstacle is simply a course to develop his achievement muscle. It's a strengthening of his powers of accomplishment.
quotes.name: Eric Butterworth

quotes.message: The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.
quotes.name: Herbert Kaufman

quotes.message: Most people who succeed in the face of seemingly impossible conditions are people who simply don't know how to quit.
quotes.name: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.message: As long as I can stand it, God, I'll keep on keeping on.
quotes.name: Ray Charles

quotes.message: Self-discipline never means giving up anything, for giving up is a loss. Our Lord did not ask us to give up the things of earth, but to exchange them for better things.
quotes.name: Fulton John Sheen

quotes.message: Success is the inability to give up. Failure is giving up.
quotes.name: Nadia McInnis

quotes.message: You might feel like giving up on your dreams. Do not give up, there is an unexplainable joy waiting for you.
quotes.name: Nadia MacInnis

quotes.message: The habit of giving up when the present task is half-finished and trying something else is one of the chief causes of failure.
quotes.name: Christian D. Larson

quotes.message: It's not how hard you hit. It's how hard you get hit...and keep moving forward.
quotes.name: Randy Pausch

quotes.message: It is okay to fail as long as you keep trying.
quotes.name: Frankenweenie

quotes.message: Two little mice fell in a bucket of cream. The first mouse quickly gave up and drowned. The second mouse, wouldn't quit. He struggled so hard that eventually he churned that cream into butter and crawled out.
quotes.name: Catch Me If You Can

quotes.message: Relying on solitude is easy; giving up things to do is hard.
quotes.name: Adept Godrakpa

quotes.message: Waiting, and waiting ., After all, I am giving up, . To be free . From waiting . To start . A new journey of new hopes . And new dreams.
quotes.name: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.message: Give up trying to make me give up.
quotes.name: Masashi Kishimoto

quotes.message: Each mistake teaches you something new about yourself. There is no failure, remember, except in no longer trying. It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.name: Chis Bradford

quotes.message: When you know who matters most to you, giving things up, even yourself, doesn't really feel like a sacrifice.
quotes.name: Kiera Cass

quotes.message: Anyone can give up; it is the easiest thing in the world to do. But to hold it together when everyone would expect you to fall apart, now that is true strength.
quotes.name: Chris Bradford

quotes.message: How long should you try? Until.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Never give up on the fight until you win the belt.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Falling doesn't give you a reason to give up, as long as you believe.
quotes.name: Naruto Diaries

quotes.message: You just can't beat the person who just won't give up.
quotes.name: Babe Ruth

quotes.message: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: You do what you can for as long as you can, and when you finally can’t, you do the next best thing. You back up but you don't give up.
quotes.name: Chuck Yeager

quotes.message: Hard times may have held you down, but they will not last forever. When all is said and done, you will be increased.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Hard times are sometimes blessings in disguise. We do have to suffer but in the end it makes us strong, better and wise.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: And hard times are good in their own way, too. Because the only way you can achieve true happiness is if you experience true sadness as well. It's all about light and shade. Balance.

quotes.message: You may go through very difficult time. Where you feel like a failure but remember one thing, struggle and hard times are the most inspirational thing in the world.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: Difficult times don't come your way just so you can survive them; God uses these times in your life to form and refine you.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Every adversity, every failure, and every heartache, carries with it the seed of an equivalent or greater benefit.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.

quotes.message: Hard times build determination and inner strength. Through them we can also come to appreciate the uselessness of anger.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: You never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: The bravest sight in the world is to see a great man struggling against adversity.

quotes.message: If you are going through hell, keep going.

quotes.message: I have no regrets in my life. I think that everything happens to you for a reason. The hard times that you go through build character, making you a much stronger person.

quotes.message: Hard times arouse an instinctive desire for authenticity.

quotes.message: In the midst of these hard times it is our good health and good sleep that are enjoyable.

quotes.message: People need hard times and oppression to develop psychic muscles.

quotes.message: I like to use the hard times of the past to motivate me today.
quotes.name: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.message: Hard times make you bitter or make you more compassionate.
quotes.name: Jewel

quotes.message: Confidence, courage and determined spirit are vital for surviving hard times.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Only during hard times do people come to understand how difficult it is to be master of their feelings and thoughts.
quotes.name: Anton Pavlovich Chekhov

quotes.message: Difficult times always create opportunities for you to experience more love in your life.
quotes.name: Woody Allen

quotes.message: Tough times never last, but tough people do.

quotes.message: Difficult times have helped me to understand better than before, how infinitely rich and beautiful life is in every way, and that so many things that one goes worrying about are of no importance whatsoever.
quotes.name: Zahid Abas

quotes.message: Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: If you are being positive and strong in difficult times half of your problems will be solved automatically.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash

quotes.message: When things are bad, we take comfort in the thought that they could always get worse. And when they are, we find hope in the thought that things are so bad they have to get better.
quotes.name: Malcolm S. Forbes

quotes.message: Hard times sustain and strengthen others, inspiring them to strive toward personal growth.
quotes.name: Senora Roy

quotes.message: Going through challenging things can teach you a lot, and they also make you appreciate the times that aren't so challenging.
quotes.name: Carrie Fisher

quotes.message: Every struggle you had in your life shaped you into the person you are today. Be thankful for the hard times they can only make you stronger.
quotes.name: Anmol Andore

quotes.message: Hard times may have put you down sometimes but they will not last forever. When all is said and done, you will be wise and strong.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: No matter how hard it seems just keep going, don't quit because we only fail when we give up.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: Those who make hostility a daily manner are often left in the lurch at difficult times.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Bad times, hard times, this is what people keep saying; but let us live well, and times shall be good. We are the times: Such as we are, such are the times.

quotes.message: When you're already going through a rough patch of life; a slight wave from past thrash you down so gracefully that journey becomes an unending shore!
quotes.name: Monika Arora

quotes.message: Hard days are the best because that's when champions are made.

quotes.message: In my experience, people who don't stick around during the hard times weren't worth having around anyway.

quotes.message: One small crack does not mean you are broken, it means that you were put to the test and you didn't fall apart.

quotes.message: Pain is your friend; it is your alie. Pain reminds you to finish the job and get the hell home. Pain tells you when you have been seriously wounded.

quotes.message: You'll have bad times, but it'll always wake you up to the good stuff you weren't paying attention to.

quotes.message: There's a lot of people out there who go through hard times, and they feel alone. They feel like nobody is there. But I'm in the same boat.

quotes.message: When the going gets tough, the tough reinvent.

quotes.message: Hard times lifts the seeking souls to higher spiritual realms.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Hard Times Are Like a Washing Machine, They Twist, Turn and Knock Us Around, But In The End we Come Out Cleaner, Brighter and Better Than Before

quotes.message: Hard times always lead to something great.

quotes.message: Hard times are moments of reflection.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty

quotes.message: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to continually fear that you will make one.

quotes.message: Born through hard times, Ghetto child of mine. I wonder if you have to suffer for your father's crimes.

quotes.message: Why worry? If you've done the very best you can, worrying won't make it any better.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: In difficult times, it's so hard to look around and to see what to be grateful for.

quotes.message: Worrying does not empty tomorrow of its troubles, it empties today of its strength.

quotes.message: Life will always be hard on you, but it doesn't mean you should give up.
quotes.name: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.message: How do we handle unimaginable tragedy? What do we do when our worst nightmares come true? Instead of following conventional wisdom, Job fell down to the ground and worshiped ground.
quotes.name: Jeff Syverson

quotes.message: When life changes itself to harder. Change yourself to stronger.

quotes.message: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.

quotes.message: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.

quotes.message: In hard times, gold is a good friend and good friend is gold!

quotes.message: There are no hard times for good ideas.

quotes.message: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.

quotes.message: Write what you love. Love will hold you through the hard times and hold the world during the good times.

quotes.message: Endurance is not just the ability to bear a hard thing, but to turn it into glory.

quotes.message: The reason people find it so hard to be happy is that they always see the past better than it was, the present worse than it is, and the future less resolved than it will be

quotes.message: Even in hard times there's a possibility to have fun.

quotes.message: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.

quotes.message: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.

quotes.message: In the midst of winter, I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer.

quotes.message: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.

quotes.message: I walk slowly, but I never walk backward.

quotes.message: Stand Tall, Stand Proud. Know that you are unique and magnificent. You do not need the approval of others.

quotes.message: Always hold your head up, but be careful to keep your nose at a friendly level.

quotes.message: So keep your head high, keep your chin up, and most importantly, keep smiling, because life's a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.

quotes.message: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way. And don't pray when it rains if you don't pray when the sun shines.

quotes.message: Keep your head up. God gives his hardest battles to his strongest soldiers.

quotes.message: Keep your head up and be patient.

quotes.message: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith.

quotes.message: Rather hold my head high and die than live and duck.

quotes.message: Keep your head held high because the floor isn't very interesting to look at.

quotes.message: [Z-Ro] Cause everything's going to be alright

quotes.message: How do I deal with people who look down on me? I look up at them.

quotes.message: Keep your heads up! We are sinking!

quotes.message: I know it seems hard sometimes but remember one thing. Through every dark night, there's a bright day after that. So no matter how hard it get, stick your chest out, keep ya head up.... and handle it.

quotes.message: Above all, I would like to be remembered as a man who was selfless, who strove and worried so that others could share the glory, and who built up a family of people who could hold their heads up high and say 'We're Liverpool'.

quotes.message: God knows your value; He sees your potential. You may not understand everything you are going through right now. But hold your head up high, knowing that God is in control and he has a great plan and purpose for your life.

quotes.message: That's typically American. Keep out of trouble and tell other people to keep their chins up.

quotes.message: Come on, you know, chin up, chest out, and best foot forward

quotes.message: When you walk through a storm keep your chin up high and don't be afraid of the dark.

quotes.message: At the end of the storm is golden sky and the sweet silver song of a lark.

quotes.message: Off you pop, then, and keep your chin up.

quotes.message: Eyes bright, chins up, smiles on. I'm talking to you, Katniss.

quotes.message: You keep your chin up Gus Grimly. We're winning this thing. Don't you forget.

quotes.message: Anyway, chin up, love..
quotes.name: Terence Rattigan

quotes.message: Pack up your troubles in your old kit bag, and smile, smile, smile!

quotes.message: But, chin up. There's a medal in it for sure.

quotes.message: So chin up chum. You're a beautiful, beautiful human being, and the world is your sunshine.

quotes.message: Chin up, Chang. Believe in yourself and others will, too.

quotes.message: Chin up, Max. It's better to be sad than dead.

quotes.message: What, are you crying? You don't cry, all right? You keep your chin up. Come on, keep your chin up. Crying never helped anybody do anything, okay? You have a problem, you face it like a man.

quotes.message: So keep your chin up and look up high. You'll find your troubles will pass you by.

quotes.message: Chin up, chin up . Everybody loves a happy face . Wear it, share it . It'll brighten up the darkest place . Twinkle, sparkle . Let a little sunshine in . You'll be on the right side, looking at the bright side . Up with your chinny-chin-chin.

quotes.message: There's nothing more uncertain than the life of a man like me. You're so young and so beautiful, and you will be for a long time to come. Remember, no matter what happens, I want you to promise you'll keep your chin up.

quotes.message: I remember hurting her and her hurting me . I remember losing sleep, she was haunting my dreams . It's alright, chin up kid, it'll all be fine .

quotes.message: Life goes on, the ending's the starting line . Chin up, press on, you will survive . Young love that lasts is hard to find .

quotes.message: When you're going through your rough time . Maybe I could be your lifeline .
quotes.name: Felix Kurt Jaehn

quotes.message: Keeping your head up to the sky . Keeping your mind to stay alive . Gimme your wings so we can fly, . (fly away, fly away, fly away) .
quotes.name: Michael Jackson

quotes.message: It's summertime, lights fade away . It's wintertime, let's make it summer .
quotes.name: Eric Dan

quotes.message: It's gonna be alright . Keep your head up to the sky .
quotes.name: Joseph Wayne McVey

quotes.message: Keep your head up, because there's always tomorrow . Put the Lord first, be strong, you can't go wrong .

quotes.message: All praises due to the Most High (To the Most High) . To the Most High heed your prayer to the sky .

quotes.message: Sweet dreams are made of this . Who am I to disagree? . I've traveled the world and the seven seas . Everybody's looking for something . Hold your head up .

quotes.message: Hey, you might not see it with your eyes . But keep your head up to the sky . The sun is coming through .
quotes.name: Brittany Waddell

quotes.message: Rolling . Keep your head up, look to the sky . Rolling . Don't you ever ask yourself why . Rolling . We'll live forever, you and I .
quotes.name: Amy Wadge

quotes.message: We'll be there for eternity . I want you there yeah I want you there with me . Keep your head up he's coming some day to .
quotes.name: Benjamin Winans

quotes.message: If you been hurt, keep your head up, you'll find .
quotes.name: Kip Collins

quotes.message: You should never give it up never give it up never give it up . Learn to love yourself . That's why u got to keep it up got to keep it up got to keep it up .
quotes.name: Ayn Robbins

quotes.message: Don't let it get the best of you, you'll make it out alive . Oh, people like us we've gotta stick together . Keep your head up, nothing lasts forever . Here's to the lost and forgotten .

quotes.message: What do you do when it's too much for you . Chin up, chin up . You know these sticks and these stones cannot break my bones .

quotes.message: Encourage one another and you must keep that same encouragement yourself first, to encourage others, second keep your head up and count all joy in the worst of times.

quotes.message: Encourage others today! So often the difference between success and failure is belief.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: Weed and feed. Our minds are like a garden; each day you need to weed out the negativity and feed it positivity.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: You are more powerful than your circumstances. They don't define you. You do.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: The story you tell yourself defines the life you live and the actions you take. It's important to tell yourself a positive story.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: Regain your power, every word that leaves your mouth should breathe love.
quotes.name: Carolyn Odle

quotes.message: It is important to observe, question, interpret, and then empower yourself to make the choices with which you can live.
quotes.name: Harvey J. Coleman

quotes.message: We must also look into our feelings of grief and loss. When we accept that everything is constantly changing, when we accept the inevitability that people and animals die, we can deal with pain in a much better fashion.
quotes.name: Aaron Soltys

quotes.message: Embrace your grief and your sadness felt towards those that have passed and remember them with love.
quotes.name: Aaron Soltys

quotes.message: Replace your grief with love and appreciation. That is truly what any who have departed from our lives would wish for us.
quotes.name: Aaron Soltys

quotes.message: You associate with people who are kind, compassionate, and joyous. You keep good company, and you reflect these qualities yourself.
quotes.name: Miranda Kerr

quotes.message: I choose to be around people who uplift and support me and themselves.
quotes.name: Miranda Kerr

quotes.message: You value yourself, spiritually, mentally, and physically. You are a unique individual with so many talents and gifts.
quotes.name: Miranda Kerr

quotes.message: I am worthy of all the good in the world has to offer.
quotes.name: Miranda Kerr

quotes.message: As tides of life rise and fall, life is constant, like the waves crashing upon the shore. Persistence is the key in high and low times...
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: Encourage yourself, speak to yourself, and lift yourself right on up. Encourage yourself that change its here. Encourage yourself to continue to pursue.
quotes.name: Delene Williams

quotes.message: Encourage yourself to carry it out, to walk it out, to search it out, shout it out, and praise your way out to the change that's being presented with encouragement.
quotes.name: Delene Williams

quotes.message: They say that extroverts are unhappier than introverts and have to compensate for this by constantly proving to themselves how happy and contented and at ease with life they are.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Extroverts sparkle, introverts glow. Extroverts are fireworks, introverts are a fire in the hearth.
quotes.name: Sophia Dembling

quotes.message: Extroverts communicate well with others, Introverts communicate well with themselves.
quotes.name: Pablo

quotes.message: In an extroverted society, the difference between an introvert and an extrovert is that an introvert is often unconsciously deemed guilty until proven innocent.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Whoever you are, bear in mind that appearance is not reality. Some people act like extroverts, but the effort costs them energy, authenticity, and even physical health. Others seem aloof or self-contained, but their inner landscapes are rich and full of drama. So the next time you see a person with a composed face and a soft voice, remember that inside her mind she might be solving an equation, composing a sonnet, designing a hat. She might, that is, be deploying the powers of quiet.
quotes.name: Susan Cain

quotes.message: We're told that to be great is to be bold, to be happy is to be sociable. We see ourselves as a nation of extroverts which means that we've lost sight of who we really are. Depending on which study you consult, one-third to one half of Americans are introverts in other words one out of every two or three people you know.
quotes.name: Susan Cain

quotes.message: Extroverts are more responsive to high-intensity and 'happy' stimuli, which may be why an extrovert gets frustrated at the less 'readable' face of the introvert.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: We all move along the continuum of introvert and extrovert behaviors and preferences all day long.
quotes.name: Patricia Weber

quotes.message: Some findings reveal extroverts as more adept at reading nonverbal cues, and attribute this to the extrovert’s greater interest and experience with social interactions.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: Extroverts never understand introverts, and it was like that in school days. I read recently that all of us can be defined in adult life by the way others perceived us in high school.
quotes.name: Neil Peart

quotes.message: Extroverts may get places faster, but for introverts it's all about working at the pace you need and, at the end of the day, performing at your best.
quotes.name: Douglas Conant

quotes.message: If the extrovert is trying to 'cheer up' the introvert - extroverts are programmed to seek social rewards! - he or she may feel like a failure if the introvert remains unmoved.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: Either we are here to motivate others or to become an extrovert in our own world.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: For the extrovert, cause is from outside, he tries to achieve when he sees the things. While the introvert lives from inside, he feels something then he goes to find it or achieve it.
quotes.name: Chetan Patel

quotes.message: An extrovert is more likely to share immediate reactions and process information through conversation.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: We have this myth that extroverts are better salespeople. As a result, extroverts are more likely to enter sales; extroverts are more likely to get promoted in sales jobs. But if you look at the correlation between extroversion and actual sales performance - that is, how many times the cash register actually rings - the correlation's almost zero.
quotes.name: Daniel H. Pink

quotes.message: Being an extrovert isn’t essential to evangelism – obedience and love are.
quotes.name: Susan Cain

quotes.message: If the extrovert watches and listens a bit more, the introvert’s true mood will become more evident.
quotes.name: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.message: A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car; but if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Does college pay? They do if you are a good open-field runner.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: The primary purpose of a liberal education is to make one's mind a pleasant place in which to spend one's leisure.
quotes.name: Sydney J Harris

quotes.message: I have never let schooling interfere with my education.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: You can lead a boy to college, but you can't make him think.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Without education we are in a horrible and deadly danger of taking educated people seriously.
quotes.name: G.K Chesterton

quotes.message: Economists report that a college education adds many thousands of dollars to a man's lifetime income--which he then spends sending his son to college.
quotes.name: Bill Vaughan

quotes.message: The things taught in schools and colleges are not an education, but the means to an education.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: College is a refuge from hasty judgment.
quotes.name: Robert Lee Frost

quotes.message: I was thrown out of college for cheating on the metaphysics exam; I looked into the soul of the boy sitting next to me.
quotes.name: Woody Allen

quotes.message: Never get married in college; it's hard to get a start if a prospective employer finds you've already made one mistake.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Cauliflower is nothing but cabbage with a college education.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: I think everyone should go to college and get a degree and then spend six months as a bartender and six months as a cabdriver. Then they would really be educated.
quotes.name: Al McGuire

quotes.message: I am often amazed at how much more capability and enthusiasm for science there is among elementary school youngsters than among college students.
quotes.name: Carl Sagan

quotes.message: Going to college offered me the chance to play football for four more years.
quotes.name: Ronald Regan

quotes.message: Fathers, be good to your daughters. You are the god and the weight of her world.
quotes.name: Robert Orben

quotes.message: The greatest thing a father can do to his children is to love their mother.
quotes.name: Anjaneth Garcia Untalan

quotes.message: A father is a banker provided by nature.
quotes.name: French Proverb

quotes.message: His heritage to his children wasn't words or possessions, but an unspoken treasure, the treasure of his example as a man and a father.
quotes.name: Will Rogers Jr.

quotes.message: Noble fathers have noble children.
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: My father didn't tell me how to live; he lived,and let me watch him do it.
quotes.name: Clarence Kellard

quotes.message: He adopted a role called 'being a father' so that his child would have something mythical and infinitely important: a protector.
quotes.name: Tom Wolfe

quotes.message: When my father didn't have my hand, he had my back.
quotes.name: Linda Poindexter

quotes.message: A father is neither an anchor to hold us back, nor a sail to take us there, but a guiding light whose love shows us the way.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: The gift of a Father cannot been seen by our eyes, yet he sacrificed his every breath,sweat and everything to comfort us, his family.
quotes.name: King Tony S. Singh

quotes.message: Becoming a father is easy enough, but being one can be very rough.
quotes.name: Wilhelm Busch

quotes.message: A Father is someone you look up to no matter how tall you grow.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: A father is a man who fails every day.
quotes.name: Michael Chabon

quotes.message: A father's tears and fears are unseen, his love is unexpressed, but his care and protection remains as a pillar of strength throughout our lives.
quotes.name: Ama H. Vanniarachchy

quotes.message: It doesn't matter who my father was; it matters who I remember he was.
quotes.name: Anne Sexton

quotes.message: When you're young, you think your dad is Superman. Then you grow up, and you realize he's just a regular guy who wears a cape.
quotes.name: Dave Atell

quotes.message: It is a wise father that knows his own child.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: It is easier for a father to have children than for children to have a real father.
quotes.name: Pope John XXIII

quotes.message: No one in this world can love a girl more than her father.
quotes.name: Michael Ratnadeepak

quotes.message: Dads are most ordinary men turned by love into heroes, adventurers, story-tellers, singers of songs.
quotes.name: Pam Brown

quotes.message: My Father used to say that it's never too late to do anything you wanted to do. And he said, you never know what you can accomplish until you try.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: Every father should remember that one day his son will follow his example instead of his advice.
quotes.name: Charles F Kettering

quotes.message: A king, realizing his incompetence, can either delegate or abdicate his duties. A father can do neither. If only sons could see the paradox, they would understand the delimma.
quotes.name: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.message: One father is enough to govern one hundred sons, but not a hundred sons one father.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: One father is more than a hundred schoolmasters.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: Fatherhood is the best thing that could happen to me, and I'm just glad  I can share my voice.
quotes.name: Dwayne Wade

quotes.message: To her, the name of father was another name for love.
quotes.name: Fanny Fern

quotes.message: It is not flesh and blood but the heart which makes us fathers and sons.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: I believe that what we become depends on what our fathers teach us at odd moments, when they aren't trying to teach us. We are formed by the little scraps of wisdom.
quotes.name: Umberto Eco

quotes.message: Blessed indeed is the man who hears many gentle voices call him father.
quotes.name: Lydia M. Child

quotes.message: Any man can be a father, but it takes someone special to be a dad.
quotes.name: Anne Geddes

quotes.message: Lucky that man whose children make his happiness in life and not his grief, the anguished disappointment of his hopes.
quotes.name: Euripedes

quotes.message: A father is someone who can take the place of all others, but whose place no one else can take.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It is a wise father that knows his own child.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Fathers, like mothers, are not born. Men grow into fathers and fathering is a very important stage in their development.
quotes.name: David M. Gottesman

quotes.message: Dad, I may not be the best, but I come to believe that I got it in me to be somebody in this world. And it's not because I'm so different from you either. It's because I'm the same. I mean, I can be just as hard-headed, and just as tough. I only hope I can be as good a man as you.
quotes.name: Jake Gyllenhaal

quotes.message: The father who does not teach his son his duties is equally guilty as the son who neglects them.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Anyone can be a father, but it takes someone special to be a dad, and that's why I call you dad, because you are so special to me. You taught me the game and you taught me how to play it right.
quotes.name: Wade Boggs

quotes.message: To be as good as our fathers we must be better, imitation is not discipleship.
quotes.name: Wendell Phillips

quotes.message: I am not ashamed to say that no man I ever met was my father's equal, and I never loved any other man as much.
quotes.name: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.message: I've had a hard life, but my hardships are nothing against the hardships that my father went through in order to get me to where I started.
quotes.name: Bartrand Hubbard

quotes.message: My dad, like any coach, has always stressed the fundamentals. He taught me responsibility, accountability, and the importance of hard work.
quotes.name: Steve Young

quotes.message: The quality of a father can be seen in the goals, dreams and aspirations he sets not only for himself, but for his family.
quotes.name: Reed Markham

quotes.message: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: The nature of impending fatherhood is that you are doing something that you're unqualified to do, and then you become qualified while doing it.
quotes.name: John Green

quotes.message: The imprint of the father, remains forever on the life of the child.
quotes.name: Roy Lessin

quotes.message: My father taught me that the only way you can make good at anything is to practice, and then practice some more.
quotes.name: Pete Rose

quotes.message: A good father is one of the most unsung, unpraised, unnoticed, and yet one of the most valuable assets in our society.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: I can definitely say the older I've got the better I've become at being a dad and a husband.
quotes.name: Rod Stewart

quotes.message: Alcoholism and drug addiction are killer of mental and physical health. Alcoholic and drug addicts are killing themselves slowly.
quotes.name: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.message: Psychedelic drugs are the false friend of the human mind, and a hidden killer of the drug addicts.
quotes.name: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.message: Drug addiction reduces a man to a mindless and ridiculous thing, and creates social parasites and criminals.
quotes.name: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.message: The drug addict loses the sense of dignity, responsibility, self- esteem and self- respect, and he forgets how to live like a human being.
quotes.name: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.message: Reality is just a crutch for people who can't handle drugs.
quotes.name: Robin McLaurin Williams

quotes.message: I was, I am and I always will be a drug addict. A person who gets involved in drugs has to fight it everyday.
quotes.name: Diego Maradona

quotes.message: The greatest mistake in life is to get addicted to drugs becoming a prisoner of ecstasy and hallucination, and less of a man.
quotes.name: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.message: Drugs are a waste of time. They destroy your memory and your self-respect and everything that goes along with with your self esteem.
quotes.name: Kurt Cobain

quotes.message: Drug addiction is a self- punishing disease that ruins mental, psychological and physical health.
quotes.name: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.message: Drugs have taught an entire generation of American kids the metric system.
quotes.name: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: The drug addict does not care about what is important or worthwhile in life, such as family, career, finance, and social relationship.
quotes.name: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.message: People try drugs out of curiosity, to have a good time, to improve athletic performance, or to escape from stress, anxiety or depression, but all drug addicts are willful victims themselves.
quotes.name: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.message: Sometimes becoming drug free has less to do with addiction and more to do with sanity.
quotes.name: Shane Koyczan

quotes.message: But I will say that the drugs are much more ferocious then they used to be. There are people wrecking their lives with addiction, which seems much more severe.
quotes.name: Armistead Maupin

quotes.message: Human beings would be better and more respectable if drug addicts had not been born.
quotes.name: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.message: I much prefer to be high on life than in it.
quotes.name: Joshua Michael Levinson

quotes.message: The drug addict is his own enemy slowly killing himself using drugs as a weapon.
quotes.name: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.message: Drugs are merely the most obvious form of addiction in our society. Drug addiction is one of the things that undermines traditional values.
quotes.name: Christopher Lasch

quotes.message: Don't do drugs because if you do drugs you'll go to prison, and drugs are really expensive in prison.
quotes.name: John Hardwick

quotes.message: Every ship that comes to America got its chart from Columbus.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: One does not discover new lands without consenting to lose sight of the shore for a very long time.
quotes.name: Andre Gide

quotes.message: Columbus found a world, and had no chart, Save one that faith deciphered in the skies.
quotes.name: George Santayana

quotes.message: Columbus went around the world in 1492. That isn't a lot of strokes when you consider the course.
quotes.name: Lee Trevino

quotes.message: Self-doubt is the greatest enemy of any new good habit.
quotes.name: Victoria Moran

quotes.message: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.name: Suzy Kassem

quotes.message: If you hear a voice within you say you cannot paint, then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
quotes.name: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.message: Acting as if you were what you want to become and know you can become is the way to remove self-doubt and enter your real-magic kingdom.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: Because of self-doubt, the fear of failure, or laziness, most people usually bite off way less than they can chew.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: Do not doubt thyself, have faith in thy soul.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: So often we quit on the first failure. We must persistent long enough to achieve success.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Self-doubt inflicts the deepest wounds.
quotes.name: Marty Rubin

quotes.message: Don't regret the past or fear the future. Both bring misery through self-doubt.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: Most haters are stuck in a poisonous mental prison of jealousy and self-doubt that blinds them to their own potentiality.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Never allow opinions of others to disturb your inner tranquillity.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: A total absence of self-doubt is the first sign of insanity.
quotes.name: Sandy Woodward

quotes.message: May you find grace to overcome self-doubt.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: I'm not a perfectionist by a long shot, but self-doubt is a large part of my creative process.
quotes.name: Keith Fullerton Whitman

quotes.message: I seek strength, not to be greater than other, but to fight my greatest enemy, the doubts within myself.
quotes.name: P.C. Cast

quotes.message: Believe in yourself, your abilities and your own potential. Never let self-doubt hold you captive. You are worthy of all that you dream of and hope for.
quotes.name: Roy Bennett

quotes.message: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Other people's opinion of you does not have to become your reality.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease for ever to be able to do it.
quotes.name: James M. Barrie

quotes.message: Who hasn't asked himself, am I a monster or is this what it means to be human?
quotes.name: Clarice Lispector

quotes.message: No matter how challenging things get, never stop believing in yourself. Self-doubt is nothing but a highway to failure.
quotes.name: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.message: A person's greatest limitations are not genetic, but imposed by self-doubt, insecurities, indecision, and timidity.
quotes.name: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.message: n a society that profits from your self doubt liking yourself is a rebellious act.
quotes.name: Rachel Brathen

quotes.message: Erase self-doubt by working to build your strengths instead of focusing on your weaknesses.
quotes.name: Rodolfo Costa

quotes.message: By fully experiencing and going beyond an emotional block, through the layers of doubt and fear, you experience the emotion of who you truly are.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: Self-doubt imprisons those that never overcome it.
quotes.name: Obiora Embry

quotes.message: You do not need to pay attention to those voices within you that create pain, or make you feel less competent, smart or able.
quotes.name: Sanaya Roman

quotes.message: Our doubts are traitors, and make us lose the good we oft might win, by fearing to attempt.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Ignore self â€“doubt and inner conflict. Dwell on positive thoughts.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Self-doubt is real. Everyone has it. Having confidence and losing confidence is real, too, and everyone has been in that position.
quotes.name: Venus Williams

quotes.message: Your dream doesn’t have an expiration date. Take a deep breath and try again.
quotes.name: K.T. Witten

quotes.message: The inner speech, your thoughts, can cause you to be rich or poor, loved or unloved, happy or unhappy, attractive or unattractive, powerful or weak.
quotes.name: Ralph Charell

quotes.message: Confidence is preparation. Everything else is beyond your control.
quotes.name: Richard Kline

quotes.message: Fame is hollow. It amplifies what is there. If there is any self-doubt, or hatred, or lack of ability to connect with people, fame will magnify it.
quotes.name: Alanis Morissette

quotes.message: For most entertainers, there is a single experience, one defining moment, when confidence replaces the self-doubt that most of us wrestle with.
quotes.name: Charley Pride

quotes.message: Friends ask you questions enemies question you.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: With realization of one’s own potential and self-confidence in one’s ability, one can build a better world.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: However you arrive at the ability to ignore self-doubt if you can acquire it or possess it or find it or discover it move beyond self-doubt.
quotes.name: Dwight Yoakam

quotes.message: If, because of anxiety and self-doubt, you procrastinate and only think about working, you'll feel more exhausted than if you'd created for hours.
quotes.name: Eric Maisel

quotes.message: Doubt is an illness that comes from knowledge and leads to madness.
quotes.name: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.message: It’s not who you are that holds you back, it’s who you think you’re not.
quotes.name: Hanoch McCarty

quotes.message: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Don’t let others put thoughts into your mind that takes away your self-confidence.
quotes.name: Katori Hall

quotes.message: Self-doubt is a self-fulfilling prophecy.
quotes.name: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.message: Courage doesn’t always roar. Sometimes courage is the little voice at the end of the day that says I’ll try again tomorrow.
quotes.name: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.message: Once you become self conscious, there is no end to it once you start to doubt, there is no room for anything else.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: The worst thing about that kind of prejudice is that while you feel hurt and angry and all the rest of it, it feeds you self doubt. You start thinking, perhaps I am not good enough.
quotes.name: Nina Simone

quotes.message: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities. Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: You can either waltz boldly onto the stage of life and live the way you know your spirit is nudging you to, or you can sit quietly by the wall, receding into the shadows of fear and self doubt.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Any work looks wonderful to me except the one which I can do.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: The greater the artist, the greater the doubt perfect confidence is granted to the less talented as a consolation prize.
quotes.name: Robert Hughes

quotes.message: The egotist is all surface underneath is a pulpy mess and a lot of self doubt. But the egoist may be yielding and even deferential in things he doesn't consider important; in anything that touches his core, he is remorseless.
quotes.name: Robertson Davies

quotes.message: Our biggest enemy is our own self-doubt. We really can achieve extraordinary things in our lives. But we sabotage our greatness because of our fear.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: Clear communication between selves the surface self and the deep self is the enemy of self-doubt. It slays confusion.
quotes.name: Stephen King

quotes.message: I don't believe anyone ever suspects how completely unsure I am of my work and myself and what tortures of self-doubting the doubt of others has always given me.
quotes.name: Tennessee Williams

quotes.message: Each time we face our fear, we gain strength, courage, and confidence in the doing.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Healing takes courage, and we all have courage, even if we have to dig a little to find it.
quotes.name: Tori Amos

quotes.message: Eventually you will come to understand that love heals everything, and love is all there is.
quotes.name: Gary Zukav

quotes.message: Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity.
quotes.name: Hippocrates

quotes.message: Healing does not mean going back to the way things were before, but rather allowing what is now to move us closer to God.
quotes.name: Ram Dass

quotes.message: Healing may not be so much about getting better, as about letting go of everything that isn't you - all of the expectations, all of the beliefs - and becoming who you are.
quotes.name: Rachel Naomi Remen

quotes.message: Healing yourself is connected with healing others.
quotes.name: Yoko Ono

quotes.message: Humor is healing.
quotes.name: Brad Garrett

quotes.message: The words of kindness are more healing to a drooping heart than balm or honey.
quotes.name: Sarah Fielding

quotes.message: I've experienced several different healing methodologies over the years - counseling, self-help seminars, and I've read a lot - but none of them will work unless you really want to heal.
quotes.name: Lindsay Wagner

quotes.message: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
quotes.name: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.message: Healing is simply attempting to do more of those things that bring joy and fewer of those things that bring pain.
quotes.name: O. Carl Simonton

quotes.message: Healing is impossible in loneliness; it is the opposite of loneliness. Conviviality is healing. To be healed we must come with all the other creatures to the feast of Creation.
quotes.name: Wendell Berry

quotes.message: The main reason for healing is love.
quotes.name: Paracelsus

quotes.message: Healing is embracing what is most feared; healing is opening what has been closed, softening what has hardened into obstruction, healing is learning to trust life.
quotes.name: Jeanne Achterberg

quotes.message: The greatest barrier to own own healing is not the pain, sorrow or violence inflicted upon us as children. Our greatest hindrance is our ongoing capacity to judge, to criticize, and to bring tremendous harm to ourselves. If we can harden our heart against ourselves and meet our most tender feelings with anger and condemnation, we simultaneously armor our heart against the possibility of gentleness, love and healing.
quotes.name: Wayne Muller

quotes.message: Healing requires from us to stop struggling, but to enjoy life more and endure it less.
quotes.name: Darina Stoyanova

quotes.message: Healing takes time. Despite great advances in medicine, the biggest part of your recovery is attributable to the enormous healing power inside you. The body heals itself according to its own timetable--anxious thoughts never hasten recuperation.
quotes.name: Criswell Freeman

quotes.message: Healing is the journey. The destination is yourself. The full recognition of all the different aspects of yourself-your joy, your sorrow, your pain, your pleasure-all lead you to the source of who you are. Only by having intimate contact with this source can you experience the fullness of your life. Only by fearlessly looking within can you embrace the landscape of your life and open yourself completely to all the love and compassion that lives inside you.
quotes.name: Philip Berk

quotes.message: Healing is the application of love.
quotes.name: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.message: It has been said that time heals all wounds. The truth is that time does not heal anything. It merely passes. it is what we do during the passing of time that helps or hinders the healing process.
quotes.name: Jay Marshall

quotes.message: By far the strongest poison to the human spirit is the inability to forgive oneself or another person. Forgiveness is no longer an option but a necessity for healing.
quotes.name: Caroline Myss

quotes.message: Healing doesn't mean the damage never existed. It means the damage no longer controls our lives.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Healing is an inside job.
quotes.name: Dr. B.J. Palmer

quotes.message: Before healing others, Heal yourself.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Emotional healing is almost always a process. It takes time. There is a very important reason for this. Our heavenly Father is not only wanting to free us from the pain of past wounds, he is also desirous of bringing us into maturity, both spiritually and emotionally. That takes time, because we need time to learn to make the right choices. He loves us enough to take the months and years necessary to not only heal our wounds, but also build our character. Without growth of character we will get wounded again.
quotes.name: Floyd McClung

quotes.message: Healing has to occur on three planes: Mental (thinking), Emotional (feeling) & Physical (outcome).
quotes.name: Rev. Reggie Howard

quotes.message: Any illness is a direct message to you that tells you how you have not been loving who you are, cherishing yourself in order to be who you are. This is the basis of all healing.
quotes.name: Barbara Brennan

quotes.message: Of one thing I am certain, the body is not the measure of healing, peace is the measure.
quotes.name: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.message: Love is the most important healing power there is.
quotes.name: Louise Hay

quotes.message: Healing is taking place all the time, and we know it is God who is doing the work.
quotes.name: Malinda Cramer

quotes.message: Healing begins in the moment a life-enhancing thought (an affirmation) is chosen to replace a life-diminishing thought, no matter how you may be feeling... no matter how much energy is moving or not moving in the body.
quotes.name: Binnie A. Dansby

quotes.message: Healing is about transforming the consciousness, creating a resonance within a person so that the healing can reach them.
quotes.name: HA-Tony Neate

quotes.message: A joyful heart is good for healing, a depressed spirit dries the bones.
quotes.name: PROVERBS

quotes.message: Healing proceeds from the depths to the heights.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: Healing begins with intention.
quotes.name: Dr. Jacqueline Fields

quotes.message: Healing is a choice. It's not an easy one, because it takes work to turn around your habits, but keep making the choice and shifts will happen.
quotes.name: Yehuda Berg

quotes.message: One of the most healing things you can do is recognize where in your life you are your own poison.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: One's attitude towards oneself is the single most important factor in healing and staying well.
quotes.name: Dr. Bernie Siegel

quotes.message: The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: As soon as healing takes place, go out and heal somebody else.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Other people are going to find healing in your wounds. Your greatest life messages and your most effective ministry will come out of your deepest hurts.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: Healing invokes the power of compassion, both for yourself and for others... At this point, the healed may become a healer.
quotes.name: David Hawkins

quotes.message: Dancing, singing, storytelling and silence are the four universal healing salves.
quotes.name: Gabrielle Roth

quotes.message: Healing is a journey. It involves stepping out of our habitual roles, our conventional scripts, and improvising a dancing path.
quotes.name: Gabrielle Roth

quotes.message: With the gift of listening comes the gift of healing.
quotes.name: Catherine de Hueck Doherty

quotes.message: Healing happens when you sleep.
quotes.name: Mary Rabyor

quotes.message: The more you've suffered, the more you've wanted to bring healing to others.
quotes.name: Ralph Edwards

quotes.message: To experience some healing within yourself, and to contribute healing to the world, you are summoned to wade through the muck from time to time.
quotes.name: James Hollis

quotes.message: The body is a self-healing organism, so it's really about clearing things out of the way so the body can heal itself.
quotes.name: Barbara Brennan

quotes.message: In fact, if you look at the word 'healing' it comes from the word 'holy.' And healing is more than just physical phenomenon.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: We heal in a variety of ways: by accepting, believing, changing, connecting, coping, creating, forgiving, laughing, living, persisting, and transcending.
quotes.name: Jena Pincott

quotes.message: People go through challenging moments of losing people and of having their life threatened from illness and real grief. But they get through it. And that's the testament to the human spirit— we are fragile, but we also are divine.
quotes.name: Sheryl Crow

quotes.message: The wish for healing has always been half of health.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: My faith really has played a huge role in healing. And I don't know how people deal with the loss of a loved one or a child without faith. It hasn't been easy.
quotes.name: John Ramsey

quotes.message: Deep unspeakable suffering may well be called a baptism, a regeneration, the initiation into a new state.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: The comfort of knowing you're not alone is in itself remarkably healing.
quotes.name: Jena Pincott

quotes.message: It is true that one can temporarily feel good by blaming one's misfortunes on others, but this always ends up causing greater pain and confusion. Accepting without blame is the true turning point of healing.
quotes.name: Tulk Thondup

quotes.message: Your medicine is in you, and you do not observe it. Your ailment is from yourself, and you do not register it.
quotes.name: Hazrat Ali

quotes.message: True medicine only arises from the creative knowledge of the last and deeper powers of the whole universe; only he who grasps the innermost nature of man can cure him in earnest.
quotes.name: Paracelsus

quotes.message: Healing without medicine is a good thing.
quotes.name: Madagascan Saying

quotes.message: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.
quotes.name: Franklin

quotes.message: Healing comes only from that which leads the patient beyond himself and beyond his entanglements with ego.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: The cure for anything is saltwater— sweat, tears, or the sea.
quotes.name: Isak Dinesen

quotes.message: Much of the pain is self-chosen. It is the bitter potion by which the physician within you heals your sick self.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: Fortunately, analysis is not the only way to resolve inner conflicts. Life itself remains a very effective therapist.
quotes.name: Karen Horney

quotes.message: We doctors do nothing. We only help and encourage the doctor within...We are at best when we give the doctor who resides within each patient a chance to go to work.
quotes.name: Schweitzer

quotes.message: Love cures people—both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
quotes.name: Karl Menninger

quotes.message: Different taste in jokes is a great strain on the affections.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: It's hard to enjoy practical jokes when your whole life feels like one.
quotes.name: Rick Riordan

quotes.message: The best jokes are dangerous, and dangerous because they are in some way truthful.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: God's jokes are the soul's curriculum.
quotes.name: John Perry Barlow

quotes.message: Jokes are very curious things psychologically.
quotes.name: James Callis

quotes.message: For every ten jokes you acquire a hundred enemies.
quotes.name: Laurence Sterne

quotes.message: You shouldn’t make jokes if it makes you so unhappy.
quotes.name: Lewis Carroll

quotes.message: The shortest distance between two jokes makes a perfect speech.
quotes.name: Orlando Aloysius Battista

quotes.message: The inside jokes weren't jokes anymore. They had become stories.
quotes.name: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.message: Jokes are generally honest. Complete solemnity is always dishonest.
quotes.name: Gilbert K Chesterton

quotes.message: The best ideas come as jokes. Make your thinking as funny as possible.
quotes.name: David M. Ogilvy

quotes.message: Jokes have to be quite naked to be understood. They have to be quite simple.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: Even the people who do great jokes, its always coming out of a very real place.
quotes.name: Brett Gelman

quotes.message: Life likes jokes; life is constantly making jokes, even at the most inopportune moments.
quotes.name: Elizabeth McCracken

quotes.message: Family jokes, though rightly cursed by strangers, are the bond that keeps most families alive.
quotes.name: Stella Benson

quotes.message: The funniest jokes you know aren't from comics but relatives, friends - from your life. That's the funniest stuff.
quotes.name: Dick Gregory

quotes.message: Everyone just wants to hear the exact jokes that apply to them and want to - everyone wants a perfectly crafted joke for them.
quotes.name: Brad Williams

quotes.message: You can write jokes at any point of the day. Jokes are not that hard to write, or they shouldn't be when it is literally your job.
quotes.name: John Oliver

quotes.message: Wit is a weapon. Jokes are a masculine way of inflicting superiority. But humor is the pursuit of a gentle grin, usually in solitude.
quotes.name: Frank Muir

quotes.message: Writing your own jokes, you just kind of keep working on something until you think it might work, and then you try it out and hope for the best.
quotes.name: Aziz Ansari

quotes.message: Jokes of the proper kind, properly told, can do more to enlighten questions of politics, philosophy, and literature than any number of dull arguments.
quotes.name: Isaac Asimov

quotes.message: The best jokes resonate because they uncover ridiculousness in our daily lives, reveal the silliness - and sometimes sadness - of things we see every day.
quotes.name: Rachel Sklar

quotes.message: Jokes are ideally pleasurable. They are an act of assassination without a corpse, a moment of total annihilation that paradoxically makes anything possible.
quotes.name: Penelope Gilliatt

quotes.message: Jokes are better than war. Even the most aggressive jokes are better than the least aggressive wars. Even the longest jokes are better than the shortest wars.
quotes.name: George Mikes

quotes.message: A lot of the jokes had some build-up to some nasty stuff. But most of it was all character situations leading to what the ultimate payoff would be for that character.
quotes.name: Shawn Wayans

quotes.message: Real racist jokes or sexist jokes aren't funny - not because they're offensive, but because they're not true. As soon as a joke is based on an untruth, it's not funny.
quotes.name: Ricky Gervais

quotes.message: Anybody can make jokes. But unless they come from conviction, and there's truth in them, you haven't nailed it. They aren't as funny as they could be, and they don't make a point.
quotes.name: Dan Jenkins

quotes.message: Thinking up jokes is easy. The hard part is trying them out on stage, because you never know if they're funny until you get there. Not one comedian in the world ever really knows.
quotes.name: Emo Philips

quotes.message: Jokes spread around the world and embed themselves in our shared culture; the most resonant of them get lodged in the language in the same way as cliche or old wives' tales do.
quotes.name: Jimmy Carr

quotes.message: You have to begin to develop a repertory of jokes, multi-plane spiritual jokes, the sort of things the Zen masters tell each other when they're asleep. These are the secret teachings.
quotes.name: Frederick Lenz

quotes.message: To me, the highest expression of life is art with jokes. It's very rarified, very difficult to accomplish if you want to be more than just funny, and more than just jokes about human gaseousness.
quotes.name: Neil Peart

quotes.message: There are a lot of great jokes you can sit down and write, but that's just a written joke, versus the comedy of the situation. Ideally, you're pulling as much comedy out of the situation as you can.
quotes.name: John Mulaney

quotes.message: Ultimately, jokes are this really special thing that we can all share. It's exciting to have basically a thousand people in a room together that can laugh at the same time, but I think of it almost as, like, a religious experience.
quotes.name: Mike Birbiglia

quotes.message: In both jokes and dreams, Freud observed, meanings are condensed and displaced, things are represented indirectly or by their opposites, fallacious reasoning trumps logic. Jokes often arise involuntarily, like dreams, and tend to be swiftly forgotten. From these similarities Freud inferred that jokes and dreams share a common origin in the unconscious. Both are essentially means of outwitting our inner censor.
quotes.name: Jim Holt

quotes.message: Most jokes state a bitter truth.
quotes.name: Larry Gelbart

quotes.message: Some of those more out-there jokes were written in the wee hours of the morning. Somehow, they remained funny the next day.
quotes.name: Seth MacFarlane
