quotes.message: I have to exercise in the morning before my brain figures out what I'm doing.
quotes.name: Marsha Doble

quotes.message: It is exercise alone that supports the spirits, and keeps the mind in vigor.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: If it weren't for the fact that the TV set and the refrigerator are so far apart, some of us wouldn't get any exercise at all.
quotes.name: Joey Adams

quotes.message: Walking: the most ancient exercise and still the best modern exercise.
quotes.name: Carrie Latet

quotes.message: Any workout which does not involve a certain minimum of danger or responsibility does not improve the body - it just wears it out.
quotes.name: Norman Mailer

quotes.message: To keep the body in good health is a duty...otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.

quotes.message: Too many people confine their exercise to jumping to conclusions, running up bills, stretching the truth, bending over backwards, lying down on the job, sidestepping responsibility and pushing their luck.
quotes.name: Unkown

quotes.message: Jogging is very beneficial. It's good for your legs and your feet. It's also very good for the ground. It makes it feel needed.
quotes.name: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.message: When it comes to eating right and exercising, there is no 'I'll start tomorrow.' Tomorrow is disease.
quotes.name: Terri Guillements

quotes.message: Getting fit is all about mind over matter. I don't mind, so it doesn't matter.
quotes.name: Adam Hargreaves

quotes.message: Exercise is like an addiction. Once you're in it, you feel like your body needs it.
quotes.name: Elsa Pataky

quotes.message: When working out, length is not a substitute for intensity.
quotes.name: Bill Loguidice

quotes.message: Feed your fitness. Starve your mediocrity.
quotes.name: Krystal Breakley

quotes.message: Physical activity is an excellent stress-buster and provides other health benefits as well. It also can improve your mood and self image.
quotes.name: Jon Wickham

quotes.message: People say that losing weight is no walk in the park. When I hear that I think, yeah, that's the problem.
quotes.name: Chris Adams

quotes.message: Exercise and temperance can preserve something of our early strength even in old age.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: Nothing lifts me out of a bad mood better than a hard work out on my treadmill. It never fails. Exercise is nothing short of a miracle.
quotes.name: Cher

quotes.message: Great effort is required to arrest decay and restore vigor. One must exercise proper deliberation, plan carefully before making a move, and be alert in guarding against relapse following a renaissance.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: Working out is my biggest hobby. It's my Zen hour. I just zone out.
quotes.name: Zac Efron

quotes.message: Research says getting regular exercise is one of the most effective ways to cope with stress.
quotes.name: Chris Meno

quotes.message: Breathing correctly is the key to better fitness, muscle strength, stamina and athletic endurance.
quotes.name: Dr. Michael Yessis

quotes.message: The difference between someone who is in shape, and someone who is not in shape, is the individual who is in shape works out even when they do not want to.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: I feel better in my mind when I work out. It makes everything better.
quotes.name: Keri Russell

quotes.message: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.
quotes.name: Kenneth H. Cooper

quotes.message: Exercise should be regarded as tribute to the heart
quotes.name: Gene Tunney

quotes.message: Patients should have rest, food, fresh air, and exercise - the quadrangle of health.
quotes.name: William Osler

quotes.message: Exercise and temperance can preserve something of our early strength even in old age.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: Look like a beauty. Train like a beast.
quotes.name: April Jones

quotes.message: There's nothing sweeter than sweat.
quotes.name: Lindsey Leavitt

quotes.message: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Typically, people who exercise, start eating better and becoming more productive at work. They smoke less and show more patience with colleagues and family. They use their credit cards less frequently and say they feel less stressed. Exercise is a keystone habit that triggers widespread change.
quotes.name: Charles Duhigg

quotes.message: You have to exercise, or at some point you’ll just break down.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: Even when all is known, the care of a man is not yet complete, because eating alone will not keep a man well; he must also take exercise. For food and exercise, while possessing opposite qualities, yet work together to produce health.
quotes.name: Hippocrates

quotes.message: When it comes to health and well-being, regular exercise is about as close to a magic potion as you can get.
quotes.name: Tich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: Running is not just exercise; it is a lifestyle.
quotes.name: John Bingham

quotes.message: Once you are doing exercise regularly, the hardest thing is to stop it.
quotes.name: Erin Gray

quotes.message: If you don’t make time for exercise, you’ll probably have to make time for illness.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: The doctor of the future will give no medicine, but will involve the patient in the proper use of food, fresh air, and exercise.
quotes.name: Thomas Edison

quotes.message: Our growing softness, our increasing lack of physical fitness, is a menace to our security.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Leave all the afternoon for exercise and recreation, which are as necessary as reading. I will rather say more necessary because health is worth more than learning.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Swimming is normal for me. I'm relaxed. I'm comfortable, and I know my surroundings. It's my home.

quotes.message: Exercise is amazing, from the inside out. I feel so alive and have more energy.

quotes.message: Never hurry. Take plenty of exercise. Always be cheerful. Take all the sleep you need. You may expect to be well.

quotes.message: One of the things I've always enjoyed is moving around and staying fit. Physicality is such a big part of being an actor, but it's also about stillness and silence.

quotes.message: The only way for a rich man to be healthy is by exercise and abstinence, to live as if he were poor.

quotes.message: I think if you exercise, your state of mind - my state of mind - is usually more at ease, ready for more mental challenges. Once I get the physical stuff out of the way it always seems like I have more calmness and better self-esteem.

quotes.message: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
quotes.name: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.message: Exercise is the chief source of improvement in our faculties.
quotes.name: Hugh Blair

quotes.message: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It’s about being better than you used to be.

quotes.message: Exercise is king. Nutrition is queen. Put them together and you’ve got a kingdom.
quotes.name: Kack Lalanne

quotes.message: Train hard, turn up, run your best and the rest will take care of itself.

quotes.message: I hate every minute of training. But i said, don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: Exercise is done against one’s wishes and maintained only because the alternative is worse.
quotes.name: George A. Sheehan

quotes.message: Exercise now, yeah you move like a dancer . Get it shorty, don't let me interrupt .
quotes.name: Eddie Smith

quotes.message: According to a recent study, simply thinking about exercise, even while sitting still, can have physical benefits. For all you know, I could be exercising right now.

quotes.message: You keep on exercising, and you're gonna be strong as a bull! These exercises are gonna make you real strong!

quotes.message: A bicycle needs a certain amount of exercise. It's a well-known fact.
quotes.name: Roy Clarke

quotes.message: Ladies, we are supposed to be exercising our bodies, not our mouths.
quotes.name: Doris Orgel

quotes.message: The following exercise cranks up your self-esteem and makes you aware of your own abilities and the symptoms deep within you.
quotes.name: Anton Klee

quotes.message: Morning exercise is futile at best. When one arises, the body is more subject to postural hypotension.
quotes.name: Ken Levine

quotes.message: Never felt better since I've been on this diet of exercise and healthy food.
quotes.name: Benny Medina

quotes.message: Exercise has been understood for centuries to provide benefits to the human body. Diet and exercise have long been prescribed as the first lines if therapy for metabolic diseases.
quotes.name: Bruce Spiegelman

quotes.message: Lifestyle intervention such as physical exercise is widely recognized to improve whole-body performance and metabolism in health and disease.
quotes.name: Bruce Spiegelman

quotes.message: Exercise your body, exercise your abilities, exercise you mind, it will make you health, wealth and wise.
quotes.name: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.message: Thinking is just an excercise for the brain.
quotes.name: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.message: Physical activity is so important that failure to lead a physically active lifestyle can result in several abnormalities.
quotes.name: Hasan Sozen

quotes.message: Thirty minutes of exercise everyday canbe sufficient to maintain health and well-being.
quotes.name: Aoife A. Donnelly

quotes.message: Regular physical activity is a well-known protective factor for the prevention and treatment of several non-communicable diseases, such as heart disease, stroke, diabetes and different types of cancer.
quotes.name: Aoife A. Donnelly

quotes.message: Physical activity is also known to promote good mental health.
quotes.name: Aoife A. Donnelly

quotes.message: Physical fitness is the ability of your body system to work together efficiently to allow you to be healthy and effectively perform activities perform activities of daily living.
quotes.name: Charles B. Corbin

quotes.message: When people do physical activity especially for the purpose of getting fit, we say the are doing exercise.
quotes.name: Charles B. Corbin

quotes.message: Performing physical activity has many benefits. Regular exercise leads to improved physical fitness. Both regular physical activity and good fitness provide benefits to health and wellness.
quotes.name: Charles B. Corbin

quotes.message: Besides looking better, people who do regular physical activity feel better.
quotes.name: Charles B. Corbin

quotes.message: A fit, healthy body, that is the best fashion statement.
quotes.name: Jess C. Scott

quotes.message: The act of getting strong doesn't start in the gym, it starts in your head.
quotes.name: Lisbeth Darsh

quotes.message: One workout at a time. One day at a time. One week at a time.
quotes.name: Mick Kremling

quotes.message: When it comes to eating right and exercising, there is no 'I'll start tomorrow.' Tomorrow is disease.
quotes.name: V L Allinear

quotes.message: Deep down we all really know what we need to do to get fit and healthy - eat right and exercise.
quotes.name: Sarah Gabb

quotes.message: Physical fitness can neither be achieved by wishful thinking nor outright purchase.
quotes.name: Joseph Pilates

quotes.message: Not only will exercise make you look fantastic, but it will make you feel that way too!
quotes.name: Edward Lance

quotes.message: There's no sure-fire for good health, however the mixture of healthy eating and regular exercise comes awfully close.
quotes.name: Edward Lance

quotes.message: Exercise can restore confidence in your body and make you feel more capable--more in control.
quotes.name: Robert H. Phillip

quotes.message: The right types and amounts of excercise can help you break fatigue-rest-fatigue cycle and make you feel better in counttless other ways.
quotes.name: Robert H. Phillip

quotes.message: I spent the weekend after our date wishing I could stab him with my fluffy duck pen and staring at the phone hoping he'd call. Dating is a very tricky business.
quotes.name: Cath Crowley

quotes.message: Men don't realize that if we're sleeping with them on the first date, we’re probably not interested in seeing them again either.
quotes.name: Chelsea Handler

quotes.message: I was on a date with this really hot model. Well, it wasn't really a date date. We just ate dinner and saw a movie. Then the plane landed.
quotes.name: Dave Attell

quotes.message: I'm always looking for meaningful one night stands.
quotes.name: Dudley Moore

quotes.message: At first I thought he was walking the dog and then I realized it was his date.
quotes.name: Edith Massey

quotes.message: This is one rule about mixing boys and girls: that a date always comes first.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Berg

quotes.message: Memory has always fascinated me. Think of it. You can recall at will your first day in high school, your first date, your first love.
quotes.name: Eric Kandel

quotes.message: I'm dating a woman now who, evidently, is unaware of it.
quotes.name: Garry Shandling

quotes.message: The worst thing a man can ever do is kiss me on the first date.
quotes.name: Halle Berry

quotes.message: Dating is about finding out who you are and who others are. If you show up in a masquerade outfit, neither is going to happen.
quotes.name: Henry Cloud

quotes.message: Dating is a give and take. If you only see it as ‘taking,’ you are not getting it.
quotes.name: Henry Cloud

quotes.message: The cry of the soul is for freedom. It longs for liberty, from the date of its first conscious moments.
quotes.name: J. G. Holland

quotes.message: For our first date we went Dutch. We would have gone another nationality, but they are the tallest.
quotes.name: Jarod Kintz

quotes.message: If you kiss on the first date and it's not right, then there will be no second date. Sometimes it's better to hold out and not kiss for a long time. I am a strong believer in kissing being very intimate, and the minute you kiss, the floodgates open for everything else.
quotes.name: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.message: Dating is pressure and tension.
quotes.name: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.message: What is a date, really, but a job interview that lasts all night? The only difference is there aren't many job interviews where you'll wind up naked.
quotes.name: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.message: The joy of intimacy is the reward of commitment.
quotes.name: Joshua Harris

quotes.message: Yeah, well, not many boys take their girls out on a duck shoot with them as the target for a first date. You have to give me points for style.
quotes.name: Joss Stirling

quotes.message: I'd like to start a family, but you have to have a date first.
quotes.name: Larry David

quotes.message: I don't kiss on the first date. My friends always make fun of me for that! But I will hold hands.
quotes.name: Lauren Conrad

quotes.message: It’s always been my personal feeling that unless you are married, there is something that is not very dignified about talking about who you are dating.
quotes.name: Luke Wilson

quotes.message: Better to put your heart on the line, risk everything, and walk away with nothing than play it safe. Love is a lot of things, but safe isn't one of them.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Good looking individuals are treated better than homely ones in virtually every social situation, from dating to trial by jury.
quotes.name: Martha Beck

quotes.message: Dating is where you pretend you're someone you're not to impress someone you don't know.
quotes.name: Melanie White

quotes.message: As for me, I was already in love and ready to get engaged, which we did three and a half weeks after we met. Four months later we got married.
quotes.name: Michael W. Smith

quotes.message: A man on a date wonders if he'll get lucky. The woman already knows.
quotes.name: Monica Piper

quotes.message: It is the same way with dating. The time you are most prepared for dating is when you don't need anyone to complete you, fulfill you, or instill in you a sense of worth or purpose. You are ready to date when you have first learned how to be single.
quotes.name: Myles Munroe

quotes.message: A person’s readiness to date is largely a matter of maturity and environment.
quotes.name: Myles Munroe

quotes.message: If you think there are no new frontiers, watch a boy ring the front doorbell on his first date.
quotes.name: Olin Miller

quotes.message: She realized she'd never felt this happy, even at her old school, she had been an outsider, always the lonely girl, the one who stayed at home watching tv on Saturday nights while her friends went to parties and out on dates.
quotes.name: R.L. Stine

quotes.message: I tell ya, my wife was never nice to me.
quotes.name: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.message: A guy should make the woman he is dating feel different and more special than anyone else in his life.
quotes.name: Samantha Daniels

quotes.message: Love is so unpredictable. Sometimes you'll know a man for years and then one day, boom! Suddenly you see him in a different way. And other times, it's that first date, that first moment. That's what makes it so great.
quotes.name: Sarah Dessen

quotes.message: I went on a date recently and the guy took me horseback riding. That was kind of fun, until we ran out of quarters.
quotes.name: Susie Loucks

quotes.message: A first date should be elegant. In comfortable surroundings. A place with excellent food, where you can talk easily and get to know each other.
quotes.name: Oleg Cassini

quotes.message: I shake hands on the first date.
quotes.name: Nargis Fakhri

quotes.message: Beware the man who doesn't ask you any questions about yourself on your first date.
quotes.name: Merrill Markoe

quotes.message: The perfect date is the one where anything and everything goes wrong, but at the end of it, all you want is to see them again.
quotes.name: Dylan O'Brien

quotes.message: There are times when silence is the best way to yell at the top of your voice.
quotes.name: Orlando Aloysius Battista

quotes.message: It's not enough to be quiet. Quietness is the absence of noise. We need peace, the presence of justice and to be - and so people here can coexist and live together.
quotes.name: Jesse Jackson

quotes.message: Quietness is the beginning of virtue. To be silent is to be beautiful. Stars do not make a noise.
quotes.name: James Stephens

quotes.message: Silence propagates itself, and the longer talk has been suspended, the more difficult it is to find anything to say.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Silence often expresses 'more powerfully than speech the verdict and judgment of society.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: My heart is tuned to the quietness that the stillness of nature inspires.
quotes.name: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.message: The silence often of pure innocence persuades when speaking fails.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: After an argument, silence may mean acceptance or the continuation of resistance by other means.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: In quietness we find inner peace.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: As we practice meditation, we get used to stillness and eventually are able to make friends with the quietness of our sensations.
quotes.name: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.message: Silence holds the door against the strife of tongue and all the impertinences of idle conversation.
quotes.name: James Hervey

quotes.message: Silence is the great teacher and to learn its lessons you must pay attention to it. There is no substitute for the creative inspiration, knowledge, and stability that come from knowing how to contact your core of inner silence.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: True silence is the rest of the mind; it is to the spirit what sleep is to the body, nourishment and refreshment.
quotes.name: William Penn

quotes.message: Silence is a trick when it imposes. Pedants and scholars, churchmen and physicians, abound in silent pride.
quotes.name: John Zimmerman

quotes.message: Silence is only frightening to people who are compulsively verbalizing.
quotes.name: William S. Burroughs

quotes.message: Learn silence. With the quiet serenity of a meditative mind, listen, absorb, transcribe, and transform.
quotes.name: Pythagoras

quotes.message: Silence is one of the great arts of conversation.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: Silence is as full of potential wisdom and wit as the unshown marble of great sculpture. The silent bear no witness against themselves.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: Mentally prepare ourselves for excellence...block out the noise of everyday distractions and tap into the quietness of meaningful focus, intent and a winning mindset.
quotes.name: Robert Cheeke

quotes.message: Silence is sometimes the only way to share the unsharable.
quotes.name: Ron McLarty

quotes.message: To me so deep a silence portends some dread event; a clamorous sorrow wastes itself in sound.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Silence fertilizes the deep place where personality grows. A life with a peaceful center can weather all storms.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Silence is the safest response for all the contradiction that arises from impertinence, vulgarity, or envy.
quotes.name: Johann Georg Zimmermann

quotes.message: All that is important comes in quietness and waiting.
quotes.name: Patrick Lindsay

quotes.message: The true lasting quietness comes from a complete consecration to the Divine.
quotes.name: Mirra Alfassa

quotes.message: Silence is the most perfect expression of scorn.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Quietness is an essential part of all awareness. In quiet times and sleepy times, a child can dwell in thoughts of his own, and in songs and stories of his own.
quotes.name: Margaret Wise Brown

quotes.message: True inward quietness ... is not vacancy, but stability - the steadfastness of a single purpose.
quotes.name: Caroline Emelia Stephen

quotes.message: By drawing our senses of perception inward, we are able to experience the control, silence, and quietness of the mind.
quotes.name: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.message: Silence is a solvent that destroys personality, and gives us leave to be great and universal.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Silence, when nothing need be said, is the eloquence of discretion.
quotes.name: Christian N. Bovee

quotes.message: Silence is a figure of speech, unanswerable, short, cold, but terribly severe.
quotes.name: Theodore Parker

quotes.message: Silence is the language of God; it is also the language of the heart.
quotes.name: Sivananda

quotes.message: In quietness the soul expands.
quotes.name: Rockwell Kent

quotes.message: Silence is the safest course for any man to adopt who distrust himself.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: There's a non-existent peace in the uncertain quietness.
quotes.name: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.message: Well-timed silence is the most commanding expression.
quotes.name: Mark Helprin

quotes.message: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Only in quietness do we possess our own minds and discover the resources of the Inner Life.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: The true lasting quietness, comes from a complete consecration to the Divine
quotes.name: Mirra Alfassa

quotes.message: Quiet minds cannot be perplexed or frightened but go on in fortune or misfortune at their own private pace, like a clock during a thunderstorm.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: Cultivating quietness is a missing discipline today...the quietness needed to nurture an inner life hid in Christ.
quotes.name: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.message: Silence is more musical than any song.
quotes.name: Christina Rossetti

quotes.message: In the moment of quietness, my strength re-energized.

quotes.message: Silence is one of the hardest arguments to refute.

quotes.message: Today, the concept of business is to make money. Making money is the name of the business.

quotes.message: I have ways of making money that you know nothing of.

quotes.message: To acquire money requires valor, to keep money requires prudence, and to spend money well is an art.

quotes.message: An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.

quotes.message: The longer you're not taking action the more money you're losing.

quotes.message: Making money isn't hard in itself. What's hard is to earn it doing something worth devoting one's life to.

quotes.message: Investing is simple, but not easy.

quotes.message: The real key to making money in stocks is not to get scared out of them.

quotes.message: Life started getting good when I started making money.

quotes.message: Money is usually attracted, not pursued.

quotes.message: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.

quotes.message: Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.

quotes.message: The only point in making money is, you can tell some big shot where to go.

quotes.message: There is a gigantic difference between earning a great deal of money and being rich.

quotes.message: Money is like a sixth sense and you can't make use of the other five without it.

quotes.message: The more you learn, the more you earn.

quotes.message: Money is always eager and ready to work for anyone who is ready to employ it.
quotes.name: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.message: To get rich, you have to be making money while you're asleep.

quotes.message: If all you're doing is making money, you have a luxurious but empty life.

quotes.message: Making money is easy. It is. The difficult thing in life is not making it, it's keeping it.

quotes.message: When money realizes that it is in good hands, it wants to stay and multiply in those hands.
quotes.name: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.message: Balancing your money is the key to having enough.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Warren

quotes.message: It is better to have a permanent income than to be fascinating.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: The more your money works for you, the less you have to work for money.
quotes.name: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.message: The quickest way to double your money is to fold it in half and put it in your back pocket.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: Never spend your money before you have it.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: The resurrection gives my life meaning and direction and the opportunity to start over no matter what my circumstances.
quotes.name: Robert Flatt

quotes.message: Easter is the demonstration of God that life is essentially spiritual and timeless.
quotes.name: Charles M. Crowe

quotes.message: Our Lord has written the promise of the resurrection, not in books alone, but in every leaf in spring-time.

quotes.message: The story of Easter is the story of God's wonderful window of divine surprise.
quotes.name: Carl Knudsen

quotes.message: We live and die; Christ died and lived!
quotes.name: John Stott

quotes.message: Easter is a time to rejoice, be thankful, be assured that all is forgiven so life extends beyond the soil of earth.
quotes.name: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.message: Easter spells out beauty, the rare beauty of new life.
quotes.name: S.D. Gordon

quotes.message: Earth's saddest day and gladdest day were just three days apart.
quotes.name: Susan Coolidge

quotes.message: The resurrection gives my life meaning and direction and the opportunity to start over no matter what my circumstances.
quotes.name: Robert Flatt

quotes.message: The joyful news that He is risen does not change the contemporary world. Still before us lie work, discipline, sacrifice. But the fact of Easter gives us the spiritual power to do the work, accept the discipline, and make the sacrifice.

quotes.message: The great gift of Easter is hope - Christian hope which makes us have that confidence in God, in his ultimate triumph, and in his goodness and love, which nothing can shake.

quotes.message: A man who was completely innocent, offered himself as a sacrifice for the good of others, including his enemies, and became the ransom of the world. It was a perfect act.

quotes.message: The Bible tells us that Jesus Christ came to do three things. He came to have my past forgiven, you get a purpose for living and a home in Heaven.

quotes.message: Easter was when Hope in person surprised the whole world by coming forward from the future into the present.
quotes.name: N.T. Wright

quotes.message: His crucifixion is the key; His resurrection is the door... it is only by his death that we have the mandate to enter into the gates of eternal life. His doors are open always.

quotes.message: Easter is meant to be a symbol of hope, renewal, and new life.

quotes.message: We understand and acknowledge that the Resurrection has placed a glorious crown upon all of Christ's sufferings!

quotes.message: God's plan makes you sing about resurrection when your hanging on a cross.

quotes.message: Our old history ends with the cross; our new history begins with the resurrection.

quotes.message: On Easter Day the veil between time and eternity thins to gossamer.

quotes.message: He takes men out of time and makes them feel eternity.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: For I remember it is Easter morn, And life and love and peace are all new born.
quotes.name: Alice Freeman Palmer

quotes.message: Easter is a time to rejoice, be thankful, be assured that all is forgiven so life extends beyond the soil of earth.
quotes.name: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.message: It is the hour to rend thy chains, the blossom time of souls.
quotes.name: Katherine Lee Bates

quotes.message: But from this earth, this grave, this dust, my God shall raise me up, I trust.

quotes.message: Easter is very important to me, it's a second change.

quotes.message: Here is the amazing thing about Easter; the Resurrection Sunday for Christians is this, that Christ in the dying moments on the cross gives us the greatest illustration of forgiveness possible.
quotes.name: T.D. Jakes

quotes.message: Let the whole world join the happy lay, Let the hills and vales break forth in singing, Christ, the Lord of Life, is ris'n today.

quotes.message: The symbolic language of the crucifixion is the death of the old paradigm; resurrection is a leap into a whole new way of thinking.

quotes.message: Every Easter, at one household or another, I find a battle begins and the conversation of how to 'properly eat' a chocolate bunny.

quotes.message: Easter is an arts and crafts moment where your whole family and friends can get involved.

quotes.message: The day the Lord created hope was probably the same day He created spring.
quotes.name: Bernard Williams

quotes.message: The Easter egg symbolizes our ability to break out of the hardened, protective shell we've surrounded ourselves with.

quotes.message: Easter is a time when God turned the inevitability of death into the invincibility of life.
quotes.name: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.message: We are the Easter people and hallelujah is our song.
quotes.name: St. John Paul II

quotes.message: Spring bursts to-day, . For Christ is risen and all the earth's at play.
quotes.name: Christina Rossetti

quotes.message: ... all alone, alone, alone, He rose again behind the stone.
quotes.name: Alice Meynell

quotes.message: Most glorious Lord of lyfe, that on this day . Didst make thy triumph over death and sin, . And having harrowed hell, didst bring away . Captivity thence captive, us to win: . This joyous day, deare Lord, with joy begin.
quotes.name: Edmund Spenser

quotes.message: Death, and darkness get you packing, . Nothing now to man is lacking, . All your triumphs now are ended, . And what Adam marred, is mended.
quotes.name: Henry Vaughan

quotes.message: Enthroned in thy sovereign sphere . Thou shedd'st thy light on all the year: . Sundays by three more glorious break, . An Easter Day in every week: . And week-days, following in their train, . The fullness of thy blessing gain, . Till all, both resting and employ, . Be one Lord's day of holy joy.
quotes.name: John Keble

quotes.message: Though dead, not dead: . Not gone, through fled; . Not lost, not vanished. . In the great gospel and true creed, . He is yet risen indeed; . Christ is yet risen.
quotes.name: Arthur Hugh Clough

quotes.message: ... there's the Lenten lily . That has not long to stay . And dies on Easter Day.
quotes.name: A. E. Housman

quotes.message: Loveliest of trees, the cherry now . Is hung with bloom along the bough, . And stands about the woodland ride . Wearing white for Eastertide.
quotes.name: A. E. Housman

quotes.message: Myrtilla's tripping down the street, . In Easter finery. . The Easter blooms are not more sweet . And radiant-hued than she.
quotes.name: Dorothy Parker

quotes.message: We have lost Christmas through the commercial interest... and I don't want to lose Easter. We crucified the given Christ on His birthday. Shall we now bury the living Lord beneath the rabbits, the eggs, satins, finery and thoughtlessness? We say no. We want to celebrate Easter in religion from now on.

quotes.message: The resurrection is God's way of getting our attention.

quotes.message: To a Christian, Easter Sunday means everything, when we celebrate the resurrection of Jesus Christ.

quotes.message: Easter is the only time when it’s perfectly safe to put all of your eggs in one basket.

quotes.message: Easter tells us that life is to be interpreted not simply in terms of things but in terms of ideals.
quotes.name: Charles M. Crowe

quotes.message: Unless there is a Good Friday in your life, there can be no Easter Sunday.
quotes.name: Fulton Sheen

quotes.message: 'Twas Easter-Sunday. The full-blossomed trees; Filled all the air with fragrance and with joy.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: And he departed from our sight that we might return to our heart, and there find Him. He departed, and behold, He is here.
quotes.name: St. Augustine

quotes.message: And it is always Easter Sunday at the New York City Ballet. It is always coming back to life. Not even coming back to life - it lives in the constant present.
quotes.name: John Guare

quotes.message: Creating something is all about problem-solving.

quotes.message: I've learned over decades of building that a deadline is a potent tool for problem-solving.

quotes.message: Too many problem-solving sessions become battlegrounds where decisions are made based on power rather than intelligence.

quotes.message: Problem solving is hunting. It is savage pleasure and we are born to it.

quotes.message: Never bring the problem solving stage into the decision making stage. Otherwise, you surrender yourself to the problem rather than the solution.

quotes.message: I'm not afraid of problem-solving. There is always a way.
quotes.name: Hanneli Mustaparta

quotes.message: We can not solve our problems with the same level of thinking that created them.

quotes.message: I suppose it is tempting, if the only tool you have is a hammer, to treat everything as if it were a nail.

quotes.message: Never try to solve all the problems at once make them line up for you one-by-one.
quotes.name: Richard Sloma

quotes.message: One thing is sure. We have to do something. We have to do the best we know how at the moment . . . ; If it doesn't turn out right, we can modify it as we go along.
quotes.name: Franklin D.Roosevelt

quotes.message: Erroneous assumptions can be disastrous.
quotes.name: Peter Drucker

quotes.message: Determine the thing that can and shall be done, and then we shall find the way.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: It is a mistake to think you can solve any major problems just with potatoes.
quotes.name: Douglas Adams

quotes.message: There's no use talking about the problem unless you talk about the solution.
quotes.name: Betty Williams

quotes.message: The difference between what we do and what we are capable of doing would suffice to solve most of the world's problems.
quotes.name: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.message: The direct use of force is such a poor solution to any problem, it is generally employed only by small children and large nations.

quotes.message: As much as we may want to withdraw into a world of pure problem solving, we have to acknowledge that the most successful architectures are the ones you can actually convince someone to implement.

quotes.message: Solving big problems is easier than solving little problems.

quotes.message: I think the next best thing to solving a problem is finding some humor in it.

quotes.message: When solving problems, dig at the roots instead of just hacking at the leaves.

quotes.message: Solving a problem created by debt... by creating more debt is a fool's errand.

quotes.message: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Don't find fault, find a remedy.

quotes.message: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems--not people; to focus your energies on answers--not excuses.

quotes.message: Make small commitments and keep them. Be a light, not a judge. Be a model, not a critic. Be part of the solution, not part of the problem.

quotes.message: There are two ways of meeting difficulties: You alter the difficulties or you alter yourself to meet them.
quotes.name: Phyllis Bottome

quotes.message: To solve any problem, here are three questions to ask yourself: First, what could I do? Second, what could I read? And third, who could I ask?

quotes.message: Whatever your problem, no matter how difficult, you can release spiritual power sufficient to solve your problem. The secret is--pray and believe.

quotes.message: As the world we live in is so unpredictable, the ability to learn and to adapt to change is imperative, alongside creativity, problem-solving, and communication skills.
quotes.name: Alain Dehaze

quotes.message: If I had an hour to solve a problem I'd spend 55 minutes thinking about the problem and 5 minutes thinking about solutions.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The formulation of the problem is often more essential than its solution, which may be merely a matter of mathematical or experimental skill.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Intellectuals solve problems; geniuses prevent them.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Until we have real conflict, we don’t fully understand the problem.
quotes.name: Alfred Sloan

quotes.message: Identify your problems but give your power and energy to solutions.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: We always hope for the easy fix: the one simple change that will erase a problem in a stroke. But few things in life work this way. Instead, success requires making a hundred small steps go right - one after the other, no slipups, no goofs, everyone pitching in.
quotes.name: Atul Gawande

quotes.message: Avoiding a problem doesn't solve it.
quotes.name: Bonnie Jean Thornley

quotes.message: Difficulties are opportunities to better things; they are stepping-stones to greater experience.... When one door closes, another always opens; as a natural law it has to, to balance.
quotes.name: Brian Adams

quotes.message: Again and again, the impossible decision is solved when we see that the problem is only a tough decision waiting to be made.
quotes.name: Dr. Robert Schuller

quotes.message: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
quotes.name: Duke Ellington

quotes.message: Well, if it can be thought, it can be done, a problem can be overcome.
quotes.name: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.message: It is better to solve one problem five different ways, than to solve five problems one way.
quotes.name: George Pólya

quotes.message: It is not stress that kills us. It is effective adaptation to stress that allows us to live.
quotes.name: George Vaillant

quotes.message: For every complex problem there is an answer that is clear, simple, and wrong.
quotes.name: HL Mencken

quotes.message: No problem can be solved until it is reduced to some simple form. The changing of a vague difficulty into a specific, concrete form is a very essential element in thinking.
quotes.name: J. P. Morgan

quotes.message: The opposite of a problem would likely be the correct solution.
quotes.name: Joey Lawsin

quotes.message: A problem well stated is a problem half solved.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: Think outside the square. Think for yourself don't just follow the herd. Think multidisciplinary! Problems by definition, cross many academic disciplines.
quotes.name: Lucas Remmerswaal

quotes.message: You can increase your problem-solving skills by honing your question-asking ability.
quotes.name: Michael J. Gelb

quotes.message: The most serious mistakes are not being made as a result of wrong answers. The truly dangerous thing is asking the wrong questions.
quotes.name: Peter Drucker Men

quotes.message: Vocabulary words are the building blocks of the internal learning structure. Vocabulary is also the tool to better define a problem, seek more accurate solutions, etc.
quotes.name: Ruby K. Payne

quotes.message: If you define the problem correctly, you almost have the solution.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: The problem is not that there are problems. The problem is expecting otherwise and thinking that having problems is a problem.
quotes.name: Theodore Rubin

quotes.message: Whatever the problem, be part of the solution. Don’t just sit around raising questions and pointing out obstacles.
quotes.name: Tina Fey

quotes.message: Identify your problems but give your power and energy to solutions.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: Every problem has a solution. You just have to be creative enough to find it.
quotes.name: Travis Kalanick

quotes.message: A baby is God's opinion that the world should go on.
quotes.name: Carl Sandburg

quotes.message: Children are natural mimics who act like their parents despite every effort to teach them good manners.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: A child of five would understand this. Send someone to fetch a child of five.
quotes.name: Groucho Marx

quotes.message: Children seldom misquote you. In fact, they usually repeat word for word what you shouldn't have said.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Blessed are the young for they shall inherit the national debt.
quotes.name: Herbert Hoover

quotes.message: Children today are tyrants. They contradict their parent, gobble their food, and tyrannize their teachers.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Familiarity breeds contempt - and children.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: I am not young enough to know everything.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Flowers are words which even a baby can understand.
quotes.name: Arthur C. Coxe

quotes.message: Giving birth is like taking your lower lip and forcing it over your head.
quotes.name: Carol Burnett

quotes.message: I love children, especially when they cry, for then someone takes them away.
quotes.name: Nancy Mitford

quotes.message: If you want to recapture your youth, just cut off his allowance.
quotes.name: Al Bernstein

quotes.message: Never raise your hands to your kids. It leaves your groin unprotected.
quotes.name: Red Buttons

quotes.message: It's never too late to have a happy childhood.
quotes.name: Tom Robbins

quotes.message: Lawyers, I suppose, were children once.
quotes.name: Charles Lamb

quotes.message: The first half of our life is ruined by our parents and the second half by our children.
quotes.name: Clarence Darrow

quotes.message: Most convicted felons are just people who were not taken to museums or Broadway musicals as children.
quotes.name: Libby Gelman-Waxner

quotes.message: The old believe everything, the middle-aged suspect everything, the young know everything.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Youth is wasted on the young.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Human beings are the only creatures that allow their children to come back home.
quotes.name: Bill Cosby

quotes.message: Ask your child what he wants for dinner only if he's buying.
quotes.name: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.message: People who get nostalgic about childhood were obviously never children.
quotes.name: Bill Watterson

quotes.message: If your parents never had children, chances are you won't, either.
quotes.name: Dick Cavett

quotes.message: Never have children, only grandchildren.
quotes.name: Gore Vidal

quotes.message: My mother loved children -- she would have given anything if I had been one.
quotes.name: Groucho Marx

quotes.message: I have found the best way to give advice to your children is to find out what they want and then advise them to do it.
quotes.name: Harry S Truman

quotes.message: If you want to see what children can do, you must stop giving them things.
quotes.name: Norman Douglas

quotes.message: Always be nice to your children because they are the ones who will choose your rest home.
quotes.name: Phyllis Diller

quotes.message: I take my children everywhere, but they always find their way back home.
quotes.name: Robert Orben

quotes.message: The reason grandparents and grandchildren get along so well is that they have a common enemy.
quotes.name: Sam Levenson

quotes.message: Somewhere on this globe, every ten seconds, there is a woman giving birth to a child. She must be found and stopped.
quotes.name: Sam Levenson

quotes.message: Insanity is hereditary - you get it from your children.
quotes.name: Sam Levenson

quotes.message: The simplest toy, one which even the youngest child can operate, is called a grandparent.
quotes.name: Sam Levenson

quotes.message: To measure the man, measure his heart.
quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.message: The true test of character is not how much we know how to do, but how we behave when we don't know what to do.
quotes.name: John Holt

quotes.message: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: It's good to shut up sometimes.
quotes.name: Marcel Marceau

quotes.message: Character is like a tree and reputation like its shadow. The shadow is what we think of it; the tree is the real thing.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: You cannot dream yourself into a character; you must hammer and forge yourself one.
quotes.name: James A Froude

quotes.message: A person reveals his character by nothing so clearly as the joke he resents.
quotes.name: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.message: Men show their characters in nothing more clearly than in what they think laughable.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: I take it as a man's duty to restrain himself.
quotes.name: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.message: It is in the character of very few men to honor without envy a friend who has prospered.
quotes.name: Eschylus

quotes.message: Hard work spotlights the character of people: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don't turn up at all.
quotes.name: Sam Ewig

quotes.message: You can tell the character of every man when you see how he receives praise.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Put more trust in nobility of character than in an oath.
quotes.name: Solon

quotes.message: Sow an act...reap a habit; Sow a habit...reap a character; Sow a character...reap a destiny.
quotes.name: George Dana Boardman

quotes.message: Of all the properties which belong to honorable men, not one is so highly prized as that of character.
quotes.name: Henry Clay

quotes.message: Good government generally begins in the family, and if the moral character of a people once degenerate, their political character must soon follow.
quotes.name: Elias Boudinot

quotes.message: Sports do not build character. They reveal it.
quotes.name: Matthew Campbell

quotes.message: History is the record of an encounter between character and circumstances.
quotes.name: Donald Creighton

quotes.message: Wealth stays with us a little moment if at all: only our characters are steadfast, not our gold.
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: Thoughts lead on to purposes; purposes go forth in action; actions form habits; habits decide character; and character fixes our destiny.
quotes.name: Tryon Edwards

quotes.message: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Talent develops in tranquillity, character in the full current of human life.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: It seems to me that perfection of means and confusion of goals seems to characterize our age.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: A signature always reveals a man's character - and sometimes even his name.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: It is part of the American character to consider nothing as desperate - to surmount every difficulty by resolution and contrivance.

quotes.message: To bear failure with courage is the best proof of character that anyone can give.

quotes.message: Don't worry so much about your self-esteem. Worry more about your character. Integrity is its own reward?

quotes.message: Ability may get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.

quotes.message: Good breeding consists in concealing how much we think of ourselves and how little we think of the other person.

quotes.message: Our character is what we do when we think no one is looking.

quotes.message: The average dog is a nicer person than the average person.

quotes.message: Work on your relationships...

quotes.message: Don't smother each other. No one can grow in the shade.

quotes.message: Never let a problem to be solved become more important than a person to be loved.

quotes.message: A lovers' quarrel is always about every quarrel you ever had.

quotes.message: Problems in relationship occur because each person is concentrating on what is missing in the other person.

quotes.message: Assumptions are the termites of relationships.

quotes.message: Never love anybody that treats you like you're ordinary.

quotes.message: If your love for another person doesn't include loving yourself then your love is incomplete.

quotes.message: Every relationship has its own problems. But sometimes what makes it perfect is if you still wanna be together, when things go the wrong way.

quotes.message: Love cannot live where there is no trust.

quotes.message: Trouble is part of your life, and if you don't share it, you don't give the person who loves you enough chance to love you enough.

quotes.message: There is no pain equal to that which two lovers can inflict on one another.

quotes.message: The best person to talk to about the problems in your relationship is the person you're in a relationship with.

quotes.message: Don't settle for a relationship that won't let you be yourself.

quotes.message: Every couple needs to argue now and then. Just to prove that the relationship is strong enough to survive. Long-term relationships, the ones that matter, are all about weathering the peaks and the valleys.

quotes.message: How can our relationship grow when you don't respect my need to discuss everything that is wrong with you?

quotes.message: I love her too, but our neuroses just don't match.

quotes.message: Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you.

quotes.message: Almost all of our sorrows spring out of our relations with other people.

quotes.message: When you're in a relationship, you're always surrounded by a ring of circumstances... joined together by a wedding ring, or in a boxing ring.

quotes.message: In general, the problem in a relationship is when the couple stagnate.

quotes.message: When you don't talk, there's a lot of stuff that ends up not getting said.

quotes.message: Miscommunication is endless.

quotes.message: Disrespect is fatal to a relationship.

quotes.message: Relationships based on obligation lack dignity.

quotes.message: If you want equal rights in a relationship, then you need to put in equal efforts.

quotes.message: A relationship is part of life, so why run from something that's always going to be a part of your life.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: You can't give love if you have no love for yourself. What you give to yourself, will be exactly what you get from someone else.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: If a man takes you into his home, his intentions should be to marry you, if not you're the one to blame for being his roommate.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: God heals the heart while your mind reflects mental pain.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: There's no room in relationships for track stars.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: If you treat your relationship like a recession, your significant other will surely go find work someone else.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: Save the fight for those who physically or mentally hurt you, not the ones who try and truly love you.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: Relationships are like board games, if you willing to play, there's no chance of winning.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: Don't rely on relationship books, to emulate what the body feels.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: I'd rather be single and have everything, then be in a relationship and have little or nothing.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: A relationship can't survive, if you're going in two separate directions, being a unite requires we ride together.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: If you feel lonely in a relationship, it's better not to be in it.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: No one can make you happy but you, getting into a relationship to fill a lonely space, will only end.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: If you don't learn how to guard your heart against the past, you'll be a fool in the future.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: Little boys push little girls from time to time to show their dominants, real men walk away.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: After you've been burned in a relationship, it's not easy for the next person to win the lottery of trust in your heart.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: If the price of love, cost me a lifetime of pain, there's no value in it.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: Let your mind co-sign your heart's intentions.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: Being in a bad relationship is like being a slave on a plantation.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: A person who looks at a relationship part-time will never understand a full time commitment.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: Warning signs of a relationship can be predetermined by words and actions expressed, but if you don't take the time to listen, the mistakes issues or problems that occur will be your own fault, by your own omission.
quotes.name: Mr.Semiopenminded Harris

quotes.message: You never realize how much you love someone until they're gone.

quotes.message: The key to loving relationships is to accept one another in permanence. That means we must love each other no matter what happens to the relationship.

quotes.message: Do not let a small disagreement ruin a great relationship.

quotes.message: Remember that the best relationship is that in which mutual love is bigger that mutual necessity.

quotes.message: Consider that great love relationships and life goals are risky: if you lose, cherish the lesson anyway.
quotes.name: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.message: When you enter into a new relationship, treat that person as if a gift.

quotes.message: To make a great realtionship last, trust and friendship must be your first task.
quotes.name: Arlene De’Sha Jennings

quotes.message: If there is no trust in a relationship at all, it is destined to surely fall.
quotes.name: Arlene De’Sha Jennings

quotes.message: People often say that this or that person has not yet found himself. But the self is not something one finds, it is something one creates.
quotes.name: Thomas Szasz

quotes.message: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.

quotes.message: Know yourself. Don't accept your dog's admiration as conclusive evidence that you are wonderful.

quotes.message: Know thyself? If I knew myself, I'd run away.

quotes.message: The only journey is the journey within.

quotes.message: Not until we are lost do we begin to understand ourselves.

quotes.message: One must know oneself. If this does not serve to discover truth, it at least serves as a rule of life, and there is nothing better.

quotes.message: To find yourself, think for yourself.

quotes.message: Someday, somewhere – anywhere, unfailingly, you'll find yourself, and that, and only that, can be the happiest or bitterest hour of your life.

quotes.message: I long, as does every human being, to be at home wherever I find myself.

quotes.message: Each man's life represents a road toward himself.

quotes.message: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power.

quotes.message: First find the man in yourself if you will inspire manliness in others.

quotes.message: Lose yourself wholly; and the more you lose, the more you will find.

quotes.message: You've got to know yourself so you can at last be yourself.

quotes.message: You really have to look inside yourself and find your own inner strength, and say, 'I'm proud of what I am and who I am, and I'm just going to be myself.

quotes.message: You never find yourself until you face the truth.

quotes.message: Sometimes when you lose your way, you find YOURSELF.

quotes.message: The only way to find yourself is when you start being true to everyone around you.

quotes.message: We lose ourselves in things we love. We find ourselves there, too.

quotes.message: All the wonders you seek are within yourself.

quotes.message: Your imagination is your preview of life’s coming attractions.

quotes.message: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.

quotes.message: A year from now you will wish you had started today.

quotes.message: When you’re committed to something you accept no excuses only results!

quotes.message: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.

quotes.message: Don’t count the days, make the days count.

quotes.message: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it… The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.

quotes.message: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.

quotes.message: The one who says it’s not possible should move out of the way of those doing it.

quotes.message: No masterpiece was ever created by a lazy artist.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Nothing in the world is more common than unsuccessful people with talent.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: I will tell you the secret of getting rich on Wall Street. You try to be greedy when others are fearful and you try to be very fearful when others are greedy.

quotes.message: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

quotes.message: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing–that’s why we recommend it daily.

quotes.message: All in good time.

quotes.message: Anyone can hold the helm when the sea is calm.

quotes.message: At the bottom of patience one finds heaven.

quotes.message: At the gate of patience there is no crowding.

quotes.message: Bear and forbear.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: By diligence and patience, the mouse bit in two the cable.

quotes.message: Don't cross the bridge til you come to it.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: Don't cry before you are hurt.

quotes.message: Don't expect things to go right the first time.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Don't halloo until you're out of the wood.

quotes.message: Don't let anyone get your goat.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Drive gently over the stones.

quotes.message: Everything comes to those who wait.

quotes.message: Grain by grain a loaf, stone by stone, a castle.

quotes.message: Haste has no blessing.

quotes.message: Hasty climbers have sudden falls.

quotes.message: Keep your shirt on.
quotes.name: American Saying

quotes.message: Never change horses in midstream.

quotes.message: Never cut what can be untied.
quotes.name: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.message: One step at a time.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Patience is a virtue.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Patience is bitter but its fruit is sweet.

quotes.message: Patience is the companion of wisdom.

quotes.message: The continuous drip polishes the stone.

quotes.message: The more you ask how much longer it will take, the longer the journey seems.

quotes.message: The salt of patience seasons everything.

quotes.message: Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day.
There are times to stay put, and what you want will come to you, and there are times to go out into the world and find such a thing for yourself
quotes.name: Lemony Snicket

quotes.message: Patience is not the ability to wait. Patience is to be calm no matter what happens, constantly take action to turn it to positive growth opportunities, and have faith to believe that it will all work out in the end while you are waiting.

quotes.message: Have patience with everything that remains unsolved in your heart.

quotes.message: Patience is all.

quotes.message: This is one more piece of advice I have for you: don't get impatient. Even if things are so tangled up you can't do anything, don't get desperate or blow a fuse and start yanking on one particular thread before it's ready to come undone.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: Patience gives your spouse permission to be human. It understands that everyone fails.

quotes.message: Waiting and hoping is a hard thing to do when you've already been waiting and hoping for almost as long as you can bear it.

quotes.message: If there is anything that gives kingliness to the soul, it is patience. What was the secret of the masters who have accomplished great things, who have inspired many and who have helped many souls? Their secret was patience.
