quotes.message: Patience plants us firmly in the ground of our being, content with who and where we are.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Patience makes us happier, it leads us to success, and it gives us greater peace of mind every day.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Impatience is a habit; so is patience.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Patience helps us waste less time, energy and money.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Patience gets us more of what we want.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Patience guards the door to anger.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Patience gives us greater tolerance and empathy.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Patience helps us have happier love relationships.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Patience makes us better parents.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Patience teaches us the power of receptivity.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Patience is the heart of civility.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Patience grows our souls.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Patience is a decision.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: To practice patience, you need a real rascal to help you. It’s no use practicing on gentle and kind creatures, for they require no patience.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: When we see those who challenge us as teachers rather than burdens, our patience instantly grows.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: If we as a community of human souls harness the power of patience, there is no problem we can’t solve - eventually.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Have patience with all things, but chiefly have patience with yourself. Every day begins the task anew.
quotes.name: St. Francis de Sales

quotes.message: When we recognize that waiting actually can bring greater enjoyment than the immediate gratification of our needs, it makes patience much easier to practice.
quotes.name: M.J. Ryan

quotes.message: Patience is a major attribute that has accounted for success.
quotes.name: Patience Johnson

quotes.message: The world gives us PLENTY of opportunities to strengthen our patience. While this truth can definitely be challenging, this is a good thing. Patience is a key that unlocks the door to a more fulfilling life. It is through a cultivation of patience that we become better parents, powerful teachers, great businessmen, good friends, and a live a happier life.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Inner peace is impossible without patience. Wisdom requires patience. Spiritual growth implies the mastery of patience. Patience allows the unfolding of destiny to proceed at its won unhurried pace.
quotes.name: Brian Weiss

quotes.message: Patience is not simply the ability to wait - it's how we behave while we're waiting.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: Have patience. All things are difficult before they become easy.
quotes.name: Saadi

quotes.message: The greatest power is often simple patience.
quotes.name: E. Joseph Cossman

quotes.message: The more you know yourself, the more patience you have for what you see in others.
quotes.name: Erik Erikson

quotes.message: The test of good manners is to be patient with the bad ones.
quotes.name: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

quotes.message: Sometimes things aren't clear right away. That's where you need to be patient and persevere and see where things lead.
quotes.name: Mary Pierce

quotes.message: The very important thing you should have is patience.
quotes.name: Jack Ma

quotes.message: If patience is worth anything, it must endure to the end of time. And a living faith will last in the midst of the blackest storm.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Our patience will achieve more than our force.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: Somehow how is perfectly patient can get more done than someone who is not, and someone who forgives another's faults is often stronger than a person who is addicted to holding on to another's flaws in an attempt to make him or herself feel better.
quotes.name: Christian Olsen

quotes.message: Patience is not resignation. It is power. It is a strength. It actually enhances control.
quotes.name: Christian Olsen

quotes.message: Patience is not the same as being slow; instead, it often equals being slow to anger and endorses courage that accepts a loss and puts the loss into perspective. In this sense, the conclusion of what really matters in life and in eternity gets placed in front of the temporal, insignificant annoyance.
quotes.name: Christian Olsen

quotes.message: Patience speaks of a person's steadfastness under provocation. Enduring ill-treatment without anger or thought of retallation or revenge.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Patience is the transcendent radiance of a loving and tender heart which, in its dealings with those around it, looks kindly and graciously upon them.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Our lives are to be characterized by patience, for it is important in developing the mature, stable character which God wants to produce in His people.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Patience includes perseverance - the ability to bear up under weariness, strain, and persecution when doing the work of the Lord.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: No word is too long to the man who advances deliberately and without undue haste; and no honors are too distant for the man who prepares himself for them with patience.
quotes.name: Bruyere

quotes.message: Patience and diligence, like faith, remove mountains.
quotes.name: William Penn

quotes.message: Patience is a bitter plant but is has a sweet fruit.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Whoever has no patience has no wisdom.
quotes.name: Sa'Di

quotes.message: Patience is the greatest prayer.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Patience is not a virtue. It is an achievement.
quotes.name: Vera Nazarian

quotes.message: If you're not scared then you're not taking a chance. If you're not taking a chance then what the hell are you doing anyway.
quotes.name: Ted Mosby

quotes.message: I've got to take chances and get out there. What are you going to do, sit home and knit? I don't knit.
quotes.name: Cybill Shepherd

quotes.message: Be passionate about your life. Learn to live without the fear of failing. Take a chance, you just might surprise yourself.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: Our lives improve only when we take chances—and the first and most difficult risk we can take is to be honest with ourselves.
quotes.name: Walter Anderson

quotes.message: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
quotes.name: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.message: To dare is to lose one's footing momentarily. To not dare is to lose oneself.
quotes.name: Sren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: A lifetime isn't forever, so take the first chance, don't wait for the second one! Because sometimes, there aren't second chances! And if it turns out to be a mistake? So what! This is life! A whole bunch of mistakes! But if you never get a second chance
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: You learn so much from taking chances, whether they work out or not. Either way, you can grow from the experience and become stronger and smarter.
quotes.name: John Legend

quotes.message: The great thing about taking big chance when you're younger is you have less to lose and you don't know as much. So you take big swings.
quotes.name: Amy Poehler

quotes.message: The important thing is not being afraid to take a chance. Remember, the greatest failure is to not try. Once you find something you love to do, be the best at doing it.
quotes.name: Debbi Fields

quotes.message: We all need to decide whether to 'play it safe' in life and worry about the downside, or instead take a chance, by being who we really are and living the life our heart desires.
quotes.name: Charlie Badenhop

quotes.message: Do you want to be safe and good, or do you want to take a chance and be great?
quotes.name: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.message: He who takes no chances wins nothing.
quotes.name: Danish Proverb

quotes.message: If you are never scared, embarrassed or hurt, it means you never take chances.
quotes.name: Julia Soul

quotes.message: I believe in taking chances and living your life. Sometimes doors open and others close and you have to figure out which one you're going to take. I'm always for the one that's challenging.
quotes.name: Gisele Bundchen

quotes.message: Take a chance! All life is a chance. The man who goes farthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Necessity is the mother of taking chances.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: If you want to achieve a high goal, you're going to have to take some chances.
quotes.name: Alberto Salazar

quotes.message: Every chance taken is another chance to win.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Nothing important was ever achieved without someone taking a chance.
quotes.name: H Jackson Brown Jr

quotes.message: In life we take chances to prove to ourselves that we are strong enough to be here.
quotes.name: Shaylee Schmidt

quotes.message: Take a chance. You never know how perfect something might turn out to be.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Never regret taking a chance, even if you fall on your face; It's better to know you tried and failed than to wonder the great 'what if?.
quotes.name: Devin Frye

quotes.message: When we allow ourselves to become vulnerable, to take chances, and to risk our pride, that is when we find our own glory.
quotes.name: Richard Corman

quotes.message: Life's not about sitting at home in front of the TV waiting for your life to begin. Get out there and take some chances.
quotes.name: Queen Latifah

quotes.message: Taking chances on opportunities, even if they aren't right for you, gives you a clearer picture of where you want to go with your life and career.
quotes.name: Lauren Bush

quotes.message: The successful man is the one who had the chance and took it.
quotes.name: Roger Babson

quotes.message: You can't go through life protecting yourself from everything. You have to take chances. Because if you don't, then you might as well not be living.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Every day, you'll have opportunities to take chances and to work outside your safety net. Sure, it's a lot easier to stay in your comfort zone.. in my case, business suits and real estate.. but sometimes you have to take risks. When the risks pay off, that's when you reap the biggest rewards.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: I always try to take the chance even though my past wasn't the greatest. I take a person and accept them for who they are and whatever past, present or future they hold. Even the scariest of chances could be the greatest.
quotes.name: Jacki Grenier

quotes.message: Your regrets aren't what you did, but what you didn't do. So I take every opportunity.
quotes.name: Cameron Diaz

quotes.message: Chance favors only those who court her.
quotes.name: Charles Nicolle

quotes.message: A wise man turns chance into good fortune.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: If you know you can do it - if you can already chart every day in your future - then why bother? Choose to do something you have more trouble imagining. Take a chance.
quotes.name: Gina Barreca

quotes.message: The only safe thing is to take a chance.
quotes.name: Mike Nichols

quotes.message: Everything you want lies on the other side of learning to trust yourself. Take a chance. Have faith. You already know who you are, what you want, and where you want to go.
quotes.name: Vironika Tugaleva

quotes.message: If I had not tried and taken chances, I would have missed many great opportunities in life.
quotes.name: Lailah Giftyakita

quotes.message: Somebody must take a chance. The monkeys who became men, and the monkeys who didn't are still jumping around in trees making faces at the monkeys who did.
quotes.name: Lincoln Steffens

quotes.message: You never know what life is going to throw at you so don't be afraid to take a chance because it might just be the best thing to happen to you!
quotes.name: Abhishek Tiwari

quotes.message: Sometimes you just have to have Faith and take a Chance...
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: Don't listen to anybody. Nobody knows the magic bullet. If they did, they'd sell it and make a fortune. Follow your gut. Follow your instincts. Every once in a while, take a chance.
quotes.name: Michael Cudlitz

quotes.message: Any time you take a chance you better be sure the rewards are worth the risk because they can put you away just as fast for a ten dollar heist as they can for a million dollar job.
quotes.name: Stanley Kubrick

quotes.message: Just keep taking chances and having fun.
quotes.name: Garth Brooks

quotes.message: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: In the end, what we regret most are the chances we never took.
quotes.name: Frasier Crane

quotes.message: In an instant, we can make the choice to let our hearts stay broken or we can take a chance in living, and allow this beautiful adventure called life, set our hearts on fire.
quotes.name: Lrae Brown

quotes.message: Winning is not everything, but the effort to win is.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Winning is a state of mind that embraces everything you do.
quotes.name: Bryce Courtenay

quotes.message: Winning isn't everything, but losing is nothing.
quotes.name: Red Symons

quotes.message: Winning isn't getting ahead of others. It's getting ahead of yourself.
quotes.name: Roger Staubach

quotes.message: Don't believe that winning is really everything. It's more important to stand for something.
quotes.name: Lane Kirkland

quotes.message: Winning is everything. The only ones who remember you when you come second are your wife and your dog.
quotes.name: Damon Hill

quotes.message: Winning means being unafraid to lose.
quotes.name: Fran Tarkenton

quotes.message: Winning isn't everything. It's the only thing.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Winning is only half of it. Having fun winning is the other half.
quotes.name: Bum Phillips

quotes.message: Winning may not be everything, but losing has little to recommend it.
quotes.name: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.message: We count on winning. And if we lose, don't beef. And the best way to prevent beefing is - don't lose.
quotes.name: Knute Rockne

quotes.message: The key to winning is poise under stress.
quotes.name: Paul Brown

quotes.message: Winning is nice if you don't lose your integrity in the process.
quotes.name: Arnold Horshak

quotes.message: Winning is great, sure, but if you are really going to do something in life, the secret is learning how to lose. Nobody goes undefeated all the time. If you can pick up after a crushing defeat, and go on to win again, you are going to be a champion someday.
quotes.name: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.message: Winning isn't everything, but it beats anything that comes in second.
quotes.name: Paul Bryant

quotes.message: Winning doesn't always mean being first. Winning means you're doing better than you've ever done before.
quotes.name: Bonnie Blair

quotes.message: Winning is all in the attitude!
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Winning is a habit.
quotes.name: Leo Durocher

quotes.message: Winning is like shaving - you do it every day or you wind up looking like a bum.
quotes.name: Jack Kemp

quotes.message: Winning is the most important thing in my life, after breathing. Breathing first, winning next.
quotes.name: George Steinbrenner

quotes.message: Winning is really about the DECISIONS you make and the ACTIONS you take as you play the game!
quotes.name: Billy Cox

quotes.message: Winning tastes good.
quotes.name: Jean Claude Killy

quotes.message: Winning becomes easier over time as the cornerstones of confidence become habits.
quotes.name: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

quotes.message: The hardest thing about winning is trying to do so without losing something of greater importance.
quotes.name: PETE ABRAMS

quotes.message: Winning is not a sometime thing; It's an all the time thing. You don't win once in a while; you don't do things right once in a while; you do them right all the time.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Winning is the science of being totally prepared.
quotes.name: George Allen

quotes.message: The art of winning in business is in working hard - not taking things too seriously.
quotes.name: Albert Green Hubbard

quotes.message: If winning isn't everything, why do they keep score
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: When it comes to winning, you need the skill and the will.
quotes.name: Frank Tyger

quotes.message: A winning effort begins with preparation.
quotes.name: Joe Gibbs

quotes.message: The determination to win is the better part of winning.
quotes.name: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.message: Winning once can be a fluke; winning twice proves you are the best.
quotes.name: Althea Gibson

quotes.message: What really matters is not just our own winning but helping other people to win, too.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: I am not one of those who think that coming in second or third is winning.
quotes.name: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Winning is something that builds physically and mentally every day that you train and every night that you dream.
quotes.name: Emmitt Smith

quotes.message: First, accept sadness. Realize that without losing, winning isn't so great.
quotes.name: Alyssa Milano

quotes.message: All right Mister, let me tell you what winning means - you're willing to go longer, work harder, give more than anyone else.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Winning is not always the barometer of getting better.
quotes.name: Tiger Woods

quotes.message: Winning is the most important. Everything is consequence of that.
quotes.name: Ayrton Senna

quotes.message: After winning, most teams become individuals; most teams become complacent.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: The key to winning is choosing to do God's will and loving others with all you've got.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: If winning isn't important, why do we spend all that money on scoreboards
quotes.name: Chuck Coonradt

quotes.message: Develop the winning edge; small differences in your performance can lead to large differences in your results.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: The secret to winning is constant, consistent management.
quotes.name: Tom Landry

quotes.message: Don't fight a battle if you don't gain anything by winning.
quotes.name: George S. Patton

quotes.message: Tactics, fitness, stroke ability, adaptability, experience, and sportsmanship are all necessary for winning.
quotes.name: Fred Perry

quotes.message: Winning is a habit. Unfortunately, so is losing.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Win or lose, playing at all is winning.
quotes.name: Wolfgang Nording

quotes.message: Winning in businesss is great because when companies win, people thrive and grow.
quotes.name: Jack Welch

quotes.message: Winning lifts everyone it touches--it just makes the world a better place.
quotes.name: Jack Welch

quotes.message: Do play to win, rather than simply to compete. Define winning in your context, painting of a brilliant, successful future.
quotes.name: A.G. Lafley

quotes.message: Success is living my life based on purpose.
quotes.name: Malene Barnett

quotes.message: Be authentic. Own your work style and don't ever think you have to change who you are to be successful.
quotes.name: Cheryl Day

quotes.message: The world's successful people are more good and giving than most imagine.
quotes.name: Brendon Burchard

quotes.message: From the word go, those who win the race of success and legacy started with the lifestyle of humility, audacity, integrity, sagacity and prosperity-mentality.
quotes.name: Anyaele Sam Chiyson

quotes.message: Every experience you have experienced were necessary to enable you see-through the responsibility in maturity.
quotes.name: Anyaele Sam Chiyson

quotes.message: No matter the challenges you are going through, great people went through it and came out of it. You are coming out a success; you are a success.
quotes.name: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.message: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart . Who looks inside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: You build on your successes in life to gain confidence to gain confidence and self-esteem.
quotes.name: Shelley Howe

quotes.message: You are more powerful than your circumstances. They don't define you. You do.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: The story you tell yourself defines the life you live and the actions you take. It's important to tell yourself a positive story.
quotes.name: Jon Gordon

quotes.message: Sometimes life is hard. How do you hang on when things seem hopeless? You can tackle your problems as you would climb a mountain.
quotes.name: Andrew Matthews

quotes.message: Through hard times. It puts your life into perspective. It will get you back on track.
quotes.name: Andrew Matthews

quotes.message: Fruitful times are waiting those who are patient in the hard times.
quotes.name: Jonathan H. Wilson

quotes.message: Those who do not have worthy struggles in their lives neve enjoy the pleasure of celebrating a hard-won victory.
quotes.name: Eric Greitens

quotes.message: Success is completion--accomplishing what we set out to do, whether a task, a call, an errand, or a dream.
quotes.name: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.message: Success is deletion--knowing when not to do, when to say no, when to eliminate habits, methods, or relationships.
quotes.name: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.message: The most joyous part of success is also the most challenging. To create what we want, we need to stop looking back to blame others.
quotes.name: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.message: Success is feeling satisfied and fulfilled by what you choose to do and be on a daily basis.
quotes.name: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.message: Feeling successful is an inner process each one of us needs to learn. To master this process, you need ten skills. Redefining success for yourself while learning to self-acknowledge is the first skill you need to begin leading your life.. skillfully.
quotes.name: Susan Ford Collins

quotes.message: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: When you think you can't... revisit a previous triumph.
quotes.name: Jack Canfield

quotes.message: Sometimes things become possible if we want them bad enough.
quotes.name: T.S Eliot

quotes.message: The spirit, the will to win, and the will to excel are the things that endure. These qualities are so much more important than the events that occur.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Great works are performed not by strength, but by perseverance.
quotes.name: Dr. Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: It doesn't matter what you are thinking, or what fear you have, if you just do it! Action is the only thing that matters... I can see that at the end of my life, I am not going to look back and say, 'I wish I had taken more action'.
quotes.name: Diana von Welanetz Wentworth

quotes.message: People become successful the minute they decide to.
quotes.name: Harvey Mackay

quotes.message: Good things come to those who hustle while they wait.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.message: The fastest way to pass your own expectations is to add passion to your labor.
quotes.name: Mike Litman

quotes.message: To be a champion, you believe in yourself when nobody else will.
quotes.name: Sugar Ray Robinson

quotes.message: Time, patience, and perseverance will accomplish all things.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.message: To be a winner, all you have to give is all you have.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.message: Successful people tend to become more successful because they are always thinking about their successes.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: I have tried 99 times and have failed, but on the 100th time came success.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Success is more attitude than aptitude.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.message: The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.
quotes.name: Herbert Kaufman

quotes.message: Let your heart feel for the afflictions and distress of everyone, and let your hand give in proportion to your purse.
quotes.name: George Washington

quotes.message: You pray in your distress and in your need; would that you might also pray in the fullness of your joy and in your days of abundance.
quotes.name: Khalil Gibran

quotes.message: The world is quickly bored by the recital of misfortune, and willing avoids the sight of distress.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: Let him who expects one class of society to prosper in the highest degree, while the other is in distress, try whether one side; of the face can smile while the other is pinched.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: To pity distress is but human; to relieve it is Godlike.
quotes.name: Horace Mann

quotes.message: If we want to make a statement about a man's nature on the basis of his physiognomy, we must take everything into account; it is in his distress that a man is tested, for then his nature is revealed.
quotes.name: Paracelsus

quotes.message: Without realizing it, the individual composes his life according to the laws of beauty even in times of greatest distress.
quotes.name: Milan Kundera

quotes.message: The more you practice tolerating uncomfortable emotions, the more confident you'll become in your ability to tolerate the distress that may be necessary to reach your full potential.
quotes.name: Amy Morin

quotes.message: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
quotes.name: Thomas Paine

quotes.message: By adversity are wrought the greatest works of admiration, and all the fair examples of renown, out of distress and misery are grown.
quotes.name: Samuel Daniel

quotes.message: Inflicting emotional distress has typically been treated as a civil action.
quotes.name: Nancy Gibbs

quotes.message: To live in the midst of suffering, which we do, we do, amid distress, and to keep some equilibrium in the midst of that - that would be happiness enough.
quotes.name: Michael Luinig

quotes.message: Today continuing poverty and distress are a deeper and more important cause of international tensions, of the conditions that can produce war, than previously.
quotes.name: Lester B. Pearson

quotes.message: People in distress behave in a stressful way. They aren't all sweetness and light. They don't behave well when they are unhappy. That's just what observed.
quotes.name: Penelope Wilton

quotes.message: Recognizing chronic sadness may encourage someone to reach out to a friend, family member, or counselor rather than concealing the distress.
quotes.name: Mary Pilon

quotes.message: Suffering by nature or chance never seems so painful as suffering inflicted on us by the arbitrary will of another.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: Suffering becomes beautiful when anyone bears great calamities with cheerfulness, not through insensibility but through greatness of mind.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: People have a hard time letting go of their suffering. Out of a fear of the unknown, they prefer suffering that is familiar.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: If there is a meaning in life at all, then there must be a meaning in suffering. Suffering is an ineradicable part of life, even as fate and death. Without suffering and death, human life cannot be complete.
quotes.name: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.message: Tell your heart that the fear of suffering is worse than the suffering itself. And no heart has ever suffered when it goes in search of its dream.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Every damsel in distress deserves a hero.
quotes.name: Tracy Anne Warren

quotes.message: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: Waiting is painful. Forgetting is painful. But not knowing which to do is the worse kind of suffering.
quotes.name: Paul Coelho

quotes.message: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
quotes.name: Hellen Keller

quotes.message: It is by suffering that human beings become angels.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: In times of distress strengthen your heart.
quotes.name: Samuel ibn Naghrillah

quotes.message: People in distress never think that you feel enough.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Much dearer be the things which come through hard distress.
quotes.name: Herbert Spencer

quotes.message: When you see a man in distress, recognize him as a fellow man.
quotes.name: Seneca The Younger

quotes.message: When people fall in deep distress, their native sense departs.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: It is not our failures that distress us so much as our idiocies.
quotes.name: Anna Robertson Brown Lindsay

quotes.message: Distress is virtue's opportunity: we only live to teach us how to die.
quotes.name: Thomas Southerne

quotes.message: Distress: A disease incurred by exposure to the prosperity of a friend.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: Accept the challenges so that you may feel the exhilaration of victory.
quotes.name: Gen George Patton

quotes.message: Opportunities to find deeper powers within ourselves come when life seems most challenging.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: The greatest challenge to any thinker is stating the problem in a way that will allow a solution.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Time on its back bears all things far away - Full many a challenge is wrought by many a day - Shape, fortune, name, and nature all decay.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: Reality challenges and rewards. I believe our best days are yet to come.
quotes.name: George W Bush

quotes.message: It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer, the achiever - the one who recognizes the challenge and does something about it.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Don't be a cynic and disconsolate preacher. Don't bewail and moan. Omit the negative propositions. Challenge us with incessant affirmatives.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Leadership is the challenge to be something more than average.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: These are times in which a genius would wish to live. It is not in the still calm of life, or in the repose of a pacific station, that great challenges are formed. . . . Great necessities call out great virtues.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: Allow yourself to be inspired. Allow yourself to succeed. Dare to excel.
quotes.name: Vince Dente

quotes.message: You may not know where you're going, but so long as you spread your wings the winds will carry you.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: To dare is to lose one's footing momentarily. Not to dare is to lose oneself.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.
quotes.name: Jonas Salk

quotes.message: He that cannot reason is a fool. He that will not is a bigot. He that dare not is a slave.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: It often requires more courage to dare to do right than to fear to do wrong.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Don't dare to be different, dare to be yourself - if that doesn't make you different then something is wrong.
quotes.name: Laura Baker

quotes.message: Who dares nothing, need hope for nothing.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
quotes.name: T. S. Eliot

quotes.message: A person needs a little madness, or else they never dare cut the rope and be free.
quotes.name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.message: Dare to err and to dream. Deep meaning often lies in childish plays.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: Take a chance! All life is a chance. The man who goes farthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Dare to be a fool in the face of impossibilities.
quotes.name: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.message: It is impossible to win the race unless you venture to run, impossible to win the victory unless you dare to battle.
quotes.name: Richard M. DeVos

quotes.message: This is no time for ease and comfort. It is time to dare and endure.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: He who knows how to suffer everything can dare everything.
quotes.name: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.message: Dare to be true. Nothing can need a lie: a fault which needs it most, grows two thereby.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: Everything you dare in life reveals the giant in you.
quotes.name: Topsy Gift

quotes.message: In order to conquer, what we need is to dare, still to dare, and always to dare.
quotes.name: Georges Danton

quotes.message: What a man dares to do, he should dare to confess- unless he is a coward.
quotes.name: Rafael Sabatini

quotes.message: One must work and dare if one really wants to live.
quotes.name: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.message: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.name: Charles Darwin

quotes.message: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.name: Robert Kennedy

quotes.message: Dare to wear the foolish clown face.
quotes.name: Frank Sinatra

quotes.message: We must dare, and dare again, and go on daring.
quotes.name: Georges Jacques Danton

quotes.message: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare, it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: The only dare you ever want to take is the dare to be all that you can be.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: When somebody challenges you, fight back. Be brutal, be tough.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: We become strong by embracing vulnerability, we dare more greatly when we acknowledge our fear.
quotes.name: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.message: You must have long-range goals to keep you from being frustrated by short-range failures.
quotes.name: Charles C. Noble

quotes.message: We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be.
quotes.name: May Sarton

quotes.message: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Trust your own instinct. Your mistakes might as well be your own, instead of someone else's.
quotes.name: Billy Wilder

quotes.message: To dare to dream in the midst of adversity, in the midst of failure, in the midst of complacency, is to have hope.
quotes.name: Dani Johnson

quotes.message: We no longer dare to believe in beauty and we make of it a mere appearance in order the more easily to dispose of it.
quotes.name: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quotes.message: Don't dare a person who has nothing else left to lose.
quotes.name: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quotes.message: Dare to be the best you can at all times, dare to be!
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: There are many who dare not kill themselves for fear of what the neighbours will say.
quotes.name: Cyril Connolly

quotes.message: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
quotes.name: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.message: Don't you dare underestimate the power of your own instinct.
quotes.name: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.message: Dare to be honest and fear no labor.
quotes.name: Robert Burns

quotes.message: There's a level of immaturity to people who just can't clean up after themselves.
quotes.name: Jann Wenner

quotes.message: For many, immaturity is an ideal, not a defect.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: Comb your immaturity if you want to grow.
quotes.name: Kishore Bansal

quotes.message: Another unsettling element in modern art is that common symptom of immaturity, the dread of doing what has been done before.
quotes.name: Edith Wharton

quotes.message: Remaining childish is a tremendous state of innocence.
quotes.name: John Lydon

quotes.message: A childish mind griped to unexpected changes.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: He's like a child, but without a child's capacity for joy.
quotes.name: Eva Heller

quotes.message: Revenge is always the weak pleasure of a little and narrow mind.
quotes.name: Juvenal

quotes.message: I was very immature when I was young, and for me there was no balance. Everything was just all or nothing.
quotes.name: Mickey Rourke

quotes.message: Most people grow old, but not everybody grows up.
quotes.name: Nishan Panwar

quotes.message: If you keep playing games you're going to be playing them alone.
quotes.name: Sonya Parker

quotes.message: As long as people believe in absurdities they will continue to commit atrocities.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Some people are like trees, they take forever to grow up.
quotes.name: Ana Sandoval

quotes.message: ... Nine-year-old boys usually turn ten at some point. It's the nineteen-year-olds who have difficulty turning twenty.
quotes.name: John Boyne

quotes.message: We're kind of like the smoking section in high school. We're immature, keep to ourselves.
quotes.name: Matt Stone

quotes.message: You are only young once, but you can stay immature indefinitely
quotes.name: Ogden Nash

quotes.message: Our element is unending immaturity.
quotes.name: Witold Gombrowicz

quotes.message: Inconsistencies in men are generally testimony to their immaturity
quotes.name: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.message: What I look forward to is continued immaturity followed by death.
quotes.name: Dave Barry

quotes.message: There were times my immaturity kept me from being all I wanted to be.
quotes.name: Len Elmore

quotes.message: This weekend showed our immaturity. We're not the team that we thought we were.
quotes.name: Ben Lamanna

quotes.message: To the immature, other people are not real.
quotes.name: Harry Overstreet

quotes.message: To resolve problems through negotiation is a very childish approach.
quotes.name: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.message: Making bad decisions is a part of life. Blaming others for your bad decisions is immature.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Immature is the love of the youth, and immature his hatred of man and earth. His mind and the wings of his spirit are still tied down and heavy.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: People who have no hold over their process of thinking are likely to be ruined by liberty of thought. If thought is immature, liberty of thought becomes a method of converting men into animals.
quotes.name: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.message: Some people need to stop being immature. Seriously grow up.
quotes.name: Mahmoud El Hallab

quotes.message: Immature is aword boring people use to describe fun people.
quotes.name: Will Ferrell

quotes.message: Just because your pain is understandable, doesn't mean your behavior is acceptable.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: An adult can correctly tell a kid, ‘what you are I was and what I am you will be’. And unlike a child he cannot misplace priority due to purity and immaturity.
quotes.name: Vincent Okay Nwachukwu

quotes.message: Immaturity exists in every human; however, it becomes the prisoner of the maturity force, whether it is real or pretended; it naturally escapes on many occasions.
quotes.name: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.message: Man’s growth is held back by his surrender to other people’s expectation that he remain the person he was when they met him.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: In short, immaturity is spoiled. And what is spoiled doesn’t ripen. It goes bad early, gets bitter and withers on the vine.
quotes.name: Gina Barreca

quotes.message: Continuously feeling superior is a characteristic of immaturity.
quotes.name: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.message: The young have all the same flaws adults do. Plus one: immaturity.
quotes.name: Nelson Rodrigues

quotes.message: Maturity comes not with age but with the acceptance of responsibility.
quotes.name: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.message: Immaturity means self-centeredness, inability to compromise, to rise above hurt feelings, to postpone immediate pleasures in favor of future benefits, or to do unpleasant chores when they need to be done.
quotes.name: Arnold J. Toynbee

quotes.message: So far in the history of the world, there have never been enough mature people in the right places.
quotes.name: G. B. Chisholm

quotes.message: The most dangerous members of our society are those grownups whose powers of influence are adult but whose motives and responses are infantile.
quotes.name: Harry Allen Overstreet

quotes.message: The mark of the immature man is that he wants to die nobly for a cause, while the mark of the mature man is that he wants to live humbly for one.
quotes.name: Wilhelm Stekel

quotes.message: You can only be young once. But you can always be immature.
quotes.name: Dave Barry

quotes.message: You are physically and socially mature. You are, of course, intellectually immature. So are we, on the staff; so is everybody. In the intellectual world the only mature people are those who are willing to admit their immaturity.
quotes.name: Northrop Frye

quotes.message: An immature ear of corn appears first.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: Politics are usually the executive expression of human immaturity.
quotes.name: Vera Brittain

quotes.message: Imagination: the supreme delight of the immortal and the immature.
quotes.name: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.message: The first sign of maturity is not reacting to others' immaturity.
quotes.name: D. Muthukrishnan

quotes.message: Maturity does not match, with immaturity.
quotes.name: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.message: Longing for the ideal, while criticizing the real is evidence of immaturity.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.
quotes.name: John Holmes

quotes.message: It is one of the most beautiful compensations of this life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: How far that little candle throws his beams! So shines a good deed in a weary world.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Success has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It's what you do for others.
quotes.name: Danny Thomas

quotes.message: An effort made for the happiness of others lifts us above ourselves.
quotes.name: Lydia M. Child

quotes.message: Let me do all the good I can, to all the people I can, as often as I can, for I shall not pass this way again.
quotes.name: John Wesley

quotes.message: Never worry about numbers. Help one person at a time, and always start with the person nearest you.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could only do a little.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: The true meaning of life is to plant trees, under whose shade you do not expect to sit.
quotes.name: Nelson Henderson

quotes.message: Dare to reach out your hand into the darkness, to pull another hand into the light.
quotes.name: Norman B. Rice

quotes.message: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.
quotes.name: Napolean Hill

quotes.message: To ease another's heartache is to forget one's own.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Love is not patronizing and charity isn't about pity, it is about love. Charity and love are the same - with charity you give love, so don't just give money but reach out your hand instead.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Criticism, like rain, should be gentle enough to nourish a man's growth without destroying his roots.
quotes.name: Frank A. Clark

quotes.message: The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
quotes.name: John Quincy Adams

quotes.message: If you light a lamp for someone else it will also brighten your path.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Never look down on anybody unless you're helping him up.
quotes.name: Jesse Jackson

quotes.message: There is no use whatever trying to help people who do not help themselves. You cannot push anyone up a ladder unless he is willing to climb himself.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: Help others and give something back. I guarantee you will discover that while public service improves the lives and the world around you, its greatest reward is the enrichment and new meaning it will bring your own life.
quotes.name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.message: Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help.
quotes.name: Pope Paul VI

quotes.message: Charity is injurious unless it helps the recipient to become independent of it.
quotes.name: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.message: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Successful people are always looking for opportunities to help others.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Every single time you help somebody stand up, you are helping humanity rise.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Your purpose in life is to use your gifts and talents to help other people. Your journey in life teaches you how to do that.
quotes.name: Tom Krause

quotes.message: You can have everything in life you want, if you will just help other people get what they want.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Doing nothing for others is the undoing of ourselves.
quotes.name: Horace Mann

quotes.message: If you want your life to get better, sometimes the best thing you can do is to help improve somebody else's life.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: A single generosity enlarges the world.
quotes.name: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.message: Time and money spent in helping men to do more for themselves is far better than mere giving.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Condemn none: if you can stretch out a helping hand, do so. If you cannot, fold your hands, bless your brothers, and let them go their own way.
quotes.name: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.message: If you have some respect for people as they are, you can be more effective in helping them to become better than they are.
quotes.name: John W. Gardner

quotes.message: Those who are happiest are those who do the most for others.
quotes.name: Booker T. Washington

quotes.message: You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
quotes.name: John Bunyan

quotes.message: The best antidote I know for worry is work. The best cure for weariness is the challenge of helping someone who is even more tired. One of the great ironies of life is this: He or she who serves almost always benefits more than he or she who is served.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: Give yourself entirely to those around you. Be generous with your blessings. A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: When you become detached mentally from yourself and concentrate on helping other people with their difficulties, you will be able to cope with your own more effectively. Somehow, the act of self-giving is a personal power-releasing factor.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: To be a revolutionary you have to be a human being. You have to care about people who have no power.
quotes.name: Jane Fonda

quotes.message: I shall not pass this way again: Then let me now relieve some pain, Remove some barrier from the road, Or brighten some one's heavy load.
quotes.name: Eva Rose Park

quotes.message: Maturity begins to grow when you can sense your concern for others outweighing your concern for yourself.
quotes.name: John MacNaughton

quotes.message: If you want happiness for an hour, take a nap. If you want happiness for a day, go fishing. If you want happiness for a year, inherit a fortune. If you want happiness for a lifetime, help somebody.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: In helping others, we shall help ourselves, for whatever good we give out completes the circle and comes back to us.
quotes.name: Flora Edwards

quotes.message: The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches but to reveal to him his own.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: All day long we are, in some degree helping each other to one or the other of these destinations. It is in the light of these overwhelming possibilities, it is with the awe and the circumspection proper to them, that we should conduct all of our dealings with one another, all friendships, all loves, all play, all politics.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: the right one does not . stand in your way . they make space for you .
quotes.name: Rupi Kaur

quotes.message: Everything you have is to give.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: Learn to light a candle in the darkest moments of someone’s life. Be the light that helps others see; it is what gives life its deepest significance.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: There is nothing more beautiful than someone who goes out of their way to make life beautiful for others.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Helping others is the secret sauce to a happy life.
quotes.name: Todd Stocker

quotes.message: Helping others isn't a chore; it is one of the greatest gifts there is.
quotes.name: Liya Kebede

quotes.message: Meet hostility and suspicion with kindness. Helping others out of love is always the best option.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Seek something outside your nine-to-five job as an additional source of fulfillment and as a way to feel the joy of helping others.
quotes.name: Harold S. Kushner

quotes.message: Forget yourself by becoming interested in others. Do every day a good deed that will put a smile of joy on someone's face.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: We are all like one-winged angels. It is only when we help each other that we can fly.
quotes.name: Luciano De Crescenzo

quotes.message: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Do something for somebody every day for which you do not get paid.
quotes.name: Dr. Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Even if it is a little thing, do something for those who have need of help, something for which you get no pay but the privilege of doing it.
quotes.name: Dr. Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: As you grow older you will discover that you have two hands. One for helping yourself, the other for helping others.
quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.message: Doing things for others always pays dividends.
quotes.name: Claude M. Bristol

quotes.message: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him find it within himself.
quotes.name: Galileo Galilei

quotes.message: You get the best out of others when you give the best of yourself.
quotes.name: Harry Firestone

quotes.message: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
quotes.name: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.message: Every morning when I wake up, I dedicate myself to helping others to find peace of mind. Then, when I meet people, I think of them as long-term friends; I don't regard others as strangers.
quotes.name: 14th Dalai Lama

quotes.message: The journey is not about helping ourselves, but about helping others. We do best when we use our own skills to make a positive difference in the lives of others. When we do this, we bring enjoyment, hope and fulfillment to others, but we also find that we enjoy the journey more than we ever could have imagined.
quotes.name: Dave Lieber

quotes.message: To enjoy the journey is to leap into people’s lives. To enjoy the journey is to give until the stretch is a sacrifice.
quotes.name: Janie Jasin

quotes.message: If I can stop one heart from breaking, . I shall not live in vain. . If I can ease one life the aching, . Or cool one pain, . Or help one fainting robin . Unto his nest again, . I shall not live in vain.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: Each of us was placed here for a special purpose. I believe that it is each person's responsibility to determine what he or she can do to make the world a better place—and then go out and do it.
quotes.name: Ross Perot

quotes.message: Service is what life is all about.
quotes.name: Marian Wright Edelman

quotes.message: When people are serving, life is no longer meaningless.
quotes.name: John W. Gardner

quotes.message: We are here on earth to do good for others. What the others are here for, I don't know.
quotes.name: W. H. Auden

quotes.message: When a person is down in the world, an ounce of help is better than a pound of preaching.
quotes.name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: Life's most urgent question is: What are you doing for others?
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: To me it seems that to give happiness is a far nobler goal than to attain it: and that what we exist for is much more a matter of relations to others than a matter of individual progress: much more a matter of helping others to heaven than of getting there ourselves.
quotes.name: Lewis Carroll

quotes.message: Great opportunities to help others seldom come, but small ones surround us every day.
quotes.name: Sally Koch

quotes.message: Every good act is charity. A man's true wealth hereafter is the good that he does in this world to his fellows.
quotes.name: Muhammad

quotes.message: The happiest people I have known have been those who gave themselves no concern about their own souls, but did their uttermost to mitigate the miseries of others.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.message: Help publicly. Help privately. Help in your actions by recycling and conserving and protecting, but help also in your attitude. Help make sense where sense has gone missing. Help bring reason and respect to discourse and debate. Help science to solve and faith to soothe. Help law bring justice, until justice is commonplace. Help and you will abolish apathy—the void that is so quickly filled by ignorance and evil.
quotes.name: Tom Hanks

quotes.message: Everybody can be great... because any-body can serve. You don't have to have a college degree to serve. You don't have to make your subject and your verb agree to serve... You don't have to know the second theory of thermodynamics in physics to serve. You only need a heart full of grace. A soul generated by love.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: The life I touch for good or ill will touch another life, and that in turn another, until who knows where the trembling stops or in what far place my touch will be felt.
quotes.name: Frederick Buechner

quotes.message: A man that flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a short cut to meet it.
quotes.name: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.message: Let us not pray to be sheltered from dangers but to be fearless when facing them.
quotes.name: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.message: Beneath every excuse lies a fear. Practice being fearless.
quotes.name: Robin Sharma

quotes.message: Focus on your goals, not your fear. Focus like a laser beam on your goals.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: Bravely overcoming one small fear gives you the courage to take on the next.
quotes.name: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.message: I think it's good to be a little more fearless in saying what you feel. In not being scared of the repercussions of that.
quotes.name: Oscar Isaac

quotes.message: Forget the self and you will fear nothing, in whatever level or awareness you find yourself to be.
quotes.name: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.message: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Becoming fearless isn't the point. That's impossible. It's learning how to control your fear, and how to be free from it.
quotes.name: Veronica Roth

quotes.message: Be fearful when others are greedy and greedy when others are fearful.
quotes.name: Warren Buffet

quotes.message: Being fearless isn't being 100% Not fearful, it's being terrified but you jump anyway.
quotes.name: Taylor Swift

quotes.message: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.name: George Addair

quotes.message: If you're offered a seat on a rocketship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
quotes.name: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.message: It's your place in the world; it's your life. Go on and do all you can with it, and make it the life you want to live.
quotes.name: Mae Jemison

quotes.message: You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Face your fears and doubts, and new worlds will open to you.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: To escape fear, you have to go through it, not around.
quotes.name: Richie Norton

quotes.message: Whatever it is you're scared of doing, do it.
quotes.name: Neil Gaiman

quotes.message: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
quotes.name: Woody Allen

quotes.message: I'm strong and fearless and not afraid to take risks in business.
quotes.name: Khloe Kardashian

quotes.message: I'm fearless, I don't complain. Even when horrible things happen to me, I go on.
quotes.name: Sofia Vergara

quotes.message: Fearless is getting back up and fighting for what you want over and over again....even though every time you've tried before you've lost.
quotes.name: Taylor Swift

quotes.message: People are supposed to fear the unknown, but ignorance is bliss when knowledge is so damn frightening.
quotes.name: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.message: Fear is the worst kind of grave, because it buries one alive.
quotes.name: Beth Fantaskey

quotes.message: I try to be as fearless as possible. I don't always succeed, but I like to think I try.
quotes.name: Zachary Quinto

quotes.message: Be fearless in the pursuit of greatness.
quotes.name: ATGW

quotes.message: Have the fearless attitude of a hero ad the loving heart of a child.
quotes.name: Soyen Shaku

quotes.message: Here is the world. Beautiful and terrible things happen. Don't be afraid.
quotes.name: Frederick Buechner

quotes.message: Find what you are afraid of, face it, and then you won't be afraid of it anymore.
quotes.name: Marilyn Manson

quotes.message: I tend to think you're fearless when you recognize why you should be scared of things, but do them anyway.
quotes.name: Christian Bale

quotes.message: Decide that you want it more than you are afraid of it.
quotes.name: Bill Cosby

quotes.message: My approach is just fearless. I'm not afraid to try anything.
quotes.name: Stormzy

quotes.message: The light of a new day always chases the shadows of the night away, and shows us that the shape of our fear is only the ghost of our own minds.

quotes.message: The best way to be successful is to be fearless.
quotes.name: Janelle Osido

quotes.message: You don't have to be fast. But you'd better be fearless.
quotes.name: Christopher McDougall

quotes.message: Don't be afraid of your fears. They're not there to scare you. They're there to let you know that something is worth it.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: Do the thing you are afraid to do, and the death of fear is certain.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: The will to never give up and to be fearless. That's what I have.
quotes.name: Christina Milian

quotes.message: Expose yourself to your deepest fear; after that, fear has no power, and the fear of freedom shrinks and vanishes. You are free.
quotes.name: Jim Morrison

quotes.message: Don't be afraid your life will end. Be afraid that it will never begin.
quotes.name: Grace Hansen

quotes.message: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: Do things the ego does not like to do.
quotes.name: Stuart Wilde

quotes.message: Fate loves the fearless.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: Feel the fear and do it anyway.
quotes.name: Susan Jeffers

quotes.message: When you're fearless, you take more risks because you're less conscious of failure or what can go wrong.
quotes.name: Brett Ratner

quotes.message: Face your worry and see it as an illusion. It cannot exist unless you give it power and give it life.
quotes.name: Robert Anthony

quotes.message: Be fearless, overcome our acceptance of the quo, and for each to step up and take action to make a difference in our world.
quotes.name: Jean Case

quotes.message: We must work to empower everyone to take action to improve bad situatios, right perceived wrongs and be fearless.
quotes.name: Jean Case

quotes.message: We must not be afraid to stand up for what we believe in, to make the right choices. And when millions and millions of people make ethical choices, this will, cumulatively, move us toward a better world.
quotes.name: Jean Case

quotes.message: You can live a fearless life. You can turn your dreams into reality. You can have all that you want. You can overcome the barriers that are standing between you and success, happiness, and love.
quotes.name: Jonathan Alpert

quotes.message: Find the courage to be who you really are, rather that the person you think others want you to be.
quotes.name: Jonathan Alpert

quotes.message: You overcome fear not by avoiding it, but by facing it. The more you face your fear, the more fearless you will become.
quotes.name: Jonathan Alpert

quotes.message: Being fearless isn't something that some people are born with, and it's not found in a magical pill either. What separates the fearless from the fearful isn't the absence or the presence of fear. Rather, it's what they do about it.
quotes.name: Jonathan Alpert

quotes.message: Be fearless. Focus on what you have control over, not on what's beyond it.
quotes.name: Jonathan Alpert

quotes.message: Fearlessness is not the absence of fear. Rather, it's the mastery of fear.
quotes.name: Arianna Huffington

quotes.message: We will never completely eliminate fear from our lives, but we can definitely get to the point where our fears do not stop us from daring to think new thoughts, try new things, take risks, fail, start again, and be happy.
quotes.name: Arianna Huffington

quotes.message: Fearlessness is about getting up one more time than we fall down.
quotes.name: Arianna Huffington

quotes.message: If we can find that greater inner freedom and strength, then we can evolve from a fearful state of living to a state of freedom, trust, and happiness.
quotes.name: Arianna Huffington

quotes.message: When the fear was overwhelming but which taught me that it was possible to break to the other side. To fearlessness.
quotes.name: Arianna Huffington

quotes.message: I was scared many time on Everest, but this is all part of the challenge. It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
quotes.name: Sir Edmund Hillary

quotes.message: Courage isn't about fearlessness. It's taking action even though you're scared.
quotes.name: Margie Warrell

quotes.message: The more often you act bravely, the more you grow your muscles for life.
quotes.name: Margie Warrell

quotes.message: To thrive in our culture of fear we must not let it set up residence in our lives.
quotes.name: Margie Warrell

quotes.message: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to he understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
quotes.name: Marie Curie

quotes.message: Knowing what you stand for is the foundation stone upon which bravery is built.
quotes.name: Margie Warrell

quotes.message: Face your fear and rise above it. When you acknowledge your fears, you dilute their strength.
quotes.name: Margie Warrell

quotes.message: Break free of labels and be truly fearless when people are putting you under pressure to be someone you're not.

quotes.message: Being fearless when losing a job or when facing any of life's challenges is not about learning to defend ourselves. Nor is it a matter of having a 'stiff upper lip' where we try to convince ourselves that we can shoulder any burden and withstand any insult.

quotes.message: The kind of confidence that remains fearlessly unshaken in the face of life's often terrifying paradoxes--instinctively resourceful and at ease--is not something we can manufacture. Such fearlessness is our birthright; it is what makes us human at our most fundamental level.
quotes.name: Michael Carroll

quotes.message: By contemplating the pointlessness of cowardice, we gradually exhaust our fascination with false hopes and exaggerated fears and begin t consider the possibility of living a fearless life.
quotes.name: Michael Carroll

quotes.message: Illustrating how mindfulness-awareness tames the restless mind, opens us to the present moment, reveals our natural fearlessness, and promotes a sane and confident life.
quotes.name: Michael Carroll

quotes.message: To live a fearless, confident life and resolve the challenge of cowardice, we must examine the distressing side of our experience: we must 'face the fierce facts of life.
quotes.name: Michael Carroll

quotes.message: Since we live in in a world filled with both germs and fears of many trains and sizes, we will never be completely free of either. So we need to learn horw to work with them.
quotes.name: Michelle Aguilar

quotes.message: Everyday gives us new opportunities to build up our physical and emotional immunity, keeping fears from paralyzing us everytime we come up against them.
quotes.name: Michelle Aguilar

quotes.message: Fear is contagious. Fortunately, so is courage. Learning to become fearless will touch everyone around you, and best of all, you'll find it's a gift that keeps on giving.
quotes.name: Michelle Aguilar

quotes.message: Courage faces fear and thereby masters it.

quotes.message: With out fear we'd never get to be brave. You can't ban fear, delete it or extinguish it, but you can work with it to achieve great things.

quotes.message: Fear doesn't have to hold you back or dictate your life. Being fearless means acknowledging your fear, saying 'yes, I see you' and then making the choice to take action anyway.
quotes.name: Jo Usmar

quotes.message: So don't be afraid. You are worth much more than many sparrows.
quotes.name: Matthew 10:31 NCV

quotes.message: To live boldly is to be fully alive, to experience the full range of emotions.
quotes.name: Susan Mitchell

quotes.message: Determined people are bold. And boldness always involves risk.
quotes.name: Susan Mitchell

quotes.message: You should always encourage yourself to be bold enough to work out what it is you really believe in and what kind of life you want to lead.
quotes.name: Susan Mitchell

quotes.message: Not to have a bold vision for the future means that our enemies have won. They have diminished our dreams and therefore they have diminished us.
quotes.name: Susan Mitchell

quotes.message: Leaders is about not being afraid to be bold and not being afraid to be seen to be bold.
quotes.name: Susan Mitchell

quotes.message: Control is power. When we have a plan, we can tell ourselves that we are in charge of our lives. It's easy to be brace. We feel confident when we know what to expect.
quotes.name: Mary E. Lenaburg

quotes.message: Courage is doing things even when you're scared. Being brave isn't something that happens when you're not scared anymore. Brave people don't stop hearing the whispers of fear.
quotes.name: Annie F. Downs

quotes.message: Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, and intelligent execution; it represents the wise choice of many alternatives - choice, not chance, determines your destiny.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Excellence is the gradual result of always striving to do better.

quotes.message: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.message: Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
quotes.name: Ralph Marston

quotes.message: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.

quotes.message: Excellence is doing ordinary things extraordinarily well.

quotes.message: The road to excellence is always under construction.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Superiority -- doing things a little better than anybody else can do them.

quotes.message: It is quality rather than quantity that matters.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Excellence is rarely found, more rarely valued.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Doing common things uncommonly well.

quotes.message: With regard to excellence, it is not enough to know, but we must try to have and use it.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Excellence encourages one about life generally; it shows the spiritual wealth of the world.

quotes.message: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

quotes.message: Supreme excellence consists in breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.

quotes.message: Next to excellence is the appreciation of it.

quotes.message: The sad truth is that excellence makes people nervous.

quotes.message: Excellence is the unlimited ability to improve the quality of what you have to offer.

quotes.message: Excellence always sells.

quotes.message: Excellence means when a man or woman asks of himself more than others do.

quotes.message: Those who attain any excellence, commonly spend life in one pursuit; for excellence is not often gained upon easier terms.

quotes.message: The pursuit of excellence is less profitable than the pursuit of bigness, but it can be more satisfying.

quotes.message: All human excellence is but comparative. There may be persons who excel us, as much as we fancy we excel the meanest.

quotes.message: Excellence is a process that should occupy all our days.

quotes.message: He who does it first may do well, but he who does it best will do better.

quotes.message: The desire of excellence is the necessary attribute of those who excel. We work little for a thing unless we wish for it.

quotes.message: Many people can reach for and achieve excellence. To do this consistently is what separates masters and geniuses from everyone else.

quotes.message: Hunger for excellence. Continuously seek inspiration to make your work better.

quotes.message: Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best.

quotes.message: If you'll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives.

quotes.message: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.

quotes.message: The price of greatness is responsibility.

quotes.message: The final proof of greatness lies in being able to endure criticism without resentment.

quotes.message: True greatness consists in being great in little things.

quotes.message: Greatness is not measured by what a man or woman accomplishes, but by the opposition he or she has overcome to reach his goals.

quotes.message: Greatness is a road leading towards the unknown.

quotes.message: There is no excellence without labor. One cannot dream oneself into either usefulness or happiness.

quotes.message: Whatever you do, don't do it halfway.

quotes.message: You do not merely want to be considered just the best of the best. You want to be considered the only ones who do what you do.

quotes.message: Our goal, simply stated, is to be the best.

quotes.message: Do more than you're supposed to do and you can have or be or do anything you want.

quotes.message: We must do the best we can with what we have.

quotes.message: The best is the enemy of the good.

quotes.message: I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.

quotes.message: Excellence is the best deterrent to racism or sexism.

quotes.message: Pursue excellence and success will follow.

quotes.message: Excellence requires discomfort.
quotes.name: T. D. Jakes

quotes.message: The extent of your impact on the world depends on the size of your devotion to excellence.

quotes.message: Demand excellence.

quotes.message: Excellence is not a gift, but a skill that takes practice. We do not act rightly because we are excellent in fact we achieve excellence by acting rightly.

quotes.message: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less than excellent work.

quotes.message: Excellence is to do a common thing in an uncommon way.

quotes.message: We don’t get a chance to do that many things, and every one should be really excellent. Because this is our life.

quotes.message: Excellence is not an exception; it is a prevailing attitude.

quotes.message: If you don’t do it with excellence, don’t do it at all! Because if it’s not excellent, it won’t be profitable or fun.

quotes.message: People of excellence go the extra mile to do what's right.

quotes.message: Be driven with purpose. Be relentless in your alignment with excellence. Pay no mind to the disimpassioned impotent haters.

quotes.message: Wealth does not bring about excellence, but excellence makes wealth and everything else good for men, both individually and collectively.

quotes.message: The price of excellence is discipline.

quotes.message: The greatest enemy of excellence is good.

quotes.message: Innovation accelerates and compounds. Each point in front of you is bigger than anything that ever happened.

quotes.message: A spirit of innovation is generally the result of a selfish temper and confined views. People will not look forward to posterity, who never look backward to their ancestors.

quotes.message: Pure innovation is more gross than error.

quotes.message: Innovation is creativity with a job to do.

quotes.message: Innovation happens because there are people out there doing and trying a lot of different things.

quotes.message: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

quotes.message: Innovation is taking two things that already exist and putting them together in a new way.

quotes.message: Innovation is the calling card of the future.

quotes.message: There is no innovation and creativity without failure. Period.

quotes.message: Innovation is serendipity, so you don't know what people will make.

quotes.message: Innovation is the whim of an elite before it becomes a need of the public.

quotes.message: Innovation is moving at a scarily fast pace.

quotes.message: A key ingredient in innovation is the ability to challenge authority and break rules.

quotes.message: Once we rid ourselves of traditional thinking we can get on with creating the future.

quotes.message: There's a way to do it better - find it.

quotes.message: The essential part of creativity is not being afraid to fail.

quotes.message: Creativity is not the finding of a thing, but the making something out of it after it is found.

quotes.message: The secret to creativity is knowing how to hide your sources.

quotes.message: Discoveries are often made by not following instructions, by going off the main road, by trying the untried.

quotes.message: Innovation is the process of turning ideas into manufacturable and marketable form.

quotes.message: Creativity requires the courage to let go of certainties.

quotes.message: If you're not prepared to be wrong, you'll never come up with anything original.

quotes.message: A new idea is delicate. It can be killed by a sneer or a yawn; it can be stabbed to death by a quip and worried to death by a frown on the right man's brow.

quotes.message: All great deeds and all great thoughts have a ridiculous beginning.

quotes.message: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.

quotes.message: The more original a discovery, the more obvious it seems afterwards.

quotes.message: Innovation is the ability to convert ideas into invoices.

quotes.message: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.

quotes.message: Innovation is the creation of the new or the re-arranging of the old in a new way.

quotes.message: Get a good idea, and stay with it. Dog it, and work at it until it's done, and done right.

quotes.message: If you're not failing every now and again, it's a sign you're not doing anything very innovative.

quotes.message: Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity.

quotes.message: Ideas won't keep. Something must be done about them.

quotes.message: Innovation is all about people. Innovation thrives when the population is diverse, accepting and willing to cooperate.

quotes.message: An innovation will get traction only if it helps people get something that they're already doing in their lives done better.

quotes.message: Predicting innovation is something of a self-canceling exercise: the most probable innovations are probably the least innovative.

quotes.message: An innovation is one of those things that society looks at and says, if we make this part of the way we live and work, it will change the way we live and work.

quotes.message: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.

quotes.message: When you innovate, you've got to be prepared for everyone telling you you're nuts.

quotes.message: For good ideas and true innovation, you need human interaction, conflict, argument, debate.
