quotes.message: Innovation, being avant garde, is always polemic.
quotes.name: Ferran Adria

quotes.message: The process of innovation is, of course, never ending.
quotes.name: Alan Greenspan

quotes.message: Never before in history has innovation offered promise of so much to so many in so short a time.
quotes.name: Bill Gates

quotes.message: Innovation is the central issue in economic prosperity.
quotes.name: Michael Porter

quotes.message: Innovation is the ability to see change as an opportunity - not a threat.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: Creativity is the ability to see relationships where none exist.
quotes.name: Thomas Disch

quotes.message: A rational process is a moral process.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: If you want to feel good, be rational.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Only the rational and useful is beautiful.
quotes.name: Yevgeny Zamyatin

quotes.message: In the end, rational policy is always good.
quotes.name: Paul Keating

quotes.message: Rationalization is foreplay with one's conscience.
quotes.name: Doug Copper

quotes.message: No crime can ever be defended on rational grounds.
quotes.name: Livy

quotes.message: In everything one thing is impossible: rationality.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Rationality is not one of this industry's attributes.
quotes.name: Scott Hamilton

quotes.message: The real is the rational and the rational is the real.
quotes.name: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.message: If you scare somebody enough, they stop being rational.
quotes.name: Etgar Keret

quotes.message: A man has free choice to the extent that he is rational.
quotes.name: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.message: What is rational is actual and what is actual is rational.
quotes.name: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.message: A person is an individual substance of a rational nature.
quotes.name: Boethius

quotes.message: Rational thinking which is free from assumptions ends therefore in mysticism.
quotes.name: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.message: Rational thinking is an important aspect of human nature, but we have imagination, we have ambition, we have irrational fear, we are swayed by other people, we get indoctrinated and we get influenced by advertising.

quotes.message: People who lean on logic and philosophy and rational exposition end by starving the best part of the mind.
quotes.name: William Butler Yeats

quotes.message: Man is not a rational animal, he is a rationalizing animal.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: The man of regular life and rational mind never despairs.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.message: A rational prediction has an explanation based on theory.

quotes.message: Rational assessments too often led to rational surrenders.
quotes.name: Scott Jurek

quotes.message: Rational argument can be defeated by refusing to argue rationally.

quotes.message: In rational worlds all the hierarchies of our world are reversed.
quotes.name: Bruce Crown

quotes.message: These are not free men in any rational and exact sense of the word.

quotes.message: Rational confidence [is] the just result of knowledge and experience.

quotes.message: Rational thoughts never drive people's creativity the way emotions do.

quotes.message: It is rational to believe, as it is our very existence that is at stake.

quotes.message: If you're rational you don't get to believe whatever you want to believe.
quotes.name: Michael Huemer

quotes.message: When the rational mind is shut off, we have the possibility of intuition.

quotes.message: Rational beliefs bring us closer to getting good results in the real world.
quotes.name: Albert Ellis

quotes.message: Stick to the basics, hold on to your family and friends - they will never go out of fashion.
quotes.name: Niki Taylor

quotes.message: Nothing purchased can come close to the renewed sense of gratitude for having family and friends.
quotes.name: Courtland Milloy

quotes.message: The length of one's days matters less than the love of one's family and friends.
quotes.name: Gerald Ford

quotes.message: I've learned that all a person has in life is family and friends. If you lose those, you have nothing, so friends are to be treasured more than anything else in the world.
quotes.name: Trey Parker And Matt Stone

quotes.message: Present your family and friends with their eulogies now - they won't be able to hear how much you love them and appreciate them from the grave.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches.
quotes.name: Wanda Hope Carter

quotes.message: Inspiring passion in family and friends has more enduring value than just staying alive for them.
quotes.name: Alex Lowe

quotes.message: We love to be with our family and friends and I can tell you that lots of eating will be involved.
quotes.name: Julia Barr

quotes.message: We don't have the luxury of time. We spend more because of how we live, but it's important to be with our family and friends.
quotes.name: Sara Blakely

quotes.message: Cherish your human connections: your relationships with friends and family.
quotes.name: Barbara Bush

quotes.message: Talking with my friends and family every day helps keep me grounded and connected to home. They are the most important things to me.
quotes.name: Colbie Caillat

quotes.message: Love overflows and joy never ends in a home that is blessed with family and friends.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I like to be judged by my family and friends because they know me.
quotes.name: Leighton Meester

quotes.message: Of course my family and friends are incredibly valuable to me. They keep me sane, they teach me things and I love spending time with them. I think that ranking what you value is a sort of western and linear way of looking at things.
quotes.name: Julia Stiles

quotes.message: There's nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street.
quotes.name: Willie Stargell

quotes.message: If you want to really know what your friends and family think of you die broke, and then see who shows up for the funeral.
quotes.name: Gregory Nunn

quotes.message: I have friends and family that are filled with massive amounts of integrity. And it shouldn't be an oddity.
quotes.name: Sandra Bullock

quotes.message: I've learned...
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
quotes.name: Philip Green

quotes.message: When I do get the chance I just love to hang around at home with friends and family.
quotes.name: Delta Goodrem

quotes.message: I'm surrounded by great friends and family. I don't know what I would do without them.
quotes.name: Emma Roberts

quotes.message: My friends and family always thought I was pretty funny, but I don't know if they thought I was get-my-own-show funny.
quotes.name: Nick Kroll

quotes.message: Keep playing games. Make time to play games with your friends and family, because it's surprisingly heartbreaking to wipe a thin layer of dust off a game you love, before you put it back on the shelf because the real world is calling you.
quotes.name: Wil Wheaton

quotes.message: Going home and spending time with your family and your real friends keeps you grounded.
quotes.name: Jennifer Ellison

quotes.message: I love being at home, being with friends and family. I'm of European stock, brought up in Australia. I'm a passionate guy. I just love life.
quotes.name: Eric Bana

quotes.message: Indeed, I was so afraid to dishonour my friends and family by my indiscreet actions, that I rather chose to be accounted a fool, than to be thought rude or wanton.
quotes.name: Margaret Cavendish

quotes.message: I feel only my friends and family need to know what is happening in my personal life.
quotes.name: Virat Kohli

quotes.message: Some of my friends and family have tried to challenge me to do jokes that aren't as self-deprecating, where I genuinely express my own opinion in my own voice.
quotes.name: Maria Bamford

quotes.message: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family: Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
quotes.name: Jane Howard

quotes.message: The books, along with family and friends, and sometimes even against family and friends, molded their characters.
quotes.name: Vick S

quotes.message: What you need to understand when you choose specific friends and family members to help you with your depression is that they have lives too.
quotes.name: Joanna Jackson

quotes.message: The real success of our personal lives and careers can best be measured by the relationships we have with the people most dear to us - our family, friends, and co-workers.
quotes.name: Mary Kay

quotes.message: Families are the crucibles that transform infants into mature human beings. No matter how hard things are in your family right now, it is possible to create a home where differences are resolved amicably, and to raise children who are friends for life.
quotes.name: Laura Markham

quotes.message: In case you feel quite low, try your best to not sit alone. Rather, go to a family member or a friend who you can trust. Everyone has that person in the life, who understands him. her.
quotes.name: Ryan Michaelson

quotes.message: Family, friends and the typical attitudes of society will, at different stages, try to tell you what you 'should' be doing with your life.
quotes.name: Philip West

quotes.message: Your friends, family, and coworkers have a great impact on your self-confidence. Keep a steady stock of people who encourage, enable, and support you to be confident.
quotes.name: Kathleen Rao

quotes.message: Family and close friends who are supportive of you should be integrated into your schedule regularly, to nourish and nurture your overall well being.
quotes.name: Ace McCloud

quotes.message: I understand there are rules, but when it comes to family and friends, there's a time to break them!
quotes.name: Chris Fedak

quotes.message: Remember: family and friends are everything. Money, greed, and power are a dance with Satan.
quotes.name: Chris Fedak

quotes.message: Well, because she's family. I mean, 90% of the time, family just gets under your skin. That's the difference between family and friends.
quotes.name: Hart Hanson

quotes.message: Families and friends make us vulnerable. Make us unable to pull the trigger.
quotes.name: Chris Fedak

quotes.message: Find the source. But, if it comes to a choice between people and treasure, family and friends must come first.
quotes.name: Richard Beban

quotes.message: That's the one day family and friends get together and show their love for each other! It's the one time when everybody gives instead of takes. I know that means nothing to you two sophisticates, but it's mighty important to the rest of the world.
quotes.name: Felix E. Feist

quotes.message: Here's to family and friends . It's good to be here again . On the streets there's children laughing .
quotes.name: Dee Snider

quotes.message: Here's to family and friends . The next time we meet again . God bless us everyone . The good and the bad . The happy, the sad .
quotes.name: Dee Snider

quotes.message: Knowing that you care . Always makes me smile . You are what makes living . Worthwhile . With my family, all of my friends . With my family and all of my friends .
quotes.name: Allen Toussaint

quotes.message: We're not related but here's good news .
quotes.name: Benjamin Connell

quotes.message: Live everyday every possible ways . Spend your time with your family, your friends . Live it right down to the end . Take every road, every bend .
quotes.name: Paul Anka

quotes.message: In a perfect world our family and our friends provide us with the help we need when we go through difficult time in our lives.
quotes.name: Ann Palmer

quotes.message: Our family and our friends accept us no matter what, forgive our mistakes and love us unconditionally.
quotes.name: Ann Palmer

quotes.message: In a perfect world we can open up to our family and friends about our fears and our joys and know they will understand.
quotes.name: Ann Palmer

quotes.message: When persons need help, our culture expects that they turn first to their family, and that the family will help to the extent that they can.
quotes.name: Diana R. Garland

quotes.message: Support system are a network of people such as family and friends who remain close and provide assistance.
quotes.name: Kelvin L. Chou

quotes.message: Family and friends. These are the people you love the most, choose to spend the most time with, love you the most.
quotes.name: Richard Templar

quotes.message: If we want our relationships with our family or friends to eb successful and for them to think the very best or us, then we do need to give those relationships some thought--a conscious approach rather than sailing on asleep at the wheel like most people.
quotes.name: Richard Templar

quotes.message: You have responsibilities toward both your children and your parents. You have a duty to your siblings. You have obligations, that have to be taken seriously, to your friends.
quotes.name: Richard Templar

quotes.message: Remember to balance your time between friends, family, and relationships, even though its incredibly difficult.
quotes.name: Kevin M. Kacvinsky

quotes.message: All unhappiness is due to the ego. With it comes all your trouble. If you would deny the ego and scorch it by ignoring it you would be free.
quotes.name: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.message: All human unhappiness comes from not facing reality squarely, exactly as it is.
quotes.name: Gautama Buddha

quotes.message: All mankind's unhappiness derives from one thing: his inability to know how to remain in repose in one room.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: Unhappiness isn't at its most acute point until a realistic chance of happiness, sufficiently close, has been envisioned.
quotes.name: Michel Houellebecq

quotes.message: We are sometimes dragged into a pit of unhappiness by someone else's opinion that we do not look happy.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: Unhappiness and dissatisfaction with life are not signs of mental illness, but of growing intelligence.
quotes.name: Ken Wilber

quotes.message: If our life is unhappy it is painful to bear; if it is happy it is horrible to lose, So the one is pretty equal to the other.
quotes.name: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.message: The primary cause of unhappiness is never the situation but your thoughts about it.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Unhappiness is really an incorrect way of seeing. When we are unhappy we don't see life as it really is. We are in a condition of veiled light, of shadows.
quotes.name: Frederick Lenz

quotes.message: The unhappiest people in this world, are those who care the most about what other people think.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: You have to fight unhappiness like a dragon with fire and breathe.
quotes.name: Drew Barrymore

quotes.message: Your unhappiness is a way of speaking to you, it's telling you something isn't right.
quotes.name: Robert Greene

quotes.message: No one is discontented at not being a king except a discrowned king unhappiness almost invariably indicates the existence of a road not taken, a talent undeveloped, a self not recognized.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: The cause of most of man's unhappiness is sacrificing what he wants most for what he wants now.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: By becoming more unhappy, we sometimes learn how to be less so.
quotes.name: Madame Swetchine

quotes.message: Unhappiness is not knowing what we want, and killing ourselves to get it.
quotes.name: Don Herold

quotes.message: The unhappy are prisoners of a single round of thought.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: Unhappiness is not knowing what we want and killing ourselves to get it.
quotes.name: Don Herold

quotes.message: There is only one cause of unhappiness: the false beliefs you have in your head, beliefs so widespread, so commonly held, that it never occurs to you to question them.
quotes.name: Anthony De Mello

quotes.message: All unhappiness is caused by our trying to be limited, to be an ego. The more we are our Self, the happier we are. We will never be completely happy until we are completely being our Self.
quotes.name: Lester Levenson

quotes.message: If a man is unhappy, remember that his unhappiness is his own fault, for God made all men to be happy.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Unhappy people often insist on trying to uncover the full magnitude of their unhappiness, or choose to investigate other people's lives as a distraction from their own.
quotes.name: Javier Marías

quotes.message: Unhappiness in one place doesn't breed happiness elsewhere. It just breeds more unhappiness.
quotes.name: Callie Bates

quotes.message: Unhappiness is something we are never taught about; we are taught to expect happiness, but never a Plan B to use to use when the happiness doesn't arrive.
quotes.name: Douglas Coupland

quotes.message: Unhappiness slowly creeps up on you, like a shape-shifting monster waiting in the darkness of your hallway, his bulging eyes watching your every move. The breath on his slimy tongue makes the hairs on your neck stand up.
quotes.name: Kate Rockland

quotes.message: Unhappiness indicates wrong thinking, just as ill health indicates a bad regimen.
quotes.name: Paul Bourget

quotes.message: Much unhappiness has come into the world because of bewilderment and things left unsaid.
quotes.name: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.message: Unhappiness does make people look stupid.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: We create our own unhappiness. The purpose of suffering is to help us understand we are the ones who cause it.
quotes.name: Willie Nelson

quotes.message: Unhappiness in a child accumulates because he sees no end to the dark tunnel. The thirteen weeks of a term might just as well be thirteen years.
quotes.name: Graham Greene

quotes.message: Unhappiness is best defined as the difference between our talents and our expectations.
quotes.name: Edward de Bono

quotes.message: Unhappiness comes when you try to be like everyone else rather than embracing the unique person that you are.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: Unhappiness is a dangerous thing, like carbon monoxide. You don't smell it, you don't taste it, it's formless and colourless, but it poisons slowly. It seeps into every pore of your skin until one day your heart just stops beating.
quotes.name: Bella Pollen

quotes.message: There is no unhappiness like the misery of sighting land (and work) again after a cheerful, careless voyage.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Unhappiness is the ultimate form of self-indulgence.
quotes.name: Tom Robbins

quotes.message: Those who are unhappy have no need for anything in this world but people capable of giving them their attention.
quotes.name: Simone Weil

quotes.message: Unhappiness is complicated and has many different causes, but happiness is simple and has only one reason.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: Unhappiness is often caused by tendency to find fault with others.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: I speak to everyone in the same way, whether he is the garbage man or the president of the university.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: If you want to be respected by others, the great thing is to respect yourself. Only by that, only by self-respect will you compel others to respect you.
quotes.name: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.message: That you may retain your self-respect, it is better to displease the people by doing what you know is right, than to temporarily please them by doing what you know is wrong.
quotes.name: William J. H. Boetcker

quotes.message: Without feelings of respect, what is there to distinguish men from beasts?
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: He that respects himself is safe from others; he wears a coat of mail that none can pierce.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: If we lose our love and self-respect and respect for each other, this is how we will finally die.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Respect commands itself and it can neither be given nor withheld when it is due.
quotes.name: Eldridge Cleaver

quotes.message: Respect is an invention of people who want to cover up the empty place where love should be.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: This is the final test of a gentleman: his respect for those who can be of no possible value to him.
quotes.name: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.message: Tolerance implies a respect for another person, not because he is wrong or even because he is right, but because he is human.
quotes.name: John Cogley

quotes.message: If men are to resect each other for what they are, they must cease to respect each other for what they own.
quotes.name: A.J.P. Taylor

quotes.message: You can demand courtesy but you have to earn respect.
quotes.name: Lawrence Goldstone

quotes.message: If we can respect the divine within us, if we can treat it with dignity, then we can respect others around us.
quotes.name: Vishwas Chavan

quotes.message: Respect begins with this attitude: I acknowledge that you are a creature of extreme worth.
quotes.name: Gary Chapman

quotes.message: People crave for more respect than love, because they expect love only from few people but they want respect from everyone.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Respect at the cost of others is disrespect in effect.
quotes.name: Muhammad Tariq Majeed

quotes.message: When we love and respect people, revealing to them their value, they can begin to come out from behind the walls that protect them.
quotes.name: Jean Vanier

quotes.message: The only true disability is the inability to accept and respect differences.
quotes.name: Comic Strip Mama

quotes.message: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
quotes.name: Lao-Tzu

quotes.message: It is not grey hair that makes one respectable but character.
quotes.name: Rana Junaid Mustafa Gohar

quotes.message: Respect depends on reciprocity.
quotes.name: Nyang Proverb

quotes.message: When we show our respect for other living things, they respond with respect for us.
quotes.name: Arapaho Proverb

quotes.message: Deal with yourself as an individual worthy of respect and make everyone else deal with you the same way.
quotes.name: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.message: A man's respect for law and order exists in precise relationship to the size of his paycheck.
quotes.name: Adam Clayton Powell Jr.

quotes.message: Mutual respect is the foundation of genuine harmony.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: The gentle and respectful ways of saying 'To hell with you' are being abandoned.
quotes.name: Millicent Fenwick

quotes.message: The only way to teach respect is to model it.
quotes.name: Todd Whitaker

quotes.message: I'm not concerned with your liking or disliking me. All I ask is that you respect me as a human being.
quotes.name: Jackie Robinson

quotes.message: We must have respect for both plumbers and our philosophers, or neither our pipes or our theories will hold water.
quotes.name: John. W. Garner

quotes.message: Respect yourself if you would have others respect you.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: I never make the mistake of arguing with people for whose opinions I have no respect.
quotes.name: Edward Gibbon

quotes.message: Respect the burden.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: Men are respectable only as they respect.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: One of the most sincere forms of respect is actually listening to what another has to say.
quotes.name: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.message: Treat people the way you want to be treated. Talk to people the way you want to be talked to. Respect is earned, not given.
quotes.name: Hussein Nishah

quotes.message: Respect is a two-way street, if you want to get it, you've got to give it.
quotes.name: R.G. Risch

quotes.message: Respect yourself and others will respect you.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Give to every other human being every right that you claim for yourself.
quotes.name: Thomas Paine

quotes.message: I must respect the opinions of others even if I disagree with them.
quotes.name: Herbert H. Lehman

quotes.message: I firmly believe that respect is a lot more important, and a lot greater, than popularity.
quotes.name: Julius Erving

quotes.message: To be one, to be united is a great thing. But to respect the right to be different is maybe even greater.
quotes.name: Bono

quotes.message: If I despised myself, it would be no compensation if everyone saluted me, and if I respect myself, it does not trouble me if others hold me lightly.
quotes.name: Max Nordau

quotes.message: Nothing is more despicable than respect based on fear.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Respect a man, he will do the more.
quotes.name: James Howell

quotes.message: Never take a person's dignity: it is worth everything to them, and nothing to you.
quotes.name: Frank Barron

quotes.message: Treat others as you want them to treat you because what goes around comes around
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: He who wants a rose must respect the thorn.
quotes.name: Persian Proverb

quotes.message: You should respect each other and refrain from disputes; you should not, like water and oil, repel each other, but should, like milk and water, mingle together.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Be more humble than a blade of grass, more tolerant than a tree, always offering respect onto others and never expecting any in return.
quotes.name: Chaitanya Mahaprabhu

quotes.message: You will never gain anyone's approval by begging for it.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Respecting someone indicate the quality of your personality.
quotes.name: Mohammad Rishad sakhi

quotes.message: Respect comes in two unchangeable steps: Giving it and receiving it.
quotes.name: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.message: If a person loves you but doesn't respect you then it can not be a real love. It is not possible to love them without respecting them.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: A person's a person, no matter how small.
quotes.name: Dr. Seuss

quotes.message: This is how you start to get respect, by offering something that you have.
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: In the end, those who demean others only disrespect themselves
quotes.name: D.B. Harrop

quotes.message: When we treat people merely as they are, they will remain as they are. When we treat them as if they were what they should be, they will become what they should be.
quotes.name: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.message: Tolerance isn't about not having beliefs. It's about how your beliefs lead you to treat people who disagree with you.
quotes.name: Timothy Keller

quotes.message: When I look at a person, I see a person - not a rank, not a class, not a title.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: But the idea of respect is more than just being polite.
quotes.name: Bruce Glassman

quotes.message: Respect means recognizing that all people are entitled to basic human dignity.
quotes.name: Bruce Glassman

quotes.message: Friendship unites affection with respect. There is no need to bow down before a friend. We can look him in the eye. We neither look up to him nor down to him.
quotes.name: Jurgen Moltmann

quotes.message: Religionism is the result of a lack of respect for the followers of another religious faith. But, then, it is also a lack of respect for God.
quotes.name: Tissa Balasuriya

quotes.message: Them that honor me I will honor, and they that despise me shall be lightly esteemed.
quotes.name: 1 Samuel 2:30

quotes.message: There will be differences between men and women, but it is the duty of every man to respect her.
quotes.name: Harish Muralidhar

quotes.message: We do not earn respect. It is given as a gift. What we do with it is up to us.
quotes.name: Tod Whitaker

quotes.message: Teachers, who educate children, deserve more honor than parents, who merely gave them birth; for the latter provided mere life, while the former ensure a good life.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Wherever I look, I see signs of the commandment to honor one's parents and nowhere of a commandment that calls for the respect of a child.
quotes.name: Alice Miller

quotes.message: The secret of education is respecting the pupil.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: All the great religions deserve respect and, if practiced seriously, are paths to love and peace.
quotes.name: Travis Hellstorm

quotes.message: Resolute in our determination to respect the rights of others, and to command respect for the rights of ourselves, we must kep ourselves adequately strong in self-defense.
quotes.name: Bryan Curtis

quotes.message: Religion, by teaching man his relationship to God, gives the individual a sense of his own dignity and teaches im to respect himself by respecting his neighbors.
quotes.name: Bryan Curtis

quotes.message: The greatest honor history can bestow is that of peacemaker.
quotes.name: Bryan Curtis

quotes.message: Thieves respect property. They merely wish the property to become their property that they may more perfectly respect it.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: True friends will respect one another's viewpoints without letting differences in opinion affect the relationship.
quotes.name: Robert Arp

quotes.message: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
quotes.name: Robert Arp

quotes.message: I can offer you neither honor nor wages; I offer you only hunger, thirst, forced marches, battles, and death. Anyone who loves his country, follow me.
quotes.name: Giuseppe Garibaldi

quotes.message: Each man has his own prevailing passion, which differs in some respect from that of his neighbors.
quotes.name: J.B. Lippincott

quotes.message: Consult with your friend on every thing, but particularly on that which respects yourself.
quotes.name: J.B.Lippincott

quotes.message: When the people possess no authority, their rights obtain no respect.
quotes.name: George Bancroft

quotes.message: Self-respect is the cornerstone of all virtue
quotes.name: John Herschel

quotes.message: Our own heart, and not other men's opinion forms our true honor
quotes.name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.message: If I lose mine honor, I lose myself.
quotes.name: Shakespeare

quotes.message: The shortest and surest way to live with honor, is to be in reality that we would appear to be; all human virtues increase and strenghten themselves by the practice and experience of them.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Sometimes we are separated by differences, and sometimes we are united by common ideals of respect and compassion.
quotes.name: Frank Johnson

quotes.message: Respect is one of the greatest expressions of love.
quotes.name: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.message: Respect is the appreciation of the separateness of the other person, of the ways in which he or she is unique.
quotes.name: Annie Gottlieb

quotes.message: Losing your life is not the worst thing that can happen. The worst thing is to lose your reason for living.
quotes.name: Jo Nesbo

quotes.message: Despair gives the shocking ease to the mind that a mortification gives to the body.
quotes.name: Sir Fulke Greville

quotes.message: The road that is built in hope is more pleasant to the traveler than the road built in despair, even though they both lead to the same destination.
quotes.name: Marion Zimmer Bradley

quotes.message: Despair is our chance to wrestle with fire and come through.
quotes.name: Christina Baldwin

quotes.message: What we call our despair is often only the painful eagerness of unfed hope.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Even in my despair, I knew in a vague way that the Bible held hope for me in its pages. I just didn't know where to begin.
quotes.name: Joni Eareckson Tada

quotes.message: The most common form of despair is not being who you are.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: Despair is sometimes the great energizer of the mind, though sometimes its flowering may be sterile.
quotes.name: Taylor Caldwell

quotes.message: Despair is a cruel companion. It robs you of everything; especially the choices that still lie within your control.
quotes.name: Brownell Landrum

quotes.message: Despair doth strike as deep a furrow in the brain as mischief or remorse.
quotes.name: Bryan Procter

quotes.message: Despair is only for those who see the end beyond all doubt. We do not.
quotes.name: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.message: Despair is most often the offspring of ill-preparedness.
quotes.name: Donald E. Williams, Jr.

quotes.message: Despair is the result of each earnest attempt to go through life with virtue, justice and understanding, and to fulfill their requirements. Children live on one side of despair, the awakened on the other side.
quotes.name: Hermann Hesse

quotes.message: Despair is the only genuine atheism.
quotes.name: Jean Paul

quotes.message: Despair is anger with no place to go.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: There is no love of life without despair of life.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Despair is for people who know, beyond any doubt, what the future is going to bring. Nobody is in that position. So despair is not only a kind of sin, theologically, but also a simple mistake, because nobody actually knows. In that sense there is always hope.
quotes.name: Patrick Curry

quotes.message: My life is a perfect graveyard of buried hopes.
quotes.name: L.M. Montgomery,

quotes.message: If you're in despair, you don't know how to be part of your own life anymore.
quotes.name: Naomi Wallace

quotes.message: Don't despair, not even over the fact that you don't despair.
quotes.name: Franz Kafka

quotes.message: Happiness is the greatest hiding place for despair.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: Despair lames most people, but it wakes others fully up.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: One of the greatest dangers of great dreams in your youth is waking up to despair as an adult.
quotes.name: Tice Davids

quotes.message: Despair is the price one pays for setting himself an impossible aim.
quotes.name: Graham Greene

quotes.message: There are far too many silent sufferers. Not because they don't yearn to reach out, but because they've tried and found no one who cares.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: Depression is the flaw in love. To be creatures who love, we must be creatures who can despair at what we lose, and depression is the mechanism of that despair.
quotes.name: Andrew Solomon

quotes.message: We cannot despair of humanity, since we ourselves are human beings.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: One despairs of others so as not to despair too much of oneself.
quotes.name: Henri Petit

quotes.message: I need to be alone. I need to ponder my shame and my despair in seclusion; I need the sunshine and the paving stones of the streets without companions, without conversation, face to face with myself, with only the music of my heart for company.
quotes.name: Henry Miller

quotes.message: Despair is the greatest of our errors.
quotes.name: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.message: The deepest form of despair is to choose to be another than himself.
quotes.name: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.message: Sometimes it feels as though happiness is just a word people say to hide the despair of not knowing anything.
quotes.name: Michael Gilbert

quotes.message: Fools usually know best that which the wise despair of ever comprehending.
quotes.name: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.message: Despair is the only cure for illusion.
quotes.name: Alexander Lowen

quotes.message: Despair is deadly sin, but worse, it is mortal folly.
quotes.name: Ellis Peter

quotes.message: Without lies humanity would perish of despair and boredom.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: Despair makes us serve evil as much as good.
quotes.name: Hadewijch

quotes.message: Despair is better treated with hope, not dope.
quotes.name: Richard Asher

quotes.message: Despair puts the last touch not only to our misery but also to our weakness.
quotes.name: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.message: Despair can be like an iron band constricting the heart.
quotes.name: Jurgen Moltmann

quotes.message: As for despair, it comes about when I have been a fool and hate myself and despair of my personality. I am prone to gloom, but not depression as such.
quotes.name: Alain De Botton

quotes.message: Despair exaggerates not only our misery but also our weakness.
quotes.name: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.message: Despair is like a gas, odourless, tasteless, without nourishment. You breathe it in, your limbs relax, you cease to care, even at the moment when the steel touches your throat.
quotes.name: J. M. Coetzee

quotes.message: To hope for nothing, to expect nothing, to demand nothing. This is analytical despair.
quotes.name: James Hillman

quotes.message: To be Despair. It is a portrait. Only close your eyes and feel.
quotes.name: Neil Gaiman

quotes.message: Despair is typical of those who do not understand the causes of evil, see no way out, and are incapable of struggle. The modern industrial proletariat does not belong to the category of such classes.
quotes.name: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.message: Despair is suffering without meaning.
quotes.name: Viktor E Frankl

quotes.message: In character, in manner, in style, in all things, the supreme excellence is simplicity.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: Simplicity is the glory of expression.
quotes.name: Walt Whitman

quotes.message: The art of simplicity is a puzzle of complexity.
quotes.name: Douglas Horton

quotes.message: Simplicity is not the goal. It is the by-product of a good idea and modest expectations.
quotes.name: Paul Rand

quotes.message: Nothing is more simple than greatness; indeed, to be simple is to be great.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Simplicity is the final achievement. After one has played a vast quantity of notes and more notes, it is simplicity that emerges as the crowning reward of art.
quotes.name: Frederic Chopin

quotes.message: If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Live simply, so that others may simply live.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Our life is frittered away by detail simplify, simplify, simplify!
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Simplicity is the keynote of all true elegance.
quotes.name: Coco Chanel

quotes.message: Simplicity embarks not on what is seen by the naked eye, but dwelling on what is in the heart.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: The most complicated skill is to be simple.
quotes.name: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.message: Simplicity is an exact medium between too little and too much.
quotes.name: Sir Joshua Reynolds

quotes.message: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
quotes.name: Hans Hofman

quotes.message: Simplicity is making the journey of this life with just baggage enough.
quotes.name: Charles Warner

quotes.message: The trouble with simple living is that, though it can be joyful, rich, and creative, it isn't simple.
quotes.name: Doris Janzen Longacre

quotes.message: The greatest step towards a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Simplicity is indeed often the sign of truth and a criterion of beauty.
quotes.name: Mahlon Hoagland

quotes.message: Simplicity is the shortest path to a solution.
quotes.name: Ward Cunningham

quotes.message: Simplicity is prerequisite for reliability.
quotes.name: Edsger W. Dijkstra

quotes.message: Simplicity the art of maximizing the amount of work not done is essential.
quotes.name: Principles Behind The Agile Manifesto

quotes.message: Simplicity is a state of mind.
quotes.name: Charles Wagner

quotes.message: A little simplification would be the first step toward rational living, I think.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: A taste for simplicity cannot last for long.
quotes.name: Eugene Delacroix

quotes.message: As beautiful as simplicity is, it can become a tradition that stands in the way of exploration.
quotes.name: Laura Nyro

quotes.message: I despise simplicity. It is the negation of all that is beautiful.
quotes.name: Norman Hartnell

quotes.message: I don't need a lot of money. Simplicity is the answer for me.
quotes.name: Linda McCartney

quotes.message: It is simplicity that makes the uneducated more effective than the educated when addressing popular audiences.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Seek simplicity but distrust it.
quotes.name: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.message: Simplicity does not precede complexity, but follows it.
quotes.name: Alan Perlis

quotes.message: Simplicity involves unburdening your life, and living more lightly with fewer distractions that interfere with a high quality life, as defined uniquely by each individual. You will find people living simply in large cities, rural areas and everything in between.
quotes.name: Linda Breen Pierce

quotes.message: Simplicity is not an objective in art, but one achieves simplicity despite one's self by entering into the real sense of things.
quotes.name: Constantin Brancusi

quotes.message: Simplicity is the key to brilliance.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Simplicity is the nature of great souls.
quotes.name: Papa Ramadas

quotes.message: One can furnish a room very luxuriously by taking out furniture rather than putting it in.
quotes.name: Francis Jourdain

quotes.message: Never use a long word when a short one will do.
quotes.name: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.message: I relish simplicity as an all-comprehensive value.
quotes.name: Ela Bhatt

quotes.message: Simplicity is the seal of truth.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: Simplicity is natures first step, and the last of art.
quotes.name: Philip James Bailey

quotes.message: There is a simplicity that exists on the far side of complexity, and there is a communication of sentiment and attitude not to be discovered by careful exegesis of a text.
quotes.name: Patrick J. Buchanan

quotes.message: Be content with what you have, rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Simplicity is a jewel rarely found.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: Simplicity of all things is the hardest to be copy.
quotes.name: Richard Steele

quotes.message: There is one show of breeding vulgarity seldom assumes, simplicity.
quotes.name: George Macdonald

quotes.message: Simplicity is a captivating grace in woman, as rare as it is attractive.
quotes.name: J. De Finod

quotes.message: Simplicity is that grace which frees the soul from all unnecessary reflections upon itself.
quotes.name: Francois Fenelon

quotes.message: Genuine simplicity of heart is a healing and cementing principle.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: Upright simplicity is the deepest wisdom, and perverse craft the merest shallowness.
quotes.name: Isaac Barrow

quotes.message: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.name: Og Mandino

quotes.message: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
quotes.name: Duke Ellington

quotes.message: Always do your best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best.
quotes.name: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.message: Perfection is impossible; just strive to do your best.
quotes.name: Angela Watson

quotes.message: If you try to do your best there is no failure.
quotes.name: Mike Farrell

quotes.message: It is not enough to do your best; you must know what to do, and then do your best.
quotes.name: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.message: Do your best when no one is looking. If you do that, then you can be successful in anything that you put your mind to.
quotes.name: Bob Cousy

quotes.message: You can only do your best. That's all you can do. And if it isn't good enough, it isn't good enough.
quotes.name: Imelda Staunton

quotes.message: You always feel pressure to do your best, and when you know that the story revolves around you, it become very overwhelming.
quotes.name: Lauren Ashley Carter

quotes.message: You have to love what you do, to give your best.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: You have to first do your best before you expect God to do the rest for you.
quotes.name: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.message: Don't beat up yourself up for what you couldn't do, or didn't do. Just do the best you can now, and now.
quotes.name: Akiroq Brost

quotes.message: Doing your best is more important than being the best.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.message: Like what you do, and then you will do your best.
quotes.name: Katherine Johnson

quotes.message: Do your best, one shot at a time and then move on. Remember that golf is just a game.
quotes.name: Nancy Lopez

quotes.message: When you are entrusted with an assignment, you do your best.
quotes.name: Tu Youyou

quotes.message: You do your best with the realization that nothing gets you in ring-shape better than being in the ring.
quotes.name: Shawn Michaels

quotes.message: Nerves can be useful, as they sharpen you up, make you determined to try you hardest and do your best.
quotes.name: Stephen Cole

quotes.message: Obscurity is usually the refuge of incompetence.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: Incompetence is often highly regarded in governmental circles.
quotes.name: William Wallace

quotes.message: If at first you don't succeed, you may be at your level of incompetence already.
quotes.name: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.message: Incompetence is certainty in the absence of expertise. Overconfidence is certainty in the presence of expertise.
quotes.name: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.message: Inconsistency, incompetence, and lies are all cut short by the ground. It will stop you if you can't stop yourself.
quotes.name: Mark Twight

quotes.message: A certain combination of incompetence and indifference can cause almost as much suffering as the most acute malevolence.
quotes.name: Bruce Catton

quotes.message: Arrogance, ignorance, and incompetence. Not a pretty cocktail of personality traits in the best of situations. No sirree. Not a pretty cocktail in an office-mate and not a pretty cocktail in a head of state. In fact, in a leader, it's a lethal cocktail.
quotes.name: Graydon Carter

quotes.message: Never attribute to malevolence what is merely due to incompetence.
quotes.name: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.message: One of the chief features of incompetence was an inability to see it in oneself.
quotes.name: Kim Stanley Robinson

quotes.message: When success and incompetence meet, disaster is not far away.
quotes.name: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.message: Incompetence is the true crisis.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: It happens; incompetence is rewarded more often than not.
quotes.name: Jeff Lindsay

quotes.message: Sometimes incompetence is useful. It helps you keep an open mind.
quotes.name: Roberto Cavalli

quotes.message: The problem with incompetence is its inability to recognize itself.
quotes.name: Orrin Woodward

quotes.message: The English think that incompetence is the same thing as sincerity.
quotes.name: Quentin Crisp

quotes.message: Secrecy breeds incompetence because where there is failure, failure is kept secret.
quotes.name: Julian Assange

quotes.message: Work is accomplished by those employees who have not yet reached their level of incompetence.
quotes.name: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.message: Authoritarianism and secrecy breed incompetence; the two feed on each other. It's a vicious cycle. Governments with authoritarian tendencies point to what is in fact their own incompetence as the rationale for giving them yet more power.
quotes.name: Josh Marshall

quotes.message: Incompetence is a better explanation than conspiracy in most human activity.
quotes.name: Peter Bergen

quotes.message: If there is any one proof of a man's incompetence, it is the stagnant mentality of a worker who, doing some small routine job in a vast undertaking, does not care to look beyond the lever of a machine, does not choose to know how the machine got there or what makes his job possible, and proclaims that the management of the undertaking is parasitical and unnecessary.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Always assume incompetence before looking for conspiracy.
quotes.name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.message: Incompetence, in my books, is the failure of the critical faculties to interfere constructively with the natural flow.
quotes.name: Robert Genn

quotes.message: Man cannot live by incompetence alone.
quotes.name: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.message: The price of loyalty is incompetence.
quotes.name: Jonathan Alter

quotes.message: One moment of incompetence can be fatal.
quotes.name: Frank Herbert

quotes.message: Laziness has become the chief characteristic of journalism, displacing incompetence.
quotes.name: Kingsley Amis

quotes.message: The most dangerous irony is, people are angry with others because of their own incompetence.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Any constraint is part of the skeleton that you build the composition on - including your own incompetence.
quotes.name: Brian Eno

quotes.message: The Andrew Principle is when the incompetence of an organization exceeds the incompetence of certain individuals within that organization, thereby allowing their promotion within said organization.
quotes.name: Chris Alexander

quotes.message: Incompetence plus incompetence equals incompetence.
quotes.name: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.message: Ignorance is the worst liberation. To know even a few is better than knowing nothing at all.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: t shattered something inside me that hadn't been broken before.
quotes.name: E. Lockhart

quotes.message: Upon your shattered ruins where This vine will flourish still, as rare, As fresh, as fragrant as of old. Love will not crumble.
quotes.name: Eleanor Farjeon

quotes.message: When it seems that someone has shattered your dreams....pick up even the smallest of pieces and use them to build bigger and better dreams.
quotes.name: Jeremy Irons

quotes.message: When your heart is shattered into a million pieces, all you can do is try to keep holding on. You breathe. You try to fall asleep. You try to not think about him.
quotes.name: Susane Colasanti

quotes.message: It's what's buried deep inside that frightens me because it's broken, like a shattered mirror.
quotes.name: Jessica Sorensen

quotes.message: Shattered people are best represented by bits and pieces.
quotes.name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.message: But those with shattered souls find it very difficult to speak.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Smart

quotes.message: Shattered legs may heal in time, but some betrayals fester and poison the soul.
quotes.name: George R. R. Martin

quotes.message: A shattered illusion is a sorrowful experience; but a life without illusion is a sorrowful life.
quotes.name: José Narosky

quotes.message: You can be broken into a dozen shattered pieces and still heal the world because service has its own medicine--hope.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Your heart will be shattered by sorrow if you force it to live in tomorrow's ephemeral imagination - world instead of in today's eternal reality - now.
quotes.name: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.message: The eye, like a shattered mirror, multiplies the images of sorrow.
quotes.name: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.message: The only thing a boyfriend was good for was a shattered heart.
quotes.name: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.message: There is always more surface to a shattered object than a whole.
quotes.name: Djuna Barnes

quotes.message: Every time he left, I shattered apart.
quotes.name: Rachel Higginson

quotes.message: When your world has shattered, ain't nothing else matters. It ain't over, it's only love and that's all.
quotes.name: Bryan Adams

quotes.message: When you break up, your whole identity is shattered. It's like death.
quotes.name: Dennis Quaid

quotes.message: It can take years to mold a dream. It takes only a fraction of a second for it to be shattered.
quotes.name: Mary E. Pearson

quotes.message: Total loyalty is possible only when fidelity is emptied of all concrete content, from which changes of mind might naturally arise.
quotes.name: Hannah Arendt

quotes.message: Loyalty is still the same, whether it win or lose the game; true as a dial to the sun, although it be not shined upon.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: Loyalty means giving me your honest opinion, whether you think I'll like it or not. Disagreement, at this state, stimulates me. But once a decision is made, the debate ends. From that point on, loyalty means executing the decision as if it were your own.
quotes.name: General Colin Powell

quotes.message: If put to the pinch, an ounce of loyalty is worth a pound of cleverness.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Loyalty isn't grey. It's black and white. You're either loyal completely, or not loyal at all.
quotes.name: Sharnay

quotes.message: Loyalty cannot be blueprinted. It cannot be produced on an assembly line. In fact, it cannot be manufactured at all, for its origin is the human heart-the center of self-respect and human dignity. It is a force which leaps into being only when conditions are exactly right for it-and it is a force very sensitive to betrayal.
quotes.name: Maurice R. Franks

quotes.message: You cannot buy loyalty; you cannot buy the devotion of hearts, minds, and souls. You have to earn these things.
quotes.name: Clarence Francis

quotes.message: The only people I owe my loyalty to are those who never made me question theirs.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: If loyalty is, and always has been, perceived as obsolete, why do we continue to praise it? Because loyalty is essential to the most basic things that make life livable. Without loyalty there can be no love. Without loyalty there can be no family. Without loyalty there can be no friendship. Without loyalty there can be no commitment to community or country. And without those things, there can be no society.
quotes.name: Eric Felten

quotes.message: Don't let your loyalty become slavery. If they don't appreciate what you bring to the table, let them eat alone.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Our modern, rootless times do seem to be a particularly inhospitable environment for loyalty. We come and go so relentlessly that our friendships can't but come and go too. What sort of loyalty is there in the age of Facebook, when friendship is a costless transaction, a business of flip reciprocity.... Friendship held together by nothing more permanent than hyperlinks is hardly the stuff of selfless fidelity.
quotes.name: Eric Felten

quotes.message: Loyalty to a petrified opinion never yet broke a chain or freed a human soul.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: The highest spiritual quality, the noblest property of mind a man can have, is this of loyalty ... a man with no loyalty in him, with no sense of love or reverence or devotion due to something outside and above his poor daily life, with its pains and pleasures, profits and losses, is as evil a case as man can be.
quotes.name: Algernon Charles Swinburne

quotes.message: I'll take fifty percent efficiency to get one hundred percent loyalty.
quotes.name: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.message: Loyalty is a fine quality, but in excess it fills political graveyards.
quotes.name: Neil Kinnock

quotes.message: Loyalty to the country always. Loyalty to the government when it deserves it.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Unlike the puerile loyalty to a conviction, loyalty to a friend is a virtue — perhaps the only virtue, the last remaining one.
quotes.name: Milan Kundera

quotes.message: Loyalty to an unjust cause is a perversion of honor.
quotes.name: Brian Herbert & Kevin J. Anderson

quotes.message: Loyalty publicly results in leverage privately.
quotes.name: Andy Stanley

quotes.message: Loyal companions are an unequaled grace, stanching fear before it bleeds you numb, a reliable antidote for creeping despair.
quotes.name: Dean Koontz

quotes.message: Loyalty and friendship, which is to me the same, created all the wealth that I've ever thought I'd have.
quotes.name: Ernie Banks

quotes.message: Loyalty is a characteristic trait. Those who have it, give it free of charge.
quotes.name: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.message: Loyalty to the family must be merged into loyalty to the community, loyalty to the community into loyalty to the nation, and loyalty to the nation into loyalty to mankind. The citizen of the future must be a citizen of the world.
quotes.name: Thomas Cochrane

quotes.message: Those who don't know the value of loyalty can never appreciate the cost of betrayal.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Confidentiality is a virtue of the loyal, as loyalty is the virtue of faithfulness.
quotes.name: Cheryl Cole

quotes.message: Within the hearts of men, loyalty and consideration are esteemed greater than success.
quotes.name: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.message: An intelligent and conscientious opposition is a part of loyalty to country.
quotes.name: Bainbridge Colby

quotes.message: Loyalty is what makes us trust, Trust is what makes us stay, Staying is what makes us love, and love is what gives us hope.
quotes.name: Glenn van Dekken

quotes.message: No more important duty can be urged upon those who are entering the great theater of life than simple loyalty to their best convictions.
quotes.name: Edwin Hubbell Chapin

quotes.message: Loyalty ... is a realization that America was born of revolt, flourished in dissent, became great through experimentation.
quotes.name: Henry S. Commager

quotes.message: We are all in the same boat, in a stormy sea, and we owe each other a terrible loyalty.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: The greater the loyalty of a group toward the group, the greater is the motivation among the members to achieve the goals of the group, and the greater the probability that the group will achieve its goals.
quotes.name: Rensis Likert

quotes.message: If a man asks me for my loyalty...I will give him my honesty. If a man asks me for my honesty...
quotes.name: John Boyd

quotes.message: We must not confuse dissent with disloyalty. When the loyal opposition dies, I think the soul of America dies with it.
quotes.name: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.message: Be loyal and trustworthy. Do not befriend anyone who is lower than yourself in this regard.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: You don't earn loyalty in a day. You earn loyalty day- by- day.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.message: Unless you can find some sort of loyalty, you cannot find unity and peace in your active living.
quotes.name: Josiah Royce

quotes.message: Loyalty A will, a decision, a resolution of the soul.
quotes.name: Pascal Mercier

quotes.message: I have a loyalty that runs in my bloodstream, when I lock into someone or something, you can't get me away from it because I commit that thoroughly. That's in friendship, that's a deal, that's a commitment. Don't give me paper — I can get the same lawyer who drew it up to break it. But if you shake my hand, that's for life..
quotes.name: Jerry Lewis

quotes.message: Be loyal to those who are not present. In doing so, you build the trust of those who are present.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: A woman's loyalty is tested when her man has nothing. A man's loyalty is tested when he has everything.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Loyalty means I am down with you whether you are wrong or right, but I will tell you when you are wrong and help you get it right.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Loyalty is the highest virtue taught by abusers, and used as a control tool.
quotes.name: Dr Bill Tollefson

quotes.message: Fidelity purchased with money, money can destroy.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: It is better to be faithful than famous.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: The scholar does not consider gold and jade to be precious treasures, but loyalty and good faith.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Where there is loyalty, weapons are of no use.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: I'll take fifty percent efficiency to get one hundred percent loyalty.
quotes.name: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.message: Total loyalty is possible only when fidelity is emptied of all concrete content, from which changes of mind might naturally arise.
quotes.name: Hannah Arendt

quotes.message: An ounce of loyalty is worth a pound of cleverness.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Loyalty will not permit envy, hate, and uncharitableness to creep into our public thinking.
quotes.name: Bainbridge Colby

quotes.message: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family, that it remains the measure of our stability because it measures our sense of loyalty.
quotes.name: Haniel Long

quotes.message: We both have a great loyalty to it, and I think that it's important to give it our best shot.
quotes.name: Nicholas Lea

quotes.message: You've got to give loyalty down, if you want loyalty up.
quotes.name: Donald T. Regan

quotes.message: Loyalty means nothing unless it has at its heart the absolute principle of self-sacrifice.
quotes.name: Woodrow T. Wilson

quotes.message: When does loyalty become martyrdom?
quotes.name: Robert Charles Wilson

quotes.message: Loyalty is something you give regardless of what you get back, and in giving loyalty, you're getting more loyalty; and out of loyalty flow other great qualities.
quotes.name: Charles Tremendous Jones

quotes.message: Unless you can find some sort of loyalty, you cannot find unity and peace in your active living.
quotes.name: Josiah Royce

quotes.message: Lack of loyalty is one of the major causes of failure in every walk of life.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: A family in harmony will prosper in everything.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life. Rarely do members of one family grow up under the same roof.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: Loyalty means giving me your honest opinion, whether you think I'll like it or not. Disagreement, at this state, stimulates me. But once a decision is made, the debate ends. From that point on, loyalty means executing the decision as if it were your own.
quotes.name: General Colin Powell

quotes.message: You cannot buy loyalty; you cannot buy the devotion of hearts, minds, and souls. You have to earn these things.
quotes.name: Clarence Francis

quotes.message: Loyalty isn't grey. It's black and white. You're either loyal completely, or not loyal at all.
quotes.name: Sharnay

quotes.message: You don't earn loyalty in a day. You earn loyalty day- by- day.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.message: Loyalty is a characteristic trait. Those who have it, give it free of charge.
quotes.name: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.message: Be loyal to those who are not present. In doing so, you build the trust of those who are present.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: Loyalty is what makes us trust, Trust is what makes us stay, Staying is what makes us love, and love is what gives us hope.
quotes.name: Glenn van Dekken

quotes.message: Loyalty is the highest virtue taught by abusers, and used as a control tool.
quotes.name: Dr Bill Tollefson

quotes.message: We are all in the same boat, in a stormy sea, and we owe each other a terrible loyalty.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Where there is loyalty, weapons are of no use.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: The whole point of loyalty was not to change: stick with those who stuck with you.
quotes.name: Larry McMurtry

quotes.message: Nothing is more noble, nothing more venerable than fidelity. Faithfulness and truth are the most sacred excellences and endowments of the human mind.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: The only true test of loyalty is fidelity in the face of ruin and despair.
quotes.name: Eric Felten

quotes.message: I'm very loyal in relationships. Even when I go out with my mom I don't look at other moms.
quotes.name: Garry Shandling

quotes.message: The strength of a family, like the strength of an army, is in its loyalty to each other.
quotes.name: Mario Puzo

quotes.message: I don't like to give up on people when they need someone not to give up on them.
quotes.name: Carrol Bryant

quotes.message: Birds of a feather flock together.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: A healthy loyalty is not passive and complacent, but active and critical.
quotes.name: Harold Laski

quotes.message: Loyalty is a major force making for unity in any life-even in the existence of a civilization.... It gives point and flavor, most of all meaning, to a life or a culture.
quotes.name: Harmon M. Gehr

quotes.message: There is one element that is worth its weight in gold and that is loyalty. It will cover a multitude of weaknesses.
quotes.name: Philip Armour

quotes.message: Loyalty will not permit envy, hate, and uncharitableness to creep into our public thinking.
quotes.name: Bainbridge Colby

quotes.message: He speaketh not; and yet there lies a conversation in his eyes.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: It is better to be faithful than famous.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Commitment is an act, not a word.
quotes.name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.message: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Faithfulness lives where love is stronger than instinct.
quotes.name: Paul Carvel

quotes.message: Loyalty and devotion lead to bravery. Bravery leads to the spirit of self-sacrifice. The spirit of self-sacrifice creates trust in the power of love.
quotes.name: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.message: I like people who are loyal to me, and I like to be loyal, too.
quotes.name: George Strait

quotes.message: It is the soul's duty to be loyal to its own desires. It must abandon itself to its master passion.
quotes.name: Rebecca West

quotes.message: Very few people deserted me when I went to prison. They stayed loyal.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Archer

quotes.message: A little thing is a little thing, but faithfulness in little things is a great thing.
quotes.name: Hudson Taylor

quotes.message: It takes a deep commitment to change and an even deeper commitment to grow.
quotes.name: Ralph Ellison

quotes.message: Commitment. This is my favorite word because in some way, people who are committed are always much more interesting and much more reliable, and much more, I would say, deep than people who are not.
quotes.name: Carlos Ghosn

quotes.message: It gives me strength to have somebody to fight for; I can never fight for myself, but, for others, I can kill.
quotes.name: Emilie Autumn

quotes.message: If by my life or death I can protect you, I will.
quotes.name: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.message: If you are patient in one moment of anger, you will escape a hundred days of sorrow.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Anger and jealousy can no more bear to lose sight of their objects than love.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: It is easy to fly into a passion--anybody can do that--but to be angry with the right person and at the right time and with the right object and in the right way--that is not easy, and it is not everyone who can do it.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Be not hasty in thy spirit to be angry: for anger resteth in the bosom of fools.
quotes.name: Ecclesiastes 7:9

quotes.message: I was angry with my friend I told my wrath, my wrath did end. I was angry with my foe: I told it not, my wrath did grow.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: A man is measured by the size of things that anger him.
quotes.name: Geof Greenleaf

quotes.message: Do not do to others what angers you if done to you by others.
quotes.name: Isocrates

quotes.message: Be not angry that you cannot make others as you wish them to be, since you cannot make yourself as you wish to be.
quotes.name: Thomas Kempis

quotes.message: When angry, count ten before you speak; if very angry, an hundred.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: It's practically impossible to look at a penguin and feel angry.
quotes.name: Joe Moore

quotes.message: Never write a letter while you are angry.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: There was never an angry man that thought his anger unjust.
quotes.name: Saint Francis de Sales

quotes.message: The greatest remedy for anger is delay.
quotes.name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: Laying aside falsehood, speak truth each one of you with his neighbor, for we are members of one another. Be angry, and yet do not sin; do not let the sun go down on your anger, and do not give the devil an opportunity.
quotes.name: Ephesians 4:25-27

quotes.message: Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight.
quotes.name: Phyllis Diller

quotes.message: Get mad, then get over it.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: Heaven has no rage like love to hatred turned, Nor hell a fury like a woman scorned.
quotes.name: William Congreve

quotes.message: He who angers you conquers you.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Kenny

quotes.message: If a small thing has the power to make you angry, does that not indicate something about your size?
quotes.name: Sydney J Harris

quotes.message: When anger rises, think of the consequences.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Anger makes dull men witty, but it keeps them poor.
quotes.name: Elizabeth I

quotes.message: Anger as soon as fed is dead- 'Tis starving makes it fat.
quotes.name: Emily Dickinson

quotes.message: If you do not wish to be prone to anger, do not feed the habit; give it nothing which may tend to its increase.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Never forget what a man says to you when he is angry.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Speak when you are angry--and you will make the best speech you'll ever regret.
quotes.name: Laurence J Peter

quotes.message: A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger.
quotes.name: Proverbs 15:1

quotes.message: How much more grievous are the consequences of anger than the causes of it.
quotes.name: Marcus Aelius Aurelius

quotes.message: Speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Life is too short to think small. Chase your dreams. Make the impossible happen.
quotes.name: Aysel Gunar

quotes.message: Don't be afraid to imagine your biggest dream becoming a reality.
quotes.name: Aysel Gunar

quotes.message: The amount of work it takes your brain to work on chasing a small dream versus a big dream is the same. You are more likely to be inspired and motivated if the dream is larger and seemingly impossible to achieve.
quotes.name: Aysel Gunar

quotes.message: Start with a dream. Maybe a dream that is personal and small, but worth doing. Then dream a bigger dream. Keep dreaming until your dreams seem impossible to achieve. Then you'll know you're on the right track. Then you'll know you're ready to conjure up a dream big enough to define your future and perhaps your generation's future.
quotes.name: Vance Coffman

quotes.message: Dream big and chase your dreams—hold on to optimism—even in failure, amazing things will happen.
quotes.name: Bill Clinton

quotes.message: You see things and you say 'Why?' But I dream things that never were; and I say 'Why not?'
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than the one with all the facts.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.message: Far away there in the sunshine are my highest aspirations. I may not reach them, but I can look up and see their beauty, believe in them and try to follow where they lead.
quotes.name: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.message: Dream big. Infinity has room for the possibilities of you.
quotes.name: Anne Neil

quotes.message: You are never too old to set another goal or dream a new dream.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: The American dream is about equal opportunity for everyone who works hard.
quotes.name: Barbara Bush

quotes.message: You have to have a big vision and take very small steps to get there. You have to be humble as you execute but visionary and gigantic in terms of your aspirations.
quotes.name: Jason Calacanis

quotes.message: A noble man compares and estimates himself by an idea which is higher than himself; and a mean man, by one lower than himself. The one produces aspiration; the other ambition, which is the way in which a vulgar man aspires.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: The heart is a small thing, but desireth great matters.
quotes.name: Quarles

quotes.message: There is not a heart but has its moments of longing, yearning for something better, nobler, holier than it knows now.
quotes.name: H.W. Beecher

quotes.message: The desires and longings of man are vast as eternity, and they point him to it.
quotes.name: Tyron Edwards

quotes.message: It is not for a man to rest in absolute contentment.—He is born to hopes and aspirations as the sparks fly upward, unless he has brutified his nature and quenched the spirit of immortality which is portion.
quotes.name: Southey

quotes.message: This world is a dream within a dream; and as we grow older, each step is an awakening.
quotes.name: Walter Scott

quotes.message: In great attempts, it is glorious even to fail.
quotes.name: Longinus

quotes.message: Aim at the sun, and you may not reach it; but your arrow will fly far higher than if aimed at an object on a level with yourself.
quotes.name: J. Hawes

quotes.message: High aims form high characters, and great objects bring out great minds.
quotes.name: Tyron Edwards

quotes.message: I gotta dream big cause when it happen it's gonna happen real quick (yes I feel it, I gotta) . I gotta move fast cause when it happen I can't let it move past (only get one chance).
quotes.name: Jazmine Sullivan

quotes.message: Big dreams in a small town . Guess it's time to settle down . Don't ya like the way it sounds . You and me in a small town.
quotes.name: Dave Robbins

quotes.message: When you got big dreams . don't listen to what nobody say . and don't let nobody turn you away . When you got big dreams . keep your eyes on the prize . don't fall to the waste side.
quotes.name: James Phillips

quotes.message: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn’t do than by the ones you did. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: All big things in this world are done by people who are naïve and have an idea that is obviously impossible.
quotes.name: Frank Richards

quotes.message: All successful people men and women are big dreamers. They imagine what their future could be, ideal in every respect, and then they work every day toward their distant vision, that goal or purpose.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: If your dream is a big dream, and if you want your life to work on the high level that you say you do, there's no way around doing the work it takes to get you there.
quotes.name: Joyce Chapman

quotes.message: If your thoughts are as tall as the height of your ceiling, you can’t fly above your room.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: The world around you may ask you to stop dreaming big, as it could create insecurity in their lives. Dream big anyway, dance to your own music and let them dance to theirs.
quotes.name: Mridula Singh

quotes.message: I always say, 'To have a big dream requires the same effort as having a small dream.
quotes.name: Jorge Paulo Lemann

quotes.message: I tell aspiring young skaters to dream big, work hard, have fun, and follow their passion. It's simple to say never give up, but learn from your mistakes to keep growing.
quotes.name: Michelle Kwan

quotes.message: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: The more you can dream, the more you can do.
quotes.name: Michael Korda

quotes.message: We will only grow as big as we dream that's why we must dream big.
quotes.name: Gabrielle Williams

quotes.message: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.name: Harriet Tubman

quotes.message: Whatever you do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius and power and magic in it.
quotes.name: Goethe

quotes.message: If you have a dream, don't just sit there. Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality.
quotes.name: Dr Roopleen

quotes.message: Dare to dream big. Never fear to fail. Take actions with love.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: If a little dreaming is dangerous, the cure for it is not to dream less but to dream more, to dream all the time.
quotes.name: Marcel Proust

quotes.message: Dream big dreams! Imagine that you have no limitations and then decide what's right before you decide what's possible.
quotes.name: Brian Tracey

quotes.message: No matter how small you start, always dream and think big. If you start with small thoughts then you will stay with small thoughts.
quotes.name: Stephen Richards

quotes.message: Always dream big dreams. Big dreams attract big people.
quotes.name: Dave Liniger

quotes.message: Dream big and your problems become small.
quotes.name: Vishen Lakhiani

quotes.message: To dream is to have a chest filled with stars, a mind captivated by possibilities and a heart enveloped in imagination.
quotes.name: Anastasia Bolinder

quotes.message: You can go as far as you dream, think and imagine.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: You must dream big and dream often. Take risks and see what happens.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: Dream big for you can't stuff a great life into a small dream.
quotes.name: Barb Rees

quotes.message: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in your soul. Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
quotes.name: Pamela Vaull Starr

quotes.message: Dream the impossible. See the invisible. Pursue the intangible. Achieve the incredible.
quotes.name: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.message: There is no need to reach high for the stars.
