quotes.name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.message: For souls in growth, great quarrels are great emancipations.
quotes.name: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.message: Women's history is the primary tool for women's emancipation.
quotes.name: Gerda Lerner

quotes.message: Even the largest army is nothing without a good general.
quotes.name: Afghan

quotes.message: He that cannot obey, cannot command.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: He who rules must fully humor as much as he commands.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: The good will of the governed will be starved if not fed by the good deeds of the governors.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The higher the monkey climbs, the more he shows his tail.
quotes.name: John Wycliffe

quotes.message: The master of the people is their servant.
quotes.name: Yemeni

quotes.message: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
quotes.name: John Quincy Adams

quotes.message: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it.
quotes.name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.message: Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: No man will make a great leader who wants to do it all himself, or to get all the credit for doing it.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: A man who wants to lead the orchestra must turn his back on the crowd.
quotes.name: Max Lucado

quotes.message: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
quotes.name: Warren Bennis

quotes.message: A man can only lead when others accept him as their leader, and he has only as much authority as his subjects give to him. All of the brilliant ideas in the world cannot save your kingdom if no one will listen to them.
quotes.name: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.message: Leadership does not always wear the harness of compromise.
quotes.name: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.message: The task of leadership is not to put greatness into humanity, but to elicit it, for the greatness is already there.
quotes.name: John Buchan

quotes.message: A gentle hand may lead even an elephant by a hair.
quotes.name: Iranian

quotes.message: A great one must have a long heart.
quotes.name: Ethiopian

quotes.message: A ruler must sometimes humor as well as command.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Great chiefs prove their worthiness.
quotes.name: Seneca Proverb

quotes.message: If the townspeople are happy, look to the chief.
quotes.name: Liberian

quotes.message: If you can't serve, you can't rule.
quotes.name: Bulgarian

quotes.message: In the country of the blind, the one-eyed man is king.
quotes.name: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.message: When we think we lead, we are most led.
quotes.name: Lord Byron

quotes.message: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Never give an order that can't be obeyed.
quotes.name: General Douglas MacArthur

quotes.message: Don't tell people how to do things, tell them what to do and let them surprise you with their results.
quotes.name: George Patton

quotes.message: Example is not the main thing in influencing others. It is the only thing.
quotes.name: Albert Schweiter

quotes.message: You do not lead by hitting people over the head. That's assault, not leadership.
quotes.name: Dwight Eisenhower

quotes.message: Anyone can hold the helm when the sea is calm.
quotes.name: Publilus Syrus

quotes.message: Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren't used to an environment where excellence is expected.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves.
quotes.name: Ray Kroc

quotes.message: Lead, follow, or get out of the way.
quotes.name: Thomas Pane

quotes.message: It's hard to lead a cavalry charge if you think you look funny on a horse.
quotes.name: Adlai Stevenson II

quotes.message: He who cannot be a good follower cannot be a good leader.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: If you would convince a man that he does wrong, do right. But do not care to convince him. Men will believe what they see. Let them see.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.name: Harold McAlindon

quotes.message: The art of leadership is saying no, not yes. It is very easy to say yes.
quotes.name: Tony Blair

quotes.message: Part of the happiness of life consists not in fighting battles, but in avoiding them. A masterly retreat is in itself a victory.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Leadership and learning are indispensable to one another.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Don't find fault, find a remedy.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: Learn to see things backwards, inside out, and upside down.
quotes.name: John Heider

quotes.message: Speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things.
quotes.name: Peter Drucker

quotes.message: Good leadership consists of showing average people how to do the work of superior people.
quotes.name: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.message: Power isn’t control at all — power is strength, and giving that strength to others. A leader isn’t someone who forces others to make him stronger; a leader is someone willing to give his strength to others that they may have the strength to stand on their own.
quotes.name: Beth Revis

quotes.message: Leadership is simple: Add value to people everyday.
quotes.name: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.message: Our recovery didn't happen by accident. It happened because we did what we were hired to do: to lead and manage by results.
quotes.name: Michael Bloomberg

quotes.message: The key to being a good leader is to focus on the mission and know how to implement a plan without getting lost in the swamp!
quotes.name: Donald J. Palmisano

quotes.message: Leadership starts with respecting others and paying attention to the needs of those around you. Respecting those who you lead, may lead, follow or just touch with your mind and eyes. You don't lead because you want to lead; you lead because they want to follow.
quotes.name: Norman McSwain

quotes.message: The manager asks how and when; the leader asks what and why.
quotes.name: Warren G. Bennis

quotes.message: Leadership is an art that includes possessing a vision based on unwavering principles, and an ability to inspire and encourage others to be leaders.
quotes.name: W. Jeff Terry

quotes.message: A swift and vigorous transition to attack—the flashing sword of vengeance—is the most brilliant point of the defensive.
quotes.name: Karl von Clausewitz

quotes.message: Leadership is about identifying where you want to go, why it is important to go, and what's in it for others—both the positive and the negative. Leaders lead by example. Leadership is personal. It is working shoulder to shoulder. You must show you are willing to get your hands dirty. You must work at least as hard as those you wish to lead. They eat first. They get sleeping quarters first. You will put yourself at risk, both professionally and physically. Leadership is service before self.
quotes.name: Dr. James P. Bagian

quotes.message: You must lead from the front, always. Speed is everything. There must be a sense of urgency. Listen to the locals. Keep the public informed on the details, they often know more than the Nobel Prize Laureates. Ignore the politics; focus on doing a good job.
quotes.name: Governor Jindal

quotes.message: Leadership is action, not position.
quotes.name: Donald H. McGannon

quotes.message: A good leader is someone who sees beyond themselves and really thinks about how they can move their organization forward by helping others to fulfill their potential.
quotes.name: Sharon Allen

quotes.message: Leadership is hard to define and good leadership even harder. But if you can get people to follow you to the ends of the earth, you are a great leader.
quotes.name: Indra Nooyi

quotes.message: Leadership is a series of behaviors rather than a role for heroes.
quotes.name: Margaret Wheatley

quotes.message: Leadership is something that is learned. It can be learned and should be learned. Leadership is something you're always honing and learning and reflecting to see ways you could have been better at it. Anyone who thinks they're a natural leader is probably horrible to work with.
quotes.name: Rachel Sklar

quotes.message: I want every little girl who's told she is bossy to be told she has leadership skills.
quotes.name: Sheryl Sandburg

quotes.message: Lead from the front; don't push from the rear.
quotes.name: Frances Hesselbein

quotes.message: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: I must follow the people.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit.
quotes.name: Arnold Glasow

quotes.message: The first responsibility of a leader is to define reality. The last is to say thank you. In between, the leader is a servant.
quotes.name: Max Depree

quotes.message: Lead me, follow me, or get out of my way.
quotes.name: General George Patton

quotes.message: Unbounded courage and compassion join'd, . Tempering each other in the victor's mind, . Alternately proclaim him good and great, . And make the hero and the man complete.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Leadership is leading from the front, saying what needs to be done, doing what needs to be done, inspiring your followers, and persuading your critics.
quotes.name: Richard L. Reece

quotes.message: The six essential leadership attributes: set high standards; live your standards and mentor those who follow; create and share a vision; make the hard choices when necessary; be visible and outfront; and instill hope in those who follow.
quotes.name: John Di Frances

quotes.message: Again and again, an enlightened and strong-willed individual has pushed against the prevailing trends and the prevailing wisdom to perform an act of courage that changed history.
quotes.name: Paul Johnson

quotes.message: The best executive is the one who has sense enough to pick good men to do what he wants done, and self-restraint to keep from meddling with them while they do it.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: People ask the difference between a leader and a boss. The leader works in the open, and the boss in covert. The leader leads, and the boss drives.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: The test of leadership is not to put greatness into humanity, but to elicit it, for the greatness is already there.
quotes.name: James Buchanan

quotes.message: Take the ideas of the masses and concentrate them, then go to the masses, persevere in the ideas and carry them through, so as to form correct ideas of leadership—such is the basic method of leadership.
quotes.name: Mao Zedong

quotes.message: Leadership means making people feel good.
quotes.name: Jean Chrétien

quotes.message: Connect before you collaborate. Listen before you lead. Partner before you persuade.
quotes.name: Jo Miller

quotes.message: Leadership includes being able to confidently convey your message and the ability to confidently convey who you are.
quotes.name: Monica L. Wofford

quotes.message: When matters are desperate we must put on a desperate face.
quotes.name: Robert Burns

quotes.message: Desperate times call for desperate measures.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: Mankind at its most desperate is often at its best.
quotes.name: Bob Geldof

quotes.message: Because I remember, I despair. Because I remember, I have the duty to reject despair.
quotes.name: Elie Wiesel

quotes.message: When a man is in despair, it means that he still believes in something.
quotes.name: Dmitri Shostakovich

quotes.message: The desperate usually succeed because they have nothing to lose.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: There is nobody more terrible than the desperate.
quotes.name: Alexander Suvorov

quotes.message: If you are curious, you will learn. If you are desperate, you will discover.
quotes.name: Mooji

quotes.message: Desperation can make a person do surprising things.
quotes.name: Veronica Roth

quotes.message: A starving man won't notice a dirty plate.
quotes.name: Mary Renault

quotes.message: Desperate ills need desperate remedies.
quotes.name: Agatha Christie

quotes.message: When things are desperate, there is no need to pretend that everything is beautiful.
quotes.name: Tenzin Gyatso

quotes.message: Desperation is often more powerful than inspiration.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: Desperation is like stealing from the Mafia: you stand a good chance of attracting the wrong attention.
quotes.name: Douglas Horton

quotes.message: Desperate times call for desperate analogies.
quotes.name: John Diamond

quotes.message: When one hits the bottom of the Desperation Barrel, there is always someone down there.
quotes.name: Kelli Jae Baeli

quotes.message: Sometimes that's all life is... One desperate act after another.
quotes.name: Terry Goodkind

quotes.message: There are no desperate situations, there are only desperate people.
quotes.name: Heinz Guderian

quotes.message: Life begins on the other side of despair.
quotes.name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.message: When the situation is desperate, it is too late to be serious. Be playful.
quotes.name: Edward Abbey

quotes.message: Human beings do not readily admit desperation. When they do, the kingdom of heaven draws near.
quotes.name: Philip Yancey

quotes.message: Beware of desperate steps; the darkest day, lived till tomorrow, will have passed away.
quotes.name: William Cowper

quotes.message: Desperation is a necessary ingredient to learning anything, or creating anything. Period. If you ain't desperate at some point, you ain't interesting.
quotes.name: Jim Carrey

quotes.message: Tempt not a desperate man.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: But desperation is the mother-in-law of invention.
quotes.name: Laura Marney

quotes.message: But a desperate heart will seduce the mind.
quotes.name: Mitch Albom

quotes.message: Desperation makes men fearless.
quotes.name: Jocelyn Murray

quotes.message: Like carnivores to carnal pleasures as are we to desperate measures.
quotes.name: Harvey Danger

quotes.message: When they face desperation... human beings become animals.
quotes.name: Dan Brown

quotes.message: Desperation is sometimes as powerful an inspirer as genius.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Despair makes victims sometimes victors.
quotes.name: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.message: A dog in desperation will leap over a wall.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.message: Brilliance is born of Desperation.
quotes.name: Jayanth Komarneni

quotes.message: The greatest inspiration is often born of desperation
quotes.name: Comer Cotrell

quotes.message: That if desperate times call for desperate measures, then I'm free to act as desperately as I wish.
quotes.name: Suzanne Collins

quotes.message: Feeling lost, crazy and desperate belongs to a good life as much as optimism, certainty and reason.
quotes.name: Alain De Botton

quotes.message: Who knows where inspiration comes from. Perhaps it arises from desperation. Perhaps it comes from the flukes of the universe, the kindness of the muses.
quotes.name: Amy Tan

quotes.message: We all need money, but there are degrees of desperation.
quotes.name: Anthony Burgess

quotes.message: Be still, and the world is bound to turn herself inside out to entertain you. Everywhere you look, joyful noise is clanging to drown out quiet desperation.
quotes.name: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.message: Salvation now consists of a deep wrestling in our souls with the sinfulness of our hearts, the depth of our depravity, and the desperation of our need for his grace.
quotes.name: David Platt

quotes.message: Under miserable conditions of life, any vision of the possibility of better things makes the present misery more intolerable, and spurs those who suffer to the most energetic struggles to improve their lot, and if these struggles only immediately result in sharper misery, the outcome is sheer desperation.
quotes.name: Emma Goldman

quotes.message: Success is the good fortune that comes from aspiration, desperation, perspiration,and inspiration.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: Don't despair, not even over the fact that you don't despair.
quotes.name: Franz Kafka

quotes.message: Folly and desperation are ofttimes hard to tell apart.
quotes.name: George R. R. Martin

quotes.message: Desperation can toy with you and if you give desperation any wiggle room, it will find alternative answers.
quotes.name: Harlan Coben

quotes.message: Hope means to keep living amid desperation and to keep humming in the darkness.
quotes.name: Henri Nouwen

quotes.message: Most men lead lives of quiet desperation and go to the grave with the song still in them.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: It is a characteristic of wisdom not to do desperate things.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Despair is the price one pays for setting oneself an impossible aim.
quotes.name: Henry Graham Greene

quotes.message: The tragedy of it is that nobody sees the look of desperation on my face. Thousands and thousands of us, and we're passing one another without a look of recognition.
quotes.name: Henry Miller

quotes.message: Every age yearns for a more beautiful world. The deeper the desperation and the depression about the confusing present, the more intense that yearning.
quotes.name: Johan Huizinga

quotes.message: Despair is the damp of hell, as joy is the serenity of heaven.
quotes.name: John Donne

quotes.message: But I'm not here just to make records and money. I'm here to say something and to touch other people, sometimes in a cry of desperation.
quotes.name: Keith Richards

quotes.message: Even in the inevitable moments when all seems hopeless, men know that without hope they cannot really live, and in agonizing desperation, they cry for the bread of hope.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King

quotes.message: Finding permanent and universal causes for misfortune is the practice of despair.
quotes.name: Martin Seligman

quotes.message: Consequences lost all purchase when they became mad. And desperation, when pressed beyond anguish, became narcotic.
quotes.name: R. Scott Bakker

quotes.message: Killing yourself is a major commitment, it takes a kind of courage. Most people just lead lives of cowardly desperation. It's kinda half suicide where you just dull yourself with substances.
quotes.name: Robert Crumb

quotes.message: Despair is not a particularly respectable condition and yet despair and delight alternate like systole and diastole in my heart.
quotes.name: Stephanie Mills

quotes.message: When you're at the end of your rope, tie a knot and hold on.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: In life you need either inspiration or desperation.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: Desperation is the raw material of drastic change. Only those who can leave behind everything they have ever believed in can hope to escape.
quotes.name: William S. Burroughs

quotes.message: Beware of driving men to desperation. Even a cornered rat is dangerous.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Charity begins at home.
quotes.name: Terence

quotes.message: Peace, like charity, begins at home.
quotes.name: Franklin D Roosevelt

quotes.message: I hate nobody: I am in charity with the world.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: Every charitable act is a stepping stone toward heaven.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: He hath riches sufficient, who hath enough to be charitable.
quotes.name: Sir Thomas Browne

quotes.message: Too many have dispensed with generosity in order to practice charity.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Behold, I do not give lectures or a little charity, When I give, I give myself.
quotes.name: Walt Whitman

quotes.message: Real progress is progress in charity, all other advances being secondary thereto.
quotes.name: Aldous Leonard Huxley

quotes.message: If you haven't got charity in your heart, you have the worst kind of heart trouble.
quotes.name: Bob Hope

quotes.message: The worst of charity is that the lives you are asked to preserve are not worth preserving.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Enrich my heart, mouth, hands in me, With faith, with hope, with charity, That I may run, rise, rest with Thee.
quotes.name: George Herbert

quotes.message: Defer not charities till death; for certainly, if a man weigh it rightly, he that doth so is rather liberal of another man's than of his own.
quotes.name: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.message: The primal duties shine aloft, like stars; The charities that soothe and heal and bless Are scattered at the feet of man like flowers.
quotes.name: William Wordsworth

quotes.message: Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry and narrow-mindedness. Broad, wholesome, charitable views cannot be acquired by vegetating in one little corner of the earth.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Let a man then know his worth, and keep things under his feet. Let him not peep or steal, or skulk up and down with the air of a charity-boy, a bastard, or an interloper.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Charity sees the need not the cause.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: A bone to the dog is not charity. Charity is the bone shared with the dog, when you are just as hungry as the dog.
quotes.name: Jack London

quotes.message: Be charitable before wealth makes thee covetous.
quotes.name: Sir Thomas Browne

quotes.message: The charity that hastens to proclaim its good deeds, ceases to be charity, and is only pride and ostentation.
quotes.name: William Hutton

quotes.message: The envious die not once, but as oft as the envied win applause.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracin

quotes.message: It is never wise to seek or wish for another's misfortune. If malice or envy were tangible and had a shape, it would be the shape of a boomerang.
quotes.name: Charley Reese

quotes.message: Envy is the art of counting the other fellow's blessings instead of your own.
quotes.name: Harold Coffin

quotes.message: Envy is thin because it bites but never eats.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: Envy, if surrounded on all sides by the brightness of another's prosperity, like the scorpion confined within a circle of fire, will sting itself to death.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: Envy is the coward side of Hate, And all her ways are bleak and desolate.
quotes.name: Henry Abbey

quotes.message: Envy is a gun with a faulty breech-lock which flares back and burns the gunner.
quotes.name: Austin O'Malley

quotes.message: Envy is a littleness of soul, which cannot see beyond a certain point, and if it does not occupy the whole space, feels itself excluded.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Take heed you harbour not that vice call'd Envy, lest another's happiness be your torment, and God's blessing become your curse.
quotes.name: Wellins Calcott

quotes.message: Do not overrate what you have received, nor envy others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: It is in the character of very few men to honor without envy a friend who has prospered.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: A sound heart is the life of the flesh: but envy the rottenness of the bones.
quotes.name: Proverbs 14:30

quotes.message: Our envy of others devours us most of all.
quotes.name: Alexander Solzhenitsyn

quotes.message: Envy comes from people's ignorance of, or lack of belief in, their own gifts.
quotes.name: Jean Vanier

quotes.message: Rust consumes iron and envy consumes itself.
quotes.name: Danish Proverb

quotes.message: Envy is the tax which all distinction must pay.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Nothing sharpens sight like envy.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: Men are so constituted that every one undertakes what he sees another successful in, whether he has aptitude for it or not.
quotes.name: Johann Von Goethe

quotes.message: Envy among other ingredients has a mixture of the love of justice in it. We are more angry at undeserved than at deserved good-fortune.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: The envious person grows lean with the fatness of their neighbor.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Oh, what a bitter thing it is to look into happiness through another man's eyes.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Envy is more irreconcilable than hatred.
quotes.name: Franois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Envy feeds on the living, after death it rests, then the honor of a man protects him.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: Fools may our scorn, not envy, raise. For envy is a kind of praise.
quotes.name: John Gay

quotes.message: Envy is a symptom of lack of appreciation of our own uniqueness and self worth. Each of us has something to give that no one else has.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Envy shoots at others and wounds itself.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: Keep yourselves far from envy; it eateth up and taketh away good actions, like as fire eateth up and burneth wood.
quotes.name: Muhammad

quotes.message: Envy is ever joined with the comparing of a man's self; and where there is no comparison, no envy.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Envy is like a fly that passes all the body's sounder parts, and dwells upon the sores
quotes.name: Arthur Chapman

quotes.message: All envy is proportionate to desire; we are uneasy at the attainments of another, according as we think our own happiness would be advanced by the addition of that which he withholds from us.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: No one can have all he wants, but a man can refrain from wanting what he has not, and cheerfully make the best of a bird in the hand.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: For one man who sincerely pities our misfortunes, there are a thousand who sincerely hate our success.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: The envious speak from the heart about morality; they are consumed by hunger and begrudging. They tolerate, when no one else listens; and with the spur of spite, they applaud another's prosperity.
quotes.name: Charles Aldridge

quotes.message: Great power which incites great envy, hurls some men to destruction; they are drowned in a long splendid stream of honors.
quotes.name: Juvenal

quotes.message: Envy feeds on the living, after death it rests, then the honor of a man protects him.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: Whenever a friend succeeds, a little something in me dies.
quotes.name: Gore Vidal

quotes.message: There is no sweeter sound than the crumbling of ones fellow man.
quotes.name: Groucho Marx

quotes.message: Man will do many things to get himself loved; he will do all things to get himself envied.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Let age, not envy, draw wrinkles on thy cheeks.
quotes.name: Thomas Browne

quotes.message: It is in the character of very few men to honor without envy a friend who has prospered.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: Covetousness, which is idolatry.
quotes.name: The Bible

quotes.message: The laws would not prevent each man from living according to his inclination, unless individuals harmed each other; for envy creates the beginning of strife.
quotes.name: Democritus

quotes.message: It is better to be envied than pitied.
quotes.name: Herodotus

quotes.message: Envy has been, is, and shall be, the destruction of many. What is there, that Envy hath not defamed, or Malice left undefiled? Truly, no good thing.
quotes.name: Pythagoras

quotes.message: No man likes to be surpassed by those of this own level.
quotes.name: Titus Livy

quotes.message: Base envy withers at another's joy, And hates that excellence it cannot reach.
quotes.name: James Thomson

quotes.message: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: With that malignant envy which turns pale, And sickens, even if a friend prevail.
quotes.name: Charles Churchill

quotes.message: Nothing can allay the rage of biting envy.
quotes.name: Claudian

quotes.message: Envy follows worth as a shadow follows a body.
quotes.name: Spanish Proverb

quotes.message: Envy never has a holiday.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: Other people's things are more pleasing to us. and ours to other people.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: The envious man grows lean at the prosperity of another.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: Attribute not the good actions of another to bad causes; thou canst not know his heart but the world will know by this that thine is full of envy.
quotes.name: Akhenaton

quotes.message: There is no greater glory than love, nor any greater punishment than jealousy.
quotes.name: Felix Lope de Vega

quotes.message: Be aware of any feelings of envy that arise, and counter them by developing your own self-worth.
quotes.name: Yi Jung

quotes.message: As a moth gnaws a garment, so doth envy consumes a man.
quotes.name: John Chrysostom

quotes.message: Envy eats nothing but its own heart.
quotes.name: German Saying

quotes.message: Envy and pride are the leading lines to all the misery that mankind has suffered from the beginning of the world to this day.
quotes.name: John Marrant

quotes.message: Envy is the most stupid of vices, for there is no single advantage to be gained from it.
quotes.name: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.message: Whoever has freed himself from envy and bitterness may begin to try to see things as they are.
quotes.name: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.message: A show of envy is an insult to oneself.
quotes.name: Yevgeny Yevtushenko

quotes.message: Envy is but the smoke of low estate, ascending still against the fortunate.
quotes.name: Brooke

quotes.message: No crime is so great to envy as daring to excel.
quotes.name: Churchill

quotes.message: We are often vain of even the most criminal of our passions, but envy is so shameful a passion that we never dare to acknowledge it.
quotes.name: Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Envy ought to have no place allowed it in the heart of man; for the goods of this present world are so vile and low that they are beneath it, and those of the future world is so vast and exalted that they are above it.
quotes.name: Colton

quotes.message: If envy, like anger, did not burn itself in its own fire and consume and destroy those persons it possesses before it can destroy those it wishes worst to, it would set the whole world on fire, and leave the most excellent persons the most miserable.
quotes.name: Clarendon

quotes.message: Envy makes us see what will serve to accuse others, and not perceive what may justify them.
quotes.name: Bp Wilson

quotes.message: Envy and hatred try to pierce our neighbor with a sword. But the blade cannot reach him unless it first passes through our own body.
quotes.name: St. Augustine of Hippo

quotes.message: Envy is a denial of providence.
quotes.name: Stephen Charnock

quotes.message: If envy was not such a tearing thing to feel, it would be the most comic of sins. It is usually, if not always, based on a complete misunderstanding of another person's situation.
quotes.name: Monica Furlong

quotes.message: Envy takes the joy, happiness, and contentment out of living.
quotes.name: William Franklin

quotes.message: Envy of another man's calling can work havoc on our own.
quotes.name: Watchman Nee

quotes.message: Envy is sin, and it punisheth itself like gluttony; for it fretteth the heart, shorteneth the life, and eateth the flesh.
quotes.name: Henry Smith

quotes.message: As iron is eaten by rust, so are the envious consumed by envy.
quotes.name: Antisthenes

quotes.message: Envy is the basis of democracy.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: That envy is universal is best proved by the fact that it breaks out among the mad themselves in their brief intervals of lucidity.
quotes.name: E.M. Cioran

quotes.message: There is envy and jealousy sufficient in the world to seek to lessen a character however beneficial to the country or useful to the state.
quotes.name: Abigail Adams

quotes.message: Envy always implies conscious inferiority wherever it resides.
quotes.name: Pliny the Elder

quotes.message: Spite of his many successes, . Men loved him the same; . My one pale ray of good fortune . Met scoffing and blame. . When we erred, they gave him pity, . But me -- only shame.
quotes.name: Adelaide Anne Procter

quotes.message: Envy is a curse with the darkest shadow . Its yearning left unsettled in a greenish cast . Jealousy its evil twin beyond veracity purview . Coveting the burning torches —of all darkness past.
quotes.name: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.message: If you drink don't drive. Don't even putt.
quotes.name: Dean Martin

quotes.message: A drunk driver is very dangerous. So is a drunk backseat driver if he's persuasive.
quotes.name: Demetri Martin

quotes.message: Better To Arrive Sober And Late Than Never.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: It's as if people used the invention of seat belts as an opportunity to take up drunk driving.
quotes.name: John Lanchester

quotes.message: Their alcohol consumption levels haven't dropped much, but their drunk driving has.
quotes.name: James Lange

quotes.message: Drunk driving contains a far greater risk of violent death than the use or sale of illegal drugs, the societal response to drunk drivers has generally emphasized keeping the person functional and in society, while attempting to respond to the dangerous behavior through treatment and counseling.
quotes.name: Michelle Alexander

quotes.message: When people are really drunk they have a propensity to harm themselves and others they fall off buildings, they drive into other cars.
quotes.name: Emily Yoffe

quotes.message: Drinking and driving: there are stupider things, but it's a very short list.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: People that insist upon drinking and driving, are putting the quart before the hearse.
quotes.name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.message: If you're going to drive a Hummer and buy carbon offsets, that's like getting drunk every night and getting into an AA meeting, throwing money in the basket, and leaving.
quotes.name: Ed Begley, Jr.

quotes.message: This is interesting. Researchers have found that people who drive drunk are more dangerous on the road than drivers who are high on marijuana. Don't get too excited. It's mostly because the drivers using marijuana are just sitting in the Taco Bell drive-through.
quotes.name: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.message: More people die on a per mile basis from drunk walking than from drunk driving.
quotes.name: A. J. Jacobs

quotes.message: The problem with drinking and driving is the mourning after.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Sober Driving Today. Alive Tomorrow.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Driving under the influence of alcohol, or 'drunk driving,' is by far the most commonly encountered offense in the courts today.
quotes.name: Lawrence Taylor

quotes.message: Drunk driving is a deceptively difficult type of case to deal with, and the risks to the client are much higher than are generally appreciated.
quotes.name: Lawrence Taylor

quotes.message: The consequences and cots of youthful alcohol use are enormous. Many of these harmful consequences are immediate and all too evident--injuries due to impaired driving or violence.
quotes.name: Institute of Medicine

quotes.message: Alcohol use by you people is dangerous, not only because of the risks associated with acute impairment, but also because of the threat to their long-term development ad well-being. Traffic crashes are perhaps the most visible of these dangers with alcohol being implicated in nearly one third of youth traffic fatalities.
quotes.name: Institute of Medicine

quotes.message: The changing of attitudes and norms is the best hope for reducing drunk driving over the long run. If more people regarded drunk driving as irresponsible and dangerous, there would be less drunk driving, more informal control mechanisms, and more support for normal encounter measures.
quotes.name: James B. Jacobs

quotes.message: Drink and drive. Combining the two makes for a tragic mix of poor decision making, car crashes, injuries, legal problems, and potential life-changing situations.
quotes.name: Valerie Mendralla

quotes.message: Teens talking to other teens about safe driving and having fun without alcohol can be very effective in changing attitudes and perceptions and, in turn, behaviors.
quotes.name: Valerie Mendralla

quotes.message: Drinking and driving can destroy lives and families.
quotes.name: Valerie Mendralla

quotes.message: Drinking and driving has devastating effects on the entire nation. At the very least, people who drink and drive can lose their privileges to drive. At worst, they can lose their loved ones or even their lives.
quotes.name: Valerie Mendralla

quotes.message: Teens who get behind the wheel after drinking may also hurt innocent bystanders or other drivers.
quotes.name: Valerie Mendralla

quotes.message: Drinking and driving threatens the lives of all Americans. Whether we are drivers, passengers, or pedestrians--whether or not we drink alcohol--each of us is at risk of being involved in an alcohol-related crash at some time during our lives.
quotes.name: Ross J Homel

quotes.message: If you drink and drive, sooner or later, you're gonna meet the Undertaker.
quotes.name: Vince McMahon

quotes.message: Many a man who is drunk prefers to drive because he feels he is in no condition to walk.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: People who insist on drinking before driving are putting the quart before the hearse.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: Most of those who are driven to drink, make the trip in the driver's seat.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: The one for the road may be two for the cemetery.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: There's only one thing worse than being driven to drink, and that's driving yourself home from it.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: A tree never hits an automobile except in self defense.
quotes.name: American Proverb

quotes.message: A woman drove me to drink and I didn't even have the decency to thank her.
quotes.name: W. C. Fields

quotes.message: If you drink don't drive, don't even putt.
quotes.name: Dean Martin

quotes.message: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
quotes.name: Francis Scott Key Fitzgerald

quotes.message: Drink the first. Sip the second slowly. Skip the third.
quotes.name: Knute Rockne

quotes.message: I know some people are against drunk driving, but you know, sometimes you've got no choice. Those kids got to get to school.
quotes.name: Dave Attell

quotes.message: An intoxicated person might become angry if other suggest that he or she should not drive.
quotes.name: Valerie Mendrala

quotes.message: How fugitive and brief is mortal life between the budding and the falling leaf.
quotes.name: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quotes.message: Happiness is fugitive; dissatisfaction and boredom are real.
quotes.name: Jack Vance

quotes.message: There is no reality on this earth except religion and the power of love; all the rest is even more fugitive than life itself.
quotes.name: Madame De Stael

quotes.message: There is in most passions a shrinking away from ourselves. The passionate pursuer has all the earmarks of a fugitive.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: Not even for an hour can you bear to be alone, nor can you advantageously apply your leisure time, but you endeavor, a fugitive and wanderer, to escape from yourself, now vainly seeking to banish remorse by wine, and now by sleep; but the gloomy companion presses on you, and pursues you as you fly.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: Hell is of this world and there are men who are unhappy escapees from hell, escapees destined ETERNALLY to reenact their escape.
quotes.name: Antonin Artaud

quotes.message: The ideal beauty is a fugitive which is never found.
quotes.name: Joan Rivers

quotes.message: Let us enjoy the fugitive hour. Man has no harbor, time has no shore; it rushes on, and carries us with it.
quotes.name: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.message: Unmarried men are best friends, best masters, best servants, but not always best subjects; for they are light to run away, and almost all fugitives are of that condition.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: We are all in a race for dear life: that is to say, we are fugitives from death.
quotes.name: Theodor Reik

quotes.message: Passing beauties are only the fugitive reflections of the eternal.
quotes.name: Eliphas Levi

quotes.message: Time was the arch fugitive, always on the run.
quotes.name: Mahasweta Devi

quotes.message: Anytime there is an escapee, we consider that escapee to be dangerous. The adrenaline is flowing. He wants to get away.
quotes.name: Larry Todd

quotes.message: The fugitive, brief, though intense satisfactions that come to the nerves through the appetite and passions are not the foundations of joy in this world: they come with a moment's flash, and are disastrous in their flight.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: In youth alone, unhappy mortals live; But, ah! the mighty bliss is fugitive: Discolour'd sickness, anxious labour, come, And age, and death's inexorable doom.
quotes.name: Virgil

quotes.message: In a world of fugitives, the person taking the opposite direction will appear to run away.
quotes.name: T.S. Eliot

quotes.message: What fugitive from his country can also escape from himself.
quotes.name: Horace

quotes.message: One must always be prepared to switch sides with justice, that fugitive of the winning camp.
quotes.name: Simone Weil

quotes.message: Thought is fugitive; the mind does not repeat itself; if you do not catch the whisperings of the oracle as they come to you, they are lost forever. You must-and this is absolutely essential-convince yourselves that what is offered you this very moment will never be offered again.
quotes.name: Jean Guitton

quotes.message: Modernity signifies the transitory, the fugitive, the contingent, the half of art of which the other half is the eternal and the immutable.
quotes.name: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.message: I cannot praise a fugitive and cloistered virtue, unexercised and unbreathed, that never sallies out and sees her adversary, but slinks out of the race where that immortal garland is to be run for, not without dust and heat.
quotes.name: John Milton

quotes.message: People who travel are always fugitives.
quotes.name: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.message: I am supposing, or perhaps only hoping, that our future may be found in the past's fugitive moments of compassion rather than in its solid centuries of warfare.
quotes.name: Howard Zinn

quotes.message: Poetry is one of the most fugitive arts: it can be assigned to memory, taken and hidden in the mind, smuggled into smoky cabin back rooms, recited there and then conveyed only by speech to another person. It is therefore the most likely to survive colonization.
quotes.name: Eavan Boland

quotes.message: Memory, with its fugitive adjustments, is the merciful veil to the grim enactments of the first law. It hides the anguish in the human heart which is always craving for perpetuity.
quotes.name: Stacy Aumonier

quotes.message: We also have a tendency to root for the fugitive. We're always on the side of the animal being chased.
quotes.name: Norman Jewison

quotes.message: Fear can be good when you're walking past an alley at night or when you need to check the locks on your doors before you go to bed, but it's not good when you have a goal and you're fearful of obstacles. We often get trapped by our fears, but anyone who has had success has failed before.
quotes.name: Queen Latifah

quotes.message: Fear can supplant our real problems only to the extent --unwilling either to assimilate or to exhaust it --we perpetuate it within ourselves like a temptation and enthrone it at the very heart of our solitude.
quotes.name: Emil Cioran

quotes.message: Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Fear doesn't go away. The warrior and the artist live by the same code of necessity, which dictates that the battle must be fought anew every day.
quotes.name: Steven Pressfield

quotes.message: Fear has many eyes and can see things underground.
quotes.name: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.message: Fear is a darkroom where negatives develop.
quotes.name: Usman B. Asif

quotes.message: Fear is a distorting mirror in which anything can appear as a caricature of itself, stretched to terrible proportions; once inflamed, the imagination pursues the craziest and most unlikely possibilities. What is most absurd suddenly seems the most probable.
quotes.name: Stefan Zweig

quotes.message: Fear is a question: What are you afraid of, and why? Just as the seed of health is in illness, because illness contains information, your fears are a treasure house of self-knowledge if you explore them.
quotes.name: Marilyn Ferguson

quotes.message: Fear is a self imposed prison that will keep you from becoming what God intends for you to be. You must move against it with the weapons of faith and love.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: Fear is a tyrant and a despot, more terrible than the rack, more potent than the snake.
quotes.name: Edgar Wallace

quotes.message: FEAR is an acronym in the English language for False Evidence Appearing Real.
quotes.name: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.message: Fear is an insidious and deadly thing. It can warp judgment, freeze reflexes, breed mistakes. Worse, it's contagious.
quotes.name: Jimmy Stewart

quotes.message: Fear is contagious. You can catch it.
quotes.name: Neil Gaiman

quotes.message: Fear is excitement without breath.
quotes.name: Robert Heller

quotes.message: Fear is faith that it won't work out.
quotes.name: Sister Mary Tricky

quotes.message: Fear is never a reason for quitting; it is only an excuse.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Fear is only as deep as the mind allows.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: Fear is pain arising from the anticipation of evil.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Fear is simply staring in a direction you didn't want to go anyway.
quotes.name: Brian Germain

quotes.message: Fear is static that prevents me from hearing myself.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: Fear is the enemy of logic.
quotes.name: Frank Sinatra

quotes.message: Fear is the father of courage and the mother of safety.
quotes.name: Henry H. Tweedy

quotes.message: Fear is the highest fence.
quotes.name: Dudley Nichols

quotes.message: Fear is the lengthened shadow of ignorance.
quotes.name: Arnold Glasow

quotes.message: Fear is the main source of superstition, and one of the main sources of cruelty. To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Fear is the mother of foresight.
quotes.name: Thomas Hardy

quotes.message: Fear is the mother of morality.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Fear is the needle that pierces us that it may carry a thread to bind us to heaven.
quotes.name: James Hastings

quotes.message: Fear is the path to the Dark Side. Fear leads to anger, anger leads to hate, hate leads to suffering.
quotes.name: Yoda

quotes.message: Fear is the tax that conscience pays to guilt.
quotes.name: George Sewell

quotes.message: Fear is the thief of dreams.
quotes.name: Brian Krans

quotes.message: Fear is the thought of admitted inferiority.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Fear is, I believe, a most effective tool in destroying the soul of an individual - and the soul of a people.
quotes.name: Anwar Sadat

quotes.message: Fear isn't an excuse to come to a standstill. It's the impetus to step up and strike.
quotes.name: Arthur Ashe

quotes.message: Fear makes strangers of people who would be friends.
quotes.name: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.message: Fear makes the wolf bigger than he is.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Fear makes us feel our humanity.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Fear not those who argue but those who dodge.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Fear sometimes stops you from doing stupid things. But it can also stop you from doing creative or exciting or experimental things. It can cloud your judgment of others, and lead to all kinds of evil. The control and understanding of our personal fears is one of the most important undertakings in our life.
quotes.name: Helen Mirren

quotes.message: Just as courage imperils life; fear protects it.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: The enemy is fear. We think it is hate; but, it is fear.
quotes.name: Gandhi

quotes.message: The oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear.
quotes.name: H.P. Lovecraft

quotes.message: The only thing we have to fear is fear it'self - nameless, unreasoning, unjustified, terror which paralyzes needed efforts to convert retreat into advance.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: The presence of fear does not mean you have no faith. Fear visits everyone. But make your fear a visitor and not a resident.
quotes.name: Max Lucado

quotes.message: There is great beauty in going through life without anxiety or fear. Half our fears are baseless, and the other half discreditable.
quotes.name: Christian Nevell Bovee

quotes.message: To fear is one thing. To let fear grab you by the tail and swing you around is another.
quotes.name: Katherine Paterson

quotes.message: Where the fear is, happiness is not.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Every time you go out there, you want to be a little nervous, have a little bit of butterflies in your stomach and get the juices flowing.
quotes.name: Taryne Mowatt

quotes.message: Being nervous when talking in front of a lot of people. Sweaty hands, shakey voice, forgetting what your about to say.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Nervousness always provokes mistakes, and mistakes lead to easy convictions.
quotes.name: S.R. Ford

quotes.message: I'm a very anxious, nervy kind of loser in many ways, and I get very stressed and a little tense.
quotes.name: Ed Weeks

quotes.message: That nervous feeling when you think about that certain someone and how you're about to see them soon.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Nervous people tend to overreact.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: When you feel nervous, recall your pride.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: If you're not nervous then you're not paying attention.
quotes.name: Miles Davis

quotes.message: One of the symptoms of an approaching nervous breakdown is the belief that one's work is terribly important.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: To show his nervousness was not shameful; only to admit it.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: A well adjusted person is one who makes the same mistake twice without getting nervous.
quotes.name: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.message: Most beginners are too anxious for results. Real progress takes place over a long period of time.
quotes.name: Mary Beth McKenzie

quotes.message: Being nervous actually kept me very tense.
quotes.name: Kate Bush

quotes.message: The way to secure success is to be more anxious about obtaining than about deserving it.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: The sad truth is that excellence makes people nervous.
quotes.name: Shana Alexander

quotes.message: Time flies when you are anxious!
quotes.name: Maria Bamford

quotes.message: Butterflies in your stomach. More like killer bees.
quotes.name: Kami Garcia

quotes.message: Don't try to be what you're not. If you're nervous, be nervous. If you're shy, be shy. It's cute.
quotes.name: Adriana Lima

quotes.message: The mind that is anxious about the future is miserable.
quotes.name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: To talk to someone who does not listen is enough to tense the devil.
quotes.name: Pearl Bailey

quotes.message: If you're not nervous, it means you don't care.
quotes.name: Tiger Woods

quotes.message: Being nervous is not something you should be ashamed of. Nervous means you care, you really want to do well.
quotes.name: Paula Creamer

quotes.message: A nervous silence loosens tongues.
quotes.name: Jacqueline Carey

quotes.message: You don't have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
quotes.name: Dan Millman

quotes.message: Nervousness made her feel nauseous, almost like she had two hearts frantically beating in her chest, instead of one.
quotes.name: Caroline Hanson

quotes.message: Sometimes when you're just thrown into something, you are more ready for it than when you have time to think it over and get nervous about it.
quotes.name: Lara Flynn Boyle

quotes.message: When you feel afraid or nervous to do a thing then do it because the real harm which you may thus receive is less poignant than its expectation and fear.
quotes.name: Ali bin Abu-Talib

quotes.message: A bad liver is to a Frenchman what a nervous breakdown is to an American. Everyone has had one and everyone wants to talk about it.
quotes.name: Art Buchwald

quotes.message: Selfishness is not living as one wishes to live, it is asking others to live as one wishes to live.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Selfish persons are incapable of loving others, but they are not capable of loving themselves either.
quotes.name: Erich Fromm

quotes.message: A selfish man is a thief.
quotes.name: Jose Marti

quotes.message: Selfishness must always be forgiven you know, because there is no hope of a cure.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: Selfishness is the greatest curse of the human race.
quotes.name: William E. Gladstone

quotes.message: Selfishness is the biggest form of helplessness as it makes the person blind so much that he fails to search his true self for being always in the lurch.
quotes.name: Anuj Somany

quotes.message: A man is called selfish not for pursuing his own good, but for neglecting his neighbor's.
quotes.name: Richard Whately

quotes.message: Selfishness is the root and source of all natural and moral evils.
quotes.name: Nathaniel Emmons

quotes.message: Selfishness, if but reasonably tempered with wisdom, is not such an evil trait.
quotes.name: Giovanni Ruffini

quotes.message: Selfishness is the making a man's self his own centre, the beginning and end of all he doeth.
quotes.name: John Owen

quotes.message: Selfishness comes from poverty in the heart, from the belief that love is not abundant.
quotes.name: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.message: Selfishness is one of the qualities apt to inspire love.
quotes.name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.message: The force of selfishness is as inevitable and as calculable as the force of gravitation.
quotes.name: Hailliard

quotes.message: SELFISH, adj. Devoid of consideration for the selfishness of others.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: Selfishness is blind.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Selfishness creates greed and greed destroys the soul.
quotes.name: Zarina Bibi

quotes.message: Selfishness stops the flow of blessings to you and others.
quotes.name: Brenda Johnson Padgitt

quotes.message: The selfish man suffers more from his selfishness than he from whom that selfishness withholds some important benefit.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Being selfish to me means that you have to look out for yourself and you don't have to sacrifice.
quotes.name: Herbie Mann

quotes.message: Thorough selfishness destroys or paralyzes enjoyment. A heart made selfish by the contest for wealth is like a citadel stormed in war, utterly shattered.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Selfishness is the grand moving principle of nine-tenths of our actions.
quotes.name: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Take the selfishness out of this world and there would be more happiness than we should know what to do with.
quotes.name: Henry Wheeler Shaw

quotes.message: Give up your selfishness, and you shall find peace; like water mingling with water, you shall merge in absorption.
quotes.name: Sri Guru Granth Sahib

quotes.message: People wrapped up in themselves make very small packages.
quotes.name: Jessica Kennedy

quotes.message: Selfishness and self-absorption are deadly charm-exterminators.
quotes.name: Loretta Young

quotes.message: Nothing resembles selfishness more closely than self-respect.
quotes.name: George Sand

quotes.message: Selfishness, when it is punished by the world, is mostly punished because it is connected with egotism.
quotes.name: Sir Arthur Helps

quotes.message: If all the people in this world, in which we live, were as selfish as a few of the people in this world, in which we live, there would be no world in which to live.
quotes.name: W. L. Orme

quotes.message: Selfishness at the expense of others' happiness is demonism.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: I think that in today's world, by nature, we are all self-centered. And that often leads to selfishness.
quotes.name: Gary Chapman

quotes.message: That man who lives for self alone, Lives for the meanest mortal known.
quotes.name: Joaquin Miller

quotes.message: We are all selfish and I no more trust myself than others with a good motive.
quotes.name: Lord Byron

quotes.message: Human history is the sad result of each one looking out for himself.
quotes.name: Julio Cortazar

quotes.message: He who lives only to benefit himself confers on the world a benefit when he dies.
quotes.name: Tertullian

quotes.message: It is selfishness which is the cause of most of our misery. It is as a cankering disease.
quotes.name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.message: Selfishness is really self-destruction in slow motion.
quotes.name: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.message: The most difficult thing for us seems to be to give of ourselves, to do away with selfishness. If we really love someone, nothing is too difficult for us to do for that individual. There is no real happiness in having or getting unless we are doing it for the purpose of giving it to others. Half the world seems to be following the wrong scent in the pursuit of happiness many think it consists of having and getting and being served, when really happiness is found in serving others.
quotes.name: N. Eldon Tanner

quotes.message: The hardest work you and I will ever do is to put off our selfishness.
quotes.name: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.message: Sometimes you have to be selfish to be selfless.
quotes.name: Edward Albert

quotes.message: Sometimes you have to be selfish to get what you want and move forward in life.
quotes.name: Kristen Stewart

quotes.message: The man who lives by himself and for himself is apt to be corrupted by the company he keeps.
quotes.name: Charles Henry Parkhurst

quotes.message: There are many things that we would throw away if we were not afraid that others might pick them up.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Those who do not hate their own selfishness and regard themselves as more important than the rest of the world are blind because the truth lies elsewhere.
quotes.name: Blaise Pascal

quotes.message: Selfishness is one of the more common faces of pride. 'How everything affects me' is the center of all that matters - self-conceit, self-pity, worldly self-fulfillment, self-gratification, and self-seeking.
quotes.name: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.message: There are points in your life, especially if you have creative ambitions, where selfishness is necessary.
quotes.name: Kris Kristofferson

quotes.message: We found evolution will punish you if you're selfish and mean. For a short time and against a specific set of opponents, some selfish organisms may come out ahead. But selfishness isn't evolutionarily sustainable.
quotes.name: Chris Adami

quotes.message: We cannot pass our guardian angel's bounds, resigned or sullen, he will hear our sighs.
quotes.name: Saint Augustine

quotes.message: One thing you can say for guardian angels: they guard. They give warning when danger approaches.
quotes.name: Emily Hahn

quotes.message: Our private thoughts are known only to God. The secret thoughts of all of us are not known by angels or demons or one another. Every prayer, however, is heard instantly by our guardian angel.
quotes.name: Janice T. Connell

quotes.message: Our guardian angels are closer to us than anything except the love of God.
quotes.name: Eileen Elias Freeman

quotes.message: Every night and every morning thank your own guardian angel for peace and for the regeneration of all the cells in your body, and for joy.
quotes.name: Dorie D'Angelo

quotes.message: I believe most at-home accidents happen in the bathroom because our guardian angels give us our privacy.
quotes.name: Cathy L. Poulin

quotes.message: I think we all do have a guardian angel. I believe they work through us all the time, when we are thoughtful and good and kind to each other.
quotes.name: Roma Downey

quotes.message: I never wanted a Guardian Angel. I didn't ask for one. One was assigned to me.
quotes.name: Mercedes McCambridge

quotes.message: I think that someone is watching out for me, God, my guardian angel, I'm not sure who that is, but they really work hard.
quotes.name: Mattie Stepanek

quotes.message: The reason angels can fly is because they take themselves lightly.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Angels have no philosophy but love.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: It is not known precisely where angels dwell -- whether in the air, the void, or the planets. It has not been God's pleasure that we should be informed of their abode.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: All God's angels come to us disguised.
quotes.name: James Russell Lowell

quotes.message: Angels are principally the guardians of our spirits. Their function is not to do our work for us, but to help us do it ourselves, by God's grace.
quotes.name: Eileen Elias Freeman

quotes.message: In Heaven an angel is nobody in particular.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Make yourself familiar with the angels, and behold them frequently in spirit; for, without being seen, they are present with you.
quotes.name: St Francis of Sales

quotes.message: We should pray to the angels, for they are given to us as guardians.
quotes.name: St Ambrose

quotes.message: One function of the angels is illumination, and the other function is that of being a guardian.
quotes.name: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.message: I guess I have never really doubted that we are all born to our guardian angel.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: Your two guardian angels are always with you. The other angels come and go as we need them.
quotes.name: Doreen Virtue

quotes.message: Angels are not merely forms of extraterrestrial intelligence. They are forms of extra-cosmic intelligence.
quotes.name: Mortimer J. Adler

quotes.message: When you are lonely or frightened, talk to your guardian angel. You can do it out loud or inside your head, your angel can hear you. Ask your angel to be near you, to put his or her hand on your shoulder, to give you courage and protect you.
quotes.name: Joan Wester Anderson

quotes.message: Remember, Angels are both God's messengers and God's message, witness to eternity in time, to the presence of the divine amidst the ordinary. Every moment of every day is riddled by their traces.
quotes.name: F. Forrester Church

quotes.message: The angels are a strange genus, they are precisely what they are and cannot be anything else. They are themselves soul-less beings who represent nothing but the thoughts and intuitions of their Lord.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: Angels assist us in connecting with a powerful yet gentle force, which encourages us to live life to it's fullest.
quotes.name: Denise Linn

quotes.message: Make friends with the angels, who though invisible are always with you. Often invoke them, constantly praise them, and make good use of their help and assistance in all your temporal and spiritual affairs.
quotes.name: Francis de Sales

quotes.message: Where loved ones failed you, guardian angels stand ready to catch your fall.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Everyone was born with a guardian angel. Guardian Angels brighten our journey of life with divine love, protection, peace, healing, grace, strength and, miracles.
quotes.name: Liliah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: You should never feel alone there's always someone to turn to, it is the Guardian Angel who is watching over you.
quotes.name: K. Sue

quotes.message: The Holy Guardian Angel is the spiritual Sun of the Soul of the Adept.
quotes.name: Aleister Crowley

quotes.message: Poetry has been the guardian angel of humanity in all ages.
quotes.name: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.message: But if these beings guard you, they do so because they have been summoned by your prayers.
quotes.name: Stephen Ambrose

quotes.message: Some believe strongly that each Christian may have his own guardian angel assigned to watch over him or her.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Angels appear in many different forms to hold your hand through the difficult times.
quotes.name: Doreen Virtue

quotes.message: Be good. This will make your angel happy. When sorrows and misfortunes physical or spiritual afflict you turn to your guardian angel with strong trust and he will help you.
quotes.name: John Bosco

quotes.message: Do not be surprised that you fall every day do not give up, but stand your ground courageously. And assuredly, the angel who guards you will honor your patience.
quotes.name: John Climacus

quotes.message: Our Guardian Angels are our most faithful friends because they are with us day and night, always and everywhere. We ought often to invoke them.
quotes.name: John Vianney

quotes.message: The Devil writes down our sins our Guardian Angel all our merits. Labor that the Guardian Angel's book may be full, and the Devil's empty.
quotes.name: John Vianney

quotes.message: If only we could see the joy of our guardian angel when he sees us fighting our temptations!
quotes.name: John Vianney

quotes.message: If you wish success in life make perseverance your bosom friend.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: When I look back on my life I wonder how I survived my mother said I had a guardian angel.
quotes.name: Micky Dolenz

quotes.message: Never travel faster than your guardian angel can fly.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Guardian angels guide the steps of idiots.
quotes.name: Nancy Farmer

quotes.message: Angels are visible to those who accept the light and break the pact made with darkness.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: It comes down to whether you believe in seven miraculous escapes a week or one guardian angel.
quotes.name: Robert Breault

quotes.message: I guess I have never really doubted that we are all born to our guardian angel.
quotes.name: Robert Breault

quotes.message: Make yourself familiar with the angels and behold them frequently in spirit for without being seen they are present with you.
quotes.name: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.message: A guardian angel o'er his life presiding. Doubling his pleasures and his cares dividing.
quotes.name: Samuel Rogers

quotes.message: Gratitude is our most direct line to God and the angels.
quotes.name: Terry Taylor

quotes.message: A man does not always choose what his guardian angel intends.
quotes.name: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.message: An angel can illumine the thought and mind of man by strengthening the power of vision and by bringing within his reach some truth which the angel himself contemplates.
quotes.name: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.message: Smoking is one of the leading causes of all statistics.
quotes.name: Liza Minnelli

quotes.message: Much smoking kills live men and cures dead swine.
quotes.name: George D. Prentice

quotes.message: Every time you light up a cigarette, you are saying that your life isn't worth living.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: No one can quit smoking for you, or make you want to change your life. No one can make you do anything that you don't want to do.
quotes.name: Gudjon Bergmann

quotes.message: Today just might be the best day to start seriously thinking about quitting smoking.
quotes.name: Alexander Woollcott

quotes.message: To quit smoking, you must first want to quit, but then you must also do the quitting.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Quitting smoking is rather a marathon than a sprint. It is not a one-time attempt, but a longer effort.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Quitting cigarettes might be the hardest thing to do in life, but at least you will have one.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: You're always better off if you quit smoking; it's never too late.
quotes.name: Loni Anderson

quotes.message: Every time you try to quit smoking you are actually getting closer to staying smoke free.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: There's nothing quite like tobacco: it's the passion of decent folk, and whoever lives without tobacco doesn't deserve to live.
quotes.name: Moliere

quotes.message: Smoking kills. If you're killed, you've lost a very important part of your life.
quotes.name: Brooke Shields

quotes.message: A cigarette is the only consumer product which when used as directed kills its consumer.
quotes.name: Gro Brundtland

quotes.message: Smoking is hateful to the nose, harmful to the brain, and dangerous to the lungs.
quotes.name: King James I

quotes.message: Smoking is suicide by instalments.
quotes.name: H.M. Forester

quotes.message: Smoking is neither an art nor a sport. Better to liberate yourself before the body retaliates, for its vengeance would be a furious blow enthused out of all the bygone years' mercy you thanklessly thought you were entitled to.
quotes.name: Lukhman Pambra

quotes.message: The true face of smoking is disease, death and horror â€“ not the glamor and sophistication the pushers in the tobacco industry try to portray.
quotes.name: David Byrne

quotes.message: Rather than you smoking a cigarette, the cigarette is really smoking you.
quotes.name: Anthony Liccione

quotes.message: Smoking must be harder than not smoking. For the latter does not require any action.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: If you resolve to give up smoking, drinking, and loving, you don't actually live longer; it just seems longer.
quotes.name: Clement Freud

quotes.message: Cigarettes are a classy way to commit suicide.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: If quitting smoking seems hard right now, it is exactly what you should start doing.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: The best way to stop smoking is to just stop â€“ no ifs, and or butts.
quotes.name: Edith Zettler

quotes.message: Quitting smoking can be a very good test of ones character. Pass the test and you will have accomplished so much more than just get rid of one bad habit.
quotes.name: Abraham Maslow

quotes.message: It is easier to prevent bad habits than to break them.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Smoking kills half of all lifetime smokers.
quotes.name: Alex Bobak

quotes.message: If knowing about the dangers of smoking were enough, almost no one would smoke.
quotes.name: Gudjon Bergmann

quotes.message: Not only will giving up cigarettes put more money in your pocket, your body will thank you for it.
quotes.name: Auliq Ice

quotes.message: Cigarette smoking is clearly identified as the chief, preventable cause of death in our society.
quotes.name: C. Everett Koop

quotes.message: Tobacco exports should be expanded aggressively because Americans are smoking less.
quotes.name: Dan Quayle

quotes.message: The true face of smoking is disease, death and horror - not the glamour and sophistication the pushers in the tobacco industry try to portray.
quotes.name: David Byrne

quotes.message: Tobacco smoke contains chemicals that weaken the body's immune system, making it more susceptible to disease and handicapping its ability to destroy cancer cells.
quotes.name: Michael Greger

quotes.message: The tobacco companies knew quite early on the addictive nature of their product.
quotes.name: Neil Cavuto

quotes.message: Tobacco is the only industry that produces products to make huge profits.
quotes.name: Margaret Chan

quotes.message: The expansion of tobacco cessation centers is an important part of our historic and continuing effort to help smokers quit.
quotes.name: George Pataki

quotes.message: Giving up smoking is the easiest thing in the world. I know because I've done it thousands of times.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Smoking is definitely not cool anymore, and the folks who have worked against that have done a great job.
quotes.name: Tarana Burke

quotes.message: Save your life. Kill the smoke. Stamp the cigarette. Quick smoking forever.
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: All the suffering, stress and addiction comes from not realizing you already are what you are looking for.
quotes.name: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.message: I quit smoking in December. I’m really depressed about it. I love smoking, I love fire, I miss lighting cigarettes. I like the whole thing about it, to me it turns into the artist’s life, and now people like Bloomberg have made animals out of smokers, and they think that if they stop smoking everyone will live forever.
quotes.name: David Lynch

quotes.message: It's not the cigarette that kills you, it's the thoughts behind the cigarette that does.
quotes.name: Raghu Venkatesh

quotes.message: Watch your cigarette cravings in a curious, mindful way. Read: CURIOSITY KILLED THE CRAVING.
quotes.name: Raj Fernandes

quotes.message: Just smoke less and keep trying. If you smoke 10 cigarettes in a day, smoke only 9 for next 3 days then 8, then 7… and one day you will quit. Smoking cigarettes is not doing any good to you. It’s just killing you. You don’t wanna die yet.
quotes.name: Abhishek Kumar

quotes.message: I had not been at all fair to myself, or to anyone or anything near me, by keeping my cigarettes right there next to me or in my shirt pocket throughout the years.
quotes.name: Earl Chinnici

quotes.message: I'm more proud of quitting smoking than of anything else I've done in my life, including winning an Oscar.
quotes.name: Christine Lahti

quotes.message: After years of denial and deception, the Philip Morris company has admitted that cigarette smoking causes lung cancer and other diseases. This formal acknowledgment comes far too late but still we must all welcome it. It can be the beginning of clearing the air.
quotes.name: Bill Clinton

quotes.message: The believing we do something when we do nothing is the first illusion of tobacco.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: It takes a lot of dedication to quit smoking, and whether you give up for good on your first try or have to give it a couple of tries - just keep swinging at it and you will succeed.
quotes.name: Harmon Killebrew

quotes.message: I want all hellions to quit puffing that hell fume in God's clean air.
quotes.name: Carrie Nation

quotes.message: I quit smoking. I feel better. I smell better. And it's safer to drink from old beer cans lying around the house.
quotes.name: Roseanne Barr

quotes.message: I gave up smoking four years, two weeks, and five days ago.
quotes.name: Sandra Scoppettone

quotes.message: Smoking is very bad for you and should only be done because it looks so good. People who don't smoke have a terrible time finding something polite to do with their lips.
quotes.name: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: It's official: Nicorette is the best cure for nicotine addiction. Just put a patch over each eye and you won't be able to find your cigarettes.
quotes.name: Brendan O'Carroll

quotes.message: Sucking on a burning scrap of rotting leaf is not the best way to stay young.
quotes.name: Joseph O'Connor

quotes.message: I've stopped smoking... I think the cost was a lot of it, and not being able to breathe. I first gave up smoking when I was eight.
quotes.name: Dave Allen

quotes.message: People are so rude to smokers. You'd think they'd try to be nicer to people who are dying.
quotes.name: Roseanne Barr

quotes.message: Get me well so I can get on television and tell people to stop smoking.
quotes.name: Nat King Cole

quotes.message: I ran like a cheetah-well, like a cheetah that smoked too much.
quotes.name: John Green

quotes.message: While many people give up smoking, on their own or with medicinal products, many fail. ‘Quit or die’ is no longer the only option for those who cannot give up.
quotes.name: The Global State of Tobacco Harm Reduction

quotes.message: Tobacco kills eight million people each year. This includes one million deaths from second-hand exposure.
quotes.name: World Health Organization

quotes.message: The culture is about moving to a place where tobacco and smoking isn't part of normal life: people don't encounter it normally, they don't see it in their big supermarkets, they don't see people smoking in public places, they don't see tobacco vending machines.
quotes.name: Andrew Lansley

quotes.message: I've chosen to get the word out to women, especially young women, that tobacco is not glamorous - it's addictive and smoking takes a serious toll on your health.
quotes.name: Mena Suvari

quotes.message: Cigars, cigarettes, and hookah tobacco are all smoked tobacco — addictive and deadly. We need effective action to protect our kids from struggling with a lifelong addiction to nicotine.
quotes.name: Tom Frieden

quotes.message: Politicians and ideologically-driven advocates should not be explicitly working to scare tobacco users from using a product that, relative to smoking, does less harm to their health, and is proven to be an effective means in helping them quit smoking altogether.
quotes.name: NZ Vaping Alliance

quotes.message: I’ve had a couple of cigarettes here and there, and every time I put one in my mouth and bite it and smoke it, it tastes awful.
quotes.name: Ryan Storey

quotes.message: To me, it’s not that I’m a 100 percent nonsmoker, but I cut down the tobacco that I do use. To me, that’s a plus. If it eventually leads me to being a 100 percent nonsmoker forever, great. If all it does is cut me back, that’s fine, too.
quotes.name: Travis Barker

quotes.message: Either quit smoking or get a new lighter.
quotes.name: Federal Marshal Quigley
