quotes.message: I was gonna focus on quitting smoking. But it turns out quitting smoking is stressful. And when I'm stressed-out, I smoke.
quotes.name: Earl

quotes.message: One of the great attractions of patriotism - it fulfills our worst wishes. In the person of our nation we are able, vicariously, to bully and cheat. Bully and cheat, what's more, with a feeling that we are profoundly virtuous.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: A soldier will fight long and hard for a bit of colored ribbon.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: Real patriotism is a willingness to challenge the government when it's wrong.
quotes.name: Ron Paul

quotes.message: Patriotism is the last refuge of the scoundrel.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: One flag, one land, one heart, one hand, One Nation evermore!
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.message: Let every nation know, whether it wishes us well or ill, we shall pay any price, bear any burden, meet any hardship, support any friend, oppose any foe, to assure the survival and success of liberty.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: If our country is worth dying for in time of war let us resolve that it is truly worth living for in time of peace.
quotes.name: Hamilton Fish

quotes.message: The urge to save humanity is almost always a false face for the urge to rule it.
quotes.name: H.L. Mencken

quotes.message: The love of one's country is a splendid thing.
quotes.name: Pablo Casals

quotes.message: Our country is not the only thing to which we owe our allegiance. It is also owed to justice and to humanity. Patriotism consists not in waving the flag, but in striving that our country shall be righteous as well as strong.
quotes.name: James Bryce

quotes.message: It is sweet to serve one's country by deeds, and it is not absurd to serve her by words.
quotes.name: Sallust

quotes.message: It is the love of country that has lighted and that keeps glowing the holy fire of patriotism.
quotes.name: J. Horace Mcfarland

quotes.message: My kind of loyalty was loyalty to one's country, not to its institutions or its office-holders.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: He loves his country best who strives to make it best.
quotes.name: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.message: Men love their country, not because it is great, but because it is their own.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Patriotism is your conviction that this country is superior to all other countries because you were born in it.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Patriotism is easy to understand in America - it means looking out for yourself by looking out for your country.
quotes.name: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.message: A man's country is not a certain area of land, of mountains, rivers, and woods, but it is a principle; and patriotism is loyalty to that principle.
quotes.name: George William Curtis

quotes.message: Loyalty to country ALWAYS. Loyalty to government, when it deserves it.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: There is no flag large enough to cover the shame of killing innocent people for a purpose which is unattainable.
quotes.name: Howard Zinn

quotes.message: I am an American; free born and free bred, where I acknowledge no man as my superior, except for his own worth, or as my inferior, except for his own demerit.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: A patriot must always be ready to defend his country against his government.
quotes.name: Edward Abbey

quotes.message: It is not always the same thing to be a good man and a good citizen.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Patriotism is the virtue of the vicious.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: A love for tradition has never weakened a nation, indeed it has strengthened nations in their hour of peril.
quotes.name: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.message: The greatest patriotism is to tell your country when it is behaving dishonorably, foolishly, viciously.
quotes.name: Julian Barnes

quotes.message: Patriots always talk of dying for their country but never of killing for their country.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: I love my country, not my government.
quotes.name: Jesse Ventura

quotes.message: To oppose corruption in government is the highest obligation of patriotism.
quotes.name: G. Edward Griffin

quotes.message: By patriotism is meant, not only spontaneous, instinctive love for one's own nation, and preference for it above all other nations, but also the belief that such love and preference are good and useful.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: When a whole nation is roaring patriotism at the top of its voice, I am fain to explore the cleanness of its hands and the purity of its heart.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: A man's feet must be planted in his country, but his eyes should survey the world.
quotes.name: George Santayana

quotes.message: True patriots we; for be it understood we left our country for our country's good.
quotes.name: George Barrington

quotes.message: The greatness of a nation can be judged by the way its animals are treated.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Patriotism, when it wants to make itself felt in the domain of learning, is a dirty fellow who should be thrown out of doors.
quotes.name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.message: Ask not what your country can do for you, ask what you can do for your country.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Though I love my country, I do not love my countrymen.
quotes.name: Lord Byron

quotes.message: To make us love our country, our country ought to be lovely.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: True patriotism is not worship of our nation but rather, in the light of our worship of the God of justice, to conform our nation's ways of justice.
quotes.name: Robert Mcafee Brown

quotes.message: True patriotism sometimes requires of men to act exactly contrary, at one period, to that which it does at another, and the motive which impels them the desire to do right is precisely the same.
quotes.name: Robert E. Lee

quotes.message: My Country! When right keep it right; when wrong, set it right!
quotes.name: Carl Schurz

quotes.message: Patriotism does not oblige us to acquiesce in the destruction of liberty. Patriotism obliges us to question it, at least.
quotes.name: Wendy Kaminer

quotes.message: Patriotism is a religion, the egg from which wars are hatched.
quotes.name: Guy De Maupassant

quotes.message: Patriotism is a menace to liberty.
quotes.name: Emma Goldman

quotes.message: You'll never have a quiet world until you knock the patriotism out of the human race.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Blind patriotism has been kept intact by rewriting history to provide people with moral consolation and a psychological basis for denial.
quotes.name: William H. Boyer

quotes.message: During times of war, hatred becomes quite respectable even though it has to masquerade often under the guise of patriotism.
quotes.name: Howard Thurman

quotes.message: A true patriot never abandons his country at the hour of need.
quotes.name: Auliq Ice

quotes.message: What is light is to the eyes, what air is to be lungs, what love is to the heart, liberty is to be the soul of man.
quotes.name: Robert Ingersoll

quotes.message: A good country song taps into strong undercurrents of family, faith and patriotism.
quotes.name: George W. Bush

quotes.message: I believe in America because we have great dreams and because we have the opportunity to make those dreams come true.
quotes.name: Wendell L. Wilkie

quotes.message: America is another name for opportunity. Our whole history appears like a last effort of divine providence on behalf of the human race.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.
quotes.name: Martinn Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: Every good citizen makes his country's honor his own, and cherishes it not only as precious but as sacred.
quotes.name: Andrew Jackson

quotes.message: I saw my grandson off to war. My grandson, heads for danger, bear, and sand. Alone.
quotes.name: Carolyn Howard-Johnson

quotes.message: I wish that every human life might be pure transparent freedom.
quotes.name: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.message: A patriotism which is not short, frenzied outbursts of emotion, but the tranquil and steady dedication of a lifetime.
quotes.name: Adlai E. Stevenson

quotes.message: Guard against the impostures of pretended patriotism.
quotes.name: George Washington

quotes.message: It is impossible to govern a nation without God and the Bible.
quotes.name: George Washington

quotes.message: Liberty, when it begins to take root, is a plant of rapid growth.
quotes.name: George Washington

quotes.message: The constitution is the guide which I will never abandon.
quotes.name: George Washington

quotes.message: A war for a great principle ennobles a nation.
quotes.name: Albert Pike

quotes.message: When the sword is once drawn, the passions of men observe no bounds of moderation.
quotes.name: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.message: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep, I am afraud of an army of sheep led by a lion.
quotes.name: Alexander The Great

quotes.message: If the union is once severed, the line of separation will grow wider and wider, and the controversies which are now debated and settled in the halls of legislation will then be tried in field of battle and determined by the sword.
quotes.name: Andrew Jackson

quotes.message: As long as our government is administered for the good of the people, and is regulated by their will; as long as it secures is the rights of persons and of property, liberty of conscience and of the press, it will be worth defending.
quotes.name: Andrew Jackson

quotes.message: The brave man inattentive of his duty, is worth little more to his country than the coward who deserts in the hour of danger.
quotes.name: Andrew Jackson

quotes.message: True independence and freedom can only exist in doing what is right.
quotes.name: Brigham Young

quotes.message: Patriotism consists not in waving the flag, but in striving that our country shall be righteous as well as strong.
quotes.name: James Bryce

quotes.message: It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died, Rather we should thank God that such men lived.
quotes.name: George S. Patton

quotes.message: The patriot volunteer, fighting for our country and his rights, makes the most reliable soldier on earth.
quotes.name: Thomas J Jackson

quotes.message: The nation that forgets its defenders will itself be forgotten.
quotes.name: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.message: Over the years, the United States has sent many of its fine young men and women into great peril to fight for freedom beyond our borders. The only amount of land we have ever asked for in (consequence) is enough to bury those who did not return.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: I do not believe that war and military service are the only means to honor America. God grants us all the privilege of having our character and our patriotism tested.
quotes.name: John McCain

quotes.message: Those who wear the uniform of the United States know better than anyone the meaning of American Citizenship.
quotes.name: John McCain

quotes.message: A young man who does not have what it takes to perform military service is not likely to have what it takes to make a living.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: A hero is no braver than an ordinary man, but he is braver five minutes longer.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: These men came here to storm these beaches for one purpose only, not to gain anything for ourselves, not to fulfill any ambitions that America had for conquest, but just to preserve freedom. Many thousands of men have died for such ideals as these, but these young boys were cut of in their prime.
quotes.name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.message: One man with courage makes a majority.
quotes.name: Andrew Jackson

quotes.message: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
quotes.name: Thomas Paine

quotes.message: It's the soldier not the reporter who gives you the freedom of the press.
quotes.name: John Hagee

quotes.message: It's the soldier not the campus organizer who allows you to demonstrate.
quotes.name: John Hagee

quotes.message: It is an unfortunate fact that we can secure peace only by preparing for war.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: I may be compelled to face danger, but never fear it, and while our soldiers can stand and fight, I can stand and feed and nurse them.
quotes.name: Clara Barton

quotes.message: So long as we have enough people in this country willing to fight for their rights, we'll be call a democracy.
quotes.name: Roger Baldwin

quotes.message: We confide in our strength, without boasting of it; we respect that of others, without fearing it.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Victories that are easy are cheap. Those only are worth having which come as the result of hard fighting.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Aim for the stars.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Aim high in your career but stay humble in your heart.
quotes.name: Korean

quotes.message: Do not leave for tomorrow what you can do today.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: First come, first served.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If the eyes didn't see, the hands wouldn't take.
quotes.name: Yiddish

quotes.message: Manana (tomorrow) is often the busiest day of the week.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: New day, new fate.
quotes.name: Bulgarian

quotes.message: No time like the present.
quotes.name: Mary de la Riviere Manley

quotes.message: Once the rice is pudding, it's too late to reclaim the rice.
quotes.name: Indonesian

quotes.message: One who waits for chance, may wait a year.
quotes.name: Yoruba

quotes.message: Opportunities come but do not linger.
quotes.name: Nepalese

quotes.message: Strike while the iron is hot.
quotes.name: Chaucer

quotes.message: When one door shuts, another opens.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Who waiteth for dead man's shoes will go long barefoot.
quotes.name: John Heywood

quotes.message: Whoever wins the war gets to write the history.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.name: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.message: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.name: Milton Berle

quotes.message: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.name: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.message: How much I missed, simply because I was afraid of missing it.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: I will prepare and some day my chance will come.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Our most significant opportunities will be found in times of greatest difficulty.
quotes.name: S. Monson

quotes.message: Unfortunately, there seems to be far more opportunity out there than ability.... We should remember that good fortune often happens when opportunity meets with preparation.
quotes.name: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.message: Sometimes opportunities float right past your nose. Work hard, apply yourself, and be ready. When an opportunity comes you can grab it.
quotes.name: Julie Andrews Edwards

quotes.message: No great man ever complains of want of opportunity.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Time is limited and some opportunities never repeat themselves.
quotes.name: Belle de Jour

quotes.message: Opportunity is a haughty goddess who wastes no time with those who are unprepared.
quotes.name: George S. Clason

quotes.message: Opportunities will come and go, but if you do nothing about them, so will you.
quotes.name: Richie Norton

quotes.message: There comes a moment in every life when the Universe presents you with an opportunity to rise to your potential. An open door that only requires the heart to walk through, seize it and hang on. The choice is never simple. It's never easy. It's not supposed to be. But those who travel this path have always looked back and realized that the test was always about the heart. ...The rest is just practice.
quotes.name: Jaime Buckley

quotes.message: Opportunity never knocks. It hangs thick in the air all around you. You breathe it unthinking, and dissipate it with your sighs.
quotes.name: Roy H. Williams

quotes.message: Opportunity is often difficult to recognize; we usually expect it to beckon us with beepers and billboards.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: Opportunity is a bird that never perches.
quotes.name: Claude McDonald

quotes.message: Every day is an opportunity to make a new happy ending.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: All great work is preparing yourself for the accident to happen.
quotes.name: Sidney Lumet

quotes.message: Many an opportunity is lost because a man is out looking for four-leaf clovers.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Opportunities fly by while we sit regretting the chances we have lost, and the happiness that comes to us we heed not, because of the happiness that is gone
quotes.name: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.message: Grasp your opportunities, no matter how poor your health; nothing is worse for your health than boredom.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: Spend eighty percent of your time focusing on the opportunities of tomorrow rather than the problems of yesterday.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.
quotes.name: Francois Bacon

quotes.message: Opportunity -Often it comes in the form of misfortune, or temporary defeat.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Opportunities? They are all around us - there is power lying latent everywhere waiting for the observant eye to discover it.
quotes.name: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.message: Small opportunities are often the beginning of great enterprises.
quotes.name: Demosthenes

quotes.message: We are continually faced by great opportunities brilliantly disguised as insoluble problems.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: A man who misses his opportunity, and monkey who misses his branch, cannot be saved.
quotes.name: Hindu Proverb

quotes.message: Teachers open the doors, but you must enter by yourself.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: Even when opportunity knocks, a man still has to get up off his seat and open the door.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Opportunity comes like a snail, and once it has passed you it changes into a fleet rabbit and is gone.
quotes.name: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.message: Nothing is more expensive than a missed opportunity.
quotes.name: H.Jackson Brown JR.

quotes.message: A good opportunity is seldom presented and easily lost.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: Get bait while the tide is out.
quotes.name: Irish Proverb

quotes.message: Opportunities neglected are lost.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: Opportunity never knocks twice in any man's door.
quotes.name: Roman Proverb

quotes.message: Opportunities, like eggs, come one at a time.
quotes.name: American Proverb

quotes.message: If the camel once gets its nose in the tent, his body will soon follow.
quotes.name: Arabic Proverb

quotes.message: The mill cannot grind with the water that is past.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: When the cat's away, the mice will play.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: A person who misses his chance, and the monkey who misses his branch can't be saved.
quotes.name: Indian Proverb

quotes.message: Time is that wherein there is opportunity, and opportunity is that wherein there is no great time.
quotes.name: Hippocrates

quotes.message: My friends, as I have discovered myself, there are no disasters, only opportunities. And, indeed, opportunities for fresh disasters.
quotes.name: Boris Johnson

quotes.message: He that will not when he may, when he will he shall have nay.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: He is a good time-server that finds out the fittest opportunity of every action.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: While we stop to think, we often miss out opportunity.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: The sure way to miss success is to miss the opportunity.
quotes.name: Philarete Chaskes

quotes.message: The wise will make more opportunities than they find.
quotes.name: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.message: To be a great man it is necessary to turn to account all opportunities
quotes.name: La Rochefoucauld

quotes.message: Every opportunity presents an obligation.
quotes.name: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

quotes.message: Next to knowing when to seize an opportunity, the most important thing in life is to know when to forego an advantage.
quotes.name: Disraeli

quotes.message: To improve the golden moment of opportunity and catch the good that is within our reach is the great art of life.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: He who refuses to embrace a unique opportunity loses the prize as surely as if he had failed.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: The golden opportunity you are seeking is in yourself. It is not in your environment. It is not in luck or chance, or the help of others; it is in yourself alone.
quotes.name: Orison S. Marden

quotes.message: There are two kinds of opportunities: one which we chance upon, the other which we create. In times of great difficulty, one must not fail to create his opportunity.
quotes.name: Takamori Saigo

quotes.message: I had to make my own living and my own opportunity...Don't sit down and wait for opportunities to come ; you have to get up and make them.
quotes.name: Madame C.J. Walker

quotes.message: For the highest task of intelligence is to grasp and recognize genuine opportunity, possibility.
quotes.name: John Dewey

quotes.message: The world is all gates, all opportunities, strings of tension waiting to be struck.
quotes.name: Emerson

quotes.message: Present opportunities are neglected and attainable good is slighted, by minds busied in extensive ranges and intent upon future advantages.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Opportunities multiply as they are seized.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: Chance is always powerful. Let your hook be always cast; in the pool where you least expect it, will be fish.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: Great opportunities come to all, but many do not know they have met them.
quotes.name: A.E. Dunning

quotes.message: When one door closes, another door opens; but we so often look so long and regretfully upon the closed door, that we do not see the ones which open for us.
quotes.name: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.message: Take advantage of every opportunity; where there is none, make it for yourself.
quotes.name: Marcus Garvey

quotes.message: How singular, in the vastness of creation, is the richness of our opportunity.
quotes.name: John Cheever

quotes.message: What we have before us are some breathtaking opportunities disguised as insoluble problems.
quotes.name: John William Gardner

quotes.message: Opportunity does not knock; it presents itself when you beat down the door.
quotes.name: Kyle Chandler

quotes.message: Opportunities are often things you haven't noticed the first time around.
quotes.name: Catherine Deneuve

quotes.message: The wise are always impatient, for he that increases knowledge increases impatience of folly.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: Alas, impatience is but another form of unhappiness. It is true, it is true. I have never met a happy impatient person.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: When we get impatient because something is taking too long, we should remember that Life waits on us a thousand times more than we wait on Life.
quotes.name: Laura Teresa Marquez

quotes.message: Impatience is the cardinal sin of youth.
quotes.name: M.T. Bass

quotes.message: The sea does not reward those who are too anxious, too greedy, or too impatient. One should lie empty, open, choiceless as a beach - waiting for a gift from the sea.
quotes.name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.message: Impatience is a hindrance. As with all things if you attempt to take shortcuts, the final destination will rarely be as good and may even be attainable.
quotes.name: Chris Bradford

quotes.message: Impatience, resentment, jealousy and endless 'want' are not creative attractors and have no value.
quotes.name: Bryant McGill

quotes.message: We were too greedy, grasping for immortality too soon. Perhaps if we had only been patient, content to wait, we would all have forever in the end.
quotes.name: Jessica Khoury

quotes.message: Impatience has a poor track record for perfection.
quotes.name: Garrison Wynn

quotes.message: Impatience has ruined many crowns; it had lured people to give up when they have just few minute to win, just few millimeters to touch the winning carpet!
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Impatience turns an ague into a fever, a fever to the plague, fear into despair, anger into rage, loss into madness, and sorrow to amazement.
quotes.name: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.message: Impatience may be a virtue if you have to write for today's generation.
quotes.name: Haresh Sippy

quotes.message: We want instant lunch, instant cure, instant miracles, instant salary, instant successâ€” instant everything. This instant civilization, we have obsessed with, has made us grow a tad too impatient in virtually everything about life. And, of course, that doesn't serve us so well.
quotes.name: Boniface Sagini

quotes.message: Waiting is one of the things that human beings cannot do well, though it is one of the essential things we must do successfully if we are to know happiness. We are impatient for the future and try to craft it with our own powers, but the future will come as it comes and will not be hurried.
quotes.name: Dean Koontz

quotes.message: The wisest are the most annoyed at the loss of time.
quotes.name: Dante Alighieri

quotes.message: Perhaps there is only one cardinal sin: impatience. Because of impatience we were driven out of Paradise, because of impatience we cannot return.
quotes.name: W. H. Auden

quotes.message: Impatience is racing at misery full speed.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: Patience is the art of concealing your impatience.
quotes.name: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.message: When you wear the weed of impatience in your heart instead of the flower Acceptance-with-Joy, you will always find your enemies get an advantage over you.
quotes.name: Hannah Hurnard

quotes.message: You're trying to eat grass that isn't there.
quotes.name: Richard Adams

quotes.message: Impatience is a virtue.
quotes.name: Ursula Burns

quotes.message: Never allow impatience to prevent you for reaching your full potential.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Impatience can teach us the lessons of patience better.
quotes.name: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.message: We are impatient, anxious to see the whole picture, but God lets us see things slowly, quietly.
quotes.name: Pope Francis

quotes.message: Our impatience of miles, when we are in a hurry; but it is still best that a mile should have seventeen hundred and sixty yards.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: The impatient man is his own enemy; he slams the door on his own progress.
quotes.name: Idries Shah

quotes.message: Impatience can be very good by helping us not put up with tyranny, but it can distort our view of what is possible and how to bring about change. We have to cultivate patience so that our perception isn't distorted.
quotes.name: Paul Ekman

quotes.message: Impatience kills quickly.
quotes.name: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

quotes.message: Patience and time do more than strength or passion.
quotes.name: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.message: Impatience translates itself into a desire to have something immediate done about it all, and, as is generally the case with impatience, resolves itself in the easiest way that lies ready to hand.
quotes.name: Edward Sapir

quotes.message: Impatience dries the blood sooner than age or sorrow.
quotes.name: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.message: Impatience is not wanting to understand that you don't understand.
quotes.name: James Richardson

quotes.message: Impatience never commanded success.
quotes.name: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.message: Youthful impatience obscures the endless potential for joy that's standing right in front of you.
quotes.name: Greg Gutfeld

quotes.message: Do not be impatient for impatience is of the flesh. Do not try different methods because they are useful solely in helping the flesh. We must distrust the flesh entirely.
quotes.name: Watchman Nee

quotes.message: Impatience is a great obstacle to success; he who treats everything with brusqueness gathers nothing, or only immature fruit which will never ripen.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: He that is impatient, and cannot wait on God for a mercy, will not easily submit to Him in a denial.
quotes.name: William Gurnall

quotes.message: The thing about waiting is that the longer you wait, the more impatient you become.
quotes.name: Ashay Abbhi

quotes.message: Impatience is the mark of independence, not of bondage.
quotes.name: Marianne Moore

quotes.message: Our human tendency is to be impatient with the person who cannot see the truth that is so plain to us. We must be careful that our impatience is not interpreted as condemnation or rejection.
quotes.name: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.message: Impatience can cause wise people to do foolish things.
quotes.name: Janette Oke

quotes.message: An impatient person plays differently than a more patient person.
quotes.name: Vladimir Kramnik

quotes.message: Patience is the support of weakness; impatience the ruin of strength.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: Impatience is not the fastest way of getting to where your treasures are. It is the quickest way of by-passing them without even knowing.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: By being impatient, matters are damaged and great works cannot be done.
quotes.name: Yamamoto Tsunetomo

quotes.message: The biggest pitfall as you make your way through life is impatience. Remember that being impatient is simply a way of punishing yourself. It creates stress, dissatisfaction, and fear.
quotes.name: Susan Jeffers

quotes.message: What good has impatience ever brought? It has only served as the mother of mistakes and the father of irritation.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Other people can't cause us to be impatient unless we let them do so. In other words, others don't make us impatient. We make ourselves impatient, through our expectations and demands, fixated attachments and stuckness.
quotes.name: Surya Das

quotes.message: People are impatient. They want things to happen overnight, and have no idea of the circumstances and situations that can surround an individual at times.
quotes.name: Rohit Sharma

quotes.message: You have to walk carefully in the beginning of love; the running across fields into your lover's arms can only come later when you're sure they won't laugh if you trip.
quotes.name: Jonathan Carroll

quotes.message: I have learned not to worry about love; But to honor its coming with all my heart.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: The beginning of love is to let those we love be perfectly themselves, and not to twist them to fit our own image. Otherwise we love only the reflection of ourselves we find in them.
quotes.name: Thomas Merton

quotes.message: Love at first sight has nothing on how special love at first talk is. I've cherished all our getting-to-know-you moments we've shared.
quotes.name: Robin Raven

quotes.message: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
quotes.name: Carl Jung

quotes.message: When you grow older, you love again, and the new love feels so different that the love before feels like make-believe. The way you love changes throughout your life. Even the way you love the same person changes.
quotes.name: Heather Davis

quotes.message: Getting into a new relationship is like pouring Miracle-Gro on your character defects.
quotes.name: Anne Lamott

quotes.message: It is difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know that it has begun.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: The best part about getting to know you is anticipating that each day brings new surprises that are all about you.
quotes.name: Robin Raven

quotes.message: For every new relationship, there's at least another new broken heart.
quotes.name: Ryan Barber

quotes.message: I present myself to you in a form suitable to the relationship I wish to achieve with you.
quotes.name: Luigi Pirandello

quotes.message: When a man loves a woman, periodically he needs to pull away before he can get closer.
quotes.name: John Gray

quotes.message: I knew you were special from the moment we met. How I'm looking forward to all of our tomorrows.
quotes.name: Robin Raven

quotes.message: One genuine new relationship is worth a fistful of business cards.
quotes.name: Susan Cain

quotes.message: New love is grand. Savor all the crazy, muddled might of it.
quotes.name: Eli Easton

quotes.message: It does not need that a poem should be long. Every word was once a poem. Every new relationship is a new word.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Don't ever punish your present relationship for what your past relationship did.

quotes.message: Do not sabotage your new relationship with your last relationship's poison.

quotes.message: New love can heal lost loves, but it cannot make you forget.

quotes.message: Don't let your past relationships ruin your future relationships because everyone is not the same and true love might not always be what you want, so accept who God blesses you with.

quotes.message: Since I met you, I started to understand why all my past relationships ended: so that we could start.

quotes.message: If a relationship is founded on love it doesn't end.

quotes.message: When you love someone all your saved up wishes start coming out.

quotes.message: When men and women are able to respect and accept their differences then love has a chance to blossom.

quotes.message: Each friend represents a world in us, a world possibly not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.

quotes.message: New month, new intentions, new goals, new love, new light, and new beginnings.

quotes.message: Love must be learned, and learned again and again; there is no end to it.

quotes.message: If the past is not resolved, future relationships will suffer. Let your heart heal, before you open the door to another.

quotes.message: Relationships are based on trust until you meet someone new.

quotes.message: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.

quotes.message: If I am to meet with a disappointment, the sooner I know it, the more of life I shall have to wear it off.

quotes.message: One's best success comes after their greatest disappointments.

quotes.message: God makes the life fertile by disappointments, as he makes the ground fertile by frosts.

quotes.message: Disappointment is a sort of bankruptcy - the bankruptcy of a soul that expends too much in hope and expectation.

quotes.message: Disappointment is nothing but an eye-opening learning process for your future endeavors.

quotes.message: Use disappointments as material for patience.

quotes.message: High expectations lead to higher disappointments.

quotes.message: Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.

quotes.message: Nobody likes being alone that much. I don't go out of my way to make friends, that's all. It just leads to disappointment.

quotes.message: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.

Being pessimistic and negative about our experiences will not enhance the quality of our lives. A determination to be of good cheer can help us and those around us to enjoy life more fully.

quotes.message: Life teaches you many lessons, many good, some bad. Just learn from the good and forget the bad.

quotes.message: And I truly believe that the information, thoughts, ideas and inspiration that we feed our mind, soul and spirit with has a direct correlation with the quality and ultimately the direction of our life's unfolding.

quotes.message: Go to a place where you're not going to be stressed, because a honeymoon itself can be a stressful thing.

quotes.name: Ray Bandy

quotes.message: Short honeymoons are better than no honeymoons, but long honeymoons are best of all.
quotes.name: John Davey

quotes.message: The honeymoon is not actually over until we cease to stifle our yawns.
quotes.name: Helen Rowland

quotes.message: My clothes are great for a honeymoon: They're light and sexy, colorful and pretty, and not expensive.
quotes.name: Diane von Furstenberg Sex

quotes.message: The honeymoon is the unforgettable period in a couple's life. Later in life, tried and tired in the dust and mist of relations, together or not, they would always miss that time they spent together. Every bit of it.
quotes.name: Girdhar Joshi

quotes.message: Honeymoons are the beginning of wisdom but the beginning of wisdom is the end of romance.
quotes.name: Helen Rowland

quotes.message: Your honeymoon tells the world and maybe you who you are.
quotes.name: Ginger Strand

quotes.message: Honeymoon lasts not nowadays above a fortnight.
quotes.name: Samuel Richardson

quotes.message: Happiness consists of living each day as if it were the first day of your honeymoon and the last day of your vacation.
quotes.name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.message: Our honeymoon will shine our life long: its beams will only fade over your grave or mine.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.message: It was a honeymoon at first, with people feeling like brothers and sisters. It was beautiful.
quotes.name: Stanford Siver

quotes.message: The honeymoon is the only period when a woman isn't trying to reform her husband.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: That honeymoon phase is so much fun in real life, when you meet and discover somebody new and fall in love and chase them. The pursuit. And that climactic final moment of ultimate togetherness.
quotes.name: Lucas Neff

quotes.message: Your marriage is a glorious bond but don't take it as an easy task. It is meant to be worked upon similar to all of your other relationships.
quotes.name: Raymond Eido

quotes.message: Always strive to give your spouse the very best of yourself; not what's leftover after you have given your best to everyone else.
quotes.name: Dave Willis

quotes.message: Congratulations for embarking on life's journey called marriage which is either a two way street between compromise and sacrifice or a one way street to diivorce.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: All married couples should learn the art of battle as they should learn the art of making love. Good battle is objective and honest never vicious or cruel. Good battle is healthy and constructive, and brings to a marriage the principles of equal partnership.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: Happy marriages begin when we marry the ones we love and they blossom when we love the ones we marry.
quotes.name: Tom Mullen

quotes.message: We may argue and have our ups and downs, but any poor soul who ever tries to get between us will find out that our love is stronger than ever.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: To the newlyweds: May for better or worse be far better than worse.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: As you become husband and wife, prepare to welcome a lot of strife. Each others faults you will point out, you will fight and argue without a doubt. Don't even bother trying to find a solution, this is marriage life's toughest institution.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Putting love first, even above the laws of marriage, will allow you to see past the small, insignificant details and focus on the relationship you truly desire.
quotes.name: E'yen A.Gardner

quotes.message: Marriage is a form of discipline involving two people committing to a certain lifestyle and set of boundaries.
quotes.name: David Khalil

quotes.message: Have a good and godly marriage that shows the world Christ's love through how you sacrificially love and serve one another.
quotes.name: John Stange

quotes.message: Simply put, a marriage is not a marriage without the existence of two individuals who promised to love each other.
quotes.name: Jessica Gardner

quotes.message: From the first, the Bible makes clear that marriage is a calling from God to care for, bless, and serve another.
quotes.name: Adam Hamilton

quotes.message: Marriages are like fingerprints; each one is different and each one is beautiful.
quotes.name: Maggie Reyes

quotes.message: When two people become one by way of marriage, it is not only their hearts that are united, but their minds and souls as well.
quotes.name: Julie Donner Andersen

quotes.message: A young woman, newly wed, may find herself in the delightful position of wanting to do nothing without the company of her darling husband. She may indeed discover that she spends all her waking hours with her fellow to the exclusion of every other friend or family member. This is understandable, but wholly unacceptable, to society.
quotes.name: Anna Godbersen

quotes.message: The best time to love with your whole heart is always now, in this moment, because no breath beyond the current is promised.
quotes.name: Fawn Weaver

quotes.message: Newlyweds, they have this ideal, this picture of what marriage is like, something similar of their favorite memories growing up. If only it were that simple.
quotes.name: William Taylor

quotes.message: When you make the sacrifice in marriage, you're sacrificing not to each other but to unity in a relationship.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: Marriage is the highest state of friendship. If happy, it lessens our cares by dividing them, at the same time that it doubles our pleasures by mutual participation.
quotes.name: Samuel Richardson

quotes.message: Both people need to care deeply about the other person, to put the other's needs before their own, and to make a daily commitment to that person to stick it out.
quotes.name: Alessandra Torre

quotes.message: Marriage is the golden ring in a chain whose beginning is a glance and whose ending is eternity.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: We were married for better or worse. I couldn’t have done better, and she couldn’t have done worse.
quotes.name: Henny Youngman

quotes.message: Dear newlywed wife, somebody out there is determined to shape your view of intimacy and marriage.
quotes.name: Ngina Otiende

quotes.message: Compromise, communicate, and never go to bed angry - the three pieces of advice gifted and regifted to all newlyweds.
quotes.name: Gillian Flynn

quotes.message: The lonely evenings in the life of a newly married girl may be really agonizing.
quotes.name: Girdhar Joshi

quotes.message: I hope you smile, laugh, and maybe even learn something that will help you along the way to happily-ever-after.
quotes.name: T.N. Carpenter

quotes.message: Marriage: Love is the reason. Lifelong friendship is the gift. Kindness is the cause. Til’ death do us part is the length.
quotes.name: Fawn Weaver

quotes.message: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Motto for the bride and groom: We are a work in progress with a lifetime contract.
quotes.name: Phyllis Koss

quotes.message: Success? That's a strange choice of word. Usually, newlyweds are wished happiness.
quotes.name: Joan Crawford

quotes.message: Think about your marriage vows. It is easy to say them the day you get married and never give them any thought again. Say them to each other on your wedding anniversary.
quotes.name: Alastair Williams

quotes.message: Just because you have got married, it is no excuse to stop taking pride in your appearance. If you don't respect your own body, then it will be difficult for your partner to. Eat a healthy diet, and do some form of exercise at least once a week. You could even find a fun activity to do together.
quotes.name: Alastair Williams

quotes.message: Enjoy and cherish the things you do for the first time as a married couple and take lots of photos of those special moments.
quotes.name: Alastair Williams

quotes.message: Make the effort to learn about your partner's likes and dislikes, and remember the small details.
quotes.name: Alastair Williams

quotes.message: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: If ever two were one, then surely we.
quotes.name: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.message: If you get married, make sure you keep a separate account of your own money as a safety net.
quotes.name: Yolanda Asher's mother

quotes.message: You may not be newlyweds but you can still kiss like you are.
quotes.name: Darlene Schacht

quotes.message: Newlyweds.
quotes.name: Don Pedro Aragon

quotes.message: You two, you're newlyweds, you're in love. God bless you, you know nothing.
quotes.name: Marie Barone

quotes.message: Newlyweds are always beautiful. They cannot fail to make the heart sing, for even the plainest faces are alive with promise.
quotes.name: Mature Jenny

quotes.message: Change is inevitable in life. You can either resist it and potentially get run over by it, or you can choose to cooperate with it, adapt to it, and learn how to benefit from it.
quotes.name: Jack Canfield

quotes.message: It is not the strongest or the most intelligent who will survive but those who can best manage change.
quotes.name: Charles Darwin

quotes.message: All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy, for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter into another.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Embrace uncertainty. Some of the most beautiful chapters in our lives won't have a title until much later.
quotes.name: Bob Goff

quotes.message: Look for solutions, instead of being difficult; be more thoughtful, instead of allowing anger to burn you out. Look at things from a different perspective, embrace change, look out for opportunities and you will feel much more in control.
quotes.name: Steve Backley

quotes.message: The art of life is a constant readjustment to our surroundings.
quotes.name: Kakuzo Okakaura

quotes.message: It takes a lot of courage to release the familiar and seemingly secure, to embrace the new. There is more security in the adventurous and exciting, for in movement there is life, and in change there is power.
quotes.name: Alan Cohen

quotes.message: Change the changeable, accept the unchangeable, and remove yourself from the unacceptable.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars. You have to let go at some point in order to move forward.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: Embrace change. Envision what could be, challenge the status quo, and drive creative destruction.
quotes.name: Charles Koch

quotes.message: What is magical and mystifying to me about style is not that by seeing we can believe.
quotes.name: Stacy London

quotes.message: I think the growth of the brain is a slow process. But you do change and the more you accept change and embrace change, the better.
quotes.name: Diane Keaton

quotes.message: Life happens. Adapt. Embrace change, and make the most of everything that comes your way.
quotes.name: Nick Jonas

quotes.message: Fear stagnation; embrace change.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: You can live your dreams if you can embrace change. It's by taking chances that you'll learn how to be brave.
quotes.name: Nikita Koloff

quotes.message: Clinging to the past is the problem. Embracing change is the answer.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: Embrace change, even when the change slaps you in the face.
quotes.name: Walter Breuning

quotes.message: Buddhism teaches you to embrace change.
quotes.name: Koo Stark

quotes.message: We cannot become what we want by remaining what we are.
quotes.name: Max Depree

quotes.message: Growth means change and change involves risks, stepping from the known to the unknown.
quotes.name: George Shinn

quotes.message: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Embrace change. True success can be defined by your ability to adapt to changing circumstances.
quotes.name: Connie Sky

quotes.message: A lot of people resist transition and therefore never allow themselves to enjoy who they are. Embrace the change, no matter what it is; once you do, you can learn about the new world you're in and take advantage of it.
quotes.name: Nikke Giovanni

quotes.message: Time when learning how to learn (and unlearn) is central to success. Instead of hiding from change, let's embrace it. Each time we try something new, we get better at getting better. Experience builds competence and confidence, so we're ready for the big changes, like re-thinking what we do.
quotes.name: Peter Morville

quotes.message: If we can recognize that change and uncertainty are basic principles, we can greet the future and the transformation we are undergoing with the understanding that we do not know enough to be pessimistic.
quotes.name: Hazel Henderson

quotes.message: As self-governing entities, artists have a profound interest in change. Embracing change, we embrace growth and we embrace our future.
quotes.name: Robert Genn

quotes.message: Resistance is never the agent of change. You have to embrace the actions that are going to get you closer to your goal.
quotes.name: Ali Vincent

quotes.message: We cannot change what we are not aware of, and once we are aware, we cannot help but change.
quotes.name: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.message: I cannot say whether things will get better if we change; what I can say is they must change if they are to get better.
quotes.name: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.message: Every generation is gonna keep changing, and you just have to embrace the change.
quotes.name: Wyclef Jean

quotes.message: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: We cannot become what we need to be, by remaining what we are.
quotes.name: Max Depree

quotes.message: Some people don't like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster.
quotes.name: Elon Musk

quotes.message: Adaptability is not imitation. It means power of resistance and assimilation.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we are not really living.
quotes.name: Gail Sheehy

quotes.message: When in doubt, choose change.
quotes.name: Lily Leung

quotes.message: Life is about change. Sometimes it's painful. Sometimes it's beautiful. But most of the time, it's both.
quotes.name: Lana Lang

quotes.message: Change has long been a fearful thing for human beings ... and at the same time, it is our most Divine opportunity. Clinging to the banks of the river may seem safe and more secure, but life's possibilities are truly engaged only when we trust, release and become part of The Flow of the Universe.
quotes.name: Chelle Thompson

quotes.message: Your desire to change must be greater than your desire to stay the same.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Life belongs to the living, and he who lives must be prepared for changes.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Don't fear change - embrace it.
quotes.name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.message: Become a student of change. It is the only thing that will remain constant.
quotes.name: Anthony D'Angelo

quotes.message: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Worry less, smile more, accept criticism, take responsibility, listen & love, don't hate, Embrace change and feel good anyway.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The moment that judgment stops through acceptance of what it is, you are free of the mind. You have made room for love, for joy, for peace.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them; that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Embracing change is never easy. But the reward for doing so can be far greater than you can ever imagine.
quotes.name: Kenneth Johnson

quotes.message: I'm human. I'm flawed. But I embrace change... and enhancement. Now there's nothing I can't do. Nothing. Nothing I can't know. Nothing I can't be. I want you to listen to something.
quotes.name: Shirow Masamune

quotes.message: He evolved; he embraced change, because he always wanted to be better than he was.
quotes.name: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.message: Embracing change brings us everyday wisdom, suggestions, and lessons to find the power inside to improve the quality of our lives and get through the difficult times.
quotes.name: Joseph F. Sica

quotes.message: If you are ready to shape your destiny and change your life to have a more fulfilling career, economic freedom, or more passionate relationships, then you have to embrace change.
quotes.name: Franklin A. Ohiozebau

quotes.message: To be constantly happy and wise, you must be prepared to and even embrace change.
quotes.name: D. Brewer

quotes.message: Embrace change enjoy today.
quotes.name: Allen Klein

quotes.message: If you change the future, you change the past. It keeps changing? Change is constant.
quotes.name: Jun Eishima

quotes.message: Embrace change. Keep your eyes on the prize. Keep moving in the direction where doors of opportunities are opened.
quotes.name: Beverley Childs

quotes.message: Don't fight change. Stop trying to hold on what is lost. Let go of the old and make room for the new. Time to make adjustments by recognizing when a season has ended. It's time to do it bigger than ever.
quotes.name: Beverley Childs

quotes.message: In order to renew our life's we must be willing to change and leave behind the things and people that compromise our happiness.
quotes.name: Beverley Childs

quotes.message: The biggest inhibitor to change lies within yourself, and that nothing gets better until you change.
quotes.name: Spencer Johnson

quotes.message: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
quotes.name: Allen Klein

quotes.message: One never lose time in vainly regretting the past or in complaining against the changes which cause us discomfort, for change is the essence of life.
quotes.name: Allen Klein

quotes.message: If a rock is in the way, the root of a tree will change its direction. The dumbest animals try to adapt themselves to changed conditions. Even a rat will change tactics to get a piece of cheese.
quotes.name: Melvin B. Tolson

quotes.message: The first step toward change is acceptance... Change is not something you do, it's something you allow.
quotes.name: Will Garcia

quotes.message: Each new season grows from the leftovers from the past. That is the essence of change, and change is the basic law.
quotes.name: Hal Borland

quotes.message: We must embrace change.
quotes.name: Sharon Halliday

quotes.message: Embracing change is having an open mind, soul, spirit and heart of reason and reasoning.
quotes.name: Dr. James J. Krieger D.D.

quotes.message: Change is not easy. But it is simple. Things will always change. We don't have a choice about that, but we do have a choice on how we react to change; and as a leader whether or not we choose to create change. The choice is really boils down to this. Either we manage change, or it will manage us.
quotes.name: Tom Feltenstein

quotes.message: When we resist change, it's called suffering. But when we can completely let go and not struggle against it, when we can embrace the groundlessness of our situation and relax into its dynamic quality, that's called enlightenment, or awakening to our true nature, to our fundamental goodness.
quotes.name: Pema Chodron

quotes.message: To embrace change, however, and actually welcome challenges that force you to personally grow, is a way to let go of the anger that a mistrusting situation left you with.
quotes.name: Jessica E. Smith

quotes.message: Learning the hard way, to embrace change.
quotes.name: Jessica E. Smith

quotes.message: Embrace change by viewing each collaborative opportunity and project as an opportunity to challenge yourself, thereby gleaning experience and knowledge.
quotes.name: Melissa Merz

quotes.message: We can embrace the challenges and changes in our lives, and discover the seeds of courage, wisdom, and joy that lie within us, waiting to blossom.
quotes.name: Melissa Merz

quotes.message: Embracing change is a matter of timing and knowledge, vision and guts.
quotes.name: Jay Conrad Levinson

quotes.message: Everything is change. Embrace that. Flow with it.
quotes.name: Ryan Holiday

quotes.message: Leave all the afternoon for exercise and recreation, which are as necessary as reading. I will rather say more necessary because health is worth more than learning.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it, as long as you really believe 100 percent.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: You have to train your mind like you train your body.
quotes.name: Bruce Jenner

quotes.message: The vision of a champion is someone who is bent over, drenched in sweat, at the point of exhaustion, when no one else is watching.
quotes.name: Anson Dorrance

quotes.message: Your health account, your bank account, they're the same thing. The more you put in, the more you can take out. Exercise is king and nutrition is queen. Together you have a kingdom.
quotes.name: Jack Lalanne

quotes.message: Your mind will quit 100 times before your body ever does. Feel the pain and do it anyway.
quotes.name: Larissa Reis

quotes.message: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: When you stay consistent with working out, you start to look good, which also leads to feeling good from the inside to the outside.
quotes.name: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.message: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
quotes.name: Gene Tunney

quotes.message: Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.
quotes.name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.message: I hated every minute of training, but I said, â€˜Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life a champion.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.name: Jim Ryin

quotes.message: The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit.
quotes.name: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.message: Don't show up late. Don't try to slide out early. Don't cheat your rep counts. And, definitely, don't hold back. Leave it all in the gym.
quotes.name: Gunnar Peterson

quotes.message: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
quotes.name: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.message: Even if you don't have time for a big workout, stretching in the morning and night really changes your body.
quotes.name: Erin Heatherton

quotes.message: Every time you work out you strengthen your body. Every time you don't you weaken it.
quotes.name: Toni Sorenson

quotes.message: Exercise is life in motion.
quotes.name: Toni Sorenson

quotes.message: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It's about being better than you used to be.
quotes.name: Khloe Kardashian

quotes.message: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: You're going to have to let it hurt. Let it suck. The harder you work, the better you will look. Your appearance isn't parallel to how heavy you lift, it's parallel to how hard you work.
quotes.name: Joe Manganiello

quotes.message: You're only one workout away from a good mood.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: No one ever drowned in sweat.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: When working out, length is not a substitute for intensity.
quotes.name: Bill Loguidice

quotes.message: Not only are squats not bad for the knees, every legitimate research study on this subject has shown that squats improve knee stability and therefore help reduce the risk of injuries.
quotes.name: Charles Poliquin

quotes.message: When people tell me they can't afford to join a gym, I tell them to go outside; planet Earth is a gym and we're already members. Run, climb, sweat, and enjoy all of the natural wonder that is available to you.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: It's not what you do in the gym that makes you fit, it's what you do all day.
quotes.name: Bonnie Pfiester

quotes.message: Just because the summer is over doesn't mean that we should stop working out to keep ourselves in shape. Staying in shape is primarily for your health, and not just to look good on the outside.
quotes.name: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.message: I'm a busy guy but I set aside quiet time every morning and every evening to keep my equilibrium centered on my own path.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: It's nice, when fishing, to catch a fish. But it doesn't really matter if you don't. What you always catch is a quiet time sitting at the water's edge, or in a gently rocking boat, a silent time of water and sky and the movement of natural things.
quotes.name: Ruth Rudner

quotes.message: I get clarity through quiet time, reflection, reading, and meditation. Finding the space between thoughts gives me the energy to take on new challenges with enthusiasm.
quotes.name: Jaime Murray

quotes.message: The most important habit is solitude, quiet time. People who enter their day by taking 45 minutes or an hour for themselves - meditation, prayer, inspirational reading, taking a walk - before they go for it in the real world do best.
quotes.name: Ken Blanchard

quotes.message: Nothing increases happiness like quiet time. The truth is, the only moments that make you laugh or happy are seconds of stillness.
quotes.name: Russell Summons

quotes.message: Hair and makeup has become part of my pre-competition routine. It's a quiet time, when I can reflect, I can put on some music - and I can mentally get in the zone of performance.
quotes.name: Tessa Virtue

quotes.message: Aeroplane journeys give me quiet time to read and sleep; it's like being unplugged from the earth.
quotes.name: Linda Gray

quotes.message: I imagine I appear very outgoing, and I do enjoy people and parties and being involved in life. I am also a very private person, and I value my quiet time. I think people assume I am just a party animal, and in truth, I need to recharge my battery just like everyone else.
quotes.name: Ron Ben-Israel

quotes.message: For my mind, I try to reduce stress by finding quiet time and meditating.
quotes.name: Josh Mcdermitt

quotes.message: In the laughing times we know that we are lucky, and in the quiet times we know that we are blessed. And we will not be alone.
quotes.name: Dar Williams

quotes.message: I need the spiritual revival that comes from spending quiet time alone with Jesus in prayer and in thoughtful meditation on His Word.
quotes.name: Anne Graham Lotz

quotes.message: The prayer offered to God in the morning during your quiet time is the key that unlocks the door of the day. Any athlete knows that it is the start that ensures a good finish.
quotes.name: Adrian Rogers

quotes.message: Solitude is very different from a 'time-out' from our busy lives. Solitude is the very ground from which community grows. Whenever we pray alone, study, read, write, or simply spend quiet time away from the places where we interact with each other directly, we are potentially opened for a deeper intimacy with each other.
quotes.name: Henri Nouwen

quotes.message: I try to get in quiet time and book time, but really, the only time I ever get that is when I'm on an airplane - I have a fear of flying, but I actually love flying because it's the only time I can sleep, and it's the only time I get to read.
quotes.name: Kesha

quotes.message: I like my quiet time. There is a writer's sensibility in me sometimes, where I step back.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: I'm an early bird, partly because I like to have some quiet time and partly because by 9am emails begin arriving, the phone starts ringing and I have dragons to kill of one sort or another.
quotes.name: Andrew Motion

quotes.message: Night is a more quiet time to work. It aids thought.
quotes.name: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.message: Reading helps me be more creative, it helps my imagination and I like the fact that it gives me some quiet time.
quotes.name: Rey Mysterio

quotes.message: Age puzzles me. I thought it was a quiet time. My seventies were interesting and fairly serene, but my eighties are passionate. I grow more intense as I age.
quotes.name: Florida Scott-Maxwell

quotes.message: You are the only Bible some unbelievers will ever read, and your life is under scrutiny every day.
quotes.name: John Macarthur

quotes.message: We are the Bibles the world is reading; we are the creeds the world is needing; we are the sermons the world is heeding.
quotes.name: Rev. Billy Graham

quotes.message: God has made relationships His chosen delivery system for the gospel of hope.
quotes.name: Ed Stetzer

quotes.message: When a man is filled with the Word of God you cannot keep him still. If a man has got the Word, he must speak or die.
quotes.name: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.message: The salvation of a single soul is more important than the production or preservation of all the epics and tragedies in the world.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: The way you store up treasure in Heaven is by investing in getting people there.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: Taking the gospel to people wherever they are—death row, the ghetto, or next door—is frontline evangelism. Frontline love. It is our one hope for breaking down barriers and for restoring the sense of community, of caring for one another, that our decadent, impersonalized culture has sucked out of us.
quotes.name: Charles Colson

quotes.message: We are told to let our light shine, and if it does, we won't need to tell anybody it does. Lighthouses don't fire cannons to call attention to their shining- they just shine.
quotes.name: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.message: If you want your neighbor to know what Christ will do for him, let the neighbor see what Christ has done for you.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: One thing I have observed in all my years of ministry is that the most effective and important aspects of evangelism usually take place on an individual, personal level. Most people do not come to Christ as an immediate response to a sermon they hear in a crowded setting. They come to Christ because of the influence of an individual.
quotes.name: John Macarthur

quotes.message: Our task is to live our personal communion with Christ with such intensity as to make it contagious.
quotes.name: Paul Tournier

quotes.message: You never know till you try to reach them how accessible men are; but you must approach each man by the right door.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: Evangelism is not a professional job for a few trained men, but is instead the unrelenting responsibility of every person who belongs to the company of Jesus.
quotes.name: D. Elton Trueblood

quotes.message: The Church exists for nothing else but to draw men into Christ, to make them little Christs. If they are not doing that, all the cathedrals, clergy, missions, sermons, even the Bible itself, are simply a waste of time. God became Man for no other purpose.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: We email, Facebook, tweet and text with people who are going to spend eternity in either heaven or hell. Our lives are too short to waste on mere temporal conversations when massive eternal realities hang in the balance. Just as you and I have no guarantee that we will live through the day, the people around us are not guaranteed tomorrow either. So let's be intentional about sewing the threads of the gospel into the fabric of our conversations every day, knowing that it will not always be easy, yet believing that eternity will always be worth it.
quotes.name: David Platt

quotes.message: Evangelism is more about being than being perfect.
quotes.name: Rev. Kellen Roggenbuck

quotes.message: Evangelization is a process of bringing the gospel to people where they are, not where you would like them to be… When the gospel reaches a people where they are, their response to the gospel is the church in a new place.
quotes.name: Vincent Donovan

quotes.message: Any method of evangelism will work if God is in it.
quotes.name: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.message: If you had the cure to cancer wouldn't you share it? ... You have the cure to death ... get out there and share it.
quotes.name: Kirk Cameron

quotes.message: Catch on fire with enthusiasm and people will come for miles to watch you burn.
quotes.name: Charles Wesley

quotes.message: People who don't believe in missions have not read the New Testament. Right from the beginning Jesus said the field is the world. The early church took Him at His word and went East, West, North and South.
quotes.name: J. Howard Edington

quotes.message: If your Gospel isn't touching others, it hasn't touched you!
quotes.name: Curry R. Blake

quotes.message: No one has the right to hear the gospel twice, while there remains someone who has not heard it once.
quotes.name: Oswald J. Smith

quotes.message: Nothing will convince and convict those around us like the peaceful and positive way you and I respond to our twentieth century hurts and distress. The unbelieving world—your neighbors, the guy at the gas station, the postman, the lady at the cleaners, your boss at work—is observing the way we undergo our trials.
quotes.name: Joni Eareckson Tada

quotes.message: God uses people. God uses people to perform His work. He does not send angels. Angels weep over it, but God does not use angels to accomplish His purposes. He uses burdened broken-hearted weeping men and women.
quotes.name: David Wilkerson

quotes.message: God is not saving the world; it is done. Our business is to get men and women to realize it.
quotes.name: Oswald Chambers

quotes.message: Run to and fro everywhere, holy fires, beautiful fires; for you are the light of the world, nor are you put under a bushel. He whom you cleave unto is exalted, and has exalted you. Run to and fro, and be known unto all nations.
quotes.name: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.message: New Evangelization is the work of the whole Church — lay, ordained, and consecrated. It’s about friends, family, and co-workers reaching out to one another and proclaiming the truth of Christ using all available means — conversation, personal witness, media, and the vast array of intellectual and spiritual riches the Church has built up in her two-thousand-year history. It’s about simple acts of kindness, simple challenges issued in love, and simple questions asked with sincerity. More fundamentally, the New Evangelization is more for the baptized than the unbaptized. It’s for those who’ve been inadequately catechized but all too adequately secularized, and it’s for those who’ve been de-Christianized in the very process of being sacramentalized.
quotes.name: Scott Hahn

quotes.message: Show me that you are redeemed, and I will believe in your Redeemer.
quotes.name: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.message: Evangelism is just one beggar telling another beggar where to find the bread.
quotes.name: Daniel Thambyrajah Niles

quotes.message: Jesus teaches us another way. Go out! Go out! Share your testimony, go out and interact with your brothers, go out and share, go out and ask! Become the Word in body as well as in spirit.
quotes.name: Pope Francis

quotes.message: Being an extrovert isn’t essential to evangelism—obedience and love are.
quotes.name: Rebecca Manley Pippert

quotes.message: We have to go out and talk to people in the city who we've seen on their balconies. We have to come out of our shell and tell them that Jesus lives... to say it with joy...even though it seems a little crazy sometimes.
quotes.name: Pope Francis

quotes.message: Successful evangelism involves not only harvesting, but sowing and watering, too. We must never think that because a nonbeliever remained unconvinced by our case that our apologetic has failed. For one encounter is not the end of the story.
quotes.name: William Lane Craig

quotes.message: Christians are like manure: spread them out and they help everything grow better.
quotes.name: Francis Chan

quotes.message: Could a mariner sit idle if he heard the drowning cry? Could a doctor sit in comfort and just let his patients die? Could a fireman sit idle, let men burn and give no hand? Can you sit at ease in Zion with the world around you damned?
quotes.name: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.message: Instead of imposing new obligations, (Christians) should appear as people who wish to share their joy, who point to a horizon of beauty and who invite others to a delicious banquet.
quotes.name: Pope Francis

quotes.message: Christianity is not a set of private convictions that we cultivate inwardly or whisper among ourselves. It is the message that the whole world needs to hear. We who have heard it must become agents of subversion and transformation.
quotes.name: Bishop Robert Barron

quotes.message: I've seen far too many Christians who are more than willing to travel halfway around the world to volunteer for a week in an orphanage, but who cannot bring themselves to take the personal risk of sharing Jesus with the co-worker who sits day after day in the cubicle right next to them.
quotes.name: Lee Strobel

quotes.message: We Christians sometimes think we need a plan for evangelism. I don't think Jesus had an evangelism plan. I think He just interacted with the people He came into contact with.
quotes.name: Matt Diaz

quotes.message: The news that we, as Christians, have to bring is so great, so tremendous, not only because our depravity is so pervasive and our sin so widespread, but also because God’s plans for us are so different, so wonderful.
quotes.name: Mark Dever

quotes.message: The way from God to a human heart is through a human heart.
quotes.name: Samuel Dickey Gordon

quotes.message: To ‘evangelize’ . . . does not mean to win converts . . . but simply to announce the good news, irrespective of the results.
quotes.name: John Stott

quotes.message: The Great Commission is not an option to be considered; it is a command to be obeyed.
quotes.name: Hudson Taylor

quotes.message: I just want to lobby for God.
quotes.name: Rev. Billy Graham

quotes.message: Evangelism applies a supernatural remedy for the need of the world.
quotes.name: Faris Whitesell

quotes.message: The simple definition of evangelism: Those who know, telling those who don't.
quotes.name: Leith Anderson

quotes.message: Evangelism is not salesmanship. It is not urging people, pressing them, coercing them, overwhelming them, or subduing them. Evangelism is telling a message. Evangelism is reporting good news.
quotes.name: Richard Halverson

quotes.message: Being a Christian is not the result of an ethical choice or a lofty idea, but the encounter with an event, a person, which gives life a new horizon and a decisive direction
quotes.name: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.message: It takes a man of God, with the Word of God, and the Spirit of God, to make the children of God, for the glory of God.
quotes.name: Jack Wellman

quotes.message: Our witness – good or bad – is the overflow of our lives.
quotes.name: Alistair Begg

quotes.message: We live in a day when it is very easy to make converts, very hard to make disciples.
quotes.name: David Wells

quotes.message: The magic isn't in getting married, it's in staying married.
quotes.name: Derek Luke

quotes.message: Getting married and settling down isn't the most important thing in my life.
quotes.name: Liam Neeson

quotes.message: Writing is like getting married. One should never commit oneself until one is amazed at one's luck.
quotes.name: Iris Murdoch

quotes.message: My advice to you is to get married. If you find a good wife, you'll be happy; if not, you'll become a philosopher.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: Come, let's be a comfortable couple and take care of each other! How glad we shall be, that we have somebody we are fond of always, to talk to and sit with.
quotes.name: Charles Dickens

quotes.message: Love seems the swiftest but it is the slowest of all growths. No man or woman really knows what perfect love is until they have been married a quarter of a century.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Getting married isn't going to make your relationship better. It's just a ceremony.
quotes.name: Rob Lowe

quotes.message: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.name: Nora Ephron

quotes.message: I guess walking slow getting married is because it gives you time to maybe change your mind.
quotes.name: Virginia Cary Hudson

quotes.message: Getting married is like putting one's hand in a bag containing 99 serpents and one eel.
quotes.name: Thomas More

quotes.message: Getting married was a ball. Being married was a nightmare.
quotes.name: Kid Rock

quotes.message: When I get married I'm going to make the marriage work. Getting married is forever, no matter what my spouse does.
quotes.name: Sarah Mlynowski

quotes.message: Nowadays it's hip not to be married. I'm not interested in being hip.
quotes.name: John Lennon

quotes.message: If he's getting married, he's not longer interesting.
quotes.name: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quotes.message: If I get married, I want to be very married.
quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.message: Don't marry the person you think you can live with; marry only the individual you think you can't live without.
quotes.name: James C. Dobson
