quotes.message: Make it your goal to create a marriage that feels like the safest place on earth.
quotes.name: Greg Smalley

quotes.message: Getting married is a lot like getting into a tub of hot water. After you get used to it, it ain't so hot.
quotes.name: Minnie Pearl

quotes.message: Getting married is easy. Staying married is more difficult. Staying happily married for a lifetime should rank among the fine arts.
quotes.name: Roberta Flack

quotes.message: Getting married is very much like going to a restaurant with friends. You order what you want then when you see what the other person has, you wish you had ordered that.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: You don't marry one person; you marry three: the person you think they are, the person they are, and the person they are going to become as a result of being married to you.
quotes.name: Richard Needham

quotes.message: If you get married, you lose all your benefits. That's insane! We should give people bonuses for getting married, and sending signals and talking about it to the society.
quotes.name: Sam Brownback

quotes.message: Instead of getting married again, I'm going to find a woman I don't like and give her a house.
quotes.name: Lewis Grizzard

quotes.message: Don't marry a man unless you would be proud to have a son exactly like him.
quotes.name: Katie Ray Blair

quotes.message: I think that, on some level, everybody lives vicariously through couples who are getting married.
quotes.name: Amy Dickinson

quotes.message: People today expect too much from marriage. Getting married is really like taking on a big new job.
quotes.name: Rosamunde Pilcher

quotes.message: Getting divorced just because you don't love a man is almost as silly as getting married just because you do.
quotes.name: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.message: Getting married is the boldest and most idealistic thing that most of us will ever do.
quotes.name: Maggie Gallagher

quotes.message: I think getting married gave me a focus. It gave me a focus and direction I want to have in my life. And I think having another person that you make such a purposeful bond with has given me the opportunity to see how that can be with all the other aspects of my life.
quotes.name: Selma Blair

quotes.message: For me, getting married doesn't mean we should limit ourselves to some pre-defined idea. Rather, it's an opportunity to explore new things in life.
quotes.name: Jessica Biel

quotes.message: For many, many people, getting married is one of the most important things they will ever do in the pursuit of happiness.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: Grow old with me! The best is yet to be.
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: The surest way to be alone is to get married.
quotes.name: Gloria Steinem

quotes.message: Getting married, for me, was the best thing I ever did. I was suddenly beset with an immense sense of release, that we have something more important than our separate selves, and that is the marriage. There's immense happiness that can come from working towards that.
quotes.name: Nick Cave

quotes.message: To get the full value of joy you must have someone to divide it with.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Getting married and starting a family has been a lifelong goal and one that I have persevered through different paths up to it!
quotes.name: Alanis Morissette

quotes.message: Getting married is like trading in the adoration of many for the sarcasm of one.
quotes.name: Mae West

quotes.message: If you're getting married less you're getting less divorces.
quotes.name: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.message: Getting married and really digging in with another human being can point out your greatest strengths and your greatest weaknesses.
quotes.name: Mat Kearney

quotes.message: Getting married is an incredible act of hopefulness.
quotes.name: Ashley Judd

quotes.message: Those who think they have not time for bodily exercise will sooner or later have to find time for illness.
quotes.name: Edward Stanley

quotes.message: Getting fit is all about mind over matter. I don't mind, so it doesn't matter.
quotes.name: Adam Hargreaves

quotes.message: The more you sweat in training, the less you bleed in combat.
quotes.name: Richard Marcinko

quotes.message: The deadlift also serves as a way to train the mind to do things that are hard.
quotes.name: Mark Rippetoe

quotes.message: Your current body is the only body that can take you to your new body — so be kind to it.
quotes.name: Elaine Moran

quotes.message: The real workout starts when you want to stop.
quotes.name: Ronnie Coleman

quotes.message: If you think lifting weights is dangerous, try being weak. Being weak is dangerous.
quotes.name: Bret Contreras

quotes.message: I don't believe in bodybuilders using steroids. If a man doesn't have enough male hormones in his system to create, a nice hard, muscular body, he should take up ping pong.
quotes.name: Steve Reeves

quotes.message: In training, you listen to your body. In competition, you tell your body to shut up.
quotes.name: Rich Froning Jr

quotes.message: Don't be scared to LIFT HEAVY! You won't get huge and bulky, you'll just get amazing.
quotes.name: Jessie Hilgenberg

quotes.message: Don't quit. You're already in pain. You're already hurt.
quotes.name: Eric Thomas

quotes.message: When working out, length is not a substitute for intensity.
quotes.name: Bill Loguidice

quotes.message: The resistance that you fight physically in the gym and the resistance that you fight in life can only build a strong character.
quotes.name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.message: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
quotes.name: Lance Armstrong

quotes.message: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides the champion from someone else who is not a champion.
quotes.name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.message: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying 'I will try again tomorrow.
quotes.name: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.message: There's no secret formula. I lift heavy, work hard, and aim to be the best.
quotes.name: Ronnie Coleman

quotes.message: You shall gain, but you shall pay with sweat, blood, and vomit.
quotes.name: Pavel Tsatsouline

quotes.message: To be number one, you have to train like you're number two
quotes.name: Maurice Green

quotes.message: People laugh and call me lazy, while they twit around in their three-hour workout making zero progress. Sometimes, instead of what you do in the weight room, it's what you don't do that will lead to success.
quotes.name: Jim Wendler

quotes.message: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.
quotes.name: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.message: The fight is won or lost far away from witnesses, behind the lines, in the gym, and out there on the road, long before I dance under those lights.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: Be patient and tough; some day this pain will be useful to you
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: The pain of discipline is nothing like the pain of disappointment.
quotes.name: Justin Langer

quotes.message: No matter who you are, no matter what you do, you absolutely, positively do have the power to change.
quotes.name: Bill Phillips

quotes.message: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
quotes.name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.message: The gym was originally the domain of jocks, weightlifters, and basketball and football players. Today due to a heightened national awareness of fitness the gym is part of the daily routine for millions of Americans.
quotes.name: Nan Marshall

quotes.message: If it weren't for the fact that the TV set and the refrigerator are so far apart, some of us wouldn't get any exercise at all.
quotes.name: Joey Adams

quotes.message: I have to exercise in the morning, before my brain figures out what I'm doing.
quotes.name: Marsha Doble

quotes.message: An hour of basketball feels like 15 minutes. An hour of treadmill feels like a weekend in traffic school.
quotes.name: David Walters

quotes.message: A man who drinks in a healthy, fit, and self-approving manner will mix vodka with yogurt and get tangled in the Nautilus machine trying to kiss his own ass.
quotes.name: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: People come to the gym to enhance their looks and health or simply to enjoy the activity and improve their quality of life.
quotes.name: Yigal Pinchas

quotes.message: The gym is a protected artificial environment that can be accessible to all exercises at all times and under all conditions.
quotes.name: Yigal Pinchas

quotes.message: The gym is also the ideal place for those 'loners' who come to work out rather than to develop social ties.
quotes.name: Yigal Pinchas

quotes.message: Now that I am in the gym, though interestingly I still choose the group exercise studio within the gym, I am there so frequently that it has become almost a second home to me.
quotes.name: Shari Dworkin

quotes.message: At the end of each of those hectic days as I do on most workdays, I would eagerly look forward to lifting weights or do aerobics with my woman friends at the gym.
quotes.name: Jo Malin

quotes.message: Fitness is something that happens to you while you're practising good technique.
quotes.name: Terry Laughlin

quotes.message: I have been in some schools in which the teachers call physical education, 'gym,' even when the school had no gymnasium.
quotes.name: Charmain Sutherland

quotes.message: Happiness is a ball after which we run wherever it rolls, and we push it with our feet when it stops.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: In gym class, learning involves both your brain and your body. It teaches your body how to move.
quotes.name: Darlene R. Stille

quotes.message: What hurts today makes you stronger tomorrow.
quotes.name: Jay Cutler

quotes.message: Exercise is really important to me - it's therapeutic. So if I'm ever feeling tense or stressed or like I'm about to have a meltdown, I'll put on my iPod and head to the gym or out on a bike ride along Lake Michigan with the girls.
quotes.name: Michelle Obama

quotes.message: The word 'aerobics' came about when the gym instructors got together and said: If we're going to charge $10 an hour, we can't call it Jumping up and down.
quotes.name: Rita Rudner

quotes.message: You're going to have to let it hurt. Let it suck. The harder you work, the better you will look. Your appearance isn’t parallel to how heavy you lift, it’s parallel to how hard you work.
quotes.name: Joe Manganiello

quotes.message: The gym is somewhere you can go to just forget for an hour what you do for a living, what you are doing on a daily basis. You just turn up and get on with it.
quotes.name: Luke Evans

quotes.message: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: It’s going to be a journey. It’s not a sprint to get in shape.
quotes.name: Kerri Walsh Jennings

quotes.message: Going to the gym was never about 'working out' like it is for most people. To me, It was a matter of life or death. It was either me or the weights-and I was going to win. I've always had that competitive streak, whether it was in the gym, on the stage, or In anything else I did.
quotes.name: Rich Gaspari

quotes.message: When people tell me they can't afford to join a gym, I tell them to go outside; planet Earth is a gym and we're already members. Run, climb, sweat, and enjoy all of the natural wonders that are available to you.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: Your mind is the strongest and most valuable muscle you can grow in the gym.
quotes.name: Greg Plitt

quotes.message: When it comes to eating right and exercising, there is no ‘I'll start tomorrow.’ Tomorrow is a disease.
quotes.name: V.L. Allinea

quotes.message: A man’s health can be judged by which he takes two at a time — pills or stairs.
quotes.name: Joan Welsh

quotes.message: Exercise is done against one’s wishes and maintained only because the alternative is worse.
quotes.name: George Sheehan

quotes.message: Fitness — if it came in a bottle, everybody would have a great body.
quotes.name: Cher

quotes.message: Leave all the afternoon for exercise and recreation, which are as necessary as reading. I will rather say more necessary because health is worth more than learning.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Total physical fitness is a positive state of well-being bringing about sufficient strength and energy to participate in a full, active lifestyle.
quotes.name: Karen S. Mazzeo

quotes.message: Reunion after long separation is even better than one's wedding night.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: I love family reunions. Maybe next year we could pass out samurai swords.
quotes.name: Doug Solter

quotes.message: Perhaps the greatest social service that can be rendered by anybody to this country and to mankind is to bring up a family.
quotes.name: G.B. Shaw

quotes.message: Important families are like potatoes. The best parts are underground.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Every man sees in his relatives, and especially in his cousins, a series of grotesque caricatures of himself.
quotes.name: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.message: Family reunion quilted with love grounded by memories.
quotes.name: Thompson

quotes.message: At the end of the day, a loving family should find everything forgivable.
quotes.name: Mark V. Olsen

quotes.message: Nothing like watching your relatives fight, I always say.
quotes.name: Rick Riordan

quotes.message: Know from whence you came because if you know from whence you came, there is no limit to where you can go.
quotes.name: James Baldwin

quotes.message: Our most basic instinct is not for survival but for family. Most of us would give our own life for the survival of a family member, yet we lead our daily life too often as if we take our family for granted.
quotes.name: Paul Pearshall

quotes.message: I think the family is the place where the most ridiculous and least respectable things in the world go on.
quotes.name: Ugo Betti

quotes.message: Heirlooms we don't have in our family. But stories we've got.
quotes.name: Rose Cherin

quotes.message: If minutes were kept of a family gathering, they would show that Members not Present and Subjects Discussed were one and the same.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: You ought to try surviving one of my family reunions. It's like having a bowling alley in your brain.
quotes.name: Edna Buchanan

quotes.message: Family faces are magic mirrors. Looking at people who belong to us, we see the past, present and future. We make discoveries about ourselves.
quotes.name: Gail Lumet Buckley

quotes.message: A food truce, the picnic suspension of oedipal feeling that permits the generations to love each other at family reunions.
quotes.name: Karen Russell

quotes.message: One of the things that binds us as a family is a shared sense of humor.
quotes.name: Ralph Fiennes

quotes.message: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
quotes.name: George Burns

quotes.message: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
quotes.name: Barbara Bush

quotes.message: There's an awful lot of blood around that water is thicker than.
quotes.name: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.message: You might be a redneck if your grandfather completely executes the pull my finger trick at the family reunion.
quotes.name: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.message: In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future.
quotes.name: Alex Haley

quotes.message: If you don't believe in ghosts, you've never been to a family reunion.
quotes.name: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.message: Home is the place where, when you have to go there, they have to take you in.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: It is not flesh and blood, but heart which makes us fathers and sons.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: The great gift of family life is to be intimately acquainted with people you might never even introduce yourself to, had life not done it for you.
quotes.name: Kendall Hailey

quotes.message: Let us open wide the windows of our hearts, that each family member may feel welcome and at home.
quotes.name: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.message: When our relatives are at home, we have to think of all their good points or it would be impossible to endure them.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: If you share a common ancestor with somebody, you're related to them. It doesn't mean that you're going to invite them to the family reunion, but it means that you share DNA. I think it's fascinating.
quotes.name: Henry Louis Gates

quotes.message: I don't have to look up my family tree, because I know that I'm the sap.
quotes.name: Fred Allen

quotes.message: A family reunion is an effective form of birth control.
quotes.name: Heinlein

quotes.message: Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family. Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
quotes.name: Jane Howard

quotes.message: There is no such thing as fun for the whole family.
quotes.name: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.message: When you look at your life, the greatest happinesses are family happinesses.
quotes.name: Joyce Brothers

quotes.message: My encounters with racism are sort of second-hand situations where I might be standing around with a group of white friends and someone makes a comment that they wouldn't make at my family reunion.
quotes.name: Wentworth Miller

quotes.message: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
quotes.name: Lee Iacocca

quotes.message: Be a storehouse of happy memories.
quotes.name: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.message: In a world of fugitives, the person taking the opposite direction will appear to run away.
quotes.name: T.S. Eliot

quotes.message: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: What greater blessing to give thanks for at a family gathering than the family and the gathering.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: You might be a redneck if you look upon a family reunion as a chance to meet Ms. Right.
quotes.name: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.message: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
quotes.name: David Ogden Stiers

quotes.message: The happiest moments of my life have been the few which I have passed at home in the bosom of my family.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life!
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: One wants to be together with one's family. That's what families are about.
quotes.name: Aung San Suu Yuki

quotes.message: One would be in less danger . From the wiles of the stranger . If one's own kin and kith . Were more fun to be with.
quotes.name: Ogden Nash

quotes.message: It is no use telling me that there are bad aunts and good aunts. At the core, they are all alike. Sooner or later, out pops the cloven hoof.
quotes.name: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.message: Family!... the home of all social evil, a charitable institution for comfortable women, an anchorage for house-fathers, and a hell for children.
quotes.name: August Strindberg

quotes.message: As a rule, you see, I’m not lugged into Family Rows. On the occasions when Aunt is calling to Aunt like mastodons bellowing across primeval swamps and Uncle James’s letter about Cousin Mabel’s peculiar behaviour is being shot round the family circle...the clan has a tendency to ignore me.
quotes.name: P. G. Wodehouse

quotes.message: After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even one’s own relations.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: The family. I believe more unhappiness comes from this source than from any other—I mean the attempt to prolong family connection unduly, and to make people hang together artificially who would never naturally do so.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: Santa Claus has the right idea — visit people only once a year.
quotes.name: Victor Borge

quotes.message: Some people stay longer in an hour than others can in a week.
quotes.name: William Dean Howells

quotes.message: I'll never stop dreaming that one day we can be a real family, together, all of us laughing and talking, loving and understanding, not looking at the past but only to the future.
quotes.name: LaToya Jackson

quotes.message: Cherish your human connections — your relationships with friends and family.
quotes.name: Barbara Bush

quotes.message: Family reunion? We'd all cut each other's throats for a dime.
quotes.name: Marjory Morgan

quotes.message: Well, here we are, a family reunion and what a collection.
quotes.name: Cabot Barr

quotes.message: I think the rumors might be true... that their parents met at a family reunion.
quotes.name: Roz

quotes.message: Apparently there was a fire at the family reunion. Lucky for my Uncle Dean, he was not welcome at the event.
quotes.name: Walter Peralta

quotes.message: Family reunions can be brutal. Our last one, we lost two cousins and a sheep dog.
quotes.name: Monroe

quotes.message: Honey, driving across town to a family reunion, cooking, cleaning, organizing and budgeting is not fun and *not* a vacation! Yet, it's what I do with my free time.
quotes.name: Beth Newton

quotes.message: Family reunions are about uniting the family, bringing together the young and old. Singing and dancing and thanking God, giving him the glory. Thanking him for getting us over.
quotes.name: Myrtle

quotes.message: Let's celebrate, have a basement party . A barbeque how we used to do . On the avenue, have a family reunion .
quotes.name: Bobby Bush; Jerry Duplessis; Guerschom Farel Jean; Wyclef Jean; Patti Labelle

quotes.message: There's momsey Tiggers and popsey Tiggers . And Tiggers I never knew . Like uncle Tiggers and nephew Tiggers . And grandma Tiggers too . And when we Tiggers all get together . We really have a ball! . The bounciest, trounciest, flounciest, pounciest .
quotes.name: Richard M. Sherman; Robert B. Sherman

quotes.message: How ya doin', must have been years . I didn't see you guys at all, the whole time she was here . Let's break out the bottle, the party's just begun .
quotes.name: John Scott Sherrill; Pebe Sebert

quotes.message: Everybody stop what you're doing . No crying, quit your boo-hooing . Sun be shinin' . Barbequing .
quotes.name: C. Smith; Kim L. Waters; Martiz Ware

quotes.message: We'll have that family reunion . The one you dreamed of . Until the day you died . This time Mama he's gonna stay .
quotes.name: Chick Rains; Harlan Howard

quotes.message: Our family reunion . I'd rather be anywhere but here . It's like a pain you shouldn't ignore .
quotes.name: Alexander O'Connor; Jeff Kleinman; Michael Ozowuru

quotes.message: This family reunion . I felt so uncomfortable, I left . They all decided to stay .
quotes.name: Alexander O'Connor; Jeff Kleinman; Michael Ozowuru

quotes.message: Everyday should be a family reunion . We should speak . From the heart .
quotes.name: Tony Nicholas; Gerald Levert

quotes.message: We're still reminded-: sometimes by a rain, . but we can no longer say what it means; . life was never again so filled with meeting, .
quotes.name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.message: The only thing sweeter than union is reunion.
quotes.name: Kathleen McGowan

quotes.message: Generations pass like leaves fall from our family tree. Each season new life blossoms and grows benefiting from the strength and experience of those who went before.
quotes.name: Heidi Swapp

quotes.message: When our hearts turn to our ancestors, something changes inside us. We feel part of something greater than ourselves. Our inborn yearnings for family connections are fulfilled when we are linked to our ancestors.
quotes.name: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.message: No matter how you feel about your extended family or family gatherings you will be attending. This is because now the ultimate reason for attending family gatherings is for your children to have the time of their lives with their cousins. Little kids love their cousins. I’m not being cute or exaggerating here. Cousins are like celebrities for little kids. If little kids had a People magazine, cousins would be on the cover. Cousins are the barometers of how fun a family get-together will be.
quotes.name: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.message: Some family trees bear an enormous crop of nuts.
quotes.name: Wayne Huizenga

quotes.message: Some family trees bear an enormous crop of nuts.
quotes.name: Wayne Huizenga

quotes.message: Ugh, I'd like to go to JUST ONE family reunion where I don't run into someone I know.
quotes.name: Keaton Patti

quotes.message: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
quotes.name: Andy Warhol

quotes.message: Things do not change; we change.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: Nothing endures but change.
quotes.name: Heraclitus

quotes.message: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Things alter for the worse spontaneously, if they be not altered for the better designedly.
quotes.name: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.message: He that will not apply new remedies must expect new evils; for time is the greatest innovator.
quotes.name: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.message: When you are through changing, you are through.
quotes.name: Bruce Barton

quotes.message: Consider how hard it is to change yourself and you'll understand what little chance you have in trying to change others.
quotes.name: Jacob M Braude

quotes.message: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: They must often change, who would be constant in happiness or wisdom.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.name: Gandhi

quotes.message: There is a certain relief in change, even though it be from bad to worse! As I have often found in travelling in a stagecoach, that it is often a comfort to shift one's position, and be bruised in a new place.
quotes.name: Washington Irving

quotes.message: The man who looks for security, even in the mind, is like a man who would chop off his limbs in order to have artificial ones which will give him no pain or trouble.
quotes.name: Henry Miller

quotes.message: We are chameleons, and our partialities and prejudices change place with an easy and blessed facility, and we are soon wonted to the change and happy in it.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: He who rejects change is the architect of decay. The only human institution which rejects progress is the cemetery.
quotes.name: Harold Wilson

quotes.message: The main dangers in this life are the people who want to change everything -- or nothing.
quotes.name: Lady Nancy Astor

quotes.message: Loss is nothing else but change, and change is Nature's delight.
quotes.name: Marcus Aelius Aurelius

quotes.message: It is a secret both in nature and state, that it is safer to change many things than one.
quotes.name: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Not everything that is faced can be changed. But nothing can be changed until it is faced.
quotes.name: James Arthur Baldwin

quotes.message: Vision without action is merely a dream. Action without vision just passes the time. Vision with action can change the world.
quotes.name: Joel Barker

quotes.message: I have my faults, but changing my tune is not one of them.
quotes.name: Samuel Beckett

quotes.message: If a man die, shall he live again? All the days of my appointed time will I wait, till my change come.
quotes.name: Job 14:14

quotes.message: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
quotes.name: Anthony Brandt

quotes.message: We must all obey the great law of change. It is the most powerful law of nature.
quotes.name: Edmund Burke

quotes.message: Look abroad through Nature's range, Nature's mighty law is change.
quotes.name: Robert Burns

quotes.message: A fanatic is one who can't change his mind and won't change the subject.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: If the facts don't fit the theory, change the facts.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Can anybody remember when the times were not hard and money not scarce?
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: There is in the worst of fortune the best of chances for a happy change.
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: It is not strange ... to mistake change for progress.
quotes.name: Millard Fillmore

quotes.message: One must never lose time in vainly regretting the past or in complaining against the changes which cause us discomfort, for change is the essence of life.
quotes.name: Anatole France

quotes.message: He who shall introduce into public affairs the principles of primitive Christianity will change the face of the world.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Most of the change we think we see in life is due to truths being in and out of favor.
quotes.name: Robert Lee Frost

quotes.message: The tiger can't change his spots. No, wait, he did! Good for him!
quotes.name: Jack Handey

quotes.message: In times like these, it is helpful to remember that there have always been times like these.
quotes.name: Paul Harvey

quotes.message: In a time of drastic change, it is the learners who inherit the future. The learned find themselves equipped to live in a world which no longer exists.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: Don't knock the weather; nine-tenths of the people couldn't start a conversation if it didn't change once in a while.
quotes.name: Kin Hubbard

quotes.message: Perhaps nothing has changed in the course of history as much as historians.
quotes.name: Franklin P Jones

quotes.message: Instead of giving a politician the keys to the city, it might be better to change the locks.
quotes.name: Doug Larson

quotes.message: The real sadness of fifty is not that you change so much but that you change so little.
quotes.name: Max Lerner

quotes.message: If you want truly to understand something, try to change it.
quotes.name: Kurt Lewin

quotes.message: Take a chance! All life is a chance. The man who goes the furthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: A wish changes nothing. A decision changes everything.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: Manipulation aims at control, not cooperation.
quotes.name: Dr. Paul W. Swets

quotes.message: A man convinced against his will is of the same opinion still.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quotes.name: Margaret Mead

quotes.message: Creative people are often found either disagreeable or intimidating by mediocrities.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: A nervous silence loosens tongues.
quotes.name: Jacqueline Carey

quotes.message: If you give in to intimidation, you'll go on being intimidated.
quotes.name: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.message: I know what the intimidation level of high school is. You're on a hamster wheel, running, running, running, trying so hard to fit in. It's all about how you deal with what you're given, feeling OK with being the odd man out before you're finally successful.
quotes.name: Drew Barrymore

quotes.message: The persistent winner is not discouraged by a problem - he is challenged by it.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
quotes.name: Alice Walker

quotes.message: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: The ones who hate me the most are the ones who don't scare me.
quotes.name: Rebecca Mckinsey

quotes.message: There is a stubbornness about me that can never bear to be frightened at the will of others. My courage always rises at every attempt to intimidate me.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: A mighty person is one who can control their emotions and make of an enemy a friend.
quotes.name: Simeon ben Zoma

quotes.message: Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim.
quotes.name: Nora Ephron

quotes.message: If you want to control someone, all you have to do is to make them feel afraid.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Ocean is not supposed to be scared of the drops.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Don't be intimidated by power, wealth or station, character alone makes all the difference.
quotes.name: Joe Biden

quotes.message: To win one hundred victories in one hundred battles is not the acme of skill. To subdue the enemy without fighting is the acme of skill.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: The argument from intimidation is a confession of intellectual impotence.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Men are intimidated by smart women. They make us want to kick up our game more.
quotes.name: Ian Somerhalder

quotes.message: The stupidity of gossips is that they become frightened when they see your face, and a little word from your mouth makes them vibrate like an electrocuted criminal.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: A man who is intimate with God is not intimidated by man.
quotes.name: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.message: Any woman who is sure of her own wits, is a match, at any time, for a man who is not sure of his own temper.
quotes.name: Wilkie Collins

quotes.message: Don't be intimidated by other people's opinions. Only mediocrity is sure of itself, so take risks and do what you really want to do.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: A man of your valor deserves not another breath.
quotes.name: Craig R. Key

quotes.message: To destroy that which seeks to destroy me, God invites me to stand against it until it stands down and then falls down.
quotes.name: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.message: Don't be intimidated by what you don't know. That can be your greatest strength and ensure that you do things differently from everyone else.
quotes.name: Sara Blakely

quotes.message: One of the single most powerful things you can do to influence others is smile at them.
quotes.name: John L. Mason

quotes.message: Better to master one mountain than a thousand foothills.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: Under democracy one party always devotes its chief energies to trying to prove that the other party is unfit to rule - and both commonly succeed, and are right.
quotes.name: H.L. Mencken

quotes.message: A politician is a person who can make waves and then make you think he's the only one who can save the ship.
quotes.name: Ivern Ball

quotes.message: We live in a world in which politics has replaced philosophy.
quotes.name: Martin L. Gross

quotes.message: There are many men of principle in both parties in America, but there is no party of principle.
quotes.name: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.message: All of us who are concerned for peace and triumph of reason and justice must be keenly aware how small an influence reason and honest good will exert upon events in the political field.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Under democracy one party always devotes its chief energies to trying to prove that the other party is unfit to rule and both commonly succeed, and are right.
quotes.name: H.L. Mencken

quotes.message: Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it whether it exists or not, diagnosing it incorrectly, and applying the wrong remedy.
quotes.name: Ernest Benn

quotes.message: Let us not seek the Republican answer or the Democratic answer, but the right answer. Let us not seek to fix the blame for the past. Let us accept our own responsibility for the future.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: We hang the petty thieves and appoint the great ones to public office.
quotes.name: Aesop

quotes.message: Politics is war without bloodshed while war is politics with bloodshed.
quotes.name: Mao Zedong

quotes.message: Politics have no relation to morals.
quotes.name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.message: The whole aim of practical politics is to keep the populace alarmed (and hence clamorous to be led to safety) by menacing it with an endless series of hobgoblins, all of them imaginary.
quotes.name: H. L. Mencken

quotes.message: I predict future happiness for Americans, if they can prevent the government from wasting the labors of the people under the pretense of taking care of them.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: The rights of every man are diminished when the rights of one man are threatened.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Politics is the art of postponing decisions until they are no longer relevant.
quotes.name: Henri Queuille

quotes.message: Politics is for the present, but an equation is for eternity.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: You may fool all the people some of the time, you can even fool some of the people all of the time, but you cannot fool all of the people all the time.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Politics is a pendulum whose swings between anarchy and tyranny are fueled by perpetually rejuvenated illusions.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: In war, you can only be killed once, but in politics, many times.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Politics, noun. A strife of interests masquerading as a contest of principles. The conduct of public affairs for private advantage.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: Republicans are the party that says government doesn't work, and then get elected and prove it.
quotes.name: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: Vote: the instrument and symbol of a freeman's power to make a fool of himself and a wreck of his country.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: Politics is supposed to be the second-oldest profession. I have come to realize that it bears a very close resemblance to the first.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: In politics you must always keep running with the pack. The moment that you falter and they sense that you are injured, the rest will turn on you like wolves.
quotes.name: R. A. Butler

quotes.message: Politics ought to be the part-time profession of every citizen who would protect the rights and privileges of free people and who would preserve what is good and fruitful in our national heritage.
quotes.name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.message: Politics has less to do with where you live than where your heart is.
quotes.name: Margaret Cho

quotes.message: The whole art of politics consists in directing rationally the irrationalities of men.
quotes.name: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.message: Politics is the art of preventing people from taking part in affairs which properly concern them.
quotes.name: Paul Valery

quotes.message: Politics is more difficult than physics.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The political machine triumphs because it is united minority acting against a divided majority.
quotes.name: Will Durant

quotes.message: Politicians are the same all over. They promise to build a bridge even where there is no river.
quotes.name: Nikita Krushchev

quotes.message: In politics, an absurdity is not a handicap.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: Politicians and corporations have always placed economic interests above moral interests. This is now hurting the entire planet.
quotes.name: Marianne Thieme

quotes.message: I have come to the conclusion that politics are too serious a matter to be left to the politicians.
quotes.name: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.message: Public sentiment is everything. With public sentiment nothing can fail; without it nothing can succeed. He who molds public sentiment goes deeper than he who enacts statutes or decisions possible or impossible to execute.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Politics is the skilled use of blunt objects.
quotes.name: Lester B. Pearson

quotes.message: Politics is but the common pulsebeat, of which revolution is the feverspasm.
quotes.name: Wendell Phillips

quotes.message: I have never regarded politics as the arena of morals. It is the arena of interests.
quotes.name: Aneurin Bevan

quotes.message: The purification of politics is an iridescent dream.
quotes.name: John Ingalls

quotes.message: It is dangerous for a national candidate to say things that people might remember.
quotes.name: Eugene McCarthy

quotes.message: Loyalty to country ALWAYS. Loyalty to government, when it deserves it.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: You're not to be so blind with patriotism that you can't face reality. Wrong is wrong, no matter who does it or says it.
quotes.name: Malcolm X

quotes.message: The heaviest penalty for declining to rule is to be ruled by someone inferior to yourself.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: What right does Congress have to go around making laws just because they deem it necessary?
quotes.name: Marion Barry

quotes.message: Power tends to corrupt and absolute power corrupts absolutely.
quotes.name: Lord Acton

quotes.message: The ballot is stronger than the bullet.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Never underestimate the ego of a politician.
quotes.name: Dan Brown

quotes.message: The men the American people admire most extravagantly are the most daring liars; the men they detest most violently are those that try to tell the truth.
quotes.name: H.L.Mencken

quotes.message: The American political system is like fast food— mushy, insipid, made out of disgusting parts of things...and everybody wants some.
quotes.name: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: Politics is a blood sport.
quotes.name: Aneurin Bevan

quotes.message: Politics is not a bad profession. If you succeed there are many rewards, if you disgrace yourself...you can always write a book.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Politics is not the art of the impossible. It consists in choosing between the disastrous and the unpalatable.
quotes.name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.message: I always figured the American public wanted a solemn ass for President, so I went along with them.
quotes.name: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.message: The vice-presidency is like the last cookie on the plate. Everybody insists he won't take it, but somebody always does.
quotes.name: Bill Vaughan

quotes.message: Always be sincere, even if you don't mean it.
quotes.name: Harry S. Truman

quotes.message: When a man assumes a public trust, he should consider himself as public property.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: In politics, nothing happens by accident. If it happens, you can bet it was planned that way.
quotes.name: Franklin Delano Roosevelt

quotes.message: When I was a boy I was told anybody could become the President; I'm beginning to believe it.
quotes.name: Clarence Darrow

quotes.message: Politicians are people who, when they see the light at the end of a tunnel, order more tunnel.
quotes.name: Sir John Quinton

quotes.message: There are two things that are important in politics. The first is money...and I can't remember what the other one is.
quotes.name: F. Paul Wilson

quotes.message: A politician needs the ability to foretell what is going to happen tomorrow, next week, next month, and next year. And to have the ability afterward to explain why it didn't happen.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Being in Politics is like being a football coach. You have to be smart enough to understand the game, and dumb enough to think it's important.
quotes.name: Eugene McCarthy

quotes.message: In politics, guts is all.
quotes.name: Barbara Castle

quotes.message: The challenge is to practice politics as the art of making what appears to be impossible, possible.
quotes.name: Hillary Clinton

quotes.message: Politics is made up of to words; 'poli,' which is Greek for 'many,' and 'tics' which are blood-sucking insects
quotes.name: Gore Vidal

quotes.message: The game of politics is to make you afraid so that you don't think.
quotes.name: Michelle Obama

quotes.message: A lot has been said about politics; some of it complimentary, but most of it accurate.
quotes.name: Eric Idle

quotes.message: A politician is a fellow who will lay down your life for his country.
quotes.name: Texas Guinan

quotes.message: Politician is perhaps the only profession for which no preparation is thought necessary.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: He knows nothing, and he thinks he knows everything. That points clearly to a political career.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Politics is not a game. It's an earnest business.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: It is a fine game to play— the game of politics— and it is well worth waiting for a good hand before really plunging.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: There is no gambling like politics.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: There is no act of treachery or meanness of which a political party is not capable; for in politics, there is no honour.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Politics are like a labyrinth, from the inner intricacies of which it is even more difficult to find the way of escape than it was to find the way into them.
quotes.name: William E. Gladstone

quotes.message: Politics is like waking up in the morning. You never know whose head you will find on the pillow.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Political elections... are a good deal like marriages, there's no accounting for anyone's taste.
quotes.name: Will Rogers

quotes.message: A politician is like a quicksilver, if you try to put your finger on him, you find nothing under it.
quotes.name: Austin O'Malley

quotes.message: Politics are almost as exciting as war and quite as dangerous.
quotes.name: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Politics without compromise is like a car without a gearbox; it can look quite elegant but you won't get anything out of it.
quotes.name: Neil Kinnock

quotes.message: If politics is the art of the possible, research is surely the art of the soluble. Both are immensely practical-minded affairs.
quotes.name: Peter Medawar

quotes.message: The efficient man is the man who thinks for himself.
quotes.name: CharlesW. Eliot

quotes.message: Every man's in his own hands, with a little help from his brothers.
quotes.name: Janet Morris

quotes.message: Associate with the noblest people you can find; read the best books; live with the mighty. But learn to be happy alone. Rely upon your own energies, and so not wait for, or depend on other people.
quotes.name: Thomas Davidson

quotes.message: The best place to find a helping hand is at the end of your own arm.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If it is to be, it is up to me.
quotes.name: William H. Johnsen

quotes.message: There is no dependence that can be sure but a dependence upon one's self.
quotes.name: John Gay

quotes.message: The only tyrant I accept in this world is the still voice within.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Self-reliance is the only road to true freedom, and being one's own person is its ultimate reward.
quotes.name: Patricia Sampson

quotes.message: The strongest man in the world is he who stands alone.
quotes.name: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.message: The best lightning rod for your protection is your own spine.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: I listen with attention to the judgement of all men; but so far as I can remember, I have followed none but my own.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: If you think you can do it, or you think you can't do it, You are right.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Don't compromise yourself. You're all you've got.
quotes.name: Janis Joplin

quotes.message: If you lead me astray, then my wanderings will bring me to my destination.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: You don't have to worry about burning bridges, if you're building your own.
quotes.name: Kerry E. Wagner

quotes.message: Nobody can bring you peace but yourself.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Chance never helps those who do not help themselves.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: Learn to depend upon yourself by doing things in accordance with your own thinking.
quotes.name: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.message: The proverb warns that, 'You should not bite the hand that feeds you.' But maybe you should, if it prevents you from feeding yourself.
quotes.name: Thomas Stephen Szasz

quotes.message: Expect more from yourself than from others.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: No one can be great, or good, or happy except through the inward efforts of themselves.
quotes.name: Frederick W. Robertson

quotes.message: The highest manifestation of life consists in this: that a being governs its own actions. A thing which is always subject to the direction of another is somewhat of a dead thing.
quotes.name: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.message: No one can cheat you out of ultimate success but yourself.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Behind every successful woman is herself.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: There's no one to stop you but yourself.
quotes.name: David Thomas

quotes.message: Over himself, over his own body and mind, the individual is sovereign.
quotes.name: John Stuart Mill

quotes.message: If you truly want to be respected by people you love, you must prove to them that you can survive without them.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Don't ask of your friends what you yourself can do.
quotes.name: Quintus Ennius

quotes.message: The best things in life must come by effort from within, not by gifts from the outside.
quotes.name: Fred Corson

quotes.message: The greatest thing in the world is to know how to belong to oneself.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: Only a weak person needed someone else around all the time.
quotes.name: Sarah Dessen

quotes.message: Faced with crisis, the man of character falls back on himself.
quotes.name: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.message: You can't trust other people. If it's important, you have to do it yourself.
quotes.name: Neil Gaiman

quotes.message: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everyone will respect you.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: To find yourself, think for yourself.
quotes.name: Socrates

quotes.message: If you want a thing done well, do it yourself.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: No one can really pull you up very high-you lose your grip on the rope. But on your own two feet you can climb mountains.
quotes.name: Louis Brandeis

quotes.message: You cannot help people permanently by doing for them, what they could and should do for themselves.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: I'd rather die my way than live yours.
quotes.name: Lauren Oliver

quotes.message: The best bet is to bet on yourself.
quotes.name: Arnold Glasow

quotes.message: Disobedience is the stamp of the hero.
quotes.name: Arthur Desmond

quotes.message: Disobedience is the vehicle of progress.
quotes.name: John McAfee

quotes.message: The secret of all failure is disobedience.

quotes.message: Disobedience to conscience makes conscience blind.

quotes.message: Civil disobedience is the inherent right of a citizen.

quotes.message: Civil disobedience is a preparation for mute suffering.

quotes.message: Disobedience to be civil has to be open and nonviolent.

quotes.message: Civil disobedience can only lead to strength and purity.

quotes.message: When you know how to use it, disobedience can be a virtue.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Any lack of joy in the world is the result of disobedience.

quotes.message: Accepting yourself as you are is an act of civil disobedience.

quotes.message: Disobedience that is wholly civil should never provoke retaliation.

quotes.message: Obedience is an act of faith; disobedience is the result of unbelief.

quotes.message: Disobedience to authority is one of the most natural and healthy acts.

quotes.message: If obedience invariably leads to cruelty, disobedience is our moral duty.

quotes.message: Mass civil disobedience can use rage as a constructive and creative force.

quotes.message: Civil disobedience is a viable political tactic, and a non-violent tactic.

quotes.message: Civil disobedience can never be in general terms, such as for independence.

quotes.message: Disobedience is the true foundation of liberty. The obedient must be slaves.

quotes.message: Civil disobedience becomes a sacred duty when the state becomes lawless or corrupt.

quotes.message: Civil disobedience is a lever which can move the world by using peace as a fulcrum.

quotes.message: Disobedience happens not when we think too much grace but when we think too little of it.

quotes.message: Civil disobedience is the only nonviolent escape from the soul-destroying heat of violence.

quotes.message: You only find yourself when you disobey. Disobedience is the beginning of responsibility, I think.

quotes.message: Disobedience to conscience is voluntary; bad poetry, on the other hand, is usually not made on purpose.

quotes.message: Complete civil disobedience is a state of peaceful rebellion, a refusal to obey every single state-made law.

quotes.message: Individual civil disobedience was everybody's inherent right, like the right of self-defence in normal life.

quotes.message: You must disobey an order, if the order is unfair, or inhuman. Disobedience is not something we are being taught.

quotes.message: God is responsible for the consequences of our obedience, WE are responsible for the consequences of our disobedience.

quotes.message: Human history began with an act of disobedience and it is not unlikely that it will be terminated by an act of obedience.

quotes.message: A good person will resist an evil system with his whole soul. Disobedience of the laws of an evil state is therefore a duty.

quotes.message: Civil disobedience presupposes willing obedience of our self-imposed rules, and without it civil disobedience would be a cruel joke.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Disobedience, the rarest and most courageous of the virtues, is seldom distinguished from neglect, the laziest and commonest of the vices.

quotes.message: Civil disobedience is not something outside the realm of democracy. Democracy requires civil disobedience. Without civil disobedience democracy does not exist.
quotes.name: Howard Zinn

quotes.message: The act of civil disobedience is the act of taking our anger and turning it into sacred rage. It is a personal and collective gesture of resistance and insistance.
quotes.name: Terry Tempest Williams

quotes.message: Civil disobedience becomes a sacred duty when the state has become lawless or corrupt. And a citizen who barters with such a state shares in its corruption and lawlessness.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Disobedience, in the eyes of any one who has read history, is human's original virtue. It is through disobedience that progress has been made, through disobedience and through rebellion.

quotes.message: Civil disobedience is not only the natural right of a people, especially when they have no effective voice in their own Government, but that it is also a substitute for violence or armed rebellion.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Civil disobedience has an honourable history, and when the urgency and moral clarity cross a certain threshold, then I think that civil disobedience is quite understandable, and it has a role to play.
quotes.name: Al Gore

quotes.name: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.message: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only one page.
quotes.name: Saint Augustine

quotes.message: I still find each day too short for all the thoughts I want to think, all the walks I want to take, all the books I want to read, and all the friends I want to see.
quotes.name: John Burroughs

quotes.message: What we become depends on what we read after all the professors have finished with us. The greatest university of all is the collection of books.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Happy the people whose annals are blank in the history books!
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: If I have not read a book before, it is, for all intents and purposes, new to me whether it was printed yesterday or three hundred years ago.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Honesty is the first chapter of the book of wisdom.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: A book is like a garden carried in the pocket.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: The experience to be gathered from books, Though often valuable, is but of the nature of learning; Whereas the experience gained from actual life, Is of the nature of wisdom; And a small store of the latter Is worth vastly more than a stock of the former.

quotes.message: The man who does not read good books has no advantage over the man who cannot read them.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Be careful of reading health books, you might die of a misprint.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: No two persons ever read the same book.
quotes.name: Edmund Wilson

quotes.message: Some books are to be tasted, others swallowed, and some few to be chewed and digested.
quotes.name: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Books must follow sciences, and not sciences books.
quotes.name: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.message: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: Every burned book or house enlightens the world; every suppressed or expunged word reverberates through the earth from side to side.

quotes.message: I am sure of this, that by going much alone a man will get more of a noble courage in thought and word than from all the wisdom that is in books.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: I can tell you, honest friend, what to believe: believe life; it teaches better than book or orator.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: If a man writes a book, let him set down only what he knows. I have guesses enough of my own.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: The love of learning, the sequestered nooks, And all the sweet serenity of books.
quotes.name: Henry Wordsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: Nobody ever outgrows Scripture; the book widens and deepens with our years.
quotes.name: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quotes.message: Literature is my Utopia. Here I am not disenfranchised. No barrier of the sense shuts me out from the sweet, gracious discourse of my book friends. They talk to me without embarrassment or awkwardness.

quotes.message: There are men that will make you books, and turn them loose into the world, with as much dispatch as they would do a dish of fritters.
quotes.name: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.message: The only words that ever satisfied me as describing Nature are the terms used in fairy books, charm, spell, enchantment. They express the arbitrariness of the fact and its mystery.

quotes.message: From the moment I picked your book up until I laid it down I was convulsed with laughter. Some day I intend reading it.
quotes.name: Groucho Marx

quotes.message: In the case of good books, the point is not to see how many of them you can get through, but how many can get through to you.
quotes.name: Mortimer Adler

quotes.message: No man can be called friendless when he has God and the companionship of good books.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.message: A good book has no ending.
quotes.name: R D Cumming

quotes.message: The instruction we find in books is like fire. We fetch it from our neighbours, kindle it at home, communicate it to others, and it becomes the property of all.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Reading, after a certain age, diverts the mind too much from its creative pursuits. Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Many books require no thought from those who read them, and for a very simple reason; they made no such demand upon those who wrote them.
quotes.name: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.message: I still find each day too short for all the thoughts I want to think, all the walks I want to take, all the books I want to read, and all the friends I want to see.
quotes.name: John Burroughs

quotes.message: What we become depends on what we read after all the professors have finished with us. The greatest university of all is the collection of books.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: The ideas I stand for are not mine. I borrowed them from Socrates. I swiped them from Chesterfield. I stole them from Jesus. And I put them in a book. If you don't like their rules whose would you use?

quotes.message: Don't join the book burners. Do not think you are going to conceal thoughts by concealing evidence that they ever existed.
quotes.name: Dwight David Eisenhower

quotes.message: Never read a book that is not a year old.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Every burned book or house enlightens the world; every suppressed or expunged word reverberates through the earth from side to side.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: I am sure of this, that by going much alone a man will get more of a noble courage in thought and word than from all the wisdom that is in books.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Whenever you read a good book, it's like the author is right there, in the room, talking to you, which is why I don't like to read good books.

quotes.message: If I have not read a book before, it is, for all intents and purposes, new to me whether it was printed yesterday or three hundred years ago.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: A classic is a book which people praise and don't read.

quotes.message: A good novel tells us the truth about its hero; but a bad novel tells us the truth about its author.

quotes.message: Reading, after a certain age, diverts the mind too much from its creative pursuits. Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book.

quotes.message: Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read.

quotes.message: Learn as much by writing as by reading.

quotes.message: Read not to contradict and confute?nor to find talk and discourse, but to weigh and consider.

quotes.message: Live always in the best company when you read.

quotes.message: The multitude of books is making us ignorant.

quotes.message: The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.

quotes.message: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.

quotes.message: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.

quotes.message: I ask not for a lighter burden, but for broader shoulders.

quotes.message: Don't pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.

quotes.message: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.

quotes.message: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.

quotes.message: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.

quotes.message: It always seems impossible until it's done.

quotes.message: Life is hard and it gets worse and worse and worse.

quotes.message: And hard times are good in their own way, too. Because the only way you can achieve true happiness is if you experience true sadness as well. It's all about light and shade. Balance.

quotes.message: Life is hard enough without someone walking into your life on purpose and making it worse.

quotes.message: I'll tell you something about tough times. They just about kill you, but if you decide to keep working at them, you'll find your way through.

quotes.message: The greater the obstacle, the more glory in overcoming it.

quotes.message: The key to life is accepting challenges. Once someone stops doing this, he's dead.

quotes.message: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.name: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.

quotes.message: We all want things to stay the same. Settle for living in misery because we are afraid of change, of things crumbling to ruins. Ruin is a gift. Ruin is the road to transformation.

quotes.message: When you have exhausted all possibilities, remember this: you haven't.

quotes.message: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
quotes.name: J.K. Rowling

quotes.message: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.

quotes.message: We can't be afraid of change. You may feel very secure in the pond that you are in, but if you never venture out of it, you will never know that there is such a thing as an ocean, a sea.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: If you break your neck, if you have nothing to eat, if your house is on fire, then you got a problem. Everything else is inconvenience.

quotes.message: You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.

quotes.message: In the midst of winter, I finally learned that there was in me an invincible summer.

quotes.message: Adversity is like a strong wind. It tears away from us all but the things that cannot be torn, so that we see ourselves as we really are.

quotes.message: Life is very simple: it merely consists in learning how to accept the impossible, how to do without the indispensable, how to endure the insupportable.

quotes.message: Life is a crowded superhighway with bewildering cloverleaf exits on which a man is liable to find himself speeding back in the direction he came.

quotes.message: As I grow to understand life less and less, I learn to love it more and more.

quotes.message: Life is a hospital in which every patient wants to change his bed for another's.

quotes.message: It is impossible to cheat life; there are no answers to the problems of life in the back of the book.

quotes.message: He has spent his life best who has enjoyed it most; God will take care that we do not enjoy it any more than is good for us.

quotes.message: Many people who spend their time mourning over the brevity of life, could make it seem longer if they did a little more work.

quotes.message: Life seems to be divided into two periods: in the first we indulge, in the second we preach.

quotes.message: We are here to add what we can to life, not to get what we can from it.

quotes.message: It is not true that life is one damn thing after another: it's one damn thing over and over.

quotes.message: The life of a man in this world is like the life of a fly in a room filled with a hundred boys, each armed with a flyswatter.

quotes.message: About the time we learn how to make the most of life, most of it is gone.

quotes.message: Life is generally made up of three things: pretense, suspense. and expense.

quotes.message: Life is a matter about which we are lost if we reason either too much or too little.
quotes.name: Samuel Butler

quotes.message: Life is no laughing matter, except to the man who can laugh at his troubles.

quotes.message: When a person puts his best foot forward and gets it stepped on-that's life.
quotes.name: Evan Esar

quotes.message: Life consists not in holding good cards, but in playing well those you do hold.

quotes.message: Life is painting a picture, not doing a sum.
quotes.name: Justice O.W. Holmes

quotes.message: Your decisions influence how you will live the remainder of you life.
quotes.name: John A. Andrews

quotes.message: Life moves swiftly, and you need to act before you're acted upon.
quotes.name: John A. Andrews

quotes.message: Life is not divided into semesters. You don't get summers off and very few employers are interested in helping you find yourself.
quotes.name: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.message: In real life, people actually have to leave the coffee shop and go to jobs.
quotes.name: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.message: The refusal to accept suffering as a natural part of life can lead to viewing oneself as a perpetual victim and blaming others for our problems.
quotes.name: Rudolph Giuliani

quotes.message: Whether you suffer depends on how you respond to a given situation.
quotes.name: Rudolph Giuliani

quotes.message: Every problem is an opportunity in disguise.
quotes.name: Jason K. Baxter

quotes.message: Adversity reveals genius. Prosperity conceals it.
quotes.name: Horatius

quotes.message: To be tested is good. The challenged life may be the best therapist.
quotes.name: Gail Sheehy

quotes.message: We may counter many defeats, but we must not be defeated.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: When life knocks you down, try to land on your back. Because if you can look up, you can get up.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: You don't make your character in a crises; you exhibit it.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: The darker the night, the sweetest the victory.
quotes.name: Bill Clinton

quotes.message: One must not be afraid of being hurt. The world is full of all kinds of hurts and it is only by facing them that we can become strong and hardy.
quotes.name: Indira Gandhi

quotes.message: There are millions of people in the world but most of them just drift along, afraid of death and even more afraid of life.
quotes.name: Indira Gandhi

quotes.message: Hard times can mean no money.
quotes.name: Andrew Matthews

quotes.message: Hard times can mean no friends, no job, no hope.
quotes.name: Andrew Matthews

quotes.message: Sometimes life is hard. How do you hang on when things seem hopeless? You can tackle your problems as you would climb a mountain.
quotes.name: Andrew Matthews

quotes.message: Through hard times. It puts your life into perspective. It will get you back on track.
quotes.name: Andrew Matthews

quotes.message: We will all have setbacks in life--not maybe, not might, but for sure. We will all have setbacks in life. Both success and failure are decisions. Once your vision is in place, you need to decide you're going to win despite the setback.
quotes.name: Willie Jolley

quotes.message: Where you put your focus and your energy will determine where you will go. If you focus on the setback and challenges it brought you, you cannot effectively move forward.
quotes.name: Willie Jolley

quotes.message: Genius: The capacity to see and to express what is simple, simply!
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Men of genius are rarely much annoyed by the company of vulgar people.
quotes.name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.message: Genius is the true mystery, and at its edge--the abyss.
quotes.name: Guillermo Del Toro

quotes.message: Genius always gives its best at first; prudence, at last.
quotes.name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: One of the strongest characteristics of genius is the power of lighting its own fire.
quotes.name: John W. Foster

quotes.message: Doing easily what others find difficult is talent; doing what is impossible for talent is genius.
quotes.name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.message: The only genius that's worth anything is the genius for hard work.
quotes.name: Kathleen Winsor

quotes.message: Every great genius has an admixture of madness.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Genius is eternal patience.
quotes.name: Michelangelo

quotes.message: Genius is the recovery of childhood at will.
quotes.name: Arthur Rimbaud

quotes.message: This is the nature of genius, to be able to grasp the knowable even when no one else recognizes that it is present.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: Genius is finding the invisible link between things.
quotes.name: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.message: Real genius is nothing else but the supernatural virtue of humility in the domain of thought.
quotes.name: Simone Weil

quotes.message: Genius hath electric power which earth can never tame.
quotes.name: Lydia M. Child

quotes.message: Geniuses don't become geniuses until they find the right moron to compare themselves to.
quotes.name: James McGregor

quotes.message: The role of genius is not to complicate the simple, but to simplify the complicated.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: What the world needs is more geniuses with humility. There are so few of us left.
quotes.name: Oscar Levant

quotes.message: Genius without Education is like Silver in the Mine.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: We all have genius within us, never doubt that fact.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: A man of genius makes no mistakes; his errors are volitional and are the portals of discovery.
quotes.name: James Joyce

quotes.message: Genius is never understood in its own time.
quotes.name: Bill Watterson

quotes.message: Genius... is the capacity to see ten things where the ordinary man sees one.
quotes.name: Ezra Pound

quotes.message: Every true genius is bound to be naive.
quotes.name: J.C.F. von Schiller

quotes.message: Thousands of geniuses live and die undiscovered â€” either by themselves or by others.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: We know that the nature of genius is to provide idiots with ideas twenty years later.
quotes.name: Louis Aragon

quotes.message: Genius ain't anything more than elegant common sense.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Genius always looks forward, and not only sees what is, but what necessarily will be.
quotes.name: Fulke Greville

quotes.message: In the republic of mediocrity, genius is dangerous.
quotes.name: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.message: Becoming a genius is not just knowing that it is possible - it is taking action and having genius experiences.
quotes.name: Andrei G. Aleinikov

quotes.message: Genius is experience. Some seem to think that it is a gift or talent, but it is the fruit of long experience in many lives. Some are older souls than others, and so they know more.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Genius is the ability to renew one's emotions in daily experience.
quotes.name: Paul Cezanne

quotes.message: Men of lofty genius when they are doing the least work are most active.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: Genius might be the ability to say a profound thing in a simple way.
quotes.name: Charles Bukowski

quotes.message: One is not born a genius, one becomes a genius.
quotes.name: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.message: Taste is the common sense of genius.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Genius is the ability to put into effect what is on your mind.
quotes.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.message: Everyone is born a genius, but the process of living de-geniuses them.
quotes.name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.message: Genius thinks out of box when leader adjusts the size of box.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: All geniuses die young.
quotes.name: Groucho Marx

quotes.message: Geniuses have the shortest biographies.
quotes.name: Claire Messud

quotes.message: Everybody is a genius. But, if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will spend its whole life believing it is stupid.
quotes.name: Einstien

quotes.message: The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age, which means never losing your enthusiasm.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: See the genius in everyone you encounter. Just as the mountain cannot crack a nut though it can carry a forest on its back, so too does every living creature have its own perfection built into it.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: We are all geniuses up to the age of ten.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: Almost everyone is born a genius and buried an idiot.
quotes.name: Charles Bukowski

quotes.message: Intellectuals solve problems, geniuses prevent them.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Genius is more often found in a cracked pot than in a whole one.
quotes.name: E. B. White

quotes.message: Genius is talent set on fire by courage.
quotes.name: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.message: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
quotes.name: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.message: Youth is such a wonderful thing. What a crime to waste it on children.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Youth comes but once in a lifetime.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: Youth is not a time of life, it is a state of mind. You are as old as your doubt, your fear, your despair. The way to keep young is to keep your faith young. Keep your self-confidence young. Keep your hope young.
quotes.name: Luella F. Phean

quotes.message: Youth is about the only thing worth having, and that is about the only thing youth has.
quotes.name: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.message: Youth gets together with their materials to build a bridge to the moon or maybe a palace on earth; then in middle age they decide to build a woodshed with them instead.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: You are only young once, and if you work it right, once is enough.
quotes.name: Joe E. Lewis

quotes.message: We have a powerful potential in our youth, and we must have the courage to change old ideas and practices so that we may direct their power toward good ends.
quotes.name: Mary Mcleod Bethune

quotes.message: Who so neglects learning in his youth loses the past and is dead to the future.
quotes.name: Euripedes

quotes.message: A youth with his first cigar makes himself sick; a youth with his first girl makes everybody sick.
quotes.name: Mary Little

quotes.message: The young do not know enough to be prudent, and therefore they attempt the impossible, and achieve it, generation after generation.
quotes.name: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.message: Youth would be an ideal state if it came a little later in life.
quotes.name: Herbert Henry Asquith

quotes.message: Youth cannot know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young.
quotes.name: J.K Rowling

quotes.message: A sensual and intemperate youth translates into an old worn-out body.
quotes.name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.message: Youth is to all the glad season of life; but often only by what it hopes, not by what it attains, or what it escapes.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: Youth is not a question of years: one is young or old from birth.
quotes.name: Natalie Clifford Barney

quotes.message: Young people are in a condition like permanent intoxication, because youth is sweet and they are growing.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: The deepest definition of youth is life as yet untouched by tragedy.
quotes.name: Alfred North Whitehead
