quotes.message: Youth is ever apt to judge in haste, and lose the medium in the wild extreme.
quotes.name: Aaron Hill

quotes.message: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of the people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will have truly defeated age.
quotes.name: Sophia Loren

quotes.message: One of the signs of passing youth is the birth of a sense of fellowship with other human beings as we take our place among them.
quotes.name: Virginia Woolf

quotes.message: It is not possible for civilization to flow backward while there is youth in the world. Youth may be headstrong, but it will advance its allotted length.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: If youth is a defect, it is one we outgrow too soon.
quotes.name: Robert Lowell

quotes.message: Use your youth so that you may have comfort to remember it when it has forsaken you, and not sigh and grieve at the account thereof.
quotes.name: Sir Walter Raleigh

quotes.message: A youth is to be regarded with respect.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Youth is, after all, just a moment, but it is the moment, the spark, that you always carry in your heart.
quotes.name: Raisa M. Gorbachev

quotes.message: Well, youth is the period of assumed personalities and disguises. It is the time of the sincerely insincere.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: The Youth of a Nation are the trustees of posterity.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Youth is that period when a young boy knows everything but how to make a living.
quotes.name: Carey Williams

quotes.message: Youth has no age.
quotes.name: Pablo Picasso

quotes.message: We cannot always build the future for our youth, but we can build our youth for the future.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: The surest way to corrupt a youth is to instruct him to hold in higher esteem those who think alike than those who think differently.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Praise youth and it will prosper.
quotes.name: Irish Proverb

quotes.message: Reckless youth makes rueful age.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Young people need models, not critics.
quotes.name: John Wooden

quotes.message: Youth is wasted on the young.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: If I have known much trouble in my youth, I have also known much joy.
quotes.name: Clara Schumann

quotes.message: Youth is a period of missed opportunities.
quotes.name: Cyril Connolly

quotes.message: Youth is easily deceived because it is quick to hope.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Youth is wholly experimental.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: Remember now thy Creator in the days of thy youth.
quotes.name: Bible

quotes.message: Youth doesn't need friends - it only needs crowds.
quotes.name: Zelda Fitzgerald

quotes.message: Youth is a disease from which we all recover.
quotes.name: Dorothy Fulheim

quotes.message: Youth is certain what it rejects before it knows what it will accept.
quotes.name: Jean Cocteau

quotes.message: The secret of eternal youth is arrested development.
quotes.name: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quotes.message: Youth is a quality, not a matter of circumstances.
quotes.name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.message: A Church without Youth is a Church without a future. Moreover, Youth without a Church is Youth without a future.
quotes.name: Pope Shenouda Iii

quotes.message: The foundation of every state is the education of its youth.
quotes.name: Diogenes

quotes.message: Youth, which is forgiven everything, forgives itself nothing; age, which forgives itself everything. is forgiven nothing.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: 'Youth is full of pleasance, age is full of care; youth like summer morn, age like winter weather; youth like summer brave, age like winter bare. Youth is full of sport, age's breath is short; youth is nimble, age is lame; youth is hot and bold, age is weak and cold; youth is wild, and age is tame.
quotes.name: William Byrd

quotes.message: Sweet as youth's, and more sufficing than the rank and rare enjoyments of the boy.
quotes.name: Robert Crawford

quotes.message: To the heart of youth the world is a highwayside.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: To fall upon a guiltless youth? For he who such a prize would win.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: So my flowers of youth decay like those that float below.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: Your own fair youth, you care so little for it-- smiling toward Heaven, you would not stay the advances of time and change upon your happiest fancies.
quotes.name: Alice Meynell

quotes.message: She has hope's remedy in being young: when age is on, and life has such a fall, the efficacy has left that medicine which in youth is so vital.
quotes.name: Robert Crawford

quotes.message: When youth has done its tedious vain expense of passions that for ever ebb and flow.
quotes.name: Matthew Arnold

quotes.message: Youth's sway and youth's play, of songs and flowers and love.
quotes.name: Dante Gabriel Rossetti

quotes.message: A boy's will is the wind's will, and the thoughts of youth are long, long thoughts.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: Pastimes of youth sometimes among, none can say but necessary.
quotes.name: King of England

quotes.message: The day that youth had died, there came to his grave-side.
quotes.name: Rupert Brooke

quotes.message: Take heed, my dear: youth flies apace; as well as cupid, time is blind.
quotes.name: Matthew Prior

quotes.message: A youth in apparel that glittered went to walk in a grim forest.
quotes.name: Stephen Crane

quotes.message: Today's youth are told to get rich or die trying and they really shouldn't take that attitude forward with them.
quotes.name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.message: The youth is the hope of our future.
quotes.name: Jose Rizal

quotes.message: Old age has its pleasures, which, though different, are not less than the pleasures of youth.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: In youth we learn; in age we understand.
quotes.name: Marie Von Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.message: Youth itself is a talent, a perishable talent.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: Keep true to the dreams of your youth.
quotes.name: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.message: The duty of youth is to challenge corruption.
quotes.name: Kurt Cobain

quotes.message: The youth need to be enabled to become job generators from job seekers.
quotes.name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.message: Everybody's youth is a dream, a form of chemical madness.
quotes.name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.message: Youth is a blunder; Manhood a struggle, Old Age a regret.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
quotes.name: Bill Cosby

quotes.message: The most basic human desire is to feel like you belong. Fitting in is important.
quotes.name: Simon Sinek

quotes.message: Always desire to learn something useful.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: Burning desire to be or do something gives us staying power - a reason to get up every morning or to pick ourselves up and start in again after a disappointment.
quotes.name: Marsha Sinetar

quotes.message: What you seek is seeking you.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: Those who restrain their desire do so because theirs is weak enough to be restrained.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: You can have everything in life you want if you will just help enough other people get what they want.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Be suspicious of what you want.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: Desire is the absurdity that holds open the infinity of possibility.
quotes.name: Wendy Farley

quotes.message: Desire presses ever forward unsubdued.
quotes.name: Sigmund Freud

quotes.message: To get what he wanted, a man had to give other people what they wanted.
quotes.name: Dashiell Hammett

quotes.message: Desire, like the atom, is explosive with creative force.
quotes.name: Paul Vernon Buser

quotes.message: A desire scorned and neglected is an enemy lying in wait with bared dagger.
quotes.name: Abraham Miller

quotes.message: Desires satisfied are but as seeds sown a second time.
quotes.name: Edward Counsel

quotes.message: Anything you really want, you can attain, if you really go after it.
quotes.name: Wayne Dyer

quotes.message: He who desires but acts not, breeds pestilence.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: Plant the seed of desire in your mind and it forms a nucleus with power to attract to itself everything needed for its fulfillment.
quotes.name: Robert Collier

quotes.message: Desire is what leads you through life until the time comes when you desire a higher life. So do not be ashamed that you want so much, yet at the same time do not fool yourself into thinking that what you want today will be enough tomorrow.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: Almost every desire a poor man has is a punishable offence.
quotes.name: Louis Ferdinand Celine

quotes.message: So long as there is desire or want, it is a sure sign that there is imperfection. A perfect, free being cannot have any desire.
quotes.name: Vivekananda

quotes.message: All cravings are the mind seeking salvation or fulfillment in external things and in the future as a substitute for the joy of Being.
quotes.name: Eckhard Tolle

quotes.message: Weak desires bring weak results, just as a small amount of fire makes a small amount of heat.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Some desire is necessary to keep life in motion, and he whose real wants are supplied must admit those of fancy.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: One must not lose desires. They are mighty stimulants to creativeness, to love, and to long life.
quotes.name: Alexander A. Bogomoletz

quotes.message: It is the nature of desire not to be satisfied, and most men live only for the gratification of it.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: If you greatly desire something, have the guts to stake everything on obtaining it.
quotes.name: Brendan Francis

quotes.message: Let your desires be ruled by reason.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: One must desire something to be alive.
quotes.name: Margaret Deland

quotes.message: Desires are only the lack of something: and those who have the greatest desires are in a worse condition than those who have none, or very slight ones.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: We desire nothing so much as what we ought not to have.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: Desire creates the power.
quotes.name: Raymond Holliwell

quotes.message: A burning desire is the greatest motivator of every human action. The desire for success implants ''success consciousness'' which, in turn, creates a vigorous and ever-increasing ''habit of success.
quotes.name: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.message: A desire to be observed, considered, esteemed, praised, beloved, and admired by his fellows is one of the earliest as well as the keenest dispositions discovered in the heart of man.
quotes.name: John Adams

quotes.message: The discipline of desire is the background of character.
quotes.name: John Locke

quotes.message: Desire is a powerful force that can be used to make things happen.
quotes.name: Marcia Wieder

quotes.message: Desire will in due time externalize itself as concrete fact.
quotes.name: Thomas Troward

quotes.message: If you desire many things, many things will seem few.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: The intensity of your desire governs the power with which the force is directed.
quotes.name: John Mcdonald

quotes.message: Desire, burning desire, is basic to achieving anything beyond the ordinary.
quotes.name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.message: When desire dies, fear is born.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: Desire means the way to go out; desire is the path that leads you out. If your mind is still desiring, you cannot move within.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Desire is poverty. Desire is the greatest impurity of the mind. Desire is the motive force for action. Desire in the mind is the real impurity. Even a spark of desire is a very great evil.
quotes.name: Swami Sivananda

quotes.message: Every intense desire is perhaps a desire to be different from what we are.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: When your desires are strong enough, you will appear to possess superhuman powers to achieve.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: The desire accomplished is sweet to the soul.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: It is much easier to suppress a first desire than to satisfy those that follow.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Desire is proof of the availability...
quotes.name: Robert Collier

quotes.message: If you desire to be good, begin by believing that you are wicked.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Desires are insatiable.They keep growing as we try to satisfy them just as the fire becomes more inflamed when oil is poured into it.
quotes.name: Manu Smriti

quotes.message: We should learn from today, and dream for tomorrow. It is the pursuit of our dreams that gives us the opportunity to expand our knowledge and improve our lives.
quotes.name: G. Donald Jr. Craig

quotes.message: Your clear vision will instill you desire to move towards achieving your goal. Each day you look to that goal you will be pulled to continue the effort.
quotes.name: G. Donald Jr. Craig

quotes.message: Desire is powerful. One of the most powerful forces in our lives. Follow your desire! It sounds good.
quotes.name: John Eldredge

quotes.message: Desire can lead us to the life we were meant to be live. It can shape our hopes and dreams, fill them with passion and determination.
quotes.name: John Eldredge

quotes.message: Life without love can hardly be called living. The same holds true when we abandon our heart's deep desires.
quotes.name: John Eldredge

quotes.message: God is not opposed to desire. Far from it. He gave us a heart that desires deeply, and he uses those desires to draw us himself, and to the life he created us to live.
quotes.name: John Eldredge

quotes.message: How you handle your heart's desire will in great measure determine what becomes of your life.
quotes.name: John Eldredge

quotes.message: There are two tragedies in life. One is not to get your heart's desire. The other is to get it.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Do not impose on others what you yourself do not desire.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Every person who wins in any undertaking must be willing to cut all sources of retreat. Only by doing so can one be sure of maintaining that state of mind known as a burning desire to win-essential to success.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Existence does not listen to your desires, and does not follow you desires, however beautiful and however pious. Existence goes on in its own way.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: Freedom from the desire for an answer in essential to the understanding of a problem.
quotes.name: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.message: Future is your projection of unfulfilled desires. The more unfulfilled you are, the bigger a future you have. The more unfulfilled is your being, the richer the dreams you have of the future. But it is just in your mind.
quotes.name: Osho

quotes.message: I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day.
quotes.name: EB White

quotes.message: I see nothing wrong with the human trait to desire. In fact, I consider it integral to our success mechanism. Becoming attached to what we desire is what causes the trouble. If you must have it in order to be happy, then you are denying the happiness of the here and now.
quotes.name: Pter McWilliams

quotes.message: I used to desire many, many things, but now I have just one desire, and that's to get rid of all my other desires.
quotes.name: John Cleese

quotes.message: Those who live in the realization of their oneness with the infinite power become magnets to attract to themselves a continual supply of whatever things they desire. Those who are truly wise and who use the forces and powers with which they are endowed--to them the great universe always opens her treasure house.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Trine

quotes.message: The only real limitation on what you can accomplish is the level of intensity of your desire. If you really want something badly enough, there are no limits on what you can achieve.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: When you really want something deeply and take massive action, you can achieve wonders.
quotes.name: Amey Hedge

quotes.message: You can have anything you want-if you want it badly enough. You can be anything you want to be, do anything you set out to accomplish if you hold to that desire with singleness of purpose.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: When you find your heart's desire, you'll have the key to unlocking your potential in every other part of your life.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Humans have the remarkable ability to get exactly what they must have. But there is a difference between a 'must' and a 'want.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Your are what your deepest desire is. As is your desire, so is your intention. As is your intentions, so is your will. As is your will, so is your deed. As is your deed, so is your destiny.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: Our destiny ultimately comes from the deepest level of desire and also from the deepest level of intention. The two are intimately linked to each other.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: From the experience in the past that we create memories, which are the basis of imagination and desire. Desire is the basis of action.
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: If you're not willing to do whatever it takes to achieve your outcomes. The goals you desire and set for yourself are just not magically going to happen on their own.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: Those who will and those who do, often live the life of their dreams, their ultimate dream life. They know the only way to create the life they desire and deserve is to set goals, and to take action in the achievement of these goals.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: You need a desire to grow as a person, to discover what your gifts in life are to yourself, others, and the world. You are the only you in the world.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: You may long for a new life, but need to appreciate the life you currently have, in order to create the life you desire.
quotes.name: James A. Murphy

quotes.message: We saw desire as the maker of the world, from how intention causes its own satisfaction, to how desire drives the spiritual and worldly aspects of life for us all.
quotes.name: David Webster

quotes.message: Desire is indeed a power, a danger. So much so that in human hands it requires significant regulation.
quotes.name: David Webster

quotes.message: Start with whatever is in your heart right now, and trust your hunch - that invisible voice that breathes life into your vision. Someday your acorn of desire may become a full grown oak.
quotes.name: John A. Andrews

quotes.message: Many of us desire to win so much that we forget what it takes to get there.
quotes.name: John Maxwell

quotes.message: Desires directs focus. If your desires are vague, your focus will be blurred. If your desires are heartfelt, however, your focus will be sharp and clear.
quotes.name: Sonia Choquette

quotes.message: Vague desires will never materialized, but clearly focused heart's desires will. Clear focus is the mind's magic wand. It points your creativity in a particular direction and channels your experience behind it. Wherever you clearly focus, you create.
quotes.name: Sonia Choquette

quotes.message: When you have a true desire, you have a burning urge for some particular experience or outcome. This burning, intense, passionate longing is the creative spark that sets miracle making into motion.
quotes.name: Sonia Choquette

quotes.message: Once you learn how to manifest dreams, you can manifest as many as you desire.
quotes.name: Sonia Choquette

quotes.message: Ninety percent of all talent is really desire. You don't really need talent. You need desire, and that will drive you to develop talent.
quotes.name: Jon Garate

quotes.message: Desire is not something to be conquered over or transcend, but a unique opportunity to be explored.
quotes.name: Darcy Lyon

quotes.message: Our body and desire are not obstacles to our deepest natures; they are the doorway in.
quotes.name: Darcy Lyon

quotes.message: Desire knows no boundary. It is simply the very nature of the universe itself. Desire is the very root of the universe.
quotes.name: Douglas Brooks

quotes.message: Every human mind is a great slumbering power until awakened by a keen desire and by definite resolution to do.
quotes.name: Edgar F Roberts

quotes.message: Everyone has the necessary resources within them to achieve what they desire. Your gifts and talents are there and ready to be used.
quotes.name: Jan Malloch

quotes.message: It has been said that we live not so much through our achievements as through our desires. The successes we achieve do not last, but we desire what is immortal.
quotes.name: James M. Houston

quotes.message: A feeling of restlessness is one of the main ways in which desire can dominate our lives. Even if we choose to hide our desires, they may still influence our personalities very deeply.
quotes.name: James M. Houston

quotes.message: I was born with the restless desire to do a thing as well as it could be done. That meant doing it a little better than the other fellow.
quotes.name: Ty Cobb

quotes.message: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential.. these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quotes.name: Eddie Robinson

quotes.message: Energy is equal to desire and purpose.
quotes.name: Eddie Robinson

quotes.message: Whatever you vividly imagine, ardently desire, sincerely believe, and enthusiastically act upon, must inevitably come to pass.
quotes.name: Eddie Robinson

quotes.message: Ignorance of the Scriptures is ignorance of Christ.
quotes.name: St. Jerome

quotes.message: The Scriptures were written, not to make us astronomers, but to make us saints.
quotes.name: Matthew Henry

quotes.message: The Scriptures were not given to increase our knowledge, but to change our lives.
quotes.name: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.message: We must not only read the Scriptures, but we must make their rules of life our own.
quotes.name: Hosea Ballou

quotes.message: Yet one thing secures us what ever betide, the scriptures assures us that the Lord will provide.
quotes.name: Isaac Newton

quotes.message: The Scriptures of God are my only foundation and substance in all matters of weight and importance.
quotes.name: John Knox

quotes.message: When you read the sacred Scriptures, or any other book, never think how you read, but what you read.
quotes.name: John Philip Kemble

quotes.message: We were given the Scriptures to humble us into realizing that God is right, and the rest of us are just guessing.
quotes.name: Rich Mullins

quotes.message: Any manipulation of the Scriptures to make them speak peace to the natural man is evil and can only lead to ruin.
quotes.name: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.message: The Scriptures teach us the best way of living, the noblest way of suffering, and the most comfortable way of dying.
quotes.name: John Flavel

quotes.message: The scriptures say to wake up from the deep sleep of ignorance, remain fully awake, remain conscious, & go on learning.
quotes.name: Rama Swami

quotes.message: Scriptures are like packets of light that illuminate our minds and give place to guidance and inspiration from on high.
quotes.name: Richard G. Scott

quotes.message: The truths of the Scriptures are so marked and inimitable, that the inventor would be more of a miraculous character than the hero.
quotes.name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.message: In the divine Scriptures, there are shallows and there are deeps; shallows where the lamb may wade, and deeps where the elephant may swim.
quotes.name: John Owen

quotes.message: The Scriptures obtain full authority among believers only when men regard them as having sprung from heaven, as if there the living words of God were heard.
quotes.name: John Calvin

quotes.message: The Scriptures are shallow enough for a babe to come and drink without fear of drowning and deep enough for theologians to swim in without ever reaching the bottom.
quotes.name: St. Jerome

quotes.message: The Holy Scriptures are that divine instrument by which we are taught what to believe, concerning God, ourselves, and all things, and how to please God unto eternal life.
quotes.name: John Robinson

quotes.message: The scriptures make the danger of delay clear. It is that we may discover that we have run out of time. The God who gives us each day as a treasure will require an accounting.
quotes.name: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.message: The inspired Scriptures make the clear distinction between false and true riches and make plain the reason why happiness is gained and fully enjoyed only by those who find true riches.
quotes.name: Joseph Franklin Rutherford

quotes.message: The scriptures offer us so many doctrinal diamonds. And when the light of the Spirit plays upon their several facets, they sparkle with celestial sense and illuminate the path we are to follow.
quotes.name: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.message: The Scriptures should be read with the aim of finding Christ in them. Whoever turns aside from this object, even though he wears himself out all his life in learning, he will never reach the knowledge of the truth.
quotes.name: John Calvin

quotes.message: The Holy Scriptures surpass in efficaciousness all the arts and all the sciences of the philosophers and jurists; these, though good and necessary to life here below, are vain and of no effect as to what concerns the life eternal.
quotes.name: Martin Luther

quotes.message: The scriptures bid us to send forth our light and our truth and when children carry within their hearts the torch of hope, they learn the darkness yields not only to man-made fire, but to starlight, to the rising sun, and to the light of the soul.
quotes.name: Dennis Kucinich

quotes.message: And that the Scriptures, though not everywhere Free from corruption, or entire, or clear, Are uncorrupt, sufficient, clear, entire In all things which our needful faith require.
quotes.name: John Dryden

quotes.message: Scripture indicates that heaven is not distant but rather… heaven is near—in another realm.
quotes.name: Paul Enns

quotes.message: Holy Scriptures; the precious promise of God.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: The scriptures are in print what Christ is in person.
quotes.name: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.message: The scriptures hold the keys to spiritual protection.
quotes.name: Boyd K. Packer

quotes.message: The Holy Scriptures lead us to God and open the path to the knowledge of God.
quotes.name: Saint John Chrysostom

quotes.message: Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important.
quotes.name: Bill Gates

quotes.message: Our technological powers increase, but the side effects and potential hazards also escalate.
quotes.name: Alvin Toffler

quotes.message: Technology gives us power, but it does not and cannot tell us how to use that power. Thanks to technology, we can instantly communicate across the world, but it still doesn't help us know what to say.
quotes.name: Jonathan Sacks

quotes.message: Technological progress has merely provided us with more efficient means for going backwards.
quotes.name: Aldous Huxley

quotes.message: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
quotes.name: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.message: Technology... is a queer thing. It brings you great gifts with one hand, and it stabs you in the back with the other.
quotes.name: Carrie Snow

quotes.message: Technology is a gift of God. After the gift of life it is perhaps the greatest of God's gifts. It is the mother of civilizations, of arts and of sciences.
quotes.name: Freeman Dyson

quotes.message: Technology is always a two-edged sword. It will bring in many benefits, but also many disasters.
quotes.name: Alan Moore

quotes.message: For a successful technology, reality must take precedence over public relations, for Nature cannot be fooled.
quotes.name: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.message: Technology is making gestures precise and brutal, and with them men.
quotes.name: Theodor Adorno

quotes.message: Technological society has succeeded in multiplying the opportunities for pleasure, but it has great difficulty in generating joy.
quotes.name: Pope Paul VI

quotes.message: Technology...the knack of so arranging the world that we don't have to experience it.
quotes.name: Max Frisch

quotes.message: Technology is so much fun but we can drown in our technology. The fog of information can drive out knowledge.
quotes.name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.message: The Internet is so big, so powerful and pointless that for some people it is a complete substitute for life.
quotes.name: Andrew Brown

quotes.message: You affect the world by what you browse.
quotes.name: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.message: Technology is a word that describes something that doesn't work yet.
quotes.name: Douglas Adams

quotes.message: Technology made large populations possible; large populations now make technology indispensable.
quotes.name: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.message: So much technology, so little talent.
quotes.name: Vernor Vinge

quotes.message: The ultimate promise of technology is to make us master of a world that we command by the push of a button.
quotes.name: Volker Grassmuck

quotes.message: Technology is the campfire around which we tell our stories.
quotes.name: Laurie Anderson

quotes.message: Once a new technology rolls over you, if you're not part of the steamroller, you're part of the road.
quotes.name: Stewart Brand

quotes.message: Technology presumes there's just one right way to do things and there never is.
quotes.name: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.message: If we continue to develop our technology without wisdom or prudence, our servant may prove to be our executioner.
quotes.name: Omar N. Bradley

quotes.message: Technology has to be invented or adopted.
quotes.name: Jared Diamond

quotes.message: All of our technology is completely unnecessary to a happy life.
quotes.name: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.message: Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master.
quotes.name: Christian Lous Lange

quotes.message: Technology is anything that wasn't around when you were born.
quotes.name: Alan Kay

quotes.message: Technology will definitely solve all our problems, but in the process it will create brand new ones. But that's O.K. because the most you can expect from life is to get to solve better and better problems.
quotes.name: Scott Adams

quotes.message: Technology is teaching us to be human again.
quotes.name: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.message: Digital technology allows us a much larger scope to tell stories that were pretty much the grounds of the literary media.
quotes.name: George Lucas

quotes.message: As technology continues to increase our possibilities, what we're seeing is a shrinking of the lag time between what we dream about and what we create.
quotes.name: Jason Silva

quotes.message: Technology gives us the facilities that lessen the barriers of time and distance - the telegraph and cable, the telephone, radio, and the rest.
quotes.name: Emily Greene Balch

quotes.message: We can't blame the technology when we make mistakes.
quotes.name: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.message: As information technology restructures the work situation, it abstracts thought from action.
quotes.name: Shoshana Zuboff

quotes.message: Technology is destructive only in the hands of people who do not realize that they are one and the same process as the universe.
quotes.name: Alan W. Watts

quotes.message: Our technology forces us to live mythically.
quotes.name: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.message: As technology advances in complexity and scope, fear becomes more primitive.
quotes.name: Don DeLillo

quotes.message: Technology is dominated by two types of people: those who understand what they do not manage and those who manage what they do not understand.
quotes.name: Archibald Putt

quotes.message: The purpose of technology is not to confuse the brain but to serve the body.
quotes.name: William S. Burroughs

quotes.message: For any new technology there is always controversy and there always some fear associated with it. I think that's just the price of being first sometimes.
quotes.name: Hugh Grant

quotes.message: If it keeps up, man will atrophy all his limbs but the push-button finger.
quotes.name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.message: Technology - with all its promise and potential - has gotten so far beyond human control that its threatening the future of humankind.
quotes.name: Kim J. Vicente

quotes.message: Technology means you can now do amazing things easily; but you couldn't easily do them legally.
quotes.name: Lawrence Lessig

quotes.message: The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it, so it's part of everyday life.
quotes.name: Bill Gates

quotes.message: New technology is useful, but it's inefficient and ugly; it knows it'll be obsolete by lunchtime tomorrow, so it has no incentive to be anything else.
quotes.name: Tom Holt

quotes.message: Technology makes things faster and more cost-effective, but it's not perfect. It requires you to be as flexible as you can be.
quotes.name: John Phillips

quotes.message: As technology advances, it reverses the characteristics of every situation again and again. The age of automation is going to be the age of do it yourself.
quotes.name: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.message: Technology breeds crime and we are constantly trying to develop technology to stay one step ahead of the person trying to use it negatively.
quotes.name: Frank Abagnale

quotes.message: I used to work in a funeral home to feel good about myself, just the fact that I was breathing.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: If a great outfit gets you one step closer to feeling good about yourself, then it's worth every penny.
quotes.name: Rachel Roy

quotes.message: Eliminating the things you love is not wellness. Wellness feeds your soul and makes you feel good.
quotes.name: Iman

quotes.message: There is nothing that works out for the worst that won't work out for the better.
quotes.name: Karldon Okruta

quotes.message: Real beauty is to be true to oneself. That's what makes me feel good.
quotes.name: Laetitia Casta

quotes.message: I know only that what is moral is what you feel good after and what is immoral is what you feel bad after.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.name: Dr. Seuss

quotes.message: When you're feeling your worst, that's when you get to know yourself the best.
quotes.name: Leslie Grossman

quotes.message: Hard work makes you feel good because you have accomplished something.
quotes.name: Alcurtis Turner

quotes.message: People who produce good results feel good about themselves.
quotes.name: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quotes.message: When you look good, you feel good. Confidence with what you're wearing is very important. If you feel good, you will always perform your best without worrying about anything.
quotes.name: Maria Sharapova

quotes.message: The best feeling in the world is realizing that you're perfectly happy without the thing you thought you needed.
quotes.name: Marxie

quotes.message: If you know that all is well, you know all you need to know. And if you know life is supposed to be fun, you know more than almost anybody else knows.
quotes.name: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.message: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to swim.
quotes.name: Jon Kabat Zinn

quotes.message: Laughter is the sensation of feeling good all over and showing it principally in one place.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Just do your best. I find that if I set that goal for myself and no one else, I feel good.
quotes.name: Cobie Smulders

quotes.message: I feel pretty good. My body actually looks like an old banana, but it's fine.
quotes.name: Mike Piazza

quotes.message: Laugh at yourself. It tones your facial muscles and attitude.
quotes.name: Kelly Rudolph

quotes.message: Follow what feels good in the moment, every moment, and it will lead you through a most excellent life.
quotes.name: Jen Sincero

quotes.message: As you think thoughts that feel good to you, you will be in harmony with who you really are.
quotes.name: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.message: Giving back, doing motivational speeches and stuff like that, that's always made me feel good. If you repeatedly go out there, and you are the change that you want to see, then that's what you are.
quotes.name: Keke Palmer

quotes.message: If we are always pushing away from feelings that we condemn as wrong, painful, or ugly, we are also pushing away from the very energy that can bring us incredible joy and ecstasy.
quotes.name: Shaeri Richards

quotes.message: Feeling good about ourselves is essential in our being able to love others.
quotes.name: Fred Rogers

quotes.message: See with the eyes of love and a thing becomes beautiful. See with the eyes of hate and things are ugly.
quotes.name: Joy Cowley

quotes.message: When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Even if happiness forgets you a little bit, never completely forget about it.
quotes.name: Jacques Prevert

quotes.message: Those who can laugh without cause have either found the true meaning of happiness or have gone stark raving mad.
quotes.name: Norm Papernick

quotes.message: Your dreams don't have to be lofty; they just have to be lived.
quotes.name: Kelly Bouchard

quotes.message: To feel good, do good.
quotes.name: Debasish Mridha

quotes.message: Be thankful for what you have and you will end up having more.
quotes.name: Oprah

quotes.message: I'm not about trying to get and get and get. I feel good when I get, but I kind of feel better when I give.
quotes.name: K'naan

quotes.message: Just try to do the right thing, and that's immediate karma: I feel good about myself.
quotes.name: Linda Thompson

quotes.message: It's always a nice day above the clouds.
quotes.name: James Stoddah

quotes.message: The better you feel, the more in alignment you are. The worse you feel the more out of alignment you are.
quotes.name: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.message: Being happy doesn't mean you're perfect. It just means you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.
quotes.name: K.B Indiana

quotes.message: The next time you feel really good, just keep feeling that way for the rest of your life.
quotes.name: Donny Miller

quotes.message: If you're happy, if you're feeling good, then nothing else matters.
quotes.name: Robin Wright Penn

quotes.message: Mining the moment for something that feels good, something to appreciate, something to savour, something to take in, that's what your moments are about.
quotes.name: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.message: When you take care of yourself, you're a better person for others. When you feel good about yourself, you treat others better.
quotes.name: Solange Knowles

quotes.message: Always remember you are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, smarter than you think and twice as beautiful as you've ever imagined.
quotes.name: Dr. Seuss

quotes.message: It's your life; live it well.
quotes.name: Judge Judy Sheindlin

quotes.message: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
quotes.name: John Barrymore

quotes.message: Life is full of challenges, seen and unseen, so to look and feel great, you must hold your head up each day and project your inner confidence.
quotes.name: Cindy Ann Peterson

quotes.message: God brings men into deep waters, not to drown them, but to cleanse them.
quotes.name: John Aughey

quotes.message: I will always find a way and a way will always find me.
quotes.name: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.message: Don't water your weeds.
quotes.name: Harvey Mackay

quotes.message: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: Our capacity to draw happiness from aesthetic objects or material goods in fact seems critically dependent on our first satisfying a more important range of emotional or psychological needs, among them the need for understanding, for love, expression and respect.
quotes.name: Alain De Botton

quotes.message: Learn to value yourself, which means: fight for your happiness.
quotes.name: Ayn Rand

quotes.message: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift; that’s why it’s called The Present.
quotes.name: Bil Keane

quotes.message: Put your thoughts to sleep. Do not let them cast a shadow over the moon of your heart. Let go of thinking.
quotes.name: Rumi

quotes.message: Take a deep breath. Inhale peace, exhale happiness.
quotes.name: A.D. Posey

quotes.message: Life is the dancer and you are the dance.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or touched, they are felt with the heart.
quotes.name: The Little Prince

quotes.message: The world is full of magical things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.
quotes.name: W.B. Yeats

quotes.message: There’s as many atoms in a single molecule of your DNA as there are stars in the typical galaxy. We are, each of us, a little universe.
quotes.name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.message: See what no one else sees. See what everyone chooses not to see – out of fear, conformity or laziness.
quotes.name: Patch Adams

quotes.message: Wherever you are, you are one with the clouds and one with the sun and the stars you see. You are one with everything.
quotes.name: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.message: Nature does not hurry, yet everything gets accomplished.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: Each morning when I open my eyes I say to myself: I, not events, have the power to make me happy or unhappy today. I can choose which it shall be. Yesterday is dead, tomorrow hasn’t arrived yet. I have just one day, today, and I’m going to be happy in it.
quotes.name: Groucho Marx

quotes.message: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Men are made stronger on realization that the helping hand they need is at the end of their own arm.
quotes.name: Sidney J. Phillips

quotes.message: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
quotes.name: J. K. Rowling

quotes.message: You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
quotes.name: Walter Hagen

quotes.message: To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing and be nothing.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: You can't get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good.
quotes.name: Jerry West

quotes.message: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: The free soul is rare, but you know it when you see it - basically because you feel good, very good, when you are near or with them.
quotes.name: Charles Bukowski

quotes.message: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Those who matter don't mind, and those who mind don't matter.
quotes.name: Bernard Baruch

quotes.message: Genius is more often found in a cracked pot than in a whole one.
quotes.name: E. B. White

quotes.message: When I feel good about myself, things start happening for myself. When you look up, you go up.
quotes.name: Herschel Walker

quotes.message: The culture we have does not make people feel good about themselves. And you have to be strong enough to say if the culture doesn't work, don't buy it.
quotes.name: Morrie Schwartz

quotes.message: It sounds like a cliche but I also learnt that you're not going to fall for the right person until you really love yourself and feel good about how you are.
quotes.name: Emma Watson

quotes.message: We don't laugh because we feel good; we feel good because we laugh.
quotes.name: Bob Ross

quotes.message: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Life's too short to pretend and play games like that. I want to spend my time hanging out with people who make me feel good about myself. People who make me happy.
quotes.name: Gena Showalter

quotes.message: The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: If you want to be happy, do not dwell on the past, do not worry about the future, focus on living fully in the present.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
quotes.name: Anthony J. D’Angelo

quotes.message: Nothing ever goes away until it teaches us what we need to know.
quotes.name: Pema Chodron

quotes.message: Happiness is a habit - cultivate it.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
quotes.name: Anne Frank

quotes.message: Music is music, ultimately. If it makes you feel good, cool.
quotes.name: Prince

quotes.message: The audience likes their emotions to be touched. They want to laugh and cry and feel good.
quotes.name: Magic Johnson

quotes.message: Kindness makes a fellow feel good whether it's being done to him or by him.
quotes.name: Frank A. Clark

quotes.message: The true secret of happiness lies in the taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
quotes.name: William Morris

quotes.message: As people spin faster and faster in the pursuit of merely personal happiness, they become exhausted in the futile effort of chasing themselves.
quotes.name: Andrew Delbanco

quotes.message: Happiness is not an ideal of reason, but of imagination.
quotes.name: Immanuel Kant

quotes.message: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: Everything real is in the present moment. Only here can we find happiness and harmony, feel alive and do something that will change our future. Only here can we be with the people we love, enjoy the things we like and see beautiful places.
quotes.name: Lidiya K.

quotes.message: There is still no cure for the common birthday.
quotes.name: John Glenn

quotes.message: Middle age is the time when a man is always thinking that in a week or two he will feel as good as ever.
quotes.name: Don Marquis

quotes.message: Middle age is when your age starts to show around your middle.
quotes.name: Bob Hope

quotes.message: A diplomat is a man who always remembers a woman's birthday but never remembers her age.
quotes.name: Robert Lee Frost

quotes.message: The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age.
quotes.name: Lucile Ball

quotes.message: With mirth and laughter let old wrinkles come.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: And in the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: We know we're getting old when the only thing we want for our birthday is not to be reminded of it.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: A birthday is just the first day of another 365-day journey around the sun. Enjoy the trip.
quotes.name: Unknown

quotes.message: One to-day is worth two to-morrows.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: I'm sixty years of age. That's 16 Celsius.
quotes.name: George Carlin

quotes.message: No wise man ever wished to be younger.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: Grow old along with me! The best is yet to be, the last of life, for which the first was made.
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: I'm at an age when my back goes out more than I do.
quotes.name: Phyllis Diller

quotes.message: If we could be twice young and twice old we could correct all our mistakes.
quotes.name: Euripides

quotes.message: Time and Tide wait for no man, but time always stands still for a woman of thirty.
quotes.name: Robert Lee Frost

quotes.message: What most persons consider as virtue, after the age of 40 is simply a loss of energy.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Every man over forty is a scoundrel.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: The years between fifty and seventy are the hardest. You are always being asked to do things, and yet you are not decrepit enough to turn them down.
quotes.name: T S Eliot

quotes.message: Prejudice is a burden that confuses the past, threatens the future and renders the present inaccessible.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Prejudice is a learned trait. You're not born prejudiced; you're taught it.
quotes.name: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.message: Prejudice is a chain, it can hold you. If you prejudice, you can't move, you keep prejudice for years. Never get nowhere with that.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: Prejudice is like a hair across your cheek. You can't see it, you can't find it with your fingers, but you keep brushing at it because the feel of it is irritating.
quotes.name: Marian Anderson

quotes.message: Bias and prejudice are attitudes to be kept in hand, not attitudes to be avoided.
quotes.name: Charles Curtis

quotes.message: Prejudice is a raft onto which the shipwrecked mind clambers and paddles to safety.
quotes.name: Ben Hecht

quotes.message: Prejudice is the child of ignorance.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Prejudice - a vagrant opinion without visible means of support.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: Bigotry or prejudice in any form is more than a problem; it is a deep-seated evil within our society.
quotes.name: Judith Light

quotes.message: Preconceived notions are the locks on the door to wisdom.
quotes.name: Merry Browne

quotes.message: Judgments prevent us from seeing the good that lies beyond appearances.
quotes.name: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.message: Our thoughts are unseen hands shaping the people we meet. Whatever we truly think them to be, that's what they'll become for us.
quotes.name: Richard Cowper

quotes.message: Prejudices subsist in people's imagination long after they have been destroyed by their experience.
quotes.name: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.message: If you judge people you have no time to love them.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Prejudices, it is well known, are most difficult to eradicate from the heart whose soil has never been loosened or fertilised by education: they grow there, firm as weeds among stones.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.message: Prejudice is the glass through which most things are seen and judged.
quotes.name: Edward Counsel

quotes.message: All prejudices are obstinate, like diseases of chronic tenacity, and require radical cures.
quotes.name: Norman Macdonald

quotes.message: Prejudice is the sole author of infamies: how many acts are so qualified by an opinion forged out of naught but prejudice!
quotes.name: Marquis De Sade

quotes.message: Prejudice squints when it looks and lies when it talks.
quotes.name: Duchess d'Abrantes

quotes.message: Prejudices are what fools use for reason.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Two things reduce prejudice: education and laughter.
quotes.name: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.message: Race prejudice can't be talked down, it must be lived down.
quotes.name: Francis J. Grimke

quotes.message: Prejudice not being funded on reason cannot be removed by argument.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Sometimes we feel the loss of a prejudice as a loss of vigor.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: Prejudice cannot see the things that are because it is always looking for things that aren't.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Prejudices are the chains forged by ignorance to keep men apart.
quotes.name: Marguerite Gardiner

quotes.message: Prejudice is opinion without judgement.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Our prejudices are our robbers, they rob us valuable things in life.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: There is no prejudice so strong as that which arises from a fancied exemption from all prejudice.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Our prejudices are like physical infirmities - we cannot do what they prevent us from doing.
quotes.name: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.message: Prejudice is being down on something you're not up on.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I think people always believe what they want to believe, don't you?
quotes.name: Lillian Hellman

quotes.message: Too many of our prejudices are like pyramids upside down. They rest on tiny, trivial incidents, but they spread upward and outward until they fill our minds.
quotes.name: William McChesney Martin

quotes.message: Bigotry is the sacred disease.
quotes.name: Heraclitus

quotes.message: Bigotry tries to keep truth safe in its hand
quotes.name: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.message: Prejudice assumes the garb of reason, but the cheat is too thin.
quotes.name: Henry Wheeler Shaw

quotes.message: The prejudices of men emanate from the mind, and may be overcome; the prejudices of women emanate from the heart and are impregnable.
quotes.name: Jean Baptiste de Boyer

quotes.message: Beware prejudices. They are like rats, and men's minds are like traps; prejudices get in easily, but it is doubtful if they ever get out.
quotes.name: Lord Jeffrey

quotes.message: When we destroy an old prejudice, we have need of a new virtue.
quotes.name: Madame De Stael

quotes.message: Prejudices are the props of civilization.
quotes.name: Andre Gide

quotes.message: Prejudices are what rule the vulgar crowd.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Prejudice is the twin of illiberality.
quotes.name: G. D. Prentice

quotes.message: Prejudice is never easy unless it can pass itself off for reason.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Prejudice, which sees what it pleases, cannot see what is plain.
quotes.name: Aubrey de Vere

quotes.message: Rigid judgmental opinions can block descent of Spirit's pinions.
quotes.name: Saiom Shriver

quotes.message: Prejudice is a house-plant which is very apt to wilt if you take it out-of-doors among folks.
quotes.name: H. W. SHAW

quotes.message: Prejudice is an equivocal term; and may as well mean right opinions taken upon trust and deeply rooted in the mind, as false and absurd opinions so derived, and grown into it.
quotes.name: Richard Hurd

quotes.message: Prejudice is a mist, which in our journey through the world often dims the brightest and obscures the best of all the good and glorious objects that meet us on our way.
quotes.name: Shaftesbury

quotes.message: You learn to like someone when you find out what makes them laugh, but you can never truly love someone until you find out what makes them cry.
quotes.name: John Mayer

quotes.message: Why is it so embarrassing to admit you like someone? It should be a compliment to them, and even if they don't like you back, they should at least commend you on your refined taste.
quotes.name: Dalya Moon

quotes.message: The fact of the matter is that when there are feelings involved and you like someone, it doesn't matter if you're an actor, a teacher, a doctor, a lawyer, a receptionist, you can't really help it when you have feelings for someone.
quotes.name: Jessica Szohr

quotes.message: I'm all for being in love and whenever I like someone, I end up pretty much completely smitten.
quotes.name: Ed Westwick

quotes.message: To look into that persons eyes and find yourself so completely lost in another world, a world full of absolute comfort and happiness.
quotes.name: Lily Collins

quotes.message: I'm so in love, every time I look at you my soul gets dizzy.
quotes.name: Jesse Tyler

quotes.message: You flew off with the wings of my heart and left me flightless.
quotes.name: Stelle Atwater

quotes.message: We've all at some point in our life encountered that feeling of secretly liking someone, secretly having your eyes on them, secretly wishing they knew, but deep inside you were afraid of what the outcome would be. So you kept it unnoticed.
quotes.name: Telisa McLaughlin

quotes.message: Liking someone doesn't mean you have to be lovers, sometimes you just have to be friends.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Sometimes you never realize how much you like someone, until you watch them liking someone else.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Do you know what it's like to like someone so much you can't stand it and know that they'll never feel the same way
quotes.name: Jenny Han

quotes.message: If you don't expect to like someone and then you do, that's an incredibly exciting moment.
quotes.name: Steven Moffat

quotes.message: Everytime you speak about how much you like someone else, it kills me inside.
quotes.name: Xuan Ta

quotes.message: I like the way he danced. And then I like the way we danced together.
quotes.name: Anita Diamant

quotes.message: If love is liking someone an awful lot, then I suppose I'm in love with several people.
quotes.name: Steig Larsson

quotes.message: If I had a rose for every time I thought of you, I'd be picking roses for a lifetime.
quotes.name: Swedish Proverb

quotes.message: Love's easy. It kind of comes with the territory. But liking is another story.
quotes.name: Melina Marchetta

quotes.message: It's a lot easier to like people when they can't make life miserable for you anymore.
quotes.name: Carol Kendall

quotes.message: You know you are in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.name: Dr. Seuss

quotes.message: Sometimes your nearness takes my breath away; and all the things I want to say can find no voice. Then, in silence, I can only hope my eyes will speak my heart.
quotes.name: Robert Sexton

quotes.message: What I feel for you seems less of earth and more of a cloudless heaven.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Just because you discover that you may like somebody after all, it doesn't necessarily mean there's any attraction.
quotes.name: Steve Kluger

quotes.message: How do you make yourself not like someone
quotes.name: Louise Rennison

quotes.message: Wanna hear something funny? What? I think I started liking you.
quotes.name: Jenny Han

quotes.message: I like someone I can have fun with and who can be more laid-back than I am, because it calms me down.
quotes.name: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.message: I like you more than I would like to have a cigarette.
quotes.name: Wendy Cope

quotes.message: You know you really like someone, when you sit the painful way in your chair just to get a better look at them.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Liking one person is an extra reason for liking another.
quotes.name: E. M. FORSTER

quotes.message: You can tell if someone's into you. You can feel the chemistry.
quotes.name: BRADLEY COOPER

quotes.message: It is also necessary to keep a very sharp lookout for fear our liking for some person makes us uncharitable, or even unfair, to someone else.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: The worldly man treats certain people kindly because he 'likes' them.: the Christian trying to treat people kindly, finds himself liking more and more people as he goes on— including people he could not even have imagined himself liking at the beginning.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: Natural liking or affection for people makes it easier to be 'charitable toward them.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: If someone below us does not treat us politely, we don't like anything he does. If, instead, we take a liking to someone, we forgive him anything he does.
quotes.name: St Francis of Sales

quotes.message: Liking someone who gives you can induce you to provide a return gift, since liking someone implies liking what is good for her, and generally her satisfaction, pleasure, or happiness.
quotes.name: Serge-Christophe Kolm

quotes.message: And because we tend to like people who like us, another very simple part of liking someone is knowing that the person likes you.
quotes.name: Jeffrey D. Holmes

quotes.message: Liking someone results from a good feeling for someone because of what they are and what they do.
quotes.name: John James MIller

quotes.message: LIking someone occurs naturally because of their attractiveness.
quotes.name: John James MIller

quotes.message: Finding someone likeable is not just liking him but liking him in a manner sensitive to whatever makes liking him appropriate.
quotes.name: J. David Velleman

quotes.message: To find someone likeable is thus to like him for a reason.
quotes.name: J. David Velleman

quotes.message: Liking someone is a positive feeling and positivity is key to feeling good about yourself and the world.
quotes.name: Sally Anne Hurley

quotes.message: Liking someone focuses on what they do for you; loving someone is what you must do to honor who they are.
quotes.name: Frank Sabatte

quotes.message: The key is to try to be at peace with everyone and avoid conflicts based on you not liking someone and someone not liking you.
quotes.name: Jawara D. King D.D.

quotes.message: Just learning that someone likes you can be quite an ego-booster and the next time you interact with that person you're apt to act a little differently— a little warmer and friendlier perhaps.
quotes.name: Patricia Wallace

quotes.message: Liking someone means that the person has admirable traits that you can respect and appreciate.
quotes.name: Abraham J. Twerski

quotes.message: Liking someone is not a precondition for a successful working relationship. Remember you don't have to like someone on a personal basis in order to work effectively with her.
quotes.name: Michael Henry Cohen

quotes.message: I like her because she smiles at me and means it.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: Do not agree to a disagreeable thing spoken by someone you like or disagree to an agreeable thing spoken by someone you dislike.
quotes.name: Ram Mohan

quotes.message: I'm not concerned with your liking or disliking me… All I ask is that you respect me as a human being.
quotes.name: Jackie Robinson

quotes.message: Liking is probably the best form of ownership, and ownership the worst form of liking.
quotes.name: Jose Saramago

quotes.message: Getting people to like you is merely the other side of liking them.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Now I worry. If people ended up liking me, did I do the job wrong? So I decided they didn't end up liking me - they ended up being able to deal with me.
quotes.name: Daniel Okrent

quotes.message: There are some things you can't share without ending up liking each other.
quotes.name: J.K. Rowling

quotes.message: Admiration is a very short-lived passion, that immediately decays upon growing familiar with its object.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: I'm sick of just liking people. I wish to God I could meet somebody I could respect.
quotes.name: J.D. Salinger

quotes.message: When you're the cool guy, you don't know how to take people not liking you. I've already been there, done that.
quotes.name: Kyle

quotes.message: She was always daydreaming. She never wanted to live in the real world; she always seemed to be separated from other children her age. They couldn’t understand her or her imagination. She was always thinking outside of the box, breaking rules, and only following what her heart told her was right.
quotes.name: Shannon A. Thompson

quotes.message: She never felt like she belonged anywhere,except for when she was lying on her bed, pretending to be somewhere else.
quotes.name: Rainbow Rowell Eleanor and Park

quotes.message: A daydream is a meal at which images are eaten. Some of us are gourmets, some gourmands, and a good many take their images precooked out of a can and swallow them down whole, absent-mindedly and with little relish.
quotes.name: W.H. Auden

quotes.message: There are certain half-dreaming moods of mind in which we naturally steal away from noise and glare, and seek some quiet haunt where we may indulge our reveries and build our air castles undisturbed.
quotes.name: Washington Irving

quotes.message: Lying in bed and daydreaming was the best thing I did all day.
quotes.name: Marty Rubin

quotes.message: Is daydreaming a distraction from work, or work a distraction from daydreaming?
quotes.name: Marty Rubin

quotes.message: We seek to escape the dark cave of a despondent mind by either dulling oneself mentally or through imaginative acts. One form of escapism is daydreaming.
quotes.name: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.message: I try to maintain a healthy dose of daydreaming to remain sane.
quotes.name: Florence Welch

quotes.message: In my head, this world is so much more beautiful. If you ever catch me daydream, please, don’t wake me up.
quotes.name: Mandy K

quotes.message: Daydreams are cool alright. Daydreams are nice, especially the ones about... food.
quotes.name: Doug Walker

quotes.message: Do you ever daydream? I do. That's the only time I'm really happy. Dreaming.
quotes.name: Charles Chaplin

quotes.message: I doze and daydream. I think about my life. I don't know what I did wrong. I'd feel better if I did.
quotes.name: Robert K. Massie

quotes.message: You're daydreamers instead of go-getters. In a way, you've got to be crazy. You're not satisfied to live with flying - you've got to be in love with it.
quotes.name: Frank Wead

quotes.message: On a street where reality is not much different from dreams I've had . A dream is all I have .
quotes.name: Y Adman Chris

quotes.message: Daydreaming, daydreaming into the night . And I'm alright . Daydreaming, daydreaming all the time .
quotes.name: Y Adman Chris

quotes.message: Daydreaming, just daydreaming .
quotes.name: Andre G Previn

quotes.message: Daydreaming, just daydreaming . Helps me find the joy, the boy I call my own . Night comes on, it's true I'm blue .
quotes.name: Andre G Previn

quotes.message: Daydreaming, just daydreaming . Please don't mind if I just sigh and stay . Stay dreaming, daydreaming .
quotes.name: Andre G Previn

quotes.message: So many times things pass you by . Imagination running wild . You've got to start choosing right from wrong .
quotes.name: Christopher Lowe

quotes.message: Life's happening now . And there's no time to sleep . Daydreaming, . You're daydreaming, . You dream of the day .
quotes.name: Kincaid Alan Smith

quotes.message: Daydreaming, . You're daydreaming, . You're dreaming your life away . Although the headlines scream at you, .
quotes.name: Kincaid Alan Smith

quotes.message: Well I'm floating on air when I'm daydreaming . I quietly observe standing in my space .
quotes.name: Adrian Nicholas Matthew Thaws

quotes.message: And we're all daydreaming now . Escape to another world . Live for another day .
quotes.name: Elliot Gleave

quotes.message: Where you been all of my life . I've been daydreaming 'bout you .
quotes.name: Brian Thomas Higgins

quotes.message: But I don't mind if I'm only daydreaming . If dreams can bring so near to me .
quotes.name: Walter Carl Becker

quotes.message: Day dream . Don't break my reverie . Until I find that she .
quotes.name: Billy Strayhorn

quotes.message: And you can be sure that if you're feeling right . A daydream will last long into the night . Tomorrow at breakfast you may prick up your ears .
quotes.name: John Sebastian

quotes.message: What a day for a daydream . Custom made for a daydreaming boy . And I'm lost in a daydream .
quotes.name: John Sebastian

quotes.message: Daydreaming . Under crying skies . Everything is better here .
quotes.name: Jorgen Keill Elofsson

quotes.message: A world in myself . Daydreaming admiring being . Quietly, open the world . I hear the time of the starry sky .
quotes.name: Elizabeth Fraser

quotes.message: I remember sitting back daydreaming . Bout a better life with finer things . To be honest I would do that a lot . But now our dreams turning into reality.
quotes.name: Reburst

quotes.message: Your greatness lies in your daydreams. But they are great only to the extent to which they inspire you to work and strive towards them. When they do, you will find that you are wiser and happier than you have ever been.
quotes.name: Robert O'Brien

quotes.message: Daydream If you have built castles in the air, that is where they should be; now put foundations under them.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: How many of our daydreams would darken into nightmares were there any danger of their coming true.
quotes.name: Logan P. Smith

quotes.message: Vision without execution is a daydream. Execution without vision is a nightmare.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: I had a daydream about a nightmare. . Today is the only day you can live. . A sort stay leaves a good impression.
quotes.name: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.message: Sometimes I daydream. . I dream about life, . Trying to find a purpose.
quotes.name: Richard Adcock

quotes.message: I keep looking for a purpose . Like a hungry dog searching for food. . Sometimes I daydream, . Wishing I was someone else.
quotes.name: Richard Adcock

quotes.message: We are lost in the daydream landscapes we have created in our minds.
quotes.name: David Nichtern

quotes.message: Daydreaming , our ability to give 'to airy nothing. A local habitation and a name,' remains one of the most fascinating, if perplexing, phenomena in the vast range of human behavior.
quotes.name: Jerome L. Singer

quotes.message: Daydreaming or conscious fantasy seems most likely to occur under conditions relatively similar to those of night dreaming.
quotes.name: Jerome L. Singer

quotes.message: Since daydreams are so often visual, the movies are especially effective in capturing their quality.
quotes.name: Jerome L. Singer

quotes.message: It is a basic human pastime to daydream, in the sense of entertaining conscious and private fictions.
quotes.name: M. Regis

quotes.message: Daydreams are private fictions; few are wiling to submit their fantasies.
quotes.name: M. Regis

quotes.message: Daydreams are very common and yet they remain theoretically elusive.
quotes.name: M. Regis

quotes.message: One knows that a daydream is not real. It is not confused with present reality.
quotes.name: Teresa Brennan

quotes.message: Visionaries of every sort credit daydreams for creating conditions ripe for moments of insight to blossom.
quotes.name: Amy Fries

quotes.message: The beauty of daydreaming is that it's a process available to everyone of us.
quotes.name: Amy Fries

quotes.message: The uncensored aspect of daydreaming is also priceless in that it gives us both the means and the freedom to explore, without an internal critic hovering over us.
quotes.name: Amy Fries

quotes.message: What happens in your daydreams, stays in your daydreams, unless you choose to share.
quotes.name: Amy Fries

quotes.message: Daydreaming does not enjoy tremendous prestige in our culture, which tends to regard it as unproductive thought.
quotes.name: Michael Pollan

quotes.message: Daydreaming with pencil and paper is a respectable form of meditation.
quotes.name: John Howe

quotes.message: A daydream is a meal at which images are eaten. Some of us are gourmets.
quotes.name: W. H. Auden

quotes.message: Daydreaming is okay, even better if you can make some lasting memory out of it.
quotes.name: Leslie Dean Brown

quotes.message: A story in your head isn't a story. It's just a daydream until you actually write it down. So write it down.
quotes.name: Andy Weir

quotes.message: You can spend your time daydreaming or make use of it in other ways.
quotes.name: Erik Qualman

quotes.message: I was trying to daydream, but my mind kept wandering.
quotes.name: Steven Wright

quotes.message: They say there's no harm in daydreaming, but there is.
quotes.name: Charlaine Harris

quotes.message: If you don't daydream your life is a nightmare.
quotes.name: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.message: Everything starts as somebody's daydream.
quotes.name: Larry Niven

quotes.message: Daydreams were dangerous because they made her wish for things she could never have.
quotes.name: Julie Garwood

quotes.message: We can imprison ourselves with our wants, wishes, and false dreams.
quotes.name: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.message: Day dreaming is actually research for the next book.
quotes.name: Val Richards

quotes.message: Daydreaming allows you to play out scenarios where you miraculously save the day. You play out scenarios in your head that are kind of crazy, and then you personally, heroically resolve them.
quotes.name: Mark Waters

quotes.message: Unlike any other form of thought, daydreaming is its own reward.
quotes.name: Michael Pollan

quotes.message: Getting knocked down in life is a given. Getting up and moving forward is a choice.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: What is coming is better than what is gone. Let this belief aim you in the direction you need to go.
quotes.name: Karen Salmanson

quotes.message: Just doing nothing and having those still moments is what really rejuvenates the body.
quotes.name: Miranda Kerr

quotes.message: A woman who lives with the stress of an overwhelmed schedule will often ache with the sadness of an underwhelmed soul.
quotes.name: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.message: If we don't see a failure as a challenge to modify our approach, but rather as a problem with ourselves, as a personality defect, we will immediately feel overwhelmed.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: It is nice finding that place where you can just go and relax.
quotes.name: Moises Arias

quotes.message: When you're overwhelmed by your emotion, you listen less and you judge more. This is also the reality of the dogmatic mind.
quotes.name: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.message: We don't realize that, somewhere within us all, there does exist a supreme self who is eternally at peace.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.message: Even from a dark night, songs of beauty can be born.
quotes.name: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.message: Life can be magnificent and overwhelming, that is the whole tragedy. Without beauty, love, or danger it would almost be easy to live.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: When life gets hectic and you feel overwhelmed, take a moment to focus on the people and things you are most grateful for. When you have an attitude of gratitude, frustrating troubles will fall by the wayside.
quotes.name: Dana Arcuri

quotes.message: When you do nothing, you feel overwhelmed and powerless. But when you get involved, you feel the sense of hope and accomplishment that comes from knowing you are working to make things better.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: We should all relax about life because you don't have a clue as to what's really going on.
quotes.name: Barry Sonnenfeld

quotes.message: If you don't do anything, you simply end up overwhelmed by something happening.
quotes.name: Matsuri Hino

quotes.message: The benefit of carrying the entire world on your shoulders was that you didn't have to stare it in the face.
quotes.name: Rhian J. Martin

quotes.message: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. To be your own man is a hard business. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
quotes.name: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.message: Don't give up now. Chances are your best kiss, your hardest laugh, and your greatest day are still yet to come.
quotes.name: Atticus

quotes.message: Life has many ways of testing a person's will, either by having nothing happen at all or by having everything happen at once.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Sometimes you're overwhelmed when a thing comes, and you do not realize the magnitude of the affair at that moment. When you get away from it, you wonder, did it really happen to you.
quotes.name: Marian Anderson

quotes.message: One must not let oneself be overwhelmed by sadness.
quotes.name: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.message: The feeling of overwhelm always means the same thing: You're too heavy on the action and not heavy enough on the alignment of energy.
quotes.name: Abraham Hicks

quotes.message: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Sometimes when you're overwhelmed by a situation, when you're in the darkest of darkness that's when your priorities are reordered.
quotes.name: Phoebe Snow

quotes.message: At some stages of your life you will deal with things and at others you are overwhelmed with misery and anxiety.
quotes.name: Nigella Lawson

quotes.message: If you're overwhelmed, lost, or like you life is out of control, do whatever you can that matters to someone else or ever did to you... it might not help, but it certainly won't hurt.
quotes.name: Ingrid Weir

quotes.message: Learning to ignore things is one of the great paths to inner peace.
quotes.name: Robert J. Sawyer

quotes.message: Anxiety happens when you think you have to figure out everything all at once. Breathe. You're strong. You got this. Take it day by day.
quotes.name: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.message: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Sometimes being overwhelmed by emotions can leave you speechless but even then it is important to identify the correct emotion.
quotes.name: Sam Owen

quotes.message: In most cases, you might just be overwhelmed by way too much sensory indoor distraught by taking in the emotions of others.
quotes.name: Vayana Ariz
