quotes.message: The person who hates you is surely overwhelmed by not just one delusion but many.
quotes.name: Josh Bartok

quotes.message: Friends had told me in breathy tones that the moment my son appeared, I'd gaze into his little unblinking eyes and feel an overwhelming, boundless love, beyond anything I'd ever experienced in my life.
quotes.name: Kristin Van Ogtrop

quotes.message: Willingly taking on suffering, we will never be overwhelmed by the suffering that we are bound to experience.
quotes.name: Yangsi Rinpoche

quotes.message: The moment you think only of yourself, the focus of your whole reality narrows, and because of this narrow focus, uncomfortable things can appear huge and bring you fear and discomfort and a sense of feeling overwhelmed by misery.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Change begins with a decision: to be overwhelmed or to overcome.
quotes.name: Perry Noble

quotes.message: What gets our attention ultimately determines our direction. If we are constantly focused on our circumstances, we will be overwhelmed.
quotes.name: Perry Noble

quotes.message: If you continue to identify yourself by your circumstances rather than by Christ in you, then you will always feel overwhelmed and trapped.
quotes.name: Perry Noble

quotes.message: As long as we identify ourselves by who we used to be, we fall back into that cycle of sin and become overwhelmed with guilt and shame.
quotes.name: Perry Noble

quotes.message: Don't allow the fear to overpower you, allow love to overpower you.
quotes.name: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.message: A mediator can sit joyously alone for months, for years.
quotes.name: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.message: The role you undertook to play . does not strike anyone. . It itself is struck powerfully . by the irresistible aspiration of the Dialectic . to overwhelm the Human Being . with second opinions . in a second head.
quotes.name: Ilias Foukis

quotes.message: I couldn't take it back to her shadow; that same unbearably pugnacious shadow; which had so torturously broken it in the first place; trying to lambaste and invidiously overwhelm every shade of my celestial existence,
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: And from the realms . Of the shadowy elms . A tide-like darkness overwhelm . The fields that round us lie. . But the night is fair, . And everywhere . A warm, soft vapor fills the air, . And distant sounds seem near.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: You can't calm the storm, so stop trying. What you can do is calm yourself. The storm will pass.
quotes.name: Timber Hawkeye

quotes.message: When my heart is overwhelmed, lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
quotes.name: Psalm 61:2

quotes.message: I feel so much that it is hard for me at times to feel anything at all.
quotes.name: Mary Kate Teske

quotes.message: I have been driven many times to my knees by the overwhelming conviction that I had absolutely no other place to go.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Some days you will feel like the ocean. Some days you will feel like you are drowning in it.
quotes.name: Lora Mathis

quotes.message: I often think I can't do this anymore but then I realize what choice do I have?
quotes.name: Justin Blaney

quotes.message: He was swimming in a sea of other people’s expectations. Men had drowned in seas like that.
quotes.name: Robert Jordan

quotes.message: I could no longer discern what was real and what was fake. Everything, including the present, seemed to be both too much and nothing at all.
quotes.name: Clemantine Wamariya

quotes.message: What’s on your mind? I don’t know. Nothing but everything at once.
quotes.name: Lidia Longorio

quotes.message: Your past haunts you . Your present overwhelms you . Your future scares you . Yet you survive.
quotes.name: Lidia Longorio

quotes.message: I had a dream that I was being drowned in a flood and I realized it was a flood of people.
quotes.name: Ellen Burstyn

quotes.message: People are being overwhelmed with social issues, political problems and economic problems - and this notion of giving everything up and going to live off-grid and to have a simpler way of life is quite attractive.
quotes.name: Ben Fogle

quotes.message: Our greatest battles are with our minds.
quotes.name: Jameson Frank

quotes.message: So many of us live in our own palace of pain, convinced that we are alone in our struggle, but the fact is… we're not alone.
quotes.name: Lisa Lieberman-Wang

quotes.message: Few things in the world are more powerful than a positive push. A smile. A world of optimism and hope. A 'you can do it' when things are tough.
quotes.name: Richard M. DeVos

quotes.message: Optimism is essential to achievement and it is also the foundation of courage and true progress.
quotes.name: Nicholas M. Butler

quotes.message: Optimism is the madness of insisting that all is well when we are miserable.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: It only ends once. Anything that happens before that is just progress.
quotes.name: Jacob On Lost

quotes.message: Choose to be optimistic, it feels better.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.message: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: It isn't all over; everything has not been invented; the human adventure is just beginning.
quotes.name: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.message: There is some good in this world, and it's worth fighting for.
quotes.name: J.R.R.Tolkien

quotes.message: To find optimism, look for the good things in life.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Optimism can be more powerful than a battery of artillery or squadron of tanks. It can be contagious and it's necessary to being a leader.

quotes.message: The habit of looking on the bright side of every event is worth more than a thousand pounds a year.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: One of the things I learned the hard way was that it doesn't pay to get discouraged. Keeping busy and making optimism a way of life can restore your faith in yourself.
quotes.name: Lucille Ball

quotes.message: We would accomplish many more things if we did not think of them as impossible.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Optimism is joyful searching; pessimism is a prison of fear and a clutching at illusionary safety.
quotes.name: Kathleen A. Brehony

quotes.message: Optimism refuses to believe that the road ends without options.
quotes.name: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.message: It's not that optimism solves all of life's problems; it is just that it can sometimes make the difference between coping and collapsing.
quotes.name: Lucy Macdonald

quotes.message: Optimism. It's not just a mind-set, it is behavior.
quotes.name: Larry Elder

quotes.message: The predominant quality of successful people is optimism.... Your level of optimism is the very best predictor of how happy, healthy, wealthy, and long-lived you will be.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible
quotes.name: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.message: The things you think are the disasters in your life are not the disasters really. Almost anything can be turned around: out of every ditch, a path, if you can only see it.
quotes.name: Hilary Mantel

quotes.message: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.name: CS Lewis

quotes.message: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.name: Jimmy Dean

quotes.message: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
quotes.name: Maria Robinson

quotes.message: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done.
quotes.name: Bo Bennett

quotes.message: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship.
quotes.name: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.message: Teaching is the greatest act of optimism.
quotes.name: Colleen Wilcox

quotes.message: It can be said of optimism that while sometimes mistaken, it is never sadly mistaken.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: Optimism is a kind of heart stimulant ? the digitalis of failure.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Optimism is the foundation of courage.
quotes.name: Nicholas Murray Butler

quotes.message: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Optimism: The doctrine or belief that everything is beautiful, including what is ugly.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: My sun sets to rise again.
quotes.name: Robert Browning

quotes.message: I believe that man will not merely endure; he will prevail.
quotes.name: William Faulkner

quotes.message: Optimism is the content of small men in high places.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Miracles happen to those who believe in them.
quotes.name: Bernhard Berenson

quotes.message: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will be drawn to you.
quotes.name: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.message: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.message: If I have the belief that I can do it, I shall surely acquire the capacity to do it even if I may not have it at the beginning.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: If you can imagine it you can achieve it. If you can dream it, you can become it.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: Optimism with some experience behind it is much more energizing than plain old experience with a certain degree of cynicism.
quotes.name: Twyla Tharp

quotes.message: Scared and sacred are spelled with the same letters. Awful proceeds from the same root word as awesome. Terrify and terrific. Every negative experience holds the seed of transformation.
quotes.name: Alan Cohen

quotes.message: The darkest night is often the bridge to the brightest tomorrow.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: Optimism helps us persevere. Life isn't easy. But life is always good.
quotes.name: John Jacobs

quotes.message: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change by merely changing his attitude.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Believe it is possible to solve your problem. Tremendous things happen to the believer. So believe the answer will come. It will.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: While we may not be able to control all that happens to us, we can control what happens inside us.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Every cloud has a silver lining.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: When things are at the worst, they begin to mend.
quotes.name: English Proverb

quotes.message: Sin is behooved, and all shall be well and all manner of thing shall be well.
quotes.name: Julian of Norwich

quotes.message: In this best of possible worlds...all is for the best.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Sunshine and light come always to those who sincerely hope that their dreams will come true.
quotes.name: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.message: Optimism doesn't wait on facts. It deals with prospects. Pessimism is a waste of time.

quotes.message: An optimist may see a light where there is none, but why must the pessimist always run to blow it out?
quotes.name: Michel de Saint-Pierre

quotes.message: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Always expect the best and you'll see that the outcome is spontaneously contained in the expectation
quotes.name: Deepak Chopra

quotes.message: Grey skies are just clouds passing over.
quotes.name: Duke Ellington

quotes.message: Be fanatically positive and militantly optimistic. If something is not to your liking, change your liking.

quotes.message: An optimist understands that life can be a bumpy road, but at least it is leading somewhere. They learn from mistakes and failures and are not afraid to fail again.

quotes.message: Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out.
quotes.name: John Wooden

quotes.message: Do not anticipate trouble or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight.

quotes.message: What is hope but a feeling of optimism, a thought that says things will improve, it won't always be bleak ad there's a way to rise above the present circumstances.

quotes.message: Even if I knew that tomorrow would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.

quotes.message: Optimism is a strategy for making a better future. Because unless you believe that the future can be better, you are unlikely to step up and take responsibility for making it so.

quotes.message: The latest definition of an optimist is one who fills up his crossword puzzle in ink.

quotes.message: An optimist is one who knows exactly how bad a place the world can be; a pessimist is one who finds out anew every morning.

quotes.message: Optimism, warranted or not, will help you when you're frustrated and the odds are against you. Some call such optimism a belief in miracles.

quotes.message: Set your sights high, the higher the better. Expect the most wonderful things to happen, not in the future but right now. Realize that nothing is too good. Allow absolutely nothing to hamper you or hold you up in any way.
quotes.name: Eileen Caddy

quotes.message: Keep your face to the sunshine, and you cannot see the shadow.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: I would rather stay positive and get 60 percent good results than stay negative and get 100 percent bad results.
quotes.name: Joyce Meyer

quotes.message: I make the most of all that comes and the least of all that goes.
quotes.name: Sara Teasdale

quotes.message: Hope is definitely not the same thing as optimism. It is not the conviction that something will turn out well, but the certainty that something makes sense, regardless of how it turns out.
quotes.name: Vaclav Havel

quotes.message: If you pretend to be good, the world takes you very seriously. If you pretend to be bad, it doesn't. Such is the astonishing stupidity of optimism.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope.

quotes.message: Nobody is stronger, nobody is weaker than someone who came back. There is nothing you can do to such a person because whatever you could do is less than what has already been done to him. We have already paid the price.

quotes.message: In spite of everything that was done to me and my race, in spite of the adversity and the bitter moments, again we rise.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: In a mad world, only the mad are sane.
quotes.name: Akiro Kurosawa

quotes.message: Peace is the one condition of survival in this nuclear age.

quotes.message: All I'm trying to do is not join my ancestral spirits just yet.
quotes.name: Joshua Nkomo

quotes.message: Hunger, love, pain, fear are some of those inner forces which rule the individual's instinct for self preservation.

quotes.message: If you live among wolves you have to act like a wolf.
quotes.name: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.message: To survive it is often necessary to fight and to fight you have to dirty yourself.
quotes.name: George Orwell

quotes.message: Once one determines that he or she has a mission in life, that's it's not going to be accomplished without a great deal of pain, and that the rewards in the end may not outweigh the pain --if you recognize historically that always happens, then when it comes, you survive it.

quotes.message: Man can live about forty days without food, about three days without water, about eight minutes without air, but only for one second without hope.

quotes.message: Survival is nothing more than recovery.
quotes.name: Dianne Feinstein

quotes.message: The ability to delude yourself may be an important survival tool.

quotes.message: Through humor, you can soften some of the worst blows that life delivers. And once you find laughter, no matter how painful your situation might be, you can survive it.

quotes.message: In a world where change is inevitable and continuous, the need to achieve that change without violence is essential for survival.
quotes.name: Andrew Young

quotes.message: For Harmony. A chance at life. To fight on other days.
quotes.name: Janet Morris

quotes.message: The consciousness of being deemed dead, is next to the presumable unpleasantness of being so in reality. One feels like his own ghost unlawfully tenanting a defunct carcass.
quotes.name: Herman Melville

quotes.message: Nature's stern discipline enjoins mutual help at least as often as warfare. The fittest may also be the gentlest.
quotes.name: Theodosius Dobzhansky

quotes.message: The faster you can signal for rescue, the faster you get out of that situation.
quotes.name: Joseph Teti

quotes.message: You don't know if you're going to be rescued in a day or a month; gotta prepare for the long haul; gotta make the place your home.
quotes.name: Matt Graham

quotes.message: The man who goes afoot, prepared to camp anywhere and in any weather, is the most independent fellow on earth.
quotes.name: Horace Kephart

quotes.message: Perhaps catastrophe is the natural human environment, and even though we spend a good deal of energy trying to get away from it, we are programmed for survival amid catastrophe.
quotes.name: Germaine Greer

quotes.message: Tis the last rose of summer Left blooming alone; All her lovely companions Are faded and gone.
quotes.name: Thomas More

quotes.message: Every day I run scared. That's the only way I can stay ahead.
quotes.name: John H. Johnson

quotes.message: The condition of man... is a condition of war of everyone against everyone.
quotes.name: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.message: And while the law of competition may be sometimes hard for the individual, it is best for the race, because it ensures the survival of the fittest in every department.

quotes.message: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent, but rather the one most adaptable to change.

quotes.message: Resilience is the maintenance of high levels of positive affect and well-being in the face of adversity. It is not that resilient individuals never experience negative affect, but rather that the negative affect does not persist.
quotes.name: Richard J. Davidson

quotes.message: Self-preservation is the first principle of our nature.

quotes.message: In truth, we exist and survive, not because of the ego, but in spite of it.
quotes.name: David R. Hawkins

quotes.message: Only the strong survive.

quotes.message: Rule of survival: Pack your own parachute.
quotes.name: T.L. Hakala

quotes.message: Victory at all costs, victory in spite of all terror, victory however long and hard the road may be; for without victory, there is no survival.

quotes.message: We shall draw from the heart of suffering itself the means of inspiration and survival.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Survival is triumph enough.
quotes.name: Harry Crews

quotes.message: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: It takes but one positive thought when given a chance to survive and thrive to overpower an entire army of negative thoughts.
quotes.name: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.message: Confront them with annihilation, and they will then survive; plunge them into a deadly situation, and they will then live. When people fall into danger, they are then able to strive for victory.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: Every man is wise when attacked by a mad dog; fewer when pursued by a mad woman; only the wisest survive when attacked by a mad notion.
quotes.name: Robertson Davies

quotes.message: Notice that the stiffest tree is most easily cracked, while the bamboo or willow survives by bending with the wind.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Hunger, love, pain, fear are some of those inner forces which rule the individual's instinct for self preservation.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Self-preservation, nature's first great law, all the creatures, except man, doth awe.
quotes.name: Andrew Marvell

quotes.message: We are survival machines -- robot vehicles blindly programmed to preserve the selfish molecules known as genes.
quotes.name: Richard Dawkins

quotes.message: Survival is the ability to swim in strange water.
quotes.name: Frank Herbert

quotes.message: Survival often feels like an indignity.
quotes.name: Guillermo Del Toro

quotes.message: In the greater part of humankind there resides an instinct for survival. It is this which can clutch at straws and effect a rescue from them. It is this which can, now and then, outwit fate.
quotes.name: Tanith Lee

quotes.message: Survival ... is an infinite capacity for suspicion.
quotes.name: John Le Carre

quotes.message: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: What does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: There's a difference between surviving and living.
quotes.name: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.message: I think that adaptation is the key to survival. Cooperation and symbiosis.
quotes.name: John Wyndham

quotes.message: Life is cruelty. We all feed on each other, exploit each other in some way to survive.
quotes.name: John Wyndham

quotes.message: Survival is not about certain death, it is about keeping your head down.
quotes.name: John Ridley

quotes.message: There is more to life than survival.
quotes.name: John Maclean

quotes.message: Surviving is not relevant. Living is. We want to live.
quotes.name: Gabe Ibáñez

quotes.message: The Pilgrims were born to help us in our heroic quest for survival. Now they build our homes, drive our cars, and wipe our asses when we get old. I have no idea what we're going to do next.
quotes.name: Gabe Ibáñez

quotes.message: Why does the Doctor always survive? Because he always assumes he's going to win. He always knows there's a way to survive. He just has to go and find it.
quotes.name: Steven Moffat

quotes.message: If the Earth dies, you die. If you die, the Earth survives. There are only a handful of planets in the cosmos that are capable of supporting complex life.
quotes.name: David Scarpa

quotes.message: Only the strong survive, you gotta be strong, you gotta hold on.
quotes.name: Chris Hegedus

quotes.message: In any disaster situation having a full tank of gas or access to gas is a dire emergency and can mean the difference between life and death in some cases.
quotes.name: Shannon Rizzotto

quotes.message: Being able to travel to get help, food, water, and even medical treatment will enable you to be one step up on any disaster.
quotes.name: Shannon Rizzotto

quotes.message: Regardless what the disaster situation brings you are going to need water. Water is essential in survival.
quotes.name: Shannon Rizzotto

quotes.message: The human body requires water to survive the amount however, depends on the body type and size of the person.
quotes.name: Shannon Rizzotto

quotes.message: Everyone is going to be stressed after a collapse. As long as you're' willing to take at least part of your payments in alternative currencies, you might be able to make a good living thinking out the box.
quotes.name: Sean Brodrick

quotes.message: The ability to adapt to change will make your life easier, no matter what lies ahead.
quotes.name: Sean Brodrick

quotes.message: There are qualities that will make you more successful at changing, and they're qualities for which you might want to strive because if you're not in the right mental and emotional space, then preparing for potentially catastrophic change will be that much harder.
quotes.name: Sean Brodrick

quotes.message: The times we are living in now are the richest, fattest days in human history. Life will probably never get easier. This is when you need to start preparing right now for the hard times coming.
quotes.name: Sean Brodrick

quotes.message: Stockpiling, self-sufficiency, and frugality, which I prefer to call Spartaneity, are three tools that will help you survive and thrive.
quotes.name: Sean Brodrick

quotes.message: Survival is the continuation of life or existence in the presence of or despite unusually difficult conditions.
quotes.name: Rainer Stahlberg

quotes.message: In order to survive after the fall of civilized society you will have to roam about in order to locate whatever your specific necessities of life may be, and at some point you may be forced to raid in order to actually obtain them. By definition, now, that makes you a Marauder.
quotes.name: Kilkenny

quotes.message: In order to survive the fall of civilization, it will do you no good to be a hoarder, or a Prepper.
quotes.name: Kilkenny

quotes.message: Prepping is not the answer. Sure, you need to have some supplies on hand to get going, but the only real way to keep living, and thriving, is by looking for what you need and then taking it.
quotes.name: Kilkenny

quotes.message: There's only one way to survive. Go out and do it first.
quotes.name: Kilkenny

quotes.message: If you live on a farm, or way out in the country and are supplied by water from your own well, congratulations. You survive the first few weeks.
quotes.name: Kilkenny

quotes.message: An important benefit to learning survival skills is it increases your self-confidence.
quotes.name: Jim Cobb

quotes.message: Having the ability to not just think but know you have what it takes to survive can make the difference between a news story featuring your survival over incredible odds vs becoming just another tragic statistic.
quotes.name: Jim Cobb

quotes.message: What does it mean to improvise in a survival scenario? Simply put, it is using what you have to get what you need.
quotes.name: Jim Cobb

quotes.message: No matter how hard you prep, how much money you spend, and how many hours you invest, the disaster always calls the shots.
quotes.name: Jim Cobb

quotes.message: With a little resourcefulness and an 'outside of the survival box' mentality, you can oftentimes use what you do have to get what you need.
quotes.name: Jim Cobb

quotes.message: Disease outbreaks, global wars, environmental catastrophes, nuclear disasters, and colonization are all apocalyptic events that humanity has survived.
quotes.name: Bradley Garrett

quotes.message: Looking to past events should give us hope, because human beings can and do survive events like those that are unfolding.
quotes.name: Bradley Garrett

quotes.message: Catastrophe is the natural human environment, and even though we spend a good deal of energy trying to get away from it, we are programmed for survival amid catastrophe.
quotes.name: Bradley Garrett

quotes.message: Animal life is an important and substantial source of food for survival.
quotes.name: Larry Dean Olsen

quotes.message: A person thrown into a primitive survival situation would quickly find his existence greatly impaired without the aid of so simple a tool as a pocketknife.
quotes.name: Larry Dean Olsen

quotes.message: It would seem that one could never survive without a knife to cut poles for building shelters, to cut shafts for a spear or bow.
quotes.name: Larry Dean Olsen

quotes.message: It is asserted from time that true survival is measured by a person's capacity to stay put and prepared.
quotes.name: Larry Dean Olsen

quotes.message: In survival terms we might say that comfort only gets in the way.
quotes.name: Larry Dean Olsen

quotes.message: Probably the most important decision you'll make in your preparations for a crisis is the location of your retreat.
quotes.name: James Wesley

quotes.message: No. I can survive well enough on my own— if given the proper reading material.
quotes.name: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.message: If you truly want to be respected by people you love, you must prove to them that you can survive without them.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: If time be of all things the most precious, wasting time must be the greatest prodigality.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: There's no good way to waste your time. Wasting time is just wasting time.
quotes.name: Helen Mirren

quotes.message: Half the time men think they are talking business, they are wasting time.
quotes.name: E. W. Howe

quotes.message: Wasting time is something that people do or feel all over the world, not just in Italy.
quotes.name: Paolo Sorrentino

quotes.message: When you spend time worrying, you're simply using your imagination to create things you don't want.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: To think too long about doing a thing often becomes its undoing.
quotes.name: Eva Young

quotes.message: A year from now you will wish you had started today.
quotes.name: Karen Lamb

quotes.message: I do not want to waste any time. And if you are not working on important things, you are wasting time.
quotes.name: Dean Kamen

quotes.message: Any time you have an opportunity to make a difference in this world and you don't, then you are wasting your time on Earth.
quotes.name: Roberto Clemente

quotes.message: If you are not doing what you love, you are wasting your time.
quotes.name: Billy Joel

quotes.message: When one pays a visit it is for the purpose of wasting other people's time, not one's own.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: When you kill time, remember that it has no resurrection.
quotes.name: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.message: Your time is way too valuable to be wasting on people that can't accept who you are.
quotes.name: Turcois Ominek

quotes.message: The biggest mistake you can make in life is to waste your time.
quotes.name: Jerry Bruckner

quotes.message: One of the very worst uses of time is to do something very well that need not to be done at all.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Don't waste your time on revenge. Those who hurt you will eventually face their own karma.
quotes.name: Matareva Pearl

quotes.message: If you're wasting your time or your attention, then start investing it wisely.
quotes.name: Mitch Thrower

quotes.message: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.name: Charles Robert Darwin

quotes.message: Never make someone a priority when all you are to them is an option.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Wasting Time Is Robbing Oneself.
quotes.name: Estonian Proverb

quotes.message: Stop wanting someone who doesn't want you. You're just wasting your time.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Wasting time with the wrong person is just time wasted.
quotes.name: Greg Behrendt

quotes.message: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: It's bad enough wasting time without killing it.
quotes.name: Norton Juster

quotes.message: Someone wasting your time is far worse than someone wasting your money.
quotes.name: Mitch Thrower

quotes.message: No point in wasting time with false vanity when you possess the real thing.
quotes.name: Alan Bradley

quotes.message: What fools call wasting time is most often the best investment.
quotes.name: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.message: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.
quotes.name: Tom Robbins

quotes.message: There is no waste of time in life like that of making explanations.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: Don't live in the past. There's no point. You can't change anything. What a waste of time.
quotes.name: Bob Newhart

quotes.message: We cannot waste time. We can only waste ourselves.
quotes.name: George Matthew Adams

quotes.message: Doing a thing well is often a waste of time.
quotes.name: Robert Byrne

quotes.message: The best way to fill time is to waste it.
quotes.name: Marguerite Duras

quotes.message: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Doing something you're not fully committed to is a colossal waste of time.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: If I do not waste time, I am wasting my time.
quotes.name: James Richardson

quotes.message: Short as life is, we make it still shorter by the careless waste of time.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: I'm not gonna waste your time, so I wouldn't expect you to waste my time.
quotes.name: Terrell Owens

quotes.message: There's no reason to waste time trying to prove who you are to people that don't even know who they are.
quotes.name: Pastor YPJ

quotes.message: Spending today complaining about yesterday won't make tomorrow any better.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The biggest waste is the waste of time.
quotes.name: Theophrastus

quotes.message: Stop Wasting Time trying to find the perfect person Instead, Invest your time in becoming the best You, and the right person will come along very quickly.
quotes.name: Charles Orlando

quotes.message: Do something instead of killing time because time is killing you.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Do not waste time trying to convince people who have their mind made up.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Sometimes we waste too much time to think about someone who doesn't even think about us for a second.
quotes.name: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.message: Anyone who loves in the expectation of being loved in return is wasting their time.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: If you're wasting time having fun, you're not wasting time.
quotes.name: Tim Ferriss

quotes.message: When the time comes for you to leave this earth, if it doesn’t become a lesser place with your absence, then you have wasted your life.
quotes.name: Shaun Hick

quotes.message: We're wasting time, when already we've wasted enough. We've got everything ahead, waiting for us.
quotes.name: V.C. Andrews

quotes.message: How tragic it is to find that an entire lifetime is wasted in pursuit of distractions while purpose is neglected.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: To live a busy life, to not be excruciatingly pained by the wasted years and maximize the time at hand.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: If you understand that a wasted time is a wasted life, you will start running away from television, you will begin to run away from movies, you will run away from games like criminal case and candy crush.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: When you waste one hour of your time, you have wasted your life.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: Your time keeps flying away into vanity while you dine with your distractions. Your life keeps diminishing while you waste your time feeding your distractions.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: You will need an evidence to show the world that you didn’t waste your time here on earth.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: You are to use this one life to make a difference in your world. You are to invest your time and not waste it.
quotes.name: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.message: Stop wasting your time looking for the key to happiness… the door is open and unlocked… just walk through it.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: I am often filled with wonder when I see some men demanding the time of others and those from whom they ask it most indulgent. Both of them fix their eyes on the object of the request for time, neither of them on the time itself; just as if what is asked were nothing, what is given, nothing.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: No one sets a value on time, all use it lavishly as if it cost nothing.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Man had time enough, but those who have been robbed of much of their life by the public, have necessarily had too little of it.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Ain't it funny how the best days of my life was all that wasted time. All that wasted time.
quotes.name: Keith Urban

quotes.message: Mama told me life's not fair. So cliche advice right there. The time we wasted, time we lost. We don't even try.
quotes.name: Ari Lennox

quotes.message: The only value of wasted time is knowledge.
quotes.name: Monica Drake

quotes.message: Every second wasted might have saved a life.
quotes.name: Jason Medina

quotes.message: Don’t waste someone’s time or money when you know that person is not someone you want a future with.
quotes.name: April Harding

quotes.message: We are wasting time. Time wastes itself.
quotes.name: Iain M. Banks

quotes.message: Over a lifetime there are vast amounts of available time that on analysis are wasted.
quotes.name: Steven Redhead
